column2: Oobho eghun otu obho ạJizos Kraist ạḅol bọ aru tẹmar-arōoy obho. Odi olꞌeghun otu taDevid ọony ọobhe tEbrạhạm,
ọde tẠizik, ọde tạJekob. ẠJekob ọde taJuda nꞌaburumōr odi.
AJuda ọde tạPerez nꞌaZera, oniin eedi ughōl ạTama. ẠPerez ọde tạHezron, ọde tạRam,
ọde tẠminadab, ọde taNason, ọde tạSalmon,
ọde tạBoaz (oniin odi ughōl ạRehab). ẠBoaz ọde tObed (oniin odi ughōl aRut). Obed ọde tạJesi,
ọde taDevid.
ADevid ọde tạSolomon (oniin odi ạni taYuraya).
ẠSolomon ọde taRihoboam, ọde tAbaija, ọde tẠsa,
ọde tạJehosafat, ọde tạJoram, ọde tỤzaya,
ọde tạJotam, ọde tEhaz, ọde tạHezekaya,
ọde tạManase, ọde tẠmon, ọde taJosaya,
ọde tạJekonaya nꞌaburumōr odi, tamen obho ubhin rōoy tIzirẹl ubhin ụghi tạBabilon.
Tamen obho moobhin rōoy obho ubhin ụghi tạBabilon, ạJekonaya ọde tạSealtiel, ọde tạZerubabel,
ọde tAbiud, ọde tẸliakim, ọde tAzor,
ọde tạZedok, ọde tẠkim, ọde tẸliud,
ọde tẸliezar, ọde tạMatan, ọde tạJekob,
ọde taJosef olom taMeri obho aru moniin tạJizos obho ughōl bọ mạMesaya.

Aḍiōbh nꞌinya ọoke ạburude nꞌạnwuny abhin tamen tEbrạhạm ạghi asi tamen taDevid, nꞌịnon aḍiōbh nꞌinya abhin tamen taDevid asi tạsaki ụseghe rōoy Izirẹl ubhin ụghi tạBabilon, nꞌịnon aḍiōbh nꞌinya abhin asi tạsaki obho ụmar ạMesaya obho.
Iibha pẹzo ụmar mạJizos Kraist. Oniin odi ughōl aMeri. Tamen obho aJosef atuḅeen mọkala mobhin odi, ịzal eedi dẹrolan io monyiin esi, pụmiin bho odi maamōr mọony tesi ịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho.
AJosef olom obhꞌodi ooḅi ōoy molo ọva ḍio mọloki odi rẹgheer mi teesoḍia arōoy, podi ạatua tologhi odi be mọgbaranuan odi mi tẹḅokia.

Ẹzo bho odi aseeri moomo ologhi odi mi tịitua iibha bho, potelema tObạmọogh obho amutenaan odi mi tạramala ạkpete kua, “AJosef, ọony ọobhe taDevid, ughiilaan ghạ mobhin aMeri ọlogha talōor onuma kạni onuma. Obho odi bọ tọbaraka odi obho olꞌẸmugh Iigbia bho.
Odi tạmar molobhir ọony keḍio ạna takōl ḍien odi ạJizos, ebum obho odi tạpel rōoy odi atẹnẹmi tịkarabh eedi obho.”
Iibha bho imute kua moḍighi obhulughi tibha Obạmọogh obho abhin tọnu ozil obho ạkpete bọ aghōl,
“Iinon, onyiin ọkpur ọnyani taamōr ni ạmar molobhir ọony, keḍio tokōl ḍien obhꞌodi Ịmanuel.” “Ẹnaan odi nꞌezira,” pẹmu obho.
Amen aJosef ạsuma tạramala bho, podi ạtuugh aḍighi mibha otelema tObạmọogh obho ạkpete ạnogho odi obho, ạghi abhin maMeri.
Odi omunuom io zodi ninii odi aru ạmar molobhir ọony obho, keḍio odi aJosef aghōl ḍien odi ạJizos.
Ụmar ạJizos tạBetilihem ebhugh obhꞌaJudia mi taraḍuma tạHerod ọolema bho. Tamen obho ụmar odi obho, pilōghōm ạar arōoy ịḍua temutonom aghōzōgh obho iru taJerusạlẹm,
nepuruan kua, “Oḍighen ọony obho ụmar bọ bho, obho tatu bọ mọolema arōoy aJu obho? Ezōor nọomiin mẹenaany odi bho amute temutonom aghōzōgh obho kezōor oru mookpulughu odi.”
Amen ạHerod ọolema ạmoghon miibha bho, pekpom odi ạbhur magey. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mi toomo obo bho idi taJerusạlẹm obho.
Podi abheleghi aakōbhōghi moomo aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho, apuruan kua zeedi, “Tọmar teḍighen maKraist obho.”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Tọmar tạBetilihem obho ebhugh obhꞌaJudia. Ozil obho ạge kua,
‘Ạna ạBetilihem obhꞌebhugh obhꞌaJuda,
ạna ukio ḍio apu mi teesoḍia ạruula ebhugh obhꞌaJudia,
ebum obho ọola tạḍua tonuma atu
mọda arōoy ạmi Izirẹl obho.’ ”
PạHerod abheleghi milōghōm ạar arōoy obho mi tẹḅokia ạva teedi alōghōm mạkar amen obho ẹenaany obho amute bho.
Keḍio odi aghōl ạnogho eedi mọghi tạBetilihem, ạkpete kua, “Ịki mẹmaar edeny ẹva mọony obho, amen enyina nẹemiin odi, pitu mẹgba ẹnogho ạami molo ạami ạki aakpulughu ạni zodi.”
Tọnuekpete bhobho, peedi iḍigh tebōom. Tebōom obho ponyiin odi ẹenaany obho eedi ịmiin temutonom aghōzōgh obho aḍionom eedi taghisigh ninii ạghi ạmōruōm tesi obho ụmar bọ mọony obho.
Amen eedi ịmiin mẹenaany obho nạamara, mịin ẹzo ologhi eedi ạḅaal kilo eedi neesi tạnyu-ẹnaan.
Eedi iḍigh totu obho peedi ịmiin mọony obho nꞌaMeri oniin odi, peedi igbuluman iikpulughu zodi, keḍio ikpẹnyōgh rụḅa eedi iinwo zodi magold nꞌạfrankinsens nꞌamaa.
Tạramala pẸnaan aakiom eedi mọḅele omula tạHerod. Peedi ịḅol tọnon ebōom imula ighẹel tẹma ebhugh eedi.

Ilōghōm ạar arōoy obho ịḍua, potelema tObạmọogh obho amutanaan maJosef mi tạramala ạkpete kua, “Ḅetunu mabhin mọony obho nꞌoniin odi maghiilom mạḍua mạghi tIzipt, mạrol epa ninii ạami utuom ạna mọnu momula. ẠHerod tạva siibha mọony obho moghigh.”
PaJosef aḅetunu muḍugul obho abhin mọony obho nꞌoniin odi atẹn tIzipt,
ịrol epa ninii ạHerod aru ạbho.
Uḍighi miibha bho mobhulughiom tibha Obạmọogh obho abhin tọnu ozil obho ạkpete aghōl, “Ạami ubheleghi mọony ạmi amutonom mi tIzipt.”

Amen ạHerod alōghōm mobho ilōghōm ạar arōoy obho neebi zodi obho, pịikaany odi odi arōm ạghi ụze moomo ạnwuny ịzal ạsia ạseghe asōor ibha idi tạBetilihem nꞌibꞌạraama ibha ituan odi obho, tẹzo bho ilōghōm ạar arōoy obho ịgba ịnogho odi men obho eedi ịmiin mẹenaany obho.
Tiibha bho, pibha aJerimaya ozil obho ạkpete kua,
“Ọmoghon imulughu eḍi nꞌizin eghiḍim mi taRama.
AResel aleghe nwụny odi,
molo obo ọkue odi olo,
ebum obho oomꞌeedi neekun ịman obho.”
ẠHerod ạbho, potelema tObạmạogh obho amutenaan maJosef mi tạramala mi tIzipt,
ạkpete kua, “Ḅetunu mabhin mọony obho nꞌoniin odi memula tebhugh Izirẹl, ebum obho obo bho ịva bọ moghigh ọony obho nẹebhozu obho.”
PaJosef aḅetunu abhin mọony obho nꞌoniin ọony obho, imula ịghi tebhugh Izirẹl.

Amen aJosef ạmoghon mobho Ạkelaos mạarolom mẹtolom tạHerod ọde odi mi taJudia, paruugu isibh odi mobhin otu odi ọghi taJudia. Omina nạ ọmaar ookiom odi mi tạramala. Tiibha bho bẹleni, podi aḅetunu ạghi tebhugh obhꞌaGalili,
arugh ghạ tẹma olo ughōl ạNazaret. Tiibha bho puḍighi ubhulughiom tibha arizil obho ịkpete bọ ighōl, “Tokōl odi olꞌạNazaret” obho.
Tamen opopo, pạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho aru ạke nạgba dōm obho mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obhꞌaJudia,
nạkpete kua, “Ikiraan toḍighi ịkarabh enyina, ebum obho Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho nạarol ḅubh obho.”
Odi ạJon obo bho Ạizaya ozil obho ạgba bọ aghōl,
“Kir onyiin ōoy olo odi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho namulughu akōl kua,
‘Iselemi mebōom obho tObạmọogh obho meseerian zodi.
Iḍighi ebōom obhꞌodi ạmaar asel.’ ”
Arukpe tạJon uluom asubhuubh uuva, ọkpuom ukpe egum odi ozu ẹnam, keḍio ạḅa ghạ migurubia nꞌaḍava.
Arōoy ẹḍua ghạ taJerusạlẹm, nꞌoomo ebhugh obhꞌaJudia, nꞌoomo ạraama bho idi tọtu ọbhiiny obho ughōl bọ ạJodan obho eru todi.
Eedi iituma ghạ mịkarabh eedi keḍio odi tazuughiom eedi mụum mi tạJodan obho.
Amen ạJon ạmiin marōoy aFarisi nꞌaSadusi obho netu todi, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Sọo ịikpolodu, okōr ōoy ạkpete ạnogho enyina moru molo enyina emuzōnaan mi tạlile bho tẸnaan obho natu obho?
Iḍighi mọkpo lo tẹgba emutiom mobho enyina neeghiraan tịkarabh araabōom enyina.
Ịítua ghạ nạ tiloghi enyina mebo mobho Ebrạhạm aru mobꞌọde enyina. Ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, Ẹnaan tatue ni aḅẹriōn rụbharakpar bhibha aḍighi atẹnẹ nwụny tEbrạhạm.
Nooseeri makubu tamen obhobho molo olẹrẹghiom iirẹeny obho ki taruutu eedi. Koorẹeny koorẹeny olo ọloki ḍio miiḅi itu tolẹr ni otōbh ọlogh nyạn.

Ạami ubhin mụum nazuughiom enyina mọgba omutiom mobho enyina neeghiraan tịkarabh enyina, keḍio odi obo bho natu tạman ạmi obho tazuom enyina mẸmugh Iigbia bho nꞌạnyan. Odi ạbugh ạni nị kua apu zạmi. Ạami ugbẹbh io morōol arakōrō odi.
Ọosuom ale odi odi tạvo odi, mọosuom ale bho. Odi taḅunyogh ni aakōbhōghi moomo ikpo ale akubh totu ighuale odi, keḍio odi tazu mirumutum ale bho ạsu tạnyan olo neemōr kamen kamen.”
Tamen opopo pạJizos ạḍua taGalili ạghi tọbhiiny ạJodan, keḍio ạghi tạJon mozuom odi mụum.
PạJon aru mọpuenaan odi, keḍio ạkpete kua, “Ạna kuzuom ạami mụum, ạna kumina akiton natu tạmi.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ḅẹle ẹrol mẹzo bho siibha. Tiibha bho poḍighi oomo ibha iḍigh tologhi tẸnaan obho.” PạJon amōruōm odi.
Uzuom kua zodi ạJizos mụum obho be ọḅele podi abhun tạmuum obho, pạnyu obho aghuurunu ạnogho zodi keḍio odi ạmiin mẸmugh obho tẸnaan naasōor natu keekumude ạbadi ạlelom odi,
keḍio oghōrōkō ạḍua tạnyu obho aru ạkpete kua, “Oobho Ọony oḍigh ologhi ạmi obho aḍighi bọ ologhi ạmi nạḅaal obho.”
Keḍio Ẹmugh Iigbia bho areliom mạJizos ạloghom tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho molo eru obho kạdegh odi.
Tamen olo odi nạarol merubal ootaany nꞌuḍugul molo ạar olo naaḍigh tọbaraka odi olo, pọkoony nasibh odi,
keḍio eru obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Erumolo ạna uru mỌony tẸnaan, puḍighi mịpaḍi ạrubharakpar bhibha matẹnẹ mạbred.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua, ‘Eḍian be ḍio mobho ōoy taḍumom, idi toghōrōkō ọnuekpete tẸnaan!’ ”
Podi eru obho abhin mạJizos ạghi tẹma iigbia bho, ạsiine zodi tesi obho ạsiinom bọ apu mi tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho,
ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Erumolo ạna uru mỌony tẸnaan, pupel asōor tade bho, ebum obho ẹegia ạkpete kua,
‘Ẹnaan tạto ni ạnogho mitelema odi milo igboloman nꞌạna.
Eedi tekōbh ẹpam ạna tạravo eedi, molo ạna oḍighia malẹkẹ onuma
tạrubharakpar obho.’ ”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua, ‘Ụdegh ghạ mẸnaan Obạmọogh ạna bho.’ ”
Peru obho abhin mạJizos ạsiinom tạnyu obꞌeegum aḍeeriom odi moomo aruubhugh ẹmar-arōoy obho, nꞌoomo ẹela bhꞌeedi,
keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Oomo iibha bho mobho ạami tạnogho ạna, erumolo ạna ugbuluman uukpulughu ạami.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ḍụa sọo, ạna aSetan. Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua, ‘Kpukpulughu mẸnaan Obạmọogh ạna bho be, odi nạ be mobho ạna taḍighian moḍighi.’ ”
Peru obho ạḅele zodi ạḍua, keḍio itelema tẸnaan iru ịlogh ạvo ịnogho zodi.
Amen ạJizos ạmoghon mobho nọologhom mạJon mikoli obho, podi aḅetunu ạghi taGalili.
Odi omina ḍio ạghi tạNazaret, ạghi arugh tạKapaniom, ẹma olo odi tọtu obꞌegha ọbhiiny obho ughōl bọ aGalili obho mi tebhugh ạZebulon nꞌạNaftali.
Uḍighi miibha bho mobhulughiom tibha Ạizaya ozil obho ạkpete bọ aghōl,
“Epa ebhugh ạZebulon, nꞌebhugh ạNaftali,
ibha ituan mạbadi obho, mi tẹḅeenyom ọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan,
ebhugh aGalili obho arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho netugh obho.
Arōoy obo bho netugh tọkinim obho
tẹmiin ni mogbōgh ẹḅaal.
Obo bho netugh tebhugh obho ọkinim obho neekpiom obho,
ẹḅaal obho tasōorōm ni zeedi.”
Ạseghe tamen opopo ạghi taghisigh, pạJizos ạke mọgba ooḅi adōm obhꞌodi, ạkpete kua, “Ikiraan toḍighi ịkarabh enyina, ebum obho Ade-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho nạarol ḅubh obho.”

Ẹzo bho ạJizos nạgbarion sike mi totu obꞌegha ọbhiiny obhꞌaGalili obho, podi ạmiin mịzal aburumōr ilo iru mịze mina: eedi ạSaimon, obho ughōl bọ aPita bho, nꞌẠndru umōr odi. Eedi nezu mọzuguru tọbhiiny obho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịtuonuman ạami, pạami oḍighi enyina kekughi rōoy.”
Tonyiin odi amen opopo, peedi ịḅele mạruzuguru bhꞌeedi ịtuonuman odi.
Odi atirom taghisigh podi ạmiin mịnon ịzal aburumōr, aJems nꞌạJon, ạnwuny taZebidi. Eedi idi toghuugh nꞌọde eedi nẹkooḍi mạruzuguru eedi, pạJizos abheleghi eedi.
Tonyiin odi amen opopo, peedi ibhun toghuugh obho ịḅele nạ mọde bhꞌeedi tạman, ịghi ịtuonuman mạJizos.

Odi ạJizos areleey ghạ toomo aGalili ạtughumiom ghạ mi tarutu iikpulughu obhꞌeedi, ạgba ghạ nạ mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obhꞌAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan, ạrol aakōoy nạ rōoy mi toomo oḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh nꞌẹenwia eedi,

molo ọdu odi alela toomo ạraama bhꞌaSiria. Peedi ibhin iruom odi moomo obo bho nẹnweey moomo oḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh obho, nꞌobo bho ịteeny moḍigh kẹrekere ẹegama alōor obho, arōoy ilo ịkarabh ạruumugh nẹeḅaghami, nꞌilo nẹtaalogh, nꞌilo asilōor obho neemuughogh. Odi ạJizos aakō ni ạman moomꞌeedi.
Eḅir arōoy ẹḍuaghu taGalili nꞌAḍiōbh Ạraama nꞌaJerusạlẹm nꞌebhugh aJudia nꞌạraama ibha idi tẹḅeenyom ạJodan obho eru ẹtuonom odi.
ẠJizos ạmiin mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho, podi ạsiin tạnyu eegum ạrol delede. Pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho iru todi,
keḍio odi ạke mọtughumiom eedi.
“Ạlisebh ilꞌobo bho ikulom tạruumugh obho, eedi obo ịteeny mAde-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho.
Ạlisebh ilꞌobo bho idi tịitu obho, Ẹnaan tạkue ni zeedi.
Ạlisebh ilꞌobo bho isōoriōm lōor eedi obho, eedi obo tetugh tade bho.
Ạlisebh ilꞌobo bho iseeriom oomo ologhi eedi moḍighi ibha iḍigh tologhi tẸnaan obho, tọpere ni eedi.
Ạlisebh ilꞌobo bho ịteeny ọsu ạghusan aḍien obho, eedi obo tọsuanaan ghụsan aḍien.
Ạlisebh ilꞌobo bho ịkarabh ilo tologhi eedi obho, eedi obo obho tẹmiin Ẹnaan.
Ạlisebh ilꞌobo bho idi nꞌekima motulughi oomo arōoy obho, eedi obo tokōl ạnwuny tẸnaan.
Ạlisebh ilꞌobo bho nọnogho mọmiinom tebum ibha odi naḍighi mibha iḍigh tologhi tẸnaan obho,
Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho olꞌeedi.
“Ạlisebh ilꞌenyina, tamen olo arōoy tetōnyōgh enyina, ẹnogho enyina mịiḅaghami, ẹgbaaghiom enyina moomo oḍigh kẹrekere iben mebum obho enyina nẹtuonom ạami obho.
Ibo, ologhi enyina ẹkona ạḅaal nạ, ebum obho ạmukpe enyina mi tạnyu obho, ẹzo ọgba olo nolo bho. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mobho arōoy ịnogho mọoḅaghami marizil obho tẸnaan ibha ibhira iru enyina bho.”

“Enyina idi kabōbh mi tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho. Eru kạar olo abōbh obho ẹmel ilo mu, ẹzo olo omina oḍighi nạ molo kemina kẹmel nạ olo mu. Abōbh pipa, ạar oḍighiom olo mu, molo ịkpe ni be mozu orōbh arōoy kẹezeghi.
“Enyina idi kẹḅaal mi tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho. Ẹma olo uḅōgh tạnyu eegum ọḅokia ghạ ḍio.
Oōy olo tạsu mọtodi akpereghiom mạbafu olo. Odi nạasu podi ọḅam tạnyu ạbebe mọnogho ẹḅaal kōoy kōoy olo odi totu obho.
Onyiin ẹzo bho, ịḅele ẹḅaal obhꞌenyina ạmu asōorōm kōoy kōoy, molo eedi ẹmiin miiḅi ọkpo bho enyina neḍighi obho, ebuom Ẹnaan Ọde bhꞌezira obho odi tạnyu obho.”
“Ịitua ghạ mobho ạami uru mọpueghi araalōgh obho taMozis nꞌịtughumiom arizil obho. Ạami utu ḍio mọpueghi, ạami uru moḍighi obhulughiom tibha eedi ịkpete bho.
Agey nạ nị, ninii ade bho nꞌạnyu tepẹ emuneen, bọbon ẹnuny ạar olo igboloman nꞌaraalōgh obho olo tọḅele moḍighi omutiom tagey obho olo.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, kōoy kōoy olo agin mookō bọbon onyiin olōgh obho asōoriōm bọ apu obho, ạtughumiom nạ mịnon mọḅele ookō, odi tasōoriōm apu mi tAde-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho. Keḍio odi obo bho aakō raalōgh obho, ạtughumiom nạ mịnon mookō araalōgh obho, odi tạbugh ni magey mi tAde-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho.
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina siibha bho, enyina irue ḍio eḍigh ạni tAde-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho erumolo eḍighiom ạar enyina ịneghe ḍio epu mibhꞌarōoy aFarisi obho nꞌobꞌịtughumiom araalōgh obho.”
“Enyina nẹemoghon mobho ụkpete ụnogho marōoy ageedi ughōl ‘Ụko ghạ menu. Kōoy kōoy olo ạko menu, topin zodi ọmarami taghisigh ọtu mịiruan mi totu ạraakpe bho.’

Keḍio esiibha bho ạami nạkpete kua ạnogho enyina: kōoy kōoy olo aḅẹebhaan ologhi nꞌumōr odi, topin ni zodi ọki ọmarami taghisigh ọtu mịiruan mi totu ạraakpe bho. Kōoy kōoy olo aghōl mumōr odi, ‘Ạna ạar oḍighiom olo,’ topin ni zodi ọki ọmarami taghisigh ạruula ẹma bho. Kōoy kōoy olo aghōl umōr odi ẹnam eḍum nạlogh ghuḍum odi mi taḍuugh ạnyan oonu obho ikunughi olo bho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, erumolo ạna nạki mọtun ạar ọnogho Ẹnaan mi tẹede iigbia bho, kạna ạatua mobho umōr onuma nạgbaam ạna mịkarabh olo ạna uḍighi zodi,
pụḅele mọtun ạar obhꞌonuma mi taghisigh ẹede iigbia bho, mamula mạghi mabhira matulughian mumōr onuma, ku magbi momula oru ọtun ạar obhꞌonuma ọnogho Ẹnaan.

“Kẹm mạmoghonyan mobo bho nạva ạna rạakpe bho mi tamen olo ọkpe bhꞌenyina idi nini mi tebōom. Enyina neesi totu ạraakpe bho, podi obhin onuma ọnogho ọtu mịiruan obho, odi kabhin ạna kạlogh tạravo arōoy iḅōrō, eedi kẹghi kẹduom ạna mi totu ikoli obho.
Ạami nạgba ạnogho ạna, tesuo pesi ạna tạtol ninii ạna tatu ạkpe mạkobo obho akunughiom obho mi tibha umuul ạna bho.”
“Enyina nẹemoghon mobho ụkpete ughōl, ‘Ule ghạ mẹma.’
Keḍio ạami nạkpete kua ạnogho zenyina siibha, kōoy kōoy olo abhin ekpaḍien aanonom mạni-ebhōbh mọmunuom odi, naasōor olōgh ole ẹma mi tologhi odi.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, eru kạar olo ekpaḍien oḍiom ạvo onuma naḍighi mobhin onuma ọlogh tesi ịkarabh, pụtoghorona marōbh. Onyiin ọpaḍi alōor onuma motughuna talōor onuma ịneghe epu molo korōbh moomo alōor onuma kọlogh mi toonu ọmiinom obho ikunughi olo bho.

Oḍiom ạvo onuma aḍighi mobhin onuma ọlogh tesi ịkarabh, pusōbh arōbh. Onyiin ọpaḍi alōor onuma motughuna talōor onuma ịneghe ạni nị kua epu molo korōbh moomo alōor onuma kọlogh mi toonu ọmiinom obho ikunughi olo bho.”
“Omina ọkpete nạ kua, ‘Kōoy kōoy olo agbo mạni odi mạḅam amutiom, ạnogho zodi mọbhereer ạḅam.’

Keḍio ạami nạkpete kua ạnogho zenyina siibha: ōoy olo agbo mạni odi mạḅam abhirighan, tughuneen tilo odi ạni obho otue ḍio mọgbesa tolom odi ḍio, odi naḍighi mạni obho mole ẹma, erumolo odi ạni obho ạghi ạḅal mọnon ōoy. Kōoy kōoy olo abhin mạni olo ugbo mạḅam umutiom nale nạ mẹma.”
“Enyina nẹemoghon nạ mobho ụkpete ụnogho marōoy ageedi ughōl, ‘Ubi ghạ moguan onuma, tụugh aḍighi mạnogho mObạmọogh obho tẹzo bho ạna uguan odi obho.’
Keḍio ạami nạkpete kua ạnogho enyina: kamen kamen olo enyina neguan moguan, ighir ghạ mịzo, ibhin ghạ mạnyu obho meghirom ịzo, ebum obho ạnyu obho aru mẹtolom tẸnaan obho.
Ibhin ghạ nạ made bho meghirom ịzo, ebum obho ade bho aru moḅeleriom asike tẸnaan obho. Ibhin ghạ nạ maJerusạlẹm meghirom ịzo, ebum obho aru mẹma tỌolema bho ạbugh bọ apu obho.
Ibhin ghạ nạ mẹmu enyina meghirom ịzo, ebum obho enyina itue ḍio eḍighi monyiin ekpo ạsilaan enyina kạḅaal bolobolo kaḅil.
Ọnuekpete enyina eru ghạ mạ ‘Ii’ bolobolo ‘Eenyi’ be. Ilo ipuom suo, pịḍua teru obho keru.”
“Enyina nẹemoghon mobho ụkpete ughōl, ‘Kōoy kōoy olo aḅom ḍien, odi tạkpiom ḍien, ạlaay pạlaay.’
Keḍio ạami nạkpete kua ạnogho zenyina siibha, ímulumian ghạ mịkarabh mobo bho aḍighi enyina mịkarabh obho. Oōy aḅōr ạna toḍiom ạgba onuma, pukiraan mạnogho zodi mobho ekẹeny obho odi aḅōr ạḅaram.
Kōoy agbo ạna mogbo mọboor ạsuoma onuma, pụḅelemaan odi alegheri ạseghiom nꞌakoti obhꞌonuma.
Keru kạar olo onyiin ōoy oḅe rạagham obho abhin obꞌekpaḍien ạnogho ạna dōol odi morōol ọghi onyiin atobi, pụḅaram ọnon atobi.
Oōy agbẹel ạna mạar, pụnogho. Kōoy kōoy olo aru mạḅoole tạvo onuma, pụḅoolian.”
“Enyina nẹemoghon mobho ụkpete ughōl, ‘Tulan obo bho atulan ạna bho, mạlogh ḍien mobo bho ịlogh ạna ḍien obho.’
Keḍio ạami nạkpete kua ạnogho enyina siibha bho: itulan mobo bho ịlogh enyina ḍien obho, meekpulughu ghạ mẹnogho mobo bho nẹnogho enyina mịiḅaghami obho,
molo enyina etu mạnwuny Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho. Odi naḍighi ghạ ẹḅaal aghōzōgh obho asōorōm moomo iiḅi nꞌịkarabh arōoy obho, ạnogho nạ mẹlebhe mọlobhom iḍighi miiḅi nꞌiḍighi mịkarabh obho.
Enyina etulan obo bho itulan enyina bho be, iḍighen ạlisebh ibha enyina tepin tẸnaan? Bọbon igunogh raasōgh obho su neḍighi ghạ nạ miibha bho.
Eru kạar olo enyina nepeleghian ghạ mạburubulol enyina be, kenyina iḍighi mẹkaraan epuom mipedi obho? Onyiin ẹzo bho ḍio gạ, mobho obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho neḍighi ghạ?
Ịmaar ẹneghe mẹman kẹzo bho Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho ạneghe ni ạman obho.”
“Igona lōor enyina mi toḍighi iiḅi mi tasumusigh arōoy molo eedi kẹmiin mibha enyina neḍighi obho. Ibha enyina iḍighi kua, ạmukpe olo enyina tepin tạvo tỌde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho olo.

“Tebum iibha bẹleni, kamen kamen olo ạna ụnogho mạar mōoy, ụlaal ghạ mokpokpo, kẹzo bho arōoy obo bho neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy obho neḍighi ghạ mi tarutu iikpulughu nꞌaraabōom obho, molo arōoy kebuom eedi obho. Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, arōoy ilo idi kua, ạmukpe ilo eedi tepin tạvo tẸnaan olo.
Kamen kamen olo enyina nẹnogho mạar mōoy, ímōrō ghạ ekẹeny ạvo enyina alōghōm mibha oḍiom ạvo enyina naḍighi obho,
molo ibha enyina iḍighi obho ẹtol tẹḅokia, pỌde bhꞌenyina obho nạmiin ghạ mibha enyina neḍighi tẹḅokia bho omulumian enyina.”

“Kamen kamen olo enyina neekpulughu, iíkpulughu ghạ karōoy obho neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy obho. Eedi negbẹel ghạ moḅetunu ọmara ookpulughu mi tarutu iikpulughu obho nꞌọtu araabōom molo arōoy ẹmiin eedi. Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, ạmukpe olo eedi tepin tẸnaan olo.

Kamen kamen olo enyina netu mookpulughu ghạ, iḍigh tẹkpe enyina, meghuughi meguugh obho ku meekpulughu mẹnogho mỌde enyina obho odi tẹḅokia bho, podi Ọde bhꞌenyina obho nạmiin ghạ mibha enyina neḍighi tẹḅokia bho omulumian enyina.

“Tiikpulughu enyina íbhin ghạ meekpulughuom mobꞌọlogh ikpo ọnuekpete ilo ạar oḍighiom ilo kẹzo bho obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan neḍighi ghạ bho, ibha nẹetua mobho Ẹnaan tạmoghon eedi tebum ibꞌịidoony iikpulughu eedi obho.
Iíkpulughu ghạ keedi. Ọde bhꞌenyina naalōghōm mibha enyina nẹva bho atẹnẹ keḍio enyina igbi mogbẹel odi.
Tiibha bẹleni, iikpulughu ghạ kua,
‘Ọde ezōor obo odi tạnyu, iigbia ẹrol ẹnogho ḍien obhꞌonuma.
Ade-Ọolema bhꞌonuma aru, ịto bhꞌonuma ẹrol ạni nạ kua tade bho kẹzo bho idi tạnyu obho.
Eḍian ibhꞌaadon nọgho ezōor dodon.
Ḅẹlemaan ezōor mịkarabh ibha ezōor nooḍighi obho, kẹzo bho ezōor nọḅelemaan mịkarabh obo bho iḍighi ezōor mịkarabh obho.
Ubhin ghạ zezōor mạlogh tesi ịdereghi, keḍio tesi ịkarabh pẹl ezōor mạseghe.’
“Eru kạar olo enyina ịḅelemaan ịkarabh ilo ịnon arōoy iḍighi enyina, pỌde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho ọḅelemaan nạ enyina.
Keru kạar olo enyina ịḅelemaan io mịkarabh ilo ịnon iḍighi enyina, pỌde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho ọḅele nạ ọḅelemaan enyina mịkarabh ibha enyina eḍighi obho.

“Tamen olo enyina idi mọkoony mebum iikpulughu, ighireni ghạ sumusigh enyina kẹzo bho arōoy obo bho neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy obho neḍighi ghạ bho. Eedi neemirigheni ghạ sumusigh karōoy ilo ọkoony nạpibhoghom ẹki kesi kesi molo kōoy kōoy alōghōm mobho eedi idi mọkoony mebum iikpulughu. Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, ạmukpe olo eedi tepin tẸnaan olo.
Kamen kamen olo enyina idi mọkoony, iitōla ghạ sumusigh enyina, mẹsala mẹmu enyina,
molo Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho be alōghōm mobho enyina idi mọkoony mebum iikpulughu, ịnon arōoy ilōghōm io. PỌde bhꞌenyina obho nạmiin mibha enyina neḍighi tẹḅokia bho omulumian enyina.
“Íkubhughi ghạ mẹela mẹnogho silōor enyina mi tade bho, obho ọsari nꞌọoghara iseeri ḍio bho, ạruḅa ẹkona neḍigh ghạ emiinyogh obho.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ikubhughi mẹela enyina mi tạnyu obho, obho ọsari nꞌọoghara itue ḍio ekulaan obho, nꞌobho ạruḅa ẹkona itue ḍio eḅom eḍigh emiinyogh nạ bho.
Kesi kesi olo ạna ukubh mịga pesi ologhi onuma odi nạ.
“Ikpo-ariḍien onuma pọtodi alōor onuma. Erumolo ariḍien onuma ịneghe ni ịman, poomo alōor onuma ẹḅaal ẹḅaal.
Kerumolo ạna ụteeny mọkarabh ekpaḍien, poomo alōor onuma ọkinim ọkinim. Tebum iibha bẹleni, eru kạar olo ẹḅaal alōor obhꞌonuma aru mọkinim, okōr oḍigh obꞌọkinim mobho odi talōor obhꞌonuma.
“Bọbon ōoy olo tatue ạtolan ịzal ạburude otu olo. Odi tạlogh ni ḍien monyiin atulan mopedi obho. Odi takiilaan ni monyiin aanon ạpue mopedi obho. Enyina irue ḍio ẹbham mẸnaan nꞌikpoki ẹrolom.

“Iibha kiḍighi kạami nạkpete kua ạnogho enyina: ịíḅaghami ghạ lōor enyina mi tọkpo ilo igboloman nꞌiileey, nꞌịibhoghol mọnogho enyina ghuḍum, bolobolo tilo igboloman nꞌibura ilo oburuom alōor obho. Aghuḍum io gạ mobho ạla mạar apu meḍian? Iikpōogh alōor obho ịla ḍio mạar epu mibura gạ?
Ịmiin maghuḍum ịnun obho nẹpeebh tạnyu obho, eedi iḅẹbh ghạ ḍio eḅu eekōbhōghi ekubh. Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho pobo naakō zeedi. Ịitua. Enyina ịla ḍio mạar epu mịnun obho gạ?
Okōr ōoy, mi tenyina tatue ạlogh sụmusia taghuḍum odi mi tịitu?
“Kebum eeghe kenyina nẹeḅaghami lōor enyina mi tebum arukpe? Iinon mạrafalawa eḍum obho. Eedi ikumuan ghạ ḍio mọteeny ibura ilo oburuom alōor eedi.
Keḍio ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, toomo ẹela bho tạSolomon odi obura ḍio mibura ilo ịneghe iileeny mạrafalawa bhibha.

Ẹnaan obo ạseghe mạrafalawa bho aburom mịigho eḍum obho, ibha ụmiin dodon, eḍie nọosu nyạn. Sọo, arōoy obo ologhi omōruōm obho igbẹbhan io, enyina ilōghōm io mobho odi tabur ni enyina apu miibha bho gạ?
Tebum iibha bẹleni ịrol ghạ mẹeḅaghami lōor enyina meghōl, ‘Ạami taḍighi ẹko kạteeny meḍian ole, bolobolo amiim ọbhoghol bolobolo ukpe omina?’
Iibha pọkpo ibha obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho nekilighuan ghạ taghuḍum eedi. Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho naalōghōm mobho ịgbaan ni molo enyina kẹteeny moomo ọkpo bhibha.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ipira meḅe mẹzo oḍigh ạni tAde-Ọolema bhꞌodi nꞌoḍighi ibha iḍigh tologhi odi obho ku, podi ọḅaraghiom ọnogho enyina moomo ọkpo ipedi obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịíḅaghami ghạ lōor enyina tilo igboloman nꞌeḍie. Eḍie tạteeny ni mịiḅaghami ilo tegbẹbhan nꞌodi. Ịḅelemaan ịiḅaghami ibhꞌaḍuma bho ẹrol milꞌodi aḍuma popo.
“Ịru ghạ mịiruan mẹnogho mịnon molo Ẹnaan ọtu mịiruan ạnogho enyina,
ebum obho ọtuom obho enyina ibhin ịtuom ịnogho mịnon obho, pibha Ẹnaan tapin ạtuom ạnogho enyina nạ.
Eeghe aḍighi siibha bho, kạna nạmiin ghạ meekuneen aḍien tumōr onuma, keḍio obꞌọbhalakpa aḍien onuma ạna ọmiina ghạ ḍio?
Ạna tane ni nạ mọkpete ọnogho umōr onuma oghōl ekua, ‘Tue ạami ụseghe meekuneen obho odi taḍien onuma bho,’ tamen olo obꞌọbhalakpa odi ni taḍien onuma?
Sọo, obo nạmiin ghạ milꞌịnon, ọmiin ghạ ḍio milꞌodi, pira mạseghia mobꞌọbhalakpa bhꞌaḍien onuma ku, pạna orue ọmaar ọmiin ọseghe eekuneen obhꞌaḍien umōr onuma.
“Ị́nogho ghạ sighōghō mọkpo iigbia. Enyina ẹnogho peedi oghiraan osōmōghi enyina. Ízu ghạ nạ maraseleni mẹnogho mivel, eedi tẹezeghi ni be.”
“Igbẹel, pọnogho enyina. Ịva, penyina ọmiin. Iikpu, poghuuron ọnogho enyina,
ebum obho kōoy kōoy olo agbẹel, tọnogho ni zodi, kōoy kōoy olo ạva tạmiin ni, kōoy kōoy olo aakpu tokuuron ni ọnogho zodi.
Okōr ōoy tenyina olo aru mọde tạnogho mọony odi mọpaḍi ọbharakpar erumolo odi agbẹel mạbred?
Bolobolo ạnogho zodi mooḍigh erumolo odi agbẹel mena?
Toomo ẹzo bho enyina iḅẹebh isi obho, keḍio enyina ilōghōm ghạ mọnogho iiḅi ọkpo mạnwuny enyina, kịitua miiḅi ọkpo olo Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho tạnogho mobo bho igbẹel odi obho.
“Iḍighi ghạ mẹnogho mịnon mibha enyina nẹva molo eedi keḍighi kẹnogho enyina bho. Iibha pẹmu araalōgh obho taMozis nꞌịtughumiom arizil obho.”
“Ịḅol tẹḍiibh ọnu-otu obho meḍigh, ebum obho ọnu-otu obho ạregh magey, ebōom obho ẹkona adugh nạ magey mobho ạlogh nạki tobꞌoonu ọmiinom obho ikunughi olo bho, keḍio ọlogh arōoy mobo nẹḅol.
Ọnu-otu aghuḍum obho odi ḍịibh, keḍio ebōom obho ạlogh nạki todi aghuḍum obho ạkpar nạ magey. Ịbam arōoy be mobo nẹmiin ẹḅol eḍigh.”
“Ịmaar egon miben arizil obho. Eedi tetu tenyina kạraana mi tozu alōor ạman obho, keḍio tologhi obhꞌeedi eedi ạkar ạrukurunuma.
Teḍighiom ạar eedi pesi enyina tepin elōghōm eedi. Izin-oḍu ịloki ghạ ḍio mitu ịleleezu, iibom ịloki ghạ ḍio male.
Oorẹeny olo aḍum amute magey nạloki ghạ nạ miiḅi itu, ẹkpagh oorẹeny nạloki ghạ mịbhuagh itu.
Oorẹeny olo aḍum amute magey orue ḍio ạloki mịbhuagh itu. Ẹkpagh oorẹeny orue nạ ḍio ạloki miiḅi itu.
Koorẹeny koorẹeny olo ọloki ḍio miiḅi itu tolẹr ni otōbh ọlogh tạnyan.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, enyina telōghōm miben arizil mi tẹzo eḍighiom ạar eedi.”
“Oomo obo bho nepeleghi ạami ‘Obumọogh, Obumọogh’ obho ḍio mobho teḍigh tAde-Ọolema obho odi tạnyu obho. Obo bho neḍighi mibhꞌologhi Ọde bhꞌạmi obho odi tạnyu obho be mobo teḍigh.

Amen tạteeny ḍuma popo, ọlogh arōoy mobho tetu ẹkpete ẹnogho ạami ekōl kua, ‘Obumọogh, Obumọogh! Ezōor ubhin taḍien onuma ọgbaam ghạ dōm obho tẸnaan, obhin nạ ḍien obhꞌonuma obhirighan ghạ mịkarabh ạruumugh, oḍighi nạ mọlogh ọkpo ịiḍaany.’
Keḍio ạami tạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi ‘Ạami ulōghōm io enyina. Ịḍua taghisigh ạmi, enyina iḍighi mịkarabh arōoy obho.’ ”
“Tebum iibha bẹleni, kōoy kōoy olo ạmoghon mọnuekpete bhibha tạmi kạtuugh aḍighi, tạtol kolōghōm mạar ōoy olo aḅōgh motu odi mi tạnyu ọbharakpar.
Ẹlebhe asōor azuughian, aḍigho aḍigh abhulughi mạribhiiny obho, ogim agim ạbhibhoghom motu obho, keḍio omeel io, ebum obho uḅōgh tạnyu ọbharakpar obho.
“Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạmoghon mọnuekpete bhibha tạmi kọtuugh io oḍighi, tạtol kobꞌeema ōoy olo aḅōgh otu odi mi tạnyu ọosaar.
Ẹlebhe asōor azuughian, aḍigho aḍigh abhulughi mạrubhiiny obho, ogim agim ạbhibhoghom motu obho, keḍio odi otu obho ameel, molo emeel odi otu obho, ẹzo ọgba olo nolo.”
ẠJizos ạman mọnuekpete bhibha, pobꞌọlogh arōoy obho iimōogh toḍigh ịtughumiom obho odi ạtughumiom obho.
Odi ọtughumiom io konyiin obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obhꞌeedi. Odi abhin tịnyaam ịto ạtughumiom.
ẠJizos asōor tạnyu eegum obho, pobꞌọlogh arōoy ịtuonom odi.
Ponyiin ōoy olo nạnwe mẹzegh ịpueghi riiḅi aru todi, agbuluman taghisigh odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Oōy, eḍigh tologhi onuma, ạna tatue ni aakō ạami.”
PạJizos asele mạvo odi akulaan odi, keḍio ạbhagharana ạkpete kua, “Eḍigh tologhi ạmi, ḍum.” Tonyiin odi amen obho pōoy obho aḍum tẹzegh ịpueghi riiḅi obhꞌodi.

Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Mọghon, ụgba ghạ mạar mạnogho mōoy. Tẹn monyen onyen mạghi toḅu miiḅua bho odi aanon lōor onuma, ku mạghi mạtun mạar obho aMozis ạto bho mạnogho mẸnaan molo kōoy kōoy alōghōm mobho ạna naaḍum.”
Amen ạJizos asi tạKapaniom, ponyiin uvẹmụ ōoy oḅe rạagham olꞌaRom aru todi aasen odi mọbhel odi,
keḍio ạkpete ạlogh odi meghuan aghōl kua, “Oōy, ẹbana ạmi odi tẹmuna mi totu ạmi nạnwe. Orue ḍio moḅetunu keḍio odi nạ togbōgh ọmiinom.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạami tatu ni aakō zodi.”
Podi uvẹmụ ōoy oḅe rạagham obho ạkpete kua, “Eenyi, ekua ḍio. Ạami ugbẹbh io molo ạna kaaku kaḍigh totu ạmi. Kpẹte mạar be pẹbana bhꞌạmi oḍum.

Ạami ẹkona ōoy olo nọonogho mịnyaam ọto ịto, olo iḅe rạagham idi tẹeḍiani ạmi. Ibha ạami ụkpete ụnogho monyiin ughōl ‘Kịa,’ podi ọghi. Ibha ạami ụkpete ụnogho mọnon ughōl ‘Tue,’ podi oru; kạami ạkpete ạnogho mẹbana ạmi aghōl ‘Ḍighi miibha,’ podi ọtuugh oḍighi.”

ẠJizos ạkar aamōogh magey mọmoghon iibha bho, keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho rōoy obho nẹtuonom odi obho, “Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina: ạami dọmiin ghạ ḍio moḍigh ologhi omōruōm obhobho mi tonyiin ōoy olꞌIzirẹl.

Ilōghōm mobho ọlogh arōoy tẹḍua ni tọpaḍi obho aghōzōgh obho namute ghạ bho, nꞌọpaḍi obho aghōzōgh naḍigh ghạ bho etu ẹtol delede nꞌEbrạhạm nꞌẠizik nꞌạJekob mi tẹtolom ẹzaal Ade-Ọolema bho odi tạnyu obho,
keḍio obo bho kịtol tAde-Ọolema bho totōḅōḍi ni omutiom ọlogh tọkinim etẹrẹ bho. Tepa pesi eedi tẹtol eleghe ẹkiirogh rạlaay.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho uvẹmụ ōoy oḅe rạagham obho, “Kẹel, tibha omōruōm obhꞌonuma tọtuugh ni oḍighi ọnogho ạna.” Pẹbana ōoy oḅe rạagham obho aḍum tonyiin amen obho.
ẠJizos ạghi aḍigh totu taPita, podi ạmiin moniin ọnyani taPita odi tẹmuna nạnwe. Ọole naaḍigh odi.
Podi ạJizos akulaan mạvo bhꞌodi ạni obho, pọole bho ạḍua. Podi ạni obho aḅetunu tonyiin amen obho ạke mọkiom odi.
Ạteeny mudule, parōoy ibhin mọlogh arōoy ilo ịkarabh ạruumugh nẹeḅaghami iruom mạJizos. PạJizos abhin tọnuekpete ọnu odi abhirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh obho aakōoy moomo obo bho nẹnweeny obho.
Iibha imute kua moḍighi obhulughiom tibha Ạizaya ozil obho aghōl bọ, “Odi nịvo nịvo abhin talōor odi mạrazegh nꞌẹenwia ezira.”
Amen ạJizos ạmiin obꞌọlogh arōoy obho ikō zodi ikiton obho, podi ạkpete ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho mokiton ọghi tẹḅeenyom obꞌegha bho.
Ponyiin obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho aru todi ạkpete kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạami tạtuonom ạni nị ạna kesi kesi olo ạna nạki.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạraakpa nꞌaraapōgh eedi, ịnun nꞌarutu eedi, keḍio Ọony Oōy obho bọbon esi otuḅeen ẹmu odi obhooghia olo.”
Pọnon ōoy olo nạake nạtuom odi ạkpete ạlogh eghuan zodi aghōl kua, “Oōy, ḅẹle ạami upira ụki uḍi mọde ạmi kụ.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Tụonom ạami, mạḅelemaan obo bho nẹebhozu obho eḍi miḍim eedi.”
ẠJizos aḍigh toghuugh obho, pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho iḍigh ạni.
Eedi imutiom, tekperenom pobꞌogim asōor tegha bho, molo opōkō ạmuum obho netu moḅie oghuugh obho. Toomo ipa bho, ạJizos nakoḍi.
Pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho iru ịsumeen odi, ịkpete kua, “Obumọogh, pẹl ezōor, ezira tọpozu.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana ạkpete kua, “Eeghe kenyina nekiil ruugu? Pẹzo ologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina akio.” Keḍio odi aḅetunu ạkpete mogim obho nꞌopōkō ạmuum obho modeny, pọbhiiny obho aru adeny ạrol pọtom.
Kōoy kōoy aamōogh ni, keḍio eedi ịkpete kua, “Odi oobho kokōr oḍigh ōoy? Bọbon ogim obho nꞌopōkō ạmuum obho nekiilaan nạ zodi.”

ẠJizos asi tebhugh obhꞌaGadarin mi tẹḅeenyom egha bho, pịzal arōoy ịḍua taruugu ọkarabh eḍum obho iru todi. Ịkarabh ạruumugh nẹeḅaghami rōoy obho magey molo bọbon ōoy olo namina ane motẹn tebōom opopo olo.
Osi todi be peedi imulughu ịkpete kua, “Ọony tẸnaan, ạna taḍighiom eeghe zezōor? Ạna naaru moliom ezōor keḍio kagbi mọteeny ạkar aḍuma bho?”
Atuan nꞌeedi, ọlogh arabhōrōpō idi nẹḅal ịḅal.
Pịkarabh ạruumugh obho iisen mạJizos ịkpete kua, “Eru kạar olo ạna natu mobhirighan ezōor, pupirighan ezōor ọghi oḍigh tarabhōrōpō bho.”
PạJizos ạkpete ạnogho eedi aghōl kua, “Ịki.” Peedi ịḍua tẹmu arōoy obho ịghi iḍiku tarabhōrōpō bho. Poomo eedi arabhōrōpō iikilaay tạḅarabh aruugum obho ịghi imeleghu tobꞌegha ọbhiiny obho ịguḅaay.
Arōoy obho neteliom marabhōrōpō bho ighiil ịḍua ịghi tẹma bho, ịgba moomo ibha imute bho, nꞌibha imutenaan rōoy obho ịteeny ịkarabh ạruumugh obho.
Poomo arōoy ẹma bho iru tạJizos. Amen eedi iru ịmiin mạJizos, peedi iisen odi mọḍua tebhugh eedi.
ẠJizos aḍigh toghuugh obho amula tẹḅeenyom egha bho, podi ạghi asi tẹma odi.

Pẹde arōoy ibhin mōoy olo alōor obho nạabho ạman iruom odi. Ụmuneen tẹmuna zodi ōoy obho. ẠJizos ạmiin mobꞌologhi omōruōm arōoy obho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho alōor obho nạabho ạman obho, “Ọony ạmi, pạm ologhi onuma. Nọoḅelemaan ạna mịkarabh onuma.”
Pẹtede arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nẹghunughun tiloghi eedi nekōl kua, “Oōy obhobho nạkpete aḍighanaan Ẹnaan.”
ẠJizos naalōghōm mibha idi tiloghi eedi obho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹetua mịkarabh ịitua ilo idi kua?
Iḍighen idugh epu mọkpete, ‘Nọoḅelemaan ạna mịkarabh onuma,’ nꞌoghōl ekua, ‘Ḅetunu marele’?
Ạami naḍighi moḍeeriom enyina mobho Ọony Oōy obho ạteeny ni mịikpo tade bho mọḅelemaan ịkarabh.” Podi amula ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho, “Ḅetunu, makpōr ẹmuna onuma maghẹel.”
Pōoy obho aḅetunu aghẹel.
Amen arōoy obho ịmiin miibha bho, paruugu isibh eedi, eedi ibuom nạ mẸnaan mọnogho ịikpo ilo ileeny mẹzo bho rōoy.

ẠJizos ạḍua tesi opopo, arele nạki, podi ạmiin monyiin ogunogh raasōgh. Aḍien odi ōoy obho ughōl aMatiu. Odi ạrol delede tesi oḍighi odi. ẠJizos ạmiin odi pạkpete ạnogho odi aghōl kua, “Tụonom ạami.” PaMatiu aḅetunu ạtuonom odi.
Tamen olo ạJizos odi totu aMatiu nale meḍian pọlogh igunogh raasōgh nꞌiḍighi mịkarabh iru itul nꞌodi nꞌobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho, nele ạni.
Ẹde arōoy aFarisi obho ịmiin mẹzo bho, pịkpete kua ịnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho, “Ebum eeghe kobo bho nạtughumiom enyina atul migunogh raasōgh nꞌiḍighi mịkarabh nale meḍian?”
ẠJizos nạamoghon, podi ạbhagharana kua, “Obo bho asilōor obho ịghuay obho ịva ghạ ḍio mozil, obo bho nẹnweey obho be.
Ịki mẹva mẹmu ẹegia bhobho, ‘Ọsu ạghusan aḍien, oḍighi iiḅi, pobho ạami nạva, ọtunogh ọkpo ḍio.’ Ạami uru mobheleghi ạsukarabh obho, aruuḅi obho ḍio.”

Onyiin amen pobo bho nẹtuonom mạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho iru tạJizos nepuruan kua, “Ebum eeghe kezōor nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho nẹtol ghạ mọkoony mebum iikpulughu keḍio obo bho nẹtuonom ạna bho ịrol ạni ghạ ḍio?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Enyina ịitua, tipina, obo bho ipina bho teḍigh ni tịitu tamen olo opina bho odi nꞌeedi? Aḍuma natu molo tọḅoor zeedi mopina bho, keḍio eedi tegbi mọrologhu ọkoony.
“Bọbon ōoy olo tạseghe momoom ukpe apuom ugbaany olo, ebum obho esi obho upuom obho tạkooron ni mukpe bho, aḍighi epōgh obho ạbugh apu mịḅel obho.

Oōy olo tạseghe nạ mimoom amiim azu ạloki tigbaany izu ịnam ạsikarama olo. Ibha odi ạloki, pizu ạsikarama bho opologhu, amiim obho kezuughian nạ, eedi izu ạsikarama bho kerubhughu nạ kebẹebh. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, imoom amiim nọlogh ghạ timoom izu ạsikarama, poomo eedi oḍum.”

Tamen obho ạJizos nạḍeghe miibha bho nạnogho eedi obho, ponyiin okenya arōoy aJu obho aru todi, agbuluman taghisigh odi, ạkpete kua, “Ọnyani ạmi eede amen ạbho, keḍio tue nạ mạḅam ạvo onuma talōor odi podi omula.”
PạJizos aḅetunu ạtuonom odi. Obo bho nẹtuonom odi obho eḅetunu nẹki ani.
Ponyiin ạni olo nạnwe mẹzegh ạraani moomo aḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạsia ạniiran rōoy obho mi tạman tạJizos ạghi akulaan mọdu ukpe bhꞌodi.
Odi ạni obho nạatua tologhi odi akōl kua, “Eru kạar olo ạami ụkar ukulaan mukpe bhꞌodi be, pạami ọdum.”
ẠJizos aghiraan ạmiin odi pạkpete kua, “Ọnyani ạmi, pạm ologhi onuma, ologhi omōruōm onuma naakō ạna.” Tamen opopo pạni obho aḍum.
PạJizos ạghi asi totu okenya bho. Amen odi ạmiin rōoy obho nẹḍe mọḍe amaḍi obho, nꞌoomo arōoy obho neeḍigh tịitu obho,
podi ạkpete kua, “Kōoy kōoy amute. Ọnyani obho ọbho ḍio, odi nakoḍi ni.” Poomo eedi ịmologh ịiḅaghami odi.
Umutioghom rōoy obho ọman kua be, pạJizos ạghi aḍigh tologhi otu, ạbham tạvo ọnyani obho, pọnyani obho aḅetunu.
Pọdu iibha bho ilela toomo ọpaḍi odi ebhugh obhobho.
ẠJizos ạḍua tesi opopo, ẹzo bho odi arele nạki obho, pịzal arōoy ikpom ariḍien ịke mọtuonom odi. Eedi ịrol imulughu ighōl, “Ọony taDevid, sụanaan ezōor ghụsan aḍien.”
ẠJizos aḍigh totu, peedi arōoy ikpom ariḍien obho iru todi, keḍio odi apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina emōruōm mobho ạami tatue ni aḍighi miibha bho ạnogho enyina?” Peedi imōrō mu, “Ii, ōoy.”
PạJizos akulaan riḍien eedi, ạkpete kua, “Ẹtuugh ẹrol tibha ologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina.”
Pariḍien obhꞌeedi ịkparanu. PạJizos aḍuur raḅeri eedi aghōl kua, “Ị́gba ghạ miibha bho mẹnogho bọbon onyiin ōoy.”
Eedi ịḍua, peedi ịgba mọdu tạJizos ileenyemi toomo ọpaḍi ebhugh obho.
Ẹzo bho arōoy obho nẹḍua bho, pẹde arōoy ibhin mokpom-ụka ōoy olo ọkarabh ẹmugh nạaḅaghami iruom mạJizos.
Tonyiin amen obho ubhirighan mọkarabh ẹmugh obho, pōoy obho ạke mọkpete ạar. Kōoy kōoy aamōogh ni, keḍio ịkpete kua, “Dọmiin ghạ ḍio moḍigh ọkpo bhibha mi tIzirẹl.”
Parōoy aFarisi obho ịkpete kua, “Uvẹmụ ịkarabh ạruumugh obho ạnogho zodi mịnyaam mobhirighanogh eedi.”

PạJizos ạghi nakiton toomo igbōgh nꞌịbam ạraama bho, ạtughumiom tarutu iikpulughu obhꞌeedi, ạgba mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan, aakōoy nạ rōoy toomo oḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh nꞌịkarabh asilōor.
Ẹzo bho odi ạmiin mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho, podi ạsuanaan eedi ghụsan aḍien, ebum obho iloghi eedi ịnegheey io, obo ọlogh ạvo ọnogho eedi olo nạ bho. Eedi nẹerol kạraana ilo obo ookō olo.
Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho, “Iiḅua bho ẹbugh magey, keḍio obo oḅu iiḅua bho ịbam be.
Iikpulughu mẹnogho mobo bhꞌoḍighi obho molo odi atōm rōoy oḍighi obho mookōbhōghi eḍian iiḅua bhꞌodi.”
ẠJizos abheleghi maḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm odi monyiin esi ạnogho eedi mịikpo mobhirighan ịkarabh ạruumugh nꞌookōoy oomo oḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh nꞌẹenwia.
Iibha pariḍien eedi aḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho. Ọḅel obho ạSaimon, obho ughōl bọ aPita bho, nꞌẠndru umōr odi; aJems nꞌạJon umōr odi, eedi ạnwuny taZebidi;
aFilip nꞌaBatolomiu; ạTomos nꞌaMatiu ogunogh raasōgh obho; aJems ọony tẠlifios nꞌạTadios;
ạSaimon obho ughōl bọ aZelot obho nꞌaJudas Ịskariot, obho aḅool bọ mạJizos obho.
ẠJizos arōm amutioghom maḍiōbh nꞌịzal arōoy bhibha ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịghi ghạ nọghi tonyiin ẹma arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho bolobolo tonyiin ẹma ạraama aSameria bho.
Kpẹlen nꞌeedi, ịki kụ tạraama arōoy Izirẹl ibha neebhẹzu obho.
Ịki mẹgba meghōl kua, ‘Ade-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho nạarol ḅubh.’

Iikōoy mobo bho nẹnweey obho, meḅẹriōn rōoy ilo ịbhozu, meekōoy mobo bho nẹnweey rạzegh ịpueghi riiḅi obho, mebhirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh. Ibha enyina ibhin obho ạfu olo enyina ịkpe olo, ịnogho nạ mikpo.
Ị́logh ghạ mikpoki tạruḅa enyina mẹbham ẹghi,
ịbham ghạ nạ mẹḅa ararele mi terele bhꞌenyina. Ịbham ghạ nạ mịzal ạrusuoma nꞌarakōrō bolobolo ẹḅu. Obo bho naḍighi moḍighi obho ịgbaan ni mole eḍian oḍighi odi.
“Amen olo enyina isi togbōgh bolobolo ọbam ẹma, pịki mẹva meḍigh totu ōoy olo tapin ni enyina ạloghom, mẹrolan odi ninii ạteeny men enyina tẹḍua tẹma popo.
Kamen kamen olo enyina iḍigh totu ōoy ịkpete ghạ kua, ‘Ekima ẹrol ẹnogho enyina.’
Eru kạar olo arōoy obho otu obho ibhin enyina ịloghom, pịḅelemaan eedi mipeleghian ekima bhꞌenyina, keru kạar olo eedi ipin io enyina ẹloghom, pịḍuonom mipeleghian obhꞌenyina.
Keru kạar olo otu bolobolo ẹma ipin io enyina ẹloghom bolobolo ẹmoghonyan enyina, pịḍua megunugun obhugh asike bhꞌenyina metuḅeḍi.
Ilōghōm mobho, taḍuma ịiruan obho, ọsu ạghusan aḍien olo Ẹnaan tạsuanaan marōoy ạSodom nꞌaGomora tepu ni mibhꞌarōoy ẹma popo.”
“Ịmaar ẹmoghon, ạami urōm enyina namutiom kạraana mi togbo ọlogh ạrukurunuma. Alōor enyina ạnwana kạririar, keḍio ideny karuukumude.
Igona lōor enyina, arōoy tetu ni eḅologh enyina, epin enyina ẹki totu ạraakpe, ẹgurogh enyina mi tarutu iikpulughu eedi.
Topin ni enyina otu ọmarami taghisigh ạruula nꞌạruulema mi tebum aḍien ạmi, molo enyina ẹgbaanaan ạami mooḅi adōm obho ẹnogho zeedi nꞌarōoy ịnon aruubhugh.
Amen eedi ibhin enyina ịmarami mọnogho ịigbaay, ịíḅaghami ghạ lōor enyina milo enyina tekōl ẹgba nꞌẹzo ọgba. Tamen opopo, pọnogho enyina milo enyina tepin ẹgba.
Ọnuekpete bho enyina tẹkpete bho tẹḍua tẸmugh Ọde bhꞌenyina emuteghu tenyina.
“Arōoy tẹkar epin burumōr eedi ẹnogho molo kọze, ạburude bho ẹkona onyiin ẹzo bho teḍighi nạ nwụny eedi, ạnwuny obho ẹkona tekiraan nạ nị esomoghian bụrude nꞌaburuniin eedi epin eedi ẹki ẹlogh tọbho.
Kōoy kōoy tạlogh ni enyina ḍien mebum ạmi. Keḍio obo bho tạkparam ạpam asi tikunughi obho tọpel ni zodi.
Kamen kamen olo ụnogho enyina mọmiinom tonyiin ẹma, pikiil ẹḍua mẹghi tọnon. Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, enyina ịman io moḍighi enyina mi toomo ạraama bhꞌIzirẹl ninii Ọony Oōy obho amula atu.
“Ọony ịtuugha olo apu mobo bho nạtughumiom odi obho olo. Ẹbana nạ olo apu mọde otu odi olo nạ.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, ọony ịtuugha bho abe mooleeny obo bho nạtughumiom odi obho, ẹbana bho mooleeny ọde otu odi. Eru kạar olo ughōlōm ḍien Bielzebul uvẹmụ ịkarabh ạruumugh obho molobhir uvotu obho, aḍien olo tokōlōm mạnwuny-otu obho teḅẹebh ni apu mobhꞌodi.”
“Ighiil ghạ rōoy. Kạar kạar olo ukpereghi, tokpẹerōn ni. Oomo ọkpo ẹḅokia tomutiom ni tẹḅaal ogbo etẹrẹ.
Ibha ạami nạḍeghe ạnogho enyina tọkinim obho, enyina temutiom ni tẹḅaal; ibha enyina ịmoghon tẹḅokia bho, enyina temulughu ni emutiom ọmoghon ọman.
Ighiil ghạ ruugu mobo bho tekigh iikpōogh alōor obho itue ḍio eghigh mẹmugh obho, ikiil nạ ni mẸnaan obo bho tatue ni akigh miikpōogh obho nꞌẹmugh obho atōbh ạlogh tobꞌoonu obho ikunughi olo bho.
Enyina tetue ni ekō mịzal ạriwiriri-wịriri monyiin ạkobo, keḍio bọbon onyiin olo tameel olo Ọde enyina ọto ḍio kua olo.
Enyina ni dụgh, ạkar ạsilaan ibhꞌẹmu enyina Ẹnaan nạaḅal.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ighiil ghạ ruugu. Enyina ịla mạar epu ạni ni kua mọlogh ạriwiriri-wịriri.”
“Kōoy kōoy olo aatumuom ạami mi togbo arōoy, onyiin mẹzo bho nạ mobho tamulumian odi mi taghisigh Ọde ạmi obho odi tạnyu obho.
Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạbharanaan ạami mi togbo arōoy, pẹzo ạami tạparanaan nạ zodi mi taghisigh Ọde ạmi obho odi tạnyu obho.”
“Ịítua ghạ mobho ạami ubhin mekima uru tẹmar-arōoy obho. Eenyi, ạami upin io mekima aru, ẹgham.
Ạami uru moḍighi olo ạnwuny kẹmaranuan bụrude eedi, ạsunwunyaan kẹmaranuan buruniin eedi, ạsunwunyaan ilom kẹmaranuan maburuniin ilom eedi.
Ạkar obo ọlogh aḍien ōoy tạḍua tạkar otu odi atu.
“Kōoy kōoy olo atulan mọde bolobolo oniin odi apu ạami ogbẹbh io mọtuonuman ạmi. Kōoy kōoy olo atulan mọony bolobolo ọnyani odi apu ạami ogbẹbh io mọtuonuman ạmi.
Kōoy kōoy olo ọseghe ḍio moorẹeny ẹmigheri obhꞌodi ạtuonom ạami ogbẹbh io mọtuonuman ạmi.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạva mookō aghuḍum odi tapiẹmi ni, obo bho abhiẹmi ghuḍum odi mebum ạmi bho tạteeny ni.”
“Kōoy kōoy olo abhin enyina ạloghom, abhin nạ ạami ạloghom, keḍio odi obo bho abhin ạami ạloghom obho, ạloghom nạ zodi obo bho arōm ạami dōm obho.

Kōoy kōoy olo abhin ạloghom mọgba dōm tẸnaan, mebum obho odi aru mọgba dōm tẸnaan tapin ạni ạmukpe odi, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo abhin mooḅi ōoy ạloghom mebum obho odi aru mooḅi ōoy obho tapin ạni ni nạ mạmukpe odi.
Iinon, kōoy kōoy olo ạnogho bọbon ạkopu iḅōkōom ạmuum monyiin obo bho akio bọ apu obho ibha nẹtuonom ạami obho, mebum obho odi nạtuonom ạami obho, tạkar nạ ni apin ạni mụkpe obhꞌodi.”
ẠJizos ạkpeteey mipa ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi ạḅele, podi ạḍua tesi opopo ạghi tạraama bho ituan obho nạtughumiom ạgba dōm obho.
Amen ạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho ạrol totu ikoli obho ạmoghon moḍighi obho aKraist obho naḍighi obho, podi arōm ẹde iteledōm odi mọghi tạJizos,
opuruan ekua, “Gbạ mạnogho ezōor, ạna obo bho ạJon ạgba aghōl mu natu obho bẹlee kezōor oḅōrō mọnon?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Imula mẹghi mẹgba mẹnogho mạJon mibha enyina nẹmoghon ẹmiin obho.

Obo ikpom ariḍien obho nẹmiin mạar, arukula bho neteleey, obo bho nẹnweey mạrazegh ịpueghi riiḅi obho neḍumogh, obo bho ịḅaaghabh obho nẹmoghon mạar, noḅẹriōn iḍim tọbho bhꞌeedi, keḍio nọogba mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho nọnogho ruvekulom obho.
Keḍio ạlisebh tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho igonan io ạami obho.”

Amen ạnwuny adōm obho tạJon iḍionom ạman, pạJizos ạkpete milo igboloman nꞌạJon ạnogho megi arōoy obho aghōl kua, “Amen obho enyina ịghi tạJon mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho, kenyina ịitua mọmiin ẹkaraan? Enyina ịghi ghạ mobhōgha ịigho bho ọpibha nạpibhoghom obho?
Enyina ịkar ịghi ghạ mọmiin eeghe? Enyina ịghi ghạ mọmiin ōoy olo abura mạravelvet? Obo bho neburaay ghạ mibura pipa bho netughogh ghạ tarutu ạruulema.
Ịgba mẹnogho ạami, enyina ịkar ịghi ghạ mọmiin eeghe? Ozil tẸnaan gạ? Ạkar agey nạ ni, mibha ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina bho, enyina ịmiin molo apu mozil.
Odi ạJon pobo bho ẹegia bho ạgba bọ aghōl, ‘Nonon, ạami naarōm moteledōm ạmi moḍionom onuma. Odi taḍionom taghisigh moselemi ebōom obho ọnogho onuma.’
Agey, ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, ạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho apu kōoy kōoy olo nọomar utuḅeen tesuo ade bho. Keḍio oomo ipa ẹkona obo bho asōoriōm bọ apu mi tAde-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho apu zodi.
Ạḍua taruḍuma tạJon ninii ạteeny siibha, Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho naaḍigh togbōgh ọmiinom oḅe elebhir, molo obo bho nẹnogho mọmiinom obho ịva moḅum ni be ọseghe.
Oomo arizil obho nꞌaraalōgh obho taMozis ịgba ghạ milo igboloman nꞌAde-Ọolema bho ninii ạteeny ruḍuma bho tạJon.
Eru kạar olo idi tologhi enyina momōruōm adōm obho, ạJon pIlaija, obho nọogba moru odi obho.
Erumolo enyina ịteeny raḅeri, ịmoghon.
“Ạami tạkar apin ẹkaraan siibha bho ạtuom mạnwuny ọobhe bhobho? Eedi idi kạnwuny ilo idi delede mi taḍighi. Onyiin ẹku temulughu ẹkiom monyiin ekōl kua,
‘Ezōor uti miitia ipina ọnogho enyina, keḍio enyina ịgher io. Ezōor ụmoor sọor amaḍi ọnogho enyina, enyina ilegheey io.’
ẠJon aru ạrol mọkoony eḍian tebum iikpulughu, agin miim, kōoy kōoy aghōl kua, ‘Ọkarabh ẹmugh odi tẹmu odi.’

Ọony Oōy obho aru, nale nạpoghol, kōoy kōoy aghōl kua, ‘Ịmiin obꞌẹḍogh mẹḍogh, ọpoghoḍia rimiim, nꞌọbulol igunogh raasōgh nꞌiḍighi mịkarabh.’ Oomo ipa ẹkona, ibha olōghōm ạar tẸnaan neḍighi emutiom obho nẹgba emutiom mobho olōghōm ạar obhꞌodi aru magey olōghōm ạar.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạke mozuonom ọkpete ạraama bho odi naaḍighiiy mọkpo ịiḍaany obho, ebum obho arōoy obho deghiraan io tịkarabh eedi obho.

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina arōoy ibhꞌaKorazin. Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina nạ arōoy ibhꞌaBetsaida. Ughōl ọkpo ịiḍaany obho nooḍighi tenyina bho kuḍighi taTaya nꞌaSaidon bọ, kōl eedi neeḍigh tịitu ekiraan tịkarabh eedi kọkanya amen.
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, taḍuma ịiruan obho, ilo Ẹnaan tạsuanaan ghụsan aḍien marōoy aTaya nꞌaSaidon tepu ni enyina.

Enyina arōoy ibhꞌạKapaniom, enyina ịva ghạ mọbheebh osi tẸnaan gạ? Tonyuughi zenyina ọlogh tobꞌoonu obho ikunughi olo bho. Ughōl ọkpo ịiḍaany obho nooḍighi tenyina bho kuḍighi tạSodom bọ, kōl ạSodom odi nini kaadon.
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, taḍuma ịiruan obho, ilo Ẹnaan tạsuanaan ghụsan aḍien mạSodom tepu ni enyina.”

Tamen opopo, pạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ạda. Obạmọogh mạnyu obho nꞌade bho, ạmi nạsebh ni ạna magey tebum obho ạna naaḍeeriom mobo bho ilōghōm io mạar bho, mọkpo bho ạna ụḅoki milōghōm ạar arōoy obho nꞌibꞌịmiin ẹbhereer obho.
Ạda, ẹzo bho nạ, ạna kụto moomo iibha bho tẹzo bho iḍigh bọ tologhi onuma bho nꞌẹzo ịitua bhꞌonuma.

“Ọde ạmi nạalogh tạvo ạmi kạar kạar. Tughuneen mỌde bho ḍio, bọbon ōoy olo alōghōm mỌony obho olo. Tughuneen mỌony obho ḍio, nꞌobo bho Ọony obho nạva mọgba odi omutiom ọnogho bho ḍio, bọbon ōoy olo alōghōm nạ mỌde bho olo.
“Itu tạmi, oomo enyina obo neḍike mibꞌaradōol obho, pạami ọnogho enyina mobhooghia.
Itu mebhin igbōrō bhꞌạmi merōolōm dōol enyina, mẹtuugha ạami, penyina ọteeny obhooghia ebum obho ạami ụteeny alideny alōor nꞌosōoriōm alōor obho.
Igbōrō bho ạami tạnogho enyina bho ạneghe magey; adōol obho ẹemor olo.”
Ipa iru itẹn, ibia ḍio pạJizos arele natẹn tookua ịbiakpa mi taḍuma obhooghia bho. Obo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ọkoony nesibhogh, peedi iḅuni mịbiakpa bho nele.
Amen arōoy aFarisi obho ịmiin mipa bho peedi ịkpete kua ịnogho mạJizos, “Nonon, obo bho nẹtuonom ạna bho neesōor olōgh moḍighi ipa bho mi taḍuma obhooghia bho.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Enyina deghōl io ẹmiin mibha aDevid aḍighi tamen olo odi nꞌarōoy odi ọkoony nesibhogh?
Odi ạghi aḍigh totu obho tẸnaan, keḍio odi nꞌarōoy odi ile mạbred obho ụtunom mạar ụnogho mẸnaan obho, toomo ibha olōgh odi molo eedi kele bho ẹkona. Arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho mobo ịteeny mịnyaam mole.
Bẹlee kenyina deghōl io mi taraalōgh obho taMozis mobho oomo aḍuma obhooghia bho, iḅo miiḅua bho nesōor ghạ molōgh aḍuma obhooghia bho mi totu iikpulughu obho, keḍio debhum io eedi, iben?
Kir ạar olo odi suo, ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, olo ạla mạar apu ạni ni kua motu iikpulughu obho.

Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua, ‘Oḍighi iiḅi ọsu ạghusan aḍien mobho ạami nagbẹel, ọtunoghom ọkpo mịnam io.’ Enyina ịkar ni elōghōm ẹmu ọnuekpete bhobho bọ, enyina kịgba ḍio mapum ẹnogho rōoy ilo ạar olo ịpiom ilo,
ebum obho Ọony Oōy obho aru mObạmọogh aḍuma obhooghia bho.”
ẠJizos ạḍua tesi opopo podi ạghi tonyiin otu iikpulughu obhꞌeedi.
Kir ōoy olo odi olo ạvo bho naamuugh. Kir ẹde arōoy ilo idi ạni ilo nẹva mạar obhin ọgbaam ạJizos, peedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Olōgh odi gạ mookō ōoy mi taḍuma obhooghia bho?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ẹena onyiin enyina ameel aḍigh toonu mi taḍuma obhooghia bho, kenyina teḍighi ẹko? Enyina ịghi ḍio ebhune gạ?
Keḍio ōoy ạla mạar apu ạni nị kua mẹena. Tebum iibha bẹleni, araalōgh obhꞌezira ẹnogho ezira mịikpo mọlogh ạvo ọnogho ōoy mi taḍuma obhooghia bho.”
Podi ạkpete ạnogho mōoy obho aghōl kua, “Sele mạvo onuma.” Odi ōoy obho asele mạvo bho, pạvo bho aru ạneghe kẹzo bho opedi obho odi obho.
Parōoy aFarisi obho ịḍua iḍikuan maruzue moghigh ạJizos.
Amen ạJizos ạmoghon mipa bho, podi ạḍua tesi obho ạghi tọnon esi, keḍio ọlogh arōoy ịtuonom odi, odi aakōoy nạ moomo obo bho nẹnweey rạzegh obho,
aakiom eedi mọḅele ọgba odi ọnogho ịnon arōoy,
moḍighi obhulughiom tibha Ẹnaan abhin tọnu tẠizaya ozil obho ạkpete aghōl,
“Odi Ọony-otu ạmi obho ạami nạason ụseghe bho,
obho ạami utulan, aḍigh nạ tologhi ạmi magey obho.
Ạami tạlogh ẹmugh ạmi mi todi,
odi ạgba amutiom mịiruan ạmi ạnogho moomo arōoy.
Odi ọghanan io rōoy, ọva ḍio rạakpe, omulughu ḍio taraabōom obho.
Odi oḅun io amuton mọpoki obho naaḅunaagh kạrolom obho,
bolobolo aḍime ạman mọtodi obho naamōr ḍụre ḍụre ḍụre bho.
Odi tạkparami ni mạvo odi ninii agey obho epuom ḍien,
oomo arōoy eḍuom odi mologhi.”
Pẹtede arōoy ibhin iruom mạJizos mōoy ikpom ariḍien olo otue nạ ḍio mọkpete ạar, ebum obho ọkarabh ẹmugh odi tẹmu odi obho. PạJizos aakō mōoy obho molo odi nạmiin ạkpete mạar.
Poomo ọlogh arōoy obho iimōogh, ịkpete kua, “Odi ọony obho taDevid io gạ?”
Amen arōoy aFarisi obho ịmoghon pịkpete kua, “Odi napirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh ebum obho ọola eedi ạnogho zodi mịnyaam obho.”

ẠJizos naalōghōm mibha eedi nẹetua bho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Bọbon onyiin ebhugh olo ịḍianogh rụuku onyiin naḅe monyiin orue ḍio aḍum abia. Ẹma bolobolo otu olo ịḍianogh rụuku onyiin naḅe monyiin tapẹ ni.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, eru kạar olo onyiin ẹku mi tade-ọolema taSetan naḅe mọnon, pu nemōrō ekōl made-ọolema bhꞌodi nạaveleghian ẹḍianogh rụuku, molo natu nạ mobhẹ siibha.

Enyina nekōl mạami napirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh mebum obho ọola ịkarabh ạruumugh obho ạnogho ạami mịikpo. Eru kua, kokōr ōoy ạnogho ạni mịikpo mobo bho nẹtuonom enyina bho mobhirighan eedi? Obo bho nẹtuonom enyina bho nẹegba emutiom mobho enyina neekōrōnuan.
Ẹmugh tẸnaan obo bho ạnogho ạami mịnyaam mobhirighanogh ịkarabh ạruumugh obho. Iibha bho nẹgba emutiom mobho Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan naaru ạteenyom enyina.
“Bọbon ōoy olo tatue aḅom aḍigh totu ōoy olo ạghua magey ạḅirogh mọkpo odi tughuneen molo odi abhira abhum ạbhaḍi mōoy obho ḍio olo. Odi naabhum ạpaḍi, podi orue oḅẹer otu obhꞌodi.
“Kōoy kōoy olo oḍigh io nꞌạami, odi nꞌạami obo ạruruan. Kōoy kōoy olo ọḅar io ạami aakōbhōghi rạana bho nạazarami ni.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, tọḅelemaan ni rōoy kịkarabh kịkarabh ilo eedi iḍighi bolobolo ịkpete, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạkpete mịkarabh aḍighanaan mẸmugh Iigbia bho ọḅelemaan olo.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạkpete mịkarabh aḍighanaan mỌony Oōy obho totue ni ọḅelemaan, keḍio obo bho ạkpete aḍighanaan mẸmugh Iigbia bho, ọḅelemaan olo, esiibha nꞌoomo amen.”
“Oorẹeny mọloki iiḅi itu, tạmaar ni amute ạtol dumaduma. Oorẹeny mosi otẹn ẹkpagh, odi tạloki nạ mịbhuagh itu. Nolōghōm ghạ moḍigh oorẹeny obho mi toḍigh itu obho odi ạloki obho.
Sọo, ịikpolodu! Ẹkaraan taḍighi kiiḅi ọkpo emute tọnu enyina iru mịkarabh arōoy? Ịmiin, ọnu obho nạkpeteey ghạ mibha imuzō tekpom obho.
Ooḅi ōoy tapin tẹela iiḅi ọkpo bho idi tekpom odi obho podi oḍighiom iiḅi ọkpo amutiom, ọkarabh ōoy tamutiom mịkarabh ọkpo.
“Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, taḍuma ịiruan obho kōoy kōoy tạmaranuan ni mẸnaan ạgba mọnuekpete ạreḍeghe ole-ọnu ilo imute tọnu odi.
Topin ibha imute tọnu onuma bho ọtu mịiruan obho ọnogho ạna, eru kạar olo ạna tapin akẹel bolobolo apum.”
Pẹde arōoy ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌẹde arōoy aFarisi obho ịkpete kua imutiom, “Obo ịtughumiom, ezōor nọva mọmiin ọkpo ịiḍaany ilo ạna taḍighi.”
PạJizos amulumian kua, “Sọo, pẹzo arōoy ọoke bhobho iḅẹebh isi, ilōghōm io nạ mẸnaan. Enyina negbẹel molo ạami kaḍighi mọkpo ịiḍaany. Ọnon olo enyina tẹmiin olo, tughuneen ibha taJona ozil obho ḍio.
Onyiin ẹzo bho aJona ạrol ịraar aḍuma mi tọbaraka obꞌena bho, pẹzo Ọony Oōy obho tạtol nạ mịraar aḍuma mi tologhi ade bho.

Taḍuma ịiruan obho, arōoy aNineve tẹmara ni ẹgbaaghian enyina, ebum obho eedi ighiraan ni tịkarabh eedi men obho eedi ịmoghon ịigbaay obho aJona ạgba bho, keḍio tesuo ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, kir olo apu maJona.

Taḍuma ịiruan obho, ạni obho ạda bọ maruubhugh Arebia bho taḅetunu ni ạmaranuan ạgbaaghian enyina, ebum obho odi ạḍua tegbeeny esi aru mọmoghon ịtughumiom olōghōm ạar tạSolomon obho. Keḍio tesuo, ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, kir olo apu mạSolomon.”
“Kamen kamen olo ọkarabh ẹmugh amute tẹmu ōoy, odi nateleey ghạ tariisi olo ạmuum ilo, ạva mesi oḍigh obhooghia. Erumolo odi otue ḍio mọmiin esi obhooghia,
podi ọkpete ekua ọnogho alōor odi, ‘Ạami tamula ni ạki tugbaany amarugh ạmi.’ Odi amula aru kạmiin mobho otu obho odi mozōol, nọomaar uḅẹer uukōbhōghi useeri,
podi oghiil omula ọghi obhin ịnon oḍual ịkarabh ạruumugh ilo iḅẹebh ipu zodi oru ọloghom, molo aghuḍum ōoy obho taḅẹebh ni apu mịḅel. Pẹzo temutenaan marōoy ọoke bhobho.”
ẠJizos odi nini nạḍeghe men oniin nꞌaburumōr odi iru, ịmara tetẹrẹ bho nepuruan mọḍeghe ạreḍeghe ọnogho odi.
Ponyiin ōoy ạkpete kua ạnogho odi, “Nonon, oniin nꞌaburumōr onuma idi tetẹrẹ bho nẹva mọḍeghe ạreḍeghe ọnogho onuma.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Okōr ōoy oniin ạmi? Ikōr arōoy aburumōr ạmi?”
Keḍio odi aghiraan ạsughughuun mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ạkpete kua, “Nonon, iibha poniin nꞌaburumōr ạmi.
Obo bho aḍighi bọ mibha iḍigh tologhi Ọde ạmi obho odi tạnyu obho, pumōr nꞌụmarani nꞌoniin ạmi.”
Tonyiin odi aḍuma bho ạJizos ạḍua totu obho podi atẹn ạghi tọtu ọbhiiny obho, ạrol delede ạke mọtughumiom.
Ọlogh arōoy obho ikō zodi obho ipu ni molo odi aḍigh toghuugh ạrol delede, arōoy obho ịrol tegbolom.
Odi abhin sidōgh ạgbaam ọlogh ọkpo ạnogho eedi. Onyiin obho odi ạgba kua,
“Onyiin amen keḍio onyiin ōoy ạghi moḅẹbh iḅẹbh.
Odi aadu ni mikpo bho mi toḍighi obho, molo ẹtede imeleghu tebōom, ịnun iru ikpologh ile.
Ẹde imeleghu tọbharakpar ade olo ịbam ọomi be mobho idi. Ibia ḍio pikpo bho ịke mosi. Ebum obho eḅum ọomi obho ịbugh io obho,
amen aghōzōgh obho amute pạnuemi mikpo bho nẹekpur netu obho, ebum obho ịika bho ịteeny io mesi ọmaar oḍigh ọghi obho, molo eedi ịnyurughan ịikaraghan ịbhozu.
Ẹde imeleghu tiiḅulom, ilo isi iru igimogh eedi.
Keḍio ẹde imeleghu tooḅi ade, isi iru ịloki. Ẹtede ịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh itu, ẹde erubal nꞌaḍisibh itu, ịnon aḍisibh ḍiōbh itu.
Obo ạteeny raḅeri mọmoghon ạmaar ạmoghon.”
Odi ạḍeghe ạḅele, pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho iru ipuruan kua zodi, “Ebum eeghe kạna abhin sidōgh nạḍeghe ạnogho eedi?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Nọonogho enyina mịikpo molōghōm ẹmu ọkpo ẹḅokia ibhꞌAde-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho, ụnogho ạni ḍio eedi.
Ebum obho obo bho aḍigh ạteeny mạar obho tomina ni ọnogho zodi ọḅaram, molo odi ạteeny apuom ịḅel obho. Keḍio ōoy obho ạar olo ạteeny olo bho, tịbam obho odi ạteeny obho ẹkona tọḅoor ni odi.
Ạar obho aḍighi bọ kạami nadōgh sidōgh ạnogho eedi obho, ebum iibha eedi arōoy ilo neenon keḍio ịmiin io, eedi nẹmoghon keḍio ịmoghonyan io, araḅeri eedi ilo suo.
Molo oḍighi omuzeni tạghiiny obho Ạizaya ozil obho ạmiin obho. Odi ạkpete kua,
‘Enyina tẹtol mọmoghon mọmoghon keḍio enyina ịmoghonyan io,
tẹtol moonon moonon
keḍio enyina ịmiin io,
ebum obho ịitua arōoy bhibha izuum ni ipu,
araḅeri obhꞌeedi ịimor ipu mọmoghon ạar,
ariḍien eedi iru mikpom.
Ekua ḍio bọ pariḍien eedi kịmiin,
araḅeri eedi ẹmoghon,
ịitua eedi ẹmoghonyan,
molo eedi keghiraan keru tạmi
molo ạami kaakō zeedi,
pẹzo Ẹnaan ạkpete.’
“Enyina ni dụgh, ibo, ebum obho ariḍien enyina nẹmiin, araḅeri enyina nẹmoghon obho.
Ilōghōm kua mobho ọlogh arizil nꞌọlogh arōoy tẸnaan ịva magey mọmiin ạni ibha enyina nẹmiin obho, keḍio irue ḍio, nꞌọmoghon ibha enyina nẹmoghon obho, keḍio ịkpo.
“Ịmoghon siibha mẹmu asidōgh oḅẹbh miḅẹbh obho.
Obo bho ịmoghon bọ mọnuekpete adōm Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho, keḍio ịmoghonyan io bho, idi kikpo bho imeleghu bọ tebōom obho. Eru obho aru pạḅoorogh eedi mibha nooḅẹbh teedi obho.
Ikpo bho imeleghu tade ọbharakpar obho parōoy ilo ibhinon dōm obho nꞌọḅaal ologhi mi tamen obho eedi ịmoghon obho.

Keḍio ibha eedi ịmoghon obho iḍigh io esi tekpom obhꞌeedi molo ịtolan io eedi ebia molo, tamen olo ịiḅaghami bolobolo ọmiinom iru tebum adōm obho eedi ịmoghon obho, peedi ịkporion rạvo eedi tonyiin amen obho.
Ikpo bho imeleghu tiiḅulom obho parōoy ilo ịmoghon dōm obho, keḍio ịiḅaghami aghuḍum obhobho nꞌẹḍogh ẹela ikpoki ịkom igimogh dōm obho, molo bọbon itu ilo eedi ịloki ilo.
Keḍio ikpo bho uḅẹbh tooḅi ade parōoy ilo ịmoghon dōm obho ịmoghonyan nạ, ịloki mikpo, ẹde ilo tegbẹbh ni mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh, ịnon erubal nꞌaḍisibh, imina ẹde aḍisibh ḍiōbh.”
Keḍio ạJizos amina adōgh ọnon asidōgh ạnogho eedi aghōl kua, “Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho odi kōoy olo ạghi toḍighi odi aḅẹbh migey ịlel.
Aḍio aghul, tamen olo oomo arōoy neeḍiku ịman, pobo ọlogh aḍien odi ạghi aḅẹbh mịkpuuny eḍum ạguonom nꞌịlel obho, atẹn ạḍua.
Amen eedi isiiy, neḅom pịkpuuny eḍum obho imutiom lōor.
Pạrubana odi ōoy obho iru todi ịkpete kua, ‘Uvotu, iiḅi eḍian io gạ mibha ạna uḅẹbh toḍighi obhꞌonuma, kịkarabh obho ịḍua teḍighen eru?’
Podi ạbhagharana kua, ‘Obo ọlogh aḍien ạmi aḍighi mipa bho.’ Pạrubana bho ipuruan kua zodi, ‘Ezōor ọghi orubhi mịkarabh obho?’
Podi ạbhagharana kua, ‘Eenyi, enyina ẹghi morubhi ịkarabh obho, penyina ọḅaraghiom nꞌiiḅi obho.

Ịḅele oomꞌeedi esi eru eḅōrō ninii ạteeny maḍuma iiḅua bho, keḍio ạami tạgba ạnogho mobo bho tẹbu miiḅua bho eedi ebhira erubhi mịkarabh obho ẹghoroghi zeedi tarabol morōbh ọlogh tạnyan, keḍio eedi teekōbhōghi miiḅi obho ẹki ezu totu.’ ”
Keḍio ạJizos amina adōgh ọnon asidōgh ạnogho eedi aghōl kua, “Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho odi kekpo oorẹeny olo odi kamiim ekẹr olo ōoy ạseghe aḅẹbh toḍighi odi.
Odi akio apu mikpo ịnon iirẹeny, keḍio amen odi asi ạbugh, odi apu koorẹeny koorẹeny, aru agbẹbh moorẹeny molo ịnun iru iḅōghi rutu mi tịgha bhꞌodi.”

Keḍio ạJizos amina adōgh mọnon asidōgh aghōl kua, “Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho odi kạar obho noḍighiom ghạ mạbred obho, obho ughōl bọ ayist obho. Onyiin ạni-ebhōbh ạseghe ạguonom ịraar ẹḅa ạfalawa molo ịrol suo iḍighi molo oomꞌeedi iibhuugh.”
ẠJizos adōgh sidōgh ạgba moomo ọkpo bhibha ạnogho meḅir arōoy obho. Odi ọḅele ḍio nọḅele modōgh asidōgh ọnogho eedi.
Odi aḍighi kua moḍighi obhulughiom tibha ozil obho ạkpete aghōl,
“Ạami tapin sidōgh ạḍeghiom ạnogho eedi,
ạgba mọkpo ilo ulōghōm io kọḅel amen
obho ụlem bọ mẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Ipa iru itẹn pạJizos ạḅele mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho aḍigh totu. Piteledōm obhꞌodi iru todi ịkpete kua, “Gbạ mẹmu asidōgh ịkpuuny eḍum obho uḅẹbh toḍighi obho.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Oōy obho aḅẹbh bọ magey ịlel obho, pỌony Oōy obho.
Eḍum oḍighi obho pẹmar-arōoy obho. Iiḅi eḍian obho parōoy obho iru milꞌAde-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho. Ịkarabh obho parōoy ibha iru milꞌeru obho.
Obo ọlogh aḍien obho aḅẹbh mịkpuuny eḍum obho paSetan. Aḍuma iiḅua bho paḍuma ikunughi obho, keḍio obo bho teḅu meḍian obho pitelema bho.
Ẹzo bho uukōbhōghi mịkarabh eḍian obho ụsu nyạn obho, pẹzo tẹtol nạ mi taḍuma ikunughi obho.
Ọony Oōy obho tatōm mitelema odi etu eedi eekōbhōghi emutiom tAde-Ọolema bhꞌodi moomo obo bho iḍighi molo arōoy keḍighiiy mịkarabh obho, nꞌoomo ịnon arōoy iḍighi mịkarabh obho,
etōḅōḍi eedi ẹlogh tobꞌegi ạnyan obho. Tepa pesi eedi tẹtol eleghe ịkiirogh rạlaay.
Keḍio arōoy tẸnaan tẹke mọmua kaghōzōgh obho mi tAde-Ọolema bhꞌỌde bhꞌeedi. Obo bho ịteeny raḅeri mọmoghon obho ẹmaar ẹmoghon.
“Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho odi kịga ilo ụḅoki toḍighi, keḍio ōoy ạghi ạva ạmiin, podi amina akpereghi aseeri. Ologhi odi ạḅaal magey molo odi ạghi aḅool kạar kạar olo odi ạteeny amula ạghi aghō de bho.
“Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho odi nạ kōoy olo nạva mịdamini moghō.
Amen odi ạmiin monyiin olo ạneghe magey podi ạghi aḅool kạar kạar olo odi ạteeny ạghi aghō mịdamini obho.
“Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho odi nạ kọzuguru olo uzu tọbhiiny olo oḍigh kẹrekere ina iḍiku.
Amen ina bho iḍiku igbẹbh, pịze mina bho oḍur obhune tegbolom, ọrol delede ọson iiḅi obho ọloki tạrukpaagh eedi ozu ibha ịneghe ḍio bho orōbh.
Pẹzo tẹtol taḍuma ikunughi obho, itelema bho tẸnaan tetu ni eekōbhōghi mịkarabh arōoy obho ẹseghe tiiḅi obho,
etōbh eedi ẹlogh tobꞌegi ạnyan obho. Tepa pesi eedi telegheey ẹkiirogh rạlaay.”
Ikunughi obho pạJizos apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina ẹmoghonyan miibha bho?” Peedi imōrō mu, “Ii.”
Podi ạkpete kua, “Iibha nemōrō ekōl kua mu kōoy kōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho olo aru moteledōm mi tAde-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho, odi odi kuvotu olo ạseghe mimoom nꞌigbaany ọkpo amutiom totu obhꞌodi.”
ẠJizos akunughiom modōgh asidōgh obho ọnogho eedi podi ạḍua tesi obho odi ạrol obho,

amula ạghi tẹma odi. Podi ạghi ạtughumiom totu iikpulughu obhꞌeedi, molo obo bho ịmoghon ani obho iimōogh ni, keḍio ịkpete kua, “Odi kạteeny teḍighen moḍigh olōghōm ạar obhobho, nꞌịnyaam oḍighi ọkpo ibꞌaruugu obho?
Odi ọony tọkasi mọkasi obho ḍio gạ? AMeri oniin odi ḍio gạ? AJems nꞌaJosef nꞌạSaimon nꞌaJudas aburumōr odi ḍio gạ?
Oomo ạburumarani odi ḍio gạ mibha idi suo bho? Odi kạteeny teḍighen moomꞌiibha bho?”
Tebum iibha bẹleni, peedi igin odi. PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ozil tẸnaan aḍigh eghuan magey mi toomo ariisi, tughuneen tẹma nꞌeghun otu odi be ḍio.”
Odi oḍighi ḍio magey mịkanya ọkpo ibꞌaruugu tebum obho eedi ịteeny io mologhi omōruōm obho.
Tamen opopo pamen ạHerod ọolema aGalili ạmoghon milo igboloman nꞌạJizos,
ạgba ạnogho rōoy oḍighi odi aghōl kua, “Odi ạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho mobho nạakar amula tọbho bho. Pạar obho odi ạteeny nạ mịnyaam ilo ileeny kua moḍighi ibꞌọkpo ilo ịbugh mẹzo bho.”
Odi ạHerod nạanogho mịikpo ọki oḅol mạJon ọloghom ikoli. Odi aḍighi miibha bho mebum ạHerodias, ạni taFilip umōr odi.
Odi ạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho ạkpete ghạ kua ạnogho zodi ạHerod, “Ịneghe ḍio molo ạna kabhin mạni tumōr onuma.”
PạHerod ạrol ạva moghigh odi, keḍio tebum arōoy aJu obho odi one ḍio, ebum obho eedi ịseghe mạJon iseeri kozil tẸnaan obho.
Tonyiin aḍuma olo ạHerod nale mẹzaal mọotua aḍuma bho ụmar odi obho pọnyani tạHerodias aru ạgher ạnogho mẹku obhꞌeedi. Eḍigh tologhi tạHerod
molo odi ạnogho mọnyani obho moguan obhobho, aghiran ịzo aghōl kua, “Kạar kạar olo ạna ugbẹel ạami, pạami ọnogho onuma.”
Tẹzo bho oniin odi ạkpete ạnogho odi obho, podi ạghi ạkpete kua, “Nọgho ạami mẹmu tạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho mi tologhi ẹkpepere.”

Ọolema bho, ologhi obho ọneghe ḍio, keḍio tebum obho odi naaguan moguan obho mi taghisigh obo bho odi abheleghi tẹzaal obho, podi ạnogho mịikpo molo koḍighi kọnogho mọnyani obho tibha odi agbẹel obho.
Tipa bẹleni podi arōm ụghi usōbh ẹmu tạJon mi totu ikoli obho,
ịlogh nạ tẹkpepere iru ịnogho mọnyani obho, odi abhin ạghiom moniin odi.
Keḍio iteledōm odi ạJon ịghi ibhin moḍim obhꞌodi ịghi iḍi, ịghi nạ ịgba ịnogho mạJizos.
Amen ạJizos ạmoghon mọbho bho tạJon, podi aḍigh toghuugh ạḍua tesi opopo ạghi tesi olo adeny, odi nꞌalōor odi be. Parōoy obho ịmoghon, ịḅeleey rạama eedi ịḅol tavel ịghi todi.
ẠJizos abhun toghuugh obho, ạmiin mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho, pạghusan eedi isibh odi, odi aru aakōoy rōoy eedi ibha nẹnweey obho.
Udule aḍuma popo, piteledōm odi iru todi ịkpete kua, “Esiibha aḍio naalegheri nakpereghi, keḍio esi obhobho esi olo ịnon arōoy ilo. Kpẹte mạnogho rōoy obho eedi ẹghi tạraama bho ẹva meḍian eghō ele.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ịgbaan io molo eedi kẹḍua; enyina ịnogho zeedi meḍian eedi ele.”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Oomo ibha ezōor ụteeny suo pōogh eḅol ạbred nꞌịzal ina.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ipin eruom ạami.”

Keḍio odi aru ạkpete ạnogho rōoy obho mọrologhu adelede mi tịigho bho, keḍio odi ạseghe mōogh eḅol ạbred obho nꞌịzal ina bho, aanon tạnyu obho ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, aḅigi ạnogho miteledōm obho, eedi iru ịnoghooy rōoy obho mole.
Kōoy kōoy ạmaar ni ale ọbaraka amute. Iteledōm obho iikōbhōghi mibha isughō bho; aḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạrukpaagh mobho eedi ịteeny.
Ọnu arōoy obho ile meḍian obho, utughuneen mạraani nꞌịbam ạnwuny tegbẹbh ni maḍiōbh nꞌịzal nꞌạmaḍian ọonir arōoy.
PạJizos ạkpete ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi moḍigh oghuugh obho ọghi ghạ tẹḅeenyom obꞌegha bho, odi ạrol tạman naḍighi ghạ molo arōoy obho kegheleghu.
Arōoy obho igheleghu ịman podi ạsiin tạnyu eegum nꞌalōor odi be mookpulughu. Ạteeny mudule, odi be odi nini tepa.
Tamen opopo oghuugh obho odi togbo egha bho, opōkō ạmuum obho nabōrōghōm, ebum obho ọpibha bho nạpibhom eedi obho.
Obꞌẹtughuḅaal tamen olo ạsokiey odi teesoḍia ịraar nꞌodiin, pạJizos arele tạnyu ạmuum obho aru teedi.
Amen iteledōm obho ịmiin odi natele tạnyu ạmuum obho, paruugu isibh eedi, keḍio eedi ịkpete kua, “Oḍim,” paruugu obho ilegheri ilegheri.
PạJizos akẹm ạkpete ạnogho eedi aghōl kua, “Ịpam ologhi enyina, ạami, ighiil ghạ ruugu.”
PaPita akẹm ạkpete kua, “Obumọogh, eru kạar olo ạkar aru zịna, puḍighi ạami utele ạni tạnyu ạmuum obho utu tonuma.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Tue.” PaPita asōor tạnyu ạmuum obho ạke natele nạki tạJizos.
Amen odi aghiraan aanon mopōkō ạmuum obho, paruugu ịke mosibh odi, odi ạke nạ moḍiin. Keḍio amulughu aghōl kua, “Pẹl ạami, Obumọogh.”
Tonyiin amen obho pạJizos asele mạvo odi ạbham odi, ạkpete kua, “Pẹzo ologhi omōruōm onuma akio. Ebum eeghe kạna aru ạteeny ịzal ologhi?”
Amen ịzal eedi iḍigh toghuugh obho pọpibha bho asōbhẹ.
Piteledōm obho idi toghuugh obho igbuluman iikpulughu mạJizos, keḍio ịkpete kua, “Tạkar agey obho, ạna Ọony tẸnaan.”
Eedi ịḅeeny megha bho peedi ibhun tade arōoy ạGenesaret.
Tesi opopo parōoy obho ịlogh mạJizos melẹgh. Peedi irōmōgh rōoy mọgba kobhinogh mobo bho nẹnweey toomo ebhugh obho keru tạJizos.
Eedi iisen odi molo obo bho nẹnwe bho kekulaan mọdu ukpe bhꞌodi. Kōoy kōoy olo akulaan paḍum.
Pẹde arōoy aFarisi obho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho ịḍua taJerusạlẹm iru tạJizos ipuruan kua zodi,
“Ebum eeghe kiteledōm onuma nepẹl ọnu ịtughumiom igbaany ạburude bhꞌezira? Eedi iitōla ghạ ḍio rạvo eedi mi tẹzo bho ụtughumiom obho kegbi mole eḍian.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ebum eeghe kenyina ẹkona nepẹl ọnu ịtughumiom araalōgh obho tẸnaan nẹtuonom ịtughumiom ibhꞌenyina?
Ẹnaan ạkpete kua, ‘Ikiilaan mọde nꞌoniin enyina,’ keḍio ‘Obo bho ạsua mọde bolobolo oniin odi olo oghigh.’
Keḍio enyina neenwe nẹtughumiom merumolo ōoy ạteeny mạar mọbhelom ọde bolobolo oniin odi, kodi ạkpete aghōl, ‘Iibha ilo tẸnaan,’
podi okiilaan mu mọde odi. Pẹzo enyina neenon etughuneen ḍien moghōrōkō bho tẸnaan ẹtuonom mịtughumiom ibhꞌenyina.
Sọo obo ilōghōma lōor nelōghōm ghạ milꞌịnon, ạghiiny obho Ạizaya ạmiinom enyina ịkar ni eezuan. Odi ạkpete kua,
‘Pẹzo Ẹnaan ạkpete, arōoy bhibha ibhin ọnuekpete be neebhughumi ạami,
iloghi obhꞌeedi egbeenyan magey mi tạmi.
Iikpulughu obho eedi neekpulughu ạami obho, ạar oḍighiom olo,
ebum obho eedi nẹtughumiom maraalōgh arōoy kilo eedi araalōgh obho iru maraalōgh ilo Ẹnaan ạlokiiy.’ ”
Keḍio ạJizos abheleghi mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho iru todi keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịde raḅeri enyina mẹmaar ẹmoghonyan.
Ibha neḍigh tọnu ōoy obho ḍio mibha neḍighi mōoy moru ọkarabh ōoy, ibha ịḍua tọnu odi nemuteghu obho.”
Odi ạkpete ạḅele, piteledōm obho iru todi ịkpete kua ịnogho odi, “Ạna alōghōm aghōl iloghi arōoy aFarisi obho neḅẹebh tibha ạna ụkpete bho?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Koorẹeny koorẹeny olo Ọde ạmi obho odi tạnyu obho oḅẹbh io, totubh ni otōbh.
Iínon ghạ zeedi. Eedi arōoy ikpom ariḍien ilo ikpo mịnon netenom taghisigh, keḍio kamen kamen olo ōoy ikpom ariḍien nateliom mọnon, ịzal eedi tesuman ni emeleghu toonu.”
PaPita ạkpete kua amutiom, “Gbạ mẹmu asidōgh obhobho mạnogho ezōor”
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Olōghōm ạar obhꞌenyina idi nini nạ kibha ipedi obho.
Senyina ịmoghonyan io? Kạar kạar olo aḍigh tọnu ōoy nạki ghạ asi tobꞌọla, ạḅol amute talōor ōoy obho.
Keḍio ibha ịḍua tọnu obho imute bho ịḍua tekpom odi keru. Ipa pibha neḍighi ghạ mōoy atu mọkarabh.
Ịkarabh ịitua nẹḍua ghạ tekpom obho ku netu moḍighi odi kaghigh mōoy, nꞌole ẹma, nꞌoḍighi ịnon ịkarabh ọkpo ạraani nꞌilobhir, nꞌomiigh aviigh, nꞌọgba iben, nꞌọgba ịnon ọpue.
Iibha pibha neḍighi ghạ mōoy moru ọkarabh. Ole eḍian molo uutōla ḍio rạvo kẹzo bho eedi nẹkpete bho, iḍighi ḍio mōoy aru mọkarabh.”
ẠJizos ạḍua tesi opopo, podi ạghi tebhugh olo atuan rạama bhꞌaTaya nꞌaSaidon.
Ponyiin ạni olꞌaKenan olo natugh tebhugh obho aru todi amulughu ạkpete kua, “Oōy, Ọony taDevid, sụanaan ạmi ghụsan. Ọkarabh ẹmugh nạaḅaghami mọnyani ạmi molo naaghigh odi kaseeri.”
Keḍio ạJizos ọsir io mọghor ạnogho odi. Pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịkpete kua ịnogho odi, “Kpẹte mạnogho mạni obho odi ạḍua. Odi nạtuonom ezira namulughu moḍigh kẹrekere imulughu.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Urōm ạami oru tarōoy Izirẹl ibha neebhẹ kạraana bho be.”
Tamen opopo pạni obho aru agbuluman taghisigh odi ạkpete kua, “Oōy, lọgh ạvo mạnogho ạami.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ịneghe ḍio mozu eḍian ạnwuny obho ọnogho asighōghō.”
Pạni obho ạbhagharana kua, “Oōy, agey, keḍio asighōghō bho ẹkona, su nele ghạ nị nạ meḍian uvotu obho, ibha isughō imeleghu tizebele odi obho.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua mạni obho, “Ạna ạni olo ạteeny magey mologhi omōruōm. Ibha ạna nagbẹel obho toḍighi ni ọnogho ạna.” Tạkar odi amen opopo pọnyani obhꞌodi aḍum.
ẠJizos ạḍua tesi opopo, podi ạghi tọtu obꞌegha bhꞌaGalili, ạsiin meegum ạrol delede.
Pọlogh arōoy iru todi, ibhin nạ iru todi marukula, nꞌobo ikpom ariḍien, nꞌạsukugha, nꞌarukpom ụka nꞌọlogh ịnon arōoy ilo nẹnwe, keḍio odi ạJizos aakōoy eedi.
Arōoy obho iimōogh ni mọmiin obho arukpom ụka bho nẹkpeteey mạar, obo bho itue ḍio morele bho neeḍumogh, arukula bho neteleey, arōoy ikpom ariḍien obho nẹmiin mạar, molo eedi ibuom Ẹnaan obhꞌIzirẹl.

Tesuo, PạJizos abheleghi miteledōm odi ạkpete kua, “Ạghusan arōoy bhibha nesibh ạami, ebum obho eedi nẹerolan ạami moomꞌịraar aḍuma keḍio eḍian olo eedi neele olo. Ạami ụva ḍio molo eedi keghẹel kua molo eedi ile ḍio meḍian. Eedi eghẹel kua, tetue ni ẹkorom tebōom obho kegbi mosi tarutu eedi.”
Piteledōm obho ipuruan kua zodi, “Ezira tọmiin teḍighen mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho meḍian mọbheriom obꞌọlogh arōoy bhibha?”
PạJizos apuruan kua zeedi, “Ịni ạbred mobho enyina ịteeny?” Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Oḍual eḅol ạbred nꞌịbam ịbam ina.”
PạJizos ạkpete ạnogho rōoy obho mọrologhu adelede mi tade bho,
keḍio odi ạseghe moḍual eḅol ạbred obho nꞌina bho ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, aḅigi ạnogho miteledōm obho, eedi ịnoghooy rōoy obho.
Oomꞌeedi iru ile ạrubaraka imuteey, iteledōm obho iru iikōbhōghi moḍual ạrigiel ạrukpaagh ịpaḍi ạbred ilo isughō.
Utughuneen rạani nꞌịbam ạnwuny, obo bho ile meḍian obho aḍiōbh ọonir arōoy.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho rōoy obho mogheleghu, odi aḍigh toghuugh ạghi tebhugh obhꞌạMagadan.
Odi asi, pẹde arōoy aFarisi nꞌaSadusi obho iru todi ạJizos. Eedi nẹva mạar olo ubhin ọbhamam odi, peedi igbẹel odi moḍighi ọkpo ịiḍaany ọnogho eedi molo elōghōm mobho Ẹnaan arōm odi.
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Amen olo aghōzōgh obho naḍigh, penyina ughōl, ‘Aḍio bhꞌeḍie tạmu ni, ebum obho eḅōghōghaan obho akōgh ni obho.’

Keḍio obun-ụḍirogh penyina oghōl, ‘Aḍio bhꞌaadon tạlobh ni, ebum obho eḅōghōghaan obho akōgh aḅilom obho.’ Enyina neenon ghạ ni ekōl elōghōm ḍio bho, keḍio enyina irue ḍio molōghōm ọgba ẹmu araalōgh obho amen obhobho.

Pẹzo ạnwuny ọoke bhobho iḅẹebh isi molo ilōghōm nạ ḍio mẸnaan. Enyina negbẹel molo ạami kaḍighi mọkpo ịiḍaany kạnogho enyina? Ịkpo, bọbon olo toḍighi ọnogho enyina olo, tughuneen ịiḍaany taJona ḍio.” Podi ạḅele eedi ạḍua.
Amen iteledōm obho isi tẹḅeenyom ọbhiiny egha bho peedi ịitua mobho eedi neebulo mọbhamam ạbred.
Eedi isi pạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Igona lōor enyina, mẹkporion rạvo enyina mi tayist arōoy aFarisi nꞌaSadusi obho.”
Peedi ịke mọḍeghe nꞌalōor eedi oghōl ekua, “Odi nạḍeghe miibha bho mebum obho ezira ụpam io mạbred obho.”

ẠJizos naalōghōm mibha eedi nẹḍeghe bho, podi apuruan kua zeedi, “Eeghe aḍighi kenyina nẹḍeghian nꞌalōor enyina mebum obho enyina ịpam io mạbred eru obho? Pẹzo ologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina alegheri akio asi.
Enyina derue nạ ḍio mọmoghonyan kesiibha? Enyina irue ḍio mọotua amen obho ạami uḅigi mōogh eḅol ạbred ụbheriom maḍiōbh nꞌịzal nꞌạmaḍian ọonir arōoy obho? Ạbred bho isughō, ịni ạrukpaagh bho imuza?
Ẹko ạni mibha oḍual eḅol ạbred obho aḍiōbh ọonir arōoy obho ile bho, ịni ạrigiel ạrukpaagh mibha isughō?
Eeghe aḍighi kenyina irue ḍio mọmoghonyan mobho ạami ụkpete ḍio ạnogho enyina milo igboloman nꞌạbred? Igona lōor enyina mi tayist arōoy aFarisi nꞌaSadusi obho.”

Keḍio iteledōm obho tegbi mọmoghonyan mobho ạJizos ọkpete ḍio ạnogho eedi mogona alōor eedi mi tilo igboloman nꞌayist ibha noḍighiom ghạ mạbred obho, odi nạkpete ạnogho eedi mogona alōor eedi mi tịtughumiom arōoy aFarisi nꞌaSadusi obho.
ẠJizos aḅetunu suo pạghi tebhugh obho atuan bọ mẹma bho ughōl bọ aSizaria Filipai obho. Tepa podi apuruan kua miteledōm obhꞌodi, “Arōoy ku nekōl mạami Ọony Oōy obho kokōr ōoy?”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ẹtede nekōl ghạ mạna ạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho, ẹde nekōl mạna Ilaija, keḍio ịnon nekōl mạna aJerimaya ozil obho bolobolo ọnon onyiin ozil tẸnaan.”
Keḍio odi aghiraan apuruan kua zeedi, “Tenyina, kenyina nekōl ạni mạami kokōr ōoy?”
PạSaimon Pita ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna ạMesaya bho, Ọony tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho.”

PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ạlisebh tẹtol ni ẹnogho ạna ạSaimon, ọony obho taJona. Oōy olo esuo ẹmar-arōoy obho kọgba ḍio aḍeeriom ạna magey bhibha, Ọde ạmi obho odi tạnyu obho ạgba amutiom aḍeeriom ạna.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạami nạgba kua ạnogho ạna, ạna aPita, ẹmu obho pọbharakpar, keḍio tạnyu odi ọbharakpar obhobho pesi ạami taḅōgh mạsosi ạmi, obho bọbon ọbho ẹkona nạ otue ḍio ạmaranuan apuom ḍien obho.
Ạami tạnogho ạna mạrisabi Ade-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho. Kạar kạar olo ạna ugbi tade bho pogbi nạ tạnyu obho, kạar kạar olo ạna ụḅelemaan tade bho, pọḅelemaan nạ tạnyu obho.”
Keḍio ạJizos aakiom eedi meedi ịgba ḍio ẹnogho mọnon ōoy mobho odi aru mạMesaya bho.

Ạseghe tamen opopo ạghi taghisigh, pạJizos ạke mọmaar ọgba omutiom ọnogho iteledōm odi oghōl ekua, “Ạami tạki ni taJerusạlẹm ạmiinom magey mi tạravo arukenya, nꞌaruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho, nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho. Tokigh ni ạami, keḍio ogbẹbhiōm ịraar aḍuma poḅẹtōn ạami tọbho bho.”
PaPita abhin odi atẹnẹ tọtu ạrol asi odi aghōl kua, “Ẹnaan omōrō ḍio, Obumọogh. Iibha bho irue ḍio emute.”
PạJizos aghiraan amulumian kua maPita, “Sọo, aSetan, tẹn tạman ạmi. Ạna ụumighian tebōom ạmi, ebum obho ibha ạna nạatua bho ịitua arōoy, ilo tẸnaan io.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho, “Kōoy kōoy olo nạva mọtuonom ạmi, odi taḅulo ni ghuḍum odi, aḅẹtōn atōol moorẹeny ẹmigheri obhꞌodi ạtuonom ạami.
Kōoy kōoy olo nạva mookō alōor oḍume aghuḍum odi tapiẹmi ni, keḍio obo bho nạva mobhiẹmi aghuḍum odi mebum ạmi obho, odi pobo taḍume.
Okōr oḍigh ạsuo mobho ōoy tạteeny erumolo odi agbo moomo ẹela ẹmar-arōoy obho keḍio abhiẹmi ghuḍum obho Ẹnaan ạnogho zodi obho? Ạsuo olo. Bẹlee, kẹkaraan mobho ōoy tapin anwiom ghuḍum odi?
Ọony ōoy obho nạva moru nꞌitelema bho tẸnaan mi teghuan Ọde bhꞌodi, ọkpe omulumian kōoy kōoy mi tẹzo eḍighiom ạar ibhꞌodi.
Agey nạ ni, ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, kir ẹde enyina obo bho idi suo olo ịpo ḍio ninii eedi ẹmiin mỌony Oōy naamula natu kọolema.”
Odiin aḍuma itẹn pạJizos abhin maPita, nꞌaJems nꞌạJon, ịzal aburumōr obho, eedi be ịsiin tạnyu obꞌeegu.
Ẹzo bho eedi neenon obho, palōor tạJizos anwian, aghisigh odi aru nạmu kaghōzōgh obho, ibura bhꞌodi nẹmu kẹḅaal obho.
Keḍio ịraar iteledōm obho ịmiin maMozis nꞌIlaija nẹḍeghian nꞌạJizos.

Tipa bho paPita akōbh ạkpete kua, “Obumọogh, ịkar ni ẹneghe magey mẹzo bho ezira idi suo bho. Eru kạar olo iḍigh tologhi onuma, pạami oḅōgh ịraar arutu eḍum mi tesuo, onyiin olꞌonuma, onyiin olo taMozis, onyiin olo tỊlaija.”

Odi odi nini nạḍeghe mipa bho, pọbhurubuur olo nạmu kẹḅaal obho ạḍua tạnyu obho akpiom eedi, keḍio eedi ịmoghon oghōrōkō tọbhurubuur obho ạkpete kua, “Oobho ogini Ọony ạmi, obho naḍighi milo iḍigh tologhi ạmi; ịmoghonyan odi.”
Amen iteledōm obho ịmoghon moghōrōkō bho, paruugu isibh eedi magey molo eedi igbuluman iḍi sumusigh eedi mi tade bho.
Keḍio ạJizos aru akulaan eedi ạkpete kua, “Iḅetunu, ighiil ghạ ruugu.”
Peedi ikiton iinon ịmiin mạJizos be, ọnon ōoy olo odi olo mu.
Ẹzo bho eedi nesōor teegum obho pạJizos aakiom eedi aghōl kua, “Ị́gba ghạ nꞌạar nꞌạar ilo igboloman nꞌạghiiny obho enyina ịmiin obho ninii oḅẹtōn Ọony Oōy obho mi tọbho bho.”
Keḍio iteledōm obho ipuruan kua mạJizos, “Eeghe aḍighi kobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nekōl mIlaija tapira atu?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ilaija nạakar apira atu, molo odi aakōbhōghi kạar kạar aseeri.

Keḍio ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, Ilaija nạakar atu keḍio arōoy obho ịlogh io zodi elẹgh, molo eedi iḍighi zodi mẹzo olo ologhi eedi aḍigh aḍigh. Onyiin ẹzo bho pẹzo Ọony Oōy tạmiinom nạ mi tạravo eedi.”
Keḍio iteledōm obho tegbi mọmoghonyan mobho odi nạḍeghe ạnogho eedi milo igboloman nꞌạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho.
Amen eedi imula iru tesi obho ọlogh arōoy obho idi obho, ponyiin ōoy aru agbuluman taghisigh tạJizos ạkpete kua,
“Oōy, sụanaan mọony ạmi ghụsan aḍien. Ọkarabh ẹmugh nạaḅaghami odi molo odi nạmiinom mịkanya. Otamen tạpam odi ạlogh tạnyan, otamen tạpam odi ạzubh tạmuum.
Keḍio ạami ubhin odi uruom iteledōm onuma mookō keedi irue ḍio.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Enyina arōoy bhibha, pẹzo enyina iḅẹebh molo bọbon ologhi omōruōm olo enyina ịteeny olo. Ạami tạtolan enyina kokōr amen? Ipin mọony obho meruom ạami.”
ẠJizos ạkpete ạnogho mọkarabh ẹmugh obho mọḍua, molo ọony obho aḍum tonyiin amen obho.
Piteledōm obho ịghi tạJizos ipuruan odi tẹḅokia ighōl kua, “Eeghe aḍighi kezōor urue ḍio mobhirighan ọkarabh ẹmugh obho?”

PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ebum obho ologhi omōruōm enyina igbẹbh io bho. Ilōghōm kua mobho, eru kạar olo enyina ịteeny mologhi omōruōm olo ạbugh aaleeny mekpo amiim-ẹker, enyina tetue ni ẹkpete ẹnogho meegum obhobho ekōl kua, ‘Ḍiirunu suo mạghi epa,’ pọghi nạ. Enyina tetue ni eḍighi kạar kạar.
[Keḍio oḍigh ẹzegh obhobho, iikpulughu nꞌọrol ọkoony be mobho tatue apirighan, ọnon ạar olo.]”
Tamen olo iteledōm obho, oomꞌeedi neekōbhōghian monyiin esi mi taGalili, pạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Natuan men tokuugh mỌony Oōy obho ọlogh tạravo ạnwuny arōoy.
Eedi tekigh ni zodi, keḍio togbẹbhiōm ịraar aḍuma bho poḅẹtōn odi tọbho bho.” Pịitu isōorōm miteledōm obho magey.
Amen ạJizos nꞌiteledōm odi ịghi isi tạKapaniom, pigunogh raasōgh otu iikpulughu obho iru taPita ipuruan kua zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom enyina nasōgh ghạ ni mosōgh otu iikpulughu obho gạ?”

PaPita ạbhagharana aghōl kua, “Ẹe.” Amen aPita aḍigh totu obho pạJizos abhira apuruan kua maPita, “ẠSaimon, tologhi onuma kẹko? Ikōr arōoy nesōgh ghạ mosōgh ẹnogho mạruulema ẹmar-arōoy obho? Ạnwuny ogbo-eghun obho bẹlee, kisoloman obho?”
PaPita ạbhagharana aghōl kua, “Isoloman obho.” PạJizos amulumian kua zodi, “Eru kua, pịgbaan io nwụny ogbo-eghun obho mosōgh osōgh.

Keḍio ạami ụva ḍio moḍighanaan arōoy bhibha. Tebum iibha bẹleni, sōor tegha bho mạtobhori mụkpabh, ọḅel ena bho ạna tapune bho, nonon tọnu obho pạna ọmiin okpoki olo tagbẹbhōm ni mosōghōm osōgh otu iikpulughu obho milꞌạmi nꞌilꞌonuma. Sẹghe mạghi mạkpiom osōgh ibhꞌezira.”
Tamen opopo, piteledōm obho iru tạJizos ipuruan kua zodi, “Okōr ōoy tạbugh apu mi tAde-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho?”
PạJizos abheleghi monyiin ọbam ọony ạmarami taghisigh oomꞌeedi,
ạkpete kua, “Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina: tughuneen molo enyina inwian ịrol kọbam ọony obhobho ḍio, enyina irue ḍio eḍigh ani tAde-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho.
