Obo bho apu kōoy kōoy mi tAde-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho pobo bho asōoriōm lōor odi ạrol kọbam ọony obhobho bho.
Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo abhin ạloghom monyiin ọbam ọony olo odi kua mi taḍien ạmi, naabhin nạ ạami ạloghom.”
“Kōoy kōoy olo aḍighi monyiin ọbam ọony abaabha bho arōbh ologhi omōruōm odi mi tạmi, ọkpo ooḍigh torum odi ọkpuom tobꞌọbharakpar otuḅeen togbo ọbhiiny ịneghe epu.

Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho mẹmar-arōoy obho, suo ọdegh arōoy ọlogh toḍighi ịkarabh idi mịkanya obho. Iibha bho ikun io tẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho ọdegh oonon tẹḍua etu obho.

“Eru kạar olo ạvo bolobolo alẹkẹ onuma takireni mologhi onuma moḍighi ịkarabh, pusōbh arōbh. Ạna moḍighom eekpoogh ạvo nꞌeekpoogh alẹkẹ mi taghuḍum ịneghe ạni ni kua epu molo kọloghom ạna mi tobꞌegi ạnyan obho iḍim ghạ ḍio kamen kamen obho tilo ạravo nꞌasike onuma igbẹbh ni ịman.

Keru kạar olo aḍien onuma nakireni mologhi onuma moḍighi ịkarabh, pụtoghoron arōbh. Ạna moḍighom onyiin ekpaḍien mi taghuḍum ịneghe ạni ni kua epu molo kọloghom ạna mi tobꞌegi ạnyan oonu obho ikunughi olo bho tilo ariḍien onuma igbẹbh ni ịman.”
“Kamen kamen, iínon ghạ mẹpue mịbam ạnwuny bhibha. Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, eedi ẹteeny itelema tẸnaan ilo idi tạnyu obho mi taghisigh tẸnaan.
[Ọony Oōy obho aru mọbhel obo bho neebhẹ bho.]

“Enyina nẹetua ẹko? Oniin ōoy kạteeny mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ạraana konyiin abhẹ, enyina nẹetua odi taḍighi ẹko? Odi tạḅele ni monyiin olo mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ipedi obho nele mịigho mi tọtu eegum obho, ạki mọva onyiin obho abhẹ bho.
Amen odi ạmiin, ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ilo ologhi odi tạḅaal mi tebum onyiin obho abhẹ bho tepu ni mibha onyiin olo mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ibha ipẹ ḍio bho.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho ọva ḍio molo onyiin ịbam ạnwuny bhibha kabhẹ.”
“Onyiin umōr onuma kaḍighi ạna mịkarabh, kịa todi mạgba mịkarabh bhꞌodi mamutiom. Ḍighi miibha bho mi tẹḅokia nꞌịzal enyina be. Eru kạar olo odi ạmoghonyan ạna, pạna nạaḅoorom amulumi mumōr onuma.
Kodi ọmoghonyan io ạna, pupin ọnon ōoy, onyiin bolobolo ịzal, mẹghi todi, molo ‘kịigbaay kịigbaay ilo ụgba teḍigh taraḅeri ịzal nꞌịraar,’ kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
kodi ọmoghonyan nạ ḍio zenyina, pụgba moomo ibha imute bho mạnogho mạsosi obho. Kodi ọmoghonyan nạ ḍio puseeri zodi kisoloman bolobolo kogunogh raasōgh.”
“Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ibha enyina igin tade bho, pogin nạ tạnyu obho; ibha enyina ịḅelemaan tade bho, pọḅelemaan nạ mi tạnyu obho.

“Keḍio ạami kạgba digha ạnogho enyina nạḅaram, kamen kamen olo ịzal arōoy mi tenyina mi tade bho ịmoghonyan tonyiin ạar olo enyina iikpulughu igbẹel, Ọde ạmi obho odi tạnyu obho taḍighi ni ạnogho enyina.
Ebum obho kesi kesi olo ịzal nꞌịraar ịrol monyiin esi mi taḍien ạmi, ạami odi nꞌeedi.”
PaPita aru apuruan kua mạJizos, “Obumọogh, ịni amen mobho umōr ạmi taḍighi ạami mịkarabh kạami agbi mọḅelemaan odi? Oḍual amen bẹle?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ekua ḍio, oḍual amen be ḍio, ḅẹlemaan odi mạsumuunir amen.
Ilōghōm mobho Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho odi kọolema olo aru mọḅalan ikpoki nꞌobo oḍighi odi.
Ụke kua be, pubhin uruom odi monyiin olo naale mạsumuunir asinaira.
Odi ōoy bho ikpoki ilo odi ạteeny mọkpiom ọmugh obhꞌodi olo, pọola bho ạto aghōl moḅool odi kẹbana nꞌạni odi, nꞌạnwuny odi, nꞌoomo kạar kạar olo odi ạteeny, mọkpiom ọmugh obhꞌodi.
Podi ōoy obho agbuluman taghisigh ọolema bho aasen odi aghōl kua, ‘Kpạram ạḅelemaan ạami, ạami tạva ni ạkpe amulumian ạna kạar kạar.’
Ọsu ạghusan aḍien esibh mọolema bho magey molo odi ạḅelemaan mōoy obho aghōl modi aghẹel.
“Odi ōoy obho apẹl amute podi ạmiin monyiin ōoy olo eedi neḍighi monyiin oḍighi obho olo ale mịbam asinaira mọmugh odi, podi akinighi mẹḍogh ōoy obho ạkpete kua, ‘Kpẹ mọmugh ạmi siibha siibha.’
Popedi obho agbuluman aasen odi aghōl kua, ‘Kpạram ạḅelemaan ạami siibha, ạami tạva ni ạkpe amulumian ạna.’
Keḍio ōoy obho omōrō ḍio nomōrō. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, podi aḅol mōoy obho ạloghom mikoli, mọkpe ḍio mọmugh obho momute ḍio.
Amen ịnon ibha neḍighi nạ moḍighi obho ịmiin mẹzo bho, pologhi eedi aḅẹebh, eedi ịghi ịgba moomo ibha imute bho ịnogho mọolema bho.
Pọolema bho abheleghi mōoy obho ạloghom, ạkpete kua, ‘Ạna ạar oḍighiom olo, ạami ụḅelemaan ạna moomo ọmugh obho ạna ule tạvo ạmi obho, tebum obho ạna uusen ạami obho.
Ịgbaan nị molo ạna kạteeny mọsu ạghusan aḍien mi todi obo bho ale mọmugh onuma bho kẹzo bho ạami ụsuanaan ạna ghụsan obho?’
Ologhi ọolema bho aḅẹebh magey, podi ạloghom mōoy obho mikoli mọmiinom ninii odi atu ạkpe moomo ọmugh obho odi ale bho.
Pẹzo Ọde ạmi obho odi tạnyu obho taḍighi nạ moomꞌenyina obo bho ịḅelemaan ghạ ḍio nꞌoomo ologhi enyina mịkarabh aburumōr enyina bho.”
Amen ạJizos ạḍeghe miibha bho ạḅele, podi ạḍua taGalili ạghi tebhugh obhꞌaJudia, mi tẹḅeenyom ọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan.
Ọlogh arōoy ẹtuonom odi molo odi aakōoy nạ zeedi.

Pẹde arōoy aFarisi obho iru todi nẹva mạar olo obhin ọbhamam odi, keḍio ipuruan kua zodi, “Araalōgh obhꞌezira ẹnogho mịnyaam mōoy mogbo ạḅam omutiom ạni odi tebum ibha idi tologhi odi moḍighi obho gạ?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Enyina deghōl io ẹmiin tẹegia iigbia bho miibha bho gạ? ‘Tọḅel egbiom obho obo bho ạlem bọ mẹmar-arōoy obho, ạlem mọza nꞌolobhir,’
keḍio ạkpete kua, ‘Tebum iibha bẹleni, olobhir ọony tạḅele mọde nꞌoniin eedi, atul ọnu nꞌạni odi, keḍio ịzal eedi tetu monyiin.’
Tebum iibha bẹleni, eedi ịzal arōoy mu ḍio, eedi onyiin. Tebum iibha bẹleni, ōoy ọgbarion io mibha Ẹnaan naatul iru monyiin obho.”
Parōoy aFarisi obho ipuruan kua, “Eeghe aḍighi kaMozis ạto aghōl mōoy olo agbo mạḅam abhirighan mạni odi ạge mọbhereer ạnogho odi?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “AMozis ạḅelemaan enyina mogbo ạraani enyina omutiom tebum obho enyina ịkpar ni magey mọtughumiom obho. Ịrol io kua mi tamen obho ụlem bọ mẹmar-arōoy obho.
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina siibha, kōoy kōoy olo agbo mạni odi amutiom tilo odi kole ḍio ni mẹma kạghi abhin mọnon ạni, podi nale mẹma.”
Piteledōm obhꞌodi ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Eru kua mi tilom, pōoy mọḅele obhin ạni ịneghe epu.”
ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ịtughumiom obhobho ilꞌoomo arōoy io, ilꞌobo bho Ẹnaan nạanogho mịikpo bho.

Oḍigh kẹrekere ọkpo idi mạar obho aḍighi bọ karōoy ipinogh io rạani obho; ẹde, ebum obho ụmar eedi mẹzo bho; ịnon, ebum obho arōoy iḍighi eedi mọrol ekua bho; imina ẹde, ebum Ade-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho. Kōoy kōoy olo tatue ni, ạtuonom mịtughumiom bhobho.”
Ẹtede arōoy ibhin nwụny eruom mạJizos molo odi kạnogho eedi lịsebh, pobo bho nẹtuonom zodi obho ịrol ịbhooruom rōoy obho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ịḅelemaan ạnwuny obho eru tạmi, ị́puenaan ghạ zeedi. Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho ilꞌarōoy ilo idi keedi.”
Odi ạnogho eedi lịsebh obho, podi ạḍua.
Onyiin amen ponyiin ōoy aru tạJizos apuruan kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, ikōr oḍigh iiḅi oḍighi mobho ạami taḍighi mọteeny ạni aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ebum eeghe kạna napuruan ạami milo igboloman nꞌoḍighi iiḅi. Onyiin be mobho aru mooḅi. Kōkō raalōgh obho eru kạar olo ạna nạva mọteeny aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.”
Podi apuruan kua, “Iḍighen araalōgh?” PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ughigh ghạ mōoy, ule ghạ mẹma, umiigh ghạ viigh,
kiilaan ọde nꞌoniin onuma, matulan mobo bho atuan ạna bho kẹzo bho ạna utulan lōor onuma bho.”
Podi ọola bho amulumian kua zodi, “Ạami naakō raalōgh bhibha, ẹkaraan asughō molo ạami kaḍighi?”

PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Eru kạar olo ạna nạva mogbẹbh ọman, pụkia maḅool kạar kạar olo ạna ụteeny mạseghe mikpoki obho mạnogho ruvekulom obho, pạna ogbo ẹela mi tạnyu obho, ku maru mạtuonom ạami.”
Amen ōoy obho ạmoghon mibha ạJizos ạkpete bho, podi atẹn ạḍua nꞌịitu, ebum obho odi agbo magey mẹela bho.
Keḍio ạJizos tạkpete ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho aghōl kua, “Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina: ẹkar ẹkpar magey molo ọola kaḍigh ạni tAde-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho.
Keḍio ạami kạgba digha ạnogho enyina uuva mọḅol oḍigh taḍien ạnuga ịkar idugh epu molo ọola kaḍigh tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Amen obo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịmoghon mẹzo bho peedi iimōogh, keḍio ịkpete kua, “Komina okōr ōoy mobo totue ni opẹl?”
PạJizos agbiom eedi musigh odi keḍio ạbhagharana kua, “Iibha bho ẹkparanaan magey rōoy, keḍio tẸnaan kạar kạar idugh ni ẹman.”
PaPita akōbh ạkpete kua, “Nonon ni, ezōor nọoḅele kạar kạar otu nọtuonom ạna. Ezōor ku tọteeny mẹkaraan?”

PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, amen olo Ọony Oōy obho tạsiin tẹtolom ọdaam ẹma eghuan obho mi tomoom ẹmar-arōoy obho, enyina aḍiōbh nꞌịzal obo bho nẹtuonom ạami tẹtol ạni tẹtolom obho ẹtu mịiruan ẹnogho maḍiōbh nꞌịzal arughun-otu obhꞌIzirẹl.

Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạḅele motu, nꞌaburumōr, nꞌạburumarani, nꞌọde nꞌoniin, nꞌạnwuny bolobolo ariḍighi odi mebum ạmi, ilo odi tapin tepu ni mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ipa bho, keḍio tọnogho nạ zodi maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.
Keḍio obo bho iru bọ mịḅel siibha bho, tẹtol tạman; obo bho idi tạman obho tetu mịḅel.”
“Ade-Ọolema obhꞌạnyu obho odi kōoy olo ạteeny mookua iirẹeny amiim. Odi aḅon obun ụḍirogh ạghi amuulan rōoy moḍighi oḍighi tookua bho.
Odi amōrō mọkpe eedi mẹzo bho nọkpe ghạ maḍuma oḍighi obho, ọpaḍi asilva ḍuma. Eedi imōrōnuan, podi arōm rōoy obho mọghi oḍighi oḍighi obho.
Asi tesughō asuo, podi amina amute ạghi taḍighi obho, ạmiin rōoy ilo ịmaraay kua be ạar olo neḍighi ilo,
podi ạkpete ạnogho eedi aghōl kua, ‘Enyina ẹkona ịki tookua bhꞌạmi meḍighi moḍighi obho, ạami tạkpe ni enyina mibha iizuan obho.’
Peedi ịghi. Onyiin ẹzo bho mobho odi aḍighi mi tamen olo aḍio nạaḍi ịzal abin, nꞌịraar asuo.

Natuan tōogh asuo mamen odi amina ạghi taḍighi obho ạmiin mịnon arōoy ilo ịmaraay kua be ạar olo neḍighi olo. Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, ‘Ebum eeghe kenyina natōbh men oomo aḍuma bho molo ạar olo enyina neḍighi ilo?
Gụa, enyina ẹkona ikẹm mẹghi tookua bhꞌạmi meḍighi moḍighi.’

“Ạteeny mudule, pobo bho oḍighi obho arōm mōoy obho nạkpe ghạ mikpoki oḍighi obho ạkpete kua ạnogho odi, ‘Peleghi marōoy oḍighi obho mạkpe zeedi. Kẹ tobo bho ịrol tạman moru obho ninii ạghi asi tịḅel arōoy obho.’
Obo bho ịke tōogh asuo bho ụkpe ōoy ọpaḍi ọpaḍi asilva.
Aru ạteeny mamen ọkpe obo bho ibhira iru obho; eedi nẹetua ghạ mobho tọlogh ni mikpoki tibhꞌeedi, keḍio eedi ẹkona ụkpe nạ monyiin odi ọpaḍi asilva bho.
Eedi ibhin ikpoki obho peedi ịrol ịghunughun ịnogho mobo bho ạloghom eedi moḍighi obho,
ịkpete kua, ‘Obo bho ịrol tạman moru obho, iḍighi moḍighi obho monyiin ạwa be, keḍio ezōor uḍighi moomo aḍuma bho mi teesu aghōzōgh obho, keḍio eedi nꞌezōor ạna ụkpe monyiin ẹzo bho.’
Pobo bho oḍighi obho ạbhagharana kua monyiin eedi, ‘Ọbulol, mọghon, ạami uuniom io ạna. Ezira umōrōnuan molo ạna kaḍighi moḍighi obho ạami kạkpe ạna mikpoki aḍuma oḍighi, ọpaḍi asilva.
Pin mikpoki onuma maghẹel. Iḍigh tologhi ạmi mọkpe obo bho ịrol tạman moru obho kẹzo bho ạami ụkpe ạna bho.
Ilo tịnyaam ạmi gạ, moliom ikpoki ạmi mẹzo olo ologhi ạmi aḍigh aḍigh? Bẹlee kạna nabōbhan ạami mobho ạami ukpobhōtiom io mạvo ạmi obho?’
Tebum iibha bẹleni, obo bho ịrol tạman obho tetu mịḅel, ịḅel obho ẹtol tạman.”
Ẹzo bho ạJizos nạki taJerusạlẹm obho, podi abhin maḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho ạghi tọtu ạgba tẹḅokia mi tebōom obho aghōl kua,
“Ịmoghon, ezira nọki taJerusạlẹm. Tepa pokuugh Ọony Oōy obho ọlogh tạravo aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua, nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho. Eedi tẹtu ni mịiruan epumeni odi moghigh odi,
keḍio eedi tekuugh odi ẹlogh tạravo obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho, ẹmologh odi, ẹgurogh odi, ẹkan odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri ekigh, keḍio ịraar aḍuma neetẹn, poḅẹtōn odi tọbho bho.”
Ipa iru itẹn, poniin ạnwuny taZebidi ạbham nwụny odi aru tạJizos agbuluman taghisigh odi agbẹel odi moḍighi ạar ọnogho odi.
PạJizos apuruan odi, “Ạna nạva mẹkaraan?” Pạni obho ạbhagharana kua, “Tọ molo ịzal ạnwuny bhibha tạmi ẹtol tekẹeny nꞌoḍiom ạvo onuma men ạna uru mọolema bho.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Enyina ilōghōm io mạar olo enyina negbẹel. Enyina tetue ni ẹpogholom ạkopu ọmiinom obho ạami natu mọbhogholom obho?” Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ezōor totue ni.”

PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Agey enyina tẹpoghol ni mi tạkopu obhꞌạmi, keḍio ạami ụteeny io mịikpo mọson obo bho tẹtol tekẹeny nꞌoḍiom ạvo ạmi. Ariisi bhibha ilꞌobo bho Ọde ạmi tapin aseeri obho.”
Amen aḍiōbh iteledōm ipedi obho ịmoghon miibha bho, peedi iḅẹebhẹni miloghi eedi ịnogho mịzal aburumōr obho.
PạJizos abheleghi aakōbhōghi moomꞌeedi iru todi keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Enyina neelōghōm mobho ạruula bho ịda rōoy obho, aruvẹmụ arōoy obhꞌeedi nẹto mịto ẹnogho rōoy obho.
Teesoḍia enyina iibha bho ịtol io kua. Eru kạar olo onyiin enyina nạva moru ogbōgh, podi tatu mōoy olo takumuan ipedi obho,
keru nạ kạar olo onyiin enyina nạva moru ọḅel, odi tatu ni mẹbana enyina,
kẹzo bho idi tỌony Oōy obho, obho otu ḍio molo ịnon arōoy kekumuan odi obho, odi aru mokumuan ịnon, nꞌọnogho aghuḍum odi mọtaam ọlogh arōoy.”
Ẹzo bho eedi nẹḍua taJeriko bho, pobꞌọlogh arōoy ịtuonom ạJizos.
Ịzal arōoy ikpom ariḍien ilo idi delede tọtu ebōom obho ịmoghon mobho ạJizos natẹn tebōom obho, peedi ịke momulughu ọkpete ekua, “Ọony taDevid, obo apu ezōor, sụanaan ezōor ghụsan aḍien.”
Parōoy obho ịbhooruom eedi mọrol aḅirim. Keḍio ịrol kilo ụpue ni, imulughu ipu mịḅel, “Ọony taDevid, obo apu ezōor, sụanaan ezōor ghụsan aḍien.”
PạJizos ạmara, abheleghi eedi, apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina nẹva molo ạami kaḍighi mẹkaraan kạnogho enyina?”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Obumọogh, ezōor nogbẹel molo ạna kạkparion riḍien ezōor.”
PạJizos ạsuanaan eedi ghụsan akulaan riḍien obhꞌeedi. Tonyiin amen obho peedi ịke mọmiin ạar, keḍio ịtuonom ạni odi.
Eedi netuan taJerusạlẹm peedi ịghi taBetfagi, mi tobꞌeegum obho ughōl bọ Ọlivs obho. Tesuo pạJizos arōm mịzal iteledōm odi motẹn ghạ ọghi taghisigh,
ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịki tọbam ẹma bho odi taghisigh enyina bho, penyina ọmiin ẹnam olo nọokpo useeri nꞌọony odi. Ịkoton mebhin eedi meru.
Eru kạar olo onyiin ōoy ạkpete mạar ạnogho enyina, pịgba kua mẹnogho odi, ‘Obạmọogh obho nagbẹel,’ podi okẹm ọḅelemaan enyina.”
Iibha bho imute kua moḍighi ogbẹbhẹghiōm tibha ozil obho ạkpete bọ aghōl,
“Gbạ mạnogho mẹma bhꞌạZayon,
esiibha ọolema bhꞌenyina natu tenyina.
Odi adeny ni, keḍio aghiilom nạ ẹnam nꞌọony odi natu,
ạkar ọony ẹnam obho.”
Piteledōm obho iḅetunu ịghi ịtuugh iḍighi mibha ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho eedi moḍighi obho,
ibhin mẹnam obho nꞌọony obho iruom odi, ịseghe mibura bhꞌeedi iburom ẹnam obho, keḍio ạJizos aḍigh.
Obꞌọlogh arōoy ịḅirogh mibura eedi ẹdeey tebōom obho, ịnon iigbooy masigo iirẹeny eru ẹde tebōom obho.
ẠJizos ạrol togbo arōoy obho, keḍio arōoy obho nẹmoor ghạ kua ẹtuonom odi, “Ibuom mỌony obho taDevid; ạlisebh ẹrol ẹnogho zodi obo bho abhin taḍien tObạmọogh obho natu obho. Ibuom Ẹnaan.”
Amen ạJizos asi taJerusạlẹm, oomo ẹma bho naazighina keḍio nepuruan ghạ kua, “Odi oobho bho kokōr ōoy?”
Keḍio obꞌọlogh arōoy obho nẹpagharana ghạ kua, “Odi ạJizos ozil obho tẸnaan. Odi olꞌạNazaret ebhugh obhꞌaGalili.”

PạJizos ạghi aḍigh totu iikpulughu obho, abhirighanogh moomo obo bho neḅo maḅo mi totu iikpulughu obho, anyuughi akpululeni marazebele obo bho nenweeghiiy mikpoki totu iikpulughu obho, nꞌạrikasi obo bho neḅoḍi maruukumude bho,
ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ụge kua tẹegia iigbia bho oghōl mẸnaan ạkpete kua, ‘Otu ạmi tokōl otu iikpulughu.’ Keḍio enyina neeḍighi etẹnẹ motu ạruḅa.”
Arōoy ikpom ariḍien nꞌạsukugha eru todi mi totu iikpulughu obho, keḍio odi aakōoy eedi.

Ologhi arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho aḅẹebh magey men eedi ịmiin mibꞌọkpo aruugu obho ạJizos naḍighi obho, nꞌẹzo bho ịbam ạnwuny obho nemulughu ẹmoor totu iikpulughu obho nekōl kua, “Ibuom mỌony obho taDevid.”

Peedi ịkpete kua ịnogho mạJizos, “Ạna nạmoghon mibha eedi nẹkpete bho?” PạJizos ạbhagharana aghōl kua, “Ạami nạmoghon. Enyina dẹmoghon ghạ nạ ḍio gạ mibha ụge tẹegia iigbia bho ughōl mẸnaan ạkpete kua, ‘Ạami taḍighi ni ạrunwuny ibha nẹebugh nꞌibha nẹmaam ni obho ẹmaar ẹmoor iiḅi ạsōor ebuom ạami’?”
PạJizos ạḅele eedi ạḍua ạghi tạBetani ạmanaghan tepa.
Ạḅaal odi ạJizos namula taJerusạlẹm mobun ụḍirogh obho, ọkoony nasibh odi.

Tebōom obho podi ạmiin moorẹeny olo ughōl ạfig mi tọtu ebōom obho, podi ạghi teetu odi oorẹeny obho, keḍio bọbon otu olo odi ạmiin olo, asigo asigo be. Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho moorẹeny obho, “Ạna omuum mu mikpo kamen kamen.” Tonyiin odi amen opopo poorẹeny obho amuugh.
Obo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịmiin miibha bho peedi iimōogh magey keḍio nepuruan ghạ kua, “Imute ẹko kodi oorẹeny obho akẹm amuugh kua?”

PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, eru kạar olo enyina imōruōm, molo enyina ịteeny io mịzal ologhi, penyina orue oḍighi ibha ạami uḍighi moorẹeny obho. Iibha nạ be ḍio, enyina tetue ni ẹkpete kua ẹnogho meegum obhobho, ‘Ḍiirunu mạghi mazuan tọbhiiny obho,’ pọtuugh nạ omute.
Eru kạar olo enyina ịteeny ologhi omōruōm, kạar kạar olo enyina igbẹel tiikpulughu penyina obhin.”

PạJizos amula aru asi totu iikpulughu obho. Ẹzo bho odi nạtughumiom obho, paruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarukenya arōoy aJu obho iru todi ipuruan kua zodi, “Tịnyaam okōr ōoy mobho ạna ubhin naḍighiom mọkpo bhibha? Okōr ōoy ạnogho ạna mịikpo bhibha?”

ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Onyiin iipuruan be mobho ạami natu mopuruan omulumian enyina. Eru kạar olo enyina ịnogho ạami mọbhagharana, pạami ọbhagharana enyina nạ mịikpo bho ạami ubhin naḍighiom miibha bho.

Ịnyaam ozu ạmuum obho ạJon ạteeny obho ịḍua teḍighen keru? Tịikpo tẸnaan bẹlee kịikpo arōoy?” Peedi ịke mọghana nꞌalōor eedi nẹkpete kua, “Ezira tọpagharana ẹko? Eru kạar olo ezira ụbhagharana ughōl ‘Ịḍua tẸnaan keru,’ podi omulumian ezira oghōl, ‘Keeghe aḍighi kenyina imōruōm io mạJon?’
Kezira oghōl kua, ‘Ịḍua tarōoy keru,’ aruugu tesibh ni ezira milo arōoy obho teḍighi ezira, ebum obho oomꞌeedi nẹekar imōruōm mobho ạJon aru mozil tẸnaan obho.”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua mạJizos, “Ezōor ulōghōm io.” Podi amulumian ạni kua zeedi, “Ạami ẹkona ụgba ḍio nạ ạnogho enyina mesi ạami ụteeny mịnyaam obho ạami ubhin naḍighiom mọkpo bhibha bho.”
“Esiibha kenyina nẹetua ẹko? Onyiin amen kir onyiin ōoy olo ạteeny ịzal ạnwuny. Odi ạghi tọḅel obho ạkpete kua, ‘Ọony ạmi, kịa maḍighi moḍighi tookua bhꞌạmi dodon.’
Podi ạbhagharana kua, ‘Ạami ụki dio.’ Enyemen keḍio odi anwe mologhi odi ạghi aḍighi moḍighi obho.
Keḍio ọde bho ạghi topedi obho ạkpete nạ monyiin ẹzo bho, podi amōrō aghōl kua, ‘Ạda, ạami tạki ni,’ keḍio ọghi ḍio aḍighi moḍighi obho.

Oḍighen tịzal eedi mobho aḍighi mibhꞌologhi ọde bho?” Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ọḅel obho.” Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, igunogh raasōgh obho nꞌile rạama bho tepir eḍigh enyina mi tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.

ẠJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho aru aḍeeriom enyina mebōom olo enyina kẹḅol keḍio enyina imōruōm io zodi, keḍio igunogh raasōgh obho nꞌile rạama bho emōruōm odi. Enyina ịmiin nạ mipa bho ẹkona, enyina inwe ḍio mịitua enyina emōruōm odi.”

Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ịmoghon ọnon asidōgh. Onyiin amen kir onyiin ōoy olo ạteeny mookua keḍio aru aḅẹbh miirẹeny amiim, akō akiton aru agbo mesi omiibh amiim obho, keḍio aru aḅōgh motu iḅōrō aseeri, keḍio aru ạloghom rōoy mọku ghạ itu obho eedi keḍian ghạ. Eedi ịmoghonyan ịḅele, podi ạghi merele.
Aru ạteeny men ọkuuy ikpo iirẹeny obho, podi ōoy obho arōm ạrubana odi mọghi tarōoy obho mi tookua bho obhin abin odi.
Arōoy obho ịmiin rụbana bhꞌodi peedi ịbhamagh eedi, iḍul monyiin, ighigh monyiin, irōḅōl mopedi obho.
Oomo ipa ẹkona podi ōoy obho amina arōm mịnon ạrubana ilo ipu mịḅel obho, keḍio arōoy obho iḍighi nạ monyiin ẹzo bho eedi iḍighi mịḅel obho.
Ikunughi obho podi arōm mọony odi ạghiom eedi, ạatua kua tologhi odi, ‘Eedi tẹmiin mọony ạmi tekiilaan ni.’
Keḍio amen eedi ịmiin mọony obho peedi ịkpete kua ịnogho lōor eedi, ‘Oobho ạkar ọony obho tale rutu mobo bhꞌookua bho. Itu oghigh odi, pezira ọteeny ẹmoogh oomo ọkpo bhꞌodi.’
Peedi ịbham odi, ibhin imutiom tookua bho ighigh odi.
“Esiibha, amen odi obo bho oḍighi obho tatu, odi taḍighi ẹko rōoy bhibha?”
Parōoy obho ịbhagharana kua, “Odi tạze ni mịkarabh arōoy pipa, ạloghom ịnon arōoy mi toḍighi obho, arōoy ilo tẹnogho ni zodi mabin odi mi tạkar amen obho eedi ịḍeghe bho.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Enyina dẹkar io eghōl ẹmoghon mibha ụge bọ tẹegia bho gạ? Ụge kua,
‘Ạkar odi ạkpo otu obho iḅōghi rutu obho igin obho naaghiraan atu molo ạla mạar apu.
Obạmọogh obho aḍighi miibha bho.
Ẹzo ịmaar ịneghe.’ ”
Keḍio ạJizos amina ạkpete kua ạḅaram, “Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạami nạkar ạgba kua ạnogho enyina, Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan tọḅoor ni enyina ọnogho mịnon arōoy ilo temuum iiḅi iimuuma.
[Kōoy kōoy olo ameelom ạkpo otu obhobho taḅigian ni, keru kạar olo odi ạkpo otu obho ameelom mōoy pọgbe odi otẹnẹ obhugh.]”
Aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho ịmoghon sidōgh obho tạJizos, peedi ilōghōm mobho ạJizos nạkpete ạgbaaniom eedi,
peedi ịva mebōom olo oḅol odi, keḍio aruugu arōoy obho ipu ni. Arōoy obho nẹeseghe eseeri mạJizos kozil tẸnaan.
Tesuo pạJizos ạke momina odōgh asidōgh ọnogho arōoy obho.
“Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho odi konyiin ọolema olo asōorẹ mẹzaal ipina mọnogho ọony odi.
Podi arōm rụbana odi mọghi ọgba ọnogho obo bho ubheleghi moru ole ẹzaal obho eedi keru kele, keḍio arōoy obho ịva ḍio moru.
Podi arōm ịnon ạrubana ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, ‘Ịgba kua mẹnogho eedi: Ẹzaal obhꞌạmi nạateeny mole. Ịnam ẹzaal obho nọoze. Kạar kạar nookōbhōghi oseeri. Itu ole mẹzaal obho.’
Keḍio eedi obo bho ubheleghi obho ịtuom io mạar, ịghi neḍighiiy riḍighi eedi. Onyiin ạghi teḍum oḍighi odi, ọnon taḅo odi,
keḍio ipedi obho ịbham rụbana bhꞌodi iḍul ịze.
Pologhi ọolema bho aḅẹebh magey molo odi arōm rōoy ẹgham odi ịghi ịze rụukoma arōoy pipa, ịlogh nạ nyạn mẹma bhꞌeedi.
Keḍio odi abheleghi rụbana bhꞌodi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, ‘Ẹzaal ipina bhꞌạmi nạateeny mole, keḍio arōoy obho ạami ubheleghi obho ịgbaan io moru ole.
Ịki siibha mi taraabōom obho mebheleghi kọnu kọnu arōoy olo enyina irue eedi eru tẹzaal obho.’
Pạrubana bho ịghi taraabōom obho ibheleghi kōoy kōoy olo eedi ịmiin ịmiin, ịkarabh nꞌiiḅi arōoy, iikōbhōghi ịloghom, molo otu ẹzaal ipina bho nạarol kpibh rōoy obho.
“Ọolema bho ạghi mọmiin arōoy obho, podi ạmiin mōoy olo ọlogha ḍio mạsuoma ẹzaal ipina bho.
Podi apuruan kua mōoy obho, ‘Ọbulol, ạna uḍighi ẹko kạna aḍigh suo molo ạna ọlogha ḍio mạsuoma ẹzaal ipina bho?’ Ạar olo ōoy obho ạteeny mọkpete olo.
Pọolema bho ạkpete ạnogho rụbana bhꞌodi aghōl kua, ‘Ịpaḍi mōoy obhobho merōbh zodi mi tetẹrẹ ọkinim obho. Tepa pesi odi tạtol ạkiir rạlaay odi aleghe.’ ”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua akunughiom, “Ọlogh mobho ubheleghi keḍio ịbam be mobho ụson ụseghe.”
Parōoy aFarisi obho ịḍua ịghi iḍikuan ruzue mobhin tiipuruan ọbhamam ạJizos.

Peedi irōm ẹde ạrubana eedi nꞌarōoy ẹku tạHerod mọghi tạJizos. Eedi ịghi isi pipuruan kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, ezōor noolōghōm mobho ạna ọgba ghạ ḍio miben. Ạna nạtughumiom ghạ rōoy mebōom obho tẸnaan mi tagey obho molo ạna ọnagha ḍio milo arōoy nẹetua, ebum obho ạna oonon ghạ ḍio mạlibugh arōoy obho.
Gbạ mạnogho ezōor tibhꞌịitua onuma, olōgh odi gạ mi taraalōgh obhꞌezira mosōgh osōgh ọnogho ọolema bhꞌaRom?”
ẠJizos naalōghōm ạman mịkarabh ịitua ezue bhꞌeedi, podi ạkpete kua, “Sọo, arōoy obo neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy, ebum eeghe kenyina nẹva mebōom ọbham ạmi?
Iḍeeriom ạami mokpoki obho enyina nesōghōm ghạ mosōgh obho.” Peedi ịnogho zodi mokpoki.
Keḍio odi apuruan kua zeedi, “Oobho kamusigh nꞌaḍien okōr ōoy?”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Olꞌobꞌọolema bhꞌaRom.” PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Isōgh mẹnogho mọolema bho mibha iru bọ milꞌodi obho, mẹnogho mẸnaan mibha tẸnaan.”
Amen eedi ịmoghon miibha bho pasilōor eedi ịkpoghogho, eedi ịḅele odi ịḍua.
Tonyiin odi aḍuma popo pẹde arōoy ogbo arōoy aSadusi obho iru nạ tạJizos. (Eedi obo bho nẹgba ghạ ekōl oḅetunu tọbho bho olo bho.)
Eedi iru pịkpete kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, aMozis ạtughumiom kua, ‘Eru kạar olo ōoy olo abhin mạni kọmar io mọony kạbho, pumōr odi ale rutu mạni obho ạmaraghi rụnwuny ạnogho mobo bho nạabho bho.’
Onyiin amen kir oḍual aburumōr ilo ịrol. Okenya bho abhin mạni, ọmar io nọmar mọony ạbho molo umōr odi ale rutu mạni obho.
Onyiin ẹzo bho mobho imutenaan mogbẹbhiōm ịzal obho, nꞌogbẹbhiōm ịraar obho ninii oomꞌeedi oḍual obho iru ịbho ịman.
Ikunughi obho, podi ạni obho aru nạ ạbho.
Esiibha, taḍuma oḅerenu tọbho bho, kạni obho tatu mạni okōr ōoy? Oomꞌoḍual eedi irughom odi be.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Enyina neekōrōnuan magey, ebum obho enyina ilōghōm io mẹegia iigbia bho nꞌịnyaam obho tẸnaan.
Amen obo bho nẹebho teḅerenu tọbho bho eedi tẹtol kitelema bho tẸnaan ibha idi tạnyu obho molo ạraani nꞌilobhir ịḅalan io milom.
Tilo igboloman nꞌoḅerenu tọbho bho, enyina deghōl ghạ ḍio mibha Ẹnaan ạgba ạnogho enyina bho?
Odi ạkpete kua, ‘Ạami pẸnaan tEbrạhạm nꞌẠizik nꞌạJekob.’ Iibha bho nemōrō mobho odi otu ḍio mẸnaan obo bho nẹebho bho, aru mẸnaan obo idi mimoom.”
Amen egi arōoy obho ịmoghon miibha bho, peedi iimōogh tịtughumiom obhꞌodi.
Amen arōoy aFarisi obho ịmoghon mobho ạJizos naakpereghi mịnu arōoy aSadusi obho, peedi iikōbhōghian monyiin esi,
keḍio onyiin eedi, obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho abhin iipuruan aru mọbhamam ạJizos,
keḍio apuruan kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, taraalōgh obho, oḍighen apu?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “ ‘Tulan mẸnaan Obạmọogh ạna bho nꞌoomo ologhi onuma nꞌoomo aghuḍum onuma, nꞌoomo ịitua onuma.’
Olōgh obhobho pọḅel obho ạbugh ạla nạ mạar apu.
Ogbẹbhiōm ịzal obho odi nạ kọḅel obho, ạkpete kua, ‘Tulan obo bho atuan ạna bho kẹzo bho ạna utulan lōor onuma bho.’
Oomo araalōgh obho taMozis nꞌịtughumiom arizil obho ịmara tịzal bhibha be.”
Amen arōoy aFarisi iikōbhōghian monyiin esi, pạJizos apuruan kua zeedi,
“Enyina nẹetua ạMesaya bho kokōr ōoy? Odi kolo ọobhe okōr ōoy?” Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Odi olo ọobhe taDevid.”
Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua, “Kebum eeghe kẸmugh Iigbia aḍigh talōor taDevid molo odi abheleghi zodi ‘Obumọogh’ ạkpete kua,
‘Ẹnaan Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho mObạmọogh ạami obho,
Tọl delede suo mi toḍiom ạvo ạmi
ninii ạami aḍighi
mobo ọlogh aḍien onuma etu
moḅeleriom asike onuma’?
“Eru kạar olo aDevid abheleghi zodi ‘Obumọogh,’ eeghe aḍighi molo odi ạMesaya bho tamina atu molꞌọobhe taDevid?”
Bọbon ōoy olo arue mọkpaton ọnu ọbhagharana odi olo, molo ạseghe taḍuma popo ạghi taghisigh ōoy olo ane momina opuruan odi miipuruan olo.
Ipa iru itẹn, pạJizos ạkpete amutiom ạnogho mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho nꞌobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho aghōl kua,
“Obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho pobo ịteeny ịikpo mọgba ẹmu araalōgh obho taMozis.
Tebum ipa bẹleni, ikiilaan mẹtuonom kạar kạar olo eedi ịkpete ịnogho enyina moḍighi. Oomo ipa ẹkona, ị́tuonom ghạ meḍighiom ạar eedi, ebum obho eedi nẹtughumiom kẹre, eḍighi mịnon obho.
Eedi ịghoroghi mibꞌadōol eeti mịnon keḍio ịlogh io bọbon ịbam ạvo ẹnogho eedi morōol ạni.

Kạar kạar olo eedi neḍighi eedi neḍighi ghạ molo arōoy ẹmiin eedi ẹsebh. Ịmaar ẹmiin mẹzo eedi ịgeey mọlogh ọogo-oghōl ẹegia bho mi tizu ịnam ịkpuom taragbodo nꞌạravo bhꞌeedi, nꞌẹzo eedi nẹloghaay ghạ ịgodogodo ạrusuoma.
Tẹzaal, ariisi obho ịneghe bọ ipu obho pariisi eedi negbẹel ghạ mọrologhu. Tarutu iikpulughu obho, ẹtolom ibha ịla mạar ipu obho pibha eedi negbẹel ghạ mọrolom.
Eedi nẹva ghạ molo arōoy kebheleghian ghạ zeedi nꞌeghuan mi tariḍighi obho, nꞌolo arōoy kebheleghi ghạ zeedi ‘Obo ịtughumiom.’
Ímōrō ghạ arōoy ebheleghi enyina ‘Obo ịtughumiom,’ ebum obho oomo enyina iru burumōr, nꞌobho enyina ịteeny monyiin obo ịtughumiom be bho.
Ibheleghi ghạ nạ ‘Ạda,’ monyiin ōoy tesuo ade bho, ebum obho enyina ịteeny monyiin Ọde be bho, odi obho odi tạnyu obho.
Ímōrō ghạ nạ obheleghi enyina mOtẹnẹ meḍia, ebum obho Otẹnẹ meḍia enyina aru monyiin be bho, odi ạMesaya bho.
Obo bho tapu moomo enyina bho akumuan mipedi obho.
Obo bho ạbughe lōor odi obho toonon ni osōorẹ, keḍio obo bho asōoriōm lōor odi obho toonon ni ọbughe.”

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho enyina arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho, obo bho neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy obho. Enyina ịdu meguugh Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho ẹegighiman nẹpuenaan nạ mobo bho nẹva moḍigh obho, keḍio enyina nịvo nịvo ịḅol nạ ḍio eḍigh.

[Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho enyina arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho, obo bho neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy obho. Enyina neenioghom ghạ marukpukele ạraani mi tarutu eedi, keḍio tẹzo oobiōghōm arōoy nẹki ghạ eekpulughu mịidoony iikpulughu. Tebum iibha bẹleni ilo tọliom enyina teḅẹebh epu milo ịnon arōoy.]

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho enyina arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho, obo bho neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy obho. Enyina nepẹl ghạ oḍual ighool nꞌoḍual ọbhiiny ẹki toomo aruubhugh obho moḍighi okiton onyiin ōoy olo tạtuonom enyina, keḍio amen enyina neekiton monyiin, enyina imina ku eḍighi eedi moḅẹebh opu ạkar enyina ịzal amen, molo ịgbaan ni monyuughi eedi ọloki toonu ọmiinom obho ikunughi olo bho.

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho enyina arōoy ikpom ariḍien obho neteliom ịnon obho. Enyina nẹtughumiom ghạ ekōl, ‘Oōy abhin otu iikpulughu obho aghirom ịzo, odi ọkpe ḍio ẹkona, ạar olo, kibha abhin agold obho odi totu iikpulughu obho aghirom ịzo, odi ọkpe ọkpe.’
Sọo araama arōoy ikpom ariḍien, tịzal obho oḍighen ạla mạar apu? Agold obho bẹlee kotu iikpulughu obho aḍighi bọ zodi agold obho moru ạar iigbia bho?
Enyina nẹtughumiom nạ kua, ‘Oōy abhin ẹede iigbia bho aghirom ịzo, odi ọkpe ḍio ẹkona, ạar olo, kibha odi abhin ọkpo bho ụtunom mạar tẹede bho aghirom ịzo, odi ọkpe ọkpe.’
Enyina ạkar arōoy ikpom ariḍien. Tịzal obho, oḍighen ạla mạar apu, ọkpo bhꞌẹede bho bẹlee kodi ẹede bho aḍighi mọkpo bho moru ọkpo iigbia bho?
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ōoy abhin ẹede iigbia bho aghirom ịzo, odi aghirom kạar kạar olo odi tẹede bho.
Kōoy olo abhin otu iikpulughu obho aghirom ịzo, podi aghirom odi otu iikpulughu obho nꞌẸnaan, obo bho natugh totu obho.
Amen olo ōoy abhin ạnyu obho aghirom ịzo, odi ạḅar ẹtolom obho tẸnaan nꞌodi obo bho odi tẹtolom obho aghirom.

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho enyina arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho, obo bho neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy obho. Enyina nẹḍi ghạ ḍiōbh abin mịigho asumōbōbh, ẹseghe bin ẹnogho mẸnaan keḍio enyina negin mọtuonom ạkar ịtughumiom araalōgh obho osōbh agey ạraakpe, nꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien, nꞌiiḅi eḍighiom ạar ibha ịla mạar ipu obho. Iibha pibha ịkpe molo enyina keḍighi kẹḅaram mipedi obho.
Sọo, araama arōoy ikpom ariḍien enyina nẹeḅa ghạ ezu mikpukuma ibha idi tamiim obho keḍio enyina nẹpogholom ẹmin ẹman mịpoghol-miim obho.

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho enyina arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho. Enyina neetōl ghạ mạman ọbhogholom ạmuum enyina nꞌạrakpere enyina ẹḅaaleni, keḍio odi ḍorōbh mịitua oḅumogh ọkpo arōoy nꞌọoku ạaku.
Sọo, arōoy aFarisi ikpom ariḍien, ipira meetōl mibha idi ḍorōbh tologhi ọbhogholom ạmuum obho ku, pạman obho ọḅaal nạ.

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho enyina arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho. Enyina idi karuugu ilo ụmaar usigh ịḅaal ạgba, ịmaar ịneghe mọmiin tạman obho, keḍio tologhi obho ịikpo arōoy obo bho nẹebho bho nꞌịḅure ọkpo imuzō ni.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mobho enyina nẹneghe tasumusigh oomo arōoy kiiḅi arōoy mi tozu ạman obho, keḍio tiloghi enyina iben iimia nꞌoḍighi ịkarabh ạka ni.”

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho enyina arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obo bho neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy obho. Enyina iḅōghōm rutu eḍighi ẹneghemi maruugu arizil obho tẸnaan ibha ịbhozu obho ẹmaar nạ eburogh mibha obo bho iḍum ooḅi aghuḍum obho,
keḍio enyina nẹkpete ghạ kua, ‘Ezōor umute tạmuum ạburude ezōor bọ, ezōor kuḍighi ḍio mibha eedi iḍighi obho mọze arizil obho tẸnaan.’
Suo enyina nẹekar eḍumom mobho enyina iru mạnwuny ọobhe obo bho ịze marizil obho.
Iḍighi ni mẹghi taghisigh mẹman mibha ạburude enyina ịke kageedi moḍighi obho.
Sọo ịikpolodu nꞌạnwuny ịikpolodu, eeghe taḍighi kenyina ẹḍuana tọmiinom oonu obho ikunughi olo bho?

Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ạami tatōm ni atuom enyina marizil, nꞌilōghōm mạar arōoy, nꞌobo ịtughumiom. Ẹde eedi enyina tẹze ni, ẹkan mẹde mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri, ẹgurogh ịnon mi tarutu iikpulughu obhꞌenyina, ẹḍua tẹma etẹn tẹma epirighanogh eedi.

Iibha kiḍighi kạliliom obo bho ịze rōoy ilo ạar olo ịpiom olo bho tameelom enyina, ạḍua tamen obho ughigh bọ mEbẹl obho ninii aru asi tamen obho ughigh bọ mạZekaraya, ọony tạBarakaya obho enyina ighigh teesoḍia ẹkpe iigbia otu iikpulughu obho nꞌẹede iigbia bho.
Ạami nạkar ạgba magey ạnogho enyina, ibha topin ọliom oomo arōoy bhibha bho temeelom arōoy ọoke bhobho.”

“Sey aJerusạlẹm aJerusạlẹm, ạna obo bho nạze ghạ marizil obho tẸnaan atoḅol miteledōm obho Ẹnaan arōm aruom enyina bho. Ịni amen mobho ạami nạava mọseghe ạravo ạmi oghuruom oomo arōoy onuma, kẹzo bho ạkenegh nakuruom ghạ mạnwuny odi obho, keḍio ạna omōrō ḍio nomōrō.
Esiibha ẹma bhꞌonuma noogin ọman.

Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ạseghe dodon ạghi taghisigh, enyina ịmiin mụ ạami, ninii ạteeny tamen obho enyina tẹkpaton mọnu enyina ekōl kua, ‘Ẹnaan ạsebh ni zodi obo bho natu mi taḍien tObạmọogh obho.’ ”
ẠJizos aḅetunu atẹn nạḍua mi totu iikpulughu obho, pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho iru iḍeeriom odi meḅōghōm otu iikpulughu obho.

Podi ạkpete kua, “Enyina nẹmiin oomꞌiibha bho, ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina miibha bho, bọbon onyiin ọpaḍi ọbharakpar ibha enyina nẹmiin obho olo onyiin tạtol tạnyu onyiin olo. Oomꞌeedi tonyuughi ni otuḅeḍi.”

Ẹzo bho ạJizos odi delede tạnyu obꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs, pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho iru ipuruan kua zodi tẹḅokia, “Gbạ mạnogho ezōor mamen iibha bho temute, nꞌoḍigh elẹgh olo tamute mi tamen olo natuan molo ạna karu, nꞌikunughi ẹmar-arōoy obho.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ịmaar egona lōor enyina, ímōrō ghạ oobiōghōm onyiin enyina.
Ọlogh arōoy tetu ni taḍien ạmi ẹkpete kua, ‘Ạami ạMesaya bho,’ eebiōghōm ọlogh arōoy.
Enyina tẹmoghon ni mọdu oghur ạraagham mi tegbeeny nꞌetuan, keḍio ịíḅaghami ghạ lōor enyina. Ọkpo ilo idi kua temute ni, keḍio iibha bho ịgba ḍio mobho nạateeny mikunughi obho.
Aruubhugh teḅezuan ni, ẹma tẹmaranuan ni mẹma. Oḅẹer, nꞌade bho moozighinian oḅomian tẹtol ni kesi kesi.
Oomꞌabaabha bho idi kịḅel ẹegama ạni olo eghun negun.
“Tamen opopo poḅologh enyina ọnogho arōoy mọliom enyina, ọze nạ enyina. Kōoy kōoy tesuo ade bho tạlogh ni enyina ḍien mebum ạmi.
Ọlogh arōoy tegin ni etōbh momōruōm obhꞌeedi. Onyiin taḅool ni monyiin, onyiin ạlogh ḍien monyiin.
Keḍio ọlogh iben arizil temuteghu moobiōghōm ọlogh arōoy.
Pẹzo oḍighi ịkarabh tepōbh elela molo etulan ọlogh arōoy tẹtol tọlolo.
Keḍio obo tạkparam ạpam asi tikunughi obho, tọpel ni zodi.
Keḍio ooḅi adōm obhobho, obho igboloman nꞌAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan tọgba ni olelemi toomo ẹmar arōoy, mọgbaanaan ọnogho oomo arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio ikunughi obho tagbi mọteeny.”
“Amen olo enyina ịmiin mibꞌạmagh obho ạDaniel ozil obho ạgba bho, mobho neemute tesi iigbia bho, (ạna obo bho nakōl mọbhereer obho mọmoghonyan!)
pobo bho idi taJudia bho eghilighu ẹghi taruugum obho!
Odi obo bho odi tạnyu otu odi obho osōor io moḍigh ọḅirogh ọkpo odi mi totu obho.
Obo bho odi teḍum obho omula ḍio mọseghe ạsuoma odi.
Opo pọmiinom olo tẹtol ẹnogho mạraani ilo idi nꞌeghun, nꞌạraani ilo ạnwuny eedi nẹmaam ni mạmaam.
Iikpulughu mẸnaan molo enyina ikilighu ḍio mamen uuta bolobolo aḍuma obhooghia bho.
Ịiḅaghami amen opopo tepu ạni ni kua milꞌọnon amen ilo neemute ghạ, ạseghe kọḅel egbiom ẹmar-arōoy obho ninii aru asi tọoke bhobho. Ọnon olo taaleeny nạ moobho bho olo.
Oomo ipa ẹkona, Ẹnaan naasōbh akpẹrẹmi ruḍuma bho. Odi oḍighi ḍio kua bọ, bọbon ōoy olo kụḅol atẹn olo. Tebum arōoy obho odi Ẹnaan nạason ạseghe moru arōoy odi obho kiḍighi kodi nasōbh ruḍuma bho.
“Tebum iibha bẹleni, eru kạar olo onyiin ōoy aru tenyina aghōl, ‘Iinon, oobho ạMesaya bho,’ bolobolo ‘Odi odi eebha,’ ímōruōm ghạ zodi.
Iben ạraMesaya nꞌiben arizil tẸnaan temuteghu ni. Eru kạar olo eedi tetue ni, eedi tepin ni mọkpo ịiḍaany nꞌọkpo ibꞌaruugu moobiōghōm arōoy obho Ẹnaan nạason ạseghe bho.
Iinon, demute ḍio ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina miibha bho.
“Keru nạ kạar olo arōoy iru ịkpete ịnogho enyina ighōl, ‘Iinon, odi naamute ạki tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho,’ ímōruōm ghạ.
Ọony ōoy obho tatu kẹḅaal obho naḍighi ghạ meghenem tạnyu obho alela moomo eḅōghōghaan obho ạḍua temutonom aghōzōgh obho asi teḍighom aghōzōgh obho.
“Kesi kesi olo ọḅure ẹnam odi, pesi ạsudele neekōbhōghian ghạ.”
“Tamen olo ịiḅaghami aruḍuma pipa neetẹn, paghōzōgh obho oḅil, ụvanyu obho ọmu mụ, ịinaany obho ọḍua tạnyu obho omeleghu, ịnyaam ọkpo bho idi tạnyu obho okunughiom.

Pelẹgh obho Ọony Oōy obho tatu obho omute teḅōghōghaan obho, oomo arughun otu idi tade bho olegheey, keḍio eedi tẹmiin mỌony Oōy obho mobho nạaḍua teḅōghōghaan ạnyu obho natu nꞌịnyaam nꞌigbōgh eghuan.
Eeḍue bho naasi puubh, podi orōm itelema odi ọghi tinya ạruukul ade bho, keḍio eedi teekōbhōghi monyiin esi marōoy ibha odi nạason ạseghe bho, ạḍua tonyiin ẹkul ẹmar-arōoy obho asi tọnon.”
“Ịḅele oorẹeny obho ughōl bọ ạfig obho ạtughumiom enyina. Kamen kamen olo orẹeny obhobho natughẹel migue, penyina olōghōm mobho unu natuan.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, amen olo enyina ịmiin moomo ọkpo bhibha, pilōghōm mobho amen obho naatuan, naḅurunu moru.
Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, oomo ọkpo bhibha temute ni koomo arōoy obho idi tesuo nꞌaghuḍum obho tẹpo ẹman.
Ạnyu obho nꞌade bho tepẹ ni keḍio ọnuekpete bhꞌạmi irue ḍio ebhẹ.”
“Oomo ipa ẹkona, ōoy olo alōghōm ḍuma bho nꞌamen obho olo. Itelema bho tẸnaan ẹko, nꞌạkar Ọony obho ẹkona olo alōghōm olo. Ọde bho be alōghōm.
Ẹzo bho ịrol bọ tamen taNoa bho pẹzo tẹtol nạ tamen obho tatu obho.
Ẹzo bho ịrol bọ kobꞌaḍigho bho aḍigh obho, pẹzo tẹtol nạ. Arōoy nẹemaar ele nẹpoghol, ạraani nꞌilobhir nẹḅalam ilom ninii ạteeny mạkar aḍuma bho aNoa aḍigh tobꞌoghuugh obho.
Oomo ipa ẹkona, eedi ilōghōm io mạar ilo nemute ninii aḍigho bho akune moomꞌeedi. Pẹzo tẹtol men Ọony Oōy obho tatu.
Tamen opopo ịzal arōoy tẹtol eḍighi moḍighi mi tonyiin eḍum obho, tọseghe monyiin ọḅele mopedi obho tạman.
Ịzal ạraani idi monyiin otu nekum eḍian, tọseghe monyiin ọḅele mopedi obho tạman.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, íkoḍi ghạ ebum obho enyina ilōghōm io maḍuma bho Obạmọogh enyina tatu obho.
Ilōghōm mobho, ughōl obo bho otu obho alōghōm ni bọ mamen ọḅa bho tatu, odi kụmanaghan io akoḍi ạḅelemaan mọḅa bho moḅom oḍigh totu obhꞌodi omiinyogh.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, enyina ẹkona íkoḍi ghạ, ebum obho Ọony Oōy obho tatu mamen olo enyina ịitua ḍio mọmiin odi obho.”

“Okōr ōoy siibha bho mẹbana olōghōm ạar olo ạteeny nạ mooḅi eḍighiom ạar? Odi pobo bho ọde otu obho nạalogh tạvo odi moonon ạrubana ipedi obho, mọnogho ghạ eedi mariḍian eedi tamen olo iizuan mọnogho.
Ọḅaal ologhi tạtol ni ạnogho mẹbana bho ọde otu odi tatughẹel tạmiin ni zodi mobho odi ạtuugh naḍighi mibha ụkpete ụnogho odi obho.
Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, ọde otu obhꞌodi tạlogh ni tạvo odi moomo ọkpo odi.
Keru kạar olo odi aru mọkarabh ẹbana, podi ọotua ekua tologhi odi, ‘Ọde otu ạmi nabia morughẹel,’
podi ọrol oḍulogh ghạ ạrubana ipedi obho, ọrol adelede ole ọbhoghol nꞌịpoghol miim.
Keḍio ọde otu ẹbana popo tatughẹel ḍuma olo odi ọotua ḍio nꞌamen olo odi olōghōm io.
Ọde otu obhꞌodi taveleghi zodi mịpaḍi aḍighi odi apin ạni bin obo bho neemia ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy obho. Tepa pesi odi tạtol ạkiir rạlaay aleghe.”
“Taḍuma popo Ade-Ọolema bhꞌạnyu obho tạtol kaḍiōbh ạsunwunyaan ilo ịḅirogh mịtodi ịghi moḅōrō opina morughẹel.
Oōgh aruḅua, ōogh ilōghōm ạar.
Aruḅua bho ịḅirogh mịtodi obhꞌeedi pịḅele mọbhamam ạmunu ọtodi ilo ọḅaram ibha idi tọtodi obho.
Ilōghōm mạar obho ịbhamagh nꞌarakōtō ilo ạmunu ọtodi obho imuzō ni ẹḅaram nꞌibhꞌịtodi obhꞌeedi.
Ạteeny men obho opina bho kutu obho, oru ḍio, pạsunwunyaan obho iduḅa ikoḍiiy.
“Ogbo eeleeny mobho ụmoghon imulughu ughōl, ‘Opina bho naasi, itu mẹmiinan odi.’
Paḍiōbh ạsunwunyaan obho iḅerenu ịbugheeny mịtodi obhꞌeedi.
Ịtodi obhꞌeedi neḍimogh, pōogh aruḅua bho igbẹel mipedi obho ighōl kua, ‘Ịnogho ạni ezōor mịbam mụnu ọtodi obhꞌenyina, ịtodi ezōor neḍimogh.’
Pilōghōm ạar obho imulumian kua zeedi, ‘Ịkpo-o, ibhꞌezōor igbẹbhan io enyina nꞌezōor. Ịki nạ ni tobo bho neḅool obho megho.’
Peedi ōogh aruḅua bho itẹn mọghi ogho ạmunu ọtodi obho. Eedi itẹn kua be popina bho aru asi. Oōgh obho idi neḅōrō bho ịtuonom odi iḍigh totu ẹzaal ipina bho, keḍio uru ughuughi meguugh obho.
“Ịbam amen itẹn, pōogh ipedi obho imula iru neleghe ekōl kua, ‘Ọde otu, ọde otu, kuuron ezōor oḍigh ạni.’
Popina bho amulumian kua zeedi, ‘Ạami ụkar io alōghōm enyina.’
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịkpamaghia lōor enyina ebum obho enyina ilōghōm io maḍuma nꞌamen obho.”
“Tẹtol kōoy olo aḅetunu totu nạki merele. Natu mọghi pabheleghi rụbana odi, ạbham otu obho ạlogh tạravo eedi.
Keḍio odi ạtuugh tẹzo ịnyaam ōoy esuo ạnoghooy eedi mikpoki. Onyiin odi ạnogho maḍiōbh ọonir anaira, ọnon inya ọonir anaira, omina ọnon ịzal ọonir anaira. Odi ạnoghooy ạḅele podi atẹn.
Ọḅel obho abhin bọ maḍiōbh ọonir anaira bho aḅetunu be pakẹm ạghi aḅuom maḅo molo odi ạteeny mịnon ibha ụnogho odi obho ạḅaram.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mobo bho abhin minya ọonir obho, odi ạteeny mịnon ibha ụnogho odi obho ạḅaram.
Keḍio ẹbana bho abhin bọ mịzal ọonir obho ạḍua ni ạghi abugha de bho aḍi ạḅoki mikpoki obho ọde otu odi ạnogho odi obho.
“Tamen olo naabia magey, pọde otu eedi ạrubana bho amula arughẹel mọḅalan nꞌeedi mikpoki obho.

Ẹbana bho abhin maḍiōbh ọonir anaira bho aru pạnogho zodi mịnon itibha odi abhin obho, ạkpete kua, ‘Ọde otu, ạna ụnogho ạami maḍiōbh ọonir anaira, keḍio nonon, iibha ịnon aḍiōbh ọonir anaira ilo ạami nạateeny.’

Pọde otu obho ạkpete kua ạnogho odi, ‘Ạna naaḍighi. Ạna ooḅi ẹbana ọtuughom ologhi. Ẹzo bho ạna ụmaar uḍighiom oḍighi mịbam obho ụnogho ạna bho, ạami tạlogh ni tạvo onuma migbōgh. Tue maḍigh nꞌạami tọḅaal ologhi ạami.’
Ẹbana bho abhin minya ọonir anaira obho aru pạkpete kua, ‘Ọde otu ạami, ạna ụnogho ạami minya ọonir anaira, keḍio nonon, iibha ịnon inya ọonir anaira ilo ạami nạateeny.’

Pọde otu obhꞌodi ạkpete kua, ‘Ạna naaḍighi. Ạna ooḅi ẹbana ọtuughom ologhi. Ẹzo bho ạna ụmaar uḍighiom oḍighi mịbam obho ụnogho ạna bho, ạami tạlogh ni tạvo onuma migbōgh. Tue maḍigh nꞌạami mi tọḅaal ologhi ạmi.’

Keḍio ẹbana bho abhin mịzal ọonir anaira bho aru ạkpete kua, ‘Ọde otu, ạami naalōghōm mobho ạna uru mōoy olo ọsu ạghusan aḍien olo. Ạna nạseghe ghạ tesi olo ạna oseeri ḍio, aḅu nạ tesi olo ạna oḅẹbh io.
Aruugu onuma esibh ạami molo ạami ụghi ubugha made bho uḍi ụḅoki mikpoki onuma. Iibha ikpoki onuma.’
Pọde otu obhꞌodi amulumian kua zodi, ‘Ạna ọkarabh ẹbana ẹgbuor mẹgbuor. Ạna naalōghōm mobho ạami naḅu ghạ tesi olo ạami uḅẹbh io, nạseghe tesi olo ạami useeri ḍio?
Keeghe aḍighi kạna ọghi ḍio ạlogh mikpoki ạmi tesi obho nạlokiiy ghạ mikpoki obho? Kōl suo ạami urughẹel obho, kōl ạami naabhin mạsuo ikpoki obho.
Esiibha, ịḅoor odi mikpoki obho mẹnogho mọḅel ẹbana bho.

Ebum obho, kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny, tomina ni ọnogho zodi mịnon ọḅaram, molo odi ạteeny apuom moomo ibha odi nagbẹel obho. Keḍio odi obo bho ạar olo ạteeny olo bho, bọbon ịbam obho odi ạteeny obho, tomina ni ọḅoor zodi.
Keḍio odi ọkarabh ẹbana bhobho ạar oḍighiom olo bho, itōbh zodi memutiom tetẹrẹ ọkinim obho. Tepa pesi odi tạtol ạkiir rạlaay aleghe.’ ”
“Amen Ọony Oōy obho tatu kọolema nꞌoomo itelema bho, odi tạtolom ẹtolom ọolema bho,
keḍio tookōbhōghi moomo arōoy ade bho taghisigh odi. Eedi neekōbhōghian, podi odi eedi mịzal ạruku, kẹzo bho ookō rạana nạgbarion ghạ mivel obho mi tạraana bho.
Odi taseeri rạana bho toḍiom ạvo odi aseeri mivel obho mi tekẹeny odi.
Keḍio ọolema bho tạkpete kua ạnogho mibhꞌoḍiom odi, ‘Enyina obo bho Ọde ạmi nạasebh obho, iḍigh eru. Itu mebhin mAde-Ọolema bho nookōbhōghi useerian enyina kọḅel egbiom obho ụlem bọ mẹmar-arōoy obho.
Ọkoony nasibh ạami, penyina ịnogho ạami meḍian, ạmuum ịral ạami penyina ịnogho ạami mụum. Ạami uru misoloman tenyina penyina ibhin ạami ịloghom tarutu enyina,
ạami natele mẹduḅa penyina ịnogho ạami mukpe momina, ạami nạnwe penyina iikō ạami, ạami ụrol tikoli penyina iru ibheleghian ạami.’
Keḍio obo bho iru miiḅi arōoy obho tẹpagharana kua zodi, ‘Obumọogh, okōr amen mobho ạna odi mọkoony ezōor ụmiin ạna ụnogho ạna meḍian, bolobolo ụmiin mobho ạmuum nẹtal ạna, ụnogho ạna mụum mọbhoghol?
Okōr amen mobho ezōor nọomiin ghạ nạ mobho ạna uru misoloman kezōor ubhin ạna ụloghom tarutu ezōor, bolobolo ụmiin ạna mobho ạna odi mẹduḅa ụnogho ạna rukpe momina?
Ezōor ụmiin ạna mokōr amen mobho ạna nạnwe bolobolo odi mikoli kụghi ubheleghian ạna?’
Pọolema bho omulumian ekua, ‘Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, kamen kamen olo enyina iḍighi miibha bho ịnogho monyiin umōr ạmi abaabha bho, obho asōoriōm bọ apu obho, penyina iḍighi ịnogho ạami.’

“Keḍio odi tạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho idi tekẹeny odi obho, ‘Ịḍua taghisigh ạmi, enyina obo bho neebhin mọghor tạvo tẸnaan obho. Ịḍua mẹghi meḍigh tạnyan obho iḍim ghạ ḍio kamen kamen obho, obho ugu useerian meru obho nꞌạnwuny adōm odi obho.
Ọkoony asibh ạami enyina ịnogho ḍio ạami meḍian mole, ạmuum ịral ạami enyina ịnogho ạami mụum ọbhoghol.
Ạami ụrol misoloman tenyina keḍio enyina ibhin io ạami ẹloghom tarutu enyina, ụrol nạ mẹduḅa enyina ịnogho ḍio ạami mukpe omina. Ạami nạnwe, uḍigh nạ mikoli, enyina iru ḍio ebhelegian ạami.’

Keḍio eedi tẹpagharana kua zodi, ‘Obumọogh, ezōor ụmiin ạna mokōr amen mobho ọkoony nasibh ạna, bolobolo ạmuum nẹtal ạna, bolobolo ạna uru misoloman tezōor, bolobolo odi mẹduḅa, bolobolo nạnwe, bolobolo odi mikoli kezōor ọḅele mọlogh ạvo ọnogho onuma?’

Pọolema bho omulumian ekua zeedi, ‘Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, kamen kamen olo enyina igin mọlogh ạvo ọnogho onyiin umōr ạmi abaabha bho, obho asōoriōm bọ apu obho, penyina igin mọlogh ạvo ọnogho ạmi.’
Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, abaabha bho teḍigh tọmiinom obho ikunughi olo bho, aruuḅi obho eḍigh taghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.”
Amen ạJizos ạtughumiom moomo iibha ạḅele, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho,
“Enyina neelōghōm, ịzal aḍuma isughō pole ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho. Taḍuma popo pokuugh Ọony Oōy obho ọkan toorẹeny ẹmigheri.”
Ipa iru itẹn paruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarukenya arōoy aJu obho iikōbhōghian totu tạKayafas uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho.
Eedi iḍigh mezue eḅia mọghi oḅol ạJizos tẹḅokia oghigh odi,
keḍio eedi ịkpete kua, “Ezira uḍighi ḍio miibha mi tẹzaal obho; ibha ezira uḍighi, parōoy obho orubhe ẹgham.”
Tamen olo ạJizos odi totu tạSaimon obho ạnwe mẹzegh ịpueghi riiḅi obho mi tạBetani,
ponyiin ạni aru todi. Odi ạbham mobꞌokōtō elo olo nạkunu magey, ạla nạ mikpoki magey. Podi aḅuton melo bho azuom tẹmu tạJizos tamen olo odi nale meḍian.
Obo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịmiin mipa bho pologhi eedi ạrol aḅẹebh keḍio ịkpete kua, “Ebum eeghe ku nopiẹmi melo bhobho?
Elo bhobho ạla kua bho, ịkpe molo koḅool, kọseghe mikpoki obho kọnogho maruvekulom obho.”
ẠJizos naalōghōm mibha eedi nẹkpete bho podi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Eeghe kenyina nẹeḅaghami mạni obho? Ịneghe magey mibha odi aḍighi ạnogho ạami obho.
Aruvekulom obho idi nꞌenyina moomo amen, keḍio ạami ụtolan io enyina moomo amen.
Ibha odi naaḍighi obho, odi asighom melo bhobho lōor ạmi mi tiikōbhōghia amaḍi ạmi.
Esiibha, ịitua ghạ miibha bho. Kesi kesi olo ụgba mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obhobho mi toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho, ibha odi aḍighi obho tọgba ghạ ni mọotua ghạ odi.”
Tesuo ponyiin taḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho, obho ughōl bọ Judas Ịskariot obho, amute ạghi taruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho
ạkpete kua, “Ạami abhin mạJizos aruom enyina kenyina tẹnogho ạami meeghe?” Peedi iru ịḅal maḍisibh ḍiōbh asilva ịnogho odi.
Ạseghe tamen opopo ạghi taghisigh paJudas ạrol ạva ghạ meepōogh moḅool ạJizos.

Tọḅel aḍuma ẹzaal obho noliom ghạ mạbred obho ụlogh ghạ ḍio mạar obho ughōl bọ ayist obho, piteledōm obho iru tạJizos ipuruan kua zodi, “Ezōor ọghi teḍighen ookōbhōghia oseerian ạna mole ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho?”

ẠJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịki mẹmiinan monyiin ōoy mi tẹma bho mẹkpete kua mẹnogho odi, mōoy obo ịtughumiom obho ạkpete kua, mamen odi nạateeny, iteledōm odi nꞌodi tele mẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn totu onuma.”
Piteledōm obho ịghi ịtuugh iḍighi mẹzo bho ạJizos ạto ạnogho eedi obho, iikōbhōghia meḍian ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho.
Ạteeny mudule pạJizos nꞌaḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho ịghi ịrologhu delede mole eḍian ẹzaal obho.
Eedi nele meḍian obho pạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, onyiin enyina taḅool ni ạami.”
Pasilōor iteledōm obho ịkpoghogho, ōoy amen amen ạke mopuruan odi kua, “Ạami bẹle, Obumọogh?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Odi obo bho natiom mạbred mi tonyiin esi obho ạami natiom obho taḅool ạami.

Ẹzo bho nọoge tẹegia bho mobho Ọony Oōy obho tạpo bho pẹzo tẹtuugh nạ emutenaan odi, keḍio itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zodi obo bho taḅool bọ mỌony Oōy obho. Kịneghe ni epu ẹnogho zodi eru kạar olo ụmar io nꞌọmar zodi.”
PaJudas, obo bho aḅool odi obho ạkpete kua amutiom apuruan odi, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạami ḍio mobo bho ạna nakōl obho, iben gạ?” PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna nạkpete kua, ạami ḍio.”
Eedi nele meḍian obho, pạJizos ạseghe mạbred aakpulughu ạnogho lịsebh, aḅigi ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi, ạkpete kua, “Ịdo, ile, oobho piikpōogh obhꞌạmi.”
Keḍio odi ạseghe mạḅugha amiim obho, aakpulughu ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, ạnogho eedi, ạkpete kua, “Ịdo, oomo enyina ịpoghol,
iibha ịḅaal ạmi ibha Ẹnaan abhin aghirom ịzo bho, ibha uzu ụnogho mọlogh mọḅelemaan ịkarabh obho.
Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, ạami ụpoghol mụ miim bhibha ninii ạteeny ḍuma bho ạami tatul nꞌenyina ạpoghol mi tAde-Ọolema tỌde ạmi obho.”
Eedi ịmoor sọor ịḅele peedi imute ịghi tobꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs.
Tebōom obho pạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ạkar uḍugul aadon poomo enyina oghiil ọḍua ọḅele ạmi, ebum obho ụkpete kua tẹegia bho, ‘Ẹnaan takigh mookō rạana bho keḍio ạraana bho tẹezaranu.’
Oomo ipa ẹkona, amen nooḅẹtōn ạami tọbho bho pạami ọghi ghạ taGalili oḅōrō enyina.”
PaPita ạkpete kua amutiom ạnogho mạJizos, “Ạami ụḅele ḍio ạna bọbon amen ạḍua. Oomo ipedi obho ịḍuaghu nạ ni ẹkona ạami ụḍua ḍio.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho maPita, “Tụtua miibha bho ạami nạkpete ạnogho ạna bho. Keḍio ạkenegh tạlaal muḍugul aadon ạna nạabharanaan ạami ịraar amen.”
PaPita ạbhagharana kua, “Ughōl nạ nokigh ạami ẹkona ạami ụparanaan io ạna.” Poomo iteledōm obho ịkpete nạ monyiin ẹzo bho.
Ipa iru itẹn pạJizos abhin miteledōm obhꞌodi nꞌodi ịghi tesi olo ughōl Getsemani, keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịtologhu suo delede meḅōrō ạami, ạami ụki epa uukpulughu.”
Podi ạbhamam nꞌaPita nꞌịzal ạnwuny obho taZebidi. Ịitu nꞌịiḅaghami neelegheri esōorōm odi,
keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịitu obhꞌekpom ạmi neepu molo idi kolo netu moḅiiḍi ạmi oghigh. Ịtol suo megon eḅōrō ạami.”

Odi arele ạghi taghisigh mịbam, pagbuluman azumeni ghisigh odi tade bho, aakpulughu aghōl kua, “Ạda, eru kạar olo iḍigh tologhi onuma putughuneen mọmiinom obhobho mi tạmi. Oomo ipa ẹkona, ịtol io tibha ịto ạmi, ẹrol ni tịto onuma.”
Odi aakpulughu kua ạḅele, podi amula ạghi tịraar iteledōm obho, eedi nekoḍiiy, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho maPita, “Eeghe aḍighi kịraar enyina irue ḍio mogon oḅōrō ạmi bọbon onyiin ạwa?
Igon ghạ be meekpulughu molo enyina imeel eḍigh tọdegh oonon. Idi tologhi ẹmugh obho keḍio iikpōogh obho irue ḍio, idugh ni epu.”
Podi amina amula mogbẹbhiōm ịzal amen ạghi aakpulughu aghōl kua, “Ạda, eru kạar olo tughuneen molo ạami ụmiinom mọmiinom obhobho nolo itue ḍio ẹneghe, pẹrol ni tibha ịto bhꞌonuma.”
Odi amina amula ạghi iteledōm obho, nekoḍiiy ni, irue nạ ḍio norue momina ọkparion ariḍien obhꞌeedi.
PạJizos amina ạḅele eedi ạḍua, ạghi aakpulughu mogbẹbhiōm ịraar amen, ạkpete nạ monyiin odi ọnuekpete bho.
Odi aakpulughu ạḅele, podi amula ạghi titeledōm obho ạkpete kua, “Enyina idi nini nekoḍi epooghia? Iinon, amen obho nạateeny mobho tokuugh mỌony Oōy obho ọlogh tạravo iḍighi mịkarabh arōoy.
Iḅerenu, ọghi! Iinon, oobho odi ōoy obho, obo naḅool ạami obho.”

ẠJizos odi nini ạḍeghe men aJudas, onyiin taḍiōbh nꞌịzal obo bho nẹtuonom odi obho aru, odi nꞌobꞌọlogh arōoy ilo iroḍi mibꞌạsumugem ẹgham nꞌarugule. Aruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua bho nꞌarukenya arōoy aJu obho irōm eedi.
Odi obo bho aḅool odi obho, nạakpete ạnogho mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho, ạnogho eedi melẹgh, akōl kua, “Oōy olo ạami uḅolom podi ōoy obho, iḅol odi.”
Amen aJudas aru asi podi akẹm ạghi tạJizos ạkpete kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, ekima ẹrol ẹnogho ạna!” Keḍio aru aḅolom odi.
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ọbulol, kẹm aḍighi mibha ạna natu moḍighi obho.” Peedi arōoy obho iru iḅol odi, ịmaar ikinighi.
Ponyiin obo bho idi nꞌạJizos obho ạnyagh mobꞌạmugem odi amutiom aben asōbh maḅeri ẹbana uvẹmụ ōoy oḅo iiḅua bho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho odi, “Kpọlori mobꞌạmugem onuma mamulumi maseeri, ebum obho oomo obo bho neḅiom obꞌạmugem obho tẹpo ḍuugh obꞌạmugem obho.
Ạna olōghōm io gạ mobho, ạami aghōl mobheleghi Ọde ạmi karu kạlogh mạva kạnogho ạami, tonyiin odi amen opopo odi tatōm ni maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ọlogh itelema iḅe-rạagham moru?
Iibha bho keru emute kua, toḍighi ẹko koḍighi opulughiom tibha ọnuekpete ẹegia bho, mẹetuugh imute?”

Keḍio odi ạJizos aghiraan ạkpete kua ạnogho mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho, “Enyina ịbhamagh mibꞌạsumugem ẹgham nꞌarugule eru moḅol ạmi kilo enyina iru moḅol ọḅa. Oomo aḍuma mobho ạami ụrol ghạ delede ụtughumiom mi totu iikpulughu obho, keḍio enyina iḅol io ạami.
Keḍio oomo iibha bho ịtuugh ni nemute moḍighi obhulughiom tibha arizil obho ịge tẹegia bho.”
Tiibha bho poomo iteledōm obho ịḅele odi ighilighu ịḍua.
Obo bho iḅol bọ mạJizos obho ibhin odi ẹghi totu tạKayafas, uvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho. Arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarukenya bho neekōbhōghian todi otu obho.
APita nạatuonom odi tegbeeny aḍigh ạni togigo otu osōbh ạraakpe uvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho. Odi aḍigh togigo bho, ạghi atul nꞌarōoy iḅōrō bho ạrol delede, mọmiin oomo ibha temute bho.
Aruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua bho nꞌoomo isōbh rạakpe bho ịva bọbon iben oḅologhiom ạJizos molo koghigh odi,
keḍio bọbon ạar olo eedi ịteeny olo, toomo ibha ọlogh arōoy iru ịgba miben ịḅam tẹmu odi obho ẹkona. Ikunughi obho pịzal arōoy imute iru
ịkpete kua, “Odi ōoy obhobho ạkpete kua, ‘Ạami tatue ni ạakpo motu iikpulughu obho tẸnaan amina aḅōgh ạmarami teesoḍia ịraar aḍuma.’ ”
Puvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho aḅetunu ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Ọbhagharana olo ạna ụteeny mọbhagharana toomo ibha nọgba ọḅam tẹmu onuma bho olo?”

Keḍio odi ạJizos ẹkona ọkpete nạ ḍio mạar. Puvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho amina ạkpete kua ạnogho odi, “Taḍien tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho, mobho ạami ubhin nakirom mịzo bho, gbạ mạnogho ezōor eru kạar olo ạna uru maKraist Ọony obho tẸnaan obho.”

PạJizos ạbhagharana zodi aghōl kua, “Ạna ku nạkpete mipa bho, keḍio ạami nạgba kua ạnogho moomo enyina, ạseghe siibha ạghi taghisigh enyina tẹmiin ni mỌony Oōy obho mobho odi delede mi toḍiom ạvo obo bho ạmoogh moomo ẹmiriikpo bho, amina nạ ạḍua teḅōghōghaan ạnyu obho natu.”
Tiibha bho puvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho aruura mạsuoma odi ạkpete kua, “Odi nạakpete mịkarabh aḍighanaan mẸnaan. Ezira ụva mu mịnon ịigbaay. Esiibha ezira nọomiin mọnuekpete ịkarabh obhꞌodi.
Enyina nẹetua ẹko?” Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Neebhum odi, odi tạpo ni.”
Peedi ịsiroghom odi mịghor taghisigh odi, iḅōrōgh nạ zodi, keḍio eedi obo bho iḅōrōgh odi obho
ịkpete kua, “Ạna aKraist obho, gbạ mạnogho ezōor mobo bho iḅōrōgh ạna bho.”
APita ạrol delede tetẹrẹ mi togigo bho, ponyiin ẹbana ọnyani uvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho aru todi ạkpete kua, “Ạna ụrolan ạni ghạ mạJizos obhꞌaGalili obho.”
PaPita ạbharanaan taghisigh oomo eedi ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami ulōghōm io mibha ạna nạkpete bho.”
Odi ạbhagharana ạḅele pạḍua ạghi ạrol tọnu-otu ogigo bho. Pọnon ẹbana ọnyani ạmiin odi ạkpete ạnogho mobo bho idi todi esi obho aghōl kua, “Odi ạrolan ạni ghạ nꞌạJizos obhꞌạNazaret obho.”
PaPita amina ạbharanaan ạbhagharana kua, “Ịzo ẹko ạami takir ni, ạami ulōghōm io mōoy opopo.”
Ịbam amen itẹn parōoy obho ịmaraay todi esi obho iru taPita ịkpete kua, “Agey, ọnuekpete onuma iizuan io.”
PaPita aghir mịzo aghōl kua, “Ẹnaan ạrabh ạami eru kạar olo ạami nạgba miben. Ạami ulōghōm io mōoy opopo.” Ibia ḍio pạkenegh ạlaal,
keḍio aPita ạatua mibha ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho odi obho, “Keḍio ạkenegh tạlaal, ạna nạabharanaan ạami ịraar amen.” Podi amute ạḍua ạghi aleghe magey.
Obun ụḍirogh poomo aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarukenya arōoy aJu obho ikpi rụumu eedi ịmoghonyan mẹzo eedi tẹgba molo okigh mạJizos.
Keḍio eedi iru ịkasi zodi ibhin odi ịghi ịlogh tạvo taPailet ạgovono bho.

Amen aJudas, obo bho aḅool bọ mạJizos, ạmiin mobho nọoru mịiruan ụnogho mạJizos moghigh odi obho, podi alōghōma mịkarabh odi aghiraan abhin amulumi maḍisibh ḍiōbh ịpaḍi asilva bho ạghiom mịvaruumu iḅo miiḅua nꞌarukenya bho,
ạkpete kua, “Ạami naaḍighi mịkarabh, tẹzo bho ạami uḅool mōoy olo ạar olo ạpiom olo ụnogho ḍuugh obho.” Peedi ịbhagharana kua zodi, “Ipa bho nꞌezōor ạar olo ụmooghan olo, ọkpe onuma.”
PaJudas arōbhōnaan eedi mikpoki obho mi totu iikpulughu obho, ạḍua ạghi ạkpo mooḍigh asina ạbho.
Paruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho ịghi iḅẹtōn mikpoki obho ịkpete kua, “Iibha ikpoki ạzara ẹmu ōoy. Tẹzo araalōgh ezira ịgbaan io molo kọseghe kọlogh tẹḅa otu iikpulughu obho.”
Amen eedi iru ịmoghonyan ịḅele milo igboloman nꞌikpoki obho, peedi ịseghe ịghi ighuōm ade ọlemogh suugh moḍi ghạ isoloman.
Pạar obho kesiibha nokōl ni ade popo “Ade Ạzara” bho.
Piru iḍighi ibhulughiom tibha aJerimaya ozil obho ạge bho. Odi ạge kua, “Eedi ibhin maḍisibh ḍiōbh ịpaḍi asilva bho, ọnu ikpoki obho arōoy Izirẹl imōrōnuan mọkpe tẹmu odi obho,
eghuōm Ade Ọlemogh Suugh kẹzo bho Obạmọogh obho ạto ạnogho ạami obho.”
Ubhin mạJizos uru ụmarami taghisigh ạgovono bho, podi apuruan kua mạJizos. “Ạna ọolema arōoy aJu obho?” PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ạna ku nạkpete kua.”
Toomo iben obho aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho ịgba iḅologhiom odi obho, bọbon ạar olo odi ạkpaton mọnu olo.
Tipa bẹleni, paPailet ạkpete kua ạnogho odi, “Ạna ọmoghon io moomo ibha eedi nẹgba eḅologhiom ạna bho bẹle?”
Keḍio ạJizos omōrō nạ ḍio mọkpaton ọnu odi ọkpete ạar, molo ạgovono bho aamōogh magey.
Oomo aḍuma olo nale mẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho, ạgovono bho namutiom ghạ monyiin ōoy ikoli olo arōoy obho igbẹel.
Tamen opopo kir onyiin ōoy ikoli olo kōoy kōoy alōghōm ni zodi, olo ughōl ạJizos Bạrabas.
Tamen olo obꞌọlogh arōoy obho iikōbhōghian, paPailet apuruan kua zeedi, “Oḍighen mobho enyina negbẹel molo ạami kamutiom kạnogho enyina, ạJizos Bạrabas bẹlee kạJizos obho ughōl bọ aKraist obho?”
Odi nạakar alōghōm mobho eedi ịtuan tebum ibōbhan kibhin mạJizos iruom odi.

Tamen olo aPailet odi delede mi totu ạraakpe bho, pạni odi arōm dōm aruom odi ạkpete kua, “Ụlogh ghạ mạvo onuma mi tōoy opopo ạar olo aḍighi ạpiom olo. Uḍugul obho mi tạramala ạami ạmiinom mịkanya milo igboloman nꞌodi.”
Aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarukenya bho itiki magey mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho mogbẹel aPailet kamutiom mạBarabas, oghigh ạJizos.
Pạgovono bho apuruan kua zeedi, “Oḍighen tịzal bhibha mobho enyina negbẹel molo ạami kamutiom kạnogho enyina?” Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “ẠBarabas.”
PaPailet apuruan kua zeedi, “Kenyina nẹva molo ạami kaḍighi ẹko mạJizos obho ughōl aKraist obho?” Poomo eedi ịbhagharana kua, “Kạn odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.”
PaPailet apuruan kua, “Iḍighen ịkarabh ibha odi aḍighi obho?” Peedi ịke momulughu ọḅaagheni araḅeri ighōl kua, “Kạn odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.”

Amen aPailet ạva ạmiin mobho ẹzo oḍighi olo mu obho, nꞌobho eedi nẹemara nạ morubhe ẹgham obho, podi ạseghe mụum aatōla rạvo odi mi taghisigh obꞌọlogh arōoy obho keḍio ạkpete kua, “Ạravo ạmi ilo mi tọbho ōoy obhobho. Kilo kilo imute imute idi tẹmu enyina.”
Poomo eedi obꞌọlogh arōoy obho ịbhagharana imulumian kua zodi, “Ạzara ẹmu odi ọḅam ni tạruumu ezōor nꞌạnwuny ezōor.”
PaPailet amutiom mạBarabas ạnogho eedi, abhin mạJizos ạghi ụgurogh amulumi ạnogho eedi mọghi ọkan odi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.
Ipa iru itẹn, piḅe rạagham taPailet ibhin mạJizos ịloghom totu ạgovono bho, keḍio oomo eedi iḅe rạagham obho iikōbhōghian ikō zodi ikiton,
ịkporion mạsuoma obhꞌodi, ịloki odi mạdoni ọolema iḅe rạagham,

keḍio iru ikpōgh meghōony ọolema iiḅulom izuom odi, ịseghe moorẹeny ịlogh toḍiom ạvo odi, keḍio igbuluman ghạ taghisigh odi ịrol ịiḅaghami odi ighōl kua, “Ọodoony aghuḍum ạrol ạnogho ạna ọolema aJu obho.”
Keḍio eedi ịsiroghom odi mịghor, ịḅoor moorẹeny obhꞌạvo odi ịguroghom tẹmu obhꞌodi.
Eedi ịiḅaghami odi ịḅele, peedi iru ịkporion mạdoni ọolema bho ịloki odi mạsuoma obhꞌodi, ibhin odi imutiom mọghi ọkan odi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.
Ẹzo bho eedi imute irele nẹki obho peedi ịmiinan mōoy olꞌaSairini olo ughōl ạSaimon, peedi ịbham odi ịnogho odi morōol oorẹeny ẹmigheri obho tạJizos.
Eedi ịghi isi tesi olo ughōl Gọlgota, ẹmu obho “Esi ịikpo.”
Peedi ịnogho odi miim ilo ụguonom nꞌạkata mọbhoghol. Odi ạanama ạmiin, podi agin mọbhoghol.
Eedi ịkan odi peedi iru ịkonyogh mạsuoma bhꞌodi ịsa mẹlel ibhinighan.
Eedi ibhinighan ịḅele peedi ịrol delede negon ghạ zodi mọmiin ibha temute bho.
Tạnyu ẹmu odi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho nọogiom ọgba mịkarabh obho odi aḍighi obho. Ụge kua, “
Eedi ịkan odi ịḅele, peedi ịkanam nꞌịnon ịzal ạruḅa arōoy, onyiin toḍiom, onyiin tekẹeny odi.
Kōoy kōoy olo natẹn pozighe ẹmu ọoḅaghami odi ạJizos, oghōl ekua,
“Ạna pobo bho tạakpo motu iikpulughu obho amina aḅōgh ạmarami teesoḍia ịraar aḍuma bho. Pẹla lōor onuma, eru kạar olo ạna uru mỌony tẸnaan! Sōor toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho!”
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mobho aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarukenya bho ịmologh ịiḅaghami nạ zodi,
ighōl kua, “Odi nạpel ghạ mịnon keḍio odi orue ḍio mọbhela alōor odi. Odi ḍio gạ mọolema bhꞌIzirẹl? Odi ạkar asōor toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho aru pezōor omōruōm odi.
Odi aseeriom moomo ologhi odi mẸnaan, aghōl kua modi Ọony tẸnaan. Gụa, ọmiin siibha eru kạar olo Ẹnaan tạpel ni zodi.”
Bọbon ạruḅa bho utul nꞌodi ụkan obho ịiḅaghami nạ zodi monyiin ẹzo bho.
Aḍio ạḍi ịzal abin ḍuma popo pọkinim akpe moomo ẹma bho mịraar ạwa.
Tesi olo ịraar asuo, pạJizos aleghe amulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō aghōl kua, “Ẹloi, ẹloi, lẹma sạbaktani?” ẹmu obho ạkpete kua, “Ẹnaan ạmi, Ẹnaan ạmi, eeghe aḍighi kạna aanon ạami atughuneen ḍien?”
Ẹde obo bho idi todi esi obho ịmoghon, pighōl kua, “Odi napeleghi mIlaija.”
Ponyiin eedi aghiil tonyiin odi amen obho ạghi ạseghe mạar ạtobhori tamiim ilo neegboogh, ạbhaghari toorẹeny aḍighi molo ạJizos kạbhoghol.
Ipedi obho nẹekpete kua, “Iḅōrō ọmiin eru kạar olo Ilaija natu mọbhel odi!”
Podi ạJizos amina aleghe amulughu abhooghu asoroghi.
Tamen opopo pobꞌukpe olo odi totu iikpulughu obho ạbaan ạḍian ịzal abin ạseghe tẹmu obho asi teetu obho. Ade bho ẹkona aazighinian, ạrubharakpar obho iḅomian,
aruugu obho iḅomian, molo ọlogh arōoy tẸnaan ibha nẹebhozu obho iḅerenu tọbho bho,
ịḍuaghu tọkarabh eḍum obho. ẠJizos aḅetunu tọbho bho peedi iḍigh tẹma bhꞌaJerusạlẹm molo ọlogh arōoy ịmiin eedi.

Amen uvẹmụ arōoy iḅe rạagham obho nꞌeedi iḅe rạagham obo bho neḅōrō mạJizos obho ịmiin mẹzo bho ade bho aazighinian aḅomian obho nꞌoomo ọkpo bho imuteghu obho, paruugu isibh zeedi molo eedi ịkpete kua, “Ạkar agey, odi Ọony tẸnaan.”
Ọlogh ạraani ịrol ạni todi esi obho kegbeeny neenon ghạ. Eedi ịtuonom mạJizos mi taGalili eru ẹlogh ạvo ẹnogho odi.
AMeri obhꞌạMagdala, nꞌaMeri oniin taJems nꞌaJosef, nꞌoniin ạnwuny taZebidi ịrol ạni nạ.
Ạteeny mudule, ponyiin ōoy olꞌẠrimatia aru. Aḍien odi ughōl aJosef. Odi ọola. Odi ẹkona onyiin obo nẹtuonom mạJizos.
Odi ạghi taPailet agbẹel moḍim obho tạJizos, keḍio aPailet ạnogho odi mịikpo mọseghe oḍim obho.
Podi aJosef aru ạseghe abhurughiom mạbalala
aḍi zodi toogu odi olo ugbo meede mi tạrubharakpar obho. Odi aḍi ạḅele podi aakilimi mọbharakpar akpeeghiom mọnu oogu obho atẹn aghẹel.
AMeri obhꞌạMagdala nꞌaMeri opedi obho ịrol delede esōmōghan moogu obho.
Ạḅaal ḍuma obhooghia arōoy aJu obho, paruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho ịghi taPailet
ịkpete kua, “Ọde otu, ezōor nọotua mọnuekpete olo odi ọgba miben obho ạkpete men obho odi dọbho ḍio bho. Odi ạkpete kua, ‘Ịraar aḍuma neetẹn pạami oḅetunu tọbho bho.’

Tọ rōoy ẹghi ẹrol toogu obho ninii ịraar aḍuma bho etẹn, molo obo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịki emiigh odi ẹseghe, ẹghi ẹgba ẹnogho rōoy obho eghōl, ‘Odi naaḅetunu tọbho bho.’ Iben bhibha teḅẹebh ni epu mịḅel obho.”
PaPailet ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ipin rōoy iḅōrō obho mẹghi, mẹḍin moogu obho mẹghuemi mẹzo olo ologhi enyina aḍigh aḍigh.”
Peedi ịḍua, ịghi ịmaar ịḍin moogu obho ịghuemi, iseeri rōoy iḅōrō bho mogon oḅōrō.
Aḍuma obhooghia arōoy aJu obho aru atẹn, obun ụḍirogh ạSondi obho paMeri obhꞌạMagdala nꞌaMeri opedi obho ịghi moonon oogu obho.
Tekperenom pade bho aazighinian molo ẹzo ọgba olo, aḅomian. Tamen opopo potelema tObạmọogh obho ạḍua tạnyu obho asōor aru aakilimi mọbharakpar obho atughuneen tọnu oogu obho ạrolom delede.
Oomo alōor obhꞌodi odi kẹḅaal obho, keḍio abura mịḅaal ạbalala.
Obo bho neḅōrō moogu obho aruugu ilo isibh eedi ẹzo ọgba olo, molo eedi ịrologhu karōoy ilo nẹebhozu.
Potelema bho ạkpete kua ạnogho rạani obho, “Ighiil ghạ ruugu. Ạami naalōghōm enyina nẹva mạJizos obho ụkan bọ toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.
Odi olo mu suo. Nooḅẹtōn odi tọbho bho kẹzo bho odi ạḍeghe bho. Itu mẹmiin mesi obho ụmuneen odi obho.

Ikẹm siibha siibha mẹghi mẹgba mẹnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi meghōl kua, ‘Nooḅẹtōn odi tọbho bho. Esiibha odi naatẹn ghạ nạki taGalili. Tepa penyina ọmiin odi.’ Íḅulo ghạ mibha ạami nạkpete ạnogho enyina bho.”
Peedi, taruugu nꞌọḅaal ologhi ighiil ịḍua toogu obho ịghi ịgba ịnogho miteledōm obho.
Tekperenom, pạJizos amutenaan eedi ạkpete kua, “Ekima ẹrolaan enyina.” Peedi ịghi todi igbuluman ịbham masike odi iikpulughu odi.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ighiil ghạ ruugu. Ịki mẹgba mẹnogho burumōr ạmi meedi ẹghi taGalili, tepa peedi ọmiin ạmi.”
Suo ạraani obho nẹḍua mọghi ọgba bho, ẹde arōoy ẹgham obo bho iḅōrō moogu obho nẹeghi tẹma bho ẹgba ẹnogho maruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho moomo ibha imute bho.
Paruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho ịghi tarukenya bho iikōbhōghian monyiin esi iḍikuan ruzue, ịnogho mikpoki ilo ịbugh magey marōoy ạraagham obho
ịkpete kua, “Ịgba meghōl kua, miteledōm odi imiigh odi ẹseghe tamen olo enyina nekoḍi.
Keru kạar olo ạgovono bho ạmoghon pezōor ọgba opuom odi ḍien molo ịiḅaghami ḍio enyina.”
Peedi obo bho iḅōrō moogu obho ibhin mikpoki obho ịtuugh iḍighi mibha ụkpete ụnogho eedi obho. Kaadon ipa pibha arōoy aJu obho nẹgba elelemi kesi kesi.
Aḍiōbh nꞌonyiin iteledōm obho ịghi teegum olo odi taGalili olo ạJizos aghōl ạnogho eedi mọghi.
Amen eedi ịmiin odi peedi igbuluman iikpulughu odi, oomo ipa ẹkona ẹde eedi ibhinom io.
PạJizos ạghi atuan eedi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Nọonogho ạami moomo ịikpo mi tạnyu obho nꞌade bho.
Tebum ipa bẹleni, ịki toomo arōoy ilo idi toomo ariisi meḍighi eedi eru mobo tẹtuonom ạami, mezuom eedi mụum mi taḍien Ọde bho, nꞌỌony obho, nꞌẸmugh Iigbia bho,
mẹtughumiom eedi moghiilaan oomo kạar kạar olo ạami ụto ụnogho enyina. Keḍio ilōghōm kua meghōl ạami odi nꞌenyina moomo amen ninii ạteeny tikunughi amen obho.”
Oobho ọḅel egbiom ooḅi adōm obho igboloman nꞌạJizos Kraist Ọony obho tẸnaan.
Ụkiom kẹzo bho Ạizaya ozil obho ạge bho:
“Mịin ạami tatōm mọony adōm ạmi motẹnōm onuma taghisigh moselemi ebōom onuma.
Oōy odi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho namulughu akōl kua,
‘Iselemi mebōom tObạmọogh obho meseerian odi.
Iseleghi mebōom obhꞌodi mẹnogho odi morele.’ ”
Ẹzo bho mobho ạJon amute tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho ạrol azuughiom rụmuum rōoy ạgba ghạ nạ dōm obhꞌodi aghōl kua, “Ikiraan tịkarabh enyina meru mezua mụum, pẸnaan ọḅelemaan enyina mịkarabh enyina.”
Ọlogh arōoy ịḍua tebhugh obhꞌaJudia nꞌẹma bhꞌaJerusạlẹm eru mọmoghon ạni ịigbaay obho tạJon. Eedi eetuma mịkarabh eedi ẹnogho zodi keḍio odi azuughiom eedi mụum mi tọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan.
Odi ạJon amina ghạ marukpe ilo ụlemom masubhuubh uuva, nꞌọnu ukpe ozu ẹnam mi tegum obhꞌodi. Odi ạḅa ghạ migurubia ạlaay ghạ mạmem.
Odi ạgba ghạ kua ạnogho marōoy obho, “Oōy obho natu tạman ạmi obho apu zạmi. Ạami ugbẹbhan io todi mozuman ọkporion arakōrō asike odi.
Ạami ubhin mụum nazuughiom enyina keḍio odi tapin Ẹmugh Iigbia bho azuughiom enyina mụum.”
Ipa iru itẹn ibia ḍio pạJizos ạḍua tạNazaret aru tebhugh obhꞌaGalili, ạJon azuom odi mụum mi tọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan.
Odi ạJizos namute kua be tạmuum obho podi ạmiin mobho ạnyu obho nakuurunu. Ẹmugh obho ạbheebh keekumude aru asōorōm odi,
oghōrōkō ạḍua nạ tạnyu obho aru ạkpete kua, “Ạna pogini Ọony oḍigh ologhi ạmi. Eḍighiom ạar onuma eḍigh tologhi ạmi.”
Tonyiin odi amen opopo pẸmugh obho abhin odi aḍighom tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho.
Odi ạrol epa merubal aḍuma, aSetan ạnogho odi mọdegh oonon. Ịnam ẹbhooru ẹrol nạ teḍum obho, molo itelema bho tẸnaan iru ghạ ịlogh ạvo ịnogho zodi.
Uḅol mạJon ọloghom mikoli, pạJizos ạghi taGalili ạke mọgba ooḅi adōm obho tẸnaan.
Odi ạgba aghōl ghạ kua, “Amen obho naagbẹbh ạman, Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan naaru atuan. Ikiraan tịkarabh enyina memōruōm adōm obho.”
Ẹzo bho ạJizos natele tọtu obꞌegha ọbhiiny obhꞌaGalili obho, podi ạmiin mịzal arōoy ịze mina. Ariḍien eedi ughōl ạSaimon nꞌẠndru. Eedi aburumōr. Eedi ibhin ọzuguru nẹziom ina mi tegha bho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịtuonom ạami pạami oḍighi enyina keru marōoy ilo tepin rōoy etu kịze mina.”
Tonyiin odi amen opopo peedi ịḅele mọzuguru obhꞌeedi ịtuonom odi.
Odi arele ạghi taghisigh mịbam podi ạmiin mịnon ịzal aburumōr. Ariḍien eedi ughōl aJems nꞌạJon. Eedi ạnwuny taZebidi. Eedi idi tologhi oghuugh eedi nẹkooḍi rụzuguru eedi.
ẠJizos ạmiin eedi be podi abheleghi eedi, peedi ịḅele nạ maZebidi ọde bhꞌeedi nꞌarōoy oḍighi obhꞌeedi mi toghuugh obho, ịghi ịtuonom mạJizos.
Eedi ịghi isi tẹma bho ughōl bọ ạKapaniom obho, ạteeny ḍuma obhooghia bho podi ạJizos ạghi totu ịtughumiom obho ạke mọtughumiom.
Obo bho ịmoghon ịtughumiom obhꞌodi obho iimōogh ni magey mebum ẹzo bho odi nạtughumiom obho. Odi olo kobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho. Odi abhin toghōrōkō ẹmu ịto ạrol ạtughumiom.
Ibia ḍio ponyiin ōoy olo ạteeny ọkarabh ẹmugh mi tẹmu odi aru aḍigh totu ịtughumiom obho namulughu akōl kua,
“Ạna ạJizos obhꞌạNazaret, ạna ụkar nạva ezōor mẹkaraan? Ạna naaru mobhiẹmi ezōor bẹle? Ạami naalōghōm ạna. Ạna ōoy olo ạḍua tẸnaan aru olo ịkarabh ilo.”
PạJizos ạbhooruom odi ạkpete kua, “Kpereghi mọnu onuma, mamute tẹmu ōoy obho.”
Podi ọkarabh ẹmugh obho azighe mōoy obho magey, amulughu migbōgh imulughu keḍio amute tẹmu odi ōoy obho.

Poomo arōoy obho iimōogh, molo onyiin ạkpete kua ạnogho monyiin, “Iibha keeghe? Iibha ponyiin oḍigh imoom ịtughumiom? Odi ōoy obhobho abhin toghōrōkō ịnyaam nꞌịto ạkpete ạnogho mịkarabh ạruumugh obho, peedi ighiilaan nạ odi nẹḍuaghu.”
Tiibha bho pọdu odi ạJizos alela kesi kesi mi tebhugh obhꞌaGalili.
Eedi ịḍua totu ịtughumiom obho peedi itẹn onyen ịghi totu tạSaimon nꞌẠndru. AJems nꞌạJon ịghi ạni.
Eedi isi totu obho, oniin ạni tạSaimon ọole naaḍigh ạmanaghan tẹmuna. ẠJizos aḍigh kua be totu obho pụgba ụnogho zodi malōor ạni obho.
Podi ạghi todi ạni obho ạlogh ạvo ạbham odi aḅẹtōn. Pọole bho ạḍua odi ạke nạ ni mọkiom eedi.
Udule, tamen olo aghōzōgh obho naaḍigh, parōoy ibhin iruom mạJizos moomo obo bho asilōor neḍighi obho nꞌobo bho nẹtaalogh obho.
Oomo arōoy ẹma bho iikōbhōghian taghisigh otu obho.

Keḍio ạJizos aakō mọlogh obo bho nẹnwe moḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh, abhirighanogh nạ mọlogh ịkarabh ạruumugh. Odi omōrō ḍio nomōrō molo ịkarabh ạruumugh obho kẹkpete mạar, ebum obho eedi neelōghōm odi obho.
Ạḅaal, obun ụḍirogh be, pạJizos aḅon aḅetunu totu obho ạḍua, ạghi tesi olo adeny aakpulughu.
PạSaimon nꞌobo bho nꞌodi netelian obho ịghi nẹva zodi.
Amen eedi ịmiin odi peedi ịkpete kua, “Oomo arōoy obho nẹva mọmiin onuma.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ezira tọki ạni ni tạraama ipedi obho ituan suo bho. Ạami tạgba ạni ni tạraama pipa, ebum obho ạami ụtuan miibha bho kuru obho.”
Podi akiton toomo aGalili ạgba dōm obho mi tarutu ịtughumiom obho ibhirighanogh nạ mịkarabh ạruumugh.
Oōy olo nạnwe mẹzegh ịpueghi riiḅi aru tạJizos agbuluman tasike odi aasen mạJizos mọlogh ạvo ọnogho odi aghōl kua, “Eru kạar olo iḍigh tologhi onuma ạna tatue ni aakō ạami.”
PạJizos ạsuanaan odi ghụsan, ạghi akulaan odi ạbhagharana kua, “Eḍigh tologhi ạmi, ḍum.”
Tonyiin odi amen opopo pẹzegh ịpueghi riiḅi obho ịḍua talōor odi, odi aru aḍum.
PạJizos aḍuur raḅeri odi ạkpete ạnogho odi moghẹel
aghōl kua, “Mạar ạmoghon, ụgba ghạ mạnogho nꞌōoy nꞌōoy. Tẹn onyen mạghi tōoy oḅo miiḅua bho odi aanon ạna, kụ mạghi mạtun mạar mạnogho mẸnaan kẹzo bho aMozis ạto bho, mọgba omutiom mobho ạna naaḍum.”

Odi ōoy obho ạḍua, pạghi kesi kesi ạgba miiḅi obho uḍighi ụnogho odi obho. Odi ạgba molo ạJizos omina ḍio arue momute tẹma bho mi tesi ogbo arōoy. Kpẹlen nꞌipa odi ạrol kụ tariisi ilo ideny keḍio arōoy ịḍua ghạ kesi kesi iru todi.
Ịbam aruḍuma iru itẹn pạJizos amula aru tạKapaniom, molo ọdu odi alela mobho odi naaru asi totu.
Obꞌọlogh arōoy mobho iru iikōbhōghian imuzō totu obho molo bọbon ẹzo ọḅol tọnu-otu obho oḍigh nạ olo. ẠJizos nạgba ghạ dōm obho ạnogho eedi.
Eedi idi suo pinya arōoy irōol tẹmuna mōoy olo alōor obho nạabho ạman iruom odi.

Ebum obꞌọlogh arōoy obho eedi irue ḍio mobhin ōoy obho ọghiom odi, peedi irubhe mepogh tạnyu otu obho mi tesi obho ạJizos odi obho, ide lōor isoorẹ mōoy obho mẹzo bho odi tẹmuna bho mi taghisigh tạJizos.
Amen ạJizos ạmiin ologhi omōruōm obho arōoy obho ịteeny obho podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho alōor obho nạabho aghōl kua, “Ọony ạmi, ịkarabh obhꞌonuma nọoḅelemaan ạna.”
Pẹde arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho ịrol ịitua nẹkpete kua tiloghi obhꞌeedi,
“Eeghe aḍighi kodi nạkpete kua miibha bho aḍighanaan mẸnaan? Ọnon ōoy olo tatue ạḅelemaan mịkarabh olo tughuneen mẸnaan io.”
Tonyiin odi amen opopo pạJizos alōghōm ịitua iloghi obhꞌeedi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹetua mipa bho tiloghi obhꞌenyina?
Iḍighen idugh epu mọkpete ọnogho odi ōoy obho alōor obho nạabho bho? Oghōl ekua, ‘Ịkarabh onuma nọoḅelemaan ạna,’ bẹlee kọkpete oghōl, ‘Ḅetunu mạseghe mẹmuna onuma maghẹel’?
Ạami taḍighi ni aḍeeriom enyina mobho Ọony Oōy obho ạteeny ni mịnyaam tade bho mọḅelemaan ịkarabh.” Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho alōor obho nạabho bho,
“Ạami ụkpete ạnogho ạna, ḅetunu mạseghe mẹmuna onuma maghẹel.”
Taghisigh eedi, podi ōoy obho aḅetunu ạseghe mẹmuna bhꞌodi aghiil aghẹel. Oomo eedi iimōogh ni ẹman keḍio ịrol ibuom Ẹnaan ighōl kua, “Ọkpo bhibha ezōor dọmiin ghạ ḍio.”
Ipa iru itẹn, podi ạJizos amina amula ạghi tọtu ọbhiiny obꞌegha bhꞌaGalili, molo obꞌọlogh arōoy iru todi, odi ạrol ạtughumiom eedi.
Ẹzo bho odi natele bho podi ạmiin mogunogh raasōgh ōoy olo ughōl aLivai, ọony tẠlifios. Odi odi delede tesi oḍighi odi. PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Tụonom ạami.” Podi aLivai aḅetunu ạtuonom odi.

Ịbam amen itẹn podi ạJizos ạghi aḍigh nꞌodi aLivai nale meḍian totu odi. Ọlogh arōoy igunogh raasōgh nꞌarōoy ilo nọologh mụum eru nạ nẹtuonom odi ạJizos molo ọlogh eedi itul nꞌodi nꞌiteledōm obhꞌodi nele meḍian.

Ẹde arōoy aFarisi obho nẹtughumiom raalōgh obho ịmiin mobho ạJizos atul marōoy ilo nọologh mụum nꞌigunogh raasōgh nale meḍian obho, peedi ipuruan kua miteledōm obhꞌodi ighōl kua, “Ebum eeghe kodi atul nꞌarōoy ilo idi kua nale meḍian?”
ẠJizos nạamoghon keḍio ạbhagharana kua zeedi. “Obo bho asilōor obho ịghuaay obho ịva ghạ ḍio mozil, obo bho nẹnweey obho be. Ạami uru mobheleghi ạsukarabh obho, aruuḅi obho ḍio.”

Onyiin amen olo iteledōm tạJon nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho ịrol mọkoony mebum iikpulughu, pẹde arōoy iru tạJizos ipuruan kua zodi, “Ebum eeghe kiteledōm tạJon nꞌibha arōoy aFarisi obho nẹtologhu ghạ mọkoony mebum iikpulughu keḍio ibhꞌonuma ịkpo?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Obo bho iru mipina bho tẹtologhu ni mọkoony gạ tamen olo opina bho odi nꞌeedi? Ịkpo. Tamen obho odi odi nꞌeedi obho, eedi irue ḍio ẹrologhu mọkoony.
Aḍuma natu molo tọseghe mopina bho mi teedi, keḍio eedi tegbi mọrologhu ọkoony.
“Bọbon ōoy olo tạseghe momoom ukpe mopuom ugbaany ạsuoma olo. Ibha odi aḍighi kua pomoom ukpe bho ọba ugbaany obho molo epōgh obho tạbugh ni apu mọḅel obho.

Oōy olo tạseghe nạ mimoom amiim ạloki tigbaany izu ịnam ạsikarama amiim olo. Ibha odi ạloki pimoom amiim obho orubhughi igbaany izu ạsikarama bho, amiim obho kezuughian, izu ạsikarama bho ẹkona kerubhughu keḅẹebh. Imoom amiim nọloki ghạ timoom izu ạsikarama.”
Tonyiin aḍuma obhooghia bho olo ạJizos arele natẹn tookua ịbiakpa, pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho iḅuni mịbiakpa bho.
Pẹtede arōoy aFarisi obho ịkpete kua ịnogho mạJizos, “Nonon, obo bho nẹtuonom ạna bho neesōor molōgh moḍighi ipa bho mi taḍuma obhooghia bho.”
ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Enyina deghōl ghạ ḍio ẹmoghon mibha aDevid aḍighi tamen obho odi nꞌarōoy odi ọkoony nasibh mi taḍuma obhooghia bho gạ?

Odi aḍigh totu iikpulughu obho tẸnaan ạseghe mạbred obho ụtunom mạar ụnogho mẸnaan obho ale. Iibha bho imute tamen olo Ạbayata aru muvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho. Tẹzo ịto araalōgh obho ọnon ōoy ole ghạ ḍio, keḍio aDevid ale ni amina ạseghe ạnogho ạni rōoy odi.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua akunughiom, “Useeri maḍuma obhooghia bho ọnogho mōoy, ōoy io mobho ụnogho maḍuma obhooghia bho.
Ebum obho Ọony Oōy obho aru mObạmọogh aḍuma obhooghia bho.”
Keḍio ạJizos amula ạghi totu ịtughumiom obho. Tesuo kir ōoy olo ạvo bho naamugh.
Kir ẹde arōoy ilo idi ạni ilo nẹva mạar olo obhin ọgbaam ọbhamam ạJizos, peedi ịke mogon eru kạar olo odi taakō ni mōoy obho mi taḍuma obhooghia bho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho ạvo bho naamugh obho, “Tele maru eebha taghisigh ogbo arōoy obho.”

Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua rōoy obho, “Iḍighen mibha iizuan moḍighi tẹzo araalōgh obhꞌezira mi taḍuma obhooghia bho? Ọlogh ạvo ọnogho ōoy nꞌoḍighi odi mịkarabh? Ọbhel aghuḍum ōoy nꞌobhiẹmi aghuḍum obhꞌodi?” Oomꞌeedi iḅa ni be ịrol bịrim.

Ẹzo bho ạJizos naanon eedi obho ariḍien obhꞌodi neeghiraan. Tonyiin odi amen opopo pạghusan eedi isibh odi mebum ọḅaar ẹmu obhꞌeedi nꞌobho eedi neekōrōnuan obho. Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho, “Sele mạvo onuma.” Odi asele pạvo bhꞌodi aru ạneghe.
Parōoy aFarisi obho ịḍua totu ịtughumiom obho iikōbhōghian tonyiin esi nꞌarōoy iḅōrō tạHerod, eedi iḍikuan ruzue mẹzo oghigh odi ạJizos.
Tipa bho pạJizos nꞌobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịḍua ịghi tobꞌegha bhꞌaGalili. Tesuo pobꞌọlogh arōoy iru todi. Eedi ịḍua taGalili nꞌaJudia,

nꞌaJerusạlẹm, nꞌebhugh obhꞌIdumia, nꞌebhugh obho odi tẹḅeenyom ọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan, nꞌạraama ebhugh aTaya nꞌaSaidon ibha ituan obho keru. Eedi obꞌọlogh arōoy obho iru tạJizos tebum obho eedi nẹemoghon mọkpo bho ạJizos naḍighi obho.
Arōoy obho ịbugh ni epu molo ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho mọva oghuugh oseerian odi, molo arōoy obho ịizeghi odi.
Odi naakō mobꞌọlogh arōoy molo oomo obo bho nẹnweey obho nenyuughian moḍigh ọghi okulaan odi.
Kamen kamen olo obo bho ịkarabh ạruumugh nẹeḅaghami obho ịmiin odi peedi ogbuluman omulughu oghōl ekua, “Ạna Ọony obho tẸnaan.”
PạJizos ạbhooruom magey mịkarabh ạruumugh obho mọḅele ọgba odi omutiom.
Ipa iru itẹn, pạJizos ạsiin tạnyu eegum abheleghi marōoy obho iḍigh tologhi odi obho iru todi. Eedi iru todi,
podi ạson maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ibha odi aghōl ḍien aghōl iteledōm obho. Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ạami nạason enyina mọrolan ạmi. Ạami tatōm ni enyina amutiom mọghi ọgba adōm obho,
obhin nạ ịnyaam obhirighanogh ịkarabh ạruumugh.”
Iibha eedi aḍiōbh nꞌịzal obho odi ạson ạseghe bho: ạSaimon (obho ạJizos ạnogho mọnon aḍien aghōl aPita bho);
aJems nꞌạJon umōr odi, (eedi ạnwuny taZebidi, ibha ạJizos aghōl ḍien eedi aghōl araBoanaag, ẹmu obho “arōoy aḍio olo nagumughu”);
nꞌẠndru, nꞌaFilip, nꞌaBatolomiu, nꞌaMatiu, nꞌạTomos, nꞌaJems ọony tẠlifios, nꞌạTadios, nꞌạSaimon ẹku arōoy ibha ughōl bọ aZelot obho,
nꞌaJudas Ịskariot obho aḅool mạJizos obho.
Ipa iru itẹn pạJizos atẹn aghẹel. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ obꞌọlogh arōoy iru iikōbhōghian molo ạJizos nꞌiteledōm odi ịteeny io nọteeny men ole eḍian.
Amen aburumōr odi ịmoghon mipa bho peedi ịghi mobhin odi, ebum obho arōoy nẹkpete ekōl kua, “Odi nạtaal.”
Ẹde arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho, ilo ịḍua taJerusạlẹm iru ịrol ịkpete kua, “ABielzebul ọkarabh ẹmugh obho odi todi.” Ịnon ịkpete kua, “Uvẹmụ aruru obho ạnogho odi mịnyaam obhirighanogh eedi.”
PạJizos abheleghi rōoy obho iru todi keḍio odi adōgh mẹde asidōgh bhibha ạnogho eedi aghōl kua, “Imute ẹko molo aSetan tapirighan maSetan?
Eru kạar olo onyiin ebhugh ịḍianogh rụuku onyiin naḅe monyiin, ebhugh opopo orue ḍio ạmara, tameel ni.
Eru kạar olo onyiin eghun otu ịḍianogh rụuku onyiin naḅe monyiin, eghun otu opopo orue ḍio ạmara, tameel ni.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, eru kạar olo ade-ọolema taSetan nẹeḍianogh rụuku, odi ọrolom mu mẹtolom obho, ikunughi odi naatuan.
“Oōy olo tatue aḅom aḍigh totu ōoy olo ạghua magey aminyogh mọkpo odi ạḍuonom olo, tughuneen molo odi abhira abhum mọoghuanaan ōoy obho ạbhaḍi ḍio, keḍio odi tagbi mookōbhōghi ọkpo ōoy obho ọḍuonom.
“Ịitua miibha bho. Totue ni ọḅelemaan kịkarabh kịkarabh ilo arōoy iḍighi nꞌoomo ịkarabh ọnuekpete ilo eedi ịkpeteey.
Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạkpete mịkarabh aḍighanaan mẸmugh Iigbia bho ọḅelemaan olo, ebum obho odi naaḍighi mịkarabh olo ikunughi olo bho.”
(ẠJizos ạkpete miibha bho tebum obho ẹde arōoy ịkpete ighōl kua, “Ọkarabh ẹmugh odi todi.”)
Eedi idi suo, poniin nꞌaburumōr tạJizos iru. Eedi ịmara tetẹrẹ erōm dōm ịghi nepuruan ghạ zodi.
