Obꞌọlogh arōoy ịrologhu delede ekō mạJizos ẹlogh togbo. Eedi pobo ịgba ịnogho mạJizos ighōl kua, “Nonon ni, oniin onuma nꞌaburumōr onuma idi tetẹrẹ nepuruan ạna.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Okōr ōoy oniin ạmi? Ikōr arōoy aburumōr ạmi?”
Podi akiton aanon mobo bho ịrol delede ikō zodi ikiton obho aghōl kua, “Iinon, iibha poniin nꞌaburumōr ạmi.
Kōoy kōoy olo aḍighi mibha Ẹnaan nạva molo odi kaḍighi obho, odi pumōr nꞌụmarani nꞌoniin ạmi.”

Iibha iru itẹn pạJizos amina ạke mọtughumiom mi tọtu obꞌegha ọbhiiny obhꞌaGalili. Arōoy obho isōor ikō zodi ikiton obho ipu ni molo odi aḍigh toghuugh ạrol delede, amutiom moghuugh obho; arōoy obho ịrol tegbolom obho mi tọtu ạmuum obho.
Odi abhin tasidōgh ạtughumiom eedi mịkanya ọkpo, molo tịtughumiom obhꞌodi odi adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi aghōl kua,
“Ịmoghon. Onyiin amen keḍio onyiin ōoy ạghi moḅẹbh iḅẹbh.
Ẹzo bho odi aḅẹbh naadu mikpo bho mi toḍighi obho, ẹde imeleghu tebōom obho. Odi ạḍua kua be pịnun iru ikpologh ile.
Ẹde imeleghu tạnyu ọbharakpar ade olo ịbam ịimi be idi. Ikpo bho ịke mosi omute ebum obho eḅum ọomi obho ịbugh io obho,
amen aghōzōgh obho amute pạnuemi mibha ipologhu obho. Ebum obho ịika bho iḍigh io tade bho, peḍian obho ipologhu obho inyoroghon ịbhozu.
Ẹde ikpo bho imeleghu tade iiḅulom molo iiḅulom obho igimogh mibha nesi obho molo eedi ịloki ḍio mikpo.
Ẹde ikpo bho imeleghu tooḅi ade, ẹde ẹmaar epologhu esi ẹbugh ẹloki, molo ịloki maḍisibh ḍiōbh itu, ẹde erubal nꞌaḍisibh itu, ịnon ịloki mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh itu.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete akunughiom aghōl kua, “Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny raḅeri mọmoghon ạmoghon!”
Tamen olo odi ạJizos odi mesi be, pẹde obo bho ịmoghon mibha odi adōgh obho nꞌaḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho iru todi ịkpete ịnogho odi mọgba ẹmu asidōgh obho ọnogho eedi.
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Nọonogho enyina molōghōm ọkpo ẹḅokia Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan, keḍio ipedi obho iḍigh ạni ḍio bho todōgh sidōgh kọnogho eedi molo,
‘Eedi tẹtol ghạ moonon moonon keḍio ịmiin io,
ẹtol mọmoghon mọmoghon keḍio ịmoghonyan io.
Ilōghōm mobho, eru kạar olo eedi ịmiin ịmoghonyan,
peedi oghiraan oru tẸnaan odi kạḅelemaan eedi.’”
Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina ịmoghonyan io sidōgh obhobho? Penyina tetue ni ẹmoghonyan moomo asidōgh obho?
Oḅẹbh miḅẹbh obho aḅẹbh mọnuekpete tẸnaan.
Ẹtede amen ọnuekpete bho ameel tebōom. Arōoy bhibha ẹmoghon mọnuekpete bho keḍio obia ḍio nobia pEru obho aru ạḅirogh mọnuekpete bho mi tiloghi obhꞌeedi.
Ịnon arōoy idi kikpo bho imeel tạnyu ọbharakpar ade bho. Eedi ịmoghon mọnuekpete bho be peedi ibhinom nꞌọḅaal ologhi.
Keḍio ibha eedi ịmoghon obho iḍigh io egbeeny tiloghi obhꞌeedi molo eedi ịrol io ebia. Amen ịiḅaghami nꞌọmiinom iru mebum ọnuekpete bho peedi igorona.
Imina ịnon arōoy idi kikpo bho imeel togbo iiḅulom obho. Iibha pobo bho ịmoghon mọnuekpete
keḍio ịiḅaghami ọkpo aghuḍum obhobho, nꞌẹzo olo ogbo ẹela nꞌẹmel oomo oḍigh kẹrekere bho ikuōm igimogh mọnuekpete bho molo eedi ịloki ḍio mikpo.
Keḍio imina ịnon arōoy idi kikpo bho uḅẹbh tooḅi ade bho. Eedi ịmoghon mọnuekpete bho, ebhinom, ẹloki mitu, ẹde aḍisibh ḍiōbh itu, ẹde erubal nꞌaḍisibh itu, ẹde ịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh itu.”
Keḍio ạJizos amina ạkpete kua ạḅaram, “Kir ōoy olo tạsu mọtodi ạlogh tạgbugba akpereghi bolobolo ạlogh tẹeḍian ẹmuna aseeri gạ? Odi ọḅam io ni tạnyu ạbebe kaseeri gạ?
Kạar kạar olo ụḅoki, nꞌaḍuma nꞌaḍuma tomutiom togbo etẹrẹ. Ibha ukpereghi obho tokpẹerōn ni omutiom tẹḅaal.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny raḅeri mọmoghon ạmoghon!”

Odi amina nạ ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịtuom mạar mibha enyina nẹmoghon obho. Inyiin araalōgh obho enyina ibhin nẹtu mịiruan ẹnogho mịnon obho pibha Ẹnaan tapin ạtu mịiruan ạnogho enyina, keḍio ibha todi tẹenyuom ni epu.
Obo bho ạteeny obho, tibha odi ạteeny obho digha tọlogh ni ọḅaram, keḍio obo bho ọteeny io obho, ịbam obho odi ạteeny obho tọḅoor ni zodi.”
Keḍio ạJizos amina adōgh sidōgh obhobho aghōl kua, “Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan odi kōoy olo aadu mikpo oorẹeny iḅẹbh mi toḍighi.
Aghul ạḅaal odi aḅetunu keḍio ibha odi aḅẹbh obho nesiiy ẹbughogh, keḍio odi olōghōm io mẹzo imute ku nesiiy.
Ade bho aḍighi kiḅẹbh obho nesi ẹloki mitu. Ọmiibh obho tapira amute, keḍio ạkar odi oorẹeny obho tamute. Itu obho odi tạloki obho tekunughiom.
Itu obho nẹeḅaar keḍio nạateeny mobho odi ōoy obho taḍighiom moḍighi melōor odi, ebum obho nạateeny mamen iiḅua bho.”
Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua, “Ezira topin ọtuom ẹkaraan mAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan? Ezira topin okōr oḍigh asidōgh ọgbaam mẹzo odi?
Odi kekpo amiim ẹker. Odi akio apu moomo iirẹeny ẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio ōoy ạseghe aḅẹbh tade bho.
Ọbam amen aru atẹn pasi ạbugh aru apuoghom moomo iirẹeny obho, ạteeny mọlogh ịgha olo ịnun ạnyu obho iru iḅōghi rutu.”
ẠJizos abhin oḍigh asidōgh ilo idi kua ạgba dōm odi ạnogho rōoy obho. Odi adōgh sidōgh ilo eedi tetue ni ẹmoghonyan.
Odi ọḅele ḍio nọḅele mobhin asidōgh odōgh ọnogho eedi, keḍio amen olo odi be odi mesi nꞌobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho podi ọgba ẹmu asidōgh obho omutiom ọnogho eedi.
Udule odi aḍuma popo, pạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho, “Itu ọḅeeny ọghi tẹḅeenyom obꞌegha bho.”
Peedi ịḅele mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho, iteledōm obho iḍigh toghuugh obho ạJizos odi obho imutiom. Ịnon arughuugh idi nạ todi esi obho.
Eedi imutiom pobꞌogim asōor abhōbhẹ mopōkō ạmuum obho molo ạmuum neḍigh toghuugh obho momuzō.

ẠJizos odi tọpaḍi eti oghuugh obho nạamanaghan aḅeleriom mẹmu odi masiḅisạkị nakoḍi. Piteledōm obho ịsumeen odi ịkpete kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạna ọtuom io mạar maghuḍum ezira mobho ezira notu mọbhozu obho?”
PạJizos aḅetunu aze mogim obho, ạkpete kua ạnogho mụum obho, “Deny.” Pogim obho nꞌạmuum obho iru ideny magey.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi, “Eeghe kenyina nekiil ruugu? Enyina bọbon ịbam ologhi omōruōm ilo?”
Keḍio aruugu ilegheri ịrol isibh eedi, onyiin ạkpete kua ạnogho monyiin, “Odi oobho bho kokōr oḍigh ōoy olo ogim nꞌopōkō ạmuum obho nẹmoghonyan ekiilaan moghōrōkō odi.”
Eedi ibhun tẹḅeenyom obꞌegha bhꞌaGalili, peedi isi tebhugh obhꞌaGerasin.
ẠJizos abhun kua be mi toghuugh obho ponyiin ōoy ạḍua tarōopōgh aruugu obho aru ạmiinan mạJizos.
Odi ōoy obhobho ạteeny mọkarabh ẹmugh tẹmu odi aḍighi odi arugh ghạ taruugu obho. Bọbon ōoy olo arue momina ọseghe agbirigbiri ọkpuom odi olo.
Ọlogh amen mobho ụseghe magbirigbiri ụkpuom rạvo nꞌasike odi keḍio odi taagbo ni magbirigbiri obho aḅuni rukurōgh obho asike odi. Ịnyaam odi neepu molo ōoy kạmarami odi.
Uḍugul nꞌootaany odi nạla ghạ akiton taruugu obho nꞌaruugum obho amulughu ạḅirogh mịpaḍi ạrubharakpar obho ạmeghia lōor odi.
Odi odi ni kegbeeny men odi ạmiin mạJizos, podi aghiil ạghi agbuluman taghisigh tạJizos
amulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō ạkpete kua, “ẠJizos Ọony tẸnaan obho ạbugh bọ apu obho, ạna nạva moḍighi ẹko zạmi? Ạami naasen ni zịna mi taḍien tẸnaan, ụliom ghạ zạmi.”
(Odi ạkpete miibha bho tebum obho ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạna ọkarabh ẹmugh obho mute talōor ōoy obhobho.”)
PạJizos apuruan kua zodi, “Aḍien onuma kughōl ẹko?” Podi ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Aḍien ạmi ughōl ‘Ọlogh,’ ebum obho ezōor uru mịkanya bho.”
Keḍio odi naasen ghạ ni be mạJizos molo odi opirighan mịkarabh ạruumugh obho ẹḍua tebhugh opopo.
Todi esi obho kir ọlogh arabhōrōpō ilo ituan nẹḅal mịḅal mi tọtu eegum obho.
Peedi ịkarabh ạruumugh obho iisen mạJizos ighōl kua, “Tōm ezōor ọghi oḍigh tarabhōrōpō bho.”

PạJizos ạḅelemaan eedi, eedi ịḍua tẹmu ōoy obho ịghi iḍiku tarabhōrōpō bho. Poomo eedi arabhōrōpō bho iikilaay tọtu eegum obho ịghi imeleghu tobꞌegha bho ịguḅaay. Arabhōrōpō ilo tegbẹbh ni mōogh ọonir.
Arōoy obho neteliom marabhōrōpō bho ịmiin miibha bho, peedi ighiil ịghi tẹma bho nꞌoomo obo bho idiighu taruuḍum obho ịgba ilelemi mibha imute bho. Parōoy obho iruughu mọmiin ạni ibha imute bho.
Eedi iru peedi ịmiin mạJizos nꞌodi ōoy obho ọlogh ịkarabh ạruumugh ịiḅaghami ghạ bho odi nꞌodi ạJizos, nạarol delede amina mukpe, nạmoghonyan nạ rōoy, molo aruugu isibh moomo eedi.
Keḍio obo bho ịmiin ạni obho ịgba ịnogho rōoy obho mibha imutenaan mōoy obho ịkarabh ạruumugh obho nꞌarabhōrōpō bho.
Peedi iisen mạJizos mọḅele ebhugh eedi ọḍua.
Ẹzo bho ạJizos naḍigh toghuugh obho, pōoy obho ịkarabh ạruumugh obho ịrol ịiḅaghami obho aasen odi aghōl kua, “Sesen ni, ạami ụtuonom ạni zịna.”
Keḍio ạJizos omōrō ḍio. Kpẹlen nꞌipa odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Mula maghẹel totu enyina mạgba miiḅi ọkpo bho Ẹnaan naaḍighi ạnogho ạna nꞌẹzo odi ạsuanaan ạna ghụsan aḍien.”
Podi aghẹel ạgba moomo ibha ạJizos aḍighi ạnogho odi obho alelemi toomo aḍiōbh ạraama bho, molo kōoy kōoy olo ạmoghon naamōogh ghạ ni be.
Amen ạJizos amula ạḅeeny mobꞌegha bho, pobꞌọlogh arōoy iru ikō zodi ikiton mi tọtu ạmuum obho.
Tesuo poniin ōoy olo ughōl aJairos, odi uvẹmụ onyiin otu iikpulughu obho, aru ạni. Amen odi ạmiin mạJizos podi aru agbuluman tasike odi
abhin nꞌoomo ologhi odi aasen mạJizos aghōl kua, “Ọbam ọnyani ạmi nạnwe magey. Sesen ni, tue mạḅamaghi rạvo onuma tẹmu odi maakō zodi molo odi aḍum.”
PạJizos ạtuonom odi. Obꞌọlogh arōoy obho nẹtuonom odi obho neepu molo nẹeninighian tekẹeny nꞌoḍiom odi.
Tọlogh arōoy bhibha kir onyiin ạni olo nạnwe ạmiinom magey mẹzegh ạraani moomo aḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạsia.
Toomo ibha odi nạaghi toḍigh kẹrekere arizil, arōḅōḍi mịkanya ikpoki obho, kpẹlen nꞌolo odi kaḍum nelōghōm moḅẹebh ghạ be.
Odi nạamoghon milo igboloman nꞌạJizos, podi ạniiran togbo arōoy obho ạghi tạman tạJizos.
Odi nạatua tologhi odi akōl kua, “Eru kạar olo ạami urue ukulaan ukpe bhꞌodi pạami oḍum.”
Odi ạni obho akulaan mọdu ukpe bhꞌodi be, tonyiin odi amen obho, pạni obho aru aḍum, odi alōghōma talōor odi mobho ịiḅaghami odi ilo mu.
Tonyiin odi amen obho nạ pạJizos alōghōma nạ talōor odi mobho ịnyaam odi nẹeḍua talōor odi. Podi aghiraan tobꞌọlogh arōoy obho apuruan kua, “Okōr ōoy akulaan mukpe ạmi?”
Pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịbhagharana kua, “Ạna nạmiin mẹzo arōoy obho nẹninighian ạna bho. Eeghe kạna napuruan mobo akulaan ạna?”
Oomo ipa ẹkona ạJizos naanon ni mọmiin obo bho akulaan odi obho.
Odi ạni obho naalōghōma mibha neemutenaan odi obho, podi aru, napiigha nꞌibꞌaruugu, agbuluman tasike odi, ạgba ạnogho zodi moomo agey obho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ọnyani ạmi, ologhi omōruōm onuma naakō ạna, kẹel nꞌekima, ẹzegh obho ẹkona ọoḅaghami mu ạna.”
Tamen obho ạJizos odi nạḍeghe mipa bho, pạnwuny adōm ịḍua totu taJairos iru ịgba kua ịnogho zodi, “Ọnyani onuma nạabho. Ụga ghạ mamina mạaḅaghami mōoy obo ịtughumiom obho.”
ẠJizos obhin io ạtuom mạar mibha eedi nẹkpete bho keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi aJairos, “Ụutu ghạ, mōruōm be.”
Tamen obho odi omina ḍio ạva molo ọnon ōoy kạtuonom odi tughuneen maPita nꞌaJems nꞌạJon umōr odi aJems ḍio.
Eedi isi totu odi onyiin ọola otu iikpulughu obho, pạJizos ạmiin mẹmoghonyan, ạmoghon moomo ibꞌeḍi nꞌipumughu ibhꞌeedi.
Podi aḍigh ạghi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Eeghe kẹmoghonyan obho emute? Eeghe kenyina neleghe? Ọnyani obhobho dọbho ḍio, odi nakoḍi ni be.”
Peedi ịrol ịiḅaghami zodi, molo odi abhirighanogh eedi amutiom tetẹrẹ, abhin mọde nꞌoniin obho nꞌịraar iteledōm obho, eedi iḍigh tẹkpe bho ụmuneen odi ọnyani obho.

Odi ạbham ạvo ọnyani obho podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Talita kumi.” Ẹmu obho ụkpete kua, “Ọbam ọnyani, ạami ụkpete kua nạnogho ạna, ḅetunu.” Tonyiin odi amen obho, pọnyani obho aḅetunu natele. Odi ọnyani obho naagbẹbh maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạsia. Amen iibha bho iru imute poomo eedi iimōogh magey.
Keḍio ạJizos aḍuur raḅeri eedi meedi ịgba ḍio ẹnogho bọbon nꞌonyiin ōoy, keḍio ạkpete ạnogho eedi aghōl kua, “Ịnogho mọnyani obho meḍian odi ale.”
ẠJizos ạḍua tesi obhobho podi ạghi tẹma bho uukō bọ zodi obho, iteledōm todi ẹkona ịghi ạni nạ.

Taḍuma obhooghia bho podi ạghi nạtughumiom mi totu ịtughumiom obho. Ọlogh arōoy mobho ịrol. Amen eedi ịmoghon mịtughumiom obhꞌodi poomo eedi ịrol iimōogh ipuruan ghạ kua, “Odi abhin moomo iibha bho teḍighen? Iibha poḍigh olōghōm ạar ilo odi nạateeny?
Odi ọkasi mịkasi obho ḍio gạ, ọony obho taMeri, umōr taJems nꞌaJosis nꞌaJudas nꞌạSaimon? Ạburumurani odi ḍio mibha netughogh suo bho?” Peedi igin, iinon odi ịpue.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ozil aḍigh eghuan kesi kesi tughuneen tẹma odi nꞌotu odi ḍio.”
Odi omina ḍio arue moḍighi ọkpo ibꞌaruugu mi tesuo tughuneen ịbam arōoy ilo nẹnwe ilo odi ạḅamaghi rạvo odi aakō be.
Odi aamōogh magey tebum obho eedi ịteeny io mologhi omōruōm obho.
Ipa iru itẹn pạJizos ạghi tạraama bho ituan obho ạrol ạtughumiom rōoy obho.
Odi abheleghi maḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho arōm amutiom zạzal zạzal. Odi ạnogho eedi mịikpo mopuom ạvo mịkarabh ạruumugh
keḍio ạnogho eedi liiki obhobho, “Terele bhꞌenyina, ịbham ghạ nꞌạar nꞌạar tughuneen mẹḅu be ḍio, ịbham ghạ meḍian nꞌẹḅa iigbẹel miigbẹel, okpoki ọtol nạ ḍio nꞌenyina.
Ịlokia rakōrō keḍio ịbham ghạ mịzal ạrusuoma.”
Odi amina nạ ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Kesi kesi olo ubhin enyina ụloghom ịtol totu opopo ninii enyina ẹḍua tẹma popo.
Eru kạar olo enyina ịghi tesi olo arōoy obho ipin io enyina ẹloghom bolobolo imōrō ḍio mọmoghonyan enyina, pịḍua megun mobhugh ibhꞌasike enyina. Ipa bho tẹnogho eedi liiki.”
Peedi ịghi ịgba ghạ kua marōoy eghiraan tịkarabh eedi.
Eedi ebhirighanogh mọlogh ịkarabh ạruumugh esighogh rụmunu mi tọlogh arōoy ilo nẹnweey eekōoy eedi.

Tamen obho pạHerod ọolema bho ạmoghon milo igboloman nꞌoomo iibha bho, ebum obho ọdu tạJizos naalela kesi kesi obho. Ẹde ịrol ịkpete kua, “ẠJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho naaḅetunu tọbho bho. Ipa kiḍighi kodi ạteeny mịnyaam aḍighiiy iibha bho.”
Ịnon ighōl ghạ kua, “Odi Ilaija.” Imina ịnon ighōl ghạ kua, “Odi ozil olo odi konyiin ozil ageedi obho.”
Amen ạHerod ạmoghon podi ạkpete kua, “Odi ạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho, obho ạami usōbh ẹmu obho ughigh obho, nạakar aḅetunu tọbho bho.”
Odi ạHerod nịvo nịvo arōm rōoy ẹghi eḅol mạJon ẹbhaḍi zodi ẹloghom ikoli, mebum ạHerodias ạni tumōr odi aFilip obho odi ạHerod ạakpa bho.
PạJon ạrol ạkpete ghạ kua ạnogho zodi ạHerod, “Ạna mọokpa ạni tumōr onuma ịneghe ḍio.”
Tebum iibha bho pạHerodias ạlogh ḍien mạJon ạva ghạ mebōom olo oghigh odi keḍio odi orue ḍio mebum ạHerod.

ẠHerod aghiil ghạ ruugu mạJon ebum obho odi naalōghōm mobho ạJon aru mooḅi ōoy nꞌōoy tẸnaan obho. Tebum ipa bẹleni odi ọva ḍio molo koghigh odi. Eḍigh tologhi odi magey mọmoghon ibha ạJon nạgba ghạ bho toomo ibha kamen kamen olo odi ạmoghon nẹgam ghạ ni tologhi odi obho.

Ikunughi obho ạHerodias ạteeny nạ mibha odi nạva bọ bho. Imute taḍuma olo ạHerod nale mẹzaal mọotua aḍuma bho ụmar odi obho. Odi aḍuma popo odi ạsa meḍian abheleghi migbōgh arōoy ibha idi tẹeḍian odi obho nꞌaruvẹmụ iḅe rạagham obho nꞌigbōgh arōoy aGalili.

Ọnyani tạHerodias aru ạgher mịḅa ilo iḍigh magey tologhi tạHerod nꞌobo bho odi abheleghi bọ bho, molo ạHerod ạkpete kua ạnogho mọnyani obho, “Ẹkaraan mobho aḍigh tologhi onuma? Kạar kạar olo ạna ugbẹel pạami ọnogho onuma.”
Odi aghir nạ mọlogh ịzo ạkpete kua ạnogho mọnyani obho, “Ạami naaguanaan ạna, kạar kạar olo ạna ugbẹel zạmi pạami ọnogho onuma, eru kạar olo iru nạ mạmaḍian ade ọolema bhꞌạmi.”
Pọnyani obho amute ạghi apuruan moniin odi aghōl kua, “Ạami ugbẹel mẹkaraan?” Poniin odi ạbhagharana kua, “Gbẹel mẹmu tạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho.”
Pọnyani obho arubh meghiil ạghi tọolema bho agbẹel odi aghōl kua, “Ạami nagbẹel molo ạna kạnogho ạami siibha siibha mẹmu tạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho mi tologhi ẹkpepere.”
Iibha bho iḍighi molo ịitu isōorōm mọolema bho, keḍio ẹzo olo odi kagin olo, ebum obho odi naaguanaan odi moguan mi taghisigh oomo obo bho odi abheleghi obho.
Podi, tonyiin odi amen opopo, arōm mōoy iḅōrō mọghi obhin ẹmu tạJon obhin oru. Pōoy iḅōrō bho ạḍua ạghi totu ikoli obho asōbh orum tạJon abhin aru,
keḍio odi ạlogh tẹkpepere ạnogho mọnyani obho abhin ạghiom moniin odi.
Amen iteledōm odi ạJon ịmoghon peedi iru ịseghe moḍim obho tạJon ịghi iḍi.
Iteledōm obho imula irughẹel, peedi ịghi tạJizos ịgba kạar kạar ilo eedi iḍighi nꞌilo eedi ịtughumiom ịnogho odi.

Ọlogh arōoy mobho neḍigh emute molo ạJizos nꞌiteledōm odi bọbon amen olo ịteeny mole eḍian olo. PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Itu ezira be ọghi tesi olo adeny molo ịiḅaghami ilo molo enyina epooghia mịbam.”
Peedi be iḍigh oghuugh ịḍua ịghi tesi olo adeny.
Oomo ipa ẹkona ọlogh arōoy ẹmiin eedi ẹlogh elẹgh men obho eedi nẹḍua bho molo eedi ịḍua toomo ạraama bho iigo tavel ibhira ịghi isi mạJizos nꞌiteledōm odi mi tesi obho.
Amen ạJizos abhun toghuugh obho podi ạmiin mobꞌọlogh arōoy bhibha molo ạghusan eedi isibh odi magey ebum obho eedi nẹerol kạraana ilo obo ookō olo bho. Podi ạke mọtughumiom eedi mọlogh ọkpo.
Tamen olo natuan mudule piteledōm obhꞌodi iru todi ịkpete kua, “Aḍio nakul, keḍio esi obhobho esi olo ịnon arōoy ilo.
Kpẹte mạnogho rōoy obho eedi ẹghi tariḍighi obho nꞌạraama bho ituan obho ẹva mọkpo ilo eedi tele eghō.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua. “Enyina ịnogho zeedi mạar olo eedi tele.” Peedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Ạna nạva molo ezōor kọghi koghō mạbred ọonir anaira koru kookuōm eedi bẹle?”
PạJizos apuruan kua zeedi, “Ịni eḅol ạbred mibha enyina ịteeny? Ịki meenon.” Amen eedi ịghi ịva ịmiin peedi iru ịgba kua ịnogho zodi, “Oōgh eḅol nꞌịzal ina mibha idi.”
PạJizos ạkpete ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi moḍighi arōoy obho kẹḍianogh rụuku kẹrologhu delede mi tịigho bho.
Parōoy obho ịgoor ịrologhu delede mi tạruuku ịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh esi, erubal ḍiōbh esi.
Keḍio odi ạJizos ạseghe mōogh eḅol ạbred obho nꞌịzal ina bho ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, aḅigi ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi mọḍi arōoy obho.
Kōoy kōoy ale ni ọbaraka ạmaar amute.
Keḍio iteledōm obho iru iikōbhōghi mạbred nꞌina ibha isughō bho milo imuzō maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạrukpaagh.
Ọnu arōoy obo bho ile bho aḍiōbh nꞌịzal nꞌạmaḍian ọonir arōoy.
Obia ḍio pạJizos ạkpete ạnogho miteledōm odi moḍigh toghuugh oḍia ghạ taghisigh ọghi taBetsaida mi tẹḅeenyom obꞌegha bho, odi naḍighi molo arōoy obho kegheleghu.
Odi ạmiin eedi iteledōm obho akunughiom podi ạghi ạsiin tạnyu eegum mookpulughu.
Aḍio nakul, oghuugh obho odi togbo obꞌegha bho, asughōnōm mạJizos be mi tegbolom obho.

Odi nạamiin mobho iteledōm obhꞌodi idi tọmiinom ọzoghi ebum obho ọpibha bho nạpibhom eedi obho, molo tamen olo aḍio bho naasi teesoḍia ịraar nꞌodiin asuo obꞌẹtughuḅaal, podi arele tạmuum obho ạghi teedi, aḍighi kilo odi natu motẹn eedi.
Peedi ịmiin odi natele tạnyu ạmuum obho peedi ịitua ighōl kua, “Oḍim.”
Amen oomo eedi ịmiin odi paruugu isibh eedi, keḍio ạJizos akẹm ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịpam mologhi enyina, ighiil ghạ ruugu, ạami.”
Podi aru aḍigh toghuugh obho, ọpibha bho ẹkona adeny nạ. Iteledōm obho iimōogh magey,
ebum obho eedi derue ḍio mọmoghonyan ẹmu araḅol ạbred obho, deḍiku ḍio tekpom obhꞌeedi.
Eedi ịḅeeny mobꞌegha bho peedi ibhun tebhugh obhꞌạGenesaret keḍio eedi iru ịkpo moghuugh obho.
Eedi ibhun parōoy obho ịlogh mạJizos melẹgh monyiin amen obho.
Peedi ighilighu ịghi toomo ebhugh obho ibhinogh mobo bho idiighu tạrumuna ạrazegh obho iruom odi kesi kesi olo eedi ịmoghon mobho odi odi,

molo kesi kesi olo ạJizos ạghi, tịbam ạraama bho nꞌigbōgh ạraama bho nꞌaruuḍum ariḍighi, arōoy obho ibhinogh mobo bho nẹnweey obho ibhin ịghi taḍighi obho iisen odi moru molo obo bho nẹnweey obho keḍigha kekulaan bọbon ọdu ukpe bhꞌodi. Oomo obo bho ikulaan obho iḍumogh ni ẹman.
Arōoy aFarisi nꞌẹde arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho, ibha ịḍua taJerusạlẹm iru obho iru iikōbhōghian ikō mạJizos ikiton.
Eedi idi suo bho peedi ịmiin mẹzo ẹde iteledōm obhꞌodi ibhin rạvo ilo ịḅaal io neliom eḍian. Eedi ịmaar io mootōla kẹzo bho arōoy aFarisi obho negbẹel ghạ molo arōoy keetōla bho.

Eedi arōoy aFarisi obho nꞌarōoy aJu ipedi obho, nẹtuonuman ghạ mịtughumion obho igbaany ạburude bho ịtughumiom eedi obho. Eedi ịmaar io eetōla mạravo eedi kẹzo bho ụtughumiom eedi obho eedi ile ḍio meḍian.

Ạar olo ughō taḍighi ubhin uru, uutōl io, eedi ile nạ ḍio. Ọlogh ịnon ịtughumiom ilo idi kua mobho eedi nẹtuonuman ghạ, nꞌẹzo ọmaar ootōlōgh ọkpo ọbhogholom ạmuum, nꞌasuugh, nꞌọkpo oliom eḍian, nꞌạrumuna.

Peedi arōoy aFarisi obho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho ipuruan mạJizos, “Ebum eeghe kiteledōm onuma ịtuonuman ạni ḍio mịtughumiom obho igbaany ạburude ezira ịtughumiom ezira bho, ekiton ebhin rạvo ilo ịḅaal io neliom eḍian?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Iizuan ni mẹzo bho Ạizaya ozil obho ạgba milo igboloman nꞌenyina bho. Enyina arōoy ilo neemia ghạ ẹtol kiiḅi arōoy kẹzo bho odi ạge aghōl,
‘Ẹnaan ạkpete kua: arōoy bhibha ibhin ọnuekpete be nẹnogho ạami meghuan,
iloghi obhꞌeedi ituan io notuan zạmi.
Iikpulughu eedi mi tạmi ạar oḍighiom olo,
ebum obho eedi nẹtughumiom raalōgh ilo arōoy ịloki kilo Ẹnaan ạloki obho.’ ”
“Enyina ibhin araalōgh obho tẸnaan eseeri tọtu nekiilaan mịtughumiom arōoy.”
Keḍio odi ạJizos amina ạkpete kua, “Enyina nẹemaar elōghōm maraabōom ẹzo ogin araalōgh tẸnaan molo enyina eekō mịtughumiom obhꞌenyina.
AMozis ạlogh aghōl kua, ‘Ikiilaan mọde nꞌoniin enyina. Kōoy kōoy olo ạkpete mịkarabh mọde nꞌoniin odi pikigh.’
Keḍio enyina ikiton ịtughumiom nekōl kua, meru kạar olo ōoy ạteeny mạar ọloghom ạvo ọnogho ọde bolobolo oniin odi, kodi ạkpete aghōl kua, ‘Iibha bho ilo tẸnaan,’
podi naamuzōnaan mọlogh ạvo ọnogho ọde bolobolo oniin odi.
Tiibha bho penyina ibhin ịtughumiom obho enyina ibhin tạvo netẹnẹ tạvo neenon ekiemi mọnuekpete bho tẸnaan. Iibha nꞌịnon ilo idi kua mobho enyina neḍighiiy ghạ.”
Keḍio ạJizos abheleghi mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Oomo enyina ịmaar mẹmoghon mẹmoghonyan ạami.
Bọbon ạar olo ạḍua tozu alōor aḍigh tologhi olo taḍighi zodi ạḅele mọḅaal olo. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ibha ịḍua kụ tologhi odi ku nemute bho pibha teḍighi zodi odi ạḅele mọḅaal.
[Oōy olo ạteeny raḅeri mọmoghon ạmaar ạmoghon!]”
Amen odi ạḅele mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho ạḍua ạghi totu, piteledōm odi iru ipuruan odi milo igboloman nꞌasidōgh obho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Olōghōm ạar enyina ipu ḍio mibhꞌipedi obho. Senyina ịmoghonyan io? Bọbon ạar olo tạḍua tozu ạnyu alōor ōoy aḍigh tologhi obho olo taḍighi odi ạḅele mọḅaal olo,

ebum obho ibha ịḍua tọnu iḍigh obho nẹki ghạ eḍigh tobꞌọla bho, iḍigh io tekpom obhꞌodi, keḍio tẹḍua tobꞌọla bho odi ạni atōbh.” (Tọnuekpete bhobho tạJizos podi namutiom mobho eḍian ilo iḅẹebh molo ōoy ole ḍio ilo.)
Keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua, “Ibha ịḍua tekpom ōoy nemute bho pibha neḍighi odi ạḅele mọḅaal.
Ịḍua tekpom ōoy emute kōoy nale ghạ mẹma, amiigh viigh,
ạko menu, ạki mạni ọnon ōoy, ạḍogh mẹḍogh okpoki, nꞌoḍighi oḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh ọkpo, ọgba iben, ọbasi ọkpo, obōbhan ibōbhan, ọgba ōoy ọpue, ọbughia alōor, nꞌoḍigh evel.
Oomo ịkpo bhibha ịḍua tekpom ōoy nemute eḍighi odi mọḅele ọḅaal.”

Ipa iru itẹn pạJizos ạḍua ạghi tebhugh obho atuan bọ mẹma bho aTaya bho. Podi ạghi aḍigh tonyiin otu. Odi ọva ḍio molo nꞌōoy nꞌōoy kalōghōm mobho odi odi suo, keḍio odi orue ḍio mọḅokia molo arōoy ịmiin io odi.
Onyiin ạni olo ọnyani odi ọkarabh ẹmugh nạaḅaghami, ạmoghon milo igboloman nꞌodi ạJizos, podi aru todi agbuluman tasike odi.
Odi ạni obho isoloman. Ụmar odi mi tẹma olo ughōl Fonisia mi tebhugh obhꞌaSiria. Podi ạni obho aasen mạJizos mobhirighan ọkarabh ẹmugh obho mi tẹmu ọnyani obhꞌodi.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ḅele ạnwuny obho ele ạrubaraka eedi emute ku. Iizuan io mọseghe eḍian ịbam ạnwuny obho ozu ọnogho asighōghō.”
Pạni obho ạbhagharana kua, “Ọde-otu, ạami naalōghōm keḍio asighōghō bho idi tẹeḍian izebele bho ẹkona nele ghạ ni mịpaḍi eḍian obho isughō bho.”
Tipa bho pạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Tebum ọbhagharana bhobho tonuma, kẹel, ọkarabh ẹmugh obho nạaḍua talōor ọnyani obhꞌonuma.”
Ạni obho aghẹel, ọnyani odi odi tẹmuna, ọkarabh ẹmugh obho nạaḅele nạ mọnyani obho mạvo.
Keḍio ạJizos ạḍua tebhugh obhꞌaTaya. Odi ạḅol tebhugh obhꞌaSaidon ạghi tobꞌegha bhꞌaGalili atẹn tebhugh obhꞌaḍiōbh ạraama bho.
Pẹde arōoy ibhin mōoy olo ọmoghon ghạ ḍio mạar, nẹkparanaan nạ magey mọkpete ạar iruom odi ạJizos iisen odi mọḅam ạvo odi mi tẹmu ōoy obho.
PạJizos abhin mōoy obho be eedi ịḍua tobꞌọlogh arōoy obho keḍio odi ạseghe mạghunu ạvo odi ạlogh taḅeri ōoy obho, ạsir ịghor, akulenom manem ōoy obho.
PạJizos aanon tạnyu obho, ạfibhaan, keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho, “Ẹfata.” Ẹmu obho ụkpete kua, “Kpạrion.”
Tonyiin odi amen obho, paraḅeri odi ōoy obho iḅurunu, anem obhꞌodi aru ạneghe odi ạke nạ mọkpete ạar molo ịiḅaghami ilo.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho moomꞌeedi meedi ịgba ḍio miibha bho ẹnogho nꞌōoy nꞌōoy, keḍio ịkpo be, ibha odi ạkpete bho keḍio ụpue ni be.
Oomo obo bho ịmoghon obho iimōogh ni be ẹrol ẹkpete kua, “Kạar kạar olo odi aḍighi iiḅi iiḅi. Odi naḍighi nạ obo bho ịmoghon io bho nẹmoghon, arukpom-ụka nẹkpete nạ mạar.”
Ibia ḍio pọnon obꞌeghu arōoy imina iru iikōbhōghian. Tamen olo eedi ạar ole ilo mu pạJizos abheleghi miteledōm obhꞌodi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi,
“Ạghusan arōoy bhibha nesibh ạami mobho eedi nẹerolan ạami moomo ịraar aḍuma tesuo, keḍio esiibha eedi ạar ole ilo mu.
Ạami ụnogho ḍio eedi meḍian eedi ele, kạami ạkpete ạnogho eedi mogheleghu ẹde eedi tẹkorom ni tebōom obho men eedi nekẹel, ebum obho ẹde eedi ịḍua tegbeeny esi kiru obho.”
Piteledōm obhꞌodi ipuruan kua zodi, “Tologhi obꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho kōoy tạmiin teḍighen mạbred ilo tegbẹbhan moomo arōoy bhibha?”
PạJizos apuruan kua zeedi, “Ịni eḅol ạbred mibha enyina ịteeny?” Peedi ịbhagharana ighōl kua, “Oḍual eḅol.”

Podi ạto ạnogho rōoy obho mọrologhu adelede tade bho, keḍio odi aru abhin moḍual eḅol ạbred obho, ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, aru aḅigi mạbred obho ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi mọḍi ọnogho arōoy obho. Keḍio iteledōm obho iru ịtuugh iḍighi mẹzo bho.
Eedi ẹteeny nạ mịbam ina. Podi ạJizos abhin nạ mipa ạnogho lịsebh, ạkpete ạnogho miteledōm obho mọḅaram ọḍiom.
Kōoy kōoy ạmaar ni ale ọbaraka amute. Obo bho ile bho tegbẹbh ni maḍiōbh ọonir arōoy.
Keḍio iteledōm obho imina nạ iikōbhōghi mịpaḍi ạbred ilo imuzō moḍual ạrukpaagh. Eedi ile ịḅele pạJizos ạkpete ạnogho rōoy obho mogheleghu.
Tonyiin odi amen obho podi aḍigh toghuugh, odi nꞌiteledōm odi ịghi tebhugh obhꞌaDalmanuta.
Ẹde arōoy aFarisi obho ibhin ịkanan eru tạJizos mọghanan odi. Eedi nẹva ghạ mebōom obhin ọbhamam odi, peedi igbẹel odi moḍighi ọkpo ịiḍaany mọgba omutiom mobho Ẹnaan ạkar arōm odi.
PạJizos alegheri ạfibhaan keḍio ạkpete kua, “Eeghe kạnwuny ọoke bhobho negbẹel ghạ mọmiin ọkpo ịiḍaany? Ịkpo, ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, ọkpo ịiḍaany ilo toḍighi moḍeeriom ạnwuny ọoke bhobho ilo.”
Podi ạḅele eedi ạḍua, amula ạghi aḍigh toghuugh obho ạghi ạḅeeny tẹḅeenyom obꞌegha bho.
Eedi imutiom mobho eede bho, iteledōm obho neeḅulo mọbham ạbred keḍio onyiin eḅol be mobho eedi ịteeny toghuugh obho.
Tamen olo ạJizos aakiom ạkpete ạnogho eedi aghōl kua, “Igona lōor enyina mi taghuḍum arōoy aFarisi obho nꞌạHerod ibha idi kạar obho neebhuughumeni ghạ mạbred obho, obho ughōl bọ ayist obho.”
Peedi ịke mọrol ọḍeghian nꞌalōor eedi oghōl ekua, “Odi nạkpete miibha bho ebum obho ezira ụpam io mạbred obho.”

ẠJizos naalōghōm mibha eedi nẹḍeghe bho, podi apuruan kua zeedi, “Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹḍeghe mobho enyina ịpam io mạbred obho? Kesiibha bho ẹkona enyina derue ḍio molōghōm bolobolo ọmoghonyan? Pẹzo iloghi obhꞌenyina ilegheri idugh?
Ariḍien obho enyina ịteeny obho enyina ịmiinom ghạ ḍio mạar? Araḅeri obhꞌenyina enyina ịmoghonom ghạ ḍio mạar? Enyina irue ḍio mọotua
amen obho ạami uḅigi mōogh eḅol ạbred uukuōm aḍiōbh nꞌạmaḍian ọonir arōoy obho, ịni ạrukpaagh ịpaḍi ạbred mobho enyina iikōbhōghi?” Peedi ịbhagharana ighōl kua, “Aḍiōbh nꞌịzal.”
Keḍio odi amina apuruan kua, “Ẹko mibha amen obho ạami ubhin oḍual eḅol uukuōm maḍiōbh ọonir arōoy obho, ịni ạrukpaagh ịpaḍi ạbred mobho enyina ịteeny?” Peedi ịbhagharana ighōl kua, “Oḍual.”
Podi apuruan kua zeedi, “Oomo ipa bho keḍio enyina irue ḍio nạ mọmoghonyan?”
Eedi isi taBetsaida, pẹde arōoy ibhin mōoy ikpom ariḍien iruom mạJizos iisen odi mokulaan odi.

PạJizos ạḅam mōoy ikpom ariḍien obho mi tạvo areliom odi amutonom tẹma bho. Odi ạsirom ịghor mi tariḍien ōoy obho, podi ạseghe rạvo odi apuom riḍien ōoy obho keḍio apuruan kua zodi, “Ạna nạmiin mạar?”
Oōy obho aanon tạnyu pamōrō keḍio aghōl kua, “Ạami nạmiin rōoy keḍio eedi idi kiirẹeny ilo netele.”
Keḍio ạJizos amina apuom rạvo odi mi tariḍien ōoy obho. Obheede bho podi ōoy obho ạmaar aanon, ariḍien obhꞌodi nẹekparanu, odi ạmaar nạmiin kạar kạar.
Keḍio ạJizos aakiom odi ạkpete kua ạnogho odi, “Mula maghẹel keḍio ụghi ghạ tẹma bho.”
Ipa iru itẹn, pạJizos nꞌiteledōm odi ịḍua ịghi tạraama bho ughōl bọ Sizaria Filipai obho. Tebōom obho odi apuruan kua zeedi, “Ịgba mẹnogho ạami, arōoy ku nekōl ghạ ạami kokōr ōoy?”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ẹde nekōl ghạ kua mạna ạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho, ịnon mạna Ilaija, keḍio ẹtede mạna onyiin ozil obho.”
Keḍio ạJizos amina apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina ạni kẹko? Enyina nekōl ạami kokōr ōoy?” PaPita ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna ạMesaya bho.”
PạJizos aakiom eedi aghōl kua, “Ị́gbạ ghạ milo igboloman nꞌạami mẹnogho nꞌōoy nꞌōoy.”

PạJizos ạke mọtughumiom eedi oghōl ekua, “Ọony Oōy obho tạmiinom ni magey, arukenya bho nꞌaruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho tegin odi. Tokigh ni zodi, keḍio ịraar aḍuma neetẹn podi oḅetunu tọbho bho.”
Odi ạmaar ni ạḍeghe ạgba amutiom ạnogho eedi, paPita abhin mọnu odi ạrol asi odi.
PạJizos aghiraan aanon miteledōm obhꞌodi keḍio asi maPita aghōl kua, “Ạna aSetan, tẹn tạman ạmi. Ịitua onuma ịitua arōoy, ịitua tẸnaan io.”

Keḍio ạJizos abheleghi meghu arōoy obho nꞌiteledōm obhꞌodi iru todi keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Kōoy kōoy olo natu mọtuonuman ạmi, taḅulo ni lōor odi aḅẹtōn atōol moorẹeny ẹmigheri obhꞌodi, kạtuonuman ạami.
Kōoy kōoy olo nạva moḍume aghuḍum odi tapiẹmi ni, keḍio odi obo bho napiẹmi ghuḍum odi mebum ạmi nꞌebum ooḅi adōm obho taḍume ni.
Okōr oḍigh ạsuo mobho ōoy tạteeny erumolo odi agbo mẹela oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio abhiẹmi ghuḍum obho Ẹnaan ạnogho odi obho? Ạsuo olo.
Bọbon ạar tạnogho monweom aghuḍum odi olo.

Tipa bẹleni, kōoy kōoy olo nakiil ạami nꞌịtughumiom ạmi rẹgheer mi taruḍuma bhibha ọḅaar ẹmu, olōghōm Ẹnaan ẹko olo bho, Ọony Oōy obho takiil nạ ni odi rẹgheer tamen obho odi tatu mi teghuan Ọde bhꞌodi ạpam nꞌiiḅi itelema bho tẸnaan obho.”
Keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua, “Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, ẹde obo bho idi suo bho ịbho ḍio ninii eedi ẹmiin mAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan abhin nꞌịnyaam natu.”
Odiin aḍuma iru itẹn, pạJizos abhin maPita nꞌaJems nꞌạJon eedi be ịghi ịsiin tạnyu obꞌeegum. Ẹzo bho eedi idi suo neenon obho, palōor odi anwean taghisigh eedi,
molo ibura bhꞌodi ịḅaal molo bọbon ōoy tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho olo arue ghạ aatōl ghạ ạḅaaleni kua olo.
Peedi ịraar iteledōm obho ịmiin mIlaija nꞌaMozis bho iru nẹḍeghian nꞌạJizos.
PaPita akẹm ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Obo ịtughumiom, esi obhobho ezira idi obho ạneghe magey. Ezōor togim ịraar arutu suo, onyiin olꞌonuma, onyiin olo taMozis, onyiin olo tIlaija.”
Odi nꞌipedi obho aruugu neesibh molo eedi ilōghōm io mạar ọkpete.
Ẹzo bho eedi idi nini todi esi obho, pọbhurubuur asōor akpiom eedi, keḍio eedi ịmoghon moghōrōkō tologhi ọbhurubuur obho ạkpete kua, “Oobho Ọony ạmi obho ạami nạason ụseghe bho, ịmoghonyan odi.”
Eedi imina ikiton mobho eede bho eedi imina ḍio ẹmiin mọnon ōoy, ạJizos be mobho asughōnōm nꞌeedi.
Ẹzo bho eedi nesōor tạnyu obꞌeegum obho, pạJizos aakiom eedi ạkpete kua, “Ị́gba ghạ mẹnogho nꞌōoy nꞌōoy mibha enyina ịmiin obho ninii Ọony Oōy obho aḅetunu tọbho bho.”
Peedi imōrō mọtuugh oḍighi ibha odi ạkpete bho, keḍio eedi be nẹḍeghe ghạ nꞌalōor eedi ekōl kua, “Ẹmu odi ‘oḅetunu tọbho’ bho keeghe?”
Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua mạJizos, “Eeghe aḍighi kobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho ẹgba eghōl mIlaija tapira atu?”
Odi ạbhagharana kua, “Ilaija nạakar apira atu moḍighi kạar kạar oseeri. Oomo ipa ẹkona, ebum eeghe kẹegia bho aghōl mỌony Oōy obho tạmiinom ni, ogin nạ zodi?
Oomo ipa ẹkona, ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, Ilaija naaru atẹnẹ, keḍio arōoy iḍighi nạ zodi mẹzo olo iloghi eedi iḍigh iḍigh, kẹzo bho ụge tẹegia bho milo igboloman odi obho.”
Amen eedi iru titeledōm ipedi obho, peedi ịmiin mobꞌọlogh arōoy. Ẹde arōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nẹkanan ghạ nꞌeedi iteledōm obho.
Amen arōoy obho ịmiin kua be mạJizos peedi iimōogh magey keḍio ighiil ịghi todi ibheleghian odi.
Podi ạJizos apuruan kua miteledōm obhꞌodi, “Enyina nẹkanan mẹkaraan?”
Ponyiin ōoy ạḍua amute tobꞌọlogh arōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạami ubhin mọony ạmi aruom ạna ebum obho ọkarabh ẹmugh odi todi aḍighi molo odi otue ḍio mọkpete ạar.

Kamen kamen olo odi ọkarabh ẹmugh obho aru abhum odi, pokuugh odi ọgurom tade bho, keḍio oobha tẹtol emute tọnu obhꞌodi, odi ạtol ạkiir nạ rạlaay odi, molo oomo alōor obhꞌodi tạgbegheghe ạkparagh. Ạami uru ạna olo, keḍio ạami ụkpete ụnogho miteledōm onuma mobhirighan ọkarabh ẹmugh obho keḍio eedi irue ḍio.”

PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Bọbon ologhi omōruōm olo enyina arōoy bhibha ịteeny olo nolo? Ịni aḍuma mobho ạami tạtolan enyina? Ịni aḍuma mobho ạami tapin ạkparaghiom enyina? Ipin mọony obho meruom ạami.”
Peedi ibhin mọony obho iruom mạJizos. Ọkarabh ẹmugh obho ạmiin kua be mạJizos, pabhum mọony obho azighe molo ọony obho ameel tade bho naakila, nafugh nạ moobha tọnu obho.
Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua mọde bho, “Kokōr amen mobho ạke moḍighi ekua zodi?” Podi ạbhagharana kua, “Kamen ịbam odi.
Ọlogh amen mobho nạava moghigh odi, akuugh odi ạlogh tạnyan nꞌọzubh odi tạmuum. Sụanaan ezōor ghụsan aḍien mạlogh ạvo mạnogho ezōor, eru kạar olo ạna tatue ni.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Eru kạar olo ạna ku tatue ni. Bọbon ạar olo tẹkparanaan mobo bho ạteeny mologhi omōruōm obho olo.”
Tonyiin odi amen obho pọde bho aleghe amutiom aghōl kua, “Ạami ạteeny mologhi omōruōm keḍio ogbẹbhan io. Lọgh ạvo mạnogho ạami ạami ụteeny upuom suo.”

ẠJizos ạmiin mẹzo obꞌọlogh arōoy obho neeḍuraan netu mọpighiti odi obho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mọkarabh ẹmugh obho, “Ạna okpom-ụka ọkarabh ẹmugh obho, ạami ụkpete kua nạnogho ạna, mute talōor ọony obhobho. Umina ghạ nạ maḍigh talōor odi.”
Podi ọkarabh ẹmugh obho amulughu, akuugh mọony obho ạgurom, keḍio amute talōor ọony obho. Pọony obho ạrol kōoy olo nạabho molo kōoy kōoy aghōl kua, “Odi nạabho.”
PạJizos ạbham ạvo ọony obho ạlogh ạvo ạnogho odi moḅetunu, podi ọony obho aru aḅetunu.
ẠJizos aḍigh totu piteledōm obhꞌodi iru ipuruan odi tẹḅokia ighōl kua, “Eeghe aḍighi kezōor urue ḍio mobhirighan odi ọkarabh ẹmugh obho omutiom?”
Odi ạbhagharana kua, “Iikpulughu be mobho tetue epirighan moḍigh obhobho, ọnon ạar olo tatue olo.”
Eedi ịḍua suo peedi ịḅol ịghi tọpaḍi aGalili. ẠJizos ọva ḍio molo nꞌōoy nꞌōoy kalōghōm mesi obho odi odi,
ebum obho odi nạtughumiom miteledōm odi nakōl kua, “Tokuugh ni mỌony Oōy obho ọlogh tạravo arōoy; eedi ekigh odi. Nooghigh odi ịraar aḍuma etẹn podi oḅetunu tọbho bho.”
Eedi ịmoghonyan io mẹmu ịtughumiom obhobho, keḍio eedi nekiil nạ ruugu mopuruan odi.
Eedi iru isi tạKapaniom, iḍigh totu, pạJizos apuruan kua miteledōm obhꞌodi. “Tebōom obho kenyina ịḍeghe meeghe?”
Eedi irue ḍio mọbhagharana odi ebum obho eedi ịrol ịḍeghe ịghanan tebōom obho milo igboloman nꞌobo tapu moomo eedi.

ẠJizos ạrol delede, podi abheleghi maḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Kōoy kōoy olo nạva motẹn ọḅel, odi taseeri ni lōor odi kobo bho odi tikunughi obho atu nạ mẹbana oomꞌenyina.”
Keḍio odi abhin mọony ạmarami taghisigh oomꞌeedi, aghuruom odi keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi,

“Kōoy kōoy olo abhin taḍien ạmi abhin moḍigh ọony olo odi kua ạloghom, podi abhin ạami ạloghom, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo abhin ạami ạloghom obhin io zạmi be ạloghom, abhin nạ ạloghom zodi obo bho arōm ạami moru obho.”
PạJon ạkpete kua ạnogho odi, “Ọde otu, ụmiin monyiin ōoy olo abhin taḍien onuma napirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh, keḍio ezōor ụpuenaan odi ebum obho odi olo ạni tẹku ezōor obho.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ị́puenaan ghạ zodi, ebum obho bọbon ōoy olo taḍighi mọkpo ibꞌaruugu mi taḍien ạmi, olo tonyiin odi amen obho ạkpete ạami mịkarabh olo.
Kōoy kōoy olo ọgbaghan io ezira aḍigh nꞌezira.
Ilōghōm mobho kōoy kōoy olo ạnogho enyina mụum ọbhoghol mebum obho enyina iru milꞌạmi obho, odi tapin ni luunwo odi.”
“Oōy olo taḍighi monyiin ịbam ạnwuny bhibha, obo bho imōruōm ạami obho, moḍighi ịkarabh, ịkpe mọseghe obꞌọbharakpar ọkpuom tẹḍogh odi ōoy opopo korōbh otuḅeen odi tobꞌọbhiiny.

Eru kạar olo ạvo onuma naḍighi molo ạna kaḍighi mịkarabh, pusōbh arōbh. Ạna moḍighom eekpōogh ạvo taghuḍum ịneghe ạni ni kua epu, kpẹlen nꞌolo ạna kaḍighom ịzal ạravo mi toonu ạnyan obho iḍim ghạ ḍio kamen obho.
[Toonu opopo, ikpukuma ịbho ghạ ḍio, ạnyan obho iḍim ghạ ḍio kamen kamen.]

Keru nạ kạar olo alẹkẹ onuma naḍighi molo ạna kaḍighi mịkarabh, pusōbh arōbh. Ạna moḍighom eekpōogh alẹkẹ mi taghuḍum ịneghe ạni ni kua epu, kpẹlen nꞌolo ạna kaḍighom ịzal asike onuma mi toonu obho ikunughi olo obho.
[Toonu opopo, ikpukuma ịbho ghạ ḍio, ạnyan obho ẹkona iḍim ghạ ḍio kamen kamen.]

Keru nạ kạar olo ekpaḍien onuma naḍighi molo ạna kaḍighi mịkarabh, pụtoghorona marōbh. Ạna moḍighom onyiin ekpaḍien mi tAde-Ọolema tẸnaan ịneghe ạni ni kua epu, kpẹlen nꞌolo ạna kaḍighom mịzal ikpo ariḍien mi toonu obho ikunughi olo bho.
Toonu opopo, ‘ikpukuma ịbho ghạ ḍio, ạnyan obho ẹkona iḍim ghạ ḍio kamen kamen.’
“Kōoy kōoy tọḍa ni oonon tạnyan obho.
Abōbh ẹneghe, keḍio eru kạar olo abōbh obho ikiḍimu mu, ạna taḍighi ẹko kabōbh obho emina ekiḍimuom? Ịteeny bōbh talōor enyina, mẹrologhuan tekima.”

Ipa iru itẹn, pạJizos ạḍua tesi opopo ạghi tebhugh obhꞌaJudia, ạghi tẹḅeenyom ọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan. Tesuo nạ pobꞌọlogh arōoy iru imina iikōbhōghian ịninighian odi, keḍio odi aru ạrol ạtughumiom eedi kẹzo bho odi naḍighi ghạ bho.
Pẹde arōoy aFarisi obho iru todi nẹva mebōom ọdegh odi, peedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Gbạ mạnogho ezōor, araalōgh obho ẹnogho mịnyaam mōoy mogbo ạni odi mạḅam omutiom gạ?”
PạJizos abhin mọnon iipuruan mọbhagharana keḍio odi apuruan kua zeedi, “AMozis kạlogh ẹko molōgh obho, ạnogho enyina?”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “AMozis ạnogho mịikpo mōoy mọge ọbhereer ạḅam ọnogho ạni obho obhirighan odi.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “AMozis ạlogh molōgh obhobho ạnogho enyina ebum obho ịkpar lẹpuuny zenyina mọmoghonyan obho.
Kọḅel egbiom obho, tamen obho nọlem bọ mẹmar-arōoy obho, ụgba kua, ‘Ẹnaan ạlem eedi mọza nꞌolobhir.
Tebum iibha bẹleni kōoy tạḅele mọde nꞌoniin odi ạki aḍigh nꞌạni odi,
keḍio ịzal eedi tetu monyiin.’ Tiibha bho eedi ilo mu mịzal arōoy, eedi neeru monyiin be.
Tebum ipa bẹleni, ibha Ẹnaan naaḍighi iru monyiin obho, ōoy ọgbarion io.”
Amen eedi imula ịghi isi totu, piteledōm obho ipuruan mạJizos milo igboloman nꞌibha odi ạḍeghe bho.
Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Oōy olo agbo mạni odi amutiom kạghi abhin mọnon ạni, odi nale mẹma nꞌodi ạni opopo;
keru kạar olo odi ạni obho agbo mạḅam ạḍua tạvo olom odi, kạghi ạḅal mọnon ōoy, odi ẹkona nale nạ mẹma.”
Ẹtede arōoy ibhin nwụny eedi eruom mạJizos molo odi kakulaan eedi, pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịrol isi rōoy obho.

Amen odi ạJizos ạmiin mibha eedi neḍighi obho pịikaany odi keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho. “Ịḅele ạnwuny obho eru tạmi, ị́puenaan ghạ zeedi, ebum obho Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan aru milꞌarōoy ilo idi keedi obho.
Ilōghōm kua: ōoy olo opin io mAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan kọbumoony orue ḍio aḍigh ạni.”
Keḍio odi aru abhin nwụny obho men onyiin onyiin amegheri tạrugbo odi, ạḅamaghi rạvo odi mi tạruumu eedi lịsebh.

Ẹzo bho ạJizos amina ạke merele odi obho, ponyiin ōoy aghiil aru agbuluman taghisigh odi, keḍio apuruan kua zodi, “Obꞌooḅi ōoy ịtughumiom, ạami taḍighi meeghe kạami ạteeny ạni maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo?”
PạJizos apuruan kua zodi, “Ebum eeghe kạna abheleghi ạami mooḅi ōoy? Tughuneen mẸnaan io ọnon ooḅi ōoy olo.
Sạna naalōghōm raalōgh obho: ‘Ughigh ghạ mōoy, ule ghạ mẹma, umiigh ghạ viigh, ụgba ghạ miben, uuniom ghạ miiniom, kiilaan ọde nꞌoniin onuma.’”
Podi ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami naakō raalōgh bhibha kamen ịbam ạmi.”

PạJizos abhin tetulan keḍio aanon taghisigh odi ạkpete kua, “Kir ạar olo asughō molo ạna kaḍighi, kịa maḅool kạar kạar olo ạna ụteeny, mạseghe mikpoki obho mạnogho maruvekulom obho, pạna ogbo ẹela tẸnaan, maru mạtuonom ạami.”
Amen ōoy obho ạmoghon miibha bho palōor odi ạkpoghogho, odi atẹn ạḍua nꞌịitu, ebum obho odi aru mobꞌọola bho.
PạJizos aghiraan aanon miteledōm obhꞌodi keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Tẹkar ni ẹkpar magey molo ạruula keḍigh tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Iteledōm obho ekperenom mọmoghon ọnuekpete bhobho, keḍio odi ạJizos amina ạkpete kua, “Ạnwuny ạmi, pẹzo ịkpar mọḅol oḍigh tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan!
Uuva mọḅol otẹn taḍien ạnuga idugh epu molo ọola kaḍigh tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Tiibha bho piteledōm obho ịrol iimōogh, keḍio onyiin ạrol apuruan kua monyiin, “Eru kua, okōr ōoy mobo totue ni ọpel?”
PạJizos aanon tasumusigh eedi keḍio ạbhagharana kua, “Tarōoy ipa bho ẹkpar magey, keḍio tẸnaan io; bọbon ạar olo ạkpar apu molo Ẹnaan kaḍighi olo.”
PaPita akōbh mọnu odi ạkpete kua, “Nonon ni, ezōor nọoḅele kạar kạar otu nọtuonom ạna.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ẹzo bho, keḍio ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, kōoy kōoy olo ạḅele meghun otu nꞌaburumōr nꞌạburumarani, nꞌọde nꞌoniin, nꞌạnwuny nꞌoḍighi odi mebum ạmi nꞌooḅi adōm obho,

tapin ni milo ipuom suo mi taghuḍum obhobho. Odi tapin ni apuoghom mạsumuunir arughun otu, nꞌaburumōr nꞌạburumarani, nꞌaburuniin nꞌạnwuny, nꞌarade oḍighi, nꞌọmiinom tạravo ịnon nạ; keḍio taghuḍum obho natu obho odi tạteeny aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.
Keḍio ọlogh obo bho idi taghisigh siibha bho tẹtol tạman, ọlogh obo bho idi tạman siibha bho tẹtol taghisigh.”

Eedi iḍigh tebōom nẹki taJerusạlẹm, pạJizos atẹnōm miteledōm obho taghisigh molo eedi neemōogh, arōoy obho nẹtuonom odi tạman obho ẹkona aruugu nesibh. Podi ạJizos amina abhin maḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho be atẹnẹ tọtu ạgba mọkpo ilo temutenaan odi ạnogho eedi.

Odi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịmoghon, ezira nọki taJerusạlẹm. Tepa pokuugh Ọony Oōy ọlogh tạravo aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho. Eedi tẹgba epumeni odi moghigh odi, ekuugh odi ẹlogh tạravo arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho.
Eedi tẹeḅaghami ni odi, ẹsiroghom odi mịghor, ẹgurogh odi, ekigh odi, keḍio ịraar aḍuma neetẹn podi oḅetunu tọbho bho.”
Ipa iru itẹn, paJems nꞌạJon ạnwuny taZebidi iru tạJizos ịkpete kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, kir ạar olo ezōor nọva molo ạna kaḍighi kạnogho ezōor.”
PạJizos apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina nẹva molo ạami kaḍighi meeghe kạnogho enyina?”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Amen ạna tạtol delede mi tẹtolom eghuan obhꞌonuma, ḍighi ezōor ọrol ạni onyiin toḍiom onuma opedi obho tekẹeny onuma.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ạar olo enyina negbẹel enyina ilōghōm io. Enyina tetue ni ẹpogholom mọbhogholom ạmuum obho ạami tạpogholom obho, ezua moḍigh ozua ạmuum obho ạami tazua bho?”

Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ezōor totue ni.” PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Tagey obho, enyina tetue ni ẹpogholom mọbhogholom ạmuum obho ạami tạpogholom obho, ezua moḍigh ozua ạmuum obho ạami tazua bho,
keḍio ilo tịnyaam ạmi mọto obo tạtol toḍiom nꞌekẹeny ạvo ạmi. Ẹnaan pobo tạto, ạnogho mobo bho odi naakōbhōghi aseerian obho.”
Amen aḍiōbh iteledōm ipedi obho ịmoghon mipa bho peedi ịrol iḅẹebheni miloghi ịnogho maJems nꞌạJon.
PạJizos abheleghi moomꞌeedi aakōbhōghi monyiin esi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Enyina neelōghōm mobho obo bho iru rụula bho ibhin ịnyaam nẹdaam rōoy obho, nꞌobho aruvẹmụ eedi nẹto mịto ẹnogho eedi.
Ẹzo bho ḍio mobho tẹtol togbo enyina. Onyiin enyina olo nagbẹel moru ogbōgh mi tenyina, odi tatu mẹbana ipedi obho.
Obo bho nạva moru ọḅel tenyina bho, odi takumuan moomꞌenyina.
Ẹzo bho nạ pẹzo Ọony Oōy obho ạtuan aru, odi oru ḍio molo ịnon kekumuan odi, odi aru mokumuan nꞌọnogho aghuḍum odi ọtaam ọlogh arōoy.”
Eedi iru isi taJeriko, odi nꞌiteledōm odi nꞌobꞌọlogh arōoy iḅetunu nẹḍua, pōoy ikpom ariḍien olo ughōl Bạtimios, ọony tạTimios, olo odi ghạ tebōom obho nagbẹel ghạ miigbẹel,
ạmoghon mạJizos obhꞌạNazaret natẹn, podi ạke momulughu oghōl ekua, “ẠJizos, ọony taDevid, sụanaan ạami ghụsan aḍien!”
Pọlogh arōoy ịrol isi odi ịkpete ịnogho odi mokpereghi ọnu odi, keḍio odi alegheri amulughu apu mịḅel obho aghōl kua, “Ọony taDevid, sụanaan ạami ghụsan!”
PạJizos ạmara ạkpete kua, “Ipeleghi odi aru.” Peedi ibheleghi mōoy ikpom ariḍien ịkpete kua ịnogho odi, “Ḅạal ologhi, ḅetunu, odi napeleghi ạna.”
Podi arōbh mạsuoma obhꞌodi, aḅetunu, apel aghiil ạghi tạJizos.
PạJizos apuruan kua zodi, “Ạna nạva molo ạami kaḍighi meeghe kạnogho ạna?” Odi ōoy ikpom ariḍien obho ạbhagharana kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạami nagbẹel, molo ạami ạmiin ạni mạar.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kịa, ologhi omōruōm onuma naakō ạna.” Tonyiin odi amen obho podi ạke mọmiin ạar, keḍio ạrol ạtuonuman odi ạJizos tebōom obho.
Ẹzo bho eedi netuan taJerusạlẹm obho mi tẹma olo ughōl Betfagi nꞌạBetani, peedi ịghi isi tobꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs. PạJizos arōm ịzal iteledōm odi mọghi taghisigh,
keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịki tọbam ẹma bho odi taghisigh enyina bho, enyina neḍigh kua be penyina ọmiin ọony ạnam olo ọnon ōoy doḍigh ghạ ḍio. Ịkoton meruom ạami.
Eru kạar olo onyiin ōoy apuruan enyina aghōl kua, ‘Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹkoton?’ ịkpete kua mẹnogho odi, ‘Uvotu obho nagbẹel, odi tamulumi ni siibha siibha.’ ”
Peedi itẹn ịghi ịmiin nạ mọony ạnam mi tebōom obho nọokpo tạpe onyiin otu. Ẹzo bho eedi nẹkoton obho be
pẹde arōoy obo bho ịmara tebōom obho ipuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina neḍighi meeghe, enyina nẹkoton mọony ạnam obho?”
Peedi ịkpete mẹzo bho ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho eedi obho, parōoy obho ịḅelemaan eedi, eedi ibhin ịḍuonom.
Eedi ibhin ọony ạnam obho iruom mạJizos peedi ịkporona mạrusuoma eedi ịde tạnyu ẹnam obho keḍio odi ạJizos aru aḍigh.
Ọlogh arōoy ẹdeey nạ rukpe eedi mi tebōom obho, keḍio ẹtede iigbooy masigo iirẹeny iru ịde tebōom obho.
Keḍio arōoy obo bho idi taghisigh obho nꞌobo bho nẹtuonom tạman obho ịrol nẹmoor emulughu ekōl kua, “Ibuom mẸnaan. Ẹnaan ạsebh zodi obo bho abhin taḍien tObạmọogh obho natu obho.
Ẹnaan ạnogho lịsebh mọdaam ẹma bho taDevid ọde ezira obho natu obho. Iibhughumi ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan!”
Odi ạJizos aḍigh taJerusạlẹm, podi ạghi aḍigh tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho, arele ạmaar aanon kạar kạar. Tebum ẹzo bho aḍio bho nakpereghi obho podi ạḍua ạghi tạBetani, odi nꞌaḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho.
Ạḅaal, eedi ịḍua tạBetani nemula, pọkoony nasibh mạJizos.

Tegbeeny, podi ạmiin moorẹeny obho ughōl bọ ạfig obho. Oomo odi asigo asigo. Podi ạghi moonon eru kạar olo odi tạmiin ni mitu ọku ole. Amen odi ạghi asi bọbon otu olo odi ạmiin olo, asigo asigo be, ebum obho dọteeny io men eedi nẹloki ghạ bho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho moorẹeny obho, “Oōy ọku mu mikpo onuma amina ale!” Iteledōm obhꞌodi nẹemoghon mipa bho.

Amen eedi isi taJerusạlẹm, pạJizos ạghi aḍigh tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho, ạke mobhirighanogh arōoy obo bho neḅo raaḅo mi totu iikpulughu obho akpuleniiy razebele obo bho nenweeghi mikpoki obho, arōḅōḍi mạretolom obo bho neḅoḍi mịnun ạbadi obho.
Odi ọva ḍio nọva molo onyiin ōoy kaḅo maḅo mi totu iikpulughu obho.
Keḍio odi ạtughumiom rōoy obho aghōl kua, “Nọoge tẹegia bho okōl kua, mẸnaan ạkpete kua, ‘Otu ạmi tatu motu iikpulughu ạnogho moomo arōoy aruubhugh obho,’ keḍio enyina neeghireni etẹn motu ạruḅa.”

Arukenya iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nẹemoghon, peedi ịrol ịva mebōom olo oghigh odi ạJizos, keḍio aruugu odi nesibh eedi ebum obho oomo obꞌọlogh arōoy obho neemōogh magey mi tịtughumiom obhꞌodi.
Ạteeny mudule, podi ạJizos nꞌiteledōm obhꞌodi ịḍua tẹma bho.
Ẹzo bho eedi netele tebōom obho mobun ụḍirogh obho peedi ịmiin mobho ạfig obho nạabho, ạseghe tịgha bho ninii asi tịika bho.
PaPita ạatua mẹzo bho imute, keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Obo ịtughumiom, nonon, ạfig obho ạna ụghor obho nạabho.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ịteeny ologhi omōruōm mi tẸnaan.

Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, enyina tetue ni ẹkpete kua ẹnogho meegum obhobho, ‘Ḍiirunu suo mạghi mameel tobꞌọbhiiny.’ Eru kạar olo enyina ịteeny io mịzal ologhi, kenyina ẹkar emōruōm mobho ibha enyina ịkpete bho tẹtuugh ni emute mẹzo bho enyina ịkpete bho, pomute nạ ọnogho enyina.
Tebum iibha bho kạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, kamen kamen olo enyina iikpulughu igbẹel mạar, imōruōm mobho enyina neebhin zodi ạar obho, pọnogho nạ enyina kạar kạar olo enyina igbẹel.
Keḍio kamen kamen olo enyina ịmara neekpulughu, ịḅelemaan kịkarabh kịkarabh ilo ōoy aḍighi enyina, molo Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho ạḅelemaan ạni enyina mịkarabh enyina.
[Eru kạar olo enyina ịḅelemaan io mịnon, Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho ẹkona ọḅelemaan nạ ḍio zenyina mịkarabh enyina.]”
Eedi imula iru isi taJerusạlẹm, odi ạJizos ạghi aḍigh tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho natele parukenya iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh nꞌarukenya otu iikpulughu obho iru todi
ipuruan kua zodi, “Okōr oḍigh ịnyaam mobho ạna ụteeny moḍighi iibha bho? Okōr ōoy ạnogho ạna mịikpo oḍighiiy ipa bho?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Ạami tapuruan enyina monyiin iipuruan be, eru kạar olo enyina ịbhagharana zạmi pạami ọgba ọnogho enyina mịikpo bho ạami ụteeny moḍighiiy iibha bho.
Ịgba mẹnogho ạami, ịnyaam ozu ạmuum tạJon kịḍua teḍighen keru, tẸnaan bẹlee ku tarōoy?”
Peedi ịke mọghanan nꞌalōor eedi oghōl ekua, “Ezira tọpagharana ẹko? Eru kạar olo ezira ughōl, ‘TẸnaan,’ podi oghōl ekua, ‘Keeghe kenyina imōruōm io zodi ạJon?’
Kibha ezira ughōl, ‘tArōoy...’ ” (Aruugu arōoy obho nesibh eedi, ebum obho kōoy kōoy nạakar amōruōm mobho ạJon aru mozil tẸnaan.)
Peedi ịbhagharana kua mạJizos, “Ezōor ulōghōm io.” PạJizos ạbhagharana nạ kua zeedi, “Ạami ẹkona ụgba ḍio ạnogho enyina mịikpo bho ạami ụteeny moḍighiiy ọkpo bhibha bho.”

Keḍio ạJizos adōgh sidōgh ạnogho eedi aghōl kua, “Onyiin amen keḍio onyiin ōoy aḅẹbh mookua iirẹeny amiim, akō mikō akitonom, aḍighi mesi omiibh ghạ amiim obho oseeri, aḅōgh motu iḅōrō aseeri, ạseghe ạnogho mịnon arōoy mogu ghạ eedi kẹḍian, keḍio odi atẹn ạghi merele.
Amen iirẹeny obho iru ịneghe mogu ookōbhōghi podi arōm mẹbana odi mọghi obhin abin odi mi tarōoy obho.
Parōoy obho ikuugh mẹbana bho iḍul ibhirighan odi imulumi moobho ạvo.
Keḍio odi ōoy obho amina arōm mọnon ẹbana ạghi, peedi imina iḍul odi ịgurogh tẹmu obho ịloki zodi mibꞌạregheer.
Odi ōoy obho amina nạ arōm mọnon ẹbana, opo bho eedi ighigh ni. Ọlogh ịnon ilo odi arōm abhin ạghi, eedi iḍighi nạ monyiin ẹzo bho, eḍul mẹde, ẹze mẹde.
Obho asughōnōm morōm pogini ọony oḍigh ologhi odi ōoy obho. Ikunughi obho podi arōm mọony obhꞌodi ạghiom rōoy obho, ạatua kua tologhi odi, ‘Ạami naalōghōm eedi tekiilaan ni mọony obhꞌạmi.’
Amen arōoy obho ịmiin mọony obho ponyiin ạkpete kua ạnogho monyiin, ‘Oobho ọony obhꞌodi obo bho ookua bho, itu oghigh odi, poomo kạar kạar odi oru ilꞌezira.’
Peedi ikuugh mọony obho ighigh, irōbh odi imutiom tookua bho.”
Odi adōgh ạḅele, podi apuruan kua, “Enyina nẹetua, ẹkaraan amina asughō molo odi obo bho ạteeny mookua bho kaḍighi. Odi nịvo nịvo tatu ni ạze rōoy bhibha ạseghe mookua bho ạlogh tạravo ịnon arōoy.
Ạami nakōl enyina neeghōl ghạ miibha bho ụge bọ tẹegia bho? Ụge kua,
‘Ạkar odi ọbharakpar obho iḅōghi rutu obho igin obho naakiton atu mobho ạla bọ mạar apu obho.
Obạmọogh obho aḍighi miibha bho.
Ẹzo ịmaar ịneghe.’ ”
Parukenya aJu obho ịrol ịva mebōom oḅol odi ạJizos, ebum obho eedi neelōghōma mobho ạJizos adōghōm zeedi sidōgh obhobho, keḍio eedi ine ḍio mebum aruugu obꞌọlogh arōoy obho, peedi ịḅelemaan odi ịḍua.
Ẹde arōoy aFarisi obho nꞌẹde arōoy ẹku tạHerod ilo urōm mobhin iipuruan oru ọdeghom ạJizos

iru ipuruan kua zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, ezōor noolōghōm mobho ạna ọgba ghạ ḍio miben, ọnagha ghạ nạ ḍio milo arōoy nẹkpete, ạna ọtuom ghạ ḍio mạar mōoy, keḍio ạna nạtughumiom rōoy magey obho milo igboloman nꞌẸnaan. Gbạ mạnogho ezōor, kir olōgh gạ mi taraalōgh obhꞌezira mogun osōgh ọnogho ọolema bhꞌaRom bẹlee kolōgh olo? Ezōor osōgh ọnogho bẹlee kezōor usōgh io?”
Tipa bho ạJizos naalōghōm mịitua bhꞌeedi keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua, “Ebum eeghe kenyina eru mọdegh ạmi? Ipin mokpoki meruom ạami ạami uunon.”
Eedi ibhin iru podi apuruan kua zeedi, “Amusigh nꞌaḍien okōr ōoy mobho idi bọ suo bho?” Peedi ịbhagharana ighōl kua, “Ọolema bhꞌaRom.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ịnogho mọolema bho mibha iru bọ milꞌodi obho, mẹnogho mẸnaan mibha tẸnaan.” Peedi ighiilaan odi.
Ẹde arōoy ogbo arōoy aSadusi obho iru tạJizos. (Eedi obo bho imōruōm io mobho oḅetunu tọbho bho odi obho.)
Eedi ịkpete kua ẹnogho zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, aMozis ạge kua taraalōgh obho aseerian ezira,
‘Oōy kabhin mạni kạbho, eru kạar olo odi ạnwuny ilo,
pumōr odi abhin mạni obho molo odi ạmaraghi rụnwuny ạnogho zodi obo bho nạabho bho!’
“Onyiin amen keḍio oḍual aburumōr iru imute. Okenya bho aru abhin mạni, ọmar io mọony ạbho.
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm ịzal obho aru abhin mạni obho, ọmar nạ ḍio mọony aru ạbho. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mobho imutenaan mogbẹbhiōm ịraar umōr obho,
nꞌoomo aburumōr ipedi obho. Oomo eedi oḍual aburumōr obho ibhin ni zodi ạni obho ẹman keḍio bọbon olo ạmar mọony olo. Ikunughi obho, podi ạni obho aru ạbho.
Esiibha, taḍuma oḅetunu tọbho bho, ọteeny omoom aghuḍum obho, kodi ạni obho tatu mạni okōr ōoy, ẹzo bho oomo oḍual eedi neebhin mạni obho?”
ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Enyina nẹepionuman magey. Enyina elōghōm mạar obho? Bọbon ạar olo enyina ilōghōm milo igboloman nꞌaraalōgh obho bolobolo ịnyaam obho tẸnaan olo nolo.
Amen olo obo bho nẹebho teḅerenu tọbho bho, ạraani nꞌilobhir ịḅalan mu milom. Eedi tẹtol kitelema bho tẸnaan ibha idi tạnyu obho.

Tilo igboloman nꞌoḅẹriōn obo bho nẹebho mi tọbho bho, enyina deghōl ghạ ḍio tọbhereer obho taMozis tibha odi ạgba milo igboloman nꞌeekpu eḍum obho ạrol ale nyạn obho? Todi esi obho ụge ughōl mẸnaan ạkpete kua ạnogho maMozis, ‘Ạami Ẹnaan tEbrạhạm nꞌẸnaan tẠizik nꞌẸnaan tạJekob.’
Iibha bho nemōrō mobho odi aru mẸnaan obo bho idi nꞌaghuḍum obho, Ẹnaan obo bho nẹebho bho ḍio. Enyina nẹekar kua ekōrōnuan.”

Kir onyiin ōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho olo ạrol suo ạmoghon mibha ạJizos ạḍeghe bho. Odi nạamoghon mobho ạJizos ạmaar ạbhagharana ạseghe ạnogho marōoy aSadusi obho, podi aru tạJizos nꞌiipuruan apuruan kua zodi, “Oomo araalōgh obho, oḍighen ạla mạar apu?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Oobho pobho ạla bọ mạar apu obho, ‘Arōoy Izirẹl, ịmoghon, Ẹnaan Obạmọogh obho odi be mObạmọogh.
Itulan Ẹnaan Obạmọogh enyina bho nꞌoomo ologhi enyina nꞌoomo aghuḍum enyina nꞌoomo ịitua enyina nꞌoomo ịnyaam enyina.’
Ogbẹbhiōm ịzal obho ạla mạar obho, poobho bho, ‘Tulan obo bho atuan ạna bho kẹzo bho ạna utulan lōor onuma bho.’ Ọnon olōgh olo ạla mạar apu mịzal bhibha olo.”
Podi ōoy obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Ạlua, obo ịtughumiom. Agey mẹzo bho ạna ụḍeghe bho, mobho Obạmọogh obho be aru mẸnaan, nꞌobho tughuneen zodi be ḍio ọnon Ẹnaan olo,

nꞌobho ōoy tatulan mẸnaan nꞌoomo ologhi odi nꞌoomo ịitua odi nꞌoomo ịnyaam odi, nꞌotulan obo bho atuan odi obho kẹzo bho odi atulan lōor odi obho. Ookō ịzal araalōgh bhibha ịla mạar epu mọze ịnam nꞌịlel ọtunom ạar ọnogho Ẹnaan mi tẹede iigbia bho.”
ẠJizos ạmaar ạnagha mẹzo bho odi nạpagharana bho pạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạna dogbeenyan io mi tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.” Iibha bho itẹn, ọnon ōoy omina ḍio ane mopuruan odi miipuruan.
Ẹzo bho odi ạJizos nạtughumiom totu iikpulughu obho podi apuruan kua rōoy obho, “Ịkar imute ẹko kobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nekōl maMesaya obho tatu mọony ọobhe taDevid?
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạnogho mịnyaam maDevid molo odi ạkpete kua,
‘Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho mObạmọogh ạami obho:
tọl delede suo toḍiom ạvo ạmi ninii ạami uḍighi ạna maḅeleriom sike mobo ọlogh aḍien onuma.’
“Ạkar odi aDevid nịvo nịvo abheleghi aghōl ‘Obạmọogh,’ imute ẹko kodi aKraist obho amina atu mọony ọobhe todi aDevid?”
Obꞌọlogh arōoy obho ibhin nꞌọḅaal ologhi ẹmoghon mịtughumiom obho tạJizos.

Ẹzo bho odi nạtughumiom eedi obho podi ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Igona lōor enyina mi tarōoy obo bho nẹtughumiom raalōgh obho, obho negbẹel ghạ mọlokia ibꞌạradoni ọrol orele gọlom gọlom kesi kesi obho, nꞌolo kobheleghian eedi mipeleghi eghuan mi tariḍighi obho,
obo bho negbẹel ghạ molo kosereghian eedi mạretolom mi tarutu iikpulughu obho, nꞌọrologhom ạretolom ilo ịla mạar mi tariisi ilo nole mẹzaal obho.
Eedi neenioghom ghạ nạ rukpukele ạraani mi tarutu eedi, keḍio tẹzo olo oobiōghōm arōoy nẹki ghạ eekpulughu mịidoony iikpulughu. Ạliliom ibhꞌeedi tepu mibhꞌịnon.”
Ẹzo bho ạJizos ạrol delede atuan tẹḅa ikpoki otu iikpulughu obho, podi ạmaar naanon mẹzo arōoy nẹlokiiy mikpoki eedi. Ọlogh ạruula iru ịloki mịkanya ikpoki ịḍua,
keḍio uvekulom ekpukele ạni aru ạlogh mịzal ịbam ikpoki ilo tegbẹbh ni mạkobo.
PạJizos abheleghi mobo bho nẹtuonuman odi obho ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, uvekulom ekpukele ạni obhobho ạlogh mi tẹḅa otu iikpulughu obho apu moomo arōoy ipedi obho.

Ebum obho ipedi obho ịseghe mịbam tobꞌọlogh ikpoki obho eedi ịteeny obho eru ẹlogh, keḍio odi ạni obho, toomo ekulom obhꞌodi, odi aru ạlogh moomo ibha odi ạteeny obho, ipa bho nạ ni be poomo aghuḍum odi.”
Ẹzo bho ạJizos namute totu iikpulughu obho ponyiin oteledōm obhꞌodi ạkpete kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, mịin ẹzo ạrubharakpar otu obho nꞌodi otu obho ịneghe.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna nạmiin zodi obꞌotu obhobho? Bọbon ọpaḍi ọbharakpar ibha idi obho olo tọḅelemaan ạtol ẹzo obho odi odi obho olo, oomo eedi tonyuughi ni otōḅōḍi ạar esi esi.”
Ẹzo bho ạJizos ạrol delede mi tạnyu obꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs asōmōghan mobꞌotu iikpulughu obho, paPita nꞌaJems nꞌạJon nꞌẠndru iru todi mi tẹḅokia,
keḍio ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Gbạ mạnogho ezōor mamen iibha bho temute, nꞌaraalẹgh ilo temute moḍeeriom obho naatuan men ọkpo bhibha temute.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Igona lōor enyina. Ímōrō ghạ onyiin ōoy aabiōghōm enyina.
Ọlogh arōoy tetu ni taḍien ạmi ekōl kua, ‘Ạami podi,’ moobiōghōm ọlogh arōoy.

Ịíḅaghami ghạ nạ lōor enyina kamen kamen olo enyina nẹmoghon moghur ạraagham tetuan, nꞌọdu ạraagham tegbeeny. Ọkpo ilo idi kua temuteghu ni keḍio iibha bho ịgba ḍio mobho nạateeny mikunughi aghuḍum obho.

Aruubhugh obho, onyiin taḅetunu ni aḅe monyiin, ạruula ạraama bho onyiin taḅetunu ni ạmaranuan monyiin. Ade bho taḅomian ni kesi kesi. Oḅẹer ẹkona tasōor nạ ni. Ọkpo bhibha tẹtol kịḅel ẹegama igun eghun ạni-ebhōbh.

“Enyina ẹkona igona nạ lōor enyina. Toḅologh ni enyina opin ọki totu ạraakpe. Toḍulogh ni enyina nạ mi tarutu iikpulughu obho. Tọmarami ni zenyina tasumusigh arukenya nꞌạruula ẹma mebum aḍien ạmi, molo enyina ẹgba ẹnogho zeedi mooḅi adōm obho.
Tọgba ni mooḅi adōm obho ọnogho rōoy oomo aruubhugh obho.

Keḍio, tamen olo eedi iḅol enyina ibhin ịghi tarutu ạraakpe bho, ịítua ghạ mepughuḍi tẹmu enyina milo enyina tekōl ẹgba. Tamen opopo, ịkpete kilo ụnogho enyina mọkpete. Ibha enyina tẹkpete tamen opopo bho, ọnuekpete enyina ḍio, Ẹmugh Iigbia bho tatōmōghiōm enyina.
Arōoy tẹkar ekuugh kua burumōr eedi ẹnogho molo kọze, ạburude eḍighi nạ monyiin ẹzo bho nwụny eedi. Ạnwuny tekiraan ni ẹmaranuan bụrude nꞌaburuniin eedi molo kọze zeedi.
Kōoy kōoy tạlogh ni enyina ḍien mebum ạmi, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạkparam asi tikunughi obho tọpel ni.”
“Amen olo enyina ịmiin mibꞌạmagh obho neemute tesi olo ịgbaan io momute, pobo bho idi taJudia bho eghilighu ẹghi taruugum obho!
Obo bho odi tạnyu otu obho, ọoḅaghami ḍio lōor odi mosōor ọghi oḍigh totu ọseghe ọkpo ilo odi kạbhamam kạghi taruugum obho.
Obo bho odi teḍum oḍighi obho omula mu ạghi totu mọseghe ukpe odi.
Opo pọmiinom ilo tẹtol ẹnogho rạani ilo idi nꞌạrubaraka nꞌilo nekpōghi ni rụnwuny mi taruḍuma pipa.
Iikpulughu mẹnogho mẸnaan molo ọkpo bhibha imute ḍio tamen uuta.

Ebum obho ọmiinom obho odi taruḍuma pipa teḅẹebh ni epu milo neemute ghạ ilo ẹmar arōoy obho neelōghōm, ạseghe tamen obho Ẹnaan ạlem ẹmar-arōoy obho ninii ạteeny siibha. Ọnon olo tamina aaleeny nạ mipa bho olo.
Ạar obho ạneghe bho, Obạmọogh obho naakiemi ruḍuma bho. Ipa ilo bọ, bọbon ōoy kumuzaan olo. Tebum obo bho odi naabheleghi ạson ạseghe bho kiḍighi kodi akiemi ruḍuma bho.
“Tamen opopo, ōoy aru nạ ni ạkpete kua ạnogho enyina, ‘Mịin, aKraist obho odi eebha,’ bolobolo, ‘Mịin, odi odi epa,’ ímōruōm ghạ zodi.
Iben araKraist nꞌiben arizil temuteghu ni. Eedi teḍighiiy ni mọkpo ibꞌaruugu nꞌọkpo ịiḍaany moobiōghōm obo bho Ẹnaan naabheleghi ạson ạseghe bho, eru kạar olo eedi tetue ni.
Igona lōor enyina. Ạami nạagba kạar kạar ạnogho enyina tamen olo ọkpo bho demuteghu ḍio.”
“Taruḍuma ilo aruḍuma ọmiinom obho neetẹn paghōzōgh obho oḅil, ụvanyu obho ọmu mu,
ịinaany obho ọgharaghu tade bho, ịnyaam ọkpo bho idi teḅōghōghaan obho ọḍuaghu tariisi obho eedi idiighu obho.
PỌony Oōy obho oḍeeriom alōor odi, ọḍua tạnyu obho osōor oru nꞌigbōgh ịnyaam nꞌeghuan.
Odi tatōm ni mitelema tẸnaan ibha idi tạnyu obho ẹki tinya ạruukul obhꞌade bho mookōbhōghi arōoy obho Ẹnaan naabheleghi ạson ạseghe bho, ạḍua tonyiin ẹkul ẹmar-arōoy obho asi tọnon.”
“Ịtuugha mạar mi toorẹeny obho ughōl bọ ạfig obho. Amen olo odi nạaghi migue natughẹel, penyina olōghōm mobho unu naatuan.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, amen enyina ịmiin ọkpo bhibha nemuteghu penyina olōghōm mobho amen obho naatuan, natu mọke.
Ilōghōm mobho oomo ọkpo bhibha temuteghu ni keḍio oomo arōoy obho idi bọ suo tegbi mọbhozu ọman.
Ạnyu obho nꞌade bho tepẹ ni ẹman keḍio ọnuekpete bhꞌạmi obhẹ ḍio.”
“Oomo ipa ẹkona, bọbon ōoy olo alōghōm ḍuma bho bolobolo amen obho olo. Itelema bho tẸnaan ibha idi tạnyu obho nꞌỌony obho olo alōghōm olo, Ọde bho be alōghōm.
Ịmaar ẹmara megon eḅōrō, ebum obho enyina ilōghōm io mamen obho.
Tẹtol kōoy olo ạḍua totu nạki merele keḍio ạnoghooy riḍighi mạrubana odi, keḍio ạkpete ạnogho moḅōrō motu obho mọmaar oonon.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịmaar ẹmara meḅōrō, ebum obho enyina ilōghōm io mamen ọde otu obho tatughẹel obho. Odi tatue ni atu mudule, bolobolo ogbo eeleeny, bolobolo obꞌẹtughuḅaal, bolobolo ụḍirogh.
Odi aru tekperenom, odi ọmiin io ạna mobho ạna odi tạrala!
Iibha bho ạami nạkpete ạnogho enyina bho, ạami ụkpete nạnogho kōoy kōoy: ịmara meḅōrō.”

Ịzal aḍuma isughō siibha mọteeny aḍuma ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho, nꞌaḍuma ẹzaal obho noliom ghạ mạbred olo ụlogh io mạar obho ughōl bọ ayist obho. Tamem opopo paruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho ịrol ịva mebōom olo oḅol ạJizos tẹḅokia oghigh odi.
Eedi ịkpete kua, “Uḍighi ḍio miibha bho taḍuma ẹzaal obho, milo arōoy obho itubhe mẹgham.”

ẠJizos odi tạBetani mi totu tạSaimon obho ạnwe mẹzegh ọpueghi riiḅi obho, eedi nele meḍian ponyiin ạni aru aḍigh totu obho. Odi ạbham nꞌobꞌokōtō elo olo ạla mạar magey, ạla nạ mịkanya ikpoki abhin aru, aḅuton mokōtō bho azuom elo bho tẹmu tạJizos kạtubh tụbh tụbh.
Pẹde obo bho idi ạni obho ịrol ịle, onyiin ạkpete kua ạnogho monyiin, “Ebum eeghe ku nọbasi melo bhobho?
Oḅool, kipu ni mịzal ọonir anaira. Ịkpe moḅool ọseghe ikpoki obho ọnogho aruvekulom obho!” Peedi ịrol ịnwiom mạni obho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ịḅelemaan zodi. Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹeḅaghami zodi? Odi naaḍighi mooḅi ạar ạnogho ạami.
Enyina idi nꞌaruvekulom obho kamen kamen olo ologhi enyina aḍigh aḍigh enyina tetue ni ẹlogh ạvo ẹnogho zeedi.
Odi naaḍighi mibha alōor odi. Odi naasigh lōor ạmi melo naḅōruōm mamen toḍi ạami.
Ilōghōm kua mobho kesi kesi olo tọgba mooḅi adōm obhobho, mi toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho, olo tọḅele mọgbaam ghạ ọotua ibha odi aḍighi obho olo.”
Tesuo paJudas Ịskariot, onyiin taḍiōbh nꞌịzal obo nẹtuonom mạJizos, ạḍua ạghi taruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho ạḍeghe nꞌeedi moḅool ạJizos ọnogho eedi.
Ologhi eedi ạḅaal magey mọmoghon ibha odi ạḍeghe ạnogho eedi obho, molo eedi iguan mọnogho odi mikpoki. Ạseghe tamen opopo ạghi taghisigh, paJudas ạrol ạva meepōogh olo oḅool ạJizos.

Tọḅel aḍuma bho tole mẹzaal obho noliom ghạ mạbred olo ayist ilo bho, aḍuma bho nọze ghạ mạnwuny ạraana oliom ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho, piteledōm tạJizos ipuruan kua zodi, “Ezōor ọghi teḍighen ookōbhōghia oseerian ạna mole ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho?”
PạJizos arōm ịzal obo bho nẹtuonom, odi obho ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Iḍigh tẹma bho penyina ọmiin ōoy olo arōol mạfa ạmuum. Ịtuonom odi
mẹghi totu obho odi taḍigh obho, mẹkpete kua mẹnogho mobo bho otu obho, ‘Oōy obo ịtughumiom obho ạkpete kua: oḍighen ẹkpe bho iteledōm ạmi nꞌạami tole mẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho?’
Podi oḍeeriom enyina mobꞌẹkpe mi totu ạnyu olo nọomaar ubur useeri. Todi esi opopo, pesi enyina teekōbhōghia eseerian ezira mole ẹzaal obho.”
Iteledōm obho ịḍua ịghi tẹma bho peedi ịmiin kạar kạar kẹzo bho ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho zeedi obho, keḍio eedi iru iikōbhōghi iseeri molo eedi kele mẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho.
Ạteeny mudule podi ạJizos nꞌiteledōm obho iru.
Eedi idi tizebele nele meḍian obho pạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami ụgba kua nạnogho enyina, onyiin enyina bho atul nꞌạami nale meḍian obho taḅool ni ạami.”
Pasilōor iteledōm obho ịkpoghogho, ōoy amen amen ạke mopuruan odi kua, “Ạami gạ? Ạami gạ?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Onyiin enyina aḍiōbh nꞌịzal obho, onyiin obo bho atul nꞌạami natiom mạbred monyiin esi obho.

Ọony Oōy obho tạpo nạ mẹzo bho ẹegia iigbia bho ạgba aghōl odi tạpo bho, keḍio itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho taḅool mỌony Oōy obho. Odi ōoy obho taḍighi miibha bho, ụmar io nọmar zodi kịneghe ni ẹnogho zodi epu.”
Eedi nele meḍian obho, pạJizos ạseghe mạbred, aakpulughu ạnogho lịsebh, aḅigi ạnogho miteledōm odi ạkpete kua, “Ịdo, oobho piikpōogh alōor obhꞌạmi.”
Keḍio odi aru ạseghe mạḅugha amiim, ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, keḍio odi aru ạnogho zeedi, keḍio oomo eedi iru ịbhogholom.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua, “Iibha pịḅaal obhꞌạmi obho uzu ụnogho mọlogh arōoy obho, ịḅaal ạmi ibha Ẹnaan aghirom ịzo bho.
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ạami ụpoghol mu miim bhibha ninii ạteeny aḍuma bho ạami tạpoghol imoom amiim obho mi tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Eedi ịmoor sọor ịḅele, peedi imute ịghi tobꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Oomo enyina tẹḅele ni ạami ekiil ẹḍua, kẹzo bho ụge tẹegia bho ughōl, ‘Ạami Ẹnaan takigh ni mookō rạana bho keḍio oomo ạraana bho tẹezaranu.’
Oomo ipa ẹkona, amen ạami naaḅetunu tọbho bho pạami ọghi taGalili oḅōrō enyina.”
PaPita ạbhagharana kua, “Oomo ipedi obho ịḅele nạ ni ạna ẹḍua ẹkona ạami ụḅele ḍio ạna ạḍua.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho maPita, “Tụtua mibha ạami tạkpete ạnogho ạna bho, keḍio ạkenegh tạlaal ịzal amen muḍugul aadon, ạna nạabharanaan ạami ịraar amen.”
PaPita akpola meeku odi ạbhagharana kua, “Ạar olo aḍighi ghạ ạami ụbharanaan ạna olo; ughōl nạ tọbho ẹkona pạami ọbho nạ.” Poomo iteledōm ipedi obho ịkpete nạ monyiin ẹzo bho.
Eedi iru isi tesi olo ughōl Getsemani, pạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi, “Ịtol suo ạami ụki uukpulughu.”
Podi ạbham maPita nꞌaJems nꞌạJon nẹki molo odi aḍigh tịitu nꞌegbika,
molo odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịitu ibhꞌekpom ạmi neepu molo ạami nạpo mebum ipa. Ịtol suo meenon ghạ meḅōrō ạami.”
Odi ạghi taghisigh mịbam podi abhumaan tade bho aakpulughu molo eru kạar olo totue ni odi ạḅele moḍigh tamen ọmiinom obho.
Keḍio odi aakpulughu kua, “Ọde ạmi, Ọde ạmi, bọbon ạar olo ịkparanaan ạna moḍighi olo. Tughuneen ạami tọmiinom obhobho. Oomo ipa ẹkona, ḍighi mibha idi tologhi onuma bho, ibha ologhi ạmi ḍio.”
Odi amula aru tịraar iteledōm obho, ịraar eedi nekoḍiiy, pạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho maPita, “Sạimon, ạna nakoḍi? Onyiin ạwa be ạna orue ḍio mọmara oḅōrō ạmi?”
Keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho mịraar eedi, “Ịmara meekpulughu meḅōrō molo enyina imeel eḍigh tọdegh oonon. Idi tologhi obho keḍio iikpōogh obho ịnyaam ilo.”
Podi amina amula ạghi aakpulughu ạkpete monyiin ọnuekpete bho.
Odi amina amula aru iteledōm obho digha ekoḍiiy, irue ḍio mọkparion ariḍien eedi. Eedi ilōghōm nạ ḍio mạar ọkpete ọnogho odi.

Amen odi amula aru mogbẹbhiōm ịraar amen obho podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Enyina idi nini tạrala nepooghia? Nẹeneghiom. Nạateeny men obho. Iinon, nookuugh mỌony Oōy obho siibha bho ọlogh tịnyaam ạravo iḍighi mịkarabh arōoy.
Iḅerenu ọghi. Iinon, oobho odi ōoy obho naḅool ạami obho.”

ẠJizos odi nini nạḍeghe men aJudas, onyiin taḍiōbh nꞌịzal obo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ạḍua aru. Odi abhin obꞌọlogh arōoy ilo iroḍi mibꞌạsumugem ẹgham nꞌarugule eru. Aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌarukenya bho irōm zeedi moru oḅol ạJizos.
Odi obo bho aḅool odi obho nạakpete ạnogho rōoy obho akōl kua, “Obo bho ạami taḅolom obho podi ōoy obho. Iḅol odi, mebhin mẹḍuonom.”
Odi aJudas asi kua be pạghi tạJizos ạkpete kua, “Obo ịtughumiom,” Keḍio aḅolom odi.
Peedi iru iḅol mạJizos ịmaar ikinighi.
Tesuo ponyiin obo bho ịmaraay obho ạnyagh mobꞌạmugem odi aben asōbh maḅeri ẹbana onyiin uvẹmụ ōoy oḅo miiḅua bho.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete amutiom ạnogho zodi aghōl kua. “Enyina ibhin ibꞌạsumugem ẹgham nꞌarugule eru moḅolom ạmi kilo enyina netu moḅol ọḅa?
Oomo aḍuma mobho ạami odi nꞌenyina totu iikpulughu obho nạtughumiom, keḍio enyina iḅol ghạ ḍio ạami. Toḍighi opulughi mibhꞌẹegia bho.”
Tipa bho poomo iteledōm obho ịḅele odi be ighilighu ịḍua.
Onyiin onyughẹel ọony olo abura mịnyeghenyeghe arukpe be mobo ạrol ạtuonom mạJizos. Eedi iru moḅol odi,
ịbham mukpe bhꞌodi, podi ạḅelemaan zeedi mukpe bho, aghiil mẹduḅa ạḍua.
Peedi ibhin mạJizos ịghi totu uvẹmụ ōoy oḅo miiḅua bho. Oomo aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarukenya bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho neekōbhōghian todi otu obho.
APita ạrol ạtuonom kegbeeny kegbeeny ạghi aḍigh ạni togigo otu uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho, atul nꞌobo iḅōrō bho ạrol delede nạanwa nyạn.
Keḍio aruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua bho nꞌoomo obo bho ịrolom delede mọkpe bho ịrol ịva mịigbaay ilo obhin osōbhōm obhumeni ạJizos moghigh odi, keḍio bọbon ạar olo eedi irue mọva olo.
Ọlogh arōoy mobho iru ịgbaay miben iḅologhiom mạJizos keḍio ịigbaay bhꞌeedi iizuan io.
Pẹde arōoy iḅetunu ịgba miben obhobho iḅologhiom mạJizos ighōl kua,
“Ezōor ọmoghon mobho odi ạkpete kua, ‘Ạami tạakpo ni azu motu obhobho uḅōghōm rạvo bho, keḍio ịraar aḍuma neetẹn pạami ọmarami ọnon olo arōoy iḅōghōm io rạvo.’ ”
Ịigbaay eedi arōoy bhibha ẹkona iizuan nạ ḍio.
Puvẹmụ ōoy iḅo miiḅua bho aḅetunu ạmara togbo oomꞌeedi keḍio apuruan kua mạJizos, “Bọbon ọbhagharana olo ạna ụteeny mọbhagharana iibha bho nọgbaaghiom ạna bho olo?”
Ẹzo bho odi ạJizos odi bịrim obho pẹzo odi ạrol, bọbon ọghor ọsir io. Podi uvẹmụ obho amina apuruan kua, “Ạna aKraist obho, Ọony obho tẸnaan eghuan obho?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami odi, keḍio enyina tẹmiin ni mỌony Oōy obho mobho odi delede mi toḍiom ạvo obo bho ạmoogh bọ moomo ẹmiriikpo bho, ạḍua teḅōghōghaan obhꞌạnyu obho natu.”
Puvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho ạnyagha mạsuoma bhꞌodi ạḅa ạkpete kua, “Ụva mu mịnon ịigbaay.
Enyina nẹemoghon mọnuekpete ịkarabh obhꞌodi. Enyina nẹetua ạni ẹko?” Poomo eedi iḍumom ighōl mu neebhum odi, odi olo oghigh.
Pẹde eedi ịke mọsiroghom ịghor mạJizos, keḍio tetu epu maghisigh obhꞌodi, ẹkpol odi, keḍio tẹkpete kua, “Kōl obo bho ạkpol ạna bho.” Obo iḅōrō bho ẹkona iru ibhin odi ịrol iḅōrōgh nạ zodi.
Toomo ipa bho aPita odi nini delede togigo bho, ponyiin ẹbana-ọnyani uvẹmụ ōoy oḅo miiḅua bho aru natẹn tạman odi.
Amen odi ọnyani obho ạmiin maPita nạanwa nyạn obho, podi ọnyani obho ạmaar aanon maPita taghisigh obhꞌodi keḍio ạkpete kua, “Ạna ẹkona ụrolan ạni ghạ mạJizos obhꞌạNazaret.”
PaPita ạbharanaan ạkpete kua, “Ạami ulōghōm io zodi. Ạami ụmoghonyan io ạna mibha ạna nạkpete bho.”
Ẹbana-onyani obho amina ạmiin odi pamina ạrol ạkpete nạ monyiin ẹzo bho ạnogho mobo bho ịmaraay obho aghōl kua, “Odi onyiin eedi arōoy obho.”
PaPita amina nạ ạbharanaan. Ọbam amen atẹn pobo bho ịmaraay obho ịrol isi maPita ighōl kua. “Ạna orue ḍio ạbharanaan mobho ạna otu ḍio monyiin eedi, ebum obho ạna uru molꞌaGalili obho.”
PaPita ạghorogha aghir ịzo aghōl kua. “Ẹnaan ạrabh ạami eru kạar olo ạami nạgba miben. Ạami ulōghōm io mōoy obho enyina nekōl obho.”

Todi amen opopo, pạkenegh ạlaal agbẹbhiōm ịzal ọnu, keḍio aPita ạatua mibha ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho odi, aghōl, “Keḍio ạkenegh tạlaal ịzal ọnu ạna nạabharanaan ịraar amen mobho ạna olōghōm io ạami.” Podi aleghe magey.
Obun ụḍirogh paruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarukenya bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌobo bho ịrolom delede mọkpe bho iikōbhōghian iḍikuan ruzue eedi, ịduughi mạJizos ibhin odi ịghiom maPailet.
PaPailet apuruan kua zodi, “Ạna ọolema arōoy aJu obho?” PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna ku nakōl kua.”
Aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho ịgbaaghiom mạJizos mịkanya ọkpo,
molo aPailet amina apuruan kua zodi, “Bọbon ạar olo ạna nạpagharana olo? Ạna nạmiin oomo ọkpo bho eedi nẹgba ẹḅam tẹmu onuma bho.”
Keḍio ạJizos ọkpete nạ ḍio mạar, molo aPailet ạrol aamōogh.
Kaḍuma kaḍuma olo nole mẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho, paPailet omutiom ghạ onyiin ōoy ikoli olo arōoy obho igbẹel.
Tamen opopo kir ōoy olo ughōl ạBarabas olo odi mikoli. Odi nꞌịnon arōoy irubhe mẹgham eḅe molo odi aghigh mōoy.
Amen obꞌọlogh arōoy obho iikōbhōghian negbẹel maPailet moḍighi ẹzo bho odi naḍighi ghạ bho,
podi apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina negbẹel molo ạami kamutiom kạnogho enyina mọolema arōoy aJu obho bẹle?”
Odi naalōghōm mobho aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho ibhin mạJizos iruom odi mebum obho eedi nebōbhan odi obho be.
Paruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho itiki mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho mogbẹel olo aPailet kamutiom kạnogho zeedi mạBarabas kạḅele mạJizos.
PaPailet amina ạkpete kua ạnogho mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho, “Enyina nẹva molo ạami kaḍighi ẹko kạnogho enyina zodi obo bho enyina ighōl ọolema arōoy aJu obho?”
Peedi imulughu imulumian kua zodi, “Kạn zodi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.”
PaPailet apuruan kua zeedi, “Ikōr oḍigh ịkarabh mibha odi aḍighi?” Peedi imulughu ịḅaagheni raḅeri odi ighōl kua, “Kạn odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.”
APailet ạrol ạva molo odi oḅẹebh tiloghi obꞌọlogh arōoy obho, podi amutiom mạBarabas ạnogho zeedi, keḍio odi arōm ụgurogh mạJizos ạnogho zeedi mọghi ọkan odi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.
Piḅe rạagham obho ibhin mạJizos iḍighom togigo ạraakpe bho (obho aru bọ mogigo otu ạgovono bho), keḍio ibheleghi moomo ipedi obho iru iikōbhōghian.
Keḍio eedi iru ịseghe mọnyeghenyeghe ạdoni ọolema iru ịloki mạJizos, ikpogh eghōony iiḅulom ọolema izu zodi,
keḍio ịrol ibheleghian odi nekōl kua, “Ọodoony aghuḍum ẹrol ẹnogho ạna ọolema aJu obho!”
Keḍio eedi ịseghe mẹkolom ịguroghom ẹmu obhꞌodi, ịsiroghom odi mịghor, etu nạ ezuman egbuluman taghisigh odi.
Eedi ịiḅaghami zodi igbẹbhẹ mibhꞌologhi eedi, peedi ịkporion ạdoni obho eedi ịloki odi obho, iru ịloki odi mạsuoma obhꞌodi, keḍio eedi ibhin odi ịḍuonom mọghi ọkan odi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.

Tebōom obho peedi ịmiinan mōoy olo ughōl ạSaimon ạḍua teḍum natughẹel, peedi ipuom odi mạvo ịnogho odi moorẹeny ẹmigheri tạJizos morōol. (Odi ạSaimon obhobho olꞌẹma olo ughōl Sairini. Odi ọde tẠleksanda nꞌaRufos.)
Peedi ibhin mạJizos iru isi tesi olo ughōl Gọlgota, ẹmu obho. “Esi ịikpo arōoy.”
Eedi iru ịnogho odi miim olo ụguonom mọogho olo ughōl amaa, ạJizos omōrō ḍio mọbhoghol.
Peedi iru ịkan odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho, ịkonyogh mạsuoma bhꞌodi ịsa mẹlel ịḍianogh.
Asokiẹy odi tesughō asuo ụḍirogh men eedi ịkan odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.
Nọogiom ọgba mịkarabh obho odi aḍighi obho. Ụge kua. “
Eedi ẹkan nạ mịnon ịzal ạruḅa arōoy mi tiirẹeny ẹmigheri, onyiin toḍiom odi, opedi obho tekẹeny odi.
[Tiibha bho puḍighi ubhulughiom tibhꞌẹegia bho, obho ụge ughōl kua, “Ụloghom odi tẹku ạruukoma.”]
Arōoy ilo irele netẹn, ịmiin odi pozighe ạruumu eedi ọmologh ọoḅaghami odi oghōl ekua, “Oobho sạna, ạna obo bho ughōl mạna tạakpo mobꞌotu iikpulughu obho, amina aḅōgh teesoḍia ịraar aḍuma be bho.
Esiibha sōor toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho mạbhela lōor obhꞌonuma.”

Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mobho aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho ịrol ịiḅaghami nạ zodi ạJizos onyiin ạkpete ạnogho monyiin aghōl kua, “Odi nạpel ghạ mịnon keḍio alōor odi odi orue ḍio mọbhel.
Ọḍa ọmiin zodi obo bho aghōl modi aKraist obho, ọolema Izirẹl, molo tasōor toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho atu siibha, pezōor omōruōm odi.” Ẹzo bho nạ mobho ịzal obo bho ụkanaghi ạni nạ bho ịiḅaghami nạ zodi.
Aḍio bho ạḍi ịzal abin pọkinim akpe moomo ebhugh obho ạrol milo tegbẹbh ni mịraar ạwa.
Tịraar asuo pạJizos amulughu mimulughu aghōl kua, “Ẹloi, ẹloi, lẹma sạbaktani?” Ẹmu obho ụkpete kua, “Ẹnaan ạmi. Ẹnaan ạmi, eeghe aḍighi kạna aanon ạami atughuneen ḍien?”
Ẹde arōoy obo bho idi ạni todi esi obho ịmoghon mibha odi ạkpete bho pighōl kua, “Enyina mẹmoghon, odi napeleghi mIlaija.”

Ponyiin eedi aghiil ạghi ạseghe mạar olo nạmoobh ghạ ni mụum ạtobhori tamiim ilo neegbōogh ạbhaghari toorẹeny, aabhoghomi aseeriom tọodoronu tạJizos keḍio ạkpete kua, “Iḅōrō ọḍa ọmiin, eru kạar olo Ilaija natu mosōorẹ odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.”
Odi ạJizos aleghe amutiom pạbho.
Obꞌukpe olo ụkpo tobꞌotu iikpulughu ạbaan nạ tạnyu obho asi teetu obho ạḍian ịzal abin.
Uvẹmụ oḅe rạagham obho olo ạmara taghisigh oorẹeny ẹmigheri obho, ạmiin mẹzo ạJizos aleghe ạbho bho, pạkpete kua, “Oōy obhobho ạkar Ọony tẸnaan magey.”
Kir ẹde ạraani ilo ịrol kegbeeny neenon ghạ mibha memutenaan mạJizos obho. Teedi ạraani bhibha paMeri obhꞌạMagdala, nꞌaMeri oniin tọbam aJems nꞌaJosis, nꞌaSalomi.
Eedi nẹetuonom mạJizos kamen obho odi taGalili obho ẹlogh ạvo ẹnogho odi. Ọlogh ịnon ạraani ẹrol ạni nạ, eedi ịtuonom odi eru taJerusạlẹm.

Natuan mudule men aJosef obhꞌẠrimatia aru. Odi ōoy olo aḍigh eghuan mi togbo arōoy osōbh ạraakpe bho, olo nạva mebōom olo oḍigh ạni tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan obho natu obho. Aḍuma popo paḍuma iikōbhōghia (ạḅaal paḍuma obhooghia bho). Tebum, ipa bẹleni, paJosef ạkpo mologhi ạghi taghisigh taPailet agbẹel odi moḍim obho tạJizos.
APailet aamōogh mọmoghon mobho ạJizos nạabho kọkanya amen, podi abheleghi muvẹmụ iḅe rạagham obho apuruan odi meru kạar olo ạJizos nạabho kọkanya amen.
Amen aPailet ạmoghon mibhꞌọnu odi oḅe rạagham ōoy obho podi ạkpete ạnogho maJosef mọghi ọseghe oḍim obho.
AJosef ạghi paghō mạbalala ukpe, ạghi asōorẹ mạJizos, ạseghe mạbalala bho abhurughiom, ạlogh aḍi toogu olo ugbo tạrubharakpar, keḍio aakilimi mọbharakpar akpereghiom mọnu oogu obho.
AMeri obhꞌạMagdala nꞌaMeri oniin taJosis ịrol ạni ẹmiin mesi obho uḍi mạJizos obho.
Aḍuma obhooghia bho aru atẹn paMeri obhꞌạMagdala nꞌaMeri oniin taJems nꞌaSalomi ighōoy ralo ịghi mosigh oḍim obho tạJizos.
Obun ụḍirogh ạSondi, nakpōorōn kua be, peedi ịghi toogu obho.

Tebōom obho, peedi nẹḍeghe ghạ ekōl kua, “Okōr ōoy taakilimi mọbharakpar obho atughuneen tọnu oogu obho ạnogho ezira?” (Odi ọbharakpar obho ạbugh magey.) Eedi isi ịmiin, nookilimi mọbharakpar obho ọseghe kọkanya amen.
Peedi iḍigh toogu obho. Eedi iḍigh peedi ịmiin monyughẹel ọony odi delede toḍiom ạvo bho. Odi ōoy obho ạlokia mọḅaal ạdoni. Eedi ịmiin odi peedi ikperenom magey.

Podi ōoy obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Íkperenom ghạ. Ạami naalōghōm mobho enyina nẹva mạJizos obhꞌạNazaret, obho ụkan bọ toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho. Odi olo suo. Odi naaḅetunu tọbho bho. Iinon, obho esi obho ụmuneen odi obho.
Esiibha, ịki mẹgba miibha bho mẹnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi nꞌaPita meghōl kua, ‘Odi naatẹn ghạ nạki taGalili. Tepa penyina ọmiin odi kẹzo bho odi ạkpete bho.’ ”
Peedi imute toogu obho ịke moghiil mebum aruugu obho nesibh zeedi obho. Aruugu obho ipu ni molo eedi ịgba nạ ḍio mạar ẹnogho mōoy.
ẠJizos aḅetunu tọbho bho, obun ụḍirogh ạSondi, podi amutenaan maMeri obhꞌạMagdala, obho odi abhirighan moḍual ịkarabh ạruumugh tẹmu obho.
Podi ạghi ạgba ạnogho mobo bho nꞌodi iru monyiin ẹku obho. Eedi nẹetu nelegheey.
Amen eedi ịmoghon mobho ạJizos odi nini nꞌaghuḍum obho, nꞌobho odi aMeri nạamiin odi obho, eedi imōruōm io.
Ipa bho iru itẹn pạJizos anwia lōor odi amutenaan mịzal arōoy ilo ịḍua tobꞌẹma bho nẹki tọbam ẹma.
Peedi imula iru ịgba ịnogho mipedi obho, keḍio eedi irue ḍio momōruōm.

Ikunughi obho podi amutenaan maḍiōbh nꞌonyiin obo bho ịtuonom ghạ zodi obho mi tamen olo eedi nele meḍian, keḍio odi aru asi zeedi mebum obho eedi ịteeny io mologhi omōruōm obho nꞌebum obho eedi ịḅaar ẹmu imōruōm io mobo bho ịmiin odi taghuḍum obho.
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịki toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho mẹgba mooḅi adōm obho mẹnogho kōoy kōoy.
Kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm kazua mụum tọpel ni, obo bho imōruōm io bho tọtu ni mịiruan apum ọnogho zeedi.
Iibha pelẹgh ịnyaam ilo tẹtol ẹnogho mobo bho imōruōm obho; eedi tepirighan ni mịkarabh ạruumugh taḍien ạmi; eedi tẹkpaay ni mọnu ạraama ilo eedi dẹtuugha ghạ ḍio;
eedi ẹbham ooḍigh bolobolo ẹbhoghol ọdiḅo, ọfu be, ạar olo teḍighi zeedi olo; eedi ẹḅamaghi rạvo eedi tobo bho nạnwe bho, podi oḍum.”
ẠJizos ạḍeghe mipa bho ạnogho zeedi ạḅele pụseghe zodi ụsiinom tạnyu obho odi ạrol delede mi toḍiom ạvo tẸnaan.
Peedi iteledōm obho ịghi kesi kesi ịgba mooḅi adōm obho, molo Obạmọogh obho ạnogho zeedi melẹgh ịnyaam aḍighi aḍeeriom rōoy mobho ibha eedi ịgba bho iru magey.]
[Pạraani obho ịghi taPita nꞌạburubulol odi ịgba ịnogho zeedi meekpōogh oomo ibha ụgba ụkpete ụnogho zeedi obho.

Iibha iru itẹn, pạJizos nịvo nịvo arōm miteledōm obhꞌodi amutiom mọḍua temutonom ọghi teḍighom aghōzōgh obho, mọgba adōm iigbia bho nꞌadōm obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho, obho nạnogho mịbhelegha olo kamen kamen obho.]
Ooḅi ạTiofilos, ọlogh arōoy nẹelogh mẹmu mọge omutiom ọkpo ibha imute bọ teesoḍia ezira bho.
Eedi ịge mibha obo bho ịmiin ạni bọ mọkpo bhibha kọḅel egbiom obho ịgba ịnogho ezōor ibhin nạ nẹgba eelelemi toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, ooḅi ạTiofilos, ōoy oḍigh eghuan, imina ni ẹneghe nạ tạmi, tibha ạami nạamaar ạtuugha ạmoghonyan moomo ọkpo bho imute bọ kọḅel egbiom obho, mọge ọnogho onuma men onyiin onyiin mẹzo ọkpo bho imute.
Ạami nạge miibha bho molo ạna ạmaar alōghōm tagey obho tilo igboloman nꞌoomo ibha nọotughumiom ạna bho.
