Taruḍuma tạHerod ọolema bhꞌaJudia, kir onyiin ōoy oḅu miiḅua olo ughōl ạZekaraya. Odi olo ẹku tAbaija. Ạni odi, Ẹlizabet, olo eghun otu tEron.
Ịzal eedi iiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan, olo neerele izueni toomo iilōgh obho nꞌoomo ịto tObạmọogh obho mi tẹzo olo ịghor ạman ilo nolo.
Eedi ịteeny io mọony, tebum obho Ẹlizabet aru mẹmar ạni obho. Ịzal eedi ẹkona nẹemar ẹkpo nạ magey.
Ạteeny monyiin aḍuma, podi ạZekaraya naḍighi moḍighi oḅu iiḅua bho mi taghisigh tẸnaan tebum obho nạateeny maruḍuma oḍighi ẹku obhꞌodi obho.
Tẹzo eḍighiom ạar arōoy iḅu miiḅua bho, peedi ịsa mẹlel keḍio ẹlel obho ameelom odi mọsu ạnyan mọkpo ooḅi eḍu alōor tẹede iiḅua bho.
Ạteeny mamen ọsu ọkpo bho, podi ạZekaraya aḍigh tẹkpe iigbia bho, obꞌọlogh arōoy ipedi obho ịrol totu iikpulughu obho neekpulughu ghạ.
Potelema tObạmọogh obho aru amutenaan zodi ạmara toḍiom ạvo ẹede iiḅua bho.
Tamen obho ạZekaraya ạmiin bọ zodi obho, palōor obhꞌodi amuugh, aruugu imina nạ isibh zodi.

Keḍio otelema bho ạkpete ạnogho zodi aghōl kua, “Ughiil ghạ ruugu. Nọomoghon miikpulughu obhꞌonuma. Ẹlizabet ạni obhꞌonuma tạmaranaan ạna monyiin olobhir-ọony. ẠJon paḍien obho ạna takōl zodi ọony obho.
Ạna tabo ni nꞌọḅaal ologhi. Eruom arōoy tẹḅaal nạ ni mologhi tebum ẹmara ọony obhobho.

Odi tatu mobꞌogbōgh ōoy mi taghisigh tObạmọogh obho. Odi ọbhoghol io miim bolobolo ịighuanaan amiim ilo tekigh odi. Ẹmugh Iigbia bho tamuzō ni talōor odi ạseghe zodi tamen olo odi odi ni tọbaraka oniin odi.
Eruom arōoy Izirẹl mobho odi takireni atuom mObạmọogh obho, Ẹnaan obhꞌeedi.

Odi tapin tịnyaam ẹmugh tIlaija atẹnōm taghisigh Obạmọogh obho, aḍighi miloghi eedi obo bho iru bụrude bho mokiton tạrunwuny obho, akireni mobo bho neḅom ghạ mẹmu obho ạnogho molōghōm ạar oḍighi iiḅi arōoy. Odi tạpam miloghi arōoy tObạmọogh obho aseerian zodi.”
PạZekaraya ạkpete kua ạnogho motelema bho, “Toḍighi ẹko kạami alōghōm miibha bho? Ạami sōoy olo mạakpo, ạni ạmi ẹkona nạakpo nạ.”
Potelema bho ạḅooranaan kua zodi, “Ạami paGebriel obo bho nạmara ghạ bọ taghisigh tẸnaan obho. Urōm ạami moru ọgba ọnogho onuma nꞌoḍeeriom onuma mooḅi adōm obhobho.
Tebum obho ạna omōruōm io bho bẹleni, ạna tatẹn mokpom ụka ninii abaabha bho tetu emute.”
Tamen obhobho, arōoy obho neḅōrō ghạ mạZekaraya, keḍio neemōogh tibha iḍighi bọ kodi nabia mẹzo bho mi tologhi ẹkpe iigbia bho.
Tamen obho odi amute aru bọ bho, odi orue mu mọkpete ạar, peedi ilōghōm mobho odi nạamiin ghịiny tologhi ẹkpe iigbia bho. Odi ạnwaaghi rạvo bhꞌodi be, ọkpete ḍio mạar.
Ipa iru itẹn tamen obho aruḍuma ibhꞌiiḅua bhꞌodi neegbẹbh obho, podi atẹn aghẹel totu odi.
Ịbam aruḍuma itẹn pẸlizabet ạni obhꞌodi aamōr ạḅoki meghun aḍien obhꞌodi moomo ōogh ụvanyu,
keḍio aghōl kua, “Iibha pẹzo Obạmọogh obho naaḍighi ạami taruḍuma bho odi aanon bọ zạmi obho, mọseghe otughuneen ạregheer alōor obhꞌạmi teesoḍia arōoy.”
Togbẹbhiōm odiin ụvanyu teghun obhꞌodi, pẸnaan arōm motelema bhꞌodi aGebriel mọghi tonyiin obꞌẹma mi taGalili olo ughōl ạNazaret,
mọghi tonyiin ọkpur ọnyani olo ōoy olo ughōl aJosef olo eghun otu taDevid naatuḅeen mọkala. Aḍien odi ọnyani obho ughōl aMeri.
Keḍio otelema bho ạghi aḍighanaan zodi ọnyani obho aghōl kua, “Ologhi onuma ạḅaal! Ạna nạateeny mẹneghe ẹmugh, Obạmọogh obho odi nꞌạna.”
Tamen obho odi ọnyani obho ạmiin zodi obho, pologhi obhꞌodi agu mi tebum ọnuekpete bho, podi ạlogh aseeri tologhi odi mẹmu oḍigh ipeleghian bhibha.
Keḍio otelema bho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi ọnyani obho, “AMeri, ughiil gha ruugu. Ạna nạateeny mẹneghe ẹmugh tạvo tẸnaan.
Keḍio nonon ni, ạna taamōr tọbaraka onuma, ạmar molobhir ọony, keḍio ạna takōl ḍien obhꞌodi ạJizos.
Tọbughe ni zodi. Ighōlaan aḍien odi, Ọony tẸnaan obho ạbugh bọ apu obho, keḍio Ẹnaan Obạmọogh obho tạnogho zodi mẹtolom emuna ẹma bho taDevid ọde bhꞌodi.
Odi tạda motu tạJekob kamen kamen. Ẹdaam ẹma bhꞌodi ikunughi olo.”
Keḍio aMeri ạkpete kua ạnogho motelema bho, “Iibha bho teḍighi ẹko kemute tamen olo ạami dolōghōm io molobhir ọony?”
Potelema bho ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ẹmugh Iigbia bho tatuanaan ạna keḍio ịnyaam tẸnaan obho ạbugh bọ apu obho tasōorōm ạna, molo odi Ọony obho ạna tạmar bọ bho tokōl zodi Ọony Iigbia nꞌỌony tẸnaan.
Nonon ni, Ẹlizabet ọzaamani obhꞌonuma obho ughōl bọ mẹmar obho, toomo iibha odi nạakpo bho ẹkona naamōr monyiin olobhir ọony. Oobho pogbẹbhiōm odiin ụvanyu mi teghun obhꞌodi.
Tịto tẸnaan bọbon ạar olo tạkparanaan zodi moḍighi olo.”
Keḍio aMeri ạkpete kua, “Emutenaan ni zạmi, ọnyani ẹbana tObạmọogh obho, kẹzo ọnuekpete bhꞌonuma.” Podi otelema bho ạḅele zodi ạḍua.
PaMeri aḅetunu taruuḍuma bhibha abhin nꞌeghiil ạghi tẹma olo odi taruugum obho mi tebhugh obhꞌaJuda,
ạghi aḍigh totu tạZekaraya abheleghian mẸlizabet.
Tamen obho Ẹlizabet ạmoghon oghōrōkō ipeleghian obho taMeri obho, pọony obho apẹl tologhi ọbaraka bhꞌodi, keḍio Ẹmugh Iigbia bho aru amuzō talōor tẸlizabet.
Keḍio odi Ẹlizabet abhin nꞌogbōgh oghōrōkō ạkpete kua amutiom, “Ạlisebh ẹrolan ạna tesooḍia ạraani, ạlisebh ẹrolan nạ mọony obho ọbaraka onuma.
Eeghe kiibha bho nemutenaan ạmi molo ạna oniin tObạmọogh ạami obho ku tamina atu mọmiinan ạmi?
Mịin, onyiin amen obho oghōrōkō ipeleghian obhꞌonuma iru iḍigh taraḅeri ạmi obho, pọony obho abhin tọḅaal ologhi ạrol tọbaraka bhꞌạmi apẹl.
Ạlisebh ẹrolan ạna obo bho umōruōm mobho ibha Obạmọogh obho abhin tọnu odi ạkpete amutiom ạnogho ạna bho tẹtuugh ni nạ mẹzo bho emutenaan ạna bho.”
Keḍio aMeri ạkpete kua,
“Ẹmugh obhꞌạmi nakueni mObạmọogh obho,
Ologhi ạmi nạḅaal nạ magey tebum Ẹnaan Ọpela bhꞌạmi.
Odi nạasuanaan zạmi, ọnyani ẹbana bhꞌodi, ghụsan aḍien, molo ạseghe dodon ạghi taghisigh oomo arōoy tẹnogho ni zạmi lịsebh,
tebum ibꞌọkpo bho Ẹnaan oomo ẹmiriikpo bho naaḍighi ạnogho ạami obho. Iigbia paḍien obhꞌodi.
Odi nạsuanaan ghạ ghụsan aḍien moomo obo bho ighiilaan odi obho ạseghe tọoke asi tọoke.
Odi naabhaghami mạvo ịnyaam obhꞌodi, ạazaramiom mịbughia lōor arōoy obho nꞌoomo ịitua bhꞌeedi.
Odi naasōrōghi moomo ibꞌạruula bho mi tẹtolom ọda ẹma bhꞌeedi, apōbhe mobo bho isōoriōm lōor obho.
Odi nạaḅirogh miiḅi ọkpo ạperiom mobo bho nẹpozu mọkoony obho, apirighanogh mạruula bho moobho ạravo.
Odi nạalogh mạvo ạpel marōoy Izirẹl ạnwuny obhꞌodi, ạpam oguan obhꞌodi kẹzo bho odi aguanaan bọ mạburude bhꞌezira obho.
Odi nạatua ạsuanaan mEbrạhạm nꞌoomo ạnwuny ọobhe bhꞌodi ghụsan aḍien kamen kamen.”
AMeri ạrolan mẸlizabet milo tegbẹbh ni ịraar ụvanyu keḍio agbi moghẹel.
Iru igbẹbh men obho Ẹlizabet tạmar obho, podi aru ạmar molobhir ọony.
Arōoy okōol odi nꞌaburumōr odi iru ịmoghon mobꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien obho Obạmọogh obho nạasuanaan zodi obho, peedi iru itul nꞌodi nẹḅaal mologhi.
Ọony obho agbẹbh mạbhenya aḍuma, peedi iru iḍun mọony bho, nẹva ghạ maḍien olo oghōl odi, keḍio iru moghōlōm odi maḍien ọde odi, ạZekaraya,
poniin obhꞌodi agin aghōl maḍien odi tokōl mạJon.
Keḍio eedi ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Toomo eghun enyina bọbon onyiin ōoy olo ughōl ạJon olo.”
Peedi ịtuoghom rạvo ịnogho mọde bho ipuruan maḍien obho tokōl mọony obho,
podi ạnwaaghi rạvo agbẹel moobolom, ụnogho zodi, podi ạge aghōl maḍien ọony obho ughōl ạJon.
Tamen opopo, pọnu obhꞌodi ạkpatanu, keḍio odi ạke mọkpete ạar nꞌobuom Ẹnaan.
Keḍio aruugu isibh moomo obo bho ịrol bọ ikuōm zeedi obho, molo oomo ọnuekpete bhibha ilela ni toomo ebhugh obhꞌaJudia.
Oomo obo bho ịmoghon bọ miibha bho ibhin ịlogh tiloghi eedi ighōl kua, “Okōr oḍigh ōoy mobho odi ọony obhobho tamute atu ạtol?”, ebum obho ạvo tObạmọogh obho odi nꞌodi obho.
PẸmugh Iigbia bho aru amuzō talōor tạZekaraya ọde bhꞌodi, molo odi ạmiin mạghiiny bhibha ạkpete kua,
“Ạlisebh ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan, obo bho ạmoogh bọ mIzirẹl obho. Odi naaru apeleghian ạta marōoy odi.
Odi naamutiom mi totu taDevid oteledōm obhꞌodi ạnogho zezira mọoghuanaan ọpela,
kẹzo bho arizil iigbia bho ibhin tọnu obhꞌodi ịkpete imutiom kooḍuul ageedi obho,
modi tạpel ni zezira atughuneen tobo ọlogh aḍien ezira, ạlogh ạvo ạnogho ezira mi toomo obo bho nẹlogh ezira ḍien obho.
Odi tạsuanaan ni ghụsan aḍien kẹzo bho odi aguanaan migbaany ạburude bhꞌezira bho, ạatua nạ mịzo iigbia bhꞌodi.
Ịzo bho odi aghiran bọ ạnogho mEbrạhạm ọde bhꞌezira, ạmara bọ mọbhel ezira otẹnẹ mi tạravo obo ọlogh aḍien ezira bho molo ezira olōghōm odi tẹzo olo aruugu ilo,
molo ezira otu miiḅi arōoy ilo ịkarabh ilo taghisigh odi mi toomo aghuḍum ezira.
Keḍio ạna, ọony obhꞌạmi, Ẹnaan takōl ạna ozil tẸnaan obho ạbugh bọ apu obho. Ạna pobo taḍionom taghisigh mObạmọogh obho moselemi ebōom obhꞌodi,
nꞌọgba ọnogho arōoy obhꞌodi mobho tọpel ni zeedi mi tọḅelemaan ịkarabh obhꞌeedi,
ebum obho Ẹnaan obhꞌezira ạteeny magey mọsu ạghusan aḍien. Amen odi Obạmọogh obho tatu, podi oḍighi ẹḅaal obhꞌodi kasōorōm ezira kaghōzōgh obun ụḍirogh obho
mọnogho ẹḅaal mobo bho ọkinim ọbho naakpiom obho nꞌoreliom ọlogh ezira taraabōom ekima.”
Keḍio ọony obho abhōbh ạbugh molo ẹmugh obhꞌodi ạghua nạ magey, keḍio odi arugh ghạ tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho ninii aru ạteeny ḍuma bho odi tamutiom lōor odi ạnogho marōoy Izirẹl obho.
Taruḍuma bhibha, aSiza Ọgostos mạlogh molōgh, molo oomo arōoy obho odi ạda bọ bho kẹghi kẹgian riḍien eedi molōghōm ọnu arōoy obho.
Ọḅel ọḅalagh arōoy obho, ụke tamen obho aKuirinios ạda bọ maruubhugh aSiria bho.
Tebum ipa bẹleni, pu kōoy kōoy aghẹel tẹma eedi.
Keḍio aJosef ạḍua tạNazaret obhꞌaGalili aghẹel tạBetilihem ẹma bho ụmar bọ maDevid obho, tebhugh obhꞌaJudia, ebum obho odi aru molo eghun otu taDevid.
Keḍio odi ạbhamam aMeri, obho odi atuḅeen bọ mọkala bho, ạghi mọgian ariḍien obho. Amen opopo aMeri odi nꞌeghun.

Eedi isi tạBetilihem otu olo eedi keḍigh ạni mi tarutu isoloman obho olo mu. Keḍio nạateeny migun eghun obhꞌodi, podi aru ạmar mọḅel ọony obhꞌodi ạseghe marukpe abhurughiom mọony obho ạmuneen tesi olo nookō ghạ mịnam.
Tebughotu ẹma bho, kir iikō rạana ilo neekō rạana eedi muḍughul obho, mi tọtu aruugum.
Keḍio otelema tObạmọogh obho aru ạteeny miikō rạana bho. Molo ẹḅaal eghuan tObạmọogh obho asōorōm zeedi akō akitonom. Aruugu esibh zeedi magey,
keḍio otelema bho ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ighiil ghạ ruugu. Ạami uru mọgba ọnogho enyina mooḅi adōm olo tạnogho moomo arōoy mọḅaal ologhi.
Uḍugul obho aadon, nọomar ọnogho zenyina mi tẹma bho taDevid mọony olo tatu mỌpela bhꞌenyina, aKraist Obạmọogh obho.
Ẹzo olo oḍighi oḍeeriom enyina, enyina tẹmiin ni mọbumoony olo ubhurughiom ukpe uuta, ụmuneen tesi olo nookō ghạ mịnam.”
Tonyiin amen obho, pọlogh itelema tẸnaan iru ikō ikitonom mọḅel otelema bho nebuom Ẹnaan, nekōl kua,
“Eghuan ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan tạnyu obho.
Ekima ẹrol ẹnogho marōoy ibhꞌade bho, obo bho iḍigh tologhi odi obho.”
Amen itelema bho ịḅele eedi ịḍua ịsiin tạnyu obho, piikō rạana bho, onyiin ạkpete kua ạnogho monyiin, “Itu ọghi tạBetilihem ọmiin ạni mibha neemute bho, ibha Obạmọogh obho nạagba ạnogho ezira bho.”
Peedi ibhin nꞌeghiil ịghi ịmiin maMeri nꞌaJosef nꞌọony obho nọomuneen tesi obho nookō ghạ mịnam obho.
Amen eedi ịmiin mọony obho, peedi ibhin mọnuekpete bho ụgba bọ ụnogho zeedi obho milo igboloman nꞌodi ọony obho ilelemi toomo ariisi.
Ọnuekpete iikō rạana bho ịnogho ni mobꞌeemōogh moomo obo bho ịmoghon obho.
Keḍio aMeri abhin moomo iibha bho aseeri tologhi odi nạatua ghạ.
Keḍio iikō rạana bho imula nẹnogho meghuan nꞌiibhughumi mẸnaan nebuom zodi mi toomo ibha eedi nẹemoghon ịmiin nạ kẹzo bho itelema bhꞌodi ịgba ịnogho zeedi obho.
Igbẹbh mạbhenya aḍuma, puru uḍun mọony obho keḍio ughōl ḍien obhꞌodi ạJizos, aḍien obho otelema bho tẸnaan ạnogho bọ zodi kamen obho domōr io zodi obho.
Ạteeny mamen oḍighi ạar ẹmu aghuḍum ọony obho kẹzo bho iilōgh obho taMozis ịtughumiom bho, paJosef nꞌaMeri ibhin mạJizos ịghi taJerusạlẹm ịlogh zodi tạvo tObạmọogh obho,
kẹzo bho nọoge bọ tiilōgh obho tObạmọogh ughōl mu, “Kọkpana kọkpana ọony obhin ghạ oru mọkool ụkool Obạmọogh obho.”
Eedi ịghi nạ mọtunom ạar “mịzal aruukumude bolobolo ịzal aruukumude ạbadi,” ọnogho Ẹnaan kẹzo bho ịto bhꞌodi.
Tamen opopo kir ōoy olo odi taJerusạlẹm olo ughōl ạSimion. Odi ooḅi ōoy olo eḍighiom ạar odi isel ni taghisigh tObạmọogh obho keḍio naḅōrō nạ mamen tọta mIzirẹl.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho odi nꞌodi molo aguanaan zodi modi ọmiin io mọbho ninii odi ạmiin maKraist obho Obạmọogh obho aguan mIzirẹl obho.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho areliom ni zodi ạghi tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho tamen obho ọde nꞌoniin tạJizos ibhin zodi iru ịloghom moḍighinaan odi kẹzo bho iilōgh obho ịtughumiom obho,
podi abhin zodi ạlogh tạravo odi nạsebh mẸnaan nakōl kua,
“Esiibha bho, Obumọogh, ibha ạna uguan obho nẹetuugh emute.
Ḅẹlemaan ọony ẹbana bhꞌonuma aghẹel nꞌekima,
ebum obho ạami nạamiinom nꞌikpo ariḍien ạmi mịbhelegha bhꞌonuma,
ibha ạna naaḍighi umutiom taghisigh arōoy oomo aruubhugh obho.
Odi pẹḅaal obho tasōorōm moomo arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho,
obho tạnogho meghuan marōoy obhꞌonuma Izirẹl.”
Ọnuekpete bhibha tạSimion, ibha igboloman nꞌọony obho, ẹnogho meemōogh magey mọde nꞌoniin obho.

Keḍio ạSimion aru ạnogho zeedi lịsebh ạkpete kua ạnogho maMeri oniin obhꞌodi, “Mọghon. Ọony obhobho Ẹnaan ạson ạseghe mọbhel nꞌobhiẹmi ọlogh arōoy mi tIzirẹl. Odi tatu mạmagh olo ạḍua tẸnaan aru olo ọlogh arōoy tẹkpete ni zodi ẹpue,
keḍio odi tatubhughiom miloghi arōoy aseeri mozōol. Ịitu tegimogh ni nạ mekpom onuma eveleghi kilo ụseghe mobꞌạmugem ẹgham ịzal ạman nogimoghom.”
Onyiin ozil-ạni olo ughōl Ạna ạrol nạ suo. Odi ọnyani tạFanuel obho eghun otu obho tẠsa. Odi ạḅal ilom moḍual ạsia be, polom odi ạbho,
keḍio odi aḍum aghuḍum ekpukele ạraani mịzal ạraala nꞌinya ạsia ạkpo. Odi omute ghạ ḍio totu iikpulughu obho, naakpulughu ghạ mẸnaan suo muḍugul nꞌootaany ạtol ghạ nạ mọkoony mebum iikpulughu.

Tonyiin odi amen obho aMeri nꞌaJosef ibhin mọony obho iru obho, podi aru nạ nạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan keḍio nạgbaay mọkpo ilo igboloman nꞌọony obho nạnogho moomo obo bho neḅōrō mamen Ẹnaan tatu ạta maJerusạlẹm obho.
Eedi iḍighi ịḅele moomo ibha Obạmọogh obho ạto ạnogho eedi moḍighi obho, peedi imula irughẹel tạNazaret ẹma bhꞌeedi mi tebhugh obhꞌaGalili.
Keḍio ọony obho abhōbh ạghua magey, ạteeny nạ magey molōghōm ạar, tebum obho ạlisebh tẸnaan idi nꞌodi obho.
Ạla ạgba atẹn mạla, ọde nꞌoniin tạJizos ịḅele ghạ ḍio mọghi taJerusạlẹm ole ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho.
ẠJizos aru agbẹbh maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạsia peedi ịbhamam odi ịghi tẹzaal obho kẹzo bho eedi nẹki ghạ bho.
Aruḍuma ẹzaal obho iru igbẹbh, peedi itẹn nekẹel, ạJizos ạrol tạman mi taJerusạlẹm, ọde nꞌoniin odi ilōghōm io mobho odi odi tạman.
Eedi nẹetua ghạ ekōl modi odi ạni togbo arōoy obho. Eedi neerele moomo okpom aḍuma keḍio eedi igbi mọotua ọva odi mi taburumōr nꞌạburubulol eedi.
Eedi ịva eedi ịmiin io, peedi imula taJerusạlẹm mọva odi.
Ịraar aḍuma itẹn, peedi iru ịmiin odi tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho mạarol delede nꞌobo ịtughumiom arōoy aJu obho nạmoghonyan apuruanagh eedi miipuruan.
Molo oomo obo bho nẹnaghanyan zodi obho iimōogh ni mi tẹzo bho odi ạmaar nạmoghonyan ạpagharanaay miipuruan arōoy obho.
Amen ọde nꞌoniin odi iru ịmiin odi peedi iimōogh keḍio oniin odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ọony, ebum eeghe kạna aḍighi kua zezōor? Ọde onuma nꞌạami nọova ạna ninii nꞌịitu.”
Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua “Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹva zạmi, enyina ilōghōm io mobho ạami tạtol ni totu Ọde bhꞌạmi gạ?”
Eedi ịmoghonyan io mọnuekpete bho odi ạkpete ạnogho zeedi obho.
Podi ạJizos ạtuonuman zeedi aghẹel tạNazaret ẹma bhꞌeedi, aghiilaan ghạ nạ zeedi magey, keḍio oniin odi ạminogh aseeri moomo ọkpo bhibha mi tekpom obhꞌodi.
Keḍio ạJizos abhōbh ạbugh magey mi tozu alōor obho nꞌolōghōm ạar ẹmu, molo odi aru aḍigh tologhi tẸnaan nꞌarōoy magey.

Tạla bho agbẹbhiōm bọ ḍiōbh nꞌōogh ạsia, obho aTaibirios ạda bọ maRom obho, ạPontios Pailet nạda nạ maJudia, ạHerod nạda maGalili, aFilip umōr odi ạHerod nạda mebhugh Ituria nꞌaTrakonitis, aLisanias nạda mebhugh Abilini,
keḍio Ạnas nꞌạKayafas paruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua bho; tamen obhobho pamen ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan aru tạJon ọony obho tạZekaraya mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho.
Odi ạJon akiton ghạ toomo aruubhugh obho idi bọ tọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan nạkpete ghạ kua, “Ikiraan toḍighi ịkarabh enyina meru mezua mụum molo Ẹnaan ạḅelemaan enyina mịkarabh enyina.”
Iibha bho iḍighi imuzeni tọnuekpete tẠizaya ozil obho, ibha odi ạge bọ tọbhereer obhꞌodi aghōl kua,
“Oōy odi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho namulughu akōl kua,
‘Iselemi mebōom obho tObạmọogh obho meseerian zodi.
Iḍighi ebōom obhꞌodi ạmaar asel.
Iḅologh moomo ariisi ilo isōor megbo meelelemi mibꞌaruugum nꞌaruuḅum obho,
meseleey moomo ạrugul obho,
meelelemi moomo ariisi olo idi tạghala tạghala,
molo oomo arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho ẹmiin mịbhelegha bho tẸnaan.’ ”
Pọlogh arōoy iru tạJon molo odi kazuughiom eedi mụum, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Sọo, ịikpolodu, okōr ōoy ạkpete ạnogho enyina moru molo enyina emuzōnaan mi tạlile bho tẸnaan obho natu obho.

Iḍighi mọkpo lo tẹgba emutiom mobho enyina neeghiraan tịkarabh araabōom enyina. Íbo ghạ mebum obho Ebrạhạm aru mobꞌọde ezira. Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, Ẹnaan tatue ni aḅẹriōn rụbharakpar bhibha aḍighi atẹnẹ nwụny tEbrạhạm.
Nooseeri makubu tamen obhobho molo olẹrẹghiom iirẹeny obho ki taruutu obhꞌeedi. Koorẹeny koorẹeny olo ọloki ḍio miiḅi itu tolẹr ni otōbh ọlogh nyạn.”
Parōoy obho ipuruan kua zodi, “Ezōor oḍighi ẹko siibha bho?”
Podi ạbhagharana aghōl kua, “Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny ịzal ạrusuoma ạseghe monyiin ạnogho mọnon ōoy olo ọteeny io mạsuoma. Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny eḍien ole ạḍian mịnon arōoy.”
Pẹtede igunogh raasōgh arōoy ilo iru nạ todi mozua ạmuum ipuruan kua zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, ezōor oḍighi ạni ẹko?”
Podi ạbhagharana kua, “Ígun ghạ mepuom mibha urōm enyina mogun obho.”

Ẹde iḅe rạagham obho ipuruan nạ kua zodi, “Ezōor ạni kẹko?” Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Íḅum ghạ mẹḅoor ikpoki arōoy, bolobolo mẹgbaam rōoy miben ọkpe. Ibha nọkpe enyina bho ẹgbeghan talōor enyina.”
Parōoy ịrol iḍuom ologhi. Eedi nẹetua ghạ ekōl mụmaar suo odi ạJon paKraist obho,

podi ạJon ạkpete ạnogho oomo eedi aghōl kua, “Ạami ubhin mụum nazuughiom zenyina keḍio kir ōoy olo natu olo apu ạami, ạami ugbẹbhan io todi mozuman ọkporion arōkōrō odi. Odi tapin mẸmugh Iigbia bho nꞌạnyan azuughiom enyina mụum.
Ọosuom ale odi odi tạvo odi mọosuom ale bho. Odi taḅunyogh ni aakōbhōghi moomo ikpo ale bho akubh totu ighuale odi, azu mirumutum ale bho ạsu tạnyan olo neemōr kamen kamen.”
Odi ạJon abhin oḍigh kẹrekere ẹzo ạgbaam mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho ạnogho liiki marōoy aJu obho,
keḍio odi ạgba ghạ nạ amutiom mịkarabh tạHerod, ebum obho odi ạghi abhin mạHerodias, ạni umōr odi, nꞌịnon ịkarabh ilo odi naḍighiiy.
Tilo ipuom suo, odi ạHerod aḅol mạJon ạloghom mikoli.
Oomo arōoy obho iru izua mụum ịḅele, pạJizos aru ạni azua mụum.

Odi naakpulughu, pạnyu obho akpẹerunu keḍio Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạbheebh keekumude asōorōm odi. Keḍio oghōrōkō ạḍua nạ tạnyu obho aru ạkpete kua, “Ạna pogini Ọony oḍigh ologhi ạmi. Eḍighiom ạar onuma eḍigh tologhi ạmi.”
ẠJizos ạke moḍighi odi tamen olo odi naagbẹbh maḍisibh ḍiōbh ạsia. Odi ọony taJosef, kẹzo bho arōoy negbiom ghạ mologhi obho. Odi aJosef, ọony taHilai,
ọony tạMatat, ọony taLivai, ọony taMelki, ọony taJanai, ọony taJosef,
ọony tạMatatias, ọony tẸmos, ọony tạNehum, ọony tẸsili, ọony taNagai,
ọony tạMaat, ọony tạMatatias, ọony taSemein, ọony tạJosek, ọony tạJoda,
ọony tạJoanan, ọony taRisa, ọony tạZerubabel, ọony tạSealtiel, ọony taNeri,
ọony taMelki, ọony tẠdi, ọony tạKosam, ọony tẸlmadan, ọony tẸr,
ọony taJosua, ọony tEliezer, ọony taJorim, ọony tạMatat, ọony taLivai,
ọony tạSimion, ọony taJuda, ọony taJosef, ọony tạJonam, ọony tẸliakim,
ọony taMelea, ọony tạMena, ọony tạMatata, ọony taNetan, ọony taDevid,
ọony tạJesi, ọony tObed, ọony tạBoaz, ọony tạSalmon, ọony taNason,
ọony tẠminadab, ọony tẠdmin, ọony tAni, ọony tạHezron, ọony tạPerez, ọony taJuda,
ọony tạJekob, ọony tẠizik, ọony tEbrạhạm, ọony taTera, ọony taNahor,
ọony taSerug, ọony taRiu, ọony tạPeleg, ọony tEber, ọony tạSala,
ọony tạKainan, ọony tẠrfaksad, ọony taSem, ọony taNoa, ọony tạLamek,
ọony taMetusela, ọony tỊnok, ọony tạJared, ọony taMahalaleel, ọony tạKainan,
ọony tẸnos, ọony taSet, ọony tẠdam, ọony tẸnaan.
Keḍio ạJizos ạḍua tạJodan natughẹel, Ẹmugh Iigbia bho naamuzō agbẹbh talōor odi, keḍio odi Ẹmugh Iigbia bho areliom odi ạloghom tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar.
Odi ạrol merubal aḍuma, molo Eru obho ạdegh nạ zodi. Oomo aruḍuma bhibha odi ole ḍio meḍian, molo tikunughi obho ọkoony asibh odi magey.
PEru obho aru ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Erumolo ạna uru mỌony tẸnaan, puḍighi mọpaḍi ọbharakpar bhobho matẹnẹ mạbred.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua, ‘Eḍian be ḍio mobho ōoy taḍumom.’ ”
PEru obho abhin zodi ạsiinom tạnyu. Nꞌokpereghi ọkpaton be, odi naaḍeriom zodi moomo aruubhugh ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạami tạnogho ạna mịnyaam mọda oomo iibha bho, nꞌoomo ẹela bhꞌeedi. Nọologh tạvo ạmi moomo iibha bho molo kōoy kōoy olo ologhi ạmi aḍigh pobo ạami tạnogho.
Oomo iibha bho tetu milꞌonuma siibha, erumolo ạna ugbuluman uukpulughu ạami.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ẹegia iigbia bho ạkpete kua, ‘Kpukpulughu mẸnaan Obạmọogh ạna bho be, odi nạ be mobho ạna taḍighian moḍighi.’ ”
Podi Eru obho abhin zodi ạghi taJerusạlẹm, ạsiine zodi mi tesi obho ạsiinom bọ apu mi tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Erumolo ạna uru mọony tẸnaan, pụpel suo masōor.
Mịin, nọoge kua tẹegia bho, ‘Ẹnaan tạnogho ni mịnyaam mitelema bhꞌodi moru okōbh onuma.’
Keḍio amina ạkpete nạ kua, ‘Eedi tekōbh ẹpam ạna tạravo eedi molo ạna oḍighia malẹkẹ onuma tạrubharakpar obho.’ ”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua, ‘Ụdegh ghạ mẸnaan Obạmọogh ạna bho.’ ”
Amen Eru obho akunughiom moḍigh kẹrekere ọdegh oonon obhꞌodi, podi ạḅele zodi ạḍua mọbam amen.
Keḍio ạJizos amula taGalili nꞌịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho, molo ọdu odi ilela ni mi toomo ebhugh obhobho.
Odi ạrol ạtughumiom ghạ nạ mi tarutu iikpulughu obhꞌeedi molo oomo arōoy obho ibuom ni zodi magey.
Keḍio ạJizos ạghi tạNazaret ẹma bho uukō bọ zodi obho. Taḍuma obhooghia bho podi ạghi totu iikpulughu obho kẹzo bho odi naḍighi ghạ bho. Odi aḅetunu moghōl ọbhereer iigbia bho,
pụnogho zodi mọbhereer tẠizaya ozil obho. Odi aabhurion podi ạmiin mesi olo ụge kua,
“Ẹmugh obho tObạmọogh obho odi nꞌạami.
Odi nạanogho ạami mịikpo mọgba ọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho ọnogho aruvekulom obho,
nꞌobho obo bho idiighu mikoli obho tomutioghom ni,
nꞌọkparion ariḍien obo ikpom ariḍien obho,
nꞌọnogho omuzōnaan mobo bho idi tọoḅaghami obho,
nꞌọgba oolelemi aḍuma bho Obạmọogh obho tatu mọbhel arōoy odi obho.”
PạJizos abhurughi mọbhereer obho amulumi ạnogho mobo bho naakō miikpulughu otu iikpulughu obho, keḍio ạghi ạrol delede. Oomo arōoy otu iikpulughu obho igbiom riḍien eedi zodi.
Keḍio odi ạke mọḍeghe ọnogho eedi oghōl ekua, “Moḍighi opulughi taraḅeri enyina dodon mọnuekpete ẹegia bho enyina ịmoghon obho.”
Oomo eedi ịgba zodi miiḅi, keḍio eedi iimōogh nạ magey mi tobꞌooḅi ọnuekpete bho odi ạkpete bho. Keḍio eedi ịkpete kua, “Odi ḍio mọony obho taJosef gạ?”

Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami naalōghōm mobho enyina netu modōgh asidōgh obhobho ọnogho ạmi, oghōl, ‘Ạna ozil obho pira maakua lōor onuma ku,’ nꞌọkpete ekua, ‘Ḍighi ạni tesuo ẹma bhꞌonuma mibha ezōor ụmoghon bhꞌạna uḍighi tạKapaniom obho.’
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina: ozil oḍigh ghạ ḍio meghuan mi tarōoy ẹma odi.
Ịmaar ẹmiin, tọkar ọgba agey obho, tIzirẹl ọlogh arukpukele ạraani ẹrologhu mi tamen tIlaija obho ẹlebhe ọlobh io moomo ịraar nꞌạmaḍian ạsia bho, molo obꞌoḅẹer asōor toomo ade bho.
Toomo ipa ẹko nạ, urōm io zodi Ilaija mọghi tonyiin eedi. Urōm ku zodi ọghiom mekpukele ạni obhꞌạZarefat obhꞌebhugh obhꞌaSaidon.
Ọlogh arōoy olo nẹnwe mẹzegh ịpueghi riiḅi ẹrol nạ mi tIzirẹl mi tamen obho tIlaisa ozil obho, keḍio bọbon onyiin eedi olo uukō olo. Ukiton ku ookō mạNaaman obhꞌaSiria be.”
Oomo arōoy obho idi bọ totu iikpulughu obho ịmoghon miibha bho pologhi eedi aḅẹebh.
Peedi iḅerenu, ịghogh mạJizos imutiom tẹma bho, ibhin zodi ịsiinom tạnyu obꞌeegum obho uḅōgh bọ mẹma bhꞌeedi obho morōbh odi odi kaakila kameel.
Idi tipa bho, podi arele togbo oomo eedi ạḍua.
Keḍio odi ạghi tạKapaniom onyiin ogbōgh ẹma mi tebhugh obhꞌaGalili, ạrol ạtughumiom rōoy obho mi taḍuma obhooghia obho.
Oomo arōoy obho iimōogh ni mi tẹzo bho odi abhin nạtughumiom obho, ebum obho odi abhin toghōrōkō ẹmu ịto nạtughumiom rōoy obho.
Totu iikpulughu obho kir onyiin ōoy olo ạteeny mọkarabh ẹmugh eru obho, namulughu tạruumu arōoy obho nạkpete kua,
“Ạna ạJizos obhꞌạNazaret, ạna ụkar nạva zezōor mẹkaraan? Ạna naaru mobhiẹmi ezōor bẹle? Ạami naalōghōm ạna. Ạna ōoy olo ạḍua tẸnaan aru olo ịkarabh ilo.”

PạJizos ạbhooruom odi aghōl kua, “Kpereghi mọnu onuma, mamute tẹmu ōoy obho.” Podi ọkarabh ẹmugh obho ạgurom mōoy obho tade mi taghisigh oomo eedi, keḍio ạḍua tẹmu ōoy obho molo bọbon esi alōor odi ōoy obho olo aḅẹebh olo.
Poomo arōoy obho iimōogh, molo onyiin ạkpete kua ạnogho monyiin, “Iibha kikōr oḍigh ọnuekpete? Odi abhin toghōrōkō ịnyaam nꞌịto ạkpetiom ạnogho mịkarabh ạruumugh obho, peedi nẹḍuaghu nạ.”
Pọdu odi ạJizos alela toomo ebhugh obho.
ẠJizos ạḍua totu iikpulughu obho, pạghi aḍigh totu tạSaimon. Oniin ọnyani tạSaimon ạkom naakuugh. Peedi iru ịgba ịnogho mạJizos.
Podi ạghi ạmara tọtu ạni obho, ạbhooruom mạkom obho, pạkom obho ạḍua, odi ạke tonyiin amen obho mọkiom eedi.
Udule, poomo obo bho ịteeny mạburubulol olo nẹnweeny moḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh ibhin eedi iruom mạJizos, keḍio odi ạḅamaghi rạvo odi toomo eedi, aakō moomo eedi.

Ịkarabh ạruumugh ẹḍuaghu nạ tạruumu ọlogh arōoy, molo nemulughuuy ekōl kua, “Ạna Ọony tẸnaan.” PạJizos ạbham mịnu obhꞌeedi. Omōrō ḍio nꞌomōrō molo eedi kẹkpete mạar, ebum obho eedi neelōghōm mobho odi aru maKraist obho.
Aḍio ạḅaal pạJizos aḅetunu ạḍua tẹma bho ạghi tesi olo ẹḅokia ạrol. Parōoy obho ịke mọva odi. Eedi iru ịmiin odi peedi ịva mọpuenaan odi mọḅele ọḍua.
Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami tạki nị ạgba ạni tịnon ạraama mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan. Oobho poḍighi obho Ẹnaan arōm ạami moru oḍighi obho.”
Podi ạghi taJudia ạgba dōm obho mi tarutu iikpulughu obho.
Onyiin amen olo ạJizos ạmara tọtu obꞌegha ọbhiiny obhꞌạGenesaret parōoy iru nenyuughian mọmoghon ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan.
Podi ạmiin mịzal arughuugh ilo usuloghom. Ịze mina bho neebhun tegbolom neetōlōgh mịzuguru obhꞌeedi.
Podi aḍigh monyiin obho. Odi opo bho, olo tạSaimon. Keḍio ạkpete ạnogho zodi monyu omutiom ịbam. Keḍio odi ạrol toghuugh obho nạtughumiom mobꞌọlogh arōoy obho.
Odi ạtughumiom ạḅele, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mạSaimon, “Nyu moghuugh obho mamutiom togbo bho mazu mọzuguru obhꞌenyina.”

PạSaimon ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, nonon nini, oomo uḍugul obho ezōor ụrol ukumuan suo, keḍio bọbon ena olo ezōor ughigh olo. Tebum oghōrōkō bhꞌonuma, ạami tạki nị azu kẹzo bho ạna ụkpete bho.”
Eedi ịghi izu mọzuguru obho peedi iru ịze mobꞌọlogh ina olo ịto nị mọbaay ọzuguru obho.
Peedi ịnwaaghi rạvo ibheleghi mạburude eedi mi toghuugh opedi obho moru ọlogh ạni ạvo. Peedi iru ibhulughi mịzal arughuugh obho mina mina molo eedi ịva ni moḅi.
Amen ạSaimon Pita ạmiin miibha bho, podi ạghi agbuluman taghisigh tạJizos ạkpete kua, “Eey Obumọogh, ḍụa talōor ạmi. Ạami obꞌoḍighi mịkarabh ōoy.”
Odi nꞌoomo arōoy ipedi obho ịmara kua be neemōogh tebum ina bho eedi ịze bho.

Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ pẹzo ịrol mi taJems nꞌạJon ạnwuny obho taZebidi obo bho nꞌaPita neḍighi monyiin oḍighi obho. Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho mạSaimon, “Ughiil ghạ ruugu. Ạseghe dodon ạghi taghisigh, ạami taḍighi ạna akughi ghạ rōoy, ina ḍio.”
Peedi iḍurogh marughuugh obhꞌeedi ibhune tegbolom, ịḅeleey kạar kạar ịghi ịtuonom mạJizos.
Onyiin amen olo ạJizos odi tonyiin ẹma ponyiin ōoy olo nạnwe magey mẹzegh ịpueghi riiḅi aru todi aasen odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Oōy, eḍigh tologhi onuma, ạna tatue ni aakō ạami.”
PạJizos asele mạvo odi akulaan odi keḍio ạkpete kua, “Eḍigh tologhi ạmi, ḍum.” Tonyiin odi amen opopo pẹzegh ịpueghi riiḅi obho ạḍua talōor ōoy obho.

PạJizos aakiom odi aghōl kua. “Ụgba ghạ miibha mạnogho bọbon onyiin ōoy, keḍio tẹn monyen onyen mạghi toḅo iiḅua bho odi aanon lōor onuma, kụ mạghi mạtun mạar mạnogho mẸnaan kẹzo bho aMozis ạto bho, molo kōoy kōoy alōghōm mobho ạna naaḍum.”
Keḍio ọdu obho tạJizos alōghōm molela olela opu ịḅel, molo obꞌọlogh arōoy iru ghạ mọmoghon ịtughumiom odi nꞌookua asilōor eedi.
Keḍio odi ọgba ghạ ḍio nọgba men mọḍua ghạ ọghi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho nꞌalōor odi be mookpulughu ghạ.

Tonyiin aḍuma olo ạJizos nạtughumiom, pẹde arōoy aFarisi obho nꞌobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho iru ịrol delede. Eedi ịḍuaghu taJerusạlẹm nꞌoomo ạraama ebhugh aGalili nꞌaJudia eruughu. Ịnyaam tObạmọogh obho idi nꞌodi ạJizos mookō ạrazegh.
Tesi opopo parōoy irōol tẹmuna mōoy olo oomo alōor obho nạabho ạman ibhin iru, nẹva ghạ mebōom olo ọḅolom ọghiom ạJizos.
Tebum obꞌọlogh arōoy obho eedi irue ḍio mọḅolom odi oḍighom totu obho. Peedi irōol odi ịsiinom tạnyu otu obho, ikpẹerōn, ịloghom odi, isōorẹ zodi togbo arōoy obho mi taghisigh tạJizos.
Amen ạJizos ạmiin mologhi omōruōm obho eedi ịteeny obho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi ōoy obho, “Oōy, nọoḅelemaan ạna mịkarabh onuma.”

Pobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho ịke mọghunughun tiloghi eedi oghōl ekua, “Odi oobho bho kokōr oḍigh ōoy olo nạkpete kua aḍighanaan mẸnaan. Tughuneen Ẹnaan be ḍio, okōr ōoy mobo tatue ạḅelemaan mịkarabh ōoy?”
ẠJizos naalōghōm mịitua eedi, podi apuruan kua zeedi, “Eeghe aḍighi kenyina nẹetua mịitua ilo idi kua?
Iḍighen idugh epu mọkpete, oghōl ekua ‘Nọoḅelemaan ạna mịkarabh onuma,’ nꞌoghōl ekua, ‘Ḅetunu marele.’

Ạami naḍighi moḍeeriom enyina mobho Ọony Oōy obho ạteeny ni mịikpo tade bho mọḅelemaan ịkarabh.” Podi amula ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho, “Ạami nạkpete ạnogho ạna, ḅetunu makpōr mẹmuna onuma, maghẹel.”
Onyiin amen obho pōoy obho aḅetunu teesoḍia bhꞌeedi, aḅẹtōn mẹmuna bho odi ạmunuom ghạ bho, atẹn aghẹel, nabuom Ẹnaan.
Oomo arōoy obho iimōogh ni ẹman. Keḍio eedi ịrol nebuom Ẹnaan, ibhin nꞌibꞌaruugu nẹkpete kua, “Sọo! Iibha ọkpo ibꞌaruugu ilo ezōor nọmiinogh dodon.”
Iibha iru itẹn, ạJizos amute tetẹrẹ, podi ạmiin mogunogh raasōgh ōoy olo ughōl aLivai, odi delede tesi oḍighi odi. PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Tụonom ạami.”
Podi aLivai aḅetunu, ạḅele kạar kạar, ạtuonuman zodi.
Podi aLivai asōorẹ mẹzaal ạnogho mạJizos totu odi. Eḅunyom igunogh raasōgh obho nꞌịnon arōoy ịrol ạni delede nꞌeedi.
Parōoy aFarisi nꞌobo ịtughumiom iilōgh ibha ogbo eedi iru nẹgozaay ẹnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi nepuruan kua, “Ebum eeghe kenyina etul migunogh raasōgh obho nꞌiḍighi mịkarabh obho nele ẹpoghol nꞌeedi?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Obo bho asilōor obho ịghuay obho ịva ghạ ḍio mozil, obo bho nẹnweey obho be.
Ạami uru mobheleghi ạsukarabh obho, aruuḅi obho ḍio.”

Pẹtede arōoy iru ịkpete kua ịnogho mạJizos, “Iteledōm tạJon aḍuugh ịtol mọkoony, eekpulughu ghạ moomo amen. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ miteledōm arōoy aFarisi obho, keḍio iteledōm onuma nẹemaar nele nẹpoghol,”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Enyina tetue ni gạ, mi tipina, eseeri mọkoony mobo bho ipina bho tamen olo opina bho odi nꞌeedi?
Aḍuma natu molo tọseghe mopina bho mi teedi, keḍio eedi tegbi mọrologhu ọkoony.”

Keḍio ạJizos amina nạ adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi. “Bọbon ōoy olo tạkooron momoom ukpe mopuom ugbaany olo. Odi aḍighi nạ kua, podi tạbaay ni momoom ukpe bho, keḍio omoom obho orue ḍio ạneghiom tugbaany obho.

Oōy olo tạseghe nạ mimoom amiim ạloki tigbaany izu ịnam ạsikarama amiim olo. Ibha odi ạloki pimoom amiim obho orubhughi igbaany izu ạsikarama obho, amiim obho kezuughian, izu ạsikarama bho ẹkona kerubhughu keḅẹebh.
Imoom amiim nọloki ghạ timoom izu ạsikarama.
Bọbon ōoy olo nạva ghạ nạ momina ọbhoghol imoom amiim tamen olo odi nạabhoghol migbaany obho olo. Eedi nekōl ghạ kua, ‘Igbaany obho ịneghe epu.’ ”
Tonyiin aḍuma obhooghia bho olo ạJizos arele natẹn tookua ịbiakpa, pobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho iḅuni mẹde ịbiakpa, ịbholobhool tạravo eedi, ile.
Pẹtede arōoy aFarisi obho ịkpete kua, “Enyina neesōor molōgh. Ebum eeghe kenyina neḍighi mọkpo olōgh taḍuma obhooghia bho?”
Keḍio ạJizos aru ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Enyina deghōl ghạ ḍio ẹmiin mibha aDevid aḍighi tamen obho odi nꞌarōoy odi ọkoony nesibhogh mi taḍuma obhooghia bho gạ?
Odi ạghi aḍigh totu obho tẸnaan ạseghe mạbred obho ụtunom mạar ụnogho mẸnaan obho, ale ạnogho ạni rōoy odi, obho tughuneen arōoy iiḅua bho ḍio ọnon ōoy ole ghạ ḍio kẹzo bho iilōgh obhꞌezira ịto bho.”
Keḍio odi ạJizos amina ạkpete kua ạḅaram, “Ọony Oōy obho pObạmọogh maḍuma obhooghia bho.”
Tọnon aḍuma obhooghia bho, pạJizos ạghi totu iikpulughu obho nạtughumiom. Tesuo, kir ōoy olo oḍiom ạvo bho naamuugh.
Ẹde obo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho nẹva ghạ mịkarabh olo ọbhamam ạJizos, peedi ịmaar negon odi mọmiin erumolo odi taakō ni mōoy taḍuma obhooghia bho.
ẠJizos maalōghōm mịitua eedi, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho, “Ḅetunu maru mạmara teebha ogbo bho.” Podi ōoy obho aḅetunu ạghi ạmara togbo bho.

Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua zeedi, “Iḍighen mibha iizuan, olo olōgh olo, moḍighi taḍuma obhooghia bho? Oḍighi iiḅi ọlogh ạvo ọnogho ōoy nꞌoḍighi odi mịkarabh? Ọbhel ookō aghuḍum ōoy nꞌotẹnẹmi aghuḍum odi?”
Keḍio odi aanon moomo eedi akin akiton, keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho mōoy obho, “Sele mạvo onuma.” Keḍio odi aru asele mạvo bhꞌodi, pạvo bhꞌodi aru ạneghe.
Pologhi oomo eedi napul kaguugh, molo eedi ịrol ịḍeghian nꞌalōor eedi mẹzo eedi tekōl eḍighi zodi.
Togbo amen opopo, pạJizos ạsiin tạnyu eegum mookpulughu, molo odi ạrol suo aakpulughu mẸnaan moomo uḍugul obho.
Aḍio aru ạḅaal, podi abheleghi mobo bho nẹtuonom zodi obho iru talōor odi, keḍio odi aru ạson maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ibha ughōl bọ iteledōm obho.
Eedi, ạSaimon (obho aḍien odi ughōl nạ aPita bho), nꞌẠndru umōr odi, nꞌaJems, nꞌạJon, aFilip nꞌaBatolomiu,
aMatiu nꞌạTomos, aJems ọony tẠlifios, nꞌạSaimon obho ughōl bọ aZelot obho,
nꞌaJudas ọony taJems, nꞌaJudas Ịskariot obho atẹn moḅoḍi rōoy obho.

ẠJizos asōor nꞌoomo eedi mi teegum obho, podi aru ạmaranuan nꞌọlogh obo bho nẹtuonom odi obho mi tạḅarabh eegum obho. Eruom arōoy nẹeḍua taJerusạlẹm, nꞌoomo ebhugh aJudia, nꞌạraama aTaya nꞌaSaidon ibha idi tọtu ọbhiiny obho, etu todi.
Eedi iru mọmoghon ịtughumiom odi nꞌookuaay asilōor eedi. Oomo obo bho ịkarabh ạruumugh nẹeḅaghami obho ẹkona eru nạ eekuaay nạ.
Kōoy kōoy aḅe ghạ mokulaan odi be, ebum obho ịnyaam aluukua bho nẹeḍua todi neekōoy oomo eedi.
Keḍio ạJizos akiton tobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ạkpete kua,
“Ọḅaal ologhi ilꞌenyina aruvekulom obho, ebum obho Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan aru milꞌenyina bho.
Ọḅaal ologhi ilꞌenyina obo bho idi mọkoony siibha bho, ebum obho tọpere ni zenyina.
Ọḅaal ologhi ilꞌenyina obo bho nelegheey siibha bho, enyina tẹmologh ni.
“Ọḅaal ologhi ilꞌenyina, tamen olo arōoy ịlogh enyina ḍien, igin enyina, irōnyōgh nạ enyina, ịkpeteey nạ enyina moḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh tebum Ọony Oōy obho.
Amen iibha bho nemutenaan enyina, pibo, mẹgher, mẹḅaal ologhi. Ibꞌigbōgh inwo mibha nookōbhōghi useerian enyina mi tạnyu obho. Pẹzo nạ ạburude eedi iḍighi nạ marizil obho tẸnaan.
“Itōnyōgh ilꞌenyina obo bho iru rụula siibha bho, ebum obho enyina neele mẹela ibhꞌenyina bho.
Itōnyōgh ilꞌenyina obo bho ạrubaraka enyina neemuzō siibha bho, ọkoony tạgurogh ni enyina.
Itōnyōgh ilꞌenyina obo bho nẹmologh siibha bho, ebum obho enyina nẹemologh ịman. Enyina teḍigh tịitu nꞌeḍi.
Itōnyōgh ilꞌenyina tamen olo oomo arōoy tẹgba zenyina miiḅi, ebum obho ạburude eedi ịgba nạ miiḅi miben arizil obho.
“Keḍio ạami nạgba kua ạnogho zenyina obo bho nẹmoghon obho, itulan mobo ọlogh ḍien enyina, memulumian ghạ miiḅi mobo bho ịlogh enyina ḍien obho.
Ịnogho ghạ lịsebh mobo bho nẹkorogh enyina bho, meekpulughu ghạ mẹnogho mobo bho nẹgba ghạ zenyina mịkarabh obho.
Oōy kaḅōr ạna tạgba onuma, pukiraan mạnogho zodi mopedi obho odi aḅōr nạ. Erumolo onyiin ōoy aru ạkporion mạsuoma onuma ạseghe, pụḅelemaan odi ạkporion nạ ạseghe mạforoko onuma.
Kōoy kōoy olo agbẹel ạna mạar pụnogho. Kamen kamen olo ōoy ạseghe mạar onuma, ugbẹel ghạ mamina mabhin.
Ḍighi mạnogho mịnon kẹzo bho ạna nạva molo eedi keḍighi kẹnogho ạna bho.
“Okōr oḍigh ạlisebh mobho enyina tepin, erumolo enyina itulan mobo bho itulan enyina bho be. Mịin, pẹzo iḍighi mịkarabh obho neḍighi ghạ nạ.
Okōr oḍigh ạlisebh nạ mibha enyina tepin, erumolo enyina iḍighi miiḅi ịnogho mobo bho iḍighi enyina miiḅi obho be. Iibha bho pibha iḍigh mịkarabh obho neḍighi ghạ nạ.
Okōr oḍigh ạlisebh mobho enyina tepin, erumolo enyina ịnogho mạḅoole mobo bho enyina neḍuom ologhi momulumian enyina bho be. Pẹzo iḍighi mịkarabh obho neelian ghạ mobhin ibꞌạsuo.

Íḍighi ghạ kua, itulan obꞌọlogh aḍien enyina, meḍighi ghạ miiḅi, mẹnogho ghạ mạḅoole tesi olo enyina ịteeny io mịitua olo omina omulumian enyina. Igbōgh ạlisebh tẹtol ni ẹnogho enyina molo enyina tetu mạnwuny tẸnaan obho ạbugh bọ apu obho. Odi omulumian ghạ ḍio mịkarabh mobo bho ilōghōm io moghōl ạlua bho nꞌobo bho ịteeny mọkarabh ẹmu obho.
Ịsu ghụsan aḍien kẹzo bho Ọde enyina nạsu ghạ ghụsan aḍien obho.
“Ị́ru ghạ mịiruan mẹnogho mịnon molo Ẹnaan ọtu mịiruan ạnogho enyina. Ị́nogho ghạ mapum mịnon molo Ẹnaan ọnogho enyina mapum. Ịḅelemaan mịkarabh ịnon molo Ẹnaan ạḅelemaan enyina mịkarabh enyina.

Ịnogho ạni mịnon pẸnaan ọnogho ạni enyina. Obꞌooḅi ọtuom, olo nọomaar uzighe, ụvimighi, imuzō nezuughian, pibha Ẹnaan tazu ạlogh tạravo enyina. Keḍio ọtuom obho enyina ibhin ịtuom ịnogho mịnon obho, pibha Ẹnaan tapin ạtuom ạnogho enyina nạ.”
Keḍio ạJizos adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi. “Oōy ikpom ariḍien orue ḍio areliom mọdo odi. Ibha odi ạghi mọkparam, pịzal eedi omeleghu oḍigh toonu.
Ọony-otu ịtuugha olo apu mobo bho nạtughumiom odi obho olo. Keḍio amen odi nạaman mịtuugha bhꞌodi, podi oru ooleeny obo bho ạtughumiom odi obho.
“Eeghe aḍighi kạna nạmiin ghạ meekuneen aḍien tumōr onuma keḍio obꞌọbhalakpa bho aḍien onuma ạna ọmiina ghạ ḍio?

Ịkar ilegheri imute ẹko molo ạna obo bho dọmiina ḍio mobꞌọbhalakpa obho odi taḍien onuma bho ku tạki ạkpete ạnogho mumōr onuma akōl, ‘Umōr, tue ạami ụseghe meekuneen obho odi taḍien onuma bho?’ Sọo, obo olōghōma lōor, nalōghōm ghạ milo ịnon, pira mạseghia mobꞌọbhalakpa bhꞌaḍien onuma ku pạna orue ọmaar ọmiin ọseghe eekuneen obhꞌaḍien umōr onuma.
“Oorẹeny olo aḍum amute magey ọloki ghạ ḍio mịbhuagh itu, bolobolo ẹkpagh oorẹeny ạloki miiḅi itu.
Koorẹeny koorẹeny nolōghōm ghạ toḍigh itu obho odi ạloki obho. Ạkarara ọlogh ghạ ḍio male bolobolo izin oḍu ẹloki mitu ịleleezu.
Ooḅi ōoy tapin tẹela iiḅi ọkpo bho idi tekpom odi obho aḍighiom miiḅi ọkpo amutiom, ọkarabh ōoy tamutiom mịkarabh ọkpo. Anem ōoy nasi ghạ amutiom mibha imuzō tekpom odi obho.
“Ebum eeghe kenyina nepeleghi ghạ zạmi, ‘Obumọogh, Obumọogh,’ keḍio enyina ịtuugh ghạ ḍio eḍighi mibha ạami ụkpete ụnogho enyina bho?
Ạami natu mọgba oḍeeriom enyina moḍigh ōoy olo aru tạmi, ạmoghon moghōrōkō ạmi, kạtuugh aḍighi mibhꞌoghōrōkō bhꞌạmi.

Odi odi kōoy olo aḅōgh motu odi tọbharakpar ade, ạmaar agbo made bho akuḍumeni keḍio agbi mogimogh ikpiti otu obho, molo aḍigho nꞌogim iru inyuughi motu obho, keḍio otu obho oozighina ḍio. Ạmaar ni ạmara tebum obho ụmaar ni uḅōgh motu obho.

Odi obo bho ạmoghon moghōrōkō ạmi kọtuugh io aḍighi bho, odi odi kōoy olo ạleleghiom ni be tade bho mikpiti otu obhꞌodi. Odi aḅōgh ạman, paḍigho nꞌogim iru inyuughi motu obho; otu obho ameel, molo, oghur emeel odi otu obho, ẹzo ọgba olo nolo.”
Amen ạJizos ạḍegheey moomo ạraḍeghe bhꞌodi ạnogho rōoy obho ạḅele, podi ạḍua atẹn ạghi tạKapaniom.
Onyiin uvẹmụ oḅe rạagham ōoy olꞌaRom ạteeny monyiin ẹbana olo aḍigh magey tologhi odi. Odi ẹbana bho nạanwe natu mọbho.
Odi ạmoghon mibha ạJizos natu obho, podi arōm mẹde arukenya arōoy aJu obho mobheleghi odi odi karu kaakō mẹbana bhꞌodi.
Peedi iru tạJizos iisen odi magey moru, keḍio ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Tue, ōoy obhobho nạkar ạva magey molo ạna kạbhel odi.
Odi atulan magey rōoy ezira, molo odi aḅōgh monyiin otu iikpulughu ạnogho ezira.”
PạJizos ạtuonom eedi ạghi. Odi natuan totu obho podi arōm bụrubulol odi mọkpete ọnogho ạJizos oghōl ekua, “Obo apu ạami, ụuḅaghami ghạ lōor onuma. Ạami ugbẹbh io molo ạna kaaku kaḍigh totu ạmi.
Ạami ẹkona ugbẹbh io nạ moru ọmiin aghisigh onuma. Kpẹte mạar be pẹbana bhꞌạmi oḍum.

Ạami ẹkona ōoy olo nọonogho mịnyaam ọto ịto, olo iḅe rạagham idi tẹeḍiani ạmi. Ibha ạami ụkpete ụnogho monyiin ughōl, ‘Kịa,’ podi ọghi, ụkpete ụnogho mọnon ughōl, ‘Tue,’ podi oru. Kạami ạkpete ạnogho mẹbana ạmi aghōl ‘Ḍighi miibha,’ podi ọtuugh oḍighi.”

ẠJizos ạkar aamōogh magey mọmoghon ọnuekpete bhibha. Keḍio odi aghiraan tarōoy obho nẹtuonom zodi obho ạkpete kua, “Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, tạkar Izirẹl ẹkona, ạami dọmiin io moḍigh ologhi omōruōm obhobho.”
Obo bho iru ịgba dōm obho imula isi totu, ẹbana bho naaḍum.
Ịbam amen iru itẹn ạJizos ạghi tẹma olo ughōl aNen, odi nꞌiteledōm odi nꞌobꞌọlogh arōoy ịghi.
Odi naḍigh kua be podi ạmiin mobꞌọlogh arōoy nꞌoḍim nemute tẹma bho. Oḍim obho ogini ọony ekpukele ạni, molo obꞌọlogh arōoy obho iḍigh ịkunu nꞌodi.
Amen Obạmọogh obho ạmiin mạni obho, palōor odi azuum nꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien, keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mạni obho, “Uleghe ghạ.”
Keḍio odi arele ạghi akulaan meḅina bho keḍio eedi obo bho irōol obho iru isōrōna. Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ọony, ạami nạkpete ạnogho ạna, ḅetunu.”
Pōoy obho nạabho bho aḅetunu ạrol delede nạkpete mạar. Keḍio ạJizos aru ạseghe zodi ōoy obho ạlogh tạvo oniin obho.
Kōoy kōoy aruugu isibh ni, keḍio ịrol nạ nebuom Ẹnaan nakōl kua, “Agey ozil tẸnaan naaru tezira. Ẹnaan naaru mọbhel arōoy odi.”
Pịigbaay ọdu obho tạJizos ilela toomo ebhugh obhꞌaJudia nꞌoomo aruubhugh obho idi tọgbagi aJudia bho.
Piteledōm tạJon ịghi ịgba ịnogho zodi moomo iibha bho. Keḍio odi ạJon abheleghi mịzal iteledōm odi,
arōm eedi mọghi opuruan ekua mObạmọogh obho, “Gbạ mạnogho ezōor, ạna obo bho ạJon ạgba aghōl mu natu obho bẹlee kezōor oḅōrō mọnon?”
Amen eedi iru tạJizos, peedi ịgba kua ịnogho odi, “ẠJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho arōm ezōor moru opuruan onuma kua, ‘Ạna pobo bho noonon obho bẹlee kezōor oonon mọnon?’ ”
Tamen opopo ạJizos naakōoy moḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh arōoy, apirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh, ạkparion nạ mariḍien ọlogh obo ikpom ariḍien obho.

Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua mạnwuny adōm obho tạJon, “Imula mẹghi mẹgba mẹnogho zodi ạJon mibha enyina nẹemiin ịmoghon obho. Obo ikpom ariḍien obho nẹmiin mạar, arukula bho neteleey, obo bho nẹnweey mạrazegh ịpueghi riiḅi obho neḍumogh, obo bho ịḅaaghabh obho nẹmoghon mạar, noḅẹriōn iḍim nạ tọbho bho, keḍio nọogba mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho nọnogho maruvekulom obho.
Keḍio ạlisebh tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho igonan io ạami obho.”

Tamen olo ạnwuny adōm obho nẹeḍua, pạJizos ạke mọkpete ilo igboloman nꞌạJon ạnogho egi arōoy obho oghōl ekua, “Amen obho enyina ịghi tạJon mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho kenyina ịitua mọmiin ẹkaraan? Enyina ịghi ghạ mobhōgha ịigho bho ọpibha nạpibhoghom obho?
Enyina ịkar ịghi ghạ mọmiin eeghe? Enyina ịghi ghạ mọmiin ōoy olo abura mạravelvet? Obo bho neburaay ghạ miibha bho, sụ nẹtol ghạ tarutu ạruula.
Ịkar ẹgba magey obho, enyina ịkar ịghi gha mọmiin eeghe? Ozil tẸnaan gạ? Ạkar agey nạni, mibha ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina bho, enyina ịmiin molo apu mozil.
Odi ạJon pobo bho ẹegia bho ạgba bọ aghōl, ‘Nonon, ạami naarōm moteledōm ạmi moḍionom onuma taghisigh. Odi taḍionom taghisigh moselemi ebōom obho ọnogho onuma.’
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ạJon apu kōoy kōoy olo nọomar tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio oomo ipa ẹkona, obo bho asōoriōm bọ apu mi tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan apu zodi.”
Oomo arōoy obho nꞌigunogh raasōgh obho, ibha ịmoghonyan bọ mạJon obho pobo ighiilaan mịto ebōom ọḅol otẹn obho tẸnaan, ịghi tạJon izua mụum.
Arōoy aFarisi obho nꞌobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho igin ni mịto bho tẸnaan, egin nạ mọghi ạJon kazuom eedi mụum.
“Ạami tạkar apin ẹkaraan siibha bho ạtuom mạnwuny ọoke bhobho? Eedi kịkar ịgbaanan mẹkaraan?
Eedi idi kạnwuny ilo idi delede mi taḍighi. Onyiin ẹku temulughu ẹkiom monyiin ekōl kua, ‘Ezōor uti miitia ipina ọnogho enyina enyina ịgher io. Ụmoor sọor ọbum ọnogho enyina, enyina ilegheey io.’
ẠJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho aru, ạrol mọkoony eḍien tebum iikpulughu agin miim, enyina ighōlōm odi mẹeraala.
Ọony Oōy obho aru nale nạpoghol, enyina iinon zodi ẹpue eghōl kua, ‘Ịmiin obꞌẹḍogh ōoy obhobho nꞌọpoghoḍia rimiim. Odi ọbulol igunogh raasōgh nꞌiḍighi mịkarabh.’
Oomo ipa ẹkona, obo bho ibhinom obho neeḍighi nemutiom mobho olōghōm ạar tẸnaan iru magey.”
Onyiin ōoy olo aFarisi obho abheleghi mạJizos mole eḍian totu odi. PạJizos ạtuonuman odi ạghi totu ōoy obho, ạrol delede mole eḍian obho.
Kir onyiin ạni olo naḍum ịkarabh aghuḍum tẹma odi ōoy obho. Odi ạmoghon mobho ạJizos naaru nale meḍian totu ōoy aFarisi obho, podi ạseghe monyiin okōtō elo olo nạkunu magey,

ạghi ạmara tạman tạJizos mi tasike odi naleghe ạḅurughiom izin odi masike tạJizos. Keḍio odi aru ạseghe mạsilaan obhꞌodi agbulolom masike tạJizos, agbuluman ạapiibh, keḍio ạseghe mokōtō elo bho azuom.

Amen ōoy aFarisi obho abheleghi bọ zodi obho ạmiin mibha ạni obho naḍighi obho, pạkpete kua tologhi odi, “Oōy obhobho ạkar aru mozil bọ, odi kulōghōm ni moḍigh ạni obho nakulughaan odi obho. Odi kulōghōm ni mịkarabh ạdol olo ạni obhobho naḍum.”
PạJizos ạḅooranaan kua zodi, “Sạimon, kir ạar olo ạami ụteeny mọkpete ọnogho onuma.” Podi ạSaimon aghōl mụ “Gụa, Obo ịtughumiom, ḍẹghe.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạke mọḍeghe. “Ịzal arōoy ịḅoole mạḅoole tạvo onyiin ōoy. Onyiin ạḅoole maḍiōbh ọonir anaira, opedi obho ạḅoole mọonir anaira.
Ịzal eedi olo arue mọkpe olo. Pobo bho ạḅoolian eedi obho ạḅelemaan mịzal eedi. Tịzal eedi, ạna ụutua, oḍighen tatulan odi apu?”
PạSaimon ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami nakōl obho ụḅelemaan bọ mịkanya bho.” PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ạna ụmaar ịni ạḍeghe.”

Keḍio odi aghiraan tạni obho, ạkpete kua ạnogho mạSaimon, “Ạna nạmiin mạni obhobho? Ạami uru totu onuma, bọbon ạmuum ạna ọnogho ḍio ạami mootōla asike ạmi. Keḍio ạni obhobho naatōlōm mizin odi masike ạmi, ạseghe mạsilaan odi agbulom.
Ạna oḅolom io ạami ạloghom totu obhꞌonuma, keḍio oomo ạami uru, ạni obhobho dọḅele ḍio mọopiibh asike bhꞌạmi tetulan.
Ạmunu olo ạna usigh tẹmu ạmi olo, keḍio odi ạni obhobho naasigh moomo asike ạmi melo ạlikunu.
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho ạna siibha bho, tibꞌetulan obhꞌodi nẹgba emutiom mobho nọoḅelemaan mịkarabh odi. Keḍio obo bho ụḅelemaan ịbam obho atulan nạ mịbam be.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho mạni obho, “Nọoḅelemaan ạna mịkarabh onuma.”
Pipedi obho idi ạni nele meḍian obho ịrol ịghunughun tiloghi eedi nekōl kua, “Odi oobho bho kokōr ōoy, olo nạḅelemaan nạ mịkarabh arōoy?”
Keḍio ạJizos amula ạkpete kua ạnogho mạni obho, “Kẹel nꞌekima, ologhi omōruōm onuma nạabhel ạna atẹnẹ.”
Ịbam amen itẹn pạJizos ạḍua mẹma atẹn mẹma, tigbōgh nꞌịbam ạraama bho, nạgbaay ghạ mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obhꞌAde-Ọolema tẸnaan. Aḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obhꞌodi ịghi ạni,
nꞌẹde ạraani ilo ạJizos abhirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh tẹmu eedi nꞌilo odi aakōoy rạzegh ịghi ạni nạ. Ạraani bhibha paMeri obho ạMagdala, obho ạJizos abhirighanogh moḍual ịkarabh ạruumugh tẹmu obho,
nꞌaJoạnạ, ạni taSiuza, obho aru muvẹmụ oḍighi otu tạHerod obho, nꞌạSuzana, nꞌọlogh ịnon ạraani. Eedi pobo ịnoghooy ghạ mạJizos nꞌiteledōm obhꞌodi kạar kạar olo nẹeḅaghami zeedi.
Tamen olo obꞌọlogh arōoy ịḍua toomo oḍigh kẹrekere ạraama bho iru tạJizos, podi adōgh sidōgh obhobho,
“Onyiin amen keḍio onyiin oḅẹbh miḅẹbh ạghi moḅẹbh iḅẹbh ịbiakpa. Ẹzo bho odi aḅẹbh naadu obho, pẹtede imeleghu tebōom keḍio ụuzeghi, ịnun iru nạ ikpologh ile.
Ẹtede imeleghu tọbharakpar ade. Ịke kua be mosi, pịnyurughan ịikaraghan ịbhozu ebum obho ạmuum ilo tade bho.
Imina ẹde imeleghu tade iiḅulom olo iiḅulom obho isiom igimogh eedi, keḍio eedi iru ịnyurughan.

Ipedi obho imeleghu tooḅi ade keḍio iru ịmaar isi ịloki nạ magey molo uru uḅun mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh itu.” Keḍio odi amina ạkpete miibha bho ạḅaram, aghōl kua, “Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny raḅeri mọmoghon ạmoghon!”
Pobo bho, nẹtuonom odi obho ipuruan zodi mẹmu asidōgh obho,

keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua, “Nọonogho enyina mịikpo molōghōm ẹmu ọkpo ẹḅokia ibhꞌAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan, keḍio ipedi obho todōgh sidōgh kọnogho, molo eedi neenonom nꞌariḍien eedi keḍio ịmiin io, nẹmoghon keḍio ịmoghonyan io.”
“Oobho pẹmu asidōgh obho. Ikpo ịbiakpa bho, pọnuekpete bho tẸnaan.
Ibha imeleghu bọ tebōom obho, parōoy ilo ịmoghon ni be, pEru obho aru ạḅirogh dōm obho mi tiloghi obhꞌeedi, molo eedi ị́moghonyan ẹteeny ạni mịbhelegha bho tẸnaan.

Ibha imeleghu bọ tọbharakpar ade bho parōoy ilo ịmoghon dōm obho pibhinom nꞌooḅi ologhi keḍio adōm obho osi ḍio agbeeny tiloghi obhꞌeedi molo eedi imōruōm mọbam amen be. Ọdegh oonon aru be peedi imeleghu.
Ibha imeleghu bọ tade iiḅulom obho pobo bho ịmoghon bọ dōm obho keḍio ịiḅaghami nꞌẹela nꞌẹmel aghuḍum obhobho iru igimogh zeedi molo itu obhꞌeedi ịkua ḍio nọghua.
Ibha imeleghu bọ tooḅi ade bho pobo bho ịmoghon dōm obho iseeri tiloghi eedi nꞌoghiilaan ninii iru ịteeny mamen eedi tẹlokiiy.”
“Bọbon ōoy olo tạsu mọtodi ạlogh tạgbugba akpereghi bolobolo ạlogh tẹeḍiani ẹmuna olo. Nọḅam ghạ tạnyu ạbebe molo obo bho teḍigh totu obho ẹmiin mạar.
Kạar kạar olo ụḅoki, nꞌaḍuma nꞌaḍuma tomutiom togbo etẹrẹ. Ibha ukpereghi obho tokpẹerōn ni omutiom tẹḅaal.

“Igona lōor enyina mi tibha enyina nẹmoghon obho. Obo bho aḍigh ạteeny obho, tomina ni ọnogho zodi ọḅaram tibha odi ạteeny obho, keḍio obo bho ọteeny io bho, ịbam obho odi ạteeny obho tọḅoor ni zodi.”
Onyiin amen olo oniin nꞌaburumōr tạJizos iru todi, irue ḍio mọmiinan odi tebum obꞌọlogh arōoy obho.
Pụgba ụnogho zodi moniin onuma nꞌaburumōr onuma idi tetẹrẹ, nẹva mọmiin onuma.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho moomo eedi, “Oniin ạmi nꞌaburumōr ạmi pobo bho ịmoghon bọ madōm tẸnaan kighiilaan obho.”
Onyiin aḍuma olo ạJizos nꞌiteledōm odi iḍigh toghuugh, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Itu ọḅeeny ọghi tẹḅeenyom obꞌegha ọbhiiny bho,” peedi imutiom.
Ẹzo bho eedi ịzoghi nẹki obho, pạJizos ạmaghanan nakoḍi. Keḍio obꞌogim asōor nagim, molo oghuugh obhꞌeedi natu moḅi.

Tẹzo bho ogim obho naḅōrōghom moghuugh obho, piteledōm obho ịghi ịsumeen zodi ịkpete kua, “Ọde-otu, ọde otu, ḅetunu ezira nope.” Keḍio odi aḅetunu ạkpete kua ạnogho mogim obho, “Deny,” pogim obho ọbhiiny obho aru adeny.

Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua zeedi, “Oḍighen ologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina?” Emōogh nꞌaruugu esibh eedi magey, molo onyiin ạrol apuruan kua monyiin, “Odi ōoy obhobho kokōor ōoy? Ibha odi ạto ạnogho mogim obho nꞌopōkō ạmuum obho, peedi ighiilaan nạ zodi.”
Peedi ịzoghi ịḍua taGalili ịghi tẹḅeenyom obꞌegha bho mi tebhugh obhꞌaGerasin.

Ẹzo bho ạJizos napun kua be, podi ạmiinan mōoy olo ạteeny mịkarabh ạruumugh tẹmu odi, bho ạḍua tẹma bho natu. Kọkanya amen ukpe nꞌodi ạar oḍighiom olo, orugh ghạ nạ ḍio totu, natugh ghạ taruugu ọkarabh eḍum obho.

Ọlogh amen mobho ọkarabh ẹmugh obho napum ghạ zodi, molo nọpaḍiom ghạ sike nꞌạravo odi magbirigbiri ọkpuom toorẹeny keḍio odi taagbo ni magbirigbiri obho, aḅuni moorẹeny obho akiil aḍigh tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho. Amen odi ạmiin mạJizos podi amuughu ameel taghisigh tạJizos ạkpetiom nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō aghōl kua, “ẠJizos, ọony tẸnaan obho ạbugh bọ apu obho, ạna nạva moḍighi ẹko zạmi? Sesen ni, ụliom ghạ zạmi.” Odi ạkpete miibha bho tamen olo ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho mọkarabh ẹmugh obho momute tẹmu odi ōoy obho.
PạJizos apuruan kua zodi, “Aḍien onuma kughōl ẹko?” Podi ạbhagharana aghōl kua, “Ọlogh,” — ebum obho ịkanya ịkarabh ạruumugh neeḍigh tẹmu odi ōoy obho.
Peedi ịkarabh ạruumugh obho iikpulughu mạJizos molo odi opirighan eedi ạlokioghom tobꞌoonu obho ikunughi olo bho.

Atuan nꞌodi esi obho eedi idi obho, kir obꞌọlogh arabhōrōpō ilo nẹḅal mịḅal tọtu aruugum obho. Peedi ịkarabh ạruumugh obho iisen mạJizos igbẹel odi molo odi kabhirighan eedi eedi keḍiku tarabhōrōpō bho, podi ạḅelemaan eedi mọghi oḍigh.
Pịkarabh ạruumugh obho ịḍua tẹmu ōoy obho ịghi iḍiku tarabhōrōpō bho. Poomo eedi arabhōrōpō bho iikilaay tạḅarabh aruugum obho ịghi imeleghu tobꞌegha ọbhiiny obho ịguḅaay.
Arōoy obho neteliom marabhōrōpō bho ịmiin miibha bho, peedi ighiil ịghi tẹma bho nꞌoomo obo bho idiighu taruuḍum obho ịgba iilelemi mibha imute bho.

Parōoy obho iruughu mọmiin ạni ibha imute bho. Eedi iru peedi ịmiin mạJizos nꞌodi ōoy obho ịkarabh ạruumugh obho nẹeḅele ịḍua bho, bho odi delede tasike tạJizos naamina mukpe, nạmoghonyan nạ rōoy, molo aruugu isibh moomo eedi.
Keḍio obo bho ịmiin ạni obho ịgba ịnogho rōoy obho mẹzo ạJizos aakō mōoy obho.
Poomo arōoy ibha ịḍua tebhugh obhꞌaGerasin iru obho, iikpulughu mạJizos mọḅele ebhugh eedi ọḍua, tebum ibꞌaruugu obho nesibh eedi obho. Podi ạJizos aḍigh moghuugh obho momula oghẹel.
Pōoy obho ịkarabh ạruumugh obho ịrol ịiḅaghami obho aasen odi aghōl kua, “Sesen ni, ạami ụtuonuman ạni ạna.” PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi,
“Mula maghẹel totu enyina mạgba miiḅi ọkpo bho Ẹnaan naaḍighi ạnogho ạna bho.” Podi aghẹel ạgba moomo ibha ạJizos aḍighi ạnogho zodi obho aalelemi toomo ẹma bho.
Amen ạJizos amula aghẹel mi tẹḅeenyom obꞌegha bho, ọlogh arōoy ilo neḅōrō zodi ebuom odi magey.
Ponyiin ōoy olo ughōl aJairos, uvẹmụ onyiin otu iikpulughu obho, aru agbuluman taghisigh tạJizos, aasen odi mọtuonom odi ọghi totu odi.
Ogini ọnyani odi olo naagbẹbh maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạsia nạanwe natu mọbho. Ẹzo bho ạJizos nạki obho, arōoy obho nẹeninighian tekẹeny nꞌoḍiom odi.
Togbo arōoy obho, kir onyiin ạni olo nạanwe mẹzegh ạraani moomo aḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạsia. Odi naarōḅōḍi moomo ikpoki odi mi tarizil, keḍio olo arue mookō odi olo.
Podi ạniiran rōoy obho mi tạman tạJizos, ạghi akulaan mọdu ukpe bho tạJizos. Palōor obhꞌodi aru ạneghe tonyiin amen obho.

PạJizos ạmara apuruan kua, “Okōr ōoy akulaan ạmi?” Bọbon ōoy olo aru aatuma olo, keḍio aPita ạkpete kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, tobꞌọlogh arōoy bhibha ịniiran ạna kua bho, keḍio ạna napuruan mobo akulaan ạna?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Onyiin ōoy naakulaan ạmi. Ạami naalōghōma ịnyaam nẹeḍua talōor ạmi.”

Amen ạni obho ạmiin mobho odi otue mu ạḅokia bho, podi ạghi agbuluman taghisigh tạJizos. Alōor odi napiigha, keḍio odi ạrol taghisigh ogbo arōoy obho aatuma mobho odi akulaan mạJizos nꞌẹzo odi aakua lōor odi tamen obho odi akulaan mọdu ukpe tạJizos obho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ọnyani ạmi kẹel nꞌekima. Ologhi omōruōm onuma naakō ạna.”
Odi odi nini nạkpete miibha bho, men ọony adōm ạḍua totu uvẹmụ ōoy otu iikpulughu obho aru ạkpete kua ạnogho maJairos, “Umina ghạ mạga mạaḅaghami mọtughumiom ịtughumiom obho. Ọnyani onuma nạabho.”
PạJizos ạmoghon keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho maJairos, “Ughiil ghạ ruugu. Mōruōm be, pọnyani obhꞌonuma oḍum.”
Amen odi ạJizos ạghi asi totu obho, odi umōrō ḍio nomōrō molo arōoy keḍigh totu obho, keḍio odi abhirighanogh rōoy obho. APita nꞌaJems nꞌạJon, nꞌọde nꞌoniin ọnyani obho be mobo ịrol ạni.
Oomo arōoy obho neeḍigh tịitu nelegheey mebum odi ọnyani obho, keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Íleghe ghạ. Ọnyani obhobho ọbho ḍio, odi nakoḍi ni.”
Oomo eedi ịmologh ịiḅaghami odi tebum obho eedi neelōghōm mobho ọnyani obho mạabho.
Keḍio odi ạJizos ạbham mạvo ọnyani obho ạkpete kua, “Ọnyani obho, ḅetunu.”
Pọnyani obho amula tonyiin amen obho keḍio odi ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho zeedi mọnogho odi meḍian, odi kale.
Ọde nꞌoniin obhꞌodi iimōogh ni keḍio ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho eedi meedi ịgba ḍio ẹnogho mōoy mibha imute bho.
Keḍio ạJizos abheleghi aakōbhōghi monyiin esi maḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho ạnogho eedi mịikpo nꞌịnyaam mobhirighan oomo ịkarabh ạruumugh tạruumu arōoy nꞌookōoy oḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh.
Keḍio odi arōm zeedi mọghi ọgba adōm Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan nꞌookōoy arōoy ilo nẹnweey.
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Terele bhꞌenyina, ịbham ghạ bọbon onyiin ạar, ịbham ghạ mẹḅu bolobolo ẹḅa bolobolo eḍian bolobolo ikpoki, ịbham ghạ nạ mịzal ạrusuoma.
Kotu kotu olo ibhin enyina ịloghom, ịtol todi otu obho ninii ạteeny mamen enyina tẹḍua tẹma bho.
Kẹma kẹma olo enyina ịghi karōoy obho ibhin io enyina ẹloghom, amen enyina nẹḍua, pigunugun mobhugh asike enyina metuḅeḍi mookiom eedi.”
Piteledōm obho iḅerenu ịghi toomo ạraama bho ịgbaay mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho iikōoy nạ rōoy kesi kesi olo eedi ịghi.

Amen ạHerod ọolema bhꞌaGalili aru ạmoghon moomo ibha nemuteey obho, odi orue ḍio mọmoghonyan ebum obho oomo arōoy obho ōoy ọnu ọnu nạgba. Ẹde arōoy nẹgba kua, “ẠJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho naaḅetunu tọbho bho.”
Ẹde nẹgba kua, “Ilaija naaru.” Imina ẹde monyiin ozil ooḍuul obho naaḅetunu tọbho bho.
Keḍio odi ạHerod ạkpete kua, “Sạami usōbh mẹmu tạJon, kōoy obhobho ạami digha ạmoghon obho kokōr ōoy?” Keḍio odi nạva ghạ mọmiin odi ạJizos.
Amen iteledōm obho imula irughẹel, peedi ịgba kạar kạar ilo eedi iḍighi ịnogho mạJizos, podi abhin eedi be ạghi tẹma olo ughōl aBetsaida.
Amen arōoy obho ịva ilōghōm mesi obho odi odi obho, peedi ịtuonom odi. Odi obhirighan io zeedi keḍio ạgba ạnogho zeedi mọnuekpete adōm Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan, aakōoy nạ mobo bho nẹnweey rạzegh obho.

Natu moghul, piteledōm obho ịghi todi ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Kpẹte mạnogho rōoy obho eedi ẹghi tạraama bho nꞌaruuḍum ariḍighi ibha ituan obho ẹva mạar olo eedi tele nꞌesi olo eedi tẹmanaghonogh, ebum obho esi obho ezira idi obho otu ḍio mẹma.”

Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Enyina ịnogho zeedi mạar olo eedi kele.” Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Oomo ạar obho ezōor ụteeny suo, pōogh eḅol ạbred nꞌịzal ina. Ạna nạva molo ezōor kọghi koghō mariḍian kookuōm mobo ọlogh arōoy bhibha bẹle?”

Keḍio arōoy obho idi obho tegbẹbh ni maḍiōbh nꞌịzal nꞌạmaḍian ọonir arōoy. Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho miteledōm obho, “Iḍighi arōoy obho ẹḍianogh rụuku ẹrologhu delede, ẹku esuo erubal ḍiōbh, erubal ḍiōbh arōoy.”
Peedi ịtuugh nạ mẹzo bho iḍighi arōoy obho ịrologhu delede.
PạJizos ạseghe mōogh eḅol ạbred obho nꞌịzal ina bho, ạbham tạvo, aanon tạnyu, keḍio ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, aḅigi ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi mọḍiiy ọnogho arōoy obho.
Poomo eedi iru ile ạrubaraka eedi imuteey, molo iteledōm obho imina iru iikōbhōghi maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạrukpaagh tibha arōoy obho ile isugheeny obho.
Tonyiin aḍuma olo ạJizos be odi mesi naakpulughu, piteledōm obhꞌodi iru todi. Podi apuruan kua zeedi, “Arōoy obho ku nekōl ghạ mạami kokōr ōoy?”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ẹtede nekōl ghạ mạna ạJon ozuughiom rụmuum obho, ẹde mạna Ilaija, imina ẹde mạna onyiin ozil ooḍuul obho olo aḅetunu tọbho bho.”
Keḍio odi apuruan kua zeedi, “Tenyina, kenyina nekōl ạni mạami kokōr ōoy?” PaPita ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna ạMesaya bho Ẹnaan aguanaan obho.”
PạJizos ạmaar aakiom eedi meedi ịgba ḍio miibha bho ẹnogho mọnon ōoy,

keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua, “Ọony Oōy obho tạmiinom ni magey, keḍio arukenya bho nꞌarōoy iiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho tegin nạ zodi, tokigh ni zodi, keḍio togbẹbhiōm ịraar aḍuma bho poḅẹtōn odi tọbho bho.”
Keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua ạnogho moomo eedi, “Kōoy kōoy olo nạva mọtuonuman ạmi, odi taḅulo ni ghuḍum odi aḅẹtōn atōol moorẹeny ẹmigheri obhꞌodi moomo aḍuma ạtuonuman ạami.
Kōoy kōoy olo nạva moḍume aghuḍum obhꞌodi tapiẹmi ni, keḍio odi obo bho napiẹmi ghuḍum odi mebum ạmi obho taḍume ni.
Okōr oḍigh ạsuo mobho ōoy tạteeny erumolo odi agbo mẹela oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho; keḍio abhiẹmi ghuḍum obho Ẹnaan ạnogho zodi obho?
Kōoy kōoy olo nakiil zạmi nꞌịtughumiom obhꞌạmi rẹgheer; odi pobo Ọony Oōy obho takiil nạ rẹgheer tamen olo odi tatu mi teghuan obhꞌodi nꞌeghuan Ọde bho nꞌoomo iiḅi itelema bho tẸnaan.
Ịitua miibha bho ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ẹde enyina obo bho idi suo siibha bho ịbho ḍio ninii eedi tẹmiin mAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Tesi olo oḍual aḍuma neetẹn tamen obho odi ạḍegheey mọkpo bhibha bho, pạJizos abhin maPita nꞌạJon nꞌaJems ịghi ịsiin tạnyu eegum mookpulughu.
Tiikpulughu obhꞌodi, paghisigh odi anwian, nꞌibura bhꞌodi iru nẹmua kaghōzōgh obho.
Tekperenom pịzal arōoy iru nẹḍeghian nꞌodi. Eedi ịzal arōoy bhibha paMozis nꞌIlaija.
Eedi ịḍua tạnyu eghuan obho eru ẹgba nẹnogho mạJizos mẹzo odi tạpo taJerusạlẹm moḍighi obhulughiom ibhꞌọnuekpete bho tẸnaan.
APita nꞌịzal ipedi obho nẹemaar ẹmanaghonogh nekoḍiiy, eedi ịsuma tạrala bho, peedi ịmiin mạJizos nꞌeghuan obhꞌodi nꞌịzal arōoy obho ịmaranuan odi obho.

Ẹzo bho arōoy obho ịḅele mạJizos nẹḍua, paPita ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, ịkar ni ẹneghe magey mẹzo bho ezira idi suo bho. Ezōor togim ịraar arutu suo, onyiin olꞌonuma, onyiin olo taMozis, onyiin olo tIlaija.” Odi nịvo nịvo ọkar io alōghōm mạar olo odi nạkpete.
Odi odi nini nạḍeghe miibha bho, pọbhurubuur aru akpiom eedi molo aruugu isibh miteledōm obho.
Keḍio eedi ịmoghon moghōrōkō tọbhurubuur obho ạkpete kua, “Oobho ọony ạmi obho ạami nạason ụseghe bho, ịmoghonyan zodi.”
Amen eedi ịḅele mọmoghon oghōrōkō bho, piru isughōnōm mạJizos be. Iteledōm obho ipua ni mịnu eedi, ịgba ḍio nọgba bọbon onyiin ibha eedi ịmiin obho ẹnogho mōoy tamen opopo.
Aḍio ạḅaal eedi ịḍua tạnyu eegum obho isōor, pobꞌọlogh arōoy iru itulom odi ạJizos.
Ponyiin ōoy togbo obꞌọlogh arōoy obho amulughu amutiom aghōl kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, sesen ni, sụanaan ghụsan aḍien mọony ạmi. Odi be mogini ọony ạmi.

Mịin. Ọkarabh ẹmugh naaḍigh tẹmu odi nazighe zodi molo namulughu ghạ motoḍigh imulughu keḍio tatōbh nạ zodi toonu molo oobha nefugh ghạ nạ tọnu obhꞌodi, naḍighi ghạ nạ kua zodi moomo amen, molo ọva ghạ nạ ḍio momina ọḅele odi.
Keḍio ạami ubhin odi uru uusenom miteledōm obhꞌonuma mobhirighan ọkarabh ẹmugh obho tẹmu odi, keḍio eedi irue ḍio.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Sey, oobho kokōr oḍigh ọkarabh ạmuum arōoy ilo iloghi omōruōm ilo! Enyina nꞌạami tomina ọtolan ẹko? Ạami tạkurughiom enyina ninii kokōr amen? Pin mọony obho mōruōm ạami.”

Ẹzo bho ọony obho natu obho, pọkarabh ẹmugh obho akuugh mọony obho ạgurom tade bho kagbam, molo alōor obhꞌodi napiigha. Keḍio ạJizos ạbhooruom mọkarabh ẹmugh obho, aakō mọony obho, abhin zodi amulumi ạnogho mọde bhꞌodi.
Oomo arōoy obho iimōogh ni teghuan ịnyaam obho tẸnaan.
Arōoy obho idi nini teemōogh mi toomo ọkpo bho ạJizos naḍighi obho, podi ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho,
“Ịmaar ẹbhamaghiom mibha ạami natu mọkpete ọnogho enyina bho: tokuugh ni mỌony Oōy obho ọlogh tạravo arōoy ịnyaam ẹmar-arōoy obhobho.”
Keḍio iteledōm obho irue nạ ḍio mọmoghonyan odi. Ụḅoki ni zeedi molo eedi ịmoghonyan, keḍio eedi ẹkona ine nạ ḍio mopuruan odi mẹmu ọnuekpete bho.
Onyiin amen piteledōm obho nẹkanan nꞌalōor eedi mobo tapu moomo eedi,
ạJizos naalōghōm mịitua bhꞌeedi podi abhin monyiin ọbumoony ạmarami talōor odi,

keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Kōoy kōoy olo tapin mọbumoony obhobho ạloghom talōor odi mi tebum aḍien ạmi, pu naabhin nạ zạmi ạloghom, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo abhin ạami ạloghom, pu naabhin nạ ạloghom zodi obo bho arōm ạami obho. Obo bho ọtuom io lōor odi mōoy togbo bhꞌenyina bho pobo tapu moomo enyina.”
PạJon ạkpete kua amutiom, “Ọde otu, ezōor ụmiin monyiin amen mōoy olo abhin taḍien onuma napirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh, keḍio ezōor ụpuenaan odi ebum obho odi olo ạni tẹku ezōor obho.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, nꞌiteledōm ipedi obho, “Ị́puenaan ghạ zodi ebum obho kōoy kōoy olo ọgbaghan io enyina paḍigh nꞌenyina.”
Aruḍuma bho ạJizos tạsiin bọ tạnyu obho netuan, podi ạto ạnogho lōor odi monyeneni taJerusạlẹm.
Podi arōm mạnwuny adōm moḍionom ghạ taghisigh ọghi tonyiin ẹma aSameria ookōbhōghia kạar kạar oḅōruōm odi.
Odi aru asi arōoy ẹma bho igin ni mobhin odi ọloghom, ebum obho neemute ịman talōor odi mobho odi nạki taJerusạlẹm.
Amen aJems nꞌạJon iteledōm obho ịmiin miibha bho, peedi ịkpete kua, “Obumọogh, ezōor obheleghi nyạn tạnyu obho asōor aru akunu zeedi?”
PạJizos aghiraan asi zeedi.
Keḍio eedi ịḍua tẹma popo ịghi tọnon ẹma.
Eedi iḍigh tebōom, ponyiin ōoy aru ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Ạami tạtuonuman ạni ni ạna kesi kesi olo ạna nạki.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạraakpa nꞌaraapōgh eedi, ịnun nꞌarutu eedi, keḍio Ọony Oōy obho bọbon esi otuḅeen ẹmu odi obhooghia olo.”
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mọnon, “Tụonuman ạami”, podi ōoy obho amulumian kua zodi, “Oōy, ạami tatu ni keḍio ḅẹle ạami upira ụki ụḍi mọde ạmi kụ.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ḅẹlemaan obo bho nẹebhozu obho eḍi miḍim eedi, keḍio ạna kịa mạgba ọnuekpete adōm Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Pọnon ōoy ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Oōy, ạami tạtuonuman ạni ni ạna, keḍio ḅẹle ạami ụki totu ukōl ‘Ịmaar ẹrol’ motu ezōor ku.”
PạJizos amulumian kua zodi, “Kōoy kōoy olo nạsiin mogbo ale kaanon tade ogbẹbh io moḍigh ạni tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Iibha iru itẹn, pObạmọogh obho ạson mịnon ạbhenya ilo mịzal ạraala arōoy amutiom zạl zạl esi moḍionom odi taghisigh ọghi toomo ạraama nꞌariisi ilo odi nạva mọghi.

Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Oḍighi iḅua oḍighi obho ạbugh magey, keḍio obo oḍighi oḍighi obho igbẹbhan io. Iikpulughu mẹnogho mobo bho oḍighi obho molo odi atōm mịnon arōoy moru oḅuuy ạni eḍian oḍighi obho.
Ịki, ạami natōm enyina kạnwuny ạraana mi tesooḍia ạrukurunuma.
Ịbham ghạ mikpoki nꞌẹḅa bolobolo arakōrō. Ị́mara ghạ mebheleghian mipeleghian mebhiẹmi men enyina mi tebōom.
Kamen kamen olo enyina iḍigh totu ōoy, ipira ghạ meghōl kua, ‘Ekima ẹrol totu obhobho!’
Erumolo ōoy olo tapin mekima bhꞌenyina natugh totu obho, pịḅelemaan ekima bhꞌenyina ẹrolan odi. Kerumolo ōoy olo odi kua olo, pịseghe mekima bhꞌenyina mẹḍuonom.
Ịtol tonyiin otu mele mẹbhoghol kilo kilo eedi ịnogho enyina. Ịkpe ni molo obo bho naḍighi moḍighi obho kabhin mạmukpe oḍighi odi. Ị́ḍua ghạ motu metẹn otu.
Kẹma kẹma olo enyina ịghi kebhin enyina ẹloghom, pile kạar kạar olo eedi ịnogho enyina,
iikōoy mobo bho nẹnweey rạzegh obho, mẹkpete kua mẹnogho marōoy ẹma bho mAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan odi tẹeḅa ạvo.
Kenyina ẹghi tẹma olo ipin io enyina ẹloghom, pimute tetẹrẹ ẹma bho mẹkpete kua,
‘Obhugh ẹma bhꞌenyina ibha idi tasike ezōor obho ẹkona, ezōor noogunugun umulumian enyina, keḍio ịitua miibha bho. Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan odi tẹeḅa ạvo.’
Ạami nạkar ạgba kua ạnogho enyina taḍuma ịiruan bho ọsu ghụsan aḍien olo Ẹnaan tạsuanaan mạSodom tepu mibhꞌẹma popo.”

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina arōoy ibhꞌaKorazin. Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina nạ arōoy ibhꞌaBetsaida. Ughōl ọkpo ịiḍaany obho nooḍighi tenyina bho, kuḍighi taTaya nꞌaSaidon, kōl eedi neeḍigh tịitu ekiraan tịkarabh eedi kọkanya amen.
Taḍuma ịiruan obho, ilo Ẹnaan tạsuanaan ghụsan aḍien marōoy aTaya nꞌaSaidon tepu ni enyina.
Enyina arōoy ibhꞌạKapaniom, enyina ịva ghạ mọbheebh osi tẸnaan gạ? Tonyuughi ni zenyina ọloki tobꞌoonu obho ikunughi olo bho.”

Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho, “Kōoy kōoy olo ạmoghon moghōrōkō enyina, pụ nạamoghon nạ moghōrōkō ạmi. Kōoy kōoy olo agin enyina, pagin nạ zạmi, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo agin ạmi pụ naagin nạ zodi obo bho arōm ạmi obho.”

Ạbhenya ilo mịzal ạraala arōoy obho imula irughẹel nꞌogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi, ịkpete kua ẹnogho mạJizos, “Obumọogh, ịkarabh ạruumugh obho ẹkona eghiilaan ezōor tamen olo ezōor ubhirighan eedi mi taḍien onuma.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ạami ạmiin maSetan mobho ạḍua tạnyu obho nameel kẹḅaal ọkarabh aḍio obho naḍighi ghạ meghenem obho.
Ịmoghon, ạami nạanogho enyina mịikpo molo enyina tetele ni ẹezeghi rịriaar nꞌịikpolodu molo ạar olo teḍighi enyina olo. Ạami nạanogho nạ zenyina mịnyaam mopuom obo ọlogh aḍien enyina.
Oomo ibha bho ẹkona, íbo ghạ tebum ịkarabh ạruumugh obho nekiilaan moghōrōkō enyina bho, ibo tebum obho Ẹnaan nạage riḍien enyina mi tạnyu obho.”

Tonyiin odi amen opopo, pẸmugh Iigbia bho aḍigh amuzō tạJizos ạnogho zodi mọḅaal ologhi molo odi ạkpete kua, “Ạda, Obạmọogh mạnyu obho nꞌade bho, ạami nạsebh ni ạna magey tebum obho ạna naaḍeeriom mobo bho ilōghōm io mạar obho mọkpo bho ạna ụḅoki milōghōm ạar arōoy obho. Ạda, ẹzo bho nạ, ạna kụto moomo iibha bho tẹzo bho iḍigh bọ tologhi onuma bho nꞌẹzo ịitua bhꞌonuma.”
Keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua, “Ọde ạmi nạalogh tạvo ạmi kạar kạar. Tughuneen mỌde bho ḍio bọbon ōoy olo alōghōm mỌony obho olo. Tughuneen nạ mỌony obho ḍio, bọbon ōoy olo alōghōm nạ mỌde bho olo.”
Keḍio odi aghiraan ạkpete kua mi tẹḅokia ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho, “Ạlisebh ilo obo bho nẹmiin miibha bho enyina nẹmiin obho.
Ọlogh arizil nꞌạruula ẹva magey mọmiin ạni ibha enyina nẹmiin obho keḍio irue ḍio mọmiin ạni, ẹva nạ magey mọmoghon ạni ibha enyina nẹmoghon obho keḍio irue nạ ḍio mọmoghon ạni.”
Onyiin amen ponyiin ọgba miilōgh aru ạmara mọḍa ạJizos oonon, keḍio abheleghi apuruan kua zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạami taḍighi ẹko kạami ạteeny ạni maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo?”
Keḍio ạJizos amulumian kua zodi, “Ụge ẹko tiilōgh obho taMozis? Ibha ạna ughōl obho kạna ụmoghonyan ghạ ẹko?”

Podi ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Ụge ughōl, ‘Tulan mẸnaan Obạmọogh ạna bho nꞌoomo ologhi onuma nꞌoomo aghuḍum ẹmugh onuma nꞌoomo ịnyaam onuma nꞌoomo ịitua onuma matulan nạ mobo okōol onuma kẹzo bho ạna utulan lōor onuma bho.’ ”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ạna ụbhagharana ni ạseghe. Tụugh aḍighi miibha bho, pạna oḍum ạni.”
Odi ọgba miilōgh obho nạva momutiom alōor mobho odi aru mooḅi ōoy, podi apuruan kua mạJizos, “Okōr ōoy mobo okōol ạmi?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Onyiin ōoy ạḍua taJerusạlẹm nạki taJeriko podi ameel aḍigh tạravo ạruḅa ilo ịbaay rụsuoma odi, iḍul odi ịḅelemaan zodi teesoḍia ọbho nꞌaghuḍum.
Tamaazuan ponyiin ōoy iiḅua bho arele natẹn tonyiin odi ebōom obho. Amen odi ạmiin mōoy obho mobho nạakeḍian, podi ạgbaaron ạḅol tọtu ạḍua.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, monyiin ōoy olꞌaLivai olo naḍighi moḍighi tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho, odi aru ạmiin podi ạgbaaron nạ ạḅol tọtu ạḍua.
Keḍio onyiin ōoy olo aSameria olo natele merele ạḅol tonyiin odi ebōom obho aru ạmiin mōoy obho. Amen odi ạmiin mōoy obho, podi ạsuanaan odi ghụsan aḍien.
Podi ạseghe mụnu nꞌamiim ạghi asighogh tariisi ōoy obho, ạghoroghiiy keḍio akpagh zodi ạḅam tạsu obhꞌodi abhin odi ạghi tonyiin otu obhooghia, aakō zodi.

Ạḅaal, podi ạseghe mikpoki ịzal aḍuma oḍighi ạnogho mobo bho naanon ghạ motu obho, ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Pin miibha bho maakuōm mōoy obho. Amen ạami umula uru, kọnu kọnu olo ạna uliom tẹmu odi pạami omulumian onuma.’
Tịraar arōoy bhibha, koḍighen mobo okōol ōoy obho ameel aḍigh tạravo ạruḅa bho?”
Pọgba miilōgh obho ạbhagharana kua, “Obo bho ạsuanaan bọ zodi ghụsan obho.” Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kịa mạtuugh aḍighi ạni ghạ miibha bho.”
Ẹzo bho ạJizos nꞌobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho itẹn nẹki tebōom obho, peedi isul tonyiin ẹma, pạni olo ughōl ạMata abhin mạJizos ạloghom totu odi.
Ụmarani odi olo ughōl aMeri odi delede tọtu asike tObạmọogh obho nạmoghon ạni mibha odi nạtughumiom obho.

Ẹbhirima otu obho neepu mạMata be mọbhirima molo ologhi odi naḅẹebh, keḍio odi ạghi ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Obumọogh, ạar io tonuma gạ mẹzo bho ụmarani ạmi nạaḅelemaan ạami be moomo ẹbhirima bho. Kpẹte mạnogho zodi odi aru ạḅar ạni ạami.”
Keḍio Obạmọogh obho amulumian kua zodi, “ẠMata, ạMata, ịkanya ọkpo nẹeḅaghami ạna.
Keḍio onyiin be mobho ạneghe ni. AMeri nạarolom zodi opo bho molo urue mu ọseghe talōor odi.”

Onyiin amen olo ạJizos odi tiikpulughu monyiin esi, piteledōm obhꞌodi iru todi tamen olo odi naakpulughu ạḅele, keḍio ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Obumọogh, tụghumiom ezōor mẹzo ookpulughu, kẹzo bho ạJon ạtughumiom miteledōm odi obho.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Iikpulughu ghạ kua,
‘Ạda,
iigbia ẹrol ẹnogho ḍien obhꞌonuma.
Ade-Ọolema bhꞌonuma aru!
Eḍian oomo aruḍuma bho, nọgho ezōor mibhꞌaadon.
Ḅẹlemaan ezōor mịkarabh ezōor,
kẹzo bho ezōor nọḅelemaan mobo bho iḍighi ezōor mịkarabh obho.
Ubhin ghạ zezōor mạlogh tesi ịdereghi.’ ”
Keḍio ạJizos amina ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Eru kạar olo onyiin enyina ạghi totu ọbulol odi mogbo uḍugul ạkpete kua, ‘Ọbulol, ḅọolian ạami mịraar eḅol ạbred.
Ọbulol ạmi olo odi merele asul totu ạmi keḍio ạar ọnogho odi olo.’
Kodi ạrol tẹkpe odi ạbhagharana kua, ‘Ụuḅaghami ghạ zạmi. Ạnwuny ạmi nꞌạami nọomanaghonogh. Ezōor nọodu motu obho. Ạami utue mu aḅetunu mọnogho onuma mạar.’

Ạna taḍighi ẹko? Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina: erumolo odi oḅetunu nạ ḍio ạnogho ạna mạbred obho tebum obho odi aru mọbulol onuma bho ẹkona, odi taḅetunu ni ạnogho ạna kạar kạar olo ạna nagbẹel tebum obho ạregheer isibh io ạna mọrol ogbẹel osi tikunughi obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, igbẹel, pọnogho enyina. Ịva, penyina ọmiin. Iikpu, poghuuron ọnogho enyina,
ebum obho kōoy kōoy olo agbẹel, tọnogho ni zodi. Kōoy kōoy olo ạva, tạmiin ni. Kōoy kōoy olo aakpu, tokuuron ni ọnogho zodi.
Eru kạar olo ọony onyiin enyina ạburude bho agbẹel enyina mena, enyina tẹnogho ni zodi mooḍigh gạ?
Bolobolo odi agbẹel enyina mọga ạkenegh, enyina tẹnogho ni zodi mọokpolodu?
Enyina ạsukarabh obho kilōghōm mọnogho iiḅi ọkpo mạnwuny enyina, kịitua mẹzo. Ọde bho odi bọ tạnyu obho tạnogho mẸmugh Iigbia bhꞌodi mobo bho igbẹel odi obho.”
Onyiin amen ạJizos abhirighan mokpom-ụka ọkarabh ẹmugh tẹmu onyiin ōoy. Ọkarabh ẹmugh obho ạḍua, pōoy obho ạke mọkpete ạar. Poomo arōoy obho iimōogh.
Pẹde obo bho idi ạni suo bho ịkpete kua, “ABielzebul uvẹmụ aruru obho ạnogho zodi mịikpo mobhirighanogh ịkarabh ạruumugh obho.”
Kir ẹde ilo nẹva mọdegh odi peedi igbẹel odi moḍighi ọkpo ịiḍaany oḍeeriom eedi mobho odi aru maKraist obho.

ẠJizos naalōghōm mịitua bhꞌeedi keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Bọbon onyiin ebhugh olo ịḍianogh rụuku onyiin naḅe monyiin olo ịrolan ghạ ibia olo. Keghun otu keghun otu olo nẹeḍianogh olo itul ile ghạ monyiin ẹkpa eḍian olo.
Kerumolo aSetan nꞌotu odi nẹeḍianogh rụuku onyiin naḅe monyiin, odi tatue ni amina ạmara? Ẹzo bho enyina nekōl maBielzebul ạnogho ạami mịikpo mobhirighanogh ịkarabh ạruumugh obho,
kokōr ōoy ạni ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom enyina bho mịikpo mobhirighan ịkarabh ạruumugh obho? Obo bho nẹtuonom enyina bho nẹegba emutiom mobho enyina neekōrōnuan.
Ạami ụkar ubhin tịikpo tẸnaan kạami napirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh obho moḍeeriom enyina mobho Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan naaru ạteenyom enyina.
“Kamen kamen olo ọoghuanaan ōoy ạnya mọkpo ẹgham ku naḅōrō motu odi, bọbon onyiin ạar olo tapẹ olo.
Kōoy olo ạghua apu zodi karu ạmaranuan apuom odi, podi ọḅirogh oomo ọkpo ẹgham obho obo bhꞌotu obho naḍuom ologhi mobho tẹpel ni odi obho, ọḍian nꞌarōoy odi.
“Kōoy kōoy olo oḍigh io nꞌạami, odi nꞌạami obo ạruruan. Kōoy kōoy olo ọḅar io ạami aakōbhōghi rạana bho, nạazarami ni.

“Kamen kamen olo ọkarabh ẹmugh amute tẹmu ōoy, odi nateleey ghạ tariisi olo ạmuum ilo, ạva mesi oḍigh obhooghia. Erumolo odi ọmiin io mesi obhooghia, podi ọkpete ekua ọnogho alōor odi, ‘Ạami tamula ni ạki tugbaany amarugh ạmi.’
Odi amula aru kạmiin mobho nọomaar uḅẹer motu obho, ụmaar uukōbhōghi useeri,
podi oghiil omula ọghi obhin ịnon oḍual ịkarabh ạruumugh ilo iḅẹebh ipu zodi, oru ọloghom molo aghuḍum ōoy obho taḅẹebh ni apu mịḅel.”
ẠJizos ạḍeghe miibha bho ạḅele, pạni olo odi ạni suo ạkpete kua, “Ạlisebh ilꞌodi ạni obho ạmar ạna bho, obho aakuom ạna mạraamaam odi obho.”
Keḍio ạJizos aghiraan ạkpete kua, “Ạlisebh ilꞌobo bho ạmoghon bọ moghōrōkō tẸnaan kaghiilaan obho.”

Ẹzo bho egi arōoy iru imuzō tesi obho ạJizos odi obho, podi ạkpete kua, “Pẹzo arōoy ọoke bhobho iḅẹebh isi. Eedi nẹva ghạ mọmiin ịiḍaany mi tẸnaan, keḍio, tughuneen mịiḍaany ibha tạJona, ịnon ilo toḍighi oḍeeriom eedi ilo.
Onyiin ẹzo bho Ẹnaan abhin maJona aru aḍighiom mịiḍaany ạnogho marōoy aNineve bho pẹzo topin nạ mỌony Oōy obho oḍighiom mịiḍaany ọnogho mạnwuny ọoke bhobho.

Taḍuma ịiruan obho, ạni obho ạda bọ maruubhugh Arebia bho tạmaranuan ni ạgbaaghian mạnwuny ọoke bhobho ạtu mịiruan ạnogho eedi ebum obho odi ạḍua tegbeeny esi aru mọmoghon ạni ịtughumiom olōghōm ạar tạSolomon obho. Keḍio iinon, ogbōgh olo apu mạSolomon odi suo.

Taḍuma ịiruan obho, arōoy aNineve tẹmaranuan ni enyina ạnwuny ọoke bhobho ẹtu mịiruan ẹnogho, tebum obho eedi ighiraan ni tịkarabh obhꞌeedi tamen obho eedi ịmoghon mịigbaay tạJona bho, keḍio tesuo ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, kir olo apu maJona.”
“Bọbon ōoy olo tạsu mọtodi kạḅoki bolobolo ạseghe mạar akpereghiom olo. Nọosu, nọḅam ghạ tạnyu ạbebe molo kōoy kōoy olo aḍigh totu obho ạmiin mạar.
Ikpo-ariḍien onuma pọtodi alōor onuma. Erumolo ariḍien onuma ịneghe ni ịman, poomo alōor onuma ẹḅaal ẹḅaal. Kerumolo ạna ụteeny mọkarabh ekpaḍien poomo alōor onuma ọkinim ọkinim.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, gona lōor onuma molo ẹḅaal alōor obhꞌonuma otu mọkinim.
Keru kạar olo oomo alōor onuma aru mẹḅaal mẹḅaal, molo bọbon esi alōor onuma olo odi tọkinim olo, palōor onuma ọmua agey, kẹzo bho ọtodi nạmua ghạ ạnogho ạna mẹḅaal obho.”
ẠJizos ạḍeghe mipe bho ạḅele, ponyiin ōoy aFarisi obho abheleghi zodi mọghi otul odi ole eḍian. Podi ạtuonuman odi ạghi ạrol delede nale.
Odi ōoy aFarisi obho akperenom ni mọmiin obho ạJizos ootōla ḍio rạvo kẹzo eḍighiom ạar obhꞌeedi kagbi mole eḍian obho.
PObạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Nonon, enyina arōoy aFarisi obho neetōlōgh ghạ mạrafa nꞌạrukpa enyina ẹḅaaleni tạman obho keḍio tiloghi obhꞌenyina ạrakpany nꞌiduguludany imuzō ni.
Sọo, ibꞌaraama, Ẹnaan obo bho ạlem bọ mạnyu bho, obo bho ạlem bọ mologhi obho nạ ḍio gạ?
Ịḅar mạman obho nꞌologhi obho meetōlōgh, penyina ọḅaal ọman taghisigh tẸnaan.

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina arōoy aFarisi obho, ebum obho enyina nẹseghe ghạ bin mi taḍiōbh abin ịigho asumabōbh ẹnogho mẸnaan obho, keḍio enyina nẹesar etuḅeen miiḅi eḍighiom ạar nꞌetulan obho tẸnaan. Enyina kiḍighi ghạ miibha bho kegbi mọḅaram ipedi obho.

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina arōoy aFarisi obho, ebum obho enyina ibhin irōol tẹmu mọrologhu ghạ tibꞌiiḅi ẹtolom mi tarutu iikpulughu obho, nꞌolo arōoy kebheleghian ghạ zenyina kẹlogh enyina meghuan mi tariḍighi obho.
Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina, ebum obho enyina idi karuugu arōoy ilo iileeny nꞌade bho molo arōoy ilōghōm io ịghi nepẹlōgh.”
Ponyiin ọgba miilōgh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, iibha bho ạna nạkpete obho, ạna nạkorogh ezōor nạ.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina ịgba miilōgh obho. Enyina neeti ghạ dōol mịnon arōoy eḅuni marurum eedi keḍio enyina ịḅar ghạ ḍio zeedi erōol ạni dōol obho.
Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina ebum obho enyina iḅōghōm rutu eḍighi ẹneghemi maruugu arizil obho, ạkar eedi arizil obho ạburude enyina ịzeey obho.
Iibha bho nẹgba emutiom mobho enyina iḍigh nꞌạburude bhꞌenyina mibha eedi ịzeey rizil obho, ebum obho enyina iḅōghōghōm rutu maruugu arizil obho.
Iibha kiḍighi kẸnaan ạkpete kua mi tọbhereer olōghōm ạar obhꞌodi aghōl, ‘Ạami tatōm rizil nꞌiteledōm aakiom eedi, ẹde eedi tẹze ni, ẹnogho mọmiinom mẹde.’
Tebum iibha bẹleni, tọkpiom ni mạnwuny ọoke bhobho tebum arizil obho ụzeey bọ kamen idi ẹmar-arōoy obho,

ạḍua tamen obho ughigh bọ mEbẹl ninii aru asi tamen obho ughigh bọ mạZekaraya bho, mi tesooḍia ẹede ọtun ạar obho nꞌesi iigbia obꞌotu iikpulughu obho. Ạkar agey nạ ni, ạnwuny ọoke bhobho tẹmiinom ni tebum oomo ọkpo bhibha.

“Itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zenyina ịgba miilōgh obho, ebum obho enyina neeḅol ịbham mịsabi eguugh otu olōghōm ạar obho. Enyina nịvo nịvo iḍigh io keḍio enyina ịmara tọnu otu obho nẹpuenaan mịnon moḍigh.”
Amen ạJizos amute totu ōoy aFarisi obho, pobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho ịke mọgbaghan odi magey nꞌopuruanōgh odi moḍigh kẹrekere iipuruan ọkpo
mọdegh odi molo eedi ẹpamam odi, erumolo odi ạkpete akōrōnuan monyiin esi.

Tamen obhobho, ạsumuunir arōoy neeru neekōbhōghian molo onyiin nạazeghi monyiin, pạJizos abhira ạkpete kua ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi, “Igona lōor enyina tiben eḍighiom ạar aghuḍum arōoy aFarisi obho ibha idi kayist obho neebhugheni ghạ mạbred obho.
Kạar kạar olo ukpereghi tokpẹerōn ni. Oomo ọkpo ẹḅokia tomutiom ni tẹḅaal ogbo etẹrẹ.
Ilōghōm mobho kọnuekpete kọnuekpete olo enyina ịḅokia tọkinim ịkpete tomutiom ni tẹḅaal. Kilo kilo enyina ịḍua tẹkpe iibhōlaay tọlaalom ni toomo ẹma bho.”
“Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina ạburubulol ibhꞌạmi, íghiil ghạ ruugu mobo bho tekigh iikpōogh alōor obho be, itue ḍio eḍighi mọnon ạar olo aḅẹebh apu suo bho.

Ạami natu moḍeeriom enyina mobo bho enyina tekiil obho. Ikiil mẸnaan obho amen odi naaghigh miikpōogh obho ạteeny nạ mịnyaam morōbh ẹmugh obho ọlogh tobꞌoonu obho ikunughi olo bho. Agey nạ ni, ạami nạkpete nạ ạnogho enyina, ikiil odi.
“Oōgh ạriwiriri-wịriri ḍio gạ mibha noḅool mịzal ạkobo? Keḍio bọbon onyiin eedi olo Ẹnaan naaḅulo olo.
Ạkar ạsilaan ibhꞌẹmu enyina Ẹnaan nạaḅal alōghōm mọnu obho. Tebum iibha bẹleni, ighiil ghạ ruugu. Enyina ịla mạar epu ạni ni kua mọlogh ạriwiriri-wịriri.”
“Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina: kōoy kōoy olo aatumuom ạami mi togbo arōoy, onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mobho Ọony Oōy obho tamulumian odi mi taghisigh itelema bho tẸnaan.
Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạbharanaan ạami mi togbo arōoy, pẹzo Ọony Oōy obho tạparanaan nạ zodi mi taghisigh itelema bho tẸnaan.
“Kōoy kōoy olo ạkpete mịkarabh aḍighanaan mỌony Oōy obho tọḅelemaan ni, keḍio obo bho ạkpete mịkarabh aḍighanaan mẸmugh Iigbia bho ọḅelemaan olo.

“Kamen kamen olo ubhin enyina ụmarami tarutu iikpulughu obho, bolobolo taghisigh ạruula, nꞌisōbh rạakpe bho, mọnogho ịigbaay enyina, ịíḅaghami ghạ lōor enyina, ịítu ghạ nạ milo enyina tekōl ẹgba mọḍua.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho pobo tạnogho zenyina mi tamen opopo mịigbaay enyina.”
Togbo arōoy obho, ponyiin ōoy ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Obo ịtughumiom, tue mạkpete mạnogho mumōr ạmi odi ạḍian nꞌạami mịga ibha ọde ezōor aseerian ezōor obho.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Oōy, okōr ōoy atẹnẹ ạami mọtu mịiruan nꞌọḍi mạḍi ạnogho enyina?”
