Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho moomo arōoy obho, “Igona lōor enyina mẹkporion rạvo enyina toomo oḍigh kẹrekere ẹḍogh okpoki, ebum obho aghuḍum ōoy olo toomo ọkpo ibha odi ạteeny obho, kẹzo kẹzo olo odi agbo mẹela asi.”
Keḍio odi aru adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi, “Onyiin obꞌọola ạteeny moḍighi olo amute magey.
Podi ạatua tologhi odi aghōl maa, ‘Ạami taḍighi ẹko? Otu olo ạami kakubh mariḍian obhꞌạmi olo.
Ạami naalōghōm mẹzo ạami taḍighi. Ạami tạakpo motu obhꞌạmi aḅōgh mọnon ogbōgh, keḍio ạami taḅu moomo ariḍian obhꞌạmi, ạseghe moomo ọkpo bhꞌạmi ạloki todi otu obho aseeri.

Keḍio ạami tạkpete kua ạnogho lōor obhꞌạmi: “Oobho pẹmugh olo ạami ụteeny. Ạna nạateeny kạar kạar olo ạna nạva ilo tẹtolom ni ạna mọlogh ạsumusia. Kibheri lōor onuma, male mạbhoghol, mạḅaal ologhi.” ’
Tipa bho, keḍio Ẹnaan ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Sọo, obꞌeema, uḍugul aadon, pạami obheleghi ọseghe aghuḍum onuma, keḍio ọkpo bhibha ạna naakōbhōghi obho tetu milꞌokōr ōoy?’
Iibha pẹzo temutenaan kōoy kōoy olo agbo mẹela akubhughi ạnogho lōor odi, keḍio taghisigh tẸnaan odi aru muvekulom.”

Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho, “Iibha kiḍighi kạami nạkpete kua ạnogho enyina: ịíḅaghami ghạ lōor enyina mi tariḍian ilo ole ọnogho enyina ghuḍum bolobolo ibura ilo oburuom iikpōogh alōor obho,
ebum obho aghuḍum obho ạla mạar apu meḍian, iikpōogh alōor obho ipu mibura.
Ịmiin maghuḍum ạsumubhaabh obho. Eedi iḅẹbh ghạ ḍio eḅu riḍian. Eedi iḅōghi ghạ ḍio rutu ẹloki rạkpe mokubhogh ariḍian. Ẹnaan pobo naakō zeedi. Enyina iḍigh io nꞌeghuan epu zeedi gạ?
Okōr ōoy mi tenyina tatue ạlogh sụmusia taghuḍum odi mi tịitu?
Ẹzo bho enyina itue ḍio eḍighi mọkpo ilo idugh kua bho, ebum eeghe kenyina nẹeḅaghami lōor enyina mi tịnon ọkpo?

Iinon mạrafalawa eḍum obho. Eedi ikumuan ghạ ḍio mọteeny ibura, ilo oburuom alōor eedi, keḍio ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, toomo ẹela bho tạSolomon odi obura ḍio mibura ilo ịneghe iileeny mạrafalawa bhibha.

Ẹnaan obo ạseghe mạrafalawa bho aburom mịigho eḍum obho, ibha ụmiin dodon eḍie nọosu nyạn, ụmiin mu obho. Sọo arōoy obo ologhi omōruōm obho igbẹbhan io, enyina ilōghōm io mobho odi tabur ni enyina apu miibha bho gạ?
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịítu ghạ mẹeḅaghami lōor enyina mọva ọkpo ole nꞌọbhoghol.
Oḍigh ọkpo bhibha pibha obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho nekilighuan ghạ tẹmar-arōoy obho. Ọde enyina obho odi tạnyu obho naalōghōm mobho ịgbaan ni molo enyina kẹteeny miibha bho.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ikilighuan maghuḍum Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan, podi ọnoghuom enyina moomo iibha bho.”
“Ighiil ghạ ruugu toomo ẹzo bho enyina ikio bho. Ẹkar eḍigh tologhi Ọde bhꞌenyina obho odi tạnyu obho mọnogho enyina mAde-Ọolema bhꞌodi.

Iḅool kạar kạar olo enyina ịteeny mẹseghe mikpoki obho mẹnoghooy ruvekulom obho. Ịkologh mạruḅa ikpoki ilo itue ḍio eḅu, mẹloki mesereghi mẹela bhꞌenyina mi tẸnaan, tesi obho eghuan ikpoki obhꞌenyina tẹtol ni kamen kamen obho, ạruḅa itue nạ ḍio eḍigh emiinyogh bolobolo ọoghara eḍigh ele.
Kesi kesi olo enyina ikubh mẹela enyina, pesi ologhi enyina tẹtol nạ.”

“Ịkpamaghia mẹmaar ẹkpua mukpe enyina mẹghuemi ku mẹsuuy mịtodi enyina mẹbham tạvo kiiḅi ạrubana ilo neḅōrō mọde otu eedi morughẹel tẹzaal ipina, molo, amen odi asi totu aakpu, eedi tekẹm ni ekuurōn meguugh obho.

Ọḅaal ologhi tẹtol ni ẹnogho mạrubana bho ọde otu eedi tatughẹel tatulom eedi mibha eedi nemori momori neḅōruōm odi. Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina: odi tazuurōna ni meghōony odi ạkpete ạnogho eedi mọrol adelede keḍio odi tạseghe meḍian ạnogho zeedi.
Ọḅaal ologhi tẹtol ni ẹnogho zeedi, erumolo odi aru mogbo uḍugul bolobolo ọḅel ọnu ạkenegh keḍio ạmiin ni zeedi mobho eedi idi mimoom neḅōrō zodi.
Ilōghōm mobho obo bho otu obho olōghōm ghạ ḍio mamen ọḅa natu totu odi. Odi alōghōm ni bọ, odi kụḅelemaan io rụḅa bho moḅom oḍigh totu odi ọḅirogh ọkpo ọḍuonom.
Enyina ẹkona ịmaar egon nạ, ebum obho Ọony Oōy obho tatu mọmiin enyina tamen olo enyina ịitua ḍio.”
PaPita ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Obumọogh, asidōgh obhobho ạna udōgh nạnogho ezōor be bẹlee koomo arōoy.”

PObạmọogh obho ạbhagharana kua, “Okōr ōoy siibha bho mẹbana olōghōm ạar olo ạteeny nạ mooḅi eḍighiom ạar? Odi pobo bho ọde otu odi tạlogh tạvo odi moomo ịikpo amarugh-otu odi mọnogho ghạ ạrubana ipedi obho maribin eḍian eedi tamen olo iizuan mọnogho.
Ọḅaal ologhi tạtol ni ạnogho mẹbana bho ọde otu odi tatughẹel tạmiin ni zodi mobho odi ạtuugh mibha ụkpete ụnogho odi obho.
Agey nạ ni, ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, ọde otu obho tạlogh ni tạvo ẹbana popo moomo ọkpo odi.
Kerumolo odi ẹbana popo ạatua tologhi odi aghōl kua, ‘Ọde-otu ạmi nabia morughẹel,’ keḍio ạke moḍulogh ạnwuny nꞌạsunwunyaan ạrubana ipedi obho tọde otu obho, nꞌole ọbhoghol, ọbhoghol keghigh,
ọde-otu obho tatughẹel maḍuma olo odi ọotua ḍio, nꞌamen olo odi olōghōm io. Ọde-otu obhꞌodi tạliom ni zodi, aseeri zodi kobo bho imōruōm io mẸnaan obho.
“Ẹbana olo alōghōm mibha iḍigh tologhi tọde-otu odi kookōbhōghia ḍio ạtuugh aḍighi mibha iḍigh tologhi tọde-otu odi obho, tọliom ni ọmaar ọgurogh.

Ẹbana bho olōghōm io mibha iḍigh tologhi ọde-otu odi obho kaḍighi mạar olo ịgbaan ni mọgurogh odi, tọliom zodi nꞌịbam ạligur. Obo bho ụnogho bọ mịkanya bho, ịkanya mobho togbẹel nạ tạvo odi. Obo bho ụnogho bọ mibꞌịkanya bho, ibꞌịkanya nạ mobho togbẹel tạvo odi.
“Ạami uru mọsu ạnyan de bho. Mịin milo ạami nạva molo koghōl nọoke ogbonoghi.
Ạami ạteeny mozua ạmuum olo ạami kazua, pịitu ilo tẹtolaan ạami ninii kamen olo temuneen!
Enyina ịkar nẹetua mobho ạami ubhin mekima uru tẹmar-arōoy obho gạ? Eenyi-o, ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, ekima ḍio, ạmaḍian.
Ạseghe siibha ạghi taghisigh, otu ōogh arōoy tẹḍianogh ni, ịraar tẹtuan ni mịzal, ịzal ẹtuan mịraar.
Ạburude tẹtuan rụnwuny eedi, ạnwuny obho nꞌạburude eedi; aburuniin tẹtuan sụnwunyaan eedi, ạsunwunyaan obho nꞌaburuniin eedi; oniin olom tạtuan ni mạni ọony odi, ạni ọony obho nꞌoniin olom odi.”
ẠJizos ạkpete kua nạ ạnogho rōoy obho, “Amen enyina ịmiin mobho aḍio aḅil natu tọpaḍi obho ọbhiiny obho, penyina okẹm oghōl maa, ‘Tạlobh ni,’ pọlobh nạ.
Amen ạbhibhom enyina mọpibha bho ạbhibh tegbolom obho natu, penyina oghōl maa, ‘Obhulo tạtol ni,’ pọrol nạ.
Sọo, arōoy ibꞌilōghōm ạar! Enyina tetue ni eenon made bho nꞌạnyu obho ẹgba mẹzo idi. Eeghe kesiibha bho enyina irue ḍio molōghōm ẹmu ọkpo bho nemute siibha bho?
“Ebum eeghe kenyina nịvo nịvo ịru ḍio mịiruan mi tọkpo bho ịneghe bọ moḍighi obho?

Erumolo ōoy ạva ạna rạakpe, kabhin ạna ạghi tạkoti, kẹm mẹkpetian metẹnẹ suo amen obho enyina idi nini tebōom obho, molo odi opin ạna ạghiom mobo bho nesōbh rạakpe bho, keḍio eedi tepin ạna ẹnogho mapolisi, keḍio apolisi obho tạloghom ạna mikoli.
Ạami nạgba ạnogho ạna, ạna orue ḍio amute ninii ạna tatu ạkpe mạkobo obho asughō obho mi tibha umuul ạna bho.”
Tamen opopo, kir arōoy ilo ịrol nạ lo ịgba ịnogho mạJizos marōoy ibhꞌaGalili ibha aPailet ạze tamen obho eedi nẹtun mọkpo mọnogho Ẹnaan obho.

ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua ạnogho zeedi, “Enyina nekōl ebum obho eedi arōoy aGalili obho ịbho moḍigh ọbho olo odi kua bho, pi nẹgba neḍeeriom mobho eedi iru mibꞌiḍighi mịkarabh ilo ipu moomo ịnon arōoy obho idi mi taGalili obho gạ?
Eenyi! Ạami nạgba ạnogho zenyina, erumolo enyina ikiraan io mi tịkarabh enyina, enyina tẹpo ạni ni kẹzo bho eedi ịbho bho.

Ḅōrō ku. Aḍiōbh nꞌạbhenya arōoy ibhꞌaSailoam obho obo otu-ạnyu ameelom ạze bho ạni keeghe? Enyina nẹetua ekōl iibha bho nẹgba eḍeeriom mobho eedi iru mibꞌiḍighi mịkarabh ilo ipu moomo ịnon arōoy ilo idi mi taJerusạlẹm gạ?
Ekua ḍio! Ạami nạgba ạnogho zenyina, erumolo enyina ikiraan io mi tịkarabh enyina, enyina tẹpo ạni ni kẹzo bho eedi ịbho bho.”
Keḍio odi ạJizos adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi, “Onyiin ōoy ạteeny meetu ẹleleezu mi tade odi olo odi ạnogho mōoy moonon ghạ. Odi nạki ghạ moomo amen mọku itu, keḍio odi ọmiin ghạ ḍio motu.
Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho naanon ghạ made bho aghōl kua, ‘Nonon ni, neegbẹbh ịraar ạsia mobho ạami naaru mọku itu, keḍio bọbon otu olo ạami nạmiin ghạ olo. Lẹer atuḅeen! Odi napiẹmi de be.’
Keḍio odi obo bho naanon ghạ made bho ạbhagharana aghōl kua, ‘Oōy obho, ḅẹlemaan, ạla bhobho amina atẹn ku, ạami tagbo ni akitonom, ạlogh mobile ọomi mọnuumeni ade bho.
Erumolo odi ạloki mitu mạla bho natu obho siiḅi, kọloki nạ ḍio kọleer.’ ”
Tonyiin aḍuma obhooghia bho, pạJizos ạghi totu iikpulughu obhꞌeedi nạtughumiom.
Tesi bhopo kir ạni olo ạteeny mọkarabh ẹmugh olo aḍighi molo odi nạarol mi tẹzegh maḍiōbh nꞌạbhenya ạsia. Odi aḅenene ni, orue ḍio mosel orele.
Amen ạJizos ạmiin zodi, podi abheleghi zodi, “Ạni obho, nọobhel ạna mi tẹzegh obhꞌonuma!”
Ẹzo bho ạJizos ạḅam rạvo odi mi tạni obho, podi asel, keḍio odi abuom Ẹnaan.

Pologhi onyiin obo bho neekō ghạ motu iikpulughu obho aḅẹebh mebum obho ạJizos aakō mōoy mi taḍuma obhooghia bho. Podi ạkpete amutiom ạnogho marōoy obho aghōl kua, “Ezira ụteeny modiin aḍuma mi tawiki obho molo oḍighiom oḍighi, itu taruḍuma bhibha meekua silōor enyina, iru ghạ mi taḍuma obhooghia bho.”
Keḍio Obạmọogh obho ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Enyina nẹmiin ghạ milo ịnon be! Onyiin enyina tạkoton ni mẹnam odi mọghi ọnogho ạmuum mi taḍuma obhooghia bho.
Keḍio tesuo ponyiin ọnyani tEbrạhạm olo Eru obho naaḅol ạbham moomo aḍiōbh nꞌạbhenya ạsia, ịkpe ḍio gạ mọbhel odi mi taḍuma obhooghia bho?”
Oomo obo bho ịlogh odi ḍien obho ịlokia ni rẹgheer mi tẹzo bho odi ạbhagharana bho. Oomo arōoy obho ịḅaal ni mologhi mi toomo ọkpo ibꞌaruugu obho odi aḍighi obho.
Tebum ipa, pạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan kodi ẹko? Ạami tapin ạtuom ẹkaraan?
Odi kekpo amiim ẹker, olo ōoy ạseghe aḅẹbh mi toḍighi odi, keḍio asi atẹn moorẹeny, olo ịnun iru iḅōghi rutu mi tịgha bhꞌodi.”
Keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua, “Ạami tạtuom mẹkaraan mAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan?
Odi kạar obho noḍighiom gha mạbred obho, obho ughōl bọ ayist obho olo ạni-ebhōbh ạseghe ạguonom ịraar ẹḅa ạfalawa, olo ịrol suo iḍighi molo oomo eedi iibhuugh.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạḍua tesuo atẹn nạki tọpaḍi aJerusạlẹm, ạḍua mẹma atẹn mẹma nạtughumiom tigbōgh nꞌịbam ạraama bho.
Ponyiin ōoy apuruan kua zodi, “Obumọogh, ịbam arōoy be gạ mobo tọpel otẹnẹmi tịkarabh obho?” Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi,
“Iḅe magey mẹkparam ẹḅol eḍigh mi tẹḍiibh ọnu otu obho. Ạami nạkpete kua ạnogho zenyina mebum obho ọlogh arōoy tẹkparam ni mọḅol ạni keḍio irue ḍio.
“Tamen olo uvotu obho naaḅetunu aghuughi meguugh obho, keḍio enyina tetu ẹmara tetẹrẹ ẹke mookpu eguugh obho oghōl ekua, ‘Obumọogh, kuurōn mạnogho ezōor!’
Keḍio enyina temulumian zodi kua, ‘Ạna nꞌezōor sule ghạ monyiin esi, ọbhoghol monyiin esi. Sạna ụtughumiom mi tẹma ezōor!’
Keḍio odi tamina ạpagharana kua, ‘Ạami ulōghōm io mesi enyina ịḍua iru sọo. Oomo enyina iḍighi mịkarabh obho, ịḍua taghisigh ạmi.’

Kụ ịmiin mobꞌeḍi olo enyina teleghe nꞌọghiir ạralaay olo enyina tẹkiir men enyina tẹmiin mEbrạhạm nꞌẠizik, nꞌạJekob nꞌoomo arizil obho tẸnaan mi tAde-Ọolema bhꞌodi tamen olo nonyuughi zenyina momutioghom tetẹrẹ!
Arōoy tẹḍua ni etu mi toomo ạruukul ọpaḍi ẹmar-arōoy obho ẹtol delede mi tẹtolom ẹzaal Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.
Keḍio obo bho ịrol tạman obho tetu mịḅel, obo bho uru bọ mịḅel obho tẹtol tạman.”
Tamen opopo, pẹtede arōoy aFarisi obho iru tạJizos ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Kẹm siibha siibha maghiil ạḍua tesuo mạghi tọnon esi. ẠHerod nạva moghigh onuma.”

PạJizos ạbhagharana zeedi kua, “Ịki mẹkpete mẹnogho mẹnam opopo meghōl kua, ‘Ạami napirighan mịkarabh ạruumugh, naakōoy mạrazegh arōoy dodon nꞌeḍie, togbẹbhiōm ịraar aḍuma bho, pạami ọman oḍighi obhꞌạmi.’
Oomo ipa ẹkona, ạami tạki ni moḍighi oḍighi ạmi dodon, nꞌeḍie, nꞌạmaa-ḍie. Ịneghe ḍio molo ozil kạbho mi tọnon esi, tughuneen taJerusạlẹm io.

“Sey aJerusạlẹm, aJerusạlẹm! Ạna obo bho nạze ghạ marizil obho tẸnaan, atoḅol miteledōm obho Ẹnaan arōm aruom ạna bho! Ịni amen mobho ạami nạava mọseghe ạravo ạmi oghuruom oomo arōoy onuma, kẹzo bho ạkenegh nakuruom ghạ mạnwuny odi obho, keḍio ạna omōrō ḍio nomōrō.

Esiibha eghun otu obhꞌonuma noogin ọman. Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, enyina ịmiin mụ ạami ninii tạteeny mamen obho enyina tẹkpaton mọnu enyina ekōl kua, ‘Ẹnaan ạsebh ni zodi obo bho natu bọ mi taḍien tObạmọogh obho.’ ”
ẠJizos, mi tonyiin aḍuma obhooghia bho, ạghi mole eḍian mi totu onyiin uvẹmụ arōoy aFarisi obho, parōoy obho ịmaar negon ghạ zodi.
Tesuo kir ōoy olo nạnwe mọobuum asike nꞌạravo olo aru todi.
Keḍio odi ạJizos ạkpete amutiom apuruan eedi obo bho nẹtughumiom ghạ miilōgh obho taMozis nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho aghōl kua, “Kir olōgh gạ mookō ẹzegh mi taḍuma obhooghia obho?”
Poomo eedi ịrol ḅaḅam. PạJizos abhin mōoy obho aakō ạkpete ạnogho zodi moghẹel.
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Erumolo onyiin enyina ạteeny mọony ạnam bolobolo ekpe olo ameel aḍigh taghuḍia mi taḍuma obhooghia bho olo tạḅele mọghi obhune mi taḍuma obhooghia bho odi gạ?”
Bọbon ōoy olo arue mọbhagharana odi olo.
Ẹzo bho ạJizos ạmiin mẹzo bho isoloman obho nẹsonogh mibꞌiiḅi ariisi ọrol adelede mi totu obo bho eedi iḍighanaan obho, podi adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi:
“Kamen kamen olo ubheleghi ạna mi tẹzaal ipina, ụrol ghạ delede mi tẹtolom obho ạla bọ mạar apu obho. Ụmaar io suo noobheleghi nạ mōoy olo aḍigh eghuan apu ạna.

Poḍighi olo amen odi uvotu obho abheleghi mịzal enyina bho tatu, tạkpete kua ạnogho ạna, ‘Ḅetunu, ōoy obhobho ạrol suo.’ Pạregheer osibh onuma mamen topin ạna ọki ọtolomi mi tẹtolom olo oḍigh io meghuan.

Kpẹlen nꞌipa, amen ạna ụghi tesi olo ubheleghi ạna, tọl tesi obho oḍigh io meghuan obho, molo amen olo uvotu obho tatu, pọkpete ekua ọnogho onuma, ‘Ọbulol, ḅetunu maru mạrol teebhakele eghuan obho.’ Iibha bho tẹnogho ạna miibhughumi mi taḍien arōoy ipedi obho.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạbughia lōor tosōorẹ ni. Kōoy kōoy olo asōoriōm lōor, odi pobo tọbughe.”

Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho mobo bho abheleghi zodi obho aghōl kua, “Kamen kamen olo ạna ụsa meḍian mobheleghi arōoy, ubheleghi ghạ mạburubulol onuma nꞌaburumōr onuma nꞌeghun otu onuma nꞌạruula oghōol otu onuma — molo eedi ipeleghi ạna ẹkpe emulumian.
Kamen kamen olo ạna ụsa meḍian mobheleghi arōoy, peleghi marukula bho nꞌobo ikpom ariḍien obho,
pạlisebh ọrol ọnogho onuma, tebum obho eedi itue ḍio ẹkpe emulumian ạna. Ẹnaan tạkpe amulumian ạna mi taḍuma bho iiḅi arōoy obho teḅerenu tọbho bho.”
Onyiin ōoy olo odi ạni nale meḍian obho ạmoghon mibha ạJizos ạḍeghe bho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạlisebh tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho tạtol ạni mole eḍian mi tAde-Ọolema tẸnaan obho!”
Keḍio ạJizos aghiraan ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Onyiin amen kir ōoy olo natu mole ogbōgh ẹzaal, molo odi abheleghi mọlogh arōoy.
Taḍuma ẹzaal obho podi arōm mẹbana odi mọghi obheleghi arōoy obho oghōl ekua, ‘Itu, ẹzaal obho nạateeny o!’
Poomo eedi, ōoy ilo ọno ilo ọno, ịgba ịḍua. Ọḅel obho ạkpete kua ạnogho mẹbana bho, ‘Ạami naaghō made oḍighi. Ạami natu mọghi ọmiin ẹzo odi. Gbạ mạnogho zodi mu, “sesen ni, ạami utue ḍio aru.” ’
Ọnon aghōl kua, ‘Ạami naaghō mōogh ạranam oḍighiom oḍighi olo ạami nạki mọḍa eedi oonon. Gbạ mạnogho zodi mu, “sesen ni, ạami utue ḍio aru.” ’
Omina ọnon ạkpete kua, ‘Eede amen ạami ubhin mạni, tebum ipa bẹleni, ạami utue ḍio aru.’

Pẹbana bho aghẹel ạgba mẹzo bho ạnogho mọde-otu odi. Keḍio ologhi ọde-otu odi aḅẹebh, keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mẹbana bhꞌodi aghōl kua, ‘Kẹm siibha siibha mạghi taraabōom nꞌarubughotu ẹma bho mabheleghi maruvekulom obho nꞌạsukugha bho nꞌobo ikpom ariḍien obho nꞌarukula bho.’
Obia ḍio pẹbana bho amula aru aghōl kua, ‘Oōy, ibha ạna urōm ạami obho, ạami nạatuugh aḍighi, keḍio eepōogh odi ni.’
Pọde-otu obhꞌodi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Kịa taraabōom ạraama bho mabheleghi rōoy eedi eru molo otu obho amuzō agbẹbh.
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho ạna, bọbon onyiin eedi obo bho igin moru obho olo takulaan ale meḍian ẹzaal bhobho olo.’ ”
Ipa iru itẹn, piḅir arōoy iru nẹtuonuman mạJizos. Keḍio odi aghiraan ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi.
“Kōoy kōoy olo tatu tạmi orue ḍio aru monyiin obo nạtuonuman ạami, erumolo odi ọlogh io ḍien mọde odi nꞌoniin odi nꞌạni nꞌạnwuny odi nꞌaburumōr odi nꞌạburumarani odi nꞌạkar alōor obhꞌodi.
Kōoy kōoy olo ọseghe ḍio moorẹeny ẹmigheri obhꞌodi ạtuonuman ạami, odi orue ḍio aru monyiin obo nạtuonuman ạami.
Erumolo onyiin enyina natu moḅōgh otu ạnyu, odi tapira ni aanon mẹḅa odi mọmiin erumolo tegbẹbhōm ni moḅōghōm.
Odi obhira ḍio aḍighi kua, odi orue ḍio aḅōgh ạman. Tasiemi tegum be. Kōoy kōoy olo tatele atẹn ạmiin, pọmologh ghạ be, oghōl ekua,
‘Oōy obhobho aru moḅōgh otu keḍio orue ḍio mọman.’

Erumolo ọolema akpo mọlogh ẹgham mọghi oḅe ọnon ọolema, olo ọlogh ẹgham ibhꞌodi iru mạmaḍian ibha obo bho odi nạki moḅe bho, odi tapira ni ạtol delede ạmaar aanon merumolo ạmaḍian ibhꞌodi tetue ni eḅe mipedi obho.
Erumolo odi otue ḍio, podi orōm adōm ọghiom opedi obho tamen olo odi odi nini tegbeeny moosen olo eedi kẹrol tekima.
Onyiin ẹzo bho, ōoy olo ọḅele ḍio kạar kạar olo odi ạteeny, odi orue ḍio aru monyiin obo nạtuonuman ạami.
“Abōbh iiḅi, keḍio ạar olo oḍighiom olo mu erumolo ẹmel abōbh obho ilo mu.
Ọneghe mụ nạ mi tade bho molo iḅẹbh. Isughōnōm molo kozu korōbh be. Oōy olo ạteeny raḅeri ạmaar ạmoghon!”
Onyiin amen olo igunogh miisōgh nꞌiḍighi mịkarabh iru mọmoghon ạni ịtughumiom tạJizos,
parōoy aFarisi nꞌobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho ịke mọghunughun ọkpete ekua, “Oōy obhobho abhin iḍighi mịkarabh ạloghom atul nꞌeedi nale meḍian.”
PạJizos adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi,

“Erumolo onyiin enyina ạteeny mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ạraana konyiin abhẹ, ạna ụutua odi taḍighi ẹko? Odi tạḅele ni monyiin olo mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ipedi obho tesi obho eedi nele mịigho bho ạki teḍum obho mọva onyiin obho abhẹ bho.
“Amen odi tạmiin, odi tabo ni, nꞌọḅaal ologhi odi tatōol tọbha odi apin akẹel.
Keḍio odi tapeleghi mạburubulol nꞌobo okōol odi monyiin esi, ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, ‘Ologhi ạmi nạḅaal mịkanya mibha ạami nạamiin mẹena bhꞌạmi abhẹ bọ bho. Itu metul ạami mẹḅaal ologhi ole mẹzaal.’

Onyiin ẹzo bho, ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, kir ogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi mi tạnyu obho mi tebum onyiin oḍighi mịkarabh olo aghiraan tịkarabh odi, ilo tepu ni mibha onyiin olo mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ịbughia lōor arōoy ilo ịva ḍio moghiraan tịkarabh eedi.
“Bolobolo, erumolo ạni-ebhōbh olo ạteeny maḍiōbh ikpoki keḍio onyiin abhẹ, ạna ụutua odi taḍighi ẹko? Odi tạsu ni mọtodi, aḅẹer motu obhꞌodi, ạmaar ạva moomo otu obho ninii odi tạva ạmiin.

Amen odi ạmiin, podi obheleghi ạburubulol odi nꞌobo okōol odi ookōbhōghi ọkpete ekua ọnogho eedi, ‘Ologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey mibha ạami nạamiin mokpoki obhꞌạmi abhẹ bọ bho. Itu metul ạami mẹḅaal ologhi olo mẹzaal!’
Onyiin ẹzo bho, ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, itelema bho tẸnaan tẹḅaal ni mologhi mi tebum onyiin oḍighi mịkarabh olo aghiraan tịkarabh odi.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạḍeghe rạḍeghe bhobho ạnogho zeedi aghōl kua, “Onyiin amen kir ōoy olo ạteeny ịzal ạnwuny.
Ạteeny monyiin aḍuma, pọbam obho ạkpete ạnogho mọde bhꞌeedi aghōl kua, ‘Ạda, ḍị mabin arutu ibhꞌạmi mạnogho ạami siibha.’ Podi ọde bho ạḍi motu obhꞌodi mịzal abin ạnogho mạrunwuny obhꞌodi.
Ịbam aruḍuma itẹn podi ọbam ọony obho aḅool mabin ibhꞌodi ạseghe mikpoki obho ạḍua totu, ạghi tegbeeny ẹma, abhẹeny aliom ikpoki obhꞌodi ạman.
Suo odi naaliom mikpoki obhꞌodi ạman obho, pobo oḅẹer asōor mi tebhugh obho odi odi obho, molo bọbon ạar olo odi ạteeny olo mu.
Molo odi ạghi moḍighian oḍighi mōoy olo odi tẹma bho, olo ạnogho zodi mookō ghạ arōbhōrōpō mi tologhi eḍum.
Odi agbẹel ghạ ni nạ mole ịpaḍi eḍian arōbhōrōpō bho, keḍio obo ọnogho odi olo nạ.
Tọmiinom obhꞌodi, podi alōghōma lōor ạatua aghōl kua, ‘Oomo ạrubana bho tọde ạmi bọbon olo natue ghạ mole ọman eḍian ibhꞌodi olo, keḍio ạami odi suo nạmiinom mọkoony.
Ạami taḅetunu ni ạki tọde ạmi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạda, ạami naaḍighi mịkarabh mẸnaan nꞌạna.
Ịgbaan mụ molo koghōl ạami ọony onuma. Sẹghe zạmi matẹnẹ konyiin ẹbana bhꞌonuma.” ’
Podi aḅetunu amula tọde bhꞌodi.
“Odi odi nini mi tegbeeny pọde bhꞌodi ạrol totu ạmiin zodi. Ọsu ạghusan aḍien ẹrol mịkanya molo odi aghiil ạghi aḅolom mọony obho, akpagh aḅẹtōn.
Keḍio ọony obho ạkpete kua, ‘Ạda, ạami naaḍighi mịkarabh mẸnaan nꞌạna. Ịgbaan mụ molo koghōl ạami ọony onuma.’
Pọde bho abheleghi mạrubana bhꞌodi ạkpete kua, ‘Ikẹm mẹghi mebhin eru mobo ạdoni obhꞌạmi mẹloki zodi. Ịloki nạ zodi magul nꞌarakōrō,
kụ mẹghi meghigh monyiin obhōghaan ạnam obho mẹsa, molo ezira kole mẹzaal.
Ọony obhobho tạmi ạbho ni, keḍio odi naamula siibha taghuḍum. Odi abhẹ ni, keḍio esiibha naamute.’ Peedi ịke mẹzaal obho.
“Tamen obhobho okenya umōr obhꞌodi odi ni teḍum. Suo odi natughẹel natuan totu obho, podi ạmoghon moghur ọḍe nꞌịḅa.
Podi abheleghi monyiin ẹbana bho apuruan kua, ‘Ẹkaraan nemute suo?’
Ẹbana bho ạgba ạnogho zodi maa, ‘Umōr onuma maarughẹel, keḍio ọde onuma aghigh monyiin obhōghaan ạnam obho tebum ẹzo bho odi arughẹel nꞌomoon alōor obho!’
Pologhi okenya umōr obho aḅẹebh molo odi agin moḍigh totu molo ọde bhꞌodi aḍigh maasen lo odi kaḍigh totu.

Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mọde bhꞌodi aghōl kua, ‘Nonon ni. Pẹzo noḍighi ghạ mōoy. Oomo ạsumusia bhibha bho ạami nạarolan ạna uḍighian ạna moḍighi konyiin ẹbana onuma, ạami dopẹl io mọnu onuma. Ạna naaḍighi meeghe ạnogho ạami? Bọbon evel sạna dọnogho ḍio ạmi moliom ạni ẹzaal nꞌạburubulol ạmi.
Ọony obhobho tonuma obho ạbasi ạna ạseghe mikpoki obhꞌonuma ạghi tile mẹma bho, suo odi amula aru obho, sạna naaghigh moghōbhaan ạnam obho ạnogho.’
Keḍio ọde bhꞌodi ạbhagharana zodi aghōl kua, ‘Ọony ạmi, ạna sodi nꞌạami moomo amen. Kạar kạar olo ạami ụteeny suo ilꞌonuma.
Ịkpe ni molo ezira kole mẹzaal kọḅaal mologhi, tẹzo bho umōr obhobho tonuma ạbho ni, keḍio odi naamula siibha taghuḍum. Odi abhẹ ni, keḍio esiibha naamute.’ ”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete nạ kua ạnogho miteledōm obhꞌodi aghōl kua, “Onyiin obꞌọola ạteeny monyiin ẹbana olo odi ạloghom toḍighi odi, keḍio ụgba ụnogho zodi mẹbana bhꞌodi naleeyogh mikpoki obhꞌodi.
Keḍio odi abheleghi zodi ạkpete kua, ‘Agey mibha ạami ụmoghon obho? Tue ọḅaalan mikpoki oḍighi obhꞌonuma. Ạna oḍighi mụ moḍighi ẹbana bho ạnogho ạami.’
Keḍio odi ẹbana bho ạkpete kua ạnogho lōor odi, ‘Sey. Ọde-otu ạmi tapirighan ạami toḍighi obhꞌạmi. Ạami taḍighi ẹko? Ạami utue ḍio aḅẹbh miḅẹbh, keḍio ạregheer tesibh ni ạami mogbẹel iigbẹel.
Ạami naalōghōm mẹzo ạami taḍighi, molo amen noobhirighan ạami toḍighi obho, pạami ọteeny ạburubulol ilo tẹloghom ni ạami totu eedi.’
Podi abheleghi moomo arōoy ilo ile mọmugh ọde-otu odi. Keḍio odi apuruan kua mọḅel obho, ‘Ịni mọmugh obho ạna ule mọde-otu ạmi?’
Podi ạbhagharana maa, ‘Ịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ạdorom ạmunu.’ Keḍio odi ạkpete kua, ‘Kẹm siibha siibha mạseghe mọbhereer obho enyina ịgian obho manwe mạlogh erubal ḍiōbh.’
Keḍio odi amina apuruan mọnon, ‘Ibhꞌonuma kịni?’ Keḍio odi ạbhagharana maa, ‘Ịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ẹḅa ạrusu.’ Pẹbana bho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Nwe mạlogh ịzal ạraala ẹḅa.’
Ọde-otu ọkarabh ẹbana bho abuom ni zodi mi tiiniom obhꞌodi, ebum obho tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho obo iiniom ipu mobo bho idi tẹḅaal obho.”

Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, ikẹm mẹseghe mikpoki iiniom obhꞌenyina mẹduan bụrubulol, molo erumolo ẹela bhꞌenyina imuneen eedi tẹloghom ni zenyina mi totu aghuḍum olo kamen kamen.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạmaar ạbham ịbam ạar, pọmaar ọbham mi tịkanya: obo bho otue ḍio mọmaar ọpham mi tịbam obho, orue ḍio mi tigbōgh.
Erumolo esiibha bho kenyina irue ḍio mọmaar ọbham ẹela ẹmar-arōoy obho, toḍighi ẹko kọnogho zenyina magey ẹela mọbham?
Erumolo enyina itue ḍio mọbham ọkpo ilꞌọnon; okōr ōoy tạnogho zenyina mọbham ibha iru milꞌenyina bho?
“Bọbon ẹbana olo tatue ạtolan ịzal ạburude-otu olo; odi tạlogh ni ḍien monyiin atulan mopedi obho; odi takiilaan ni monyiin aanon ạpue mopedi obho. Enyina irue ḍio ẹḅar mẸnaan nꞌikpoki ẹbham ẹrolom.”
Ẹzo bho arōoy aFarisi obho ịseghe moomo ologhi eedi nẹvaam ikpoki obho ịmoghon ẹzo bho, peedi ịrol ịmologh mạJizos.

Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Enyina arōoy obo bho nẹva moru aruuḅi tasumusigh arōoy obho. Ẹnaan pobo alōghōm miloghi enyina. Ibha arōoy nẹetua mobho iru miiḅi obho, taghisigh tẸnaan ạar olo oḍighiom olo.

“Iilōgh obho taMozis nꞌẹegia bhꞌarizil obho ẹghua magey ninii ạteeny tamen tạJon ozuughiom mụum obho. Kamen opopo ninii ạteeny siibha, nọgba mooḅi ọnuekpete bho, ibhꞌAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan, keḍio kōoy kōoy aḅe molo odi be kaḍigh.
Oomo ipa ẹkona, idugh ni magey molo ạnyu obho nꞌade bho kebhẹ, kpẹlen olo onyiin ọnuekpete iilōgh obho kabhẹ.
“Oōy olo agbo mạḅam mạni odi kabhin mọnon ạni nale mẹma; obo bho abhin mạni olo ugbo mạḅam umutiom obho nale nạ mẹma.
“Onyiin amen keḍio onyiin obꞌọola amute, olo nabura ghạ mibura ilo ịla mạar magey, nale meḍian ạruula moomo aḍuma.
Keḍio onyiin uvekulom ōoy olo ughōl ạLazaros amute nạ. Ariisi ịka ni talōor odi. Keḍio nopin ghạ zodi otu tọnu-otu obꞌọola bho.
Odi ạva mole ạni ghạ ịpaḍi eḍian obho nemeleghu ghạ mi tizebele oliom eḍian ọola bho. Asighōghō bho ẹkona netu ghạ ni ẹlaay mariisi obhꞌodi.
Odi uvekulom obho ạbho, pitelema tẸnaan iru irōol odi ịghi ịrolomi itueni mEbrạhạm mi tẹzaal obho. Odi ọola bho ạbho nạ, keḍio uru uḍi zodi.
Odi ạrol togbōgh esi ọmiinom mi tẹmir-iḍim, keḍio odi aanon tạnyu obho, podi ạmiin mEbrạhạm mi tegbeeny nꞌạLazaros tọtu odi.

Podi abheleghi amutiom aghōl kua, ‘Ạda, Ebrạhạm, sụanaan zạmi ghụsan aḍien marōm ạLazaros ạseghe mạsunu ạravo odi akōrōm mụum aru aḍimiom ẹesu anem obhꞌạmi. Ạami odi togbōgh ọmiinom mi tạnyan obhobho.’

Keḍio Ebrạhạm ạkpete kua, ‘Ọony ạmi, tụtua mẹzo, taghuḍum ẹmar-arōoy obho, ụnogho ni ạna moomo kạar kạar olo ịneghe, ạLazaros ạteeny moomo ibha ịneghe ḍio bho. Esiibha odi nale mẹela ibhꞌodi suo, keḍio ạna odi tọmiinom.
Ipa iru itẹn, kir obꞌoonu olo odi teesoḍia ezira, molo obo bho nẹva mọḅol oru tenyina bho itue ḍio, nꞌolo obo bho idi tenyina bho itue ḍio ẹḅeeny eru tezōor.’
Keḍio odi obꞌọola bho ạkpete kua, ‘Gụa siibha, ọde, ạami naasen ni ạna, tōm mạLazaros ạghi totu ọde ạmi
aakiom ōogh aburumōr ilo ạami ụteeny molo eedi itu ạni tesi ọmiinom obhobho.’
“Ebrạhạm ạbhagharana kua zodi, ‘Aburumōr onuma ẹteeny mẹegia taMozis nꞌarizil obho molo ookiom eedi. Ḅẹle aburumōr onuma ẹmoghonyan mibha eedi nẹgba bho.’
Pobꞌọola bho ạkpete kua, ‘Ọde Ebrạhạm, ipa bho be igbẹbh io. Erumolo ōoy aḅetunu tọbho bho ạghi ạgba ạnogho eedi, mạar io suo, peedi oghiraan tịkarabh eedi.’
Keḍio Ebrạhạm ạbhagharana kua, ‘Erumolo eedi ịmoghonyan io mẹegia bho taMozis nꞌarizil obho, eedi irue ḍio emōruōm, eru kạar olo ōoy aḅetunu nạ ni tọbho bho.’ ”
PạJizos ạkpete ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho aghōl kua, “Ọdegh oonon ọḅele ḍio moru, keḍio ịkanya ọmiinom tẹtol ni ẹnogho tobo bho ọdegh oonon tẹḍua bọ etu obho!
Ịneghe molo kọseghe mobꞌọbharakpar kọkpuom tẹḍogh odi, korōbh zodi mi tobꞌọbhiiny kpẹlen olo odi kaḍighi monyiin ịbam ạnwuny bhibha moḍighi ịkarabh.
Igona lōor enyina. Erumolo umōr onuma aḍighi zịna mịkarabh, si zodi, kodi aghiraan, pụḅelemaan zodi.
Erumolo odi aḍighi zịna mịkarabh moḍual amen mi tonyiin aḍuma, kamen kamen olo odi aru aghōl kua, ‘Ạami naaḍighi ạpue, ḅẹlemaan ạami,’ pụḅelemaan zodi.”
Keḍio obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịkpete ịnogho mObạmọogh obho ighōl kua, “Mina mạghuemi mologhi omōruōm obhꞌezōor epu suo.”

Keḍio Obạmọogh obho ạbhagharana kua, “Erumolo enyina ịteeny mologhi omōruōm olo ạbugh aaleeny mokpo amiim ẹker kenyina ẹkpete ẹnogho moorẹeny obhobho, obho ughōl bọ ạsikaman obho, ‘Ḍiirunu suo mạghi mạḅian masi tọbhiiny obho,’ podi oghiilaan enyina.”
“Erumolo onyiin enyina ạteeny mẹbana lo naḍighi moḍighi, bolobolo olo naanon ghạ mạraana, amen odi ạḍua teḍum obho aru, ạna tạkpete ni kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Kẹm aru male meḍian onuma’?
Ị ị, ekua ḍio. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ạna tạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Kẹm maḍighi meḍian ạmi, mạghi mạlokia mạsuoma onuma maḅōrō ạami ule ụpoghol ụḅele, kụ maru male mạbhoghol mibhꞌonuma.’
Ịgbaan io molo ẹbana bho kabhin mạlua mi toghiilaan obhꞌodi, ekua ḍio?
Ẹzo bho nạ mi tenyina, amen olo enyina iḍighi mạar olo urōm enyina moḍighi, ikōl kua, ‘Ezōor ạrubana be; ezōor uḍighi mabin oḍighi ibhꞌezōor be.’ ”
Ẹzo bho ạJizos nạki taJerusạlẹm obho, podi ạḅol ạghi asi tọkuan aSameria nꞌaGalili.
Odi nạki tonyiin ọbam ẹma, men aḍiōbh arōoy ilo nẹnwe mẹzegh ẹkpabhia ịmara ki tegbeeny
ibheleghi imulughu, “Jịzos Obumọogh, sụanaan ezōor ghụsan!”
Amen ạJizos ạmiin eedi, pạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịki meḍeeriom lōor enyina rōoy iiḅua bho.” Tebōom, peedi iḍum.
Onyiin eedi ạmiin mobho odi naaḍum obho, podi amula aru nạsebh mẸnaan nꞌoghōrōkō imulughu.
Keḍio odi agbuluman aakpulughu ạsebh mạJizos. Oōy obhobho olꞌaSameria.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete amutiom, “Aḍiōbh arōoy io gạ mobho uukō? Iḍighen esughō ipedi obho?
Ebum eeghe kisoloman obhobho be mobho amula aru mọnogho ạlisebh mẸnaan?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ḅetunu maghẹel. Ologhi omōruōm onuma naakō ạna.”
Ẹtede arōoy aFarisi obho ipuruan mạJizos mamen Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan tatu. Odi ạbhagharana kua, “Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan oru ḍio mi tẹzo olo tọmiin nini.
Oōy olo tatue akōl kua, ‘Odi suo!’ bolobolo, ‘Odi teebha!’ olo; Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan odi tenyina.”
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho, “Amen natu molo enyina tegbẹel ni mọmiin ạni aruḍuma tỌony Oōy obho, keḍio enyina irue ḍio ẹmiin.
Kir obo tetu ẹkpete kua ẹnogho zenyina, ‘Nonon ni, odi teebha!’ bolobolo, ‘Nonon ni, odi tepa!’ Ịghi ghạ mọva.
Ẹzo bho aḍio bho naḍighi ghạ meghenem nọmiin kesi kesi obho, pẹzo tọmiin nạ maḍuma tỌony Oōy obho.
Keḍio tạteeny, odi tạmiinom ni mịkanya, arōoy ọoke obhobho tegin ni zodi.
Ẹzo bho ịrol bọ mi tamen obho taNoa, pẹzo tẹtol nạ mi tamen obho Ọony Oōy obho tatu obho.
Kōoy kōoy nạamaar nale nạpoghol, ạraani nꞌilobhir nẹḅalan ilom, ninii ạteeny maḍuma bho aNoa aḍigh tobꞌoghuugh obho keḍio aḍigho bho aru ạze moomo eedi.
Tẹtol nạ kamen obho tạLot. Kōoy kōoy nạamaar nale nạpoghol, nakō naḅool, naḅẹebh nabōghi.
Aḍuma bho ạLot ạḍua tạSodom obho pạnyan nꞌạkabait ịlobh kẹlebhe ịze moomo arōoy obho.
Pẹzo tẹtol mi taḍuma bho Ọony Oōy obho tamutiom lōor odi obho.
“Aḍuma bhobho, obo odi tạnyu otu odi osōor io moḍigh ọḅirogh ọkpo odi mi totu obho. Ẹzo bho nạ obo odi teḍum odi otughẹel io mi totu odi.
Ịitua mạni tạLot.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạva moḍume aghuḍum odi tapiẹmi ni. Obo bho oḍume ḍio bho, pobo taakō.
Uḍugul opopo, ạami nạgba ạnogho zenyina, ịzal arōoy tẹmaghanan tonyiin ẹmuna, tọseghe monyiin ọḅele monyiin tạman.
Ịzal ạraani tẹtol monyiin otu ekum eḍian, tọseghe monyiin ọḅele monyiin tạman.
Ịzal arōoy tẹtol eḍighi moḍighi mi tonyiin eḍum obho, tọseghe monyiin ọḅele monyiin tạman.”
Obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ipuruan kua zodi, “Temute teḍighen, Obumọogh?” ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Tesi olo obo ụbho odi olo ạsudele tekōolaan.”
Keḍio ạJizos adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi, molo eedi keekpulughu ghạ moomo amen, idughom io lōor.
“Onyiin amen, kir onyiin ọtu mịiruan ōoy mi tonyiin ẹma, olo okiilaan io mẸnaan bolobolo arōoy.
Tonyiin odi ẹma bho kir onyiin ekpukele ạni olo natu ghạ moomo amen nạpam makẹel odi mi tọtu mịiruan obho nạkpete ghạ kua, ‘Pẹl ạami mi tạravo obo ọlogh aḍien ạmi!’
Kọkanya amen ọtu mịiruan obho omōrō ḍio. Enyemen, podi aghōl maa, ‘Toomo ibha ạami ukiilaan io mẸnaan nꞌarōoy obho,
tebum oomo ịiḅaghami obho ekpukele ạni obhobho nạnogho ạami obho, ạami tạnogho ni zodi makẹel odi, bolobolo odi tạtol moru moru ọnogho ạami mịiḅaghami moghigh ạmi!’ ”
Keḍio odi Obạmọogh obho amina ạkpete kua, “Ịmoghon mibha ole-mịgara ọtu mịiruan obhobho ạkpete bho.
Ẹnaan orue ḍio gạ ạnogho makẹel marōoy ibhꞌodi obo bho neleghe moomo uḍugul nꞌootaany ẹnogho zodi mọbhel eedi obho? Odi okẹm io gạ ạbhel eedi?
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, odi tạnogho ni zeedi makẹel eedi. Takẹm ni nạ. Amen Ọony Oōy obho tatu, odi tạmiin ni marōoy ologhi omōruōm mi tade bho gạ?”
Keḍio ạJizos amina adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho marōoy ibꞌiituma bho, ibha neetuma ghạ mobho eedi iru miḍighi miiḅi, nẹkpete ghạ mịnon ẹpue.
“Ịzal arōoy ịghi totu iikpulughu mookpulughu. Onyiin obho aFarisi, opedi obho ogunogh raasōgh.

Keḍio aFarisi obho aḅetunu aakpulughu maa, ‘Ạlua, Ẹnaan, mobho ạami olo kịnon arōoy, ạami uuniom ghạ ḍio miiniom, ạami uḍighi ghạ nạ ḍio mịkarabh, ạami ule ghạ nạ ḍio mẹma. Ạlua mobho ạami olo kogunogh raasōgh ōoy obhobho.
Ạami nạḅele ghạ mole eḍian tebum miikpulughu mịzal aḍuma moomo awiki, keḍio nạseghe monyiin mi taḍiōbh abin ạsuo ạmi ạnogho totu iikpulughu obho.’
Keḍio odi ogunogh raasōgh obho taḅetunu mibhꞌodi mi tegbeeny, one nạ ḍio moonon tạnyu obho, keḍio tạabhola meeku odi akōl kua, ‘Ẹnaan, sụanaan zạmi oḍighi mịkarabh obho mạghusan aḍien!’ ”

Keḍio ạJizos amina ạkpete kua, “Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ōoy obhobho, opedi obho ḍio, aghẹel totu nꞌọḅaal ologhi ọḅelemaan ịkarabh tẸnaan. Pẹzo tẹtol, kōoy kōol olo ạbughia lōor posōoriōm; obo bho asōoriōm lōor odi obho, pobo tọbughe.”
Ẹtede arōoy ibhin ịbam ạnwuny eedi eruom mạJizos molo odi kạnogho eedi lịsebh. Amen obo bho nẹtuonom zodi obho ịmiin mẹzo bho, peedi ịrol ịbhooruom eedi.
Keḍio ạJizos abheleghi mạnwuny obho iru todi, keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Ịḅelemaan ạnwuny obho eru tạmi, ị́puenaan ghạ zeedi. Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan ilꞌarōoy ilo idi keedi.
Ilōghōm kua! Oōy olo opin io mAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan kọbumoony orue ḍio aḍigh ạni.”
Keḍio onyiin uvẹmụ arōoy aJu obho apuruan kua mạJizos, “Obꞌooḅi ōoy ịtughumiom, ạami taḍighi meeghe kạami ạteeny ạni maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo?”
Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua zodi, “Ebum eeghe kạna abheleghi ạami mooḅi? Tughuneen Ẹnaan io, ọnon ooḅi olo.
Sạna naalōghōm miilōgh obho: ughigh ghạ mōoy, ule ghạ mẹma, umiigh ghạ viigh, ụgba ghạ miben, kiilaan ọde nꞌoniin onuma.”
Keḍio odi ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami naakō raalōgh bhibha kamen ịbam ạmi.”

Amen ạJizos ạmoghon mẹzo bho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kir ạar olo asughō molo ạna kaḍighi, kịa maḅool kạar kạar olo ạna ụteeny, mạseghe mikpoki obho mạnogho maruvekulom, pạna ogbo ẹela tẸnaan, maru mạtuonuman ạami.”
Amen ōoy obho ạmoghon miibha bho palōor odi ạkpoghogho. Odi agbo mẹela magey.
ẠJizos ạmiin mẹzo bho nesōrōghuōm zodi obho, podi ạkpete kua, “Ẹkar ẹkpar magey nolo ọola kaḍigh tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.
Uuva mọḅol oḍigh taḍien ạnuga ịkar idugh epu, molo ọola kaḍigh tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Arōoy obho ịmoghon mẹzo bho, pighōl kua, “Erumolo iru kua, okōr ōoy mobo totue ni ọpel?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạar olo ịkparanaan ni rōoy, tẸnaan idugh ni.”
PaPita ạkpete kua, “Mịin! Ezōor nọoḅele meghun otu ezōor nọtuonom ạna.”
ẠJizos amulumian kua zeedi, “Ilōghōm kua, ōoy olo ạḅele motu, nꞌạni, nꞌaburumōr, nꞌọde nꞌoniin, bolobolo ạnwuny mi tebum Ade-Ọolema tẸnaan
tapin ni mịkanya ọkpo apuom mibha esuo ẹmar-arōoy obhobho, keḍio taghuḍum obho natu obho, odi tạteeny aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.”

Keḍio ạJizos abhin maḍiōbh nꞌịzal obho ạghi tọtu, ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịmaar ẹmoghon! Ezira nọki taJerusạlẹm, tesi obho kạar kạar olo arizil obho ịge milo igboloman nꞌỌony Oōy obho tẹtuugh nạ mẹzo bho emute.
Tọseghe ni zodi ọlogh tạravo obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho, keḍio eedi tẹmologh zodi, etōnyōgh zodi, ẹsiroghom zodi mịghor.
Keḍio eedi tẹgurogh odi, ekigh odi. Ịraar aḍuma tetẹn, poḅẹtōn odi tọbho bho.”
Obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho irue ḍio mọmoghonyan oomo ạraḍeghe bhibha. Ụḅoki ni zeedi mạkar ekpo ọnuekpete bho, molo eedi ilōghōm io mibha ạJizos nạḍeghe ạnogho zeedi obho.
ẠJizos ạḍua natuan tẹma bhꞌaJeriko, ponyiin ōoy ikpom ariḍien olo odi gha delede tọtu ebōom obho nagbẹel gha miigbẹel,
ạmoghon moghur arōoy obho netẹn obho, keḍio odi apuruan kua zeedi, “Ẹkaraan nemute tesuo?”
Keḍio ụgba ụnogho zodi maa, “ẠJizos obhꞌạNazaret natẹn suo.”
Keḍio odi amulughu amutiom aghōl kua, “Jịzos, ọony taDevid, sụanaan zạmi ghụsan aḍien.”
Parōoy obho idi bọ taghisigh obho ịbhooruom odi mọrol ạbirim. Keḍio ịrol kilo ụpue ni. Keḍio odi amina ạmaar amulughu, “Ọony taDevid, sụanaan zạmi ghụsan aḍien!”
PạJizos ạmara, ạkpete ạnogho zeedi mobhin ōoy ikpom ariḍien obho oruom odi. Amen ubhin odi uru, pạJizos apuruan kua zodi,
“Ạna nạva molo ạami kaḍighi mẹkaraan kạnogho ạna?” Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua, “Obumọogh, ạami nạva molo ariḍien ạmi kẹkparanu.”
Keḍio ạJizos tạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ariḍien onuma ẹkparanu! Ologhi omōruōm onuma naakō ạna.”
Tonyiin odi amen obhobho pariḍien obhꞌodi ịkparanu, keḍio odi ạrol ạtuonuman mạJizos nạsebh Ẹnaan. Amen ọlogh arōoy obho ịmiin mẹzo bho, poomo eedi ịrol ibuom Ẹnaan.
Keḍio ạJizos arele aḍigh natu motẹn taJeriko.
TaJeriko kir onyiin ōoy olo ughōl ạZakios. Odi puvẹmụ igunogh raasōgh, keḍio odi agbo nạ mẹela magey.
Odi ạrol ạva mọmiin ạni ạJizos, keḍio odi orue ḍio, tebum alikper obhꞌodi nꞌobꞌọlogh arōoy obho nẹtuonuman obho.
Podi aghiil aḍionom taghisigh arōoy obho, ạsiiny moorẹeny olo ạgbaanan mọmir, molo odi kạmiin mạJizos mamen odi tatẹn tebōom ọbho.
Amen ạJizos aru asi tesi obho odi odi obho, paanon tạnyu obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Zạkios, kẹm asōor aru. Ạami taḍigh ni totu onuma dodon.”
PạZakios akẹm asōor, abhin nꞌogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi ạloghom zodi totu odi.
Amen arōoy obho ịmiin mẹzo bho, poomo eedi ịghunughun ighōl maa, “Oōy obhobho naasulomaan totu ōoy olo aru moḍighi mịkarabh.”

Keḍio ạZakios aḅetunu ạkpete ạnogho mObạmọogh obho aghōl kua, “Obumọogh, mịin! Ạami tạḍi moomo ọkpo olo ạami ụteeny ạseghe mạmaḍian ạnogho maruvekulom obho, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạami nꞌaaniom, ạami tamulumian zodi inya abin ibha ạami ubhin tạvo odi obho.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ịbhelegha neeḍigh totu obhobho dodon. Oōy obhobho ẹkona olꞌeghun otu tEbrạhạm.
Ẹzo bho, Ọony Oōy obho aru mọva nꞌọbhel obo bho neebhẹ bho.”
Ẹzo bho arōoy obho nẹnaghanyan miibha bho, pạJizos amina ạke modōgh asidōgh ọnogho eedi, tebum obho eedi nẹetua ekōl mAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan naatuan nꞌẹzo bho odi naatuan taJerusạlẹm obho.
Keḍio odi adōgh kua ạnogho zeedi, “Onyiin amen keḍio onyiin ogbōgh ōoy ạghi tegbeeny ẹma, molo koḍighi zodi kotẹnẹ mọolema odi karughẹel.

Tamen obho odi natu mọghi obho, podi abheleghi maḍiōbh ạrubana odi ạnogho zeedi ōoy esuo okpoki okpoki, ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, ‘Ịva mạar olo enyina teḍighiom molo ọteeny ạsuo tamen obho ạami ụtol io suo bho.’
Kir arōoy ẹma odi ilo ịlogh odi ḍien, ilo irōm dōm ịghi ighōl kua, ‘Ezōor ụva ḍio molo ōoy obhobho kạda zezōor.’

“Keḍio uzu nạ zodi ogbōgh ōoy obho meghōony ọolema bho, keḍio odi arughẹel. Osi be, podi abheleghi mạrubana bhꞌodi, obho odi ạnoghooy ikpoki obho mọva ọmiin ạsuo olo eedi nẹeteenyom tibha eedi ibhin obho.
Ọḅel obho aru, ạkpete kua, ‘Obumọogh, tonyiin obho ạna ụnogho ạami obho, ạami nạateeny mịnon aḍiōbh.’
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua, ‘Ạlua, ạna obꞌooḅi ẹbana. Ẹzo bho ạna ụmaar ni ụbham tịbam obho ikio magey obho, ạami tạnogho ạna maḍiōbh ạraama moonon.’
Ogbẹbhiōm ịzal ẹbana bho aru, pạkpete kua, ‘Tonyiin obho ạna ụnogho ạami obho, ạami nạateeny mịnon ōogh.’
Toobho bho, podi ạkpete kua, ‘Ạna taanon ghạ mōogh ạraama.’
Pomina ọnon ẹbana bho aru aghōl kua, ‘Obumọogh, oobho okpoki onuma, ạami ụḅoki tạpoghota.
Aruugu onuma esibh ạami, mẹzo bho ạna uru mōoy olo ọsu ạghusan aḍien olo. Ạna nạseghe ghạ tesi olo ạna oseeri ḍio, aḅu nạ tesi olo ạna oḅẹbh io.’
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Ạna ọkarabh ẹbana! Apum onuma odi tọnu onuma! Ạna naalōghōm mobho ạami uru mōoy ạlikpar, nạseghe ghạ tesi olo itu ḍio milꞌạmi, aḅu tesi olo ạami uḅẹbh io.
Ebum eeghe kạna ọlogh io mikpoki obhꞌạmi mi tesi obho nọlokiiy gha mikpoki obho? Kōl suo ạami urughẹel obho, kōl ạami naabhin mạsuo ikpoki bho.’
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho ịmaraay obho aghōl kua, ‘Ịḅoor okpoki obho tạvo odi mẹnogho mobo bho ạteeny maḍiōbh obho.’
Keḍio eedi ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, ‘Obumọogh, sodi nạateeny ghạ moomo aḍiōbh!’

Odi ạbhagharana kua, ‘Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho zenyina. Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny, tomina ni ọnogho zodi mịnon ọḅaram keḍio odi obo bho ạar olo ạteeny olo bho, bọbon ịbam obho odi ạteeny obho, tomina ni ọḅoor.
Esiibha, eedi obo bho iru mobo ọlogh aḍien ạmi obho, ibha ịva ḍio molo ạami kazua meghōony ọolema bho, ipin eru mẹze zeedi taghisigh ạmi!’ ”
ẠJizos ạḍeghe kua be ạḅele, podi aḍionom taghisigh mọghi taJerusạlẹm.
Ẹzo bho odi natuan mạraama bho ughōl bọ aBetfagi nꞌạBetani, tobꞌeegum obho ughōl bọ Ọlivs obho, podi arōm mịzal obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho motẹn ghạ ọghi taghisigh,
aghōl kua, “Ịki tọbam ẹma bho odi bọ taghisigh enyina bho, penyina ọmiin ọony ẹnam olo nọokpo useeri, olo ọnon ōoy doghiilom ghạ ḍio. Ịkoton mebhin eru.
Erumolo ōoy apuruan enyina aghōl maa, ‘Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹkoton?’, ịgba kua mẹnogho zodi, ‘Obạmọogh obho nagbẹel,’ ”
keḍio eedi itẹn ịghi ịmiin nạ mẹzo bho ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho zeedi obho.
Ẹzo bho eedi nẹkoton mọony ẹnam obho, pobo bho ạteeny obho apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina nẹkoton molo eeghe?”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Obạmọogh obho nagbẹel.”
Peedi ịseghe ịghiomaan mạJizos. Keḍio eedi ịde mạrusuoma bhꞌeedi mi tạnyu ọony ẹnam obho keḍio ịḅam zodi ạJizos tạnyu ẹnam obho.
Ẹzo bho odi aghiilom nạki obho, peedi ịde marukpe eedi tebōom obho.

Suo odi natuan taJerusạlẹm obho, mi tebōom obho ạlogh bọ mi tobꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs amute bho, pobo ọlogh arōoy obho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịke mọsebh nꞌobuom Ẹnaan nꞌimulughu, tebum oomo ibꞌọkpo aruugu obho eedi nẹemiin obho, nekōl kua,
“Ẹnaan ạsebh ni mọolema obho natu bọ mi taḍien tObạmọogh obho! Ekima ẹrol ni tạnyu obho, eghuan ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan.”
Pẹtede arōoy aFarisi obho idi ạni tọlogh arōoy obho ịkpete kua ịnogho mạJizos, “Obo ịtughumiom. Kpẹte mạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonuman ạna bho ekpereghi mịnu eedi.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Erumolo eedi ịrol bịrim, ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ịpaḍi ạrubharakpar obho nịvo nịvo temulughu ni emutiom.”
Ẹzo bho odi arele natuan tẹma bho, kạmiin mẹzo ẹma bho odi, podi aleghian,
ạkpete kua, “Kōl aadon enyina kitue ni ẹmiin mạar olo tepin ekima etu keḍio esiibha bho nọoḅoki enyina, enyina irue ḍio ẹmiin.
Aruḍuma netu molo obo ọlogh aḍien enyina tetu ekuōm enyina mịita, ekin ekiton eḍue moomo araabōom, etu etuan enyina mi toomo ạruukul.
Eedi tepiẹmi ni zenyina nꞌẹma bho ẹman. Bọbon ekpughul ọomi olo tọḅele tesi odi olo, tebum obho enyina itue ḍio mọmiin olōghōm amen obho Ẹnaan aru mọbhel enyina bho.”
Keḍio ạJizos aḍigh totu iikpulughu obho mobhirighanogh obo bho neḅo maḅo bho,
ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ụge kua tẹegia iigbia bho oghōl mẸnaan ạkpete kua, ‘Otu ạmi tokōl otu iikpulughu,’ keḍio enyina neeḍighi etẹnẹ motu ạruḅa.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạtughumiom moomo aḍuma mi totu iikpulughu obho, paruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua bho nꞌobo bho nẹtughumiom miilōgh obho nꞌeedi obo bho ikpo bọ rōoy obho neḍionom obho ịva mebōom olo oghigh odi,
keḍio eedi ilōghōm io mebōom olo ọteeny odi, tẹzo bho oomo arōoy obho nẹmoghonyan zodi obho, ịva ḍio molo onyiin oghōrōkō kapẹl zeedi.
Onyiin aḍuma olo ạJizos nạtughumiom rōoy totu iikpulughu obho nạgba nạ mooḅi adōm obho, paruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua bho, nꞌobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho nꞌarukenya bho iikōbhōghian iru tạJizos,
ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Gbạ mạnogho ezōor, tịnyaam okōr ōoy mobho ạna ubhin naḍighiom mọkpo bhibha? Okōr ōoy ạnogho ạna mịikpo moḍighi eedi abaabha bho?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Ạami tapuruan ạni zenyina miipuruan. Ịgba mẹnogho ạami:
ịnyaam ozu ạmuum obho ạJon ạteeny obho ịḍua tịikpo tẸnaan keru bẹlee kịikpo arōoy?”
Peedi ịke mọghanan nꞌalōor eedi nẹkpete kua, “Ezira tọpagharana ẹko? Erumolo ezira ughōl ‘Ịḍua tẸnaan keru,’ podi ọkpete ekua, ‘Eeghe aḍighi kenyina imōruōm io mạJon?’
Kezira oghōl kua, ‘Ịḍua tarōoy keru,’ poomo arōoy obho idi bọ suo bho orōḅōl ezira. Oomo eedi imōruōm mobho ạJon aru mozil tẸnaan.”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ezōor ulōghōm io mesi ịḍua iru.”
PạJizos amulumian kua zeedi, “Ạami ẹkona ụgba ḍio nạ ạnogho enyina mesi ạami ụteeny mịnyaam obho ạami ubhin naḍighiom mọkpo bhibha bho.”
Keḍio ạJizos adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho rōoy obho, “Onyiin amen keḍio onyiin ōoy aḅẹbh mookua iirẹeny amiim, keḍio ạseghe ạnogho mịnon arōoy mogu ghạ eedi kẹḍian, keḍio odi atẹn ạghi tọnon ẹma.
Amen iirẹeny obho ịneghe mogu podi arōm mẹbana odi mọghi obhin abin odi mi tarōoy obho. Arōoy obho odi ạnogho mookua bho iḍul ni mẹbana bho, ibhirighan imulumi moobho ạvo.
Keḍio odi amina arōm mọnon ẹbana, peedi imina iḍul, ịloki zodi mibꞌạregheer, ibhirighan zodi imulumi moobho ạvo.
Podi amina arōm ogbẹbhiōm ịraar ẹbana odi. Oobho bho eedi iḍul nạ ni nạ, ẹloki rạnem, erōbh zodi emutiom tetẹrẹ.
Keḍio odi obo bho ạteeny bọ mookua iirẹeny amiim obho ạkpete kua, ‘Ạami taḍighi ẹko? Ạami tatōm mọony ạmi, obho ạami utulan obho. Mạar io suo, eedi tekiilaan ni zodi.’
Amen eedi arōoy obho ịmiin zodi, peedi ịḍeghe kua, ‘Oobho ọkpana ọony obo bho ookua bho, itu oghigh odi molo ezira ole rutu mookua ọde bhꞌodi.’
Peedi irōbh zodi imutiom tookua obho ighigh.”
Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua, “Omina ẹkaraan mobho odi obo bho ookua iirẹeny amiim obho taḍighi zeedi arōoy obho odi ạnogho bọ mookua bho?
Odi tatu ni ạze rōoy bhibha, ạseghe mookua iirẹeny amiim obho ọnogho mịnon arōoy mogu ọḍian nꞌodi.” Amen arōoy obho ịmoghon mẹzo bho, peedi ighōl kua, “Ẹkpugh! Irue ḍio eru kua.”
Keḍio ạJizos aanon eedi apuruan kua, “Kiibha ụge bọ tiilōgh obho kimōrō ẹko?
‘Ạkar eekpōogh ọbharakpar obho iḅōghiiy rutu obho igin obho
maaghiraan atu mobho ạneghe bọ apu obho.’
“Kōoy kōoy olo ameelom todi ọbharakpar obho taḅigian ni mịpaḍi, kerumolo odi ọbharakpar obho ameelom monyiin ōoy podi ọgbe odi otẹnẹ ọomi.”
Pobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho nꞌaruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua bho ịva mebōom olo oḅol ạJizos tesi opopo. Eedi neelōghōm mobho ạJizos adōghōm zeedi sidōgh obho. Taruugu arōoy obho, eedi irue ḍio moḅol odi.

Peedi iḅōrō mamen olo tạneghe ni. Peedi ịghi iḅia marōoy olo teḍighi kir eedi iiḅi arōoy, irōm zeedi mọghi opuruan iipuruan ọdegh ạJizos, molo eedi keḅol zodi kebhin kẹghiom mọola bho ạteeny mịnyaam nꞌịikpo ọliom arōoy obho.

Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua mạJizos, “Obo ịtughumiom, ezōor noolōghōm mibha ạna nạgba, nạtughumiom magey obho. Ezōor noolōghōm mobho ạna ọoseen ghạ ḍio mōoy, nạtughumiom rōoy mebōom obho tẸnaan mi tagey obho.
Gbạ mạnogho ezōor tibha ịitua onuma olōgh odi gạ mi taraalōgh obhꞌezira mosōgh osōgh ọnogho ọolema bhꞌaRom?”
ẠJizos maalōghōm mobho eedi iru mọdegh odi, keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi.
“Iḍeeriom ạami mokpoki. Amusigh nꞌaḍien okōr ōoy mobho ụgiom suo?” Eedi ịbhagharana zodi kua, “Olꞌobꞌọolema bhꞌaRom.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Isōgh mẹnogho mọolema bho mibha iru bọ milꞌodi obho, mẹnogho mẸnaan mibha tẸnaan.”
Eedi irue ḍio mọbhamam odi togbo arōoy obho mi tiibha bho. Keḍio eedi ịrol bịrim bịrim ịḍua, neemōogh tọbhagharana bhꞌodi.
Ẹde arōoy ogbo arōoy aSadusi obho iru tạJizos. (Eedi obo bho imōruōm io mobho oḅetunu tọbho bho odi obho.) Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua zodi,

“Obo ịtughumiom, aMozis mi tiilōgh obho ạge kua aseerian ezira, ‘Erumolo ōoy abhin mạni kạbho, erumolo odi ọteeny io rụnwuny, pumōr odi ale rutu abhin mạni obho, ạmaraghi rụnwuny ạnogho zodi obo bho nạabho bho.’
Onyiin amen keḍio oḍual aburumōr iru imute. Okenya bho aru abhin mạni, ọmar io nọmar mọony, pạbho.
Pogbẹbhiōm ịzal obho ale rutu abhin mạni obho.
Ạḍua todi asi togbẹbhiōm ịraar obho. Onyiin ẹzo bhobho imutanaan moomo oḍual eedi — oomo eedi ịbhozu ni ẹman, bọbon ōoy olo ạmar mọony olo.
Tikunughi obho, podi ạni obho ạbho nạ.
Esiibha, taḍuma oḅerenu tọbho bho, ọteeny omoom aghuḍum obho, odi tatu mạni okōr ōoy, tẹzo bho oḍual aburumōr obho neerughom zodi ạni obho?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obhobho nẹḅalagh ilom, epinogh rạani.
Obo bho ịkpe bọ moḅẹriōn tọbho bho morugh tẹmar-arōoy obho natu bọ bho, ịḅalan io milom.
Eedi tẹtol kitelema tẸnaan, ịbho mu. Tẹzo bho eedi neeḅerenu tọbho bho, peedi ạnwuny tẸnaan.

AMozis ạmaar ạgba amutiom mobho noḅẹriōn mobo bho nẹebho bho mọteeny omoom aghuḍum. Tịigbaay obhꞌodi mi tesi obho ạnyan ạrol ale mekpu eḍum obho ẹkona, odi ạḍeghe mibha Obạmọogh obho aru mẸnaan tEbrạhạm nꞌẸnaan tẠizik nꞌẸnaan tạJekob.
Iibha nẹgba eḍeeriom mobho odi otu ḍio mẸnaan obo ụbho, aru mẸnaan obo bho idi nꞌaghuḍum obho, tebum obho oomo eedi iḍum ịnogho zodi.”
Pẹtede obo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho ịkpete kua imutiom, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạna nạamaar ạpagharana.”
Eedi imina ḍio eḅom ẹmu momina opuruan odi miipuruan.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Uḍighi ẹko kụ nokōl maKraist obho, ọony taDevid?
ADevid nịvo nịvo aghōl kua mi tọbhereer ạsoor obhꞌodi,
‘Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho mObạmọogh ạami obho:
Tọl suo delede mi toḍiom ạvo ạmi,
ninii ạami aḍighi mobo ọlogh aḍien onuma etu mẹtolom asike onuma.’
“Ạna ạmiin, aDevid abheleghi zodi aghōl ‘Obumọogh,’ ụteko oḍighi kaKraist obho amina aru mọony taDevid?”
Ẹzo bho oomo arōoy obho nẹmoghon zodi obho, podi ạkpete ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho aghōl kua,

“Igona lōor enyina mi tobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho, obho negbẹel ghạ mọlokia obꞌạdoni kesi kesi, nẹva ghạ molo, tipeleghian eedi, kọlogh ghạ zeedi meghuan mi tariḍighi obho, nẹson ghạ mẹtolom ạruula mi totu ịtughumiom arōoy aJu obho, nꞌibꞌiiḅi ẹtolom mi tariisi ẹzaal,
neenioghom ghạ marukpukele ạraani mi tarutu eedi, keḍio tẹzo olo oobiōghōm arōoy nẹki ghạ eekpulughu mịidoony iikpulughu. Tebum iibha bẹleni, ilo tọliom enyina teḅẹebh epu milꞌịnon arōoy.”
Keḍio ạJizos aghiraan aanon ạmiin mạruula bho nẹlokiiy mikpoki eedi mi tẹḅa ikpoki otu iikpulughu obho,
keḍio odi amina ạmiin monyiin obo uvekulom ekpukele ạni nạlogh mịzal ịbam ikpoki.
Podi aghōl kua, “Ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, uvekulom ekpukele ạni obhobho ạlogh apu mibhꞌoomo arōoy ipedi obho.
Ipedi obho ịseghe mịbam tobꞌọlogh obho eedi ịteeny obho ẹlogh: odi ạni obho tekulom obhꞌodi ạlogh moomo ibha odi ạteeny obho.”
Ẹzo bho ẹtede arōoy nẹḍeghe mẹzo otu iikpulughu obho ạneghe, nꞌibꞌiiḅi ạrubharakpar obho uḅōghōm obho, nꞌoomo iiḅi ọkpo bho nookōbhōghi ụnogho mẸnaan obho,
pạJizos ạkpete kua, “Oomo abaabha bho enyina nẹmiin suo bho — amen natu molo bọbon onyiin ọpaḍi ọbharakpar tạtol tạnyu onyiin molo unyu ḍio orōbh olo. Oomo eedi tonyuughi ni otuḅeḍi.”
Peedi ibheleghi zodi ipuruan kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, okōr amen mobho iibha bho temute? Okōr oḍigh elẹgh mibha tọmiin mamen olo iibha bho netu momute?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ịmaar egona lōor enyina. Ímōrō ghạ oobiōghōm enyina. Ọlogh arōoy tetu ni mi taḍien ạmi ẹkpete kua, ‘Ạami odi,’ bolobolo, ‘Amen obho nạateeny.’ Ítuonuman ghạ zeedi.
Aruugu isibh io zenyina tamen olo enyina ịmoghon mọdu ạraagham nꞌạruruan. Ọkpo ilo idi kua tepira ni emute, keḍio ikunughi obho dọteeny io.”
Keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua, “Ẹma nꞌẹma, nꞌebhugh nꞌebhugh teḅezuan ni.
Ade bho taazighina ni magey ạdeghenyu, oḅẹer tạtol ni nꞌoḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh mi toomo ariisi. Ọkpo ibꞌaruugu nꞌelẹgh temute ni tạnyu obho.

“Keḍio oomo abaabha temute, toḅologh ni zenyina, keḍio eedi tẹnogho zenyina mọoḅaghami nꞌọmiinom: tọloghom nạ ni nạ zenyina mi tarutu ịtughumiom obho mọva apum enyina, keḍio tọloghom enyina mi tikoli; topin ni zenyina ọmarami mi taghisigh ạruula nꞌobo ịto aruubhugh obho tebum aḍien ạmi.
Oobho pamen obho ịgbaan molo enyina kẹgba mooḅi adōm obho.
Iibha ẹrol tiloghi enyina kesiibha, mọḅele ọoḅaghami alōor enyina milo enyina tekōl ẹpagharana.
Ạami kụ tạnogho zenyina mọnuekpete nꞌolōghōm ạar molo bọbon onyiin ōoy obo ọlogh aḍien enyina olo tatue ạmaranuan zenyina mi tịigbaay enyina olo.
Ạburude nꞌaburuniin enyina, nꞌaburumōr enyina, nꞌarōoy eghunotu enyina nꞌạburubulol enyina ẹkona tepin ni enyina ẹki totu ịiruan obho. Eedi tẹze ni mẹde enyina.
Kōoy kōoy tạlogh ni zenyina ḍien mebum ạmi.
Keḍio bọbon ekpo ạsilaan olo tạkar mi tẹmu enyina olo.
Ízuum ghạ lōor, pẹzo enyina tẹpela lōor enyina.
“Amen enyina ịmiin mibha arōoy ẹgham neekuōm maJerusạlẹm, penyina olōghōm mobho naatuan mobho tọokpo zodi.
Pobo bho idi taJudia eghilighu ẹghi tibꞌaruugum obho. Obo bho idi bọ tẹma bho ẹḍuaghu, keḍio eedi obo bho ilo tẹma bho imula ḍio eru.
Aruḍuma bhibha, paruḍuma omulumian ịkarabh, molo oomo ọnuekpete ẹegia iigbia bho etu magey.
Opo pọmiinom olo tẹtol ẹnogho mạraani obo bho idi nꞌeghun obho, nꞌaburuniin ilo ạnwuny eedi nẹmaam ni mạmaam. Azuḅa ọkarabh ạdolomaan olo tạtol ạnogho made bhobho, keḍio Ẹnaan tạliom marōoy bhibha.
Ẹtede arōoy obꞌạmugem tạze, keḍio ipedi obho tetẹnẹghu marōoy ikoli ẹezaranu mi toomo aruubhugh obho, keḍio obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho tetu ẹezeghi maJerusạlẹm ninii amen eedi tatu atẹn.
“Araalẹgh temute ni mi taghōzōgh obho, nꞌụvanyu obho, nꞌịinaany obho. Tade bho ịitu tẹtol ni ẹnogho moomo aruubhugh obho. Aruugu tesibh ni rōoy tebum oghur nꞌegbōrōm ạribhiiny obho.
Arōoy tẹkorom ni mi tebum ọkpo bho netu momutenaan oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho, nꞌebum obho ịnyaam ọkpo bho idi bọ tạnyu obho tekunughiom ni obho.
Keḍio tọmiin mỌony Oōy obho nạaḍua teḅōghōghaan obho namute natu nꞌịnyaam nꞌogbōgh eghuan odi.
Amen ọkpo bhibha nẹke momuteghu, pịmara meenon tạnyu obho, ebum obho nạateeny mamen ọbhel enyina ọseghe tade bho.”
Keḍio ạJizos adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi, “Ịitua moorẹeny obho ughōl ạfig obho nꞌoomo iirẹeny ipedi obho.
Amen olo odi natughẹel migue, penyina olōghōm mobho unu natuan.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, amen olo enyina ịmiin mobho ọkpo bhibha nemuteghu, penyina olōghōm mobho Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan natuan.
“Ịitua miibha bho! Oomo ọkpo bhibha temute ni koomo arōoy obho idi tesuo nꞌaghuḍum obho tẹpo ẹman.
Ạnyu obho nꞌade bho tepẹ ni, keḍio ọnuekpete bhꞌạmi irue ḍio ebhẹ.
“Tebum ipa bẹleni, ịmaar egona lōor enyina. Íseeri ghạ silōor enyina moleeyogh ẹzaal nꞌọbhoghoḍiaay ịighuanaan arimiim nꞌịiḅaghami aghuḍum obhobho, bolobolo aḍuma popo tatuanaan enyina mi tekperenom.
Aḍuma popo tatuanaan moomo arōoy tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho kạwaya olo ụkpaari useerian ịnam.

Ịmaar megona lōor enyina meḅōrō moomo amen mi tiikpulughu molo enyina kẹteeny mịnyaam olo orue ọrol molo ạar omutenaan io zenyina tamen obho oomo ọkpo bhibha temuteghu obho, molo enyina tetue ni ẹmaranuan Ọony Oōy obho.”
Toomo aruḍuma bhipa, ạJizos ạrol ạtughumiom ghạ mi tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho. Udule podi ọghi ghạ tobꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs ọrol epa.
Keḍio oomo arōoy obho teḅon ẹki tobꞌotu iikpulughu obho mọmoghon ịtughumiom obhꞌodi.
Tamen olo natuan maḍuma ẹzaal obho noliom ghạ mạbred obho ạar obho ughōl ayist obho ụlogh ghạ ḍio bho, obho ughōl bọ Opẹl-Otẹn obho,
paruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho nẹva mebōom olo alisian moghigh ạJizos, tẹzo bho eedi nekiil ni rōoy obho.
Keḍio Eru obho aru aḍigh tologhi taJudas, obho ughōl bọ Ịskariot obho, obho aru bọ monyiin taḍiōbh nꞌịzal obho.
Keḍio aJudas ạghi aḅian nꞌaruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua bho nꞌạruula obo iḅōrō otu iikpulughu obho mẹzo olo ọseghe ạJizos ọlogh tạvo eedi.
Tọḅaal ologhi obhꞌeedi, peedi iḍumom mọkpe odi mikpoki.
Keḍio aJudas amōruōm, ạke mọva ebōom olo oḅoolaan eedi mạJizos mi tẹzo olo arōoy ilōghōm io.
Todi aḍuma ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho noliom ghạ mạbred obho ayist ilo bho, obho nokigh ghạ mọony ẹena oliom obho,
pạJizos arōm maPita nꞌạJon ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịki mẹmaar meḍighi meseeri mesi olo ezira kole mẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho.”
Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Okōr esi mobho ạna nạva molo ezōor kọghi koḍighi koseeri?”
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Iinon. Ẹzo bho enyina neḍigh kua be mi tẹma bho, penyina ọmiinan ōoy olo arōol mọonu ạmuum. Ịtuonuman zodi mẹghi meḍigh totu obho odi taḍigh obho,
mẹkpete mẹnogho mobo bho ạteeny motu obho meghōl kua, ‘Obo ịtughumiom obho aghōl mezōor opuruan kua zịna, oḍighen ẹkpe obho ạami nꞌiteledōm ạmi tole mẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho?’
Podi oḍeeriom enyina monyiin ẹkpe mi totu ạnyu obho olo nọomaar ubur; tesi opopo pesi enyina teekōbhōghi eḍighi eseeri.”
Eedi ịghi, peedi ịmiin nạ moomo ẹzo bho ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho zeedi obho, keḍio eedi iḍighi iseeri mesi ole ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho.
Amen amen obho aru ạteeny, pạJizos nꞌiteledōm obhꞌodi ịrol delede mole.
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami nạava magey motul enyina ole ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obhobho keḍio karu kạteeny maḍuma ọmiinom obhꞌạmi.
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho zenyina, ạami ule mu ninii tạteeny amen olo toḍighi omutiom mạkar ẹmu ẹzaal obhobho mi tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạseghe mạḅugha amiim obho ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Ipin mẹḍian.
Ạami ụpoghol mu miim obhobho ninii Ade-Ọolema bho tẸnaan tatu.”
Keḍio odi ạseghe mạbred obho, ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, aḅigh, keḍio ạnogho zeedi, aghōl kua, “Oobho piikpōogh alōor ạmi, obho nọtunom mạar mebum enyina bho. Iḍighi ghạ kua mọotua ghạ ạmi.”

Onyiin ẹzo bho, bho odi ạseghe ạnogho zeedi mạḅugha amiim obho, men eedi neele ịḅele, podi ạkpete kua, “Oobho pạḅugha amiim omoom ịzo tẸnaan obho ughirom nꞌịḅaal obho tạmi, obho uzu bọ mebum enyina bho.
“Keḍio iinon. Odi obo bho aḅool ạami obho naatul ạami nale ạni.
Ẹzo bho uguanaan mỌony Oōy obho pẹzo odi tạtuugh nạ ạpo ạki, keḍio itōnyōgh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zodi obo bho aḅool odi obho.”
Keḍio eedi ịrol ipuruan lōor eedi mobo bho, mi teesoḍia eedi, taḍighi miibha bho.
Keḍio obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịrol nẹkanan nạ mobo tatu muvẹmụ oomo eedi.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạruula ẹmar-arōoy obho nẹdaam ghạ nꞌịnyaam marōoy eedi, keḍio ạruula bhꞌeedi pobo nokōl ghạ ạburubulol arōoy obho.
Ịtol io kua mi tenyina. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ōoy olo, mi tenyina, tatu muvẹmụ tạtol ni kobho akio apu moomo enyina bho, keḍio obo bho tạkpo bọ aḍionom obho tạtol kọony-otu enyina.
Obo bho nale bho nꞌobo bho nạsa bọ atōol meḍian obho, tịzal eedi koḍighen apu? Sobo bho nale bho, keḍio ạami odi teesoḍia enyina konyiin olo nạsa atōol.
“Enyina pobo nẹerolan ạami mi toomo ariisi ọdegh oonon ạmi.
Tẹzo bho Ọde ạmi nạanogho zạmi mịnyaam ọda bho, pẹzo ạami nạnogho nạ zenyina.
Enyina tele ni ẹpoghol nạ mi tAde-Ọolema bho tạmi, enyina tẹtolom ẹtolom ịiruan obho esōbh rạakpe ẹnogho maḍiōbh nꞌịzal eghun otu obhꞌIzirẹl.”
“ẠSaimon, Sạimon, mọghon! Eru obho naabhin mịikpo moru ọdegh oomo enyina, kẹzo bho oḍighi male bho nạson ghạ mikpo izim obho ạḅirogh mi tịgheneken obho.
Keḍio ạami nꞌaakpulughu ạnogho ạna ạSaimon molo ologhi omōruōm onuma tạtolaan ni ạna. Amen olo ạna ughiraan uru tạmi, pukuemi miloghi aburumōr onuma.”
Keḍio aPita ạbhagharana kua, “Obumọogh, ạami taḍigh ạni ni tikoli obhꞌonuma, ạpo ạni nạ nꞌọbho onuma!”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho ạna aPita, ạkenegh ọlaal io dodon ninii ạna tạparanaan ạami ịraar amen.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho zeedi, “Amen obho ạami urōm enyina umutiom obho, kạami ughōl menyina ịpam io mikpoki nꞌẹḅa, nꞌarakōrō obho, kir ạar olo enyina ịva olo enyina ịteeny io?”
Keḍio eedi ịbhagharana kua, “Olo nolo.”
Keḍio ạJizos amina ạkpete kua, “Esiibha bho, kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny mikpoki, bolobolo ẹḅa, ạseghe; keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ọteeny io melōor ẹgham, aḅool akoti odi, ạghi aghuōm monyiin.

Keḍio ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ẹegia iigbia obho, obho aghōl bọ kua, ‘Ụḅaram odi mi tibꞌisōor miilōgh obho,’ tẹtuugh nạ ni mẹzo bho ẹtolan ạami, ebum obho ibha nọoge bọ milo igboloman nꞌạami obho nẹetuugh nạ nemute.”
Keḍio obho bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ighōl kua, “Nonon, Obumọogh. Iibha ịzal aralōor ẹgham.” Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua, “Nẹeneghiom!”
Keḍio ạJizos ạḍua tẹma bho, kẹzo bho odi naḍighi ghạ bho, ạghi tobꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs; keḍio obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịghi ạni.
Amen eedi ịghi isi todi esi obho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Iikpulughu molo enyina imeel eḍigh tọdegh oonon.”
Keḍio odi ạḅele zeedi ạghi tamusigh mịbam, olo tagbeeny ni aaleeny mobho urōbh ekpo, agbuluman aakpulughu,
aghōl kua, “Ạda, erumolo iḍigh tologhi onuma, putughuneen mọmiinom obhobho mi tạmi. Oomo ipa ẹkona, ịtol io tịto ạmi, ẹrol ni tịto onuma.”
Keḍio onyiin otelema tẸnaan tạnyu obho asōor aru ạnogho zodi mịnyaam.
Tobꞌẹegama alōor, podi amina ạghuemi mologhi odi mi tiikpulughu. Enōman olo idi keekpa ịḅaal ịrol nẹkaraghu talōor obhꞌodi.
Odi aakpulughu ạḅele, podi aḅetunu amula ạghi tobo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho; eedi nekoḍiiy, ịitu obho neepu.
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Eeghe kenyina nekoḍiiy? Iḅerenu meekpulughu molo enyina imeel eḍigh tọdegh oonon.”
ẠJizos odi nini nạḍeghe, men obꞌọlogh arōoy ịḍua iru. AJudas onyiin taḍiōbh nꞌịzal obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho, pobo akpo aḍionom rōoy obho. Eedi ịghi isi tạJizos, podi aJudas ạghi moḅolom odi.
ẠJizos apuruan kua zodi, “AJudas eḅolom pibha ạna tapin aḅoolom mỌony Oōy obho gạ?”
Amen obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịmiin ibha netu momute obho, peedi ipuruan kua, “Obumọogh, ezōor obhin maralōor ẹgham obho obiom?”
Ponyiin eedi aben asōbh moḍiom aḅeri ẹbana uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua, “Iibha nẹeneghiom!” Keḍio odi akulaan maḅeri ōoy obho aakō.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho marōoy iiḅua bho, nꞌạruula obo iḅōrō otu iikpulughu obho, obo bho iru bọ moḅol odi obho aghōl kua, “Enyina ịbhamagh maralōor ẹgham nꞌarugule eru moḅol obꞌọba bẹle?
Amen ạami ụrolan nꞌenyina moomo aḍuma mi totu iikpulughu obho, enyina ibhum io ạami. Keḍio esiibha bho pamen enyina, amen ọola ọkinim tạda bho.”
Keḍio eedi iḅol mạJizos ibhin zodi ịghi totu uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho, paPita ạtuonuman tegbeeny.
Amen eedi igbonoghi nyạn tebughotu obho, paPita aḍigh ạni ạrol delede nạanwa nyạn obho.
Amen onyiin ẹbana ọnyani obho ạmiin odi mobho ạrol delede tạnyan obho, pagbiom riḍien odi zodi ạkpete kua, “Oōy obhobho nạtolan ạni ghạ zodi.”
PaPita ạbharanaan aghōl kua, “Tạa, ạni obho, ạami ulōghōm io zodi.”
Ọbam amen atẹn, ponyiin ōoy ạlogh zodi melẹgh aghōl kua, “Ạna ẹkona onyiin eedi!” PaPita ạbhagharana kua, “Oōy, ạami ạni ḍio!”
Onyiin ạwa aru atẹn, pọnon ōoy amina ạkpete ạkpaariom aghōl kua, “Agey nạ ni, ẹzo olo ọbharanaan olo, ōoy obhobho nạtolan ạni ghạ zodi, odi ẹkona olꞌaGalili!”
Keḍio aPita tamina ạpagharana, “Oōy, ạami ụmoghonyan io miibha ạna nạkpete bho!” Tamen obho odi nạkpete miibha bho, pạkenegh obho ạlaal.

Keḍio Obạmọogh obho aghiraan asōmōghi aanon zodi aPita, keḍio odi aPita tạatua mọnuekpete tObạmọogh obho, mẹzo bho odi ạkpete ạnogho zodi aghōl kua, “Keḍio ạkenegh tạlaal dodon, ạna nạabharanaan zạmi ịraar amen.”
PaPita amute aghẹel, aleghe magey.
Arōoy obho neḅōrō bọ mạJizos obho ịrol ịiḅaghami zodi, iḍul nạ zodi.
Eedi epuughi nạ riḍien odi, keḍio tepuruan kua zodi, “Okōr ōoy ạkpol ạna? Kōl.”
Keḍio eedi imina ịkpete zodi moḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh ọnuekpete.
Amen aḍio ạḅaal, parukenya ẹma aJu obho, nꞌarōoy iiḅua bho, nꞌobo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho iru iikōbhōghian, keḍio ibhin mạJizos ịghi totu ezue eedi,
ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Gbạ mạnogho zezōor, ạna pạkar odi aKraist obho?” Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami ụgba nạ ni ạnogho enyina, enyina ibhinom io ạami,
kạami apuruan enyina miipuruan, enyina ịbhagharana ḍio ạami.
Keḍio ạseghe siibha ạghi taghisigh, Ọony Oōy obho tạtol ni toḍiom ạvo ẹtolom obho tẸnaan obo bho ạmoogh oomo ẹmiriikpo bho.”
Keḍio oomo eedi ipuruan kua, “Ạna podi Ọony obho tẸnaan?” Podi ạbhagharana zeedi “Enyina nekōl mạami.”
Keḍio eedi ịkpete kua. “Ezira ụva mu mọnon ōoy momina oru ọgba! Ezira nịvo nịvo nọomoghon mibha ọnu ịigbaay obhꞌodi.”
Poomo eedi iḅerenu ibhin mạJizos ịghiom maPailet.

Taghisigh taPailet peedi ịke mọgbaaghiom odi miben, ighōl kua, “Ezōor nọomiin mibha ōoy obhobho naabiōghōm rōoy, nạkpete ạnogho zeedi meedi isōgh io mosōgh ẹnogho mọola bho aRom, keḍio nakōl nạ modi aKraist ọola bho.”
Keḍio aPailet apuruan odi kua, “Ạna ọola arōoy aJu obho?” PạJizos ạbhagharana zodi kua, “Ạna ku nakōl kua.”
Keḍio aPailet ạkpete ạnogho marōoy iiḅua bho nꞌọlogh-ọlogh arōoy obho, aghōl kua, “Apum olo ạami ụva ụmiin mi tōoy obhobho molo oghigh odi olo.”
Peedi ịbhooru imulughu modi naabhin mịtughumiom odi naḅia moomo arōoy aJudia morubhe ẹgham. Odi ạke taGalili, keḍio esiibha odi naarōol asiom suo.
Amen aPailet ạmoghon mẹzo bho, podi apuruan kua, “Oōy obhobho olꞌaGalili?”
Amen odi aru ạmoghon mobho ạJizos aru molo ebhugh tạHerod, podi ạnogho zodi marōoy iḅōrō bho mọghiom ạHerod. Odi odi nạ taJerusạlẹm men opopo.
Ologhi tạHerod ạḅaal magey mọmiin ạJizos. Kọkanya amen mobho odi nạamoghon mọdu tạJizos, keḍio odi nạva ghạ mọmiin odi. Odi nạva molo ạJizos kaḍighi mọkpo ibꞌaruugu odi kạmiin.
Podi ạHerod apuruan mạJizos mọlogh iipuruan, keḍio ạJizos ọsir io bọbon ọghor.
Keḍio arōoy iiḅua bho nꞌarōoy obo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho imute iru nemulughuom ẹgbaaghiom odi miben.
Keḍio ạHerod nꞌarōoy ẹgham odi ịiḅaghami zodi, ịloki nạ zodi rẹgheer. Keḍio eedi ịseghe mobꞌạdoni ạruula ịḅologhi zodi, ibhin zodi imulumi ịghiom aPailet.
Todi ạkar aḍuma popo, pạHerod nꞌaPailet iru bụrubulol. Tamen iibha bho demute ḍio bho, eedi obo ọlokian ariḍien.
PaPailet amina abheleghi marōoy iiḅua bho, nꞌạruula bho, nꞌarōoy obho aakōbhōghi monyiin esi,
ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Enyina ibhin mōoy obhobho eruom ạami eghōl modi nateliom rōoy mi tịkarabh araabōom. Ạami, mi toomo ịigbaay enyina, ụmiin io mapum obho enyina nẹpamam odi obho.
Ẹzo bho ạHerod amulumi zodi aru tạmi obho, podi ẹkona ọmiin io mapum odi nạ. Bọbon ạar olo ōoy obhobho naaḍighi molo ịgbaan lo odi kạbho olo.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạami tạgurogh odi, ạḅelemaan.”
[Toomo aḍuma ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho, aPailet namutiom ghạ monyiin ōoy ikoli ạnogho zeedi.]
Oomo arōoy obho imulughu imutiom, “Kigh zodi mamutiom mạBarabas mạnogho ezōor.”
(ẠBarabas odi mikoli, tebum obho odi aghigh mōoy, tamen olo uḅeey ralebhir tẹma bho.)
APailet nạva mẹzo olo omutiom ạJizos, podi amina amula aru tarōoy obho ạkpete modeenyemi iloghi eedi.
Parōoy obho imulughu imulumian odi, “Toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho, kạn zodi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho!”
Keḍio aPailet amina ạkpete mogbẹbhiōm ịraar amen ạnogho zeedi, “Okōr oḍigh ịkarabh mibha odi aḍighi? Ạami ụmiin io mapum olo ịgbaan molo odi kạbho. Ạami tạgurogh odi amutiom.”
Peedi imulughu tạruumu eedi ighōl mụkan mạJizos mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho. Imulughu obhꞌeedi neepu molo eedi ipuom aPailet.
PaPailet asōbh mọkpe bho abhumeni mạJizos kẹzo bho eedi negbẹel obho.

Keḍio odi amutiom mōoy obho eedi negbẹel obho, odi obo bho aḍigh mikoli tebum obho odi aghigh mōoy tamen olo uḅeey ralebhir obho, keḍio odi ạseghe mạJizos ạnogho zeedi moḍighi kẹzo kẹzo olo iḍigh tologhi eedi.

Keḍio eedi ịseghe mạJizos ịḍuonom. Ẹzo bho eedi nẹki obho, peedi ịmiinan mōoy olo ughōl ạSaimon, olꞌaSairini, ạḍua nạki tẹma bho. Peedi ịbham zodi, ịnogho moorẹeny ẹmigheri obho morōol ạtuonuman ạJizos.
Obꞌọlogh arōoy ẹtuonuman zodi. Ẹtede eedi pạraani olo neleghe nepumughu mebum odi.
Keḍio ạJizos aghiraan teedi ạkpete kua, “Enyina ạraani aJerusạlẹm, íleghe ghạ mebum ạmi, ileghian lōor enyina nꞌebum ạnwuny enyina.
Aḍuma natu molo arōoy tẹkpete kua, ‘Ạlisebh ilꞌạraani obho ạnwuny ilo bho, obo bho dẹmaraghi ghạ ḍio rụnwuny obho, obo bho ọony dọmaam ghạ ḍio rạamaam eedi obho.’
Opo pamen obho arōoy tẹkpete kua ẹnogho mibꞌaruugum ạrubharakpar obho, ‘Imeleghuom ezōor,’ keḍio tẹkpete ẹnogho mịbam obho, ‘Ikpereghiom zezōor!’
Erumolo ọkpo olo idi kua nemute siibha imoom iirẹeny obho, tẹtol ẹko tamen olo iirẹeny obho neemughughu?”
Keḍio eedi ịseghe mịnon ịzal arōoy ịkanam nꞌạJizos, ạruukoma zeedi arōoy obho.
Amen eedi isi teegum obho ạgbaanan bọ kịikpo ẹmu ōoy obho, peedi ịkan zodi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho, nꞌịzal ạruukoma bho, mi tekẹeny nꞌoḍiom tạJizos.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ọde, ḅẹlemaan zeedi! Eedi ilōghōm io mạar olo eedi neḍighi.” Keḍio eedi ịsa mẹlel ịḍian marukpe bhꞌodi.

Arōoy obho nẹemaraay nepōgha; tẹzo bho, paruvẹmụ arōoy aJu obho nẹeḅaghami ghạ zodi, “Hụu! Odi nạpel ghạ mịnon, odi ạbhela lōor odi, erumolo odi aru maKraist obho tẸnaan, ạkar obho odi nạason ạseghe bho!”
Arōoy ẹgham obho ẹkona ịmologh nạ zodi, keḍio eedi iru ịnogho zodi mạkata,
keḍio ighōl kua, “Pẹla lōor onuma, erumolo ạna uru mọolema aJu obho!”
Keḍio nọoge nạ kua mi tạnyu oorẹeny ẹmigheri obho: “Oobho ọolema arōoy aJu obho.”
Onyiin ọokoma bho mi tẹeghelaan obho ạkpaton nạ mọnu ạkpete zodi mịkarabh, “Ạna aKraist obho ḍio? Pẹla lōor onuma maru mạbhel ạni ezōor!”
Keḍio ōoy opedi obho asi zodi, “Ạna oghiil io mẸnaan? Odi nꞌezira idi tonyiin ọmiinom obho.
Ibha tezira ịkar ni ẹgbaan, ezira nọsughō ḍien, keḍio odi bọbon ịkarabh olo odi aḍighi olo.”
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Obumọogh tụtua zạmi mamen ạna tatu mọda ẹmar-arōoy obho!”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho ạna: aadon ạna tạtolan ạami tesi obhooghia obho!”
Tamen olo aḍio natu mọḍian ịzal abin, paghōzōgh obho aḅil, keḍio obꞌọkinim akpe moomo ẹma bho ninii kogbo ọsilaan.
Keḍio obꞌukpe bho ụkpo bọ totu iikpulughu obho ạbaan ạḍian ịzal abin.
Tigbōgh imulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō, pạJizos aleghe kua “Ọde, ạami ụseghe mẹmugh obhꞌạmi ạlogh tạravo bhꞌonuma.” Odi ạkpete kua ạḅele, podi ạbho.
Uvẹmụ arōoy ẹgham obho ạmiin moomo ibha imute bho, podi abuom Ẹnaan aghōl kua, “Tagey obho, ōoy obhobho ooḅi ōoy!”
Oomo obo bho ịmara nepōgha bho, amen eedi ịmiin moomo ọkpo bho imute bho, peedi ịḅamaghi rạvo tạruumu eedi keḍio igheleghu.
Oomo obo bho nẹemar ilōghōm mạJizos obho, nꞌạraani obho ịtuonuman zodi ki taGalili obho, ịmaraay tegbeeny ẹrol ẹmiin mibha nemute bho.

Kir ōoy olo ughōl aJosef olo Arimatia, onyiin ẹma arōoy aJu obho. Odi ooḅi ōoy, ogbōgh ōoy nạ, olo naḅōrō mAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan moru. Odi odi ạni tạruula ibha nẹto mịto bho, keḍio odi omōruōm ạni ḍio mịto bho eedi ịto bọ moghigh ạJizos obho.
Odi ạghi taPailet agbẹel moḍim obho tạJizos.
Keḍio odi asōorẹ zodi, ạseghe mạbalala abhurughiom zodi, keḍio ạseghe zodi ạlogh toogu olo odi agbo mi tạrubhurukpar, olo doḍi ghạ ḍio mōoy.
Iibha bho imute mudule aḍuma iikōbhōghia obho tạḅaal paḍuma obhooghia arōoy aJu obho.
Ạraani obho ịtuonuman mạJizos ki taGalili obho ịghi ạni, ịrol ạni ịmiin moogu obho aJosef aḍi mạJizos obho, nꞌẹzo bho odi aḍi obho.
Keḍio eedi imula ighẹel iikōbhōghia maralo nꞌạrumunu milo ooduom toḍim obho tạJizos.
Tebum iilōgh obho, peedi ibhooghia mi taḍuma oobhooghia arōoy aJu obho.
Obun ụḍirogh ạSondi, pạraani obho itẹn ịghi toogu obho ịbhamagh nạ maralo bho eedi iikōbhōghia obho.
Eedi ịghi isi tọnu otu oogu obho nookilimi mobꞌọbharakpar obho otughuneen.
Keḍio eedi iḍigh. Iḍigh ịghi, oḍim obho tạJizos Obạmọogh obho olo.
Tẹzo bho eedi idi tesi opopo mi teemōogh obho be, pịzal arōoy nꞌibꞌịḅaal arukpe olo nẹmua ịmaranuan eedi.
Taruugu, pạraani obho izumeni sumusigh eedi igbuluman tade bho, keḍio arōoy obho ịkpete kua ịnogho zeedi, “Eeghe kenyin nẹva mi tobo bho nẹebho bho mobo bho odi nꞌaghuḍum obho?
Odi olo suo, odi naaḅetunu. Ịitua mibha odi ạkpete ạnogho enyina bho mi tamen obho odi odi nini mi taGalili obho.
‘Toḅool ni mỌony Oōy obho ọnogho miḍighi mịkarabh arōoy, keḍio tọkan zodi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho, ịraar aḍuma neetẹn, podi oḅetunu tọbho bho.’ ”
Keḍio ạraani obho tẹetua mọnuekpete obhꞌodi,
imula ighẹel, ịgba moomo ọkpo bhibha ịnogho maḍiōbh nꞌịzal obo bho ịtuonuman ghạ zodi obho nꞌipedi obho.
Ạraani bhibha paMeri obhꞌạMagdala nꞌaJoạnạ nꞌaMeri oniin taJems. Eedi nꞌạraani ipedi obho, oomo eedi ịgba moomo ẹmorokpo bhibha ịnogho miteledōm obho.
Iteledōm obho irue ḍio momōruōm ibha ạraani obho ịgba ịnogho zeedi obho. Eedi ịtuom miben be.
Keḍio aPita aḅetunu aghiil ạghi toogu obho. Odi azuman aanon, podi ạmiin mạbalala oogu obho be, ọnon ạar olo. Keḍio odi aghẹel nꞌeemōogh tọkpo bho neemute bho.
Odi aḍuma popo, ịzal arōoy eedi nẹeḍua nẹki tẹma olo ughōl Ẹmaos. Tegbẹbh ni mịzal ookōogh erele mọḍua taJerusạlẹm ọghi.
Tebōom obho eedi nẹḍeghe mibha nemute bho.
Ẹzo bho eedi ịḍeghe nẹki obho, pạJizos nịvo nịvo ạḍua aru abhir eedi natelian nꞌeedi.
Eedi nẹmiin odi, keḍio eedi irue ḍio mọlogh odi melẹgh.
Keḍio ạJizos apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina irelian nẹki obho, kenyina nẹḍeghe ghạ mikōr oḍigh ạraḍeghe?” Keḍio eedi ịmara iimirigheni ghisigh.
Keḍio onyiin eedi olo ughōl aKliopas apuruan kua zodi, “Ạna be misoloman mi taJerusạlẹm olo olōghōm io mọkpo bho nemute maruḍuma bhibha bho?”

Keḍio odi apuruan amulumian, “Ikōr oḍigh ọkpo?” Peedi ịbhagharana, “Ibha imutenaan mạJizos obhꞌạNazaret obho. Odi ozil tẸnaan, keḍio aḍigh nạ tologhi tẸnaan nꞌoomo arōoy tebum iiḅi oḍighi nꞌọnuekpete odi.
Arōoy iiḅua nꞌạruula ezōor iḅol zodi ẹnogho molo koghigh zodi, keḍio eedi ịkan nạ zodi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.
Ezōor nọotua ghạ okōl kua modi pobo bho natu mọta Izirẹl obho. Iibha iru itẹn nꞌaadon sịraar aḍuma mobho ọkpo bhibha ịke momuteghu.
Ẹde ạraani obho ogbo ezōor nẹgba mọkpo eemōogh. Eedi iḅon ụḍirogh ẹghi toogu obho,
keḍio eedi ịmiin io moḍim obho. Keḍio eedi imula iru nẹgba mibha eedi ịmiin ghịiny olo itelema tẸnaan ịgba ịnogho zeedi modi odi nꞌaghuḍum.
Ẹde togbo bhꞌezōor mẹeghi toogu obho ẹmiin nạ mẹzo bho ạraani obho ịgba bho, keḍio eedi ịmiin io zodi.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ibꞌaraama arōoy, pẹzo ịkparanaan zenyina momōruōm oomo ibha arizil obho ịgba bho!
Ịkpe ḍio molo aKraist obho kạmiinom moomo iibha bho molo odi kaḍigh mi teghuan obhꞌodi gạ?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạmaar ạgba aḍeeriom eedi moomo ibha idi bọ tologhi ẹegia bho, ibha igboloman nꞌodi obho, ạke mi tịbhereer obho taMozis ninii aru asi tibha arizil obho tẸnaan ịgeey obho.
Amen eedi iru netuan tẹma bho eedi nẹki obho, pạJizos aḍighi kilo odi natu ni motẹn,
keḍio eedi ịkpetian odi, “Tọlan ezōor ạḅaal ku, aḍio bho nakul keḍio ọbam amen asughō, pọkinim osōor.” Podi ạtuonuman eedi ạghi mọrolan eedi.
Eedi netu mole eḍian, podi ạseghe mạbred ạnogho lịsebh, keḍio aḅigh ạnogho zeedi.
Tesuo, pariḍien eedi ịkparanu, keḍio eedi ịlogh odi melẹgh. Keḍio odi abhẹ ạḍua.
Ponyiin ạkpete kua ạnogho monyiin, “Mịin ẹzo ịrol tekpom ạmi kegi ạnyan mamen obho odi nạgba bọ mẹmu oomo ibha idi bọ tẹegia iigbia bho nạnogho ezira mi tebōom obho. Ẹrol ạni kua tonuma gạ?”
Keḍio eedi ikẹm iḅerenu ighiil imula taJerusạlẹm, tesi obho aḍiōbh nꞌịzal obo bho ịtuonuman gha zodi obho neekōbhōghian nꞌobo bho idi nꞌeedi obho,
ighōl kua, “Agey nạ ni. Obạmọogh obho naaḅetunu tọbho bho! ẠSaimon nạamiin nạ zodi!”
Keḍio eedi ịzal obho ịgba moomo ibha imute tebōom obho, nꞌẹzo bho eedi ịlogh odi melẹgh tamen obho odi aḅigh bọ mạbred obho.
Ẹzo bho eedi nẹgba miibha bho, tekperenom, odi Obạmọogh obho nạamaranuan zeedi, keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ekima ẹrolan nꞌenyina.”
Tibꞌaruugu, eedi ighōdi eedi nẹmiin mẹmugh.
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Eeghe kenyina nẹeḅaghami lōor enyina? Eeghe kenyina irue ḍio momōruōm tiloghi obhꞌenyina?
Iinon tạravo nꞌasike bhꞌạmi, penyina ọmiin olōghōm mobho ạami podi obho. Ikulaan ạami, penyina ọmiin ạmi. Ẹmugh ọteeny io miikpōogh nꞌịikpo alōor, kẹzo bho enyina nẹmiin ạami siibha bho.”
Odi asi miibha bho ạḅele, paḍeeriom rạvo nꞌasike bhꞌodi zeedi.
Eedi irue nạ ḍio momōruōm, tẹzo bho eedi idi tọḅaal ologhi nꞌeemōogh ibꞌaruugu obho, podi apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina ẹteeny suo bọbon ạar ole?”
Keḍio eedi ịnogho zodi meekpōogh ena olo nọosa,
keḍio odi ạḅa taghisigh eedi.

Keḍio odi ạkpete ạnogho zeedi, “Iibha pibha ạami ụgba ụnogho zenyina men obho ạami odi nꞌenyina bho. Kạar kạar olo ụge lo igboloman ạami mi tiilōgh obho taMozis, nꞌarizil obho, nꞌọbhereer ạsoor taDevid tẹtuugh ni nạ emute mẹzo bho.”
Keḍio odi akpenyogh miloghi obhꞌeedi mọmoghonyan ẹmu ẹegia iigbia bho,
keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Iibha pibha ụge bho: maKraist obho tạmiinom ni, keḍio taḅetunu tọbho bho mi togbẹbhiōm ịraar aḍuma bho,
molo topin taḍien odi ọgba madōm oghiraan nꞌọḅelemaan ịkarabh obho olelemi toomo aruubhugh obho, keḍio tọkiom taJerusạlẹm.
Enyina tẹgbaanaan ạami moomo ọkpo bhibha,
keḍio ạami taḍighi ni molo oguan obho tỌde bho tatu asi tenyina. Keḍio ịtol tẹma bhobho ninii ịnyaam tẹḍua tạnyu obho esōorōm enyina.”
Keḍio odi abhin eedi amutonom tẹma bho asiemi kạBetani. Tesuo podi aḅẹtōn rạvo odi ạsebh zeedi.
Ẹzo bho odi nạnogho zeedi lịsebh obho, podi ạḅele zeedi ạḍua ạsiin tạnyu obho.
Keḍio eedi iikpulughu zodi, imula ịghi taJerusạlẹm nꞌobꞌọḅaal ologhi,
keḍio ịrol ghạ moomo amen mi totu iikpulughu obho ịsebh ghạ mẸnaan.
Tọḅel egbiom obho, Ekpo-ọnuekpete bho ạrol; odi ạrolan nꞌẸnaan, keḍio odi pẸnaan obho.
Odi ạrolan nꞌẸnaan kọḅel egbiom obho.
Kạar kạar mi tọlem obho ịḍua todi keru; bọbon ạar olo ụlem olo ịḍua ḍio todi keru ilo.
Todi pesi aghuḍum idi, keḍio odi aghuḍum obho pẹḅaal arōoy.
Ẹḅaal obho nạmu tọkinim obho, keḍio ọkinim obho orue ḍio moḍime.
Ẹnaan arōm mọony adōm odi aru olo ughōl ạJon.
Odi aru mọgba ẹḅaal obho omutiom, molo tịigbaay odi kōoy kōoy ạmoghon amōruōm.
Odi nịvo nịvo ẹḅaal obho ḍio; odi aru mọgba ẹḅaal obho omutiom.
Ẹḅaal obho tatu bọ ạmu toomo arōoy obho, pạkar odi ẹḅaal obho.
Odi Ekpo-ọnuekpete bho ạrol tẹmar-arōoy obho. Ịḍua todi eru kọlem ẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio ẹmar-arōoy obho ilōghōm io zodi.
Odi aru tạkar arōoy odi, keḍio arōoy bhꞌodi ibhinom io zodi.
Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo abhinom odi, pobo odi ạnogho mịikpo motẹn ạnwuny tẸnaan, nꞌobo bho imōruōm bọ ḍien odi obho.
Eedi iru ḍio mạnwuny tẸnaan mi tẹmara, tebum ạburude eedi bolobolo tebum ịto ọony ōoy. Ẹnaan nịvo nịvo pọkar Ọde eedi.
Keḍio odi Ekpo-ọnuekpete bho atẹn mōoy arughan ezōor. Ezōor ọmiin meghuan obhꞌodi, eghuan ilo idi kibhꞌOgini Ọony Ọde bho, ilo ọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌagey obho igbẹbh ni ịman.
ẠJon ạgba zodi amutiom, namulughu, “Oobho odi obo bho ạami ụḍeghe ghạ ughōl, ‘Odi natu tạman ạmi keḍio odi apu ạami, tebum obho odi odi keḍio ugbi mọmar ạami obho.’ ”
Tegbẹbhom obho odi agbẹbh ni ạman obho, odi nạaḅaraghi mạlisebh, ạseghe monyiin apumom monyiin ạnogho zezira.
Ẹnaan ạnogho maMozis maraalōgh obho, keḍio ọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌagey obho ịḍua tạJizos Kraist eru.
Bọbon ōoy olo nạamiin ghạ mẸnaan olo. Onyiin odi be, obho aru bọ mẸnaan obho, obho odi tọtu Ọde bho, odi naaḍighi olōghōm zodi.
Tamen olo ạruula arōoy aJu obhꞌaJerusạlẹm irōm marōoy iḅo miiḅua nꞌibhꞌaLivai obho iru tạJon mopuruan odi kua, “Ạna kokōr ōoy?”, iibha ịigbaay tạJon.
Odi ọbharanaan io. Ạgba ni magey obho aghōl kua, “Ạami aKraist bho ḍio.”
Keḍio eedi ịmaar ipuruan zodi, “Kạna kokōr ōoy? Ạna Ilaija bẹle?” Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua, “Eenyi, ạami odi ḍio.” Eedi imina ipuruan, “Kạna ozil obho bẹle?” Podi ạbhagharana mu, “Eenyi.”
Keḍio eedi imina ipuruan kua, “Ạna kokōr ōoy? Gbạ mạnogho ezōor milo ezōor ọteeny mạar olo ọgba ọnogho obo bho irōm ezōor obho. Ạna kạkar okōr ōoy?”
Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua,
“Ạami odi oghōrōkō bho naleghe amulughu mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum obho,
‘Iselemi mebōom obho tObạmọogh obho,’ ”
(kẹzo bho Ạizaya ozil obho ạkpete bho.)
Arōoy aFarisi obho pobo bho irōm bọ obho.
Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua, “Eru kạar olo ạna otu ḍio maKraist obho, bolobolo Ilaija, bolobolo ozil obho, ebum eeghe kạna nazuughiom rōoy mụum?”
PạJon ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami ụseghe mụum ku nazuughiom zenyina. Teesoḍia enyina kir onyiin olo enyina ilōghōm io.
Odi natu tạman ạmi, keḍio ạami ugbẹbh io nạ mọkporion arakōrō odi.”
Oomo abaabha bho imute mi tạBetani, tẹḅeenyom ọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan, tesi obho ạJon nazuoghom rōoy rụmuum obho.
Aḍio ạḅaal, ạJon nạamiin mạJizos natu todi, keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Oobho Ọony Ẹena bho tẸnaan, obho tạseghe atughuneen mịkarabh ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Odi pobo bho ạami ụrol ụgba bọ ughōl, ‘Kir ōoy olo natu tạman ạmi olo apu ạami, tẹzo bho keḍio tọotua mọmar ạmi odi odi nạ.’
Ạami ulōghōm io zodi, keḍio ạami uru nazuoghom rōoy rụmuum moḍighi olo arōoy Izirẹl kelōghōm zodi.”
Iibha pịigbaay olo ạJon ạgba, “Ạami ụmiin mẸmugh Iigbia bho mobho ạḍua tạnyu obho nasōor keekumude aru ạrolan nꞌodi.

Ẹkona ạami ulōghōm io zodi, keḍio Ẹnaan obho arōm ạami moru ozuughiom ạrumuum obho ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, ‘Ạna tạmiin ni mibha Ẹmugh obho tasōor atu ạtolom mōoy. Odi pōoy obho tạseghe mẸmugh Iigbia bho azuughiom rōoy obho.’
Ạami nạamiin kạami nạgba ạnogho enyina nakōl odi Ọony tẸnaan.”
Amina ạḅaal, pạJon nꞌịzal iteledōm odi idi tonyiin esi obho
nẹmiin mobho ạJizos arele natẹn obho, keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Oobho odi Ọony Ẹena bho tẸnaan.”
Ịzal iteledōm obho ịmoghon miibha bho, piḅetunu ịtuonuman mạJizos.

Keḍio ạJizos aghiraan, pạmiin mibha eedi nẹtuonom zodi, keḍio apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina nẹva meeghe?” Keḍio eedi ịbhagharana kua, “Rạbay, (obho amōrō kua ‘Ọtughumiom ịtughumiom,’) ạna natugh teḍighen?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana zeedi aghōl kua, “Itu mẹmiin.” Peedi ịtuonuman zodi ịghi ịmiin mesi obho odi natugh obho, keḍio ịrolan odi moomo aḍuma bho. (Nạkian inya asuo zodi aḍuma bho.)
Onyiin obo bho ạmoghon ạni mạJon kạghi ạtuonom mạJizos obho, pẠndru umōr tạSaimon Pita.
Ạndru ạmiin mumōr odi ạSaimon be pạgba aghōl maa, “Ezōor nọomiin mạMesaya bho.” (Obho amōrō kua “AKraist”.)
Keḍio odi abhin mạSaimon ạghi tạJizos. ẠJizos aanon odi ạsiine asōorẹ, paghōl maa, “Ạna ạSaimon ọony tạJon. Aḍien onuma tokōl maKifas.” (Aḍien opopo pughōl aPita, azin obho pọbharakpar.)
Aḍio ạḅaal, pạJizos natu mọghi taGalili. Podi ạmiin maFilip, ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Tụonom ạami!”
(AFilip olꞌaBetsaida, ẹma tẠndru nꞌaPita.)
AFilip ạmiin mạNataniel pạgba ạnogho zodi, “Ezōor nọomiin mōoy obho aMozis ạge ạgba mi taraalōgh obho, nꞌobho arizil obho ẹkona ịge ịgba nạ bho, ạJizos ọony taJosef obhꞌạNazaret.”
ẠNataniel apuruan kua, “Nọomiin ghạ mooḅi ạar mi tạNazaret?” Keḍio aFilip ạbhagharana kua, “Tue ọghi mạmiin.”
Amen ạJizos ạmiin ạNataniel natu todi, podi aghōl maa, “Oobho agey ōoy olo Izirẹl. Bọbon iben ilo tọnu odi.”
Keḍio ạNataniel apuruan zodi, “Ạna uḍighi ẹko kalōghōm ạami?” Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Keḍio aFilip tapeleghi ạna, men obho ạna ụrol tẹeḍian oorẹeny ạfig obho, ạami ạmiin ạna.”
PạNataniel ạbhagharana kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạna Ọony obho tẸnaan! Ạna Ọolema bhꞌIzirẹl!”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạna naamōruōm nạ ni siibha be mebum obho ạami ughōl mạami ạmiin ạna mi tẹeḍian oorẹeny ạfig obho? Ạna tạmiin ni mịnon ọkpo ilo ipu miibha.”
