Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami nạgba magey obho ạnogho zenyina: enyina tẹmiin ni mạnyu obho naaghuurunu nꞌobho itelema tẸnaan netele mi tỌony Oōy obho nẹsiin esōor.”
Ịzal aḍuma iru itẹn pu nopin ipina mi tẹma ạKena mi tebhugh obhꞌaGalili. Oniin tạJizos odi ạni tipina bho.
Odi ạJizos nꞌobo bho nẹtuonom zodi obho obheleghi nạ mọghi tipina bho.
Amen ụbhoghol mamiim obho ụman, poniin tạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Amiim obho teedi neemuneen.”
ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạni obho, ịgbaan eeghe zezira mipa bho? Amen ạami dọteeny io.”
Keḍio oniin tạJizos aghiraan ạkpete kua ạnogho mạnwuny-otu obho, “Kạar kạar olo odi ạkpete ạnogho enyina moḍighi, piḍighi.”
Tebum eḍighiom ạar ootōla ạravo arōoy aJu obho, kir odiin ịinu ạmuum mi tesi obho, ilo onyiin taḍigh ni mōogh ạtini ạmuum.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho mạnwuny-otu obho, “Ịloki rụmuum mebhule mịinu obho,” peedi iru ịloki ịmaar ibhule.
Keḍio odi ạkpete ạnogho zeedi, “Gụa, ikōr mẹghiom ọola ẹzaal obho.” Keḍio eedi ikōr ibhin ịghiom.
Amen odi aru ạnam mụum obho neetẹn miim obho, odi olōghōm io mesi amiim obho ịḍua iru, tughuneen mạnwuny-otu obho ḍio. Podi abheleghi mopina bho,

ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ịnon arōoy nepira ghạ ẹkiom mamiim obho ịneghe bho. Amen amiim obho nẹebher ịneghiom, keḍio eedi tegbi momutiom ibhꞌeesoḍia bho. Ibhꞌonuma akẹrẹ, ạna useeri miiḅi obho ninii ẹteeny siibha keḍio ạna ubhin natu!”
TạKena obhꞌaGalili pesi obho ạJizos abhira aḍighi moḍighi ibꞌaruugu obho todi; pesi odi amutiom eghuan todi, molo obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho imōruōm zodi.
Iibha iru itẹn, pạJizos nꞌoniin odi nꞌaburumōr odi nꞌobo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịghi tạKapaniom, ịrol epa mịbam aruḍuma.
Tamen olo naatuan mẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obhꞌaJu obho, pạJizos ạghi taJerusạlẹm.
Totu iikpulughu obho pạJizos ạmiin miḅo maḅo neḅoḍi rạnam nꞌạraana nꞌịnun ạbadi, nꞌobo bho nenweeghi ghạ mikpoki nẹerologhu mi taruzebele eedi.

Keḍio odi aru ạseghe miiḍigh aḍighi mạsunu abhirighanom ịnam obho mi totu iikpulughu obho, ạraana bho nꞌạranam obho, akpululeni maruzebele obo bho nenweeghi ghạ mikpoki obho, ạazarami mikpoki obhꞌeedi.
Keḍio odi ạbhooruom mobo bho neḅoḍi mịnun ạbadi obho aghōl kua, “Ịḅirogh memutiom tesuo! Íḍighi ghạ motu tỌde ạmi metẹnẹ mesi aḅo.”
Keḍio obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịitua mibha ụkpete tẹegia bho, “Ẹzo bho otu obho tonuma aḍigh tologhi ạmi obho naamōr tạmi kạnyan.”
Keḍio ạruula arōoy aJu obho iru mopuruan odi mạar, “Okōr oḍigh elẹgh mobho ạna taḍighi aḍeeriom ezōor molo ezōor olōghōm okōl ạna ạteeny mịnyaam obhirighan eedi mẹzo bho?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ịikpo motu obhobho tẸnaan, ịraar aḍuma neetẹn, pạami omina oḅōgh ọmarami.”
Peedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Ạna taḅōgh motu obhobho mịraar aḍuma, meru kạar olo ụukpo, motu iikpulughu obho ubhin erubal nꞌodiin ạsia uḅōgh obho!”
Otu iikpulughu obho odi nakōl obho palōor obho todi.
Molo tamen obho odi aḅetunu tọbho bho, pobo bho ịtuonuman ghạ zodi obho ịitua ilōghōm mibha odi aghōl miibha, keḍio eedi imōruōm ẹegia bho nꞌibha ạJizos ạgba bho.
Suo odi odi taJerusạlẹm mi tẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho, ọlogh arōoy imōruōm odi mamen eedi ịmiin moḍighi nꞌọkpo ibꞌaruugu obho odi aḍighi obho.
Odi ạJizos nịvo nịvo oḍuom io zeedi mologhi, tẹzo bho odi naalōghōm magey miloghi arōoy.
Bọbon ōoy olo amina ghạ ạgba ạnogho zodi miloghi arōoy olo. Odi naalōghōm kạar kạar ilo idi mi tiloghi eedi.
Tamen opopo, kir onyiin ōoy olꞌaFarisi obho olo ughōl aNikodimos, onyiin ọola arōoy aJu obho.

Odi ōoy obhobho aru muḍugul mi tạJizos keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, ezōor noolōghōm mibha ạna uru mōoy ịtughumiom olo ạḍua tẸnaan karu. Oōy olo arue ghạ aḍighi mọkpo ibꞌaruugu bhibha tonuma olo, tughuneen molo Ẹnaan odi nꞌodi ḍio.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami nạgba magey obho ạnogho ạna. Bọbon ōoy olo tatue ạmiin mAde-Ọolema tẸnaan olo tughuneen molo noomina ụmar odi ḍio.”
Odi aNikodimos apuruan kua, “Toḍighi ẹko komina ọmaar okenya ōoy olo odi kạmi. Odi sorue mu aḍigh mogbẹbhiōm ịzal amen mi tọobhe oniin odi molo komina kọmar odi!”
ẠJizos amulumian kua zodi, “Agey nạ ni, mibha ạami nạgba ạnogho ạna bho, bọbon ōoy olo tatue aḍigh tAde-Ọolema tẸnaan olo, tughuneen molo nọomaram zodi mụum nꞌẸmugh Iigbia bho ḍio.
Ibha ụmaram bọ miikpōogh obho ilꞌiikpōogh obho. Ibha ạruumugh obho, ilꞌạruumugh obho.
Uumōogh ghạ mebum obho ạami ụkpete ụnogho ạna ughōl, ‘Digha tomina ni ọmar enyina bho.’
Ọpibha bho nạpibh ghạ ạki tesi olo ologhi odi aḍigh aḍigh; ạna nạmoghon ẹzo bho nạpibh obho, keḍio ạna olōghōm io mesi ạbhibh natu nꞌesi nạki. Pẹzo idi nạ mi tōoy olo Ẹmugh obho ạmar.”
ANikodimos apuruan kua zodi, “Iibha bho ku temute ẹko?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Pạna ạkar obꞌōoy ịtughumiom olꞌIzirẹl olo olōghōm io miibha bho?
Agey nạ ni, ạami nạgba ạnogho ạna: Ezōor nọḍeghe ghạ mibha ezōor ulōghōm obho, nọgba mibha ezōor ụmiin obho, keḍio bọbon ōoy olꞌenyina olo namōrō momōruōm adōm ezōor olo.
Enyina imōruōm io zạmi mamen ạami ụgba mọkpo ẹmar-arōoy obho ụnogho enyina, tọteko oḍighi kenyina emōruōm ạami mamen ạami tạgba mọkpo tẸnaan ạnogho enyina?
Keḍio bọbon ōoy olo nạaghi ghạ tẸnaan olo, tughuneen mỌony Oōy obho ạḍua tẸnaan karu obho ḍio.”
Ẹzo bho aMozis aabhaghami ạḅam tạnyu ạlugua mooḍigh obho ụlemom bọ rukurōgh obho mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum obho, pẹzo tọseghe nạ mỌony Oōy obho ọḅam tạnyu,
molo kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm zodi tạteeny ni maghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho.
Ẹnaan atulan ni mẹmar-arōoy obho apu molo odi ạnogho mogini Ọony odi molo kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm odi ọpo mu, keḍio tạteeny maghuḍum olo kamen kamen.
Ẹnaan orōm io mỌony obhꞌodi aru tẹmar-arōoy obho mọru ịiruan obhumeni ẹmar-arōoy obho, odi aru mọbhel.
Ụru mụ mịiruan obhumeni kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm mỌony obho; obo bho omōruōm io obho, ịiruan apum ibhꞌodi noolegheri osōbh, tebum obho odi omōruōm io mogini Ọony tẸnaan obho.
Iibha ẹmu ịiruan obho: tibha ẹḅaal obho naaru tẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio arōoy obho itulan mọkinim obho ipu mẹḅaal obho. Ạar obho aḍighi obho keeghe? Eḍighiom ạar eedi ịkarabh.
Kōoy kōoy olo naḍighi mịkarabh ọkpo nạlogh ḍien mẹḅaal obho, molo oru ḍio tẹḅaal obho tebum obho odi ọva ḍio mịkarabh eḍighiom ạar odi kemute tẹḅaal obho.
Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo naḍighi mibha ịneghe bho, odi odi tẹḅaal obho, molo ẹḅaal obho tẹgba eḍeeriom mobho eḍighiom ạar odi iru mibha odi nakiilaan mẸnaan.
Ipa iru itẹn, pạJizos nꞌobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịghi tebhugh obhꞌaJudia. Odi ạrol ịbam amen tepa, azuughiom rōoy mụum.
ẠJon ẹkona ạrol azuughiom rōoy rụmuum mi tẠinon, esi olo ogbeenyan io mạSalim, tebum obho ịkanya ạmuum idi tepa bho. Arōoy iru ghạ todi, keḍio odi azuughiom ghạ nạ zeedi rụmuum.
(Amen opopo dọloghom io mạJon mikoli obho.)
Ẹtede iteledōm tạJon nꞌonyiin ōoy aJu ịrol ịghanan mi tọpaḍi eḍighiom ạar eedi obho igboloman nꞌọḅaaleni alōor.

Keḍio eedi ịghi tạJon ịgba ịnogho zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạna nạatua ni mōoy obho ạrol bọ nꞌạna tẹḅeenyom ọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan, obho ạna ụgba ghạ bọ bho? Nonon, odi nazuughiom rōoy rụmuum siibha bho, molo kōoy kōoy nạki todi!”
Keḍio ạJon ạbhagharana kua, “Bọbon ōoy olo tạteeny mạar olo Ẹnaan ọnogho ḍio zodi olo.
Enyina nịvo nịvo ịmoghon ạni men obho ạami ughōl, ‘Ạami aKraist obho ḍio, urōm ạami motẹnōm odi taghisigh.’
Kạni kạni olꞌolom obho; ọbulol olom obho ạmara tọtu nạmoghon ghạ, keḍio ologhi odi tạḅaal ni mamen odi tạmoghon moghōrōkō olom obho. Pẹzo ọḅaal ologhi ạmi naagbẹbh nạ asi.
Ịimogho odi tẹbugh ni, ibhꞌạmi esōor.”
Odi obo bho ạḍua tạnyu obho aru obho apu kōoy kōoy; odi obho ạḍua tade bho karu obho olꞌade bho, keḍio tạgbaay mọkpo ade bho. Odi obho ạḍua tẸnaan aru obho apu kōoy kōoy.
Odi ạgba mibha odi nạamiin ạmoghon obho, keḍio ōoy olo napinom oghōrōkō odi olo.
Kōoy kōoy olo abhinom oghōrōkō odi nạgba aḍeeriom mibha Ẹnaan aru magey.
Odi obho Ẹnaan arōm obho tạgba moghōrōkō tẸnaan, tebum obho Ẹnaan ạnogho zodi mẸmugh Iigbia bho moḍighi omuzeni taghuḍum odi.
Ọde bho atulan magey mỌony obho, keḍio ạlogh tạvo odi moomo ẹmorokpo bho.
Kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm mỌony obho nạateeny maghuḍum olo kamen kamen; kōoy kōoy olo okiilaan io mỌony obho ọteeny io maghuḍum, keḍio ọkarabh ologhi tẸnaan tạtolan zodi moomo amen.
Arōoy aFarisi obho ịmoghon mạJizos nạanyaghagh mọlogh arōoy nazuoghom rụmuum zeedi molo odi nạateeny miteledōm napu mạJon.
(Ạkar ạJizos nịvo nịvo ozuom io mōoy mụum; iteledōm odi be izuoghom.)
Amen ạJizos ạmoghon mibha arōoy nẹḍeghe obho podi ạḅele maJudia amula ạghi taGalili.
Odi nạki, podi ạḅol tebōom obho ạḅol atẹn taSameria bho.
Keḍio odi aru asi tonyiin ẹma aSameria olo ughōl Saikar, olo ogbeenyan io made bho ạJekob ạnogho maJosef ọony odi obho.
Aghuḍia bho tạJekob odi epa, molo suo nẹebher mạJizos merele bho, pạghi ạrol delede mi tọtu aghuḍia bho. Aḍio nạaḍi ịzal abin men opopo.
Keḍio onyiin ạni olꞌaSameria aru mokōr ạmuum, keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạni obho, nọgho ạami mụum ạami ụpoghol.”
(Iteledōm obhꞌodi nẹeghi tẹma bho moghō eḍian.)
Ạni obhꞌaSameria ạbhagharana zodi kua, “Ạna olꞌaJu, ạami olꞌaSameria — ibhꞌeeghe kạna nagbẹel ạami mụum?” (Arōoy aJu obho ịteeny io mạar oḍighiom marōoy aSameria bho.)
PạJizos ạbhagharana zodi kua, “Ughōl ạna naalōghōm mẹnogho bho tẸnaan, nꞌobo bho nagbẹel ạna mụum ọbhoghol obho bọ, pạna kugbẹel zodi mọnogho onuma mạmuum aghuḍum.”
Pạni obho ạkpete kua, “Obo apu ạami, ạna ạgbugba olo, keḍio aghuḍia obho ẹkona akuḍum magey. Ạna tạteeny teḍighen mạmuum aghuḍum obho?
ẠJekob ogbōgh ọde ezōor ạnogho zezōor maghuḍia bhobho. Odi nꞌạnwuny odi nꞌịnam odi ịbhoghol tesuo. Ạna upu mạJekob gạ?”
PạJizos aghōl kua, “Kōoy kōoy olo ạbhoghol mụum ibhibha, ạmuum digha tẹtal ni zodi.

Kōoy kōoy olo ạbhoghol mụum obho ạami tạnogho bho, ạmuum ịral mu zodi. Ạmuum obho ạami tạnogho bho tẹtol todi kozi ọbhiiny olo tạnogho zodi mạmuum aghuḍum, molo tạnogho zodi moḍum aghuḍum olo kamen kamen.”
Ạni obho agbẹel, “Obo apu ạami, nọgho ạni ạami mạmuum ibhibha, molo ạmuum ịtal mu zạmi, ạami ẹkona utu mu suo mokōr ạmuum.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kịa mabheleghi molom onuma maru.”
Odi ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami olom olo.” ẠJizos aghōl maa, “Agey mẹzo bho ạna ughōl bọ mạna olom olo bho.
Oōgh arōoy mobho ạna nạaḅal, keḍio obho nꞌạna netughan siibha bho olom onuma ḍio. Ạna nạakar ạgba magey obho.”
Pạni obho ạbhagharana kua, “Hụu! Ạna ozil tẸnaan.
Ạburude ạmi ibhꞌaSameria iikpulughu mẸnaan tesuo obꞌeegum obho, keḍio enyina arōoy aJu obho ighōl maJerusạlẹm pesi obho ezira kuukpulughu ghạ mẸnaan.”
ẠJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Nonon ni, ạni obho, amen natu mobho arōoy iikpulughu mu mỌde bho mi tobꞌeegum obhobho bolobolo taJerusạlẹm.
Enyina arōoy aSameria ịkar io elōghōm zodi obo bho enyina neekpulughu obho; ezōor aJu obho noolōghōm zodi obo bho ezōor nookpulughu obho. Ịbhelegha bho ịḍua tarōoy aJu obho keru.
Amen natu, esiibha podi amen obho, obho ạkar obo iikpulughu obho teekpulughu mỌde bho mi tạruumugh nꞌagey obho. Iibha pobo iikpulughu obho Ọde bho nạva molo keekpulughu zodi obho.
Ẹnaan Ẹmugh. Obo bho neekpulughu zodi obho teekpulughu nạ zodi mi tạruumugh nꞌagey obho.”
Keḍio ạni obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạami naalōghōm mobho aKraist obho tatu ni. Amen odi naaru, odi tạgba ni kạar kạar ạnogho ezōor.”
ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami podi, ạami obo bho nạḍeghe nꞌạna bho.”

Tamen opopo, piteledōm obho tạJizos iru isi, keḍio neemōogh magey mọmiin odi nꞌạni aSameria nẹḍeghe rạḍeghe, molo bọbon onyiin eedi olo apuruan zodi ạni obho aghōl, “Ạna naḍighi mẹkaraan suo?” bolobolo apuruan zodi, “Ibhꞌeeghe kạna nꞌodi nẹḍeghe rạḍeghe?” olo.
Ạni obho nạaḅele mọonu ạmuum obho todi amula tẹma bho, ạkpete kua ạnogho marōoy obho tepa,
“Itu mẹmiin mōoy olo nạgba kạar kạar olo ạami naaḍighi. Odi aKraist obho ḍio gạ?”
Peedi ịḅele mẹma bho ịghi mọmiin ạJizos.
Tamen opopo, piteledōm obho neesen ghạ mạJizos, “Obo ịtughumiom, oobho ạar ole!”
Podi ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami ụteeny meḍian olo ole enyina ilōghōm io bọbon ạar.”
Keḍio iteledōm obho onyiin napuruan monyiin, “Oōy naaru ạnogho zodi meḍian gạ?”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Eḍian ạmi poḍighi ibhꞌologhi obo bho arōm ạami obho, nꞌoḍighi ọman oḍighi obho odi ạnogho ạami moḍighi obho.
“Enyina ẹteeny mọnuekpete bhobho, ‘Inya ụvanyu isughō miiḅua.’ Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho zenyina: ịmaar eenon mi tariḍighi obho. Ariḍian obho nẹeghuaay ẹneghe moḅuuy!
Obo bho naḅu moḍighi obho nọkpe zodi, keḍio naakōbhōghi mariḍian ilo ịteeny aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo, molo obo bho aḅẹbh obho nꞌobo bho aḅu obho tẹḅaal ni mologhi eeleeny.
Agey mọnuekpete bhobho, ‘Onyiin obo oḅẹbh, ọnon obo oḅu.’
Ạami naarōm zenyina moḅu iiḅua mi toḍighi olo enyina iḍighi ḍio. Ịnon arōoy iḅẹbh keḍio enyina neliom epinom ạsuo mi toḍighi obhꞌeedi.”
Ọlogh arōoy aSameria mi tẹma bho imōruōm mạJizos, tebum ibha ạni obho ạgba aghōl maa, “Odi ạgba ạnogho ạami kạar kạar olo ạami naaḍighi.”
Molo amen arōoy aSameria bho iru piisen odi mọrolan eedi; keḍio ạJizos ạrolan eedi mịzal aḍuma.
Tebum ịigbaay odi, pọlogh arōoy imina imōruōm,
ịkpete kua ịnogho mạni obho, “Ezōor noomōruōm siibha bho, tebum ibha ạna ụgba bho be ḍio, ezōor nịvo nịvo nọomoghon ạni tọnu odi, keḍio ezōor noolōghōm mibha odi ạkar aru mỌpela ẹmar-arōoy obho.”
ẠJizos ạrolan eedi ịzal aḍuma itẹn podi ạghi taGalili,
tebum obho ạJizos nịvo nịvo nạakpete kua, “Ozil tẸnaan eghuan olo mi tẹma odi.”
Amen odi ạghi asi taGalili, arōoy ibhin ni zodi magey. Eedi nẹeghi ạni mi taJerusạlẹm mole ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho ẹmiin nạ moomo ọkpo bho odi aḍighi mi tẹzaal obho.
Suo keḍio ạJizos amula ạghi tạKena obhꞌaGalili, esi obho odi aḍighi mụum atẹnẹ miim obho. Tesuo kir onyiin ogbōgh ōoy ạgomet olo ọony odi alōor ọneghe ḍio mi tạKapaniom.
Amen odi ạmoghon mạJizos nạaḍua taJudia atu taGalili, podi ạghi todi ạkpete ạnogho zodi moru ookō ọony odi obho natu mọbho bho.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Bọbon onyiin enyina olo tamōruōm tughuneen olo odi ạmiin melẹgh olo.”
Pōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Obo apu ạami, tue, sesen ni, kọony ạmi agbi mọbho.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kịa ọony onuma taḍum ni.” Podi ōoy obho amōruōm oghōrōkō tạJizos ạghi.
Odi natẹn nakẹel, itelema odi nebhir zodi mọgba ekua, “Ọony onuma naaḍum!”
Keḍio odi apuruan mamen obho ọony todi aḍum obho, keḍio eedi ịbhagharana kua, “Aḅetunu mọsilaan eḍienaan mi tonyiin asuo.”
Pọde bho aru ạatua alōghōm mobho amen opopo aru mamen obho ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho zodi aghōl maa, “Ọony onuma taḍum ni” obho. Podi nꞌotu odi imōruōm.
Oobho pogbẹbhiōm ịzal oḍighi ibꞌaruugu obho ạJizos aḍighi suo odi ạḍua taJudia aru taGalili obho.
Iibha iru itẹn, pạteeny monyiin ẹzaal arōoy aJu obho, pạJizos ạghi taJerusạlẹm.
TaJerusạlẹm, mi tọnu-otu obho ughōl bọ “Ọnu-otu ạraana” bho, kir eghō olo ạteeny ōogh ariisi obhooghia, olo tọnu-ẹma aHibru pughōl Bẹtzata.
Ọlogh arōoy ilo asilōor ịneghe ḍio nẹmaghanan ghạ teedi ariisi obhooghia bho — arōoy ikpom ariḍien, nꞌạsukugha, nꞌobo asilōor obho meemughughu kua be. [Eedi neḅōrō molo ạmuum obho keezighinian,
tẹzo bho otelema tObạmọogh obho nasōor ghạ moomo amen azighe mạmuum obho. Ọḅel ōoy obho tapira ạpel asōor teghō bho mamen olo noozighe mụum obho, podi oḍum mi toḍigh ẹzegh obho odi nạnwe bho.]
Tesi obhobho, ōoy olo nạnwe, nạarol aḍisibh ḍiōbh nꞌạbhenya ạsia mi tẹzegh obhꞌodi odi.
ẠJizos ạmiin odi nạamaghanan, keḍio odi naalōghōm mobho odi ōoy obho nạarol tẹzegh mọnu ạsia olo ịteeny mẹzo bho, podi apuruan kua zodi, “Ạna nạva moḍum gạ?”
Odi ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Obo apu ạmi, ạami ụteeny io mōoy mi tesuo mọbham ạmi otuḅeen mi teghō bho mamen uzighe mụum obho. Kamen ạami tạkogha mosōor, ọnon ōoy nạakem apel asōor.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ḅetunu makpōr ọtagara onuma marele.”
Tonyiin odi amen obho, pōoy obho aḍum. Odi akpōr mọtagara odi arele.
Iibha bho imute mi taḍuma obhooghia bho,
pạruula arōoy aJu obho ịkpete ịnogho mōoy obho uukō bọ bho ighōl kua, “Aadon aḍuma obhooghia ạna naasōor olōgh morōol ọtagara.”
Podi ạbhagharana kua, “Obo bho aakō zạmi obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zạmi, ‘Kpōr mọtagara onuma marele.’ ”
Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Okōr ōoy mobho ạkpete ạnogho zịna mokpōr ọtagara onuma orele bho?”
Odi obo bho uukō bho olōghōm io mobo aakō zodi; tẹzo bho ọlogh arōoy idi todi esi obho, ạJizos ẹkona nạaḍua.
Ịbam amen itẹn, pạJizos ạmiin odi mi totu iikpulughu obho, keḍio ạkpete kua, “Nonon, siibha bho nookō zịna. Ḍụa tịkarabh onuma molo ịnon ibꞌịkarabh ẹzegh imina ẹteeny ạna.”
Keḍio odi ōoy obho tạḍua ạki ạgba ạnogho mạruula aJu obho mạJizos aakō zodi.
Tebum ipa bẹleni, peedi ịke mọva ạraakpe mạJizos, tibha odi aakō mōoy mi taḍuma obhooghia bho.
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Ọde ạmi naḍighi ghạ moḍighi moomo amen. Ạami ẹkona taḍighi nạ ni.”

Tọnuekpete bhobho paḍighi molo ạruula aJu obho ilegheri ịitua magey moghigh odi. Odi opẹl io molōgh aḍuma obhooghia bho be, keḍio odi aghōl mẸnaan Ọde odi, tiibha bho odi naaḍighi molo Ẹnaan nꞌodi neeleeny.

Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana zeedi, “Ạami nạgba magey obho nạnogho zenyina: Ọony obho ọkar io aḍighi mọkpo ilꞌodi. Ibha odi ạmiin bho Ọde bhꞌodi naḍighi obho be pibha odi naḍighi. Ibha Ọde bho naḍighi obho pibha Ọony obho naḍighi nạ.
Ọde bho atulan mỌony obho, molo naḍeeriom zodi kạar kạar olo odi nịvo nịvo naḍighi. Odi taḍeeriom nạ ni zodi mọkpo ilo ipu suo moḍighi, molo enyina keemōogh.
Tẹzo bho Ọde bho naḅẹriōn miḍim nạnogho ghuḍum obho, onyiin ẹzo bho nạ pibha Ọony obho tạnogho ghuḍum mobo bho iḍigh tologhi odi obho.
Ọde bho ẹkona ọru ḍio mịiruan ạnogho mōoy. Oomo ịnyaam ịiruan obho, odi nạaseghe ạnogho mỌony obho,
molo kōoy kōoy aabhughumi mỌony obho, kẹzo bho eedi iibhughumi mỌde bho. Kōoy kōoy olo oobhughumi ḍio mỌony obho, oobhughumi nạ ḍio mỌde bho arōm zodi obho.

“Agey nạ ni bho ạami nạgba ạnogho zenyina: kōoy kōoy olo ạmoghon ọnuekpete ạmi, kamōruōm zodi obo bho arōm ạami obho, nạateeny maghuḍum olo tẹtol kamen kamen. Ụru mu mịiruan ọnogho zodi, keḍio odi naapẹl mọbho aḍigh taghuḍum.
Ạami nạgba magey obho ạnogho zenyina: amen natu — esiibha podi amen obho — mobho obo bho nẹebho bho tẹmoghon ni moghōrōkō Ọony obho tẸnaan, molo eedi obo bho ịmoghon obho tẹteeny ni ghuḍum.
Ẹzo bho aghuḍum obho iru milꞌỌde bho, pẹzo odi naaḍighi nạ maghuḍum obho iru milꞌỌony obho.
Odi nạanogho mỌony obho mịnyaam olo ọru ịiruan obho, tebum obho odi aru mỌony Oōy obho.
Iímōogh ghạ mi tabaabha bho: amen natu molo oomo obo bho nẹebho bọ idi taruugu obho tẹmoghon ni moghōrōkō odi.
Keḍio eedi temuteghu taruugu obhꞌeedi, obo bho iḍighi miiḅi obho teḅerenu ni eḍum ghuḍum, keḍio obo bho iḍighi mịkarabh obho teḅerenu ni ẹnogho mapum.”

“Ạami be utue ḍio aḍighi mạar. Ạami usōbh rạakpe bho tẹzo bho Ẹnaan ạkpete ạnogho ạami obho, molo ịiruan tạmi iru magey, tebum obho ạami ụva ḍio moḍighi ilꞌạmi obho, naḍighi mibha todi obo bho arōm ạami obho be.
“Eru kạar olo ịigbaay obhꞌạmi iru milꞌạmi be, ịigbaay ibhꞌạmi irue ḍio eru magey obho.
Kir ọnon ōoy olo nạgba ạni nạ milꞌạmi, molo ạami naalōghōm mobho ibha odi nạgbaam ạami obho iru magey obho.
Enyina irōm aritelema enyina ẹghi tạJon, keḍio odi ạgba mebum agey obho.
Ughōl io ạami tapin mịigbaay ōoy. Ạami nạgba kua be molo ọpel enyina.
ẠJon ạrol kọtodi olo naamōr ạmua, keḍio enyina imōruōm ịrol mịbam amen nebo mibo mi tẹḅaal todi.
Ịigbaay ilo ipu mibha tạJon nẹgbaam ạmi. Ariḍighi obho ạami naḍighi obho, ariḍighi obho Ọde ạmi ạnogho ạami moḍighi obho, iibha nẹgbaam ạami, nẹgba eḍeeriom mobho Ọde bho arōm ạami aru.
Odi Ọde bho arōm ạami obho nạgba nạ zạmi amutiom. Enyina dẹmoghon io moghōrōkō odi, dẹmiin nạ ḍio maghisigh odi.
Enyina deseeri ḍio mọnuekpete odi mi tiloghi enyina, tebum obho enyina imōruōm io zodi obho odi arōm aru obho.
Enyina nẹtuugha mẹegia iigbia bho mebum obho enyina ịitua ighōl teedi pesi enyina tẹmiin maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo. Keḍio eedi nịvo nịvo nẹgba zạmi.
Keḍio enyina imōrō ḍio moru tạmi molo enyina kẹteeny ghuḍum.
“Ạami ụva ḍio molo arōoy kebuom ạami.
Ạami naalōghōm enyina. Ạami naalōghōm mobho enyina itulan io mẸnaan mi tiloghi enyina.
Ạami uru nꞌịnyaam tỌde ạmi, keḍio enyina ibhin io ạami. Amen ọnon ōoy tatu nꞌịnyaam odi, penyina obhin odi.
Enyina negbẹel ghạ molo onyiin kabuom monyiin, keḍio enyina ịva ḍio mọteeny ibha tobuom enyina mi todi onyiin Ẹnaan be: tediaka siibha bho kenyina emōruōm.
Ịítua ghạ meghōl ạami tạkpete ni zenyina ạpue ạnogho mỌde ạmi. AMozis pobo tạgba mịkarabh enyina — aMozis obho enyina neḍuom ologhi obho.
Eru kạar olo enyina nẹekar emōruōm maMozis, kōl enyina neemōruōm ạami, ebum obho odi ạge milꞌạmi obho.
Kenyina imōruōm io mibha odi ạge bho, enyina tetue emōruōm mibha ạami nạgba bho?”
Iibha iru itẹn, pạJizos amula ạghi ạḅeeny mọbhiiny aGalili (obho ughōl nạ ọbhiiny aTaibirias obho).
Keḍio obꞌọlogh arōoy ịtuonom odi, suo eedi nẹemiin moḍighi ibꞌaruugu obho odi aḍighi mi tookōoy ạrazegh obho.
Keḍio ạJizos ạghi ạsiin teegum, odi nꞌobo bho nẹtuonom odi obho ịrol delede.
Ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obhꞌaJu obho naatuan.
ẠJizos nạamiin mibha obꞌọlogh arōoy netu todi, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho maFilip, “Ezira tọmiin teḍighen mạbred olo oghō ọnogho oomo arōoy bhibha kele?”
(Odi apuruan kua mọdegh aFilip; odi ni dụgh, odi naalōghōm milo odi taḍighi.)
Keḍio aFilip ạbhagharana kua, “Keḍio tọteeny nạ milo ōoy ịbam ịbam kale, toliom ni mạbred ilo tẹkian ni mọonir anaira.”
Keḍio Ạndru, onyiin oteledōm obhꞌodi, umōr taPita, ạkpete kua,
“Kir ọony olo odi suo olo ạteeny ōogh eḅol ạbred nꞌịzal ina. Keedi abaabha bho tesi teḍighen tobꞌọlogh arōoy ilo ileeny mẹzo bho?”
PạJizos ạkpete ạnogho eedi, “Iḍighi arōoy obho ẹrologhu delede.” (Ịkanya ịigho idi todi esi obho.) Parōoy obho ịrologhu delede; arōoy ilo neepu maḍiōbh nꞌịzal nꞌạmaḍian ọonir arōoy.

Keḍio ạJizos ạseghe mạbred obho, ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan, keḍio ụḍi ụnogho marōoy obho ịrologhu delede bho. Odi ạseghe nạ mena bho aḍighi nạ monyiin ẹzo bho, keḍio oomo eedi iru ile kẹzo kẹzo olo eedi ịva mole.
Amen oomo arōoy obho neele ịbherogh, podi ạkpete ạnogho miteledōm odi, “Iikpo moomo ịpaḍi obho isughō bho, utōbh io bọbon ọpaḍi.”
Peedi iikpooy moomo eedi, keḍio imuza maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạrukpaagh ịpaḍi ạbred ibha isughō mi tōogh eḅol ạbred obho arōoy obho ile bho.
Amen arōoy obho ịmiin oḍighi ibꞌaruugu obho odi aḍighi obho, pịkpete kua, “Oobho ạkar odi ozil obho tatu bọ tẹmar-arōoy obho!”
ẠJizos naalōghōm mobho eedi nẹva moḅum odi otẹnẹ ọolema; podi be ạḍua ạghi taruugum obho.
Nạteeny mudule piteledōm odi isōor tọbhiiny obho
iḍigh moghuugh, keḍio ịzoghi nẹḅeeny momula tạKapaniom. Aḍio naakpereghi, keḍio ạJizos doru nạ ḍio teedi.
Tamen opopo obꞌogim naasōor molo ọbhiiny obho nạle.
Iteledōm obho nẹezoghi mịraar nꞌinya ịidoony aratobi keḍio tẹmiin mạJizos natele tạmuum obho natuan toghuugh obho, molo aruugu isibh eedi.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami. Ighiil ghạ ruugu!”
Keḍio eedi ịloghom zodi mi toghuugh obho, tonyiin odi amen opopo poghuugh obhꞌeedi ạghi asul tesiḍia bho eedi nẹki mosul obho.
Aḍio ạḅaal arōoy obho ịrol tẹḅeenyom ọbhiiny obho ịmiin mobho onyiin oghuugh be bho asughō bho. Peedi ilōghōm mobho ạJizos oḍigh ạni ḍio nꞌiteledōm odi toghuugh obho eedi be ịzoghi ịḍua.
Ịnon arughuugh ilo ịḍua taTaibirias iru neesul tesiḍia obho Obạmọogh obho abhin ạbred ạnogho lịsebh ạnogho rōoy obho mole bho.
Amen obho eedi ịmiin io mạJizos nꞌiteledōm obhꞌodi peedi iḍiku rughuugh ịghi tạKapaniom nẹva zodi.
Amen arōoy obho iru ịmiin mạJizos mi tẹḅeenyom obho, peedi ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạna usi suo mokōr amen?”

Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami nạgba kua magey obho ạnogho enyina: enyina nẹva ạami mebum ạbred obho enyina ile bho, enyina ịtuan io mebum obho enyina nẹemoghonyan moḍighi ibꞌaruugu bhꞌạami obho.

Íḍighi ghạ moḍighi olo tẹnogho enyina mịḅure ariḍian; kpẹlen nꞌipa, iḍighi moḍighi olo tẹnogho enyina meḍian olo tẹtol kamen kamen mi taghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho. Eḍian bhibha Ọony Oōy obho tạnogho enyina, tebum obho Ẹnaan Ọde bho nạalogh odi melẹgh obho.”
Peedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Ezōor toḍighi meeghe koḍighi moḍighi tẸnaan?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Oobho poḍighi obho Ẹnaan nạva molo enyina keḍighi: imōruōm obo bho odi arōm aru obho.”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Okōr oḍigh ọkpo ịiḍaany elẹgh mobho ạna taḍighi molo ezōor tọmiin omōruōm ạna? Okōr oḍighi mobho ạna taḍighi?
Igbōgh ạburude ezōor ile mạbred mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum obho, kẹzo bho ẹegia iigbia bho ịgba bho,
‘Odi ạnogho zeedi mạbred olo ạḍua tẸnaan asōor mole.’ ”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ạkar agey nạ ni, ạbred obho aMozis ạnogho zenyina bho ọḍua ḍio tẸnaan aru; Ọde ạmi pobo bho tạnogho zenyina magey ạbred obho ạḍua tẸnaan aru obho.
Ạbred obho Ẹnaan ạnogho bho, podi obo bho ạḍua tẸnaan aru nạnogho ghuḍum mẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Peedi ịkpete kua, “Ẹhe! Obo apu ezōor, nọgho ghạ zezōor mạbred bhobho.”
ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Ạami pạbred aghuḍum obho. Kōoy kōoy olo aru tạmi, ọkoony osibh mu; obo bho amōruōm ạami obho, ạmuum ịral mu zodi.
“Esiibha, ạami nạagba ạnogho enyina mobho enyina nẹemiin ạami keḍio enyina imōruōm io.
Kōoy kōoy olo Ọde ạmi ạnogho ạami tatu ni tạmi. Ạar olo taḍighi ạami apirighan mōoy olo aru tạmi olo nolo.
Tebum obho ạami naasōor uru mi tẸnaan moḍighi ibha odi obo bho arōm ạami obho ạto bho, ịto ilꞌạmi ḍio.
Iibha pibha odi obo bho arōm ạami obho nạva molo ạami kaḍighi: molo ạami upiẹmi ḍio bọbon onyiin obo bho odi nạanogho ạami obho, nꞌolo ạami taḅẹriōn ni zeedi mi taghuḍum mi tikunughi aḍuma bho.
Ọde ạmi nạva miibha: molo kōoy kōoy olo ạmiin mỌony obho amōruōm odi taḍum aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo; keḍio ạami taḅẹriōn zeedi taghuḍum mi tikunughi aḍuma bho.”
Parōoy aJu obho ịke mọghunughun mebum obho odi aghōl kua, “Ạami pạbred obho ạḍua tẸnaan aru obho.”
Peedi ịkpete kua, “Oōy obhobho ạJizos ọony taJosef odi ḍio bẹle? Ezira noolōghōm mọde nꞌoniin odi. Eeghe aḍighi kodi nakōl modi ạḍua tẸnaan karu?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana, “Ímina ghạ mẹrol ẹghunughun kua nꞌasilōor enyina.
Bọbon ōoy olo tatu tạmi olo, tughuneen nꞌolo Ọde bho arōm ạami aru obho ạnyagh zodi aru tạmi ḍio; keḍio ạami taḅẹtōn zodi mi taghuḍum mi tikunughi aḍuma bho.
Arizil obho ịge kua, ‘Ẹnaan tạtughumiom moomo arōoy obho.’ Kōoy kōoy olo ạtuugha mi tỌde bho, ạmoghonyan zodi, poru tạmi.
Iibha bho ịgba ḍio kua eghōl kir ōoy olo nạamiin ghạ mỌde bho; odi obo bho ạḍua tẸnaan karu obho, odi be mobo nạamiin ghạ mẸnaan.
“Ạami nạgba magey obho ạnogho zenyina: odi obo bho amōruōm obho taḍum aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.
Ạami pạbred aghuḍum obho.
Ạburude enyina ile mạbred bho mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum obho, pịbhozu.
Keḍio ạbred obho ạḍua bọ tẸnaan aru obho, ōoy olo ale ọbho mu.

Ạami pạbred aghuḍum obho ạḍua tẸnaan aru obho. Oōy olo ale zodi ạbred obhobho taḍum aghuḍum olo kamen kamen. Ạbred obho ạami tạnogho zodi obho, iikpōogh alōor ạmi, obho ạami ụnogho molo ẹmar-arōoy obho eḍum.”
Iibha bho iḍighi molo iloghi arōoy aJu obho iḅẹebh ịrol ịghanan ipuruan kua. “Odi ōoy obhobho taḍighi ẹko kạnogho zezira miikpōogh odi mọḅa?”

ẠJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami nạgba magey obho nạnogho zenyina: eru kạar olo enyina ịḅa ḍio miikpōogh Ọony Oōy obho, egu mịḅaal odi, enyina irue ḍio ẹteeny maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo mi talōor enyina.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạḅa miikpōogh obhꞌạmi, amina agu mịḅaal obhꞌạmi nạateeny aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo, keḍio ạami taḅẹtōn zodi mi tọbho bho mi taḍuma ikunughi obho.
Iikpōogh ạmi ạkar agey iiḅi eḍian, ịḅaal ạmi ạkar agey ạmuum alideny.
Obo ạḅa miikpōogh obhꞌạmi, agu mịḅaal obhꞌạmi, natugh tạmi, ạami natugh nạ todi.
Ọde bho aḍum ni ạman obho arōm ạami aru, molo tebum odi keḍio ạami naḍum nạ. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, kōoy kōoy olo ạḅa miikpōogh ạmi taḍum ni mebum ạmi.
Odi oobho bho bẹleni, pạkar ạbred obho ạḍua tẸnaan aru obho; olo kạbred obho ạburude enyina ile, ịbhozu obho. Obo bho ale mạbred obhobho bho taḍum ni kamen kamen.”
ẠJizos ạḍeghe miibha mamen olo odi ạtughumiom totu ịtughumiom mi tạKapaniom.
Ọlogh obo bho nẹtuonom zodi obho ịmoghon miibha bho pighōl kua, “Hụu! Ẹzo ịtughumiom bhibha ịghua. Okōr ōoy tatue ạtol ạmoghon miibha bho?”
Ụgba ḍio ọnogho zodi, keḍio odi ạJizos naalōghōm mobho obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho nẹghunughun miibha bho; podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Iibha bho be neeḍighi molo enyina nẹva mọḍua?
Eeghe temute, erumolo enyina ịmiin mỌony Oōy obho namula ạki tesi obho odi ạḍua aru obho?
Ẹmugh tẸnaan pobho nạnogho maghuḍum obho; iikpōogh alōor ōoy ạar oḍighiom olo nolo. Ọnuekpete obho ạami nạakpete ạnogho zenyina obho, Ẹmugh nꞌaghuḍum.
Oomo ipa ẹkona, ẹde enyina imōruōm io.” (ẠJizos naalōghōm kọḅel egbiom obho mobo bho imōruōm io bho, nꞌodi obo bho taḅool odi obho.)
Podi amina ạkpete kua ạḅaram, “Iibha pạar obho ạami ụkpete ụnogho zenyina ughōl bọbon ōoy olo tatu tạmi olo tughuneen nꞌolo Ọde bho aḍighi molo kẹrol kua ḍio.”
Tebum iibha, pọlogh obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho iḍionom zodi mạman, imina ḍio eru ẹtuonom zodi.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho maḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obhꞌodi, “Enyina kẹko, enyina tẹḍua nạ ni?”
Keḍio ạSaimon Pita ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Obumọogh, ezōor tọki tokōr ōoy? Ạna pobo ụteeny mọnuekpete bho nẹnogho maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo bho.
Keḍio esiibha bho ezōor noomōruōm mobho ạna uru zodi Oōy obho ịkarabh ilo bho, obho ạḍua tẸnaan aru obho.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Ạami obo bho ạson bọ maḍiōbh nꞌịzal obho enyina bho ḍio gạ? Keḍio onyiin enyina ọboghoma!”
Odi nạgba milo igboloman nꞌaJudas ọony tạSaimon Ịskariot. AJudas, toomo ibha odi aru monyiin aḍiōbh nꞌịzal obho, obo taḅool mạJizos.
Iibha iru itẹn pạJizos akin akiton moomo aGalili; odi ọva ḍio mọghi orele mi taJudia, tebum obho ạruula arōoy aJu obho nẹva moghigh odi obho.
Ẹzaal ọotua arutu ạgalaga arukpe arōoy aJu obho naatuan,
paburumōr tạJizos iru ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Ḍụa suo mamina mạghi taJudia, molo obo bho nẹtuonom ạna bho ẹmiin ạni moḍighi obho ạna naḍighi obho.
Oōy olo nạva molo arōoy kelōghōm zodi ọḅoki ghạ ḍio moḍighi obho odi naḍighi obho. Ẹzo bho ạna naḍighi mọkpo bhibha bho, ḍighi oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho elōghōm ạna!”
(Ạkar aburumōr obhꞌodi ẹkona imōruōm io zodi.)
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Amen olo ạami kạghi dọteeny io. Oomo amen obho aazuan zenyina.
Ẹmar-arōoy obho irue ḍio ẹlogh enyina ḍien, keḍio eedi nẹlogh ạami ḍien, mebum obho ạami nạgba ạnogho zeedi mobho araabōom eedi ịneghe ḍio bho.
Enyina ịki tẹzaal obho. Ạami ụki ḍio. Ạkar amen ạmi dọteeny io.”
Odi ạkpete kua ạḅele, podi ạrol bịrim mi taGalili.
Suo aburumōr odi neetẹn ịghi tẹzaal obho, keḍio odi ạJizos atẹn ạghi ạni; odi omutiom io lōor odi togbo arōoy obho, odi ạghi tẹḅokia.
Ạruula aJu obho nẹva ghạ zodi mi tẹzaal obho, nepuruan ghạ kua, “Oḍighen odi?”
Obꞌọlogh arōoy obho neebhala ghạ mebum odi. Ẹtede arōoy nekōl ghạ kua, “Odi ooḅi ōoy.” Ẹtede imōruōm io kua, ịnon nekōl kua, “Odi naabiōghōm rōoy.”
Tebum ạruula arōoy aJu obho, ōoy olo ane mọkpete ạar omutiom olo.
Noole mẹzaal obho ọḍiemi ịzal abin keḍio ạJizos tạki totu iikpulughu obho ạtughumiom.
Ạruula aJu obho eemōogh magey, keḍio ịkpete kua, “Oōy obhobho aḍighi ẹko kalōghōm oomo iibha bho? Odi ọghi ghạ ḍio otu ịtughumiom obho?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ibha ạami nạtughumiom obho, ịtughumiom ạmi ḍio. Ịḍua tẸnaan obo bho arōm ạami obho keru.
Oōy olo nạva moḍighi ibha Ẹnaan nạva bho talōghōm ni meru kạar olo ịtughumiom obhꞌạmi ịḍua tẸnaan kiru nꞌeru kạar olo ọnuekpete bhꞌạmi iru milꞌịnyaam ạmi.
Oōy olo nạgba milꞌologhi odi, nạva mọghueni aḍien odi. Obo bho nạva bọ mọghueni aḍien obo bho arōm odi obho pobo nạgba magey, molo bọbon ịbam iben ilo todi.
AMozis ạnogho zenyina maraalōgh obho enyina neekō? Bọbon ōoy enyina olo naakō maraalōgh obho olo. Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹva moghigh ạmi?”
Keḍio obꞌọlogh arōoy obho ịbhagharana kua, “Eru odi tẹmu onuma! Okōr ōoy nạva moghigh onuma?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami uḍighi monyiin obꞌoḍighi, poomo enyina iimōogh.
Tebum obho aMozis ạkpete ạnogho enyina moḍunogh ạnwuny enyina bho (aMozis nạ ḍio, igbōgh ạburude enyina ibhira ẹke), enyina iḍun ghạ ni mọony maḍuma obhooghia bho.
Eru kạar olo noḍun ghạ ni mọony maḍuma obhooghia bho molo ookō araalōgh obho taMozis, ebum eeghe kenyina nẹle mibha ạami uukō mōoy uḍume taḍuma obhooghia bho?
Ímina ghạ meenon mi tozu alōor mesōbh rạakpe, iinon tagey eḍighiom ạar obho ku mesōbh.”
Pẹde arōoy obhꞌaJerusạlẹm ịkpete kua, “Oobho ōoy obho eedi nẹva moghigh obho ḍio gạ?
Iinon! Odi nạḍeghe togbo arōoy obho, keḍio bọbon ōoy olo natue mọgba odi ọpue taghisigh odi olo. Enyina nekōl ạruula bho dẹkar io elōghōm mobho odi aru maKraist obho gạ?
Amen aKraist obho tatu, bọbon ōoy olo talōghōm mesi odi ạḍua aru olo. Oomo ezira noolōghōm mesi ōoy obhobho ạḍua aru.”

Ẹzo bho ạJizos nạtughumiom totu iikpulughu obho podi ạkpete kua amulughu amutiom, “Enyina ẹkar elōghōm ạami, elōghōm nạ mesi ạami ụḍua uru? Ạami upin io tịnyaam ạmi aru. Odi obo bho arōm ạami uru obho iben ilo todi. Enyina ilōghōm io zodi.
Ạami naalōghōm zodi, ạami ụḍua todi karu, keḍio odi arōm nạ zạmi moru.”
Tipa peedi ịva moḅol odi, keḍio ōoy olo ane olo, tebum obho amen odi dọteeny io bho.
Ẹtede arōoy mi tobꞌọlogh arōoy obho emōruōm zodi, keḍio ịkpete kua, “Amen aKraist obho tatu, tatue ni aḍighi mobꞌoḍighi ilo tepu mibha ōoy obhobho naaḍighi obho bẹle?”
Arōoy aFarisi obho nẹemoghon mobho arōoy obho neebhala miibha bho zodi, peedi nꞌaruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho irōm rōoy iḅōrō bho mọghi oḅol ạJizos.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ạami tạtolan enyina mịbam amen be, pạami omula ọghi todi obo bho arōm ạami moru obho.
Enyina tẹva ni zạmi, keḍio enyina irue ḍio ẹmiin ạami. Esi obho ạami tạtol obho enyina irue ḍio ẹghi.”
Parōoy aJu obho ipuruan kua silōor eedi, “Odi tạki tebhugh aGris obho, tạraama bho arōoy aJu obho idi obho, ạtughumiom marōoy aGris obho gạ?
Odi nakōl kua, ‘Enyina tẹva zạmi keḍio enyina irue ḍio ẹmiin ạami,’ nꞌobho, ‘Enyina itue ḍio ẹghi tesi obho ạami tạtol obho.’ Odi ạḍeghe ẹko kua bho?”
Ikunughi aḍuma ẹzaal obho ạla mạar apu. Odi aḍuma popo pạJizos aḅetunu ạkpete kua amutiom nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō, “Kōoy kōoy olo ạmuum nẹtal aru tạmi ạbhoghol!
Kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho, ‘Oōy olo amōruōm ạami, ariizi ạmuum aghuḍum tegbōr ni emute tekpom odi.’ ”
(ẠJizos ạgba miibha bho mibha Ẹmugh Iigbia bho obho obo bho imōruōm odi obho tepin obho. Tamen opopo, Ẹnaan dọnogho ḍio rōoy mẸmugh Iigbia bho tebum obho doḅẹtōn io mạJizos ọnogho meghuan obho.)
Ịkanya arōoy mi tobꞌọlogh arōoy obho ịmoghon mibha odi nạkpete bho, pighōl kua, “Oōy obhobho ạkar agey ozil obho tẸnaan.”
Ẹtede nekōl kua, “Odi aKraist obho!” Keḍio imina ịnon ighōl kua, “AKraist obho orue ḍio ạḍua taGalili aru.
Ụge kua tẹegia bho, ‘AKraist obho tạḍua teghun otu taDevid atu, keḍio tọmar zodi mi tạBetilihem, tẹma bho aDevid arugh obho.’ ”
Ịkanan bhibha iḍighi molo arōoy obho ịḍianogh mebum odi.
Ẹtede ẹva moḅol odi, keḍio ōoy olo ane mokulaan odi olo.
Obo iḅōrō bho imula ịghi taruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho, peedi ipuruan kua zeedi, “Eeghe kenyina iḅol io zodi ebhin eru?”
Keḍio obo iḅōrō bho ịbhagharana kua, “Bọbon ōoy olo naarue ghạ mọḍeghe kibhꞌodi olo!”
Parōoy aFarisi obho ipuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina ẹkona, odi naabiōghōm nạ?
Enyina mẹemiin monyiin ọola, bolobolo onyiin olꞌaFarisi obho olo amōruōm zodi?
Ọlogh arōoy obho ilōghōm io maraalōgh obho taMozis, molo eedi neḅughan itōnyōgh tẸnaan!”
Suo keḍio aNikodimos, ōoy olꞌogbo bhꞌeedi olo nạaghi ghạ ạmiinan mạJizos, ạkpete kua,
“Tẹzo araalōgh ezira, ezira urue ḍio oghigh mōoy kogbi mọgba ịigbaay ọkpo ilo odi naaḍighi.”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua zodi, “Ẹhee! Ạna ẹkona olꞌaGalili nạ? Tụugha mibhꞌẹegia bho pạna olōghōm mobho ozil tẸnaan domute ghạ ḍio taGalili.”
Pu kōoy kōoy aghẹel.
[Pu kōoy kōoy aghẹel, ạJizos ạghi tobꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs.
Ạḅaal, obun ụḍirogh be, podi amula ạghi totu iikpulughu obho. Ọlogh arōoy iru ikō zodi, keḍio odi aru ạrol delede ạke mọtughumiom eedi.
Obꞌịtughumiom araalōgh obho nꞌaraFarisi obho ibhin mạni olo uḅolom bho nale mẹma iru ịmarami taghisigh oomo eedi.
Keḍio eedi ịkpete kua ịnogho mạJizos, “Oōy ịtughumiom, ạni obhobho uḅolom mobho naḍighi mịkarabh ole ẹma.
Taraalōgh obhꞌezira, aMozis ạkpete kua, mạni olo aḍighi kua mitōḅōl odi meghigh. Tonuma, koḍighi ẹko zodi?”
Eedi ipuruan kua zodi mọdegh odi, molo eedi ẹmiin mạar olo ọgbaam ọbhamam odi. PạJizos azuman ạseghe mạghunu ạvo odi nạge tade bho.
Ẹzo bho eedi ịmara ni nepuruan zodi miipuruan obho, podi aḅẹtōn ẹmu odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Onyiin enyina olo doḍighi ghạ ḍio mịkarabh abhira ạseghe mekpo arōbhōm zodi ạni obho!”
Keḍio odi amina azuman nạge tade bho.
Amen eedi ịmoghon miibha bho, poomo eedi iḍighi sōbh sōbh sōbh, ạseghe tarukenya bho, ōoy amen amen, ịḍuaghu. ẠJizos nꞌodi ạni obho beinaan isughō. Ạni obho ạmara taghisigh odi.
Keḍio odi aḅẹtōn ẹmu odi apuruan kua zodi, “Ạni obho, iḍighen eedi? Oōy olo asughō mọnogho onuma mapum olo?”
Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua, “Obumọogh, olo.” PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Pạami ẹkona ụnogho ḍio ạna mapum. Kẹel, keḍio umina ghạ maḍighi mịkarabh.”]
Keḍio ạJizos amina ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ạami ẹḅaal ẹmar-arōoy obho. Oōy olo ạtuonom ạami tạteeny ni mẹḅaal aghuḍum molo odi orele mu mi tọkinim.”
Parōoy aFarisi obho ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Ạna naatuma lōor onuma; ibha ạna nạgba bho irue ḍio eru magey obho.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Eenyi, ekua ḍio. Oomo ipa ẹkona, erumolo ạami naatuma lōor, ibha ạami nạḍeghe bho agey, ạami be mobo ulōghōm mesi ạami ụḍua uru nꞌesi ạami nạki. Enyina ilōghōm io.
Enyina ibhin ịitua arōoy nesōbh rạakpe; ạami usōbh io rạakpe ạnogho mōoy.
Keḍio erumolo ạami usōbh rạakpe, ibha ạami usōbh obho pagey obho. Ạami be ḍio mobho nasōbh; Ọde bho arōm ạami moru obho odi nꞌạami.
Nọoge taraalōgh enyina okōl kua, mịigbaay ịzal arōoy ilo iru monyiin, ịigbaay obhꞌeedi agey.
Ạami nạgba milꞌạmi, keḍio Ọde bho arōm ạami obho nạgba nạ milꞌạmi.”

Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Ọde onuma kodi teḍighen?” ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Enyina ilōghōm io ạami obho, enyina ilōghōm nạ ḍio mỌde ạmi. Erumolo enyina ilōghōm ạami bọ, kōl enyina neelōghōm nạ mỌde bhꞌạmi.”
ẠJizos ạkpete moomo abaabha bho mamen odi nạtughumiom mi totu iikpulughu obho, mi tẹkpe bho eḅina ookōbhōghiom ikpoki obho odi ghạ bho. Keḍio ōoy olo ane mọbham odi olo, suo amen odi dọteeny io bho.
Keḍio ạJizos amina ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami tạḍua ni. Enyina tẹva ni zạmi, keḍio enyina tẹpo ni mi tịkarabh enyina. Enyina irue ḍio ẹghi tesi obho ạami nạki obho.”
Parōoy aJu obho ịkpete kua, “Odi aghōl kua, ‘Enyina irue ḍio ẹghi tesi obho ạami nạki obho.’ Iibha kodi nạkpete ẹko? Odi tạpo nꞌalōor odi bẹle?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Enyina ịḍua tesuo ade bho keru, ạami ụḍua tạnyu obho karu. Enyina ilꞌesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho, ạami olꞌẹmar-arōoy obho ḍio.
Pạar obho ạami ughōl bọ enyina tẹpuom tịkarabh enyina bho. Enyina tẹpo ni tịkarabh enyina erumolo enyina imōruōm io ạami, moru odi ōoy obho ạami nạgba mobho ạami uru zodi obho.”
Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Ạna kokōr ōoy?” Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ibha ạami ụgba ụnogho zenyina kọḅel egbiom obho.
Ọlogh ọkpo mibha ạami ụteeny mọḍeghe nꞌosōbh ạraakpe ọnogho enyina. Odi obo bho arōm ạami obho, iben ilo todi, keḍio ạami nạgba ạnogho mẹmar-arōoy obho mibha ạami ụmoghon todi obho be.”
Eedi ịmoghonyan io mibha odi nạḍeghe mibhꞌỌde bho nạnogho zeedi bho.

Keḍio ạJizos tạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Amen olo enyina neebhaghami mỌony Oōy obho penyina olōghōm mobho ‘Ạami uru zodi’; penyina olōghōm mobho ạami uḍighi ḍio mạar olꞌạmi, molo ạami nạgba ghạ mọkpo bho Ọde bho ạtughumiom ạami obho be.
Odi obo bho arōm ạami obho, odi nꞌạami; odi ọḅele ḍio zạmi be, tebum obho ạami naḍighi ghạ mọkpo ilo iḍigh tologhi odi obho.”
Ịkanya obo bho ịmoghon mibha ạJizos ạkpete bho emōruōm zodi.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho marōoy aJu obho imōruōm odi obho, “Erumolo enyina ịtuugh iḍighi mibha ạami nạtughumiom obho, penyina ạkar arōoy ilo nẹtuonuman ạami;
penyina olōghōm agey obho, keḍio agey obho taḍighi zenyina emuzaan tạrubana bho enyina idi obho.”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ezōor ạnwuny eghun otu tEbrạhạm, keḍio oomo ụrol kua, ezōor doru ghạ ḍio rụbana ōoy. Iibha kạna nạkpete ẹko moghōl ekua, ‘Enyina temuzaan ni tạrubana bho enyina idi obho’?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami nạgba magey obho ạnogho zenyina: kōoy kōoy olo naḍighi mịkarabh pẹbana oḍighi ịkarabh.
Ẹbana olꞌeghun otu obho moomo amen io, ọony obho olꞌeghun otu obho kamen kamen.
Eru kạar olo Ọony obho taḍighi ni enyina emuzaan, enyina tẹkar ni emuzaan magey.
Ạami naalōghōm mobho enyina iru mạnwuny eghun otu tEbrạhạm, keḍio enyina nẹva ni moghigh ạmi, mebum obho enyina imōruōm io mịtughumiom ạmi obho.
Ạami nạgba mibha Ọde ạmi aḍeeriom ạami obho, keḍio enyina neḍighi mibha ọde enyina ạkpete ạnogho enyina bho.”
Keḍio eedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ebrạhạm pọde ezōor.” PạJizos amulumian kua, “Eru kạar olo enyina ịkar iru mạnwuny tEbrạhạm, enyina kiḍighi ni monyiin odi oḍighi obho odi aḍighi obho.
Oomo ạar olo ạami naaḍighi suo pọgba ọnogho enyina magey obho ạami ụmoghon tọnu tẸnaan obho. Keḍio enyina nẹva ni moghigh ạmi. Ạar olo ạrol kẹzo bho olo Ebrạhạm aḍighi olo!
Enyina neḍighi mọkpo bho ọde enyina aḍighi obho.” Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ọnon ọde olo ezōor ụteeny olo, tughuneen Ẹnaan be ḍio. Ezōor ạkar agey ạnwuny odi.”

Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Eru kạar olo Ẹnaan ạkar aru mọde enyina, enyina kitulan ni zạmi, tebum obho ạami ụḍua tẸnaan uru obho, keḍio esiibha ạami odi suo. Ạami upin io tịnyaam ạmi be aru, odi karōm ạami moru.
Kebum eeghe kenyina irue ḍio mọmoghonyan ibha ạami nạgba bho? Ebum obho enyina ideny io ẹmoghonyan ịtughumiom adōm obhꞌạmi obho.

Enyina ạnwuny ọde enyina, Eru obho, molo enyina negbẹel mọtuonom ibha ọde bhꞌenyina nạva bho. Kạkar ọḅel egbiom obho, odi ọokoma. Odi dọtuonom ghạ ḍio magey obho, tebum obho agey obho ilo todi obho. Amen odi ạgba miben, odi naḍighi moḍighi iikpōogh alōor obho be, tebum obho odi aru mọgba miben, nꞌọde oomo ịgba miben obho.
Ạami ụgba magey obho, pạar obho enyina imōruōm io ạami obho.
Okōr ōoy tenyina tatue ạgba amutiom mobho neebhum ạami mebum ịkarabh ilo ạami uḍighi? Erumolo ạami nạgba magey obho, eeghe kenyina imōruōm io ạami?
Obo bho ạḍua tẸnaan aru obho nạmoghon nạ mọnuekpete tẸnaan. Ạkar enyina ịḍua ḍio tẸnaan keru, pạar obho enyina ịmoghon io bho.”
Parōoy aJu obho imulumian kua zodi, “Ezōor ụgba ḍio magey oghōl ạna olꞌaSameria olo eru odi tẹmu onuma?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Eru olo tẹmu ạmi, ạami naabhughumi mỌde ạmi, enyina neenon ạami nekiemi.
Ạami ụva ḍio moobhughumia alōor. Kir onyiin olo naabhughumeni ạami olo nạgba ạnogho ạami makẹel.
Ạami nạgba magey obho ạnogho enyina: kōoy kōoy olo ạtuugh aḍighi mibhꞌadōm obhꞌạmi ọbho mu.”

Parōoy aJu obho ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Esiibha ezōor nọokar olōghōm mobho aḍuugh odi tẹmu onuma! Ebrạhạm sịnaabho, arizil obho nẹebhozu nạ, keḍio ạna nạgba ni mu, ‘Kōoy kōoy olo ạtuugh aḍighi mibhꞌadōm obhꞌạmi ọbho mu.’
Ạna ụbugh apu mEbrạhạm ọde ezōor obho ạbho bho? Arizil obho ẹkona nẹebhozu. Ạna kokōr ōoy?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Erumolo ạami ku taabhughumia lōor, ạlibugh obhꞌạmi ạar io. Ọde ạmi pobo naabhughumi zạmi — ạkar odi obho enyina ighōl mẸnaan enyina bho.
Enyina delōghōm io zodi; ạami naalōghōm zodi. Erumolo ạami ughōl ạami ulōghōm io zodi bọ, kōl ạami ọgba miben kenyina. Ạami naalōghōm zodi, nakiilaan nạ moghōrōkō odi.
Ọde enyina Ebrạhạm abo magey mọmiin aḍuma ạmi; odi ạmiin pologhi odi ạḅaal.”
Parōoy aJu obho ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Ạsumusia onuma degbẹbh io merubal ḍiōbh ạsia — keḍio ạna nạamiin mEbrạhạm?”
Keḍio ạJizos amulumian kua, “Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho zenyina: keḍio ụmar mEbrạhạm, ‘Ạami odi’.”
Peedi iikpooy mikpo morōḅōl odi; keḍio ạJizos ạḅokia ạḍua totu iikpulughu obho.
Ẹzo bho ạJizos arele nạki obho podi ạmiin mōoy olo ụmaram ikpom ariḍien.
Pobo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ipuruan kua zodi, “Obo ịtughumiom, okōr ōoy obo bho aḍighi bọ mịkarabh obho kọmaram mōoy obhobho mikpom ariḍien obho? Ebum ịkarabh odi bẹlee kilo tọde nꞌoniin odi?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ikpom ariḍien ōoy obhobho, ịkarabh odi bolobolo ibha tọde nꞌoniin odi iḍighi ḍio. Odi ikpom ariḍien molo ọmiin ịnyaam oḍighi tẸnaan mi todi.
Ezira tọtol ni oḍighi moḍighi odi obo bho arōm ạami obho, suo aḍio doghul io obho. Uḍugul natu, amen olo ōoy otue mu aḍighi moḍighi.
Suo ạami odi tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho, ạami pẹḅaal ẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Odi ạkpete kua ạḅele, podi ạsir mịghor tade bho agbuom mọomi asigh tariḍien ōoy obho,
keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kịa teghō bho ughōl bọ Sailoam obho maatōla ghisigh onuma.” (Ẹmu aSailoam pughōl “Ụfirima ni”.) Pōoy obho ạghi aatōla aru nạmiin.
Obo okōol odi, nꞌarōoy obho nẹemiin ghạ mobho odi nagbẹel miigbẹel obho, pịrol ipuruan, “Oobho ōoy obho ạrol ghạ delede agbẹel ghạ miigbẹel obho ḍio gạ?”
Ẹtede meeghōl maa, “Odi,” ịnon ighōl maa, “Odi ḍio, ạgbaanan zodi be.” Podi ōoy obho nịvo nịvo ạgba kua, “Ạami odi.”
Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua zodi, “Uḍighi ẹko kariḍien onuma ẹkparanu?”
Podi ạgba kua, “Oōy obho ughōl bọ ạJizos obho akpo mọomi tade bho asigh tariḍien ạmi, keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, ‘Kịa taSailoam maatōla ghisigh onuma.’ Pạami ụghi, uutōla be pạami nạmiin.”
Keḍio eedi ipuruan zodi ighōl kua, “Oḍighen odi?” Odi ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami ulōghōm io.”
Peedi ibhin mōoy obho ụmaram ikpom ariḍien obho ịghiom marōoy aFarisi obho.
Aḍuma bho ạJizos agbu mọomi ạkparion riḍien ōoy obho, paḍuma obhooghia.
Parōoy aFarisi obho imina ipuruan zodi mẹzo uḍighi kodi nạmiin mạar siibha bho. Keḍio odi ạgba ạnogho zeedi, “Odi asigh tariḍien ạmi, pạami uru uutōla ghisigh ạmi, molo ạami nạmiin siibha bho.”

Ẹde arōoy aFarisi obho ẹkpete kua, “Oōy olo naḍighi mọkpo ilo idi kua orue ḍio ạḍua tẸnaan karu, ebum obho odi ookō ḍio maraalōgh aḍuma obhooghia bho.” Pẹde ịkpete kua, “Oōy olo aru moḍighi mịkarabh tatue ni aḍighi mibꞌariḍighi ilo ileeny kua?” Peedi iru ịḍianogh.
Peedi arōoy aFarisi obho imina ipuruan magey zodi ōoy obho, “Ạna nakōl odi ạkar ạkparion riḍien obhꞌonuma kạna nạatua odi kokōr ōoy?” Podi ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Odi ozil tẸnaan.”
Pạruula aJu obho irue ḍio momōruōm oghōl odi ōoy obho nạarol ghạ mikpom ariḍien molo nạmiin siibha ninii ịteeny men obho eedi neebheleghi mọde nꞌoniin ōoy obho iru,
keḍio eedi ipuruan kua zeedi, “Oobho ọony enyina? Enyina ighōl ụmaram odi mikpom ariḍien, kuḍighi ẹko kodi nạmiin siibha bho?”
Keḍio ọde nꞌoniin obho ịbhagharana kua, “Oomo ạar obho ezōor ulōghōm, odi ọony ezōor, ụmaram odi mikpom ariḍien.
Ezōor ulōghōm io mạar olo aḍighi siibha kodi nạmiin mạar. Ezōor ulōghōm io nạ mobo ạkparion riḍien odi. Ipuruan odi, odi naagbẹbh mōoy, odi tatue ni ạpagharana nꞌalōor odi!”
Ọde nꞌoniin obhꞌodi ịbhagharana kua tebum obho eedi neekiil mạruula aJu obho, eedi nẹelogh molōgh molo kōoy kōoy olo ạgba mesi mạJizos aKraist obho, potughuneen odi tọlogh arōoy otu ịtughumiom obho.
Pạar obho ọde nꞌoniin odi ighōl maa, “Odi naagbẹbh mōoy, ipuruan zodi.”
Keḍio eedi imina ibheleghi mogbẹbhiōm ịzal amen mōoy obho ụmaram ikpom ariḍien obho ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Nonon tạnyu mạgba magey obho. Ezōor noolōghōm mobho ōoy obhobho aru moḍighi mịkarabh.”

Pōoy obho amulumian kua, “Ạami ulōghōm io merumolo odi aru moḍighi mịkarabh, nꞌerumolo odi otu ḍio moḍighi mịkarabh. Onyiin ạar be bho ạami ulōghōm: ạami ụrol mikpom ariḍien, keḍio esiibha bho ạami nạmiin.”
Eedi ipuruan zodi, “Odi aḍighi ẹko zịna? Odi ạkparion ẹko riḍien onuma?”
Odi ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami nạagba ạnogho zenyina, keḍio enyina imōruōm io. Ebum eeghe kenyina digha epuruan zạmi? Enyina nẹva nạ motẹn obo nẹtuonuman zodi gạ?”
Peedi ịkpete zodi ịpue ighōl kua, “Fịa, ạna obo nạtuonuman mōoy opopo. Ezōor nọtuonuman maMozis.
Ezōor noolōghōm mobho Ẹnaan kạkpete ạnogho maMozis. Oōy opopo, tạa, ezōor ulōghōm nạ ḍio mesi odi ạḍua aru!”
Podi ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Ẹhe, iibha pọkpo ilo enyina nẹkpeteey! Enyina ilōghōm io mesi odi ạḍua aru, keḍio odi ạkparion riḍien ạmi!
Ezira noolōghōm mobho Ẹnaan ọmoghon ghạ ḍio moghōrōkō oḍighi mịkarabh. Odi nạmoghon ghạ moghōrōkō arōoy ilo nekiilaan odi, neḍighi nạ mibha odi nạva zeedi moḍighi obho.
Oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho amute, dọmoghon io mōoy molo ạkparion riḍien ōoy olo ụmaram ikpom ariḍien.
Tughuneen molo odi ōoy opopo ạḍua tẸnaan aru ḍio, odi orue ḍio aḍighi bọbon ạar.”
Peedi imulumian kua zodi, “Ụmar ạna, uukō ạna mi tịkarabh — keḍio ạna ku natu mọtughumiom ezōor?” Peedi itughuneen zodi tọlogh arōoy ịtughumiom obho.
ẠJizos nạamoghon mobho eedi neetughuneen zodi. Odi ạmiin zodi, pạkpete kua, “Ạna amōruōm mỌony Oōy obho gạ?”
Keḍio odi ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Obo upu ạami, odi kokōr ōoy? Gbạ mạnogho zạmi molo ạami amōruōm ạni zodi!”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ạna nạamiin zodi atẹnẹ, odi pobo bho nꞌạna nọḍeghe obho.”
Podi ōoy obho agbuluman taghisigh tạJizos aghōl kua, “Ạami naamōruōm, Obumọogh.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạami uru tẹmar-arōoy obho mọru ịiruan, molo arōoy ikpom ariḍien ẹmiin mạar, obo bho nẹmiin obho etu mikpom ariḍien.”
Ẹde arōoy aFarisi obho ịrol ạni obho, ịmoghon mibha odi ạkpete bho, pipuruan kua zodi, “Ariḍien obho tezōor ẹko ikpom?”
Keḍio ạJizos tạpagharana kua, “Ariḍien enyina ịkparanu ni bọ, kukōl enyina kilōghōma ḍio mịkarabh enyina: suo enyina meghōl menyina nẹmiin mạar obho, ịkarabh obhꞌenyina idi nꞌenyina.”
“Agey nạ ni, ōoy olo ọḅol io tọnu-otu obho aḍigh totu ạraana bho, obho apẹl tọnon esi aḍigh, pạghi momiigh, odi ọḅa.
Obo bho ạḅol bọ tọnu-otu obho kaḍigh obho, pookō rạana bho.
Oḅōrō meguugh obho aghuuron ạnogho zodi. Odi abheleghi mạkar ạraana obhꞌodi, pịmoghonyan oghōrōkō odi, nẹtuonuman zodi nemute.
Odi naamutiom zeedi, odi tatẹnom taghisigh, keḍio ạraana bho tẹtuonuman zodi, tibha eedi neelōghōm moghōrōkō odi obho.
Eedi ịtuonuman io mọnon ōoy. Kpẹlen nꞌọtuonuman, eedi tekiil ni ẹḍua mi todi, tẹzo bho eedi ilōghōm io moghōrōkō odi obho.”
ẠJizos adōgh sidōgh obhobho ạnogho zeedi, keḍio eedi irue ḍio mọmoghonyan odi.
PạJizos amina ạkpete kua, “Agey nạ ni, ạami ọnu-otu ạraana bho.
Oomo obo bho ibhira iru ạami obho, iru momiigh, eedi ạruḅa. Ạraana bho ẹkona ịmoghonyan io zeedi.
Ạami eguugh obho. Kōoy kōoy olo ạḍua tạmi kaḍigh taḍum ni.
Ọḅa bho aru momiigh, nꞌọpueghi, nꞌọze be. Ạami uru molo eedi kẹteeny ghuḍum, aghuḍum olo agbẹbh ni ạman.
“Ạami obꞌooḅi ookō rạana bho. Obꞌooḅi ookō rạana bho nạamara moomo amen mọbhuanaan ạraana bho.

Oōy obho nọkpe ni obho, odi oru ḍio mookō rạana bho nꞌạraana bho itu ḍio nạ milꞌodi obho nạ, amen ọkurunuma natu, podi ọḅele ạraana bho oghiil ọḍua, molo ọkurunuma bho kabhumogh mạraana bho kạazarami.
Oōy obho nọkpe ni obho takiil ni ạḍua mebum obho nọkpe ni zodi beinaan obho, odi oonon io mạraana bho.
Ạami obꞌooḅi ookō rạana bho. Ẹzo bho Ọde ạmi alōghōm ạami keḍio ạami ulōghōm nạ mỌde bho, pẹzo ạami ulōghōm ạraana bhꞌạmi, eedi ilōghōm nạ zạmi. Ạami nạamara nạ mọbhuanaan eedi.
Ạami ạteeny ịnon ạraana ilo ilo ạni tesuo otu ạraana bho. Ạami tapin nạ ni zeedi atu, eedi tẹmoghonyan ni moghōrōkō ạmi, molo oomo eedi etu monyiin ọlogh ạraana ilꞌonyiin ookō rạana.
“Ọde bho atulan ạami kua mebum obho ạami nạamara mosarana aghuḍum ạmi obho, molo ạami kamina kabhin.
Oōy olo tạseghe maghuḍum ạmi mi tạvo ạmi olo. Ạami ụutua tologhi ạmi ạnogho kua be mịkpo. Ạami ạteeny ni mịnyaam nꞌẹmoogh olo ọnogho nꞌolo omina ọseghe. Iibha pibha Ọde ạmi ạto ạnogho zạmi moḍighi.”
Tiibha bho ẹkona arōoy aJu imina ni ẹḍian mebum ọnuekpete bhibha.
Ọlogh eedi nẹkpete kua, “Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹmoghonyan odi? Odi nạateeny mọkarabh ẹmugh. Odi nạtaal.”
Ipedi obho nẹkpete kua, “Oōy olo ạteeny mọkarabh ẹmugh ọkpete ḍio miibha. Ọkarabh ẹmugh nạakparion ghạ mikpom ariḍien ōoy?”
Amen ẹzaal oḍighi alōor ọneghemi aru ạteeny taJerusạlẹm. Amen opopo ọnuur.
ẠJizos odi totu iikpulughu obho natele tạpe ẹtolom tạSolomon,
parōoy aJu obho iikōbhōghian ikō zodi ikiton ịkpete kua, “Okōr amen kạna ạkar ạgba magey obho ạnogho zezōor? Kạr ạgba magey obho. Ạna podi aKraist obho bẹlee?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami nạagba ghạ ạnogho zenyina, keḍio enyina imōruōm io zạmi. Ariḍighi obho ạami ubhinom ịnyaam tỌde ạmi uḍighi obho nẹgba ạami emutiom,
keḍio enyina imōruōm io tebum obho enyina itu ḍio mạraana ạmi obho.
Ạraana obhꞌạmi nẹmoghonyan moghōrōkō ạmi. Ạami naalōghōm zeedi, keḍio eedi nẹtuonuman zạmi.
Ạami nạanogho zeedi maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo, eedi ịbho mu; keḍio ōoy olo tatue aḅum zeedi ạḅirogh tạravo ạmi olo.
Ibha Ọde ạmi ạnogho ạami obho ipu moomo eedi, keḍio bọbon ōoy olo tatue ni aḅum zeedi ạḅirogh mi talaakō bhꞌỌde bho olo.
Ọde bho nꞌạami onyiin.”
Parōoy aJu obho imina iikpo mikpo morōḅōl odi.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami naaḍighi mịkanya oḍighi iiḅi olo Ọde bho ạnogho ạami moḍighi tasumusigh enyina. Tiibha bho koḍighen mobho enyina ịtuan netu morōḅōl ạmi?”

Parōoy aJu obho imulumian kua zodi, “Ezōor ụva ḍio morōḅōl onuma tebum oḍighi iiḅi olo ạna uḍighi, ezōor totōḅōl ạna tebum obho ạna ụupu mẸnaan. Ạna ōoy, keḍio ạna nạaseghe lōor onuma nạgbaaneni mẸnaan!”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Nọokar ọge taraalōgh obhꞌenyina mẸnaan aghōl kua, ‘Enyina Ẹnaan.’
Ezōor moolōghōm mobho ibha ẹegia bho ạkpete bho iru magey kamen kamen, keḍio Ẹnaan abheleghi zeedi meedi Ẹnaan, arōoy obho odi ạnogho dōm obho.
Ạami, Ọde bho kạson ạseghe, keḍio arōm ạami aru tẹmar-arōoy obho. Siibha bho kimute ẹko kenyina nekōl mạami nạapu mẸnaan, mebum obho ạami ughōl ạami Ọony tẸnaan?
Ímōruōm ghạ zạmi, erumolo ạami uḍighi ḍio moḍighi tỌde bhꞌạmi.

Kerumolo ạami naḍighi moḍighi obhꞌodi, enyina imōruōm io ạami ẹkona, enyina kimōruōm ni moḍighi obho ạami naḍighi obho, penyina nạ kịkar elōghōm monyiin amen mobho Ọde ạmi odi nꞌạami, ạami odi nꞌỌde ạmi.”
Peedi imina iru moḅol odi. Odi amuzaan ni ạḍua tạravo eedi.
Keḍio ạJizos amula ạghi ạḅeeny mọbhiiny obhꞌạJodan mi tesi obho ạJon azuoghom ghạ rụmuum rōoy obho, keḍio odi ạrol epa.
Ọlogh arōoy iru todi. Eedi nẹekpete kua, “ẠJon oḍighi ḍio moḍighi ibꞌaruugu, keḍio oomo ọkpo bho odi ạgba milꞌōoy obhobho agey.”
Pịkanya arōoy mi todi esi obho imōruōm zodi.
Oōy olo ughōl Lạzaros, olꞌạBetani, nạnwe, alōor ọneghe ḍio. ẠBetani pẹma taMeri nꞌạMata ụmarani odi.
AMeri obhobho pobo bho azuom asike Obạmọogh obho melo, keḍio ạseghe mạsilaan ẹmu odi agbulom. ẠLazaros umōr odi, obo bho alōor naḍighi obho.
Ạburumarani obho irōm dōm ịghiom mạJizos, “Obumọogh, alōor naḍighi mọbulol onuma.”
Amen ạJizos ạmoghon, paghōl kua, “Ẹzegh bhibha tạLazaros, ilo odi kạbho ḍio, ilo ọnogho eghuan mẸnaan, molo Ọony obho tẸnaan tapin nạ meghuan.”
ẠJizos atulan mạMata nꞌụmarani odi, nꞌạLazaros.
Amen odi ạmoghon dōm obho malōor tạLazaros ọneghe ḍio, podi ạrol mịnon ịzal aḍuma mi tesi obho odi odi obho.
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mobo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho, “Itu ọghi taJudia.”
Eedi neeghōl kua, “Obo ịtughumiom, ạna digha atu mọghi taJudia, arōoy aJu obho siru morōḅōl onuma men obho ạna ụrol epa bho?”
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Aḍiōbh nꞌịzal asuo ḍio mibha idi tẹmu aḍuma? Molo erumolo ōoy arele mi togbo ootaany odi okpetaan io, tebum obho odi nạmiinom mẹḅaal ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Kerumolo odi arele tọkinim podi okpetaan, tebum obho ẹḅaal olo todi obho.”
ẠJizos ạkpete miibha bho, pamina ạḅaram kua, “ẠLazaros ọbulol ezira naameel nakoḍi. Ạami tạki ni ạsumeen zodi.”
Pobo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịbhagharana kua, “Erumolo odi nakoḍi, Obumọogh, sodi taḍum ni.”
ẠJizos ni dụgh pi nạgba mibha ạLazaros nạabho. Eedi ighōdi odi nakōl moobho ạrala.
Keḍio ạJizos tạgba amutiom ạnogho zeedi, “ẠLazaros nạabho.
Tebum enyina ologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey mobho ạami ụtolan io zodi, ilo enyina kemōruōm. Idia ọghi todi.”
ẠTomos (obho ughōl bọ Ụmar Ịzal obho) ạkpete kua ạnogho mipedi iteledōm obho, “Itu oomo ezira ọtuonuman mōoy ịtughumiom obho ọghi, molo erumolo iizuan ezira ọpuom ạni nꞌodi.”
Amen ạJizos ạghi asi tạBetani, podi ạmoghon mạLazaros nạabho oḍi inya aḍuma etẹn.
ẠBetani ogbeeny io mọḍua taJerusạlẹm ọghi,
molo ọlogh arōoy aJu obho meeru mọkunu ọnogho ạMata nꞌaMeri obho umōr eedi ạbho bho.
Amen ạMata ạmoghon mạJizos natu, podi aghiil ạghi mọmiinan odi. AMeri ạrol totu.
Keḍio ạMata ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Obumọogh, ạna ụrol suo bọ, umōr obhꞌạmi kụpo ḍio!
Keḍio oomo ipa ẹkona, ạami naalōghōm mobho kạar kạar olo ạna ugbẹel mẸnaan, odi tạnogho ni zịna.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạgba ạnogho zodi, “Umōr onuma tamula ni aḅetunu taghuḍum.”
Podi amulumian kua, “Ạami naalōghōm mobho odi taḅetunu ni ạteeny ghuḍum mi tikunughi aḍuma bho.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạami pọbho-oḅetunu obho nꞌaghuḍum obho. Kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm ạami, odi ạbho nạ ni ẹkona, taḍum ni.
Obo bho odi ni taghuḍum obho kamōruōm ạami, odi ọbho mu. Ạna amōruōm miibha bho gạ?”
Podi ạbhagharana kua, “Ii, Obumọogh. Ạami naamōruōm mobho ạna uru maKraist Ọony tẸnaan obho, obho tatu bọ mi tẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Odi ạMata ạkpete kua ạḅele, podi ạghi ạgba kua ạnogho maMeri ụmarani odi, “Obo ịtughumiom obho naaru, napuruan zịna.”
Amen aMeri ạmoghon kua podi akẹm aghiil ạghi mọmiinan odi.
(Odi ạJizos dosi ḍio tẹma bho, odi nini tesi obho ạMata aru ạmiinan zodi obho.)
Arōoy aJu obho iru bọ mipeleghian obho idi bọ nꞌaMeri obho ighiil nẹtuonuman men eedi ịmiin mobho odi aghiil namute bho. Eedi ighōdi odi digha ạki toogu obho moleghe.
Amen aMeri aru asi tạJizos, pagbuluman tasike odi, ạkpete kua, “Obumọogh, ạna ụrol suo bọ, umōr obhꞌạmi kụpo ḍio!”
ẠJizos ạmiin mẹzo bho odi naleghe obho, nꞌarōoy aJu obho ịtuonuman odi iru obho neleghe nạ obho, pikul mologhi odi molo ạghusan isibh odi magey.
Keḍio odi apuruan kua, “Enyina iḍi zodi teḍighen?” Eedi ịbhagharana kua, “Tue mạmiin, Obumọogh.”
PạJizos aleghe.
Parōoy aJu obho ịkpete kua, “Ịmiin ẹzo odi atulan zodi.”
Pẹde eedi ịkpete kua, “Odi ạkparion mariḍien ōoy ikpom ariḍien obho, iben gạ? Odi kutue ḍio aḍighi molo odi kụpo ḍio gạ?”
Ẹzo bho imina ikul mologhi odi obho, podi ạghi toogu obho — oogu obho epōgh teegum ạrubharakpar nꞌọbharakpar tọnu obho.
PạJizos aghōl kua, “Ịseghe mọbharakpar obho metughuneen.” ẠMata ụmarani ōoy obho ạbho bho aghōl kua, “Obumọogh, tapur ni mịkanya siibha bho. Uḍi zodi inya aḍuma neetẹn.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạami dọgba ḍio ạnogho ạna aghōl ạna tạmiin ni meghuan obho tẸnaan, erumolo ạna umōruōm?”
Keḍio eedi iru itughuneen mọbharakpar obho. Keḍio ạJizos aanon tạnyu aakpulughu ạkpete kua, “Ạami nạsebh ạna Ọde bho, mibha ạna nạmoghonyan ạami obho.
Ạami naalōghōm mobho ạna nạmoghonyan ghạ ni zạmi moomo amen, oomo ipa ẹkona, ạami nạkpete miibha bho mebum arōoy obho idi bọ suo bho, molo eedi kemōruōm mobho ạna kurōm ạami uru.”
Odi aakpulughu ạḅele kua be podi ạlaal abheleghi maa, “Lạzaros, mute maru!”
Podi obo ạbho bho amute aru, nꞌẹzo bho ụghoroghi mạravo nꞌasike bho mi toogu obho, nꞌọnon ukpe olo ukinighiom taghisigh obho. Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho zeedi, “Ịkorion zodi odi aghẹel.”
Ịkanya arōoy aJu obho iru mobheleghian aMeri obho, ịmiin mibha ạJizos aḍighi obho, pimōruōm zodi.
Pẹtede eedi imula ịghi ịgba mibha ạJizos aḍighi obho ịnogho marōoy aFarisi obho.
Parōoy aFarisi obho nꞌaruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho iikōbhōghian iḍigh mezue ịkpete kua, “Ezira toḍighi ẹko? Oōy obhobho naḍighi mịkanya oḍighi ibꞌaruugu.
Ezira ọḅelemaan kua zodi, poomo arōoy obho oghiraan omōruōm odi, molo ạruula aRom tetu ni ẹeḅaghami zezira, ẹekpo motu iikpulughu obhꞌezira, nꞌoomo ebhugh obhꞌezira!”
Onyiin eedi, ōoy olo ughōl Kạyafas, uvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho mạla popo, nạakpete kua, “Bọbon ạar olo enyina ilōghōm olo!
Enyina ilōghōm io mobho onyiin ōoy mọbho ọnogho oomo arōoy obho ịneghe ni ipu molo oomo ebhugh obho kọbhozu?”
(Odi ni dụgh, odi nꞌalōor odi kọkar io nạgba miibha bho. Ẹzo bho odi aru muvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho mạla popo bho kiḍighi molo odi ạmiin nạgba mibha ạJizos tạpo ni mebum arōoy aJu obho.
Milo ebum eedi be nạ ḍio, ilo ookōbhōghi nạ oomo ạnwuny obho tẸnaan ibha nẹezaranu obho, obhin oru tonyiin esi.)
Ạseghe ḍuma popo ạghi taghisigh, pạruula aJu obho ịke moḍigh ezue mọva ẹzo olo oghigh ạJizos.
PạJizos ạḅele momutiom alōor odi mi taJu, ạḍua ạghi tebhugh olo atuan tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar, mi tẹma olo ughōl Ifraim, molo odi nꞌiteledōm odi ịrol tepa.
Aḍuma ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obhꞌaJu obho naatuan, keḍio ọlogh arōoy mi toomo ạraama bho ịghi taJerusạlẹm, eedi neeru moḍighi alōor ọneghemi ku kạteeny maḍuma ẹzaal obho.
Eedi nẹva mạJizos molo, suo eedi iikōbhōghian totu iikpulughu obho, ponyiin napuruan ghạ monyiin, “Ạna nạatua ẹko? Ạna nakōl odi orue ḍio aru tẹzaal obho gạ?”
Aruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho nẹelaal okpokpo, mu kōoy kōoy olo alōghōm mesi olo ạJizos odi paru ạgba molo eedi ẹki eḅol odi.
Odiin aḍuma isughō maḍuma ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho, pạJizos ạghi tạBetani, ẹma tạLazaros obho ạJizos aḅẹtōn mi tọbho bho.
Eedi ịsaanaan zodi meḍian. ẠMata pobo ẹbhirima, ạLazaros nꞌạJizos nele.
PaMeri ạseghe moomo okōtō elo olo ughōl “ạnad”, olo ạla mạar, azuom tasike tạJizos, ạseghe mạsilaan ẹmu odi agbulom. Eḍu elo bho ịkunu ibhule moomo otu obho.
Ponyiin oteledōm tạJizos, obho ughōl Judas Ịskariot — odi pobo bho aḅool bọ mạJizos obho — ạkpete kua,
“Ebum eeghe ku nopiẹmi melo bhobho kuḅool mịkanya ikpoki, ọseghe mikpoki obho ọnogho maruvekulom obho?”
Odi ọkpete ḍio kua mebum obho odi atulan maruvekulom obho. Odi ọḅa. Odi nạpam mẹḅa ikpoki obho — keḍio odi nạpela ghạ lōor odi suo.
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ḅẹlemaan zodi. Ḅẹle odi aseeri mibha odi ạteeny obho milo aḍuma amaḍi obhꞌạmi.
Aruvekulom obho idi nꞌenyina moomo amen. Ạami nꞌenyina ụrolan io moomo amen.”
Obꞌọlogh arōoy aJu obho, amen eedi ịmoghon mạJizos odi tạBetani, peedi iḍumaan itẹn ịghi. Eedi ịghi ḍio mọmiin ạJizos be, iru nạ mọmiin ạni ạLazaros obho ạJizos aḅẹtōn tọbho bho.
Paruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho iḍikuan mezue olo oghighom ạni ạLazaros,
tebum obho ọlogh arōoy aJu obho nẹeḍuaghu nemōruōm mạJizos tebum odi.
Ạḅaal, peedi obꞌọlogh arōoy obho iru mole ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho ịmoghon mobho ạJizos natu taJerusạlẹm,
peedi iigbooy masigo arale, ịsar ịghi mọmiinan odi, nẹmoor emulughu,
“Ịsebh Ẹnaan! Ạlisebh ẹrol ẹnogho zodi obo bho natu mi taḍien tẸnaan obho!
Ẹnaan ạsebh ni mỌolema bhꞌIzirẹl.”
ẠJizos nạamiin mọony ạsu, podi ạsiin tạnyu odi nakiilom, kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạgba bho,
“Enyina ẹma bhꞌạZayon ighiil ghạ ruugu.
Ọolema enyina natu,
nakiilom mọony ạsu.”

Tamen opopo, obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịmoghonyan io miibha bho. Nọonogho mạJizos meghuan obho keḍio eedi igbi mọotua olōghōm mobho ẹegia bho ịgba miibha bho milꞌodi, nꞌobho eedi iḍighi miibha bho mebum odi.
Obꞌọlogh arōoy obho ịrol ạni men obho ạJizos abheleghi mạLazaros mi tologhi oogu obho kaḅẹtōn zodi mi tọbho bho, nẹegba mibha imute obho.
Pạar obho ọlogh arōoy obho ịghi ịsaram zodi obho — eedi nẹemoghon mobꞌoḍighi ibꞌaruugu obho odi aḍighi obho.
Parōoy aFarisi obho onyiin nạḍeghe ạnogho monyiin, “Enyina nẹmiin, ezira umuzaan io bọbon ịbam. Iinon, oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho nẹtuonuman zodi!”
Ẹde arōoy aGris ịghi ạni mi taJerusạlẹm mookpulughu tamen ẹzaal obho.
Eedi iru taFilip (odi olꞌaBetsaida, ẹma tebhugh aGalili) keḍio ịkpete kua, “Obo upu ezōor, ezōor nọva mọmiin ạJizos.”
PaFilip ạghi ạgba ạnogho mẠndru, keḍio ịzal eedi ịghi tạJizos.
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Amen obho tọnogho migbōgh eghuan mỌony Oōy obho nạateeny.
Ạami nạgba magey obho nạnogho enyina: ekpo ọbiakpa onyiin odi be tạtol tughuneen molo odi aḍigh tade bho ạbho ḍio. Erumolo odi ạbho, podi omutiom ịnon ịkanya itu ịbiakpa.
Obo bho atulan ghuḍum odi obho tapiẹmi ni; obo bho ạlogh ḍien ghuḍum obhꞌodi mi tẹmar-arōoy obhobho taakō ni aseeri ạteeny maghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho.
Oōy olo nạva moḍighian ạmi moḍighi tạtuonuman ni zạmi molo kesi kesi olo ạami tạtol odi tạtol ạni ni. Ọde ạmi taabhughumi zodi obo bho taḍighian ạami moḍighi obho.”
“Esiibha bho ologhi ạmi nakpooy — kạami tạkpete meeghe? Ạami takōl kua, ‘Ọde, umōrō ghạ ọmiinom obhobho aru ạteeny ạami’ gạ? Sạami ụtuan iibha karu, moḍigh tamen ọmiinom obhobho.
Ọde, kueni ḍien obho tonuma.” Poghōrōkō ạḍua tạnyu obho aru, aghōl kua, “Ạami naaghueni, ạami tamina ni akueni.”
Ọlogh arōoy obho ịrol ạni tesi obho ịmoghon, pighōl kua, “Aḍio bho nagumughu ni!” Ẹtede ighōl kua, “Otelema tẸnaan ạḍeghe ạnogho zodi.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Oghōrōkō bhobho ọkpete ḍio mebum ạmi, ạtuan enyina.
Esiibha bho pamen ọru ịiruan ọnogho ẹmar-arōoy obho; esiibha bho notu mosōorẹ ọdaam-ẹma ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Amen olo nọosiine zạmi tạnyu mi tesuo ade bho, pạami ọnyagh oomo arōoy keru tạmi.”
(Tọnuekpete bhobho odi nạgba moḍigh ọbho obho odi natu mọmiinom obho.)

Ọlogh arōoy obho ịbhagharana kua, “Araalōgh obho tezōor ịgba kua ẹnogho ezōor maKraist obho taḍum ni ạtol kamen kamen. Eeghe aḍighi siibha bho kạna nakōl mu toḅẹtōn ni mỌony Oōy obho ọsiine tạnyu? Okōr ōoy zodi Ọony Oōy obho?”

Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ẹḅaal obho tạtolan ni zenyina mịbam amen. Ịmaar ẹrol mẹghi taghisigh suo enyina idi ni tẹḅaal obho, molo ọkinim obho otu ḍio ạteeny enyina, tebum obho obo bho natele tọkinim obho olōghōm io mesi odi nạki.
Imōruōm mẹḅaal obho, siibha bho enyina ịteeny mẹḅaal obho, molo enyina etu marōoy ẹḅaal obho.”
ẠJizos ạkpete kua ạḅele be podi ạḅele zeedi ạḍua ạghi ạḅokia zeedi.
Oomꞌibha odi naaḍighi moḍighi ibꞌaruugu ilo ileeny kua mi tasumusigh eedi obho, eedi imōruōm io zodi,
molo ibha Ạizaya ozil obho ạgba bho iru magey,
“Obumọogh, okōr ōoy obo naamōruōm dōm obho ezōor ụgba bho.
Tokōr ōoy mobho Obạmọogh obho naḍeeriom mịnyaam obho todi?”
Tebum iibha bẹleni, eedi irue ḍio momōruōm, tẹzo Ạizaya ẹkona amina ạkpete kua,
“Ẹnaan naaḍue riḍien obhꞌeedi.
Odi naakpereghi mịitua obhꞌeedi,
molo ariḍien obhꞌeedi ịmiin io mạar,
ịitua eedi irue ḍio mọmoghonyan,
molo eedi ikiraan io eru tạmi,
molo ạami kaakō zeedi.”
Ạizaya ạkpete miibha bho tebum obho odi ạmiin meghuan obho tạJizos, keḍio odi ạgba mibhꞌodi.
Oomo ipa ẹkona, ọlogh ạruula aJu obho emōruōm mạJizos, keḍio ịkpete ḍio emutiom mozōol mebum arōoy aFarisi obho, molo upirighan io zeedi omutiom mi tarutu ịtughumiom obho.
Eedi nẹva ghạ mạlisebh tarōoy, ibha tẸnaan eedi ịva ḍio.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete amutiom nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō, “Kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm zạmi, omōruōm io zạmi be, amōruōm nạ mobo bho arōm zạmi obho.
Kōoy kōoy olo nạamiin ạami, nạamiin nạ zodi obo bho arōm ạami aru obho.
Ạami naaru tẹmar-arōoy obho kẹḅaal, molo kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm ạami orele mu tọkinim.
Obo bho ạmoghon bọ dōm obho tạmi komōrō ḍio moḍighi, ạami ụtu ḍio mịiruan ạnogho zodi. Ạami utu ḍio mọru ịiruan ọnogho ẹmar-arōoy obho, ạami uru mọbhel.
Oōy olo aghel ạami agin dōm obhꞌạmi, odi nạateeny mobo tasōbh rạakpe bho ạnogho zodi. Ọnuekpete obho ạami nạakpete bho tetu mobo bho tasōbh rạakpe bho ạnogho zodi mi taḍuma ikunughi obho.
Ii, tebum obho ạami dọkpete ḍio milꞌalōor ạmi, Ọde bho kạgba ạnogho ạami milo ạami kạkpete nꞌọgba.
Ạami naalōghōm mobho ibha odi ạkpete bho nepin ghạ etu maghuḍum olo kamen kamen. Ibha ạami ụḍeghe bho pibha Ọde bho ạkpete ạnogho ạami mọḍeghe.”

Siibha bho, ạḅaal paḍuma ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho. ẠJizos naalōghōm mobho amen obho odi kạḍua tẹmar-arōoy obho kạghi tỌde bho nạateeny. Odi naatulan moomo amen mobo bho iru bọ milꞌodi mi tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio odi atulan nạ zeedi asi tikunughi.
ẠJizos nꞌiteledōm odi nele meḍian udule. Eru obho kọkanya amen maaḍigh tologhi taJudas ọony tạSaimon Ịskariot molo odi taḅool mạJizos.
ẠJizos naalōghōm mobho Ẹnaan nạanogho zodi moomo ịnyaam tẹmar-arōoy obho, alōghōm nạ mobho odi ạḍua tẸnaan karu, keḍio odi namula nạ tẸnaan.
PạJizos aḅetunu tizebele bho, ạkporona mạsuoma odi, ạkpua mụnu-ukpe tegum odi,
akōr mụum ạlogh tạbafu, keḍio ạke mootōl asike iteledōm obhꞌodi, ạseghe mụnu-ukpe obho agbulom sike obhꞌeedi.
Amen odi aru tạSaimon Pita, odi naaghōl kua, “Obumọogh, ạna taatōl masike ạmi?”
PạJizos amulumian kua zodi, “Ạna olōghōm io mạar olo ạami naḍighi, enyemen pạna olōghōm.”
APita ạkpete kua, “Tạa, ạna ootōl io masike ạmi!” ẠJizos maa, “Erumolo ạami kuutōl io masike onuma, ạna olꞌạmi mu ḍio.”
APita maa, “Ekua, Obumọogh, puutōl ghạ masike ạmi be, totōlōm nꞌạravo ạmi nꞌẹmu ạmi nạ!”
ẠJizos maa, “Odi obo bho naaḅura mụum obho, nạaḅaal ạman, odi ọva mu mootōla tughuneen asike odi ḍio. Oomo enyina nẹeḅaal tughuneen monyiin enyina be.”
(ẠJizos naalōghōm kọkanya amen mobo bho taḅool zodi obho, pạar obho odi aghōl kua, “Oomo enyina nẹeḅaal, tughuneen monyiin enyina be.”)
Odi aatōl masike obhꞌeedi ạḅele, podi amula ạghi ạseghe mạsuoma odi ạlogha ạrol delede tizebele bho. Keḍio apuruan kua, “Enyina neelōghōm mạar obho ạami ụtuan kuḍighi kua bho?
Enyina ibheleghi zạmi mOōy Ịtughumiom nꞌObạmọogh, keḍio enyina ịpionuman io, pẹzo nạ mobho ạami ụrol.
Ạami Obạmọogh nꞌObꞌịtughumiom enyina, keḍio ạami naatōl masike enyina. Enyina ẹkona ịkpe ni molo onyiin kaatōl masike onyiin.
Ạami naaḍighi aḍeeriom enyina molo enyina kẹtuugh ẹzo bho nạ keḍighi.
Agey nạ ni, ẹbana olo apu mọde otu odi olo; oteledōm olo apu mobo bho arōm zodi dōm obho olo.
Esiibha enyina neelōghōm magey obhobho, ọḅaal ologhi tạtol ni ạnogho zenyina magey erumolo enyina ịtuugh iḍighi mẹzo bho.
“Ilꞌoomo enyina ḍio mibha ạami nạḍeghe bho. Ạami naalōghōm mobo bho ạami ubheleghi obho. Toḍighi ni omuzeni mibha ẹegia bho ạgba bho,
‘Obo bho ạami ụnogho meḍian obho maakiton akōbh lạagba nạva ạami.’
“Ạami nạgba mabaabha bho nạnogho enyina keḍio tegbi momute, molo amen imute enyina emōruōm mobho ‘Ạami uru Zodi.’
Agey nạ ni, ōoy olo abhin ạloghom monyiin obo bho ạami urōm obho, pọ naabhin nạ zạmi. Obo bho abhin ạami obho naabhin nạ zodi obo bho arōm ạami obho.”
Odi ạkpete kua ạḅele be, pikul mologhi odi, keḍio odi ạkpete kua amutiom, “Agey nạ ni, onyiin enyina nạatua moḅool ạami.”
Piteledōm obho iinonan, neemōogh mobo bho odi nakōl obho.
Onyiin oteledōm, obho ạJizos atulan obho, ạrol delede atuan mạJizos.
ẠSaimon Pita nạanwaaghi ạnogho zodi akōl kua, “Puruan zodi mobo bho odi nakōl obho.”
Podi oteledōm obho atirom atuan mạJizos apuruan kua, “Obumọogh, ạkar okōr ōoy zodi ōoy obho?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Obo bho ạami taḅigh mạbred obho ạtobhori ạnogho bho, podi ōoy obho.” PạJizos aḅigh mạbred ạtobhori ạnogho maJudas, ọony tạSaimon Ịskariot.
AJudas abhin mạbred obho be, pEru obho aḍigh tẹmu odi. Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ibha ạna natu moḍighi obho, kẹm aḍighi!”
(Bọbon onyiin eedi olo ạmoghonyan mibha ạJizos ạkpete ạnogho zodi moḍighi obho olo.
Suo aJudas aru mobo bho ạbham bọ mẹḅa ikpoki obho, pẹtede iteledōm obho nẹetua ghạ ekōl mạJizos arōm zodi mọghi oghō ọkpo olo oliom tẹzaal obho, bolobolo ọghi ọnogho ọkpo maruvekulom obho.)
AJudas naabhin mạbred obho akẹm amute. Aḍio naaghul men obhopo.
AJudas amute, pạJizos ạkpete kua, “Esiibha nooḍighi omutiom meghuan Ọony Oōy obho. Todi pesi eghuan tẸnaan nooḍighi nạ umutiom.
Erumolo uḍighi meghuan tẸnaan umutiom todi, pẸnaan oḍighi omutiom eghuan Ọony Oōy obho mi todi, odi takẹm ni nạ aḍighi.
Ạnwuny ạmi, ạami ụtolan mu zenyina abia. Enyina tẹva ni zạmi, keḍio ạami tạkpete ạnogho enyina kẹzo bho ạami ụkpete ụnogho marōoy aJu obho, ‘Enyina irue ḍio ẹghi tesi obho ạami nạki obho.’
Omoom olōgh mobho ạami nạlogh ạnogho zenyina: onyiin atulan monyiin. Ẹzo bho ạami utulan zenyina bho, pẹzo enyina ẹkona onyiin tatulan monyiin.
Erumolo oomo enyina onyiin atulan monyiin, poomo arōoy olōghōm mobho enyina iru mobo bho nẹtuonuman zạmi obho.”
ẠSaimon Pita apuruan kua zodi, “Obumọogh, ạna nạki teḍighen?” PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Esiibha ạna orue ḍio ạtuonuman ạami ạghi tesi obho ạami nạki obho, ịbam amen neetẹn pạna orue ọtuonuman ạmi.”
PaPita apuruan kua, “Obumọogh, ebum eeghe kạami utue ḍio? Ạami nạamara mọbho ebum onuma.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna nạakar ạmara mọbho ebum ạmi? Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho ạna: keḍio ọḅel ọnu ạkenegh tatẹn, ạna nạabharanaan ạami ịraar amen akōl mạna olōghōm io zạmi.”
ẠJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịítu ghạ, imōruōm mẸnaan, memina memōruōm ạami.
Ịkanya ạrakpe mobho idi totu Ọde ạmi, molo ạami nạki mookōbhōghia oḅōruōm enyina. Erumolo itu ḍio kua, ạami kụgba ḍio ạnogho enyina.
Amen ạami nạaghi aḍighi mesi olꞌenyina, pạami tamula ni atu apin enyina ạloghom tạmi, molo esi obho ạmi odi obho pesi enyina tẹtol ạni.
Enyina neelōghōm mebōom esi obho ạami nạḅol nạki obho.”
ẠTomos nạakpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Obumọogh, ezōor ulōghōm io mesi ạna natu mọghi. Ezōor toḍighi ẹko kolōghōm ebōom olo ọghi ạni?”
ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami ebōom nꞌagey nꞌaghuḍum obho. Bọbon ōoy olo tatue asi tỌde bho olo, tughuneen molo odi ạḅol tạmi ḍio.
Suo enyina neelōghōm ạami obho, kōl enyina neelōghōm nạ mỌde ạmi. Siibha bho enyina neelōghōm ạami obho, penyina nẹemiin zodi.”
AFilip aghōl kua, “Obumọogh, ḍeeriom ezōor mỌde bho, pilo mu.”

PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Oomo amen obhobho ạami ụrolan enyina bho, keḍio ạna aFilip olōghōm io ạami? Kōoy kōoy olo nạamiin ạami nạamiin mỌde bho nạ. Eeghe kạna digha akōl kua, ‘Ḍeeriom ezōor mỌde bho’?
AFilip ạna omōruōm io bẹle mobho ạami odi tỌde bho, nꞌobho Ọde bho odi tạmi? Ọnuekpete obho ạami ụkpete ụnogho enyina bho ịḍua ḍio tạmi kemute. Ọde bho odi tạmi obho naḍighiiy milꞌodi.
Imōruōm ạami mobho ạami odi tỌde bho, Ọde bho odi tạmi. Ipa ilo, pimōruōm ariḍighi obho tạmi.
Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho zenyina: obo bho amōruōm ạami obho taḍighi ni moḍighi obho ạami naḍighi obho — molo agey, odi taḍighi ni milo tepu miibha, tebum obho ạami nạki tỌde bho.
Ạami taḍighi ni kạar kạar olo enyina igbẹel mi taḍien ạmi, molo okueni mỌde bho mi tỌony obho.
Erumolo enyina igbẹel ạami mạar mi taḍien ạmi, ạami taḍighi ni ạnogho zenyina.”
“Erumolo enyina itulan ạami, penyina teekō ni maraalōgh obhꞌạmi.
Ạami tagbẹel ni mỌde ạmi, molo odi kạnogho zenyina mọnon Ọkuemia, Ẹmugh obho aru bọ magey obho, mọrolan enyina moomo amen.
Arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho irue ḍio ebhin zodi, mebum obho eedi ịmiin io, ilōghōm nạ ḍio zodi obho. Enyina neelōghōm zodi, tebum obho odi odi tenyina, natughan nạ zenyina bho.
“Ạami ụḅele ḍio kua zenyina be, ạami tatu ni tenyina.
Ịbam amen isughō ẹmar-arōoy obho ịmiin mu zạmi, enyina tẹmiin ni zạmi. Ebum obho ạami odi ni taghuḍum obho, enyina ẹko tẹtol ni taghuḍum.
Amen tạteeny ḍuma bho, penyina olōghōm oghōl ạami odi tỌde bho, enyina idi tạmi kẹzo bho ạami odi tenyina bho.
“Kōoy kōoy olo abhin maraalōgh obho tạmi kạtuugh aakō zeedi, odi pobo atulan ạami. Ọde bho tạmi tatulan ni zodi obo bho atulan ạami obho. Ạami ẹkona tatulan ni zodi, amutiom lōor ạmi aḍeeriom zodi.”
PaJudas (aJudas Ịskariot ḍio) ạkpete kua, “Obumọogh, temute ẹko molo ạna tamutiom lōor onuma aḍeeriom zezōor, omutiom io aḍeeriom marōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho?”
ẠJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Kōoy kōoy olo atulan ạami tạtuugh ni aḍighi mibha ạami ụgba tadōm ạmi obho. Ọde ạmi tatulan ni zodi, keḍio Ọde ạmi nꞌạami totu todi ọtolan zodi.
Obo bho otulan io zạmi obho oghiilaan io moghōrōkō obhꞌạmi. Adōm obho enyina ịmoghon mobho ạami ụgba bho, ilꞌạmi ḍio, ịḍua tỌde bhꞌạmi, obho arōm ạami moru obho.
“Ạami nạgba mabaabha bho nạnogho zenyina siibha bho ạami odi ni nꞌenyina bho.
Ọkuemia bho, Ẹmugh Iigbia bho Ọde bho tatōm atu mi taḍien ạmi obho, tạtughumiom zenyina kạar kạar, ạnogho nạ zenyina mologhi ịitua ibha ạami ụgba ụnogho zenyina bho.
“Ekima pibha ạami nạḅelemaan zenyina. Ạami nạnogho zenyina mekima ibhꞌạmi, ekima ẹmar-arōoy obho ḍio. Ịítu ghạ. Ighiil ghạ nạ ruugu.

Enyina nẹemoghon mobho ạami ụgba ụnogho zenyina ughōl, ‘Ạami nạḅele zenyina ạḍua, keḍio ạami tamula ni atu tenyina.’ Erumolo enyina itulan ạami bọ, enyina kibo ni mibha ạami nạki tỌde bho, tebum obho odi apu zạmi obho.
Ạami nạagba mabaabha bho ạnogho zenyina siibha bho demute ḍio bho, molo amen temute enyina emōruōm.
Ạami usi mu ạdoonyemi siibha bho, tebum obho ọdaam ẹma ẹmar-arōoy obho natu. Ịnyaam ilo odi ạteeny tạmi olo,
keḍio ẹmar-arōoy obho telōghōm ni mobho ạami utulan mỌde bho. Pạar obho ạami nạtuugh aḍighi kạar kạar olo odi aghōl ạami moḍighi.”
“Iḅerenu ọḍua tesuo.”
“Ạami pạkar egum oorẹeny avain obho, Ọde ạmi pobo bho naakō.
Odi naḅuni kịgha kịgha ilo idi tạmi ilo ịloki ḍio mitu. Ibha nẹloki mitu bho podi ạmaar aaghō, molo ịmaar iḍum ịloki mọlogh itu.
Nooḍighi enyina ọḅaaleni mi tadōm obho ạami ụgba ụnogho zenyina bho.

Ịtolan ạami nꞌotul ọnu, pạami ọrolan enyina nꞌotul ọnu. Ọgha oorẹeny orue ḍio ạrol esi olo odi be ạloki mitu, tughuneen molo odi ạrolan tegum obho ḍio. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ enyina irue ḍio ẹloki mitu tughuneen molo enyina ịrolan ạami ḍio.
“Ạami egum obho, enyina ịgha bho. Kōoy kōoy olo ạrolan ạami, ạami ụrolan todi, tạloki ni mịkanya itu. Olo ạḍua tạmi orue ḍio aḍighi mạar amutiom.
Totōbh ni omutiom zodi obo bho ọtolan io zạmi, kẹzo bho ịgha iirẹeny nemughughu ghạ bho. Ịgha ilo idi kua nookpooy ghạ ni ọlogh tạnyan ọsu.
Erumolo enyina ịrolan zạmi nꞌọnuekpete obho tạmi ịrolan enyina, kạar kạar olo enyina tegbẹel penyina ọteeny.
Pẹzo toḍighi oḍeeriom meghuan obho tỌde ạmi: amen enyina ịloki mịkanya itu. Tẹzo bho nạ penyina oru obo nẹtuonuman zạmi.
Ạami utulan zenyina kẹzo bho Ọde ạmi atulan ạami obho. Ịtol tetulan obho tạmi.
Erumolo enyina ịtuugh iḍighi mibha ạami ụkpete ụnogho enyina bho, penyina ọrol tetulan ạmi, kẹzo bho ạami ụtuugh uḍighi mibha Ọde ạmi ạkpete ạnogho ạami obho kạami ụrol tetulan odi obho.
“Ạami nạagba miibha bho ạnogho zenyina, molo ọḅaal ologhi enyina egbẹbhan.
Oobho olōgh ạmi: onyiin atulan monyiin, kẹzo bho ạami utulan zenyina bho.
Obꞌetulan obho ōoy tạnogho mạburubulol odi, pọnogho aghuḍum odi tebum eedi.
Enyina ạburubulol ạmi, erumolo enyina iikō maraalōgh obhꞌạmi.

Ạseghe dodon ạghi taghisigh, ạami upeleghi mu zenyina mạnwuny-otu ạmi, tebum obho ọony-otu olōghōm ghạ ḍio mọkpo ilo ọde otu odi naḍighi. Tebum ipa bẹleni, ạami tapeleghi zenyina mạburubulol ạmi, tebum obho ạami nạagba ạnogho zenyina moomo ibha ạami ụmoghon tỌde ạmi obho.
Enyina kịson io ạami ẹseghe, ạami kụson zenyina ạseghe molo enyina ẹki ẹloki miiḅi itu, itu ilo tẹkparam ni tọmiinom. PỌde ạmi ọnogho enyina kạar kạar olo enyina tegbẹel zodi mi taḍien ạmi.
Oobho polōgh obho ạami nạlogh ạnogho zenyina: onyiin atulan monyiin.”
“Erumolo ẹmar-arōoy obho ịlogh zenyina ḍien, ilōghōm meghōl eedi ibhira ịlogh ạami ḍien.

Erumolo enyina iru milꞌẹmar-arōoy obho, eedi kitulan ni zenyina kilꞌeedi. Suo ạami naabheleghi zenyina ụseghe tẹmar-arōoy obho, enyina ilo mu milꞌeedi. Iibha pạar obho ẹmar-arōoy obho nẹlogh enyina ḍien obho.

Ịitua mibha ạami ụgba ụnogho enyina bho: ‘Ọony-otu olo apu mọde otu odi olo.’ Erumolo eedi ịlogh ạami tesi ọmiinom, eedi tẹlogh nạ ni zenyina tesi ọmiinom. Erumolo eedi ighiilaan dōm obhꞌạmi, peedi oghiilaan nạ ibhꞌenyina.
Eedi teḍighi ni moomo ibaabha bho zenyina tebum obho enyina iru milꞌạmi obho, nꞌebum obho eedi ilōghōm io zodi obo bho arōm ạami aru obho.
Eedi kilōghōma ḍio mịkarabh obho teedi, ughōl ạami utu ḍio bọ ạgba dōm obho ạnogho zeedi; ẹzo bho idi siibha bho, omina ọgba ọḍua olo eedi tetue ẹgba ẹḍua tịkarabh obho teedi olo.
Kōoy kōoy olo nạlogh ạami ḍien, nạlogh nạ mỌde ạmi ḍien.

Eedi kilōghōma ḍio mịkarabh obho teedi, ughōl ạami utu ḍio aḍighi tasumusigh eedi mariḍighi obho ạami uḍighi obho, ibha ọnon ōoy doḍighi ghạ ḍio bho; tẹzo bho idi obho, eedi mẹemiin mibha ạami uḍighi obho keḍio ịlogh zạmi nꞌỌde ạmi ḍien.
Tẹtol ni kua molo ibha ụge bọ taraalōgh obho teedi obho etu magey obho, ụkpete kua,
‘Ạkar ạar olo eedi ibhin kịlogh ạami ḍien olo nolo.’
“Ọkuemia bho tatu ni — Ẹmugh obho aru bọ magey obho, obho tạḍua tỌde bho katu obho. Ạami tatōm odi mi tỌde bho atu, odi tạgba ạami amutiom.
Enyina ẹkona tẹgbaanaan nạ zạmi, tebum obho enyina ịrolan ạami kọḅel egbiom obho.
“Ạami nạagba miibha bho ạnogho zenyina molo enyina imeel io emula tạman.
Eedi tepirighan ni zenyina emutiom tarutu ịtughumiom obhꞌeedi. Amen natu molo kōoy kōoy olo aghigh monyiin enyina tạatua akōl modi naḍighi moḍighi tẸnaan.
Eedi teḍighi ni mabaabha zenyina mebum obho eedi ilōghōm io mỌde ạmi nꞌạami obho.
Ạami nạagba miibha bho ạnogho zenyina molo amen obho tatu mobho eedi teḍighi zenyina miibha bho, enyina ẹetua elōghōm mibha ạami nạagba ụnogho zenyina.”
“Ạami ụgba ḍio miibha bho ạnogho zenyina kọḅel egbiom obho tebum obho ạami odi ni nꞌenyina bho.
Esiibha bho ạami nạki todi obo bho arōm ạami aru obho, keḍio onyiin enyina olo naapuruan ạami aghōl, ‘Ạna nạki teḍighen?’ olo.
Siibha bho ạami nạagba ạnogho zenyina bho, enyina nẹetuuy.
Ạami nạgba magey obho ạnogho zenyina: iiḅi mi tenyina molo ạami kạḅele enyina kạḍua, tebum obho erumolo ạami ụḍua ḍio Ọkuemia bho otu ḍio. Erumolo ạami ụki ḍio, ạami utōm io zodi aru.
Amen odi tatu podi ọgba ẹmar-arōoy obho omutiom ạar olo ịkarabh nꞌiiḅi nꞌịiruan mẹzo idi.
Ẹzo bho eedi imōruōm io zạmi obho kolōgh oḍighi ịkarabh ạbham zeedi.
Ẹzo bho ạami nakẹel tỌde bho nꞌobho enyina imina mu ẹmiin zạmi obho kodi amutiom miiḅi ibhꞌạmi aḍeeriom zeedi.
Ẹzo bho nọoru mịiruan ubhumeni mọolema ẹmar-arōoy obho keḍio eedi ilōghōm mobho Ẹnaan tạtu mịiruan ạnogho zeedi.
“Ạami ạteeny mịkanya ọkpo olo ọgba ọnogho enyina molo ạami ạgba siibha enyina itue ḍio ẹrolom.
Amen Ẹmugh obho aru bọ magey obho tatu, odi taḍeeriom ni zenyina moomo agey obho. Odi ootuma ḍio milꞌodi, tapin ibha odi ạmoghon obho ạgba ạnogho zenyina mọkpo ilo netu momute.
Odi tạnogho ạami meghuan, tebum obho odi tapin mibha ạami natu mọkpete obho, keḍio tạgba ạnogho enyina.
Kạar kạar ilo Ọde bho ạteeny pilꞌạmi. Pạar obho ạami ughōl Ẹmugh obho tapin mibha ạami ụnogho zodi obho ạgba ạnogho zenyina.”
“Ịbam amen isughō, penyina ịmiin mu zạmi, keḍio ịbam amen namina atẹn penyina ọmiin ạmi.”
