Ẹtede iteledōm obho nẹekpete kua ẹnogho mipedi obho, “Iibha kodi nạkpete ẹko mu, ‘Ịbam amen isughō, penyina ịmiin mu zạmi, keḍio ịbam amen namina atẹn penyina ọmiin ạmi,’ keḍio amina nạkpete kua mu, ‘Tebum obho ạami nạki tỌde bho’?
Ịbam amen obho odi nakōl obho keeghe? Ezōor ulōghōm io mibha odi nạḍeghe obho.”

ẠJizos naalōghōm mobho eedi netu mopuruan odi miipuruan, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami ụkpete kua, ‘Ịbam amen isughō, penyina ịmiin mu zạmi, keḍio ịbam amen tetẹn penyina ọmiin ạmi.’ Iibha pibha enyina nepuruan silōor enyina bho?
Agey nạ ni, enyina teleghe ni mizin, molo ẹmar-arōoy obho tebo ni. Enyina tẹetu ni, keḍio ịitu obho tenyina tetẹn mọḅaal ologhi.

Amen olo ạni-ebhōbh natu mọmar, odi tạtol tịitu, tebum obho amen ọmiinom odi nẹteeny. Tamen olo odi nạamar mọony obho, podi oḅulo ọmiinom obhꞌodi, tebum obho odi tabo ni mobho odi nạamar mọony tẹmar-arōoy obho.
Pẹzo enyina tẹtol nạ: esiibha enyina idi tịitu, keḍio ạami tamina ni ạmiin enyina, keḍio ọḅaal ologhi tạtolaan enyina magey, oḍigh ọḅaal ologhi olo ọnon ōoy otue ḍio ạḅoor zenyina.
“Amen tạteeny ḍuma popo, enyina igbẹel mu zạmi mạar. Agey nạ ni, Ọde bho tạnogho ni zenyina kạar kạar olo enyina tegbẹel zodi mi taḍien ạmi.
Ninii kesiibha, enyina degbẹel io mạar mi taḍien ạmi. Igbẹel, penyina obhin, molo ọḅaal ologhi enyina egbẹbhan.”
“Ạami nạagba miibha bho ạnogho enyina mi tasidōgh. Amen natu molo ạami ụgbaam mu nꞌasidōgh, ạami tạgba mibha tỌde bho mozōol ạnogho enyina.
Amen tạteeny ḍuma popo, enyina ki tegbẹel mi taḍien ạmi: ạami kugbẹel mu zodi ạnogho zenyina,
tebum obho odi Ọde bho nịvo nịvo atulan enyina. Odi atulan enyina mebum obho enyina itulan ạami, imōruōm mobho ạami ụḍua tẸnaan uru.
Ạami ụkar ụḍua tỌde bho karu, keḍio ạami ụḍua uru tẹmar-arōoy obho; molo esiibha bho ạami nạaḅele mẹmar-arōoy obho nạḍua ạki tỌde bho.”
Keḍio iteledōm obho tẹkpete kua ẹnogho zodi, “Nonon, ạna nạamaar nạgba amutiom siibha bho, ạna ọgbaam io sidōgh.
Ezōor noolōghōm siibha bho mobho kạar kạar ạna ulōghōm ni ụman; iipuruan olo ōoy amina ạteeny mopuruan onuma olo mu. Iibha bho iḍighi kezōor omōruōm mobho ạna ụḍua tẸnaan uru.”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Enyina neemōruōm siibha bho.
Amen obho natu, naasi siibha bho, amen obho enyina tẹezaranu, ōoy otu otu odi, keḍio tesughōnōm zạmi be. Oomo ipa ẹkona, ạami be usughō ḍio, Ọde bho odi nꞌạami.
Ạami ụgba miibha bho ạnogho zenyina molo enyina ẹteeny mekima mi tạmi. Ẹmar-arōoy obho tẹnogho ni zenyina mọmiinom. Ịteeny ọoghuanaan ologhi. Ạami naapuom mẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Odi ạJizos ạkpete miibha bho ạḅele, podi aanon tạnyu-ẹnaan, aakpulughu kua, “Ạda, amen obho nạateeny. Nọgho meghuan mỌony obho tonuma, molo Ọony obho ạnogho ạni ạna meghuan.
Ạna nạanogho zodi mịnyaam ọbhamam oomo arōoy, molo odi kạnogho maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo moomo obo bho ạna ụnogho zodi obho.
Oobho podi aghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho: molo arōoy kelōghōm ạna, mobho ạna be uru mạkar Ẹnaan obho, nꞌolōghōm ạJizos Kraist obho ạna urōm uru obho.
Ạami naaghueni ạna tesuo ade obho; ạami nạaman moḍighi obho ạna ụnogho ạami obho.
Ạda, nọgho ạami meghuan siibha tesuo aghisigh onuma, onyiin odi eghuan obho ạami ụteeny tonuma tamen obho aḅirini obho domute ḍio bho.
“Ạami naaḍighi marōoy obho ạna ụseghe tẹmar-arōoy obho ụnogho ạami obho elōghōm ạna. Eedi ilꞌonuma, keḍio ạna ụnogho zeedi zạmi. Eedi neeghiilaan moghōrōkō onuma,
keḍio esiibha bho eedi meelōghōm mobho kạar kạar olo ạna ụnogho ạami ịḍua tonuma kiru.
Ạami ụnogho zeedi madōm obho ạna ụnogho ạami obho, molo eedi neebhin; eedi neelōghōm mobho ạami ụkar ụḍua tonuma kuru, keḍio eedi imōruōm mobho ạna kurōm ạami moru.
“Ạami naakpulughu ạnogho eedi. Ạami uukpulughu ḍio ạnogho mẹmar-arōoy obho, ạami naakpulughu ạnogho marōoy obho ạna ụnogho ạami obho, tebum obho eedi iru milꞌonuma bho.
Oomo ibha ạami ụteeny obho ilꞌonuma, ibhꞌonuma ilꞌạmi; eghuan ạmi idi teedi.

Esiibha bho ạami natu tonuma; ạami olo mu tẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio eedi idi tẹmar-arōoy obho. Ọde Iigbia, tịnyaam aḍien onuma, taḍien obho ạna ụnogho ạami obho, mạar ạbhamam eedi maseeri, molo eedi etu monyiin kẹzo bho ezira uru monyiin obho.

Amen obho ạami odi nꞌeedi obho, ạami ubhin ni mịnyaam aḍien onuma ạmaar ạbhamam eedi, aḍien obho ạna ụnogho ạami obho. Ạami nạamaar ạpam eedi molo bọbon onyiin olo abhẹ olo, tughuneen zodi obo bho noogu ughōl tapẹ ni obho, molo oḍighi opulughi tibhꞌẹegia bho.
Keḍio esiibha bho ạami natu tonuma, pạami ụkpete mabaabha bho ụnogho zeedi molo eedi ẹteeny magey ọḅaal ologhi olo igbẹbh ni ịman tekpom eedi.
Ạami nạagba ạnogho zeedi madōm onuma molo ẹmar-arōoy obho nẹelogh zeedi ḍien, tebum obho eedi itu ḍio milꞌẹmar-arōoy obho, kẹzo bho ạami utu ḍio molꞌẹmar-arōoy obho.
Ạami ụva ḍio molo ạna kạḅirogh zeedi tẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio ạami nagbẹel molo ạna kạmaar kạbham zeedi kạseghe mi tạravo eru obho.
Ẹzo bho ạami utu ḍio molꞌẹmar-arōoy obho, eedi ẹkona ilꞌẹmar-arōoy obho ḍio.
Pin agey obho maḍighiom zeedi mạneghemi; ọnuekpete onuma pagey obho.
Ạami urōm zeedi mi tẹmar-arōoy obho kẹzo bho ạna urōm ạami moru tẹmar-arōoy obho.
Tebum eedi keḍio ạami ubhin lōor ạmi uḍighi ụneghemi taghisigh onuma, molo eedi ẹkona eḍighia lōor eedi ẹneghemi taghisigh onuma mi tagey obho.
“Ạami uukpulughu ḍio ạnogho zeedi be, ạami naakpulughu nạ ạnogho mobo bho tẹmoghon dōm eedi emōruōm ạami obho.

Ạami naakpulughu molo oomo eedi kẹrol keru monyiin. Ạda, eedi ẹrolan ezira, kẹzo bho ạna odi nꞌạmi obho; ạami odi nꞌạna bho. Ḍighi eedi ẹrol monyiin, molo ẹmar-arōoy obho emōruōm mobho ạna urōm ạami uru.
Ạami ụnogho zeedi monyiin eghuan obho ạna ụnogho ạami obho, molo eedi etu monyiin kẹzo bho ạna nꞌạami uru monyiin obho.
Ạami ụtolan eedi, ạna mạrolan ạami, molo eedi egbẹbh ni etu monyiin, nꞌolo ẹmar-arōoy obho elōghōm mobho ạna urōm ạami uru nꞌobho ạna utulan eedi kẹzo bho ạna utulan ạami obho.

“Ạda, ạna kụnogho zeedi zạmi, keḍio ạami nạva molo eedi kẹrolan ạami mesi olo ạami odi, molo eedi ẹmiin meghuan ạmi, eghuan obho ạna ụnogho zạmi obho; tebum etulan obho ạna utulan ạami kugbi mọlem ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Ọde obo ạneghe ni ạman, ẹmar-arōoy obho ilōghōm io ạna, ạami naalōghōm ạna molo abaabha bho neelōghōm mobho ạna urōm ạami uru.
Ạami naaḍighi eedi elōghōm ạna, keḍio ạami tạtol ni amina aḍighi molo etulan obho ạna utulan ạami obho ẹtolan zeedi, ạami ẹkona ạtolan zeedi.”
ẠJizos aakpulughu kua ạḅele, podi nꞌiteledōm obhꞌodi ịḍua ịḅeeny mozi obho ughōl Kidron obho. Tesi obho kir oḍighi olo ukō, pạJizos nꞌiteledōm odi iḍigh.
AJudas obho aḅool mạJizos obho naalōghōm mesi obho, tebum obho ạJizos naabhin miteledōm obho ạghi ghạ tesi obho mịkanya amen.
Podi aJudas abhin iḅe rạagham nꞌẹtede obo iḅōrō otu iikpulughu ilo aruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarōoy aFarisi obho irōm, ạghi tologhi oḍighi obho. Eedi nẹemaar ẹkpamaghia, ẹpamagh mịtodi nꞌịtaany ẹki.
ẠJizos naalōghōm kạar kạar ilo netu momutenaan odi, podi amute ạghi apuruan zeedi, “Enyina nẹva mokōr ōoy?”
Eedi nẹebhagharana kua, “ẠJizos obhꞌạNazaret.” Podi ạkpete kua, “Ạami odi.”
AJudas obho aḅool odi obho nạamaranuan nꞌeedi.
Amen ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami odi,” peedi imulaay tạman imeleghu tade bho.
Keḍio ạJizos amina apuruan zeedi, “Enyina ịkar nẹva mokōr ōoy?” Peedi ịbhagharana, “ẠJizos obhꞌạNazaret.”
PạJizos ạkpete kua, “Sạami nạagba ghạ ạnogho zenyina akōl ạami odi. Erumolo enyina nẹva zạmi, pịḅele iibhakele eghẹel.”
(Odi ạkpete kua molo ibha odi nạakpete bho etu magey, “Ọde, bọbon onyiin tobo bho ạna ụnogho ạami obho olo abhẹ olo.”)
ẠSaimon Pita ạbham nꞌelōor ẹgham, podi aabhaghami melōor obho aben monyiin ẹbana uvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho olo ughōl Mạlkos asōbh maḅeri obhꞌoḍiom obho.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho maPita, “Mulumi melōor ẹgham onuma mi tesi obho ạna ụseghe bho. Ạna ughōdi ạami utue ḍio ạbhogholom mạkopu ọmiinom obho Ọde ạmi ạnogho ạami obho bẹle?”
Peedi iḅe rạagham obho nꞌuvẹmụ obhꞌeedi nꞌobo iḅōrō aJu obho iḅol mạJizos ịduughi rạvo bho.
Keḍio ịbham zodi ịghi tẠnas. Odi ọzogo tạKayafas obho aru muvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho mạla popo.
ẠKayafas obo bho aakiom marōoy aJu obho aghōl mịkpe ni molo onyiin ōoy kạbho kạnogho moomo arōoy obho.
ẠSaimon Pita nꞌọnon oteledōm nẹtuonuman mạJizos. Oteledōm opedi obho, uvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho nạamaar alōghōm zodi. Podi ạtuonuman mạJizos aḍigh togigo obhꞌotu ạkoti uvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho.
APita ạrol tetẹrẹ atuan mọnu-otu obho. Poteledōm obho uvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho nạamaar alōghōm obho amula ạghi ạkpete ạnogho mọnyani obho naḅōrō ghạ mọnu-otu obho pụloghom maPita.
Pọnyani obhꞌọnu-otu obho apuruan maPita, “Ạna onyiin oteledōm odi ōoy obho ḍio?” APita ạbhagharana mu, “Tạa, ạami ạni ḍio.”
Uuta odi, pạrubana bho nꞌobo iḅōrō bho igbonoghi megi ạnyan nẹenwa. PaPita ạghi ạmara nạanwa ạni.
Puvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho apuruan mạJizos milo igboloman nꞌiteledōm obhꞌodi nꞌịtughumiom obhꞌodi.

PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami nạakpete ạnogho kōoy kōoy mi togbo arōoy; oomo ịtughumiom ạmi, ạami ụtughumiom mi tarutu ịtughumiom nꞌotu iikpulughu obho, ariisi obho arōoy aJu obho neekōbhōghian ghạ bho. Ạami dọkpete ḍio mạar mi tẹḅokia.
Ebum eeghe kạna digha apuruan ạami? Kịa mapuruan mobo bho ịmoghon ạami. Puruan zeedi mibha ạami ụgba ụnogho zeedi obho — eedi neelōghōm mibha ạami ụkpete bho.”
Suo ạJizos ạkpete kua bho ponyiin obo iḅōrō bho aḅōr odi ạkpete kua, “Ạna une uḅom ẹmu nạkpete kua muvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho!”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Erumolo ạami nạakpete mịkarabh tesuo, pụgba mạnogho kōoy kōoy tesuo. Kerumolo ibha ạami ụkpete bho iru magey obho, ebum eeghe kạna aḅor ạami?”
PẠnas abhin zodi, nꞌẹzo bho ụḍuughi rạvo bho, ạghiomonaan mạKayafas uvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho.
APita odi nini mẹmara nạanwa nyạn obho. Pipedi obho ipuruan kua zodi, “Ạna onyiin oteledōm odi ōoy obhobho ḍio?” PaPita ạbharanaan mu, “Tạa, ạami ạni ḍio sọo.”
Onyiin ẹbana uvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho olꞌeghun otu ōoy obho odi aPita asōbh maḅeri obho, ạgba kua amutiom, “Ạna ḍio mobo bho ạami ụmiin tologhi oḍighi bho?”
PaPita amina ạbharanaan mu, “Eenyi” — tamen opopo pạkenegh ạlaal.

Eedi ịseghe mạJizos mi totu tạKayafas ịḍuonom ịghi totu ạgovono bho. Obun ụḍirogh men obho. Arōoy aJu obho iḍigh ạni ḍio tologhi obho mebum olo oseeri alōor eedi kạḅaal tẹzo eḍighiom ạar eedi, molo eedi ele ạni meḍian ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho.
PaPailet amute ạghi teedi apuruan kua zeedi, “Ikōr oḍigh ịkarabh mobho ōoy obhobho aḍighi?”
Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ezōor kupin io zodi oruom ạna, erumolo odi oḍighi ḍio mịkarabh.”
PaPailet ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Enyina nịvo nịvo ịseghe zodi mẹghi mẹtuugh mesōbh tibhꞌaraalōgh enyina.” Arōoy aJu obho nẹebhagharana kua, “Ịnyaam olo ezōor ụteeny moghigh ōoy olo.”
(Iibha bho imute kua molo ibha ạJizos ạkpete bho etu magey, tamen obho odi ạgba moḍigh ọbho bho odi tạpo bho.)
PaPailet ạghi aḍigh totu abheleghi mạJizos apuruan kua zodi, “Ạna ọolema aJu obho bẹle?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Iipuruan ibhibha ịkar ịḍua tologhi onuma keru bẹlee kạna ụmoghon tịnu ịnon arōoy?”
PaPailet ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna ụutua ạami olꞌaJu obho bẹle? Arōoy onuma nꞌaruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bhꞌeedi ibhin ạna eruom ạami. Ạna uḍighi meeghe?”

ẠJizos nạakpete kua, “Ọdaam ẹma ạmi olꞌesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho ḍio. Ughōl ọdaam ẹma ạmi olꞌesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho bọ, obo bho nẹtuonuman ạami obho kiḅe ni molo ạami kuḍigh io tạravo aJu obho. Eenyi. Ọdaam ẹma ạmi olꞌesuo ḍio!”

PaPailet apuruan kua zodi, “Ẹrol kua, pạna ọolema?” PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna kughōl ạami ọolema. Ụmar ạami, ạami aru tẹmar-arōoy obho mebum iibha, ọgba agey obho. Kōoy kōoy olo aru molꞌagey obho tạmoghonyan ni zạmi.”
PaPailet apuruan kua zodi, “Agey obho kẹkaraan?”
PaPailet amute amula ạghi tarōoy aJu obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami ụmiin io mạar olo ọtuan oghigh ōoy obhobho.
Tẹzo eḍighiom ạar obho enyina ịteeny obho, ạami nạḅelemaan ghạ ni amutiom monyiin ōoy ikoli ạnogho zenyina mi taḍuma ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho. Ạami umutiom ụnogho zenyina mọolema aJu obho bẹle?”
Poomo eedi imulughu, “Eenyi-o, odi ḍio. Ezōor nogbẹel mạBarabas!” (Odi ạBarabas ōoy olo naḅumiiy ghạ magbuaay.)
PaPailet abhin mạJizos aḍighi molo ụgurogh zodi.
Iḅe rạagham obho ilo meghōony iiḅulom ezuom zodi, ẹloki zodi mạsuoma ọolema,
iru todi nẹkpete ghạ kua, “Ọolema aJu obho, ḍum ọodoony aghuḍum.” Keḍio ịghi nạ iḅōrōgh odi.
Keḍio aPailet tamina amula ạki tarōoy obho ạkpete kua, “Iinon, ạami tapin odi atuom enyina, molo enyina ẹmiin elōghōm ekōl mobho bọbon ạar olo ạami ụmiin olo ọtuan oghigh odi olo.”
PạJizos amute nꞌeghōony ọolema iiḅulom obho uzuom bọ zodi nꞌạsuoma ọolema bho ụloki bọ zodi obho. Keḍio aPailet ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Iinon! Oobho odi ōoy obho!”

Amen aruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌobo iḅōrō bho ịmiin zodi, pimulughu, “Kạn zodi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho! Kạn zodi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho!” Keḍio aPailet ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Enyina kịseghe zodi mẹghi mẹkan. Ạar olo ạami ụva ụmiin olo oghigh odi olo.”
Parōoy aJu obho imulumian kua zodi, “Ezōor ọteeny molōgh olo aghōl modi tạpo ni, tebum obho odi ạseghe lōor odi aghōl modi Ọony tẸnaan obho.”
Amen aPailet ạmoghon mibha eedi ịkpete bho, paruugu isibh odi magey.
Odi amula ạghi tẹkpe bhꞌodi apuruan kua mạJizos, “Ạna kolꞌokōr ẹma?” ẠJizos ọbhagharana ḍio.
PaPailet ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạna ọbhagharana ḍio zạmi. Tụtua, ạami ạteeny moomo ịnyaam olo omutiom onuma nꞌolo ọkan onuma toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua, “Ạna ụteeny mịnyaam mi tạmi mi tebum obho Ẹnaan kạnogho ạna. Keḍio odi obo bho ạseghe zạmi ạlogh tạvo onuma bho pobo bho aḍighi mịkarabh ilo iḅẹebh ipu obho.”

Amen aPailet ạmoghon miibha bho podi ạva mịkanya mebōom olo omutiom ạJizos. Arōoy aJu obho imōrō ḍio, nemulughu kua, “Erumolo ạna umutiom zodi, pu nekōl ạna ọbulol ọolema bhꞌaRom io. Kōoy kōoy olo aghōl odi ọolema, podi obo ạlokian riḍien mọolema bhꞌaRom!”
Amen aPailet ạmoghon mọnuekpete bhibha podi ạghi abhin mạJizos amutiom ạrol delede tẹtolom ịiruan obho, tesi olo ughōl “Egbolom Ọbharakpar” (tọnu-ẹma aJu obho pọ aGabata).
Amen natuan molo aḍio kạḍi ịzal abin taḍuma bho tạḅaal pẹzaal Opẹl Otẹn obho, paPailet ạkpete kua ạnogho marōoy aJu obho, “Oobho ọolema enyina!”

Peedi imulughu imulumian maa, “Kigh zodi! Kigh zodi! Kạn zodi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.” Keḍio aPailet apuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina negbẹel molo ạami kạkan mọolema enyina mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho?” Paruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho ịbhagharana kua, “Onyiin ọolema obho ezōor ụteeny pọolema bhꞌaRom!”
Keḍio aPailet tạnogho zeedi mạJizos mọghi ọkan odi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.
PạJizos aḍigh tạravo eedi.
Podi amute aru arōol moorẹeny ẹmigheri obho todi, ạghi tesi obho ughōl “Esi Ịikpo,” (tọnu-ẹma aJu obho ughōl Gọlgota.)
Tesuo peedi ịkan odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho. Eedi ịkanam nꞌịnon ịzal arōoy, onyiin tekẹeny onyiin toḍiom, ạJizos ạrol teesoḍia eedi.
APailet ạge mạar ạkanam toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho. Ạge kua, “
Ọlogh arōoy aJu obho ịḅal ịmiin miibha bho, tebum obho esi obho ụkan zodi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho ogbeenyan io mi tẹma bho. Ibha ụge bho, ụge tịnu aHibru nꞌạLatin nꞌaGris.
Paruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua aJu obho ịkpete kua ịnogho maPailet, “Ụge ghạ maghōl kua, ‘Ọolema aJu obho,’ gẹ maghōl kua, ‘Oōy obhobho aghōl ạami Ọolema aJu obho.’ ”
PaPailet ạbhagharana kua, “Ibha ạami nạage bho pu nọoge.”

Amen iḅe rạagham obho nẹekan mạJizos ịḅele, peedi ịseghe mukpe bhꞌodi ịḍian inya abin, ōoy onyiin onyiin. Peedi ịseghe nạ mạsuoma ạruula bho, obho aru monyiin ọpaḍi ukpe olo uluom ạvo ụkpologhiom nạ ḍio.
Piḅe rạagham obho onyiin ạkpete ạnogho monyiin maa, “Ị́baay ghạ. Itu ọsa mẹlel olōghōm mobo tạteeny.” Iibha bho imute kua moḍighi ibhꞌẹegia bho keru magey, ibha ughōl kua,
“Eedi ịḍian mukpe ạmi mōoy onyiin onyiin,
ẹsa mẹlel molōghōm ōoy olo tạteeny mạdoni ạmi.”
Parōoy ẹgham obho ịtuugh iḍighi kua.
Oniin tạJizos, nꞌụmarani odi oniin obho, nꞌaMeri ạni tạKlopas nꞌaMeri obhꞌạMagdala nẹemara etuan moorẹeny ẹmigheri obho tạJizos.
PạJizos ạmiin moniin odi nꞌoteledōm obho odi atulan obho, ịmara nạ tepa, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho moniin odi, “Ạni obho, pạm mọony onuma.”
Odi ạkpete kua ạnogho moteledōm obho, “Oobho oniin onuma.” Ạseghe tamen opopo ạghi taghisigh, poteledōm obho abhin mạni obho aghẹel totu odi aakō.
ẠJizos naalōghōm mobho tạteeny kesiibha kạar kạar neegbẹbh ịman, toḍighi ẹzo olo omuzeni tibhꞌẹegia bho, pạJizos ạkpete kua, “Ạmuum nẹtal zạmi.”
Ạḅugha amiim ilo idi kạkata idi todi esi obho, peedi ịseghe mạsapo ịtobhori tamiim obho ịkeleriom tẹkom oorẹeny iibhaghami iseeriom tọodoronu odi.
ẠJizos ạbhoghol miim obho paghōl kua, “Neemuneen!” Podi azumeni mẹmu odi ạbho.

Keḍio arōoy aJu igbẹel maPailet mọnogho eedi mịnyaam oḅuni asike arōoy obho ụkan ụze bho, molo osōorẹ zeedi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho. Eedi iḍighi miibha bho mebum obho ạḅaal aru maḍuma obhooghia. Eedi igbẹel io molo iḍim obho kẹrol toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho mi taḍuma obhooghia bho, tebum obho ạkar odi aḍuma popo aru maḍuma iigbia.
Parōoy ẹgham obho ịghi iḅuni masike ọḅel ōoy obho nꞌōoy opedi obho ụḅaram ụkanam nꞌạJizos obho.
Amen eedi iru tạJizos, odi nạabho kọkanya amen, peedi ịḅele moḅuni asike odi.
Ponyiin oḅe-rạagham obho ạseghe mọsobh agim titakara tạJizos, tonyiin amen obho pịḅaal nꞌạmuum igbōr imute.
(Obo bho ạmiin mibha iibha bho imute bho nạagba molo enyina ẹkona emōruōm. Ibha odi ạgba bho agey, keḍio odi naalōghōm mobho odi ạgba magey obho.)
Uḍighi kua molo ibhꞌẹegia bho etu magey, tibha ụge kua,
“Bọbon ọokpo odi olo toḅun olo.”
Kir ọnon esi mi tẹegia bho olo aghōl kua,
“Arōoy teenon ni zodi obo bho eedi igim obho.”

Iibha iru itẹn, paJosef obhꞌẠrimatia ạghi agbẹel maPailet mọseghe oḍim obho tạJizos. (AJosef onyiin ōoy olo nạtuonuman mạJizos mi tẹḅokia, tebum obho odi ạrol aghiil mạruula aJu obho.) PaPailet ạnogho zodi mịnyaam mọseghe oḍim obho, keḍio odi aJosef ạghi ạseghe moḍim obho.
ANikodimos obho abhira ạghi tạJizos muḍugul obho, ạḅar maJosef, ạseghe mạrumunu nꞌaralo ilo nẹkunu magey, ilo ẹemor obho teleeny ni mọbam ẹḅa abōbh, ạbhamam ạghi.
Eedi ịzal arōoy obho ịseghe moḍim obho tạJizos ịghoroghiom mạbalala ukpe nꞌaralo bho. Pẹzo arōoy aJu obho neekōbhōghia ghạ mamaḍi.
Oḍighi olo ukō odi tesi obho ughigh bọ mạJizos obho, omoom oogu olo doḍi ghạ ḍio mōoy odi.
Suo taruḍuma bho tạḅaal paḍuma obhooghia aJu obho, nꞌebum obho oogu obho atuan suo bho, peedi iḍi zodi ạJizos suo.
Ẹtughuḅaal ạSondi, aḍio dokpaaran io, paMeri obhꞌạMagdala ạghi toogu obho, keḍio ạmiin mobho nootughuneen mọbharakpar obho ukpereghiom obho.
Podi aghiil ạghi tạSaimon Pita nꞌoteledōm opedi obho, obho ạJizos atulan obho, ạgba kua ạnogho zeedi, “Eedi nẹeseghe mObạmọogh obho mi toogu obho, keḍio ezōor ulōghōm io mesi eedi iseeri zodi.”
PaPita nꞌoteledōm opedi obho ịḍua ịghi toogu obho.
Ịzal eedi nekiil ni, keḍio oteledōm opedi obho aghiil apuom maPita abhira asi toogu obho.
Odi ạghi asi azuman aanon pạmiin mịḅaal arukpe obho, odi oḍigh io ạghi.
Keḍio aPita ạḍua tạman odi aru, podi aḍigh onyen mi toogu obho. Odi nạamiin mịḅaal arukpe obho idi toogu obho,
nꞌukpe bho ụghoroghiom bọ mẹmu tạJizos obho. Olo ạni tesi obho mịḅaal arukpe obho idi obho, ụkpulughi kua zodi be oseeri kẹre esi.
Keḍio oteledōm opedi obho, obho abhira asi maPita toogu obho, aḍigh ạni. Odi ạmiin pamōruōm.
(Eedi ẹkona dẹmoghonyan nạ ḍio mibha ẹegia bho ạgba aghōl modi taḅetunu ni tọbho bho.)
Peedi iteledōm obho ighẹel totu.
AMeri ạmara tọtu oogu obho naleghe. Odi naleghe obho, keḍio azuman ghạ naanon ghạ toogu obho.
Podi ạmiin mịzal itelema ilo ibura mịḅaal, ịrol delede tesi obho ụmuneen moḍim tạJizos obho, onyiin tẹmu, opedi obho tasike,
keḍio ipuruan kua zodi, “Ạni obho, ạna naleghe meeghe?” Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Eedi nẹeseghe mObạmọogh ạami obho, keḍio ạami ulōghōm io mesi eedi iseeri zodi!”
Odi ạkpete kua ạḅele, podi aghiraan aanon tạman ạmiin mobho ạJizos ạmara, keḍio odi olōghōm io mobho odi aru mạJizos.

ẠJizos apuruan zodi, “Ạni obho, ạna naleghe meeghe? Ạna nạva mokōr ōoy?” Odi aghōdi odi ōoy obho naakō moḍighi obho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Obo apu ạami, erumolo ạna ụseghe zodi, kōl mesi obho ạna useeri zodi obho molo ạami ạki ạseghe zodi.”
PạJizos abheleghi zodi, “AMeri!” Podi aghiraan tạJizos ạkpete kua mi tọnu aHibru, “Rabonạy” (obho amōrō kua, “Obꞌịtughumiom”).

PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ụbham ghạ zạmi, tebum obho ạami dọghi ḍio asi tỌde bho. Kịa taburumōr ạmi mạgba mạnogho zeedi maghōl kua, ‘Ạami nạki tỌde bho aru bọ mỌde ạmi nꞌỌde enyina bho, Ẹnaan ạmi nꞌẸnaan enyina.’ ”
PaMeri obhꞌạMagdala ạghi ạgba ạnogho miteledōm obho modi nạamiin mObạmọogh obho mobho odi ạkpete miibha bho ạnogho zịno.

Udule aḍuma odi ạSondi opopo, nakpereghi, oomo iteledōm obho neekōbhōghian tonyiin otu ẹḍuughi ruguugh obho, tẹzo bho eedi nekiil ruugu mạruula aJu obho. PạJizos aru ạmara togbo bhꞌeedi, ạkpete kua, “Ekima ẹrolaan enyina.”
Odi ạkpete kua ạḅele, podi aḍeeriom zeedi mạravo nꞌitakara bhꞌodi. Pologhi iteledōm obho ạḅaal magey mọmiin Obạmọogh obho.
Keḍio ạJizos amina ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ekima ẹrolaan enyina. Ẹzo bho Ọde bho arōm ạami obho, pẹzo ạami natōm zenyina.”
Odi ạkpete kua ạḅele, podi abhooghuom zeedi ạkpete kua, “Ipin mẸmugh Iigbia bho.
Erumolo enyina ịḅelemaan mịkarabh arōoy, pu nọoḅelemaan zeedi. Erumolo enyina ịḅelemaan io, pụḅelemaan io nạ zeedi.”
Onyiin oteledōm obho, ạTomos (obho ughōl Ụmar Ịzal obho) olo ạni men obho ạJizos aru obho.

Pipedi iteledōm obho ịgba kua ịnogho zodi, “Ezōor mọomiin mObạmọogh obho.” ẠTomos ạkpete kua, “Erumolo ạami ụmiin io melẹkẹ esi obho ụkanam bọ mọgbo tạravo bhꞌodi ạlogh mạghunu ạmi, nꞌesi obho ugim titakara obhꞌodi, ạlogh mạvo bhꞌodi, ạami umōruōm io.”
Awiki aru atẹn iteledōm obho keekōbhōghian tonyiin odi otu obho ạTomos odi ạni nꞌeedi. Nọoḍuughi maruguugh obho, keḍio ạJizos aru ạmara togbo bhꞌeedi ạkpete kua, “Ekima ẹrolaan zenyina.”
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho mạTomos, “Lọgh mạghunu ạvo bhꞌonuma suo, mạmiin rạvo ạmi, ku masele mạvo onuma mạlogh titakara bhꞌạmi. Umina ghạ mamōogh, mōruōm ni be.”
Keḍio ạTomos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Obạmọogh ạami nꞌẸnaan ạmi!”
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạna naamōruōm mebum obho ạna nạamiin ạami obho. Ọḅaal ologhi tạtol ni magey ạnogho mobo bho ịmiin io ạami kimōruōm obho!”
ẠJizos aḍighi mịnon ịkanya ariḍighi ibꞌaruugu mi tasumusigh obo bho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ilo ụge ḍio ọlogh tọbhereer.
Ụge miibha bho molo enyina emōruōm mobho ạJizos aru maKraist Ọony tẸnaan obho, nꞌolo tologhi omōruōm obhobho, enyina ẹteeny maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo mi taḍien odi.
Iibha iru itẹn, pạJizos amina amutiom lōor odi ạnogho miteledōm obho odi mi tobꞌegha ọbhiiny obhꞌaTaibirias. Odi aḍeeriom kua lōor obhꞌodi ạnogho zeedi.
Tamen olo ạSaimon Pita, nꞌạTomos (obho ughōl Ụmar Ịzal obho), nꞌạNataniel (obhꞌẹma bhꞌạKena obhꞌaGalili) ọony taZebidi, nꞌịnon ịzal iteledōm tạJizos, idi monyiin esi,
pạSaimon Pita ạkpete kua, “Ạami nạki mọzuguru.” Pipedi obho ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Ezōor tọki ạni ni.” Peedi ịghi iḍigh toghuugh, keḍio oomo uḍugul opopo, bọbon ena olo eedi ighigh olo.
Aḍio bho nakpaaran kua be pạJizos aru ạmara tọtu ọbhiiny obho, keḍio eedi iteledōm obho ilōghōm io mobho aru mạJizos.
Podi apuruan kua zeedi, “Ạnwuny-o, enyina ẹteeny mina?” Eedi ịbhagharana kua, “Tạa! Bọbon onyiin olo.”

Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Itōbh ọzuguru obhꞌenyina mi toḍiom ạvo ọtu oghuugh obhꞌenyina, penyina ọze ina.” Peedi ịigbarion mọzuguru obho, kạ wororororobh. Eedi irue ḍio mọlool, ina bho iḍigh obho ipu ni.

Oteledōm obho ạJizos atulan obho ạgba kua ạnogho maPita, “Odi Obạmọogh obho!” Amen ạSaimon Pita ạmoghon mobho odi aru mObạmọogh obho, podi ạkpua mukpe odi (odi mạakporona mibura obhꞌodi) apẹl asōor tạmuum obho.
Iteledōm ipedi obho ibhun tegbolom, ogbeenyan io aaleeny merubal ḍiōbh akuḅu mobhun tegbolom.
Amen eedi ibhun tegbolom obho peedi ịmiin nyạn ilo noogbonoghi, nꞌena olo nọpooghi tạnyan obho, nꞌạbred.
PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ipin mịbam ina tibha enyina ịze siibha bho meru.”
PạSaimon Pita abhun ạghi aḍur mọzuguru obho abhune tegbolom, ina neemuzō molo oomo eedi tegbẹbh ni mịraar ạraala nꞌaḍisibh ḍiōbh nꞌịraar. Oomo ibha ịbugh kua bho, ọzuguru obho ọbaan io.
Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Itu mele.” Bọbon onyiin mi titeledōm obho olo ane mopuruan odi oghōl, “Ạna kokōr ōoy?” olo, tebum obho eedi neelōghōm mobho odi aru mObạmọogh obho.
Keḍio ạJizos ạghi ạseghe mạbred obho ạnogho zeedi, ạnogho nạ zeedi mina bho.
Oobho pogbẹbhiōm ịraar amen mobho ạJizos amutiom lōor odi ạnogho miteledōm obho suo odi naaḅetunu tọbho bho.

Eedi ile ịḅele, pạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho mạSaimon Pita, “Sạimon ọony tạJon, ạna ạkar atulan ạami apu mẹzo arōoy ibhibha netulan ạami?” PaPita ạbhagharana kua, “Ii, Obumọogh, ạna naalōghōm mobho ạami natulan ạna.” PạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kōkō mạnwuny ạraana ạmi.”
Keḍio ạJizos amina apuruan zodi, “Sạimon ọony tạJon, ạna ạkar natulan ạami?” Odi mu, “Ii, Obumọogh, ạna naalōghōm mobho ạami natulan ạna.” PạJizos amina ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kōkō mạraana ạmi.”

Ogbẹbhiōm ịraar amen obho ạJizos amina apuruan maPita maa, “Sạimon ọony tạJon, ạna ạkar natulan ạami?” PaPita aḍigh tịitu mebum obho ạJizos amina apuruan odi agbẹbhiōm ịraar amen aghōl maa, “Ạna ạkar natulan ạami?” keḍio ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Obumọogh, ạna kulōghōm kạar kạar. Ạna naalōghōm mobho ạami natulan ạna.” Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kōkō mạraana ạmi.

Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho ạna: amen ịbam onuma, ạna ụmaar ghạ ni ạkpua mukpe onuma ạghi kesi kesi olo ologhi onuma aḍigh mọghi. Amen ạna tạkpo, ạna tasele ni mạravo onuma keḍio ọnon ōoy tạkoroghi apin ạna ạki tesi olo ạna ọva ḍio mọghi.”
(Odi ạḍeghe miibha bho ạnogho maPita, nạgba moḍigh ọbho bho aPita tạpo mọnogho eghuan mẸnaan.) Keḍio ạJizos ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi mu, “Tụonuman ạami!”

APita aghiraan tạman pạmiin moteledōm opedi obho, obho ạJizos atulan obho, obho ạrol atuan ạḅeḍian mạJizos mi teḍian udule obho eedi ile bho, kapuruan kua, “Obumọogh, okōr ōoy obo bho taḅool ạna bho?”
Amen aPita ạmiin zodi, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mạJizos, “Obumọogh, ẹko ạani mōoy obhobho?”
PạJizos ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Erumolo iḍigh tologhi ạmi molo odi kaḍum kạrol ninii ạami kamula, iibha bho kịgbaan ạna meeghe? Tụonuman ạami!”

Pọdu alela moomo obo bho nẹtuonuman mạJizos obho moteledōm obhobho ọbho mu. ẠJizos ni ọkpete ḍio aghōl odi ọbho mu, odi ạkpete kua, “Erumolo iḍigh tologhi ạmi molo odi kaḍum kạrol ninii ạami kamula, iibha bho kịgbaan ạna meeghe?”
Odi poteledōm obho ạgba moomo iibha bho, odi nạ kạge miibha bho aseeri; keḍio ezōor noolōghōm mobho ibha odi ạgba bho iru magey obho.
Ịnon ọkpo ilo ạJizos aḍighi ịka ni, molo oru mọge oomo eedi men onyiin onyiin, ạami nạatua, ịbhereer ilo teḍigh moomo eedi, ẹmar-arōoy obho orue ḍio arōol.
Ooḅi ạTiofilos, tọḅel ọbhereer obho ạami ụge bho, ạami ụgba moomo ibha ạJizos aḍighi obho nꞌibha odi ạtughumiom obho, ki tamen obho odi ạke moḍighi odi obho,
ninii ạteeny ḍuma bho ụseghe odi ụsiine tạnyu obho. Odi abhin tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạto mịto ạnogho mobo bho odi ạson ạseghe moru iteledōm odi obho.

Erubal aḍuma bho odi ạrol tade bho ki tamen obho odi aḅetunu tọbho bho, odi aḍeeriom lōor odi ạnogho zeedi mịkanya amen ilo ịgba neḍeeriom mibha odi ọkar odi taghuḍum: eedi ẹmiin odi, keḍio odi ạḍeghe nạ ạnogho zeedi milꞌAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.
Amen eedi iru iikōbhōghian monyiin esi, podi ạnogho zeedi liiki obhobho, “Ị́ḍua ghạ taJerusạlẹm, ịtol meḅōrō moguan obho Ọde ạmi aguan mọnogho enyina bho, obho ạami nạagba ụnogho enyina obho.
ẠJon azuughiom ghạ rōoy mụum, keḍio ịbam aruḍuma isughō pozuom enyina mẸmugh Iigbia bho.”
Tamen obho iteledōm obho iikōbhōghian mi tạJizos obho, peedi ipuruan kua odi, “Obumọogh, nạateeny men olo ạna tạta mIzirẹl molo eedi kemina kẹda lōor eedi bẹle?”
Keḍio ạJizos ạbhagharana kua ạnogho eedi, “Ilo molo enyina kelōghōm mamen nꞌaḍio bho, idi tịnyaam tỌde ạmi be.
Enyina tẹteeny ni mịnyaam tamen olo Ẹmugh Iigbia bho naaru tenyina, keḍio enyina tẹgba mooḅi adōm obho ẹnogho rōoy ạseghe taJerusạlẹm nꞌoomo aJudia nꞌaSameria ninii asi tikunughi ẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Amen odi ạkpete mabaabha bho ạḅele, taghisigh eedi, pụseghe zodi ụsiine tạnyu, keḍio ọbhurubuur ikpeom odi molo eedi ịḅele mọmiin odi.
Eedi neenon ni tạnyu obho mẹzo bho odi nạsiin tạnyu obho, pịzal arōoy ilo ibura mịḅaal ịmaranuan eedi ịkpete kua ịnogho eedi,
“Enyina arōoy aGalili, eeghe aḍighi kenyina ẹmara neenon kua tạnyu obho? ẠJizos obhobho, obho ụseghe tenyina nọki tạnyu obho, tamula ni atu kẹzo bho enyina nẹmiin odi nạsiin tạnyu obho.”

Keḍio iteledōm obho, aPita nꞌạJon nꞌaJems nꞌẠndru nꞌaFilip nꞌạTomos nꞌaBatolomiu nꞌaMatiu nꞌaJems ọony tẠlifios nꞌạSaimon obho atulan magey mẹma odi obho, nꞌaJudas ọony taJems, ịḍua tobꞌeegum obhꞌỌlivs, olo nạkian mạḍian atobi, irughẹel taJerusạlẹm ịghi iikōbhōghian tẹkpe bho eedi ịrologhu ghạ bho, tonyiin otu-ạnyu.
Eedi nꞌạraani obho, nꞌaMeri oniin tạJizos nꞌaburumōr odi, iikōbhōghian ghạ mookpulughu nꞌonyiin ologhi.
Ịbam aruḍuma itẹn, pobo bho imōruōm obho iikōbhōghian iḍikuan ezue (ọnu arōoy obo bho iikōbhōghian bho tegbẹbh ni ịraar ạraala), keḍio aPita aḅetunu ạkpete kua,
“Aburumōr ạmi, toḍighi ni opulughi tibha Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạkpete ạnogho maDevid milo igboloman nꞌaJudas obo bho akpo bọ atẹnōm mobo bho iḅol bọ mạJizos obho.
AJudas olꞌogbo ezira mi tebum obho ụson ạni zodi mọteeny ạni abin mi toḍighi obhobho bho.”
(AJudas abhin ikpoki obho odi abhin mi tịkarabh odi obho aghuōm made olo odi ạbhuom. Ọbaraka bhꞌodi arubhaan ni keḍio oomo ịla bhꞌodi imuteghu.
Oomo arōoy obho netugh taJerusạlẹm obho ịmoghon ni ẹman, keedi ighōl zodi ade bho mi tọnu ẹma eedi mAkeldama, olo amōrō kua, “Ade Ịḅaal.”)
“Ẹzo bho pẹzo ụge mi tọbhereer ạsoor taDevid,
‘Otu odi aru mozōol, ōoy otugh io!’
“Omina nạ ọge kua,
‘Ọnon ōoy ạseghe mesi oḍighi odi!’

“Tebum ipa bẹleni, onyiin ōoy taḍigh ni ạḅarama ezira, ạgba mobho ạJizos Obạmọogh obho aḅetunu tọbho bho. Odi tatu mōoy olo ạrolan ạni ghạ zezira moomo amen obho ạJizos Obạmọogh obho abhin ghạ zezira areliom obho, ạke ki tamen obho ạJon ạgba madōm ozu-ạmuum obho ninii ạteeny taḍuma bho ụseghe mạJizos mi tezira ụsiine tạnyu obho.”
Peedi ighōl mịzal arōoy: aJosef obho ughōl bọ ạBasabas obho (ạJustos aḍien odi nạ) nꞌạMatayas.
Keḍio eedi iru iikpulughu kua, “Obumọogh, ạna pobo ulōghōm miloghi arōoy. Tebum ipa bẹleni, Obumọogh, ḍeeriom ezōor mōoy obho ạna nạason ụseghe,
molo odi kạseghe mesi oḍighi taJudas oteledōm obho odi ạḅele ạghi tesi obho iḍigh tologhi odi obho.”
Eedi iikpulughu ịḅele, peedi iru ịsa mẹlel. Ẹlel obho ameelom mạMatayas, keḍio ụseghe zodi ụḅaram tipedi aḍiōbh nꞌonyiin iteledōm obho.
Taḍuma ẹzaal obho ughōl bọ ạPentikost obho, poomo obo bho imōruōm obho iikōbhōghian monyiin esi.
Tekperenom poghur olo odi kogim ạḍua tạnyu obho aru amuzō toomo otu obho eedi idi obho.
Keḍio eedi ịmiin mạar olo odi kanem amuumōr ạnyan nalela moomo otu obho: kōoy kōoy olo odi totu obho, anem obho akulaan ni ạman.
Keḍio Ẹmugh Iigbia bho aḍigh amuzō toomo eedi, keḍio ịrol ịkpaay oḍigh kẹrekere ọnu ạraama, tẹzo bho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạnogho zeedi mịnyaam.
Kir arōoy aJu ilo netele tebōom tẸnaan, ilo ịḍua iru taJerusạlẹm mi toomo aruubhugh obho idi bọ tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Amen eedi ịmoghon malisian bhibha, pọlogh arōoy iikōbhōghian. Oomo eedi iru mọmiin ạni ibha nemute bho, tẹzo bho eedi nẹmoghon mibha obo bho imōruōm obho nẹkpa mọnu ạraama eedi obho.
Tibꞌaruugu nꞌeemōogh peedi ịkpete kua, “Arōoy bhibha nẹkpaay kua bho, oomo eedi ilꞌaGalili.
Ịteko emute molo ezira nọmoghon eedi nẹkpa mọnu ạraama ezira?
Ezōor ụḍua taruubhugh ạPatia nꞌaMidia nꞌẸlam, nꞌaMesopotamia nꞌaJudia nꞌaKapadosia, nꞌạPontos nꞌEsia,
nꞌaFrijia nꞌạPamfilia, nꞌIzipt nꞌaRom nꞌoomo ebhugh obhꞌaLibia obho atuan maSairini obho oru:

ẹde ezōor ilꞌaJu, ẹde ezōor itẹnẹghu marōoy aJu mebum ookpulughu Ẹnaan; ẹtede ilꞌaKrit nꞌArebia — keḍio oomo ezira nọmoghon mibha eedi nẹkpa mạkar ọnu ạraama bhꞌezira, igbōgh ọkpo ilo Ẹnaan naaḍighi.”
Teemōogh nꞌẹmoghonyan poomo eedi onyiin napuruan kua monyiin, “Iibha bho keeghe kua bho?”
Pẹtede arōoy ịrol ịiḅaghami mobo bho imōruōm obho nekōl kua, “Arōoy bhibha nẹebhoghol miim nekigh.”

PaPita nꞌaḍiōbh nꞌonyiin iteledōm ipedi obho iḅetunu ịmara, keḍio aPita ạkpete kua ạnogho rōoy obho, “Oomo enyina arōoy aJu nꞌobo bho netugh taJerusạlẹm obho, ịmoghonyan ạami mibha ạami tạgba ạnogho enyina bho.
Arōoy bhibha ịbhoghol io miim. Esiibha bho, ịmaar eenon, esughō asuo ụḍirogh be.
Iibha bho pibha ạJuel ozil obho ạgba bho:
‘Ẹnaan ạkpete kua:
Iibha pibha ạami taḍighi mi tikunughi aḍuma bho.
Ạami tazuughiom ni moomo arōoy mẸmugh ạmi.
Ạnwuny nꞌạsunwunyaan enyina telōghōm ni milꞌaghisigh ẹgba moghōrōkō tẸnaan.
Ạnwuny-ughẹel enyina tẹmiin ni ghịiny,
keḍio arukenya enyina tẹmalaay rạmala.
Ii, ạraani nꞌilobhir ạrubana enyina ẹkona, todi aḍuma bho ạami tazuughiom ni mẸmugh ạmi, keḍio eedi tẹmiin milꞌaghisigh ẹgba moghōrōkō tẸnaan.
Ạami taḍighi ni mọkpo ibꞌaruugu mi tạnyu obho, nꞌaraalẹgh mi tade bho. Ịḅaal nꞌạnyan nꞌibꞌạmugi tẹtol ni:
aghōzōgh obho taḅil ni, ụvanyu obho takōgh kịḅaal, keḍio obꞌaḍuma bho nꞌaḍuma eghuan tObạmọogh obho tagbi moru.
Keḍio tetu molo kōoy kōoy olo aghōl maḍien tObạmọogh obho pobo tọpel.’ ”

“Enyina arōoy Izirẹl, ịmoghonyan moghōrōkō ạmi. ẠJizos obhꞌạNazaret ōoy olo Ẹnaan ạnogho mịnyaam moḍighi ọkpo ịiḍaany, nꞌọkpo ibꞌaruugu nꞌaraalẹgh ilo oḍeeriom mobho ọno ku arōm odi. Enyina nịvo nịvo neelōghōm nạ miibha bho, tẹzo bho imuteey tesuo mi taghisigh enyina bho.
Tịto nꞌolōghōm ạar odi, Ẹnaan naalegheri aḍighi molo tọseghe mạJizos ọlogh tạravo enyina, keḍio enyina ịḅelemaan miḍighi mịkarabh ịseghe zodi ịkan ighigh odi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.
Keḍio Ẹnaan aḅẹtōn zodi mi tọbho bho. Odi aḍighi nạ molo odi ọmiinom io mi tẹegama ọbho bho, tẹzo bho ọbho ịnyaam ilo motẹnẹ odi mẹbana odi bho.
ADevid ạgbaam ẹzo bho zodi:
‘Ạami ụmiin Obạmọogh obho moomo amen mi taghisigh ạmi.
Odi odi toḍiom ạmi, molo ịiḅaghami ịtol io ẹnogho ạami.
Tebum iibha bẹleni pologhi ạmi ạḅaal,
molo ọḅaal ologhi imuzō toghōrōkō ạmi,
keḍio toomo ibha ạami tạpo ni obho ẹkona,
ạami tạmaar ni apooghia nꞌoḍuom ologhi,
ebum obho ạna ọḅele ḍio maghuḍum ạmi mi tẹmir-iḍim,
ạna omōrō nạ ḍio iikpōogh alōor Oōy oḍigh ologhi onuma ạḅor.
Ạna naaḍeeriom zạmi mebōom aghuḍum;
ẹzo bho ạna odi nꞌạami obho, ạna tạnogho ni ạami mogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi.’
“Aburumōr, ạami tạgba ni magey obho igboloman nꞌaDevid ogbōgh ọde obhꞌezira ạnogho enyina. Odi nạabho, oḍi zodi, keḍio oogu odi odi tesuo nꞌezira dodon.
Odi ozil olo alōghōm oguan obho Ẹnaan aguanaan odi obho: Ẹnaan naaghiran ịzo modi taḍighi monyiin ōoy mi teghun otu taDevid mọolema, kẹzo bho odi aDevid ạrol obho.
ADevid nạamiin mibha Ẹnaan natu moḍighi obho, podi ạgba mibha aKraist obho taḅetunu tọbho bho mi tamen olo odi ạkpete kua:
‘Ụḅelemaan io zodi mi tẹmir-iḍim. Iikpōogh alōor odi ịḅor io.’
“Ẹnaan naaḅẹtōn mạJizos Kraist obhobho mi tọbho bho, keḍio oomo ezōor nọgba ghạ miibha bho ọnogho rōoy.
Nooḅẹtōn zodi mi toḍiom ạvo tẸnaan, keḍio odi abhin todi Ẹnaan mẸmugh Iigbia bho, tẹzo bho Ọde bho aguan obho; iibha bho enyina nẹmiin nẹmoghon obho pẹnogho bho odi ạnogho zezōor obho.
ADevid nịvo nịvo ọsiin io tạnyu, keḍio odi ạkpete kua:
‘Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho mObạmọogh ạami obho:
Tọl suo delede mi toḍiom ạvo ạmi,
ninii ạami uḍighi mobo ọlogh aḍien onuma aru moḅeleriom asike onuma.’
“Oomo enyina arōoy Izirẹl, ilōghōm kua maghōl, mobho odi ạJizos obho enyina ịkan bọ mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho, pobo Ẹnaan aḍighi aseeri mObạmọogh obho nꞌaKraist obho.”
Amen arōoy obho ịmoghon miibha bho, peedi iḍigh mịitu, keḍio ipuruan kua maPita nꞌiteledōm obho, “Aburumōr, ezōor toḍighi ẹko siibha bho?”
Keḍio aPita ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ikiton meghiraan tịkarabh enyina mezua mụum mi taḍien tạJizos Kraist molo kọḅelemaan ịkarabh enyina, penyina obhin ạni ẹnogho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho tẸnaan.
Oguan obho tẸnaan, uguan ụnogho zenyina nꞌạnwuny enyina nꞌoomo obo bho idi nạ tegbeeny obho — oomo arōoy ilo Ẹnaan Obạmọogh ezira bho abheleghi.”
Keḍio aPita aasen eedi ạḅaraghiom nꞌịnon ọnuekpete aliiki aghōl kua, “Ịpela lōor enyina mi tạliliom ọmiinom obho natuanaan miḍighi mịkarabh arōoy bhibha bho.”
Ọlogh eedi emōruōm dōm obho molo iru izua mụum. Ọnu arōoy obo bho ụlogh ụḅaram tobo bho imōruōm obho tẹkian ni moḍual nꞌạmaḍian ọonir arōoy ḍuma popo.
Keḍio obo bho imōruōm obho ibhin moomo amen eedi mọtuugha ghạ ịtuugha iteledōm obho, nꞌookōbhōghian ghạ onyiin esi, nꞌole ghạ eḍian ạruumugh obho, nꞌookpulughu ghạ Ẹnaan.
Iteledōm obho iḍighi mọlogh ọkpo ibꞌaruugu, molo aruugu isibh moomo arōoy obho.
Keḍio oomo eedi obo bho imōruōm obho ịrol ghạ monyiin esi, ịḍianogh ghạ ile ghạ mogbo mọkpo obho eedi ịteeny obho.
Eedi iḅoḍi ghạ kạar kạar olo eedi ịteeny, ẹseghe mikpoki obho ẹḍi kōoy kōoy tẹzo ekulom odi.
Oomo aḍuma mobho eedi iikōbhōghian ghạ mi totu iikpulughu obho, keḍio eedi ile ghạ nạ mariḍian eedi monyiin esi mi tarutu eedi, ibhin ghạ tosōoriōm alōor nꞌọḅaal ologhi iliom meḍian obho.
Eedi ịsebh ghạ mẸnaan, iḍigh nạ tologhi oomo arōoy. Keḍio oomo aḍuma Obạmọogh obho ạlogh ghạ ạḅaram eedi marōoy obo bho nọpel tịkarabh eedi obho.
Onyiin aḍuma tịraar asuo ootaany, paPita nꞌạJon nẹki mookpulughu Ẹnaan mi totu iikpulughu obho.

Tonyiin Ọnu-otu olo eedi ighōl ạneghe bho, kir ẹkugha ōoy olo dorele ghạ ḍio moomo aghuḍum odi. Oomo aḍuma pobhin ghạ odi ọghi oseeri todi ọnu-otu obho mogbẹel ghạ igbẹel mi tarōoy obho netu ghạ moḍigh totu iikpulughu obho.
Amen odi ạmiin maPita nꞌạJon, podi agbẹel zeedi mọnogho odi mạar.
Keḍio eedi ịmaar iinon taghisigh obhꞌodi, keḍio aPita ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Nonon ezōor!”
Podi ạmaar naanon zeedi naḅōrō mobho eedi tẹnogho zodi mạar.
Keḍio aPita ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ikpoki ilo ạami ụteeny olo, keḍio ibha ạami ụteeny obho ạami tạnogho ni ạna: taḍien tạJizos Kraist obhꞌạNazaret, ḅetunu marele!”
Keḍio odi ạbham moḍiom ạvo ōoy obho ạmarami. Tonyiin amen obho, pasike nꞌịikpoghor asike bhꞌodi ịghua ịman,
podi apẹl ạmara ạke morele. Keḍio odi ạtuonuman zeedi aḍigh ạni totu iikpulughu obho, apẹlẹghu nꞌọḅaal ologhi, abuom mẸnaan.
Keḍio ọlogh arōoy obho ịmiin odi mobho odi natele nabuom mẸnaan.
Amen eedi ịlogh zodi melẹgh mobho odi aru moogbẹel miigbẹel obho nạtol ghạ tỌnu-otu obho ạneghe bho, poomo eedi neemōogh mi tibha imutenaan odi obho.
Oomo arōoy obho iimōogh ni men obho eedi ịmiin mobho ōoy obho aḅol maPita nꞌạJon keḍio ighiil ịtuonuman zeedi ịghi tẹkul obho ughōl bọ Ạpe tạSolomon obho.

Amen aPita ạmiin rōoy obho, keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Arōoy Izirẹl, ebum eeghe kenyina neemōogh mi tiibha bho? Eeghe kenyina neenon kua zezōor? Enyina ighōdi ezōor ubhin tịnyaam nꞌoḍighi iiḅi ezōor koḍighiom mōoy obhobho morele?

Ẹnaan obho tEbrạhạm nꞌẠizik nꞌạJekob, Ẹnaan obho igbōgh ạburude ezira nạanogho mạJizos Ọony-otu odi meghuan. Odi obho enyina ịseghe ịlogh tạravo ạruula bho, keḍio enyina igin odi mi taghisigh taPailet, oomo ibha aPailet ẹkona naamōrō mọḅelemaan odi obho.
Oḍighi ịkarabh ilo todi, odi ooḅi ōoy nạ, keḍio enyina igin ni zodi ekiton ku egbẹel maPailet mọḅelemaan ọokoma.
Keḍio enyina ighigh zodi obo bho ạteeny bọ ghuḍum obho. Keḍio Ẹnaan aḅẹtōn zodi mi tọbho bho — keḍio ezōor nọgba mabaabha bho ọnogho rōoy.

Tịnyaam aḍien odi pẹkugha ōoy obho ạteeny ịnyaam olo oreliom. Iibha bho enyina nẹemiin ilōghōm nạ bho uḍighi mi tologhi omōruōm taḍien odi: ologhi omōruōm mi taḍien tạJizos mobho uukuōm mōoy obhobho mi taghisigh enyina.
“Keḍio esiibha bho, aburumōr ạmi, ạami ulōghōm mobho ibha enyina nꞌạruula bho iḍighi mạJizos obho, enyina ilōghōm io ni.
Ẹnaan nạagba kọkanya amen mi tarizil obho mibha aKraist obhꞌodi tạmiinom ni; keḍio odi aḍighi nạ mẹzo bho iru magey.
Toomo ipa bẹleni, ikiraan tesi ịkarabh enyina mesōmōghan mẸnaan molo odi kạagburion mịkarabh obhꞌenyina katughuneen,
molo Obạmọogh obho ạnogho enyina maruḍuma ilo oḍighi ạruumugh enyina otẹnẹ imoom, atōm nạ mạJizos ạMesaya bho odi nạason ạseghe ạnogho enyina bho.
Odi tạtol ni mi tạnyu ninii ạteeny mamen obho kạar kạar toḍighi otẹnẹ mimoom, kẹzo bho Ẹnaan ạgba ạnogho migbaany arizil obho ịrol bọ mi tamen olo neetẹn ibia.
AMozis mạakpete kua, ‘Ẹnaan Obạmọogh enyina bho tạnogho ni enyina mozil, kẹzo bho odi ạnogho ạami zenyina bho, olꞌeesoḍia arōoy enyina. Ịmaar mẹmoghonyan kạar kạar olo odi ạkpete ạnogho zenyina.
Kōoy kōoy olo ọmoghon io mibha odi ozil obho tạkpete ạnogho zenyina bho, tọseghe ni zodi otughuneen mi tarōoy tẸnaan.’
Arizil obho ịgba dōm obho ki tamen tạSamuel nꞌoomo obo bho ịtuonuman zodi obho, ẹgba maḍuma bhobho.

Aruguan obho tẸnaan obho arizil obho ịgba bho ilꞌenyina, keḍio enyina tele rutu tịzo bho Ẹnaan aghiran nꞌạburude enyina bho. Kẹzo bho odi ạkpete ạnogho mEbrạhạm obho, ‘Tạnwuny onuma pobo ạami tạsebh oomo arōoy obho idi tade bho.’
Ipa kiḍighi kẸnaan ạseghe mỌony-otu odi arōm molo abhira aru tenyina, mọsebh enyina oḍighi olo enyina keghiraan tịkarabh araabōom enyina.”
Ẹzo bho aPita nꞌạJon idi nini nẹgba nẹnogho rōoy obho, parōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌọola otu iikpulughu obho nꞌarōoy aSadusi obho iru teedi.
Eedi nẹle mibha ịzal iteledōm obho nẹtughumiom rōoy moḅetunu tọbho bho tạJizos nꞌiibha nẹgba neḍeeriom mibha obo ụbho bho teḅerenu ni.
Aḍio nakul peedi iḅol zeedi ịloghom tikoli mọliom eedi meḍie.
Ọlogh obo bho ịmoghon dōm obho imōruōm; keḍio ọlogh eedi obo bho neemōruōm obho iru iḍighi maḍisibh nꞌōogh ọonir.
Ạḅaal pạruula nꞌarukenya bhꞌaJu obho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho iikōbhōghian taJerusạlẹm.
Ạnas uvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho, nꞌạKayafas nꞌạJon nꞌẠleksanda, nꞌoomo arōoy ipedi obho ilꞌeghun otu uvẹmụ obho pobo ịrol ạni.
Keḍio eedi iru ịmarami miteledōm obho mi tamusigh eedi ipuruan kua zeedi, “Enyina iikō ẹko mōoy obhobho? Tikir ịnyaam nạ taḍien okōr ōoy mibha enyina ibhin kiḍighi moḍighi obhobho?”
PaPita abhin mịnyaam tẸmugh Iigbia bho ạbhagharana kua zeedi, “Ạruula nꞌarukenya arōoy,
erumolo aadon enyina nepuruan zezōor mi toḍighi iiḅi olo uḍighi ụnogho mẹkugha ōoy obhobho nꞌẹzo ezōor uukō zodi,

pilōghōm kua. Oomo enyina arōoy Izirẹl ilōghōm mobho ōoy obhobho ạmara bọ taghisigh enyina bho naaḍum ạman. Uukō tịnyaam aḍien tạJizos Kraist obhꞌạNazaret — obo bho enyina ịkan bọ ighigh obho, keḍio Ẹnaan aḅẹtōn zodi tọbho bho.
Odi ạJizos pobo bho ẹegia bho ạgba bọ kua,
‘Ọpaḍi ọbharakpar obho iḅōghi rutu obho igin obho naaru ạla mạar apu.’
“Ịbhelegha ilo tọnon tughuneen todi ḍio. Tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho, ọnon ōoy olo Ẹnaan nạanogho rōoy maḍien odi molo obhin ọbhelom ezira olo.”

Obo bho ịrolom delede mọkpe bho iimōogh ni mọmiin ọoghuanaan ologhi obho aPita nꞌạJon ịteeny obho, nꞌomina olōghōm mibha eedi iru mapa arōoy ilo ọmiin ọbhereer ilo. Keḍio eedi tetu elōghōm mibha eedi ịtuonuman ghạ mạJizos.
Molo bọbon ạar olo eedi ịteeny mọkpete ọnogho eedi olo, mẹzo bho eedi nẹmiin mōoy obho uukō bho ạmaranuan nꞌaPita nꞌạJon obho.
Peedi ibhirighan zeedi mi totu ạkoti obho mọḍeghe ilo eedi tesōbh ẹnogho zeedi.

Keḍio eedi ipuruan kua silōor eedi, “Ezira tọkpete meeghe ọnogho marōoy bhibha? Oōy olo odi taJerusạlẹm olo olōghōm io mibha eedi iḍighi mibꞌọkpo ibꞌaruugu bhibha olo, keḍio ezira ẹkona urue ḍio ọbharanaan.
Ẹzo olo oḍighi olo ọkpo bhibha ilela ḍio moomo arōoy, ezira tookiom zeedi mọḅele ọkpete ạar mi taḍien tạJizos.”
Keḍio eedi ibheleghi zeedi iru, ịkpete ịnogho zeedi meedi ịgba mu, ịtughumiom mu nạ mi taḍien tạJizos, kẹzo kẹzo ilo ịrol.
Keḍio aPita nꞌạJon ịbhagharana kua zeedi, “Iḍighen ịneghe epu moḍighi mi taghisigh tẸnaan? Oghiilaan enyina bẹlee koghiilaan Ẹnaan?
Ezōor urue ḍio ọḅele mọgba ibha ezōor nịvo nịvo nọomiin ụmoghon obho.”
Keḍio eedi arōoy ạkoti obho imina ịmaar iikiom zeedi ịghuemi keḍio imutiom zeedi mịkpo. Ekpo ạar olo eedi ịmiin mobhin ọliom eedi olo, ẹzo bho oomo arōoy obho nebuom mẸnaan mi tibha imute obho.
Odi ōoy obho uukō bho nạakpo apu merubal ạsia.
Eedi imute kua be, paPita nꞌạJon ighiil imula togbo bhꞌeedi ịgba moomo ibha aruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarukenya bho ịkpete ịnogho zeedi obho.
Amen eedi ịmoghon, peedi itul mọnu iikpulughu mẸnaan, “Obạmọogh obho ạlem bọ mạnyu nꞌade bho nꞌọbhiiny obho nꞌoomo ọkpo bho idi bọ teedi obho.
Ạna ubhin mẸmugh Iigbia bho ạkpete kua mi taDevid ogbōgh ọde ezōor, ọony-otu onuma,
‘Eeghe kobo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan nemutiom ḍien?
Eeghe karōoy nẹva miben ạraakpe ilo ẹmu olo?
Ạruula ẹmar-arōoy obho neekōbhōghia silōor eedi,
keḍio aruvẹmụ obho neetul mọnu moḅe Obạmọogh obho nꞌaKraist obhꞌodi.’
“Agey nạ ni mibha ạHerod nꞌạPontios Pailet itul ọnu tẹma bhobho nꞌarōoy obho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho nꞌarōoy Izirẹl morubhiom ạJizos Ọony-otu iigbia bhꞌonuma, odi obho ạna uḍighi aru maKraist obho.
Oomo eedi iikōbhōghian mọtuugh oḍighi ibha ạna nꞌịnyaam onuma nạato aseeri milo temute ni.
Keḍio esiibha bho, Obumọogh, mạar ạmiin mibha eedi nẹpaama, keḍio nọgho ni zezōor ạrubana tonuma mịikpo olo ọgba adōm obho tonuma nꞌịnyaam.
Sele ni mạvo tonuma maakō, maḍighi molo ọkpo ibꞌaruugu temute ni taḍien tạJizos Ọony-otu iigbia bhꞌonuma.”
Ẹzo bho eedi iikpulughu nẹḅele bho, pesi obho eedi idi obho aazighinian. Keḍio Ẹmugh Iigbia bho aru aḍigh teedi amuzō, keḍio eedi ịke mọgba adōm obho tẸnaan nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi.
Keḍio ogbo obo bho imōruōm obho irughan ghạ nꞌonyiin ologhi nꞌonyiin ịitua. Bọbon ōoy olo ạseghe mạar odi aghōl olꞌodi be olo, eedi ịḍian ghạ kạar kạar mogbo.
Tigbōgh ịnyaam mibha iteledōm obho ibhinom ịgba moḅetunu tọbho bho tạJizos Obạmọogh obho, keḍio Ẹnaan ạnogho zeedi migbōgh ạlisebh.
Bọbon ōoy olꞌogbo bho olo ọteeny ạni ḍio mạar ole nꞌoḍighia olo. Obo bho ịteeny bọ marade nꞌarutu iḅool ni, ebhin ikpoki obho eedi iḅool obho,
ẹnogho miteledōm obho, keḍio tọḍi mikpoki obho ọnogho kōoy kōoy mi tẹzo bho ịiḅaghami odi ịbugh isi.

Pẹzo imute keḍio onyiin ōoy olo ughōl aJosef, olꞌeghun otu taLivai, ụmar odi mi tạSaipros, (iteledōm obho ighōl aḍien ughẹel odi mạBanabas — azin aḍien obho ughōl “Ọony olo nạsuanaan ghạ rōoy ghụsan,”)
aḅool moḍighi odi abhin ikpoki obho aruom iteledōm obho.
Pōoy olo ughōl Ạnanayas nꞌạni odi olo ughōl aSafaira iḅool ọkpo ilo eedi ịteeny,
keḍio ịḅoki mẹde ikpoki obho iseerian lōor eedi. Olom obho ạseghe mẹde be ạghiom miteledōm obho keḍio ạni obhꞌodi alōghōm ạni.

Keḍio aPita apuruan zodi, “Sey, Ạnanayas, eeghe imute kạna ạḅelemaan mEru obho moreliom ologhi obhꞌonuma mọgba iben ọnogho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho, molo ạna useeri mẹde ikpoki obho ạna ụteeny mi tọkpo obhꞌonuma ạna uḅool obho?

Amen obho ạna doḅool io bho, eedi ọkpo bho ilꞌonuma ḍio bẹle; suo ạna naaḅool obho, ikpoki obho ilꞌonuma nạ ḍio? Eeghe ịkar emute kạna ạteeny mịkarabh ịitua mi tologhi onuma mọḅoki ẹde ikpoki obhꞌonuma? Ạna ọgbaam io miben obho marōoy be, ạna ụgbaam ụnogho nꞌẸnaan.”
Ẹzo bho Ạnanayas ạmoghon miibha bho be podi ameel ạbho. Oomo obo bho ịmoghon miibha bho, iḍiku ruugu mi teedi.
Keḍio ạnwuny ughẹel obho iḍigh, ịseghe moḍim obho ịghoroghi ịseghe ịghi iḍi.
Ịbam amen iru itẹn pạni odi aru aḍigh, odi olōghōm io mibha neemute bho.
APita apuruan kua zodi, “Gbạ magey obho: iibha pạkar ọnu ikpoki ibha olom onuma nꞌạna iḅool bọ mọkpo bhꞌenyina bho?” Keḍio odi amōrō mu, “Ii, ipa poomo eedi.”
Keḍio aPita ạkpete nạ kua ạnogho zodi, “Eeghe imute kạna nꞌolom onuma etul ọnu mọdegh Ẹmugh tObạmọogh obho? Obo bho ịghi moḍi olom onuma bho neesi suo ọnu-otu obho, eedi tetōol ạna ẹki eḍi siibha!”
Tonyiin amen obho podi ameel tasike odi ạbho. Amen ạnwuny ughẹel obho iru iḍigh ịmiin mobho odi nạabho, keḍio eedi ịseghe zodi ịghi iḍi tọtu olom odi.
Keḍio iibha bho iḍiku ruugu moomo arōoy ạsosi obho nꞌoomo obo bho ịmoghon obho.
Piteledōm obho iḍighi rōoy mịkanya ọkpo ibꞌaruugu. Oomo obo bho imōruōm obho iikōbhōghian ghạ monyiin esi mi tesi ẹtolom obho tạSolomon.
Oomo bho arōoy obho nekiilaan zeedi obho, keḍio tughuneen zeedi be ḍio, ọnon ōoy olo ane ghạ aḍighom zeedi olo.
Keḍio ọnu ilobhir nꞌạraani ilo ikiton imōruōm ạni mObạmọogh obho iḍigh ạni nꞌịḅel ọlogh obho ẹbugh magey.

Ibha iteledōm obho neeḍighi obho neelegheri molo kesi kesi olo aPita arele natẹn mi taraabōom nꞌoomo ariisi, porōol obo bho nẹnweey obho mi tạrumuna nꞌịtagara obhin koru molo bọbon ookōogh odi kazuom zeedi.
Keḍio arōoy ilo idi ghạ tịbam ạraama ibha ikō maJerusạlẹm obho ibhin ghạ marōoy ilo asilōor ịnegheey io nꞌarōoy ilo ịkarabh ạruumugh nẹeḅaghami eru, keḍio uukōoy ni ọman.
Puvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho nꞌoomo obo bho itul ọnu nꞌodi togbo aSadusi obho ịlogh ḍien miteledōm obho, iguan moḍighi eedi mạar.
Peedi iḅologh miteledōm obho ịlokiom tikoli.
Ạteeny muḍugul potelema tObạmọogh obho aru aghuuron meguugh ikoli obho, abhin zeedi amutiom ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi.
“Ịki mẹmara totu iikpulughu obho, mẹgba mẹnogho marōoy milo igboloman nꞌomoom aghuḍum obho.”
Keḍio iteledōm obho imōruōm, ịghi totu iikpulughu obho mụḍirogh ịrol ịtughumiom.
Keḍio uvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua obho nꞌarōoy odi iikōbhōghi moomo arukenya aJu obho mọteeny obꞌotu ạkoti; keḍio ubheleghi miteledōm obho ubhin uru ụmarami tasumusigh eedi.
Amen ạruula bho iru, eedi ịmiin io miteledōm obho tikoli obho, keḍio imula ịghi ịgba totu ạkoti obho maa,
“Amen ezōor ụghi usi totu ikoli obho, nọomaar ọḍuuy obho, obo iḅōrō bho idi nạ neḅōrō; keḍio amen ezōor ughuuron eguugh obho, bọbon ōoy olo odi tologhi obho olo!”
Amen uvẹmụ obo iḅōrō otu iikpulughu obho nꞌaruvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua obho ịmoghon mẹzo bho, pu neemōogh mạar olo neemutenaan miteledōm obho.
Keḍio onyiin ōoy aru ạgba kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịmiin! Arōoy obho enyina ịloghom bọ mikoli obho idi totu iikpulughu obho nẹtughumiom rōoy obho.”
Podi uvẹmụ obho ạbham rōoy mọghi ọseghe iteledōm obho omulumi. Ubhin io mịnyaam tẹzo bho eedi nekiil obho molo arōoy obho itōḅōl zeedi.
Keḍio eedi ibhin miteledōm obho iru ịmarami tạkoti obho, keḍio uvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho apuruan kua zeedi,

“Ạami ughōdi, ezōor nookiom zenyina molo enyina kẹḅele mọtughumiom mi taḍien ōoy obhobho, keḍio mịin ẹzo enyina neḍighi. Enyina meelelemi moomo aJerusạlẹm mịtughumiom enyina, molo enyina netu mọḅam ịḅaal ōoy obhobho mi tẹmu ezōor.”
Keḍio aPita nꞌiteledōm ipedi obho ịbhagharana imulumian zeedi ighōl kua, “Ezōor tokiilaan mẸnaan, arōoy io.
Ẹnaan ạburude ezira aḅẹtōn mạJizos mi tọbho bho, suo enyina ịkan zodi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho ighigh zodi obho.
Ẹnaan aḅẹtōn zodi mi toḍiom odi kUvẹmụ nꞌỌpela, mọnogho arōoy Izirẹl mamen olo eedi keghiraan tịkarabh eedi, milo Ẹnaan kạḅelemaan zeedi.
Ezōor nꞌẸmugh Iigbia bho Ẹnaan nạnogho mobo bho nekiilaan zodi obho ku nọgba mabaabha bho nọnogho rōoy.”
Amen arōoy ạkoti obho ịmoghon ẹzo bho, pologhi eedi aḅẹebh magey eedi nẹva mọze iteledōm obho.
Keḍio onyiin eedi, olꞌaFarisi obho olo ughōl aGameliel, obo ịtughumiom iilōgh obho olo oomo arōoy obho nekiilaan magey, aḅetunu ạmara tạkoti obho, ạto mobhirighan iteledōm obho omutiom mịbam amen ku,
keḍio ạkpete kua ạnogho mạkoti obho, “Arōoy Izirẹl, ịmaar megon mibha enyina netu moḍighi arōoy bhibha bho.

Tamen olo neetẹn, aTeodas amute aghōl modi monyiin ogbōgh ōoy, keḍio ọlogh arōoy ilo tẹkian ni mọonir arōoy iḍigh nꞌodi. Ughigh ni zodi, poomo obo bho ịtuonuman zodi obho ighilighu ni ẹḍuaghu, keḍio ogbo bhꞌeedi abhẹ.
Iibha iru itẹn, paJudas obhꞌaGalili aru nạ mi tamen ọḅalagh arōoy obho; odi ẹkona aḍur nạ mọlogh arōoy ạseghe, keḍio odi ẹkona ạbho ni keḍio oomo obo bho ịtuonuman odi obho ịizaranu.

Keḍio esiibha bho mi tabaabha bho nạ, ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina, ịḅelemaan rōoy bhibha, íḍighi ghạ zeedi mạar. Eru molo iibha bho eedi neḍighi obho iru milꞌịnyaam ōoy, ogbo bhꞌeedi tapẹ ni nạ kipedi obho.
Keru kạar olo ịḍua tẸnaan kiru, enyina irue ḍio ẹmaranuan zeedi. Ikunughi obho, enyina tẹtol eḅe mẸnaan!” Pạkoti obho imōruōm iikiom taGameliel.
Keḍio eedi ibheleghi miteledōm obho iḍighom, ịgurogh zeedi, keḍio ịkpete ịnogho zeedi mọḅele ọgba taḍien tạJizos kamen kamen; keḍio eedi imutiom zeedi.
Eedi iteledōm obho imute tạkoti obho nꞌogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi mibha Ẹnaan naabhin zeedi aseeri karōoy ilo igbẹbh mọmiinom ịiḅaghami mi taḍien tạJizos.
Keḍio eedi ịtughumiom ghạ, ịgba nạ mooḅi adōm obho tạJizos Kraist moomo aruḍuma mi totu iikpulughu obho nꞌarutu arōoy.

Aruḍuma bhibha, ọnu obo bho nẹtuonuman obho neeru eḍighan; keḍio ạruruan imute teesoḍia arōoy aJu obho nẹmoghon nẹkpa mọnu-ẹma aGris obho nꞌobo bho nẹmoghon nẹkpa mọnu aHibru obho mobho uunon io marukpukele ạraani eedi mi tạmaḍian eḍian obho moomo aruḍuma.
Paḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm obho ibheleghi moomo obo bho nẹtuonuman obho iikōbhōghi monyiin esi keḍio ịkpete kua, “Ịneghe ḍio molo ezōor kọḅele mọgba ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan koru kọḍi ghạ meḍian.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, aburumōr, ịson oḍual arōoy mi tenyina ilo Ẹmugh Iigbia bho amuzō ni teedi, ịteeny nạ magey olōghōm ạar, molo ezōor tokuugh moḍighi obho ọnogho zeedi.
Ezōor nịvo nịvo tọnogho malōor obho mookpulughu ghạ nꞌoḍighi ọgba ọnuekpete tẸnaan.”

Ibha iteledōm obho ịḍeghe obho iḍigh ni tologhi oomo ogbo bho; keḍio eedi iru ịson maStivin, ōoy olo ọoghuanaan ologhi omōruōm nꞌẸmugh Iigbia bho amuzō ni talōor odi, nꞌaFilip nꞌạProkoros nꞌaNikanor, nꞌaTimon, nꞌaPamenas nꞌaNikolaos, isoloman olꞌẠntiok olo aghiraan naakpulughu mẸnaan aJu obho.
Keḍio eedi ịseghe zeedi ịmarami tasumusigh iteledōm obho, keḍio eedi iikpulughu ịnogho zeedi, ịḅamaghi rạvo eedi mi tẹmu eedi.
Tesuo keḍio ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan amina alela nạki taghisigh. Ọnu obo bho nẹtuonuman obho mi taJerusạlẹm neḍighan magey moomo amen, keḍio ọlogh arōoy iḅo miiḅua iru ạni imōruōm nạ.
AStivin ōoy olo Ẹnaan nạasebh magey ạnogho nạ mịnyaam aḍighi mọkpo ibꞌaruugu mi tasumusigh arōoy obho.

Pẹtede arōoy iru nẹnwiom zodi: eedi arōoy aJu ibhꞌaSairini nꞌẠleksandria ilꞌotu ịtughumiom olo ughōl otu ịtughumiom arōoy obo bho neemuzaan (pẹzo ughōl zeedi). Eedi nꞌịnon arōoy aJu ilꞌaSilisia nꞌEsia ịke mọghanan aStivin.
Keḍio Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạnogho maStivin molōghōm ạar olo amen ạkpete eedi irue ḍio mọghanan odi.
Peedi ịghi iḅia rōoy ilo oghōl ekua, “Ezōor ụmoghon mibha odi nạkpete ạpue maMozis nꞌẸnaan!”
Tẹzo bho peedi iḍighi molo nẹekany marōoy obho nꞌarukenya bho nꞌobo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho. Keḍio iru ịbham maStivin, ibhin zodi ịghi tạkoti obho.
Keḍio eedi ibhin rōoy ịgbaam odi miben ighōl kua, “Oōy obhobho nạgbaaghiom mịkarabh motu iigbia iikpulughu ezira nꞌaraalōgh obho taMozis.
Ezōor ụmoghon mibha odi aghōl mạJizos obhꞌạNazaret tạakpo ni motu iikpulughu obho, anweeghi nạ moomo eḍighiom ạar obhꞌezira ibha ịḍua taMozis iru obho!”
Keḍio oomo obo bho idi bọ tạkoti obho igbiom riḍien eedi maStivin keḍio ịmiin mobho aghisigh obhꞌodi nạagbaanan mamusigh obhꞌotelema tẸnaan.
Keḍio uvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho apuruan kua maStivin, “Agey nạ ni miibha bho?”

Suo keḍio aStivin tạpagharana akōl kua, “Aburumōr nꞌạburude, ịmoghon ạami! Ẹnaan obho aḍigh ni meghuan obho amutenaan Ebrạhạm ogbōgh ọde ezira tamen obho odi natugh ni mi taMesopotamia obho, keḍio odi tagbi mọghi orugh tạHeran,
ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Ḅẹle meghun otu nꞌarōoy onuma maru mạghi tade olo ạami taḍeeriom ạna.’
Tẹzo bho podi ạḅele made aKaldia obho ạghi morugh mi tạHeran. Amen ọde tEbrạhạm ạbho, pẸnaan aḍighi molo odi ạḍua aru tẹma bhobho, obho enyina idi siibha bho.
Bọbon esi olo Ẹnaan ạnogho mEbrạhạm, bọbon eekpu eḍum olo; keḍio Ẹnaan aru aguan zodi modi tạnogho zodi nạ mạnwuny ọobhe bho tetu tạman odi obho. Tamen obho Ẹnaan aguan miibha bho, Ebrạhạm ọony olo.
Iibha bho pibha Ẹnaan ạkpete ạnogho zodi, ‘Ạnwuny ọobhe onuma tetughogh tọnon ẹma kạrubana keḍio tọmiine zeedi mọonir ạsia.
Ạami tasōbh ni rạakpe ạnogho marōoy obho eedi tekumuan obho. Amen iibha neetẹn peedi omute tẹma popo oru tesuo ookpulughu ạmi.’

Keḍio Ẹnaan ạnogho mEbrạhạm meḍighiom ạar iḍuna bho melẹgh ịzo oguan obho. Tipa bẹleni pEbrạhạm aru aḍun mẠizik mamen obho ụmar odi oḍual aḍuma itẹn, pẠizik aḍun mạJekob, keḍio ạJekob aḍunogh maḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạnwuny todi, igbōgh ạburude arughun otu tezira.
“Ạburude arughun otu tezira ibōbhan maJosef, keḍio iru iḅool odi mẹbana mi tIzipt. Ẹnaan ạrolan nini zodi,

keḍio ạbhel nini zodi magey mi toomo ịiḅaghami odi. Amen ubhin maJosef uru taFero ọolema obhꞌIzipt, Ẹnaan ạnogho ni zodi mooḅi eḍighiom ạar nꞌolōghōm ạar. PaFero ạnogho maJosef mẹmoogh oomo ebhugh obho nꞌoghōol otu ọolema bho.
Keḍio oḅẹer aru tebhugh obhꞌIzipt nꞌaKenan, olo ạnogho mọmiinom magey. Igbōgh ạburude bhꞌezira ịmiin io meḍian.
Tamen olo ạJekob ạmoghon mibha eḍian idi tIzipt, pọḅel amen odi arōm mạnwuny odi igbōgh ạburude bhꞌezira mọghi tIzipt.
Amen eedi ịghi mobho tagbẹbhiōm ịzal amen obho, paJosef ạgba aḍeeriom lōor odi maburumōr obhꞌodi, keḍio aFero tatu alōghōm meghun otu taJosef.
Keḍio aJosef tatōm dōm ạkiom ạJekob ọde odi molo odi nꞌeghun otu odi keru tIzipt: oomo bhꞌeedi erubal nꞌaḍisibh ḍiōbh nꞌōogh arōoy.
Suo pạJekob ạghi tIzipt, tesi obho odi nꞌigbōgh ạburude obhꞌezira ịbhozu.
Iḍim obhꞌeedi ubhin ụghi tesi obho ughōl bọ ạSekem obho. Uḍiiy zeedi mi toogu obho Ebrạhạm aghuōm bọ mikpoki mi tạvo ạnwuny tạHemor.
“Amen natuan olo Ẹnaan taḍighi moguan obho odi aguanaan mEbrạhạm obho, arōoy ezira ibha ịrol tIzipt nẹebugh magey.
Tikunughi obho pọnon ọolema olo olōghōm io maJosef aru ạda mIzipt.
Keḍio odi ạdereghi marōoy obhꞌezira, ạrolom mạburude obho tezira mịkarabh ạdolomaan, ạkpaariom zeedi molo eedi kesereghi ghạ mạrunwuny mi tetẹrẹ milo ẹpozu.
Tesuo pamen ụmar maMozis, ọony olo ạneghe magey. Uukō zodi tologhi otu mịraar ụvanyu.
Tamen obho umutiom zodi totu eedi obho, pọnyani taFero ạseghe ạloghom zodi aakō kọony olꞌodi.
Oomo olōghōm ạar Izipt ụtughumiom ni zodi ọman, molo odi aru mogbōgh ōoy mi tọnuekpete nꞌeḍighiom ạar.
“Amen ạsumusia taMozis igbẹbh erubal ạsia, podi ạatua mọghi ọmiinan arōoy odi obhꞌIzirẹl.
Odi ạmiin monyiin olo ōoy olꞌIzipt naḍul, podi ạghi ạbhel zodi, aḍighi ạkpe mōoy obhꞌIzipt obho, aghigh zodi.
(Odi aghōdi arōoy bhꞌodi tẹmoghonyan ni zodi mobho Ẹnaan tạseghe zodi aḍighiom molo eedi kemuzaan, keḍio eedi ịmoghonyan io.)
Ạteeny mọnon aḍuma, podi ạmiin mịzal arōoy ilꞌIzirẹl neḅe keḍio odi ạghi mosibhi eedi. Odi ạkpete nạnogho zeedi, ‘Sọo. Enyina saburumōr. Eeghe konyiin digha amina aḍul monyiin?’
Keḍio odi obo bho naḍul bọ mopedi obho anyu maMozis atẹnẹ tọtu, apuruan kua zodi, ‘Okōr ōoy aseeri ạna mọola nꞌọtu mịiruan ezōor?
Ạna nạva moghigh ạmi kẹzo bho ạna ughigh mobhꞌIzipt obho meḍienaan obho bẹle?’
Amen aMozis ạmoghon miibha bho, podi aghiil ạḍua mi tIzipt ạghi ạke morugh tade bhꞌaMidia. Tepa podi ạteeny ịzal ạnwuny.
“Erubal ạsia iru itẹn, potelema tẸnaan amutenaan maMozis mi tologhi amuumōr ạnyan mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar olo atuan mobꞌeegum obhꞌaSainai.
AMozis aamōogh ni mi tibha odi nạmiin obho, podi ạghi atuan mọmaar ọmiin eḍum obho. Keḍio odi ạmoghon oghōrōkō tObạmọogh obho.
‘Ạami Ẹnaan tigbōgh ạburude bhꞌonuma, Ẹnaan obhꞌEbrạhạm nꞌẠizik nꞌạJekob.’ Keḍio ologhi taMozis ạrol akpooy nꞌaruugu molo odi omina ḍio ane moonon.
Keḍio Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Kpọrona rakōrō bhꞌonuma. Esi obho ạna ụmara bho ade iigbia.
Ạami nꞌꞌaanon ạmiin mọmiinom arōoy obhꞌạmi mi tIzipt. Ạami nạamoghon mịkubh obhꞌeedi. Siibha bho ạami naasōor atu mọbhel eedi. Tue siibha, ạami tatōm ạna ạki tIzipt.’

“AMozis obho arōoy Izirẹl igin bọ ipuruan zodi ighōl maa, ‘Okōr ōoy aseeri ạna mọola nꞌọtu mịiruan ezōor?’ obho, odi pobo Ẹnaan arōm kỌola nꞌỌpela, men obho otelema tẸnaan aru amutenaan zodi tologhi amuumōr ạnyan obho.
Tamen olo odi naaḍighi mịkanya ọkpo ibꞌaruugu mi tIzipt, podi abhin zeedi amutonom, ạḅolom tọbhiiny obho ughōl bọ Ọbhiiny Igbila bho, aḍighi nạ mọkpo ibꞌaruugu mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum obho merubal ạsia.
AMozis obo bho ạkpete ạnogho marōoy Izirẹl aghōl kua, ‘Ẹnaan tạnogho ni zenyina mozil odi, kẹzo bho odi ạnogho zạmi zenyina bho, olo tatu molꞌalōor enyina nịvo.’

AMozis obo bho ạrol ạni mi tookōbhōghian arōoy ibhꞌIzirẹl mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum obho: odi ạrolan ạni mạburude obhꞌezira nꞌotelema tẸnaan obho ạkpete bọ mạar ạnogho zodi mi tobꞌeegum obhꞌaSainai bho. Odi ạmoghon moghōrōkō tẸnaan obho omuneen ghạ ḍio ạnogho zezira bho.
“Keḍio igbōgh ạburude obhꞌezira igin moghiilaan odi, inyu zodi itẹnẹ tọtu, ịva momula tIzipt,
ịkpete nạ ịnogho Eron ighōl kua, ‘Lẹm maruru mạnogho ezōor ilo tekpo zezira eḍionom. Ezōor ulōghōm io milo neemutenaan maMozis obho abhin ezira amutonom mi tIzipt obho.’
Tesuo peedi tẹlem meru olo ạgbaanan mọony ạnam, ẹtun mạar ẹnogho, keḍio tele mẹzaal nebuom moḍighi ạravo bhꞌeedi.
Keḍio Ẹnaan ạḅele zeedi, ạseghe zeedi ạnogho mookpulughu ghạ ịinaany ạnyu obho, kẹzo bho nọoge bọ mi tịbhereer arizil obho maa:
‘Arōoy Izirẹl, enyina ịze ghạ mịnam obho merubal ạsia mi teekpu eḍum obho ku negbiom molo enyina nẹtunom mạar ẹnogho zạmi?
Eenyi, enyina ịgban ghạ meḅina bhꞌạMolok nꞌẹenaany obhꞌaRefayim,
maruru obho enyina ịlemogh mookpulughu obho.
Ạami tapirighan ni zenyina ạseghe atẹnōm nạ mạBabilon.’
“Ẹnaan ạrolan nꞌigbōgh ạburude ezira mi totu-eḍum iikpulughu olo notōol ghạ ni mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum obho. Uḅōgh nạ kẹzo bho Ẹnaan ạtughumiom maMozis obho, kẹzo bho uḍeeriom nạ zodi obho.

Otu-eḍum opopo ạrol ạteeny mọnon ọoke tigbōgh ạburude bhꞌezira. Eedi ibhin ni irōol zodi otu eḍum iikpulughu obho ẹtuonuman maJosua mi tamen obho eedi ịghi mọḅirogh arade bho Ẹnaan abhirighanogh rōoy obho ạnogho zeedi obho. Keḍio ạrol suo ninii ạteeny mamen taDevid.
Odi aḍigh tologhi tẸnaan molo odi agbẹel mẸnaan molo odi kaḅōgh motu kạnogho zodi Ẹnaan tạJekob.
Keḍio ạSolomon pobo aḅōgh motu obho ạnogho zodi.
“Keḍio Ẹnaan obho ạbugh bọ apu kạar kạar obho orugh ghạ ḍio mi tarutu ilo arōoy iḅōgh, kẹzo bho ozil obho ạkpete bho,
‘Ẹnaan ạkpete kua: Ạnyu obho pẹtolom ạmi,
keḍio ade bho poḅeleriom asike ạmi.
Okōr oḍigh otu mobho ạna taḅōgh ạnogho zạmi?
Esi obhooghia ạmi kodi teḍighen?
Oomo ọkpo bhibha ạami ụlem io bẹle?’

“Ịmiin ọḅaar ẹmu obho tenyina! Ịmiin ịkarabh iloghi obho tenyina mẹzo enyina itẹnẹghu mikpom araḅeri mi tadōm tẸnaan. Igbōgh ạburude obho tenyina nꞌenyina akẹrekere olo. Enyina ẹkona nẹḍaanan nạ mẸmugh Iigbia bho.

Kir ozil olo igbōgh ạburude obhꞌenyina ịnogho ḍio mịiḅaghami? Eedi ịze ni miteledōm obho tẸnaan, obo bho ịgba kọkanya amen moru obho tỌony-otu odi obho ịkarabh ilo bho. Keḍio esiibha enyina neeḅool ekigh zodi.
Enyina obo bho ibhin bọ maraalōgh tẸnaan obho, ibha itelema tẸnaan ibhin iruom enyina bho — oomo ipa ẹkona enyina iikō nạ ḍio.”
Amen arōoy ạkoti obho ịmoghon mibha aStivin ạgba bho, piloghi obhꞌeedi iḅẹebh molo ạruumu obhꞌeedi iibhuughogh keḍio eedi ịghiir rạlaay eedi nꞌọkarabh ologhi.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho naamuzō agbẹbh talōor taStivin, keḍio odi aanon tạnyu obho ạmiin meghuan obho tẸnaan, nꞌạJizos nạamara toḍiom ạvo tẸnaan.
Odi ạkpete kua, “Sey, ịmiin ạni. Ạami nạmiin mibha ạnyu obho naakperenu keḍio Ọony Oōy obho nạamara toḍiom ạvo tẸnaan!”
Peedi iḅulughia raḅeri eedi, imulughu ighughaan izuom zodi.
Ibhin odi imutiom tẹma bho irōḅōl odi. Arōoy bhibha ịkporona mọkpo eedi ịnogho monyiin onyughẹel olo ughōl ạSol mọbham.
Ẹzo bho eedi netōḅōl odi obho, podi abheleghi mObạmọogh obho aghōl kua, “ẠJizos Obạmọogh, sẹghe ghuḍum obho tạmi.”
Keḍio odi azuman aakpulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō aghōl kua, “Obumọogh, ụḅamam ghạ mịkarabh ibhibha mi tẹmu eedi!” Odi ạkpete kua ạḅele, podi ạbho.
Eḍigh tologhi tạSol moḍighi ạrookoma bhibha.

Odi aḍuma popo parōoy ạsosi obho idi bọ taJerusạlẹm obho ịke mọmiinom mi tạravo obo bho imōruōm io bho, molo oomo obo bho imōruōm obho tughuneen miteledōm obho ḍio, ịizaranu toomo ebhugh obhꞌaJudia nꞌaSameria.
Keḍio ẹtede arōoy ilo itulan mẸnaan iḍi maStivin, ịitu zodi nꞌigbōgh eḍi.
Keḍio ạSol ạva mobhiẹmi ạsosi obho, ạḍua ghạ motu atẹn motu ạghoghogh ghạ mobo bho imōruōm obho, ạraani nꞌilobhir, amutiom tetẹrẹ abhin zeedi ạghi ạlokiom ghạ zeedi mikoli.
Eedi obo bho imōruōm obho nẹezaranu, kesi kesi olo eedi ịghi, nẹgba ghạ mooḅi adōm obho.
AFilip ạḍua ạghi taSameria keḍio ạgba maKraist ạnogho rōoy obho mi tepa.
Obꞌọlogh arōoy obho ideny ni ịrol bịrim ịmaar ịmoghon mibha aFilip ạḍeghe nạnogho zeedi obho. Eedi ịmaar ịmoghonyan ịmiin nạ mọkpo ibꞌaruugu obho odi aḍighi obho.
Ịkarabh ạruumugh imuteghu ni nꞌibꞌịkanya imulughu mi tọlogh arōoy; arōoy ilo asilōor obho neemughughu nꞌilo itele ghạ ḍio ookō nạ.
Molo ogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi ạrol ni mi taSameria.
Todi ẹma bho kir ōoy olo ughōl ạSaimon, olo arōoy aSameria nekiilaan zodi magey mebum ọkpo iḍeeriom obho odi aḍighi ghạ bho. Molo odi nakōl ghạ modi ōoy.
Molo kōoy kōoy olo odi tẹma bho, igbōgh nꞌịbam, imōruōm zodi nekōl kua, “Odi pịnyaam obho tẸnaan obho ughōl bọ ‘Ibꞌịnyaam obho.’ ”
Odi maaḍighi magey mọkpo iḍeeriom obho mi tẹma bho mịkanya molo eedi nekiilaan zodi.
Keḍio tamen obho eedi imōruōm mooḅi adōm obhꞌAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan obho aFilip ạgba bho mi taḍien tạJizos Kraist obho, peedi iru izua mụum, ạraani nꞌilobhir.
ẠSaimon nịvo nịvo amōruōm ạni. Amen odi aru azua mụum obho, podi ạrolan ghạ maFilip, molo odi aamōogh magey mamen odi ạmiin mọkpo ibꞌaruugu obho aFilip naḍighi obho.
Iteledōm obhꞌaJerusạlẹm ịmoghon mibha arōoy aSameria neebhin mọnuekpete bho tẸnaan, peedi irōm aPita nꞌạJon ịghiom eedi.
Amen eedi ịghi isi, peedi iikpulughu molo obo bho imōruōm obho kebhin ạni mẸmugh Iigbia bho.
Tẹzo bho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho dosōor io mi tonyiin eedi, uzuom zeedi mụum be mi taḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho.
Keḍio aPita nꞌạJon ịḅamaghi rạvo mi tạruumu obhꞌeedi, peedi ibhin ạni mẸmugh Iigbia bho.
ẠSaimon ạmiin eedi ibhin mẸmugh Iigbia bho mi tamen obho ụḅamaghi rạvo tạruumu eedi obho, podi aru nạnogho mikpoki maPita nꞌạJon,
ạkpete kua, “Nọgho ạni ạami mịnyaam ibhibha molo kōoy kōoy olo ạami ụḅam rạvo ạmi apin ạni mẸmugh Iigbia bho.”
Keḍio aPita ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Ạna nꞌikpoki onuma iḍigh teḍum tibha ạna nạatua moghuom ikpoki mẹnogho tẸnaan obho!
Bọbon abin bolobolo ẹku olo ạna ụteeny mi toḍighi ezōor olo, tẹzo bho ologhi onuma oozuan io mi tọpaḍi obho tẸnaan.
Tebum ipa bẹleni, kiraan mi tịkarabh ịitua bhꞌonuma maakpulughu mẸnaan mọḅelemaan onuma mi tịkarabh ịitua bhibha tonuma.
Ẹzo ạami nạmiin, ạna tạḅum ni magbuay mọkpo ịnon arōoy molo ạna naaru mẹbana mi toḍighi ịkarabh.”
Keḍio ạSaimon tạkpete kua ạnogho maPita nꞌạJon, “Isesen ni, iikpulughu mObạmọogh obho mẹnogho ạami molo oomo ibha ạna ụkpete suo obho imutenaan io zạmi.”
Tamen olo aPita nꞌạJon nẹegba mọnuekpete tObạmọogh obho ịnogho rōoy, peedi imula taJerusạlẹm, ịgbaay nạ mooḅi adōm obho mi tịkanya ạraama aSameria.
Keḍio otelema tObạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho maFilip, “Ḅetunu maakōbhōghia mạghi tebōom obho ạḍua taJerusạlẹm ạghi tạGaza bho.” (Ebōom opopo ōoy olo digha ạḅol olo mu.)

PaFilip aḅetunu aakōbhōghia ạghi. Suo bho, obhaghaan ōoy olꞌẸtiopia nạaḅol tebōom opopo nakẹel. Odi ogbōgh ōoy olo nạpam ghạ mikpoki ạni-ọolema bhꞌẸtiopia. Odi ạghi taJerusạlẹm mookpulughu Ẹnaan, keḍio aḍigh oghuugh olo ẹnam nakiilom nakẹel. Ughiilom nọki obho, odi nakōl ghạ mọbhereer tẠizaya ozil obho.
Keḍio Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạkpete kua ạnogho maFilip, “Kịa matuan zodi.”
PaFilip ạghi keḍio ạmoghon bho odi nakōl bọ mi tọbhereer tẠizaya ozil obho, keḍio odi tapuruan kua zodi, “Ạna nạmoghonyan mibha ạna nakōl obho?”
Keḍio odi ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua zodi, “Kir ẹzo olo ạami kạmoghonyan, tughuneen molo ọnon ōoy tạmaar ạgba ạnogho ạami ḍio?” Keḍio odi abheleghi maFilip moru oḍigh ạni toghuugh obho.
Esi oghōl obho odi nakōl bọ bho nạgba kua,
“Odi ạrol kẹena olo nọki moghigh.
Odi ạrol kọony ẹena olo omulughu ḍio,
bho nokul subhuubh obhꞌodi.
Odi ọkpete nạ ḍio mạar.
Tẹzo bho ụloki zodi rẹgheer obho.
Pụḅele mọru agey ịiruan ọnogho odi.
Oōy olo tatue ạgba mọobhe odi olo,
tẹzo bho aghuḍum odi naakunughi tesuo ade bho.”
Keḍio ōoy obho apuruan kua maFilip, “Kạr ạgba mạnogho ạami, odi ozil obho nạgba milꞌokōr ōoy? Ilꞌodi bẹlee kọnon ōoy?”
Keḍio aFilip tạke mọḍeghe, ạkiom zodi adōm obho tozil obho aru ạgbaam mooḅi adōm obho tạJizos.
Ẹzo bho eedi nẹki obho, peedi iru isi tesi olo ạmuum idi, keḍio odi ōoy obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Iibha ạmuum. Ẹkaraan temina ẹpuenaan zạmi mozua ạmuum obho?”
[Keḍio aFilip tạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Eru molo ạna umōruōm nꞌoomo ologhi onuma, pạna ozua ạmuum obho.” Keḍio ōoy obho ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami naamōruōm mibha ạJizos Kraist aru mỌony obho tẸnaan.”]
Pōoy obho ạto molo kosōbhẹ moghuugh obho, keḍio aFilip nꞌodi isōor tạmuum obho, keḍio aFilip aru azuom zodi mụum.
Amen eedi imute mi tạmuum obho, pẸmugh tObạmọogh obho ạseghe maFilip ạḍuonom. Oōy obho omina ḍio ạmiin zodi, odi ōoy obho atẹn nakẹel nꞌogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi.
Ụmiin maFilip tẠzotos, keḍio ạghi toomo ạraama bho nạgba mooḅi adōm obho ninii odi aru asi taSizaria.
Tamen bhibha, ạSol odi ni nạnogho mịiḅaghami ạzeey mobo bho nẹtuonuman mObạmọogh obho. Odi ạghi tuvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua obho

agbẹel abhin mịbhereer ilo ịnogho zodi mịnyaam mọghi tarutu iikpulughu ibhꞌạDamaskos, merumolo odi ạmiin mōoy olo nạtuonuman mEbōom tObạmọogh obho, milobhir nꞌạraani, odi aḅologh apin atu taJerusạlẹm.
Tebōom obho, suo odi nạki, natuan tạDamaskos obho, pazuḅa ọpuuny obꞌẹḅaal olo ạḍua tạnyu obho aru asōorōm zodi,
keḍio odi ameel tade bho, keḍio ạmoghon oghōrōkō olo ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “ẠSol, ạSol! Eeghe kạna nạnogho kua zạmi mịiḅaghami?”
Keḍio odi apuruan kua zodi, “Obumọogh, ạna kokōr ōoy?” Keḍio oghōrōkō bho ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami pạJizos obho ạna nạnogho mịiḅaghami obho.
Keḍio ḅetunu mạghi tẹma bho, tọgba ọnogho zịna milo ạna taḍighi.”
Arōoy obho nẹtuonuman zodi obho ịmara nꞌikpom ịnu; eedi nẹmoghon oghōrōkō bho keḍio ōoy olo eedi nẹmiin olo.
Amen ạSol aḅetunu tade bho ạkparion riḍien odi, odi ọmiin io mạar, molo eedi ịbham zodi tạvo ireliom zodi ịghi tạDamaskos.
Odi ạrol mikpom ariḍien mịraar aḍuma, olo eḍian ole ḍio, ạmuum ọbhoghol io.
TạDamaskos, kir onyiin olo nạtuonuman mạJizos olo ughōl Ạnanayas. Odi ạmiin ghịiny olo Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạnanayas.” Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua, “Oobho ạami, Obumọogh.”
Keḍio Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kōkōbhōghia mạghi tebōom obho ughōl ‘Asel ni’ obho, mapuruan mi totu taJudas mōoy olo ughōl Sọl obhꞌạTasos. Odi naakpulughu,
nạamiin nạ ghịiny olo onyiin ōoy olo ughōl Ạnanayas ạḅamaghi rạvo mi talōor odi molo odi kamina kạmiin mạar.”
Keḍio Ạnanayas ạbhagharana kua, “Obumọogh, ọlogh arōoy nẹegba ẹnogho ạami milꞌōoy obhobho, nꞌibꞌịkarabh ọkpo ilo odi naaḍighi marōoy onuma mi taJerusạlẹm.
Keḍio esiibha odi naabhin mịnyaam mi taruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho atu tạDamaskos moḅologh arōoy obo bho nekōl ḍien onuma bho.”
Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kịa, ạami nạason zodi ạseghe moḍighiom oḍighi ạmi, omutiom aḍien obhꞌạmi ọghi tobo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho, nꞌạruula, nꞌarōoy Izirẹl.
Keḍio ạami nịvo nịvo taḍeeriom zodi milo odi tạmiinom mebum aḍien ạmi.”

PẠnanayas ạghi aḍigh totu obho, ạḅamaghi rạvo odi mi tẹmu tạSol, keḍio ạkpete kua, “ẠSol umōr ạmi. ẠJizos Obạmọogh obho nịvo nịvo, obho ạmiinan ạna mi tebōom obho suo ạna natu obho, arōm ạami moru molo ạna kạmiin mạar, nꞌolo Ẹmugh Iigbia bho kaḍigh talōor onuma kamuzō.”
Tonyiin amen obho, pạar olo odi kopolom ena ạḍua ameel tariḍien tạSol, keḍio odi ạke momina ọmiin ạar, keḍio odi aḅetunu aru azua mụum;
keḍio odi aru ale meḍian alōor odi amina aru ạghua.
Keḍio ạSol ạrolan mịbam aruḍuma nꞌobo bho nẹtuonuman mạJizos obho ibha idi tạDamaskos obho.
Odi obhiẹmi ḍio men mọghi tarutu iikpulughu obho ọgba mạJizos Ọony obho tẸnaan.

Keḍio oomo obo bho ịmoghon zodi obho neemōogh, nepuruan ghạ kua, “Oobho ōoy obho nạzeey bọ rōoy mi taJerusạlẹm, mobo bho nekōl maḍien obhobho bho ḍio gạ? Suo odi aru eebha mi tinyiin eedi abaabha bho, moḅologh eedi ọghiom aruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho ḍio?”
Keḍio ạSol ạgba ni ạkpaariom mibha ạJizos aru maKraist obho, keḍio ịnyaam ọnuekpete obhꞌodi iru ịghua magey molo arōoy aJu obho idi tạDamaskos obho irue ḍio mọbhagharana odi.
Ịbam aruḍuma itẹn parōoy aJu obho iikōbhōghian moghigh ạSol.
Puru ụgba ụnogho zodi mibha eedi nẹetua moḍighi obho. Keḍio ịrol iḅōrō moomo uḍugul nꞌootaany mi tọnu-ẹma bho moghigh odi.
Molo, onyiin uḍugul obo bho nẹtuonuman mạSol obho ịseghe zodi ịlogh tọkpaagh isōorẹ mi tẹḅagh-otu obho.
ẠSol ạghi taJerusạlẹm keḍio ạva moḍigh ạni mi tobo bho nẹtuonuman mạJizos obho. Eedi irue ḍio momōruōm mibha odi naaru monyiin obo nạtuonuman mạJizos, molo aruugu nesibh eedi.

Keḍio ạBanabas aru ạbhel zodi ạseghe odi ạghiom miteledōm obho. Keḍio aru ạgba mibha ạSol ạmiin mObạmọogh obho mi tebōom tạDamaskos obho, nꞌibha Obạmọogh obho ạkpete ạnogho zodi obho. Odi ạgba nạ mẹzo bho odi ạSol ạgbaam nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi milo igboloman nꞌạJizos.
Keḍio ạSol tạtolan zeedi ạki mi toomo aJerusạlẹm nạgba maḍien tObạmọogh obho nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi.
Odi nꞌarōoy aJu obho ịmoghon ịkpa mọnu aGris ẹghanan ghạ magey molo eedi ịrol ịva moghigh odi.
Amen aburumōr obho ilōghōm miibha bho pịseghe zodi ịghi taSizaria ịkpete ịnogho zodi mọghi tạTasos.

Tesuo keḍio oomo ạrasosi obhꞌaJudia nꞌaGalili nꞌaSameria tẹtol nꞌekima iru ịghua nạ magey. Ọnu arōoy obho tepōbh nạ mi tọlogh ạvo bho tẸmugh Iigbia bho nꞌẹzo oghiilaan obho eedi ịrol ịnogho mObạmọogh obho.
APita ạrol ạghi kesi kesi, keḍio ạteeny monyiin aḍuma podi ạghi mọmiin arōoy tẸnaan ibha netugh taLida bho.
Todi ẹma bho podi ạmiinan mōoy olo ughōl Inias, olo oomo alōor obho naamuugh ạman molo neegbẹbh ạbhenya ạsia doḅetunu ḍio tẹmuna.
Keḍio aPita abheleghi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Inias, ạJizos Kraist naakō ạna. Ḅetunu makpōr mẹmuna onuma.” Todi onyiin amen obho podi Inias aḅetunu.
Oomo arōoy obho netugh bọ mi taLida nꞌaSeron obho ịmiin mẹzo bho zodi, peedi ighiraan tObạmọogh obho.
TạJopa kir ạni olo nạtuonuman mạJizos, olo ughōl Tạbita, tọnu aGris pạDokas, ẹmu aḍien obho pọnue. Odi ạseghe moomo aghuḍum odi aseeri moḍighiom iiḅi nꞌọbhel aruvekulom.
Tamen opopo podi aru ạnwe ạbho. Keḍio uru uutōl moḍim obho todi ụmuneen tẹkpe totu ạnyu.
ẠJopa ogbeeny io mịkanya mi taLida, molo amen obo bho imōruōm obho ịmoghon ighōl maPita odi taLida, peedi irōm rōoy ịghiom zodi, ighōl kua, “Sesen ni, kẹm maru tezōor.”

Keḍio aPita aḅetunu aakōbhōghia ạtuonuman zeedi ạghi. Odi aru asi, pubhin zodi ụghi tạnyu otu obho. Oomo arukpukele ạraani obho iru ikō zodi aPita ikiton neleghe neḍereghiom mạrasuoma olo ạDokas ạkologh ạnogho zeedi men obho odi dọbho ḍio obho.

Keḍio aPita abhirighan moomo eedi amutiom totu obho, keḍio agbuluman aakpulughu, aghiraan asōmōghan moḍim obho ạkpete kua, “Tạbita, ḅetunu!” Podi ạkparion riḍien odi, ạmiin maPita, podi aḅetunu ạrol delede.
Keḍio aPita ạnogho zodi mạvo odi ạbham ạḅar zodi aḅẹtōn. Keḍio odi abheleghi mobo bho imōruōm obho nꞌarukpukele ạraani obho ạseghe zodi ạnogho zeedi nꞌaghuḍum.
Ịimoghon nꞌạsuugba bho ilela moomo ạJopa, molo ọlogh arōoy imōruōm mObạmọogh obho.
Keḍio aPita ạrol mịkanya aruḍuma mi tạJopa mi totu ōoy olo nalooy ghạ rụḅa izu ịnam olo ughōl Sạimon.
Onyiin amen mi taSizaria, kir ōoy olo ughōl Kọnilios, onyiin uvẹmụ iḅe rạagham obhꞌaRom olo ạteeny mọlogh obho ughōl bọ “Eegu ẹgham Itali.”
Odi ōoy olo nạtuonuman raabōom tẸnaan; odi nꞌoomo otu odi neekpulughu ghạ mẸnaan. Odi ạlogh ghạ mạvo ạnogho maruvekulom arōoy aJu obho, keḍio naakpulughu ghạ mẸnaan moomo amen.
Onyiin aḍuma ịraar asuo mogbo ọsilaan, podi ạmiin ghịiny olo odi ạmaar ạmiin motelema tẸnaan aru ạkpete nạnogho zodi, “Kọnilios!”
Ologhi odi nakpooy, aruugu nesibh, keḍio ạbhagharana kua, “Obo apu ạami, ẹkaraan?” Odi otelema bho aghōl kua, “Ẹnaan nạamoghon miikpulughu onuma nꞌọlogh ạvo bhꞌonuma, keḍio nạatua ạna siibha.
Siibha tōm rōoy mạghiom ōoy olo ughōl ạSaimon Pita; odi odi tạJopa.
Odi asulomaan molōoy rụḅa izu ịnam obho, ōoy olo ughōl Sạimon. Otu odi odi tọtu ọbhiiny obho.”
Podi otelema bho nạḍeghe ạnogho odi obho ạmany ạḍua, keḍio ạKonilios abheleghi mịzal ạnwuny otu odi nꞌonyiin ōoy ẹgham olo nạtuonuman nạ mẸnaan, olo aru nạ monyiin uvẹmụ eegu ẹgham odi.
Odi ạgba ạnogho zeedi mibha imute bho keḍio arōm zeedi mọghi tạJopa.
Ạḅaal, ẹzo bho eedi idi tebōom obho netuan tạJopa, paPita ạsiin tạnyu otu obho mookpulughu. Aḍio nạaḍi ịzal abin ootaany men opopo.
Ọkoony nasibh odi, odi nạatua ghạ nạ mole; suo nọsa ni meḍian obho, podi ạmiin nạ ghịiny.
Odi ạmiin mobho ạnyu obho naakperenu keḍio ạar asōor natu, ạar olo ạgbaanan ọpuuny obꞌukpe ẹmuna olo nꞌinya ạruukul, asōor natu tade bho.
Tologhi obho, oḍigh kẹrekere ịnam nꞌiiḍigh nꞌịnun ạnyu obho ịkani.
Keḍio oghōrōkō ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Pita, ḅetunu, kigh mạḅa!”
PaPita ạbhagharana kua, “Ekua ḍio, Obumọogh. Ạami dọḅa ghạ ḍio mạar olo nogbi ni, ọḅaal nạ ḍio.”
Keḍio oghōrōkō bho amina ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ugbi ghạ mạar olo Ẹnaan nạakpete aghōl ạneghe ni.”
Uḍighi kua ninii ịraar amen keḍio ụseghe zodi ạar obho ụloghom umulumi tạnyu obho.
APita naaḅetunu nạatua ghạ mạkar ạar obho amute tạghiiny obho odi ạmiin obho. Tonyiin odi amen obhobho arōoy obho ạKonilios arōm obho nẹva motu obho tạSaimon etu esi ẹmara tọnu otu obho.
Keḍio eedi ibheleghi ipuruan, “Isoloman odi suo olo ughōl Sạimon Pita?”
APita odi nini tịitua azin ạghiiny obho todi men Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạkpete ạnogho zodi mu, “Nonon! Ịraar arōoy neeru nẹva ạna.
Ḅetunu siibha maakōbhōghia masōor ạghi teedi, ugin ghạ mọtuonuman eedi. Ạami urōm zeedi eru tonuma.”
PaPita asōor ạghi tarōoy obho ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami odi ōoy obho enyina nepuruan obho. Enyina ịtuan eeghe keru?”

Eedi maa, “ẠKonilios uvẹmụ ezōor arōm ezōor. Odi ooḅi ōoy olo naakpulughu ghạ mẸnaan, olo oomo arōoy aJu obho nekiilaan magey. Onyiin otelema tẸnaan arōm odi mobhin onuma ọghi totu odi, molo odi ạmoghon mọnu onuma.”
PaPita ạloghom rōoy obho totu ịrolan odi muḍugul obho.
Ạḅaal podi aakōbhōghia ạtuonuman eedi, keḍio ẹtede aburumōr obhꞌạJopa ịtuonuman ạni zeedi.
Amina ạḅaal peedi isi taSizaria. ẠKonilios maakōbhōghia moomo otu odi. Aburumōr nꞌạburubulol odi neḅōrō.
Ẹzo bho aPita naḍigh totu obho, pạKonilios aru abheleghian odi, agbuluman azuman tasike odi.
Keḍio aPita ạbham odi aḅẹtōn, ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ḅetunu, ạami ōoy nạ konuma.”
APita ạḍeghe ghạ mẹzo bho nạnogho mạKonilios suo eedi neḍigh totu obho. Eedi iḍigh podi ạmiin marōoy obho neekōbhōghian neḅōrō zodi obho.

Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Enyina nịvo nịvo neelōghōm mobho ōoy aJu umōrō ghạ ḍio tebum eḍighiom ạar odi molo odi kạghi kaḍigh totu, bolobolo ạḍeghian rạḍeghe nꞌarōoy obo bho itu ḍio milꞌaJu obho. Keḍio Ẹnaan nạakpete kua ạnogho zạmi mụseghe ghạ mōoy maghōl mugbini, bolobolo mọneghe ḍio.
Ẹzo bho ạna urōm uruom zạmi obho ạami une ḍio mogin. Siibha bho, ạami napuruan kua zịna, eeghe amute kạna arōm aruom ạami?”
Keḍio ạKonilios ạbhagharana kua, “Otamen obhobho molo ịraar aḍuma neetẹn mobho ạami ụrol tiikpulughu mi totu ạmi mi tịraar asuo ọsilaan. Tekperenom pōoy olo ạlokia mịḅaal aru ạmara taghisigh ạmi,
keḍio ạkpete kua, ‘Kọnilios! Ẹnaan nạamoghon miikpulughu onuma, ạatua nạ riḍighi etulan obhꞌonuma,
Tōm mōoy ạghi tạJopa abheleghi mōoy olo ughōl Sạimon Pita. Odi asulomaan monyiin olōoy rụḅa izu ịnam olo ughōl Sạimon natugh ghạ tọtu ọbhiiny.’
Molo oḅetunu be, pạami urōm uru tonuma molo ạna ẹkona uḍighi nạ miiḅi uru. Siibha bho oomo ezōor mookōbhōghian taghisigh tẸnaan, noḅōrō mọmoghon ạar obho Obạmọogh obho arōm ạna bho.”
PaPita ạke mọgba, “Esiibha bho keḍio ạami naalōghōm mobho eḍighiom ạar tẸnaan iru monyiin mi toomo arōoy.
Kōoy kōoy olo aghiilaan odi ạtuugh aḍighi mibha ịneghe bho, podi ọseghe, odi oonon io mẹma bho odi amute bho.
Enyina neelōghōm madōm obho odi arōm aruom marōoy Izirẹl obho, mobho ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh oomo arōoy nạaseghe mekima ạnogho zeedi.
Enyina neelōghōm moomo ibha imute bọ mi toomo ade bhꞌaJudia, ạkiom taGalili mi tamen obho ịigbaay ozua-ạmuum obho tạJon neekunughiom.

Enyina neelōghōm mibha igboloman mạJizos obhꞌạNazaret mẹzo Ẹnaan azuughiom zodi mẸmugh Iigbia bho nꞌịnyaam. Odi ạghi kesi kesi aḍighi ghạ miiḅi, aakōoy moomo obo bho nẹeghoroghian mi tịnyaam Eru obho, tebum obho Ẹnaan ạrolan nꞌodi obho.
Ezōor ụmiin ạni moomo ọkpo bho odi aḍighiiy bọ tebhugh obhꞌaJu obho mi taJerusạlẹm. Eedi ịkan odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho ighigh odi.
Keḍio Ẹnaan aḅẹtōn odi tọbho bho mi togbẹbhiōm ịraar aḍuma bho, aḍighi odi amutenaan rōoy.
Toomo arōoy io, tezōor obo bho ụmiin ạni obho kụ nọgba mobho Ẹnaan aḅẹtōn zodi obho, obo bho odi ạson ạseghe bho be. Ezōor utul nꞌodi ole ọbhoghol suo odi naaḅetunu tọbho bho.
Keḍio odi ạto ạnogho zezōor mọgba adōm obho ọnogho kōoy kōoy, nꞌọgba ibha Ẹnaan nạaseghe zodi aseeri mọru ịiruan ọnogho imoom nꞌobo ụbho bho.
Oomo arizil obho ịgba miibha bho todi, eghōl kua mu kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm zodi, pọteeny ọḅelemaan ịkarabh odi mi tịnyaam aḍien obhꞌodi.”
APita odi nini nạḍeghe, pẸmugh Iigbia bho aru azuom moomo arōoy obho nẹmoghon dōm obho.
Molo aburumōr arōoy aJu obho ịtuonuman maPita mi tạJopa iru obho iimōogh ni mọmiin obho Ẹnaan naazuughi ạni mẹnogho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho marōoy ịnon aruubhugh.
Eedi nẹemoghon mibha eedi nẹkpaay mọnu ạraama nebuom mạlibugh tẸnaan. PaPita ạkpete kua amutiom,
“Arōoy bhibha neebhin mẸmugh Iigbia bho kẹzo bho tezira. Oōy tatue ni siibha bho ạpuenaan mozuom eedi mụum?”
Podi ạto mozuughiom eedi mụum mi taḍien tạJizos Kraist. Keḍio eedi ịkpete ịnogho zodi mọrolan eedi mịbam aruḍuma.
Iteledōm obho nꞌaburumōr obhꞌoomo aJudia ịmoghon mibha ịnon aruubhugh neebhinom ạni mọnuekpete bho tẸnaan.
Amen aPita ạḍua aru asi taJerusạlẹm pobo bho negbẹel molo koḍunogh rōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho iru nesi maPita maa,
“Ạna ụghi misoloman mi totu arōoy ilo deḍunaay io, ibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho, keḍio ạna utul nạ zeedi ule meḍian!”
PaPita aru ạgba ạnogho zeedi moomo ibha imute obho, ạke ki tọḅel egbiom obho.
