“Ạami ụrol tạJopa monyiin aḍuma naakpulughu, pạami ụmiin ghịiny. Tạghiiny obho ạar olo ạḍua tạnyu obho nasōor, olo odi kobꞌukpe ẹmuna nꞌinya ạruukul, uru utueni ạami.
Ạami ụghiom ḍien uunon tologhi obho, pạami ụmiin moḍigh kẹrekere ịnam nꞌịnun nꞌiiḍigh.
Keḍio ạami ụmoghon oghōrōkō olo ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, ‘Pita, ḅetunu, kigh mạḅa!’
Keḍio ạami ụbhagharana kua, ‘Ekua ḍio, Obumọogh, ạami dọḅa ghạ ḍio mạar olo ugbi ni, bolobolo ale meḍian ilo ịneghe ḍio.’
Keḍio oghōrōkō amina ạḍua tạnyu obho aru aghōl kua, ‘Ụseghe ghạ mạar olo Ẹnaan naaḍighi ạneghemi maghōl mọneghe ḍio.’
Iibha bho imute mịraar amen, keḍio togbi mọseghe ọsiine tạnyu obho.
Tonyiin odi amen obho, parōoy ilo urōm taSizaria moru tạmi iru isi tesi obho ạami ụrol obho.
PẸmugh Iigbia bho ạkpete ạnogho ạami ugin ghạ mọtuonuman arōoy obho. Odiin aburumōr ibhibha ịtuonuman ạni zạmi ẹghi taSizaria, keḍio oomo ezōor usul totu tạKonilios.
Keḍio odi ạKonilios ạgba ạnogho ezōor mẹzo onyiin otelema tẸnaan aru totu odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, ‘Tōm mōoy olo tạki tạJopa apeleghi mōoy olo ughōl Sạimon Pita.
Odi tạgba mọkpo ilo tẹpel ạna nꞌotu onuma.’
Ạami odi nini nạgba men Ẹmugh Iigbia bho aru ạteeny zeedi kẹzo bho ạteeny bọ ezira tọḅel egbiom obho.
Keḍio ạami tạatua alōghōm mibha Obạmọogh obho ạkpete bho mu, ‘ẠJon ạseghe mụum kazuughiom marōoy; enyina, tozuom enyina mẸmugh Iigbia bho.’
Neemute ẹman mobho Ẹnaan ạnogho marisoloman obho monyiin odi ẹnogho bho odi ạnogho zezira tamen obho ezira umōruōm bọ mạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho. Ạami kokōr ōoy moḍighi ilo ọpuenaan Ẹnaan?”
Amen eedi ịmoghon miibha bho, peedi ịḅele mosi, ikiton nẹsebh mẸnaan, ighōl kua, “Siibha bho Ẹnaan naamōrō misoloman obho ekiraan tịkarabh obhꞌeedi ẹteeny ạni ghuḍum!”

Obo bho imōruōm obho nẹezaranu tebum ibha ịiḅaghami ịteeny zeedi tamen obho ughigh bọ maStivin obho. Ẹtede eedi neegbeeny molo neesi kaFonisia nꞌạSaipros nꞌẠntiok, nẹgbaay dōm obho nẹnogho marōoy aJu obho be.
Keḍio ẹtede obo bho imōruōm obho, arōoy ilꞌạSaipros nꞌaSairini ịghi tẠntiok ịgba dōm obho ilelemi ịnogho marisoloman obho ạani, nẹgba mooḅi adōm obho tạJizos Kraist.
Ịnyaam tObạmọogh obho ạrolan zeedi molo ịkanya arōoy imōruōm ighiraan tObạmọogh obho.
Ọdu eedi abaabha bho isi tạsosi obhꞌaJerusạlẹm, molo eedi irōm mạBanabas ạghi tẠntiok.
Amen odi aru asi kạmiin mẹzo Ẹnaan nạasebh marōoy obho, pologhi odi ạḅaal, keḍio odi aakiom oomo eedi mọteeny ologhi omōruōm ọnogho alōor eedi mObạmọogh obho.
ẠBanabas ooḅi ōoy olo ạteeny magey mologhi omōruōm nꞌẸmugh Iigbia bho keḍio ụḅaram mịkanya arōoy mi tọlogh arōoy ilo neemōruōm mObạmọogh obho.
Keḍio ạBanabas ạghi tạTasos mọmiinan ạSol.

Amen odi ạmiin mạSol, podi abhin zodi aru tẠntiok. Ịzal eedi ịrol suo moomo ạla eekōbhōghi ghạ marōoy ạsosi obho, ẹtughumiom mobꞌọlogh arōoy. Tesuo Ạntiok pọḅel esi ubhira ughōl mobo bho nẹtuonuman maKraist obho aKristiens.
Tamen opopo parizil ịḍua taJerusạlẹm ịghi tẠntiok.
Ponyiin eedi olo ughōl Ạgabos aḅetunu ạmara, abhinom ịnyaam Ẹmugh obho ạgba mobꞌoḅẹer olo natu tesuo oomo ade bho. (Iibha bho imute tamen olo ạKlodios nạda mebhugh obhꞌaRom.)
Pobo bho imōruōm obho ịitua molo kōoy kōoy, tibha ạvo odi asi, mọfirima ikpoki ọghiom aburumōr obho idi taJudia obho.
Keḍio eedi iḍighi mẹzo bho ịfirima mạBanabas nꞌạSol ịghiom marukenya bho.
Tamen obhobho, ạHerod ọolema bho nạake mọnogho ịiḅaghami mịkanya arōoy ạsosi obho.
Odi ạseghe mobꞌạmugem aghighom maJems umōr tạJon.
Amen odi ạmiin mobho iḍigh ni magey mi tologhi arōoy aJu obho, podi anyeene ạghi aḅol maPita. (Iibha bho imute tamen ẹzaal obho noliom ghạ mạbred obho ụlogh ghạ ḍio mayist obho.)

Odi aḅol maPita, pụloghom zodi mikoli ụḍuom, ụlogh zodi tạravo arōoy iḅe rạagham obho, ilo usereghi minya ạruuku, ẹku esuo inya inya arōoy. ẠHerod nạatua ghạ mọseghe odi ọlogh tạravo arōoy aJu obho mamen aḍuma ẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho naatẹn.
Puseeri maPita tikoli, keḍio arōoy ạsosi obho iḍigh miikpulughu ịnogho mẸnaan mebum odi nꞌoomo ologhi eedi.
Uḍugul aḍuma bho tạḅaal pạHerod omutiom odi ọnogho arōoy obho, aPita nakoḍi teesoḍia ịzal arōoy iḅōrō bho. Nọoḍuom zodi mịzal arigbirigbiri. Arōoy iḅōrō idi nạ mi tọnu otu ikoli obho.

Tekperenom potelema tObạmọogh obho aru ạmara, ẹḅaal nạmu tẹkpe ikoli obho. Keḍio odi otelema bho ạzabhaan maPita ạsumeen zodi, ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Kẹm aḅetunu!” Onyiin odi amen obho parigbirigbiri obho taPita ịworo izuan nꞌibha ạravo odi.
Keḍio otelema obho ạkpete kua, “Mina mukpe onuma mạlogha marakōrō onuma.” PaPita ạtuugh nạ mẹzo bho aḍighi, keḍio otelema bho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Lọgha makoti onuma mạtuonom ạami.”
PaPita ạtuonuman odi amute tikoli obho. Odi olōghōm io merumolo ibha nemute bho iru magey: odi aghōdi odi nạmiin ghịiny.

Eedi ịḅol itẹn mọḅel esi arōoy iḅōrō bho, iru itẹn mogbẹbhiōm ịzal obho ninii iru isi tobho ikunughi obho, teguugh arukurōgh obho amutiom tẹma bho. Odi eguugh obho nịvo nịvo aghuurunu ạnogho zeedi, keḍio eedi iru imute. Eedi irele ịman monyiin ebōom obho, potelema bho ạmany ạḍua ạḅele zodi be.

Keḍio aPita talōghōm ibha nemutenaan zodi obho, keḍio ạkpete kua, “Esiibha keḍio ạami naalōghōm mibha iru magey. Obạmọogh obho arōm otelema odi aru ạbhel ạami atughuneen tạravo tạHerod nꞌoomo ibha arōoy aJu obho neḅōrō mọmiin ibha temute bho.”
Odi alōghōma lōor odi, podi ạghi totu taMeri oniin tạJon Mạk. Ọlogh arōoy neekōbhōghian suo neekpulughu.
Keḍio aPita aakpu teguugh obho, keḍio ọnyani otu olo ughōl aRoda aru ạmoghon.
Podi ạmoghon moghōrōkō taPita. Tọḅaal ologhi ipa bho podi ạḅele moghuuron eguugh obho aghiil amula ạghi ạgba maPita odi tetẹrẹ bho.
Eedi ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Ạna nạtaal gạ?” Keḍio odi aghōl mạkar agey nạ ni. Peedi ịbhagharana kua zodi, “Ẹmugh odi gạ!”
APita odi nini naakpu. Keḍio eedi iru ighuuron meguugh obho. Amen eedi ịmiin maPita, peedi iimōogh.

Keḍio odi ạnwaaghi rạvo odi meedi imulughu ḍio, aru ạgba mẹzo Obạmọogh obho amutiom zodi tikoli obho. Keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Ịgba miibha bho mẹnogho maJems nꞌaburumōr ipedi obho.” Odi ạkpete kua ạḅele, podi ạḍua ạghi tọnon esi.
Amen aḍio aru ạḅaal pọpuuny obꞌẹmoghonyan amute togbo arōoy iḅōrō bho tilo igboloman maPita.

ẠHerod ạnogho mịnyaam mọva odi. Peedi ịva irue ḍio mọmiin. Podi ạHerod abheleghi zeedi ạmaar apuruan zeedi, keḍio ạto aghōl mọze zeedi. Iibha iru itẹn podi ạHerod ạḍua taJudia ạghi ạrol taSizaria mịbam amen.

Ologhi tạHerod naḅẹebh mebum arōoy aTaya nꞌaSaidon, peedi ịlogh rōoy mọghi ọmiinan odi. Eedi ibhira iisen mạBlastos, paḍigh teedi: odi ạteeny mịnyaam oomo okōol ọolema bho. Keḍio eedi ịghi tạHerod igbẹel odi mekima, tebum obho arōoy ebhugh eedi nẹteeny ghạ meḍian eedi mi tebhugh odi ọolema bho.
Taḍuma bho odi agu obho, pạHerod ạkpaaghia mibura ọolema bho, ạrol tẹtolom ọdaam ẹma bho, keḍio ạkpete mọnuekpete ạnogho marōoy obho.
Arōoy obho imulughu ighōl kua, “Mọnuekpete bho, olꞌōoy io, olo tẸnaan.”
Tonyiin odi amen obho, potelema tẸnaan ạgur mạHerod atuḅeen, tebum obho odi ọnogho ḍio mẸnaan meghuan obho. Keḍio ikpukuma ịḅa zodi keḍio odi aru ạbho.
Keḍio ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan ạrol ni ạregh, alela.
ẠBanabas nꞌạSol iḍighi moḍighi eedi ẹman mi taJerusạlẹm, pịbham mạJon Mạk ịḍua irughẹel.
Tạsosi obhꞌẠntiok, kir arizil tẸnaan nꞌobo ịtughumiom: ạBanabas nꞌạSimion (obho ughōl Oḅile), nꞌạLusios obhꞌaSairini, nꞌaManain (obho uukō nꞌạHerod obho tatu mạgovono obho) nꞌạSol.
Tamen olo eedi idi tọkoony neekpulughu, pẸmugh Iigbia bho ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịgbarion mạBanabas nꞌạSol moḍighi oḍighi obho ạami ụtuan ubheleghi zeedi obho.”
Keḍio eedi imina ịrol mọkoony iikpulughu, ịḅamaghi rạvo eedi mi tạruumu eedi.
Suo Ẹmugh Iigbia bho naarōm zeedi dōm obho mọghi obho, peedi iḅetunu ịghi taSelusia keḍio ịzoghi ịghi teekpu eḍum obho ughōl bọ Sạipros obho.
Amen eedi ịghi isi tẹma bhꞌạSalamis, peedi ịgba mọnuekpete bho tẸnaan mi tarutu iikpulughu aJu obho. Eedi ịbhamam mạJon Mạk mọlogh ạvo ọnogho eedi mi toḍighi obho.
Keḍio eedi irele ịḅeeny meekpu eḍum obho isi tạPafos. Tesuo peedi ịmiinan monyiin ōoy ịiḍaany olo ughōl Bạr-Jịzos, odi ōoy aJu olo nakōl ghạ modi ozil.
Odi ọbulol tạgovono eekpu eḍum obho ughōl Sajios Pọlos, ōoy olo alōghōm lẹpuuny mạar. Odi ạgovono bho abheleghi mạBanabas nꞌạSol iru todi. Odi nạva mọmoghon ạni ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan.
Pōoy ịiḍaany obho, olo ughōl mọnu aGris mẸlimas, aru nạpuenaan, naḍighi moghireni ologhi omōruōm tạgovono bho.
Keḍio ạSol obho ughōl nạ ạPol obho, Ẹmugh Iigbia bho naagbẹbhan talōor odi, keḍio ạmaar aanon taghisigh odi ōoy ịiḍaany obho,
Keḍio ạkpete kua. “Ạna ọony Eru obho! Ạna obo ọlokiom ariḍien toomo ọkpo ilo iru miiḅi; oomo onuma ịkarabh ipesi be imuza, keḍio ạna naḍighi ghạ moghireni agey obho tẸnaan otẹnẹ iben.

Ạvo tObạmọogh obho tatu ạteeny ạna siibha; ạna tatu mikpom ariḍien, ạḅele mọmiin ẹḅaal bho mịbam amen.” Tonyiin amen obho pẸlimas ạke mọmiin oḅile ọbhurubuur mi tariḍien odi, keḍio ạrol arele nạvaam rạvo mobo tạpam rạvo odi ateliom.
Pạgovono bho amōruōm men odi ạmiin mibha imute bho; odi aamōogh magey mịtughumiom ibha tObạmọogh obho.
PạPol nꞌọlogh odi ịzoghi mi tạPafos ịḅeeny ịghi taPaaga mi tạPamfilia. PạJon Mạk ạḅele zeedi tesuo amula taJerusạlẹm.
Keḍio eedi ịḍua suo ịghi tẠntiok obhꞌaPisidia, ạteeny maḍuma obhooghia bho peedi ịghi ịrol delede mi totu iikpulughu obho.

Amen uru ughōl tọbhereer araalōgh obho taMozis nꞌẹegia arizil obho, pạruula otu iikpulughu obho irōm mọnu ịghiom eedi ịkpete kua, “Aburumōr, erumolo enyina ịteeny dōm olo ọghuemi iloghi arōoy obho, ezōor nọva molo enyina keru kẹgba.”
PạPol aḅetunu, aabhaghami rạvo odi keḍio ạke mọgba,
“Arōoy Izirẹl nꞌoomo enyina obo bho neekpulughu mẸnaan obho, ịmoghonyan ạami.

Ẹnaan arōoy Izirẹl ibhibha ạson ạseghe mạburude ezira, keḍio aḍighi zeedi iru mazuḅa ọpuuny obꞌebhugh mi tamen obho eedi iḍighomaan kisoloman mi tebhugh obhꞌIzipt. Tibꞌịnyaam odi, podi abhin zeedi amutonom mi tIzipt.
Erubal ạsia bho odi ạkparam ạbham zeedi mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho.
Odi abhiẹmi moḍual aruubhugh mi tade bhꞌạKenan, keḍio ạseghe made bho ạnogho marōoy obhꞌodi.
Ịrol mạsumusia ilo nẹkian mọonir nꞌerubal ḍiōbh.
“Iibha iru itẹn podi ạnogho zeedi mịtu mịiruan ilo oreliom eedi, ninii aru ạteeny tamen tạSamuel ozil obho.
Tamen olo eedi igbẹel mọolema, pẸnaan ạnogho zeedi mạSol, ọony taKis, olo eghun otu obho taBenjamin, odi ạda zeedi merubal ạsia.

Uru utughuneen odi, pẸnaan ạseghe maDevid atẹnẹ mọolema eedi. Ẹnaan ạgba kua maDevid, ‘Ạami nạamiin mobho aDevid ọony tạJesi aru moḍigh ōoy obho ạami nạva bho, ōoy olo taḍighi kạar kạar olo ạami ụkpete ụnogho zodi moḍighi.’
ẠJizos obhꞌọobhe obho taDevid mobho Ẹnaan atẹnẹ mỌpela bhꞌarōoy Izirẹl, kẹzo bho odi aguan obho.
Keḍio ạJizos tạke moḍighi odi, ạJon nạagba ạnogho moomo arōoy Izirẹl eghiraan tịkarabh eedi eru ezua mụum.

ẠJon natu mọman oḍighi odi, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho rōoy obho, ‘Enyina ịitua ạami kokōr ōoy? Ạami odi obo bho enyina neḅōrō bho ḍio. Iinon! Odi natu tạman ạmi keḍio ạami ugbẹbh io molo ạami kạkporion rakōrō asike odi.’
“Aburumōr, ọobhe tEbrạhạm, nꞌoomo enyina arōoy obho neekpulughu mẸnaan obho, ebum ezira kobhin dōm ịbhelegha bho oru.

Arōoy obho netugh taJerusạlẹm obho nꞌạruula bhꞌeedi ilōghōm io mobho odi aru mỌpela bho, ịmoghonyan io nạ moghōrōkō arizil obho nokōl ghạ moomo aḍuma obhooghia bho. Keḍio eedi nạ ịtuugh iḍighi mibhꞌoghōrōkō arizil obho iru magey suo eedi ighigh mạJizos obho.
Oomo ibha eedi ịmiin io mạar ọtuan oghigh odi obho, eedi ịseghe ni zodi ẹlogh tạravo taPailet ẹkpete ẹnogho moghigh odi.
Amen eedi neeru iḍighi moomo ibhꞌẹegia bho ạgba mibha temutenaan zodi obho, peedi isōorẹ zodi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho ịlogh zodi mi toogu.
Keḍio Ẹnaan aḅẹtōn zodi mi tọbho bho.
Ọlogh aruḍuma mobho odi amute aḍeeriom lōor odi mobo bho ịtuonuman ghạ zodi ịḍua taGalili ịghi taJerusạlẹm obho. Eedi siibha bho nẹgba milo igboloman nꞌodi nẹnogho rōoy Izirẹl.

Ezōor uru suo dodon mọgba ooḅi adōm obho ọnogho enyina: ibha Ẹnaan aguan mạburude ezira bho odi taḍighi ni, odi naaḍighi nạ siibha ạnogho ezira mobo bho uru bọ milꞌọobhe eedi obho, suo odi aḅẹtōn mạJizos ạnogho ghuḍum obho. Kẹzo bho odi ạkpete bọ togbẹbhiōm ịzal ẹmu tỌbhereer Ạsoor taDevid obho maa,
‘Ạna ọony ạmi.
Aadon ạami naatẹn mỌde onuma.’
“Iibha pibha Ẹnaan ạgba mibha toḅẹtōn zodi mi tọbho bho, oru mu ạḅor,
‘Ạami tạnogho ạna magey ạlisebh obho ạami ụkar uguan maDevid obho.’
“Tọgba agey, odi amina nạkpete tọnon esi,
‘Ạna omōrō ḍio ạkar agey Ọony-otu tonuma ạḅor.’
“ADevid aḍighi mibhꞌologhi tẸnaan mi tamen obhꞌodi, keḍio odi aru ạbho, uḍi zodi utueni mạburude odi, keḍio alōor odi ạḅor.
Odi obo bho Ẹnaan aḅẹtōn tọbho bho pobo bho alōor odi ọḅor io.

Oomo enyina, aburumōr, ịmaar elōghōm mobho adōm ọḅelemaan ịkarabh obho ịḍua tạJizos kiru nọgba ọnogho enyina. Ilōghōm mobho kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm zodi pọteeny ọḅelemaan toomo ịkarabh obhꞌodi ibha araalōgh obho taMozis utue ḍio amuzaan.
Igona lōor enyina, molo ibha arizil obho ịkpete bho imutenaan io enyina,
‘Iinon, enyina obo ịimologh! Iimōogh mẹbhuom!
Oḍighi obho ạami naḍighi dodon obho,
ilo enyina imōruōm io,
erumolo ōoy ạgba nạ ẹkona ạnogho zenyina!’ ”
Ẹzo bho ạPol nꞌạBanabas nemute totu iikpulughu bho, parōoy obho ịkpete ịnogho zeedi momina omula oru aḍuma obhooghia bho natu obho, momina ọgba ọnogho eedi miibha bho.
Amen arōoy obho imuteghu pịkanya arōoy aJu nꞌobo bhꞌẹma ilo neekpulughu karōoy aJu obho ịtuonuman zeedi. Keḍio iteledōm obho ịkpete iikiom zeedi mọrol oomo amen oḍum aghuḍum inwo bho tẸnaan.
Amina ạteeny maḍuma obhooghia bho, odi kolo oomo ẹma bho iru ni ịman mọmoghon ọnuekpete tObạmọogh obho.
Amen arōoy aJu obho ịmiin marōoy obho, pibōbhan iḍigh tiloghi obhꞌeedi, peedi ịkpete ịpue mạPol nꞌọnuekpete bho todi.

Keḍio ạPol nꞌạBanabas, aruugu isibh io zeedi; eedi ịmara ịgba mọnuekpete bho ighōl kua, “Ẹkpe magey mobhira ọgba ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan ọnogho enyina. Suo enyina neegin obho, iseeri lōor enyina karōoy ilo ịgbaan io mọteeny aghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho, ezōor tọḅele zenyina ọki tarōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho.
Iibha pịto bho Obạmọogh obho ạnogho ezōor,
‘Ạami naaseeri zenyina moru ẹḅaal taruubhugh ipedi obho,
nꞌoru ebōom ịbhelegha bho ọnogho oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho.’ ”
Amen obo bho itu ḍio milꞌaJu obho ịmoghon miibha, peedi ibo molo eedi ibuom ni madōm obho tObạmọogh obho. Keḍio obo bho nọoson ụnogho maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo bho iru mobo neemōruōm.
Keḍio ọnuekpete bho tObạmọogh obho alela moomo ebhugh obho.

Parōoy aJu obho ịghi iḅia migbōgh arōoy ẹma bho nꞌạraani obho itu ḍio milꞌaJu ibha ịla mạar magey neekpulughu nạ mẸnaan. Eedi ịke mọnogho ịiḅaghami mạPol nꞌạBanabas, molo ibhirighan zeedi mi tebhugh obhꞌeedi.
Keḍio iteledōm izighe itubeḍi mobhugh obhꞌasike eedi ịnogho zeedi, keḍio ịḍua ịghi tAikoniom.
Obo bho imōruōm mi tẠntiok obho ịteeny magey ọḅaal ologhi nꞌẸmugh Iigbia bho.
Onyiin ẹzo bho mobho imute nạ tAikoniom: ạPol nꞌạBanabas ịghi iḍigh totu iikpulughu arōoy aJu obho ịgba dōm obho molo ịkanya arōoy aJu obho nꞌarōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho imōruōm magey.
Arōoy aJu obho imōruōm io bho ịghi iḅia marōoy ibha itu ḍio milꞌaJu obho, ighireni miloghi obhꞌeedi moḍighi ịkarabh burumōr obho.

Iteledōm obho ịrol ibia tesuo. Nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi, eedi ebhin ịgba dōm tObạmọogh obho. Obạmọogh obho aḍeeriom mobho adōm obho teedi aru magey, ạnogho zeedi mịnyaam oḍighiom ọkpo ibꞌaruugu, nꞌịiḍaany.
Ọlogh arōoy ẹma bho nẹeḍian ịzal abin: ẹtede iḍigh nꞌarōoy aJu obho, ẹde iḍigh nꞌiteledōm obho.
Parōoy aJu obho nꞌarōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho iikōbhōghian nꞌikponom arōoy obho mọnogho ọmiinom miteledōm obho orōḅōl eedi.
Amen iteledōm obho ịmoghon miibha bho peedi ịḍua ịghi taListra nꞌaDaabi ạraama aLaikonia nꞌoomo ạraama aruubhugh ipedi obho.
Tepa peedi ịgba mooḅi adōm obho ịnogho rōoy.
TaListra kir ōoy olo asike bho neeḅaghanyu; ki tamen ụmar odi, odi dorele ghạ ḍio.
Ẹzo bho odi odi delede bho, odi nạmoghon ghạ mibha ạPol nạḍeghe obho. PạPol ạmiin mobho odi naamōruōm, nꞌobho totue ni ookō zodi, podi ạmaar aanon zodi,
keḍio ạkpete amulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō aghōl kua, “Ḅetunu mạmaruom sike onuma!” Podi ōoy obho apẹl aḅetunu ạmara, keḍio arele.
Amen arōoy obho ịmiin mibha ạPol aḍighi obho, peedi ịrol imulughu tọnu-ẹma eedi ighōl kua, “Obo bho ezira nookpulughu ghạ bho neesōor etu tezira karōoy!”
Peedi ighōl ḍien mạBanabas aJupita, ạPol eedi ighōl aMekiuri, tebum obho odi aru mobo bho ạkpete mạar obho.
Poku eru obho aJupita obho otu eru obhꞌodi odi temutonom ẹma bho, abhin ịnam nꞌạrafalawa aseeri tọnu-otu bho. Odi nꞌarōoy obho neeru mọtun ạar ọnogho iteledōm obho.
Amen ạBanabas nꞌạPol ịmoghon ibha eedi netu moḍighi obho, peedi ịbaay rụsuoma eedi, ighiil ịghi iḍigh togbo arōoy obho imulughu ịkpete kua,

“Sọo enyina arōoy bhibha, eeghe kenyina neḍighi mọkpo ilo idi kua? Ezōor ạkar arōoy ilo idi kenyina! Ezōor uru eebha mọgba ooḅi adōm obho be, molo oghireni iloghi obhꞌenyina mi tọkpo bhibha ibha ịgbaan io bho oru tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol obho, obho ạlem bọ mạnyu nꞌade nꞌọbhiiny obho nꞌoomo ọkpo bho idi teedi obho.
Tamen olo neetẹn odi ạḅelemaan kōoy kōoy mọḅol tebōom olꞌodi.

Keḍio odi ọrol io kua molo odi ọgba ḍio lōor odi amutiom aḍeeriom rōoy. Enyina ịmiin odi toḍighi iiḅi odi: odi ạnogho zenyina mẹlebhe bhꞌạnyu obho, nꞌeḍian tamen olo iizuan. Odi ạnogho zenyina meḍian abhule miloghi enyina nꞌọḅaal ologhi.”
Toomo ọnuekpete bhibha, ịbam kisughō iteledōm obho kitue ḍio ẹpuenaan zeedi mọtun ạar ọnogho eedi.
Ẹtede arōoy aJu obho ilꞌẠntiok obhꞌaPisidia nꞌilꞌAikoniom iru. Eedi iḅia rōoy obho eḍigh teedi, irōḅōl ạPol ịghogh zodi imutiom tẹma bho, nẹtughom ghạ mologhi mobho odi nạabho.
Amen obo bho imōruōm obho iru ikō zodi ikiton, podi aḅetunu amula tẹma bho. Aḍio ạḅaal podi nꞌạBanabas ịḍua ịghi taDaabi.
TaDaabi pạPol nꞌạBanabas ịgba mooḅi adōm obho ịnogho rōoy molo ọlogh arōoy imōruōm. Keḍio eedi imula taListra, ịḍua suo ịghi tAikoniom, imina ịḍua suo ịghi tẠntiok obhꞌaPisidia.

Keḍio eedi iikiom ịghuemi miloghi obo bho imōruōm obho mọrol ọghi taghisigh mi tologhi omōruōm obho eedi nẹeteeny obho, ịtughumiom zeedi kua, “Ezira tọḅol ni otẹn mi tọlogh ịiḅaghami moḍigh ạni tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.”
Keḍio eedi ịsonogh marukenya iseeri mi toomo ạrasosi obho, ịrol mọkoony iikpulughu ịseghe zeedi ịlogh tạravo tẸnaan, obho eedi neerōbhanaan mologhi eedi obho.
Eedi irele moomo ebhugh obhꞌaPisidia ịman, peedi iru tạPamfilia.
Eedi ịgba dōm obho ịnogho rōoy aPaaga, peedi ịghi tẠtalia.
Tesuo peedi ịzoghi ịḅeeny imula tẠntiok, tẹma bho ụseghe zeedi ụnogho talaakō bho tẸnaan molo oḍighi oḍighi obho eedi nẹeman bọ siibha bho.
Amen eedi iru isi tẠntiok peedi iikōbhōghi marōoy ạsosi obho ịgba moomo ibha Ẹnaan aḍighian zeedi obho, nꞌẹzo bho odi naaghuuron mebōom olo arōoy ilꞌịnon aruubhugh obho kemōruōm ạni.
Keḍio ịrolan tesuo nꞌobo bho imōruōm obho mịkanya aruḍuma.
Ẹde arōoy mẹeḍua taJudia etu tẠntiok nẹtughumiom maburumōr obho maa, “Urue ḍio ọbhel enyina otẹnẹmi tughuneen molo mooḍunogh zenyina kẹzo bho araalōgh obho taMozis ịgba bho.”
Keḍio ạPol nꞌạBanabas ịghanan zeedi tụtuu mi tabaabha bho, molo uru ụḍeghe molo ạPol nꞌạBanabas nꞌẹde ibhꞌẠntiok mọghi taJerusạlẹm ọmiinan iteledōm nꞌarukenya bho mebum eedi iibha bho.
Ạsosi obho irōm zeedi mọghi. Suo eedi nẹki bọ bho eedi ịḅol taFonisia nꞌaSameria isulogh ịgba mẹzo arōoy ịnon aruubhugh nekiraan etu tẸnaan. Iiḅi ịimoghon bhibha ẹḅaaleni miloghi aburumōr obho.
Amen eedi iru isi taJerusạlẹm, pạsosi obho nꞌiteledōm obho, nꞌarukenya bho ibhin zeedi ịloghom, tobo bho eedi ịgba ịnogho moomo ibha Ẹnaan aḍighian zeedi obho.
Pẹde obo bho imōruōm obho, obho iḍigh ạni mogbo arōoy aFarisi iḅetunu ịkpete kua, “Toḍunogh ni zeedi, ọkpete ọnogho zeedi mookō araalōgh obho taMozis.”
Keḍio iteledōm obho nꞌarukenya bho iḍigh mezue mọḍeghe iibha bho otẹnẹ.

Amen eedi nẹeghanan ninii ịbher keḍio aPita aḅetunu ạkpete kua, “Aburumōr, enyina neelōghōm mobho tamen olo neetẹn ibia, Ẹnaan ạseghe ạami mi togbo enyina mọghi ọgba ooḅi adōm obho ọnogho obo bho ịnon aruubhugh obho, molo eedi ẹmoghon ạni emōruōm.
Keḍio Ẹnaan obho alōghōm bọ miloghi arōoy obho aḍighi aḍeeriom mobho odi nạaseghe ạni zeedi, tibha odi ạnogho ạni zeedi mẸmugh Iigbia bho, kẹzo bho odi ạnogho zezira bho.
Akẹrekere olo odi aḍighi teedi nꞌezira olo, keḍio aḍighi ạḅaaleni miloghi obhꞌeedi tebum obho eedi imōruōm obho.
Kebum eeghe kenyina netu mọdegh Ẹnaan mọnogho ibꞌadōol mobo bho imōruōm obho, ilo ạburude ezira nꞌezira nạ ni ẹko utue ḍio morōol.
Ekua ḍio! Ezira umōruōm ni keḍio ụbhel zezira tebum inwo bho tạJizos Obạmọogh obho, pẹzo nạ ụbhel zeedi.”
Oomo arōoy obho ịbhamagh ni mịnu eedi men eedi ịmoghon mạBanabas nꞌạPol nẹgba mọkpo ibꞌaruugu ilo Ẹnaan aḍighi teedi mi taruubhugh obho itu ḍio milꞌIzirẹl obho.
Amen eedi ịkpete ịḅele paJems aḅetunu ạkpete kua, “Aburumōr, ịmoghon ạami.
ẠSaimon eede siibha aḅetunu ạgba mẹzo Ẹnaan abhira aḍighi aḍeeriom mobho odi nạaseghe ạni marōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho tibha odi ạseghe ạni mi teedi arōoy ilo neeru milꞌodi be.
Ọnuekpete arizil obho emōruōm magey miibha bho. Kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho:
‘Iibha neetẹn pạami omula, pẹzo Obạmọogh obho ạkpete,
keḍio ạami kaḅẹtōn motu obho taDevid obho naameel obho.
Ạami tamulumi ni mọkpo bho iḅẹebh obho,
keḍio ạami tamina aḅōgh ạmarami,
molo oomo arōoy ipedi obho tẹva mObạmọogh obho,
oomo aruubhugh ipedi obho ạami naabheleghi moru ilꞌạmi.
Pẹzo Ẹnaan ạkpete, obo bho aḍighi miibha bho amutiom kọkanya amen.’
“Idi tologhi ạmi molo ezira kụuḅaghami ḍio zeedi obo bho neemōruōm obho.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ezira ọge ọghiom zeedi milo eedi kẹḅele mole ariḍian ilo nọotunom mạar ụnogho meru, ẹḅele mịkarabh eḍighiom ạar, ẹḅele mọḅa ẹnam olo ụbhur orum obho ughigh, bolobolo amughom ịḅaal.
Ilōghōm mobho nooghōl umina ughōl maraalōgh obho taMozis mi tarutu iikpulughu obho moomo aḍuma obhooghia bho, nꞌobho nọogba mọnuekpete odi umina ụgba mi toomo ạraama.”

Keḍio iteledōm obho nꞌarukenya bho, nꞌoomo arōoy ạsosi obho, iḍumom mọson arōoy mi togbo eedi ọseghe morōm eedi kẹtuonuman mạPol nꞌạBanabas kẹghi tẠntiok. Keḍio eedi iru ịseghe maJudas, obho ughōl nạ Bạsabas obho nꞌạSailas, ịzal arōoy ilo aburumōr obho nekiilaan magey.
Keḍio eedi ịge mọbhereer ịfirima. Ọbhereer obho ạkpete kua,
“Ezōor, iteledōm obho nꞌarukenya bho, aburumōr obhꞌenyina nepuruan enyina magey, oomo enyina aburumōr arōoy ibha itu ḍio milꞌaJu obho, ibha netughogh tẠntiok nꞌaSiria, nꞌaSilisia obho.
“Ezōor nọomoghon mobho ẹde arōoy ezōor neemute iru ịnogho zenyina mịiḅaghami mi tọnuekpete obhꞌeedi. Eedi ibhin io mịikpo tezōor moru oḍighi ibha eedi iḍighi obho.
Tiibha bho bẹleni, keḍio ezōor uḍigh mezue ụmoghonyan mọson itelema oruom enyina. Eedi tẹtuonuman mibꞌiiḅi aburumōr ezōor ạPol nꞌạBanabas,
obo bho neebhiẹmi maghuḍum eedi mi toḍighi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Ezōor nọoson maJudas nꞌạSailas notuom enyina milo eedi kẹgba mibha ezōor ụge nạ bho.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho nꞌezōor nọomoghonyan mọḅele ooti enyina mobꞌadōol, tughuneen araalōgh bhibha bho ịgbaan ni obho.

Íle ghạ meḍian ilo ụtunom mạar ụnogho mEru obho; ị́ḅa ghạ mẹnam olo ạbhuom nꞌịḅaal bolobolo ụbhur orum obho ughigh; metughuneen lōor enyina mi tịkarabh eḍighiom ạar. Enyina eḍighi miibha bho, pịnon ọkpo ilo mu. Ịmaar mẹrol!”
Peedi irōm itelema bho ịghi tẠntiok, keḍio eedi iru iikōbhōghi moomo obo bho imōruōm obho iru ịnogho mọbhereer obho.
Amen arōoy obho iru ighōl mọbhereer obho, pologhi eedi ạḅaal mi taliiki obho.
AJudas nꞌạSailas arizil tẸnaan ẹkpete nạ mịkanya ọkpo ẹnogho maburumōr obho molo ọghuemi iloghi obhꞌeedi ẹnogho nạ zeedi aliiki.
Eedi ịrolan zeedi mịbam amen, paburumōr obho ịḅele zeedi momula oghẹel nꞌekima mi tobo bho irōm zeedi obho.
ẠSailas ạatua momina ọrolan eedi.
ẠPol nꞌạBanabas ịrol mịbam amen mi tẠntiok. Eedi nꞌịnon arōoy itul mọnu ẹrol ẹtughumiom rōoy, ẹgba nạ mọnuekpete tObạmạogh obho.
Ịbam amen itẹn pạPol ạkpete kua ạnogho mạBanabas, “Tue omina omula ọghi ọmiinan aburumōr ibhꞌạraama bho ezira ụgba mọnuekpete tObạmọogh obho molo omina ọmiin mẹzo eedi idi.”
PạBanabas aghōl mọbhamam ạJon Mạk,
keḍio ạPol omōrō ḍio ebum obho odi amula tạPamfilia ạḅele zeedi ọtol io asi tikunughi erele obhꞌeedi.
Peedi ịteeny mọoghuanaan ẹmoghonyan olo aḍighi molo eedi ịbaana raabōom. PạBanabas ạseghe mạMak ạzoghi ạghi tạSaipros.
Keḍio ạPol ạseghe mạSailas aḅetunu. Aburumōr obho nạ iikpulughu ịnogho zodi molo inwo tObạmọogh obho kẹrolan zeedi.
Keḍio odi ạḅol atẹn taSiria nꞌaSilisia ạnogho liiki mạrasosi obho.
ẠPol arele ninii ạghi asi taDaabi nꞌaListra. Kir ōoy olo odi suo olo amōruōm, olo ughōl Timoti. Oniin odi olꞌaJu obho, naamōruōm nạ; keḍio ọde odi olꞌaGris.
Oomo aburumōr ibhꞌaListra nꞌAikoniom nẹgba magey miiḅi milo taTimoti.
PạPol ạva mọbhamam aTimoti, podi aru aḍun odi. Odi aḍighi kua tebum obho oomo arōoy aJu obho idi bọ tepa bho neelōghōm mobho ọde taTimoti aru molꞌaGris.
Ẹzo bho eedi ịḍua mẹma itẹn ẹma peedi ịgbaay ịnogho mobo bho neemōruōm obho maraalōgh obho iteledōm obho nꞌarukenya ibhꞌaJerusạlẹm ịlogh obho, iikiom zeedi mọmaar ọbham araalōgh obho.
Iibha bho iḍighi milo ologhi omōruōm ạrasosi obho ịghua magey, molo ọnu arōoy obho neḍighan magey moomo aḍuma.
Eedi irele moomo ebhugh obhꞌaFrijia nꞌaGaletia, tebum obho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho omōrō ḍio molo eedi kẹgba dōm obho mi tebhugh obhꞌEsia.
Amen eedi isi tọkuan obho mi taMaisia, peedi iru mọghi tebhugh obhꞌaBaitinia, Ẹmugh obho tạJizos omōrō ḍio.
Peedi iḅetunu irele mi taMaisia ịghi isi taTroas.
ẠPol ạmiin ghịiny muḍugul opopo, ạmiin mōoy olꞌaMasidonia nạamara naasen zodi mu, “Tue teebhakele aMasidonia mạbhel ezōor!”
ẠPol ạmiin ghịiny obhobho paḅetunu aakōbhōghia mọghi taMasidonia, tebum obho ezōor nọomiin mobho Ẹnaan napeleghi zezōor mọghi ọgba ooḅi adōm obho ọnogho arōoy obho idi tepa bho.
Pezōor uḍigh tụnwiaru mi taTroas ụzoghi ụḅeeny taSamotres. Ạḅaal pezōor usi tạNiapolis.
Keḍio ezōor ụḍua tesuo urele tavel ụghi taFilipai, ẹma ọḅel ebhugh obhꞌaMasidonia, olo iḅe rạagham aRom netugh. Ezōor ọrol mịkanya aruḍuma mi tẹma popo.

Taḍuma obhooghia bho pezōor ụḍua tẹma bho ụghi tọtu ọbhiiny obho. Ezōor nọotua ghạ okōl ezōor tọmiin ni motu iikpulughu arōoy aJu obho. Keḍio ezōor ụrol delede nọḍeghe nꞌạraani obho iikōbhōghian monyiin esi obho.

Onyiin olo ạmoghon ạni mọnuekpete bhꞌezōor ughōl aLidia olꞌaTiatira, olo naḅoḍi ghạ rukpe. Odi ạni olo naakpulughu ghạ mẸnaan, keḍio Obạmọogh obho aghuuron mologhi obhꞌodi mọmoghonyan ibha ạPol nạgba bho.
Odi nꞌarōoy otu odi izua mụum. Podi abhin ezōor mọghi totu odi, ạkpete kua, “Itu mẹrol totu ạmi, erumolo enyina nekōl ạami ạkar ōoy olo naamōruōm mObạmọogh obho.” Keḍio odi aasen ezōor ụghi.

Onyiin aḍuma, ẹzo bho ezōor nọki tesi iikpulughu obho pezōor ụmiin mẹbana ọnyani olo ạteeny mọkarabh ẹmugh olo aḍighi odi nạseghe ghạ mẹkia. Odi nagbuemi magey mobo bho ạteeny odi obho mi tebum ọkpo bho odi nạagbaay ghạ bho.
Podi ạtuonuman mạPol nꞌezōor namulughu, “Iibha ạrubana tẸnaan obho ạbugh bọ apu obho! Eedi nẹgba mẹzo olo kọbhel enyina!”

Odi aḍighi ghạ kua mọlogh aruḍuma, molo ịikaany mạPol, keḍio odi aghiraan ạkpete kua ạnogho mẹmugh obho aghōl kua, “Ạami ubhin taḍien tạJizos Kraist kạto nạnogho ạna momute talōor odi!” Tonyiin odi amen obho pẹmugh obho ạḍua todi.
Amen obo bho ịteeny odi ịmiin mobho ebōom ikpoki eedi naakunughi obho peedi ịbham mạPol nꞌạSailas inyuughi ịghi totu ạraakpe bho ịnogho rụula bho.
Keḍio eedi ibhin zeedi iru tisōbh rạakpe bho peedi ịkpete kua, “Iibha arōoy aJu keḍio iru tẹma bhobho nẹnogho rōoy mịiḅaghami.
Eedi nẹtughumiom rōoy meḍighiom ạar olo iizuan io maraalōgh ezira: ezira ilꞌaRom, ezira urue ḍio obhin bolobolo oḍighi mipa bho.”
Pobꞌọlogh arōoy obho iḍigh mọlogh neḍul eedi. Pisōbh rạakpe bho ịbaay mạrusuoma tạPol nꞌạSailas, ịto ighōl mọgurogh zeedi.
Eedi ịmaar ịgurogh zeedi ịḅele, pinyuughi zeedi ịlokiom tikoli, ịkpete ịnogho mobo bho naḅōrō marōoy ikoli obho mọmaar oḍuom eedi.
Odi obo bho ikoli obho ạmoghon mẹzo bho panyuughi zeedi ạloghom tẹkpe bho ikunughi obho ạduom masike eedi mi tibꞌiikpōogh iirẹeny.
Nạateeny mogbo uḍugul, pạPol nꞌạSailas neekpulughu ẹmoor sọor nẹnogho mẸnaan, molo arōoy ikoli ipedi obho nẹmaar nẹnagha zeedi.
Tonyiin odi amen obho, pade bho naazighinian naḅomian, molo azighe motu ikoli obho magey. Onyiin odi amen obho paruguugh otu ikoli obho ighurunuuy, arigbirigbiri ibhꞌarōoy ikoli obho ịworo izuan.
Amen obo bho naḅōrō marōoy ikoli obho ạsuma ạmiin mibha aruguugh obho neeghurunuuy obho, podi aghōdi arōoy ikoli obho neeghilighu ẹḍuaghuuy, podi ạnyagh ạkpoton mobꞌạmugem odi mogima ọbho.
Keḍio ạPol amulughu aghōl mu, “Sey. Ugima ghạ lōor onuma! Oomo ezōor idi suo!”
Podi ōoy obho agbẹel mọtodi, aghiil aḍigh ạghi agbuluman tasike tạPol nꞌạSailas.
Keḍio odi abhin zeedi amutiom, apuruan kua, “Obo ipu ạami, ạami taḍighi meeghe kạami aḍum ạni?”
Keḍio eedi ịbhagharana kua, “Mōruōm mạJizos Obạmọogh obho, pạna oḍum ạni — ạna nꞌeghun otu onuma.”
Keḍio eedi iru ịgba mọnuekpete tObạmọogh obho ịnogho zodi nꞌoomo arōoy obho idi totu odi obho.
Tonyiin odi amen obho muḍugul obho podi abhin mạPol nꞌạSailas ạghi aatōlōgh rạnem obhꞌeedi. Keḍio odi nꞌoomo eghun otu odi izua mụum monyiin odi amen obho.
Keḍio odi abhin mạPol nꞌạSailas ạghi totu odi ạnogho zeedi meḍian. Ogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi aḍigh magey mi todi nꞌoomo otu odi, tebum obho siibha bho odi naamōruōm mẸnaan obho.
Ạḅaal ụḍirogh obho, pạruula aRom obho irōm rōoy ịto ịnogho zeedi ighōl kua mu, “Ịḅele marōoy pipa eghẹel.”
Pobo naḅōrō marōoy ikoli obho ạgba ạnogho mạPol maa, “Ạruula bho neerōm mọnu etu molo ạna nꞌạSailas kemute. Siibha, enyina tetue ni ekẹel. Ikẹel nꞌekima.”

Keḍio ạPol ạkpete kua ạnogho rōoy obho maa, “Ịkarabh ilo ụva ụmiin milo ezōor uḍighi ilo, keḍio eedi ịgurogh ni zezōor mi togbo arōoy — ezōor arōoy ilꞌaRom! Keḍio eedi inyuughi zezōor ịlokioghom ikoli. Keḍio esiibha bho eedi nẹva momutiom ezōor tẹḅokia. Ekua ḍio. Ạruula aRom obho nịvo nịvo ki tetu suo emutiom ezōor!”
Keḍio arōoy obho imula ịghi ịgba ịnogho mạruula bho. Amen eedi iru ịmoghon mobho ạPol nꞌạSailas iru milꞌaRom paruugu isibh zeedi.
Peedi ịghi iisen zeedi, keḍio ibhin zeedi imutiom totu ikoli obho, ịkpete ịnogho zeedi mọḍua tẹma bho.
Keḍio ạPol nꞌạSailas ịḍua totu ikoli obho ịghi totu taLidia. Tesuo peedi ịmiinan burumōr obho, ịkpete nạ mọnuekpete aliiki ịnogho zeedi, keḍio tẹḍua.
Keḍio eedi ịḍua itẹn mẠmfipolis nꞌẠpolonia iru isi tạTesalonika, obho otu iikpulughu arōoy aJu obho odi obho.
Tẹzo eḍighiom ạar odi, podi ạPol ạghi totu iikpulughu obho. Odi ạrol suo mịraar awiki ạrol ạghanan rōoy mi tibhꞌẹegia bho,
nạgba amutiom moḍeeriom eedi mibha ịgbaan ni molo aKraist obho kạmiinom, kamina kaḅetunu tọbho bho. Odi ạgba kua mu, “ẠJizos obhobho ạami nạgba ạnogho zenyina obho paKraist obho.”
Pẹde eedi imōruōm, iḍigh ạni tạPol nꞌạSailas. Pẹzo nạ mobꞌọlogh arōoy ilꞌaGris ilo nekiilaan mẸnaan, nꞌịvaruumu ạraani ẹma bho.

Parōoy aJu obho iru nebōbhan mạPol, ịghi iikōbhōghi mịkarabh ạruumu arōoy mi taraabōom obho milo oḅe obo ạPol. Keḍio eedi izighe mẹma bho, ịghi totu tạJesin mọnyaghagh omutiom ạPol nꞌạSailas ọnogho arōoy obho keḍul.
Eedi isi, eedi ịmiin io zeedi, peedi ịbham mạJesin nꞌịnon aburumōr ịghiom mạruula ẹma bho nemulughu ẹkpete kua, “Arōoy bhibha neeghireni mẹmar-arōoy obho mebughuleni. Eedi neesi nạ teebha.
Keḍio ạJesin nạaloghom zeedi totu odi. Oomo eedi neepeleghu maraalōgh ọolema bhꞌaRom, nekōl maa kir ọnon ọolema olo ughōl ạJizos.”
Tọnuekpete bhobho, pịikaany arōoy obho nꞌạruula ẹma bho.
Pạruula ẹma bho imuul mạJesin nꞌipedi obho ịkpe molo kọḅelemaan zeedi, eedi iru ịkpe peedi ịḅele eedi ịḍua.
Aḍio agul be, paburumōr obho ibhin mạPol nꞌạSailas ịghi taBeria. Eedi iru isi peedi ịghi iḍigh totu iikpulughu arōoy aJu obho.
Arōoy ibhꞌesuo ibhinom epu mibhꞌạTesalonika. Eedi ibhin nꞌooḅi ologhi ẹmoghonyan dōm obho, molo eedi ịḅele ḍio ḍuma mọtuugha ẹegia bho ọmiin olōghōm erumolo ibha ạPol ạkpete bho ịkar iru magey obho.
Ọlogh eedi imōruōm: ịkanya ịvaruumu ạraani ilꞌaGris nꞌịkanya arōoy ilꞌaGris imōruōm nạ.
Amen arōoy aJu ibhꞌạTesalonika ịmoghon mibha ạPol naasiemi mọnuekpete bho tẸnaan mi taBeria, peedi ịghi ịkpete ịpue miloghi arōoy obho moḍighi ịkarabh.
Tonyiin odi amen obho, paburumōr obho ibhin mạPol ịghi tọbhiiny obho, ạSailas nꞌaTimoti ịrol taBeria.
Obo bho neteliom bọ mạPol obho ibhin zodi isiemi kẠtens. Keḍio ạPol arōm zeedi mọkpete ọnogho ạSailas nꞌaTimoti mokẹm oru todi, keḍio eedi imula taBeria.
Suo ạPol naḅōrō mạSailas nꞌaTimoti moru obho, ologhi odi ọneghe ḍio nọneghe mọmiin ọlogh aruru mi tẹma bho.

Podi ạghi ghạ totu iikpulughu obho asōmōghan rōoy aJu obho nꞌobo ịnon aruubhugh ibha neekpulughu mẸnaan obho mi tịkanan. Moomo aḍuma odi ạghi ghạ mi tibꞌaraatẹrẹ mọghanan nꞌobo bho irele netẹn iru itulom odi obho.

Pẹde ilo nẹtuonom mịtughumiom tẸpikurios nꞌilo nekōl meedi aStoik iru mọmaar ọmoghonyan ạni odi. Ẹtede nẹkpete kua, “Odi oobho bho kokōr oḍigh obꞌolōghōm ạar! Odi tạkpete meeghe amutiom?” Ẹde ịkpete kua, “Odi odi kolo odi nạgba ghạ milꞌaruru ịnon ạraama.” Eedi ịkpeteey kua mebum obho ạPol nạgba milo igboloman mạJizos nꞌoḅetunu tọbho bho.
Peedi ibhin zodi ịghi tesi olo ughōl Ạriopagos ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Ezōor nọva molōghōm ạni imoom ịtughumiom ibha ạna nạgba bho.
Ẹtede ọkpo bho ạna nạgba bọ bho deḍigh ghạ ḍio taraḅeri ezōor, molo ezōor nọva molōghōm ạkar ẹmu obho.”
(Eedi arōoy Ạtens nꞌisoloman ilo irugh tepa nẹva mọgba nꞌọmoghon moomo amen mimoom ọkpo.)
Keḍio ạPol aḅetunu tesi obho uukōbhōghian mi tẠriopagos ạkpete kua, “Arōoy Ạtens, ạami nạamiin mobho toomo ọkpo enyina nẹtuonuman ịkanya mọkpo aghuḍum.
Ẹzo bho ạami urele ukiton tẹma bhꞌenyina, uunonogh tariisi iikpulughu obhꞌenyina, ạami ạmiin nạ tonyiin otu eru obhꞌenyina mobho ụge,
Ẹnaan obho ạlem bọ mẹmar-arōoy nꞌoomo ọkpo bho idi bọ todi obho, ạteeny mạnyu nꞌade bho, molo odi orugh ghạ ḍio tarutu iikpulughu ilo ạravo iḅōgh.
Odi ẹkona ọva ghạ nạ ḍio mọkpo ilo ōoy tatue ni aḍighi amutiom mọnogho odi, tebum obho odi nịvo nịvo nạnogho ghạ kōoy kōoy ghuḍum nꞌipooghu nꞌoomo ẹmar ọkpo.
Todi onyiin ōoy obho podi aru ạlem moomo arōoy aruubhugh obho, aḍighi molo eedi kerughogh toomo ade bho. Odi nịvo nịvo kạto mạkar amen nꞌikunughi ariisi ilo eedi irughogh.
Odi aḍighi kua molo eedi kẹva zodi molo mạar io suo eedi tẹmiin ni zodi, tẹzo bho eedi nẹva bọ zodi obho. Keḍio Ẹnaan ọkar io agbeenyan ạḍua tonyiin ezira,
kẹzo bho onyiin ōoy ạkpete bọ bho,
‘Ezira uḍum ụrol notele todi.’
“Kẹzo onyiin obꞌolōghōm ạar obhꞌenyina ạkpete bho,
‘Ezira ẹkona ạnwuny odi.’
“Tibha ezira uru nwụny tẸnaan, ezira ụutua ḍio ọseghe maghuḍum tẸnaan mọtuom kịga ẹela agold nꞌasilva nꞌọbharakpar.
Taruḍuma bho arōoy ilōghōm io bho, Ẹnaan naanon atughuneen ḍien, keḍio esiibha odi nạato molo kōoy kōoy kesi kesi kaghiraan tịkarabh araabōom odi.
Odi naagu ḍuma olo odi tạtu magey ịiruan ạnogho moomo ẹmar-arōoy obho, ilo tẹḍua etu tōoy olo odi nạason ạseghe. Odi nạagba aḍighi aḍeeriom magey obho tibha odi aḅẹtōn zodi ōoy obho mi tọbho bho!”
Amen eedi ịmoghon mibha ạPol ạgba milo igboloman nꞌoḅẹtōn tọbho bho, pẹde eedi ịrol iḍumonyom zodi, keḍio ịnon ịkpete kua, “Ezōor nọva momina ọmoghon iibha bho mọnon amen.”
PạPol ạḅele mezue bho ạḍua.
Ẹtede iḍigh nꞌodi emōruōm. Teedi pōoy olo ughōl Dionisios, olꞌogbo bhꞌẠriopagos, nꞌạni olo ughōl Dạmaris, nꞌịnon.
Iibha iru itẹn pạPol ạḍua tẠtens ạghi tạKorint.

Tesuo podi ạmiinan mōoy olo ughōl Ạkuila, ụmar zodi tạPontos. Eede amen odi ạḍua tItali aru nꞌạni odi aPrisila, ebum obho ạKlodios ọolema aRom mạalogh molōgh molo oomo arōoy aJu kẹḍua taRom. PạPol ạghi mọmiinan eedi,
podi ạrolan ghạ zeedi, aḍighi ghạ nꞌeedi moḍighi, tebum obho odi naakua ghạ lōor odi mi tilōoy arutu atapol pẹzo nạ zeedi ạni nꞌolom obho.
Oomo aḍuma obhooghia bho podi ọghi ghạ totu iikpulughu ọḍeghe ghạ, nạva ghạ mokiton arōoy aJu bho nꞌarōoy ilꞌaGris.
Amen ạSailas nꞌaTimoti ịḍua taMasidonia iru, pạPol ạseghe moomo amen obho odi ạteeny obho mọgbaam ghạ adōm obho be, nạgba ạnogho marōoy aJu mibha ạJizos aru maKraist obho.

Amen eedi ipinom io zodi, nẹgba zodi mịkarabh, podi amulumian zeedi agunugun mobhugh ibura odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ịḅaal enyina ẹrol tạruumu enyina! Ọkpe ạmi olo mu. Ạseghe dodon ạghi taghisigh, ạami tạki tobo bho itu ḍio milꞌaJu obho.”
Podi ạḍua ạghi arughan monyiin ōoy olo ughōl ạTitios Jụstos, odi isoloman olo naakpulughu ghạ mẸnaan, otu odi ạgbagian motu iikpulughu aJu obho.
AKrispas uvẹmụ otu iikpulughu obho, aru amōruōm Obạmọogh obho, odi nꞌoomo otu odi. Ịkanya arōoy ẹma bhꞌạKorint ịmoghon dōm obho pimōruōm, izuaay rụmuum.
Onyiin uḍugul podi ạPol ạmiin ghịiny olo Obạmọogh ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ughiil ghạ ruugu, gbạ ghạ ni be dōm obho, ughiilaan ghạ.
Ạar obho aḍighi obho, ạami odi nꞌạna. Oōy olo tatue aḍighi ạna mạar olo, ebum obho ọlogh arōoy ilo idi tẹma bhobho ilꞌạmi.”
PạPol ạrol tẹma bho mạla nꞌobharabhaar, ạtughumiom ghạ rōoy obho mọnuekpete bho tẸnaan.
Tamen olo uḍighi maGalio muvẹmụ aRom mi tebhugh obhꞌaGris, parōoy aJu obho iikōbhōghian monyiin esi, ịghi iḅol mạPol ibhin odi ịghi totu ạraakpe bho,
ịgba kua, “Oōy obhobho naḅe moghireni arōoy mookpulughu Ẹnaan mi tẹzo olo ọpue ọlogh arōoy aJu obho.”

ẠPol natu moḅetunu ọkpete ạar, paGalio asōbh ạseghe ạkpete kua ạnogho marōoy aJu obho aghōl kua, “Enyina arōoy aJu obho, ughōl iibha ạraakpe ilo igboloman mịkarabh ilo uḍighi, kōl ạami kudeny ni ạmoghon.
Kiru mịkanan ilo igboloman nꞌọnuekpete nꞌariḍien nꞌaraalōgh enyina bho, penyina nịvo nịvo ịki mẹtuugh ẹkpetian. Ạami utue ḍio ạmoghon mịiruan ọkpo bhibha.”
Podi abhirighan zeedi amutiom mi totu ạkoti obho.
Poomo eedi ịbham mạSostenis uvẹmụ otu iikpulughu obho, iḍul zodi mi taghisigh otu ạkoti obho. Ipa ịikaany nạ ḍio bọbon nꞌịbam maGalio.
Keḍio ạPol ạrolan burumōr obho mi tạKorint mịkanya aruḍuma, keḍio odi nꞌaPrisila nꞌẠkuila iḍigh toghuugh ịghi taSiria. Keḍio odi taḅetunu, podi aguan oguan mẸnaan mi taKenkria afia mẹmu obhꞌodi.
Eedi iru isi tẸfesos, pạPol ạḅele maPrisilia nꞌẠkuila. Odi ạghi totu iikpulughu obho ạghanan nꞌarōoy aJu obho.
Peedi ịkpete ịnogho zodi mọrolan eedi obia, keḍio odi omōrō ḍio.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, odi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi suo odi natu moḅetunu obho, “Ẹrol tịto tẸnaan, ạami tamula ni atu tenyina.” Tesuo podi aḍigh toghuugh mi tẸfesos.
Odi aru asi taSizaria podi atẹn ạghi taJerusạlẹm abheleghian mạsosi obho, keḍio odi ạḍua ạghi tẠntiok.
Odi ạrol ịbam amen tesuo, podi atẹn ạḍua. Odi ạghi toomo aruubhugh obhꞌaGaletia nꞌaFrijia ạnogho moomo obo bho imōruōm obho maliiki mọghuemi iloghi obhꞌeedi.
Onyiin ōoy olꞌaJu olo ughōl Ạpolos, ụmar odi tẠleksandria aru tẸfesos. Odi ōoy olo ạteeny lẹpuuny mọnu, alōghōm nạ magey mịigia bho.
Mọotughumiom zodi mEbōom tObạmọogh obho, molo odi abhinom nꞌoomo ịnyaam odi ạgbaam ạtughumiom magey obho milo igboloman nꞌạJizos. Oomo ipa ẹkona, odi alōghōm mibhꞌozua ạmuum tạJon be.
Keḍio odi abhinom nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi ạgba dōm obho mi totu ịtughumiom obho. Amen aPrisila nꞌẠkuila ịmoghon zodi, peedi ibhin odi ịghi tọtu ịmaar ịgba ịnogho zodi mạkar agey Ebōom obho tẸnaan.

PẠpolos ạatua mọghi taGris, pobo bho imōruōm bọ mi tẸfesos obho ịge mọbhereer ịnogho maburumōr ibhꞌaGris mọbhel odi, obhin ọmaar ọbham odi mi tepa. Amen odi asi, odi ạlogh ạvo ạnogho magey mobo bho ịḍua tinwo bho tẸnaan kiru mobo imōruōm obho.
Odi ạghanan magey rōoy aJu obho mi togbo arōoy nạgba aḍeeriom mi tịigia bho mibha ạJizos aru maKraist obho.
Tamen obho Ạpolos odi mi tạKorint obho, pạPol aghiraan rạama ạnyu obho aru asi mi tẸfesos. Tesuo podi atulom mẹde arōoy ilo nẹtuonuman mạJizos,
keḍio odi apuruan kua zeedi, “Tamen obho enyina imōruōm obho, enyina ebhin mẸmugh Iigbia bho?” Peedi ịbhagharana kua, “Ezōor dọmoghon ghạ nạ ḍio milo igboloman nꞌẸmugh Iigbia bho.”
PạPol apuruan kua, “Kokōr oḍigh ozua ạmuum mobho enyina izua?” keḍio eedi ịbhagharana ighōl maa, “Ozua ạmuum tạJon.”
PạPol ạkpete kua, “Ozua ạmuum obho tạJon ilꞌobo bho ighiraan tịkarabh eedi obho; keḍio odi ạkpete ạnogho marōoy Izirẹl momōruōm onyiin obo bho natu tạman odi obho — odi pạJizos.”
Eedi ịmoghon miibha bho peedi iru izua mụum mi taḍien tạJizos Obạmọogh obho.
PạPol aru ạḅamaghi rạvo odi mi tạruumu bhꞌeedi, pẸmugh Iigbia bho aru azuughiom zeedi, peedi ịkpaay mọnu ạraama, ịgba nạ dōm obho tẸnaan.
Oomo eedi tegbẹbh ni maḍiōbh nꞌịzal.
PạPol aḍigh totu iikpulughu obho, abhinom nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi ạgba ghạ ạnogho rōoy obho mi tesi ịraar ụvanyu nạkanan ghạ nꞌarōoy obho, nạva ghạ mokiton eedi mi tilo igboloman nꞌAde-Ọolema tẸnaan.

Ẹtede eedi ịḅaar liḍim mẹmu, molo imōruōm io nẹkpeteey nạ mịkarabh ọkpo milo igboloman nꞌEbōom tObạmọogh obho mi togbo arōoy obho. PạPol ạḅele zeedi ạseghe mobo bho nẹtuonuman obho ạḍua, molo oomo aḍuma odi ạtughumiom mịtughumiom mi tobꞌotu ogbo ịtughumiom aTiranos.
Odi aḍighi kua moomo ịzal ạsia molo oomo arōoy ibha netugh taruubhugh obhꞌEsia, arōoy aJu obho nꞌarōoy isoloman ịmoghon mọnuekpete tObạmọogh obho.
Ẹnaan naḍighi mịkanya ọkpo ibꞌaruugu mi tạvo tạPol,
molo bọbon ạpoghota bolobolo ạko ukpe olo odi naaḍighiom mạar kobhin ọghiom obo bho nẹnwe bho pẹzegh obhꞌeedi ọḍua, ịkarabh ạruumugh ẹkona pọḍua.

Ẹde arōoy aJu obho neeghiraan apirighanogh mịkarabh ạruumugh obho ẹkona, ẹva nạ mobhin aḍien obho tạJizos Obạmọogh obho moḍighiom. Eedi nẹkpete ghạ kua ẹnogho mịkarabh ạruumugh obho, “Ạami ụkpete nạnogho ạna mi taḍien tạJizos obho ạPol abhin nạgbaam obho.”
Oḍual ạnwuny uvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua olꞌaJu obho, obho aḍien odi ughōl Skiva, pobo neḍighi ghạ miibha bho.
Pọkarabh ẹmugh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “ẠJizos ạami alōghōm, ạPol ẹkona ạami naalōghōm, enyina kikōr arōoy?”
Pōoy obho ạteeny mọkarabh ẹmugh obho abhum eedi aḍulogh ạloki rạnem, molo oomo eedi ighilighu mẹduḅa imute totu obho.
Oomo arōoy aJu obho nꞌarōoy aGris obho ibha netughogh tẸfesos obho ịmoghon ni miibha bho ẹman, molo aruugu isibh ni zeedi magey, nꞌolo uubhughumi magey maḍien obho tạJizos Obạmọogh obho.
Ọlogh obo bho neemōruōm obho iru togbo arōoy obho neetuma ẹgba milo eedi neeḍighi.

Ọlogh obo bho nẹetuugha mịiḍaany obho ibhinogh mịbhereer ịtuugha bhꞌeedi iru iikōbhōghi monyiin esi ịsu nyạn mi tasumusigh oomo arōoy. Uukōbhōghi ugbi mọnu ikpoki ibha ịbhereer obho ịla bho igbẹbh erubal ḍiōbh ẹḅa.
Iibha bho iru iḍighi molo ọnuekpete tObạmọogh obho abhōbh alela magey nꞌọoghuanaan ạvo.
Iibha bho imute bho iru itẹn, pạPol ạatua tologhi odi mọḅol taMasidonia nꞌaGris ọghi taJerusạlẹm. Odi nạakpete kua, “Ạami nạaghi epa, ạami tạki nạ ni mọmiin aRom.”
Podi arōm maTimoti nꞌẸrastos, ịzal obo bho nẹloghonaan zodi mạvo, mọghi taMasidonia, podi tamina ạtol mịbam amen mi tebhugh obhꞌEsia.
Taruḍuma bhibha pamen ogbōgh ọoḅaghami odi mịkanya mi tẸfesos mebum Ebōom obho tObạmọogh obho.
Onyiin ọlemogh masilva olo ughōl Dimitrios nạlem ghạ masilva atuom obꞌotu eru obho ughōl bọ Ạtemis obho, molo oḍighi obhobho todi nạnogho zodi mịkanya ạsuo nꞌobo bho neḅuan nꞌodi obho.
Podi abheleghi moomo eedi monyiin esi, nꞌobo bho neḍighi nạ moḍigh odi oḍighi obho, ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Otu, enyina meelōghōm mobho ẹela ezira idi toḍighi obhobho.

Enyina nẹemiin ẹmoghon nꞌalōor enyina mọkpo ilo ōoy obhobho ạPol naḍighi. Odi aghōl maruru ibha arōoy ịkaay obho mẹnaan io, molo odi naakirion miloghi ọlogh arōoy, mi tesuo Ẹfesos nꞌịnon ariisi mi toomo ebhugh obhꞌEsia.

Esiibha bho, ilo temute, oḍighi obhobho tezira tatu ạteeny mọkarabh aḍien. Ipa nạ be ḍio nạ, otu obꞌeru obho tezira Ạtemis tapẹ siibha, ụmoghon mu mogbōgh aḍien obhobho todi — eru obho kōoy kōoy mi tEsia nꞌẹmar-arōoy obho neekpulughu obho.”
Amen arōoy obho ịmoghon mọnuekpete bhibha, pạruumu eedi ịisuuy, ịke momulughu maa, “Olo apu mẠtemis obhꞌẸfesos olo!”
Oomo ẹma bho naazighinian. Arōoy obho ịghi ibhum mạGayos nꞌẠristakos, ịzal arōoy aMasidonia ilo nẹtuonuman mạPol, ibhin eedi ịghi tobꞌetẹrẹ ọḍe bho.
ẠPol nịvo nịvo ạva mọghi tarōoy obho, keḍio obo bho imōruōm obho ịbham zodi.
Ẹde ịvaruumu ạkoti obho, ạburubolol odi ẹkona, irōm dōm iruom odi mọḅele omutiom alōor odi tetẹrẹ.
Tamen opopo oomo eedi arōoy obho nẹyaghayagha: ẹde nemulughu kẹre, ẹde nemulughu mịnon, ebum obho ạkar ẹde eedi ilōghōm io mạar obho aḍighi keedi iru isōor monyiin esi obho.

Ẹtede eedi meeghōl mẠleksanda aḍighi, tebum obho arōoy aJu obho neebhin zodi iseeri motẹnōm taghisigh. Keḍio odi Ạleksanda aabhaghami mạvo odi molo eedi kẹḅele, odi kạkpete mạar kạgba mibhꞌọnu odi kạnogho rōoy obho.
Amen eedi ịmiin mobho odi aru molꞌaJu obho, poomo eedi imulughu monyiin ẹzo moomo ịzal asuo ighōl kua, “Olo apu mẠtemis obhꞌẸfesos olo!”

Ikunughi obho keḍio ọge-mọbhereer ẹma bho aru adenyemi rōoy bho ạkpete kua, “Arōoy Ẹfesos, kōoy kōoy maalōghōm mobho ẹma bhꞌẸfesos neekō ghạ mobꞌotu eru obho Ạtemis nꞌibha ọbharakpar iigbia ạḍua bọ tạnyu ameel obho.
Bọbon ōoy olo tạparanaan miibha bho olo. Tebum ipa bẹleni, ideny, íḍighi ghạ mọkpo ilo ịneghe ḍio.
Enyina ibhin eru suo marōoy ilo ikulaan io motu eru enyina, dẹkpete nạ ḍio mịkarabh ilo igboloman nꞌodi.
Erumolo aDimitrios nꞌarōoy oḍighi odi ịteeny mọkpe nꞌōoy, saruḍuma ạkoti nꞌạruula bho sidi, eedi ebhin zeedi ẹghi tepa.
Erumolo ọnon ạar odi olo enyina nẹva, pu tọki totu ẹma bho ọkpetian.
Ezira toḍigh tọkpe bho usōorẹ mẹgham mi tiibha bho imute dodon obho. Bọbon ẹzo ọgba ọḍua mi toomo iibha bho olo, ilo ezira ụteeny nạ mọgba tibha imute bho ilo.”
Odi ạkpete miibha bho ạḅele, podi abhirighanogh zeedi.
Amen iloghi arōoy obho neesōrōghu, pạPol aakōbhōghi moomo obo bho neemōruōm obho monyiin esi ạnogho zeedi mọnuekpete aliiki aghōl meedi ẹmaar ẹrol. Podi aḅetunu atẹn ạghi taMasidonia.
Odi ạghi toomo aruubhugh bhibha ạnogho liiki rōoy obho ạgbaam nạ dōm obho. Keḍio odi ạḍua aru taGris,
ạrol suo mịraar ụvanyu. Odi nạatua ghạ mọghi taSiria men odi ạmoghon mobho arōoy aJu obho neḅia moḍighi odi mịkarabh; podi anwe ạto momula ọḅol taMasidonia ọghi.
PaSopata ọony tạPiros olꞌaBeria, ạtuonom zodi; pẠristakos nꞌaSekondos ilꞌạTesalonika, nꞌạGayos olꞌaDaabi nꞌaTimoti nꞌạTikikos nꞌạTrofimos, ilꞌebhugh obhꞌEsia, ịtuonom nạ zodi.
Eedi itẹn ghạ ịghi neḅōrō ezōor mi taTroas.
Taḍuma ẹzaal obho noliom ghạ mạbred obho ụlogh ghạ ḍio mayist obho naatẹn, pezōor ụḅol taFilipai; ōogh aḍuma itẹn, pezōor ụghi utulom eedi mi taTroas ụrol suo mawiki.
Udule ạSatode pezōor uukōbhōghian monyiin esi mole eḍian otul-ọnu obho. PạPol ạḍeghe ạnogho rōoy obho ninii kogbo uḍugul, tebum obho nạḅaal podi oḅetunu.
Tạnyu otu-ạnyu obho ezōor idi obho kir ịtodi mịkanya.

Onyiin onyughẹel ọony olo ughōl aYutikos odi delede mi tawindo bho. ẠPol nạḍeghe bho, odi nakoḍi ghạ be. Odi akoḍi asi tẹma ạlaagh, podi ạḍua tạnyu otu ịraar ạdeki obho ameel tade. Ụghi ubhum odi mạabho.
PạPol asōor ạghi aḅobhonyom odi, keḍio ạkpete kua: “Ịítu ghạ, odi napooghu ni!”
Keḍio odi amula ạsiin totu ạnyu obho, aḅigi mạbred ale. Odi ạḍeghe nꞌeedi ninii aghōzōgh namute podi aḅetunu.
Eedi ibhin monyughẹel ọony obho nꞌaghuḍum ighẹel, molo ologhi eedi ạḅaal magey.
Pezōor utẹn ghạ uḍigh toghuugh obho ụzoghi ụghi usi tẠsos, esi olo ezōor nọki mọsaay ạPol. Odi kạkpete ạnogho ezōor moḍighi ekua mebum obho odi nakiton tavel obho.
Odi aru ạteeny ezōor, pezōor ụsaay odi utẹn ụghi taMitilini.
Keḍio ezōor ụzoghi suo, ạḅaal, pusi tạKios. Aḍuma amina atẹn pezōor ụghi usi tạSamos, ạḅaal pezōor usi taMailitos.
ẠPol nạatua mọzoghi ọghi otẹn tẸfesos, molo upiẹmi men mi tebhugh obhꞌEsia. Odi naḅe mokẹm osi taJerusạlẹm, erumolo totue ni, keḍio kạteeny maḍuma bho ughōl bọ ạPentikost obho.
PạPol arōm dōm mi taMailitos ạghi tẸfesos, nagbẹel molo arukenya ạsosi obho kẹmiinan odi.
Amen eedi iru, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi: “Enyina neelōghōm mẹzo ạami ubhin ụrolom enyina moomo amen obho ạami ụrolan enyina bho, kọḅel aḍuma bho ạami ụḍua bọ tebhugh obhꞌEsia uru obho.
Toomo osōoriōm alōor nꞌizin mobho ạami ubhin uḍighiom moḍighi kẹbana tObạmọogh obho, nꞌoomo ọmiinom obho iru ịteeny ạami tebum ezue bho arōoy aJu neḍigh ghạ ẹgbaam ạmi obho.
Enyina neelōghōm mobho ạami ụpam io bolobolo ạḅoki enyina mạar olo tạpel zenyina mi tịigbaay nꞌịtughumiom obhꞌạmi mi togbo ẹsel, nꞌarutu enyina.
Ạami ubhin onyiin ẹzo bho aakiom marōoy aJu obho nꞌibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho moghiraan tịkarabh eedi mi tẸnaan, omōruōm ạJizos Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Toghiilaan Ẹmugh Iigbia bho, ạami natu mọghi taJerusạlẹm siibha; ilo temutenaan ạami tepa, ạami ulōghōm io.
Ạami ulōghōm mobho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho, kẹma kẹma olo ạami ụghi, naakiom ghạ kua ạnogho ạami mịiḅaghami nꞌikoli neḅōrō ạmi.
Keḍio ạami ụseghe ḍio mạkar aghuḍum obhꞌạmi ạtuom kir obꞌạar, molo ạami aḍighi agbẹbhẹghiōm ạman nạ moḍighi obho ạJizos Obạmọogh obho ạnogho ạami moḍighi obho, ọgba ooḅi adōm inwo bho tẸnaan.
“Ạami naakiton toomo arutu enyina ạgba mibhꞌAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan, keḍio esiibha bho ạami naalōghōm mobho bọbon onyiin enyina olo tamina ạmiin ạami olo mu,
molo ạami udeny ni usōoriōm lōor naakiom enyina dodon: erumolo onyiin enyina abhẹ, ạravo ạmi ịḅaal ni.
Bọbon ạar olo ạami ugin mọgba ọnogho enyina mi toomo ịitua bho tẸnaan olo.
Ịmaar elōghōma lōor enyina mẹbham nạ moomo ạraana bho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạnogho enyina mookō bho. Itu miikō rạana arōoy ạsosi obho tẸnaan, ibha aghuōm ịḅaal odi obho ogini Ọony obhꞌodi.
Ạami naalōghōm mobho, ẹḅughaman ạmi be, pibꞌạrukurunuma omute togbo enyina, ilo ịsuanaan io ghụsan mạnwuny ạraana bho.
Amen natu nạ molo ẹde arōoy mi togbo enyina tẹgbaay miben eebiōghōm mobo bho imōruōm obho ẹtuonom eedi.
Ịmaar eenon, mẹetua mobho ạami ubhinom ịkanya izin muḍugul nꞌootaany ụtughumiom kōoy kōoy mi tenyina moomo ịraar ạsia.
“Keḍio esiibha bho ạami naabhin enyina nạlogh tạvo tẸnaan nꞌadōm inwo obhꞌodi, obho tatue ni aakō zenyina ạnogho nạ zenyina mạlisebh obho Ẹnaan aseerian moomo arōoy odi obho.
Ạami upin io mobꞌekpaḍien ạḅoorom mokpoki bolobolo ukpe onyiin enyina.
Enyina nịvo nịvo neelōghōm mobho ạami ubhin rạvo bhibha tạmi uḍighiom moḍighi ụteeny kạar kạar olo ạami nꞌogbo ạmi nọva mọteeny.

Ạami naaḍeeriom enyina mobho toḍighi ịnyaam ạvo mi toomo kạar kạar olo ezira uḍighi, pezira orue ọbhel obo bho asilōor ilo bho, ọotua ạkar ọnuekpete bho ạJizos Obạmọogh obho nịvo nịvo ạkpete bho, ‘Ọḅaal ologhi ilo idi tọnogho ịnon ipu mobhin ghạ.’ ”
Amen ạPol ạḍeghe ạḅele, podi agbuluman nꞌoomo eedi, aakpulughu.
Oomo eedi ibhin nꞌizin ẹnoghuan zodi rạvo eḅolom odi, eghōl lōor amoon.
Eedi ịkar iḍigh tịitu mi tọnuekpete bho odi ạkpete aghōl bọ meedi irue mu emina ịmiin odi obho. Peedi ịtuonom odi isōor tesiḍia, odi aḍigh toghuugh obho.
Amen ezōor ụkpete ụnogho eedi ughōl, “Ịmaar ẹrol,” pezōor umutiom. Ụzoghi monyen ụḅeeny pezōor ụghi usi tạKos; ạḅaal pezōor usi taRods, ụḍua suo pusi tạPatara.
TạPatara pezōor ụmiin oghuugh olo nạki taFonisia, pezōor ubhun ụghi uḍigh ụḍua.
Ezōor ụzoghi usi tesi olo tọmiin ni mạSaipros, ụgbaaron ụzoghi ụghi taSiria. Keḍio ezōor ubhun taTaya, ebum obho oghuugh obho natu mobhunughi adōol.
Ezōor ụva pụmiin mobo bho neemōruōm obho, keḍio ezōor ụrolan eedi mawiki. Tịnyaam Ẹmugh obho peedi ịkpete ịnogho mạPol mọḅele osi taJerusạlẹm.
Aruḍuma bho ezōor kọrolan nꞌeedi obho igbẹbh, pezōor uḍigh tebōom. Oomo eedi nꞌạraani nꞌạrunwuny eedi ịtuonom ezōor etẹn mẹma bho eḍigh tebōom. Tesiḍia bho poomo ezōor ugbuluman uukpulughu.
Ezōor ughōl, “Ịmaar ẹrol,” eedi ighōl, “Alōor enyina emoon, mẹmaar eenon mẹzoghi,” pezōor ụghi uḍigh toghuugh ụnwiaru obho, eedi imula ighẹel.
Pezōor umutiom terele bhꞌezōor, ụzoghi taTaya ụghi taToleme. Tesuo pezōor usul ubheleghian burumōr obho, ụrolan eedi ḍuma.
Ạḅaal pezōor uḅetunu ụghi usi taSizaria. Tesuo pezōor usulomaan maFilip. Odi ōoy olo naḍighi moḍighi ọgba ọnuekpete tẸnaan. Odi onyiin mi toḍual arōoy obho ụson bọ ụseghe taJerusạlẹm obho.
Odi ạteeny minya ạsunwunyaan ilo dẹbal io milom, nẹgba ghạ dōm obho tẸnaan.
Ezōor nọorol suo mesi ịzal aḍuma keḍio onyiin ozil tẸnaan olo ughōl Ạgabos ạḍua taJudia aru.

Odi aru tezōor, pạseghe mọkpuom ukpe tạPol ạkpuom sike nꞌạravo odi, ạkpete kua, “Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạkpete kua: obo bho ạteeny bọ mọkpuom ukpe bhobho bho, pẹzo arōoy aJu obhꞌaJerusạlẹm tẹkasi zodi, ẹseghe zodi ẹlogh tạravo obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho.”
Amen ezōor ụmoghon miibha bho, pezōor nꞌaburumōr obho uusen mạPol mọḅele ọghi taJerusạlẹm.
Podi ạbhagharana kua, “Enyina neḍighi meeghe, mọrol oleghe ẹzo bho modughe ologhi ạmi bẹle? Ạami nạamara naḅōrō molo kọkasi ạmi mi taJerusạlẹm nꞌọbhuom mi taḍien tạJizos Obạmọogh obho.”
Ezōor urue ḍio mọpuenaan odi, pezōor ụḅele ụkpete nạ ni kua, “Ẹrol tẹzo ịto tObạmọogh obho.”
Ịbam aruḍuma itẹn, pezōor uukōbhōghia uḅetunu ụghi taJerusạlẹm.
Ẹde obo bho nẹtuonom maKraist obho ibhꞌaSizaria, ịtuonom nạ zezōor ịghi esi totu taMnason obo bho ezōor usulanaan obho. Odi olꞌạSaipros olo amōruōm kịḅel aruḍuma bho.
Ezōor uru usi taJerusạlẹm, aburumōr obho ẹmaar ebhin ezōor ẹloghom.
Ạḅaal, pạPol nꞌezōor ụghi mọmiinan aJems; oomo arukenya ạsosi obho idi nạ totu odi.
ẠPol aru abheleghian eedi, pạgba ạnogho eedi kạar kạar ilo Ẹnaan aḍighi tạraama ipedi obho mi toḍighi obho odi aḍighi obho.
Odi ạḍeghe ạḅele, poomo eedi ibuom Ẹnaan. Keḍio eedi ịkpete kua ịnogho mạPol, “Umōr, ạna nạamiin mẹzo idi. Ọlogh arōoy aJu obho neemōruōm, ilo ịseghe maraalōgh obho irōol tẹmu.

Nọogba ọnogho zeedi milo igboloman nꞌạna, mobho ạna nạtughumiom ghạ marōoy aJu obho idi tịnon ạraama bho morōbh araalōgh obho taMozis, nạgba ghạ nạ ạnogho eedi mọḅele oḍunogh ạnwuny eedi nꞌọḅele ọtuonom eḍighiom ạar aJu obho.
Ẹzo olo eedi tẹḅele mọmoghon mobho ạna naasi olo. Toḍighi ẹko siibha bho?
Ḍighi mibha ezōor tọkpete ọnogho ạna bho. Inya arōoy idi suo ilo neeghiran mịzo mẸnaan.

Tụonuman eedi mạghi maḅua miiḅua ọḅaaleni alōor obho mạkpienaan eedi, keḍio eedi tetue efia mạruumu eedi. Ạna aḍighi kua, pu kōoy kōoy olo tạmiin polōghōm mobho iru miben mibha eedi ịmoghon bho ụgbaam ạna bho, nꞌobho ạna ụtuugh naḍighi tẹzo ibhꞌaraalōgh obho taMozis.

Tarōoy ibhꞌịnon aruubhugh ibha neemōruōm obho, ezōor nọoge mọbhereer ọkiom eedi ọgba ọnogho zeedi mobho ezōor nọotua mobho ịneghe ḍio molo eedi kele meḍian nꞌọḅa ẹnam olo ụtunom mạar ụnogho meru, nꞌọlaay ịḅaal, nꞌọḅa ẹnam olo ụbhur orum obho, nꞌọseghe asilōor eedi mi toḍighi ịkarabh.”

Ạḅaal pạPol abhin rōoy obho ạghi aḍighi mạar iigbia ọḅaaleni alōor obho. Keḍio odi aḍigh totu iikpulughu obho mọnogho ọnu aruḍuma bho tẹtol kegbẹbh ḍuma ọḅaaleni alōor obho, tamen obho arōoy obho tetu ōoy amen amen eḍighi mạar iiḅua bho.
Amen oḍual aḍuma bho netu mokunughiom, parōoy aJu ilo ịḍua tebhugh obhꞌEsia iru, pịmiin mạPol totu iikpulughu obho. Peedi igun mobꞌọlogh arōoy ịbham mạPol,

nemulughu kua, “Arōoy Izirẹl, itu mẹlogh ạvo! Oobho ōoy obho ạghi kesi kesi nạtughumiom kōoy kōoy mịkarabh milo igboloman nꞌarōoy Izirẹl, nꞌaraalōgh obho taMozis, nꞌotu iikpulughu obhobho. Esiibha odi kapin rōoy ilo ilōghōm io mẸnaan kạloghom mi totu iikpulughu obho, ạpue mesi iigbia bhobho!”
(Eedi ịkpete miibha bho mebum obho eedi nẹemiin mạTrofimos obhꞌẸfesos nꞌạPol mi tẹma bho, peedi ịitua ighōl mạPol naabhin zodi aḍighom totu iikpulughu obho.)
Oomo ẹma bho naazighina, molo oomo arōoy ighilighu iikōbhōghian monyiin esi, ibhum mạPol ịghogh imutiom totu iikpulughu obho. Tonyiin amen obho peedi ịḍuughiiy ruguugh otu iikpulughu obho.
Arōoy ịkarabh iloghi obho neḅe ghạ mẹzo oghigh odi ạPol, mamen urōm ụghi ụgba ụnogho muvẹmụ ōoy ẹgham obhꞌaRom moomo aJerusạlẹm nẹpozuan.
Tonyiin amen obho podi arōm rōoy oḍighi odi nꞌibha ẹgham obho, ighiil ịghi tesi obho noḅe bho. Amen arōoy obho ịmiin zodi nꞌarōoy ẹgham obho, peedi ịḅele moḍul odi.
Uvẹmụ arōoy ẹgham obho akẹm ạghi tạPol, aḅol odi ạto ạnogho rōoy odi mọkasiom odi mịzal agbirigbiri, keḍio odi apuruan kua, “Oobho kokōr ōoy? Odi aḍighi meeghe?”
Ẹde mi tọlogh arōoy obho nẹgba kẹre, ịnon kẹre. Obꞌẹmoghonyan ẹrol magey molo uvẹmụ arōoy ẹgham obho otue ḍio molōghōm ạkar ạar obho amute bho; molo odi arōm rōoy odi mobhin ạPol ọghi ọduom.
Eedi isi tesi obho nọoda ghạ ọsiin obho, peedi irōol mạPol ebum obho arōoy ịkarabh iloghi obho neelegheri nẹtaal.
Oomo eedi netu todi nꞌimulughu nekōl kua, “Kigh odi! kigh odi!”
Ẹzo bho eedi netu mọduom odi obho, podi ạkpete ạnogho muvẹmụ obho, “Sesen ạami ụkpete mạar ụnogho ạna!” Podi apuruan kua zodi, “Ạna nạkpa ghạ ni mọnu aGris?
Pạna ōoy obhꞌIzipt ḍio, obho tamen olo neetẹn, aru arubhe lisian akpo modiin ọonir arōoy ẹgham aḍighom tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho ḍio?”
PạPol ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami ōoy aJu. Ụmar ạami tạTasos obhꞌaSilisia. Oōy olꞌugey ẹma. Sesen ni, ḅẹle ạami ụkpete mạar ụnogho rōoy obho.”
Puvẹmụ obho ạnogho zodi mịikpo, keḍio ạPol aḅetunu ạmara tạnyu esi obho nọsiin ghạ bho, aabhaghami rạvo odi ạnogho rōoy obho. Amen eedi iru iḅa podi ạkpete mọnu aHibru ạnogho zeedi aghōl kua:
“Ẹma, ạburude, nꞌaburumōr, ịmoghon mibhꞌọnu ạmi, nꞌịigbaay ibhꞌạmi.”
Amen eedi ịmoghon mibha odi nạkpete mọnu aHibru obho, peedi ịmaar iḅa ịrologhu bịrim; keḍio ạPol aḅẹtōn:

“Ạami ōoy aJu. Ụmar ạami tạTasos obhꞌaSilisia, keḍio uukō zạmi mi tesuo aJerusạlẹm kọony ịtughumiom taGameliel. Ọmaar ọtughumiom ạami maraalōgh ạburude ezira, molo ạami ụnogho lōor ạmi mẸnaan koomo enyina ibha idi suo dodon obho.
Ạami ụnogho mịiḅaghami ạze mobo bho nẹtuonom mEbōom obhobho obho, aḅologh ạkasiiy milobhir nꞌạraani ạlokioghom mikoli.

Uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho nꞌạruula ạkoti obho tetue ni ẹgba ạami emutiom mi tiibha bho. Ạami abhin teedi mịbhereer ilo ọghi taburumōr aJu ibhꞌạDamaskos, molo ạami kạghi kaḅologh rōoy bhibha, kạduoghom kabhin kamulumi taJerusạlẹm molo ọliom eedi.”
“Ẹzo bho ạami nạki natuan tạDamaskos, bho aḍio nạaḍian ịzal abin, pazuḅa ọpuuny obꞌẹḅaal ạḍua tạnyu obho asōorōm ạami.
Pạami umeel tade bho, ụmoghon moghōrōkō nạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, ‘ẠSol, ạSol! Eeghe kạna nạnogho ạami mibꞌịiḅaghami bhibha?’
Keḍio ạami ụbhagharana kua, ‘Obumọogh, ạna kokōr ōoy?’ Keḍio odi ạbhagharana kua, ‘Ạami ạJizos obhꞌạNazaret, obho ạna nạnogho mịiḅaghami obho.’
Obo bho nẹtuonom ạami obho nẹmiin mẹḅaal obho keḍio ịmoghon io moghōrōkō odi obo bho nạḍeghe atuom ạami obho.
Keḍio ạami upuruan kua zodi, ‘Obumọogh, ạami uḍighi ẹko?’ Keḍio Obạmọogh obho ạbhagharana kua, ‘Ḅetunu mạghi tạDamaskos, tepa pọgba ọnogho onuma milo Ẹnaan nạato milo ạna taḍighi.’
Ạami umina ḍio ạmiin mạar mebum ẹḅaal obho asōorōm ạami obho, pobo bho ogbo ạmi ịbham rạvo ạmi ireliom ạami ịghi tạDamaskos.
“Kir ōoy olo ughōl Ạnanayas, ōoy tẸnaan olo nakiilaan magey maraalōgh obhꞌezira, olo oomo arōoy ibhꞌaJu obho idi tạDamaskos obho nekiilaan magey.
Odi aru tạmi ạmaruom ạami ạkpete kua, ‘Umōr ạSol, ariḍien onuma ẹkparanu!’ Tonyiin odi amen opopo pạami umina ụke mọmiin ạar, ụrol ubhōgha zodi.
Podi ạkpete kua, ‘Ẹnaan ạburude ezira nạason ạna ạseghe molōghōm ibhꞌịto odi, ọmiin Ooḅi Ọony-otu bhꞌodi, nꞌọmoghon mobho odi abhin moghōrōkō bhꞌodi nạkpete ạnogho ạna.
Ạna obo tạgba ạnogho zodi ạnogho moomo arōoy mibha ạna ụmiin ụmoghon obho.
Esiibha kạna naḅōrō meeghe? Ḅetunu mazua mụum, aatōla mịkarabh obhꞌonuma mi taḍien obhꞌodi.’ ”
“Keḍio ạami umula ụghi taJerusạlẹm naakpulughu mi totu iikpulughu obho pạami ụmiin ghịiny.
Tạghiiny obho, pạami ụmiin mObạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, ‘Kẹm siibha siibha mạḍua taJerusạlẹm. Arōoy bhibha irue ḍio ebhinom ịigbaay onuma tibha igboloman nꞌạami obho.’
Keḍio ạami ụbhagharana kua, ‘Obumọogh, eedi nẹemaar elōghōm mobho ạami ụghi ghạ tarutu ịtughumiom obho uḅologh uḍulogh rōoy obo bho imōruōm ạna bho.
Amen obho ughigh bọ maStivin obo bho ạgba bọ mooḅi adōm obho ạnogho enyina, ạami nịvo nịvo ụrol ạni ạmiin mịikom enu obhꞌodi, ạbhamagh nạ rukpe ịikom enu obho.’
Keḍio Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, ‘Kịa, ạami tatōm ạna, ạna ạki tạraama aruubhugh obho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho.’ ”
Arōoy obho ẹmaar nẹneghanyan zodi ninii odi ạkpete miibha bho; keḍio tẹke momina omulughu tạruumu eedi nekōl kua, “Sẹghe zodi mạḍuonom. Kigh odi. Odi ogbẹbh io moḍum aghuḍum.”
Eedi nemulughu, ẹpibh rukpe eedi, ekpooy nạ mibhugh etōḅōl mi tạnyu obho.
Uvẹmụ iḅe rạagham obhꞌaRom ạnogho mịnyaam rōoy odi mobhin ạPol ọghi ọduom, nꞌọgurogh odi ọva ọmiin ạar obho aḍighi bọ karōoy aJu obho nemulughuom kua zodi obho.
Eedi iru ịghoroghi zodi netu mọgurogh, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho muvẹmụ obo iḅōrō bho, “Ọkpe olo mọgurogh ōoy ogbo eghun aRom olo dọva ḍio ọmiin mobho odi aḍighi ạpiom obho gạ?”
Amen odi obo iḅōrō bho ạmoghon miibha bho, podi aghiil ạghi tuvẹmụ iḅe rạagham obho apuruan kua, “Ạna naḍighi ẹko? Oōy obho olꞌogbo eghun aRom!”
Puvẹmụ obho ạghi tạPol apuruan kua zodi, “Kạr ạgba mạnogho ạami, ạna ōoy ogbo eghun aRom?” PạPol amōrō mu, “Ii.”
Puvẹmụ obho ạkpete kua, “Ạami ụkpe mịkanya ikpoki karu molꞌaRom.” PạPol ạbhagharana kua, “Ụkar ụmar ạami mōoy ogbo eghun aRom.”

Tonyiin amen opopo, pobo bho netu mopuruan ạPol miipuruan obho ịkporion rạvo eedi; odi uvẹmụ obho aruugu nesibh suo odi nạamoghon mobho ạPol aru mōoy ogbo eghun aRom obho, nꞌobho odi nạaghi ạkasi zodi obho.

Odi uvẹmụ obho ạkar kua nạva molōghōm ibha arōoy aJu obho nẹgbaam ạPol obho; molo ạḅaal, podi ạkarion marigbirigbiri obho tạPol, ạto abheleghi maruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌạruula bho mosōor. Keḍio odi abhin mạPol aru togbo eedi.
ẠPol ạmaar aanon tasumusigh arōoy ạkoti obho ạkpete kua, “Aburumōr ạmi! Ologhi ạmi ạneghe ni ạman nꞌoomo aghuḍum obhꞌạmi mi taghisigh tẸnaan ninii kạkar aḍuma bhobho.”
PẠnanayas uvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho ạkpete ạnogho mobo bho ịmara ituan mạPol obho moḅōr odi mi tọnu obho.
PạPol ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ẹnaan tạkar ni aḅōr ạni ạna — sọo ạna ạganeghe! Ạna ụrol suo mọseghe araalōgh obho ọgba obhumeni ạmi, keḍio ạna digha apẹl molōgh obho morōm ōoy kaḅōr ạami!”
Obo bho ịrol ituan mạPol obho ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Ạna nạkpete kua mịkarabh muvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua tẸnaan!”
PạPol ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami ulōghōm io, aburumōr ạmi, mobho odi aru muvẹmụ obo miiḅua bho. Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua, ‘Ụkpete ghạ mịkarabh mobo bho ạda moomo arōoy enyina bho.’ ”

Amen ạPol ạmiin mobho ẹde arōoy obho iru milꞌogbo aSadusi obho, ẹde iru milꞌogbo aFarisi obho, podi abheleghi mạkoti obho ạkpete kua, “Aburumōr ạmi, ạami olꞌogbo aFarisi obho, ọony ogbo aFarisi obho nạ. Uru tesuo mosōbh ạraakpe ọnogho ạmi mebum obho ạami useeriom ologhi ạmi mobho iḍim obho temula ni taghuḍum!”
Ẹzo bho odi ạkpete kua be, parōoy aFarisi nꞌaSadusi obho ịke mọruanogh, ịḍian nạ.
(ASadusi obho nekōl ghạ kua, miḍim iḅerenu mu tọbho bho, itelema tẸnaan nꞌạruumugh ẹkona ilo; aFarisi obho imōruōm ni moomo iibha.)

Poghur imulughu obho ịsiin tạnyu, keḍio ẹde obo ịtughumiom araalōgh obho ibha iru milꞌogbo aFarisi obho iḅetunu nesi magey nekōl kua, “Ezōor ụmiin io bọbon onyiin ạar olo ōoy obhobho aḍighi akōrōnuan! Ụmar io suo ẹmugh bolobolo otelema tẸnaan nạaḍeghe nạ ạnogho zodi magey!”
Pịkanan obho ịsiin mịkanya molo aruugu isibh muvẹmụ iḅe rạagham obho molo kọveleghi mạPol. Podi arōm mọlogh arōoy ẹgham odi moḍigh ọghi ọseghe ạPol mi teedi ọghi ọduom.
Aḍio aru agul, pObạmọogh obho aru ạmaranuan mạPol ạkpete kua, “Pạm ologhi onuma! Ạna nạagba ạami mi tesuo aJerusạlẹm, ạna tạgba nạ ni nạ monyiin ẹzo bho mi taRom.”
Ạḅaal pẹde arōoy aJu obho iikōbhōghian monyiin esi iḅia ighir ịzo, meedi ile ḍio ẹbhoghol bọbon ạar tughuneen molo eedi neeghigh mạPol nolo.
Oomo eedi erubal arōoy bho ighiran mịzo bho.
Peedi ịghi taruvẹmụ arōoy iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarukenya bho, ịkpete kua, “Ezōor nooghiran mịzo mọḅele ole eḍian tughuneen molo ezōor nooghigh mạPol nolo.

Esiibha bho enyina nꞌạkoti obho itōm mọnu mẹghiom uvẹmụ iḅe rạagham obhꞌaRom, odi abhin ạPol aruom enyina. Meḍighi kolo enyina netu mọmaar ọva ọmiin tilo igboloman nꞌọkpe bhꞌodi. Ezōor nọomara noḅōrō moghigh odi tebōom obho.”
Oomo ipa bho ọony ụmarani tạPol nạamoghon; podi aghiil ạghi tikoli obho ạgba ạnogho mạPol.
PạPol abheleghi monyiin obo iḅōrō bho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Pin mọbam ọony obhobho mabhin ạghiom muvẹmụ obho; kir ạar olo odi ạteeny mọḍeghe ọnogho odi.”

Podi obo iḅōrō bho abhin mọony obho ạghiom uvẹmụ obho ạkpete kua, “ẠPol ōoy ikoli obho abheleghi ạami ạkpete ạnogho ạami mobhin ọony obhobho oruom onuma, modi kir ạar olo ạteeny mọḍeghe ọnogho onuma.”
Podi uvẹmụ obho abhin odi ạbham odi tạvo ạghi apuruan zodi, “Ạna ụteeny meeghe mọgba ọnogho ạmi?”
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Ạruula aJu obho neeḍigh mezue molo ạna kabhin mạPol karu totu ạkoti obho meḍie, mopu oghōlōm mạkoti obho netu mọva omutiom ạkar agey obho mi tilo igboloman nꞌodi.

Ụmoghon ghạ zeedi. Tegbẹbh ni merubal arōoy mobho nẹeḅokia neḅōrō zodi. Eedi neeghiran mịzo mọḅele ole bolobolo ọbhoghol tughuneen molo eedi neeghigh mạPol nolo. Eedi nẹemara neḅōrō moḍighi oḍighi obhobho, keḍio neḅōrō mọmoghon ibhꞌologhi onuma.”
Puvẹmụ obho ạkpete kua, “Ụgba ghạ mạnogho bọbon ōoy maghōl ạna nạagba miibha bho ạnogho ạami.” Keḍio odi ạkpete ạnogho mọony obho moghẹel.

Keḍio uvẹmụ iḅe ạraagham obho abheleghi mịzal arōoy oḍighi odi ạkpete kua, “Ịseghe mōogh ạraala iḅe rạagham meekōbhōghia mọghi taSizaria, ịpamam nạ merubal nꞌaḍisibh ḍiōbh arōoy ilo nekiilom mạrusu, nꞌōogh ạraala arōoy ịsobh, meekōbhōghia moḅetunu tesughō asuo uḍugul obho.
Ịnogho ạni mạPol mạrusu ilo tepin ni odi esiom taFiliks ạgovono bho, tẹzo olo bọbon ạar ọteeny io zodi.”
Keḍio odi uvẹmụ obho aru ạge mọbhereer obhobho ạfirimiom:
“Ạami ạKlodios Lisias ụge natuom aFiliks ạgovono bho. Mẹeḅaal.
“Arōoy aJu obho ịbham mōoy obhobho eru moghigh odi. Nẹgbaanan kilo odi ōoy ogbo eghun aRom, pạami ubhin rōoy ẹgham ạmi ụghi ụbhel odi utughuneen.
Ạami ụva mologhōm agey obho mi tibha noḅologhiom odi obho, pạami ubhin zodi ụghi totu ạkoti obhꞌeedi.
Ạami ụva ụmiin, odi doḍighi ḍio bọbon ạar olo kọtuan koghigh bolobolo kọloghom zodi mikoli. Ọkpe bho nọgbaam odi obho igboloman nꞌiipuruan araalōgh eedi.
Amen ạami uḅughula umutiom mobho eedi neḅia moghigh odi, pạami ụutua mobhin odi oruom onuma. Ạami nạagba ạnogho mobo bho nẹva zodi obho moru tonuma.”
Parōoy ẹgham obho ịtuugh nạ mẹzo bho iḍighi. Peedi ibhin mạPol isiemi kẠntipatris.
Ạḅaal parōoy ẹgham ibhꞌavel obho imula, keḍio obo bho iḍikuuy tạrusu obho nꞌodi inyeeneni.
Eedi ibhin odi ịghi taSizaria ịnogho mọbhereer obho mạgovono bho, ibhin mạPol ịlogh tạvo odi.
Odi ạgovono bho aru aghōl mọbhereer obho, papuruan mạPol mebhugh odi. Amen odi aru ạmoghon mobho odi aru molꞌaSilisia,
podi ạkpete kua, “Ạami tạmoghon mịigbaay onuma mamen obo bho nẹgbaaghiom ạna bho neeru.” Podi ạto aghōl mọloghom oḅōrō mạPol mi totu tạHerod.

Tesi ōogh aḍuma, pẠnanayas uvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho atẹn ạghi taSizaria nꞌẹde arukenya nꞌonyiin ọgba raalōgh obho olo ughōl ạTatulios. Eedi ịghi ịmara taghisigh taFiliks ạgovono bho ịnogho mịigbaay ibhꞌeedi mi tọkpe bho tạPol.
Keḍio eedi imutiom ạTatulios ạke mọgbaaghiom iibha mạPol:
“AFiliks obo ạda zezōor! Tẹzo bho olōghōm ạar ereliom obhꞌonuma neeḍighi molo ezōor nọorol tọpuuny obꞌọodoony ekima, nꞌolo ọkpo neenweeghian nạ mịkanya mi tebhugh obhꞌezōor.
Ezōor nobuom miibha bho magey moomo amen, molo ezōor ẹkona nobuom nạ zịna magey.
Ạami ụva ḍio mobhiẹmi amen onuma oomo ipa ẹkona, ụle ghạ, deny mạmoghonyan mi tịbam ịigbaay ibhꞌezōor.
Ezōor nọva ọmiin mobho ōoy obhobho aru mịkpakpa nꞌịnunu ōoy; natubheey ghạ rạagham mi tarōoy aJu obho mi toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho; odi ẹkona obo akpo atẹnōm mogbo arōoy obhꞌạNazaret.
Odi ạva nạ mọpueghi otu iikpulughu obho, keḍio ezōor uḅol odi. [Ezōor ụva ghạ mọseghe araalōgh obhꞌezōor ọru ịiruan obho ọnogho odi,
paLisias uvẹmụ arōoy ẹgham obho aḍigh nꞌẹbhooru aru ạseghe zodi mi tezōor amutonom.
Keḍio odi aLisias ạto aghōl mobo bho nẹva zodi obho eru tonuma.] Erumolo ạna upuruan zodi ōoy obhobho, pạna nịvo nịvo ọva nạ mi todi ọmiin ibha ezōor nọgbaam odi obho.”
Parōoy aJu ipedi obho iḍumom, mibha odi ạgba bho agey agey.
Keḍio ạgovono bho ạnwaaghi rạvo molo ạPol karu kạgba ạni, keḍio odi ạPol aḅetunu ạkpete kua:
“Ạami naalōghōm mobho ạna nạarol mi tạgada osōbh ạraakpe mi tebhugh obhobho ubia, molo ologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey mọmara ọgba ọkpe bhobho ọnogho onuma.
Ạna tatue ni ạva ạmiin nꞌalōor onuma mobho depu ḍio maḍiōbh nꞌịzal aḍuma suo ạami ụḍua uru taJerusạlẹm mookpulughu.

Eedi arōoy aJu obho ịmiin io mobho ạami nạkanan mōoy mi totu iikpulughu obho, eedi ịmiin nạ ḍio mobho ạami urubhe melebhir nꞌarōoy obho, eedi ịmiin nạ ḍio mobho ạami naḍighi mipa mi tarutu ịtughumiom obho bolobolo tonyiin esi mi tẹma bho.
Eedi ẹkona ịteeny io mạar ọgba omutiom ọnogho onuma mi tibha eedi nẹgbaam ạami obho.

Ạami amōruōm iibha bho nạnogho ạna: ạami naakpulughu mẸnaan ạburude bhꞌezōor, nạtuonom mEbōom obho, obho eedi nekōl mọneghe ḍio bho. Ạami ẹkona amōruōm mi toomo ibha ụge bọ mi taraalōgh obho taMozis nꞌịbhereer arizil obho.
Ạami ụteeny monyiin oḍuom ologhi obho ạkar eedi ịteeny nạ bho, obho ughōl kua mu kōoy kōoy, iiḅi nꞌịkarabh obho, teḅerenu ni mi tọbho bho.
Ipa kiḍighi molo ạami ụseghe moomo ịnyaam ạmi mọteeny ooḅi ologhi mi tẸnaan nꞌarōoy.
“Tamen olo ạami nạaḍua mi taJerusạlẹm mịkanya ạsumusia, pạami ụseghe mikpoki mọghi ọnogho ạkar arōoy obhꞌạmi, nꞌoḅo iiḅua ạar iigbia bho.
Iibha pibha ạami naḍighi bho eedi ịmiinom ạami mi totu iikpulughu obho, tamen olo ạami naḍighi agbẹbhẹghi mi tiiḅua ọḅaaleni alōor obho. Ọlogh arōoy ịrolan io nꞌạami, koghōl ẹmoghonyan ẹrol.
Tamen opopo, kir arōoy aJu ibhꞌebhugh obhꞌEsia; eedi nịvo nịvo kitu ạni ẹmara taghisigh onuma ẹnogho mịigbaay ibhꞌeedi, erumolo eedi ịteeny mạkar ạar olo ọgbaam ạmi!
Bolobolo ịḅele eedi obo bho idi suo bho ẹgba mịkarabh ibha eedi ịva ịmiin bho ạami uḍighi men obho ạami ụmaranuan nꞌạkoti obhꞌeedi obho,

tughuneen monyiin ạar obho ạami ụkpete men obho ạami ụmara togbo eedi obho ḍio, obho ạami ughōl: ‘Enyina netu mosōbh ạraakpe ọnogho ạmi dodon mebum obho ạami umōruōm mobho iḍim teḅerenu ni tọbho bho mi taghuḍum.’ ”

Keḍio aFiliks obho nạamaar ạmoghonyan milo igboloman nꞌEbōom obho, aru aghuughi mịimoghon ọkpe bho, ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Ạami tạatua ni mọkpe bho enyina tamen olo aLisias uvẹmụ arōoy ẹgham obho naaru.”
Podi ạkpete ạnogho mobo bho taḅōrō mạPol obho, mọduom odi mi totu iḅōrō bho, ọnogho odi mịikpo olo ạburubulol odi kebhin ghạ keruom zodi kạar kạar olo odi nagbẹel.

Ịbam aruḍuma itẹn, paFiliks ạḍua aru nꞌaDrusila ạni odi. Odi ạni obho olꞌaJu. Keḍio odi arōm ạghiom ạPol moru, keḍio ạmaar nạmoghonyan mibha ạPol nạgba milo igboloman nꞌologhi omōruōm mi tạJizos Kraist.

Ẹzo bho odi ạgba ninii ạghi ạgbaam milꞌoḍighi iiḅi, nꞌọkparaghiom alōor, nꞌaḍuma ịiruan obho natu obho, paruugu nesibh maFiliks keḍio ạkpete kua, “Ọkpe olo, kịa. Ạami tamina ni apeleghi ạna men ạami ụteeny men.”
Odi nạatua ghạ nạ mobho ạPol tạnogho ni zodi mikpoki; tipa bẹleni podi abheleghi ghạ zodi moomo amen mọḍeghe ghạ nꞌodi.
Ịzal ạsia itẹn, pạPosios Fẹstos ạseghe mesi taFiliks kạgovono bho. AFiliks ạva mọteeny ooḅi aḍien mi tarōoy aJu obho, podi ạḅelemaan mạPol mi tikoli.
ẠFestos aru tebhugh obho ịraar aḍuma itẹn, podi ạḍua taSizaria ạghi taJerusạlẹm.
Tepa paruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho nꞌarukenya aJu obho ịituemi zodi mọkpe eedi nꞌạPol. Peedi iikpulughian mạFestos
mọlogh ạvo ọnogho eedi, obhin ạPol omulumi taJerusạlẹm, ebum obho eedi neeḍigh mezue ịḍeghe moghigh odi mi tebōom.
PạFestos ạbhagharana kua, “Nooseeri mạPol kōoy ikoli mi taSizaria, ạami natu nạ momula esiibha tepa.
Ịto marukenya enyina ẹtuonom ạami ẹghi taSizaria ẹnogho mịigbaay enyina ilo igboloman nꞌodi, erumolo odi naaḍighi mạar ạpionuman.”
Odi ạFestos ạrolan eedi mịnon esi aḍuma olo tegbẹbh ni mạbhenya bolobolo aḍiōbh aḍuma keḍio atẹn amula taSizaria. Ạḅaal podi ạrol delede mi tẹtolom ạkoti obho arōm mobhin ạPol oru.
Ubhin ạPol oru, parōoy aJu ibha ịḍua bọ taJerusạlẹm iru obho, iḅerenu ịmara ikō zodi ikiton, ịke mọgba oḍigh kẹrekere ọkpo aruugu ịḅam tẹmu odi, ilo eedi itue ḍio mọkar ọgba agey obho omutiom.
PạPol ạgba mibhꞌodi aghōl kua, “Ạami doḍighi ḍio mạar akōrōnuan milo igboloman nꞌaraalōgh aJu obho bolobolo otu iikpulughu obho bolobolo ọolema obhꞌaRom.”

ẠFestos nạva ghạ moru ooḅi ōoy mi taghisigh arōoy aJu obho, podi apuruan kua mạPol, “Teḍighi ni tologhi onuma mọghi taJerusạlẹm ọgbaaghian eedi mi tibha ụgba ụḅam tẹmu onuma bho ọnogho ạmi mi tepa gạ?”
PạPol ạbhagharana kua, “Ạami ụmara suo asōmōghan mọola ạkoti aRom, ạkar esi mobho ạami tamina ạki ạgba. Ạami doḍighi ḍio mịkarabh marōoy aJu obho, kẹzo bho ạna nịvo nịvo nạamiin ạni nạ bho.

Erumolo ạami naapẹl maraalōgh obho, uḍighi mịkarabh ilo ịgbaan milo ạami kạbho, ạami uusen io molo kọḅelemaan ạami. Kerumolo agey ilo tịigbaay obho eedi neḅologhiom ạami obho, bọbon ōoy olo tatue ạseghe zạmi ạlogh tạravo eedi olo. Ạami naabhin mọkpe bho ạki taRom.”
Keḍio ạFestos, tamen olo odi naaḍighom mezue nꞌarōoy odi, podi ạkpete kua, “Ạna naabhin mọkpe bho ạki taRom; taRom pesi ạna tạki nạ.”
Ịbam amen iru itẹn, pẠgripa ọolema bho nꞌaBanis ụmarani odi iru taSizaria mobheleghian ạFestos.
Eedi ịrol mịbam aruḍuma, pạFestos ạgba mibha tạPol ạnogho mọolema bho aghōl kua, “Kir ōoy olo odi suo mikoli olo aFiliks ạloghom ạḅele ạḍua;
amen ạami ụghi taJerusạlẹm, paruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua ibhꞌaJu obho nꞌarukenya bho ịnogho ạami mịigbaay ibhumeni zodi, negbẹel ạami moghigh odi.
Pạami ụkpete kua ụnogho zeedi ughōl, ilo teḍighiom ạar arōoy aRom mọseghe ōoy olo ughōl aḍighi mịkarabh molo kọliom odi tamen olo odi dọgbaaghian io nꞌobo bho nẹgba zodi mọkpe bho.
Tipa bẹleni, eedi iru, ạami utōbh io men, molo ạḅaal be pạami ụrol delede tẹtolom ịiruan ạkoti obho, urōm ubhin zodi ōoy obho uru ụloghom.
Obo bho nẹgbaaghian nꞌodi obho iḅetunu, irue ḍio mọgba bọbon ịkarabh ibha ạami ụutua bho eedi kịgba ẹḅam tẹmu odi obho.
Oomo ibha eedi ịbham obho, pịkanan ilo igboloman nꞌiikpulughu Ẹnaan nꞌaḍien onyiin ōoy olo ughōl ạJizos, olo nạabho keḍio ạPol nạgba ghạ modi siibha nꞌaghuḍum.
Ạami ụteeny io mịitua ẹzo olo ọva ạkar agey obho mi tọkpe bhobho, pạami upuruan mạPol merumolo teḍigh ni tologhi odi mọghi taJerusạlẹm ọgbaaghian eedi tepa.

Kpẹlen nꞌipa, pạPol abhin mọkpe bho ạghi taRom, nꞌoseeri odi totu ikoli iḅōrō bho molo ọolema aRom kasōbh mọkpe bho kạnogho zodi. Pạami ụnogho mịnyaam moseeri odi mi totu iḅōrō bho ninii ạami tatōm rōoy epin odi ẹki tọolema bhꞌaRom.”
PẠgripa ạkpete kua ạnogho mạFestos, “Ạami nịvo nịvo kụmoghon ạni ni mịigbaay odi ōoy obho.” PạFestos ạbhagharana kua, “Eḍie pạna ọmoghon ibhꞌọnu odi.”

Ạḅaal pẠgripa nꞌaBanis iru nꞌobꞌọbughia alōor nꞌeghuan ibhꞌọolema bho, iḍigh totu ạkoti obho. Aruvẹmụ iḅe rạagham obho nꞌarukenya ẹma bho ịtuonom eedi iḍigh nạ. PạFestos ạnogho mịto bho, pubhin mạPol uru ụloghom.

Keḍio ạFestos ạkpete kua, “Ạgripa, ọolema bho, nꞌoomo arōoy obho idi suo nꞌezōor obho, enyina nẹmiin mōoy obhobho, obho oomo arōoy aJu ibha idi suo nꞌaJerusạlẹm neebhin mịigbaay ilo igboloman nꞌodi etuom ạami. Eedi nemulughu ghạ mịgbaan io molo odi kaḍum.
Ạami utue ḍio mọva ọmiin ạar olo odi aḍighi molo koghigh odi. Kodi nịvo nịvo naabhin mọkpe bho ạghi taRom obho, ạami nạva nạ mobhin odi ọghi.
Keḍio ạami ụkar io ạteeny mạar olo ạami kabhin kạge kạghi taRom. Molo ạami naabhin zodi uruom enyina — ạkar onuma Ạgripa ọolema bho — molo amen ezira nọova ọmiin mọkpe bho, ạami ạteeny mạar olo ọge.
Tạmi, iibha oḍighi obꞌeema, mobhin ōoy ikoli ọghiom ọnon ōoy olo ụmaar io ọgba mạkar ạar obho nọgba bọ tẹmu odi obho.”
Keḍio Ạgripa ạkpete kua ạnogho mạPol, “Nọonogho ạna siibha mịnyaam mọgba nꞌalōor onuma.” PạPol aabhaghami rạvo odi aḅetunu ạgba miibha bho:
“Ạgripa ọolema bho! Ạami nabo magey mọmara aadon ọnogho onuma mịigbaay ạmi mi toomo ibha arōoy aJu obho nẹgbaam ạami obho.
Ibha ạami nạḍeghe suo bho agey, tebum obho ạna nạamaar ulōghōm moomo eḍighiom ạar nꞌiipuruan arōoy aJu obho. Ạami nagbẹel ạna siibha bho mobhin talideny alōor ọmoghonyan ạmi.
“Oomo arōoy aJu obho neelōghōm mẹzo aghuḍum ạmi kamen ạami odi ni mịbam. Eedi neelōghōm kọḅel egbiom obho mẹzo ạami urugh moomo aghuḍum ạmi mi tebhugh obhꞌạmi nꞌaJerusạlẹm.
Eedi neelōghōm, nẹmiin ghạ ni nạ, erumolo eedi temōrō ni etu ẹgba magey obho, mobho kọḅel egbiom obho ạami uḍigh ạni mogbo arōoy aFarisi obho, obho ibhin bọ maraalōgh arōoy aJu obho irōol tẹmu obho.
Keḍio esiibha bho ạami ụmara suo mosōbh ịiruan ọnogho ạmi tebum obho ạami ụteeny oḍuom ologhi mi toguan obho Ẹnaan aguan mạburude ezōor obho,

ạkar odi oguan obho oomo aḍiōbh nꞌịzal arughun otu arōoy obho ezōor neḍuom nạ mologhi mọteeny ạni, tẹzo bho eedi neekpulughu mẸnaan muḍugul nꞌootaany obho. Ọolema, ụtuan tebum odi oḍuom ologhi obhobho karōoy aJu obho ẹgba neḅologhiom ạami!
Ebum eeghe karōoy aJu obho irue ḍio momōruōm mobho Ẹnaan naḅẹriōn mobo bho nẹebho bho?
“Ạami nịvo nịvo ụva ghạ ni kạar kạar olo ạami tatue ni aḍighi, moḍighi obhiẹmi aḍien obho tạJizos obhꞌạNazaret.
Ipa pibha ạami ụrol uḍighi mi taJerusạlẹm. Ạami ubhin mịnyaam mi taruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho, ạloghom mọlogh arōoy tẸnaan mi tikoli; nꞌobho tamen olo usōbh ụnogho mọze eedi, ạami umōruōm ạni nạ.

Ịkanya amen mobho ạami ụlioghom zeedi mi tarutu ịtughumiom obho, ụva ghạ moḍighi eedi kegin keghiraan tologhi omōruōm obhꞌeedi. Ẹgam ạami magey molo ạami ụghiighu tạraama ịnon aruubhugh ụnogho zeedi mịiḅaghami.
“Tebum eedi iibha bho, pạar obho ạami ụghi tạDamaskos mi tịnyaam nꞌịto aruvẹmụ iḅo miiḅua bho.
Bẹle, ọolema! Tebōom obho, mogbo ootaany obho, pạami ụmiin mobꞌẹḅaal olo ạḅaal apu mẹḅaal aghōzōgh obho, ạḍua tạnyu obho aru akō ạami akin akiton, nꞌarōoy obho nẹtuonom ạami obho.
Poomo ezōor umeleghu tade bho, keḍio ạami ụmoghon moghōrōkō nạkpete kua ạnogho ạami mi tọnu aHibru, ‘ẠSol, ạSol! Ebum eeghe kạna nạnogho ạami mịiḅaghami? Ẹegama ilꞌonuma mọzologh ạkarana.’
Keḍio ạami upuruan kua, ‘Ạna kokōr ōoy, Obumọogh?’ Keḍio Obạmọogh obho ạbhagharana kua, ‘Ạami ạJizos obo bho ạna nạnogho mọmiinom obho.
Keḍio ḅetunu siibha mạmara. Ạami umutenaan ạna mọto onuma kẹbana ạmi. Ạna tạgba mibha ạna ụmiin tạmi dodon obho ạnogho mịnon arōoy, nꞌibha ạami taḍeeriom ạna.
Ạami tạpel ni ạna mi tarōoy aJu obho, nꞌibha ịnon aruubhugh obho, obo bho ạami tatōm ạna mọghi obho.

Ạna tạkparion riḍien eedi, atughuneen eedi mi tọkinim obho atẹnẹ tẹḅaal obho, ạḅirogh zeedi mi tịnyaam eru obho ạnogho mẸnaan, molo tẹḍua tologhi omōruōm eedi mi tạmi eedi ẹteeny ọḅelemaan ịkarabh eedi, epin ạni mesi eedi mi tarōoy obho Ẹnaan nạason ạseghe bho.’ ”
“Ạgripa ọolema bho! Ạami une ḍio none mogin oḍighi ibhꞌạghiiny obho ạami ụmiin tạnyu obho.

Ạami ụke mọgba tạDamaskos, keḍio ạami ụghi taJerusạlẹm nꞌoomo ebhugh obhꞌaJudia, nꞌibha ịnon aruubhugh obho, molo eedi ekiraan tịkarabh eedi etu tẸnaan, nꞌoḍighi ọkpo olo teḍeeriom mobho eedi neeghiraan tịkarabh eedi.
Tebum iibha bho, pạar obho arōoy aJu obho ịbham ạami tamen olo ạami odi totu iikpulughu obho, iru moghigh ạmi.
Keḍio kaadon Ẹnaan be nạpel ạami, pạar obho ạami ụmara suo mọgba ọnogho kōoy kōoy, ọbam nꞌogbōgh onyiin ẹzo bho. Ibha ạami nạgba bho ponyiin eedi ibha arizil obho nꞌaMozis ịgba ighōl temute ni obho:
mobho aKraist obho tạmiinom ni, keḍio tatu nạ mọḅel obo bho teḅetunu tọbho bho, mọgba oolelemi ẹḅaal ịbhelegha bho ọnogho arōoy aJu obho nꞌaruubhugh ipedi obho.”
Tebum ẹzo ịigbaay obho ạPol nạgba bho, pạFestos aḅetunu amulughuom odi ạkpete kua, “ẠPol, ạna nạnwe! Ibꞌịtuugha bhꞌonuma meeḍighi molo ạna nakpo mizim ẹede ọnon!”
Keḍio ạPol ạbhagharana kua, “Obo odi tẹtolom, ạami ụtaal io! Ọnuekpete bhibha tạmi ạkar eedi agey obho.

Ạgripa ọolema bho! Ạami tatue ni ạmara nꞌịnyaam ạgba ạnogho ạna tebum obho ạna naalōghōm moomo iibha bho. Ạami nạatua ạna nạamaar ạpamaghiom oomo eedi men onyiin onyiin. Ạkar eedi iibha bho imute ḍio tẹḅokia.
Ạgripa ọolema bho ạna amōruōm marizil obho? Ạami naalōghōm mobho ạna umōruōm ni!”
Keḍio Ạgripa ạkpete kua ạnogho mạPol, “Tọbam amen obhobho, ạna ụutua ạna tatue ni aḍighi ạami atẹnẹ mōoy olo nạtuonom maKraist?”

PạPol ạbhagharana kua, “Eru kạar olo iru mokpẹrẹ bolobolo ọodoony amen, iikpulughu ạmi mi tẸnaan, ạami naakpulughu molo ạna nꞌoomo obo bho nẹmoghon ạami dodon obho kẹrol ạni kạmi — tughuneen mi tarigbirigbiri bhibha ḍio!”
Pọolema bho, nꞌạgovono bho, nꞌaBanis, nꞌoomo arōoy ipedi obho iḅerenu nẹḍuaghu,
ponyiin nạkpete kua ạnogho monyiin, “Oōy obhobho doḍighi ḍio mạar akōrōnuan molo odi kạbho nꞌoḍigh ikoli.”
Keḍio Ạgripa ạkpete kua ạnogho mạFestos, “Ughōl odi dobhin io mọkpe bho ạghi taRom bọ, kumutiom ni mōoy obhobho.”
Amen nọoḍeghe ughōl ezōor tọki tItali, peedi ịseghe mạPol nꞌịnon ẹde arōoy ikoli ịlogh tạravo tạJulios. Odi onyiin ogbōgh ōoy mi tẹku iḅe rạagham arōoy ibhꞌaRom, ibha ughōl bọ “Ẹku tỌgostos obho.”

Pezōor ụghi uḍigh toghuugh ụnwiaru olo ạḍua tAdramitiom natu, olo natu mọghi taraagbolom ibhꞌebhugh obhꞌEsia. Ezōor uḍigh pamutiom. Ạristakos, olꞌạTesalonika tebhugh obhꞌaMasidonia, ạtuonom ạni zezōor.
Ạḅaal pezōor ụghi usi taSaidon. ẠJulios aḍighi miiḅi magey mạPol, molo odi ạḅelemaan zodi mọghi ọmiin ghạ ạburubulol odi, mobhin kạar kạar olo odi nagbẹel.
Keḍio ezōor umina useghenyaan utẹn. Tebum ogim obho nạpibhoghom ezōor obho, pezōor ụzoghi ụgbaanemi tọtu eeghaara obꞌegbolom obhꞌạSaipros.
Keḍio ezōor uru ụḅeeny mobꞌọbhiiny obho utẹn marisiḍia aSilisia nꞌạPamfilia, uru usi taMaira mi taLisia.
Tesuo pogbōgh ōoy obho ạbham ezōor obho ạmiin moghuugh ụnwiaru olo ạḍua tẠleksandria natu mọghi tItali, podi ạsaay ezōor.

Ezōor ụzoghi mịbam mịbam mi tesi ịzal aḍuma nꞌọmiinom, keḍio ugbi mọkpo oghuugh obho mi tegbolom olo atuan maKnaidos. Ogim obho omōrō ḍio nomōrō molo ezōor kọghiom oghuugh obho taghisigh, pezōor ụghiom oghuugh obho mi tekẹeny ạvo ọtu egbolom obhꞌaKrit obho adeeny obho, ụzoghi teekitena bhꞌaSalmoni.
Ezōor ụmaar ni nọtu, ụzoghi ninii nꞌobꞌọmiinom puru usi tesi olo ughōl Egbolom Omuzōnaan, olo ogbeenyan io mẹma bhꞌaLasea.
