Ezōor obia magey tesuo molo iḍighi molo ezōor uḍigh togbōgh ịiḅaghami momutiom, tebum obho aruḍuma bho arōoy aJu nẹtologhu ghạ mọkoony mebum iikpulughu obho neetẹn nạ bho. PạPol aakiom kua zeedi,
“Arōoy, ạami nạmiin mobho ọzoghi ezira mọḍua tesuo ọghi taghisigh ọmiinom tẹtol ni; amupẹ ọkpo bho idi bọ toghuugh obho, nꞌoghuugh obho, tẹtol ni, ụmaar io suo arōoy tẹpozu ni nạ.”
Ogbōgh ōoy ẹgham obho ạtuonom mibha ọzoghiom oghuugh obho nꞌobo bho oghuugh obho ịkpete bho. Omōruōm io mibha tạPol.

Egbolom obho ọneghe ḍio molo arōoy kẹrol tamen uuta; molo iḍigh tologhi ọlogh arōoy obho molo komutiom togbo ọbhiiny obho kọkparam kosi taFiniks, erumolo totue ni. Odi esi obho egbolom aKrit olo ạdaanaan mogim obho ạneghe mọrol amen uuta bho.
Tọpaḍi obho eedi nẹva mọḅol obho, pọbam ọfefe ọpibha ạke mọbhibh, peedi ighōl meedi tetue ni eḍighi mẹzo bho eedi ịitua bho. Peedi ịkoton moghuugh obho ịmaar ịtu magey tọtu aKrit.
Obia ḍio pọoghuanaan ọpibha, olo ughōl “Yuroklaidon”, ạbhibh ạḍua tegbolom obho aru,
panyu moghuugh obho. Ẹzo bho oghuugh obho otue mu mọdaanaan ọpibha bho, pezōor ụḅelemaan mọpibha bho mobhin ọghi kesi kesi olo odi ạghi ạghi.
Amen abhin ezōor asiom tọbam eeghaara egbolom obhꞌạKoda, pezōor ụteeny mọbam esi obhooghia. Tesuo, nꞌogbōgh ọmiinom, pezōor ubhin ụlokian rạvo molo ọbam oghuugh obho ụkpuom obho oḅomian abhẹ.

Keḍio ezōor uḍur ụsaay ụseghe mẹde ooḍigh ụnwiaru obho ụkpuom. Eedi nekiil mobho eedi tẹki ni mọgbana tobꞌeekpu ọosaar ọtu ọbhiiny obhꞌaLibia; pezōor usōrōghiom marukpe ụnwiaru obho ụḅelemaan mọpibha bho moreliom.
Ọoghuanaan ọpibha bho odi nini, molo ạḅaal peedi ịke mobhunughi ẹde ọkpo bhꞌoghuugh obho orōḅōḍi tạmuum obho.
Amina ạḅaal peedi nꞌạravo eedi ịḅirogh mẹde ọkpo oḍighi oghuugh obho irōḅōḍi tạmuum.
Aruḍuma nẹebugh molo aghōzōgh nꞌịinaany ezōor dọmiin io, keḍio ogim obho nạpibh ghạ ninii be mọoghuanaan ọpibha molo ezōor nooḅulooy maghuḍum ezōor.
Amen arōoy obho nẹerologhu mọkoony mọodoony amen, keḍio ạPol aḅetunu togbo eedi ạkpete kua, “Arōoy, enyina ịmoghonyan ni bọ ẹḅele mọzoghi ọḍua taKrit, ịpueghian nꞌamupẹ ọkpo bhibha kịtol io.
Keḍio esiibha bho, sesen ni, ịkuemi miloghi enyina! Bọbon onyiin enyina olo tạpo olo; oghuugh obho be mobho tapẹ.
Uḍugul obho tạḅaal obho, potelema tẸnaan ạmi, obho ạami naakpulughu obho, aru tạmi
ạkpete kua, ‘ẠPol, ughiil ghạ ruugu!’ Ạna tạmara ni taghisigh ọolema bhꞌaRom; keḍio Ẹnaan toḍighi iiḅi obhꞌodi nạanogho ạna maghuḍum oomo arōoy obho idi toghuugh obho.
Tebum ipa bẹleni, arōoy, ịkuemi miloghi enyina! Ạami amōruōm mẸnaan mobho temute ni kẹzo bho ụgba ụnogho ạami obho.
Tạpibh ni asiemi ezira mi teḅum onyiin egbolom.”
Togbẹbhiōm aḍiōbh nꞌinya uḍugul aḍuma bho, pọpibha ọbhiiny aMeditarenian obho ạbhibhom ezōor. Ạteeny mogbo uḍugul, pobo bho nẹzoghiom moghuugh obho ịmiin ighōl nootuan tegbolom.
Peedi ituḅeen mooḍigh ịva ịmiin mobho ekuḍum obho aru mịraar ạraala ịpaḍi arula; ịbam amen itẹn peedi imina iḍighi nạ monyiin ẹzo bho ịmiin mobho naasi mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍiōbh.
Aruugu nesibh eedi mobho eedi tẹki ẹgbana tạrubharakpar, peedi isōrōghi minya arigbirigbiri mi tạman ụnwiaru obho, neekpulughu ghạ molo aḍio kẹḅaal.
Pobo bho nẹzoghiom moghuugh obho nẹva ghạ mobhun ọḍua, peedi isōorẹ mọbam oghuugh obho iḍighi kilo eedi nẹki mosōorẹ ịnon arigbirigbiri mi taghisigh ụnwiaru obho.
PạPol ạkpete kua ạnogho mogbōgh ōoy ẹgham obho nꞌarōoy ẹgham obho, “Erumolo obo bho nẹzoghiom oghuugh obho ịtol io suo, penyina iḍumogh mu.”
Parōoy ẹgham obho isōbh mooḍigh oghuugh obho ịḅele odi ạtama ạḍua.
Aḍio natu mọḅaal, keḍio ạPol aasen oomo eedi mole ịbam eḍian, ạkpete kua, “Neegbẹbh aḍiōbh nꞌinya aḍuma mobho enyina neeḅōrō, molo oomo amen bhibha enyina dele ḍio bọbon ạar.
Ạami naasen enyina siibha bho, ile meḍian; ile molo enyina eḍum. Bọbon ạsilaan ẹmu onyiin enyina olo tapẹ olo.”
ẠPol ạkpete miibha bho ạḅele, podi ạseghe mạbred, ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan mi taghisigh oomo eedi, aḅigi, ạke mole.
Peedi ịkparami mologhi eedi, oomo eedi iru ile mịbam ariḍian.
Oomo ezōor obo bho iḍigh toghuugh obho inya ilo moḍual ạraala arōoy.
Tamen olo kōoy kōoy naale milo ịneghiom, tẹzo olo oḍighi oghuugh obho kaabhōogh peedi ịḅirogh mạruḅa eḍian ilo idi kịbiakpa obho isumughi tọbhiiny obho.

Aḍio aru ạḅaal, obo bho nẹzoghiom moghuugh obho ịlogh io elẹgh megbolom obho, eedi ịmiin mesi olo odi kẹgul nꞌesiḍia, keḍio nẹetua ghạ mobho, erumolo eedi tetue ni, eedi tekitonom moghuugh obho mi tẹgul obho.

Peedi iigbooy mịkpuom oghuugh obho, ịḅelemaan iḍinighu tọbhiiny obho, tonyiin amen obho peedi ịkoriom miiḍigh ibha ịbham bọ mariisi ọzoghi obho. Keḍio eedi iru iibhaghamiiy ịsiine tạnyu marukpe oghuugh obho, ibhꞌaghisigh obho, molo ọpibha bho ạpibh oghuugh obho ạki taghisigh, ọghi osi tegbolom obho.
Poghuugh obho ạghi ạgbana teḅum ọosaar; aghisigh obho naalegheri ạtol peke peke molo onyaghaan mu, ạman obho naḅomian mebum araakpa ạmuum obho.
Iḅe rạagham obho neḅia mọze oomo arōoy ikoli obho molo bọbon onyiin eedi olo tạmughi apun akiil ạḍua ọtol.
Pogbōgh ōoy iḅe rạagham obho nạva mẹzo olo ọbhel ạPol, podi ạpuenaan zeedi. Kpẹlen nꞌipa odi ạto molo kōoy kōoy olo tatue ni ạmughi, mopẹl osōor ọmughi obhun;
keḍio ipedi obho ịtuonom ịkpabhagh tạsuḍubo nꞌịpaḍi oghuugh obho. Iibha pẹzo oomo ezōor uḍighi ubhunughu ụman.
Amen ezōor ubhunughuuy, pezōor ụva ụmiin mobho egbolom obho ezōor idi obho ughōl ạMalta.
Arōoy obho netughogh suo bho etulan ezōor magey. Nạake nạlobh, uuta ẹkona odi, peedi igbonoghi nyạn ibheleghi moomo ezōor mọonwa.
PạPol ạghi ạso mịpe aru nạloki tạnyan obho pạar amute tebum ẹesu obho, ạabhinighian tạvo odi.

Obo bhꞌẹma bho ịmiin mạar obho nạaghunughian tạvo tạPol obho, ponyiin ạkpete kua ạnogho monyiin, “Oōy obhobho tatu ni mọokoma, toomo ibha odi naamuzōnaan tọbhiiny obho ẹkona, oghōl oru odi ọḅelemaan io zodi.”
PạPol azighe mạvo odi ạlogh mạar obho tạnyan obho molo ạar obho bọbon ạar olo aḍighi zodi olo nolo.
Eedi neenon ghạ mamen odi taabhuugh bolobolo tameel ạpo. Amen eedi iinon ninii mạar momute, kạar olo amute olo bho, peedi inwe mologhi eedi ighōl kua, “Oōy obhobho ọbam ẹnaan!”
Esi obho eedi idi obho ogbeenyan io mariḍighi tạPublios, ọolema egbolom obho. Odi ạmaar abhin ezōor ạloghom totu odi molo ezōor uḍighinaan zodi moomo ịraar aḍuma.
Ọde tạPublios odi tẹmuna nạnwe mẹzegh ọole nꞌoosaranaan. PạPol aḍigh tẹkpe odi, aakpulughu ạnogho zodi, ạḅam rạvo odi mi todi, aakō zodi.
Amen iibha bho iru imute, poomo obo bho idi tegbolom obho ibha nẹnweey obho iru odi aakōoy zeedi.
Eedi ẹnoghooy zezōor mịkanya ọkpo, molo amen ezōor notu momutiom eedi ịsaay kạar kạar olo ezōor koḍighom toghuugh obho.
Ịraar ụvanyu itẹn pezōor uḍigh umutiom toghuugh olo ạḍua tẠleksandria aru, olo ughōl “ẠKastor nꞌạPoluks”, olo asul ạrol tegbolom obhobho mebum uuta bho.
Ezōor uru usi tẹma bhꞌaSairokius, pụrol suo mịraar aḍuma.
Ụḍua tesuo pezōor ụghi usi tẹma bhꞌaRigiom. Ạḅaal pọpibha ạbhibhom ezōor; ịzal aḍuma iru itẹn pezōor usi tẹma bhꞌaPutioli.
Tesuo pezōor ụmiinan mẹde arōoy ilo neemōruōm ilo ịkpete ezōor mọrolan eedi mawiki. Ezōor ụḍua suo pusi taRom.
Aburumōr ibhꞌaRom ịmoghon milo igboloman nꞌezōor pịḍua iru mọmiinan ezōor ki tAḍighi obhꞌẠpios nꞌỊraar Arutu ilo isuloman nesulogh. Amen ạPol ạmiin zeedi podi ạsebh mẸnaan, ạghuemi mologhi odi.
Ezōor usi taRom, pụḅelemaan mạPol morugh esi olo odi be, nꞌonyiin iḅe rạagham obho moḅōrō odi.

Ịraar aḍuma iru itẹn pạPol abheleghi mạruula arōoy aJu ibha idi taRom obho mookōbhōghian. Amen eedi iru iikōbhōghian, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho zeedi, “Aburumōr ạmi! Toomo ibha ạami ụpionuman io tarōoy ezira bọbon ạar bolobolo teḍighiom ạar ibha ezira ubhin tịigbaay ạburude ezira bho ẹkona, puḅol ạami mi taJerusạlẹm ụloghom mikoli, ụlogh tạravo arōoy aRom.
Eedi iru ịva iinon mi tiipuruan mobho ạar olo ạami uḍighi ilo ịgbaan molo ạami kạbho olo bho, peedi iru momutiom ạmi.
Amen arōoy aJu obho igin miibha bho, pạami utẹnẹmi mọkpe bho uru taRom, toomo ibha ạkar ạami ụteeny io mịkarabh ilo ọgbaam arōoy ạmi obho.
Iibha kiḍighi kạami abheleghi mọmiin, ọgba ọnogho enyina; tebum obho ạami odi tagbirigbiri obhobho mi tebum odi obo bho arōoy Izirẹl neḍuom ologhi obho.”

Peedi ịkpete kua ịnogho zodi, “Ezōor dobhin io mọbhereer teebha mi taJudia milo igboloman nꞌạna, bọbon onyiin umōr ezira olo ạḍua tepa aru olo ạgba ạnogho ezōor milo igboloman nꞌạna olo nạ, olo nạagba nạ zịna mịkarabh olo nạ.
Keḍio ezōor nọva mọmoghon ạni ịtughumiom ibhꞌonuma, tebum obho ezōor noolōghōm mobho kesi kesi, kōoy kōoy nạgba ạpue mogbo bhobho ạna uḍigh ạni obho.”

Peedi iru igu ḍuma ịnogho mạPol, molo obꞌọlogh eedi iru ḍuma popo mi tesi obho ạPol natugh obho. Kụḍirogh ninii aru aghul odi ạgba ghạ ạnogho zeedi madōm odi ibha igboloman nꞌAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan. Odi ạva moḍighi eedi kemōruōm mạJizos, molo odi abhin maraalōgh obho taMozis nꞌịtughumiom arizil obho ạgbaam ạnogho eedi.
Ẹde eedi emōruōm moghōrōkō bhꞌodi, ẹde imōruōm io nomōruōm.
Peedi iḅerenu nꞌẹmoghonyan, men ạPol ạkpete monyiin oghōrōkō bhobho aghōl kua, “Ịmiin mẹzo Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạkpete mi tẠizaya ozil obho ạnogho mạburude obhꞌenyina!
Odi ạkpete kua,
‘Kịa mạgba mạnogho marōoy bhibha:
Enyina tẹtol mọmoghon mọmoghon ghạ be, keḍio ịmoghonyan ghạ ḍio;
enyina tẹtol ghạ moonon moonon
keḍio enyina ịmiin ghạ ḍio be,
ebum obho ịitua arōoy bhibha nookpereghi.
Eedi neeḅulughia raḅeri eedi,
epughiay riḍien eedi,
molo eedi ịmiinom riḍien obhꞌeedi,
ẹmoghonyom raḅeri eedi,
ẹmoghonyan tiloghi obhꞌeedi,
eghiraan eru tạmi molo ạami kaakō zeedi.
Iibha ọnuekpete tẸnaan.’ ”
Keḍio ạPol ạkpete kua akunughiom, “Ilōghōm meghōl kua, madōm ịbhelegha bho tẸnaan neesi ạni tịnon aruubhugh. Eedi tẹmoghonyan ni!”
[ẠPol ạkpete kua miibha bho ạḅele, parōoy aJu obho iḅerenu nẹḍua, iḍigh tibꞌịkanan nꞌalōor eedi.]
Oomo ịzal ạsia mobho ạPol ạrol totu olo odi nịvo nịvo ạrol ạkpe ghạ, abhin ghạ nꞌooḅi ologhi ạloghom kōoy kōoy olo aru mọmiinan odi.
Odi abhin tọoghuanaan ologhi ạgba ghạ milo igboloman nꞌAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan, ạtughumiom ghạ nạ milo igboloman nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho kesi kesi olo ụpuenaan nạ ḍio zodi.
Ạami ạPol ẹbana bho tạJizos Kraist, obo bho Ẹnaan abheleghi moru onyiin oteledōm obho mọgba ghạ ooḅi adōm obhꞌodi obho, ụge mọbhereer obhobho.
Ooḅi adōm obho, odi abhin tịnu arizil odi aguanaan kageedi obho, kubhin ụgiom tẹegia iigbia obho,
ibha igboloman nꞌỌony odi ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho. Tiikpōogh ibha ozu alōor obho, ụmar odi tọobhe taDevid.
Tooḅi aghuḍum obhꞌodi mi tẸnaan, umutiom ụmarami odi nꞌịnyaam moḍeeriom mobho ạJizos Kraist aru mỌony tẸnaan, tamen obho uḅẹtōn odi mi tọbho bho.
Ịḍua todi keru kẸnaan ạto molo ạami karu moteledōm tebum aḍien taKraist moreliom oomo arōoy aruubhugh obho kemōruōm keghiilaan dōm obho.
Enyina arōoy ibha aRom, ibha Ẹnaan abheleghi moru ilo tạJizos Kraist obho iḍigh ạani tiibha bho.
Ạami ụge natuom oomo enyina arōoy aRom ibha Ẹnaan atulan kabheleghi ạseghe moru arōoy odi obho. Ẹnaan Ọde bhꞌezira nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹnogho zenyina lịsebh nꞌekima.
Keḍio ạami tạkpete mạar, ạami nạsebh mẸnaan magey mi taḍien tạJizos Kraist mebum oomo enyina, tebum obho oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho nẹmoghon mọdu ologhi omōruōm enyina bho.

Ẹnaan obo bho ạami ubhin moomo ologhi ạmi nakumuan mọgba ooḅi adōm bhꞌỌony odi obho, tatue ni aḍighi amutiom mobho ibha ạami nạḍeghe bho iru magey. Ẹnaan naalōghōm mobho ạami nạatua ghạ ni zenyina moomo amen mi tiikpulughu ạmi.
Ạami naakpulughu mẸnaan molo kẹḍua tịto odi keḍighi molo ạami karu kabheleghian enyina, kẹzo kẹzo olo ịrol.
Ạami ụkar nạva magey moru ọmiinan enyina molo enyina epin ạni tọnu ịigbaay ạmi mạlisebh ạruumugh obho, mọghuemi enyina.
Ạkar ẹmu obho, polo oomo ezira opōbh magey tạruumugh obho, onyiin apin mologhi omōruōm onyiin ạkuemiom monyiin.

Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ilōghōm mobho kọkanya amen mobho ạami nạva ghạ ni moru ọmiinan enyina, molo ạami kuḅo miiḅua ạruumugh obho mi tenyina, kitibha ạraama aruubhugh ipedi obho, keḍio kir ạar olo ạpuenaan ghạ zạmi.
Nooti zạmi mọmugh ọnogho moomo arōoy, toomo ạraama ibha olōghōm ạar nepul tẹmu obho nꞌibha iloghi obho, obo bho ịmiin ịbhereer obho nꞌobo bho deḅom ghạ ḍio masileti obho.
Iibha kiḍighi kạami ạmara mọgba ooḅi adōm obho ọnogho ạni enyina nạ obo bho netugh taRom obho.
Ạregheer ilo nolo mi tạmi mi tebum ooḅi adōm obho, ebum obho aru mịnyaam obho Ẹnaan abhin nạpelom kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm, ịḍua tarōoy aJu obho aru asi tibha ịnon aruubhugh obho.

Ebum obho odi ooḅi adōm obho nạgba mẹzo Ẹnaan naḍighi rōoy atẹnẹ miiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh odi. Idi tologhi omōruōm be, ạseghe tọḅel egbiom obho ninii asi tikunughi obho, kẹzo bho ẹegia iigbia obho ạkpete nạ bho. “Kōoy kōoy olo ubhin tologhi omōruōm odi kaḍighi mooḅi ōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan taḍum ni.”
Ẹnaan naaḍighi amutiom ọmiin mạlile odi nạaḍua tạnyu obho nasōorōm moomo ịkarabh nꞌipesi arōoy, ibha nẹpuenaan molo kolōghōm magey obho.
Odi nạliom eedi mebum obho odi naaḍighi amutiom ạnogho kōoy kōoy milo ịgbaan molo eedi kelōghōm milo igboloman nꞌodi obho.

Kọḅel egbiom obho Ẹnaan ạlem bọ mẹmar-arōoy obho, eḍighiom ạar tẸnaan ibha nọmiin obho, nꞌịnyaam obhꞌodi ikunughi olo bho nꞌaghuḍum obhꞌodi ọnon olo aaleeny olo bho, kōoy kōoy ạmaar nị nạmiin. Kōoy kōoy olo ọmiin io tọkpo bho odi ạlem obho olo, molo bọbon ōoy olo ạteeny mọnu ọgba molo kọḅelemaan odi olo.
Eedi neelōghōm mẸnaan keḍio eedi ịnogho ḍio zodi meghuan ibhꞌodi. Eedi ịiḅaghami nạ ḍio lōor eedi moghōl odi ạlua. Eedi ikiton ku nẹetuaay mịitua araama, ọkinim naakpiom nạ mizōol ịitua bhꞌeedi.
Eedi nekōl ghạ meedi ilōghōm mạar arōoy molo eedi iru itẹn raama.
Kpẹlen nꞌolo eedi keekpulughu ghạ mẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho, eedi ikiton ku neekpulughu ruru ilo ụlem ụgbaaniom mōoy, bolobolo ịnam, nꞌịnun nꞌạririar ibha tẹḅor ni epẹ bho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, pẸnaan aanon eedi atughuneen ḍien, ạḅelemaan eedi moḍighi ịkarabh obho idi tiloghi eedi obho, molo onyiin naḍighi mọkpo ạregheer monyiin,

ebum obho eedi ighẹl magey ibha igboloman nꞌẸnaan obho nemōruōm miben, ikiton neekpulughu ekiilaan mọkpo ibha Ẹnaan ạlemogh obho, kpẹlen nꞌookpulughu oghiilaan odi obo bho ạlemogh obho, obho ạlisebh obho iru milꞌodi kamen kamen obho. Ẹrol ni nạ kua.
Iibha kiḍighi kẸnaan ạḅelemaan eedi moḍighiiy ọkpo ạregheer mi tẹmuna. Bọbon ạraani neeghireni meḍighiom ạar ẹmuna, neḍighi mibha iizuan io bho.

Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ milobhir obho, eedi nẹeḅele meḍighiom ạar ẹmuna nꞌạraani nẹva mọmunuom ịnon ilobhir ạnwuny. Ilobhir ạnwuny onyiin nạmunuom onyiin. Iibha bho ọkpo ạregheer, molo Ẹnaan naabhin nạliom eedi tebum ọkpo ịkarabh bhꞌeedi.

Ebum obho arōoy ịva ḍio molōghōm ibha ịgbaan molo eedi kelōghōm milo igboloman nꞌẸnaan obho, podi aanon eedi atughuneen ḍien ạḅelemaan eedi tịkarabh ịitua bhꞌeedi molo eedi neḍighiiy mọkpo ilo ịgbaan io molo eedi keḍighi.

Oomo aghuḍum eedi imuzō ni moḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh aghuḍum ipesi, nꞌoḍighi ịkarabh nꞌẹḍogh ọkpo ịnon, nꞌonyiin mobhin ọkarabh aḍien oononom onyiin. Ibōbhan, nꞌịzian, nꞌaralebhir, nꞌoobiōghōm arōoy, nꞌọdegh arōoy, imuzō ni nạ taghuḍum eedi. Eedi nẹnyoghogh ghạ rōoy,
onyiin ạgba monyiin ạpue. Ọlogh aḍien mẸnaan nꞌonyiin mọopu orōnyōgh onyiin nꞌọbughia lōor nꞌootuma iituma, nꞌomutioghom araabōom oḍighi ịkarabh, nꞌopẹl ọnu ạburude nꞌaburuniin pibha ụmanam eedi.
Eedi araama ilo iloghi ilo, ịpam ghạ ḍio moguan, ịsuanaan ghạ nạ ḍio ghụsan aḍien mịnon.

Eedi neelōghōm mobho Ẹnaan nạato ạlogh molōgh aghōl moomo obo bho neḍighiiy miibha bho ịkpe ni mosineni, keḍio eedi ịmaar neḍighiiy miibha, emina nạ ẹekpa rạvo ẹnogho mobo bho neḍighiiy nạ miibha bho.

Sọo, ạna obo bho nạtu mịiruan ạnogho mịnon obho, ạar ọtuan ọḅelemaan onuma olo nolo, kẹzo kẹzo olo ạna ụrol. Ebum obho ạna obo bho nạtu mịiruan ạnogho mịnon obho naḍighiiy nạ monyiin eedi ọkpo bhibha bho, nạaru mịiruan ạnogho lōor onuma bho.
Ezira noolōghōm mobho Ẹnaan ọpionuman io mọru ịiruan ọnogho arōoy ilo neḍighiiy miibha bho.
Keḍio ạkar onuma obo bho naḍighiiy miibha bho kụ nạtu mịiruan ạnoghooy mịnon obho nạatua mobho ạna tamuzōnaan ni magey ịiruan tẸnaan gạ?

Mạar io suo ạna naḍuom ologhi mibꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌọghurughiom nꞌalideny alōor obho tẸnaan gạ? Ạna olōghōm io mobho odi abhin tọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi moḍighi olo ạna kaghiraan tịkarabh onuma gạ?

Keḍio ạna naaḅulughia raḅeri onuma, aḍionom ạman mẸnaan. Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạna naakōbhōghi aseerian lōor onuma mạlile ibha Ẹnaan tapin ạliom ạna mi togbōgh aḍuma bho odi tạnogho kōoy kōoy magey ịiruan ibhꞌodi obho.
Ẹnaan tạkpe ni amulumian kōoy kōoy tibha odi aḍighi obho.
Kir ẹde arōoy ilo ạvo eedi dodugh io mi toḍighi iiḅi, ibhin nẹvaam eghuan nꞌiibhughumi nꞌaghuḍum olo ọpo mụ. Iibha pibha Ẹnaan tạnogho maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.
Ẹde arōoy neḍum aghuḍum ạaku, ekẹl mibha ịneghe bho mọtuonuman ịkarabh. Eedi pobo Ẹnaan tazuonom mạlile odi ạliom eedi.
Ẹegama nꞌọmiinom tẹtol ni ẹnogho moomo obo bho neḍighi mịkarabh obho. Tọkiom rōoy aJu obho, keḍio togbi moru ọteeny arōoy ibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho.
Keḍio Ẹnaan tạnogho ni meghuan nꞌiibhughumi nꞌekima moomo obo bho neḍighi miiḅi obho. Odi tạke tarōoy aJu obho keḍio tagbi moru osi tarōoy ibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho.
Oōy olo apu monyiin taghisigh tẸnaan olo.

Arōoy ibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho ịteeny ạni ḍio maraalōgh obho taMozis obho, ubhin io raalōgh obho taMozis kọliom osineni eedi mi tịkarabh eedi. Arōoy aJu obho ịteeny raalōgh obho, topin taraalōgh obho kọliom osineni eedi mi tịkarabh eedi.
Tọmoghon ghạ raalōgh obho be ḍio mobho ubhin rōoy nọmarami taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy. Idi tilo ọtuugh oḍighi ghạ ibha araalōgh obho ịto bho.
Toomo iibha arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ịteeny ạni ḍio maraalōgh obho taMozis obho, keedi ebhin tiloghi eedi eḍighi eezueni mibha araalōgh obho ịto bho, piloghi obhꞌeedi nẹenogho zeedi molōgh obho.

Eḍighiom ạar obhꞌeedi nẹgba emutiom mobho eedi nẹeteeny mịto araalōgh obho mi tiloghi obhꞌeedi. Ịitua bhꞌeedi ẹkona nẹgba nạ emutiom mibha iibha bho iru magey, ebum obho iloghi obhꞌeedi neḅigi ghạ zeedi moto amen, ebuom eedi moto amen.
Iibha pibha ạami nạgba ghạ mi tooḅi adōm obho, mobho Ẹnaan tạtolomi mạJizos Kraist mi togbōgh aḍuma bho ạtu mịiruan ạnogho kōoy kōoy amutiom tạnyu mịitua iloghi obhꞌeedi.
Ạna obo bho uru molꞌaJu obho, kẹko ạani? Ạna obo bho naatuma ghạ mobho ạna uru mōoy tẸnaan useeriom ologhi onuma mi taraalōgh obho.
Ạna naalōghōm mibha Ẹnaan nạva molo ạna kaḍighi, ạna nạatuugha maraalōgh obho alōghōm mọson ibha ịneghe bho ọseghe.
Ạna nạakar alōghōm mobho ạna uru mobo taḍeeriom mebōom mobo bho idi mikpom ariḍien obho nꞌọnogho ẹḅaal mobo bho idi tọkinim obho,
nꞌọnogho olōghōm ạar raama arōoy obho, nꞌọtughumiom ạnwuny. Ạna nạamaar alōghōm mobho taraalōgh obho agey obho nꞌolōghōm ạar imuzō ni.
Ạna obo nạtughumiom mịnon obho, eeghe aḍighi kạna ọtughumiom io lōor onuma? Ạna nạgba ghạ mu, “Ímiigh ghạ,” ạna namiigh ghạ ni gạ?
Ạna nạkpete ghạ akōl mu, “Íle ghạ mẹma,” ạna nale ghạ ni mẹma gạ? Ạna nạgba aze ghạ maruru, kạna nạki ghạ ni amiinyogh mọkpo aruru gạ?
Ạna naatuma ghạ mobho Ẹnaan ạnogho ạna raalōgh obho, ạna napẹl ghạ ni mọloki ạregheer mẸnaan gạ?
Ịmoghon mibha ẹegia iigbia bho ạkpete bho, “Arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ịtuan enyina arōoy aJu obho ku nẹkpeteey ghạ mịkarabh maḍien tẸnaan.”
Ạna aakō raalōgh obho, pibha ạna uḍuna bho ạar oḍighiom odi, kerumolo ạna upẹl raalōgh obho, pạna odi nini muudu.
Erumolo uudu ōoy olꞌọnon ebhugh aakō raalōgh obho, Ẹnaan orue ḍio gạ aseeri odi kobo bho naaḍuna bho?

Tebum iibha bho, arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho tesōbh ni rạakpe ẹḅam tẹmu onuma ōoy aJu obho, ebum obho toomo ibha nọoge raalōgh obho ụnogho ạna obo bho naaḍuna bho, napẹl raalōgh obho. Eedi pobo neekō raalōgh obho toomo ibha eedi idi muudu obho.
Itu ọmaar okpi rụumu ezira siibha. Okōr ōoy mạkar ōoy aJu obo bho nạakar aḍuna bho? Obo bho aru molꞌaJu mi tozu alōor obho, obho aḍuna tiikpōogh obho ḍio.

Obo bho ạkar aru molꞌaJu obho pobo bho aḍuna tologhi odi obho, tozu alōor obho ḍio. Iibha bho oḍighi ịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho tẸnaan, oḍighi araalōgh obho ụge useeri obho ḍio. Oōy olo aḍuna tologhi odi, Ẹnaan pobo nabuom odi, arōoy io.
Tiibha bho, karōoy aJu obho ibhin eeghe epuom marōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho? Oḍighen ạsuo oḍunaay obhꞌeedi?
Ạsuo odi magey moomo ạruukul obho. Tọkiom, Ẹnaan ạlogh tạvo arōoy aJu obho mọnuekpete adōm obho.
Eeghe tamute tẹzo bho ẹde eedi imōruōm io bho? Ẹnaan tatuan ni mebum eedi abi moguan odi gạ?
Ịkpo. Odi tạmara ni toguan odi toomo ibha kōoy kōoy naaru mọgba miben obho, kẹzo bho ụkpete tẹegia iigbia bho,
“Kamen kamen olo ạna ụkpete mạar, tọmiin ni mobho iben ilo,
kụmarami nạ ni ạna mi totu ạraakpe ạna tạgba ni amute.”

Keru nạ kạar olo oḍighi okōrōnuan obhꞌezira nẹgba emutiom mobho Ẹnaan oḍighi ghạ ḍio akōrōnuan, kezira tọkpete ẹko tiibha bho? Odi nakōrōnuan ghạ ni kamen kamen olo odi ạliom ezira gạ? (Ạami nạḍeghe mạraḍeghe ạnwuny siibha bho).
Odi okōrōnuan io. Odi Ẹnaan orue ḍio aru mịiruan ạnogho moomo ẹmar-arōoy obho erumolo odi nakōrōnuan ghạ ni.
Keru nạ kạar olo iben bhꞌạmi neḍighi magey obho tẸnaan ẹnogho zodi mịkanya eghuan, ebum eeghe komina ọnogho ạami mapum koḍighi mịkarabh.
Ebum eeghe keru mịkarabh moghōl “Itu oḍighi mịkarabh molo iiḅi emute etu”? Ọlogh arōoy neebhin moghōrōkō bhobho ẹkpetiom ạami mịkarabh. Apum eedi teezuan ni.
Ạami nạkpete ẹko? Ezira arōoy aJu obho ụneghe opu marōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho bẹle? Ekua ḍio. Ạami nạaḍeghe ghạ ạgba amutiom mobho arōoy aJu obho nꞌibha ịnon aruubhugh obho ịkarabh nẹnyagbuom eedi,
kẹzo bho ẹegia iigbia bho ạkpete bho,
“Bọbon oḍighi miiḅi ōoy olo,
bọbon ōoy olo nạmoghonyan bolobolo nạva molōghōm Ẹnaan olo.
Oomo arōoy neeḍionom ạman mẸnaan, oomꞌeedi neebhẹ taraabōom odi. Bọbon ōoy olo naḍighi miiḅi olo nolo.
Ịnu obhꞌeedi nepur karuugu arōoy ilo ukpereghi ḍio.
Anem obhꞌeedi mibha eedi nepin ghạ eebiōghōm rōoy.
Ọnuekpete eedi idi kịgu ooḍigh mi tịidoronu obhꞌeedi.
Ọnogho ịkarabh ọghor arōoy be bho imuzō tịnu obhꞌeedi.
Eedi ibia gha ḍio mọnogho ịiḅaghami, ọze arōoy.
Kesi kesi olo ạraaḅa asike eedi ibhun, pamaḍi nꞌọmiinom be.
Aghuḍum ekima nꞌeedi ạar ụmooghan olo.
Eedi ilōghōm nạ ḍio mẹzo oghiilaan Ẹnaan.”
Esiibha ezira noolōghōm mobho oomo ibha araalōgh obho ịkpete bho, ịkpete nẹnogho mobo bho idi taraalōgh obho molo Ẹnaan ạtu mịiruan ạnogho kōoy kōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho molo ịgbanian ilo,
ebum obho bọbon ōoy olo tạmara taghisigh tẸnaan kooḅi ōoy tebum obho odi aakō maraalōgh obho olo bho. Ạar obho aḍighi obho keeghe? Araalōgh obho nẹgba ghạ ẹnogho mōoy mịkarabh ibha odi aḍighi obho.
Keḍio esiibha bho nọogba omutiom olelemi mẹzo Ẹnaan naseeri rōoy kiiḅi arōoy taghisigh odi, oonon io tookō araalōgh obho. Eedi araalōgh obho nꞌẹegia arizil obho eghiran ịzo tiibha bho.
Ẹnaan abhin rōoy naseeri kiiḅi arōoy taghisigh odi tebum ologhi omōruōm eedi mi tạJizos Kraist. Odi aḍighi miibha bho nạnogho kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm maKraist, tebum obho akẹrekere olo nolo bho.
Kōoy kōoy naaḍighi mịkarabh asōoriōm teghuan obho Ẹnaan ạto bọ mọnogho odi obho.
Keḍio Ẹnaan naabhin tọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi nạnogho luunwo kōoy kōoy moru ooḅi ōoy taghisigh odi mi tạJizos Kraist obo bho nạta eedi ạseghe tịkarabh obho.

Ẹnaan ạtunom odi mạar molo ẹḍua tọbho bhꞌodi, kōoy kōoy ạteeny ọḅelemaan ịkarabh odi tebum ologhi omōruōm odi mi todi ạJizos Kraist. Odi Ẹnaan aḍighi miibha bho kua moḍighi omutiom oḍeeriom arōoy mobho todi ịkarabh eḍighiom ạar ilo nolo. Tamen olo neetẹn, odi abhin tọghurughiom obhꞌodi aanon atughuneen ḍien mịkarabh arōoy.

Keḍio taruḍuma bhibha odi naabhin nạliom ịkarabh arōoy moḍighi omutiom obho odi napin rōoy aseeri taghisigh odi kiiḅi arōoy. Odi abhin tiibha bho naḍighi aḍeeriom mobho, todi, ịkarabh eḍighiom ạar ilo nolo, nꞌobho odi napin rōoy ilo imōruōm mạJizos Kraist aseeri taghisigh odi kiiḅi arōoy.
Iḍighen siibha bho mạar obho ezira topin ootumuom obho? Ạar obhin ootumuom olo. Ebum ẹkaraan? Tebum ookō araalōgh obho? Eenyi, idi tomōruōm.
Ezōor nọova ọmiin mobho Ẹnaan naseeri ghạ mōoy taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy tebum ologhi omōruōm odi be, ọtuan io tebum obho odi aakō raalōgh obho.
Bẹlee kenyina nekōl odi Ẹnaan Ẹnaan arōoy aJu obho be gạ? Odi Ẹnaan arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ạani ḍio gạ? Oōy olo olōghōm io miibha bho olo.
Ẹzo bho odi be aru mẸnaan obho, odi tapin tologhi omōruōm eedi obo bho neeḍunaay obho aseeri zeedi kiiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh odi, ạseghe mobo bho idi muudu obho tebum ologhi omōruōm eedi nạ.
Kezōor nọtuan ebum odi ologhi omōruōm obhobho ọkaay raalōgh obho gạ? Ekua ḍio. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ezōor ubhin urōol tẹmu.
Kezira tọkpete meeghe nạ milo igboloman nꞌibha imutenaan mEbrạhạm, ogbōgh ọde bhꞌezira mi tade bho?
Ughōl Ẹnaan ạseghe zodi aseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy tebum oḍighi olo odi aḍighi bọ, kōl odi kụteeny ni mạar obhin oḅuom taghisigh tẸnaan, keḍio odi orue ḍio aḅo taghisigh tẸnaan.
Ọnuekpete iigbia bho kạkpete ẹko? Ạkpete kua, “Ebrạhạm amōruōm Ẹnaan keḍio ạtuan tebum ologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi ạseghe zodi aseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy.”
Ịmiin, obo bho naḍighi moḍighi obho, ibha nọkpe zodi obho aluunwo ḍio, nọkpe zodi tibha oḍighi obho odi aḍighi obho.

Keḍio todi obo bho oḍighi ḍio moḍighi obho aḍumuom ni be mobho neebhum odi, ạteeny ologhi omōruōm mi tẸnaan ọsu ạghusan aḍien obho, ologhi omōruōm odi mobho Ẹnaan tạtuan kapin aseeri odi mi taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy.
Iibha kiḍighi kaDevid ạnogho lịsebh mobo bho opin io toḍighi olo odi aḍighi kạmaruom taghisigh tẸnaan kooḅi ōoy obho. Odi ạkpete kua,
“Ạlisebh ilꞌodi obo bho Ẹnaan nạaḅelemaan mịkarabh odi obho,
apuughi nạ zeedi ịkarabh obho.
Ạlisebh ilꞌodi obo bho Ẹnaan ọḅalam mụ mịkarabh odi obho.”

Ạlisebh bhibha nọsebhom mobo bho neeḍunaay obho be gạ? Ekua ḍio. Ilo obo bho idi muudu obho ạani. Ezira nooghōl ghạ tọbhereer iigbia bho mobho ạkpete kua, “Ebrạhạm amōruōm Ẹnaan kẸnaan abhin odi aseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy tebum ologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi.”
Iibha bho kimute mokōr amen? Imute tamen olo nooḍun odi bẹlee kamen olo doḍun io zodi? Imute tamen olo doḍun io zodi.

Iibha neetẹn keḍio uḍun odi, mọlogh elẹgh ọgba omutiom mobho Ẹnaan ạtuan tologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi kabhin odi aseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy, keḍio ugbi moḍun odi, molo odi atu mọde oomo obo bho imōruōm obho mi tạruumugh obho, ibha Ẹnaan naabhin aseeri taghisigh odi kiiḅi arōoy obho, toomo ibha eedi idi muudu obho ẹkona.
Odi ẹkona ọde obo bho neeḍunaay obho nạ, tebum obho eedi neeḍunaay obho be ḍio, ebum obho eedi neḍum oḍigh aghuḍum ologhi omōruōm obho Ebrạhạm ọde ezōor aḍum kugbi moḍun odi obho.

Oguan obho Ẹnaan aguanaan mEbrạhạm nꞌạnwuny ọobhe odi mobho oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho tetu milꞌodi obho, ụtuan io tebum ibha odi aakō raalōgh obho, ebum obho odi amōruōm obho kẸnaan abhin odi aseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy.
Ughōl oguan obho ilo obo bho iikō raalōgh obho bọ, kōl ạar oḍighiom ologhi omōruōm olo, oguan obhꞌodi ẹkona ạar oḍighiom kulo mu nạ.
Araalōgh obho obo ibhin ạlile tẸnaan iru. Keḍio, esi olo olōgh olo, osōor olōgh olo nạ.

Oguan obho uḅeleriom tologhi omōruōm molo ọkuemi mẹnogho tẸnaan ọnogho moomo ạnwuny ọobhe tEbrạhạm, obo bho neekō raalōgh obho be ḍio, oomo obo bho imōruōm nạ kẹzo bho tEbrạhạm obho. Ebum obho Ebrạhạm aru mọde ạruumugh oomo ezira bho,

kẹzo bho ụge tẹegia bho, “Ạami naaḍighi ạna atu mọde ọlogh aruubhugh.” Oguan obho eḍigh tologhi tẸnaan obo bho Ebrạhạm amōruōm obho, obho naḅẹriōn mobo bho nẹebho bho ạnogho ghuḍum, aḍighi mọkpo ilo imute ḍio emute bho.
Ebrạhạm amōruōm ni aḍuom ologhi tamen olo odi ọtuughuom mụ nạ mologhi, tibha bho “podi aru mọde ọlogh aruubhugh.”

Ạsia odi men opopo, ịbam isughō mịzal ạraala nꞌaḍisibh, odi naalōghōm nạ mobho noḅōrō mogbo oogu odi, keḍio ologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi odugh io, toomo ibha aSera nạakpo otue mu ạmaraghi rụnwuny obho ẹkona.
Ologhi omōruōm odi ọḅele ḍio zodi, odi ẹkona ọteeny io mịzal ologhi mi toguan obho tẸnaan. Ologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi ạnogho zodi migbagbarabh ịnyaam molo odi abuom Ẹnaan.
Ologhi odi ạghua nị ạman, amōruōm mobho Ẹnaan taḍighi ni mibha odi aguan obho.
Iibha kiḍighi kẸnaan abhin odi tologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi “aseeri zodi kooḅi ōoy mi taghisigh odi.”
Ọnuekpete bho ụkpete bọ ughōl “useeri zodi kooḅi ōoy taghisigh tẸnaan” obho, ụkpete ḍio ọnogho zodi be.
Ụkpete nọnogho nạ zezira obo bho topin oseeri taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy obho, ezira obo bho noomōruōm zodi obo bho aḅẹtōn bọ mạJizos Obạmọogh ezira mi tọbho bho,
odi obo bho ukuugh ụnogho mọbho tebum ịkarabh ezira bho, keḍio uḅẹtōn tọbho bho mobhin ezira ọmarami taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy obho.
Esiibha bho ezira nooru miiḅi arōoy mi tebum ologhi omōruōm obho, ezira idi tekima nꞌẸnaan mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.

Odi naabhin ạloghom ezira tebum ologhi omōruōm obhꞌezira, mọteeny ạni aluunwo bho tẸnaan obho ezira ubhin nọtuughom ologhi obho, molo ologhi ezira nạḅaal mi tọtuughom ologhi obho ezira ụteeny mobhin ạni abin mi teghuan obho tẸnaan.
Tilo ipuom suo, ologhi ezira nạḅaal magey mi tọmiinom obhꞌezira, tẹzo bho ezira noolōghōm mobho ọmiinom obhꞌezira tẹnogho ni ezira mọkparaghiom.
Tọkparaghiom obhꞌezira pẸnaan ọva ọmiin mobho ezira ụghua nị, tibha Ẹnaan nạava ạmiin tezira bho, teḍighi ezira ọteeny ọtuughom ologhi.

Ọtuughom ologhi obhobho tezira obi ḍio ezira, ebum obho Ẹnaan naabhin Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạlogh amuzeni metulan obhꞌodi mi tiloghi ezira bho. Ẹmugh Iigbia bhꞌodi paluunwo ẹnogho bho odi naanwo ezira bho.
Tạkar amen olo ọlogh ạvo olo mu nolo, tamen olo Ẹnaan nạato aseeri, paKraist ạbhuonaan mimutiom ḍien arōoy obho.
Ẹkar ẹkpar magey molo onyiin ōoy kạbhuonaan mooḅi ōoy. Tetue ni etu molo onyiin ōoy tatue ni ạpuonaan mooḅi ōoy.
Keḍio Ẹnaan aḍighi amutiom etulan obhꞌodi mi tezira mobho tamen olo ezira idi nini miḍighi mịkarabh paKraist ạbhuonaan ezira.
Tebum ọbho bhꞌodi kobhin ezira oseeri taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy, kụ tụtua siibha bho, odi ọḅele ḍio mọbhel ezira ọseghe tạlile bho tẸnaan.
Aru kạar olo, tamen obho ezira uru mobo ọlokian ariḍien tẸnaan obho, odi abhin ni mọbho Ọony obhꞌodi atulughian ezira, kụ tụtua siibha bho, odi ọḅele ḍio mobhin aghuḍum Ọony obhꞌodi ọbhelom ezira.
Ipa bho be nạ ḍio, ezira idi tọḅaal ologhi nꞌẸnaan mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho, obo bho atulughi ezira nꞌẸnaan obho.
Oḍighi ịkarabh ịḍua tonyiin ōoy keḍigh tẹmar-arōoy obho, molo ịkarabh obhꞌodi ibhin ọbho iru, molo ọbho alela toomo arōoy, ebum obho kōoy kōoy naaḍighi mịkarabh obho.
Ịkarabh idi tẹmar-arōoy obho kogbi mọnogho araalōgh obho, keḍio esi olo olōgh olo ọgba ịkarabh ọḅam olo nạ.
Keḍio ạḍua taruḍuma tẠdam ninii asi taruḍuma taMozis, ọbho ạda mẹma moomo arōoy, ạkar obo bho iḍighi ḍio mịkarabh kẹzo bho tẠdam ẹkona.
Ạdam ookōogh odi obo bho tatu obho.

Oomo ipa ẹkona, ịzal eedi onyiin io. Aluunwo ẹnogho bho tẸnaan nꞌoḍighi ịkarabh obho tẠdam onyiin io. Eru kạar olo ọlogh arōoy ịbho tebum ịkarabh odi onyiin ōoy obho, kịitua minwo bho tẸnaan. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, aluunwo ẹnogho bhꞌodi tepuoghom nạ nị mibha tẠdam, ẹnogho mọlogh arōoy mi tinwo ạlisebh onyiin odi ōoy obho, obho aru bọ mạJizos Kraist obho.

Akẹrekere idi mi taluunwo ẹnogho tẸnaan nꞌịkarabh odi onyiin ōoy obho. Ịiruan ịkarabh odi onyiin ōoy obho ibhin apum olōghōma ịkarabh eru, keḍio ịiruan ịkarabh ọlogh arōoy ibhin luunwo ạlisebh eru, apum olōghōma ịkarabh io.

Noolōghōm tạkar agey obho, mobho, tebum oḍighi ịkarabh odi onyiin ōoy obho pọbho aru ạda mẹma, tebum odi onyiin ōoy obho. Kịḍa mẹetua milo temute tibha odi onyiin ōoy obho, ạJizos Kraist, aḍighi obho. Oomo obo bho ibhin mẹela aluunwo ạlisebh obho tẸnaan nꞌaluunwo ẹnogho bho odi abhin rōoy naseeri taghisigh odi kiiḅi arōoy, tẹda mẹma mi taghuḍum ạruumugh obho mi taKraist.
Ẹzo bho oḍighi ịkarabh odi onyiin ōoy obho ạnogho mapum moomo arōoy obho, pẹzo oḍighi iiḅi odi onyiin ōoy obho tamutioghom ạḅelemaan moomo arōoy ạnogho eedi ghuḍum.

Tebum obho odi onyiin ōoy obho okiilaan io mẸnaan obho, kiḍighi molo ọlogh arōoy iru miḍighi mịkarabh obho, pẹzo topin ọlogh arōoy oseeri taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy tebum oghiilaan odi onyiin ōoy obho.
Ụlokiiy raalōgh mọbughe oḍighi ịkarabh, keḍio kesi kesi olo ịkarabh nẹbugh pesi aluunwo ọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan nẹtol gha nạ epuoghom,
molo, ẹzo bho oḍighi ịkarabh ịda mẹma mi tọbho bho, inwo tẸnaan ẹda ạni mẹma mi toḍighi iiḅi, mobhin ezira ọloghom taghuḍum olo ikunughi olo mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Ezira tọkpete ẹko siibha bho? Ezira ọrol oḍighi ghạ mịkarabh ọghi taghisigh molo inwo bho tẸnaan ẹtolaan ezira epuoghom?
Ẹkpugh. Temute ẹko molo ezira obo bho nọobhozu toḍighi ịkarabh obho, tomina omula ọki otughom eedi?
Enyina ilōghōm io mobho oomo ezira obo bho noozua mụum mi taḍien tạJizos Kraist obho noozua mụum mi taḍien ọbho bhꞌodi gạ?
Tozua ạmuum obhꞌezira, uḍiom ezira nꞌodi mi tọbho bhꞌodi, molo tẹzo bho uḅẹtōn Kraist mi tọbho bho, mi tịnyaam eghuan Ọde bho, ezira ẹkona oḍum ạni momoom aghuḍum.
Eru kạar olo ezira uḍigh nꞌodi ụbho kẹzo bho odi ạbho bho, ezira ẹkona toḍigh ạni nị nꞌodi oḅetunu tọbho bho kẹzo bho odi aḅetunu obho.
Ezira noolōghōm mobho ugbaany aghuḍum obhꞌezira nọokanam ughigh nꞌaKraist mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho mobhiẹmi ịnyaam ugbaany aghuḍum obho, molo ezira uḍigh mụ rụbana ọnogho moḍighi ịkarabh.
Kamen kamen olo ōoy nạabho, odi nꞌoḍighi ịkarabh ạar ụmooghan olo mu.
Eru kạar olo ezira nọobho nꞌaKraist, ezira noomōruōm nạ mobho ezira toḍum ạni nị nꞌodi.
Ezira noolōghōm mobho nooḅẹtōn maKraist tọbho bho odi ọpo mụ kamen kamen. Ịnyaam olo ọbho amina ạteeny todi olo mu.
Ọbho bho odi ạbho bho, ọbho obhiẹmi oḍighi ịkarabh olo odi ạbho monyiin amen be. Keḍio aghuḍum obho odi naḍum siibha bho, odi aḍum nạnogho mẸnaan.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, enyina ẹkona ịitua mobho ọbho bho enyina ịbho bho, aru mọbho obhiẹmi oḍighi ịkarabh, keḍio aghuḍum obho enyina neḍum siibha mi tạJizos Kraist obho, enyina iḍum nẹnogho mẸnaan.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, oḍighi ịkarabh ọteeny mụ mịnyaam mọda alōor obhꞌenyina ibha tẹḅor nị obho, moḍighi olo enyina keghiilaan keḍighi mibha nẹtal lōor enyina moḍighi obho!

Ị́ḅelemaan ghạ nạ monyiin ọpaḍi alōor enyina mobhin omutiom aḍien oḍighi ịkarabh. Kpẹlen nipa, ịseghe lōor enyina mẹnogho mẸnaan, karōoy ilo nooḍiiron tọbho ụnogho ghuḍum, mẹḅelemaan lōor enyina zodi mobhin oḍighiom iiḅi ariḍighi.
Oḍighi ịkarabh ịda mụ ghuḍum enyina, tẹzo bho enyina iḍum mụ ghuḍum ookō araalōgh obho, enyina neḍum tebum ọsu ạghusan aḍien aluunwo tẸnaan obho.
Esiibha kezira toḍighi ẹko? Ọtuan ebum obho ezira uḍum mụ ghuḍum ookō araalōgh obho, noḍum tebum ọsu ạghusan aḍien aluunwo tẸnaan obho oḍighi ghạ mịkarabh? Ẹkpugh.

Enyina delōghōm io mobho erumolo enyina izuum lōor iḍiku rụbana ịnogho monyiin ōoy penyina ạrubana odi ōoy obho enyina nekiilaan obho, eru nạ kạar olo iru toḍighi ịkarabh, obho tapin enyina ạloghom tesi aḍuugh obho ẹkona, bolobolo toghiilaan obho tạloghom enyina aseeri taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy obho ẹkona.

Ạlisebh ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan, tebum obho tamen olo neetẹn enyina iḍiku ghạ rụbana ịnogho moḍighi ịkarabh, keḍio esiibha enyina nekiilaan nꞌoomo ologhi enyina magey obho enyina nẹemiin tịtughumiom obho ụtughumiom enyina bho,
molo esiibha bho nọobhel enyina ụseghe tịkarabh obho, enyina neeru mạrubana oḍighi iiḅi.

Ạami tạḍeghe rạḍeghe ạnwuny tebum obho enyina dẹghua ḍio taghuḍum enyina bho. Tamen olo neetẹn enyina ịkar kua ezuum lōor eḍiku rụbana ẹnogho moḍighi ọkpo ạregheer, ọḍua tịkarabh otẹn tịkarabh. Tonyiin ẹzo bho nạ, izuum lōor enyina mẹman meḍiku rụbana mẹnogho toḍighi iiḅi, moru iiḅi arōoy mi tẸnaan.
Tamen obho enyina iḍiku rụbana ịnogho moḍighi ịkarabh obho, oḍighi iiḅi nꞌenyina ạar ụmooghan olo.
Esiibha, iḍighen ạsuo ibha enyina ibhin mi tọkpo obho enyina iḍighiiy ghạ bho, ibha enyina nekiil rẹgheer siibha bho? Ikunughi eedi ipa bho pọbho.
Keḍio esiibha bho nọonyagh enyina ọseghe toḍighi ịkarabh, enyina etu rụbana tẸnaan, molo enyina nẹeneghe taghisigh odi. Ikunughi obho, enyina tẹteeny aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.
Ebum obho ạmukpe oḍighi ịkarabh aru mọbho, keḍio ẹnogho aluunwo bho tẸnaan aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Iiḅi aburumōr, enyina ilōghōm io mobho araalōgh obho nẹto mịto ẹnogho mōoy tibha odi taḍighi tamen olo odi odi nꞌaghuḍum be gạ? Ạami napuruan mobo bho ilōghōm raalōgh obho.

Ạni ilom, tẹzo lo ọtuom, araalōgh obho nẹto mịto ẹnogho tẹzo lo odi tạtolom olom odi tamen olo odi odi nini nꞌaghuḍum. Odi olom obho ạbho, pạni obho naamuzōnaan tịto araalōgh obho ịkpuom odi tolom odi obho.

Tiibha bho, eru kạar olo olom obho dọbho ḍio kodi ạghi natughom ọnon ōoy, tokōl odi ole mẹma. Kolom odi ạbho, olōgh obhobho ạar olo ạteeny moḍighiom odi olo mu. Odi tatue ni ạḅal ọnon ōoy, odi ole ḍio mẹma.

Onyiin ẹzo bho pẹzo idi nạ tenyina, iiḅi aburumōr. Tọbho bho taKraist enyina ẹkona nẹebho nạ tilo igboloman nꞌaraalōgh obho, molo esiibha bho enyina neeru ạni milꞌodi obo bho uḅẹtōn bọ tọbho bho, ezira oḍum iiḅi aghuḍum ọnogho mẸnaan.
Tamen obho ezira uḍum ghạ tibha alōor ezira nagbẹel obho, araalōgh obho ịnogho ezira mịnyaam moḍighi ịkarabh ariḍighi talōor ezira, molo ezira uḍum ịkarabh aghuḍum ụnogho mọbho.
Keḍio esiibha, olōgh olo mu tezira, tebum obho ezira nọobho todi obo bho aḅol ghạ ạbham ezira mi tikoli obho. Ezira uḍum mụ ghuḍum ookō araalōgh obho ụge bho, noḍum tomoom aghuḍum Ẹmugh Iigbia bho.

Ezira tọkpete ẹko siibha bho? Enyina nekōl araalōgh obho ịkarabh gạ? Eenyi, ekua ḍio. Keḍio mịin, araalōgh obho obo iḍighi kạami uru ulōghōm mịkarabh. Ạami kulōghōm io mẹzo ọsebh ọseghiom, ughōl araalōgh obho ịkpete ḍio kua eghōl mu “Ụsebh ghạ mạseghiom” bọ.
Oḍighi ịkarabh iḍigh taraalōgh obho nenyuughi ạami moḍighi oḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh ọsebh ọseghiom. Otughuneen raalōgh obho, oḍighi ịkarabh oḍum ịkarabh aghuḍum olo mu.
Kir onyiin amen olo ạami uḍum ghạ ghuḍum olo araalōgh obho ilo, keḍio amen araalōgh obho iru, pọbho aḍum, ạami ụbho.
Ụlogh raalōgh obho mọnogho arōoy ghuḍum, keḍio ikiton ku ebhin ọbho eruom ạami.
Oḍighi ịkarabh iḍigh taraalōgh obho ẹmiin ebōom ọḅol oobiōghōm ạmi. Oḍighi ịkarabh iḍigh taraalōgh obho eghigh ạami.
Oomo ipa ẹkona, araalōgh obho ịḍua tẸnaan keru, ịto araalōgh obho ẹkona ịḍua nạ tẸnaan keru, nẹgba miiḅi ọkpo, ẹlogh ạvo ẹnogho rōoy.

Iibha bho nemōrō ekōl iiḅi ọkpo mibha iḍighi ạami ụbho bho gạ? Ẹnaan omōrō ḍio kua. Oḍighi ịkarabh iḍighi. Oḍighi ịkarabh abhin tibha iru miiḅi obho abhin ọbho aruom ạami molo ạkar aghuḍum oḍighi ịkarabh obho emute ẹman, nꞌolo ẹḍua tịto araalōgh obho oḍighi ịkarabh ẹḅor ẹman teḍighiom ạar odi.
Ezira noolōghōm mobho araalōgh obho iru milo ạruumugh ezira, keḍio ạami eḅol ọomi olo nooḅool kẹbana ụnogho moḍighi ịkarabh.
Ạami utue ḍio mọmoghonyan ibha ạami naḍighi obho. Ibha idi tologhi ạmi moḍighi obho ạami utue ḍio moḍighi, keḍio ibha ạami ụva ḍio moḍighi obho pibha ạami naḍighi.
Kamen kamen olo ạami uḍighi mibha ạami ụva ḍio moḍighi obho, pụ nẹgba mobho ạami naamōruōm mobho araalōgh obho ịneghe nị.
Ạami ạkar obo bho naḍighi miibha bho ḍio, oḍighi ịkarabh obho natughom ạami obho.
Ạami naalōghōm nạ mobho iiḅi ilo idi tạmi ilo nolo, tạkar odi eḅol ọomi iikpōogh alōor obhꞌạmi. Ologhi oḍighi ibha ịneghe bho idi tạmi keḍio ạami utue ḍio moḍighi.
Iiḅi ibha ạami kuḍighi obho ạami utue ḍio moḍighi. Ạami ukiton ku naḍighi mịkarabh ibha ạami ụva ḍio moḍighi obho.
Eru kạar olo ạami naḍighi mibha ạami ụva ḍio moḍighi obho, pạkar ạmi ḍio mobho naḍighi obho, oḍighi ịkarabh obho natughom ạami obho naḍighi.
Iibha iḍighi molo ạami ụmiin molōgh obhobho talōor ạmi, ibha ạami nạva moḍighi ibha ịneghe bho, ibha iru mịkarabh obho be mibha idi tologhi ạmi.
Eḍigh tologhi ạmi magey maraalōgh obho tẸnaan.
Keḍio ọnon oḍigh olōgh mobho ạami nạmiin tiikpōogh alōor obhꞌạmi, naḅe molōgh obho odi tologhi ạmi obho, nạloghom ạami mikoli mi taraalōgh oḍighi ịkarabh obho natughom iikpōogh alōor ạmi obho.
Ọsaagh ọmiin oḍigh aghuḍum olo ạami naḍum. Okōr ōoy taḍighi ạami amuzōnaan teḅol ọomi obho nạloghom ạami tesi aḍuugh obho?
Ạlisebh ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Oobho poḍigh aghuḍum olo ạami naḍum, ạami nịvo nịvo naakō raalōgh obho tẸnaan mi tologhi ạmi, keḍio ạami ubhin lōor obhꞌạmi naakuōm raalōgh oḍighi ịkarabh.
Obo bho ạJizos Kraist natughom obho ibhin mụ mapum siibha.
Ebum obho araalōgh Ẹmugh obho, obho abhin ghuḍum mi tạJizos Kraist natuom ezira bho, nẹebhel ạami ịseghe mi taraalōgh oḍighi ịkarabh nꞌọbho bho.

Ẹnaan naaḍighi mibha araalōgh obho itue ḍio moḍighi tebum obho iikpōogh alōor ōoy ịnyaam oḍighi iiḅi ilo bho. Odi arōm mạkar Ọony obhꞌodi aru mọnogho apum moḍighi ịkarabh. Odi Ọony obhꞌodi aru kōoy nꞌiikpōogh alōor oḍighi ịkarabh mobhiẹmi ịkarabh.
Ẹnaan aḍighi miibha bho molo iiḅi ịto araalōgh obho ẹtol kẹzo bho odi ạto bho, mi tezira obo bho uḍum io tibha iikpōogh obho, noḍum tibha Ẹmugh obho.

Ebum obho obo bho neḍum tibha iikpōogh obho neseeriom gha mologhi eedi tọkpo ibha iikpōogh obho negbẹel obho, keḍio obo bho neḍum tibha Ẹmugh obho neseeriom ghạ mologhi eedi tọkpo ibha Ẹmugh obho nagbẹel obho.
Oōy olo aseeriom ologhi odi mi tọkpo ibha iikpōogh obho negbẹel obho podi ọbho, keḍio obo bho aseeriom ologhi odi mi tibha Ẹmugh obho nagbẹel obho podi oḍum ọteeny nạ ekima.
Tiibha bho bẹleni, kōoy kōoy olo aseeriom ologhi odi tọkpo iikpōogh obho, podi obo ọlogh aḍien tẸnaan, ebum obho odi ookō ḍio raalōgh tẸnaan obho, keḍio odi orue nạ ḍio aakō.
Obo bho nẹtuonom mibha iikpōogh obho irue ḍio eḍighi milo teḍigh tologhi tẸnaan.

Enyina ilo kua, enyina ịtuonom io mibha iikpōogh obho negbẹel obho, enyina nẹtuonom mibha Ẹmugh obho, eru kạar olo ạkar Ẹmugh Iigbia bho tẸnaan natughom enyina. Kōoy kōoy olo ọteeny ạni ḍio mẸmugh Iigbia bho taKraist olꞌodi ḍio.

Keru kạar olo aKraist naḍum taghuḍum enyina, toomo ibha iikpōogh enyina nẹebho tebum ịkarabh obho ẹkona, Ẹmugh Iigbia bho odi nꞌaghuḍum mi tenyina tebum obho nooseeri enyina kiiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan obho.

Eru kạar olo Ẹmugh Iigbia bho tẸnaan obho aḅẹtōn bọ maKraist tọbho bho odi taghuḍum enyina, podi obo bho aḅẹtōn bọ maKraist tọbho bho tapin nạ nị tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho odi tenyina bho ạnogho ghuḍum miikpōogh obhꞌenyina ibha nẹeḅor obho.
Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr, ezira noole mọmugh, ilo oḍum tibha iikpōogh obho negbẹel obho ḍio.
Eru kạar olo enyina iḍum ghuḍum enyina mi tibha iikpōogh obho negbẹel obho, penyina ọbho; kenyina ebhin tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho, ebhiẹmi mịkarabh eḍighiom ạar obhꞌenyina, penyina oḍum.
Oomo obo bho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho abhin nateliom obho pobo iru mạnwuny tẸnaan.

Ẹmugh Iigbia bho Ẹnaan ạnogho enyina bho, ọloghom io enyina rụbana, mọnogho enyina mẹroogh. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, odi akiton ku naḍighi enyina moru ạnwuny tẸnaan, molo ezira ubhin tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho noleghe okōl “Ạda, eey Ọde ạmi.”
Odi Ẹmugh Iigbia bho obo aḍigh nꞌạruumugh ezira nạgba amutiom mobho ezira uru mạnwuny tẸnaan.

Ẹzo bho ezira nooru mạnwuny odi obho, ezira topin ạni nị mạlisebh obho odi naseerian marōoy odi obho, keḍio ezira toḍigh ạni nạ nꞌaKraist opin ạni mibha Ẹnaan naaseerian odi obho. Eru kạar olo ezira nopin ạni mọmiinom obho taKraist, ezira topin ạni nị nạ mabin eghuan obhꞌodi.
Ạami nạatua ọmiinom obho ezira nọmiinom siibha bho ẹzo ọtuom eghuan obho tomutiom ọnogho ezira bho olo nolo.
Oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho neebhurion riḍien neḅōrō mọmiin obho Ẹnaan tamutiom nwụny odi.
Ịḍua tologhi tẸnaan keru mọnogho apum kạar kạar olo ụlem tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho, ilo ịto ẹmar-arōoy obho ḍio. Oomo ipa ẹkona, obhooghu osōrōghiōm obhobho odi,
mobho kạar kạar olo Ẹnaan ạlem tẹmar-arōoy obho nịvo nịvo, nꞌaḍuma nꞌaḍuma, tọpel zodi toḍigh ẹbana bho odi aḍigh mọḅor obho, mobhin abin eghuan tẸnaan kạnwuny odi ilo neemuzōnaan.
Oōy olo olōghōm io olo, mobho kesiibha kạar kạar tẹmar-arōoy obho nẹkubh mịkubh ọmiinom kạni olo eghun negun.

Keḍio ọkpo ẹmar-arōoy obho be ḍio, ezira obo bho noobhin mẸmugh Iigbia bho kọḅel ẹnogho tẸnaan obho nọkubhughu nạ tạkar ologhi obhꞌezira, suo ezira noḅōrō mẸnaan moru ọghaaron obhin ezira kạnwuny odi nꞌọta iikpōogh alōor ezira bho.
Ụbhel ezira notẹnẹmi tebum oḍuom ologhi obhobho. Ezira kọmiin mibha ezira noḍuom ologhi obho, eedi ipa bho irue ḍio eru moḍuom ologhi. Okōr ōoy obo naḍuom ghạ mologhi tibha odi nạmiin obho?
Kezira noḍuom ologhi tibha ezira ụmiin io bho, pezira odeny oḅōrō eedi.

Onyiin ẹzo bho mobho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho nạlogh ghạ mạvo ạnogho ezira talidugh alōor obhꞌezira. Ezira ụkar io olōghōm mẹzo ookpulughu ghạ, keḍio odi Ẹmugh Iigbia bho nịvo nịvo pobo naasen Ẹnaan ạnogho ezira mi tibꞌẹegama olo ikpo-ọnu ōoy otue ḍio ạgba amutiom.
Keḍio Ẹnaan obo bho nạmiin iloghi arōoy obho pobo alōghōm mibha idi tịitua Ẹmugh Iigbia bho, ebum obho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho naḍigh ghạ maasen mẸnaan ạnogho marōoy odi Ẹnaan mi tibha idi tologhi odi obho.
Ezira noolōghōm mobho, kạar kạar ilo imute, Ẹnaan odi nꞌobo bho itulan odi obho moḍighi ọnogho eedi miiḅi ọkpo, obo bho odi abhin tibha ologhi odi kabheleghi obho.
Obo bho Ẹnaan ạkar ạson ạseghe bho, eedi pobo odi naabhin nạ aseeri mobhin ạni abin aghuḍum tỌony obhꞌodi, molo Ọony obhꞌodi atu mọkpana ọlogh aburumōr obhꞌodi.

Tiibha bho, obo bho odi Ẹnaan nạason ạseghe bho pobo odi abheleghi. Odi obheleghi ḍio ni zeedi be, odi naaḍighi nạ zeedi etu miiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh odi. Eedi obo bho odi aḍighi aseeri taghisigh odi kiiḅi arōoy obho pobo odi nạḍi ạnogho meghuan odi.
Tiibha bho kezira tọkpete meeghe? Erumolo Ẹnaan odi nꞌezira, okōr ōoy mobo tatue ạmaranuan ezira?
Bọbon ạkar Ọony obhꞌodi, odi oseeri ḍio tạman. Odi abhin ni ạtunom mạar ạnogho moomo ezira. Ạkar Ọony obhꞌodi keḍio odi ạnogho ezira, odi orue nạ ḍio gạ ạnogho ezira kạar kạar?
Okōr ōoy mobo tatu ạpam olōgh mạkar arōoy obho Ẹnaan nạason ạseghe bho? Ẹnaan nịvo nịvo nạanogho eedi makẹel.
Ọnon ōoy tatue ni ạnogho eedi mapum gạ? ẠJizos Kraist obo bho ạbho bho, ạkar odi obo bho uḅẹtōn bọ tọbho bho, obho odi siibha mi toḍiom ạvo tẸnaan obho, odi obo naasen mẸnaan ạnogho ezira.
Okōr ōoy obo tatue ạgbarion ezira nꞌetulan obho taKraist siibha bho? Ịiḅaghami tetue ni gạ? Bolobolo ọmiinom nꞌobhin ẹegama tạravo arōoy tebum aḍien taKraist, nꞌoḅẹer, nꞌekulom, nꞌaḍuugh nꞌọbho?
Kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
“Tebum enyina kezōor idi tọnu aḍuugh moomo aḍuma,
opin ezōor oseeri kạraana ilo notu mọghi ọze.”
Ịkpo, toomo ọkpo bhibha ezira tọmara kạruukpara mi tịnyaam odi obo bho atulan ezira bho.

Ebum obho ạami nạakar ulōghōm mobho bọbon ạar olo tatue ạgbarion ezira nꞌetulan obhꞌodi olo, ọbho bẹlee kaghuḍum, bẹlee kịkarabh ạruumugh ạnyu obho, nꞌạruula, nꞌọkpo ilo idi siibha nꞌilo netu taghisigh, nꞌọkpo ilo ịteeny mịnyaam,

nꞌẹmar-arōoy obho odi tạnyu obho nꞌobho odi tẹeḍiani ade bho ẹkona, nꞌoomo ọkpo bho Ẹnaan ạlem tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho, ilo irue ghạ ịgbarion ezira nꞌetulan obho tẸnaan ibha idi mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho olo.
Ạami nạgba magey obho mi taKraist, ạami ụgba ḍio miben. Ẹmugh Iigbia bho odi nꞌologhi ạmi nạgbaanaan ạami mobho ạami ụgba ḍio miben.
Ologhi ạmi ọḅaal io nọḅaal, ekpom ạmi naaḍigh tibꞌịitu olo ẹzo ọgba olo,
tebum aburumōr obhꞌạmi, ibha nꞌạami uru monyiin ịḅaal obho. Ịneghe ni bọ, ạami kugbẹel nạ nị molo itōnyōgh tẸnaan kẹrolan ạami mọgbarion ạmi nꞌaKraist tebum eedi.

Eedi arōoy ibha Ẹnaan ạson ạseghe bho, abhin eedi kạnwuny odi, ạḍian nạ nꞌeedi meghuan obhꞌodi, aghiran eedi mịzo, ạnogho nạ zeedi raalōgh obho, molo eedi iru ịteeny mạkar ebōom ookpulughu Ẹnaan, ibhin nạ moguan obho tẸnaan.
Eedi pạkar ạnwuny ọobhe igbaany ạburude bho, keḍio aKraist mi tiikpōogh obho, olo ebhugh eedi. Kamen kamen ạlisebh ẹrol nị ẹnogho zodi Ẹnaan, obo bho nạda kạar kạar obho. Ẹrol nị nạ kua.
Ạami ụḍeghe ḍio moghōl Ẹnaan ọbham io moguan obhꞌodi. Oomo obo bho iru bọ marōoy Izirẹl obho pobo Ẹnaan ạson ạseghe ḍio.
Oomo ạnwuny ọobhe tEbrạhạm nạ ḍio mobo iru mạnwuny tẸnaan. Ẹnaan ạkpete ẹko ạnogho mEbrạhạm? Odi ạkpete kua, “Ạnwuny ọobhe tẠizik be mobo tetu milꞌonuma.”
Iibha bho nẹgba mobho ạnwuny ibha ụmar tiikpōogh obho ḍio mibha tetu mạnwuny tẸnaan, ibha ụmar bọ tẹzo oguan obho tẸnaan mobo tọḅalam tạnwuny ọobhe tEbrạhạm.
Oobho oghōrōkō odi oguan obho, “Tamen olo nạateeny pạami omula oru, paSera ọmar ọony.”
Iibha nạ be ḍio. Ịzal ạnwuny obho tạRibeka onyiin ọde. Odi Ạizik obꞌọde bhꞌezōor.

Tamen olo dọmar io zeedi, dolōghōm nạ ḍio mọkarabh nꞌooḅi, pẸnaan ạkpete kua ạnogho mạRibeka, “Okenya bho takumuan mọbam obho”, molo ịto ibha ologhi tẸnaan ẹtol ẹki taghisigh, nꞌolo ọtuan tebum obho odi Ẹnaan kabheleghi zeedi, itu ḍio tibha eedi iḍighi obho.
Idi nạ kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete nạ bho, “ẠJekob pobo ạami utulan, Ịso oḍigh io tologhi ạmi.”
Tiibha bho kezira tọkpete ẹko? Kir ẹde arōoy ilo iḍigh tologhi tẸnaan, kir ẹde ilo iḍigh io tologhi odigạ? Ẹkpugh.
Odi ạkpete kua ạnogho maMozis, “Obo ologhi ạmi aḍigh obho pobo ạami tạsuanaan ghụsan, obo ologhi ạmi aḍigh pobo ạami taḍighi miiḅi ạnogho.”
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ilo tilo ōoy nạva moḍighi bolobolo tilo odi naḍighi, idi tọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan be.
Tẹegia bho ụkpete kua ọnogho maFero, “Ạami ụtuan miibha kạami atẹnẹ ạna mọolema, obhin onuma oḍighi omutiom ịnyaam ạmi, nꞌoḍighi olo aḍien ạmi kamute toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Tebum iibha bẹleni, Ẹnaan nạsuanaan ghạ ghụsan mobo bho ologhi odi aḍigh obho, ạkparami miloghi obo bho ologhi odi aḍigh obho.
Onyiin enyina tatue ni apuruan kua zạmi, “Eru kạar olo iru kua, eeghe aḍighi kodi ạgba mōoy mịkarabh? Okōr ōoy tatue agin tibha ologhi tẸnaan?”
Keḍio, ōoy, ạna obo bho napuruan kua bho kokōr ōoy mọḅoorana Ẹnaan? Ọonu omula dio apuruan kua mobo bho ạlem odi obho aghōl kua, “Ebum eeghe kạna ạlem ạami kua?”
Odi obo bho nạlem mọonu obho ọteeny io mịnyaam gạ, moḅoloḅol ọomi obho mẹzo lo ologhi odi aḍigh aḍigh, ọseghe onyiin odi eḅol ọomi obho ọlemom ịzal ịinu, onyiin kạla sịpom opedi obho kạla mạfu.

Onyiin ẹzo bho mobho Ẹnaan abhin naḍighi mọkpo odi. Odi ạva mobhin tạlile bhꞌodi oḍighi omutiom ịnyaam obhꞌodi. Tiibha bho podi adeny nạkurughiom mịkarabh obo bho idi kọonu olo ubhin ọkarabh ologhi ụlemom, obho ịgbaan nị moḅomi obho.

Odi ạva nạ moḍighi omutiom ẹela eghuan obhꞌodi, ibha odi akpologhian ezira obo bho idi kịinu ilo ubhin ọsu ạghusan aḍien ụlemom obho, ạkar ezira obo bho odi ạlem molo ezira kobhin ạni meghuan odi obho,
ebum obho ezira uru mobo bho odi abheleghi obho. Odi obheleghi ḍio tarōoy aJu obho be, napeleghi nạ tibha ịnon aruubhugh obho.
Ịmoghon mibha odi ạkpete tọbhereer taHozia ozil obho,
“Obo bho itu ḍio rōoy ạmi obho, ạami takōl ḍien eedi ‘Arōoy ạmi’;
ebhugh obho ạami utulan io bho, ạami takōl ḍien odi ‘Obo oḍigh ologhi ạmi.’
Keḍio tạkar odi esi obho ụmara bọ ughōl eedi, ‘Enyina arōoy ạmi ḍio’ bho,
pesi tọmara okōl eedi ạnwuny tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho.”
Ạizaya ozil obho ẹkona ạgba amutiom milo igboloman nꞌarōoy Izirẹl aghōl kua, “Ughōl nạ arōoy Izirẹl iḍighan nạ ileeny mọosaar ibha idi tọtu ọbhiiny obho ẹkona, ịbam eedi be mobo tọpel,
ebum obho Obạmọogh obho natu siibha siibha mọru ịiruan ọnogho oomo arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Idi kẹzo bho odi Ạizaya ạkpete nạ tamen olo neetẹn aghōl, “Ughōl odi Obạmọogh Oomo ẹmiriikpo bho osughenaan io ezira nwụny bọ, kōl ezira nọorol kạSodom, kōl ezira idi kaGomora.”
Ezira tọkpete ẹko siibha bho? Oghōl, arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ibha iḅe ḍio mọrol taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy obho, pobo noobhin tologhi omōruōm useeri taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy,
keḍio arōoy obho odi ạson ạseghe bho, ibha nẹva mọbhamam olōgh ọghi ọmara taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy obho pobo itue ḍio.
Eeghe aḍighi? Ebum obho eedi iḅeleriom io tologhi omōruōm obho, iḅeleriom ghạ mologhi eedi tibha eedi tetue ni eḍighi obho, peedi ikpetaan imeleghu tọbharakpar ẹghorom obho,
kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
“Ịmiin, ạami naseeri mi tạZayon mọbharakpar olo taḍighi arōoy tekpetaan,
olo eedi tẹzorom emeleghu.
Keḍio obo bho amōruōm odi obho ụloki ḍio zodi rẹgheer.”
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, oomo ibha idi tologhi ạmi, nꞌibha ạami naakpulughu mẸnaan, pilo Ẹnaan ạpel eedi.
Ạami tatue ni akiran eedi mịzo, tẹzo eedi iseeriom ologhi mẸnaan, keḍio eedi iseeriom io mologhi obhꞌeedi mi tạkar agey olōghōm ạar obho tẸnaan,

ebum obho eedi ilōghōm io mẹzo Ẹnaan napin rōoy aseeri taghisigh odi kiiḅi arōoy obho. Eedi nẹva gha mebōom olꞌeedi, molo eedi ịgbaaron ẹḍua tebōom obho Ẹnaan nạloghom rōoy aseeri eedi kiiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh odi obho.
AKraist ikunughi araalōgh obho, molo kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm odi poseeri taghisigh tẸnaan kooḅi ōoy.
AMozis ạge ạkpete kua, “Obo bho aakō raalōgh obho taḍum taraalōgh obho.”

Keḍio tibha topin tologhi omōruōm oseeri mōoy taghisigh tẸnaan kooḅi ōoy obho ụkpete kua, “Upuruan ghạ tologhi onuma maghōl kua, ‘Okōr ōoy tạsiin tạnyu obho?’ ” Tiibha bho pạna nạva mosōorẹ aKraist tade bho.
“Ughōl ghạ nạ ‘Okōr ōoy tasōor ạki tẹmar-arōoy obhꞌade bho?’ ” Tiibha bho pạna nạva momulumi aKraist mi tọbho bho.
Ụkar ụkpete ẹko? Ụkpete kua, “Adōm tẸnaan naaru atuan enyina, tịidoronu nꞌekpom enyina.” Iibha padōm omōruōm ibha ezōor nọgba bho.
Erumolo enyina ịgbaam mịidoronu obhꞌenyina mobho ạJizos aru mObạmọogh obho, imōruōm tekpom obhꞌenyina mobho Ẹnaan aḅẹtōn odi tọbho bho, pọbhel enyina.
Ebum obho noseeri ezira taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy tebum obho ezira umōruōm tekpom ezira bho, nọpel ezira tibha ezira ụgbaam ịidoronu ezira bho.
Ẹegia iigbia bho ạkpete kua, “Oōy olo tamōruōm odi olo tọloki rẹgheer olo.”

Iibha bho igboloman kōoy kōoy, ebum obho akẹrekere olo mi tarōoy aJu obho nꞌibha ịnon aruubhugh obho. Obạmọogh obho Obạmọogh oomo arōoy, olo nạnogho ghạ lịsebh magey kōoy kōoy olo abheleghi aghōl ḍien odi,
kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho, “Kōoy kōoy olo abheleghi aghōl ḍien odi pọbhel.”
Keḍio eeghe taḍighi karōoy epeleghi zodi obo bho eedi demōruōm io bho? Eeghe nạ taḍighi keedi emōruōm, erumolo eedi dẹmoghon io dōm obho? Keedi tẹmoghon nạ ẹko, erumolo ụgba ḍio dōm obho?
Oomo ipa ẹkona, tọgba ẹko dōm obho, erumolo utōm io rōoy mọghi ọgba? Kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete aghōl bọ, “Mịin ẹzo ịkpiom obo bho ibhin ooḅi adōm obho netu obho.”
Keḍio kōoy kōoy io mobo bho neebhinom mooḅi adōm obho. Ạizaya ozil obho nịvo nịvo ạkpete kua, “Obumọogh, ōoy olo naamōruōm dōm obhꞌezōor olo.”
Keḍio ịmiin, tọmoghon adōm obho parōoy ọteeny ologhi omōruōm, tọgba ilo igboloman nꞌaKraist parōoy ọmoghon adōm obho.
Keḍio ịḅele ạami upuruan kua zenyina, enyina nekōl eedi ịmoghon io dōm obho gạ? Ụḍeghe ghạ, eedi ẹmoghon, kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạgba bho,
“Oghōrōkō eedi ạghi asi kesi kesi mi tade bho,
ọnuekpete bhꞌeedi asi tạkar ikunughi ẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Ịḅele ạami umina upuruan kua, enyina nekōl eedi arōoy Izirẹl ịmoghonyan io gạ? AMozis nịvo nịvo ọḅel obo abhira ạbhagharana aghōl kua,
“Ạami taḍighi enyina ebōbhan mobo bho ịkar io eru mebhugh obho,
apin ebhugh ilo ilōghōm io mạar aḍighi ologhi enyina aḅẹebh.”
Keḍio Ạizaya obho ạghua mologhi apu obho ạkpete kua,
“Obo bho ịva ḍio ạami obho pobo nẹemiin ạami.
Ạami naamutiom lōor ạmi ạnogho mobo bho ipuruan io ạami obho.”
Keḍio tilo igboloman nꞌarōoy Izirẹl odi ạkpete kua, “Oomo okpom aḍuma bho, ạami usele rạvo ạmi ạnogho marōoy ilo oghiilaan ilo, ilo negin ghạ moḍighi ibha ụkpete ụnogho eedi moḍighi obho.”
Ịḅele ạami upuruan kua siibha bho, Ẹnaan naagin rōoy odi gạ? Ịkpo. Ạkar ạmi nịvo nịvo, ạami olꞌIzirẹl, onyiin ọony ọobhe tEbrạhạm, mi teghun otu taBenjamin.
Ẹnaan dogin io rōoy odi ibha odi ạson ạseghe kọḅel egbiom obho. Enyina ilōghōm io gạ mibha ẹegia bho ạkpete ạnogho mIlaija tamen obho odi aakpulughu aasen Ẹnaan ạnogho mIzirẹl obho?
Odi ạkpete kua, “Obumọogh, eedi nẹeze rizil onuma, ẹekpooy mạraade ọtun ạar obho. Ạami be usughō tạman, keḍio eedi digh ẹva nạ ghuḍum ạmi.”
Ẹnaan ạbhagharana ẹko zodi? Odi ạkpete kua, “Ạami naaseerian lōor ạmi rōoy ilo tegbẹbh ni maḍiōbh nꞌoḍual ọonir nꞌobhōrōbhōor ilo degbuluman io eekpulughu maBeạl eru obho.”
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mibha idi siibha. Ịbam arōoy ilo odi abhin tọsu ạghusan aḍien odi ạson aseeri idi.

Odi ọtuan io tibha eedi iḍighi obho ạsuanaan ghụsan aḍien ạson eedi ạseghe. Eru kạar olo Ẹnaan nạson ạseghe rōoy tebum oḍighi ilo eedi iḍighi, pọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi olo mu magey ọsu ạghusan aḍien.
Eeghe amina asughō? Arōoy Izirẹl ịteeny io mibha eedi ịrol ịva bho. Ịbam ẹku obho Ẹnaan ạson ạseghe bho pobo ịteeny. Ipedi obho Ẹnaan aḅulughi raḅeri obhꞌeedi mi tipeleghi obhꞌodi,
kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho, Ẹnaan akpereghi miloghi obhꞌeedi, apuughi riḍien obhꞌeedi molo eedi ịmiin, nꞌaraḅeri obhꞌeedi molo eedi ịmoghon ninii kaadon.
ADevid ạkpete nạ kua,
“Tọkpaariom ni osin eedi kịnam ilo iḍiku tạrawaya mi tẹzaal obho eedi nele ghạ bho,
eedi emeleghu ọliom eedi.
Ariḍien obhꞌeedi ekpereghian molo eedi ịmiin,
oḍighi nạ eedi ẹmiinom tịiḅaghami eedi moomo amen.”
Ạami napuruan kua siibha bho, eedi neekpetaan emeleghu epẹ gạ? Ịkpo. Tebum oḍighi ịkarabh obhꞌeedi, ịbhelegha neeru ẹteeny ạni marōoy ibha ịnon aruubhugh obho, moḍighi arōoy aJu obho kebōbhan eedi.

Eru kạar olo, esiibha, oḍighi ịkarabh obhꞌeedi abhin mẹela aruom mẹmar-arōoy obho, nꞌekulom eedi mi tạruumugh obho abhin lịsebh aruom arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho, kịitua siibha migbōgh ạlisebh ilo tẹtol men oomo arōoy aJu obho teḍighom ạni.
Iibha bho ạami nạkpete ạnogho enyina arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho siibha bho. Tẹzo bho ạami uru moteledōm tẸnaan mi tenyina arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho bẹleni, ạami taatuma ni toḍighi obhꞌạmi.
Ụmaar io suo ạami tapin ni tiibha bho aḍighi rōoy obho nꞌạami uru monyiin ịḅaal obho ẹteeny ibōbhan molo otue ọpel ạni mẹde eedi.
Ebum obho, tamen obho ugin eedi obho puḍighi mẹmar-arōoy obho iru mạburubulol tẸnaan, kịitua mẹzo tẹtol men topin ạni eedi ọloghom. Tẹtol kaghuḍum ōoy olo uḅẹtōn toogu.

Eru kạar olo uḅigh mọpaḍi ạbred ụnogho mẸnaan kạneghe ni taghisigh odi, poomo odi eḅol ạbred obho ạneghe ni ạman. Eru kạar olo uḍiiron ịika oorẹeny ụnogho mẸnaan kịneghe ni taghisigh odi, pịgha oorẹeny obho ẹkona ịneghe ni nạ.

Ẹde ịgha oorẹeny obho ughōl bọ ọliv obho, olo ụḅe, nọoghaghion otōḅōḍi, ọkaghion mịgha ọnon olo ụḅe ḍio ọzologhiom. Enyina arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho pạ ọliv obho ụḅe ḍio bho, obho neeḍigh nꞌarōoy aJu obho nepin ạni bin tịnyaam nꞌaghuḍum ẹela eedi obho.

Tebum ipa bẹleni, iínon ghạ mekiemi mobo bho ụghaghion kịgha bho urōḅōḍi obho. Ẹzo olo enyina kẹbughia lōor olo. Enyina tẹtuan ẹkaraan ẹbughia lōor? Enyina idi kịgha oorẹeny obho. Enyina kịbham io mịika bho ẹmarami, ịika bho kịbham enyina ẹmarami.
Ụmaar io suo onyiin enyina takōl ni kua, “Ẹe, ẹzo bho, ụghaaron ịgha bho molo ạami aḍigh ạni.”

Ẹzo bho, ụghaghion eedi orōḅōḍi tebum obho eedi ịteeny io mologhi omōruōm obho, keḍio enyina iru ịrol tesi eedi tebum obho enyina imōruōm obho. Oomo ipa ẹkona, ị́teeny ghạ mologhi ọbughia alōor, kpẹlen nꞌipa, aruugu esibh enyina.
Ẹzo bho Ẹnaan ọḅelemaan io marōoy aJu ibha idi kạkar ịḅel ịgha oorẹeny obho, enyina nẹetua odi tạḅelemaan ni enyina gạ?

Tesuo, ezira nọomiin mẹzo Ẹnaan aḅẹebh asi nꞌẹzo odi ạneghe asi. Odi aḅẹebh tobo bho neemeleghu obho, ạneghe tenyina, eru kạar olo enyina tẹtol ni ẹki taghisigh mi toḍighi iiḅi ọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi. Ekua nilo, pọghaghion nạ enyina orōḅōḍi.
Karōoy aJu obho eghiraan eru emōruōm pomulumi eedi mi tesi eedi. Ẹnaan tatue ni aḍighi miibha bho.

Enyina arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho idi kịgha ọliv olo ōoy olo ạḅe olo, ilo ụghaghion uru ụzologhiom tolo ụḅe nị tẹzo bho Ẹnaan ạlem zodi oorẹeny obho ḍio. Arōoy aJu obho idi koorẹeny olo ụkar nị ụḅe, molo tedugh ạni nị kua epu molo Ẹnaan kamulumi todi oorẹeny obho mịgha odi ibha ụghaghion obho.

Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, kir ọkpo ẹḅokia ilo ạami nạva mọgba omutiom ọnogho enyina molo enyina ịitua mobho enyina ilōghōm liḍim mạar. Omutiom aḍien arōoy Izirẹl ịrol io kamen kamen, tekunughiom tamen olo arōoy taKraist ibha ịnon aruubhugh obho neeru tẸnaan igbẹbh ịman,
keḍio togbi mọbhel oomo arōoy Izirẹl, kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho. Ạkpete kua,
“Ọpela bho tạḍua tạZayon atu.
Odi taḍighi atughuneen moomo ọḅaar ẹmu mi tạnwuny ọobhe bho tạJekob.
Ạami takiran eedi mịzo bhobho tamen olo ạami naatughuneen mịkarabh eedi.”

Tilo igboloman nꞌooḅi adōm obho arōoy aJu obho obo ọlogh aḍien tẸnaan tebum enyina arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho, keḍio tebum obho Ẹnaan kạson eedi ạseghe bho, eedi tetu ni marōoy oḍigh ologhi tẸnaan tebum oguan obho odi aguan migbaany ạburude eedi obho.
Ebum obho Ẹnaan okireni ḍio mologhi odi mi tobo bho odi ạson ạseghe ạnogho lịsebh obho.
Idi kẹzo bho, tamen olo neetẹn, enyina arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ikiilaan io mẸnaan, keḍio esiibha enyina neebhin mọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan tebum obho arōoy aJu obho ikiilaan io mẸnaan obho.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, tebum obho enyina neebhin mọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan obho, arōoy aJu obho siibha ighiilaan io mẸnaan molo eedi epin ạni mọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan.
Ẹnaan naaḍighi kōoy kōoy ẹtol karōoy ikoli tebum obho teedi oghiilaan olo bho, molo odi ạsuanaan moomo eedi mọsu ạghusan aḍien odi.
Sọo, pẹzo Ẹnaan agbo mẹela asi. Pẹzo olōghōm ạar nꞌịitua bhꞌodi ịbugh isi. Okōr ōoy tatue ạgba amutiom mibha ologhi odi? Okōr ōoy tatue ạmoghonyan raabōom odi?
Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua,
“Oōy olo alōghōm mologhi tObạmọogh obho olo.
Oōy olo tatue ạnogho zodi liiki olo.
Oōy olo nạanogho ghạ nạ zodi mạar molo odi kạkpe kamulumian dọrol ghạ ḍio.”
Kạar kạar odi ạlem, odi olo ạar olo taḍum ạtol nạ olo, keḍio kạar kạar ịrol ịnogho zodi. Eghuan ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan kamen kamen. Ẹrol nị nạ kua.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr, ạami naasen ni enyina tebum igbōgh ọsu ạghusan aḍien obho tẸnaan, ịnogho silōor enyina mẸnaan meginanaan toḍighi obhꞌodi kọtun ạar ilo idi ni mimoom, ilo iḍigh tologhi odi magey. Iibha poḍigh iikpulughu ibha enyina teekpulughu mẸnaan.

Ị́tuonom ghạ meḍighiom ạar aghuḍum ẹmar-arōoy obhobho, keḍio ịḅelemaan Ẹnaan anwe ạman mịitua bhꞌenyina, molo enyina etue elōghōm mibha ologhi tẸnaan — ibha iru miiḅi obho, nꞌibha iḍigh tologhi odi obho, nꞌibha ịneghe ni ịman obho.

Ạami ụtuan tebum ọsu ạghusan aḍien aluunwo bho Ẹnaan aanwo ạami obho nạkpete miibha bho ạnogho moomo enyina, iíḅoghomi ghạ rụumu enyina. Ịítua ghạ nạ mịitua ịnam eḍum, keḍio kōoy kōoy mi tenyina abhin tẹzo ologhi omōruōm obho Ẹnaan ạnogho zodi obho aru mịiruan ạnogho lōor odi.
Alōor ōoy oḍigh kẹrekere ịpaḍi mibha idi. Ọpaḍi esuo oḍighi oḍighi ọno.
Onyiin ẹzo bho pẹzo ezira idi. Toomo ibha ezira uru mọlogh obho, ezira onyiin alōor mi taKraist, molo nootulughi moomo ezira koḍigh kẹrekere ịpaḍi alōor obho mi tonyiin alōor.
Ezira ẹkona obhin oḍighiom oḍighi mẹnogho bhꞌezira tẹzo ọsu ạghusan aḍien aluunwo bho Ẹnaan aanwo ezira bho.
Eru kạar olo iru moḍighian odi moḍighi, pitu oḍighi ghạ. Eru kạar olo iru mịtughumiom, pitu ọtughumiom ghạ.

Eru kạar olo aru mọghuemi ghạ iloghi ịnon arōoy, pitu oḍighi ghạ nạ. Kōoy kōoy olo nạḍian mịnon mibha odi ạteeny obho, oḍighiom io nꞌologhi ạaku. Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny mịnyaam ọto ịto, ạghuemi ghạ mạvo odi. Kōoy kōoy olo naḍighi miiḅi ạnogho mịnon, aḍighiom ghạ nꞌọḅaal ologhi.
Obhin nꞌooḅi ologhi otulan metulan! Ikpereghi riḍien enyina mi tịkarabh, mekughumuom miiḅi.
Onyiin atulan monyiin nꞌeegu alōor kiiḅi aburumōr mi taKraist, mẹva ghạ nạ magey molo onyiin kạnogho moghiilaan monyiin.
Ạvo oḍighi enyina ạghua magey! Ị́gbuor ghạ mẹgbuor. Ipin mọoghuanaan ologhi meḍighi moḍighi mẹnogho mObạmọogh obho.
Toḍuom ologhi obhꞌenyina, ịḅaal mologhi, mẹteeny ọghurughiom mi tịiḅaghami obhꞌenyina, ku meekpulughu ghạ moomo amen.
Isōghian mibha enyina ịteeny obho mẹnogho ạni ghạ marōoy tẸnaan obo bho ạar olo ịteeny ạni ilo bho, meghunyogh ghạ nạ rutu enyina mẹnogho misoloman.
Iikpulughu ghạ mẸnaan mẹnogho lịsebh mobo bho nẹnogho enyina mọmiinom tebum aḍien taKraist obho, ịghor ghạ zeedi. Iikpulughu ghạ mẸnaan mọnogho eedi lịsebh be.
Itul mẹḅaal ologhi nꞌobo bho nẹḅaal mologhi obho, meḍigh nꞌobo bho nelegheey obho meleghe.
Oomo enyina ịtolan monyiin ẹzo. Ị́bughia ghạ lōor, keḍio ịduan bụrubulol nꞌobo bho isōoriōm lōor obho. Iítuma ghạ molōghōm ạar.
Oōy aḍighi enyina mịkarabh, ímulumian ghạ zodi mịkarabh. Ịkparam meḍighi ghạ mibha oomo arōoy ịmiin ighōl iiḅi obho.
Ịkparam, kẹzo kẹzo ilo enyina idi, mẹrolan kōoy kōoy nꞌekima.

Iiḅi aburumōr, íḍighi ghạ memulumian kilo kilo uḍighi enyina, ịḅelemaan ạlile tẸnaan ạkpe amulumian eedi. Ẹegia iigbia bho ạkpete kua, “Oḍighi omulumian ilꞌạmi, ạami tạkpe nị, pẹzo Obạmọogh obho ạkpete.”

Kpẹlen nꞌipa, iḍighi mibha ẹegia iigbia bho ạkpete bho. “Ọkoony nasibh mobo bho ạlogh ạna ḍien obho, nọgho odi meḍian odi ale. Ạmuum nẹtal odi pụnogho odi mụum odi ạbhoghol. Tiibha bho pạna ọloki odi rẹgheer.”
Ímōrō ghạ ịkarabh epuom enyina mạvo. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ipin oḍighi iiḅi mepuom ịkarabh mạvo.
Kōoy kōoy ạnogho moghiilaan marōoy ẹmu ịto ebhugh obho! Bọbon ịto ilo ịḍua ḍio tẸnaan keru ilo. Ẹnaan aseeri marōoy ịto bho mi tariisi obho eedi idi obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, kōoy kōoy olo agin mịto arōoy ade bho, agin mịto tẸnaan, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo agin, napin mapum ạlogha talōor odi.

Ạruula ịto bho iḍiku ghạ ḍio ruugu tobo bho ịteeny iiḅi eḍighiom ạar obho, obo bho ịteeny mịkarabh eḍighiom ạar obho pobo nekiil ghạ. Enyina nẹva molo aruugu obo bho nẹto mịto bho isibh io enyina, piḍighi mibha ịneghe bho, podi obuom enyina.

Eedi obo bho nẹto mịto bho ạrubana tẸnaan mọlogh ạvo ọnogho enyina. Erumolo enyina iḍighi mịkarabh, pikiil ruugu, ẹkolom obhꞌạvo odi ibura ḍio. Eedi ạrubana tẸnaan mọliom obo bho neḍighi mịkarabh obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ikiilaan marōoy ẹmu ịto bho, tebum ạlile bho tẸnaan be ḍio, ipin tebum ooḅi ologhi obhꞌenyina mẹnogho eedi moghiilaan obho.
Iibha kiḍighi kenyina nẹkpeey mạtaks obho, ebum obho kamen kamen olo arōoy ẹmu ịto iḍighi moḍighi eedi, eedi iḍighi nẹnogho mẸnaan.
Iḍighi mẹnogho zeedi mibha iizuan molo enyina keḍighi kẹnogho eedi obho. Ịkpe mạtaks enyina, mẹnogho moghiilaan nꞌeegu aḍien meebhughumi moomo eedi.
Íle ghạ mọmugh ōoy. Ọmugh obho ịgbaan molo enyina kele, ponyiin motulan onyiin. Kōoy kōoy olo atulan mobo bho atuan odi obho, naakō raalōgh obho.

Araalōgh obho ughōl bọ, “Ule ghạ mẹma, ughigh ghạ mōoy, umiigh ghạ viigh, ụsebh ghạ mạseghiom”, oomo iibha bho nꞌoomo oḍigh kẹrekere bho, uukōbhōghi useeriom tonyiin obhobho ughōl bọ, “Tulan mobo bho atuan ạna bho kẹzo bho ạna utulan lōor onuma bho.”
Kōoy kōoy olo atulan mobo bho atuan odi obho, podi naakō moomo araalōgh obho.

Iḍighi miibha bho tebum obho enyina neelōghōm men obhobho bho. Nạateeny men enyina kẹsumaay tạrala bhꞌenyina, ebum obho amen obho tọpel ezira bho naatuan ạrol ḅubh apu mọḅel amen obho ezira umōruōm obho.
Ọkinim uḍugul obho nạanyaghaan namuneen, ẹḅaal obun ụḍirogh obho nạarol kẹegh. Itu ọḅeleey moḍighiiy ọkpo ọkinim obho, ọḅirogh ọkpo ẹgham ibha ẹḅaal obho ọnyaa.

Nẹeneghe molo ezira kọmaar koseeri silōor ezira karōoy ilo netughom ẹḅaal ootaany obho, ụnamaghian io rimiim, utu nạ ḍio mịpoghol rimiim, ule ḍio mẹma, upesi ḍio mipesi, uḅe ḍio ralebhir, ubōbhan io mibōbhan.
Itu ọnyaa mọkpo ẹgham obho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho, ọḅele mọtuonom oḍighi ịkarabh obho neeḅolom talōor ezira bho, moḍighi ibha iikpōogh obho nẹnyaghagh ezira moḍighi obho.
Ipin ẹloghom teesoḍia enyina mobo bho ologhi omōruōm obho ọkua ḍio bho, ịghanan ghạ nꞌodi mi tibha idi tịitua odi obho.
Onyiin amōruōm mobho odi tale ni ạḅa kạar kạar, keḍio obo bho ologhi omōruōm odi dọghua ḍio bho amōruōm mole ịigho asumōbōbh be.
Odi obo bho tale ni ạḅa kạar kạar obho oonon io ạpue mobo bho nagin ni obho, keḍio odi obo bho nale mịigho be bho ọgba ḍio ạpue mopedi obho, ebum obho Ẹnaan naabhin odi obho.

Ạna kokōr ōoy mọgba ọpue ẹbana ọnon ōoy? Ọde otu odi pobo tạva ạmiin mobho odi aḍighi ni nạseghe bolobolo aḍighi ni nakōrōnuan. Odi taḍighi ni ạseghe, ebum obho Obạmọogh obho tatue ni ạlogh ạvo ạnogho odi molo odi kaḍighi kạseghe.
Onyiin ōoy nạatua akōl monyiin aḍuma ạla mạar apu moomo ịnon aruḍuma bho, keḍio tọnon, oomo aruḍuma bho onyiin. Kōoy kōoy amōruōm tibha ologhi odi.

Odi obo bho ạseghe monyiin aḍuma aagbiemi obho aḍighi nạnogho meghuan mObạmọogh obho, obo bho nale kạar kạar obho, ale nạnogho meghuan mObạmọogh obho ebum obho odi nạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan mebum eḍian obho. Obo bho nagbiiy mọkpo oleey obho naḍighi ạnogho nạ meghuan mObạmọogh obho, odi nạnogho nạ lịsebh mẸnaan.
Bọbon onyiin ezira olo naḍumanaan lōor odi be olo, olo nạpuonaan lōor odi be nạ olo. Eru kạar olo ezira uḍum, ezira uḍumanaan mObạmọogh obho,
eru kạar olo ezira ụbho, ezira ụbhuonaan nạ zodi. Tebum iibha bẹleni, ezira ụbho, ezira uḍum, ezira ilꞌodi Obạmọogh obho.
AKraist ạbho ni aḅetunu tọbho bho molo odi atu mObạmọogh imoom nꞌiimuugh obho.
Ebum eeghe kenyina neenon ẹpue mumōr enyina mi taKraist? Keḍio ạna ẹkona, ebum eeghe kạna nạgba ạpue mumōr onuma mi taKraist? Oomo ezira tọmaranuan ni mẸnaan, odi ạtu mịiruan ạnogho ezira,
kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
“Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua, ‘Taghuḍum ạmi, kōoy kōoy tagbuluman ni taghisigh ạmi,
ạgba amutiom mobho ạami uru mẸnaan.’ ”
Tiibha bho, kōoy kōoy tạmaranuan ni mẸnaan ạgba mibha odi aḍighi obho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, ọḅele, molo onyiin kaanon monyiin kạgba monyiin kạpue! Kpẹlen nꞌipa, oḍighi ghạ miibha, ọotua ghạ moḍighi ilo iḍighi ḍio mumōr ezira mi taKraist mokpetaan omeel oḍigh tesi ịkarabh.

Aghuḍum ạmi mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho naaḍighi ạami ạkar kua alōghōm mobho bọbon ạar olo aru mọkarabh mi tạkar odi ạar obho olo. Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm mobho ọoku ạar obhobho aru mọkarabh, podi ạar obho oru ọkarabh ạar todi.
Enyina ebhin tọkpo iileey eḍighi mịkarabh mumōr enyina mi taKraist, petulan olo mu mi tenyina. Ímōrō ghạ eḍian obho enyina nele bho ẹlogh tesi ọmiinom mōoy olo aKraist ạbhuonaan.
Íḍighi ghạ ibha enyina ighōl eḍian obho ẹteeny mọkarabh aḍien.
Ạar olo iileey nꞌịibhoghol igboloman mi tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan olo. Ibha noonon, poḍighi ibha ịneghe taghisigh tẸnaan, ọrol tekima nꞌọḅaal ologhi obho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho nạnogho ghạ bho,
molo odi obo bho naḍighi miibha bho ạnogho maKraist obho, taḍigh ni tologhi tẸnaan nꞌarōoy.
Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, itu oḍighi ghạ milo tepin mekima etuom ezira, ẹlogh nạ mạvo ẹkuemi mologhi onyiin.
Ị́tuan ghạ mebum eḍian mebhiẹmi mibha Ẹnaan naaḍighi obho. Keḍian keḍian ịgbaan nị mole, keḍio ịneghe ḍio mole eḍian ilo teḍighi mọnon momeel oḍigh tesi ịkarabh.
Ibha iizuan moḍighi, pọḅele ọḅaay ịnam, nꞌọbhoghol amiim bolobolo oḍighi ạar olo taḍighi monyiin umōr ezira mi taKraist momeel tesi ịkarabh.
Ibha enyina imōruōm tiibha bho ẹrol teesoḍia tẸnaan nꞌologhi enyina be! Ọḅaal ologhi olo obo bho aḍighi mạar ologhi odi okpooy io bho.

Keḍio obo bho ạteeny ịzal ologhi tibha odi nale bho, ku nale ni, pẸnaan nạanogho zodi mapum, ebum obho ologhi omōruōm olo todi mi tibha odi naḍighi obho. Keḍio kạar kạar olo noḍighi olo ologhi omōruōm olo naaru moḍighi ịkarabh.
Ezira obo bho nọoghua tologhi omōruōm obho ịkpe nị mọlogh ạvo ọnogho obo bho idugh tologhi omōruōm obho, mi tịiḅaghami eedi. Ezira uḍighi ḍio mibha tẹneghe ẹnogho ezira be bho!
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, oḍighi ghạ mibha tẹneghe ẹnogho nạ mumōr ezira miiḅi taghuḍum odi obho, mọghueni odi mi tomōruōm obho.
AKraist oḍighi ḍio mibha tẹneghe ẹnogho lōor odi be bho. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, imute kibha ẹegia bho ạkpete bho, “Ọnuekpete obo bho irōnyōgh enyina bho, uzuom ạami.”
Kạar kạar olo ụge tẹegia bho ụge mọtughumiom ezira, molo ezira ọteeny oḍuom ologhi mi talideny alōor nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi obho ẹegia bho nạnogho ezira bho.
Keḍio Ẹnaan obo bho nạnogho ghạ lideny alōor nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi obho, aḍighi ni molo enyina ẹteeny monyiin odi ologhi obho mọtuonom ạraaḅa asike tạJizos Kraist,
molo oomo enyina eekōbhōghian, etul ọnu, emulughu ebuom Ẹnaan Ọde bho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, onyiin abhin monyiin ạloghom totu odi mọnogho eghuan mẸnaan kẹzo bho aKraist naaḍighi enyina bho.
Ạami nạaḍeghe ghạ ạnogho enyina mobho aKraist aru aḍigh mẹbana ạnogho marōoy aJu obho molo Ẹnaan obi ḍio moguan obho odi aguanaan migbaany ạburude eedi obho,
nꞌoḍighi ẹzo olo arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ebuom ạni mẸnaan tebum ọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi, kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bọ bho,
“Tiibha bho bẹleni, ạami tạnogho nị ạna lịsebh mi teesoḍia arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho,
ạami tabuom ni nạ ḍien obhꞌonuma.”
Keḍio amina ạkpete nạ kua,
“Enyina arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho, itul nꞌarōoy obho Ẹnaan ạson ạseghe bho mẹḅaal ologhi.”
Keḍio amina ạḅaram kua,
“Oomo enyina arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ibuom Obạmọogh obho,
kōoy kōoy abuom odi magey.”
Tọnon esi Ạizaya ozil obho ạkpete nạ kua,
“Ọony ọobhe tạJesi tamute ni atu.
Tọbughe ni zodi mọda arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho,
keḍio eedi teseeriom moomo ologhi eedi zodi.”

Ẹnaan obo bho naḍighi ghạ molo ezira kọteeny oḍuom ologhi obho, abhulughi ạnogho enyina mọḅaal ologhi nꞌekima mi tomōruōm obhꞌenyina molo, tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho, enyina ẹteeny ọoghuanaan oḍuom ologhi.
Iiḅi aburumōr, ạami nịvo nịvo nạakar alōghōm mobho oḍighi iiḅi imuzō ni tenyina, nꞌoḍigh kẹrekere olōghōm ạar, nꞌobho tenyina onyiin natue ghạ nị ạtughumiom monyiin.

Keḍio tọbhereer obhobho ạami ubhin tọoghuanaan ologhi ạge mẹtede ọkpo ilo ạami naabhin ụutuemiom enyina. Tebum oḍigh oḍighi obho Ẹnaan abhin aabhughumiom ạami obho kạami ạteeny ọoghuanaan ologhi ọge iibha bho.

Oḍi aabhughumiom ạami moḍigh ẹbana ọnogho ạJizos Kraist oḍighi oḍighi ọnogho arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho. Ạami naḍighi moḍigh oḍighi arōoy iiḅua bho mobhin tẸnaan ọgba ọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho molo arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho etu mạar ẹmu aghuḍum ilo teḍigh ni tologhi tẸnaan, ilo Ẹmugh Iigbia bho aḍighi ạneghemi ạnogho mẸnaan.
TạJizos Kraist siibha bho, ạami ạteeny ẹmu ootuma toḍighi obho ạami naḍighi ạnogho mẸnaan obho.
Ạami tạteeny nị mọoghuanaan ologhi mọgba ibha aKraist naaḍighi mi tạmi obho be. Odi abhin marōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho moghiilaan Ẹnaan mi tịnyaam ọnuekpete nꞌeḍighiom ạar,
nꞌọkpo ịiḍaany nꞌibꞌaruugu, mi tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho, molo, tararele ạmi, ạḍua taJerusạlẹm asi tIlirikum, ạami nạagba kesi kesi mooḅi adōm ibha taKraist.
Oomo ibha ịrol ghạ tologhi ạmi moomo amen, pọgba ooḅi adōm obho mi toomo ariisi ilo doghōl ghạ ḍio ḍien taKraist, molo ạami ụsiin io ạke moḅōgh tạnyu-otu ọnon ōoy,
kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
“Obo bho dọgba ḍio zodi ọnogho bho, tẹmiin nị zodi,
keḍio obo bho dẹmoghon io bho tẹmoghonyan nị.”
Ụtuan tiibha bho kọpuenaan ạami mọlogh amen moru tenyina.
Keḍio esiibha bho ạami nạaman moḍighi ạmi mi taruubhugh bhibha, nꞌẹzo bho ạami nạva ghạ kịkanya ạsumusia moru ọmiinan enyina bho,
ạami nạatua moru esiibha. Amen ạami nạki tebhugh obhꞌaSpen pạami osul ọmiinan enyina molo enyina ẹlogh ạvo ẹnogho ạami mọghi osi tepa, tamen olo ạami nạarolan enyina mịbam amen.
Esiibha ạami nạki taJerusạlẹm mi toḍighi arōoy obho tẸnaan.
Arōoy ạsosi ibha aMasidonia nꞌaGris nẹetua tologhi eedi be momutiom ikpoki ọloghom ạvo ọnogho aruvekulom arōoy tẸnaan ibha idi taJerusạlẹm obho.

Eedi nịvo nịvo kịitua moḍighi iibha bho. Ạkar agey nạ, eedi nẹkpe mọmugh. Ẹzo bho arōoy aJu obho nẹḍian nꞌeedi arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho nꞌạlisebh ạruumugh obho, ịkpe nị molo eedi kẹḍian ạni nꞌarōoy aJu obho mi tạlisebh ibha esuo ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Amen ạami naaḍighi moḍighi obhobho ụman usōrōna ụnogho eedi moomo ikpoki obho umutiom mọbhelom eedi obho, pạami oḅetunu otẹn ọghi taSpen, osul ọmiinan enyina men ạami nạki.
Amen ạami tatu, ạami naalōghōm mobho ạami tatu nꞌoomo ibꞌẹela ạlisebh obho taKraist.
Iiḅi aburumōr, ạami ubhin taḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho, nꞌetulan obho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạnogho ezira bho, naasen enyina motul ọnu nꞌạami ookpulughu Ẹnaan ọnogho ạmi.
Iikpulughu molo onyiin ạar omutōnaan ạami mi tạravo arōoy aJudia ibha imōruōm io bho, nꞌolo oḍighi obhꞌạmi mi taJerusạlẹm teḍigh ni tologhi arōoy tẸnaan ibha idi epa bho,
molo tịto tẸnaan, ạami atu tenyina nꞌogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi, atul nꞌenyina apooghia nꞌọḅaal ologhi.
Ẹnaan ekima bho ạrolan nꞌoomo enyina. Ẹrol nạ kua.
Ạami natu mọgba ọnogho enyina milo igboloman nꞌụmarani ezira aFibi. Odi ooḅi ạni olo naḍighi magey moḍighi ạsosi obho mi taKenkria.

Ipin odi mẹloghom togbo enyina mi taḍien tObạmọogh obho, tibha iizuan molo arōoy tẸnaan keḍighi, mẹlogh ạvo mẹnogho zodi toomo ọkpo ilo tẹeḅaghami odi mi teesoḍia enyina, ebum obho odi ẹkona naaru ghạ nạ mooḅi ọbulol ọlogh arōoy nꞌạami obho.
Ipuruan mẹnogho ạami maPrisila nꞌẠkuila, obo bho iḍigh nꞌạami neḍighi moḍighi obho tạJizos Kraist obho,
ịto nạ mobhiẹmi aghuḍum eedi mebum ạmi obho. Ạami nạsebh eedi magey. Ạami be ḍio, oomo arōoy ạsosi ịnon aruubhugh obho ẹkona.
Ipuruan nạ marōoy ạsosi obho neḍigh ghạ totu eedi obho.
Ipuruan nạ mẸpainetos ooḅi umōr ạmi, obho aru bọ mọḅel ōoy obho amōruōm maKraist mi tebhugh Esia bho.
Ipuruan maMeri obho akumuan magey ạnogho enyina bho.
Ipuruan mẠndronikos nꞌaJunias arōoy ẹma ạmi aJu ibha nꞌạami ụrol tikoli obho. Iteledōm obho neelōghōm eedi magey. Eedi ibhira ẹke ạami nạ mọtuonom aKraist.
Ipuruan mẠmpliatos obho aḍigh tologhi ạmi magey mi tObạmọogh obho.
Ipuruan nạ mỤrbanos obho aḍigh nꞌezōor naḍighi moḍighi taKraist obho, nꞌạStakas obho aḍigh nạ magey tologhi ạmi obho.
Ipuruan mẠpeles, ōoy obho nọogba umutiom moghiilaan odi mi taKraist obho, mepuruan nạ mobo bho iru milo otu tẠristobulos obho.
Ipuruan mạHerodion ōoy ẹma ạmi, nꞌobo bho neemōruōm maKraist ibha idi totu tạNarkisos obho.
Ipuruan mạTrifaina nꞌaTrifosa ibha idi toḍighi tObạmọogh obho, mepuruan nạ mạPasis ọbulol ạmi obho naaḍighi magey oḍighi ạnogho mObạmọogh obho.
Ipuruan maRufos obho nạkar aḍighi magey moḍighi tObạmọogh obho, mepuruan nạ moniin odi obho abhin naanon ạami moomo amen kọony odi obho.
Ipuruan mẠsinkritos nꞌaFlegon, nꞌạHamis nꞌạPatrobas nꞌạHamas nꞌoomo aburumōr obho idi nꞌeedi obho.
Ipuruan mạFilologos nꞌaJulia, nꞌạNereos nꞌụmarani odi, nꞌỌlimpas nꞌoomo arōoy tẸnaan ibha idi nꞌeedi obho.
Ipin tetulan aburumōr, onyiin aḅolom monyiin. Oomo ạrasosi obho taKraist epuruan enyina.

Ạami naakiom enyina, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, igona lōor enyina mi tobo bho neḍighi molo ạmaḍian kẹrol teesoḍia enyina bho, nꞌọnogho ịiḅaghami mologhi omōruōm arōoy obho, ibha nẹegbaghaḍi mịtughumiom obho ụtughumiom enyina bho. Ịkporion rạvo enyina talōor eedi.
Obo bho neḍighi miibha bho iḍighian io maKraist Obạmọogh ezira bho, neḍighian rụbaraka eedi. Eedi ibhin ẹmel ọnu nꞌịigbaay ilo ilo tọḅal moobiōghōm iloghi arōoy obo ilōghōm ạani.

Kōoy kōoy nạamoghon moghiilaan enyina mi tadōm obho. Iibha kiḍighi kologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey mi tenyina. Ạami nạva molo enyina kẹteeny molōghōm ạar mi tiiḅi ọkpo, nꞌolo enyina keru meḅōr-ugo mi tibha iru mịkarabh obho,
pẸnaan ekima bho okẹm obhiẹmi aSetan, enyina keḅeleriom sike zodi.
Ọsu ạghusan aḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho ẹrolan enyina.
ATimoti obho nꞌạami utul noḍighi moḍighi obho apuruan enyina. ẠLusios nꞌạJesin nꞌaSosipata ibha nꞌạami uru monyiin ẹma bho epuruan nạ enyina.
Ạami ạTatios obo bho ụge bọ mọbhereer obhobho bho apuruan enyina mi taḍien tObạmọogh obho.
ẠGayos obho ạami uḍighanaan obho, obo bho ạsosi obho neḍigh gha totu odi obho, apuruan enyina. Ẹrastos ọpam ikpoki ẹma bho, nꞌạKuatos umōr ezira epuruan enyina.
[Ọsu ạghusan aḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho ẹrolan nꞌoomo enyina. Ẹrol nạ kua.]

Itu obuom Ẹnaan obo bho tatue ni aḍighi enyina mologhi omōruōm enyina mi tọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho ạami nạgba mibha igboloman nꞌạJizos Kraist obho, ibha noobhin tẹegia arizil obho nọgba omutiom tẹḅaal mọkpo bho ụḅoki kageedi obho. Tịto tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho, nooḍighi kebhugh kebhugh tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho elōghōm nẹman miibha bho, molo kōoy kōoy amōruōm akiilaan mẸnaan.
Eghuan ẹrol ẹnogho zodi Ẹnaan, obho tughuneen zodi be ḍio ọnon olo bho, obho odi be ạteeny moomo olōghōm ạar obho, mi taḍien tạJizos Kraist, kamen kamen. Ẹrol nạ kua.
Ạami ạPol obo bho ịḍua tịitua tẸnaan kiru kodi abheleghi ạami moru onyiin oteledōm tạJizos Kraist obho, nꞌạSostenis umōr obhꞌezira

ụge notuom oomo enyina arōoy ạsosi obhꞌạKorint, nꞌoomo obo bho Ẹnaan naabheleghi ạseghe moru arōoy odi mi totul ọnu nꞌạJizos Kraist, nꞌoomo arōoy obho idi toḍigh kẹrekere aruubhugh ibha nekōl maḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho, olꞌezira be ḍio, olꞌeedi ạni.
Ạlisebh nꞌekima tẸnaan Ọde bho nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹrolan nꞌoomo enyina.
Ạami nạsebh ghạ ni mẸnaan moomo amen mebum enyina, tebum obho odi nạanogho zenyina mọsu ạghusan aḍien mi tạJizos Kraist.
Totul ọnu obhꞌenyina nꞌạJizos Kraist, enyina neeru egbo mẹela mi toomo ẹmorokpo, tạkar oomo ọnuekpete enyina nꞌoomo olōghōm ạar enyina.
Adōm obho igboloman bọ maKraist obho nẹemar eḍigh tiloghi obhꞌenyina egbẹbh
molo bọbon onyiin ạlisebh olo naapẹl enyina olo, suo enyina neḅōrō meruom tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Odi tạmaar nạ ni nạ ạpam enyina ạkuemi ninii ạteeny tikunughi amen obho, molo bọbon ịkarabh olo tọteeny mọgbaam enyina mi tobꞌaḍuma bho ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira obho tatu obho olo.
Ẹnaan obo bho abheleghi enyina motul ọnu nꞌỌony odi ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho obi ghạ ḍio.

Iiḅi aburumōr, ạami ubhin tịnyaam ịto bho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho naasen enyina molo oomo enyina ketul mọnu mi toomo ọnuekpete enyina, molo ạmaḍian ạruuku ịtol teesoḍia enyina. Ịteeny motul ọnu olo agbẹbh ni ạman molo ịitua nꞌeḍighiom ạar enyina etu monyiin.
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ạami nạḍeghe miibha bho tebum obho ẹde arōoy ilo eghun otu taKloi nẹeḍua iru ịgba imutiom ịnogho ạami mobho ạruruan idi teesoḍia bhꞌenyina.

Ịḅele ạami ulegheri ụgba ụnogho zenyina miibha ạami ụmoghon obho menyina nẹeḍianogh. Onyiin nakōl kua, “Ạami olo tạPol,” ọnon, “Ạami olo tẠpolos,” omina ọnon, “Ạami olo taKifas,” ọnon, “Ạami olo taKraist.”
