Eru nạ kạar olo ezōor nokpo mizim ẹede ọnon ẹkona, ezōor ukpo nọnogho mẸnaan, keru nạ kạar olo alōor ezōor ạar olo, pịrol ịnogho enyina.
Ebum obho etulan taKraist mobho natōmōghiōm ezōor obho, siibha bho ezōor nooru ulōghōm mobho ebum obho onyiin ōoy aru ạbho ạnogho moomo arōoy obho, poomo arōoy neeḍigh nꞌodi ẹpo nạ bho.
Odi ạbho ạnogho moomo arōoy molo obo bho idi nꞌaghuḍum obho iḍumanaan silōor eedi, eḍum ẹnogho zodi be, obo bho ạbhuonaan eedi kuḅẹtōn tọbho bho mebum eedi nạ bho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni ạseghe dodon ạghi taghisigh, ezōor uunon mu mōoy kẹzo bho arōoy neenon mōoy obho. Eru nạ kạar olo ezōor nꞌꞌoonon ghạ maKraist men kẹzo bho arōoy neenon ghạ bho, esiibha ezōor uunon mụ kua.
Kamen kamen olo kōoy kōoy odi nꞌaKraist, odi omoom ōoy, ugbaany aghuḍum obhꞌodi naatẹn, odi naḍum omoom aghuḍum.
Iibha bho ịḍua tẸnaan keru, odi obo bho ạtuan ebum aKraist atulughian ezira, ạnogho nạ zezōor moḍighi oḍighi itulughi obho.
Ẹmu adōm obhꞌezōor piibha, Ẹnaan ạtuan aKraist natulughian kōoy kōoy. Odi ọḅal mụ azu tẹmu eedi mịkarabh eedi. Odi nịvo nịvo nạanogho zezōor madōm itulughi obho.
Siibha bho, ezōor ạnwuny adōm ilo ụson useeri mi tesi taKraist, molo Ẹnaan odi tezōor nookpulughu enyina. Tebum aKraist, sesen ni, itulughian mẸnaan.
Odi aḍighi maKraist obo bho ịkarabh ilo bho moru ọkarabh ōoy mebum ezira, molo, todi, ezira otu miiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan.
Ezōor noosen ni enyina, tẹzo bho ezōor utul nꞌodi Ẹnaan noḍighi moḍighi obho, ibhin ghạ mẹbasi maluunwo ọsu ạghusan aḍien obho tẸnaan.
Ịmoghon ẹzo odi ạkpete,
“Ạami ạmoghon oghōrōkō onuma tạkar ogbo amen olo iizuan, ạbhel ạna togbo aḍuma ịbhelegha bho.”
Ilōghōm mobho esiibha aru mạkar amen obho iizuan obho, aadon aru mạkar ogbo aḍuma ịbhelegha bho.
Ezōor ukiki ghạ ḍio mọpuenaan ōoy mi tebōom odi molo ezōor ụteeny ọghor ạman mi toḍighi obhꞌezōor.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, kạar kạar olo ezōor noḍighi, ezōor noḍighi ghạ mọgba omutiom mobho ezōor uru mạrubana tẸnaan mi talideny alōor obho ezōor ubhin nọkparaghiom mi tịiḅaghami, nꞌekulom nꞌọmiinom obho.
Ụgba ḍio men olo uḍulogh ezōor, ụsarom migiri ụlokioghom ikoli. Oto aḍuma ezōor tokumuan kua ninii molo ạrala ilo, eḍian ilo.
Iiḅi eḍighiom ạar obhꞌezōor, nꞌolōghōm ạar obhꞌezōor, nꞌalideny alōor obhꞌezōor, nꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌezōor, nꞌẸmugh Iigbia bho odi tezōor obho, nꞌoomo etulan obho nẹgba nạ mẹzo bho.

Onyiin oghōrōkō nạ mobho ọnuekpete agey obho ezōor nọgba bho, nꞌịnyaam obho tẸnaan ibha idi nꞌezōor obho neeli nạ. Ooḅi aghuḍum mi taghisigh tẸnaan pikpo ẹgham obho ezōor ubhin noḅiom, nopin nạ okōrōm ikpo ọduana.
Ezōor oḍigh eghuan tẹde arōoy, ẹde ịloki zezōor rẹgheer; ẹde netōnyōgh, ẹde nebuom. Toomo ibha agey obho ọḍua ḍio tịnu ezōor obho ẹkona, ẹde ibhin ezōor nẹlaam mobho ezōor uru mịgba miben.

Toomo ibha kesi kesi noolōghōm ezōor obho ẹkona, ẹde neḍighi kilo bọbon ōoy olo alōghōm ezōor olo nolo. Ẹde mezōor nọobhozu, keḍio enyina nẹmiin, ezōor udi. Oobum ọliom ezōor magey keḍio ezōor ụbho ḍio.

Oomo ibha ezōor idi karōoy ịkunu obho ẹkona, ologhi ezōor ạbalala moomo amen. Ezōor idi karuvekulom keḍio ezōor nooḍighi mọlogh otẹnẹ rụula. Idi kolo bọbon ạfu ạar olo tọmiin tạvo ezōor olo, keḍio kạar kạar ezōor ụteeny ni ọman.
Tenyina arōoy ạKorint, ezōor nookpẹriōn ịnu nꞌiloghi ezōor ozuanaan enyina.
Ezōor ụḅoki ḍio zenyina miloghi ezōor, enyina kụ nẹḅoki zezōor miloghi enyina.
Ạami nạḍeghe ạnogho enyina siibha bho kạnwuny ạmi, ipin tonyiin ologhi obhobho meghuuron iloghi obhꞌenyina mẹnogho ezōor.
Ị́ḅaran ghạ moḍighi nꞌobo aruru. Iiḅi nꞌịkarabh ạmaḅaran ilo ghạ. Ẹḅaal nꞌọkinim irughan ghạ ḍio monyiin esi.
AKraist nꞌeru obho otul ọnu odi gạ? Okōr oḍigh ạar mobho obo bho imōruōm maKraist obho nꞌobo aruru obho ịḅaran?
Ịgbaan eeghe molo otu iikpulughu tẸnaan taalian nꞌotu ịikool aruru? Ezira potu iikpulughu tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho. Odi nịvo nịvo ạkpete kua,
“Ạami tatugh teedi, atelian nꞌeedi, molo ạami atu mẸnaan eedi, eedi etu rōoy ạmi.”
Iibha kiḍighi kObạmọogh obho ạkpete kua,
“Ịḍua teedi, mẹgbaranuan silōor enyina nꞌeedi.
Ị́teeny ghạ mạar oḍighiom mọkpo ilo ịḅaal io, molo ạami apin enyina ạloghom.”
“Pạami oru Ọde enyina, enyina keru nwụny nꞌạsunwunyaan ạmi,
Obạmọogh oomo ẹmiriikpo bho ạkpete kua.”

Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, oomo iibha bho uguanaan ezira. Tebum iibha bẹleni, itu ọḅaaleni lōor ezira toomo ẹmorokpo ilo neḍighi ghạ lōor bolobolo ẹmugh ezira mọḅele ọḅaal, oḍum aghuḍum oghiilaan Ẹnaan, ọneghe ọman taghisigh odi.
Ipinom ezōor. Oōy olo ezōor uḍighi mịkarabh olo, ezōor doḍighi nạ ḍio ọpue mōoy, bolobolo ooniom onyiin ōoy.
Ạami ụkpete ḍio miibha bho mọgba enyina mịkarabh. Tamen olo neetẹn ạami nạagba ghạ ạnogho enyina mẹzo enyina iḍigh tologhi ezōor molo tọbho nꞌaghuḍum oomo ezira idi monyiin esi.
Ạami nạtuughuom enyina mologhi magey molo ạami naḅuom enyina magey. Toomo ịiḅaghami obhꞌezōor ẹkona, ologhi ạmi ạghua ni ạman, ạami nạpeebh kugo.
Ạkar amen obho ezōor ụghi usi taMasidonia obho ẹkona, ipooghu ezōor ikima ḍio. Oomo kẹkul kẹkul ịiḅaghami ịiḅaghami, ạruruan nꞌịnon arōoy nꞌaruugu tekpom ezōor.
Keḍio Ẹnaan obo bho nạnwanami ghạ miloghi obo bho iloghi obho neeḅōkōom obho, abhin mạTaitos aru ạnwanami miloghi ezōor.

Ibha odi aru obho be ḍio, ịimoghon obho odi abhin abhulughi raḅeri ezōor mẹzo enyina ịghuemi mologhi odi obho. Odi ạgba ạnogho ezōor mẹzo enyina negbẹel mọmiin ạmi, nꞌẹzo ologhi enyina ọneghe ḍio tibha enyina iḍighi obho, nꞌẹzo enyina nẹemara mọgba ọbhel ạmi ọseghe. Iibha bho nẹekar ẹḅaaleni mologhi ạmi magey.
Ughōl nạ ẹko ọḅel ọbhereer obhꞌạmi aḍighi molo ologhi enyina ọneghe ḍio ẹkona, ạami ụutu mụ. Ạami alōghōm mobho ọḅel ọbhereer obhꞌạmi aḍighi molo ologhi enyina ọneghe ḍio mọbam eekpōogh amen.

Ologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey tiibha bho, tebum obho ạami uḍighi enyina mọotu obho ḍio, ebum obho ịitu obhꞌenyina iḍighi molo enyina neenweeghian taraabōom aghuḍum enyina bho. Ẹnaan kạlogh mịitu bhibha tiloghi obhꞌenyina molo iḍighi molo ezōor ụpue ḍio miloghi enyina.

Ịitu obho Ẹnaan nạlogh ghạ tiloghi arōoy obho neḍighi ghạ molo iloghi eedi nenweeghian mosōmōghi eedi tịbhelegha. Tiibha bho ōoy olo takōl “ạar iḅōr ạami” olo. Ịitu ẹmar-arōoy obho pobo nẹnogho ghạ mọbho.

Ịmiin mẹzo Ẹnaan abhin mịitu obhꞌenyina aḍighi amutiom mobho enyina ibhin oomo ologhi enyina neḍighiom oḍighi obho nꞌẹzo enyina ịmara ni mọgba mobho ạar olo enyina ịpiom olo, nꞌẹzo enyina ibhin ịkarabh iseeri, nꞌẹzo aruugu isibh enyina, nꞌẹzo enyina nẹva magey mọmiin ạmi, nꞌẹzo enyina nẹemara mọgba ọbhel ạmi, nꞌẹzo enyina nẹemara mọliom oḍighi mịkarabh obho. Enyina nẹegba lōor enyina emutiom mobho enyina ịghor ạman ilo tibha imute bho.

Tọkpete okpẹrẹni, toomo ibha ạami ụge mọbhereer obhobho bho ẹkona, ạami ụtuan io mobo bho aḍighi mịkarabh obho bolobolo obo bho uḍighi mịkarabh obho kạge. Ạami ụge mọmiin ạkar agey ẹzo enyina nẹetua zezōor mi taghisigh tẸnaan.
Iibha kiḍighi kologhi ezōor nạnwana.
Ẹzo ologhi ezōor ạnwana be ḍio, ologhi ezōor ạḅaal nạ magey men ạTaitos aru ạgba ạnogho ezōor mẹzo oomo enyina ibhin ịḅaaleni mologhi odi.

Ạami abhin enyina aatumuom ạnogho odi, keḍio enyina ibhin nạ mẹzo bho ịlogh ạami meghuan. Kamen kamen, agey obho mobho ezōor ụgba ghạ ụnogho enyina. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, iituma bho ezōor ubhin enyina uutumuom ụnogho mạTaitos obho neeru nạ magey.

Iibha bho neeḍighi molo, etulan obhꞌodi mi tenyina neebhōbh isi mesi olo ẹzo oḍighi olo, molo, kamen kamen olo odi ạatua mẹzo oomo enyina ibhin ịmaruom toghiilaan obhꞌenyina, nꞌẹzo enyina ibhin toghiilaan nꞌeegu aḍien ibhin odi ịloghom talōor enyina.
Ologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey siibha bho mobho ạami tatue ni aḍuom enyina mologhi.
Iiḅi aburumōr, ezōor nọva molo enyina elōghōm mẹzo ọsu ạghusan aḍien aluunwo bho tẸnaan naaḍighi moḍighi mi tạrasosi obhꞌaMasidonia.
Eedi eḍigh togbōgh ọdegh oonon mi tọmiinom obho eedi ịmiinom obho, keḍio ọḅaal ologhi obhꞌeedi ẹzo ọgba olo, molo toomo ekulom obhꞌeedi ẹkona, eedi ibhin ologhi aluunwo bho irōol tẹmu.
Tọgba agey obho, eedi ịnogho kẹzo kẹzo olo eedi irue, keḍio tilo imina ipuom suo, eedi ibhin nꞌoomo ologhi eedi ẹnoghuom
egbẹel, eesen ezōor molo kọnogho eedi meepōogh olo eedi kẹlogh ạni mạvo kẹnogho marōoy tẸnaan ibha idi taJudia obho.
Ibha eedi iḍighi obho nẹekar kua epu mibha ezōor nọotua bho. Eedi ibhira ịnogho lōor eedi mObạmọogh obho, keḍio igbi mọnogho ạni alōor eedi zezōor tẹzo ịto bho tẸnaan.
Tiibha bho pezōor ụkpete ụkpaariom mạTaitos obo bho ạke moḍighi obhobho bho, moḍighi ọghi taghisigh ọlogh ạvo ọnogho enyina ọman mi tạkar oḍighi etulan obhobho.

Enyina ạruula mi toomo ọkpo bho enyina ịteeny obho, tạkar omōruōm obhꞌenyina, nꞌoghōrōkō ọnuekpete enyina, nꞌolōghōm ạar obhꞌenyina, nꞌẹzo bho iḍigh tologhi enyina mọlogh ạvo bho, nꞌetulan obho enyina ibhin netulan ezōor obho. Ipin nạ tẹzo bho mẹteeny nạ mologhi aluunwo mi toḍighi etulan obhobho.
Iibha bho ạami ụlogh io ni molōgh ạnogho enyina. Ạami nạgba ni be ạnogho enyina mẹzo iḍigh tiloghi ịnon arōoy mọlogh ạvo, mọva ọmiin oḍigh etulan obhꞌenyina.

Enyina neelōghōm maluunwo ọsu ạghusan aḍien obho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho. Toomo ẹzo bho odi agbo mẹela asi obho, odi atẹn muvekulom mebum enyina, molo ẹḍua tekulom obhꞌodi etu enyina etẹnẹghu rụula.
Iibha aliiki ạmi mi tiibha bho. Oḍighi ọman esiibha mibha enyina ịke kạla bho atẹn obho ịneghe epu. Enyina obo bho ibhira ịke moḍighi iibha bho, enyina ibhira nạ eḍumom nꞌoomo ologhi enyina.
Iḅerenuom siibha meḍighi mẹghi taghisigh mẹman oḍighi obho. Ebhulubhul nạ tiloghi enyina mọman kẹzo bho ịrol bọ men obho idi nini tịitua enyina bho. Oomo ipa ẹkona, ipin tibha ạravo enyina meḍighiom.
Eru kạar olo idi tiloghi enyina mọnogho, Ẹnaan taanon tibha idi tạravo enyina bho apin mẹnogho bhꞌenyina, oonon io tibha enyina ịteeny io bho.
Ạami ụva ḍio molo koghōl ạami naḅẹriōn dōol ịnon mọḅamaghi tạruumu enyina.

Eezuan magey siibha bho enyina ịteeny mịkanya ọkpo magey obho molo enyina kẹlogh ạvo kẹnogho mobo bho ịteeny ạni ḍio obho, molo amen enyina ịteeny ạni ḍio peedi ọlogh ạni ạvo ọnogho ạni enyina. Tiibha bho pạvo oḅur avel avel kaḅur mạvo mụum.
Kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
“Odi obo bho aakōbhōghi mịkanya bho ọteeny io milo ilegheri ipu,
keḍio odi obo bho aakōbhōghi mịbam obho ọteeny io milo ilegheri ikio ipu.”
Ezōor nọsebh mẸnaan magey mobho iḍigh tologhi tạTaitos magey mọlogh ạvo ọnogho enyina kẹzo bho ezōor nọotua nạ bho.
Odi oḍumom io ni be tibha ezōor ụkpete ụnogho odi obho, neeḍigh nạ tologhi odi magey mọlogh ạvo ọnogho enyina molo odi nạatua nạ moru tenyina.
Ezōor notōm mọnon umōr olo oomo ạrasosi obho nekiilaan odi tebum oḍigh oḍighi ọgba ọnuekpete adōm obho, mọḅarama odi.

Odi umōr obhobho, ạrasosi obho ẹkona nẹeson odi ẹseghe molo odi kạtuonom ạni ghạ ezōor mi toḍighi oḍighi-iiḅi obho ezōor noḍighi mọnogho eghuan mObạmọogh obho, nꞌoḍighi omutiom mobho ịkar idi tologhi ezōor mọlogh ạvo bho.
Ezōor noḅe magey molo ịghor ạman ịtol io mi tẹzo ezōor ubhin nọpam maluunwo bhibha.
Ezōor nooseeriom mologhi ezōor mi toḍighi ghạ ibha ịneghe taghisigh tObạmọogh obho be ḍio, tasumusigh arōoy nạ.

Iibha kiḍighi kezōor notōm umōr ezōor nꞌeedi. Ezōor nọodegh odi mọlogh amen, ọmiin nạ mobho nebhulubhul tologhi odi mọlogh ạvo ọnogho arōoy. Keḍio esiibha bho odi naaseeriom ologhi odi zenyina bho, neelegheri nebhulubhul tologhi odi mọlogh ạvo ọnogho enyina.
ẠTaitos nị dụgh, odi nꞌạami utul noḍighi moḍighi obho mọlogh ạvo ọnogho enyina. Aburumōr ipedi obho netu nꞌodi obho, ạrasosi obho ịson eedi moru taḍien eedi mọnogho eghuan maKraist.
Itulan eedi magey molo oomo ạrasosi obho ẹkar kua elōghōm mobho iituma bho ezōor uutumuom enyina bho iru magey.
Ạami nạatua, ạar ọga omina ọge oruom enyina milo igboloman nꞌikpoki ọloghonaan ạvo ọnogho arōoy tẸnaan ibhꞌaJudia olo.

Ạami naalōghōm mobho idi tologhi enyina magey mọlogh ạvo, molo ạami naatumuom enyina ụnogho marōoy aMasidonia. Ạami ụgba kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịmiin, aburumōr ibhꞌaGris nẹemara kaana mọlogh ạvo ọnogho.” Ologhi ọlogh ạvo bho enyina ịteeny obho neenyuughi miloghi ọlogh eedi.

Iibha kiḍighi kạami arōm burumōr bhibha natuom enyina molo iituma bho ezōor uutumuom enyina mi tilo igboloman nꞌiibha bho itu moobhulo ọnu be, molo kẹzo bho ạami ụḍeghe bho, enyina neḅōruōm nꞌaluunwo enyina.

Iibha ilo, karōoy aMasidonia bho nꞌạami oru ọteeny enyina kọva ọmiin mobho enyina deekōbhōghia ḍio, ịmiin ạregheer ilo tesibh ezōor (ibhꞌenyina ụgba ḍio nọgba) moḍuom enyina mologhi ilo ịrol mẹzo bho.

Iibha kiḍighi kạami ạatua morōm aburumōr bhibha keḍionom ghạ zạmi taghisigh keru keekōbhōghi ghạ maluunwo bho enyina iguan obho, molo, amen ạami tatu asi, kạar kạar idi neḅōrō. Poḍighi nạ oghōl ịkar idi tiloghi enyina mọnogho, ụvimoghom io ni zenyina.
Ilōghōm mobho kōoy kōoy olo aḅẹbh meeghōorō oḍighi taḅu mịbam eḍian, obo bho aḍighi mẹesia bho taḅu mịkanya eḍian.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, kōoy kōoy ạnogho kẹzo bho idi tologhi odi obho. Odi ọogboghomi ḍio riḍien kạnogho bolobolo ạnogho kilo nọvimoghom ni zodi. Ẹnaan natulan ghạ mobo bho nạnoghuom nꞌooḅi ologhi obho.
Odi Ẹnaan tatue ni ạnogho enyina apuom ibha enyina negbẹel mọteeny obho, molo kamen kamen enyina tẹteeny ghạ ni mibha alōor enyina nꞌilo ipuom suo mobhin oḍighiom oomo oḍigh kẹrekere iiḅi ọkpo,
kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
“Odi ọokuom ghạ ḍio maruvekulom obho, oḍighi iiḅi odi idi kamen kamen.”
Ẹnaan obo bho nạnogho ghạ mikpo iḅẹbh moḅẹbh iḅẹbh, nꞌạbred molo ole bho, tạnogho ni enyina moomo ikpo iḅẹbh ilo enyina negbẹel, aḍighi nạ eedi esiiy moḅu iiḅua ẹela mi taluunwo bhꞌenyina.
Odi tagbuemi ghạ ni zenyina molo enyina eenwo luunwo moomo amen, molo ọlogh arōoy tepin luunwo bhꞌenyina mi tezōor ẹnogho lịsebh mẸnaan.
Ọlogh ạvo bhobho enyina nẹlogh obho, enyina iḍighi ḍio ẹnogho marōoy tẸnaan be, neḍighi nạ molo ịkanya arōoy ẹnogho lịsebh mẸnaan.

Ọlogh ạvo bhꞌenyina neeḍighi emutiom miiḅi eḍighiom ạar obhꞌenyina, molo ọlogh arōoy tẹnogho ni meghuan mẸnaan tebum oghiilaan obhꞌenyina mi tooḅi adōm obho taKraist, obho enyina imōruōm obho, nꞌaluunwo bho enyina iinwo zeedi nꞌoomo ịnon arōoy obho.
Peedi ookpulughu Ẹnaan ọnogho enyina nꞌigbōgh etulan tebum aluunwo ibꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien obho tẸnaan mi tenyina.
Itu ọsebh Ẹnaan tebum ẹnogho bhꞌodi ẹzo ọgba olo bho.
Ạami ạPol obo bho nạaḅoogh ghạ taghisigh enyina, ạteeny ọnu tạman obho, ubhin taḍien alideny alōor nꞌoḍighi iiḅi obho taKraist naakpulughu enyina.
Ị́vimoghom ghạ zạmi molo ạami kạteeny mọnu men ạami uru tenyina. Ạami nạgba ạnogho enyina, ạami tatue ni ạteeny mọnu ạmaranuan mobo bho nekōl meḍighiom ạar ezōor ilo esuo ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Agey, ezōor idi tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho keḍio ezōor ubhin io meḍighiom ạar esuo ẹmar-arōoy obho noḅiom.
Ọkpo ẹgham ezōor, ọkpo ẹgham esuo ẹmar-arōoy obho ḍio. Ịnyaam tẸnaan, ibha tetue ni eḅuni moomo ịikpo bho, pibha ezōor ubhin noḅiom opiẹmi miben ịkarabh ịkanan obho.
Kạar kạar olo ạagighimian nꞌọbughia alōor mi tebōom, mọmaranuan olōghōm ạar obho tẸnaan pobho ezōor nọkom ghạ ozu ọokpo, ọlogh ghạ mẹbana moomo ịitua molo ekiilaan maKraist?
Kamen kamen olo enyina iḍighi imutiom mobho oghiilaan obhꞌenyina neegbẹbh ịman, pezōor ọmara mọliom oomo eḍighiom ạar arōoy ilo oghiilaan olo.

Enyina neenon ghạ mọkpo tozu ạnyu obho be. Kir ōoy olo odi epa mi tenyina olo nagbiom lōor odi mobho odi aru mōoy taKraist. Odi anwe mịitua ologhi odi agbiom nạ zezōor mobho ezōor uru ạni marōoy taKraist.
Ạregheer ẹko isibh nạ ḍio zạmi, eru kạar olo ạami uutuma miituma ịikpo bho Obạmọogh obho ạnogho ezōor obho upu nạ suo ẹkona, ịikpo bho obhōbhẹ enyina, ilo obhiẹmi enyina ḍio.
Ạami ụva ḍio mobhin ibha ạami ụge tịbhereer ạmi obho oḍighi ọloki enyina ruugu.
Mạar io suo, onyiin ōoy tạkpete ni kua, “Hụ! ẠPol nạteeny ghạ mọnu ạkua tịbhereer odi, taghisigh arōoy odi ịnyaam ilo, ọnuekpete odi ạar oḍighiom olo.”
Oōy olo nạatua miibha bho alōghōm mobho akẹrekere ilo tibha ezōor ụge tịbhereer ezōor mi tamen olo ezōor idi tegbeeny, nꞌibha ezōor toḍighi tamen olo ezōor idi nꞌenyina.
Enyina neelōghōm mobho ezōor une ḍio ọseghe lōor ezōor otueni bolobolo ọtuom mobo bho ịseghe silōor eedi ịsiine kepa bho. Eedi neḍigh evel monyiin mọseghe alōor onyiin ogbiom, omina ọtuom onyiin.
Tezōor, kẹzo kẹzo ilo ịrol, iituma ezōor kir ọkuan, ezōor upẹlōm ghạ nạ ḍio suo. Ezōor useeriom tọkuan oḍighi obho Ẹnaan ạlogh tạravo ezōor obho, obho enyina iḍighom ạni obho.
Tẹzo bho enyina idi ạani togbo odi ọkuan obho, tamen obho ezōor ubhin mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho igboloman nꞌaKraist uruom enyina bho, ezōor upẹl io mọkuan obho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, ezōor uutuma ḍio opẹlōm mi tọkuan obho Ẹnaan aseeri ezōor obho oḍigh toḍighi ịnon arōoy. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ezōor useeriom ologhi mẸnaan molo ologhi omōruōm enyina kabhōbh kạghi taghisigh, nꞌolo ezōor totue ni oḍighi mọkanya oḍighi teesoḍia enyina moomo amen molo ezōor upẹl io mọkuan obho Ẹnaan aseeri ezōor obho.
Pezōor orue opẹl enyina ọghi tịnon aruubhugh ọgba ọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho, molo ezōor upin io moḍighi ạravo ọnon ōoy ootumuom.
“Kōoy kōoy olo taatuma aatumuom mObạmọogh obho,” kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho.
Ebum obho kōoy kōoy olo Obạmọogh obho ạbham amutiom pobo nọsebh ghạ, obo bho amutiom lōor odi obho ḍio.
Ịmoghonyan ạami, sesen ni, ạkar esiibha bho ạami natu mọḍeghe ạraḍeghe araama bho.
Ạami ạteeny mobōbhan mi tenyina kẹzo bho Ẹnaan ạteeny obho, ebum obho enyina idi kooḅi ọkpur ọnyani olo ạneghe ni ạman, olo ạami utuḅenaan mọkala maKraist komoom olom olo odi ạteeny.
Ạami nạatu magey molo enyina ịgbaranuan ẹḍua tetulan nꞌịitua bhꞌenyina mi taKraist kẹzo bho ooḍigh obho abhin aapeleghia ạdegh mIiv, odi ameel obho.

Ebum obho enyina ikẹm lẹpuuny nepinom kōoy kōoy olo aru nạgba ạnogho enyina mọnon ạJizos olo akōrōnuan mobho ezōor ụgba ụnogho enyina bho, nepinom nạ mẹmugh nꞌadōm olo oozuan io noozuan mẹmugh obho nꞌadōm obho enyina ibhin tezōor obho.
Ạami nạatua, ạami usōoriōm io apu mạkar ibꞌiteledōm ibhꞌenyina.
Eru nạ kạar olo ạami ụmaar io mọnuekpete, olōghōm ạar ạmi idi. Ezōor nọogba ghạ miibha bho mi toomo oḍigh kẹrekere araabōom mi toomo kạar kạar ọnogho zenyina.
Ạami umuul io enyina bọbon onyiin ạar men obho ạami ụgba mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho tẸnaan ụnogho enyina bho. Ạami usōoriōm lōor ạmi mọbughe enyina. Iibha bho ạami uḍighi mịkarabh gạ?
Amen obho ạami ụrolan enyina uḍighian enyina moḍighi obho, ịnon ạrasosi kịkpe ghạ zạmi mikpoki oḍighi ạmi. Idi kolo ạami umiigh eedi mọloghom ạvo ọnogho enyina.

Men obho ạami odi nꞌenyina bho, ạami ụnogho ḍio enyina mịiḅaghami ọlogh ạvo ọnogho ạmi tamen olo okpoki olo nolo tạvo ạmi, ebum obho aburumōr ibha aMasidonia ibhin iruom ạami kạar kạar ilo ạami nạva mọrolom. Ẹzo bho ịrol tamen olo naatẹn obho pẹzo tẹtol nạ taghisigh. Bọbon amen olo ạami tạnogho enyina mịiḅaghami olo.
Tọgba agey taKraist ibha idi tạmi obho, iituma bhibha tạmi iḍigh io meḍum kesi kesi mi toomo ebhugh obhꞌaGris.
Ebum eeghe kạami nạḍeghe miibha bho? Ebum obho ạami utulan io enyina gạ? Ẹnaan be kalōghōm erumolo ạami utulan io enyina.
Ạami taḍighi ghạ ni be ạki taghisigh siibha bho molo “iteledōm” ipedi obho ịteeny mọnu ootuma oghōl meedi nꞌezōor uḍighi monyiin oḍighi obho.
Arōoy ilo idi kua iben iteledōm. Oḍighi eedi oobiōghōm arōoy be, ooghirina ọrol kiteledōm taKraist.
Ẹzo bho, aSetan ẹkona naaghirina ghạ nị ạtol konyiin oteledōm ẹḅaal obho.
Molo, ibꞌạar io erumolo ạrubana odi iighirina ịrol kạrubana ilo ịneghe ni ịman taghisigh tẸnaan. Ikunughi obho eedi tepin tạvo tẸnaan mạmukpe oḍigh oḍighi obho eedi neḍighi obho.
Ạami digha ạḍeghe nạ monyiin ẹzo bho, ịítua ghạ mobho ạami uru meema. Kenyina ẹetua nạ kua ẹkona, pipinom ạami keema molo ạami ạteeny ạni mạar obhin ootumuom.
Ibha ạami nạḍeghe siibha bho ạami nạḍeghe rạḍeghe eema, ịḍua ḍio tịto tObạmọogh obho keru. Ạkar ạraḍeghe iituma bhobho ạami nạḍeghe araama.
Ku neeḍigh iru molo ọlogh arōoy neebhin neetumuom mịitua ịlelemu arōoy obho, ạami ẹkona taatuma ạni ni.
Enyina nịvo nịvo ilōghōm mạar arōoy, molo enyina nẹḅaal ghạ ni mologhi eḅaam rạḍeghe araama.
Enyina neḅaam ghạ nị ẹnogho mobo bho neeghirimi enyina kạrubana bho, bolobolo eliom enyina bho, ẹdeghogh enyina mẹzo olo ologhi eedi aḍigh, eenon enyina ekiemi, eḅōrōgh nạ masumusigh enyina bho.
Ạami nạkpete mọlokia ạregheer, ezōor ụroogh nị opu moḍighi ipa bho.
Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ane ạkpaton mọnu mootuma, — ạami nạḍeghe mạraḍeghe eema — ạami ẹkona tane nạ nị aatuma.
Eedi arōoy aHibru bẹle? Ạami sẹzo bho nạ. Eedi ilꞌIzirẹl? Ạami ẹkona. Eedi ạnwuny ọobhe tEbrạhạm? Ạami ẹzo bho nạ.

Eedi ạrubana taKraist? Ạami nạḍeghe kōoy olo nakpo mizim ẹede ọnon, ạami ukumuan apu eedi. Ạami uḍiku nạ mikoli apu eedi, ilo nọogurogh nạ zạmi ipu zeedi, keḍio ọlogh amen olo ạami naatuan mọbho, oomo eedi olo naarubh lẹke motuan olo.
Neegbẹbh ōogh amen mobho arōoy aJu obho nẹegurogh ạami monyiin olo merubal ạligur ạvo.
Ịraar amen mobho nọoguroghom ạami mọga, otōḅōl ạami men. Sịraar amen mobho ạami nạagbana togbo ọbhiiny ạbadi molo onyiin amen ạami ụrol tạmuum ạmuum moomo uḍugul nꞌootaany.

Tararele bhꞌạmi, ụgba ḍio men mobho ạami ụrol teesoḍia aḍuugh nꞌọbho mi tạribhiiny, nꞌạravo ạruḅa nạ, nꞌạravo ạkar arōoy ạmi nạ, nꞌạravo arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho nꞌạravo iben aburumōr ạmi tibꞌạraama bho nꞌibꞌeekpu aruuḍum obho, tibꞌạribhiiny.
Ụgba ḍio men olo ạami ukumuan uḍighi moḍighi molo ạami ukoḍi ḍio rạla muḍugul, ụrol nạ mọkoony eḍian nꞌạmuum. Oto amen, bọbon eḍian ole ilo, esi oḍigh obhooghia olo, ukpe okuugha ẹkona olo.
Tẹzo olo osōbh okpẹrẹmi, oomo aḍuma mobho ịitua ạmi nẹvimoghom ghạ zạmi tilo igboloman nꞌoomo ạrasosi obho.
Okōr ōoy adugh tomōruōm odi molo ạmi udugh ạni ḍio? Okōr ōoy ameel aḍigh tesi ịkarabh molo ạami ụsuanaan io ghụsan?
Ạami taatuma nạ ekona, ạami taatuma tọkpo bho ịgba neḍeeriom ạami mobho ạami ịnyaam ilo nolo bho.
Ẹnaan tạJizos Obạmọogh obho obho aru nạ mỌde odi obho, obho ạlisebh tẹtol ni ẹnogho kamen kamen obho, naalōghōm mobho ạami ụgba ḍio miben.
Onyiin amen mi tạDamaskos, uvẹmụ ōoy ẹma bho, obho odi tẹeḍiani tẠretas ọolema bho, arōm rōoy mọmara tọnu otu ẹma bho moḅol ạmi.
Keḍio ụlogh ạami tọkpaagh usōorẹ tẹḅagh-otu ẹma bho molo ạami umuzōnaan tạravo odi.
Toomo ibha ạsuo ilo bho ẹkona, ạami taatuma ni, keḍio ạami natu mọgba ilo igboloman nꞌạghiiny nꞌọkpo ẹḅokia ilo Obạmọogh obho ạgba amutiom ạnogho ạami.

Ạami alōghōm monyiin olo atul ọnu nꞌaKraist olo tamen olo aḍiōbh nꞌinya ạsia neetẹn, ụseghe ụsiinom tobꞌạnyu obho. Eru kạar olo iru tiikpōogh obho nꞌeru kạar olo iru tạruumugh obho, ạami ulōghōm io, Ẹnaan be kalōghōm.
Ạami ulōghōm mobho ụseghe mōoy obhobho ubhin ụghi tạnyu-ẹnaan obho. Eru kạar olo iru tiikpōogh obho nꞌeru kạar olo iru tạruumugh obho, ạami ulōghōm io, Ẹnaan be kalōghōm.
Tepa podi ạmoghon mọkpo ilo ōoy otue ḍio ạgba, ilo anem odi ẹkona otue ḍio ạsir amutiom.
Odi ōoy obhobho pobo ạami taatumuom. Ạami uutumuom io lōor ạmi, tughuneen tọkpo bho nẹgba emutiom mobho ạami ịnyaam ilo bho ḍio.

Ạami aru nạ mootuma ẹkona, ạami uḍigh io meema, ebum obho ạami ụgba ḍio miben obho. Keḍio ạami ụva ḍio, molo onyiin ōoy ọlogh ạami apu tịitua odi, tughuneen tibha odi ạmoghon toghōrōkō ạmi, ạmiin nạ bhꞌạami naḍighi obho ḍio.

Keḍio, toḍighi ẹzo olo ạami ụseeghi ḍio rạvo mi tọbughia alōor tebum ibꞌọkpo bho ạami ụmiin obho, pụnogho ạami mẹegama ooḅulom tiikpōogh obho, olo naḍighi moḍigh oḍighi ẹbana taSetan moḍighi olo ạami ụbughia ḍio lōor.
Ịraar amen mobho ạami uukpulughu mObạmọogh obho motughuneen talōor ạmi.

Odi ạbhagharana kua, “Ọnon ạar olo ạna tagbẹbh olo tughuneen ọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌạmi ḍio ebum obho ịnyaam obhꞌạmi nẹkua ghạ epu tamen olo alōor onuma naadugh.” Iibha kiḍighi kologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey mootuma tibha ạami ịnyaam ilo bho, molo aKraist apin ịnyaam obhꞌodi akuōm ạami akiton molo ạar ọteeny ạami.
Talidugh alōor, nꞌitōnyōgh, nꞌọkoony, nꞌọmiinom, nꞌịiḅaghami mi tebum aKraist, ạami ụuḅaghami ghạ ḍio lōor ạmi. Ebum obho kamen kamen olo alōor ạmi adugh pamen ạami nạteeny ghạ mịnyaam.
Ạami naḅo miḅo araama, keḍio enyina obo bho iḍighi obho. Eru nạ kạar olo ạami ụla ḍio mạar tenyina ẹkona, ạami uḅẹebh io apu mạkar “iteledōm” obhꞌenyina.
Alideny alōor obhꞌạmi mi togbo enyina nꞌọkpo ịiḍaany nꞌibꞌaruugu obho pibha iḍighi bọ imutiom mobho ạami uru monyiin ạkar agey oteledōm.
Ezōor ọkar ooniom enyina opuom mạrasosi ipedi obho, tughuneen tibha ạami ụuḅaghami ḍio enyina mọlogh ạvo ọnogho ạmi obho be ḍio? Sesen ni, ịḅelemaan ạami tiiniom bhibha.

Nꞌoobho sogbẹbhiōm ịraar amen mobho ạami naakōbhōghia moru tenyina, keḍio ạami ugbẹel io zenyina nꞌạar nꞌạar. Enyina pibha ạami nạva, ikpoki ḍio. Ạnwuny io mobo nẹnoghooy ghạ mọkpo bụrude, ạburude ku nẹnoghooy ghạ.
Ologhi ạmi tạḅaal ni magey moliom kạar kạar olo ạami ụteeny, nꞌạkar aghuḍum ạmi, mọbhelom enyina. Ebum obho ạami utulan enyina mẹzo bho, pạar obho enyina tepin etulan ạami mịbam obho gạ?
Ạami nakōl enyina neemōruōm mobho ạami ụnogho ḍio zenyina dōol orōol. Mạar io suo, onyiin ōoy tatue ni akōl mạami ụgba miben ạloghom enyina tẹto.
Ḅōrō ku, ạami ụkar uḍighi ẹko? Ạami abhin tadōm obho ạami urōm uruom enyina bho aaniom enyina gạ?
Ạami uusen mạTaitos moru tenyina, amina arōmōm nạ nꞌumōr opedi obho. ẠTaitos aaniom enyina gạ? Araabōom odi nꞌạami, nꞌeḍighiom ạar ezōor onyiin io gạ?
Iiḅi aburumōr, mạar io suo enyina nẹetua ekōl mezōor nọva mesi ọgba ọḍua mi tenyina. Ịítua ghạ kua. Ezōor nọḍeghe ọnogho enyina mi taghisigh tẸnaan mibha aKraist nạva molo ezōor kọḍeghe obho.

Aruugu nesibh ạami mobho ụmaar io suo, amen ạami tatu asi tenyina ạami tạmiin enyina mẹzo olo ạami ụva ḍio mọmiin enyina, enyina ẹmiin ạami mẹzo olo enyina ịva ḍio mọmiin ạmi. Mạar io suo ạami tatu atulom enyina tạruruan, nꞌibōbhan, nꞌọkarabh ologhi ẹbhooru, nꞌologhi ạaku, nꞌitōnyōghan nꞌịnyoghoghan, nꞌọbughia alōor nꞌẹmoghonyan.

Ạami nạatu ni molo amen ạami tamina atu asi tenyina, Ẹnaan obhꞌạmi taḍighi ni ạregheer enyina esibh ạami, nꞌobho ạami taḍigh ni tịitu aleghian mobo bho iḍighi mịkarabh tamen olo neetẹn obho, ibha deghiraan io eḍionom ạman moḍighi ịkarabh, ọva ạraani nꞌilobhir nꞌọkpo ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho eedi iḍigh ịduḅuḍian obho.
Oobho ogbẹbhiōm ịraar amen obho ạami natu tenyina. “Keḍio tọpam mōoy molōgh, tọmoghon ni mịigbaay ọnu ịzal nꞌịraar arōoy,” kẹzo bho ẹegia iigbia bho ạkpete bho.

Ạami naakiom ni enyina obo bho neeḍighi mịkarabh mi tamen olo neetẹn obho, nꞌoomo ipedi obho. Togbẹbhiōm ịzal amen obho ạami uru tenyina bho ạami ạkpete nạ miibha bho, keḍio ạami digha amina ạkpete, siibha bho ạami ugbeenyan ni tenyina bho, mobho, amen obhꞌeede bho ạami tatu obho, bọbon onyiin ōoy olo ạami tạḅelemaan olo.

Enyina tẹmiin ni moomo ibha enyina nẹva mọmiin obho: mobho aKraist abhin ạami nạkpete ạnogho enyina. Amen odi tạpam enyina, penyina olōghōm oghōl odi ofaabh io, odi taḍighi ni amutiom mịnyaam odi ạnogho enyina.

Toomo ibha odi adughom lōor ạnogho eedi eedi ịkan ighigh odi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho ẹkona, odi abhin ịnyaam tẸnaan naḍumom siibha. Ezōor idi nạ todughom alōor obho odi ạrol bọ tiikpōogh obho, keḍio tolōghōmuan obhꞌezira, ezōor topin ni tịnyaam tẸnaan oḍum ạni nꞌodi.

Ịḍa lōor enyina meenon, mẹmiina lōor enyina nịvo nịvo erumolo enyina neḍum aghuḍum ologhi omōruōm. Ạami ụga ạni ni napuruan, enyina neelōghōm mobho ạJizos Kraist naḍum taghuḍum enyina? Gạ, pụ mạar io suo enyina neemeleghu ẹman taraabōom obhꞌodi.
Bọbon ịitua ilo oghōl ezōor noomeleghu nạ, ạami nạatua, ilo nolo tenyina.
Ezōor nookpulughu mẸnaan molo enyina iḍighi monyiin ạar ekōrōnuan, tebum olo oḍighi ezōor opẹ ḍio, ebum olo enyina eḍighi ghạ mibha iizuan obho, eru nạ kạar olo oḍighi obhꞌezōor abhẹ nạ ẹkona.
Ebum obho ezōor ụva ḍio mọmaranuan, oḍighi okōrōnuan tagey obho tẸnaan, nọva ghạ mọbham ọghi taghisigh be bho.
Ologhi ezōor nạḅaal ghạ nị men olo alōor ezōor naadugh, kalōor enyina ạghua ni ạmara. Tiibha bho kezōor nookpulughu ghạ molo enyina kegbẹbh kẹman toomo eḍighiom ạar enyina.

Pạar obho aḍighi bọ kạami nạge miibha bho tesuo amen olo ạami ugbeenyan ni enyina bho, molo, amen ạami tatu asi, ạami upin io tịnyaam obho Obạmọogh obho ạnogho ạami obho amulughuom enyina. Ịnyaam obho ạami ubhin obho, ịnyaam obhōbhẹ enyina, olo obhiẹmi enyina ḍio.

Siibha bho, iiḅi aburumōr, ịmaar ẹrol. Iḅe mẹzo olo enyina egbẹbh ẹman toomo iiḅi eḍighiom ạar. Ịmoghon liiki ạmi, onyiin ạmoghonyan monyiin, meḍum ghuḍum ekima, pẸnaan etulan nꞌekima bho ọrolan enyina.
Onyiin abheleghian ghạ monyiin nꞌiiḅi ipeleghian aburumōr.
Oomo arōoy tẸnaan ibha idi eebha bho epuruan enyina.
Ọsu ạghusan aḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho, nꞌetulan obho tẸnaan, nꞌotul ọnu Ẹmugh Iigbia bho, ẹrolan nꞌoomo enyina.

Ạami ạPol obo bho ubheleghi moru onyiin oteledōm obho ụge mọbhereer obhobho. Oōy kobheleghi ḍio ạami, bolobolo ịḍua nạ ḍio tịto ōoy keru, ạJizos Kraist nịvo nꞌẸnaan Ọde bho, obo bho aḅẹtōn bọ zodi tọbho bho, kibheleghi ạami.
Ạami ụge natuom enyina oomo arōoy ạrasosi obho idi bọ tebhugh obho aGaletia bho. Oomo aburumōr obho idi eebha nꞌạami obho epuruan enyina.
Ẹnaan Ọde bhꞌezira nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹnogho ni enyina lịsebh nꞌekima!
Tẹzo ọbhel ezira ọseghe tịkarabh ẹmar-arōoy obhobho nꞌẹzo olo oghiilaan ịto bho tẸnaan Ọde bhꞌezira, paKraist ạnogho lōor obhꞌodi ḍuugh ạbho mebum ịkarabh ezira.
Kamen kamen eghuan ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan! Ẹrol ni nạ kua!
Ạami naamōogh ni magey mẹzo enyina ikẹm ighiraan nẹḍua todi obo bho ạtuan tinwo bho taKraist kabheleghi enyina bho nẹki mọtuonom ọnon adōm.
Ạkar odi nị dụgh ọnon adōm olo, ạami ụtuan mebum ẹde arōoy olo nẹpueghi miloghi obhꞌenyina nẹva moghireni adōm obho taKraist obho, kạami nạkpete miibha bho.
Itōnyōgh ẹrol ẹnogho mobo bho tạḍua atu ạgba mọnon oḍigh adōm obho ezōor ụgba ụnogho enyina bho, erumolo onyiin ezōor ẹkona bolobolo otelema tẸnaan ạḍua nạ tạnyu obho aru anwe ạgba.
Ezōor nọokpete ghạ miibha bho, keḍio ạami digh amina ạkpete: kōoy kōoy olo ạgba ạnogho enyina mọnon oḍigh adōm olo akōrōnuan tobho enyina neebhinom obho, itōnyōgh ẹrol ẹnogho zodi!

Abaabha bho nẹgbaanan molo oghōl ạami nạva molo arōoy kebuom ạami gạ? Eenyi. Ạami nạva mẸnaan mobuom ạami. Ẹgbaanan nạ molo oghōl ạami nạva molo arōoy kelōghōm ạami gạ? Ughōl ạami nạva ni miibha bho bọ, ạami kutu ḍio mẹbana taKraist.
Iiḅi aburumōr, ilōghōm kua, adōm obhꞌạmi ōoy kọgba ḍio ạnogho ạami.
Ạami upin nạ ḍio tọnu ōoy; ōoy ẹkona kọtughumiom io ạami. ẠJizos Kraist nịvo nịvo kạgba amutiom ạnogho ạami.

Nọogba ọnogho enyina mẹzo ạami ụrol men obho ạami ụnogho lōor ạmi mi tiikpulughu arōoy aJu obho, ẹzo ạami ụsuanaan io ghụsan marōoy ạsosi obho tẸnaan, ụnogho ni zeedi mịiḅaghami, ụbham magey mobhiẹmi eedi.
Tẹzo eḍighiom ạar arōoy iikpulughu aJu bho, ạami upu mọlogh aburugbo ạmi. Ạami ụtuom mạar meḍighiom ạar ạburude bhꞌezōor apu mịnon.
Keḍio Ẹnaan, tọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi, ạson ạami ki tamen olo dọmar io ạami, abheleghi ạami moḍighi oḍighi ọnogho odi.

Tamen olo idi tologhi odi mọgba omutiom Ọony obhꞌodi ọnogho ạmi, molo ạami kạgba mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho, obho igboloman nꞌodi obho, mọnogho arōoy ibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho, ōoy olo ạami ụghi mọnogho ạmi maliiki olo,
ạami ụki nạ ḍio taJerusạlẹm mọmiinan iteledōm obho idi bọ taghisigh ạmi obho. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ạami ụghi tArebia keḍio ạami umula urughẹel tạDamaskos.
Ịraar ạsia neetẹn keḍio ạami ugbi mọghi taJerusạlẹm mọmiinan aPita, keḍio ezōor ụrolan maḍiōbh nꞌōogh aḍuma.
Ọnon oteledōm olo ạami ụmiin olo, tughuneen maJems umōr tObạmọogh obho ḍio.
Iibha bho ạami nạge bho agey. Ẹnaan be kalōghōm, ạami ụgba ḍio miben.
Ọbam amen atẹn, pạami ụghi tariisi ilo idi taruubhugh aSiria nꞌaSilisia.
Tamen obhobho, arōoy ạsosi ibhꞌaJudia delōghōm io ạami.
Eedi nẹmoghon ghạ mibha ịnon arōoy nekōl kua: “Oōy obho ạnogho ezōor mịiḅaghami obho tebum ooḅi adōm obho naaghiraan nạgba ạni ạnogho rōoy momōruōm obho odi ạva bọ mobhiẹmi obho.”
Tiibha bho bẹleni, peedi ibuom mẸnaan mebum ạmi.
Ḍiōbh nꞌinya ạsia itẹn, pạami nꞌạBanabas umula ụghi taJerusạlẹm. Ạami ạbhamam nạ mạTaitos.

Ẹnaan ạgba amutiom ạnogho ạami aghōl mọ kịa, kạami ạghi. Tezue eghun otu nꞌarukenya bho, pạami ụgba ụnogho eedi mọnuekpete adōm obho ạami ụgba ghạ bọ ụnogho marōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho, molo oḍighi obho ạami naaḍighi obho nꞌibha ạami naḍighi obho itu mapa ạar be.
ẠTaitos obo bho ạtuonom ạami obho toomo ibha odi aru molꞌaGris obho, uḅum io zodi oḍun.

Ẹde arōoy ilo iighirina iḍigh ạni togbo bhꞌezōor kaburumōr mi taKraist, ịva ghạ moḅum oḍun odi. Arōoy bhibha iru ịḅar tọtu mọva ọmiin ilo igboloman nꞌomuzōnaan obho ezōor ụteeny mi totul ọnu nꞌạJizos Kraist obho. Eedi ịva ghạ momina omulumi ezōor moḍum aghuḍum ạrubana.
Ezōor udughom io nodughom lōor ọnogho zeedi bọbon amen molo ezōor useerian enyina magey obho ooḅi adōm obho.

Keḍio obo bho ighōl bọ meedi ịvaruumu obho, ạkar eedi ịvaruumu obho ịgba ḍio momoom ạar ẹnogho ạami. Ạami nạkpete miibha bho tebum obho eedi itu ḍio makẹrẹ arōoy mi tạmi obho. Ẹnaan oonon ghạ ḍio tozu alōor obho kasōbh rạakpe odi.
Eedi ịmaar iinon, peedi ịmiin mobho Ẹnaan nạanogho ạami mịnyaam mọgba ooḅi adōm obho ọnogho arōoy ịnon aruubhugh, kẹzo bho odi ạnogho maPita mịnyaam mọgba ooḅi adōm obho ọnogho obo bhꞌaJu obho.
Ịḍua tịnyaam tẸnaan keru kạami aru moteledōm mi tarōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho, kẹzo bho aPita aru moteledōm mi tarōoy aJu obho.

Amen obho aJems nꞌaKifas nꞌạJon, obho ịrol kịvaruumu obho, ịmiin mobho Ẹnaan nạanogho ạami moḍighi oḍighi obhobho bho, peedi iḅolom mạBanabas nꞌạami. Karōoy onyiin oḍighi obho, oomo ezōor umōruōm ughōl mezōor oḍighi ghạ moḍighi obho mi togbo arōoy aJu obho.
Iibha ạami naḅe ghạ moḍighi obho, pibha eedi ịkpete ịnogho ezōor, mọotua ghạ ọlogh ạni ghạ mạvo ọnogho maruvekulom obho idi togbo eedi obho.
Amen olo aPita aru tẠntiok, ạami asi zodi taghisigh odi tebum obho odi aḍighi akōrōnuan.

Keḍio obo bho aJems arōm moru obho, iru isi, aPita naatul nꞌaburumōr arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ale ghạ meḍian; eedi iru isi, podi amuluom ạman agin motul eedi ole eḍian, nakiil ruugu mobo bho ighōl moḍunogh rōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho.
Pipedi arōoy aJu aburumōr obho ẹkona, ịke nạ moḍighi karōoy ẹroogh nꞌaPita, ạBanabas ẹkona ạtuonom nạ rạaḅa asike eedi.

Men ạami ụva ụmiin mobho eedi ịtuonom io monyen tagey ooḅi adōm obho, pạami ụkpete ụnogho maPita mi taghisigh oomo eedi, ughōl kua “Ạna ōoy aJu olo naḍum aghuḍum arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho kaghuḍum ōoy aJu ḍio, imute ẹko kạna nạvimom rōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho moḍum aghuḍum arōoy aJu obho?”
Agey nạ ni, ezōor ạkar arōoy aJu. Ezōor isoloman ibha ikiilaan io maraalōgh obho taMozis obho ḍio.

Keḍio ezōor noolōghōm mobho ụtuan io tibha araalōgh obho ịkpete bho, kobhin mōoy oseeri kooḅi ōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan, ologhi omōruōm odi mi tạJizos Kraist be. Ezōor ẹkona noomōruōm nạ mạJizos Kraist molo kobhin ạni ezōor koseeri taghisigh tẸnaan kiiḅi arōoy tebum ologhi omōruōm obhꞌezōor mi taKraist. Ụtuan io tookō ibha araalōgh obho ịkpete bho. Bọbon ōoy olo tatu mooḅi ōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan tebum obho odi aakō raalōgh obho olo.

Kẹzo bho ezōor obo bho noḅe moru iiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan tebum otul ọnu obhꞌezōor nꞌaKraist obho, kọva ọmiin mobho ezōor uru miḍighi mịkarabh karōoy ibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho, iibha bho nemōruōm mobho aKraist aabe mịkarabh gạ? Eenyi, ekua ḍio.
Ạami aḅẹriōn mibha ạami ulẹrẹghi obho, pụ nẹgba mobho ạami naapẹl molōgh.
Araalōgh obho ịnyaam ilo mu talōor ạmi. Eedi neeghigh ạami molo ạami kaḍum kạnogho mẸnaan. Nọokanam ạami nꞌạJizos Kraist mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho okigh,

molo tạmi aghuḍum olo mu, ạJizos Kraist pobo naḍum mi tạmi. Keḍio aghuḍum obhobho ạami naḍum siibha bho, ạami naḍum tologhi omōruōm obho ạami ụteeny mi tỌony obho tẸnaan, obho atulan ạami magey kạnogho lōor odi ḍuugh ạbho mebum ạmi obho.
Ạami ugin io minwo bho tẸnaan mi tọbho bho taKraist. Erumolo Ẹnaan tapin ni ezira kiiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh odi tebum ookō araalōgh obho, pọbho bho taKraist ạar oḍighiom olo.
Ibꞌaraama arōoy aGaletia, okōr ōoy ạḍaany miloghi obhꞌenyina? Tasumusigh enyina nọogba ọveleghi mọbho bho tạJizos Kraist mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho ọnogho enyina.
Onyiin ạar odi molo ạami nạva molōghōm tenyina. Enyina ibhin mẸmugh Iigbia obho tẸnaan tebum obho enyina iikō raalōgh obho taMozis, bẹlee kebum obho enyina ịmoghon imōruōm mooḅi adōm obho?
Iibha kokōr oḍigh eema olo enyina neḍigh! Enyina igbiom mOoḅi Ẹmugh obho tẸnaan enyina nẹva siibha mokunughiom tịnyaam alōor enyina gạ?
Oomo ibha imutenaan enyina bho apa ạni ni be gạ? Eenyi. Ẹla mịkanya mạar.
Ẹnaan ạnogho enyina mOoḅi Ẹmugh obho aḍighi mọkpo ibꞌaruugu mi togbo enyina mebum obho enyina iikō raalōgh obho, bẹlee modi ạtuan mebum obho enyina ịmoghon imōruōm mooḅi adōm obho?
Idi nạ kibha ẹegia bho ịgba bọ milo igboloman nꞌEbrạhạm obho, “Odi amōruōm Ẹnaan keḍio Ẹnaan ạtuan tebum ologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi keḍio ạseghe zodi aseeri kooḅi ōoy.”
Ilōghōm kua siibha bho, mobho kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny ologhi amōruōm, odi ạkar ọony ọobhe tEbrạhạm.

Ẹnaan nạagba ạnogho mobo bho ạge bọ mẹegia bho, mobho odi nạatua kọkanya amen mọloghom ạni arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ịteeny bọ mologhi omōruōm obho, moru iiḅi arōoy taghisigh odi. Ọgba mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho ọnogho mEbrạhạm kọkanya amen mobho, “Tẹḍua tonuma keḍio Ẹnaan tạsebh moomo arōoy ibhꞌade bho.”
Ebrạhạm amōruōm ni keḍio ụsebh nạ zodi. Iibha kiḍighi, kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm, pọsebh ạni nạ odi.

Oomo obo bho ịmara bọ mookōoy ghạ araalōgh obho idi togbo itōnyōgh tẸnaan. Ạar bho aḍighi obho keeghe? Ẹegia bho nạakpete kua, “Kōoy kōoy olo ookō ḍio moomo araalōgh obho ụge bọ tọbhereer araalōgh obho taMozis obho, odi odi togbo itōnyōgh tẸnaan.”

Iibha bho nemōrō kua, bọbon ōoy olo tapin tookō araalōgh obho ạmara taghisigh tẸnaan kooḅi ōoy olo, kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho, “Kōoy kōoy olo Ẹnaan ạtuan tebum ologhi omōruōm odi kaseeri zodi kooḅi ōoy mi taghisigh odi, taḍum ni maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.”
Araalōgh obho ịmaruom io tologhi omōruōm. Idi kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho, “Kōoy kōoy olo aakō moomo araalōgh obho taḍum ni maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.”

Keḍio aKraist nạata zezira ạseghe titōnyōgh obho araalōgh obho ibhin iru obho, tamen obho odi abhin itōnyōgh mebum ezira bho. Kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho, “Kōoy kōoy olo usineni toorẹeny, odi togbo itōnyōgh tẸnaan.”

ẠJizos Kraist ạmiinom miibha bho molo ẹḍua todi etu molo arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho epin ạni mạlisebh obho. Ẹnaan aguanaan mEbrạhạm obho, molo ẹḍua tologhi omōruōm ezira etu molo ezira topin ạni mẸmugh Iigbia bho Ẹnaan aguanaan obho.
Iiḅi aburumōr, tẹzo olo ọkpete ọgbaaniom, amen olo ịzal arōoy ighiran ịzo, ōoy olo tạtol tạman anwe mịzo bho bolobolo amina ạlogh mọnon ọnu olo.

Oguan obho tẸnaan, odi aguanaan mEbrạhạm nꞌọony ọobhe bhꞌodi. Ẹegia bho ọkpete ḍio aghōl kua, “Nꞌạnwuny ọobhe onuma” moḍeeriom oghōl mọlogh arōoy; ụge ughōl, “Nꞌọony ọobhe onuma.” Iibha bho nẹgba eḍeeriom mobho aru monyiin ōoy be, odi aKraist.

Ẹmu ạraḍeghe bhꞌạmi imōrō kua. Ẹnaan aghiran ịzo aguan moguan molo kookō. Onyiin ọonir nꞌaḍisibh ḍiōbh ạsia neetẹn keḍio aMozis ạge maraalōgh obho abhin aru. Araalōgh bhibha irue ḍio enwe mịzo bho nꞌoguan obho tẸnaan.
Ughōl Ẹnaan ạmara taraalōgh obho kụ nạnoghooy ghạ lịsebh obho, odi kụmara mụ toguan obhꞌodi. Ịmiin, odi Ẹnaan ạmara toguan obhꞌodi kodi ạnogho mEbrạhạm lịsebh.

Ụtuan eeghe kọlogh raalōgh obho? Ụḅaram raalōgh obho mi toguan obho molo arōoy kelōghōm mịkarabh nꞌiiḅi eḍighiom ạar, ninii ạteeny men obho ọony ọobhe bho tEbrạhạm obho aru bọ mẹmu oguan obho tatu. Itelema tẸnaan ibhin maraalōgh obho eruom mōoy olo ạrol kọokpaany moruom arōoy.
Keḍio oguan obho, Ẹnaan nịvo nịvo ạnogho mEbrạhạm. Ọokpaany ọrol io.

Ḅōrō ku, iibha bho neḍighi milo oghōl araalōgh obho nꞌoguan obho tẸnaan imōruōm io gạ? Eenyi. Ekua ḍio. Erumolo nọologh raalōgh obho mọnogho arōoy ghuḍum, pōoy kutue ni ạmara taghisigh tẸnaan kooḅi ōoy tebum eedi araalōgh obho.
Keḍio ẹegia bho nạakpete kua, moomo ẹmar-arōoy obho idi tịnyaam ịkarabh, molo obo bho imōruōm obho epin mẹnogho bho uguanaan bọ mobo bho tẹteeny mologhi omōruōm mi tạJizos Kraist obho.
Keḍio aKraist aru, araalōgh obho ịduom ezira karōoy ikoli ninii aru ạteeny men obho odi obo bho ezira umōruōm obho amute aru ạman.
Molo araalōgh obho iḅologh ezira ịbham ninii aru ạteeny men obho aKraist aru obho, nꞌolo ezira otu miiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan tebum iloghi omōruōm obhꞌezira.
Siibha bho ezira noomōruōm maKraist obho, araalōgh obho ịnyaam ilo mu tezira.
Ịḍua tebum ologhi omōruōm, koomo enyina obo bho itul mọnu nꞌạJizos Kraist obho eru mạnwuny tẸnaan.
Enyina neezua mụum etul mọnu nꞌaKraist molo enyina neebhin nꞌalōor enyina moḍum oḍigh aghuḍum obho tạJizos Kraist nịvo nịvo.
Molo akẹrẹkẹrẹ olo mu mi tarōoy aJu nꞌarōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho, tạrubana nꞌạnwuny ogbo eghun tạraani nꞌilobhir. Oomo enyina neeru monyiin tạJizos Kraist.
Erumolo enyina iru milo taKraist, penyina arōoy ọobhe tEbrạhạm. Enyina tepin ạni ni mibhꞌoguan obho tẸnaan.
Ạami nạkpete miibha bho mọloghom, ọony olo tale rutu mọde odi toomo iibha oomo ịga bho tọde odi iru milꞌodi obho ẹkona, topira ni oseeri zodi kẹbana suo odi dogbẹbh io mōoy obho.
Suo odi odi nini mọbumoony obho, ạrabobo odi tẹpamanaan mọkpo bho eseerian odi ninii odi tatu asi agbẹbh mōoy tamen obho ọde odi aghōl bọ molo kọnogho zodi mọkpo bho.
Ẹzo bho nạ zezira. Tamen obho ezira idi nini mịbam ạnwuny obho, ezira uḍigh rụbana ọnogho mịtughumiom ạnwuny,
keḍio, amen ạkar ogbo odi amen obho, aru ạteeny, pẸnaan arōm ạkar Ọony obhꞌodi aru. Odi aru kẹzo bho ạni-ebhōbh nạmar ghạ mọony obho; arughom raalōgh arōoy aJu obho
mọta obo bho idi tịto araalōgh obho, molo ezira koru mạnwuny tẸnaan.
Tẹzo olo oḍighi enyina kelōghōm mobho enyina iru mạnwuny odi, pẸnaan arōm mẸmugh Ọony obhꞌodi moḍigh tiloghi obhꞌezira, odi Ẹmugh obho naleghe ghạ bọ tezira, “Mạda, mạda” bho.
Tiibha bho bẹleni, enyina ạrubana mụ ḍio. Odi naaḍighi kōoy kōoy mọony odi olo odi tạnogho zodi moomo iibha odi naaseerian bọ mạnwuny odi obho.
Tamen olo neetẹn, enyina ilōghōm io mẸnaan, molo enyina iru mạrubana aruru ilo enyina ịgbaaniom mẸnaan.

Esiibha bho enyina neelōghōm mẸnaan — mạa-suo ạami kukōl kua, esiibha bho Ẹnaan naalōghōm enyina — ebum eeghe kenyina nẹva momina oghiraan tịtughumiom ạnwuny olo ịnyaam ilo mọbhel ōoy, ạsuo ẹko olo nạ? Eeghe amute kenyina digh emula moḍigh ạrubana ọnogho ịtughumiom bhibha?
Enyina neemina neekōoy ruḍuma nꞌạruvanyu nꞌaḍio nꞌạsumusia neegbiemi.
Ạami nꞌꞌạatu ni mobho oomo oḍighi obho ạami ukumuan enyina bho netu moru apa be.
Iiḅi aburumōr, ịtol kạmi kẹzo bho ạami naaru ụrol kenyina bho. Ịkarabh ilo enyina neeḍighi ạami olo.
Enyina nẹetua ni gạ mobho ịḍua tebum ẹzegh alōor obhꞌạmi kiḍighi mobho ạmi ụgba mooḅi adōm obho ụnogho enyina tọḅel egbiom obho?

Oomo ipa ẹkona, enyina ịkpete ḍio ạami ẹpue, bolobolo egin ạami mebum ẹzegh alōor obhꞌạmi, obho ạnogho enyina mogbōgh ọdegh oonon obho. Kpẹlen nꞌiibha, enyina ibhin ni ạami ẹloghom kẹzo bho enyina tepin nạ ni ẹloghom motelema tẸnaan obho. Enyina ibhin ạami ẹloghom kẹzo bho enyina tepin nạ ni mạJizos Kraist ẹloghom obho.
Ologhi enyina ạḅaal magey. Ẹkaraan imina emute? Ạami nịvo nịvo tatue ni ạgbaam enyina miibha bho. Enyina tetue ni bọ, kōl enyina kịtoghonya ni riḍien enyina ẹnogho ạami.
Keḍio, esiibha bho enyina nẹetuan mebum agey obho ạami ụgba ụnogho enyina bho nẹlogh ạami ḍien bẹle?
Arōoy ipedi obho ẹkar etuan enyina magey, keḍio tịitua bhꞌeedi iiḅi ilo. Oomo iibha eedi nẹva bho pilo ọgbarion enyina mi tạmi be, molo enyina etuan ạni zeedi kẹzo bho eedi ituan enyina bho.

Ạami ugin io molo ịnon arōoy nꞌạami kotuan enyina. Iiḅi molo ịkanya arōoy ketuan enyina erumolo eedi ịteeny miiḅi ịitua. Iibha bho eezuan magey moomo amen tamen olo ạami odi nꞌenyina, nꞌamen olo ạami olo nꞌenyina.
Iiḅi ạnwuny etulan ạmi, ạami kamula digh ạmiinom koniin olo odi nꞌiguneghun ninii ọmiin maghuḍum obho taKraist mi tenyina.
Ughōl ạami odi nꞌenyina siibha bọ, ẹzo kiḍigh tologhi ạami, molo ạami kunwe moghōrōkō ạmi mi tenyina. Ạami nạatu magey zenyina.
Ạami natu mopuruan enyina obo bho nẹva mookōoy araalōgh obho taMozis obho miipuruan obhobho: Enyina dẹmoghon ghạ ḍio mibha araalōgh obho nẹkpete bho bẹle?
Eedi nẹgba kua: mEbrạhạm ạteeny ịzal ạrunwuny, onyiin ẹbana-ạni ạmar, opedi obho ạni ogbo eghun otu ạmar.
Keḍio ịto ẹmara odi ọony ẹbana-ạni obho ịḍua tōoy keru. Ibha ọony ạni ogbo eghun otu obho ịḍua tịto oguan tẸnaan keru.
Iibha bho ụkpete ni nọgbaaniom mobho ịzal ạraani obho iru mịzal ịzo. AHegar ọḅel ạni obho ạmaraghi bọ mạrunwuny-ạrubana bho, pọḅel ịzo bho ughiran bọ tobꞌeegum obhꞌaSainai.
ASainai obꞌeegum obho odi bọ tArebia bho, paJerusạlẹm aadon, ẹma olo odi nꞌarōoy odi idi rụbana.
Keḍio aJerusạlẹm obho ạnyu obho pạni ogbo eghun obho. Odi poniin ezira.
Ạar obho aḍighi obho keeghe? Ẹegia bho nạakpete kua,
“Ạna ẹmar ạni obho, ḅạal mologhi,
ạna obo bho dọmiinom ghạ ḍio mẹegama iguneghun obho,
mulughu mimulughu ọḅaal ologhi,
ebum obho epin ạni obho tạmaraghi rụnwuny apu meebhinaan obho.”
Nonon ni; iiḅi aburumōr, enyina idi kẠizik ọony obho Ẹnaan aguanaan mEbrạhạm obho.
Tamen opopo, ọony obho ịḍua bọ tịto ōoy kiru kụmar obho abhirighan ni ạnogho mọmiinom zodi obo bho ụmar bọ mi tịnyaam Ẹmugh tẸnaan obho. Pẹzo idi nạ siibha.

Ẹegia bho kạkpete ẹko? Ạkpete kua, “Pirighan mẹbana-ạni obho nꞌọony obhꞌodi mamutiom. Ạar obho aḍighi obho keeghe? Ịgbaan io mọony ẹbana-ạni obho kạḅar mọony ạni ogbo eghun otu obho kale rutu mọkpo ọde bhꞌeedi.”
Siibha bho, ilōghōm kua, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, mobho ezira utu ḍio mạnwuny ẹbana ạni obho, ezira ạnwuny ạni ogbo eghun otu obho.
Oḍum aghuḍum ogbo eghun otu pibha ezira noḍum, keḍio aKraist nạabhel ezira atẹnẹmi. Ímina ghạ memōrō arōoy emulumi enyina moḍum aghuḍum ạrubana. Ịmara moḍum aghuḍum arōoy ogbo eghun.
Ịmoghonyan ạami. Ạami ạPol nạkpete miibha bho ạnogho enyina. Enyina emina ẹnogho lōor enyina moḍunaay, pidi kolo aKraist ạar oḍighiom togbo enyina olo mu.
Ạami kamina digh aakiom enyina mobho kōoy kōoy olo ạnogho lōor odi moḍuna podi tạmara ni mookōoy oomo araalōgh obho.
Enyina obo bho nẹkparam moru iiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan tebum ookōoy araalōgh obho, nẹegbaranuan maKraist. Enyina neegin minwo bho tẸnaan.

Ezōor nị dụgh, oḍuom ologhi ezōor odi tobho Ẹnaan taḍighi ezōor atẹnẹ miiḅi arōoy taghisigh odi. Iibha pibha ezōor ubhin noḅōrō tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho tẸnaan, obho naḍighi moḍighi tologhi omōruōm ezōor obho.
Tamen olo ezira nootul mọnu nꞌạJizos Kraist akẹrẹkẹrẹ olo mu tobo bho iḍunaay obho nꞌobo bho iḍuna ḍio bho. Oomo ibha nọva bho, pọteeny ologhi omōruōm olo nꞌetulan.
Enyina ịke magey. Okōr ōoy aru ạpuenaan enyina mọmoghonyan agey obho. Odi kabhironuman enyina ẹko?
Ẹnaan obo bho abheleghi enyina bho oḍighi ḍio miibha bho.
Kẹzo bho nọkpete ghạ bho, “Onyiin ọkarabh okōlōgh be, mobho nạpue ghạ mizagara eḍian.”

Toomo ipa ẹkona, ạami naḍuom ni enyina mologhi. Otul ọnu obhꞌezira mi tObạmọogh obho ạnogho ạami mọoghuanaan ologhi mobho enyina inweeghian io, nꞌobho odi obo bho nạaḅaghami miloghi enyina bho, kẹzo kẹzo olo odi ạrol, Ẹnaan tạliom ni zodi.

Iiḅi aburumōr, erumolo ạami nạgba mibha ịgbaan ni moḍunaay, eeghe aḍighi kụ nomina ọnogho ạami mọmiinom tebum adōm obho? Ughōl iibha bho agey bọ, kōl tịigbaay obhꞌạmi ibha igboloman nꞌoorẹeny ẹmigheri obho taKraist kụnogho mụ ạami mịiḅaghami.
Idi tịto ạami bọ, kōl eedi obo bho nẹeḅaghami miloghi enyina bho kiḍighi ni mibha eedi nẹva bho ẹghi taghisigh, eḍunaay ẹgbaranuan lōor eedi tạsiosi obho.

Enyina nị dụgh, iiḅi aburumōr, ubheleghi enyina mi tomuzōnaan, keḍio ímōrō ghạ omuzōnaan obhobho aru molo taḍighi enyina mọtuonom ibhꞌiikpōogh obho, molo enyina kẹgba kẹḍua. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ịḅelemaan netulan obhꞌenyina aḍighi molo onyiin kakumuan kạnogho monyiin.
Oomo araalōgh obho uukōbhōghi tonyiin olōgh obhobho, “Tulan kōoy kōoy olo atuan ạna kẹzo bho ạna utulan lōor onuma bho.”
Igona lōor enyina erumolo enyina nenomian eḅezuan kasighōghō, bolobolo penyina ọzian omuneen.
Iibha pibha ạami nạkpete bho, ịḅelemaan Ẹmugh obho areliom aghuḍum obhꞌenyina penyina iḍighi mu mibha iikpōogh obho nẹnyaghagh enyina moḍighi obho.

Ạar obho aḍighi obho keeghe? Ibha iikpōogh obho nẹva bho, Ẹmugh obho ogbẹel io, keḍio ibha Ẹmugh obho nạva bho, iikpōogh obho ogbẹel io. Ịzal eedi idi kọdele nꞌaghōogh. Tiibha bho, enyina irue ḍio eḍighi mibha enyina nẹva bọ moḍighi obho.
Erumolo Ẹmugh obho nateliom enyina, paraalōgh obho ịteeny mụ mịnyaam tenyina.
Oōy olo olōghōm io moḍighi iikpōogh alōor obho olo. Iibha eedi ọva ạraani nꞌole ẹma, oghiil ạregheer olo,
ookpulughu aruru, ọgher ạghuma, ọlokian ariḍien, ọruan ạruruan oḅeey aralebhir, ibōbhan, ọteeny ọkarabh ologhi, ọoku ạaku, ịgbaranuan, ọḍian ạruuku,

ọsebh ọseghiom, ọbhoghoḍiaay arimiim, orubhe ạruruan nꞌaralebhir, nꞌịnon ọkpo ilo idi kua. Ạami digh aakiom enyina kẹzo bho ạami nꞌꞌaakiom ghạ enyina bho, mobho kōoy kōoy olo naḍighi mọkpo bhibha otue ḍio aḍigh ạni tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan.
Ibha Ẹmugh obho, petulan nꞌọḅaal ologhi nꞌekima, nꞌalideny alōor, onwo inwo, oḍighi iiḅi obi oguan olo,
osōoriōm alōor, nꞌọmaar ọbhama alōor. Olōgh olo agin miibha bho olo.
Obo bho iru bọ milo tạJizos Kraist obho, iikpōogh alōor obhꞌeedi nꞌoomo ịkarabh eḍighiom ạar ibha nẹnyaghagh eedi obho, nọoḅaram nꞌạJizos ọkanam toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho okigh.
Ẹmugh obho nạanogho ezira ghuḍum; odi tạpam nạ ghuḍum obhꞌezira ateliom.
Ezira ụbughia ḍio lōor. Onyiin ọpa ḍio monyiin, onyiin obōbhan nạ ḍio monyiin.

Iiḅi aburumōr, erumolo onyiin ōoy naḍighi monyiin ịkarabh, enyina obo bho neḍum aghuḍum ạruumugh obho ebheleghi zodi talideny alōor ẹbham zodi emulumi. Igona lōor enyina molo enyina imeel ạni eḍigh tonyiin odi ọdegh oonon obho.
Onyiin ạḅar ịiḅaghami onyiin arōol, penyina ookō araalōgh obho taKraist.
Oōy olo aghōl modi ōoy keḍio ụva uunon odi ạar oḍighiom olo, odi naabiōghōm lōor odi be.
Kōoy kōoy aru mịiruan ạnogho meḍighiom ạar odi. Erumolo iru miiḅi, odi ọtuom io milo ọnon ōoy kabuom.
Ilōghōm mobho ōoy adōol adōol ọno tatōol.
Oōy obo bho nọtughumiom madōm taKraist obho ạḍian moomo iiḅi ọkpo bho odi nạateeny obho mobo bho nạtughumiom zodi obho.
Iíbiōghōm ghạ lōor enyina. Bọbon ōoy olo tatue aanon akiemi mẸnaan olo. Ibha ạna uḅẹbh obho, pibha ạna taḅu obho.
Oōy olo aḅẹbh miḅẹbh iikpōogh alōor obho, odi taḅu miiḅua ọbho. Obo bho aḅẹbh miḅẹbh ạruumugh obho, odi taḅu miiḅua aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, oḍighi iiḅi ịper io ezira. Erumolo ezira ụsar io otuḅeen, ikunughi obho, ezira toḅu ni miibha ezira uḅẹbh obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, kọbam kọbam amen olo ezira ụteeny, obhin oḍighiom ghạ miiḅi ọnogho kōoy kōoy, nꞌạkar obo bho iru bọ milꞌeghun otu ezira tobo bho imōruōm maKraist obho.
Ịmiin mẹzo ạami ubhin nꞌạvo ạmi nạgiom ibikpo moruom enyina.
Obo bho nẹva bọ momutiom ozu alōor eedi obhin eghuan obho, pobo nenyuughi enyina moḍunaay. Eedi ịtuan mebum olo ụnogho eedi mọmiinom tebum oorẹeny ẹmigheri obho taKraist.
Ạkar eedi obo bho iḍunaay obho iikō ḍio raalōgh obho. Eedi nẹva molo enyina keḍunaay molo eedi eetuma epin meghuan elẹgh mobho enyina neeḍigh nꞌeedi.

Ạami nị dụgh, ạami tabuom mọmiinom obho ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho ạmiinom toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho mebum ạami obho. Ịḍua tọmiinom oorẹeny ẹmigheri obhꞌodi kerumolo ẹmar-arōoy obho ịteeny io mạar oḍighiom ạami, ạami ẹkona ụteeny io mạar oḍighiom ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Akẹrẹkẹrẹ olo mi tobo bho odi muudu nꞌobo bho neeḍuna bho. Omoom aghuḍum obho tẸnaan pibha nogbẹel obho.
Ekima nꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien ẹrolan moomo arōoy tẸnaan obo bho neekō momoom olōgh obhobho bho.
Ạseghe dodon ạghi taghisigh, ōoy ọnogho mụ ạami mịiḅaghami, ebum obho ịgbananaan ibha alōor ạami neḍeeriom mobho ạami uru mẹbana tạJizos.
Inwo tạJizos Kraist, Obạmọogh ezira bho, ẹrolan nꞌoomo enyina, iiḅi aburumōr obhꞌạmi. Ẹrol ni nạ kua.
Ạami ạPol obo bho Ẹnaan ạto kạami uru moteledōm tạJizos Kraist obho, ụge mọbhereer obhobho natuom oomo arōoy tẸnaan ibha idi tẸfesos obho, obo bho neemōruōm ạni mạJizos Kraist obho.
Ẹnaan Ọde bhꞌezira nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹnogho nị enyina lịsebh nꞌekima!
Ạlisebh ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho, Ọde bhꞌodi, obo bho nạnogho ezira obo bho notul ọnu nꞌaKraist obho moomo oḍigh kẹrekere ạlisebh ạruumugh obho mi tạnyu obho.
Keḍio Ẹnaan aru ạlem mẹmar-arōoy obho, odi nạason ezira ạseghe moru ilꞌodi mi taKraist, molo ezira otu miiḅi arōoy ilo ọghor ạman ilo mi taghisigh odi.
Ẹnaan nạato mi tetulan obhꞌodi molo ezira koru nwụny odi mi tạJizos Kraist kẹzo ịto bhꞌologhi odi,
molo obuom aluunwo eghuan obhꞌodi obho odi ạtuan tebum Ọony oḍigh ologhi obhꞌodi naanwo ezira bho.
Ubhin tịḅaal tạJizos Kraist Ọony obhꞌodi ọtaam ezira, ọḅelemaan nạ ezira mịkarabh ezira mi tẹzo ẹela aluunwo ạlisebh obhꞌodi
ibha odi abhin naanwuom ezira bho.
Tolōghōm ạar obhꞌodi nꞌịitua ologhi obhꞌodi podi aḍighi amutiom ạnogho ezira molōghōm ọkpo ẹḅokia ibhꞌologhi odi, tẹzo bho odi ạatua ạto molo aKraist kaḍighi kamutiom obho,
molo tamen olo aruḍuma bho neegbẹbh odi aakōbhōghi kạar kạar ilo idi tade bho nꞌạnyu obho monyiin esi, aKraist kạda.
Uḍighi kạar kạar tẹzo ịitua ologhi obho tẸnaan, molo odi ạson ezōor ạseghe moru arōoy odi totul ọnu nꞌaKraist tebum ẹzo bho odi ạatua ạto nạ kọḅel egbiom obho.
Ẹnaan nạato molo ezōor obo bho ubhira noḍuom ologhi maKraist obho kobuom eghuan obhꞌodi.

Pẹzo idi nạ mi tenyina obo bho nẹemoghon mạkar agey adōm obho, ooḅi adōm obho abhin ịbhelegha aru obho. Amen obho enyina imōruōm maKraist obho pẸnaan ạnogho enyina mẸmugh Iigbia bho odi aguanaan obho, mọlogh enyina melẹkẹ mobho enyina iru marōoy odi.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho pobho Ẹnaan ạbhaghan mobho ezira topin ni mibha odi aguanaan rōoy odi obho, nꞌobho odi tạkar nị ạta ạseghe mobo bho iru bọ milꞌodi obho, mobuom eghuan obhꞌodi.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, kamen obho ạami ụmoghon mọdu ologhi omōruōm enyina mi tạJizos Obạmọogh obho nꞌetulan obhꞌenyina mi toomo arōoy obho tẸnaan,
ạami dọḅele ḍio nọḅele mọotua ghạ enyina mi tiikpulughu ạmi ọnogho ạlisebh mẸnaan,

nꞌogbẹel odi Ẹnaan obho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho, Ọde eghuan obho, mọnogho enyina mẸmugh Iigbia bho, obho tạkparion riḍien enyina ạgba mẸnaan amutiom ạnogho enyina molo enyina elōghōm odi obho.

Ạami naakpulughu ghạ nạ molo iloghi enyina ẹkparanu mọmiin ẹḅaal obhꞌodi molo enyina elōghōm moḍigh oḍuom ologhi obho odi abheleghi enyina mọteeny obho, nꞌẹzo ạlisebh ibꞌaruugu obho odi aguanaan rōoy odi obho ịla mạar isi,
nꞌẹzo ịnyaam oḍighi odi ịbugh isi tezira obo bho umōruōm odi obho. Ịnyaam bhibha todi ibha idi tezira bho, onyiin eedi ịnyaam
obho odi abhin aḅẹtōnōm maKraist mi tọbho bho, aḍighi nạ odi ạghi ạrol delede mi toḍiom ạvo odi mi tạnyu obho.
AKraist nạda moomo ạruula nꞌịto mịto, nꞌarōoy ịnyaam, nꞌaruvẹmụ arōoy ibha ạruumugh obho, apu nạ kaḍien kaḍien olo tokōl tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho nꞌobho natu obho.
Ẹnaan naaḍighi odi aḅeleriom sike kạar kạar, odi atu nạ mọola oomo ẹmorokpo ạnogho mạsosi obho
aru bọ malōor odi obho, obho aḍighi odi agbẹbhẹghiōm obho, odi obo bho naḍighi kạar kạar agbẹbhẹghiōm obho.
Tamen olo naatẹn enyina ịbhozu nị tạruumugh obho ebum obho enyina ịteeny io moghiilaan nꞌebum ịkarabh obhꞌenyina bho.
Tamen opopo enyina ịtuonom ghạ mịkarabh araabōom ẹmar-arōoy obhobho, ẹtuonom ghạ nạ raalōgh ọola ạruumugh obho ạda bọ mookugh obho, ẹmugh obho nateliom bọ siibha marōoy obho ikiilaan io mẸnaan obho.

Oomo ezira ụrologhu ghạ keedi, ọtuugh ọrologhu ghạ tibha iikpōogh alōor obhꞌezira negbẹel obho, ọtuugh ghạ nạ oḍighi mibha idi tiloghi ezira nꞌịitua ẹmu ezira nꞌibha alōor ezira negbẹel obho, molo ịkar nị ịgbaan molo ezira kọmiinom ạni kịnon arōoy mi tạlile bho tẸnaan.
Keḍio Ẹnaan, obho agbo magey mẹela ọsu ạghusan aḍien obho, abhin toomo etulan obho odi atulan ezira bho,
ạaveghi amulumi ezira taghuḍum nꞌaKraist mi tạkar amen olo ezira nọobho tebum oḍighi ịkarabh ezira. Tebum ọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan kọbhel enyina.
Tebum otul ọnu ezira nꞌạJizos Kraist podi aḅẹriōn ezira mọda nꞌodi mi tạnyu obho,
molo odi aḍighi amutiom ạnogho mọoke atẹn mọoke mobꞌẹela ọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi mi toḍighi iiḅi obho odi naḍighi ạnogho ezira mi tạJizos Kraist obho.
Ẹnaan abhin tọsu ạghusan aḍien aluunwo bhꞌodi kạbhelom enyina mi tologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina. Enyina kiḍighi ḍio, idi tẹnogho aluunwo tẸnaan.
Ilo nạ tebum ịnyaam oḍighi ạravo enyina, molo onyiin enyina opin aatumuom.
Ẹnaan obo ạlem ezira, molo, totul ọnu obhꞌezira nꞌạJizos Kraist, odi nạanogho ezira momoom aghuḍum oḍighi iiḅi ibha odi naakōbhōghi aseerian ezira moḍighi obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, enyina arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho ịitua mẹzo enyina ịrol tamen olo neetẹn, enyina obo bho arōoy aJu ibha neeḍunaay tozu alōor obho nekōl ghạ marōoy ilo idi muudu obho.

Tamen opopo enyina arōoy ilo ịgbaranuan nị nꞌaKraist. Enyina iru misoloman ilo iḍigh ạni ḍio nꞌarōoy obho Ẹnaan ạson ạseghe bho. Enyina iḍighom ạni ḍio tịzo oguan obho Ẹnaan aguanaan rōoy odi obho. Taghuḍum enyina mi tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho ạar olo enyina iseeriom ologhi olo, Ẹnaan ẹko olo nạ nolo taghuḍum enyina.
Keḍio esiibha, tebum otul ọnu obhꞌenyina nꞌạJizos Kraist enyina obo bho igbeenyan ni tamen olo naatẹn obho, noobhin tịḅaal obho taKraist notueni enyina mẸnaan.
AKraist naaḍighi arōoy aJu obho nꞌibha ịnon aruubhugh obho etu monyiin, ạnogho ezira mekima, ạveleghi nạ apiẹmi moghōony ọkuan ọlokian ariḍien obhꞌeedi.
Odi abhin tiikpōogh alōor obhꞌodi abhiẹmi raalōgh arōoy aJu obho nꞌoomo ịto araalōgh obho mobhin tịzal oḍigh aruubhugh arōoy obho oḍighi onyiin be, ọnogho eedi mekima.
Tọbho bhꞌodi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho podi ạseghe mọlokian ariḍien obho atulughi mịzal ẹde aruubhugh obho moru onyiin be mi tiikpōogh obho omulumi eedi ọnogho Ẹnaan.
Iibha kiḍighi kaKraist aru ạgba mooḅi adōm ekima bho ạnogho kōoy kōoy, tenyina ibha ịnon aruubhugh obo bho igbeenyan mẸnaan obho, nꞌarōoy aJu obo bho ituan odi obho.
Ịḍua taKraist keḍighi molo oomo ezira, arōoy aJu nꞌibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho orue ọghi nookōbhōghian tonyiin Ẹmugh obho mi taghisigh Ọde bho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, enyina arōoy ibha ịnon aruubhugh obho isoloman mu ḍio, enyina ạnwuny ogbo eghun nꞌarōoy tẸnaan, nꞌarōoy onyiin eghun otu obho tẸnaan.
Enyina otu olo uḅōgh tạnyu otu ịtughumiom iteledōm obho nꞌarizil obho. ẠJizos Kraist nịvo nịvo pạkpo otu obho.
Odi pobo ạbham otu obho ạmarami napōbhẹ ạki taghisigh mọnu otu iikpulughu iigbia mọnogho Obạmọogh obho.
Totul ọnu obhꞌenyina nꞌodi noḅōghōm ạni enyina nꞌezōor motu tẸnaan olo Ẹmugh Iigbia bhꞌodi karugh.
Tebum iibha bho kạami ạPol ōoy ikoli obho tạJizos Kraist mebum enyina obo bho iru milꞌịnon aruubhugh obho naakpulughu ghạ ạnogho mẸnaan.
Ạami nạatua enyina nẹekar ẹmoghon mobho Ẹnaan abhin tọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi, nạalogh tạvo ạmi moḍighian enyina moḍighi obhobho.
Ẹnaan aḍighi amutiom agananaan ạnogho ạami mịitua ẹḅokia ologhi obhꞌodi kẹzo bho ạami nạage ghạ ụgba meekpōogh obho.
Enyina eghōl mibha ạami ụge bho penyina ọtuugha ọmoghonyan ọkpo ẹḅokia bho taKraist.
Tamen olo neetẹn ụgba ḍio mọkpo ẹḅokia bhobho ọnogho rōoy, keḍio esiibha Ẹnaan naabhin tẸmugh Iigbia bhꞌodi ạgba amutiom ạnogho miiḅi iteledōm nꞌarizil obhꞌodi.

Odi ịitua ẹḅokia bhꞌodi pọgba omutiom mi tooḅi adōm obho mobho arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho teḍigh ạni nị nꞌarōoy aJu obho epin lịsebh bhꞌodi. Eedi arōoy onyiin iikpōogh alōor obho, molo eedi nepin ạni bin mi toguan obho Ẹnaan aguan aḍighi abhulughi mi tạJizos Kraist obho.
Taluunwo ẹnogho tẸnaan mobho odi abhin abheleghi ạami ạnogho mịnyaam odi moḍighi oḍighi ooḅi adōm obhobho.

Ạami usōoriōm apu mobo bho akio bọ apu mi toomo arōoy tẸnaan obho, keḍio oomo ipa ẹkona, odi ạlogh ni ạami meghuan mobhin ooḅi adōm ẹela taKraist obho ikunughi olo bho oruom arōoy ibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho,
moḍighi kōoy kōoy kạmiin mịitua ẹḅokia tẸnaan ibha ụḅoki kageedi mi todi obo bho ạlem kạar kạar obho,
molo esiibha bho, ẹḍua tarōoy ạsosi obho eḍighi molo ạruula arōoy ịnyaam ạnyu obho elōghōm moḍigh kẹrekere ẹzo olōghōm ạar obho tẸnaan.
Ẹnaan abhin tịitua bhꞌodi ikunughi olo bho ạtooghi miibha bho aḍighi amutiom magey obho mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Totul ọnu obhꞌezira nꞌodi, nꞌologhi omōruōm obhꞌezira mi todi pesi ezira ụteeny mebōom ọḅol ọghi ọmara ạni taghisigh tẸnaan nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi.
Ạami naasen ni enyina tebum iibha bho, ịítu ghạ tebum ọmiinom obhꞌạmi, ibha iru bọ meghuan enyina bho.
Tebum eedi iibha bho, pạami ugbuluman uukpulughu mỌde obho,
obo bho keghun otu keghun otu mi tạnyu obho nꞌade bho nepin riḍien eedi obho,
ugbẹel odi mọseghe tẹela eghuan obhꞌodi, obhin Ẹmugh Iigbia bhꞌodi ọnogho enyina mịnyaam mọghuemi iloghi obhꞌenyina

nꞌolo aKraist karu kakima tiloghi obhꞌenyina mi tologhi omōruōm. Ạami naakpulughu ghạ nạ molo Ẹnaan ạnogho enyina metulan, enyina ẹmaar ẹmara ẹkua koorẹeny olo ạteeny iiḅi ịgha, nꞌotu, olo uḅōgh ụghuemi magey
nꞌolo enyina nꞌoomo arōoy tẸnaan ẹteeny mịnyaam ẹmoghonyan ẹreghe nꞌạlidoony nꞌẹsiiniom ạnyu nꞌekuḍum etulan obho taKraist,
nꞌolōghōm odi etulan obho taKraist obho bọbon amen olo nọkar ghạ kua olōghōm ọman olo bho, molo oomo iiḅi eḍighiom ạar obho tẸnaan egbẹbh ni ẹman tenyina.
Esiibha, todi obo bho, tẹzo ịnyaam oḍighi obho odi naḍighi tezira bho, tatue ni aḍighi ạnogho ezira apuoghom tibha ezira ugbẹel obho bolobolo tibha ezira nọotua bho,
eghuan ẹrol ẹnogho zodi mi tạsosi obho, ạḍua tọoke asi tọoke, mi taḍien tạJizos Kraist kamen kamen. Ẹrol ni nạ kua.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạami obo bho odi mikoli tebum obho ạami nakumuan mObạmọogh obho, naasen ni enyina moḍum aghuḍum ilo teezuan ni tibha Ẹnaan abheleghi enyina bho.
Iḍum aghuḍum osōoriōm alōor nꞌọkparaghiom nꞌalideny alōor, mebhin tetulan onyiin ạghurughiom ịkarabh onyiin.
Ịkparam mẹbham magey motul ọnu obho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạghoroghi ạkpo enyina mi tekima bho.
Onyiin alōor nꞌonyiin Ẹmugh be mobho idi, kẹzo bho Ẹnaan abheleghi enyina tonyiin oḍuom ologhi be bho.
Onyiin Obạmọogh nꞌonyiin ologhi omōruōm nꞌonyiin ozua ạmuum be mobho idi,
nꞌonyiin Ẹnaan nꞌỌde oomo arōoy, Obạmọogh kạar kạar obho. Odi odi moḍighi toomo ẹmorokpo, olo odi nạ toomo ọkpo.
Oomo ezira, ōoy oḍigh oḍigh ẹnogho mobho Ẹnaan ạnogho ezira tẹzo ạmaḍi obho aKraist nạḍi ạnoghooy obho,
kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
“Amen obho odi ạsiin bọ tobꞌạnyu obho,
podi aakōbhōghi mọlogh ạrubana ạsiinom,
aanwo rōoy mẹnogho.”
Ẹmu obho ughōl bọ mọ “odi ạsiin tạnyu obho” keeghe? Nẹgba mobho odi abhira asōor tade bho, tạkar obꞌekuḍum ẹeḍiani ade bho.
Odi obo bho asōor tade bho pobo bho ạsiin tạnyu obho, tạnyu obho ạsiiniom bọ apu obho molo odi ạtol kesi kesi mi toomo ạnyu bho nꞌade pho.
Ẹnogho arōoy obho, odi ạnoghooy molo ẹde keru miteledōm, ịnon keru rizil, imina ẹde keru mịgba dōm obho, imina ịnon keru mạrapasto nꞌobo ịtughumiom.
Uḍighi kua mookōbhōghia oomo arōoy tẸnaan moḍighi oḍighi ạsosi obho onyiin kạlogh ạvo kạnogho monyiin, mọneghemi ọman alōor obho taKraist,
ninii oomo ezira otu otul mọnu mi tologhi omōruōm nꞌolōghōm ạar ezira mi tỌony obho tẸnaan, opōbh ogbẹbhẹghu rōoy ooleeny ạni maKraist,
molo ezira uḍum mụ ghuḍum ạnwuny, olo apōkō ạmuum akpōgh naḅōrōghōm, ọpibha iben ịtughumiom arōoy obo bho ibhin iipelekia eedi ịloghom rōoy tịkarabh araabōom obho ọpibhoghom ezira.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, obhin tologhi etulan ọgba ghạ magey obho molo ezira opōbh ọteenyom maKraist obho aru bọ mogbogbo ẹmu obho.

Odi pobo ạbham ạghoroghi moomo alōor obho monyiin esi. Oomo iitula alōor obho ụbham ụghoroghi ụkpo monyiin esi mi todi, molo, onyiin ọpaḍi alōor esuo naḍighi moḍighi odi magey, poomo alōor obho ọrol tetulan obhōbh oḍiku.
Gụa siibha bho, ạami ubhin taḍien tObạmọogh obho nạkpete ạkpaariom miibha bho, ímina ghạ meḍum aghuḍum arōoy aruru obho, obo bho ịitua eedi ạar oḍighiom olo bho,
nꞌiloghi obhꞌeedi ọkinim naasōorōm obho. Ạar olo eedi ịteeny moḍighiom aghuḍum obho Ẹnaan nạnoghooy rōoy obho olo, ebum obho bọbon ạar olo eedi ilōghōm olo bho nꞌebum ọḅaar ẹmu obhꞌeedi.
Ạregheer ẹko isibh mụ nạ zeedi. Eedi neeḅoolaan silōor eedi mọkpo ẹebhuom ẹmar-arōoy obho, neḍighiiy moḍigh kẹrekere ilo aḅeri obho ọva ḍio mọmoghon, keḍio alōor obhꞌeedi oozighina ḍio.
Iibha pibha enyina ịtuugha taKraist obho ḍio.
Enyina nẹekar ẹmoghon milo igboloman nꞌodi. Ẹzo bho enyina iru rōoy ilo nẹtuonom odi obho, nọotughumion enyina magey obho idi tạJizos obho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịizeghi meḍi mugbaany eḍighiom ạar obhꞌenyina, obho enyina iḍighi ghạ men olo neetẹn obho, odi ugbaany eḍighiom ạar obhꞌenyina obho naabiōghōm ạloghom apiẹmi enyina mi tọkpo ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho, enyina iḍighi ghạ bho.
Inweeghian mẹman mi tịitua nꞌologhi obhꞌenyina,
meḍiiron emulumi meḍighiom ạar obho ụlem ụgbaaniom meḍighiom ạar tẸnaan obho, ibha neḍighi emutiom magey aghuḍum obho anyen nini ạman, ịkarabh ẹko ilo bho.
Ọgba iben ịtol mụ siibha bho. Kōoy kōoy ạgba ghạ magey obho ạnogho mobo bho atuan odi obho, ebum obho oomo ezira uru moḍigh kẹrekere ariisi alōor taKraist obho.
Ọle, nọle ghạ ni, keḍio umōrō ghạ ạlile onuma ebhin ạna ẹloghom tesi ịkarabh. Ibha ạna nạle bho ịtol io tekpom onuma ninii aghōzōgh obho asōor.
Ụnogho ghạ bọbon onyiin eepōogh meru obho.
Oōy olo naḅomi rutu ạḅele viigh obho aḍighi moḍighi molo odi ale mikpoki oḍighi ilo iizuan odi mobhin, nꞌolo odi atue ạlogh ạni mạvo ạnogho ruvekulom obho.

Ọnuekpete enyina ọsu ḍio nyạn rutu. Ịkpete ghạ mọnuekpete ilo tẹlogh ni mạvo ẹnogho mịnon, ilo tẹnogho ni eedi mibha eedi nẹva bho, epōbhẹ nạ zeedi, molo ibha ọnu obhꞌenyina eḍighi miiḅi ẹnogho mobo bho ịmoghon obho.
Íḍighi ghạ molo ologhi Ẹmugh Iigbia bho tẸnaan kaḅẹebh. Odi pelẹkẹ obho Ẹnaan ạnogho enyina mobho enyina iru milꞌodi nꞌobho odi tạta ni enyina mi tobꞌaḍuma bho.
Ịḅughe tọtu moomo ologhi ạghuma, nꞌạlile, nꞌọkarabh ologhi, nꞌitōnyōghan nꞌaḅẹebh ologhi.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, iḍighi ghạ miiḅi, onyiin ạsuanaan ghụsan aḍien monyiin, onyiin ạḅelemaan mịkarabh onyiin kẹzo bho Ẹnaan ạḅelemaan enyina mi taKraist obho.
Ịtuonom rạaḅa asike tẸnaan kạnwuny oḍigh ologhi odi.
Itele taraabōom aghuḍum etulan, kẹzo bho aKraist atulan ezira, ạnogho ghuḍum odi ạbho mebum ezira bho. Ọbho bhobho todi idi kọtun ạar ooḅi eḍu olo aḍigh magey tologhi tẸnaan.
Ụmoghon io nọmoghon teesoḍia enyina karōoy tẸnaan, milo igboloman nꞌọva ạraani nꞌilobhir, nꞌọkpo ilo ịneghe ḍio mọmoghon, nꞌẹḍogh okpoki.
Ịgbaan nạ ḍio molo kọmoghon mi tenyina mọnuekpete aḅẹebh ọmiin, nꞌọnuekpete araama. Ịíḅaghami ghạ nạ miiḅi ọnuekpete. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ịsebh ghạ mẸnaan be.

Ilōghōm kua mobho bọbon ọva rạani nꞌilobhir, nꞌōoy olo naḍighiiy mọkpo ilo ịneghe ḍio, nꞌọḍogh mẹḍogh okpoki, (obho aru monyiin oḍigh iikpulughu aruru obho,) olo tapin ạni bin mi tAde-Ọolema bho taKraist nꞌẸnaan olo.
Ímōrō ghạ onyiin ōoy abhin ọnuekpete araama aabiōghōm enyina. Ạkar ebum eedi iibha bho kạlile tẸnaan tatu apuom mobo bho ikiilaan io zodi obho.
Arōoy ilo idi kua, ítuan ghạ.
Tamen olo naatẹn enyina irele ghạ tọkinim, keḍio esiibha enyina neeru marōoy tObạmọogh obho netele tẹḅaal.
Ẹḅaal obho pobo nagbo ghạ mẹela iiḅua oḍigh kẹrekere oḍighi iiḅi, nꞌọkpo ilo ịneghe, nꞌagey obho.
Ịkparam mẹtuugha mibha teḍigh tologhi tObạmọogh obho.
Ị́logh ghạ rạvo enyina mi teḍighiom ạar arōoy ilo idi tọkinim, ilo ạsuo ilo, kpẹlen nꞌipa, ize memutiom zeedi tẹḅaal obho.
Ạregheer ịkar idi magey mobhin ọnu ọgbaam ibha eedi neḍighi tẹḅokia bho.
Kamen kamen olo ẹḅaal asōorōm mạar, pọmiin ọman. Kạar kạar olo nọomiin ụman, odi odi tẹḅaal obho.
Kạar kạar olo naamute ạman nooḍighi otẹnẹ mẹḅaal obho pạar obho aḍighi bọ kụkpete miibha bho,
“Okoḍi rạla, suma; ḅetunu tọbho bho,
paKraist ọnogho onuma mẹḅaal.”
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịmaar eenon ghạ ku merele. Itele kilōghōm mạar arōoy, irele ghạ karaama.
Kọbam kọbam amen olo enyina ịteeny, ipin eḍighiom iiḅi ọkpo, aruḍuma bhibha ịkarabh.
Tebum iibha bẹleni ítẹnẹghu ghạ raama arōoy siibha bho, ilōghōm mibha Obạmọogh obho nạva molo enyina keḍighi obho.
Ịbhoghoḍia ghạ rimiim eghigh enyina. Iibha bho nẹpue ghuḍum be. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ịḅele Ẹmugh Iigbia bho aru amuza agbẹbh talōor enyina.
Ipin ibha ọnuekpete ạsoor taDevid nꞌibha ịbhereer ạsoor ạsosi obho nꞌạsoor iigbia bho, onyiin ạḍeghiom rạḍeghe ạnogho monyiin, mebhin nạ mẹmoorom sọor mebuom Obạmọogh obho mi tiloghi enyina.
Ịnogho ghạ lịsebh mẸnaan Ọde bho moomo amen mi toomo ẹmorokpo ilo imute mi taḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Onyiin aghiilaan monyiin tebum eegu aḍien obho enyina nẹnogho maKraist obho.
Enyina ạraani obho, ikiilaan burulom enyina kẹzo bho enyina nekiilaan mObạmọogh obho.
Olom obho pẹmu ạni obho kẹzo bho aKraist aru mẹmu ạsosi obho, aru nạ mỌpela odi, obho aru bọ lōor odi nạ bho.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, ạraani eghiilaan burulom eedi toomo kạar kạar kẹzo bho ạsosi obho nạnogho moghiilaan maKraist obho.
Aburulom, itulan rạani enyina kẹzo bho aKraist atulan mạsosi obho ạnogho ghuḍum odi zodi obho.
Odi aḍighi miibha bho, abhin toghōrōkō ọnuekpete bhꞌodi aḍighi ạḅaaleni mạsosi obho momulumi ọnogho Ẹnaan tamen olo odi naabhin mụum aatōlōm odi ạḅaaleni,
momulumi ạsosi obho talōor odi, mi toomo ẹneghe bhꞌodi tilo ịkarabh ilo nolo, ịghor ạman ẹko ilo nạ, nꞌạdoti bolobolo ạlukpo nꞌịnon ịkarabh ọkpo ịpue ḍio nọpue mẹneghe bhꞌodi.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, pẹzo aburulom kitulan rạani eedi kẹzo bho eedi itulan lōor eedi obho. Odi obo bho atulan mạni odi obho atulan nạ lōor odi.
Bọbon ōoy olo ạlogh ḍien malōor odi olo. Odi nạmaar ghạ ni aakō, ạmaar aseeri ạḅaaleni kẹzo bho aKraist naḍighi mạsosi obho,
ebum obho ezira uru moḍigh kẹrekere ariisi alōor odi obho.
“Tebum iibha bẹleni, kōoy kōoy tạḅele nị mọde nꞌoniin odi,
ạki atul mạni odi, ịzal eedi etu monyiin.”
Ẹkpar magey mọmoghonyan ọkpo ilo ụḅoki tọnuekpete bhobho, keḍio ạami nạatua, ụkpete ugboloman maKraist nꞌạsosi obho.
Egboloman nạ kōoy kōoy. Kolom kolom ạmaar atulan mạni odi kẹzo bho odi atulan lōor odi obho. Kạni kạni ạmaar ạnogho moghiilaan molom odi.
Ạnwuny, oobho oḍighi enyina mi taKraist, ọmoghonyan ọnu ọde nꞌoniin enyina. Iibha bho ịkar kua ẹneghe magey moḍighi.
“Ikiilaan mọnu ọde nꞌoniin enyina” pọḅel olōgh olo ụḅaram nꞌoguan,
olo ạkpete kua, “molo ẹneghe ẹnogho ạna, aruḍuma onuma ẹdoony mi tade bho.”
Enyina ạburude nꞌaburuniin obho, íḍighi ghạ mạar olo iloghi ạnwuny enyina keḅẹebh. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ipin tạliliom nꞌịtughumiom taKraist merughom eedi.
Kẹbana kẹbana aghiilaan mọnu ọde-otu odi taruugu nꞌeegu aḍien. Ipin nꞌoomo ologhi enyina ku meḍighiom kilo enyina neḍighi moḍighi obho nẹnogho maKraist.
Íḍighi ghạ miibha bho tamen olo eedi neenon enyina molo enyina kebhin lịsebh tạvo eedi. Ipin ghạ nꞌoomo ologhi enyina meḍighi mibha Ẹnaan nạva bho, kạrubana taKraist.
Ipin nꞌọḅaal ologhi meḍighiom oḍighi enyina kilo enyina iḍighi ḍio ẹnogho rōoy, neḍighi ẹnogho mObạmọogh obho.
Ilōghōm kua mobho Obạmọogh obho tạkpe nị amulumian kōoy kōoy mi tooḅi oḍighi obho odi aḍighi obho, iru kạar olo odi aru mẹbana bolobolo ọony ogbo eghun ẹkona.
Enyina ạburude otu obho ẹkona, itughom nạ zeedi monyiin ẹzo bho. Ímeeḍi ghạ zeedi. Ilōghōm kua meghōl eedi nꞌenyina ilo onyiin ọde-otu obho mi tạnyu obho, olo natughom kōoy kōoy monyiin ẹzo bho.
Tilo ọkpete okunughiom, ịkua magey mi tObạmọogh obho mi toomo ibꞌịnyaam obhꞌodi.
Ịnyaa talōor enyina moomo ọkpo ẹgham obho tẸnaan, molo enyina etue ẹmaranuan mịkarabh iipelekia eru obho.
Ezira ụmaranuan io moḅe arōoy, nọmaranuan moḅe ịkarabh ịnyaam arōoy ạruumugh mi tạnyu obho, nꞌạruula nꞌobo ịto nꞌobo bho ịteeny mịnyaam mi tọoke bhobho idi tọkinim obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịnyaa moomo ọkpo ẹgham obho tẸnaan, molo amen ịkarabh aruḍuma bho tetu enyina tetue ni ẹmaranuan mikpo ẹgham obo ọlogh aḍien obho, molo tikunughi obho enyina tẹmara nị.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, pịmaar ẹmara mebhin ọnuekpete agey obho mẹkpuom ukpe enyina, mebhin oḍighi iiḅi mi taghisigh tẸnaan mepuom eeku enyina,
mẹlokia marubudu ọgba ooḅi adōm ekima bho.
Tilo ipuom suo, ịpam ghạ moomo amen mọdaam ẹgham obho, obho aru mologhi omōruōm obho, obho enyina tetue ni epin eḍimiom mimōmōgh ịna Ọkarabh Oōy obho nạtaḅal obho.
Ịseghe meghōony ẹgham obho aru mịbhelegha bho mezua, mekōbh elōor ẹgham obho aru mọnuekpete bho tẸnaan obho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạnogho enyina bho mẹbham.
Iikpulughu ghạ moomo amen molo Ẹnaan kạlogh ạvo kạnogho enyina tibha Ẹmugh Iigbia bho natōmōghiōm enyina bho. Iikpulughu ghạ nạ moomo amen mẹnogho moomo arōoy tẸnaan.
Iikpulughu ghạ nạ mẹnogho ạami molo Ẹnaan ạnogho ạami dōm ọgba tamen olo ạami nạamara mọgba, molo ạami ukiil io ruugu mọgba omutiom ọkpo ẹḅokia ooḅi adōm obho,

obho ụtuan bọ kụto zạmi useeri tesi taKraist obho, toomo ibha ạami odi nạ siibha tikoli obho ẹkona. Tebum iibha bẹleni, iikpulughu ghạ molo aruugu isibh io ạami mọgba ghạ tibha iizuan ạami moḍighi obho.
ẠTikikos ooḅi umōr ezira obho naḍighi magey moḍighi tObạmọogh obho, tạgba nị ạnogho enyina kạar kạar ilo igboloman nꞌạami molo enyina elōghōm mẹzo ạami odi.
Iibha kiḍighi kạami natōm odi atuom enyina mọgba ọnogho enyina mẹzo oomo ezōor idi, mọghuemi iloghi enyina.
Ẹnaan Ọde bho nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹnogho nị moomo aburumōr obho mekima nꞌetulan nꞌologhi omōruōm.
Aluunwo ạlisebh tẸnaan ẹrolan oomo obo bho itulan mạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho nꞌetulan olo opẹ ḍio bho.

Ạami ạPol nꞌaTimoti ạrubana bho tạJizos Kraist nọge mọbhereer obhobho notuom enyina arōoy ibha netugh taFilipai, ibha itul ọnu nꞌạJizos Kraist obho, nꞌaruvẹmụ nꞌobo bho ụson useeri mọlogh ạvo ọpam ạsosi obho.
Ẹnaan Ọde bhꞌezira nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹnogho ni enyina lịsebh nꞌekima.
Ạami nạsebh ghạ ni mẸnaan ạmi magey kamen kamen olo ạami ụutua enyina.
Nꞌọḅaal ologhi mobho ạami ubhin naakpulughu ghạ mẸnaan ạnogho enyina,
tebum ẹzo bho enyina ibhin ịlogh ạvo ịnogho ạami mi toḍighi ọgba ooḅi adōm obho, kọḅel aḍuma bho ezira ulōghōmuan obho ninii kaadon.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạami nạakar alōghōm mobho Ẹnaan obo bho ạke moḍighi obhobho mi tenyina bho taḍighi ni nạ mẹzo bho ninii asi tikunughi aḍuma bho ạJizos Kraist tamula bọ atu obho.

Ạami nạatua ghạ kua zenyina tebum oḍigh ologhi obho enyina iḍigh tologhi ạmi obho, nꞌebum obho oomo enyina nꞌạami nopin bin aluunwo ạlisebh obho Ẹnaan nạanogho ezira bho, tạkar amen obhobho ạami odi tikoli obho, nꞌamen olo ubhin ạami ụmarami mọnogho ịigbaay ạmi mọgba omutiom ạkar agey oghōrōkō ooḅi adōm bho.
Ạami nạgba magey ạnogho enyina, Ẹnaan be kalōghōm mobho oḍighi ologhi obho oomo enyina iḍigh tologhi ạmi obho ịḍua tetulan obho tạJizos Kraist kiru.
Tiikpulughu ạmi, ạami naakpulughu ghạ mẸnaan molo etulan obhꞌenyina apōbh ạki taghisigh magey, nꞌolo enyina kẹteeny molōghōm ạar olōghōm ịkarabh nꞌiiḅi,
molo enyina elōghōm, ẹson ẹseghe mibha ịneghe bọ ipu obho, molo enyina emuzaan tịkarabh, ẹmara ẹpam makẹel mi taghisigh tẸnaan mi taḍuma bho aKraist tamula atu obho.
Tiibha bho, peḍighiom ạar enyina oru ọmaar ọneghe ogbẹbh ọman mi toḍigh aghuḍum obho itẹn mạJizos Kraist ọnon olo tatue ạnogho olo bho, mọnogho Ẹnaan meghuan obuom odi.
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey mọgba ọnogho enyina mobho ọkpo bho nemutenaan ạami obho nẹekar nẹpel magey mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho ẹkiom taghisigh.
Iibha bho neeḍighi molo oomo obo iḅōrō otu ọolema bho nꞌoomo arōoy ipedi obho neeru ilōghōm mobho ạami odi mikoli obho mi tebum aKraist.
Tebum obho ạami odi nạ mikoli obho, iloghi ọlogh aburumōr obho ẹkona nẹeghua nạ magey mi tObạmọogh obho, molo bọbon aruugu ilo idi teedi mobhin ọgbaam ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan ilo nolo.
Toomo ipa ẹkona, kir ẹde arōoy ilo ibhin mibōbhan nꞌologhi ạruruan kụ nẹgbaam dōm obho igboloman nꞌaKraist obho, keḍio kir ẹde ilo ibhin moomo ologhi eedi kụ nẹgbaam.
Iibha bho ibhin tologhi etulan nẹgbaam, tebum obho eedi neelōghōm mobho Ẹnaan abhin ạami aru suo mọmaranuan arōoy ọgba ooḅi adōm obho omutiom.
Arōoy ipedi obho ibhinom io mooḅi ologhi kụ nẹgba milo igboloman nꞌaKraist. Eedi nẹva mẹzo olo opu ạmi, keḍio nẹetua mobho eedi eḍighi kua peedi ọnogho ạmi mịkanya ọmiinom suo ạami odi tikoli obho.

Ọkpe olo. Ughōl nạ ẹko eedi ibhin nꞌooḅi ologhi bolobolo ọkarabh ologhi kụ nẹgbaam ẹkona, ologhi ạmi nạḅaal ni, ebum obho, kẹzo kẹzo ilo ịrol, eedi nẹgba milo igboloman nꞌaKraist obho. Ọkpe olo, ologhi ạmi ạbalala,
tebum obho ạami naalōghōm mobho tiikpulughu obhꞌenyina nꞌọlogh ạvo bho tạḍua tịnyaam Ẹmugh obho tạJizos Kraist ketu obho, teḍighi ni ẹmu ạmi amute.

Ạkar ẹzo ilo idi tologhi ạmi magey, nꞌibha ạami naanon taghisigh obho, pẹzo olo ạami upin rẹgheer ạlogha talōor, nꞌobhin ọoghuanaan ologhi moomo amen nꞌạkar esiibha bho ạami odi mikoli obho, ọseghe oomo aghuḍum ạmi oobhughumiom aKraist tọbho nꞌaghuḍum.
Aghuḍum keeghe? Tạmi, aKraist. Ọbho ọghi ọrolan odi ạneghe apu ghuḍum.
Kerumolo oḍum aghuḍum obhobho ọghi taghisigh taḍighi molo ạami kamina kaḍighi mọoghuanaan oḍighi, pu tịzal obho, olo ạami ulōghōm mọson ọseghe olo.
Ạami nạmughi tịzal ibꞌạrubhiiny. Ọḅele aghuḍum obhobho ọghi ọrolan aKraist ạneghe apu,
keḍio ọḅele oḍum ọghi taghisigh mebum enyina ịla mạar epu ạni ni kua.
Ạami nạakar alōghōm miibha bho, molo ạami naalōghōm nạ mobho ạami taḍum ni ạtolan oomo enyina moḍighi enyina kebhōbh kẹghi taghisigh nꞌolo enyina kẹteeny magey ọḅaal ologhi mi tomōruōm obhꞌenyina,
molo amen ạami tamina atu asi tenyina, enyina tẹteeny ni mạar obhin taḍien tạJizos Kraist obuom ạmi mi tibha odi aḍighi ạnogho ạami obho.

Kẹzo kẹzo ilo ịrol, eḍighiom ạar aghuḍum enyina eezuan ibhꞌoghōrōkō ooḅi adōm obho taKraist, molo erumolo ạami urue uru, nꞌerumolo ạami utue ḍio moru ọmiinan enyina ẹkona, ạami tạmoghon ni mobho enyina nẹemara ịghua itul ọnu neḅianaan mooḅi adōm obho enyina imōruōm obho,
nꞌobho enyina ikiil io noghiil ruugu mobo ọlogh aḍien enyina. Tiibha bho pẸnaan nịvo nịvo oḍeeriom eedi mobho eedi tepẹ ni, nꞌobho odi tạpel ni enyina.
Odi naḍighiiy miibha bho tebum obho nọonogho zenyina mịnyaam mi tebum aKraist mọmiinom,
pitul nꞌạami siibha bho meḅe moḍigh elebhir obho enyina ịmiin, nẹmoghon nạ siibha mobho ạami naḅe bho.

Ẹzo bho enyina neelōghōm mobho otul ọnu obhꞌenyina nꞌaKraist nạkuemi miloghi enyina bho, nꞌobho etulan obhꞌodi nạnwanami lōor enyina bho, nꞌobho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho odi nạ nꞌenyina bho, nꞌobho onyiin motulan onyiin ọsu ạghusan aḍien monyiin ạneghe ni obho,
pịmaar eekōbhōghian, sesen ni, mẹteeny monyiin ịitua nꞌonyiin ologhi, onyiin atulan monyiin molo enyina ẹḅaaleni mologhi ạmi.
Kạar kạar olo enyina neḍighi ibhin ghạ mologhi ạaku nꞌọbughia alōor meḍighiom. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, isōoriōm lōor enyina, merōbh ologhi enyina toghōl, “Oōy olo aaleeny ạami olo.”
Ịva ghạ moḍighi oomo amen mibha tẹnogho enyina mạsuo bho be ḍio.
Ipin moḍigh ịitua bho tạJizos Kraist meḍumom taghuḍum enyina.
Toomo ibha odi nꞌẸnaan akẹrẹkẹrẹ olo bho ẹkona,
odi oḅumian io moghōl odi nꞌẸnaan iileeny ni.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, odi azuuruna meghōony odi atẹn mẹbana,
suo ụmar odi, odi ạgbaaniom lōor odi mạnwuny arōoy molo akẹrẹkẹrẹ olo bho.
Tẹmar-arōoy obho odi asōoriōm lōor odi aghiilaan mẸnaan ninii odi aru ạbho mọbho, ạkar ọbho oorẹeny ẹmigheri obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, pẸnaan aabhughumi odi,
ạnogho odi ḍien olo apu moomo ẹmar-ariḍien,
molo kamen kamen olo arōoy ịmoghon ḍien obho tạJizos,
pu kōoy kōoy, mi tạnyu obho nꞌade bho, nꞌibha ẹeḍiani ade bho,
ogbuluman ookpulughu odi,
obhin oomo ịnu obhꞌeedi ọgba omutiom mobho odi ạJizos Kraist aru mObạmọogh
obho mọnogho eghuan mẸnaan Ọde bho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ẹzo bho enyina ighiilaan ghạ zạmi moomo amen olo ạami odi nꞌenyina bho, ipin nạ tonyiin odi oghiilaan obho nꞌilo ipuom nạ suo, siibha bho ạami olo nꞌenyina bho, meghiilaan mẸnaan nꞌaruugu aḍien, meḍighi megbẹbhẹghiōm tịbhelegha bhꞌenyina.
Ẹnaan mobho odi tenyina nạnogho enyina moghiilaan nꞌịnyaam moḍighi ibha idi tologhi odi obho.
Ibhin ghạ mologhi ịghunughun nꞌịgbanian meḍighiom kạar kạar olo enyina neḍighi,
molo enyina ịteeny mọghor ạman, nꞌolo enyina ẹneghe ẹman kigey ạnwuny tẸnaan mi teesoḍia ịkarabh ạnwuny ọoke bhobho, ibha enyina idi kẹḅaal togbo eedi mi tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho,
suo enyina neebhin nẹgba emutiom eḍeeriom rōoy madōm aghuḍum obho. Tiibha bho pạami obhiigha taḍuma bho ạJizos Kraist tamula atu obho, mobho oomo oḍighi obhꞌạmi uzu ḍio tạkpabh.
Keru nạ kạar olo uzu nạ mịḅaal ạmi ụḅaram tomōruōm obhꞌenyina, ibha enyina nẹtunom mạar ẹnogho mẸnaan obho ẹkona, ạami tạḅaal ni mologhi, atul nạ nꞌoomo enyina ạḅaal ologhi.
Ẹkar ẹgbaan magey molo enyina kẹḅaal mologhi, otul nạ nꞌạami ọḅaal ologhi.
ẠJizos Obạmọogh obho ạlogh ạvo pạami orōm aTimoti karu tenyina siibha siibha molo ạami ạmoghon miiḅi ọkpo ilo igboloman nꞌenyina molo ologhi ạmi ạḅaal.
Odi be mōoy olo ạami ụteeny olo odi kạmi, olo nạatua ghạ zenyina moomo amen.
Oomo ipedi obho neḅe mọkpo ilo alōor eedi be, iḅe ḍio milo tạJizos Kraist.
Enyina nịvo nịvo neelōghōm mẹzo odi ạla mạar tạmi, ẹzo odi nꞌạami idi kọde nꞌọony utul noḍighi moḍighi ọgba ooḅi adōm obho.
Ạami nạatua, ạami ubiemi ḍio morōm odi karu tenyina kamen kamen olo ạami ụmiin ẹzo ọkpo idi nꞌạami.
Obạmọogh obho ạlogh ạvo, ạami nịvo nịvo tatu ni nạ tenyina siibha siibha.
Idi tologhi ạmi magey molo Ẹpafraditos ooḅi umōr obhꞌạmi, obho atul nꞌạami naḅe aḍighi moḍighi obho tObạmọogh obho, obho enyina irōm mọlogh ạvo ọnogho ạmi obho, kamula karu tenyina.
Ologhi odi naasi magey mi tenyina, molo ipooghu odi ikima ḍio, ebum obho enyina nẹemoghon mobho alōor odi ọneghe ḍio bho.

Agey nạ, odi ạnwe molo ịbam isughō kụmuneen zodi toogu, molo Ẹnaan ạsuanaan zodi ghụsan aḍien. Odi be ḍio, ạami ẹkona, molo ịnon ịitu ikul ologhi ạami siibha bho ịiḅaghami idi tekẹeny nꞌoḍiom ạmi obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ạami nạkar ạva magey molo odi kamula karu tenyina molo ologhi enyina ạḅaal men odi aru asi, nꞌolo ịiḅaghami ologhi obhꞌạmi epōoru.
