Tebum iibha nạ bẹleni, ipin ebheleghian odi nꞌoomo ọḅaal ologhi mi taḍien tObạmọogh obho. Ịnogho moghiilaan moḍigh arōoy ilo idi kodi.
Odi ạkar abhin taḍien enyina ạmaranuan ạnogho lōor odi mọbho mi toḍighi obho taKraist mẹlogh ạvo ọnogho ạmi ogbẹbheghiōm toḍighi ọlogh ạvo bhꞌenyina.
Tẹzo olo ọkpete okunughiom, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ịḅaal ghạ mologhi mi tObạmọogh obho be. Ịikaany io ạami momina ọge oruom enyina monyiin odi oghōrōkō bho molo ịkarabh ikul ologhi enyina.
Igona lōor enyina mi tịkarabh asighōghō arōoy obo bho nẹnogho rōoy mọoḅaghami, nẹva molo kōoy kōoy kaḍuna bho.

Ezira, eedi ḍio, mobo nẹekar iḍunaay magey oḍuna bho, ebum obho ezira nookpulughu ghạ mẸnaan tạruumugh obho, nomina nạ oobhughumi mạJizos Kraist tebum ibha odi aḍighi obho, useeriom io moomo ologhi ezira mi toḍighi ạravo ezira bho.
Ughōl ipa bho tetue ni ẹpel bọ, kōl bọbon ōoy olo aaleeny ạami tipa bho olo.

Tẹzo eḍighiom ạar arōoy aJu obho, uḍun ạami men ạami ugbẹbh mạbhenya aḍuma. Ạami olꞌebhugh Izirẹl mi toghōol otu taBenjamin. Ạami ẹkona Ọony ạkar ogbo eghun aHibru. Tilo igboloman nꞌaraalōgh arōoy aJu obho, ạami olꞌẹku arōoy aFarisi obho.
Ạami ụkar kua ạmara taraalōgh obho molo ạami ụnogho mịiḅaghami marōoy ạsosi obho. Tilo igboloman nꞌaraalōgh arōoy aJu obho, bọbon olōgh olo ạami usōor olo molo ạami ụteeny io nọteeny mọghor ạman.
Keḍio ibha ạami kụḅal mobho iru mạsuo bho, ạami nạḅalam mobho iru mapẹ mebum aKraist.

Tọkar ọgba agey obho, kạar kạar ạmi, ạami naanon aseeri kamapẹ mebum olōghōm ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ạami obho. Oobho pạkar odi ogbogbo ẹmu ạsuo bho. Tebum odi, kạami abōor kạar kạar azu tạkpabh, naanon moomo eedi katōbha molo aKraist be atu mạsuo ạmi,

nꞌolo ạami atu molo odi ạman. Ẹnaan tapin ni ạami aseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy tebum omōruōm ạmi mi todi aKraist, tebum oḍighi ạravo ạmi mi tookō araalōgh obho ḍio. Ịḍua tẸnaan keru, keḍio tughuneen tomōruōm io ọnon ebōom olo.
Oomo ạar obho ạami nạva, polōghōm odi aKraist nꞌịnyaam obho ịḍua iru toḅetunu tọbho bhꞌodi obho, nꞌọtuonom odi ọmiinom molo ạami ạpo ạni moḍigh ọbho bhꞌodi,
molo, Ẹnaan ạlogh ạvo, ạami aḅetunu ạni tọbho bho.

Ịitua ilo oghōl ạami nạateeny ạman bolobolo agbẹbh ạman tiibha bho olo nolo. Ạami naḅe ni be ạki taghisigh molo ạami akuonom mọkpo pipa, kẹzo bho ạJizos Kraist naakuonom ạami, molo ạami ụḍua talōor odi obho.

Ịmaar elōghōm, iiḅi aburumōr, mobho tịitua ạmi ạami ukōl io ạami nạateeny mipa bho ạman. Onyiin ạar be mobho odi tologhi ạmi ạami ụtuugh nạ naḍighi, ạami uunon mu mọkpo ibha idi tạman obho, ạami uunon uḅe nạki taghisigh tọkpo bho idi taghisigh obho.
Ạami nakiil ghạ ni be ạki taghisigh mosi tikunughi obho molo ạami apin luunwo eghiil obho Ẹnaan napeleghi ạami mi tạJizos Kraist mọghi obhin obho, obho aru bọ maghuḍum obhꞌạnyu obho.

Ịkpe ni molo oomo ezira obo bho noogbẹbh mọghuur ale otuḅeen mi tọkpo ạruumugh obho kọteeny monyiin odi oḍigh ịitua bhibha. Mạar io suo ẹde enyina ịmiin ạni ḍio kua, eru nạ kua, Ẹnaan tạkparion ni riḍien bhꞌenyina.
Kẹzo kẹzo ilo ịrol, ezira ụsar io otuḅeen mibha ezira nookughumuom obho.
Iiḅi aburumōr, ịtuonom rạaḅa asike ạmi, mẹmaar egbi riḍien enyina tobo bho neḍum oḍigh aghuḍum obhobho bho, molo enyina kẹtuonom rạaḅa asike ezōor.
Ạami nạagba ghạ ạnogho enyina mọlogh amen mobho ẹde enyina neḍum aghuḍum ọlokian ariḍien nꞌoorẹeny ẹmigheri ọbho bho taKraist, keḍio ạami kamina digha ạgba aleghiom ạnogho enyina siibha nꞌizin.
Ikunughi eedi, ọbho be, ebum obho ạrubaraka eedi iru mẹnaan eedi obho. Ọkpo ạregheer obhꞌeedi pibha eedi ibhin nebuom ẹbughia lōor, neseeriom oomo ologhi eedi mi tọkpo ẹmar-arōoy obho be.
Ezira nị dụgh, ezira ạnwuny eghun tẸnaan. Ariḍien ezira neenon ghạ eḅōruōm mọmiin amen obho Ọpela bhꞌezira ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho tạḍua tạnyu obho atu obho.
Amen odi tatu podi obhin tịnyaam obho odi napin aḍighi kạar kạar moru ọrol kẹzo ịto bhꞌodi obho, oḍighi onweeghi iikpōogh obhꞌezira eghuan ilo bho keru kẹrol kibhꞌodi ibha ibꞌeghuan obho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr, oḍigh ologhi ạmi, ibha ạami nạva mọmiin ghạ oomo amen obho, nꞌibha iru nạ mọḅaal ologhi ạmi nꞌaluunwo oḍighi ạmi obho, ịmaar ẹmara, aburumōr oḍigh ologhi ạmi, mẹkpabh mObạmọogh obho.
Ạami naasen ni maYuodia nꞌaSintike, onyiin mọmoghonyan onyiin kạburumarani tObạmọogh obho.

Ạna ẹkona, ạna obo bho nạḅar ạami toḍighi obho, lọgh ạvo mạnogho rạani bhibha, ebum obho eedi itul ạami ikumuan magey mi toḍighi ọgba olelemi ooḅi adōm obho. Itul io ạami be, itul ạKlement nꞌạruḅarama ạmi ipedi obho, ibha ariḍien eedi nọogeey mi tọbhereer aghuḍum obho.
Ị́ḅele ghạ nọḅele mọḅaal ghạ ologhi mi tObạmọogh obho, ạami kamina digha ạkpete, ịḅaal ghạ mologhi be.
Ịteeny ologhi ọghurughiom mi toomo arōoy. Obạmọogh obho odi ḅubh.
Ị́nyaghami ghạ lōor enyina mi tọkpo. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, kạar kạar olo enyina nẹva iikpulughu mẹgba mẹnogho mẸnaan, megbẹel odi ạlogh ạvo ạnogho enyina. Íḅulo ghạ nạ mọsebh odi.
Pekima tẸnaan, obho arōoy itue ghạ ḍio mọotua ọmoghonyan obho, ọnogho iloghi nꞌịitua enyina lideny mi tạJizos Kraist.

Tẹzo olo ọkpete okunughiom, iiḅi aburumōr, iseeriom ghạ miloghi enyina mẹetua ghạ miiḅi ọkpo ilo iḍigh eghuan, nꞌilo ịneghe, nꞌilo ịḅaal fịafiafia, nꞌilo teḍigh ni tiloghi arōoy ẹtalaghom eedi, nꞌoomo ọkpo ilo arōoy tebuom ni.
Ịtuugh eḍighi mibha enyina ịtuugha tạmi obho, ibha ạami ukuugh ụlogh tạravo enyina bho, ibha enyina ịmoghon tọnu ạmi, ịmiin nạ taghuḍum ạmi obho, pẸnaan ekima bho ọrolan enyina.

Ologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey mi tObạmọogh obho, tebum obho, toomo ibha neebia bho ẹkona, enyina neemina ịitua mọlogh ạvo ọnogho ạmi. Bọbon amen olo enyina iḅulo ạami olo, ebōom ọlogh ạvo ọnogho ạmi kobho enyina ịteeny io.
Ạami ụkpete ḍio miibha bho moghōl ạami nạgbanian mibha ạami ụteeny io bho, ạami nạatuugha alōghōm mọrolom kilo kilo ạami ụteeny.

Ạami nạatuugha alōghōm mẹzo ọbhama alōor ạmi mi taghuḍum ạmi tamen olo ilo nolo, nꞌamen olo ịka ni. Ọkpo ẹḅokia oḍigh aghuḍum obhobho ạami nạatuugha alōghōm, molo kamen kamen olo ạami odi mọkoony bolobolo tẹela, nꞌamen olo ạami ụteeny ịkanya ọkpo bolobolo ilo nolo, ạami naalōghōm mẹzo ọmaranuan.
Ạami tatue ni ạdaanaan kilo kilo imute tiibha bho mi tịnyaam odi obo bho nạnogho ạami mịnyaam obho.
Toomo ipa ẹkona, enyina iḍighi miiḅi mọlogh ạvo ọnogho ạmi mi tịiḅaghami obhꞌạmi.

Enyina arōoy aFilipai nịvo nịvo neelōghōm nạ mobho ạami ụḍua kua be mi taMasidonia mi tọḅel egbiom obho ạami ụke mọgba ọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho, enyina be mạsosi obho ịlogh ạvo ịnogho ạami. Ọnon ạsosi olo aḍigh nꞌạami, ịmiinom tamapẹ nꞌạsuo ạmi olo, enyina be.
Tamen obho ạami odi tạTesalonika bho ẹkona, enyina ẹlogh nạ mạvo ẹnogho ạami mi tọkpo bho ạami ụteeny io bho.
Inwo bhꞌenyina ḍio mibha ạami naanon, ạsuo ilo enyina tepin ẹḅaraghiom tinwo bhꞌenyina mibha nẹḅaaleni mologhi ạmi obho.

Enyina nẹekpe mọmugh oḍighi ạmi, epuom nạ. Ọbaraka ạmi naamute, suo inwo bhꞌenyina, ibha enyina ifirima mẸpafraditos obho neeru iḍigh tạvo ạmi obho. Iibha idi koḍigh ọtun ạar obho nọtun ọnogho mẸnaan neḍigh ghạ tologhi odi obho.
Keḍio odi Ẹnaan obhꞌạmi tapin toomo ẹela eghuan obhꞌodi ạnogho enyina kạar kạar olo enyina nẹva. Iibha bho tẹḍua tạJizos Kraist ketu.
Eghuan ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan Ọde bhꞌezira kamen kamen. Ẹrol nạ kua.
Ipuruanaan ạami moomo arōoy tẸnaan ibha itul ọnu nꞌạJizos Kraist obho. Aburumōr obho idi eebha bho epuruan nạ enyina.
Oomo arōoy tẸnaan ibha idi eebha bho epuruan nạ enyina, ạkar obo bho idi totu ọolema bhꞌaRom obho epuruan nạ enyina magey.
Ạlisebh tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹrolan enyina.
Ạami ạPol, obo bho ịḍua tịto tẸnaan kiru kạami uru ạni monyiin oteledōm tạJizos Kraist obho, nꞌaTimoti umōr obhꞌezira,
ụge notuom enyina arōoy obho tẸnaan ibha idi bọ tạsosi obhꞌạKolosi, obo bho ịteeny ạni nꞌezōor mologhi omōruōm mi taKraist obho.
Ẹnaan Ọde bhꞌezira ạnogho enyina lịsebh nꞌekima.
Ezōor nọsebh ghạ ni mẸnaan Ọde bho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho moomo amen ọlogh enyina tiikpulughu ezōor,
ebum obho ezōor nọomoghon mologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina mi tạJizos Kraist, nꞌetulan obho enyina netulan moomo arōoy tẸnaan obho.

Amen ạkar agey ọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho aru asi tenyina, enyina ẹmoghon milo igboloman nꞌọkpo olo Ẹnaan naakōbhōghi aseerian enyina mi tạnyu obho. Molo ịḍua teedi ọkpo bho enyina neḍuom ologhi obho, kenyina ẹteeny mologhi omōruōm nꞌetulan obhꞌenyina.
Ooḅi adōm obho nạnogho lịsebh, apōbh nạ alela toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho, kẹzo bho ịrol bọ tenyina kọḅel aḍuma bho enyina ịmoghon bọ mọsu aghusạn aḍien obho tẸnaan kenyina iru ilōghōm imōruōm magey obho.
Ẹpafras ooḅi ẹbana-umōr ezira, obo bho nakumuan tesi ezōor mi toḍighi obho taKraist, pobo ạtughumiom enyina miibha bho.
Odi nạagba ạnogho ezōor metulan obho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạnogho zenyina bho.

Iibha kiḍighi kezōor ụḅele ghạ ḍio nọḅele mọlogh enyina tiikpulughu ezōor, kamen obho ezōor ụmoghon mibha igboloman nꞌenyina bho. Ezōor nookpulughu ghạ ọnogho mẸnaan molo odi apulughi tenyina mịitua ịto bhꞌodi, nꞌoomo olōghōm ạar nꞌọmoghonyan obho Ẹmugh Iigbia bhꞌodi nạnogho ghạ bho,

penyina orue oḍum aghuḍum obho Obạmọogh obho nạva bho, omina oḍighi nạ moomo amen mibha iḍigh bọ tologhi obho odi. Nꞌolo toomo oḍigh kẹrekere iiḅi oḍighi enyina, aghuḍum enyina teḅu ni miiḅi iiḅua, enyina epōbh nạ tịitua tẸnaan.
Ẹnaan ạnogho zenyina mịnyaam kotꞌịnyaam obho ịḍua bọ tịnyaam eghuan bhꞌodi kiru obho, molo enyina tetue ni ẹkparam nꞌalideny alōor toomo ẹmorokpo.
Nꞌolo enyina ẹnogho lịsebh nꞌọḅaal ologhi mỌde bho, obo bho aḍighi enyina mogbẹbh ạni arōoy ilo tepin mabin eedi mi tọkpo bho Ẹnaan, naakōbhōghi aseerian marōoy odi tepa ogbōgh ẹḅaal obho.
Odi ạbhel ezira momuzōnaan tịnyaam ọkinim obho keḍio ạde lōor abhin ezira ạloghom tAde-Ọolema ooḅi Ọony obhꞌodi,
obo bho ịḍua todi kiru, kụbhel ezira utẹnẹmi mi tọḅelemaan ịkarabh ezira bho.
AKraist aaghirinaan ni mẸnaan, molo nọomiin zodi, pụ nọomiin mẸnaan, obho dọmiin ghạ ḍio bho. Odi pọkpana bho ạrol bọ kugbi mọlem ẹmar-arōoy obho.

Ịḍua todi kọlem moomo ẹmorokpo bho idi bọ tạnyu obho nꞌade bho, ilo nọmiin nꞌilo ụmiin io, nꞌoomo obo bho ịteeny mịnyaam mọda nꞌọto ịto mi tạruumugh obho. Ịḍua tịto odi keḍio ụtuan nạ zodi kụlem moomo ẹmorokpo bho.
Odi odi kọlem oomo ẹmorokpo bho. Oomo ẹmorokpo bho ịkpabhaghian todi ẹrol mẹzo bho idi siibha bho.
Odi ẹmu ạsosi obho aru bọ miikpōogh odi obho. Aghuḍum ạke todi. Odi ọḅel ọony obo ubhira uḅẹtōn tọbho bho. Molo odi be tạtol tẹtolom ọolema bho mi toomo ẹmorokpo.
Iḍigh magey mi tologhi tẸnaan molo kọmiin kọmadon moomo eḍighiom ạar odi mi tỌony obho,

nꞌolo kẹḍua tỌony obho, odi katulughian mẹmar-arōoy obho. Molo ịḍua nạ tọbho Ọony obhꞌodi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho keḍio odi abhin mekima aru tẹmar-arōoy obho, momulumi todi moomo ọkpo olo idi tade bho nꞌạnyu obho.
Tamen olo neetẹn, enyina igbeenyan ni tịitua enyina nꞌẸnaan, molo enyina iru mobo ọlokian ariḍien odi tebum ịkarabh iloghi nꞌeḍighiom ạar obhꞌenyina.
Keḍio esiibha bho Ẹnaan nạatuan mebum ọbho iikpōogh alōor Ọony obhꞌodi atulughian enyina mobhin enyina oseeri taghisigh odi kiiḅi arōoy olo ịneghe ni ịman, ilo ụgbaam ghạ ḍio mịkarabh.

Tẹzo bho odi kabhin enyina mẹzo bho, pịmaar mẹmara mẹghua magey tologhi omōruōm enyina kạkpo otu. Ímōrō ghạ alōor enyina aabhigha toḍuom ologhi obho enyina ịteeny tamen obho enyina ịmoghon bọ mooḅi adōm obho. Ọgba odi ooḅi adōm obho kaḍighi mạar obho ạami ạPol uru mookō rạana ạsosi obho. Odi adōm obhobho poobho nọgba ọnogho kōoy kōoy mi tẹmar-arōoy obho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, ologhi ạmi nạḅaal magey mi tọmiinom obhꞌạmi mebum enyina. Ọmiinom iikpōogh alōor obhꞌạmi nẹpel moḍighi ọmadon tọmiinom obho aKraist ạmiinom tebum iikpōogh obhꞌodi obho aru bọ mạsosi obho asughenaan zeedi obho.
Ẹnaan obo bho ạnogho ạami moḍighi oḍighi obhobho ọnogho enyina bho, pobo abheleghi ạami moru ookō rạana ạsosi obho, ọgba omutiom ooḅi adōm obhꞌodi molo arōoy kẹmoghonyan.
Kageedi, ẹmu adōm obhobho ụḅoki ni moomo itelema tẸnaan nꞌarōoy, keḍio esiibha Ẹnaan naamutiom mẹmu adōm obho ạnogho rōoy odi.

Iibha pibha ịrol tịitua tẸnaan: ọgba omutiom ọnogho rōoy odi mẹmu ẹela nꞌeghuan obho ụḅoki obho, obho odi aseerian moomo arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho. Oobho podi ẹmu obho ụḅoki obho: maKraist odi tenyina. Oobho nẹgba eḍeeriom mobho enyina tepin ạni ni mabin eghuan obho tẸnaan.

Pạar obho ezōor nọgba maKraist ọnogho moomo arōoy obho. Ezōor ubhin toomo olōghōm-ạar obho ezōor ụteeny obho nookiom ọtughumiom kōoy kōoy mobhin eedi oru taghisigh tẸnaan karōoy olo neeḍum ịman tạruumugh obho mi totul ọnu nꞌaKraist.
Tẹzo olo oḍighi iibha bho, pạami ubhin toomo ibꞌịnyaam obho aKraist ạnogho ạami obho, ibha neḍighi moḍighi mi tạmi obho, nakumuan ghạ.
Ịḅele ạami ụgba ụnogho enyina mẹzo ạami uḅe ụnogho enyina nꞌarōoy ibhꞌaLaodisia nꞌoomo obo bho nꞌạami ulōghōmuan io bho,
molo eedi ẹteeny mọoghuanaan iloghi, nꞌolo oomo eedi eḍuraan tetulan, molo eedi ẹteeny magey ọmoghonyan, ẹkar elōghōm ạni mẹmu ạar obho Ẹnaan ạḅoki obho paKraist
Todi aKraist pesi ụḅoki mẹela olōghōm ạar nꞌọmoghonyan.
Ạami nạgba kua ạnogho enyina siibha bho, ímōrō ghạ onyiin ōoy abhin miben ịkanan aḍighi enyina raama, kẹzo kẹzo olo eedi ịneghe isi.

Toomo ibha ạami olo nꞌenyina tiikpōogh obho, ạami odi nꞌenyina tạruumugh obho, molo ologhi ạmi nạḅaal ni magey mọmoghon ọoghuanaan otul ọnu obho enyina ibhin ịmaruom monyiin esi mi tologhi omōruōm enyina mi taKraist obho.
Suo enyina neebhin imōruōm mạJizos Kraist moru Obạmọogh enyina bho, pitul mọnu nꞌodi.

Iḍiineni mịika bhꞌenyina mi todi, megim otu aghuḍum obhꞌenyina nạ mi todi, molo enyina eḍum ẹki taghisigh ẹkua magey tiloghi omōruōm obhꞌenyina kẹzo bho ụtughumiom enyina bho. Aghuḍum enyina emuzō mọnogho ghạ Ẹnaan lịsebh.

Igona lōor enyina, molo arōoy ipin moobho olōghōm ạar ẹmar-arōoy obho eebiōghōm enyina, etẹnẹ enyina rụbana. Oḍigh olōghōm ạar obhobho pịtughumiom eḍighiom ạar ibha ịḍua iru tezira kageedi obho. Iibha ịtughumiom ịbam ạnwuny, ilo taKraist ḍio.
AKraist aaḅua mẸnaan mi tiikpōogh obho. Odi pōoy olo oomo iiḅi eḍighiom ạar tẸnaan imuza ni ịman.
Enyina neegbẹbh ẹman mi todi, obo bho nạda bọ moomo ạruula nꞌịto mịto ạruumugh obho.
Enyina neeḍunaay totul ọnu obhꞌenyina nꞌodi. Aliḍun ibha ozu alōor obho ḍio, aliḍun obho taKraist obho aḍighi enyina momuzōnaan tịnyaam ịkarabh iikpōogh alōor obhobho bho.
Men obho uzuom enyina mụum obho, ịrol kilo nọoḅar enyina uḍiom nꞌaKraist molo Ẹnaan obo bho aḅẹtōn odi tọbho bho aḅẹriōn enyina nꞌodi mi tiloghi omōruōm obho enyina.

Tamen olo neetẹn, enyina aghuḍum ilo tạruumugh obho, tebum ịkarabh obhꞌenyina nꞌebum obho enyina iru misoloman olo deḍunaay io bho. Keḍio esiibha bho, Ẹnaan nạaḅạr maKraist nꞌenyina ạnogho ghuḍum. Odi Ẹnaan nạaḅelemaan ezira moomo ịkarabh ezira.
Odi nạagburion mọbhereer ọmugh obho ezira nꞌoomo araalōgh obho, ạḅar moomo eedi ạkanam toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho taKraist.
Tọbho bho taKraist mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho, podi amuzōnaan lōor odi mi tịnyaam ạruula nꞌịto mịto ibhꞌạruumugh obho. Odi ạsaram eedi migiri mobho odi naapuom zeedi.

Tebum iibha bho bẹleni ímōrō ghạ nomōrō ōoy aru ạru mịiruan ạnogho enyina tilo igboloman nꞌọkpo ilo ole nꞌilo ọbhoghol, nꞌilo igboloman nꞌaruḍuma olo enyina keegbiemiiy, bolobolo ariwiki nꞌạruvanyu nꞌạsumusia.
Oomo abaabha bho iikōogh ọkpo ilo iru momute be. TaKraist pesi ẹmu eedi ọkpo bhibha neemute ịman.

Ímōrō ghạ nomōrō molo obo bho nepōbha lōor eedi tebum ạghiiny olo eedi nẹmiin obho ẹru mịiruan ẹnogho enyina. Ịitua eedi igboloman nꞌọkpo esuo ade bho be. Eedi nẹgbaay ghạ molo kosōoriōm lōor kookpulughu ghạ mitelema tẸnaan. Oōy olo odi kua, ōoy iituma olo ẹmu olo,

olo nạaḅele mọkpabh aKraist obo bho aru bọ mẹmu ạsosi obho. Odi aKraist ạda ạmarami nạnogho ghuḍum moomo alōor obho, ạpam atulughi monyiin moomo ariisi alōor obho molo epōbh ẹki taghisigh kẹzo bho Ẹnaan nạva bho.

Ẹzo bho enyina nẹebho nꞌaKraist ịgbaranuan tịtughumiom ịbam ạnwuny obho, ebum eeghe kesiibha bho kenyina neḍum maghuḍum olo idi kolo enyina iru milꞌesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho? Ebum eeghe kenyina nẹtuonuman egbiiy miigbia ilo ighōl mụ
“Ụbham ghạ moobho, ule ghạ mipa, ukulaan ghạ miibha?”
Nooḍighi ọḅele moomo abaabha bho, peedi ạar oḍighiom olo mu. Iibha iigbia ilo arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho ịtooghiiy.

Iibha ịgbaanan kolo eedi ịteeny ni molōghōm ạar mi tiikpulughu itelema tẸnaan, nꞌiben osōoriōm alōor, nꞌọnogho obꞌọmiinom tiikpōogh alōor ọbho, keḍio eedi ạar oḍighiom olo mi tọbhama lōor tibha iikpōogh obho nẹnyaghagh obho.
Ẹzo bho nọoḅar aKraist nꞌenyina uḅẹriōn tọbho bho ụnogho ghuḍum obho, piseeri mologhi obhꞌenyina mi tọkpo iibha idi bọ tạnyu obho, tesi obho aKraist odi tẹtolom mi toḍiom ạvo tẸnaan obho.
Igim mịitua enyina meseeri tọkpo ibhꞌạnyu obho, ibhꞌesuo ade bho ḍio.
Enyina nẹebho, keḍio aghuḍum enyina nọoḅoki nꞌaKraist mi tẸnaan.
Ạkar aghuḍum obhꞌenyina paKraist. Amen odi tamute atu, penyina ẹkona omute oru ạni nꞌodi obhin ạni abin eghuan obhꞌodi.

Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, ịloki toogu mẹezeghi mẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho nẹnyaghagh enyina bho, ibha iru bọ mọva ạraani nꞌole ẹma, nꞌọotua ịkarabh ịitua, nꞌopesiom ạraani, nꞌogbẹel ọteeny ọkpo olo nogbiiy ni, nꞌoseeriom ologhi ọteeny kạar kạar (oobho bho ponyiin oḍigh iikpulughu eru).
Ạlile bho tẸnaan tẹtol ẹnogho mobo bho neḍighi mọkpo bhibha bho, obo bho ikiilaan io zodi obho.
Tamen olo neetẹn enyina nịvo nịvo iḍum ghạ maghuḍum obhobho molo aghuḍum enyina iḍigh rụbana eedi.
Keḍio esiibha bho, ikẹl mọkpo bhibha: ọkarabh ologhi, ạlile, aḅẹebh ologhi. Ọnuekpete ịkarabh nꞌitōnyōgh ịtol io tịnu enyina.
Onyiin ọgbaam io monyiin miben, ebum obho enyina nẹekporonaay mugbaany aghuḍum obho nꞌoomo ịkarabh eḍighiom-ạar obhꞌodi,
nẹelokiaay siibha momoom aghuḍum. Oobho pomoom aghuḍum obho Ẹnaan obo bho ạlem obho nạva ghạ moomo amen monwe enyina ọgbaaniom odi molo aḍighi enyina ẹmaar elōghōm odi.

Oobho bho naaru aḍighi molo akẹrẹkẹrẹ olo mu tarōoy aJu nꞌibhꞌịnon aruubhugh obho, obo bho idi muudu nꞌobo bho neeḍunaay obho, obo bho iru milo iloghi nꞌarōoy eḍum, ạrubana nꞌạnwuny ogbo eghun. AKraist poomo eedi, mi toomo eedi.
Enyina arōoy tẸnaan. Odi atulan enyina magey molo odi ạson enyina moru ạkar ilꞌodi. Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, ịteeny mọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌoḍighi iiḅi nꞌosōoriōm alōor nꞌoghiilaan nꞌalideny alōor.
Onyiin ạminoghom ịkarabh onyiin, ẹḅelemaan nạ mịkarabh olo onyiin aḍighi monyiin, kẹzo bho Obạmọogh obho ạḅelemaan enyina mịkarabh enyina bho.
Ilo ipuom suo, onyiin atulan monyiin. Etulan pobo nạkoroghi ghạ rōoy monyiin esi ạnogho motul ọnu olo agbẹbh ni ạman.

Ekima bho taKraist aru mọtu mịiruan tiloghi obhꞌenyina. Tilo enyina keḍum ạni maghuḍum ekima bhobho pobho Ẹnaan ạtuan kabheleghi aakōbhōghi enyina monyiin esi moru oḍighi onyiin alōor. Ịnogho ghạ lịsebh mẸnaan.

Ọnuekpete taKraist nꞌoomo ẹela bhꞌodi erugh ni tiloghi obhꞌenyina. Onyiin abhin olōghōm ạar obhꞌodi ạtughumiom monyiin ạnogho liiki. Ịmoor ghạ miiḅi ạsoor mebuom mẸnaan, mẹnogho lịsebh zodi tiloghi obhꞌenyina.
Toomo ariḍighi enyina nꞌọnuekpete enyina ipin ghạ maḍien tạJizos Obạmọogh obho kụ meḍighiom, ebum obho ạlisebh obho enyina nẹnogho ghạ bho nẹḍua ghạ todi kụ nẹki esi tẸnaan Ọde bho.
Enyina ạraani, ikiilaan maburulom enyina. Iibha pilo ịgbaan ni molo enyina obo bho nẹtuonuman maKraist obho keḍighi.
Enyina aburulom obho, itulan mạraani enyina. Ị́bhooruom ghạ zeedi.
Enyina ịbam ạnwuny obho, ikiilaan mọde nꞌoniin enyina mi toomo ọkpo. Iibha pibha iḍigh tologhi tẸnaan.
Enyina ạburude bho, íḍighi ghạ iloghi ạnwuny enyina aḅẹebh molo eedi ịfibhighu.

Enyina ạrubana bho, iḍighi moomo ibha ọde otu enyina ạkpete ạnogho enyina moḍighi obho, tamen olo odi odi suo naanon enyina nꞌamen olo odi olo suo mọmiin enyina. Ipin magey ologhi obhꞌenyina ku meḍighiom ghạ tebum oghiilaan obho enyina nekiilaan mObạmọogh obho.
Kạar kạar olo enyina neḍighi ipin nꞌoomo ologhi enyina meḍighiom, kilo enyina neḍighi ẹnogho mObạmọogh obho, iḍighi ḍio ẹnogho rōoy.
Ilōghōm mobho Obạmọogh obho tamulumian ni enyina tibha enyina iḍighi obho, ạnogho ạni enyina mabin ịga bho odi aseerian marōoy odi obho. AKraist podi ạkar ọde otu obho enyina nekumuan ẹnogho bho.
Kōoy kōoy olo naḍighi mịkarabh tapin ni mạmukpe ịkarabh obho odi naḍighi obho. Ẹnaan ọoseen ghạ ḍio mōoy, ịkarabh obho ạna uḍighi obho pibha odi tapin ạliom ạna.
Enyina ạburude arutu obho, ịmaar ẹbham mạrubana enyina. Ilōghōm mobho enyina ẹkona ịteeny nạ mọde otu olo odi tạnyu obho.
Ẹekaany iḍigh io mookpulughu ghạ oomo amen, ịsumaay tiikpulughu enyina mẹnogho ghạ lịsebh mẸnaan.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, iikpulughu ạni ghạ mẹnogho ezōor molo Ẹnaan kạnogho zezōor maraabōom ọgba adōm obhꞌodi nꞌẹmu ạar obho ụḅoki taKraist obho. Iibha pibha iḍighi bọ kạami odi mikoli obho.
Iikpulughu ghạ molo ạami ạgba magey obho amutiom arōoy ẹmoghonyan ni kẹzo bho ịgbaan obho.
Iḍum aghuḍum arōoy olo ilōghōm ạar mi togbo arōoy obo bho demōruōm io maKraist obho. Kọbam kọbam eepōogh olo amute enyina kẹgba madōm obho, ị́ḅele ghạ mobhin ọgbaam.
Ọnuekpete bhꞌenyina ẹrobhi ghạ raḅeri nꞌiloghi obo bho nẹmoghon obho, meloghōm nạ mẹzo ọbhagharana kōoy kōoy.
ẠTikikos ooḅi umōr obhꞌezira, nꞌọḅarama obho atul nꞌezōor naḍighi magey moḍighi tObạmọogh obho, tạgba ni ạnogho enyina moomo ilo igboloman nꞌezōor.
Pạar obho ạami urōm odi natuom enyina bho molo odi ạḅaaleni miloghi enyina ạgba ạnogho enyina mẹzo oomo ezōor idi.
Onisimos onyiin ọony enyina natu ạni. Odi naaru monyiin obꞌooḅi umōr ezōor mi taKraist olo naḍighi nạ magey. Eedi tẹgba ni ẹnogho enyina kạar kạar olo neemutanaan ezōor teebha.

Ạristakos obo bho odi nꞌạami tikoli obho, nꞌạMak ọony onyiin eghun otu nꞌạBanabas obho, epuruan enyina. (Ạami nạagba ghạ ạnogho zenyina milo igboloman nꞌạMak akōl kua modi aru tenyina, pipin odi nẹloghom.)

AJosua obho ughōl bọ ạJustos obho apuruan nạ enyina. Ịraar eedi be marōoy aJu ilo neeghiraan imōruōm ạJizos Kraist toomo obo bho itul nꞌạami neḍighi moḍighi Ade-Ọolema tẸnaan obho. Eedi arōoy ilo ịlogh mạvo ịnogho ạami magey.

Ẹpafras onyiin ōoy olo atul nꞌezōor naḍighi moḍighi obho tạJizos Kraist, apuruan nạ enyina. Odi nạlogh ghạ ni enyina tiikpulughu bhꞌodi moomo amen agbẹel mẸnaan molo enyina kẹmaar kemōruōm kebhōbh kẹghi taghisigh kẹmara kẹghuonom mi toghiilaan obhꞌenyina tẹzo bho ịto bhꞌodi.
Ạami tatue ni ạgbaanaan odi toḍighi alikumuan olo odi nakumuan enyina nꞌoomo arōoy obhꞌaLaodisia nꞌạHierapolis.
ALuk ookō laakō bhꞌezōor nꞌaDimas epuruan nạ enyina.
Ipurunaan ezōor moomo aburumōr obho idi bọ taLaodisia bho, nꞌaNimfa, nꞌoomo arōoy ạsosi obho neekpulughu ghạ totu odi obho.
Amen olo enyina ighōl mọbhereer obhobho, ị́ḅele ghạ mọfirima nạ ọghiom koghōl ạni tạsosi obhꞌaLaodisia. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, amen obhꞌaLaodisia aru asi tạvo enyina, pikōl ạni.
Ịgba mẹnogho mẠkipos modi ọḅele ḍio moḍighi ọman moḍighi obho Obạmọogh obho ạnogho zodi moḍighi obho.
Ạami ạPol ubhin ạkar ạvo ạmi nạgiom miibha bho. Ạami ạPol apuruan enyina. Íḅulo ghạ magbirigbiri ikoli obhꞌạmi.
Ọsu ạghusan aḍien ẹrolan enyina!
Ạami ạPol nꞌạSailas nꞌaTimoti ụge mọbhereer obhobho natuom enyina arōoy ạsosi obhꞌạTesalonika, obho iru bọ marōoy tẸnaan Ọde bho nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho.
Ạlisebh nꞌekima ẹrolan enyina.
Ezōor nọsebh ghạ ni mẸnaan moomo amen mebum oomo enyina, ụḅele ghạ nạ ḍio nọḅele mọotua enyina tiikpulughu ezōor.

Taghisigh tẸnaan Ọde bho, ezōor uḅulo ḍio mẹzo bho enyina ịtuugh neḍighi mibhꞌologhi omōruōm obho, nꞌẹzo bho etulan obhꞌenyina iḍighi kenyina nekumuan kua bho, nꞌẹzo bho oḍuom ologhi obhꞌenyina mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ạghua ni ạman obho.
Iiḅi aburumōr, ezōor noolōghōm mobho Ẹnaan atulan ni enyina magey keḍio ạson enyina ạseghe moru arōoy odi.

Ezōor ubhin io moobho ọnu be kọgbaam ọnogho enyina mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho. Ezōor ubhin tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho nꞌibha ezōor ụkar umōruōm mi tagey obho kọgbaam ọnogho enyina. Enyina neelōghōm moḍigh aghuḍum obho ezōor ubhin ụrolan enyina bho. Oomo iibha bho ezōor ụtuan ebum enyina.
Enyina ịtuonom ạraaḅa asike ezōor nꞌObạmọogh obho. Toomo iibha enyina ịmiinom obho ẹkona, enyina ibhin nꞌọḅaal ologhi ebhinom dōm obho ạḍua bọ tẸmugh Iigbia bho karu obho.
Molo enyina ịrol taghisigh oomo obo bho imōruōm mi taMasidonia nꞌaGris obho,

molo ụmoghon io madōm obho igboloman bọ mObạmọogh obho mi tịnu enyina mi taMasidonia nꞌaGris be, ọdu ologhi omōruōm enyina mi tẸnaan ilela ni mi toomo ariisi. Bọbon ạar olo ezōor umina ụteeny mọkpete olo mu,

ebum obho arōoy nịvo nịvo kụ nẹgba ghạ mẹzo bho enyina ibhin ezōor ịloghom men obho ezōor uru ụrolan enyina bho, nꞌẹzo enyina nẹeḍua taruru imula iru tẸnaan mokumuan odi ọkar agey Ẹnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol obho,
nꞌẹzo bho enyina neḅōrō mỌony obhꞌodi mọḍua tạnyu obho oru obho. ẠJizos Ọony obhꞌodi obho odi aḅẹtōn bọ tọbho bho, obho ạbhel ezira ạseghe tạlile bho tẸnaan, pobo tatu.
Enyina nịvo nịvo, iiḅi aburumōr, neelōghōm mobho oru obho tezōor mi tenyina otu ḍio moobho ạar ni be.

Enyina meelōghōm mobho, keḍio ezōor usi tenyina mi tạTesalonika, ubhira ni ụloki zezōor rẹgheer mi taFilipai. Toomo iibha obo ọlokian ariḍien ezōor ạka ni obho Ẹnaan obhꞌezōor ạnogho ni ezōor mọoghuanaan ologhi mọgba ọnogho enyina mooḅi adōm obho ạḍua todi karu obho.
Ezōor ubhin io mologhi ipesi, ọgbaay iben, ọgbaam dōm obho ọnogho enyina moobiōghōm onyiin enyina.

Kpẹlen nꞌipa, tẹzo bho Ẹnaan nạava zezōor ạmiin moru ugey arōoy olo tetue ni ẹgba mooḅi adōm obho odi ạnogho zezōor obho. Ezōor ụgba ḍio mibha bho ọḅaaleni iloghi arōoy, ezōor ụgba ghạ mọḅaaleni ologhi odi Ẹnaan obo bho alōghōm bọ miloghi ezōor obho.
Enyina meelōghōm mobho ezōor upin io mẹmel ọnu koru tenyina. Ezōor ubhin nạ ḍio tọnuekpete iiniom koru. Ẹnaan be kalōghōm.
Ezōor ụva nạ ḍio rōoy mọlogh ezōor meghuan, enyina bolobolo ịnon arōoy ẹkona. Tibha ezōor oru miteledōm taKraist obho, ezōor kutue ni ogbẹel enyina mọkpo,
keḍio ezōor usōoriōm ni lōor tamen obho ezōor ụrolan enyina obho, koniin olo naakō nwụny odi.
Enyina iḍigh tologhi ezōor magey molo tebum etulan obhꞌezōor kezōor ụmara ḍio mọnogho enyina be mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho tẸnaan, ụnogho zenyina nꞌạkar aghuḍum obhꞌezōor.

Iiḅi aburumōr, enyina nẹekar elōghōm menoman alikumuan oḍighi obhꞌezōor, ezōor ụḅar ghạ muḍugul nꞌootaany koḍighi moḍighi obho molo ezōor ụnogho ḍio zenyina mịiḅaghami men obho ezōor ụgba ghạ ụnogho enyina mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho ạḍua bọ tẸnaan aru obho.
Enyina nꞌẸnaan tetue ni ekiran ezōor mịzo mobho eḍighiom ạar ezōor mi tenyina obo bho imōruōm obho ịneghe ni ịman isel nạ ni ịman, ọpionuman ẹkona ịtol nạ ḍio.
Enyina neelōghōm mobho ezōor ụrolan enyina kẹzo bho ooḅi ọde nạtolan ghạ rụnwuny odi obho.

Ezōor uḍighi miloghi enyina ọghuemi, omina ọkparami, keḍio ezōor ụkpaariom ghạ molo enyina keḍighi ghạ mibha iḍigh tologhi tẸnaan, obo bho abheleghi enyina mobhin ạni abin Ade-Ọolema nꞌeghuan obhꞌodi obho.

Tebum iibha bho nạ bẹleni, kezōor nọnogho nạ mẸnaan lịsebh moomo amen, molo amen obho ezōor ubhin madōm obho tẸnaan uruom enyina bho, enyina ịmoghon ni, imina nạ ibhin kadōm olo ạḍua tōoy karu ḍio, ạkar adōm tẸnaan, obho odi moḍighi tenyina obo bho imōruōm obho.

Enyina, iiḅi aburumōr, onyiin ẹzo bho imutenaan enyina bho pẹzo imutenaan rōoy obho tạJizos Kraist ibhꞌạrasosi obhꞌaJudia. Ẹzo bho enyina ịmiinom tạravo arōoy enyina bho pẹzo eedi nạ ịmiinom tạravo arōoy aJu obho,
obho ighigh bọ mạJizos Kraist, ịze nạ marizil obho, ịnogho nạ zezōor mịiḅaghami tebum adōm obho, molo iibha bho iḅẹebh ni magey tologhi tẸnaan.

Eedi ịmaranuan ni kōoy kōoy ẹva moḍighi olo ezōor kọḅele mọgba ghạ adōm obho ọnogho arōoy ịnon aruubhugh molo eedi kẹteeny ạni mịbhelegha. Oḍighi ịkarabh obhꞌeedi neemute egbẹbh, molo esiibha ạlile bho tẸnaan nạvimoghom eedi magey.
Iiḅi aburumōr, tọbam amen obho ezōor ụgbaranuan enyina bho, — tiikpōogh obho be, tạruumugh obho ḍio, — eebhia enyina esibh ezōor magey molo ezōor ụva ghạ ni magey momina ọmiin enyina.
Ezōor ọto ghạ momula oru tenyina. Ạkar ạami ạPol tepẹl ni monyiin amen mobho ạami ụva ghạ momula oru tenyina keḍio aSetan omōrō ḍio nomōrō.
Ẹkaraan aḍighi kezōor ọteeny moḍuom ologhi bolobolo nꞌọḅaal ologhi nꞌeghōony ibo mi taghisigh tạJizos Kraist tamen obho odi tatu obho? Enyina ḍio gạ?
Enyina peghuan ezōor nꞌọḅaal ologhi ezōor.
Ikunughi obho, ezōor umina ḍio orue mọkparam molo ụutua ni molegheri ọrol tẠtens

orōm aTimoti umōr obhꞌezōor karu tenyina. Odi aḍigh nꞌezōor naḍighi moḍighi tẸnaan, nạgba ạni ghạ mooḅi ọnuekpete adōm obho igboloman nꞌaKraist obho. Ezōor urōm odi moru ọghuemi iloghi enyina nꞌọlogh ạvo ọnogho enyina mi tiloghi omōruōm enyina,
molo bọbon onyiin enyina okiraan io amula mebum ịiḅaghami obho. Enyina nịvo nịvo neelōghōm mobho ịiḅaghami bhibha iru monyiin ẹde ịto tẸnaan mi tezira.
Amen obho ezira ụrolan bọ bho, ezōor ụḅoki ḍio mọgba ọnogho enyina mobho ịiḅaghami tetu ni ẹteenyom ezira, kẹzo bho enyina meelōghōm nạ bho, pẹzo ịkar imute nạ.

Pạar obho aḍighi kạami tatōm bọ maTimoti moru tenyina bho. Ạami utue mu mọkparaghiom, pạar obho ạami urōm bọ zodi moru ọva ọmiin ologhi omōruōm enyina bho. Ạami ụutua idi kolo eru obho nạadegh enyina enyina imeel molo oomo oḍighi obhꞌezōor nạabhe ạman.

Debia ḍio mobho aTimoti arughẹel nạgba miiḅi ạnogho ezōor milo igboloman nꞌologhi omōruōm enyina nꞌetulan enyina. Odi nạagba ạnogho zezōor mobho enyina nẹetua ghạ zezōor moomo amen, nꞌobho enyina nẹva nạ magey mọmiin ezōor kẹzo bho ezōor nọva ghạ nạ bho.
Molo, iiḅi aburumōr, toomo ịiḅaghami nꞌọmiinom obhꞌezōor, ologhi ezōor nạḅaal ni tilo igboloman nꞌenyina. Ologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina pobho nạḅaaleni miloghi obhꞌezōor,
ebum obho esiibha, ezōor nọokar noḍum aghuḍum obho, erumolo enyina ịmaramiom ịghuemiom ghuḍum enyina mi tObạmọogh obho.
Esiibha, tebum enyina, ezōor totue ni ọnogho lịsebh mẸnaan. Ezōor nọsebh ni zodi mebum ọḅaal ologhi, obho ezōor ụteeny taghisigh Ẹnaan obhꞌezōor mebum enyina bho.
Ezōor ubhin uḍugul mꞌootaany nogbẹelom ghạ zodi nꞌooḅi ologhi molo ezōor komina kọmiin enyina nꞌalōor ezōor, ọgba ọnogho enyina ogbẹbhẹghiōm tologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina.
Ẹnaan Ọde bhꞌezira nịvo nịvo nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho, aghuuron ni mebōom olo ezōor kọḅol koru tenyina.
Obạmọogh obho aḍighi ni ạbughe metulan enyina molo enyina onyiin katulan monyiin, ketulan nạ moomo arōoy togbo enyina, ninii eru eleeny etulan obho ezōor utulan enyina bho.
Tẹzo bho, podi oḍighi iloghi enyina ọghuemi nꞌolo enyina tẹneghe ẹman mi taghisigh tẸnaan Ọde bhꞌezira, tamen obho ạJizos Obạmọogh obho tatu nꞌoomo obo bho iru bọ milꞌodi obho.

Tẹzo olo ọkpete okunughiom, iiḅi aburumōr, enyina nẹetuugha tezōor moḍigh aghuḍum obho enyina teḍum teḍigh ni tologhi tẸnaan. Ẹzo bho nạ, pẹzo enyina nẹtuugh nạ neḍum. Keḍio esiibha bho, sesen ni, tebum aḍien tạJizos Obạmọogh obho, iḍum mepuom suo.
Enyina neelōghōm mịtughumiom obho ezōor ọtughumiom enyina bho, obho ịḍua iru tịnyaam tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho.
Iibha pịto tẸnaan mi tenyina. Odi nạva molo enyina keḍum ooḅi aghuḍum nꞌọḍua ọman tịkarabh eḍighiom ạar.
Oomo enyina ilobhir ạnwuny obho ịkpe ni molo enyina kelōghōm mẹzo obhin ạni mi tebōom olo ạneghe ni.
Odi opin io mạni mi tịitua ẹmar-arōoy obho kobo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan nepin obho.

Tiibha bho, bọbon ōoy oḍighi ḍio mịkarabh akōrōnuan mumōr odi tibha odi ạteeny obho. Ezōor nọogba ghạ mibha bho ọnogho enyina keḍio ezōor digha omina ookiom enyina mobho Obạmọogh obho tạliom ni marōoy ilo iḍighi mibha bho.
Ẹnaan abheleghi ezira moḍum ooḅi aghuḍum, odi obheleghi ḍio ezira moḍum aghuḍum opesiom ạraani.
Tibha bho bẹleni, kōoy kōoy olo agin ịtughumiom bhibha, odi ogin io mōoy, odi agin mẸnaan obo bho ạnogho enyina mẸmugh Iigbia odi obho.
Ạar olo ọga omina ọge ilo igboloman nꞌetulan aburumōr obho ọnogho enyina olo, ebum obho Ẹnaan nịvo nịvo nạatughumiom enyina mẹzo olo onyiin katulan monyiin.
Pẹzo nạ enyina nẹetuugh nạ ịrolan nꞌoomo aburumōr obho idi toomo ebhugh obhꞌaMasidonia, molo, iiḅi aburumōr, ezōor noosen ni enyina motulan opuom esuo.
Ịtuugha moḍum aghuḍum ạbiribirim. Kōoy kōoy aanon aḍighi moḍighi odi be, akumuan milo ookuōm aghuḍum odi kẹzo bho ezōor nọogba ghạ ụnogho zenyina obho.
Enyina eḍighi mibha bho, penyina oḍigh eghuan taghisigh arōoy obo bho imōruōm io maKraist obho, nꞌolo enyina imina nạ ḍio eḍum aghuḍum olo oḅeleriom alōor mọnon ōoy mookō enyina.
Iiḅi aburumōr, ezōor nọva molo enyina kelōghōm ạni magey obho tibha igboloman nꞌobo bho nẹebho bho molo enyina ịtol tịitu, kobo bho ịteeny io nọteeny bọbon oḍuom ologhi obho.
Ẹzo bho ezira umōruōm mobho ạJizos ạbho kamina aḅetunu tọbho bho pẹzo ezira umōruōm nạ mobho Ẹnaan tapin ni nạ atu mạJizos nꞌobo bho imōruōm odi ibha nẹebho bho.
Iibha pịtughumiom tObạmọogh obho ibha ezōor nọgba ọnogho enyina, bho ezira obo bho idi nini taghuḍum mi taḍuma bho tObạmọogh obho, ezira utẹnōm io taghisigh mobo bho nẹebho bho.

Igbōgh ịto tẹtol ni, ọmoghon moghōrōkō uvẹmụ itelema bho nꞌoghur eeḍue bho tẸnaan, keḍio Obạmọogh obho nịvo nịvo tạḍua tạnyu obho asōor atu. Obo bho imōruōm maKraist kịbho bho tepira eḅerenu nꞌaghuḍum,
keḍio ezira obo bho idi nini nꞌaghuḍum obho tookōbhōghian monyiin esi nꞌeedi mi teḅōghōghaan obho mọmiinan Obạmọogh obho mi tạnyu obho. Keḍio, pẹzo ezira tọtolan nꞌObạmọogh obho moomo amen.
Tebum ibha bẹleni, ipinom nꞌọḅaal ologhi mọnuekpete bhobho, onyiin ạderiom monyiin.
Aburumōr, ạar olo ọga omina ọge ọnogho enyina milo igboloman nꞌamen nꞌaruḍuma ilo abaabha temute olo.
Enyina nịvo nịvo meelōghōm mobho aḍuma tObạmọogh obho tatu tekperenom kẹzo bho ọḅa nạki momiigh aviigh muḍugul obho.
Tamen olo arōoy nekōl kua, “Oomo ọkpo needeny, ịiḅaghami ilo mu,” keḍio tekperenom be pọbho ọteeny eedi. Eedi irue ḍio emuzōnaan, ẹegama bho tẹtol kạni olo odi nꞌegun eghun.
Keḍio enyina, aburumōr, ilo tọkinim molo aḍuma bho ọnogho ḍio enyina mekperenom kọḅa olo natu viigh.
Oomo enyina arōoy ilo idi tẹḅaal ootaany. Ezira ilo tọkinim uḍugul.
Tibha bho bẹleni, ezira ukoḍiiy mu kịnon arōoy, itu oḅerenu ookō alōor ezira.
Uḍugul pamen arōoy nekoḍiiy ghạ; uḍugul pamen amiim nẹze ghạ rōoy.
Keḍio ezira obo bho uru bọ milꞌẹḅaal obho, oḅerenu ookō lōor ezira. Itu ọlokia mạsuoma ologhi omōruōm nꞌetulan okpereghiom eeku ezira, ozua meghōony oḍuom ologhi ịbhelegha bho.
Ẹnaan ọson io abheleghi ezira moru ọmiinom tạlile bhꞌodi. Odi abheleghi ezira mọteeny ịbhelegha mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho,
obo bho ạtuan ezira kạbho bho molo erumolo ezira nọobho bolobolo dọbho ḍio ẹkona ezira otul nꞌodi oḍum tamen olo odi tatu.
Tebum ibha bẹleni, onyiin ạghuemi mologhi onyiin abhōbhẹ kẹzo bho enyina idi nạ bọ siibha bho.

Iiḅi aburumōr, ezōor nookiom ni molo enyina kẹnogho moghiilaan mobo bho neḍighi moḍighi tObạmọogh obho mi togbo enyina, obo bho Obạmọogh obho nạason aseeri mobhin enyina oreliom ọtughumiom enyina nạ bho.
Ịnogho zeedi mịkanya oghiilaan nꞌetulan tebum oḍighi obho eedi neḍighi obho. Oomo enyina ịtolan nꞌekima.
Sesen ni, iiḅi aburumōr, iikiom mobo ẹgbuor obho, mẹghuemi mologhi obꞌẹeḅoogh obho, mẹlogh ạvo mẹnogho mobo bho idugh tologhi omōruōm obho mẹrolom kōoy kōoy nꞌalideny alōor.
Ímōrō ghạ onyiin amulumian monyiin mọkarabh, ịitua ghạ moomo amen mẹzo olo onyiin taḍighi miiḅi ạnogho monyiin, ẹnogho nạ moomo arōoy.
Ịḅaal ologhi moomo amen,
Iikpulughu moomo amen.
Ịsebh ghạ mẸnaan toomo ẹmorokpo. Iibha pibha Ẹnaan nạva mọmiin taghuḍum enyina obo bho idi tạJizos Kraist obho.
Íḍime ghạ nyạn Ẹmugh Iigbia bho odi tenyina bho.
Iínon ghạ mẹpue mọnuekpete adōm obho tẸnaan.
Ịḍa kạar kạar meenon, mẹbham mibha ịneghe bho,
mẹkporion rạvo enyina tibha ịneghe ḍio bho.

Ezōor nookpulughu mẸnaan obo bho ạnogho ezōor mekima bho kaḍighi enyina kạneghemi toomo eḍighiom ạar, kạmaar kạbham, mẹmugh obho nꞌịitua bho nꞌiikpōogh obhꞌenyina, kaseeri molo ụmiin io bọbon ịkarabh taḍuma bho ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira tatu obho.
Odi obo bho abheleghi enyina bho taḍighi nạ ni nạ kua, ebum obho odi obi ghạ ḍio bho.
Iiḅi aburumōr, iikpulughu ạni mẹnogho ezōor.
Ipuruan moomo aburumōr obho mebhin etulan meḅolom eedi.
Ạami nạkarana tịnyaam aḍien tObạmọogh obho ạnogho enyina molo enyina ịḅele ḍio moghōl ọbhereer obhobho taghisigh oomo aburumōr obho.
Inwo tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho ẹrolan nꞌoomo enyina.
Ạami ạPol nꞌạSailas nꞌaTimoti ụge mọbhereer obhobho natuom enyina arōoy ạsosi obhꞌạTesalonika, obho iru bọ marōoy tẸnaan Ọde bho nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho.
Ẹnaan Ọde bho nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹnogho ni enyina lịsebh nꞌekima.

Iiḅi aburumōr, ịkpe ni magey molo ezōor kọsebh ghạ mẸnaan moomo amen mebum enyina, tebum obho ologhi omōruōm enyina nepōbh ni magey nꞌobho etulan obhꞌenyina, bho onyiin atulan monyiin obho, netu nạ mọbugh agey.
Iibha kiḍighi kezōor nịvo nịvo noḅuōm ni enyina magey mi tạrasosi obho tẸnaan. Ezōor noḅuōm ni enyina mobho toomo ịiḅaghami nꞌọmiinom obho nẹteeny enyina bho, enyina idi nini nẹkparam emōruōm.
Iibha nẹgba emutiom miiḅi ịiruan obho tẸnaan, mobho, toomo iibha bho nemute bho, tọḅalam ạni ni enyina moru igey arōoy tAde-Ọolema bhꞌodi. Oobho podi ạar obho enyina ịtuan bọ nẹmiinom obho.
Ẹnaan tamulumian ni kōoy kōoy, apin mọmiinom atuom obo bho nẹnogho enyina mọmiinom obho,
keḍio tạnogho ezōor nꞌenyina obo bho nẹmiinom obho mobhooghia. Odi taḍighi miibha bho taḍuma bho ạJizos Obạmọogh obho tạḍua tạnyu obho ạpamam nꞌitelema ibꞌịnyaam obhꞌodi atu obho.
Ẹnaan tapin amuumōr ạnyan ạliom mobo bho ilōghōm io zodi obho nꞌobo bho ikiilaan io mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho tạJizos Obạmọogh ezira bho.
Eedi tẹmiinom mọmiinom ọgbaranuan Ẹnaan olo ikunughi olo. Tọgbarion ni zeedi ọseghe taghisigh tObạmọogh obho nꞌibꞌeghuan obhꞌodi,

taḍuma bho odi tatu mobhin eghuan mi toomo arōoy obhꞌodi nꞌiibhughumi mi tobo bho imōruōm odi obho. Enyina ẹkona tẹtol ạni ni togbo bhꞌeedi ebum obho enyina neemōruōm dōm obho ezōor ụgba ụnogho enyina bho.

Iibha kiḍighi kezōor nookpulughu ghạ mẸnaan ọnogho enyina moomo amen. Ezōor nogbẹel ghạ zodi molo odi kạḅalam ạni enyina moḍum aghuḍum obho odi abheleghi enyina moḍum obho. Odi abhin tịnyaam obhꞌodi aḍighi amuzeniom toomo ịitua oḍighi iiḅi obhꞌenyina, amina agbẹbhẹghiōm toḍighi ologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina.
Tiibha bho, penyina orue ọnogho eghuan maḍien obho tạJizos Obạmọogh ezira bho, obhin ạni nạ todi meghuan mi tọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan ezira nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho.
Tibha igboloman nꞌoru obho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho nꞌookōbhōghian obhꞌezira nꞌodi, ạami naasen ni enyina, iiḅi aburumōr,

mọḅele okẹm ọteeny ẹmoghonyan mi tịitua enyina bolobolo ọteeny ozuum alōor omōruōm oghōl maḍuma bho tObạmọogh obho naaru atẹn. Mạar io suo, onyiin ōoy ạmiin ghịiny ạgba miibha bho ạnogho enyina, bolobolo onyiin ōoy apirisi ạnogho enyina, bolobolo mạar io suo onyiin ōoy amina ạgba ạnogho enyina aghōl mezōor ụge miibha bho mi tọbhereer.

Ímōrō ghạ nomōrō bọbon amen molo arōoy kepuughi miloghi enyina. Aḍuma bhobho oru ḍio ninii ạteeny mikunughi aḍuma omeleghu ọḍua tẸnaan obho nꞌamen olo Oōy obho ịkarabh ikunughiom todi obho, nooguanaan mosumeni odi toonu ạnyan obho naamute aru.
Odi tạgba ạpue kạar kạar olo arōoy neekpulughu, nꞌoomo ẹmorokpo ilo arōoy nẹtuom Ẹnaan. Odi taseeri lōor odi apuom oomo eedi, ạki nạ ạtol delede mi totu iikpulughu obho tẸnaan akōl nạ modi pẸnaan.
Enyina nẹetua ni gạ, mobho ạami ụgba ni moomo iibha bho ụnogho enyina men obho ạami odi nꞌenyina bho?
Keḍio, kir ạar olo aḍighi molo abaabha bho imute ḍio siibha. Enyina neelōghōm nạ zodi ạar obho. Amen olo nạateeny, podi ōoy obho ịkarabh ikunughiom todi obho omute ọman.
Ịnyaam odi Obꞌoḍighi mịkarabh obho nạake moḍighi odi, keḍio ibha temute bọ bho imute ḍio ninii ọpam otẹnẹ tọtu mObo bho ạbham bọ mịnyaam obho ạmaruom obho.
Amen opopo pamen odi ōoy obho ịkarabh ikunughiom todi obho tamute atu, keḍio ạJizos Obạmọogh obho tapin mipooghu ọnu obhꞌodi akighom zodi apiẹmi tamen obho odi tatu nꞌeghuan odi obho.
Oōy obho ịkarabh ikunughiom todi obho tapin tịnyaam taSetan atu aḍighiiy moḍigh kẹrekere ịiḍaany nꞌiben ọkpo ibꞌaruugu
nꞌoḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh ipesi mobhiẹmi obo bho tepẹ bho. Eedi tepẹ ni tebum obho eedi ipinom io etulan nạ magey obho molo kọbhel ạni zeedi.
Ẹnaan ạtuan iibha bho kạnogho zeedi mịnyaam oḍighi okōrōnuan molo eedi emōruōm mibha itu ḍio magey obho.
Molo oomo obo bho imōruōm io magey obho, kile ni mẹzaal mi tịkarabh obho, ẹteeny mapum.

Iiḅi aburumōr, ịkpe ni magey molo ezōor kọsebh ghạ mẸnaan moomo amen mebum enyina obo bho Obạmọogh obho atulan obho, ebum obho Ẹnaan ạson enyina moru ịḅel obo bho odi abhira ạbhel, obhin tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia nꞌologhi omōruōm enyina tagey obho oḍighi enyina keru miiḅi arōoy tẸnaan.
Ịḍua tooḅi adōm obho ezōor ụgba ụnogho enyina bho kẸnaan abheleghi enyina mi tiibha bho, abheleghi nạ enyina moru obhin ạni abin eghuan tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho.
Tiibha bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr, ịmaar ẹmara mẹbhamam tagey obho ezōor ụtughumiom enyina bho, mi tịigbaay obhꞌezōor nꞌibha ezōor ụge uruom enyina bho.

ẠJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho nịvo nịvo nꞌẸnaan Ọde bhꞌezira, obho atulan ezira bho kạtuan tebum ọsu aghusạn aḍien obhꞌodi kạnogho ezira mọoghuanaan ologhi nꞌagey oḍuom ologhi obho ikunughi olo bho,
emuzeni tiloghi obhꞌenyina mọoghuanaan ologhi nꞌịnyaam olo ọkpetiom nꞌoḍighiom oomo ibha ịneghe bho.
Iiḅi aburumōr, tẹzo olo ọkpete okunughiom, iikpulughu ghạ mẹnogho ezōor, molo adōm obho tObạmọogh obho tạtol ni mokẹm olela toomo ariisi obhin eghuan kẹzo bho ịrol bọ tenyina bho.
Iikpulughu nạ mẹnogho ezōor molo Ẹnaan kạbhel ezōor momuzōnaan tạravo ịkarabh arōoy obho, ebum obho oomo arōoy io mobo neemōruōm dōm obho.
Keḍio, Obạmọogh obho obi ghạ ḍio. Odi tạnogho ni enyina mịnyaam ạpel enyina ạseghe tạravo odi oḍighi mịkarabh obho.
Obạmọogh obho nạnogho ghạ ni zezōor mọoghuanaan oḍuom ologhi zenyina tibha ezōor nolōghōm mobho enyina neḍighi, teḍighi nạ ni ẹki taghisigh, mibha ezōor ụkpete ụnogho enyina bho.
Obạmọogh obho ạbham ni miloghi obhꞌenyina asiemi tetulan obho tẸnaan nꞌagey ạlikparam obho aKraist nạnogho ghạ bho.

Iiḅi aburumōr, ezōor ubhin taḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho nọkpete ọnogho enyina molo enyina kẹnyagha lōor enyina kẹseghe toomo aburumōr ilo neḍum aghuḍum ẹgbuor, obo bho ịtuonom io mịtughumiom obho ezōor ụtughumiom eedi obho.
Enyina nịvo nịvo neelōghōm mobho ịkpe ni magey molo enyina keḍighi mibha ezōor uḍighi togbo enyina bho. Ezōor ụgbuor io men obho ezōor ụrolan nꞌenyina obho.
Ạar ōoy olo ezōor ubhin olo ezōor ụkpe ḍio olo. Ezōor nịvo nịvo ukumuan ghạ nꞌalōor ezōor muḍugul nꞌootaany oḍighi moḍighi molo enyina itōbh mạkobo tẹmu ezōor.
Iibha bho ịgba ḍio mobho ezōor ụteeny io mịnyaam mobhin tenyina mibha ịgbaan ezōor mobhin tenyina bho. Ezōor uḍighi kua molo enyina kẹtuugh kẹtuonom mạraaḅa asike ezōor.
Amen obho ezōor ụrolan nꞌenyina bho, ezōor ọgba oghōl kua, “Kōoy kōoy olo ọva ḍio moḍighi oḍighi, ole nạ ḍio meḍian!”
Ezōor nọkpete miibha bho tebum obho ezōor nọmoghon mobho ẹde togbo enyina neḍum aghuḍum ạrugbuor olo iḍighi ghạ ḍio bọbon ạar, nedu ghạ mizon eedi tariḍighi ịnon arōoy.
Ezōor ubhin taḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho nookiom obo bho neḍum aghuḍum ẹgbuor obho moḍighi oḍighi molo eedi ẹmiin mạar ole.
Enyina ẹkona, iiḅi aburumōr, ighiilaan ghạ moḍighi ghạ iiḅi.

Mạar io suo, kir ẹde enyina ilo tegin moghiilaan oḍighi ibha adōm obho ezōor ụge notuom enyina tọbhereer obhobho bho. Enyina ẹmiin mōoy olo odi kua, pịnyagha lōor enyina mẹseghe todi molo ạregheer kesibh zodi.
Tiibha bho ẹkona, íseeri ghạ zodi kobo ọlokian ariḍien enyina; kpẹlen nꞌipa, iikiom zodi kumōr.
Obạmọogh obho nịvo nịvo, obo bho aru mikunughi ekima bho, ạnogho ni enyina mekima kesi kesi moomo amen. Obạmọogh obho ạrolan nꞌoomo enyina.
Ạami ạPol ubhin ạkar ạvo ạmi nạgiom miibha bho mopuruan oomo enyina. Iibha pẹzo ạami naḅiiḍiom ghạ mạvo ạmi mi toomo ịbhereer ilo ạami ụge. Iibha pẹzo ạami nạge ghạ nạ.
Inwo bho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho ẹrolan oomo enyina.
Ạami ạPol, obo bho ịḍua iru tịto tẸnaan Ọpela bhꞌezira nꞌạJizos Kraist obho ezira noḍuom ologhi obho, kạami uru monyiin oteledōm tạJizos Kraist obho,
ụge mọbhereer obhobho natuom ạna aTimoti ọony oḍigh ologhi obhꞌạmi mi tomōruōm obho.
Ẹnaan Ọde bho nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho ẹnogho ạna minwo, nꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌekima!

Tọl tẸfesos kẹzo bho ạami ụkpete ụkpaariom ụnogho ạna bho men obho ạami nạki taMasidonia bho. Ẹtede arōoy idi epa Ẹfesos molo nẹtughumiom miben ịtughumiom. Pụenaan zeedi mọtughumiom oḍigh ịtughumiom bhibha.

Kpẹte mạnogho zeedi eedi erōbh ịigbaay iiḍuul, mạkpete nạ monyiin ẹzo bho mạnogho nạ mobo bho ịge ibhin mịidoony ariḍien igbaany ạburude bho neteliom obho. Abaabha bho nepin ghạ mịkanan be etu. Ạar eḍighiom iibha bho olo mi tịitua bho tẸnaan obho nopin ghạ mologhi omōruōm olōghōm obho.
Ẹmu ạar obho ezira nọkpete miibha bho ọkpaariom obho, poḍighi etulan kemute keru tiloghi ilo ịḅaal ni ịman, nꞌagey ooḅi ologhi nꞌologhi omōruōm ilo igbẹebh ni ịman.
Ẹtede arōoy neeḍionom mạman miibha bho epẹ eḍigh tạraḍeghe araama.
Eedi nẹva moru arōoy ịtughumiom iilōgh obho tẸnaan, keḍio eedi irue ḍio mọmoghonyan ạkar ọnuekpete bhꞌeedi nꞌịigbaay obho eedi ibhin moomo ologhi obhꞌeedi kụ nẹgbaam obho.
Ezira noolōghōm mobho iilōgh obho iru miiḅi, erumolo ụbham iilōgh obho taraabōom olo iizuan mọbham.

Keḍio ezira uḅulo ḍio mobho iilōgh obho ụtuan io miiḅi arōoy kụlogh, ụtuan mobo bho nesōor ghạ miilōgh obho nꞌobo bho nẹva ghạ rạakpe bho nꞌobo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho, nꞌibꞌiḍighi mịkarabh obho, nꞌobo bho iikpulughu ghạ ḍio mẸnaan obho nꞌobo bho ilōghōm io mọkpo ạruumugh obho, nꞌarōoy obo bho nẹze bụrude mꞌaburuniin eedi obho, nꞌạruukoma,

nꞌibꞌịva rạani nꞌilobhir nꞌobo bho nẹdiom ghạ ruutu obho, nꞌobo bho nẹkpapuom ghạ rụnwuny obho, nꞌibꞌịgba miben, nꞌobo bho nẹnogho ghạ nạ miben ịigbaay obho, bolobolo nꞌịnon ọkpo ilo ikōrōnuan tagey ịtughumiom obho.
Tọmiin zodi agey ịtughumiom bhibha, mi tooḅi ọnuekpete adōm ogbōgh Ẹnaan eghuan ạlisebh obho, obho ụlogh bọ tạvo ạami mọgba olelemi obho.
Ạami nạsebh ni magey mạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho obo bho ạnogho ạami mịnyaam moḍighi oḍighi obhꞌạmi obho. Ạami nạsebh nạ zodi magey mobhin ạmi oseeriom ologhi moḍighi oḍighi ọnogho odi

toomo ibha, tamen olo neetẹn, ạami ụkpete zodi ụpue ụnogho nạ zodi mịiḅaghami, umina ụsu nạ zodi mọnu. Toomo iibha bho ẹkona, Ẹnaan ạsuanaan ni zạmi ghụsan aḍien tebum obho ạami umōruōm io, ulōghōm nạ ḍio, miibha ạami uḍighi obho.
Keḍio Obạmọogh ezira bho abhin azuughiom ạami minwo bhꞌodi tebum etulan obho tạJizos Kraist, nꞌebum obho odi ạJizos obi ghạ ḍio obho.
Oobho ạkar agey ọnuekpete olo ịmaar ni ịgbaan mobhin omōruōm, mobho ạJizos Kraist aru tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho mọbhel iḍighi mịkarabh. Keḍio toomo eedi ạami uḅẹebh apu.

Keḍio Ẹnaan ạtuan tebum eedi iibha bho ạsuanaan ạami ghụsan aḍien, molo ạJizos Kraist amutiom malideny obhꞌodi obho igbẹbh ni ịman obho mi tẹzo bho odi ạrolom ạami obꞌoḍighi mịkarabh obho moḍeeriom oomo obo bho tetu bọ momōruōm odi oḍum ạni aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo bho.
Todi ọolema bho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho, obho ụmiin ghạ ḍio obho, obho odi be aru mẸnaan obho, iibhughumi nꞌeghuan ẹrol ni ẹnogho zodi kamen kamen! Ẹrol ni nạ kua.
Ạami ụbham nạlogh tạvo onuma, ooḅi ọony obhꞌạami aTimoti, mịto ọnuekpete ạghiiny obho ụmiinom ạna kageedi obho. Pin mọnuekpete bhibha mạkpamaghia maḅiom ẹgham ạruumugh obho.
Kạaniom ologhi omōruōm onuma, nꞌooḅi ologhi. Ẹtede arōoy nẹeḅele mọmoghonyan ooḅi ologhi obhꞌeedi molo ologhi omōruōm obhꞌeedi nạagbana.
AHaimenios nꞌẠleksanda poḍigh arōoy bhibha olo ạami nạaseghe zeedi ukuugh ụlogh tịnyaam taSetan, mọtughumiom eedi molo eedi kẹḅele mọkpete Ẹnaan ọpue.
Tọḅel aliiki ạami, ạami naasen ni enyina mookpulughu ghạ oosen ogbẹel ọnogho ạlisebh mẸnaan tebum oomo arōoy,
tebum ạruula nꞌoomo arōoy ipedi obho ịteeny mịto bho, molo ezira oḍum aghuḍum alideny nꞌekima, mi toomo olōghōm Ẹnaan nꞌooḅi ạdolomaan.
Iibha bho iiḅi mi tẸnaan Ọpela bhꞌezira, eḍigh nạ tologhi odi.
Odi nạva molo kọbhel kōoy kōoy nꞌolo kōoy kōoy karu kalōghōm magey obho.
Ẹnaan onyiin be; keḍio onyiin nạ be mobo abhin mẸnaan nꞌarōoy naseeri monyiin esi. Odi ōoy obhobho pạJizos Kraist, obo bho ạseghe ghuḍum obhꞌodi ạtaam moomo arōoy obho.
Iibha nẹgba mobho, tamen olo amen obho naaru ạteeny, pẸnaan nạva molo kọbhel kōoy kōoy.
Iibha pạar obho aḍighi bọ kurōm ạami moru oteledōm nꞌobo ịtughumiom arōoy ịnon aruubhugh obho mọgba omutiom adōm omōruōm obho nꞌagey obho. Ạami ụgba ḍio miben, ạami ụkar nạgba magey obho.
Ạami nạva molo kōoy kōoy kesi kesi keebhaghami mạravo ilo ịḅaal ferere keekpulughu ghạ kẹnogho mẸnaan. Eedi iikpulughuom io mọkarabh ologhi nꞌologhi ạruruan.

Onyiin mẹzo bho nạ, ạami nạva molo ạraani kẹmaar keenona lōor kebura mibura ilo ịneghe ịgbaan nạ mobura, ịḅaraghiom io nạ moḍigh kẹrekere ibura agold mi tạsilaan nꞌalōor, nꞌibꞌạrabe, nꞌịnon oḍigh kẹrekere ibura ilo ịla mạar.
Iiḅi eḍighiom ạar ạraani ilo nẹlogh eghuan mẸnaan eru mibura bho eedi tebura ghạ.
Ạraani ẹrol ghạ bịrim bịrim, ẹmaar esōoriom lōor tesi ịtuugha bho.
Ạami ụnogho ḍio mịnyaam rạani mọtughumiom ghạ bolobolo ọrolom tẹtolom arukenya tesi olo ilobhir ạnwuny idi. Eedi ẹrol ghạ bịrim be.
Ạami nạkpete miibha bho tebum obho ubhira ụlem mẠdam keḍio ụghi mọlem aIiv.
Keḍio Ạdam nạ ḍio mobo uubiōghōm obho, ạni obho pobo uubiōghōm asōor olōgh tẸnaan.
Keḍio eedi ạraani obho tọpel ni zeedi otẹnẹmi tẹmara ạnwuny erumolo eedi ịkparam tologhi omōruōm nꞌetulan, iḍum ooḅi aghuḍum nꞌọmaar oonona alōor.
Oobho bho ọnuekpete olo nạkpete magey ạar, “Kōoy kōoy olo nagbẹel moru otẹn uvẹmụ ạsosi, naagbẹel moḍighi oḍighi olo ạla mạar magey.”

Uvẹmụ ạsosi obho aru mōoy olo ụgbaam ghạ ḍio mịkarabh. Odi abhin monyiin ạni be, aru mooḅi ōoy, nꞌọbhama alōor, nꞌooḅi ạdolomaan; odi ạmaar ghạ abhin misoloman ạloghom totu odi; ạmaar alōghōm magey mẹzo ọtughumiom.
Odi otu ḍio mọpoghol-miim, bolobolo ọva rạakpe nꞌọruan ạruruan. Odi ạmaar adeny lōor, otulan io mikpoki apu.
Odi arue ạmaar ạbham motu odi magey, aakō rụnwuny odi ẹteeny magey oghiilaan toomo ọkpo, ịsua ḍio mọnu.
Oōy olo otue ḍio mọbham otu odi tatue ni gạ ạpam mạsosi tẸnaan?
Odi otu ḍio momoom ōoy olo eede amōruōm maKraist, molo odi ọserereen rạvo tọbughia alōor ạghi aḍigh abhin ạni mapum eru obho.
Odi aru mōoy olo arōoy obo bho itu ḍio milꞌạsosi obho nekiilaan nạ zodi mịkanya, molo ụloki ḍio zodi rẹgheer odi ameel aḍigh tẹto eru obho.
Arukenya ạsosi obho ẹkona eḍum nạ mooḅi aghuḍum, ịteeny io mịzal anem. Eedi ịtol io emōobh rimiim, ẹḍogh nạ mẹḍogh okpoki.
Eedi ebhin nꞌooḅi ologhi ẹmaruom tologhi omōruōm agey obho ụgba bọ umutiom obho.
Ịḍa zeedi meenon ku, eedi neetẹn ku megbi mọnogho eedi moḍighi oḍighi arukenya bho.
Ạraani eedi ẹkona eḍum nạ mooḅi aghuḍum, ịnyoghogh io rōoy. Eedi ẹteeny ooḅi ạdolomaan ibi ghạ ḍio rōoy toomo ọkpo.
Okenya ạsosi abhin monyiin ạni be, arue nạ ạmaar ạbham mạnwuny odi nꞌotu odi magey.
Obo bho iḍighi mooḅi oḍighi obho tẹteeny mọlogh arōoy olo tẹtuonuman zeedi, nꞌọoghuanaan ologhi ọgba omutiom ologhi omōruōm obho eedi ịteeny tạJizos Kraist obho.
Ẹzo bho ạami nạge mọbhereer obhobho natuom ạna bho, ạami nạatua nạ mokẹm oru ọmiinan onuma.

Kạami abia moru, pọbhereer obho oḍighi ạna kalōghōm mẹzo arōoy teseeri lōor eedi mi tamarugh otu arōoy tẸnaan, obho aru bọ mạsosi obho tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol obho. Odi pạkpo otu obho, obho asu ạmarami bọ magey obho.
Bọbon ōoy olo tạparanaan mạlibugh ọkpo bho ezira umōruōm obho, ibha nọogba umutiom ụnogho zezira obho olo.
Odi amute aru nꞌiikpōogh alōor kōoy,
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạgba ni zodi ạneghemi,
itelema tẸnaan ẹmiin odi.
Ọgba zodi olelemi toomo aruubhugh obho,
omōruōm nạ zodi toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho,
keḍio ụsiine zodi tạnyu eghuan obho.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạkar ạmaar ạgba amutiom mobho taghisigh, ẹtede arōoy tẹsar ni etuḅeen mologhi omōruōm obhꞌeedi, ẹki ẹtol ekiilaan mạruumugh ịgba miben, nꞌọtuonuman ịtughumiom iteḍum.
Ịtughumiom bhibha iibiōghōm ịtughumiom ịgba miben arōoy ilo iloghi obhꞌeedi nẹebho, kilo ụziom momōmōgh okurōgh.
Eedi nẹtughumiom ghạ mobho iru miigbia mobhin ạni nꞌole ẹtede oḍigh eḍian obho Ẹnaan ạlem aseeri aghōl mobo bho neemōruōm iru ilōghōm magey obho, ebhin tiikpulughu ẹnogho lịsebh mẸnaan ele ghạ bho.
Kạar kạar olo Ẹnaan ạlem ạneghe ni ạman. Obhin tiikpulughu ọnogho lịsebh mẸnaan ole, ugin io bọbon ạar,
ebum obho ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan nꞌiikpulughu obho neeḍighi meḍian obho ịneghe mi taghisigh tẸnaan.
Ạna aakiom maburumōr obho miibha bho, pạna oru ugey ooḍighian toḍighi obho tạJizos Kraist suo ạna naakua lōor onuma tạruumugh obho mi tọnuekpete omōruōm obho nꞌagey ịtughumiom ibha ạna nạtuonom obho.
Kpọrion rạvo onuma tiben ịigbaay iiḍuul. Mạar ạtuugha moḍum ooḅi aghuḍum igey arōoy.
Ạsuo odi mọbam amen mọtughumiom iikpōogh alōor obho mi tasaageme, keḍio ibha ạruumugh obho ẹla mạar magey, tebum obho odi aguanaan magey aghuḍum tẹmar-arōoy obhobho nꞌobho natu obho.
Oobho bho agey ọnuekpete olo agbẹbh ni ạman mobhinom omōruōm.
Oobho pạar obho aḍighi bọ kezira uḅe magey nokumuan toḍighi obho, tebum obho ezira nooseeriom uḍuom ologhi mẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol obho, Ọpela oomo arōoy, ạkar obo bho imōruōm obho.
Kpạariom magey mạtughumiom miibha bho.

Umōrō ghạ nomōrō ōoy aanon ạna asōoriōm kẹbhi mebum obho ạna uru mọony-ughẹel obho. Kẹzo kẹzo olo ịrol, ạna ḍionom mobo bho imōruōm obho mi tọnuekpete onuma nꞌeḍighiom ạar onuma nꞌetulan onuma, nꞌologhi omōruōm onuma, nꞌooḅi ologhi.
Tọl ghạ men men mạkparam maghōl ghạ togbo arōoy mọbhereer iigbia bho mạgba mạtughumiom ghạ nạ moomo amen ninii ạami tatu.
Uunon ghạ mạpue mẹnogho bho idi tonuma bho, ibha ụnogho ạna tamen obho ụmiinom bọ zịna ghịiny karukenya ạsosi obho ịḅamaghi rạvo eedi tẹmu onuma bho.
Tụugha miibha bho mạnogho lōor onuma zeedi molo kōoy kōoy ạmiin mobho ạna naabhōbh nạki taghisigh.
Gona lōor onuma nꞌiibha ạna nạtughumiom obho. Tụugh aḍighi nạ miibha bho. Ạna tụugh aḍighi miibha bho, pạna ọbhela alōor onuma nꞌobo bho nẹmoghon mịtughumiom onuma bho.
Ụliom ghạ mokenya onuma, kpẹte ghạ mạnogho zodi kọde onuma, mạrolom mạnwuny ughẹel kaburumōr onuma,
ighudu ạraani obho kaburuniin onuma, nꞌarisina bho kạburumarani onuma nꞌooḅi ologhi.
Lọgh eghuan mobo bho ịkar iru marukpukele ạraani obho.

Kerumolo ekpukele ạni olo nạamaraghia mạnwuny nꞌolo ạnwuny odi nẹemaraghia nạ, peedi ebhira ẹtuugha totu eedi mariḍighi ạsosi obho, ẹmaar eenon zodi. Tiibha bho, peedi neḍighi emulumian mọde nꞌoniin nꞌakōkō nꞌọde akō mi talōokō bhꞌeedi. Iibha pibha iḍigh tologhi tẸnaan.
Ạkar ạni olo aru mekpukele ạni olo ọteeny io mobo oonon odi naaseeri aḍuom mologhi odi mẸnaan naakpulughu ghạ nạ muḍugul nꞌootaany nagbẹel molo Ẹnaan kạlogh ạvo kạbhel odi.
Keḍio ekpukele ạni olo ạlogh lōor odi nạabhughu tẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho nạabho atẹn toomo ibha odi odi nini napooghu obho.
Tọoghi mabaabha bho mạnogho zeedi, molo onyiin ōoy ọgbaam zeedi mịkarabh.
Kōoy kōoy olo ọmaar io aanon ạbham meghun otu odi, ạkar obo bho iru bọ milo ogbo eghun otu odi obho, nạabharanaan momōruōm obho, amina aḅẹebh nạ apu mobo bho demōruōm io bho.
Ạni olo dopel io merubal nꞌaḍisibh ạsia ụḅaram ghạ zodi tọlogh obo bho iru bọ marukpukele ạraani ạsosi obho. Lọghom mobho arughom monyiin ōoy be bho,

amina amutiom ḍien odi mi tooḅi eḍighiom ạar, nꞌobo bho ịmaar iikō rụnwuny eedi obho, nꞌobo bho nepin misoloman ẹloghom totu eedi obho, nꞌobo bho neetōl ghạ masike arōoy tẸnaan obho, nꞌobo bho nẹlogh ghạ mạvo ẹnogho mobo bho idi tọmiinom obho, nꞌobo bho ịkar bọ ịnogho lōor eedi mi toomo oḍigh kẹrekere oḍighi iiḅi obho.
Ụḅaram ghạ nọḅaram marisina ikpukele ạraani mi tọlogh obhobho ebum obho tamen olo digha ẹtal eedi momina ọḅal ilom, peedi oḍionom ạman maKraist,
peedi oru obi odi mi tọḅel oguan obhꞌeedi.

Eedi nạ ni nạ ẹtuugha morōbh amen eedi ọḍua totu otẹn totu; tilo imina iḅẹebh ipu suo, eedi tẹtol ni ẹtuugha mọnyoghogh arōoy nꞌodu izon eedi tọkpo ịnon arōoy nꞌọḍeghe ịkarabh ạraḍeghe ilo ịgbaan io mọḍeghe.

Kpẹlen nꞌiibha, ạami nạatua, ịkpe ni molo arisina ikpukele ạraani obho kemina kẹḅalagh milom kẹmaraghi rụnwuny kẹmaar kẹbham motu eedi molo obo bho ịlogh ezira ḍien obho ịteeny mịkarabh ilo ọgbaam ezira.
Ạar obho aḍighi obho keeghe? Ẹtede arukpukele ạraani obho neemina ekiraan nẹtuonom maSetan.
Kạni kạni olo naamōruōm olo ạteeny mikpukele ạraani mi totu odi, odi ạmaar ạbham eedi, ịḅam mụ dōol obhꞌeedi mi tạsosi obho, molo ạsosi obho eenon marukpukele ạraani obho idi nꞌalōor eedi obho.
Ịkpe ni magey molo arukenya ạsosi obho ibha neḍighi magey moḍighi karukenya ạsosi obho kebhin mịzal abin ạmukpe oḍighi obhꞌeedi, ạkar obo bho nekumuan mi toḍighi ọgba nꞌọtughumiom ooḅi adōm obho.
Ạar obho aḍighi obho keeghe? Ọbhereer iigbia bho nạakpete kua, “Ụghoroghi ghạ mọnu ạnam, men odi naḅunyogh mịbiakpa bho,” amina ạkpete nạ kua, “Obo aḍighi, obo ale.”
Ubhinom ghạ mịkarabh ilo ụgbaam mokenya ạsosi, tughuneen molo ạna nạamoghon tịnu ịzal nꞌịraar arōoy.
Si mạgba mamutiom togbo arōoy moomo obo bho iḍighi mịkarabh obho molo arōoy ipedi obho ekiil ruugu.
Ạami ubhin taḍien tẸnaan nꞌạJizos Kraist nꞌoomo iiḅi itelema bho tẸnaan nakirom ạna mịzo moghiilaan ịtughumiom bhibha ọḅele oonon ẹde arōoy okiemi, nꞌotulan ẹde ọḅele ẹde mi toomo eḍighiom ạar onuma.
Ukẹm ghạ mọseghe ạravo onuma ọḅamaghi tẹmu ōoy molo odi kaḍighi ạni moḍighi tObạmọogh obho molo ạna ọḍian ạni mịkarabh ịnon arōoy. Seeri lōor onuma mạḅaaleni.
Umina ghạ mạbhoghol mụum be, pọghol mịbam amiim tebum ọkarabh ọbaraka bhꞌonuma.
Ịkarabh ẹtede arōoy ịkpar io momute kọmiin, keḍio eedi ịkarabh obhꞌeedi meeḍionom zeedi taghisigh mọru ịiruan ọnogho eedi. Ibha ẹtede arōoy tebia ni keḍio tegbi momute.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, iiḅi eḍighiom ạar ịkpar ghạ ḍio momute kọmiin. Keḍio ibha ịmaar io momute kọmiin obho, ịḅokia ghạ ḍio.
Ịkpe ni magey molo ạrubana kẹnogho moomo eghuan ibha ịgbaan mọnogho ạburude otu eedi, molo onyiin ōoy ọgba mịkarabh maḍien tẸnaan nꞌịtughumiom obhꞌezira.

Ạrubana ạburude otu ilo idi ạni tomōruōm obho iinon io mạburude otu eedi ẹpue ebum obho oomo eedi neeru burumōr mi taKraist obho. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, eedi enwe meḍighiom ạar eedi epuom mịḅel obho, ebum obho obo bho neliom toḍighi obhꞌeedi obho iru marōoy ilo neemōruōm ilo eedi itulan nạ.
Tụghumiom mạgba ghạ moomo iibha bho.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạtughumiom mẹkere oḍigh ịtughumiom kạḅele momōruōm agey ọnuekpete bho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho nꞌịtughumiom iikpulughu bhꞌezira,
odi nạaserereen rạvo mi tọbughe alōor aḍigh meema. Odi nạnwe mẹzegh ịkanan nꞌạruruan mi tọnuekpete ilo nepin ghạ etu mibōbhan nꞌịipuan, nꞌitōnyōghan nꞌọteeny ọkarabh aḍien be.
Ịkanan bhibha nẹḍua ghạ etu tarōoy ilo ịitua eedi neekpo ilo ịteeny mụ nạ magey obho mi taghuḍum eedi. Eedi nẹetua ghạ ekōl mookpulughu Ẹnaan pebōom ọḅol oru ogbo ẹela.
Agey nạ, ookpulughu Ẹnaan naḍighi ghạ ni mōoy atu agbo mẹela, erumolo ibha odi ạteeny obho neegbẹbhan talōor odi.
Ezira ụbham eeghe oru tẹmar-arōoy obho? Ạar olo ezira ụbham uru olo. Kezira tọpam mẹkaraan ọḍuonom tẹmar-arōoy obho? Olo nolo nạ.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, keḍian keḍian, kukpe kukpe, olo ezira ụteeny egbẹbhan talōor ezira!
Obo bho nẹva bọ mogbo bho pobo nemeel ghạ eḍigh tọdegh oonon, nꞌoonu araama nꞌẹegama ẹebhuom ịkanya ọkpo ẹmar-arōoy obho ibha nẹnyaghagh ghạ rōoy ẹlogh tọmiinom epiẹmi bho.
Ẹḍogh okpoki nẹkom ghạ moomo oḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh etu. Ẹde arōoy ilo iḅe magey mọteeny ikpoki mesuma epẹ ẹḍua tomōruōm obho molo ịitu neeḍigh nenomi etuur miloghi obhꞌeedi.
Keḍio ạna ōoy tẸnaan, kpọrion rạvo onuma toomo iibha bho, ḅe moru ooḅi ōoy taghisigh tẸnaan, nꞌolōghōm Ẹnaan, nꞌọteeny ologhi omōruōm, nꞌetulan, nꞌọkparam alōor, nꞌalideny alōor.

Kpạrami mạvo onuma maghiil ạni meghiil obo bho imōruōm obho molo ạna apin ạnogho lōor onuma maghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho. Ẹnaan ạtuan tebum aghuḍum obhobho kabheleghi ạna ạseghe tamen obho ạna ụmara togbo arōoy ụgba umutiom mologhi omōruōm onuma bho.
Ạami ubhin ụmara taḍien tẸnaan obo bho nạnogho ghuḍum kạar kạar obho, nꞌạJizos Kraist obo bho ạmara ạgba amutiom magey obho mi taghisigh tạPontios Pailet obho, nạto ạnogho ạna
molo ạna kaghiilaan kaakō maraalōgh obho kạmaar kạghuemi ninii ạteeny ḍuma bho ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho tamute atu aganana.
Tạkar ogbo amen olo nạateeny podi Ẹnaan ạlisebh obho, obho ạteeny moomo ịto bho, ọola bho ạda moomo ạruula bho, nꞌObạmọogh obho, tughuneen zodi ḍio, ọnon olo bho tagbi mobhin odi omutiom.

Odi be mobo ọpo ghạ ḍio, odi natugh tesi ogbōgh ẹḅaal olo bọbon ōoy olo tatue ạki asi olo. Oōy olo nạamiin ghạ zodi olo, keḍio bọbon ōoy olo tatue nạ ạmiin zodi olo. Eghuan obho nꞌịikpo bho ikunughi olo bho ẹrolan ni zodi, kamen kamen. Ẹrol ni kua.

Kpẹte mạkpaariom mạnogho mobo bho iru bọ rụula ọkpo esuo ẹmar-arōoy obho meedi ịbughia ḍio lōor, iseeriom nạ ḍio moomo ologhi eedi mi tọkpo ẹela ilo ịtolan io zeedi, eedi eseeriom moomo ologhi eedi mi tẸnaan be, obo bho ọoku ghạ ḍio nạnogho ghạ zezira kạar kạar olo ịgbaan ni mobhin oḍumom ọḅaalom ologhi taghuḍum obhobho.
Mạar aakiom zeedi molo eedi keḍighi ghạ miiḅi, molo eedi kegbo mẹela mi toḍighi iiḅi, nꞌolo eedi kẹteeny mologhi inwo, nꞌọḍian nꞌịnon arōoy kạar kạar olo eedi ịteeny.
Erumolo eedi iḍighi kua, peedi okubhughi tạnyu obho oseerian alōor eedi mẹela ilo ipẹ ḍio taghisigh, keḍio eedi tegbi moru ọteeny ạni ạkar odi agey aghuḍum obho.

Timoti, mạar ạbham miibha nọologh tạvo onuma bho. Sẹghe lōor onuma mi tesi ạraḍeghe arōoy ilo ilōghōm io mẸnaan, nꞌịkanan araama ilo igboloman nꞌolōghōm ạar tẹzo bho ẹtede arōoy ilo ilōghōm io nekōl ghạ obho.
Kir ẹtede arōoy ilo nẹpam mobho eedi ịteeny molōghōm ạar molo eedi neekōrōnuan tebōom obho ibhẹ tomōruōm obho.
Ọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan ạrolan nꞌoomo enyina!

Ạami ạPol, obo bho Ẹnaan ạto moru onyiin oteledōm tạJizos Kraist, ạge mọbhereer obhobho natuom ạna aTimoti, obꞌooḅi ọony obhꞌạmi. Ẹnaan arōm ạami mọgba ghạ adōm aghuḍum obho odi aguanaan zezira obo bho itul ọnu nꞌạJizos Kraist obho. Ạlisebh nꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌekima bho tẸnaan Ọde bho nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho ẹrolan nꞌạna.

Ạami nạsebh ni mẸnaan obo bho ạami ubhin nꞌooḅi ologhi naḍighiom moḍighi ạnogho kẹzo bho ạburude bhꞌạmi iḍighi obho. Ạami nạatua ghạ ni zịna mi tiikpulughu ạmi muḍugul nꞌootaany ạnogho lịsebh mẸnaan moomo amen.
Ạami doḅulo ḍio mizin obhꞌonuma, molo ạami nạva ni magey momina ọmiinan onuma molo ạami ạteeny magey ọḅaal ologhi.
Ạami nạatua ghạ ni magey ologhi omōruōm obho ạna ụteeny obho. Oobho poḍigh ologhi omōruōm obho aLois akōkō onuma nꞌaYunais oniin onuma ịteeny obho, molo ạami ụutua ạna nạateeny ạni nạ.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, kạami namina aakiom ạna mọkpooni ẹnogho ạruumugh obho Ẹnaan ạnogho ạna tamen obho ạami ụḅamaghi rạvo ạmi tẹmu onuma bho.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho Ẹnaan ạnogho zezira bho, ẹmugh ịnyaam nꞌetulan nꞌọbhama alōor, olꞌẹroogh io.

Ughiil ghạ rẹgheer mọgba ghạ ibha tObạmọogh ezira obho. Ughiil ghạ nạ zạmi rẹgheer tebum obho ạami odi tikoli mebum odi obho. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, pin abin ọmiinom obhꞌonuma tesi ooḅi adōm obho, tibha Ẹnaan ạnogho ạna mịnyaam obho.
Odi ọbhel io abheleghi zezira moru arōoy odi tebum oḍighi iiḅi ezira. Ịḍua tịitua inwo bhꞌodi keru. Inwo bhobho odi ạnogho zezira mi tạJizos Kraist kọḅel egbiom obho,
molo esiibha noogōnōnaan ọnogho ezira mi toru obho tạJizos Kraist Ọpela bhꞌezira. Odi naabhiẹmi ịnyaam ọbho ạseghe mooḅi adōm obho ạgbaam amutiom maghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho.
Ẹnaan ạson ạami ạseghe moru onyiin oteledōm olo tạgba ạtughumiom ghạ mooḅi adōm obhobho.

Iibha kiḍighi kạami nạmiinom mọmiinom bhibha. Ạami ukiil io rẹgheer tebum obho ạami nalōghōm zodi obo bho ạami umōruōm obho. Ạami namōruōm nạ mobho odi tatue ni ạpamanaan ạami asi tikunughi aḍuma bho, mibha odi ạlogh tạvo ạmi obho.
Tụonuman magey mibha ạami ụtughumiom ạna bho kạraaḅa asike olo ạna kạtuonom, mạrolom tomōruōm nꞌetulan obho ezira obo bho utul mọnu mi tạJizos Kraist ụteeny obho.
Mạar ạbham magey obho ụlogh tạvo onuma mi tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho natugh tezira bho.
Ạna naalōghōm mobho kōoy kōoy mi tebhugh obhꞌaEsia, bọbon ạFijilos nꞌaHermojanis, iḍionom ni ạami mạman.
Ẹnaan Obạmọogh obho ạnogho ni lịsebh motu tỌnesiforos, tebum obho odi pobo ạghuemi ghạ mologhi ạmi moomo amen. Odi oghiil io zạmi rẹgheer mebum obho ạami odi tikoli obho.
Odi aru asi taRom, obhiẹmi ḍio men moru ọva ạmi ọmiin.
Obạmọogh obho ạnogho ni zodi mọsu ạghusan aḍien mi tikunughi aḍuma bho. Ạna nalōghōm moomo iiḅi obho odi aḍighi ạnogho ạami mi tẸfesos obho.
Keḍio ạna ọony ạmi, kụemi mologhi onuma mi tinwo bho ezira ụteeny mi totul ọnu tạJizos Kraist obho.
Pin moghōrōkō bho ạna ụmoghon bọ tạmi, obho ạami ụgba taghisigh oomo arōoy obho, mabhin ạnogho ạni mịnon arōoy ilo tetue ni emina ẹtughumiom mịnon arōoy.
Pin abin ọmiinom obhꞌonuma konyiin ooḅi oḅe mẹgham tạJizos Kraist.
Ugey oḅe mẹgham nạva ghạ moomo amen moḍighi ibha iḍigh tologhi uvẹmụ odi obho, ọva mụ mọguanan oḍigh aghuḍum oobho arōoy.
Okiil meghiil orue ḍio atẹn mọḅel obho erumolo odi ookō ḍio miilōgh eghiil obho.
Ooḍighian pobo tapira ale meḍian iiḅua bho.
Mạar ạatua mibha ạami nạḍeghe ạnogho ạna bho, ebum obho Obạmọogh obho tatue ni aḍighi molo ạna kạmoghonyan moomo ẹmorokpo.
Tụtua ghạ mạJizos Kraist obo bho uḅẹtōn bọ tọbho bho, obho ọobhe taDevid, kẹzo bho nọgba ghạ tooḅi adōm obho ạami nạgba bho.
Tebum ooḅi adōm obho kạami nạmiinom, nọokasiom nạ zạmi magbirigbiri konyiin ōoy olo asōor molōgh. Keḍio ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan dọkasiom io magbirigbiri.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, kạami ạkparami lōor ạmi tebum arōoy tẸnaan obho odi ạson ạḅirogh obho, molo eedi ẹkona ẹteeny ạni mịbhelegha bho idi bọ tạJizos Kraist obho, nꞌeghuan obho ikunughi olo bho.
Oobho agey ọnuekpete:
“Erumolo ezira ụbho nꞌodi, ezira tomina nạ ni oḍum nꞌodi.
Erumolo ezira urue ụkparam, ezira tọda nạ ni nꞌodi.
Ezira ọbharanaan zodi, odi ẹkona tạparanaan ni zezira.
Erumolo ezira ubi zodi, odi obi ghạ ḍio,
ebum obho odi ọgbaam ghạ ḍio miben lōor odi.”
Tụtuemi ghạ rōoy onuma miibha bho, mạmaar aakiom ghạ zeedi mi taghisigh tẸnaan mọḍua tịkarabh ịkanan. Iiḅi ilo tịkanan, neḍighi mọpue arōoy obho nẹmoghon obho be.
Kpạrami mạvo oḍighi onuma, molo Ẹnaan talōghōm mobho ạna uru mooḍighian olo ạregheer isibh ghạ ḍio toḍighi obhꞌodi, olo ạmaar aḅolom ạtughumiom mooḅi adōm obho tẸnaan.
Sẹghe lōor onuma mi tạraḍeghe araama ilo ịseghe ḍien obho tẸnaan negemiom saageme. Iibha nepirighan ghạ rōoy egbeenyeni tẸnaan.
Ịtughumiom bhꞌeedi idi kạraḅe ilo tẹḅa miikpōogh alōor obho. AHaimenios nꞌaFailitos pobo nẹtughumiom miibha bho.
Eedi nẹḍua tẹḅaal ebōom obho nẹdereghi mẹde obo bho imōruōm obho nekōl mezira nooḅerenu tọbho bho kọkanya amen.

Ade otu obho Ẹnaan naaḅol obho bọbon ōoy olo tatue aḅomi olo ọnuekpete bhibha ụge todi: “Obạmọogh obho naalōghōm mobo bho iru bọ milꞌodi obho,” keḍio, “Kōoy kōoy olo aghōl odi olo tObạmọogh obho odi tạḅele ni mịkarabh eḍighiom ạar odi.”
Togbōgh otu, oḍigh kẹrekere ạrukpa nꞌạrapani idi ghạ: ẹde ụlemom masilva nꞌagold, ẹde ụkaam miirẹeny, ẹde ụlemom mọomi. Ẹde useeri molo oḍighiom ạar, ẹde ilꞌamarugh otu.
Toseeri kōoy kōoy olo aḍighi lōor odi ạḅaaleni mi tịkarabh aghuḍum molo oḍighiom ạar, ebum obho ọde otu odi nạaseghe zodi atẹnẹ tọtu molo oḍighiom toomo iiḅi oḍighi.
Kpọrion rạvo onuma tịkarabh eḍighiom ạar ạnwuny-ughẹel, mạḅar mobo bho ibhin mooḅi ologhi ibheleghi mObạmọogh obho mọbhel eedi, maḅe toḍighi iiḅi, nꞌologhi omōruōm, nꞌetulan, nꞌekima.
Kpọrion rạvo onuma mi tịkanan araama arōoy ilo ilōghōm io mạar. Ikunughi obho ạruruan be.
Ẹbana tObạmọogh obho ọruan ghạ ḍio rụruan. Odi atulan moomo arōoy, odi aru mooḅi obo ịtughumiom nꞌalideny,
odi asōoriōm lōor kaakiom obo bho nẹgbaghan odi obho. Mạar io suo, Ẹnaan tạnogho ni zeedi mamen olo oghiraan oru olōghōm ạni agey obho.
Keḍio eedi telōghōma lōor eedi, emuzōnaan mi tạwaya bho Eru obho ạkpaari aseerian eedi obho, moḍighi ibhꞌịto odi obho.
Tụtua miibha bho. Tikunughi aḍuma bho tẹkparanaan ni rōoy magey.
Arōoy tẹeku ni mạaku, ẹḍogh mẹḍogh, eetuma miituma, ẹbughia lōor. Eedi tetōnyōgh ni, egin dōm ạburude eedi, ịgba ḍio miiḅi, ilōghōm io mẸnaan.
Eedi iḍighi ḍio miiḅi ẹsu ghụsan rōoy, tẹpueghi riḍien arōoy, eḅeeyogh ralebhir, ẹlokia ruugu alōor, eedi tẹlogh ni ḍien miiḅi ọkpo.
Eedi teḅoḍi ni rōoy, eḍighi milo eedi ịteeny ịteeny, ẹbughiaay rụumu eedi. Eedi tetulan mọkpo ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho epu mẸnaan.
Tozu alōor obhꞌeedi, eedi tepu ni be ẹtol karōoy olo nemōruōm mẸnaan, keḍio tiloghi obhꞌeedi, eedi tegin ni mịnyaam obhꞌodi. Tughuneen lōor onuma tarōoy olo idi kua.
Ẹde eedi arōoy olo neḍiku ghạ tarutu ạraani ilo idugh miloghi, epumogh zeedi ẹpue mamarugh otu eedi. Iibha ạraani ilo ịkarabh nẹeninighian talōor, ilo ịkarabh ọkpo ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho nẹnyaghagh.
Eedi nẹva ghạ moomo amen mọtuugha ạni keḍio irue ḍio modeny olōghōm ạni agey obho.
Ẹzo bho aJanis nꞌaJambris ịgbaghan ghạ maMozis obho pẹzo arōoy bhibha nạ nẹgbaghan nạ magey obho. Iibha parōoy ilo ịitua eedi nẹepila, ologhi omōruōm obhꞌeedi nạagbarara.
Eedi irue ḍio ẹghi taghisigh ebum obho kōoy kōoy tạmiin ni zeedi ạman kẹzo bho imutenaan bọ maJanis nꞌaJambris obho.
Ạna nạakpabh tịtughumiom nꞌeḍighiom ạar, nꞌibha aghuḍum obhꞌạmi, nꞌibha ologhi omōruōm, nꞌọminoghom nꞌetulan nꞌạlikparam,

nꞌịiḅaghami nꞌọmiinom obhꞌạmi mi tebum ooḅi adōm obho. Ạna naalōghōm kạar kạar ilo imutenaan ạami mi tẠntiok nꞌAikoniom nꞌaListra, nꞌobo ọmiinom obho ạami ụminoghom ni obho, keḍio Obạmọogh obho ạbhel ni ạami ạseghe toomo eedi.
Kōoy kōoy olo nạva moḍum agey aghuḍum tạJizos Kraist tạmiinom ni,
keḍio ịkarabh arōoy nꞌobo iiniom tẹtol ghạ moḅẹebh oḅẹebh ọghi taghisigh, eenioghom mịnon arōoy nꞌasilōor eedi.
Keḍio ạna, tụonom magey obho iibha nọotughumiom ạna nꞌiibha ạna ụmaar umōruōm obho. Tụtua mobo bho ịtughumiom ạna bho,
nꞌibha kamen ịbam onuma ạna naalōghōm mẹegia iigbia bho, ibha tetue ni ẹnogho ạna molōghōm ạar obhin onuma ọghi tesi ịbhelegha tologhi omōruōm obhꞌonuma mi tạJizos Kraist.

Ẹnaan abhooghuom rōoy ạnogho mịnyaam mọge ibhꞌọbhereer iigbia bho molo ịneghe ni mọtughumiom agey obho, nꞌosiom arōoy toḍighi ịkarabh, nꞌoghireni arōoy tịkarabh oḍighiom ạar, nꞌọnogho aliiki ilo oḍum agey aghuḍum,
molo ōoy tẸnaan tagbẹbh ni ạman ạnyaa moomo ọkpo olo oḍighiom ooḅi oḍighi.
Ạami ubhin taḍien tẸnaan nꞌạJizos Kraist obho tạtu mịiruan ạnogho kōoy kōoy ibha idi obho nꞌobo ụbho bho nakirom ạna mịzo tebum oru obho todi nꞌẹdaam ẹmar-arōoy obhꞌodi,
mọgba ghạ adōm obho be, tamen olo iizuan nꞌamen olo iizuan io. Ụḅele ghạ mọghi ọgba oḅurion iloghi arōoy, nꞌorubhughiom ịkarabh eedi, ọkparami iloghi eedi mi tịtughumiom alideny alōor.
Amen natu molo arōoy tegin ni mọmoghon igey ịtughumiom obho, tẹtuonuman mibhꞌologhi eedi, eekōbhōghi mọlogh obo ịtughumiom mọgba ghạ ọnogho eedi mibha iḍigh tologhi eedi obho.
Eedi teḍionom ni mạman mọmoghon agey obho keḍio tẹseghe lōor obhꞌeedi eseere mọmoghon ghạ iben ịigbaay.

Keḍio ạna, mạar ạkparami malōor onuma, toomo ẹmorokpo. Kụemi mologhi onuma tọmiinom, maḍighi moḍighi kōoy olo nạgba ghạ mooḅi adōm obho. Usugheeny ghạ bọbon ạar mi toomo oḍighi obho Ẹnaan ạnogho ạna moḍighi obho.
Ạami nị dụgh, nạateeny mamen olo ạami kạḍua taghuḍum obhobho. Nạateeny mamen olo tozu ịḅaal ạmi kẹzo bho nozu miim ọnogho mẸnaan.
Ạami naaḅe magey elebhir. Ạami naaghiil meghiil obho asi tikunughi. Ạami naakō maraalōgh omōruōm obho.

Keḍio esiibha abin ọḅel obho teghiil obho naḅōrō ạami. Obạmọogh, obho aru bọ mooḅi ọtu mịiruan obho tazu ni zạmi meghōony oḍighi iiḅi mi togbōgh aḍuma bho. Odi ozuom io zạmi be, tazuom ạni ni moomo obo bho neḅōrō zodi netulan, tamen obho odi tamute atu obho.
Ubia ghạ moru ọmiinan ạami.
ADimas maaḅolom ẹmar-arōoy obhobho agin ạami. Odi nạaḍua akẹel tạTesalonika. AKreskens ạghi taGaletia, ạTaitos ạghi taDalmesia.
ALuk be mobo odi nꞌạami. Pin mạMak maruom ạami, tebum obho odi tatue ni ạpel ạami toḍighi obho.
Ạami naarōm mạTikikos mọghi tẸfesos.
Men olo ạna natu, pạmam makōti obho ạami uḅulo taTroas totu tạKarpos obho maruom ạami. Pin mọbhereer obho nạ maru, nạkar ibha ụge bọ tozu ịnam obho.
Ạleksanda ọlem mọlem obho aḍighi ạami mịkanya ịkarabh. Obạmọogh obho tạkpe ni amulumian zodi tibha odi aḍighi obho.
Ạna, gona lōor onuma mi todi, ebum obho odi ạkar ni nẹgbaghan magey mọgba ọpue adōm obhꞌezira.
Bọbon ōoy olo ạmara mọbhel ạami tamen obho ạami nạgbaaghian obho olo. Kōoy kōoy ạḅele ni ạami ạḍua. (Ạami naakpulughu molo Ẹnaan ọḅam io tẹmu eedi miibha bho.)
Obạmọogh obho ạrolan ni ạami ạnogho ạami mịnyaam molo ạami urue ni ụgba umutiom madōm obho ụnogho moomo obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho, keḍio odi ạbhel ạami ạseghe tọnu odumunuḅụạgụ obho.
Odi, Obạmọogh obho tạpel ni ạami mi toomo ịkarabh, ạde lōor apin ạami asiemi tAde-Ọolema bho tẸnaan. Eghuan ẹrol ẹnogho zodi kamen kamen. Ẹrol ni kua.
Puruan maPrisila nꞌẠkuila nꞌeghun otu tỌnesiforos.
Ẹrastos odi tạKorint, keḍio ụḅele mạTrofimos mi taMailitos, ebum obho alōor odi ọneghe ḍio.
Ḍighi maru tạmi kạteeny mamen uuta.
AYubulos nꞌaPudens nꞌaLinos nꞌạKlodia nꞌoomo aburumōr obho epuruan ạna.
Obạmọogh obho ạrolan nꞌẹmugh onuma.
Ạlisebh tẸnaan ẹrolan nꞌoomo enyina.
Ạami ạPol ẹbana bho tẸnaan nꞌoteledōm obho tạJizos Kraist nạge mọbhereer obhobho.
Ẹnaan arōm ạami mọghuemi ghạ ologhi omōruōm obo bho Ẹnaan nạason ạseghe moru arōoy odi obho, molo eedi elōghōm magey ịtughumiom obho nenyeeneni tooḅi aghuḍum obho.
Iibha bho idi toḍuom ologhi aghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho. Ẹnaan obho ọgba ghạ ḍio miben obho aguanaan zezira maghuḍum obhobho kọḅel egbiom obho.
Ạteeny tạkar agey amen obho, podi ạgba amutiom maghuḍum obhobho mi tadōm obhꞌodi. Ẹnaan Ọpela bhꞌezira ạlogh tạvo ạmi dōm obho keḍio ạami ụgba ulelemi.
Ạami ụge natuom ạna ạTaitos ọkar agey ọony obhꞌạmi obho ezira ụteeny monyiin ologhi omōruōm obho.
Ẹnaan Ọde bho nꞌạJizos Kraist Ọpela bhꞌezira ẹnogho ni ạna lịsebh nꞌekima!
Ạami ụḅele ạna taKrit moḍighi oselemi ọkpo bho ịkpe bọ moselemi obho, nꞌọsonogh arukenya ạsosi oseeri toomo ạraama bho. Tụtua mibha ạami ụkpete ụnogho ạna bho,

mobho ịkpe ni molo ụmiin io mịkarabh mi tokenya ạsosi nꞌolo odi karu molom onyiin ạni be, nꞌạnwuny odi momōruōm Ẹnaan, molo eedi iḍum io mọkarabh aghuḍum olo oghōl eedi ạnwuny obheeny bolobolo ạnwuny iḍim.

Ebum obho odi naḍighi moḍighi tẸnaan obho, odi uvẹmụ ạsosi bho aḍum aghuḍum olo ụmiin io mọkarabh talōor odi. Odi ọbughia ḍio lōor, ọteeny nạ ḍio mọkarabh ologhi. Odi oḍimighia ḍio miim, oḅe ḍio ralebhir, ooniom io miiniom.
Odi aghuruom rōoy, atulan iiḅi. Odi aru mooḅi ōoy olo nạpama lōor odi, aḍighi magey moḍighi odi, ạtuugh aḍighi mibha iizuan obho.

Odi ạmaar ạtuugh aḍighi mibha agey ọnuekpete bho ụtughumiom obho; tiibha bho podi orue ọlogh ạvo ọnogho ịnon arōoy mi tagey ịtughumiom obho, podi orue nạ oḍeeriom obo bho nẹkanan tagey obho mesi obho eedi neekōrōnuan obho.
Ọlogh obo ịkanan idi ilo ịseghe mapa ọnuekpete eedi neebiōghōm mịnon. Iibha bho ịkar edi tobo bho ịḍua tiikpulughu arōoy aJu obho iru imōruōm maKraist obho.

Nẹeneghe moogbo okpẹrẹmi anem obhꞌeedi, ebum obho eedi nẹnogho mịiḅaghami toomo arughun otu olo eedi iḍigh nẹtughumiom mibha iizuan io obho. Ạregheer idi tebum obho eedi ịtuan mebum ikpoki ku nẹtughumiom mibha bho.
Onyiin ozil aKrit nịvo nịvo pobo ạkpete kua, “Arōoy aKrit ịgba miben nꞌịnam imutiom ḍien nꞌibꞌạraḍogh ịgbuor mẹgbuor.”
Iibha bho odi ạkpete bho agey. Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, si zeedi mịkanya molo eedi ẹteeny mologhi omōruōm olo aḍum ni ạman,
nꞌolo eedi imina mu emula ẹtuonuman miben ịigbaay arōoy aJu obho nꞌịto arōoy obo bho neegin magey obho.

Kạar kạar ạḅaal ni ạneghe ạman taghisigh obo bho ịḅaal ni ịneghe ịman obho. Keḍio bọbon ạar olo ạḅaal ạneghe tobo bho ịḅaal io ẹneghe nꞌobo bho imōruōm io obho olo, ebum obho ịitua eedi nꞌiloghi eedi neeḅẹebh.
Eedi nekōl ghạ meedi elōghōm mẸnaan, keḍio eḍighiom ạar eedi ịgba ḍio kua. Eedi nẹlokia ḍien nꞌọḅaar ẹmu. Igbẹbh io nogbẹbh moḍighi bọbon onyiin ooḅi ạar.
Keḍio ạna, mạar abhin ạkar agey ịtughumiom obho mạtughumiom mibha iizuan obho.
Kpẹte mạnogho marukenya bho eḍighiom ạar eedi ipẹlẹghōm io mibha nọva bọ bho, eedi ẹteeny eegu alōor, ẹmaar ẹbhama lōor eedi, ẹmaar ẹghua tologhi omōruōm nꞌetulan nꞌọkparam alōor eedi.

Tụugh nạ mẹzo bho mạkpete mạnogho mighudu ạraani obho eedi ẹteeny eḍighiom ạar ạraani ilo neḍum ooḅi aghuḍum. Eedi ịpueghi ḍio riḍien arōoy iḅoolaan io lōor eedi miim. Eedi ẹtughumiom ibha ịneghe bho,
molo arisina bho ẹtuugha teedi motulan aburulom nꞌạrunwuny eedi,
nꞌolo eedi tẹmaar ẹpama lōor, eḍum ooḅi aghuḍum, etu miiḅi ạraani ilo tekiilaan ni maburulom eedi, molo ōoy ọgba ḍio mịkarabh ạḅam tọnuekpete bho tẸnaan.
Tụugh nạ mẹzo bho mạkpete mạkpaariom nwụny ughẹel obho mọmaar ọbhama alōor eedi.
Ạna nịvo nịvo ẹkona, toomo ẹmorokpo, tu mōoy olo ịnon arōoy tẹtuonuman mạraaḅa asike ooḅi oḍighi onuma. Ubhin ghạ mịtughumiom obhꞌonuma maḍighi kilo ạraḍeghe be.
Kpẹtiom agey ikpo ọnuekpete olo utue ḍio ọgba ọpue molo obo ọlokian ariḍien onuma ẹlokian ni rẹgheer tibha eedi ịteeny io ịkarabh ọgbaam ezira.
Kpẹte mạnogho mạnwuny otu obho eedi eghiilaan mạburude arutu eedi, emina eḍighi ghạ nạ mibha teḍigh tologhi ạburude otu eedi obho. Eedi imulumian ghạ ḍio mọnu,
imiinyogh nạ ḍio viigh. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, eedi emutiom lōor eedi kugey arōoy olo oḍuom ologhi mi toomo ibha eedi teḍighi obho, tẹgba miiḅi mịtughumiom obho tẸnaan Ọpela bhꞌezira.
Ẹnaan naamutiom inwo ịbhelegha bhꞌodi ạnogho moomo arōoy.
Odi inwo bho nạtughumiom ezira mọḅele oḍum aghuḍum olo ulōghōm io mẸnaan nꞌọtuonuman ọkpo ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho, oru oḍum aghuḍum ọbhama alōor, ọmara, olōghōm Ẹnaan mi tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho,
tẹzo bho ezira noḅōrō maḍuma ạlisebh obho ezira noḍuom ologhi obho, obho eghuan ogbōgh Ẹnaan obhꞌezira nꞌạJizos Kraist Ọpela bho temute etu obho.
Odi aḍighi lōor odi atẹnẹ mạar aghuḍum ạnogho zezira molo ezira komuzōnaan toomo omutiom aḍien, keḍio aḍighi ezira atẹnẹmi miiḅi arōoy odi olo nẹva ghạ moḍighi iiḅi be.
Tụghumiom ghạ moomo ibha bho mabhin mọoghuanaan ạvo bhꞌonuma mạghuemi ghạ miloghi arōoy, mamina masiom mobo bho nẹmoghon ịigbaay onuma bho. Umōrō ghạ onyiin eedi aanon ạna akiemi.
Tụtuemi ghạ rōoy onuma eedi eghiilaan ẹmoghonyan rụula bho nꞌobo ịto bho, ẹmara moomo amen moḍighi oḍighi olo ịkpe moḍighi.
Kpẹte mạnogho eedi, eedi ịgba ḍio mịkarabh mōoy. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, eedi ẹrol tekima nꞌetulan nꞌalideny eḍighiom ạar toomo arōoy.

Tamen olo neetẹn ezira uḍum aghuḍum araama, oghiilaan olo, keḍio oḍighi ghạ mibha ịkpe ḍio moḍighi obho. Ezira uru mạrubana oḍigh kẹrekere ọkpo ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho. Ezira ubhiẹmi ghuḍum ezira oḍum aghuḍum ọlokian ariḍien nꞌibōbhan. Ịnon arōoy ịlogh ezira ḍien, keḍio ezira ụlogh ạni zeedi ḍien.
Amen Ẹnaan Ọpela bhꞌezira aḍighi amutiom ọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌetulan obhꞌodi, podi ạbhel ezira atẹnẹmi.
Ebum oḍighi iiḅi olo ezira kuḍighi ḍio, odi ạtuan mebum ọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi kodi abhin mẸmugh Iigbia bho nạnwe ghạ zezira ạmar, ạnogho momoom aghuḍum obho kạbhelom aatōl ịkarabh ezira.
Ịḍua tạJizos Kraist Ọpela bhꞌezira kẸnaan azuughiom ezira mẸmugh Iigbia bho alelemi,
molo odi abhin minwo obhꞌodi kaḍighi ezira moru ugey arōoy mi todi nꞌolo ezira kọteeny ạni maghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho, obho ezira noḍuom ologhi obho.
Obhobho agey ọnuekpete.
Ạami nạva molo ạna kạkpaariom magey ọnuekpete bhibha, molo obo bho imōruōm mẸnaan obho ẹnogho lōor eedi moḍighi ghạ oomo amen mooḅi oḍighi. Iibha bho ẹneghe ni, ẹkpe nạ rōoy.
Kpọrion rạvo onuma tịkanan araama ọrol ọḅalagh ịidoony ariḍien ạburude, ọruanogh ạruruan, oḅe tilo igboloman nꞌaraalōgh obho. Bọbon ạar oḍighiom ibha bho olo, eedi apa be.
Ḅigh ịzal amen mạragba ōoy olo naḍighi mọveleghi aburumōr ạsosi obho kụ magbi mọkporion alōor onuma mi todi.
Ạna naalōghōm mobho ōoy olo odi kua maabhẹ, nꞌobho ịkarabh odi nẹegba zodi imutiom.
Amen olo ạami urōm mẠrtemas bolobolo ạTikikos moru ọteeny onuma, kpạram maru mạteeny ạami mi taNikopolis, ebum obho ạami nạatua mọghi epa ọrol tamen uuta bho.
Kpạram mạlogh ạvo mạnogho mạZenas ōoy araalōgh obho nꞌẠpolos moḅetunu erele bhꞌeedi, mạnogho nạ zeedi kạar kạar olo eedi igbẹel.
Tụghumiom rōoy ezira moḍighi ghạ ooḅi oḍighi moomo amen ọloghonaan ạvo mobo bho ịteeny ạni ḍio mạar obho. Eedi iḍum io maghuḍum aruubheeny.
Oomo obo bho idi eebha nꞌạami obho epuruan ạna. Puruanaan ezōor mạburubolol ezōor obo bho ịteeny mologhi omōruōm obho.
Ẹnaan ạnogho moomo enyina lịsebh.
Ạami ạPol obo bho ụtuan bọ mạJizos Kraist kodi tikoli obho, nꞌaTimoti umōr obhꞌezira, nọge mọbhereer obhobho notuom ạna aFailimon, ooḅi ọbulol nꞌọḅarama toḍighi obhꞌezōor,
nꞌoomo arōoy ạsosi obho neekōbhōghian ghạ eekpulughu mi totu onuma bho, nꞌẠfia ụmarani ezōor nꞌẠkipos obho atul nꞌezōor naḅe ạnogho maKraist obho.
Ẹnaan Ọde bhꞌezira nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹnogho ni enyina lịsebh nꞌekima!
Kamen kamen olo ạami naakpulughu, ooḅi umōr obhꞌạmi aFailimon, ạami ụḅele ghạ ḍio moghōl aḍien onuma ọsebh Ẹnaan obhꞌạmi,
tebum obho ạami nạmoghon ghạ ni mẹzo ạna utulan moomo arōoy obho tẸnaan, nꞌologhi omōruōm obho ạna ụteeny tạJizos Obạmọogh obho.
Ạami naakpulughu ghạ molo ookōbhōghian obhꞌezōor nꞌenyina kobo bho imōruōm obho, epin etu magey ọmoghonyan toomo ạlisebh obho ezira ụteeny bọ taghuḍum ezira mi tạJizos Kraist obho.
Etulan obhꞌonuma, ooḅi umōr aFailimon, nẹenogho ạami mogbōgh ọḅaal ologhi nꞌagey ọoghuanaan ologhi tẹzo bho ạna naaḍighi nạnogho ghuḍum ọḅaal ologhi moomo arōoy tẸnaan obho.
Tebum iibha bho, nꞌobho ạami uru mumōr onuma mi taKraist, ạami kutue ni ạto ạnogho ạna mibha ịgbaan bọ moḍighi obho,
