keḍio etulan obho omōrō ḍio nomōrō. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ạami ukiton naasen ni ạna. Toomo iibha bho ạami ạPol oponoma bho tạJizos Kraist obo obho odi nạ siibha tikoli obho mebum odi obho, ụteeny nạ ni mịnyaam moḍighi iibha bho,
molo ạami naasen ni ạna mebum Onisimos, obho naaru mạkar ọony ạmi mi taKraist obho. Suo ạami odi tikoli obho, ạami naaru mọde odi mi tạruumugh obho.
Tamen olo neetẹn, ạar olo ạna ụteeny moḍighiom odi olo, keḍio esiibha bho odi nạala mạar tonuma nꞌạmi, kẹzo ẹmu aḍien obhꞌodi.
Ạami naamulumi zodi natuom ạna siibha. Odi naaru kạkar ekpom ạmi.
Eḍigh tologhi ạmi moseeri odi tạmi suo ạami odi tikoli obho mebum adōm obho, molo odi kạlogh mạvo kạnogho ạami tesi onuma.

Tiibha bho ẹkona, ạami ụva ḍio mobhin obꞌekpo aḍien opuom onuma mọlogh ạvo ọnogho ạmi, kpẹlen nꞌipa, ạami nạva molo ạna kạtuugh mibhꞌologhi onuma aḍighi, molo ạar olo ạami taḍighi olo, tughuneen nꞌolo ạami ụmoghonyan ạna.
Mạar io suo, Onisimos ạḍua tonuma mọbam amen molo odi kamula karu kạrolan ạna moomo amen.
Esiibha bho odi ẹbana mụ be ḍio, odi naapu mẹbana. Esiibha odi naaru mooḅi umōr onuma mi taKraist. Odi ạla mạar tạmi. Odi tạla nạ ni mạar apu suo tonuma, kẹbana nꞌạkar umōr mi tObạmọogh obho.
Tiibha bho, tẹzo bho ạna naaḍigh nꞌạami tonyiin oḍighi obho, pupin odi mạloghom kẹzo bho ạna tapin ni ạami ạloghom obho.
Erumolo odi aḍighi ạna mịkarabh bolobolo ale mọmugh onuma, pụḅal mạḅam tẹmu ạmi.
Tesuo, ạami tạseghe mạkar ạvo ạmi kạgiom “Ạami ạPol tạkpe ni amulumian ạna.” (Ạami ụva ḍio mọotuemi onuma mobho aghuḍum obhꞌonuma aru mọmugh olo ạna ule tạmi.)
Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, ooḅi umōr ạmi, ḍighi miibha bho mạnogho ạami tebum aḍien tObạmọogh obho. Ḅạaleni mologhi ạmi kumōr mi taKraist.
Ạami nạakar alōghōm mobho iibha bho ạami ụge natuom ạna bho, ạna tạtuugh ni aḍighi, amina aḍighi nạ apuom suo.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, ụḅele ghạ mọva ẹkpe otu oseerian ạami, tibha ạami naḍuom ni mologhi mobho Ẹnaan tạmoghon ni miikpulughu oomo enyina ạnogho ạami mem omula oru tenyina bho.
Ẹpafras obo bho nꞌạami udi tikoli tebum aḍien obho tạJizos Kraist obho apuruan ạna.
ẠMak nꞌẠristakos nꞌaDimas nꞌaLuk obo bho itul nꞌạami neḍighi moḍighi obho, epuruan nạ ạna.
Inwo tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho ẹrolan nꞌoomo enyina.
Kageedi mobho Ẹnaan abhin ịnu arizil obho ạkpete ghạ mạar ạnogho bụrude ezira mọlogh amen mi toḍigh kẹrekere araabōom,
keḍio esiibha ikunughi aruḍuma bho, odi nạkpete ạnogho ezira mi tọnu Ọony obhꞌodi, obho ịḍua todi iru kẸnaan ạlem ẹmar-arōoy obho nꞌobho odi ạson ạseghe mọteeny ẹmoogh oomo ẹmorokpo bho.

Ẹḅaal eghuan obho tẸnaan idi nꞌodi, molo odi nꞌẸnaan akẹrẹkẹrẹ olo nolo, molo odi abhin oghōrōkō ọnuekpete ịnyaam obhꞌodi nạpamam oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho. Amen odi aḍighi rōoy ạḅaaleni mi tịkarabh obhꞌeedi, podi ạsiin tạnyu obho ạrol delede toḍiom ạvo tẸnaan obho ạmoogh oomo ẹmiriikpo bho.
Ẹnaan naaḍighi aseeri mỌony obho apuoghom mitelema bhꞌodi, kẹzo bho aḍien obhꞌodi apu nạ mibhꞌeedi obho.
Ẹnaan dọkpete ghạ ḍio ạnogho monyiin otelema bhꞌodi aghōl kua,
“Ạna Ọony ạmi,
aadon ạami Ọde onuma.”
Odi dọkpete ghạ nạ ḍio ạnogho monyiin otelema bho aghōl kua,
“Ạami tatu mỌde odi,
odi atu mỌony ạmi.”
Tamen obho Ẹnaan natōm mọkpana Ọony obhꞌodi moru tẹmar-arōoy obho, odi ạkpete nạ kua,
“Kotelema kotelema tẸnaan aakpulughu zodi!”
Tilo igboloman nꞌitelema bhꞌodi, odi ạkpete kua,
“Ẹnaan ạnogho mitelema bhꞌodi nꞌạnwuny oḍighi obhꞌodi mịnyaam oḍighi ịto bhꞌodi,
aḍighi eedi ạghuemi kọpibha nꞌạnyan.”
Keḍio tilo igboloman nꞌỌony obho odi ạkpete kua,
“Ẹtolom nꞌẹḅu ọdaam ẹma bhꞌonuma Ẹnaan ikunughi olo,
ịiruan obhꞌonuma ịikpalaghia ḍio.
Iiḅi eḍighiom ạar pibha iḍigh tologhi onuma, keḍio ạna ụlogh ḍien mịkarabh eḍighiom ạar.
Iibha kiḍighi kẸnaan, ạkar Ẹnaan obhꞌonuma ạson ạna ạseghe,
ạnogho ạna lịsebh ọḅaal ologhi nꞌeghuan ilo ipu mibhꞌaburugbo onuma.”
Odi ạkpete nạ kua,
“Ạna, Obumọogh, ụlem kạar kạar tesuo ade bho kọḅel egbiom obho,
keḍio ạna ụseghe mạkar ạravo bhꞌonuma ụlemom mạnyu obho.
Ạnyu obho nꞌade bho tepẹ ni ẹḍua, keḍio ạna tạtol nị.
Oomo eedi teḅu ni karukpe.
Ạna takpōr eedi kọota, keḍio eedi tenwian karukpe.
Keḍio ạna tạtol monyiin ẹzo bho ạna odi obho,
ạlukpo otuan io talōor onuma.”
Bọbon amen olo Ẹnaan nạakpete ghạ ạnogho monyiin otelema odi aghōl,
“Tọl suo delede toḍiom ạvo ạmi,
ninii ạami atu aḍighi mobo ọlogh aḍien onuma etu moḅeleriom asike onuma” olo.
Ilōghōm mobho itelema bhibha, oomo eedi iru mạruumugh ạnwuny adōm tẸnaan mọlogh ạvo ọnogho obo bho tepin mịbhelegha odi obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ezira ọmaar ọkaaniom ibha ezira nọomoghon obho, molo ạmuum ogbōrōm ezira ạḍuonom.
Eru kạar olo adōm obho itelema bho ịgba bho iru magey, nꞌobho kōoy kōoy olo aḍighi akōrōnuan nọtuugh ghạ nị ọliom,

ezira toḍighi ẹko komuzaan erumolo ezira uunon utughuneen ḍien mi toḍigh ịbhelegha bhobho ọnon olo aaleeny olo bho? Obạmọogh obho abhira ạgba amutiom mịbhelegha bhibha, keḍio obo bho ịmoghon tọnu odi obho iḍighi imutiom ịnogho ezōor mobho iru magey.
Ẹnaan ẹkona, abhin ịnyaam ạvo aḍighi ọkpo ịiḍaany nꞌeemōogh nꞌoḍigh kẹrekere ọkpo ibꞌaruugu, ạḍi mẹnogho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho rōoy kẹzo ịto bhꞌodi, ạmara ạgba nạ amutiom.
Itelema bho ḍio mobho Ẹnaan ạnogho mịnyaam mọda ẹmar-arōoy obho natu obho, obho ezira nọḍeghe bho.
Kir esi olo ụḍeghe tọbhereer iigbia bho ughōl kua,
“Oōy kẹkaraan molo ạna ụseghe zodi urōol kua tẹmu onuma,
bolobolo ọony ōoy, molo ạna ubhin odi naanon kua?
Ạna uḍighi zodi asōoriōm ịbam molo itelema bho ipu odi mịbam mọbam amen be.
Ạna naazu zodi meghōony eghuan nꞌiibhughumi ibhꞌạruula,
aḍighi zodi mọda kạar kạar.”
Esiibha odi nạda kạar kạar obho, bọbon ạar olo olo tạravo odi olo. Ẹzo bho idi siibha bho, ezira ụmiin io mōoy mobho nạda kạar kạar siibha,

keḍio ezira nọmiin mạJizos obho uḍighi tọbam amen itelema bho ipu zodi mịbam, molo tọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan odi ạpo ạnogho moomo arōoy. Ezira nọmiin mobho noozu zodi meghōony eghuan nꞌiibhughumi siibha tebum ọbho bho odi ạmiinom obho.

Iḍigh tologhi odi Ẹnaan be, obo bho ạlem ạbham kạar kạar tạvo odi obho, moḍighi olo ạJizos uvẹmụ ịbhelegha bho kagbẹbh kạman mi tọmiinom, mobhin ọlogh ạnwuny keru kebhin ạni bin eghuan obhꞌodi. ẠJizos obo nạpam eedi ạloghom tịbhelegha.
Keḍio odi obo bho naḍighi rōoy ạḅaaleni mi tịkarabh eedi obho, nꞌeedi obo nooḍighi ụḅaaleni obho, oomo eedi ịteeny monyiin Ọde. Pạar obho aḍighi bọ kodi okiil io rẹgheer moghōl eedi aburumōr odi,
kẹzo bho odi ạkpete ạnogho mẸnaan obho,
“Ạami tạgba ni ḍien obhꞌonuma ạnogho burumōr ạmi,
ạmoor sọor abuom ạna mi togbo arōoy.”
Keḍio amina ạkpete kua,
“Ạami taseeriom moomo ologhi ạmi mi tẸnaan.”
Keḍio amina nạ ạkpete kua,
“Ạami odi suo nꞌạnwuny obho Ẹnaan ạnogho ạami obho.”
Tebum obho ạnwuny bhibha iru rōoy ilo ịteeny miikpōogh nꞌịḅaal obho, podi ạJizos abhin ạni nạ moḍigh alōor obhꞌeedi, molo odi apin tọbho odi apiẹmiom mịnyaam ọbho obho idi teru obho
nꞌolo odi ạpel mobo bho ịtuan aruugu ọbho iḍiku rụbana toomo aghuḍum eedi obho.
Oōy olo olōghōm io olo, mobho odi otu ḍio mọbhel itelema bho, aru mọbhel ạnwuny ọobhe tEbrạhạm.

Iibha bho nẹgba mobho iizuan ni zodi moru ọrol kẹzo kẹzo olo aburumōr odi ịrol, molo odi atu muvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua ọsu ạghusan aḍien eedi, olo obi ghạ ḍio mi toḍighi obho tẸnaan keḍio ubhin odi ụboromiom Ẹnaan mọḅelemaan ịkarabh arōoy.
Ebum obho odi nịvo nịvo ạmiinom amina nạ aḍigh tọdegh oonon obho odi tatue ni ạpel mobo bho idi tọdegh oonon obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr mi taKraist, ibha Ẹnaan naabheleghi nạ ạseghe bho, ịitua ghạ mạJizos, oteledōm nꞌuvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho kẹzo bho ezira omōruōm obho.
Odi obi ḍio mobo bho ạson odi ạseghe bho, kẹzo bho aMozis obi ḍio mẸnaan mi toḍighi odi mi teghun otu tẸnaan obho.
Keḍio eghuan ibha tạJizos ipu ạni nị kua mibha taMozis kẹzo bho obo bho aḅōgh motu obho naḍigh ghạ meghuan apu motu obho.
Kotu kotu ōoy aḅōgh keḍio Ẹnaan pobo aḅōghi moomo iibha bho.
AMozis ạrol kọony otu mi teghun otu tẸnaan molo ạgba ghạ amutiom mọkpo bho idi tologhi tẸnaan mọkpeteey obho, obi ḍio nobi.

Keḍio aKraist obho aru mỌony olo oomo ọkpo eghun otu tẸnaan idi tạravo odi obho, obi ghạ ḍio. Ezira peghun otu obhꞌodi, erumolo ezira ụmara useeriom oomo ologhi ezira mi tọkpo bho ezira moḍuom ologhi obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ẹrol kẹzo bho Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạkpete bho,
“Enyina ẹmoghon moghōrōkō tẸnaan dodon,
íḅulughia ghạ raḅeri enyina kamen obho ạburude enyina irubhe mọḅaar-ẹmu ịnogho mẸnaan obho,
mi taḍuma bho eedi ịlogh Ẹnaan mi tọdegh oonon mi tobꞌeekpu eḍum ọosaar obho.
Tesuo, pesi eedi ịlogh ạami mi tọdegh oonon,
toomo ibha eedi ịmiin moḍighi obho ạami uḍighi taghisigh eedi merubal ạsia bho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, pạami uḅẹebhẹni mologhi ạmi ụnogho mọoke popo,
ụkpete kua, ‘Eedi nẹpionuman ghạ nị nị be mi tibhꞌologhi eedi,
eedi dẹtuugha ḍio elōghōm raabōom ạmi.’
Molo ologhi ạmi aḅẹebh ạami ughir ịzo ughōl kua, ‘Eedi iḍigh mu tobhooghia bhꞌạmi.’ ”
Tiibha bho bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr, igona lōor enyina molo onyiin enyina ọteeny ọkarabh ologhi olo omōruōm olo, aḍionom ạman mẸnaan obho aḍum nị ạrol kamen kamen obho.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, onyiin ạlogh ạvo ạnogho monyiin moomo aḍuma, kẹzo bho ezira ụmoghonyan mẹmu “adodon” obho, molo ịkarabh iibiōghōm enyina ẹlogh tọḅaar-ẹmu enyina.
Ezira nopin ạni bin mi taKraist, erumolo ezira ụmaar umōruōm tọḅel ọoghuanaan ologhi obhꞌezira usi tikunughi.
Ẹegia iigbia bho ạkpete kua,
“Enyina ẹmoghon moghōrōkō tẸnaan dodon,
íḅulughia ghạ raḅeri enyina kamen obho ạburude enyina irubhe mọḅaar-ẹmu ịnogho mẸnaan obho.”
Ikōr arōoy mobo bho ịmoghon bọ moghōrōkō tẸnaan kirubhe ni mọḅaar-ẹmu ịnogho zodi obho? Eedi obo bho aMozis areliom amutiom tebhugh obhꞌIzipt obho ḍio gạ?
Ẹnaan ạle ạnogho mikōr arōoy moomo erubal ạsia? Obo bho iḍighi mịkarabh, ibha imeleghu ịbhozu tobꞌeekpu eḍum obho ḍio gạ?
Ikōr arōoy mobo bho Ẹnaan aghir ịzo aghōl meedi iḍigh io tobhooghia bhꞌodi obho? Obo bho ịḅaar bọ mẹmu ịnogho odi obho ḍio bẹle?
Enyina nẹmiin, ebum obho eedi imōruōm io bho kiḍighi keedi irue ḍio moḍigh ạni.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, suo nọoḅelemaan ezira moguan obhꞌodi molo ezira kọghi koḍigh kobhooghia bho, pitu oghiilaan nꞌeegu aḍien molo ụva ọmiin mobho onyiin enyina otẹn ạni ḍio aḍigh tobhooghia bho.
Ebum obho ezira nọomoghon kẹzo bho eedi ịmoghon nạ mooḅi adōm obho. Iiḅi olo adōm obho eedi ịmoghon obho aḍighi ạnogho eedi olo, ebum obho eedi ipinom io nꞌologhi omōruōm obho.
Ezira obo bho noomōruōm obho pobo noḍigh tobhooghia bho. Idi nạ kẹzo bho odi ạkpete bho,
“Ạami naaghir ịzo tạlile bhꞌạmi akōl kua,
‘Eedi iḍigh mu tobhooghia bhꞌạmi.’ ”
Odi ạkpete miibha bho toomo ibha aruḍuma oḍighi obhꞌodi neesi tikunughi kamen obho odi ạlem bọ mẹmar-arōoy obho.
Tonyiin esi mi tọbhereer iigbia bho ụkpete kua milo igboloman nꞌogbẹbhiōm oḍual aḍuma bho, “Ẹnaan abhooghia toomo ariḍighi obhꞌodi, mogbẹbhiōm oḍual aḍuma bho”
Keḍio odi amina ạkpete nạ kua tesuo, “Eedi iḍigh mu tobhooghia bhꞌạmi.”
Ịḅel obo bho ibhira ịmoghon mọnuekpete ooḅi adōm obho iḍigh ạni ḍio tobhooghia bho, ebum obho eedi imōruōm io bho. Toomo ipa ẹkona, kir ẹde ilo ụḅelemaan moḍigh ạni tobhooghia bho.
Iibha bho nẹgba mobho Ẹnaan naagu mọnon aḍuma aseeri, “Aadon.” Odi ạkpete miibha bho kageedi mi tọnu taDevid mibha ezira nooghōl ghạ tọbhereer iigbia bho,
“Enyina ẹmoghon oghōrōkō tẸnaan dodon,
irubhe ghạ mọḅaar-ẹmu mẹnogho mẸnaan.”
Ughōl aJosua areliom ni rōoy obho aḍighom tobhooghia bho tẸnaan bọ, Ẹnaan kụḍeghe mụ milo igboloman nꞌọnon aḍuma.
Ẹzo bho idi obho, aḍuma obhooghia odi nini nꞌarōoy tẸnaan;
molo kōoy kōoy olo aḍigh tobhooghia bho tẸnaan, pobhooghia nạ tariḍighi obhꞌodi kẹzo bho odi abhooghia tariḍighi odi obho.
Itu oḅe magey molo ezira oḍigh ạni tobhooghia bho tẸnaan, molo onyiin ezira ọteeny ạni mọḅaar-ẹmu obho ạḅele moḍigh tobhooghia bho.

Ilōghōm mobho oghōrōkō bho tẸnaan odi nꞌaghuḍum naḍighi mọoghuanaan oḍighi, nꞌobho arōbh ni apu mạmugem ẹgham ịzal ạman, naagbooy kua be nwạny nwạny nwạny mesi obho utul maghuḍum nꞌẹmugh ōoy obho, nꞌesi obho igibh obho nꞌịikpo bho iizuan obho, ạtu mịiruan ạnogho mibha idi tiloghi arōoy obho.
Bọbon ạar olo totue ọḅoki mẸnaan olo. Kạar kạar olo odi ạlem ukpẹerōn ni oseeri mozōol taghisigh odi obo bho ezira tọmaranuan ọgba kạar kạar olo ezira uḍighi ọnogho bho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, itu ọbham ọghuemi mibha ezira umōruōm obho, tebum obho ezira nọoteeny muvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua olo ọnon olo aaleeny olo bho, obho naaḍigh ạghi tạkar aghisigh tẸnaan obho. Odi, ạJizos Kraist Ọony obho tẸnaan.
Uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bhꞌezira ōoy olo otue ghạ ḍio mọsuanaan ạghusan ezira obo bho asilōor obho idugh obho ḍio. Odi ōoy olo ụdegh zodi uunon toomo araabōom kezira keḍio ịkarabh olo odi ạpiom olo nolo.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, itu, uzuum io lōor, otirom ọghi otuan ạni mẹtolom ọdaam ẹma bho tẸnaan obho ạlisebh idi obho, molo ezira ọteeny ọsu ạghusan nꞌaluunwo ilo ọlogh ạvo ọnogho ezira kamen kamen olo ezira nogbẹel.
Kuvẹmụ kuvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua nọson ghạ togbo arōoy ọseghe mobhin taḍien eedi oḍighi oḍighi ọnogho Ẹnaan, nꞌoḅo iiḅua ọnogho aluunwo ootōl ịkarabh arōoy obho.
Odi naalōghōm mẹzo ọminoghom nꞌobo odi nịvo nịvo ạteeny ạni nạ medughom alōor obho.
Ebum obho alōor odi nịvo nịvo nadugh ghạ nạ nị obho, odi oḅo ḍio miiḅua ạnogho mẸnaan milꞌịkarabh arōoy obho be, odi taḍighi ạni nị milꞌịkarabh odi.
Bọbon ōoy olo taḅum eghuan uvẹmụ oḅo miiḅua bho ạlogha talōor odi olo. Ẹnaan pobo napeleghi ghạ kẹzo bho odi abheleghi mEron obho.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, ạJizos Kraist oḅum io ni atẹn muvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho. Odi obo bho ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi,
“Ạna Ọony ạmi, ạami Ọde onuma dodon”, obho ạson odi ạseghe.
Odi amina ạkpete nạ kua tọnon esi,
“Ạna tatu mōoy iiḅua kamen kamen,
koḍigh ōoy iiḅua obho tạMelkizedek.”

Taghuḍum odi mi tiikpōogh obhꞌodi, ạJizos abhin timulughu eḍi nꞌizin aakpulughu agbẹel obo bho tatue ni ạpel ạseghe odi tọbho bho mọbhel odi. PẸnaan ạmoghon oghōrōkō bhꞌodi tebum osōoriōm alōor obhꞌodi nꞌeegu aḍien obho odi ạnogho zodi Ẹnaan obho.
Toomo ibha odi aru mỌony tẸnaan obho ẹkona, odi abhin tọmiinom obhꞌodi ạtuugha moghiilaan.
Amen uru uḍighi zodi agbẹbh ạman, podi aru mebōom obho oomo obo bho ighiilaan odi obho tẹteeny mịbhelegha olo kamen kamen,
suo Ẹnaan abhin zodi amutiom moru uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua koḍigh ōoy iiḅua obho tạMelkizedek obho.
Ịkanya ọkpo idi mọḍeghe ilo igboloman nꞌiibha bho, molo ẹkpar magey mọgba ẹmu obho omutiom tebum obho enyina ikẹm ghạ ḍio mọmoghonyan ọkpo bho.

Esiibha nẹeneghiom molo enyina kẹtughumiom mịnon, keḍio enyina negbẹel ni mobo kạtughumiom enyina mịḅel ikpo A B C D ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan. Kpẹlen nꞌolo enyina kenomi mikpo araḅōkō, enyina nẹmaam ni mạamaam.
Kōoy kōoy olo nạmaam ni mạamaam, odi nini mọony ạvo, olo dolōghōm io mịkarabh nꞌiiḅi.
Ikpo araḅōkō aḍian arōoy ilo neegbẹbh mẹmu, obo bho nẹelogh ẹmu eedi ịinama ilōghōm makẹrẹkẹrẹ ịkarabh nꞌiiḅi obho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, itu orōbh mạ A B C D ịtughumiom obho taKraist orele ọghi taghisigh ogbẹbh ẹmu olꞌezira. Ezōor umina mu ọke tẹḅel egbiom obho, mọtughumiom enyina moghiraan tiḍim aghuḍum ẹmar-arōoy obho ạar oḍighiom olo bho momula oru omōruōm Ẹnaan,
nꞌilo igboloman nꞌozua ạmuum nꞌọḅamaghi ạravo tẹmu, nꞌoḅerenu tọbho bho, nꞌọru ịiruan.
Itu ọghi ghạ taghisigh be. Iibha pibha ezira toḍighi, erumolo Ẹnaan ạlogh ạvo ạnogho ezira.
Ẹkpar magey momina omulumi obo bho neemeel ịḍua tomōruōm obho, eedi keghiraan tịkarabh eedi, eedi obo bho neeḍigh ghạ tẹḅaal, ịinama mẹnogho bho tẸnaan, ịteeny ạni bin tẸmugh Iigbia bho.
Eedi nẹenama elōghōm mobho ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan aru mooḅi, elōghōma nạ talōor eedi mịnyaam aghuḍum obho natu obho.
Keedi ẹḍua tẸnaan, tẹkpar ni magey momulumi eedi, ebum obho eedi neemina nẹkan mỌony obho tẸnaan mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho ẹloki nạ zodi rẹgheer obho.
Ẹnaan nạnogho lịsebh made bho nạpoghol ghạ mẹlebhe bho nạlobhom zodi obho momute eḍian ọnogho obo bho uḅẹbhanaan obho.
Kodi ade bho asi miiḅulom nꞌịigho be, pạar oḍighiom odi olo. Amen itōnyōgh odi natuan, keḍio ikunughi obho, odi olo ọsu ạnyan.
Keru nạ molo ezōor nọḍeghe miibha bho, iiḅi aburumōr, ezōor nọotua ạar olo teḍighi enyina olo. Ezōor noolōghōm mobho nọosebhom enyina miiḅi ọkpo mi tịbhelegha bhꞌenyina.

Ẹnaan olo kọkarabh ọola otu ạkoti. Odi oḅulo ḍio moḍighi obho enyina neeḍighi obho, bolobolo etulan obho enyina netulan odi mi tọlogh ạvo bho enyina ịlogh, kenyina nemina ni nạ nẹlogh, ẹnogho maburumōr enyina mi taKraist obho.

Oomo ibha ezōor nọva bho, pilo oomo enyina, kōoy kōoy ạmara aḍighi amutiom monyiin odi ibha enyina ibhin ịkiom tọḅel egbiom obho, ninii enyina esi tikunughi obho molo enyina elōghōm mạkar ibha enyina neḍuom ologhi obho.
Ezōor ụva ḍio molo enyina keru rōoy ạrugbuor. Ezōor nọva molo enyina kẹta rōoy ibha imōruōm mẸnaan nꞌalideny ịghi ibhin mibha odi Ẹnaan aguanaan obho.
Amen obho Ẹnaan aguan bọ mEbrạhạm moguan obho, ẹzo bho ọnon olo apu odi olo odi kabhin ḍien odi kaghirom ịzo olo bho, podi aghiran nꞌalōor odi,
ạkpete kua, “Ạkar agey nạ nị, ạami tạsebh ni ạna, ạnogho ạna mọlogh ạnwuny tạman onuma.”
Talideny nꞌọkparami alōor obho tEbrạhạm, podi abhin moguan obho tẸnaan.
Amen olo ōoy natu moghir ịzo napin ghạ taḍien ọnon ōoy olo apu zodi akirom, keḍio tobo bho ighiran ịzo bho, ịzo pobo nasōbh ghạ rạakpe ịkanan.
Ẹnaan ạva moḍighi omutiom oḍeeriom molo obo bho tepin bọ moguan obho kelōghōm mobho odi onwe ḍio moguan obhꞌodi podi ạḅaram nꞌịzo.

Ịzal bhibha ibha inwean ghạ ḍio bho pibha iḍighi kulōghōm mobho Ẹnaan ọgba ghạ ḍio miben, molo nẹkuemi ezira obo bho nooḍigh ạḍigalaga eḍigh-otu mi todi obho mọmaar oḅolom oḍuom ologhi obho odi taghisigh ezira bho.
Oobho pobho ạmaar ạbham ạkpo maghuḍum obhꞌezira koghuugh olo ụkasiom agbirigbiri oḍuom ologhi olo aḍigh kakpiribh ki tologhi ạman oḅile ukpe bho usōbhōm mẹkpe iigbia obhꞌạnyu obho.
ẠJizos naatẹnōm ghạ zezira ạki aḍigh mi tesi ezira. Odi naatẹn muvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua kamen kamen kẹzo oḍigh ōoy iiḅua, ạMelkizedek.

Odi ạMelkizedek obhobho ọolema ạSalem nꞌōoy iiḅua tẸnaan obho ạbugh bọ apu obho. Ẹzo bho Ebrạhạm ạḍua natughẹel mi tẹgham obho odi ạghi ạzeey rụulema bho, podi ạMelkizedek aru ạmiinan odi ạnogho zodi lịsebh.

Ebrạhạm aru ạḍi moomo ọkpo bhꞌodi ḍiōbh abin, ạseghe bin ạnogho zodi. Ọḅel ẹmu aḍien odi ughōl “Ọola olo ạneghe ni ạman taghisigh tẸnaan.” Nꞌẹzo bho ughōl nạ zodi ọolema ạSalem obho, pẹmu aḍien odi ughōl nạ “Ọolema ekima.”
Eghun otu odi, nꞌọde odi nꞌoniin odi ụgba ḍio, ulōghōm nạ ḍio mamen nꞌẹzo ụmar odi nꞌọbho odi. Odi odi kỌony obho tẸnaan, odi mōoy iiḅua kamen kamen.
Enyina nẹmiin mẹzo odi ạbugh asi. Ebrạhạm onyiin obꞌọde arōoy aJu obho ạḍi moomo ọkpo odi mi tẹgham obho ḍiōbh abin ạseghe bin ạnogho zodi.

Keḍio oomo ạnwuny ọobhe taLivai, ibha neḅo miiḅua bho, ụto ụnogho mi taraalōgh obho mobhin ghạ onyiin abin mi taḍiōbh abin ọkpo ibha arōoy aIzirẹl ịteeny obho. Iibha bho nemōrō kua meedi ebhin tạkar aburumōr obhꞌeedi, toomo ibha eedi iru nạ mạnwuny ọobhe tEbrạhạm obho.
ẠMelkizedek olꞌọobhe taLivai io, keḍio odi abhin nạ nị nạ monyiin abin mi taḍiōbh abin ibha Ebrạhạm ạteeny obho, ạnogho zodi obo bho naabhin moguan tẸnaan obho lịsebh.
Ẹzo ọgba olo, obo bho nạnogho lịsebh obho apu ạni nị kua mobo bho napin lịsebh obho.
Tamen arōoy iiḅua aLivai obho, arōoy ilo nẹebhozu ibhin bin taḍiōbh abin arōoy obho, keḍio tamen tạMelkizedek, ōoy olo odi nꞌaghuḍum abhin, kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạgba bho.
Noolōghōm mobho aLivai obo bho abhin ghạ tarōoy bin mi taḍiōbh abin obho aḍigh ạni nạ nꞌEbrạhạm ạnogho ạni nạ bin odi.
Dọmar io zodi aLivai men ạMelkizedek ạghi ạmiinan bọ mEbrạhạm obho.

Tẹzo bho ụseghe rōoy aLivai moru arōoy iiḅua bho kọlogh olōgh obhobho ọnogho marōoy aIzirẹl. Kughōl oḍighi arōoy iiḅua aLivai obho ịneghe nị ẹman bọ, kugbẹel mụ mọnon oḍigh ōoy iiḅua olo odi kạMelkizedek momina omute oru, kulegheri kụtolom marōoy Eron obho.
Ẹzo bho noonwe meghun-otu arōoy iiḅua bho, iizuan ni nạ monwe olōgh obho.
Odi obo bho ụkpete miibha bho nogboloman obho, olꞌọnon eghun-otu olo deḍighi ghạ ḍio moḍighi mi tẹede iiḅua bho.
Bọbon ōoy olo olōghōm io mobho ạJizos aru molꞌeghun-otu aJuda olo. Tilo igboloman nꞌoḅo iiḅua, bọbon ạar olo aMozis ạkpete milo igboloman nꞌeghun-otu obhobho olo.
Iibha bho nẹemaar emute kua gōogh tamen obho ọnon oḍigh ōoy iiḅua olo odi kạMelkizedek amute aru obho.
Ubhin io taraalōgh nꞌeḍighiom ạar arōoy kotẹnẹ zodi mōoy iiḅua. Ubhin tịnyaam aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo otẹniōm odi.
Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua, “Ạna tatu moḍigh ōoy iiḅua kamen kamen kạMelkizedek.”
Ebum obho ugbaany olōgh obho ọkua ḍio, ạar oḍighiom olo nạ bho, pụḅughe tọtu.
Araalōgh obho taMozis bọbon ạar olo arue moḍighi ọneghemi olo, keḍio esiibha noobhin otu moḍuom ologhi olo ạneghe apu olo ezira tọḅol ọki otuan Ẹnaan.
Oobho bho ughōl io ughirom io mịzo. Amen obho utẹnẹ marōoy ipedi obho marōoy iiḅua bho ughirom io mịzo.
Keḍio ạkar odi oobho bho Ẹnaan aghirom odi mịzo ạkpete kua,
“Obạmọogh obho naaghir mịzo, olo odi onwe ḍio,
‘Ạna tatu mōoy iiḅua kamen kamen.’ ”
Oobho bho aḍighi mạJizos aru mọbhaghaam ịzo olo ạneghe apu ạni nị kua.
Ọnon akẹrẹkẹrẹ odi. Arōoy iiḅua ipedi obho ịka nị be, ebum obho eedi ịbhozuuy itue mu moḍighi oḍighi obho.
Keḍio ạJizos odi kamen kamen, molo oḍighi oḅo iiḅua bhꞌodi utẹnẹ ḍio mọnon. Odi tạvo odi kamen kamen.
Iibha neeḍighi molo odi natue ni siibha bho nꞌoomo amen mọbhel obo bho ịḍua todi ku netu tẸnaan obho, ebum obho odi aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen naakpulughu mẸnaan ạnogho zeedi obho.

Ẹkar eezuan molo ezira kọteeny muvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua olo odi kua, olo bọbon ịkarabh ilo, ọteeny nạ ḍio mịghor ạman, ọpuena nạ ḍio lōor odi mi tịkarabh, olo ụgbarion zodi mi tịkarabh arōoy, keḍio ulegheri ụsiine zodi upẹlōghōm mạnyu obho.

Odi olo karuvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua ipedi obho mọtun ghạ ạar ọnogho Ẹnaan moomo aruḍuma, obhira ọtu ạar ịkarabh ẹmu odi kogbi ọtun ibha ịnon arōoy. Odi ạtun mạar monyiin amen be, ọnon amen olo, tamen obho odi ạtunom mạar lōor odi obho.
Araalōgh obho taMozis ịson rōoy ilo igbẹbhan io moru aruvẹmụ arōoy iiḅua, keḍio ọnuekpete ịzo bho, obho araalōgh obho ibhira iru obho, ịson ịseghe mỌony obho naagbẹbh ạman kamen kamen obho.
Ạkar ogbogbo ẹmu odi ạraḍeghe bho poobho: ezira nọoteeny mạkar uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua olo odi kua, obho odi delede mi toḍiom ạvo ẹtolom ọola bho ạsiiniom bọ apu mi tạnyu obho.
Ạkar esi ibꞌiigbia bho pesi odi odi naḍighi moḍighi uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho, tạkar otu iikpulughu obho ụkasiom marukpe ōoy oḅōgh io bho, Obạmọogh obho nịvo nịvo kaḅōgh obho.
Kuvẹmụ kuvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua, ụson useeri mobhin aluunwo arōoy ọtunom ạar ọnogho Ẹnaan. Tiibha bho bẹleni, uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bhꞌezira tạteeny ạni nị mạar obhin ọtunom ạar ọnogho Ẹnaan.
Odi odi ni tesuo ade bho bọ, bọbon ạar olo kuḍighi odi aru mōoy iiḅua olo, tebum obho arōoy iiḅua idi nẹtunogh mọkpo ẹnogho mẸnaan tẹzo eḍighiom ạar araalōgh arōoy aJu obho.
Oḍighi obhꞌeedi mi tesuo ade bho idi kafoto nꞌiikōogh ibha idi tạnyu obho. Idi nạ kẹzo bho, amen obho aMozis natu mọkasi otu iikpulughu obho ụkasiom marukpe bho Ẹnaan ạto ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi,
“Uḅulo ghạ bọbon onyiin ạar, tụugh aḍighi mẹzo bho uḍeeriom ạna mi tạnyu obꞌeegum obho.”

Keḍio ẹzo bho idi obho, nọonogho maKraist moḍighi oḍighi iiḅua olo apu ạni nị kua mibhꞌeedi, kẹzo bho ịzo bho odi aghiran rōoy nꞌẸnaan obho ạneghe nạ apu mobhꞌeedi obho, ebum obho ịzo bhꞌodi ughirom toguan ọkpo ilo ịneghe nạ ipu obho.
Ughōl ọḅel ịzo bho ạneghe nị ạman bọ kugbẹel mu mogbẹbhiōm ịzal.
Ẹnaan nạamiin mobho arōoy obho neeḍighi ikōrōnuan tịzo bho kodi ạkpete kua,
“Obạmọogh obho nạakpete kua,
maruḍuma netu molo odi tanwe akiran ịzo marōoy aIzirẹl nꞌoghōol otu taJuda.
Ọrol mụ kịzo bho ạami ughiran nꞌạburude eedi obho,
mi taḍuma bho ạami ụbham eedi tạvo umutiom togbo ade ebhugh aIzipt obho.
Eedi ịbham io mịzo bho ạami ughiran nꞌeedi obho,
molo ạami uunon eedi utughuneen ḍien, pẹzo Obạmọogh obho ạkpete.
Oobho odi ịzo bho ạami takiran nꞌeghun otu taIzirẹl obho.
Obạmọogh obho ạkpete kua, maruḍuma bhibha neetẹn pọno ọlogh araalōgh obhꞌạmi mi tiloghi obhꞌeedi,
ọgiom tekpom obhꞌeedi,
keḍio ạami tatu mẸnaan eedi,
eedi etu marōoy ạmi.
Onyiin eedi olo tamina ạtughumiom mọnon olo mu.
Oōy olo tamina ạkpete nạ kua ạnogho mọnon mu
‘Lōghōm Obạmọogh obho,’ olo mu.
Oomo eedi telōghōm ni ạami ẹman,
ạseghe tọbam asi togbōgh.
Ạami tạteeny ni mọsu ạghusan aḍien mi tịkarabh eedi,
aḅulo kịkarabh kịkarabh ilo eedi iḍighi.”
Tạraḍeghe ilo igboloman nꞌimoom ịzo bho Ẹnaan naaḍighi mọḅel obho atẹnẹ mugbaany ạar. Keḍio kạar kạar olo naatẹn mugbaany nạkaghanyu tapẹ ni ạḍua.
Ạkar odi ọḅel ịzo bho ạteeny nạ maraalōgh ẹzo ookpulughu Ẹnaan nꞌotu iikpulughu olo arōoy iḅōgh nọpam ghạ ni okitonom.
Todi otu iikpulughu obho osōbh ọnon ẹkpe olo ughōl ẹkpe iigbia. Tologhi obho, ọtodi nꞌizebele nꞌạbred obho ụnogho mẸnaan obho.
Tạman ogbẹbhiōm ịzal ukpe bho ụkpo usōbh obho, pesi ẹkpe bho ughōl bọ ẹkpe ibꞌiigbia bho odi.

Tologhi obho ẹede agold obho nọsu ghạ mọkpo ooḅi eḍu obho nꞌeḅina ịzo bho obho oomo odi nọomaar uḅologhom magold obho, mibha idi. Tologhi eḅina bho okōtō agold nꞌạmanna mobho idi, nꞌẹḅu obho tEron obho naasi sigo bho, nꞌịzal iibolom ạrubharakpar obho ụge mịzo bho.
Tạnyu eḅina bho ạKerubim ịmara ẹseghe masubhōm obhꞌeedi ekpereghiom mesi ọḅelemaan ịkarabh obho. Oobho amen ọgba kạar kạar ọman tiibha bho ḍio.
Pẹzo ụmaar ụtooghi mọkpo bho usereghi. Tọḅel ẹkpe iigbia bho pesi arōoy iiḅua bho neḍigh ghạ eḍighi moḍighi eedi moomo aruḍuma.

Keḍio tẹkpe bho ikunughi obho uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua bho be naḍigh ghạ men mẹmu ạla. Odi nạpam ghạ mạzara aḍighom mọtunom ạar ọnogho Ẹnaan tebum ịkarabh odi nꞌịkarabh ibha arōoy obho iḍighi ịpionuman taghisigh tẸnaan obho.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho abhin ạgba amutiom tịitooy bhibha mobho ebōom ọḅol oḍigh tẹkpe ibꞌiigbia bho doghuuron io tamen olo obꞌukpe bho ụkpo usōbh obho odi nini.

Iibha bho iikōogh ibhꞌạnyu obho mọnogho ạnwuny ọoke obhobho. Iibha bho nẹgba emutiom mobho aluunwo ọtun ạar obho nꞌọtunom ịnam ọnogho mẸnaan obho itue ḍio moḍighi ologhi obo bho naakpulughu mẸnaan obho kagbẹbh kạman.
Iibha bho igboloman nꞌariḍian ole, nꞌịpoghol, nꞌoḍigh kẹrekere eḍighiom ạar ọḅaaleni alōor. Iibha araalōgh ozu alōor obho, ibha ụrol noḅōruōm mamen Ẹnaan tatu anweeghi moomo ẹmorokpo bho.

Keḍio tamen obho aKraist aru aḍighi muvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua iiḅi ọkpo bho neeru obho, podi ạḅol tebōom otu iikpulughu obho agbẹbh nị ạman obho, amina nạ ạneghe apu obho, obho uḅōghōm io rạvo, obho namōrō akōl muḅōgh io tesuo ade bho,
aḍigh tẹkpe ibꞌiigbia bho monyiin amen be. Odi oḍighom io mịḅaal ivel bolobolo ilo ạnam ọtunom ạar obho, odi ạseghe kụ mạkar ịḅaal odi abhin ạtaam ezira kamen kamen.
Eru kạar olo ịḅaal ivel nꞌạranam, nꞌịiru ọtun ạar obho ụsu nyạn mọony ạnam obho, ụseghe ụsaraghiom rōoy obho neḍighi eedi obo bho neeru rōoy ẹeniir tẹzo eḍighiom ạar eedi obho nẹḅaaleni,

kịitua mẹzo ịḅaal taKraist teḍighi esi, odi obo bho abhin tẸmugh obho ọpo ghạ ḍio bho ạtunom lōor odi mạar ạnogho mẸnaan tilo ịkarabh ịkpabh io nẹkpabh zodi obho, tạḅaaleni miloghi obhꞌenyina mi tiimughaan ọkpo moḍighianaan oḍighi mẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, odi aKraist pọokpaany omoom ịzo bho, molo obo bho Ẹnaan naabheleghi obho epin ạni bin oguan ạlisebh obhꞌodi ibha tẹtol kamen kamen obho. Iibha bho temute ni kua tebum obho ōoy nạabho mọta eedi mi tịkarabh obho eedi iḍighi tọḅel ịzo bho.
Kamen kamen olo ụmoghon mọnuekpete ikunughi ōoy nọgba ghạ nị omutiom mobho odi obo bho ạkpete bho nạabho.
Ọnuekpete ikunughi ōoy ọla ḍio mạar tamen olo odi odi nini nꞌaghuḍum, odi nạabho keḍio togbi mọtuom ạar.
Iibha kiḍighi kobhin nạ mịḅaal oḍighiom mọḅel ịzo bho ọneghemi.
Tamen olo aMozis naaghōl moomo araalōgh obho ạnogho rōoy obho, podi ọseghe ịḅaal ạnam nꞌivel obho, nꞌạmuum, nꞌokōkōgh awul nꞌoḅẹerōm etẹrẹ ọsaraghiom ạkar odi ọbhereer obho nꞌoomo arōoy obho,
ọkpete ekua,
“Iibha ịḅaal ịzo bho Ẹnaan aghiran enyina bho.”
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mobho odi aMozis tạsaraghiom mịḅaal obho motu iikpulughu obho nꞌoomo ọkpo obho idi totu iikpulughu obho.
Agey nạ nị, taraalōgh obho, ịbam isughō kōl kạar kạar ubhin ghạ mịḅaal koḍighi ọḅaaleni, molo uzu ḍio mịḅaal ọḅelemaan ịkarabh olo.
Iibha bho iru miikōogh ạkar ọkpo ibha idi tạnyu obho milo iizuan nị moḍighi emutiom ọḅaaleni kẹzo bho nạ. Keḍio ạkar eedi ọkpo bho idi tạnyu obho negbẹel mọtun ạar ilo ịneghe ạni nị kua ipu.
AKraist oḍigh io tẹkpe iigbia olo uḅōghōm rạvo arōoy, obho aru mookōogh agey obho, odi ạghi aḍigh tạnyu Ẹnaan obho nịvo ịvo, tesi obho odi odianaan ezira mi taghisigh tẸnaan obho.
Uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua arōoy aJu obho aḍigh ghạ tẹkpe iigbia moomo kạla kạla nꞌịḅaal ilo itu ḍio milꞌodi, keḍio aKraist ọtunom io lōor odi mạar mọlokor amen,

iru ḍio kua bọ, kōl kamen obho ụlem ẹmar-arōoy obho odi nạamiinom mọlokor amen. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, odi amutiom lōor odi monyiin amen be tamen olo ọoke oomo amen natuan tikunughi mobhin ọtun ạar alōor obhꞌodi ootōlōm ịkarabh.
Onyiin amen be mobho ōoy tạpo, keḍio ipa neetẹn pẸnaan ọru ịiruan ọnogho odi.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ mobho ụtunom mạar maKraist mootōl ịkarabh ọlogh arōoy. Odi tamina ni atu mogbẹbhiōm ịzal amen. Ọtuan mụ mịkarabh arōoy karu, tatu mọbhel obo bho neḅōrō zodi obho.

Araalōgh arōoy aJu obho iikōogh iiḅi ọkpo ibha netu taghisigh obho be, ạkar eedi agey obho ḍio. Ạla ạgba mạla atẹn, onyiin odi ọtun ạar obho mobho nọtun ghạ kamen kamen. Keedi araalōgh bhibha teḍighi ẹko kepin ọtun ạar obhobho eḍighi rōoy obho netu tẸnaan obho ẹneghe ẹman?
Kughōl obo bho neekpulughu mẸnaan obho nẹeḅaal ẹman mi tịkarabh eedi, eedi kilōghōma mu mobho eedi neeḍighi mịkarabh, pọtun ọkpo ẹkona kiḍigh teḍum.
Keḍio tọtun ọkpo bhibha, nẹetuemi rōoy obho mịkarabh eedi moomo kạla kạla,
ebum obho ạzara ạranam nꞌivel itue ḍio eetōl mịkarabh arōoy etughuneen obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, tamen obho aKraist natu moru tẹmar-arōoy obho, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho mẸnaan,
“Ạna ọva ḍio mobhin ịnam ọtunom ọkpo ọnogho onuma,
keḍio ạna uru ụseghe lōor ōoy ụnogho ạami.
Obhin ịnam ọsu ạnyan ọman ọtunom ạar mi tẹede bho nꞌọtun ạar mootōl ịkarabh iḍigh io tologhi onuma.
Keḍio ạami umulumian kua zịna,
‘Eey Ẹnaan, oobho ạami, moḍighi ibha idi tologhi onuma bho,
kẹzo bho nọogianaan ạami mi taraalōgh obho.’ ”

Tibha odi abhira ạkpete kua aghōl, “Mobhin ịnam ọtunom ạar ọnogho onuma, bolobolo ọtunom ạar mịnam ọsu ạnyan tẹede bho, nꞌọtun ạar mootōl ịkarabh, ạna ọva ḍio, iḍigh nạ ḍio tologhi onuma” bho uḍighi tẹzo ịto araalōgh obho.
Keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua, “Eey Ẹnaan, oobho ạami, moḍighi ibha idi tologhi onuma bho.” Tiibha bho pẸnaan ạka mugbaany obho momutiom omoom obho.
Ebum obho ạJizos Kraist aḍighi mibha idi tologhi tẸnaan obho, pịḍua tọtun ạar obho odi ạseghe lōor odi ạtunom obho, aḍighi aatōl oomo ezira ạḅaaleni mi tịkarabh ezira monyiin amen be.
Oomo arōoy iiḅua aJu obho ịmara ghạ moomo aḍuma eḍighi moḍighi oḅo iiḅua ọtun ạar ilo iitōl io ẹseghe mịkarabh ōoy moomo amen.
Keḍio aKraist aḍighi mọtun ạar ootōl ịkarabh monyiin amen be, ọtun ạar olo ạneghe magey, tạtol nạ kamen kamen. Odi aḍighi ạḅele pạghi ạrol delede mi toḍiom ạvo tẸnaan.
Tepa pesi odi odi naḅōrō men Ẹnaan tapin mobo ọlogh aḍien odi etu moḅeleriom asike odi.
Tonyiin ọtun ạar obho podi abhin aḍighi agbẹbhẹghiōm mobo bho nootōl ụḅaaleni tịkarabh obho.
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ẹkona nạgba amutiom nạ tiloghi ezira ạkpete kua,
“Oobho ịzo bho ạami takiran nꞌeedi tamen olo aruḍuma bhibha neetẹn.
Obạmọogh obho ạkpete miibha bho.
Ạami tạlogh raalōgh obhꞌạmi tiloghi obhꞌeedi,
ạge nạ tekpom obhꞌeedi.”
Keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua, “Ạami ụutua mụ kamen kamen mịkarabh nꞌipesi obhꞌeedi.”
Tebum iibha bẹleni, kamen kamen olo nọoḅelemaan mōoy mẹzo bho, ụva mụ mọtun ạar olo ootōl ịkarabh.

Tebum iibha bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr, tẹzo bho ezira noḍuom ọoghuanaan ologhi mobhin tịḅaal tạJizos ọḅol tomoom ebōom aghuḍum obho odi tukpe bho ụkpo usōbh obho, obho aru bọ miikpōogh odi obho, oḍighom ạni tẹkpe ibꞌiigbia bho,
nꞌebum obho ezira nọoteeny mogbōgh ōoy iiḅua mi totu tẸnaan obho,
pitu oḍuraan otuan Ẹnaan nꞌạkar agey ooḅi ologhi nꞌomōruōm, nꞌiloghi ilo nootōl ụḅaaleni mi tịkarabh iloghi, nꞌasilōor ilo nooḅurogh tiiḅi ạmuum.
Itu ọkaaniom magey momōruōm obho ezira noḍuom ologhi obho, uuzighina ḍio, ebum obho odi obo bho aguan obho obi ghạ ḍio toguan odi obho.
Itu onyiin ạatua ghạ monyiin, aḍighi molo onyiin ạlogh ạvo ạnogho monyiin, nꞌetulan nꞌoḍighi iiḅi.

Ụḅele ḍio nọḅele mookōbhōghian ghạ onyiin esi kẹzo bho ẹde arōoy ịva ghạ ḍio bho. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, onyiin ạghuemi ghạ mologhi onyiin magey tẹzo bho enyina nẹmiin mobho aḍuma tObạmọogh obho nạarol ḅubh obho.
Tamen olo ezira noolōghōm magey obho kọmaar olōghōm ọrol noḍighi mịkarabh, ọnon ọtun ạar mootōl ọseghe ịkarabh ezira olo mu.
Oomo ạar ibha isughōnōm poghiil aruugu ịiruan tẸnaan nꞌaruugu ạnyan obho tạnuemi moomo obo bho nẹmaranuan Ẹnaan obho.
Kōoy kōoy olo asōor olōgh taMozis, ọsu ạghusan aḍien olo, poghigh orōbh, tamen olo ịzal nꞌịraar iru ịgba ịnogho zodi mapum.

Kịitua moḍigh ạliliom olo tọliom mobo bho aanon atughuneen ḍien mỌony obho tẸnaan, ạgba ạpue mịḅaal omoom ịzo bho tẸnaan obho aatōl odi ạḅaaleni obho, nꞌodi obo bho ạkpete mịkarabh mẸmugh inwo tẸnaan obho?
Ezira noolōghōm zodi obo bho ạkpete aghōl bọ kua, “Oḍighi omulumian ilꞌạmi, ạami taḍighi ạkpe.” Keḍio amina nạ ạkpete kua, “Obạmọogh obho tạtu ni mịiruan ạnogho rōoy odi.”
Ibꞌaruugu idi momeel oḍigh tạravo tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho.
Ịitua milo imutenaan enyina taruḍuma ilo neetẹn. Enyina ẹmiinom mịkanya tamen obho ẹḅaal tẸnaan asōorōm miloghi enyina bho, keḍio ạvo olo apuom enyina mi telebhir obhꞌenyina olo.
Ẹde amen tọloki enyina rẹgheer togbo arōoy nꞌẹegama alōor, tọnon amen enyina ịmara moḍigh ạni nꞌobo bho nẹmiinom kua bho.

Enyina ẹsuanaan ghụsan aḍien mobo bho idi mikoli obho, ebhin nạ nꞌọḅaal ologhi ẹghurughiom mamapẹ enyina tamen olo uḅumogh mọkpo enyina, tebum obho enyina neelōghōm mobho enyina nẹeteeny mọkpo ilo ịneghe ni ipu mipa bho ilo tẹtolan enyina kamen kamen obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, irōbh ghạ moḍuom ologhi enyina ibha ịteeny mụkpe ilo ịneghe mịkanya bho.
Ịgbaan nị molo enyina kẹteeny ologhi ọghurughiom ọkpo, molo enyina etue eḍighi mibha idi tologhi tẸnaan obho mobhin ạni ibha odi aguan obho.
Idi nạ kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
“Ịbam amen be isughō podi obo bho natu obho oru.
Odi obia ḍio.
Ooḅi ōoy ạmi olo tạneghe taghisigh ạmi tạteeny ghuḍum tologhi omōruōm;
kodi aḍionom ạman, ologhi ạmi orue ḍio ạneghe todi.”
Ezira arōoy ilo neḍionom ạman epẹ ḍio, ezira arōoy ilo ịteeny ologhi omōruōm nꞌilo nọobhel.
Ologhi omōruōm pọkar oḍumom tagey obho kụvou mi tọkpo bho ezira noḍuom ologhi obho, nꞌọkar olōghōma talōor ezira obhinom ọkpo bho ezira ụmiin io bho.
Tebum ologhi omōruōm arōoy ageedi obho keedi eḍigh tologhi tẸnaan.
Ezira ubhin tologhi omōruōm be ọmoghonyan mobho Ẹnaan abhin ọnuekpete odi be ạlemom ẹmar-arōoy obho, molo ụseghe mibha ụmiin io bho ụlemom mibha nọmiin obho.

Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kEbẹl ạtun mạar ạnogho mẸnaan milo iḍigh tologhi odi ipu mibha taKen, molo odi aru aḍigh tologhi tẸnaan, ạrol taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy. Ẹnaan nịvo nịvo ạgba miibha bho amutiom tamen obho odi abhin luunwo odi obho. Odi nạabho, keḍio tologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi, odi nạkpete ni mạar kaadon.

Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kỊnok ọbho ḍio nọbho, ụseghe zodi ụsiinom tạnyu obho. Bọbon ōoy olo ạmiin odi olo, ebum obho Ẹnaan nạaseghe zodi obho. Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua, mu keḍio tọseghe zodi mu nọoḍa zodi ọmiin mobho odi aḍighi milo iḍigh tologhi tẸnaan.

Keḍio, tughuneen tologhi omōruōm io, bọbon ōoy olo taḍighi milo teḍigh tologhi tẸnaan olo. Ebum obho kōoy kōoy olo tatu tẸnaan mobhin ạlisebh tamōruōm ni mobho odi odi, nꞌobho odi namulumian ghạ nị miiḅi mobo bho ịva zodi iru obho.

Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kaNoa ạtuonom maliiki obho Ẹnaan aakiom odi milo igboloman nꞌọkpo ilo netu taghisigh ilo odi ọmiin io. Odi aghiilaan ni mọnu tẸnaan ạkasi mobꞌoghuugh obho ubhin ụbhelom odi nꞌotu odi obho. Tiibha bho podi ạru mịiruan ạnogho mapum mẹmar-arōoy obho, abhin tẸnaan mạlisebh oḍighi iiḅi taghisigh odi, ibha nopinom ghạ mologhi omōruōm be bho.

Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kEbrạhạm aghiilaan ọnu tẸnaan men obho odi abheleghi zodi obho, ạghi tebhugh olo Ẹnaan naaguanaan zodi, ạḅele mẹma odi ạḍua, toomo ibha odi olōghōm io nolōghōm mesi odi nạki obho.
Tologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi podi ạghi arugh kisoloman mi tade bho uguanaan odi obho. Odi nꞌẠizik nꞌạJekob obo bho ibhin nạ monyiin odi oguan obho irugh ghạ tarutu ạgalaga.
Odi Ebrạhạm naḅōrō ghạ mọmiin ẹma olo Ẹnaan ạtooghi aḅōgh aseeri olo tạtol kamen kamen.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kEbrạhạm nꞌaSera ẹteeny ịnyaam ẹmar mọony, toomo ibha eedi neepẹl sịa ọmar ọony obho, ebum obho odi naabhinom Ẹnaan mobho odi tạpam nị moguan odi obho,

molo todi onyiin ōoy obhobho, tamen olo ạlukpo odi, ọbho amina ạneghe apu, pạnwuny tạnwuny odi iru ịmaraghia nwụny ilo idi kịinaany ibha ạnyu obho nꞌọosaar ibha idi tọtu ọbhiiny obho bọbon ōoy olo tatue ạḅal olo bho.

Oomo arōoy bhibha ịrol tologhi omōruōm eedi ẹbhozu. Eedi ịteeny io nọteeny mibha Ẹnaan aguanaan eedi obho. Eedi ịmiin kegbeeny ebheleghian, ẹgba emutiom mobho eedi iru misoloman iḍigh mạḍigalaga eḍigh-otu mi tesuo ade bho.
Obo bho ịḍeghe miibha bho nẹgba emutiom mobho eedi nẹva mẹma olꞌeedi.
Ịitua eedi imula ḍio tọḅel ẹma bho eedi ịḍua bho. Eedi ịitua nị bọ, ạar olo kụpuenaan eedi momula olo.
Eedi ịrol kụ ẹva mẹma olo ạneghe apu moobho bho, olo odi tạnyu obho, molo ạregheer isibh io mẸnaan molo koghōl odi Ẹnaan eedi, ebum obho odi Ẹnaan naaḅōgh mẹma aseerian eedi obho.

Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kEbrạhạm abhin mẠizik ạghi mọtunom ạar ọnogho Ẹnaan tamen obho Ẹnaan ạḍa zodi aanon obho. Odi Ebrạhạm mobo Ẹnaan aguanaan moguan obho, keḍio odi amina ni ạmara mọtunom ạar mogini ọony obhꞌodi.
Ẹnaan nạakpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Ạnwuny ọobhe bhꞌonuma tẹḍua tẠizik ketu.”
Odi naamōruōm mobho Ẹnaan tatue ni aḅẹriōn rōoy tọbho bho, molo tebum iibha bho podi amula abhin mọony obhꞌodi nꞌaghuḍum mi tẹzo olo ọtuom.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kẠizik aakpulughu mẸnaan ạnogho lịsebh ilo netu taghisigh mạJekob nꞌỊso.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi molo, tamen obho aJẹkob natu mọbho bho, odi ạkpabh tẹmu ẹḅu odi agbuluman aakpulughu mẸnaan ạnogho lịsebh men onyiin onyiin mạnwuny taJosef.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kaJosef ạgba tamen obho odi natu mọbho, mobho arōoy aIzirẹl temute ni ẹḍua tebhugh obhꞌaIzipt, aakiom eedi milo igboloman nꞌamaḍi odi.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kọde nꞌoniin taMozis ẹḅoki odi moomo ịraar ụvanyu men obho ụmar odi obho. Tẹzo bho eedi ịmiin mẹneghe ọony obho, aruugu ịto ọolema bho isibh io zeedi.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kaMozis ạbugh aru agin molo koghōl odi ọony ọnyani taFero ọolema bho.
Oḍigh ọmiinom nꞌarōoy tẸnaan iḍigh tologhi odi epu mole ẹzaal ịkarabh aghuḍum mịbam amen.
Odi agbi aanon, obhin itōnyōgh tebum aKraist obho ịneghe ạni nị kua epu moomo ẹela bhꞌIzipt, ebum obho odi naagbiom riḍien odi mi taluunwo ilo netu taghisigh obho.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kaMozis aghiil ạḍua tIzipt molo aruugu ạlile bhꞌọolema bho isibh io zodi. Odi ạghurughiom nị aḍighi kilo odi nạamiin mẸnaan obho ụmiinom ghạ ḍio mekpo-aḍien obho.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kodi asōorẹ mẹzaal Opẹl-Otẹn obho, aakiom eedi mọsaraghiom ạzara mi tạraḅa aruguugh eedi molo otelema ọbho bho okulaan mịkpana ạnwuny eedi.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi karōoy aIzirẹl erele ẹḅeeny mOkōkōgh Ọbhiiny obho kilo eedi irele teḅum ọosaar. Amen arōoy aIzipt ịghi ạni mọḅeeny pịguḅaay.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kẹḅagh otu ẹma bhꞌaJeriko ameel tamen olo arōoy aIzirẹl neekin ikiton mẹma bho moḍual aḍuma.
Ologhi omōruōm aḍighi kughighom ạni ḍio mạRehab ole-mẹma bho nꞌobo bho ikiilaan io mẸnaan obho, ebum obho odi abhin ologhi ạburubolol ạloghom mobo bho iru bọ moḍinigha ẹma ạJeriko bho.
Ạami ukōlōgh ghạ nị be bẹle? Amen olo mọgba ilo tạGidion, nꞌạBarak, nꞌạSamsin, nꞌạJefta, nꞌaDevid, nꞌạSamuel nꞌarizil obho tẸnaan.
Tologhi omōruōm mobho eedi ibhin iḅiom ipuoghom rạvo moomo aruubhugh obho iru ịmaranuan eedi obho. Eedi iḍighi milo ịneghe, ebhin tạvo tẸnaan mibha odi aguan obho, ẹbhaḍi mịnu arudumunuḅụạgụ,
eḍime mibꞌarigi ạrinyan, emuzōnaan tịnu ibꞌạsumugem ẹgham. Talidugh alōor obhꞌeedi peedi ịteeny mịnyaam, iru mibꞌiḅe rạagham ilo ipuoghom rạvo misoloman arōoy ạraagham obho.
Omulumi taghuḍum ọnogho rạani marōoy eedi ibha nẹebho bho.
Ẹtede ịrol tọmiinom, egin molo komutioghom eedi, molo oḅẹriōn eedi eedi etu eḍum aghuḍum olo ạneghe apu mibha eedi idi obho.
Ụmologh nị ọgurogh mẹde, ọbhaḍi ọlokioghom mikoli mịnon.
Orōḅōl eedi ọveleghi nạ zeedi zạzal, ọziom mobꞌạmugem ẹgham. Eedi iminaay ghạ mizu ạraana nꞌivel ekitonom, eḍum aghuḍum aruvekulom, ebhin ịiḅaghami nꞌọmiinom tebum aḍien taKraist.
Eedi ịneghe ni epu mọrol tẹmar-arōoy obhobho. Eedi ikiton ghạ kua be mi tibꞌaruukpu eḍum ọosaar obho nꞌibꞌaruugum obho erughogh ghạ taraapōgh ạrubharakpar nꞌade bho.
Oomo arōoy bhibha, toomo ologhi omōruōm obhꞌeedi, ibhin io nobhin mibha Ẹnaan aguanaan obho,
ebum obho odi nạamiinaan ezira miiḅi ọkpo ilo ịneghe ipu mipa bho, mu tughuneen tezira ḍio uḍighi ḍio zeedi ogbẹbhẹghiōm.

Ebum obho obꞌọlogh arōoy ilo neekō ezira ikin ikiton nẹmiin ibha ezira noḍighi obho idi obho bẹleni, itu orōbh tọtu kạar kạar olo ạamoromi ezira nꞌịkarabh ibha neeḅolom ezira bho, ọkparaghiom oghiil eghiil obho odi taghisigh ezira bho.

Teghiil obhꞌezira, ogbiom riḍien ezira mạJizos obo bho ologhi omōruōm ezira ạkiom obho, takunughiom nạ todi obho, obo bho ạtuan tebum ọḅaal ologhi olo nooseerian odi taghisigh obho, ạkparaghiom nị mọmiinom oorẹeny ẹmigheri obho, aanon atughuneen ḍien mạregheer obho. Ikunughi obho, odi odi delede toḍiom ạvo ẹtolom tẸnaan ọolema bho.
Ịitua mẹzo odi ạkparaghiom tạravo ạsukarabh arōoy obho ịlogh odi ḍien obho. Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịítu ghạ merōbh ologhi enyina.
Telebhir obho enyina neḅe mọḅele ịkarabh aghuḍum obho, enyina deḅe ḍio esi mesi olo enyina neezu mịḅaal enyina.
Enyina neeḅulo mọnuekpete bho Ẹnaan ạkpete mọkue enyina kạnwuny odi obho gạ? Odi ạkpete kua,
“Mạar ạmoghonyan, ọony ạmi, men Obạmọogh obho ạliom ạna,
urōbh ghạ nạ mologhi onuma mi todi, men odi asi ạna.
Obo bho Obạmọogh obho atulan obho pobo odi nạliom ghạ,
ạgurogh ghạ nạ kōoy kōoy olo odi abhin kọony odi.”
Ịkparaghiom tọmiinom obhꞌenyina kạliliom ọde enyina, ebum obho tọmiinom obhꞌenyina nẹgba emutiom mobho Ẹnaan naabhin enyina kạnwuny odi obho. Kir ọony olo ọde ọliom ghạ ḍio gạ?
Eru kạar olo ụliom ạni ḍio ạna kẹzo bho odi nạliom oomo ạnwuny odi obho, pạna ạkar ọony odi ḍio, ạna ọony olo ọde olo.
Ịneghe ḍio gạ molo ezira kughiilaan mỌde ezira mi tạruumugh obho koḍum?

Ạburude ezira esuo ẹmar-arōoy obho nẹliom ghạ ezira mọbam amen be tẹzo bho iḍigh tologhi eedi obho, keḍio Ẹnaan nạliom ezira mọneghemi ezira, molo ezira opin ạni bin taghuḍum obhꞌodi obho ịkarabh ilo bho.

Kamen kamen olo ụliom ezira idi kolo noḍighi ezira tamen opopo moḅẹebhẹni iloghi ezira, ilo oḍighi iloghi ezira kẹḅaal io. Keḍio ọbam amen naatẹn, obo bho nọoliom ụtughumiom kua bho teḍum aghuḍum ekima, eḍum taghuḍum eedi kiiḅi arōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, iibhaghami rạvo ạrugbuor obhꞌenyina mẹghuemi mariigi obhꞌenyina ibha ịnyaam ilo bho.
Itele ghạ tebōom olo asel molo ookō masike bhꞌenyina ibha iru marukula bho enyina etue etele.
Ịkparam mẹrolan kōoy kōoy mi tekima, mẹkparam nạ meḍum aghuḍum olo ịkarabh ilo talōor enyina, obho tughuneen kua ḍio ọnon ẹzo olo ōoy tatue ạḅol ạmiin Ẹnaan olo bho.
Ịmaar molo onyiin ōoy ọgbaranuan taluunwo ạlisebh obho tẸnaan. Ịmaar molo onyiin ōoy otu ạrol koorẹeny eghiḍim olo ụseghe mịika bhꞌodi nọḍaanyom ọnogho mịiḅaghami rōoy.
Ịmaar molo onyiin ōoy oḍum aghuḍum ole ẹma bolobolo oḍum aghuḍum olo olōghōm io mẸnaan kỊso obo bho aḅoolaan marukenya odi monyiin ẹkpa eḍian be bho.
Enyina neelōghōm mobho enyemen podi ạghi mobhin ạlisebh tọde odi, umulumi ni zodi ebum obho odi otue ḍio mọva ebōom olo onwe ibha odi naaḍighi obho, toomo ibha odi aleghe nꞌizin agbẹelōm obho ẹkona.
Ebum obho enyina itu ḍio karōoy aIzirẹl mi tọkpo ilo utue ḍio okulaan, obꞌạnyan obho, nꞌọkinim ibꞌaruugu obho, nꞌogim obho,
nꞌoghur eeḍue bho, nꞌimulughu oghōrōkō ōoy obho. Amen arōoy obho moghōrōkō bho peedi iisen molo eedi ịmoghon mu mọnon ọnuekpete,
ebum obho eedi ine ḍio none momina ọmoghon ọnon ọnuekpete men obho eedi ịmoghon molōgh obho ụlogh ụnogho eedi ughōl, “Ẹnam ẹkona kakulaan mobꞌeegum obhobho pitoḅol meghigh” obho.
Ibha eedi ịmiin mibha nemute bho ịkar kua eḍiku ruugu molo aMozis ạkpete kua, “Aruugu nesibh ạami molo ạami napiigha.”
Enyina neeru tobꞌeegum obhꞌạZayon, ẹma bho tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho, aJerusạlẹm obho ạnyu obho, obho ạteeny mạsumuunir itelema tẸnaan obho.

Enyina neeru eḍigh tookōbhōghian ọḅaal ologhi ịkpana ạnwuny tẸnaan, obo bho ariḍien eedi nọogeey mi tạnyu obho. Enyina neeru tẸnaan obo bho aru mọtu mịiruan oomo arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho, etu nạ tạruumugh arōoy obo bho nooḍighi ụneghemi ụman taghisigh tẸnaan obho.
Enyina neeru tạJizos obo bho aguan bọ momoom ịzo bho nꞌobho ạzara bhꞌodi uzu bọ bho nẹgba mobho iibha bho ịneghe ipu mạzara ibha tEbẹl obho.

Igona lōor enyina siibha, íḅulughia ghạ raḅeri enyina mi todi obo bho nạḍeghe miibha bho. Eru kạar olo eedi obo bho igin mọtuonom oghōrōkō odi obo bho aakiom eedi tade bho ịkatana ḍio emuzōnaan, kezira tomuzōnaan ẹko, erumolo ezira ugin mọtuonom oghōrōkō odi obo bho odi tạnyu obho naakiom ezira bho.
Oghōrōkō odi mi tamen opopo azighe made bho, keḍio esiibha odi naaguan ạkpete kua, “Ạami tamina ni azighe made bho ạḅaram nꞌạnyu obho.”
Ọnuekpete bho odi ạkpete ughōl “tamina ni” obho nạgba amutiom mobho ọkpo bho ụlemogh obho tozighe ni opiẹmi, molo ibha uzighe ḍio bho ẹtol.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, itu ọsebh Ẹnaan magey, ebum obho ezira nọoteeny made-ọolema olo utue ḍio ozighe bho. Itu obhin toghiilaan nꞌeegu aḍien ookpulughu ghạ zodi tẹzo olo teḍigh ni tologhi odi;
ebum obho Ẹnaan obhꞌezira aru nyạn olo nale apiẹmi mọkpo bho.
Etulan iiḅi aburumōr ebhōbh ẹghi taghisigh mi teesoḍia enyina.
Ígin ghạ nogin mobhin ọloghom arisoloman mi tarutu enyina. Ẹde arōoy neeḍighi ghạ kua epin ẹloghom mitelema tẸnaan mi tarutu eedi ẹkiom igoni molo eedi ilōghōm io mobho eedi nẹkiom itelema tẸnaan.
Ịitua ghạ mobo bho idiighu mikoli obho kilo enyina idi ạni nꞌeedi mi tikoli obho, mẹetua ghạ nạ mobo bho idi tọmiinom obho kilo enyina nẹmiinom ạni nạ keedi.
Kōoy kōoy ạlogh eghuan milom, opẹl io maraalōgh ẹmuna ilom obho. Ẹnaan tạtu ni mịiruan ạnogho mobo bho nele mẹma nꞌobo bho nepẹl maraalōgh ẹmuna ilom obho.
Taghuḍum enyina ítulan ghạ mikpoki. Ibha enyina ịteeny obho egbẹbhan talōor enyina! Ẹnaan naaguanaan ezira akōl kua, “Ạami tạtolan ni ạna kamen kamen, ạami ụsar io ạna atuḅeen.”
Itu ọtuan tiibha bho ọkpete ghạ kua,
“Obạmọogh obho pobo tạlogh ạvo ạnogho ạami,
ạami ukiil mụ ruugu.
Oōy tatue ni aḍighi ạami ameel?”
Ịitua migbaany aruvẹmụ arōoy ibhꞌenyina, ibha ịgba mọnuekpete tẸnaan ịnogho enyina bho.
Ịitua miiḅi ibha ịḍua taghuḍum eedi iru obho, mẹtuonom rạaḅa asike ologhi omōruōm obhꞌeedi. ẠJizos Kraist akẹrẹkẹrẹ olo meḍue nꞌaadon nꞌoomo amen.

Ímōrō ghạ arōoy ebhin oḍigh kẹrekere ịtughumiom ilo dọmoghon ghạ ḍio, ẹḍuonom enyina tooḅi ebōom obho. Ịkar kua ẹneghe molo kọghuemiom maghuḍum ezira maluunwo ạlisebh obho tẸnaan, ilo ookōoy araalōgh ogbiiy ariḍian io. Obo bho iikōoy raalōgh obho, eedi araalōgh obho irue ḍio mọlogh ạvo ọnogho eedi.
Arōoy iiḅua bho obo bho neḍighi moḍighi totu ạgalaga iikpulughu arōoy aJu obho ịnyaam ilo ịteeny mọḅa ịnam ẹede ọtun ạar obhꞌezira olo.
Uvẹmụ ōoy iiḅua arōoy aJu obho napin ghạ mạzara ịnam mọtun ạar ootōl ịkarabh obho aḍighom tẹkpe ibꞌiigbia bho, keḍio iikpōogh nꞌịikpo ịnam obho nọsu ghạ nyạn teḅughotu ẹma bho.
Tebum iibha bho, ạJizos ẹkona ạbho teḅughotu ẹma bho molo odi apin ịḅaal obhꞌodi aatōlōm mịkarabh arōoy obho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, itu ọghi todi mi teḅughotu ẹma bho obhin ạni rẹgheer obhꞌodi.
Ebum obho ezira ụteeny io mẹma mi tesuo ade bho, olo tạtolaan ezira kamen kamen obho. Ẹma bho natu taghisigh obho pobo ezira noonon obho.
Itu ọrol tạJizos obhin mịnu ezira ọnogho ghạ lịsebh ḍien tẸnaan obho iru mọtun ạar iigbia obuom Ẹnaan obho.
Íḅulo ghạ noḅulo moḍighi ghạ iiḅi nꞌonyiin mọlogh ghạ ạvo ọnogho onyiin. Iibha poḍigh ọtun ạar iigbia ibha neḍigh ghạ tologhi tẸnaan obho.

Ikiilaan mobo bho enyina idi tẹeḍiani eedi obho, mẹtuugh eḍighi mibha eedi ịto ịnogho enyina bho. Eedi pobo ipooghia ghạ ḍio mọmaar oonon aghuḍum enyina bho, tebum obho eedi tẹmara nị taghisigh tẸnaan ẹgba mẹzo eedi iḍighi moḍighi odi obho. Enyina eḍighi miibha bho peedi ẹkona ọmaar oḍighi oḍighi eedi nꞌọḅaal ologhi. Ekua ilo, ologhi eedi ọḅaal io, ịlogh nạ ḍio mạvo ẹnogho enyina.
Iikpulughu ghạ moomo amen mẹnogho ezōor. Ezōor nọokar olōghōm mobho ologhi ezōor ạneghe nị ạman, ezōor nọva ghạ nạ moḍighi oomo amen mibha ịneghe bho.
Sesen ni, ạami naamina ạmaar naasen enyina, iikpulughu mẹnogho ạami, molo Ẹnaan amulumi ạami atuom enyina.
Ẹnaan ekima bho, obho amulumi tọbho bho mạJizos Obạmọogh ezira bho, obho ụtun ịḅaal obhꞌodi odi abhin aghirom bọ mịzo, obho tạtol kamen kamen obho, aru mobꞌookō rạana olo ọnon olo aaleeny olo bho,

ạnogho nị agbẹbhẹghiōm tenyina kạar kạar olo ạneghe molo enyina eḍighi mibha idi tologhi odi obho! Odi aḍighi nạ ezōor oḍighi ghạ milo teḍigh tologhi odi mi tebum ạJizos Kraist. Eghuan ẹrol ẹnogho zodi aKraist kamen kamen. Ẹrol nị nạ kua.
Ạami naasen ni enyina, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, modeny ọmoghonyan adōm obhobho tạkuemi miloghi enyina bho, ebum obho ọbhereer obhobho ạami ụge bho ọdoony io apu obho.
Ạami nạva molo enyina kelōghōm mobho noomutiom maTimoti umōr ezira mi tikoli obho. Eru kạar olo odi akẹm aru, podi nꞌạami totu mọmiinan enyina.
Ipuruan moomo aruvẹmụ arōoy enyina nꞌoomo arōoy tẸnaan. Aburumōr ibhꞌItali epuruan enyina.
Aluunwo ạlisebh tẸnaan ẹrolan nꞌoomo enyina.
Ạami aJems ẹbana bho tẸnaan nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho, ụge natuom oomo enyina arōoy tẸnaan ibha ịizaranu tẹmar-arōoy obho. Ịḅaal mologhi.
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ịítu ghạ nꞌọotu, ologhi enyina aru mạbalala be, tamen olo oḍigh kẹrekere ịiḅaghami iru ịteeny enyina,
ebum obho enyina neelōghōm mobho ọdegh oonon iloghi omōruōm obho enyina tẹnogho zenyina mọoghuanaan iloghi ọkparam.
Keḍio ịkparam mẹzo bho mesi tikunughi, ímeel ghạ, penyina ọneghe ogbẹbh ọman, molo bọbon onyiin ạar ọoḅaghami ḍio enyina.
Keḍio erumolo olōghōm ạar nạaḅaghami monyiin enyina, odi agbẹel Ẹnaan, obo bho ọle ghạ ḍio ạakuom rōoy obho, podi ọnogho odi.
Odi abhin tologhi omōruōm odi kagbẹelōm, ọteeny io mịzal ologhi. Odi obo bho ạteeny ịzal ologhi obho odi kopōkō ạmuum ọbhiiny olo ọpibha naḅōrōghōm.
Odi alōghōm kua aghōl ōoy ịzal ologhi olo okima ghạ ḍio toomo taraabōom odi obhin io mạar tạvo Obạmọogh obho.
Uvekulom umōr olo Ẹnaan ạbughe abo!
Obꞌọola bho ẹkona abo men Ẹnaan asōorẹ zodi, ebum obho odi obo ọola bho tạḅor ni ạḍua kạrafalawa iirẹeny obho.
Aghōzōgh naamute, pẹesu obho onyōrōghẹmi ịigho bho pạrafalawa bho ọghar molo ẹneghe bhꞌeedi ẹkona ibhẹ nạ. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, pẹzo ọola bho tanyōrōghan apẹ, tọkpo bho odi nakilighuan obho.
Ọḅaal ologhi tạtol ni ạnogho mobo bho ịkparam isi tikunughi obho, ebum obho tozu ni zodi meghōony aghuḍum obho Ẹnaan aguanaan mobo bho itulan odi obho.
Oōy olo ọdegh oonon ạteenyom okōl io aghōl mẸnaan nạdegh zodi. Ẹnaan ọdegh ghạ ḍio mōoy, ọdegh oonon ẹkona ọteenyom ghạ ḍio zodi.
Ọdegh oonon nẹḍua ghạ etu tōoy tamen olo ẹela ọkpo ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho neeru ikul mologhi odi.
Ẹzo bho noomor ọmar mọony apōbh atu ạpo tikunughi obho, pẹzo ẹela ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho neemōr ghạ tiloghi arōoy ẹmar mịkarabh. Ikunughi ịkarabh obho pọbho.
Iiḅi aburumōr, iibiōghōm ghạ silōor enyina.
Oomo iiḅi ẹnogho ilo ịneghe ni ịman ịḍua tẸnaan obo bho ạlem ẹḅaal obhꞌạnyu obho keru. Ạkar odi onwian ghạ ḍio. Ookōogh ọnon ạar osōorōm ghạ ḍio zodi.
Tịto odi be bho odi abhin tọnuekpete agey obho ạloghom ezira moru ịḅel oḍigh iiḅua tọkpo bho odi ạlemogh obho.
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ịpamaghiom mekpo oghōrōkō bhobho: kōoy kōoy akẹm ghạ ạmoghonyan, opirighuan io mọkpete ạar nꞌokẹm ọle.
Oōy olo tapin miiḅi ịitua tẸnaan mi tạlile olo.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịkporion rạvo enyina mi toomo ịkarabh eḍighiom ạar isa, nꞌoomo ọḅaar ẹmu. Igbuluman mẹnogho mẸnaan mebhin ọnuekpete bho nọobe tiloghi enyina bho, obho tetue ni ạpel enyina bho.
Ịtuugh eḍighi mibha ikpo ọnuekpete bho enyina ịmoghon obho. Íru ghạ rōoy ilo nẹmoghon ghạ ni be, mẹrol eebiōghōm silōor enyina.
Kōoy kōoy olo nạmoghon ghạ ni be mikpo ọnuekpete bho ọtuugh io aḍighi mibha odi ạmoghon obho, odi odi kōoy olo ạghi aanona lōor odi mi tạtaḅaliki ạmiina mẹzo odi odi.
Odi ạmaar abhōgha lōor obhꞌodi ạḅele, podi atẹn ạḍua. Otẹn ọḍua noḅulo ẹzo odi odi onyiin amen.

Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạkparion riḍien odi mi taraalōgh obho ịneghe ni ịman obho, ibha nepune ghạ rōoy tọnu aḍuugh obho, kaseeriom mologhi odi ạtuugh naḍighi koru ḍio mōoy olo nạmoghon ghạ ni be aḅulo, pẸnaan ọsebh odi mi tibha odi naḍighi obho.
Oōy olo aghōl modi naakpulughu mẸnaan kọbhama ḍio manem odi, odi naabiōghōm lōor odi be; iikpulughu obhꞌodi ạar oḍighiom olo.
Ạkar agey oḍigh iikpulughu obho Ẹnaan Ọde bho nạva bho oobho: ookō ọlogh ạvo ọnogho ịnyigo ạnwuny nꞌikpukele ạraani mi tọmiinom eedi, nꞌọgbaranuan tịkarabh ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, tologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho, obho eghuan ịrol ịnogho zodi be bho, ị́ḍi ghạ mạdolomaan enyina mẹnogho moḍigh kẹrekere arōoy.
Erumolo ịzal arōoy iru tookōghōghian enyina, onyiin ạlogha magul agold abura miiḅi ibura, opedi obho abura mifurafura igbaany ibura;
kạna ạkpete ạnogho mọola bho aghōl kua, “Tọlom ạgada bhobho,” kamula ạkpete ạnogho muvekulom obho aghōl kua, “Mạra suo,” bolobolo “Tue mạrol delede tẹeḍiani asike ạmi,”
ạna dọḍi ḍio suo mạdolomaan onuma aru mọkarabh ọtu mịiruan ạnogho mịzal arōoy bhibha gạ?
Ịmoghon, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, Ẹnaan nạason ạseghe maruvekulom arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho, motẹnẹghu ạruula tologhi omōruōm obho, nobhin abin Ade-Ọolema bho odi aguanaan mobo bho itulan odi obho.
Keḍio eedi aruvekulom obho, enyina ịlogh io meghuan. Ạruula bho ḍio gạ, mobo bho nẹnyaghami eḅōrōghōm ghạ zenyina bho ḍio gạ? Eedi ḍio gạ mobo bho nepin ghạ zenyina ẹki tạkoti obho ḍio gạ?
Eedi ḍio gạ mobho ẹgba ghạ ẹpue mooḅi aḍien obho ubhin ubheleghiom enyina bho ḍio gạ?
Erumolo ạna ughiilaan molōgh Ade-Ọolema bho, pạna naḍighi magey ạar. Odi olōgh obho odi bọ tẹegia iigbia bho, obho aghōl bọ, “Tulan obo bho atuan ạna bho kalōor obhꞌonuma” bho.
Kerumolo ạna ụḍi mạdolomaan onuma ụnogho moḍigh kẹrekere arōoy, pạna naabhin mapum oḍighi ịkarabh. Olōgh obho naasōbh apumeni ạna kōoy olo asōor molōgh.
Kōoy kōoy olo aakō moomo araalōgh obho kasōor tonyiin, odi naabhin apum oomo araalōgh obho.
Ebum eeghe? Ebum obho odi obo bho aghōl, “Ule ghạ mẹma” bho, pobo aghōl nạ mụko ghạ menu. Ughōl nꞌẹko mạna dole ghạ ḍio mẹma, ạna nasōor molōgh erumolo ạna ụko menu.
Oomo ọnuekpete nꞌeḍighiom ạar enyina ẹrol kibha arōoy ilo araalōgh obho nepune ghạ rōoy tọnu aḍuugh obho, nẹeru mịiruan ịnogho.
Ẹnaan ọsuanaan io ghụsan mamen odi tạtu mịiruan ạnogho mobo bho ọsuanaan io ghụsan aḍien rōoy obho; keḍio mịin, ịiruan nepōobh ghạ tạnyu ọsu ạghusan aḍien.
Iiḅi aburumōr, oḍighen ạsuo ōoy olo aghōl mọno ạteeny ologhi omōruōm, keḍio eḍighiom ạar odi ịgba ḍio kua emutiom? Omōruōm opopo todi tạpel ni zodi atẹnẹmi gạ?
Erumolo umōr bolobolo ụmarani odi togbo enyina natele mẹduḅa eḍian ole nạ ilo,
oḍighen ạsuo bho, erumolo onyiin enyina ạkpete ạnogho zodi aghōl kua, “Ẹnaan ạsebh ạna. Mina mukpe, male ọbaraka onuma amute!” erumolo odi ọnogho ḍio zodi mukpe omina nꞌeḍian ole?
Ẹzo bho nạ pẹzo idi tomōruōm obho. Ologhi omōruōm olo eḍighiom ạar olo nạabho.

Onyiin ōoy tatue ni akōl kua, “Ạna ụteeny eḍighiom ạar, ạami ạteeny ologhi omōruōm,” keḍio ạami tapuruan kua zodi, “Ḍeeriom ạami mologhi omōruōm onuma olo eḍighiom ạar olo. Keḍio ạami tapin eḍighiom ạar ạami aḍeeriom ạna mologhi omōruōm ạmi.”
Ạna umōruōm mobho Ẹnaan aru monyiin be. Ạlua. Ịkarabh ạruumugh obho ẹkona emōruōm nạ miibha, nꞌibꞌaruugu.
Sọo, ẹnam eḍum, ạna nạva molo kọgba koḍeeriom ạna mobho ologhi omōruōm olo ọteeny io meḍighiom ạar ạḅaram, ạar oḍighiom olo gạ?
Ẹnaan ạtuan eeghe kabhin Ebrạhạm ogbōgh ọde obhꞌezira kaseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy? Odi ạtuan tebum eḍighiom ạar obhꞌodi tamen obho odi ạseghe mọony obhꞌodi Ạizik mọtunom ạar ọnogho Ẹnaan.
Ạna nạmiin, eḍighiom ạar nꞌologhi omōruōm netelian ghạ. Ologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi ụmiin ugbẹbhẹghiōm teḍighiom ạar obhꞌodi.

Molo uḍighi umuzeniom tibha ụge bọ tọbhereer iigbia bho obho aghōl bọ mEbrạhạm amōruōm mẸnaan keḍio Ẹnaan ạtuan tebum ologhi omōruōm obhꞌodi ạseghe zodi aseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi oye. Tiibha bho bẹleni keḍio ughōl Ebrạhạm mọbulol tẸnaan.
Enyina nẹmiin siibha bho mobho Ẹnaan nạseghe ghạ mōoy aseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi ōoy tebum ibha odi aḍighi obho, ọtuan io mebum ologhi omōruōm odi be.

Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ pẹzo imutōnaan nạ mạRehab, ole mẹma bho. Ẹnaan ạseghe zodi aseeri taghisigh odi kooḅi ạni tebum eḍighiom ạar odi. Odi abhin ạloghom miteledōm arōoy aJu obho ạbhel eedi ẹḅol tọnon ebōom omuzōnaan tạravo obo ọlogh aḍien eedi.
Ẹzo bho ōoy olo ẹmugh olo nạabho bho, pẹzo idi nạ mologhi omōruōm olo ọḅaram io meḍighiom ạar.
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ọlogh enyina itu ḍio marōoy ịtughumiom, ebum obho enyina neelōghōm mobho ịiruan ibha tọnogho zezōor obo bho nọtughumiom obho tẹenyuom epu mibhꞌịnon arōoy.
Oōy olo ogbōr ghạ ḍio mọkpete okōrōnuan olo, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo arue ạbham ọnu odi mọkpete okōrōnuan nạaneghe ạman taghuḍum odi, aḍighi nạ molo odi tatue ni nạ ạpama moomo alōor odi.
Ezira nọlogh ghạ mokurōgh ọkpo tọnu ạsu moḍighi olo odi kaghiilaan ezira nꞌolo ezira totue ni oḍighi zodi odi ạki kesi kesi olo ezira nọva lo odi kạghi.
Ịmiin mụnwiaru olo ogim nạpibhoghom. Oomo ẹzo bho odi ạbugh obho keḍio ọbam ọlom naḅōr apin ạki kesi kesi olo obo bho nạzoghiom obho nạva mobhin ọghi.
Pẹzo anem ōoy odi nạ. Oomo ẹzo bho akio obho keḍio ikpo ọnuekpete odi igbōgh igbōgh. Ịmaar ẹetua mẹzo onyiin ẹghanaghan ạnyan be tatue ni ale mọnuza mobꞌeekpu eḍum iiḍum.

Anem ōoy, ạnyan. Ịkarabh be mobho imuzō todi. Odi podi ọpaḍi alōor obho napin ghạ mịkarabh aalelemi toomo alōor obho. Odi napin ghạ mạnyan obꞌoonu obho ikunughi olo bho ạsu mọnuza moomo araabōom aghuḍum obhꞌezira.
Arōoy tetue ni eekō keḍio neekō nạ moomo ịnam nꞌịnun nꞌạririar nꞌina mọmoghonyan eedi.
Keḍio bọbon ōoy olo naarue mookō ọbhama anem odi olo. Oomo odi ịkarabh ịkarabh, orue ghạ nạ ḍio mọloki ōoy ruugu, nạkerom ghạ ghụma moomo ẹmorokpo.
Ezira nọseghe ghạ monyiin odi anem obho ọsebhom mỌde bho Obạmọogh ezira bho men, omina ọseghe ọkorom rōoy obo bho ụlem ụgbaaniom Ẹnaan obho mọnon amen.
Onyiin oghōrōkō ạlisebh nꞌoghōrōkō ọghorogh arōoy pibha nemute ghạ tonyiin odi ọnu obho. Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, iibha bho ịgbaan io momute ẹzo bho.
Enyina nẹemiin ghạ monyiin ozi olo nagbōr mụum eghiḍim nꞌẹmel monyiin amen obho?
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ọmir dọloki ghạ ḍio mẹena, bolobolo ẹleleezu ạloki mọmir. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ onyiin ozi ogbōr io amutioghom mụum abōbh nꞌagey ạmuum monyiin amen obho.
Kir ōoy olo odi togbo bhꞌenyina olo ạteeny olōghōm ạar nꞌọmoghonyan gạ? Odi abhin ooḅi aghuḍum obhꞌodi aḍighi amutiom, nꞌiiḅi eḍighiom ạar osōoriōm alōor nꞌolōghōm ạar obhꞌodi.
Kerumolo ạna ụteeny mologhi ibōbhan eghiḍim nꞌạaku, puutuma ghạ mạgbaam miben magey obho.
Oḍigh olōghōm ạar obhobho ọḍua ḍio tẸnaan karu, olo ẹmar-arōoy obhobho. OlꞌEru obho, olꞌẸmugh Iigbia obho ḍio.
Kesi kesi olo ibōbhan nꞌạaku idi, ẹmoghonyan nꞌoḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh ịḅele ghạ nạ ḍio mọrol.

Keḍio olōghōm ạar obho ạḍua bọ tạnyu obho aru obho abhira ni ạneghe ạman, keḍio amina aru ạteeny mekima nꞌalideny alōor nꞌọbhomoghian. Ọsu ạghusan nꞌoḍighi iiḅi imuzō ni todi. Odi naamuzōnaan toonon arōoy ọpue nꞌọgba ịkarabh.
Keḍio obo bho idi tekima bho neḅẹbh ghạ mekima keḍio teḅu miiḅi eḍighiom ạar.
Aralebhir nꞌạruruan ibha ogbo enyina kịḍua teḍighen keru? Ịḍua tịitua enyina mọteeny ọkpo ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho, ibha idi, nẹtaḍia, miikpōogh alōor obhꞌenyina bho.

Kir ọkpo olo enyina nẹva mọteeny, keḍio enyina irue ḍio mọteeny, penyina ọghi ọze; enyina ibhin obꞌekpo aḍien mọseghiom ạar, enyina irue ḍio, penyina irubhe rụruan nꞌaralebhir. Ibha enyina nẹva mọteeny obho, enyina irue ḍio mọteeny ebum obho enyina igbẹel io mẸnaan obho.
Amen olo enyina igbẹel, enyina ịteeny io, tebum obho enyina ibhin ịkarabh ịitua negbẹelōm. Enyina negbẹel ghạ mọkpo ilo kẹbheremi mẹebhuom alōor obhꞌenyina be.
Sọo ile-rạama! Enyina ilōghōm io mobho enyina ịduan bụrubolol nꞌẹmar-arōoy obho penyina nẹlokian riḍien mẸnaan gạ? Kōoy kōoy olo ạbhomoghian mẹmar-arōoy pu naaru mobo ọlokian ariḍien tẸnaan.
Enyina nekōl ẹegia iigbia bho apu-anini-be, ạḍeghe miibha bho ạkpete bọ kua, “Ẹmugh obho Ẹnaan ạlogh tezira bho ọva ḍio nọva mogonan ọnon.”
Keḍio ịnyaam ọlogh ạvo bho tẸnaan ạamor apu, kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bọ bho “mẸnaan nạmaranuan ghạ mobo bho ibꞌiituma bho, keḍio nạnogho ghạ mịnyaam ọlogh ạvo mobo bho isōoriōm ghạ lōor obho.”
Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, isōoriōm lōor enyina mẹnogho mẸnaan. Ịmaranuan mEru obho podi ọḅele enyina mạvo oghiil ọḍua.
Itu metuan Ẹnaan podi oru otuan enyina. Enyina iḍighi mịkarabh obho, ịḅaaleni miloghi enyina! Enyina obo ịzal iloghi obho, ịḅaaleni ghuḍum enyina.
Iḍigh mịitu, meleghe meḍi. Inwe mịimologh obhꞌenyina metẹnẹ meḍi, ọḅaal ologhi obhꞌenyina itẹnẹ mịkubh.
Isōoriōm lōor enyina mi taghisigh tObạmọogh obho, podi oobhaghami enyina tạnyu.

Iiḅi aburumōr, onyiin ọgba ḍio mịkarabh ạpue monyiin. Kōoy kōoy olo ạgba mịkarabh ạpue mumōr odi bolobolo aru mịkarabh ịiruan ạnogho mumōr odi, odi nạgba mịkarabh ạpue, ạtu mịiruan ạnogho maraalōgh obho. Erumolo ạna ụru mịiruan ụnogho maraalōgh obho, pạna ōoy olo namina akiilaan maraalōgh obho mu ḍio. Ạna naaru mọtu mịiruan araalōgh obho.
Ẹnaan ạnogho maraalōgh obho molo odi be mobo ọru ịiruan ọnogho. Odi be mobo tatue ạpel, odi be mobo tatue akigh apiẹmi. Ạna kokōr oḍigh ōoy mọru ịiruan ọnogho obo bho nꞌạna ituan obho?
Enyina obo bho nekōl ghạ kua, “Aadon bolobolo eḍie pezōor ọghi tọoku ẹma bhobho ọrol ạla oḍighi oḍighi ọva ọteeny ịkanya ikpoki” obho, ịmoghon.
Ạna ạkar alōghōm mẹzo aghuḍum onuma tạtol meḍienaan? Ạna odi kọbhurubuur obho namute ghạ ọbam amen be natẹn maabhẹ.
Ịkpe molo enyina kẹkpete ghạ kua, “Obạmọogh ạlogh ạvo, pezira oḍum oḍighi iibha nꞌipa.”
Enyina ịḅele miibha nẹbughia lōor eetuma mibꞌiituma: oḍigh oomo ibꞌiituma bhibha ịkarabh.
Tẹzo bhibha, pu kōoy kōoy olo ạmiin miiḅi ạar ilo oḍighi kạḅele muḍighi, ịkarabh.
Enyina ạruula bho, itu mẹmoghon siibha. Ileghe mebhumughu tebum ọmiinom obho natu mọteeny enyina bho.
Ẹela bhꞌenyina nẹeḅor, arukpe bhꞌenyina ọoghara neele.
Ikpoki bhꞌenyina neeḍiku mọsari. Ọsari bhibha tẹgbaam enyina ele miikpōogh obhꞌenyina kạnyan. Enyina neekōbhōghi ekubh mẹela tikunughi aruḍuma bhibha.

Enyina dẹkpeeghiiy io mikpoki arōoy obo bho iḍighi moḍighi enyina obho. Ịmoghon ịghunughun obhꞌeedi. Eḍi arōoy obo bho neekōbhōghi ghạ meḍian iiḅua oḍighi obhꞌenyina neesi eḍigh taraḅeri tẸnaan Obạmọogh Oomo ẹmiriikpo bho.
Enyina iḍum aghuḍum ibꞌạruula ole ẹzaal moomo aḍuma tesuo ade bho. Enyina neeḍigh ịria neḅōrō maḍuma ọmeghi obho.
Enyina nẹebham mapum ekigh mōoy olo olōghōm io mịkarabh. Keḍio odi ẹkona ọmaranuan io nạ zenyina.
Enyina aburumōr obhꞌạmi, ideny mẹrol ninii Obạmọogh obho aru. Mịin moḅẹbh miḅẹbh obho, mẹzo odi adeny naḅōrō lꞌade bhꞌodi kamute kaḅom. Odi ạmaar ghạ ni adeny aḅōrō mạralebhe eesōor nꞌomuluan.
Enyina ẹkona ideny mẹrol, mẹteeny ọoghuanaan ologhi. Obꞌaḍuma bho Obạmọogh obho tatu obho odi tẹeḅa ạvo.
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, onyiin ọonian io monyiin molo Ẹnaan ọtu mịiruan ạnogho zenyina. Ọtu mịiruan obho odi tọnu-otu obho, nạmara mopẹl oḍigh.
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ịitua ghạ mọnuekpete arizil obho ibhin bọ taḍien tObạmọogh obho kịgba nạ miibha bho. Ịtuonuman rạaḅa asike alideny nꞌạlikpar eedi mi tamen ọmiinom.

Tọkparami alōor obhꞌeedi pezira uunon eedi ụbughe. Enyina nẹmoghon ghạ ni mẹzo aJob ạkparam, keḍio tikunughi obho Obạmọogh obho ạnogho ni zodi agbẹbhẹghi toomo ọkpo amarugh otu odi. Obạmọogh obho ạteeny ọsu ạghusan aḍien magey.

Tilo ipuom suo, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, kamen kamen olo enyina neguan moguan, íghir ghạ mịzo. Íbhin ghạ mạnyu obho nꞌade bho bolobolo ọnon ạar meghirom ịzo. Ikōl ghạ ii bolobolo eenyi be, tamen olo iru magey bolobolo iben, molo Ẹnaan osōbh rạakpe ạḅam tẹmu enyina.
Kir ōoy olo ịiḅaghami idi talōor? Odi aakpulughu. Kir ōoy olo nạḅaal mologhi? Odi ạmoor ghạ sọor abuom Ẹnaan.
Kir ōoy olo nạnwe. Odi abheleghi marukenya ạsosi obho eru eekpulughu ẹnogho zodi, esigh zodi mụnum taḍien tObạmọogh obho.
Oḍigh iikpulughu obhobho olo ạteeny mologhi omōruōm, taakō ni mōoy obho nạnwe obho. Obạmọogh obho tạnogho ni zodi momoon alōor. Keḍio tạḅelemaan zodi mịkarabh olo odi naaḍighi.

Tebum ibha bẹleni, kịkarabh kịkarabh olo enyina iḍighi, onyiin ạgba ạnogho monyiin, onyiin aakpulughu ạnogho monyiin, molo enyina eḍumogh. Iikpulughu ooḅi ōoy mi taghisigh tẸnaan ạteeny mịnyaam magey.
Ilaija onyiin ōoy olo ạrol kezira. Odi ạkar aakpulughu molo ẹlebhe kạḅele mọlobh, pẹlebhe bho ạḅele nạ mọlobh moomo ịraar nꞌạmaḍian ạsia mi tesuo ade bho.
Keḍio odi amina aakpulughu lo kạlobh, pẹlebhe bho ạlobh, keḍio ade bho amina amuum iimuuma.
Iiḅi aburumōr, erumolo onyiin enyina ạḅughaan ạgbaaron ạḍua tagey obho, konyiin enyina amina amulumi zodi,
pịitua ghạ mobho kōoy kōoy olo amulumi moḍighi mịkarabh mi tịkarabh araabōom obhꞌodi tạpel ni atẹnẹmi mẹmugh odi oḍighi mịkarabh obho mi tọbho, amina aḍighi nạ molo kọḅelemaan mịkanya oḍighi ịkarabh.

Ạami aPita oteledōm tạJizos Kraist ụge mọbhereer obhobho natuom enyina arōoy obho Ẹnaan Ọde bho nạason ạseghe, ibha isulomaan rōoy oomo ạraama aruubhugh bhꞌạPontos nꞌaGaletia nꞌaKapadosia nꞌEsia nꞌaBaitinia.
Odi ạkar ạson enyina ạseghe molo Ẹmugh Iigbia bho nạ aḍighi enyina ạneghemi toghiilaan enyina mi tạJizos Kraist nꞌobhin ịḅaal odi ootōlōm enyina.
Ọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌekima ẹmaraghia ẹrolan enyina.

Itu ọsebh Ẹnaan obho aru mỌde bho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho. Tibꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi, podi ạnogho zezira momoom aghuḍum, suo odi aḅẹtōn mạJizos Kraist mi tọbho bho. Iibha bho nẹenogho moḍuom ologhi olo aḍum ni ạrol.
Tebum iibha bho, keḍio ezira noonon taghisigh mogbo ạni ẹela ạlisebh obho Ẹnaan naaseerian rōoy odi obho. Odi aseerian enyina tesi olo ọoghara ile ḍio, ịḅor io, iḅẹebh io.
Ẹela ạlisebh obho ilꞌenyina obo bho neemōruōm obho. Ẹnaan naabhin tịnyaam odi ạmaar aseeri enyina enyina ẹteeny mịbhelegha ilo nookōbhōghi momutiom tikunughi amen obho.
Tiibha bho, ologhi enyina nạaḅaal, oomo ibha enyina teḍigh ni tịitu mọbam amen mi tebum oḍigh kẹrekere ọdegh oonon obho tẹeḅaghami enyina bho.

Ọdegh oonon obhobho polo ọmiin erumolo ologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina ạneghe ni. Ạar obho ughōl bọ agold, obho totue ni ọpueghi obho nọḍaam ghạ nyạn oonon. Pẹzo nạ mologhi omōruōm obho ạla mạar apu magold bho, tọḍa nạ ni oonon molo ạneghe ni. PẸnaan obuom enyina ọnogho enyina meghuan nꞌiibhughumi taḍuma bho ạJizos Kraist tamute atu obho.

Toomo ibha enyina ịmiin io zodi obho, enyina itulan ni zodi. Toomo ibha enyina ịmiin io zodi siibha bho, enyina neemōruōm zodi, molo enyina mẹeteeny mobꞌọkanya ọḅaal ologhi, ilo ọnu ōoy atue ḍio ạgba,
ebum obho enyina nepin mịbhelegha ạruumugh obhꞌenyina, obho aru miiḅua ologhi omōruōm enyina bho.
Arizil tẸnaan obho ibhin oomo iloghi obhꞌeedi ịvaam molōghōm ibhꞌịbhelegha bhobho bho, ịgba mẹnogho obhobho Ẹnaan taanwo enyina bho.

Eedi ịva molōghōm ạkar odi amen obho nꞌẹzo oru obho todi tạtol. Oobho pamen obho Ẹmugh obho taKraist mi teedi ạgba aḍeeriom mẹkparam obho ạJizos tạkparam mi tọmiinom obhꞌodi nꞌeghuan obho tẹtuonom odi obho.

Ẹnaan akpẹerōn magey obho ạnogho marizil bho mobho oḍighi obhꞌeedi iru milꞌenyina, itu ḍio milꞌeedi. Eedi ibhin tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho urōm ạḍua tạnyu obho aru obho ẹgba milo abaabha bho enyina nẹemoghon titelema ooḅi adōm obho. Iibha pọkpo ilo itelema bho tẸnaan negbẹel mọmoghonyan ạni.
Tiibha bho bẹleni, ikpi mịitua enyina meseeri molo oḍighiom oḍighi. Ịmaar mẹmara, meseeri moomo oḍuom ologhi obhꞌenyina mi tạlisebh obho tọnogho enyina tamen obho noomutiom mạJizos Kraist aru.
Ikiilaan mẸnaan, mẹḅele moseeri aghuḍum obhꞌenyina ọgbaaniom ọkpo bho enyina ịrol ịva ghạ mọteeny mi tamen obho enyina delōghōm io mạar obho.
Kẹzo kẹzo ilo ịrol, iḍum ghạ ooḅi aghuḍum, kẹzo bho odi Ẹnaan obo bho abheleghi enyina naḍum obho.
Ẹegia bho ạkpete kua,
“Iḍum ooḅi aghuḍum kạmi Ẹnaan.”

Enyina neekpulughu ghạ ekōl Ẹnaan Ọde enyina, obo bho nạnogho mịiruan monyiin ẹzo bho moomo arōoy mi tọkpo bho ōoy ilꞌọno ilꞌọno naaḍighi obho. Eru kua, piseeri moomo aghuḍum ibha isughōnaan enyina mi tade bho, moghiilaan odi.
Enyina neelōghōm mẹzo ịla mạar isi mọkpe omulumi teḍighiom ạar ạburude bhꞌenyina ibha ạar oḍighiom olo bho. Ughuōm io enyina mạar olo naḅẹebh ghạ ni kokpoki asilva nꞌagold.
Ịḅaal ọtun ạar ọbho tạJizos Kraist ibha ịla mạar magey obho, pibha ubhin ụtaam enyina, odi obho ạrol kọony ẹena olo oḍigh io mẹgha bho.
Ẹnaan ạson zodi ạseghe kọḅel egbiom obho dọlem io mẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio odi aḍighi amutiom zodi mi taruḍuma ikunughi bhibha mebum enyina.
Ịḍua todi eru kenyina emōruōm mẸnaan, obho aḅẹtōn odi mi tọbho bho keḍio ạnogho zodi meghuan, molo ologhi omōruōm nꞌoḍuom ologhi enyina neenon mẸnaan.

Esiibha bho, toghiilaan obhꞌenyina mi tagey obho, enyina neeḍighia lōor enyina ịneghemi molo enyina neeru ịteeny magey etulan mi tobo bho neemōruōm obho, ponyiin atulan monyiin magey nꞌoomo ologhi odi.
Nẹeḍua toghōrōkō obho tẸnaan, obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho, onwe ọmar enyina kạnwuny ọde olo ọpo ghạ ḍio.
Idi kẹzo bho ẹegia bho ạkpete bho,
“Oomo arōoy idi kịigho, molo oomo eghuan eedi idi kạrafalawa ịigho bho.
Ịigho neenyōrōghan, pạrafalawa bho ọgharaghu,
keḍio oghōrōkō bho tObạmọogh obho odi kamen kamen.”
Oobho poghōrōkō ooḅi adōm obho ụgba ụnogho enyina bho.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ipōobh tạnyu oomo ịkarabh. Ọgba iben nꞌiituma nꞌibōbhan nꞌọgba rōoy ọpue ịtol mụ.
Ịtol kạnwuny ilo eede ụmaraghi, ilo neleghe mọmaam ạkar ạamaam ạruumugh obho, molo amen enyina, nẹemaam enyina eḍum etu ẹteeny ịbhelegha.
Ẹegia bho nẹegba mobho,
“Enyina nẹenama moḍighi iiḅi tObạmọogh obho.”
Itu tObạmọogh obho. Odi ạkpo otu obho aḍum ni ạrol obho, obho arōoy igin ni kọkarabh ạar, keḍio Ẹnaan ạson odi ạseghe kạar olo ạla mạar apu kạar kạar.

Itu kikpiti otu ilo aghuḍum idi molo oḅōghōm enyina motu iikpulughu ạruumugh obho, oru oghōol-otu arōoy iiḅua bho, ilo ịḅaal ni ịman, mọtun ọkpo ilo tẹḍua tạJizos Kraist kẹki tẸnaan, teḍigh ni tologhi odi.
Nọokpete kua mi tẹegia bho,
“Ạami ụson ụseghe mạkpo olo ạla mạar naseeri mọola ogbo otu mi tạZayon,
molo kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm odi ọlokia ḍio rẹgheer.”
Ạkpo obhobho ạla mạar magey mi tenyina obo bho imōruōm zodi obho; tobo bho imōruōm io bho,
“Ạkar odi ạkpo bho iḅōghi rutu obho igin obho naakiton atu atẹn mạkpo obho ạla bọ mạar apu obho.”
Tọnon esi ẹegia bho ạkpete kua:
“Oobho pạkpo bho taḍighi arōoy ekpetaan,
ọbharakpar olo taḍighi eedi emeleghu.”
Eedi ikpetaan ni emeleghu tebum obho eedi imōruōm io moghōrōkō bho; iibha peegua eedi mi tẸnaan.

Keḍio enyina parōoy obho ụson ụseghe bho, arōoy iiḅua Ọola bho, eghun-otu iigbia tẸnaan, ạkar arōoy tẸnaan ibha ụson ụseghe mọgba olelemi eḍighiom ạar ibꞌaruugu obho tẸnaan, obo bho abheleghi zenyina mi tọkinim obho ạloghom togbōgh ẹḅaal odi obho.
Tamen olo neetẹn, enyina arōoy tẸnaan io, keḍio esiibha enyina ilꞌodi; tamen olo neetẹn enyina ilōghōm io mọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan, keḍio esiibha bho enyina neebhin ạni mọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi.
Obo oḍigh ologhi ạmi, ạami naasen ni zenyina kisoloman nꞌobo ararele tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obhobho. Ísōrōna ghạ mẹnogho mi tẹmel iikpōogh alōor obho, obho oomo amen idi tẹgham nꞌạruumugh obho.

Eḍighiom ạar enyina mi teesoḍia arōoy aruru obho ẹmaar ni ẹneghe molo, tamen olo eedi tẹgbaam enyina miben kiḍighi mịkarabh eedi tẹetua ni miiḅi eḍighiom ạar obhꞌenyina, keḍio tebuom mẸnaan mi taḍuma bho odi tatu obho.
Ikiilaan, tebum Obạmọogh obho, moomo ạruula ẹmar-arōoy obho: ọolema bhꞌaRom, obho ạteeny moomo ịto bho,
nꞌobo ịto aruubhugh obho, obho odi arōm mọliom iḍighi mịkarabh obho nꞌobuom iḍighi miiḅi obho.
Iibha pibha idi tologhi tẸnaan: ilo enyina kebhin miiḅi eḍighiom ạar obhꞌenyina kekpereghiom mịnu araama arōoy obo bho nẹkpeteey milo eedi ilōghōm io bho.
Itughogh kạnwuny ogbo eghun mi tạraama bho; ibhin ghạ mịnyaam bhibha tenyina mekpereghiom ịkarabh, itugh kạnwuny otu tẸnaan.
Ịlogh eghuan kōoy kōoy, metulan obo bho nꞌenyina imōruōm obho, meghiilaan mẸnaan, mẹlogh eghuan mọolema bhꞌaRom.

Enyina ạnwuny otu obho, ịtuugh mibhꞌọnuekpete ọde otu enyina meḍighi mẹnogho zeedi moghiilaan toomo ọkpo. Ịtolom mẹzo bho mobo bho ịneghe nẹmaar eenon enyina bho be ḍio, nꞌobo bho ịteeny mịkarabh ạdolomaan obho.
Obo bho aḍighi miibha bho, Ẹnaan tạsebh ni zodi, erumolo odi ạkparam ni mi tẹegama ọmiinom obho iizuan io molo odi kạmiinom obho, tebum obho odi naalōghōm mịto tẸnaan obho.
Okōr oḍigh ạsuo mobho idi mọkparam taliḍul olo ịgbaan ni mebum ịkarabh ilo enyina iḍighi? Erumolo enyina ịkparam tọmiinom tamen olo enyina iḍighi milo ịneghe, Ẹnaan tạsebh ni enyina.
Tiibha bho pibha Ẹnaan ạtuan kabheleghi enyina, tebum obho aKraist nịvo nịvo ạmiinom mebum enyina keḍio ạḅelemaan enyina mọta odi, ọtuonom ạraaḅa asike odi.
Ịkarabh ilo odi aḍighi ilo. Iben ilo ụmoghon bho odi ạgba ilo.

Amen olo ụkpete zodi mịkarabh, odi ọkpete ḍio mịkarabh amulumian. Amen odi ạmiinom, odi ọghor io mobo bho nẹnogho zodi mọmiinom obho. Odi aseeri aḍuom ologhi odi mi tẸnaan, obho nạnogho magey ịiruan obho.
Odi ạJizos nịvo nịvo arōol mịkarabh ezira mi talōor odi ạsiinom toorẹeny obho, molo ezira ọbho toḍighi ịkarabh, oḍum mooḅi aghuḍum. Uukuōm enyina mạranem obhꞌodi.
Enyina ịrologhu kạraana ilo ibhẹzu taraabōom eedi, keḍio esiibha bho noomulumi zenyina moru ọtuonom Ookō-rạana bho, obo bho naakō rụumugh enyina bho.

Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, enyina ạraani ikiilaan maburulom enyina molo erumolo ẹde eedi idi milo imōruōm io moghōrōkō bho tẸnaan, eedi etu emōruōm ạni tebum eḍighiom ạar obhꞌenyina. Ilo nạ molo enyina kẹkpete mạar.
Eedi tẹmiin ni mobho enyina nekiilaan Ẹnaan eḍighi miiḅi.
Ímutiom ghạ mi tibura enyina, ọkpaanaay ạruumu, nꞌọloghaay ịla nꞌọlokia ạrusuoma nꞌominaay arukpe.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ẹneghe bhꞌenyina ẹḍua tạkar agey iloghi obhꞌenyina kemute, ẹneghe bho ọkpo ghạ ḍio bho, olo aḍighi namutiom alideny nꞌạbiribirim aghuḍum. Iibha pibha ịla mạar magey mi taghisigh tẸnaan.
Iibha pẹzo ạkar igey ạraani ididi obho, obo bho iḍuom oomo ologhi eedi mẸnaan obho, ighiilaan burulom eedi iḍighi mẹneghe eedi imutiom.
ASera ạrol kua: odi ạtuonom mọnu tEbrạhạm keḍio abheleghi zodi “Ọde otu ạmi.” Enyina, siibha bho, ạsunwunyaan odi, erumolo enyina iḍighi miiḅi, ikiil io mạar ruugu.

Enyina aburulom obho ẹkona, suo enyina netughoghom rạani enyina bho, ilōghōm mobho eedi iru rạani, molo enyina etughom eedi nꞌedughom ologhi oghiilaan, tebum obho eedi nꞌenyina tẹḅaran ni epin minwo aghuḍum tẸnaan obho. Iḍighi miibha molo ọoḅaghami ọtol tiikpulughu enyina.
Tesi olo okunughiom: oomo enyina ịteeny monyiin ịitua nꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien. Itulan kạnwuny onyiin onyiin. Onyiin aḍighi miiḅi monyiin, asōoriōm lōor ạnogho monyiin.
Ímulumian ghạ mịkarabh nꞌịkarabh, bolobolo ọghor nꞌọghor. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ịkpiom lịsebh, tebum obho Ẹnaan aguan mọnogho enyina lịsebh tamen obho odi abheleghi enyina bho,
ạkpete kua:
“Obo bho nạva moḍum ooḅi aghuḍum nꞌọmiin iiḅi taruḍuma odi obho ạmaar ạbham ọodoronu odi asōbh iben nꞌịkarabh arōbh.
Odi aghiraan tịkarabh, aḍighi miiḅi; odi ạva mekima aghiil ạtuonom.
Tibha Obạmọogh obho agbonom riḍien odi mobo bho noḍighi miiḅi obho nạmoghon nạ miikpulughu eedi moomo amen obho, keḍio aḍionom ạman mobo bho neḍighi mịkarabh obho.”
Okōr ōoy taḍighi enyina mạar erumolo enyina iseeriom oomo ologhi moḍighi iiḅi?
Erumolo enyina ịmiinom ẹkona mi toḍighi iiḅi, ịmiin ọḅaal ologhi olo tạtolaan enyina. Ighiil ghạ rōoy, ịítu ghạ nạ.
Ikiilaan maKraist tiloghi enyina, meseeri zodi kObạmọogh enyina. Kamen kamen ịmara mọbhagharana kōoy kōoy olo apuruan enyina mọgba oḍuom ologhi obho enyina ịteeny obho.

Ịteeny osōoriōm alōor nꞌoghiilaan mi tọbhagharana enyina. Ạravo enyina ẹḅaal, molo tamen olo ụkpete enyina mịkarabh, mi tiiḅi eḍighiom ạar obho enyina iḍighi karōoy ilo nẹtuonom maKraist obho, eedi obo bho ịkpete enyina bho ẹlokia rẹgheer tọnuekpete eedi.
Ọmiinom toḍighi iiḅi ịneghe epu mọmiinom toḍighi ịkarabh, erumolo iibha bho iru mịto tẸnaan.

Ilōghōm mobho aKraist nịvo nịvo ạbho mebum enyina. Onyiin amen obho be bho odi ạbho akunughi mịkarabh. Ooḅi ōoy ạbho ạnogho mịkarabh arōoy mobhin ezira omulumi ọnogho Ẹnaan. Ughigh zodi tiikpōogh obho, keḍio tạruumugh obho odi odi nꞌaghuḍum.
Taghuḍum ạruumugh obho odi odi obho, podi ạghi ạgba dōm obho ạnogho mạruumugh obho idi tikoli obho.

Iibha pạruumugh obho ipinom io mẸnaan, tamen obho odi adeny naḅōrō zeedi mi taruḍuma bho aNoa nạkasi mobꞌoghuugh obho. Ịbam arōoy be bho iḍigh toghuugh obho. Oomo eedi ạbhenya. Eedi pobo ụbhel tạmuum obho.

Iibha bho ịgbaaniom ozua mụum, olo nạpel enyina siibha. Ilo ootōla ẹeniir alōor obho ḍio, idi toguan olo ubhin ooḅi ologhi uguan Ẹnaan. Ozua-mụum obho ạphel enyina mi toḅetunu tọbho bho tạJizos Kraist,
obho nạasiin tạnyu obho ạrol delede mi toḍiom ạvo tẸnaan nạda moomo itelema nꞌạruula nꞌịnyaam ạnyu obho.
Odi aKraist kạmiinom ni tiikpōogh obho, enyina ẹkona ịkuemi miloghi enyina mi tonyiin ebōom obho mẹetua ghạ, ebum obho kōoy kōoy olo ạmiinom tiikpōogh obho ọrol mụ aḍighi mịkarabh.
Eru kua, pạseghe siibha ạghi taghisigh, ịnogho moomo aghuḍum obhꞌenyina mẸnaan ạbham tẹzo ịto bhꞌodi. Íḍum ghạ maghuḍum iikpōogh alōor obho.

Amen obho enyina iḍum ghạ maghuḍum arōoy aruru obho neegbẹbh. Enyina iḍum ghạ maghuḍum ipesi, nꞌọduḅuḍian tọkpo ẹmel alōor obho, nꞌoḍumughia arimiim, nꞌoleey ẹzaal, nꞌoḍiku araagbo arimiim, nꞌopuru ọkool ịikool aruru ibha nepel olōgh tẸnaan obho.
Esiibha bho arōoy aruru obho neemōogh mobho enyina itul mụ nꞌeedi eḍum aghuḍum aruubheeny obho. Tebum iibha bẹleni, peedi nẹsugh ḍien enyina.
Ịḅelemaan eedi, eedi tẹmaranuan ni mẸnaan ẹgba ghuḍum obhꞌeedi ẹnogho zodi obo bho nạamara mọru ịiruan ọnogho obo bho idi mimoom nꞌobo bho nẹebho bho.

Iibha pạar obho ụgba nạ mooḅi adōm obho ụnogho mobo bho nẹebho bho, obo bho noosōbh ụnogho mi tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho, kẹzo bho nosōbh ụnogho kōoy kōoy obho; ụgba ụnogho eedi molo taghuḍum ạruumugh obhꞌeedi, eedi eḍum kẹzo bho Ẹnaan naḍum obho.
Ikunughi oomo ẹmorokpo bho naatuan. Ịpam iloghi enyina, megona lōor enyina molo enyina etue eekpulughu mẸnaan.
Ibha ipu kạar kạar, onyiin atulan monyiin magey, tebum obho etulan nakpereghi ghạ mọlogh ịkarabh obho.
Onyiin ạloghom monyiin totu odi, ịghunughun ịtol io.
Kōoy kōoy abhin tẹnogho bho Ẹnaan aanwo zodi obho aḍighiom miiḅi mịnon arōoy, kiiḅi arōoy ilo nẹpam ọkpo tẸnaan.

Kōoy kōoy olo napirisi, ạgba mọnuekpete tẸnaan! Obo nạpel rōoy, abhin ạbhelom mi tịnyaam obho Ẹnaan ạnogho zodi obho, molo obuom Ẹnaan toomo ẹmorokpo bho mi tạJizos Kraist, obo bho eghuan nꞌịnyaam ịrol ni ịnogho kamen kamen obho. Ẹrol nị nạ kua!
Ibꞌiiḅi aburumōr, ẹegama ọdegh oonon obho enyina nẹmiinom obho ịnogho ḍio enyina meemōogh, kilo enyina ịtuom io mologhi mọmiin.
Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ologhi enyina ạḅaal mobhin ạni abin ọmiinom obho tạJizos Kraist, molo enyina ẹḅaal ologhi magey men tomutiom meghuan obhꞌodi.
Ạlisebh ilꞌenyina erumolo ụkpete enyina mịkarabh tebum obho enyina nẹtuonom maKraist obho. Iibha neḍighi eḍeeriom mobho Ẹmugh eghuan obho, Ẹmugh obho tẸnaan odi nꞌenyina.
Oōy ọtuan io ạmiinom tibha odi aru mọokoma, bolobolo ọḅa, nꞌoḍighi mịkarabh nꞌōoy olo nadu ghạ mizon tọkpo ịnon.
Kerumolo enyina ịmiinom tebum obho enyina iru marōoy ilo ughōlōm maKraist, pighiil ghạ rẹgheer. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ịsebh Ẹnaan mobho enyina ighōla maḍien taKraist.
Amen ịiruan obho nạateeny, keḍio arōoy obho tẸnaan pobo topira ọkiom. Erumolo ubhira ụkiom ezira, ikunughi obho tẹtol ẹko ẹnogho mobo bho imōruōm io mOoḅi Adōm obho ạḍua tẸnaan karu obho?
Tẹtol kẹzo bho nọoge bho,
“Ẹkpar magey mọbhel iiḅi arōoy kụ,
ḍạ mạgba milo temute mi tobo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan keḍio natōol mịkarabh tẹmu obho?”
Eru kua, obo bho neḍum iiḅi aghuḍum nẹmiinom tebum ịto bho tẸnaan obho erōbh ẹman moomo aghuḍum obhꞌeedi mi tỌolema bho, obho obi ghạ ḍio mi toguan odi obho.
Ạami obo bho uru monyiin okenya olo ạmiin ạni kua nạgba mọmiinom obho taKraist, obho tapin ạni mabin eghuan obhꞌodi obho tozuuron omutiom obho, naasen ni marukenya ạsosi obho idi togbo enyina bho,
molo enyina keekō mạraana bho Ẹnaan ạnogho enyina bho, unyu ḍio zenyina, ipin oomo ologhi enyina meḍighiom kẹzo bho Ẹnaan nạva bho. Ị́tuan ghạ mebum ạmukpe bho be, ipin ologhi etulan meenonom.
Ịbham ghạ mobo bho idi tẹeḍiani enyina bho nꞌọoghuanaan ạvo. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, iḍum ooḅi aghuḍum molo eedi ẹtuonom rạaḅa asike enyina.
Amen uvẹmụ ooko-rạana bho tamute atu, penyina obhin ạni eghōony eghuan obho, obho bọbon amen olo tạtol tụruturu olo bho.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, enyina ạnwuny-ughẹel obho, ikiilaan marukenya bho. Oomo enyina, ịkpologhia mạdoni osōoriōm alōor, onyiin asōoriōm lōor ạnogho monyiin. Tibha,
“Ẹnaan nazuonom ghạ mobo bho ịbughia lōor obho, keḍio nanwo minwo mobo bho isōoriōm lōor obho.”
Isōoriōm lōor mi tookōogh ạvo ịnyaam tẸnaan, molo tamen olo ịgbaan podi ọbughe enyina.
Itōbhanaan zodi moomo ịiḅaghami enyina, tibha odi ku naakō zenyina bho.
