Igona lōor enyina, ịmaar eenon! Obo ọlogh aḍien enyina, eru obho, naleghe agbo akin akiton kodumunuḅụạgụ, nạva mobo odi tapum ạveleghi.
Ịkuemi mologhi omōruōm enyina megin zodi, tẹzo bho enyina meelōghōm mobho oomo aburumōr enyina ibha imōruōm obho mi toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho neeḍigh nạ tonyiin odi ọmiinom obho.

Ịbam amen neetẹn mi tọmiinom obhꞌenyina, pẸnaan obꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien obho nịvo nịvo obo bho abheleghi enyina moru obhin ạni abin eghuan obho ikunughi olo mi taKraist obho, oḍighi ọneghemi enyina, ọnogho enyina mịnyaam, nꞌọoghuanaan ade olo ọmara.
Ịnyaam ọdaam ẹma bho ẹrol ẹnogho zodi kamen kamen! Ẹrol nị nạ kua!

ẠSailas, obho ạami ụseghe kumōr olo ạteeny ologhi ạlogh ạvo ạnogho ạami mọge ọbam ọbhereer obhobho aruom enyina. Ạami nạva mookiom enyina nꞌọgba ọnogho enyina mobho oobho aru mạkar ẹmu ọsu ạghusan aḍien tẸnaan obho. Ịmaar ẹtuom mạar.
Ụmarani ạsosi obhꞌạBabilon, obho Ẹnaan nạason nạ ạseghe bho, epuruan enyina. ẠMak ọony ạmi ẹkona apuruan enyina.
Onyiin abhin tetulan aḅolom monyiin.
Ekima ẹrol ẹnogho moomo enyina obo bho iru bọ milo taKraist obho.
Ạami ạSaimon Pita ẹbana nꞌoteledōm obho tạJizos Kraist ụge natuom enyina obo bho ịḍua toḍighi iiḅi obho tạJizos Kraist Ẹnaan bhꞌezira kạnogho enyina Ọpela mologhi omōruōm olo ạla mạar kobhꞌezōor.
Ọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌekima ẹmaraghia ẹrolan enyina tebum obho enyina ilōghōm mẸnaan nꞌạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho.

Tebum obho ezira noolōghōm zodi obo bho abheleghi ezira moru obhin abin eghuan nꞌoomo iiḅi obhꞌodi obho, neeḍighi molo ịnyaam tẸnaan nẹenogho zezira kạar kạar olo ezira nogbẹel mobhin oḍumom aghuḍum iikpōogh obho nꞌạruumugh obho.

Tiibha bho podi ạnogho zezira mẹnogho ilo ịbugh ịla mạar magey, ibha odi aguanaan obho, molo tẹnogho bhibha penyina omuzōnaan tọbho ẹnyaghaam ọkpo ẹmel ẹmar-arōoy obho, oru obhin ạni abin aghuḍum obho tẸnaan.
Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, ịkparam magey mẹḅaram iiḅi eḍighiom ạar mi tologhi omōruōm enyina, tiiḅi eḍighiom ạar obho ịḅaram olōghōm ạar,
tolōghōm ạar obho ịḅaram ọbhama lōor, tọbhama lōor obho ịḅaram ọkparami alōor, tọkparami alōor obho ịḅaram olōghōm Ẹnaan,
mẹḅaram ọbhomoghian aburumōr obho mi tolōghōm Ẹnaan, kụ mẹḅaram etulan mi tọbhomoghian aburumōr obho.
Erumolo enyina ịteeny taghuḍum enyina magey mabaabha bho, peedi oru oḍighi enyina, enyina kẹmaar kemute keḅom mi tolōghōm ạar enyina mi tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho.
Keḍio ōoy olo ọteeny io miibha bho mi taghuḍum odi, pariḍien odi nẹegbarara molo odi nạmiin miikōogh be, odi naaḅulo nạ mobho nootōl migbaany ịkarabh obhꞌodi.
Tiibha bho bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ilōghōma mẹbhamam tobheleghi obho Ẹnaan naabheleghi enyina ạson enyina ạseghe bho. Enyina eḍighi miibha bho, enyina imeel io tọtu.
Poḍighi olo Ẹnaan tạnogho enyina mịikpo moḍigh ạni tAde-Ọolema bho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh obho nꞌỌpela bhꞌezira, obho ikunughi olo bho.
Tebum ibha bẹleni, ạami uzuum io lōor mọḅele ghạ ọotueni enyina mọkpo bhibha, toomo ibha enyina neelōghōm itẹnẹ miibha bho, imina nạ ịghua gbigbiribh mi tagey obho enyina neebhinom obho.
Ạami ụutua, ẹkar ẹneghe molo ạami kazighe miloghi obhꞌenyina mọotuemi ghạ enyina mọkpo bhibha, suo ạami odi nini napooghu obho.
Ạami naalōghōm mobho naatuan molo ạami kạkporona kạmuneen moḍim aghuḍum obhꞌạmi kẹzo bho ạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho nạagba ạnogho ạami obho.
Ạami tạkparam ni aḍighi mẹzo olo enyina tẹetua ghạ miibha bho moomo amen, tamen olo ạami naaḍigh toogu.
Ezōor ubhin io tiben ịigbaay iiḍuul kọgba ọnogho enyina milo igboloman tịnyaam nꞌoru obho tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho. Ezōor ubhin nꞌạkar ikpo ariḍien obhꞌezōor kọmiinom eghuan obhꞌodi.

Ezōor ụrol ạni men obho Ẹnaan Ọde bho ạnogho bọ zodi miibhughumi nꞌeghuan obho, tamen olo oghōrōkō ạḍua aru todi mi tesi Ibꞌeghuan obho, ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Oobho pogini Ọony obhꞌạmi, obho ạami uḅeleriom ẹmu obho.”
Ezōor nịvo nịvo ụmoghon ạni moghōrōkō bhobho, bho ạḍua tạnyu obho aru tamen obho ezōor udi nꞌodi mi tobꞌeegum iigbia bho.

Iibha bho neeḍighi molo ịghuemi magey miloghi ezōor mi tadōm obho arizil obho tẸnaan ịgbaay obho. Ẹkpe magey molo enyina kedeny kẹmoghonyan ạni, ebum obho ịigbaay bhibha idi kọtodi olo nạmua tọkinim ninii aḍio naaru ạḅaal, pẹḅaal ẹenaany ụḍirogh obho aru ạmua tiloghi obhꞌenyina.
Tilo ipuom suo, ịitua ghạ miibha bho, mobho bọbon ōoy olo tatue ạseghe mịitua odi ạgba amutiom mẹmu ạghiiny arizil obho, ibha ụge bọ tọbhereer iigbia bho, olo,
ebum obho bọbon onyiin adōm ạghiiny arizil obho olo ạḍua tịitua ōoy karu olo. Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạbham anyuughi rōoy molo eedi ịgba mọnuekpete bho tẸnaan.

Tamen olo neetẹn, iben arizil emute teesoḍia arōoy. Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, pẹzo iben arōoy obo ịtughumiom temute nạ teesoḍia enyina. Eedi tẹḅokia ni epin etu ẹloghom mịtughumiom amapẹ, emina ẹparanaan mạkar Ọde Otu obho ạta bọ zeedi obho, molo ekperenom aḍuugh tapuom ni zeedi.
Ẹzo bho nạ, pẹzo ọlogh arōoy tẹtuonom miḍim araabōom obhꞌeedi, molo tiibha bho eedi neḍighi obho parōoy ọgba ịkarabh ọpue Ooḅi Ebōom obho.
Tẹmel ikpoki peedi ọtughumiom iben eedi mobhin ạsuo mi tenyina. Kọkanya amen mobho ọtu mịiruan eedi naaru naḅōrō, nꞌobho obo bho tapiẹmi eedi obho okoḍi ḍio.
Ẹnaan ọḅelemaan io mitelema bho iḍighi bọ mịkarabh obho. Odi anyuughi zeedi ạloki toonu olo ikunughi olo, ạkasiiy zeedi aseeri tesi olo obꞌọkinim, naḅōruōm maḍuma ịiruan obho.
Ẹnaan ọḅelemaan io mọḅel ẹmar-arōoy obho. Odi abhin mobꞌaḍigho ạziom mịkarabh arōoy obho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho. Odi ạbhel ni maNoa obho ạgba gha mebōom ooḅi aghuḍum obho nꞌịnon oḍual arōoy be.
Ẹnaan abhin ni nyạn abhiẹmiom rạama bhꞌạSodom nꞌaGomora mọnogho aliiki milo temutenaan mobo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho.
Odi ạsoghoron ni amutiom mạLot, obho aru bọ mooḅi ōoy, obho ịkarabh eḍighiom ạar arubheeny obho ịiḅaghami ghạ bho.
Odi ooḅi ōoy obhobho arughan zeedi molo oomo aḍuma odi ạmiin ghạ ạmoghon mọkpo ịkarabh eḍighiom ạar obhꞌeedi olo ịnogho mịiḅaghami mooḅi ologhi obhꞌodi.

Iibha bho nẹgba eḍeeriom mobho Obạmọogh obho alōghōm magey mẹzo ọbhel ọsighe mi tọdegh oonon eedi marōoy obo bho ilōghōm mẸnaan obho, nꞌẹzo ọbham ịkarabh arōoy oseeri tọmiinom oḅōruōm aḍuma ịiruan obho,
ạkar obo bho neegin mịto tẸnaan nẹtuonuman ịkarabh ẹebhuom alōor obhꞌodi, obho tạpue ghuḍum eedi obho.
Eedi iben arōoy obo ịtughumiom obho, aḍuugh iḅom ẹmu eepughiaay rạgba. Ighiilaan ghạ nạ ḍio meghuan itelema ạnyu obho; kpẹlen nꞌipa, eedi nẹkpete ghạ zeedi ẹpue.
Eedi itelema bho nạ, ibha ịteeny ịnyaam nꞌịikpo ipuom eedi iben arōoy obo ịtughumiom obho, irōnyōgh ghạ ḍio ẹgba zeedi ẹpue taghisigh tObạmọogh obho.

Arōoy bhibha arōoy ilo ịitua ilo, ẹebhuom ẹmel alōor obhꞌeedi nẹnyaghagh eedi neḍum aghuḍum ịnam eḍum ibha ụmaraghi mokughi ọze bho. Eedi nẹkpete ghạ ẹpue mọkpo olo neepu molōghōm ạar obhꞌeedi. Tọze ni zeedi kẹzo bho nọze ghạ mịnam eḍum obho.

Ọmiinom obho eedi ịnogho rōoy obho, pọmiinom obho topin ọkpeom eedi obho. Ọḅaal ologhi eedi poḍighi togbo etẹrẹ kạar kạar olo tạnogho zeedi nẹmel iikpōogh alōor obho eedi nẹva bọ bho. Eedi nepuughi ghisigh tObạmọogh obho ẹloki rẹgheer meḍian ạruumugh obho, men olo eedi itul nꞌenyina nele nꞌọḅaal ologhi mi tipesi nꞌịkarabh ạdolomaan obhꞌeedi.

Ọnon ạar olo eedi nẹva olo, tughuneen obhumogh ạraani ḍio. Ẹmel oḍighi ịkarabh obho igbẹbhan ghạ ḍio mi teedi. Eedi nẹkomogh ghạ ẹlogh tẹsiin mobo bho ịkua ḍio tiloghi omōruōm eedi obho. Eedi nẹetughumiom miloghi eedi eseeri mọteeny kạar kạar. Itōnyōgh tẸnaan idi nꞌeedi.
Eedi nẹeḍua epe tonyen ebōom obho. Eedi nẹtuonuman mebōom obho aBelam ọony tạBosor ạtuonuman obho, obo bho atulan mobhin oḍighi ịkarabh ogbuom obho.
Molo ụliom ni zodi mi tịkarabh odi, okpom-ụka ạsu ạkpete mạar ạnogho zodi ạpuenaan zodi moti iitia ẹnaghanyan arizil obhꞌodi.
Arōoy bhibha ariizi ạmuum ilo ạmuum ilo. Eedi idi nạ keḅōghōghaan olo ọpibha nạpibhoghom. Ẹnaan nạasi mesi obꞌọkinim aseerian zeedi.
Eedi ibhin mọnuekpete araama, nꞌiituma, nꞌipesi ẹmel alōor obhꞌeedi nẹḍaam marōoy obo bho eede ịke momuzōnaan ọḍua tobo bho netugh maghuḍum olo ạgbaranuan obho.
Eedi neguanaan ghạ rōoy maghuḍum ạnwuny ogbo eghun, keḍio eedi nịvo nịvo ạrubana ịzian ịkarabh eḍighiom ạar, tebum obho ōoy naḍigh ghạ mẹbana ạnogho kạar kạar olo napuom zodi mạvo bho.

Erumolo arōoy ibhin tolōghōma bhꞌeedi mi tạJizos Kraist Ọpela bho nꞌObạmọgh ezira bho kimuzōnaan tịnyaam ọḅiira ẹenir ẹmar-arōoy obho, kemina emula ẹebhughu teedi, aghuḍum obhꞌeedi taḅẹebh ni apu mibhꞌọḅel egbiom obho.
Ughōl eedi delōghōm io mooḅi ebōom obho bọ kịneghe epu moru olōghōm ạni koghiraan oḍionom ạman mịto iigbia bho ụnogho bọ zeedi obho.
Iibha bho imutenaan eedi obho nẹgba eḍeeriom mobho asidōgh bhibha iru magey,
“Aghōogh amina amula nale mibha odi akuḅaan azuughi obho,”
bolobolo
“Obhōrōpō olo uḅur mụum namina ghạ ni ạki tọgbudu obho.”
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, oobho ogbẹbhiōm ịzal ọbhereer obho ạami nạage uruom enyina. Toomo eedi ạami ụva magey mọkparam ọotuemi enyina mọkpo bhibha molo ạami ạloki mạkar iiḅi ịitua tạruumu enyina.
Ạami nạva molo enyina kẹetua ghạ mịigbaay arizil iigbia bho tẸnaan ibha eedi ịgba kageedi obho, nꞌaraalōgh obho Obạmọogh nꞌỌpela bho ạnogho bọ miteledōm enyina mọnogho enyina bho.
Ipira melōghōma kua, mobho tikunughi aruḍuma bho ẹtede arōoy temute ni etu ilo tẹtol ẹtuonuman mẹebhuom iikpōogh alōor eedi. Eedi tẹmologh ni ẹeḅaghami enyina
ekōl kua “Odi ạJizos saguan momula oru? Oḍighen odi? Igbaany ạburude ezira sụneebhozu, keḍio kạar kạar odi nini kẹzo bho ụlem bọ mẹmar-arōoy obho kọḅel egbiom obho.”
Eedi ịkar ni elōghōm ku nẹparanaan mobho kageedi obho Ẹnaan ạkpete ni be keḍio ụlem made bho nꞌạnyu obho. Ade bho ạḍua tạmuum amute molo ạmuum obho nẹpam nạ zodi.
Keḍio ạmuum nạ, obho obꞌạdigho bho, mobho ubhin ubhiẹmiom mugbaany ẹmar-arōoy obho.

Onyiin odi oghōrōkō bho tẸnaan mobho ạbham aseeri mạnyu obho nꞌade bho odi bọ siibha bho mobhin ạnyan obhiẹmiom. Nooseeri mạnyu obho nꞌade bho noḅōruōm maḍuma bho tọtu mịiruan ọnogho, opiẹmi marōoy obo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho.
Iiḅi aburumōr, íḅulo ghạ monyiin ekpo ạar obhobho: taghisigh tObạmọogh obho akẹrẹkẹrẹ olo mi tonyiin aḍuma nꞌạsumuunir ạsia. Todi, ịzal obho onyiin.
Obạmọogh obho obiẹmi ghạ ḍio moguan odi kẹzo bho ẹtede enyina nẹetua bho. Odi adeny ni ạnogho enyina, ebum obho odi ọva ḍio molo onyiin ōoy kabhẹ. Odi nạva molo kōoy kōoy kaghiraan tịkarabh odi.

Aḍuma bho Obạmọogh obho tatu obho, tatu tekperenom kọḅa. Taḍuma popo, tigbōgh imulughu, pạnyu obho nꞌoomo ọkpo bho idi bọ todi obho ọnu ọnyan ogbōr otẹn. Ade bho nꞌoomo ọkpo bho idi todi obho tepẹ ni ẹḍua.
Ẹzo bho topiẹmi ni moomo ọkpo bhibha bho, okōr oḍigh aghuḍum mobho ịgbaan lꞌenyina keḍum? Iḍum ooḅi aghuḍum mẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan,
ku meḅōruōm ghạ maḍuma bho tẸnaan, mẹkparam magey meḍighi molo odi aḍuma bho kakẹm karu, ạkar odi aḍuma bho ạnyu obho tạnu apẹ bọ bho, nꞌẹesu obho tanyẹnẹmi moomo ọkpo bho idi bọ tạnyu obho.
Ẹnaan naaguanaan zezira momoom ạnyu nꞌade olo oḍighi iiḅi tẹtol. Oobho pobho ezira nogon ghạ oḅōruōm obho.
Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ẹzo bho enyina negon ghạ neḅōrō ḍuma bhobho bho, pịkparam ghạ meḍighi meseeri silōor enyina ẹneghe ẹman olo ụgbaam io mịkarabh taghisigh tẸnaan, mẹrol tekima nꞌodi.

Ịkiom ghạ ḍien talideny tObạmọogh ezira bho kebōom olo odi ạnogho enyina mọḅol ọbhel enyina, konyiin ẹzo bho ooḅi umōr obhꞌezira ạPol abhin toomo olōghōm ạar obho Ẹnaan ạnogho zodi obho ạge aruom enyina bho.

Onyiin eedi abaabha bho pibha odi nạge ghạ nạ toomo ịbhereer obhꞌodi. Kir ẹde ọkpo olo ịkpar magey mọmoghonyan tịbhereer obhꞌodi olo obo ilōghōm io nꞌarōoy ịzal iloghi nenweeghiiy ẹḅaraghiom miben ẹgba, kẹzo bho eedi nẹgbaam mibha ẹegia ipedi obho, molo eedi negbo maruugu eedi.

Keḍio enyina, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, neelōghōm etẹnẹ miibha bho. Siibha bho, igona lōor enyina, molo okōrōnuan arōoy obo bho ikiilaan io raalōgh obho igbōrōm enyina taraabōom eedi nꞌolo enyina ịkorom emeel tariisi obho enyina ịmaraay bho.
Ipōbhōm mẹghi taghisigh nꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌolōghōm ạar obho tạJizos Kraist Ọpela bho nꞌObạmọogh ezira bho. Eghuan obho ẹrol ẹnogho zodi be siibha kamen kamen. Ẹrol ni kua.
Ezōor ụge notuom enyina milo igboloman nꞌEkpo-ọnuekpete aghuḍum obho, obho ạrol bọ kꞌọḅẹl egbiom ọlem obho; obho ezōor nọomoghon; umina uunon ụmiinom nꞌariḍien ezōor, ụbhamam nạ nꞌạravo ezōor.

Amen odi aghuḍum obho aru amute tẹmar-arōoy obho, ezōor ọmiin, molo ezōor nọgbaam ọnogho enyina olelemi tilo igboloman nꞌaghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho, obho ạrol bọ tỌde bho keḍio uru uḍighi ezōor ulōghōm odi.
Ibha ezōor ụmoghon ụmiin obho pibha ezōor nọgba nạ ọnogho enyina, molo enyina etul nꞌezōor mi tookōbhōghian obho ezōor ụteeny bọ mi tỌde bho nꞌỌony obhꞌodi ạJizos Kraist obho.
Ezōor nọge miibha bho, molo ọḅaal ologhi obhꞌezira agbẹbh ạman.
Iibha padōm obho ezōor ụmoghon bọ tọnu Ọony obhꞌodi obho, obho ezōor nọgba ọnogho enyina bho. Ẹnaan pẹḅaal keḍio todi bọbon ọkinim olo.
Erumolo ezira udi tọkinim ku nokōl ghạ mezira ọteeny ookōbhōghian nꞌodi Ẹnaan, tịnu nꞌeḍighiom ạar obhꞌezira nẹgba miben be.
Erumolo ezira udi tẹḅaal obho kẹzo bho odi Ẹnaan odi tẹḅaal obho, pezira, onyiin ọteeny ookōbhōghian mi tonyiin, keḍio ịḅaal tạJizos Ọony obhꞌodi taatōl moomo ịkarabh ezira ạḅaaleni.
Erumolo ezira ughōl mezira ịkarabh iloghi ilo, pezira noobiōghōm silōor ezira, agey obho ilo nạ tezira.
Kezira ootuman mịkarabh ezira ọnogho mẸnaan, odi tapin ni mebum oguan obhꞌodi aḍighi mibha ịneghe bho ạḅelemaan ezira mịkarabh ezira aatōl ezira ạḅaaleni mi toomo ịkarabh eḍighiom ạar.
Erumolo ezira ughōl mezira doḍighi ghạ ḍio mịkarabh, pezira nọgbaam Ẹnaan miben. Ọnuekpete bhꞌodi ẹko olo nạ tezira.

Ịbam ạnwuny ạmi, ạami nạge miibha bho atuom enyina molo enyina iḍighi mu mịkarabh, keḍio ōoy olo aḍighi mịkarabh, pạatua ghạ mobho ạJizos Kraist, obho odi be aru mooḅi obho, nạamaranuan mỌde bho naasen zodi ạnogho ezira.
Odi aKraist nịvo nịvo pobo ụboromiom mẸnaan molo ezira kọteeny mọḅelemaan ịkarabh ezira, ịkarabh ibhꞌezira be ḍio, ịkarabh oomo arōoy ẹmar arōoy obho.
Erumolo ezira nokiilaan oḍighi mibhꞌịto bho tẸnaan, pezira ọkar olōghōm mobho ezira noolōghōm zodi.
Kōoy kōoy olo aghōl modi alōghōm Ẹnaan koghiilaan io aḍighi mibhꞌịto bho todi, odi ọgba miben, agey obho ilo nạ todi.
Kōoy kōoy olo aghiilaan aḍighi mibhꞌoghōrōkō bho tẸnaan podi naḍeeriom mobho odi atulan Ẹnaan ạman nꞌoomo ologhi odi. Iibha pẹzo ezira tolōghōm mobho ezira ụteeny otul ọnu nꞌodi.
Kōoy kōoy olo aghōl modi nạateeny otul ọnu nꞌẸnaan, podi aḍum oḍigh aghuḍum obho ạJizos Kraist aḍum obho.
Ibꞌiiḅi aburumōr, iibha bho ạami ụge natuom enyina bho omoom olōgh io. Onyiin odi ugbaany olōgh obho, obho enyina ịmoghon kọḅel egbiom obho. Ugbaany olōgh obho, padōm obho enyina nẹemoghon obho.
Keḍio ạkar odi iibha ạami nạge bho omoom olōgh olo agey obho nọmiin taKraist nꞌenyina mobho ọkinim obho nạḍua, ạkar odi ẹḅaal obho nạake nạmua.
Oōy olo aghōl odi odi tẹḅaal obho kụ nạlogh ḍien mumōr odi, agey obho ilo todi, odi odi nini tọkinim obho kesiibha.
Kōoy kōoy olo atulan mumōr odi, odi odi tẹḅaal obho. Bọbon ạar olo idi todi molo ọnon ōoy kạtuan odi kaḍighi mịkarabh olo.
Obo bho ạlogh ḍien mumōr odi obho odi nini tọkinim. Odi natele tọkinim mobho keḍio olōghōm io mesi odi nạki, ebum obho ọkinim obho naapuughi riḍien odi.
Ạami ụge natuom enyina, ịbam ạnwuny obho, ebum obho nọotuan tebum aKraist kụ nọoḅelemaan enyina mịkarabh enyina.

Ạami ụge natuom enyina ạburude bho, ebum obho enyina neelōghōm zodi obo bho aḍum ni ạrol kọḅel egbiom obho. Ạami ụge natuom enyina ạnwuny ughẹel obho, tebum obho enyina neeḅe ipuom mObo-oḍighi mịkarabh obho.

Ạami ụge natuom enyina ạnwuny obho, ebum obho enyina neelōghōm mỌde bho. Ạami ụge natuom enyina ạburude obho, ebum obho enyina neelōghōm zodi obo bho aḍum ni ạrol kọḅel egbiom obho. Ạami ụge natuom enyina ạnwuny ughẹel obho ebum obho enyina ịteeny mịnyaam obho. Ekpo-ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan odi tiloghi obhꞌenyina molo enyina neeḅe ipuom mObo-oḍighi mịkarabh obho.
Ítulan ghạ ghuḍum ẹmar-arōoy obho nꞌoomo iibha idi bọ tẹmar-arōoy obho. Enyina etulan maghuḍum ẹmar-arōoy obho penyina ịteeny mụ metulan Ọde bho mi taghuḍum enyina.

Iibha idi bọ tẹmar-arōoy obho pibha iikpōogh obho nẹnyaghagh moḍighi obho, nꞌibha ariḍien obho nẹnyaghagh mọteeny obho, nꞌọbughia lōor tibha nọoteeny tesuo aghuḍum obho. Iibha bho bọbon olo ạḍua tịto Ọde bho karu olo. Oomo eedi ịḍua tịto ẹmar-arōoy obho keru.
Ẹmar-arōoy obho nꞌoomo ọkpo bho arōoy nẹva mọteeny obho neebhẹ nemuneen, keḍio odi obo bho naḍighi bọ mibha Ẹnaan nạva bọ bho taḍum aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo.

Ạnwuny ạmi, ikunughi obho natuan. Nọogba ọnogho enyina mobho obo ọlogh aḍien taKraist natu, keḍio esiibha ọlogh obo ọlokian ariḍien odi neemute etu, pạar obho ezira nolōghōm mobho ikunughi obho natuan.

Arōoy bhibha ịkar io erelian nꞌogbo bhꞌezira, pạar obho eḍighi bọ keedi ịgbaranuan ezira bho. Eedi netelian nꞌogbo bhꞌezira bọ, peedi kịtolan nꞌezira. Eedi ịgbaranuan kua molo ọkar ọmiin mobho oomo eedi ịkar io erelian nꞌogbo bhꞌezira.
Enyina nị dụgh, Oōy Iigbia bho naazuughiom enyina mẸmugh Iigbia bho, molo oomo enyina neelōghōm magey obho.

Ạami ụtuan io mebum obho enyina ilōghōm io magey obho kạami ạge miibha bho natuom enyina, ạami ụtuan tebum obho enyina neelōghōm magey obho nꞌobho enyina neelōghōm nạ mobho iben ịḍua ghạ ḍio tagey obho emute.
Okōr ōoy ọkar ọgba miben obho? Odi obo bho ạbharanaan bọ aghōl mạJizos paKraist obho ḍio bho. Odi ōoy obhobho pobo ọlogh aḍien taKraist. Odi nạabharanaan mỌde bho nꞌỌony obho,
Kōoy kōoy olo ạbharanaan mỌony bho odi olo ạni nꞌỌde bho. Kōoy kōoy olo ạgba miiḅi mỌony obho odi odi ạni nꞌỌde bho.

Tebum iibha bho bẹleni, ịkua magey mẹbhamam tiloghi obhꞌenyina madōm obho enyina ịmoghon bọ kọḅel egbiom obho. Erumolo enyina ịbhamam mibha enyina nẹemoghon kọḅel egbiom obho, penyina ọrolan ạni Ọony bho nꞌỌde bho moomo amen.
Aghuḍum olo ikunughi olo poobho aKraist nịvo nịvo aguanaan mọnogho ezira.
Ạami ụge miibha bho natuom enyina tibha igboloman nꞌobo bho nẹva mebōom oobiōghōm enyina bho.

Enyina nị dụgh, aKraist naazuughiom enyina Ẹmugh Iigbia bho. Enyina obo bho netughom mẸmugh Iigbia bho, ịva mu mọnon ōoy mọtughumiom enyina. Odi Ẹmugh Iigbia bho pobo tạtughumiom enyina kạar kạar. Ibha odi nạtughumiom obho pagey obho, iben ilo. Ikiilaan mịtughumiom Ẹmugh Iigbia bho mẹrolan ghạ maKraist.
Lꞌagey, ạnwuny ạmi, ịtolan nꞌodi molo ezira ọteeny mọoghuanaan ologhi tamen obho odi tamute atu obho molo ezira ukiil io zodi rẹgheer taḍuma obho odi tatu obho.
Enyina neelōghōm mobho aKraist be mobho aru mooḅi ōoy keḍio ilōghōm meghōl kua, kōoy kōoy olo aḍighi mibha ịneghe bho noonwe zodi omina ọmar.

Ịmiin etulan olo Ọde bho abhin atulan ezira. Etulan obhꞌodi ạbugh magey molo ubhin ezira ughōl mạnwuny tẸnaan. Ẹzo bho nạ pẹzo ezira idi. Ẹmar-arōoy obho ilōghōm io mẸnaan pạar obho eedi ilōghōm io zezira bho.

Ibꞌiiḅi aburumōr, esiibha ezira ạnwuny tẸnaan keḍio dọkar io ọmaar olōghōm milo ezira tọtol. Oomo iibha ezira ulōghōm obho, pezira tọtol ạni ni kaKraist men odi amute aru, ebum obho ezira tọmiin ni zodi kạkar ẹzo bho odi odi obho.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny oḍuom ologhi obhobho mi taKraist naaseeri lōor odi ạḅaaleni kẹzo bho aKraist ạḅaal ni ạman obho.
Kōoy kōoy olo aḍighi mịkarabh naasōor olōgh tẸnaan, ebum obho oḍighi ịkarabh pu nopẹl olōgh tẸnaan.
Enyina neelōghōm mobho aKraist ạḍua aru mootōl ịkarabh arōoy, nꞌobho todi bọbon ịkarabh ilo.
Keḍio kōoy kōoy olo odi nꞌaKraist ọrol ghạ ḍio aḍighi mịkarabh. Kōoy kōoy olo ạrol naḍighi mịkarabh dọmiin ghạ ḍio zodi, dolōghōm nạ ḍio zodi.
Ímōrō ghạ, ạnwuny ạmi, ōoy aabiōghōm enyina. Kōoy kōoy olo naḍighi mibha ịneghe bho, pooḅi ōoy kẹzo bho aKraist aru mooḅi ōoy obho.
Kōoy kōoy olo naḍighi ghạ mịkarabh, polo Eru obho, ebum obho Eru obho ki tọḅel egbiom obho aḍighi mịkarabh. Ọony tẸnaan ạtuan ebum obhiẹmi ariiḍighi Eru obho kamute aru.
Kōoy kōoy olo noonwe umina ụmar ọrol ghạ ḍio aḍighi mịkarabh, tebum obho amarugh eḍighiom ạar tẸnaan idi nꞌodi obho, nꞌebum obho Ẹnaan aru mỌde odi obho, odi ọrol io ạrol aḍighi ghạ mịkarabh.
Iibha pibha tọmiin makẹrẹkẹrẹ mi tạnwuny tẸnaan nꞌạnwuny Eru obho. Kōoy kōoy olo oḍighi ḍio mibha iizuan obho atulan mumōr odi, Odi olꞌEru obho, Ọony tẸnaan io.
Iibha pạkar adōm obho enyina ịmoghon kọḅel egbiom obho mezira onyiin atulan monyiin.
Ezira ụtol io kaKen. AKen olꞌEru obho, molo odi aghigh mạkar umōr odi. Odi ạtuan ebum eeghe kaghigh umōr obhꞌodi? Ebum obho eḍighiom ạar odi iḅẹebh ni, iibha tumōr odi ịneghe ni.
Tẹzo bho nạ, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, erumolo ẹmar-arōoy obho ịlogh enyina ḍien, iímōogh ghạ.
Ebum obho ezira utulan burumōr ezira bho, pạar obho aḍighi bọ mobho ezira noolōghōm mobho ezira noopẹl mọbho oḍigh taghuḍum obho. Kōoy kōoy olo otulan io mumōr odi, odi odi ni tọbho.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạlogh ḍien mumōr odi pọokom menu, keḍio enyina neelōghōm mobho ọokom menu ọteeny ghạ ḍio maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo mi todi.
Iibha pesi ezira ulōghōm mẹmu etulan, tibha aKraist ạnogho lōor odi ḍuugh mebum ezira bho. Ezira ẹkona ịgbaan ni molo ezira kọnogho ghuḍum obhꞌezira ḍuugh mebum aburumōr obhꞌezira.
Erumolo ọola ạmiin umōr odi tekulom kakpereghi riḍien odi mi tumōr obhꞌodi, odi tạgba ẹko mobho odi atulan mẸnaan mi tologhi odi?
Ạnwuny ạmi, etulan ezira otu ḍio metulan ọnu be, eru mạkar agey etulan ilo tọmiin teḍighiom-ạar ezira.
Iibha pạar obho aḍighi bọ mobho ezira ulōghōm mobho ezira uru milꞌagey obho, nꞌạar obho aḍighi nạ bọ mobho ezira ụteeny moḍuom ologhi taghisigh tẸnaan obho.
Erumolo ezira ụteeny mịitu tiloghi ezira, ezira ulōghōm mobho Ẹnaan ạbugh ni apu miloghi ezira amina alōghōm nạ kạar kạar.
Tebum iibha bẹleni, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, erumolo iloghi ezira ilo tịitu, pezira nọoteeny mọoghuanaan ologhi mi taghisigh tẸnaan.
Ebum obho ezira nookō raalōgh obhꞌodi obho, oḍighi nạ mibha iḍigh tologhi odi obho, pụ kạar kạar olo ezira ugbẹel podi ọnogho ezira.
Iibha paraalōgh obhꞌodi, mezira omōruōm ḍien obho tạJizos Kraist, Ọony obhꞌodi, onyiin atulan nạ monyiin kẹzo bho aKraist ạto ạnogho ezira bho.
Kōoy kōoy olo aakō raalōgh obho tẸnaan odi odi nꞌẸnaan, Ẹnaan odi nạ nꞌodi. Ebum Ẹmugh Iigbia bho odi ạnogho ezira bho, pạar obho aḍighi bọ kezira ulōghōm mobho Ẹnaan odi nꞌezira bho.

Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ímōruōm ghạ moomo arōoy ilo nekōl meedi ẹteeny mẸmugh Iigbia bho. Ịḍa meenon merumolo ẹmugh obho eedi ịteeny obho aru molo tẸnaan. Ạar obho aḍighi obho, ọlogh iben arizil neemute etu elela toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Ẹzo olo oḍighi olo enyina kelōghōm mōoy olo ạteeny mẸmugh obho tẸnaan, piinon ghạ mōoy olo nạgba amutiom mobho ạJizos Kraist abhin nꞌiikpōogh alōor obho aru. Odi pobo ạteeny mẸmugh obho tẸnaan.
Kōoy kōoy olo nạparanaan mạJizos ọteeny io mẸmugh obho tẸnaan. Ẹmugh obhobho ạḍua todi obo ọlogh aḍien taKraist karu. Enyina nẹemoghon mobho odi natu, keḍio naaru asi siibha tesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Ạnwuny ạmi, enyina ilo tẸnaan, molo enyina neeḅe ipuom miben arizil obho, ebum obho ẹmugh obhobho odi bọ tenyina bho, ạteeny ịnyaam apu miibha iru bọ milꞌesuo ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Eedi nẹgba ghạ mọkpo esuo ẹmar-arōoy obho molo ẹmar-arōoy obho nẹmoghonyan zeedi, ebum obho eedi iru milo ẹmar-arōoy obho.

Ezira nị dụgh, ezira ilo tẸnaan. Kōoy kōoy olo alōghōm mẸnaan pọmoghonyan ezira, obo bho otu ḍio molo tẸnaan obho ọmoghonyan io zezira. Iibha pẹzo ezira tolōghōm makẹrẹkẹrẹ ẹmugh obho nạgba magey obho nꞌobho nạgba miben obho.
Iiḅi aburumōr, itu onyiin atulan monyiin, ebum obho etulan ạḍua tẸnaan karu. Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny metulan, pu noomina oonwe zodi ọmar, odi alōghōm nạ mẸnaan.
Kōoy kōoy olo ọteeny io metulan olōghōm io mẸnaan, ebum obho Ẹnaan aru metulan.
Ẹnaan aḍighi aḍeeriom mobho odi atulan ezira men obho odi arōm mogini Ọony obhꞌodi aru tẹmar-arōoy obho molo ezira kọteeny ghuḍum mi todi.
Iibha pẹmu etulan, olo oghōl ezira kutulan mẸnaan io, odi katulan ezira karōm mỌony obhꞌodi aru molo ezira ọteeny ọḅelemaan ịkarabh ezira.
Iiḅi aburumōr, ẹzo bho Ẹnaan abhin atulan ezira bho, ezira obhin nạ mẹzo bho onyiin atulan monyiin.
Oōy olo nạamiin ghạ mẸnaan olo. Kerumolo ezira onyiin atulan monyiin pẸnaan ọrolan ezira molo toḍighi metulan obho odi ạneghe ạman mi tezira.
Ebum obho odi ạnogho bọ zezira mẹmugh obhꞌodi obho pạar obho aḍighi bọ kezira ụkar ulōghōm mobho ezira udi nꞌẸnaan, odi odi nꞌezira bho.
Molo ezōor ụmiin, keḍio nọgba ọnogho mịnon arōoy mobho Ọde bho arōm aru mỌony obhꞌodi moru Ọpela ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạgba amutiom mobho ạJizos aru mỌony tẸnaan, pẸnaan odi nꞌodi, odi odi nạ nꞌẸnaan.
Ezira noolōghōm omōruōm nạ metulan obho Ẹnaan ạnogho ezira bho.
Ẹnaan etulan, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny metulan odi mi tẸnaan, Ẹnaan odi nạ nꞌodi.

Ẹmu etulan obho uḍighi ụneghemi ụman tezira bho, olo ezira kọteeny mọoghuanaan ologhi mi taḍuma ịiruan obho, keḍio ezira tọteeny nạ ni nạ tebum obho aghuḍum ezira mi tẹmar-arōoy obho odi kobho taKraist.

Ologhi okpooy ghạ ḍio tetulan. Agey etulan olo ạneghe ni ạman napirighan ghạ mologhi aruugu. Tebum iibha bẹleni odi obo bho ologhi nakpooy obho, ọteeny io magey etulan olo ạneghe ni ạman, ebum obho ologhi odi nakpooy tebum ạliliom obho tọliom odi obho.
Ezira utulan ni tebum obho Ẹnaan abhira atulan ezira bho.

Oōy olo aghōl modi atulan Ẹnaan kụ nạlogh ḍien mumōr odi, podi ọgba miben. Erumolo odi otulan io mumōr odi obho odi nạamiin ghạ moomo amen obho, odi tạgba ẹko mobho odi natulan mẸnaan obo bho odi dọmiin ghạ ḍio bho?
Oobho podi olōgh obho aKraist ạlogh ạnogho ezira bho, modi obo bho atulan mẸnaan obho, atulan nạ kua mumōr odi.
Kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm mobho ạJizos aru maKraist obho, odi pọony tẸnaan; kōoy kōoy olo atulan mỌde bho tatulan nạ ni nạ mỌony obho.
Kamen kamen olo ezira utulan Ẹnaan, nookō raalōgh obhꞌodi pezira olōghōm mobho ezira notulan mạnwuny tẸnaan.
Erumolo ezira notulan mẸnaan pezira nookō raalōgh obhꞌodi. Keḍio araalōgh obhꞌodi ịimor io epu molo ezira utue ḍio ookō,
ebum obho kọony kọony tẸnaan tatue ni aḅe apuom mẹmar-arōoy obho. Ologhi omōruōm obhꞌezira pobho ezira ubhin noḅiom opuom ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Obo bho imōruōm bọ ighōl mạJizos Ọony tẸnaan obho pobo tetue ni eḅe epuom mẹmar-arōoy obho.

ẠJizos Kraist podi obo bho aru obho. Odi aru aḍighi agbẹbhẹghiōm tozu ạmuum obhꞌodi nꞌịḅaal obho odi azu tọbho bhꞌodi obho. Odi oru ḍio aḍighi agbẹbhẹghiōm tạmuum be, odi ạḅar mụum nꞌịḅaal aḍighi agbẹbhẹghiōm. Ẹmugh Iigbia bho nịvo nịvo nạgba nạ mobho iibha bho iru magey, ebum obho odi Ẹmugh obho aru magey obho.
Ẹmugh obho nꞌạmuum obho nꞌịḅaal obho pịraar ikiran mịzo ilo ịnu eedi iru monyiin.
Ezira nomōruōm ghạ ni mịigbaay arōoy, keḍio ịigbaay ibha tẸnaan ịghua epu. Iibha pịigbaay obho Ẹnaan ạgba milo igboloman nꞌỌony odi obho.

Molo kōoy kōoy olo amōruōm mỌony obho tẸnaan podi naamōruōm mịigbaay obho tẸnaan mi tologhi odi, keḍio kōoy kōoy olo omōruōm io mịigbaay obho tẸnaan naaḍighi zodi Ẹnaan atu mọgba miben, ebum obho odi omōruōm io mịigbaay obho Ẹnaan ạgba tilo igboloman nꞌỌony odi obho.
Iibha pịigbaay obhꞌodi, modi Ẹnaan nạanogho zezira maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo, keḍio odi aghuḍum obho odi tỌony obhꞌodi.
Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny mỌony obho nạateeny ghuḍum. Oōy olo ọteeny io mỌony obho tẸnaan aghuḍum olo todi.
Ạami ụge miibha bho natuom enyina molo enyina elōghōm mobho enyina nẹeteeny maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo, ạkar enyina obo bho neemōruōm bọ maḍien Ọony obho tẸnaan obho.
Ezira ọteeny ọoghuanaan ologhi mi taghisigh tẸnaan, tebum obho ezira nọkar ulōghōm mobho kạar kạar olo ezira ugbẹel olo idi tịto odi, odi tạmoghon ni ezira.
Kamen kamen olo ezira ugbẹel odi mạar, odi nạmoghon ghạ ni ezira. Erumolo ịkar eru kua, pezira noolōghōm nạ mobho odi tạnogho ezira kạar kạar olo ezira ugbẹel odi.

Kōoy kōoy olo ạmiin mumōr odi olo naḍighi mịkarabh ilo ịlogh io zodi tesi aḍuugh, odi aakpulughu mẸnaan molo Ẹnaan ạnogho zodi ghuḍum. Iibha bho pilo obo bho eḍighi mịkarabh olo ịlogh io zeedi tesi aḍuugh. Ịkarabh ilo ịlogh io mōoy tesi aḍuugh idi, keḍio ạami ụva ḍio molo enyina keekpulughu Ẹnaan milo igboloman nꞌiibha bho.
Ịkarabh ịkarabh, keḍio ịkarabh idi molo ịlogh io mōoy tesi aḍuugh.
Ezira noolōghōm mobho kōoy kōoy olo noonwe umina ụmar ọtol ghạ ḍio aḍighi mịkarabh, ebum obho Ọony obho tẸnaan naaghuruom zodi, molo Eru obho oru ḍio aḍighi odi mịkarabh.
Toomo ibha Eru obho nạto moḍigh kẹrekere ịto nạnogho moomo arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho, ezira noolōghōm nạ mobho ezira uru milo tẸnaan.

Ezira noolōghōm mobho Ọony tẸnaan naaru ạnogho ezira mọmoghonyan, molo ezira noolōghōm zodi Ẹnaan obho odi be mobo ịkpe mookpulughu. Aghuḍum ezira idi todi Ẹnaan obhobho nꞌạJizos Kraist Ọony obhꞌodi be. Oobho pạkar odi Ẹnaan obho, nꞌaghuḍum obho ikunughi olo bho.
Iiḅi ạnwuny ạmi, itughuneen silōor enyina mi tiben aruru.

Ạami okenya ạsosi obho, ụge natuom ạna ạni obho Ẹnaan abheleghi ạson ạseghe bho, nꞌạnwuny obhꞌonuma obo bho. Ạami utulan magey obho. Ạami be nạ ḍio mobo utulan enyina oomo obo bho neelōghōm magey obho, etulan nạ enyina,
ebum obho agey obho idi tezira bho, keḍio tẹtol nạ ni nạ tezira kamen kamen.
Ẹnaan Ọde bho nꞌạJizos Kraist Ọony obhꞌodi tẹnogho ni ezira lịsebh nꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌekima, tẹzo bho ezira idi tagey obho nꞌetulan obho.
Ologhi ạmi ạḅaal magey men ạami ụmiin mẹde ạnwuny onuma nẹtuonuman magey obho, kẹzo bho Ọde bho ạto bọ ạnogho ezira bho.
Ạni obho, ạami naasen ni ạna molo ezira onyiin katulan monyiin. Obhobho omoom olōgh io, mobho ạami ụge natuom ạna bho, onyiin odi ugbaany olōgh obho ezira ụmoghon kọḅel egbiom obho.
Ezira moḍum aghuḍum oghiilaan ookō araalōgh obho tẸnaan, podi etulan obho ạami nakōl obho. Oomo enyina onyiin motulan monyiin, podi olōgh obho enyina ịmoghon bọ kọḅel egbiom obho.
Ọlogh arōoy ilo nẹgba ẹparanaan mobho ạJizos Kraist aru nꞌiikpōogh alōor, neeru elela tẹmar-arōoy obho neebiōghōm rōoy. Oōy olo odi kua, ọgba miben nꞌobo ọlokian ariḍien taKraist.
Igona lōor enyina, lꞌenyina ipiẹmi moḍighi alikumuan obhꞌenyina, molo enyina epin ạmukpe enyina ẹman.
Kōoy kōoy olo ọtuonuman io mịtughumiom obho taKraist, katẹnōm taghisigh, podi olo tẸnaan. Obo bho nạtuonuman mịtughumiom obho odi odi tẸnaan nꞌỌony obho.
Kōoy kōoy olo aru tenyina olo ọtughumiom io mịtughumiom bhibha, ubhin ghạ zodi mọloghom totu onuma, ughōl ghạ nạ kua “Ekima ẹrolan ạna.”
Kōoy kōoy olo aakpulughu molo ekima kẹrolan odi, paḍigh nꞌodi mi tịkarabh obho odi naḍighi obho.
Ạami ạteeny ịkanya ọkpo mọgba ọnogho enyina ilo neepu mọgiom apepa nꞌiki. Kpẹlen nꞌipa, ạami nạatua moru ọmiinan enyina ọḍeghe ọnogho enyina nꞌalōor ạmi, molo ọḅaal ologhi obhꞌezira agbẹbh ạman.
Ạnwuny ụmarani onuma obo bho Ẹnaan abheleghi ạson ạseghe bho epuruan ạna.
Ạami okenya ạsosi obho ụge natuom ạna ooḅi umōr bhꞌạmi ạGayos obo bho ạami utulan magey obho.
Ooḅi umōr ạmi, ạami naakpulughu molo iiḅi kemutenaan ạna nꞌolo alōor onuma kamoon, kẹzo bho ạami naalōghōm mobho ạna ụghua ni tạruumugh obho.
Ologhi ạmi ạḅaal magey men ẹde aburumōr obho iru ịgba ịnogho ạmi mologhi omōruōm onuma mi tagey obho, kẹzo bho ạna natughom magey obho moomo amen.
Ọnon ọḅaal ologhi olo apu mọmoghon obho ạnwuny ạmi netughom obho olo.
Ooḅi umōr ạmi, ạna ạteeny mologhi omōruōm magey mi teḍighiom ạar onuma, obho ạna uḍighi ụnogho maburumōr mꞌạkar obo bho iru bọ misoloman obho.
Eedi nẹegba metulan obhꞌonuma ẹnogho marōoy ạsosi obhꞌeebha. Sesen ni lọgh ghạ mạvo mạnogho zeedi taraabōom olo iḍigh tologhi tẸnaan molo eedi ẹtol etele ẹki taghisigh,
ạar obho aḍighi obho keeghe, eedi ibhin io mọlogh ạvo tobo bho imōruōm io obho keḅẹtōnōm oḍighi obho taKraist.
Ịkpe ni molo ezira obo bho nọtuonuman maKraist obho kọlogh mạvo kọnogho marōoy olo idi kua, molo ezira opin ạni bin mi toḍighi ọgba olelemi agey obho.
Ạami ạge mokpẹrẹ ọnuekpete aruom ạsosi obho, keḍio aDiotrefis obho naḅumian moru uvẹmụ eedi obho ọva ḍio mọmoghonyan ibha ạami nạkpete bho.

Amen ạami tatu, pạami ọgba kạar kạar olo odi naaḍighi, ịkarabh ọnuekpete bho odi ạkpete ạami obho nꞌiben obho odi nạgbaay obho. Iibha bho nạ ẹkona degbẹbhan io zodi. Odi obhin ghạ ḍio burumōr obho ạloghom men eedi iru. Keḍio nạva ghạ nạ mọpuenaan obo bho netu bọ mobhin eedi ọloghom obho, naḍighi nạ mobhirighan eedi mi tạsosi obho.
Ooḅi umōr ạmi, ụta ghạ mịkarabh, tạ ghạ miiḅi. Kōoy kōoy olo aḍighi miiḅi, pōoy tẸnaan. Kōoy kōoy olo aḍighi mịkarabh dọmiin ghạ ḍio mẸnaan.
Kōoy kōoy nạgba miiḅi maDimitrios, ẹgbaan nạ magey mọgbaam odi miibha bho. Ạami nạgba nạ zodi miiḅi keḍio ạna naalōghōm obho iibha ạami nạgba bho iru magey.
Ạami ạteeny ịkanya ọkpo ọgba ọnogho onuma ilo neepu mọgiom apepa nꞌiki.
Ạami nạatua mokẹm ọmiinan onuma molo ezira ọḍeghe nꞌalōor ezira.
Ekima ẹrolan ạna. Oomo ạburubulol onuma epuruan ạna. Puruan ạburubulol ezira magey.
Ạami aJud, ẹbana bho tạJizos Kraist, umōr taJems, ụge natuom moomo obo bho Ẹnaan naabheleghi ạseghe bho, ibha netugh tetulan tẸnaan Ọde bho, ibha idi teḍigh otu tạJizos Kraist obho.
Ọsu ạghusan aḍien nꞌekima nꞌetulan ẹmaraghia ẹrolan enyina.

Iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ẹrol tologhi ạmi magey mokenya men mọge oruom enyina milo igboloman nꞌịbhelegha bho oomo ezira utul ọnu ụteeny obho, keḍio esiibha neesugh mologhi ạmi mọge ọghuemi iloghi obhꞌenyina molo enyina kẹmaranuan keḅianaan momōruōm obho Ẹnaan nạanogho marōoy odi tonyiin amen be bho.

Ạami nạge miibha bho tebum obho ẹtede arōoy nẹeḅokia iḍigh togbo bhꞌezira nenweeghi madōm ọḅelemaan ịkarabh obho tẸnaan mọgba ọḍua oḍigh tạdol ọva ạraani nꞌilobhir eedi, nꞌogin ạJizos Kraist, obho odi be mỌde otu nꞌObạmọogh ezira bho. Ẹegia iigbia bho nạagba kageedi mapum obho eedi neebhin obho.

Toomo ibha enyina nẹemaar ilōghōm miibha bho ẹkona, ạami nạva ni momina ọotuemi enyina mẹzo Obạmọogh obho ạbhel marōoy obhꞌIzirẹl mi tebhugh obhꞌIzipt, nꞌẹzo odi amina aghiraan ạze abhiẹmi mobo bho imōruōm io obho.

Ịmaar ẹetua ghạ nạ mitelema bho tẸnaan, ibha ipẹl mọota ịto bhꞌeedi obho ịḍua tesi amarugh obho ụnogho bọ zeedi obho. Ẹnaan nạaseghe magbirigbiri olo oḅu ghạ ḍio ạkasioghom zeedi ạlogh zeedi toonu obꞌọkinim naḅōruōm mogbōgh aḍuma bho tọtu mịiruan ọnogho zeedi obho.

Ịmaar ẹetua ghạ nạ mạSodom nꞌaGomora nꞌoomo ạraama bho ikuōm bọ zeedi obho. Arōoy eedi iḍighi nạ kitelema bhibha tẸnaan, esōor olōgh, ọdioghom aruutu nꞌịnon oḍigh kẹrekere ipesi. Ubhin mạnyan olo oḍim ghạ ḍio kamen kamen ọkpiom eedi ọnogho eedi mọmiinom, mọnogho aliiki moomo arōoy.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ arōoy bhibha ịmiin ghịiny ilo iḍighi eedi iḍighi lōor eedi mịkarabh, eedi ịgba ịpue mịnyaam ịto bho tẸnaan. Eedi ịipu mitelema eghuan ibha ạnyu obho.

Ạkar aMaikiel uvẹmụ itelema bho tẸnaan ẹkona doḍighi ghạ nạ ḍio miibha bho. Tạruruan obhꞌodi nꞌEru obho, obho eedi ịrol ịghanan mobo tạteeny moḍim obho taMozis ẹkona, aMaikiel ọkpete nạ ḍio ạpue mEru obho, odi ạkpete kua, “Obạmọogh obho ạliom ạna!”
Keḍio arōoy bhibha nẹkpete ghạ ẹpue mọkpo ilo eedi ịmoghonyan io. Molo eedi ọkpo bho eedi ibhin mologhi ịnam eḍum ịmoghonyan obho, pibha ibhin nepiẹmi zeedi obho.

Mịin obꞌọmiinom olo tẹtolaan eedi. Eedi nẹetuonom mebōom taKen. Eedi nẹetuan ebum ikpoki ikōrōnuan taraabōom obho mi toḍighi ịkarabh kẹzo bho aBelam aḍighi obho. Noobhiẹmi zeedi tọmaranuan obhꞌeedi kẹzo bho ubhiẹmi maKora mi tọmaranuan obho odi ạmaranuan maMozis obho.

Amen olo enyina iikōbhōghian mole eḍian ạruumugh obho, eedi ibhin ghạ ḍio rẹgheer mosughaay eḍian obho molo eedi nẹerol togbo enyina kiikuneen mọpue ookōbhōghian obho. Eedi nẹetua ghạ lōor eedi be. Eedi ịgbaanan mọbhurubuur olo ọpibha nạpibhoghom olo osōorẹ ḍio mẹlebhe. Eedi idi kiirẹeny ilo ịloki ghạ ḍio mitu mi tạkar ogbo omuluan, ilo neeḍinyighu imeleghu ịbhozu ịman.
Eedi idi kopōkō ạmuum obꞌọbhiiny, nꞌeḍighiom ạar ạregheer obhꞌeedi neemute nepōobh koobha. Eedi idi kitōbh ịsobh ịinaany, ibha Ẹnaan naaseeri zeedi mesi obꞌọkinim olo kamen kamen.
Ịnok ōoy obho agbẹbhiōm bọ oḍual mi tọobhe bho tẠdam obho, pobo ạmiinom eedi mạghiiny obhobho, “Ịmiin, Obạmọogh obho tatu ni nꞌọlogh ạsumuunir itelema iigbia obhꞌodi,

mọru ịiruan ọnogho kōoy kōoy, nꞌọnogho apum miḍighi mịkarabh arōoy obho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho, tebum oomo ịkarabh obho eedi iḍighi obho nꞌoomo ibꞌikpo ọnuekpete bho arōoy ibha ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho ịkpete zodi obho.”

Arōoy bhibha nẹghunughun ghạ moomo amen, ẹgba mọkpo ẹḅam tẹmu ịnon arōoy. Eedi nẹtuonuman ghạ mịkarabh ọkpo ẹebhuom alōor obho. Eedi neetumuom ghạ silōor obhꞌeedi, ẹnogho miben eghuan mịnon arōoy molo eedi ẹteeny mibha eedi nẹva bho.
Ịitua, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, mibha iteledōm tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho ịgba ghạ ịnogho enyina bho mi tamen olo neetẹn obho,
mi “Tikunughi aruḍuma bho, arōoy tetu ni ẹtol ẹeḅaghami enyina, arōoy ilo tẹtol ẹtuonuman mịkarabh ọkpo ẹebhuom alōor obhꞌeedi.”
Arōoy bhibha obo nẹḍi ghạ mạsosi obho rụuku. Eedi ibhin tịitua iikpōogh alōor obhꞌeedi be ku neḍighiom miibha bho, Ẹmugh Iigbia bho kọnogho ḍio zeedi mịitua bhibha.
Keḍio enyina, iiḅi aburumōr ạmi, ịkpabh tobꞌooḅi omōruōm obho mebhōbh ẹghi taghisigh ghạ be. Iikpulughu ghạ tịnyaam Ẹmugh Iigbia bho,
meḍuraan eḍigh tetulan obho tẸnaan, suo enyina neḅōrō mạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho mobhin tọsu ạghusan aḍien obhꞌodi ọnogho enyina maghuḍum olo ikunughi olo bho.
Ịsuanaan ghụsan aḍien mobo bho ịteeny ịzal iloghi obho.
Ịpel mebhunughi eedi toonu ạnyan obho. Ịmaar egona lōor enyina mi tọsuanaan ạghusan aḍien mẹtede arōoy ịlogh ḍien marukpe ibha ịkarabh ọkpo ẹebhuom alōor obhꞌeedi nẹeḅibhoghom obho.

Todi obo bho tatue ni ạpam enyina molo enyina imeel io bho, obho tapin enyina ạmarami kiiḅi arōoy nꞌọḅaal ologhi ọḍe mi taghisigh eghuan obhꞌodi obho, ạkar odi Ẹnaan Ọpela bhꞌezira, obho tughuneen zodi ḍio ọnon olo bho, igbōgh eghuan nꞌịnyaam nꞌịikpo ẹrol ẹnogho zodi kọḅel egbiom obho ninii ạteeny siibha kamen kamen tebum aḍien tạJizos Kraist Obạmọogh ezira bho. Ẹrol ni nạ kua.

Ọbhereer obhobho igboloman mibha ạJizos Kraist ạgba amutiom, ibha Ẹnaan ạnogho zodi, moḍeeriom ạrubana odi mọkpo ilo netu momute siibha siibha. AKraist arōm otelema bhꞌodi aru ạgba mọkpo bhibha aḍeeriom ạnogho mạJon ẹbana bhꞌodi.
Keḍio ạJon aru ạgba moomo ibha odi nạamiin obho. Iibha pibha odi ạgba mibha igboloman nꞌadōm obho ạḍua tẸnaan karu obho, nꞌagey obho, ibha ạJizos Kraist ạgba amutiom obho.

Ạlisebh tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho aghōl bọ mọbhereer obhobho bho, nꞌobo bho ịmoghonyan ọnuekpete adōm obho, nꞌobo bho ịtuugh iḍighi mibha ụge bọ tọbhereer obhobho bho! Aruḍuma bho ọkpo bhibha temute bho idi tẹeḅa ạvo.
Ạami ạJon ụge mọbhereer obhobho natuom oḍual ạrasosi ibha idi tebhugh obhꞌEsia.
Ạlisebh nꞌekima ẹḍua tẸnaan obho odi obho, obho ạrol obho nꞌobho natu obho, nꞌoḍual ạruumugh ibha idi taghisigh ẹtolom odi obho, eru ẹrolan enyina.
Ẹḍua nạ tạJizos Kraist, obho oomo ọnu odi agey agey be idi obho, ọkpana Ọony obho ubhira uḅẹtōn tọbho bho, obho aru nạ mọola oomo ạruula ade bho.
Odi atulan ezira molo tọbho bhꞌodi, podi ạbhel ezira tịkarabh obhꞌezira,
aḍighi ezira meghun otu ạruula iiḅua moḍighi oḍighi ọnogho Ẹnaan nꞌỌde bhꞌodi. Ịikpo nꞌeghuan ẹrol ẹnogho mạJizos Kraist kamen kamen! Ẹrol nị nạ kua!
Iinon, odi natu nꞌeḅōghōghaan obho! Kōoy kōoy tạmiin ni zodi, obo bho igim bọ mitakara bhꞌodi ẹkona. Oomo arōoy ibhꞌade bho teḍigh ni tịitu mebum odi. Ạkar agey nạ ni. Ẹrol ni nạ kua.
Ẹnaan Obạmọogh oomo ẹmiriikpo bho, obho odi obho, obho ạrol obho, nꞌobho natu obho, ạkpete kua, “Ạami Ạlfa nꞌOmega.”

Ạami ạJon umōr obhꞌenyina. Totul ọnu obhꞌạmi nꞌạJizos pạami uḍigh nꞌenyina mi tọmiinom, nꞌAde-Ọolema bhꞌodi, nꞌọghurughiom. Uru useeri ạami mi teeghara egbolom obho ughōl bọ ạPatmos obho mebum obho ạami ụgba ulelemi mọnuekpete tẸnaan nꞌagey obho ạJizos ạgba amutiom obho.
Taḍuma tObạmọogh obho, pẸmugh obho ạsiiny ạami, pạami ụmoghon moghōrōkō imulughu olo nạḅemian keeḍue nạkpete kua tạman ạmi,
“Gẹ tọbhereer maseeri mibha ạna ụmiin obho mạfirima mạghiom moḍual ạrasosi bhibha: Ẹfesos, Simana, Pagamom, Tiatira, Sạdis, Filadelfia, nꞌaLaodisia.”
Pạami ughiraan mọmiin obo bho nạkpete ạnogho ạami obho, pạami ụmiin moḍual ịtodi agold.
Togbo eedi kir ạar olo ạmara kōoy, ạlokia mạdoni olo asōor kasike odi, nꞌokuughuom olo ụlemom magold akuughiom teeku odi.
Ạsilaan odi ịḅaal kịḅaal ịgele odughuna bolobolo kogharaghar ạmuum, ariḍien obhꞌodi kamuumōr ạnyan.
Asike bhꞌodi nẹmua kokurōgh olo ugbul ụḅaaleni. Oghōrōkō bhꞌodi nạḅemian kobꞌeekpa ạrumuum ọbhiiny-ạbadi.
Toḍiom ạvo odi nꞌoḍual ikpo ịinaany. Tọnu obhꞌodi nꞌomamagh obꞌạmugem ịzal ạman. Aghisigh odi odi kẹnam-aḍio ogbo ọsilaan.
Amen ạami ụmiin zodi pạami umeel tasike odi kọobhuanaan ẹnam. Podi ạḅam rạvo odi mi tạmi ạkpete kua, “Ughiil ghạ ruugu. Ạami ọḅel obho nꞌobho ikunughi obho.
Ạami obo bho uḍum ni ụrol obho! Ạami ụbho ni, keḍio nonon, ạami naaḍum ạtol kamen kamen. Ịsabi ẹmir-iḍim nꞌọbho idi tạravo ạmi.
Siibha bho, pụge mọkpo bho ạna nạmiin obho, oomo ọkpo bho idi siibha bho, nꞌibha netu momute taghisigh obho.

Iibha ẹmu oḍual ịinaany ibha ạna ụmiin toḍiom ạvo ạmi obho, nꞌoḍual ịtodi agold obho. Tamen olo neetẹn, ẹmu obho ụḅoki ni keḍio esiibha nọogba omutiom. Oḍual ịinaany obho, pitelema oḍual ạrasosi obho, oḍual ịtodi obho, poḍual ạrasosi obho.”
“Gẹ mạghiom otelema tẸnaan obhꞌạsosi obhꞌẸfesos:
“Oobho adōm obho ạḍua natu todi obo bho ạbham bọ moḍual ịinaany obho mi toḍiom ạvo odi obho, obho natele togbo oḍual ịtodi agold obho.

“ Ạami naalōghōm moomo ibha enyina neeḍighi obho: ạami naalōghōm mịnyaam oḍighi obho enyina ibhin iḍighi obho nꞌẹzo enyina ideny ịrol obho. Ạami naalōghōm mẹzo enyina itue ghạ ḍio moonon otughuneen aḍien mi tịkarabh arōoy nꞌobho enyina nẹeḍa ẹmiin mobo bho ighōl eedi iteledōm obho kitu ḍio zeedi obho, emina ẹva nạ ẹmiin mobho eedi iru mịgba miben.
Enyina needeny, ẹmiinom ẹteeny ịiḅaghami mi tebum ạmi, keḍio enyina itighaan io be.
“Oomo ipa ẹkona, iibha pibha ạami ụva ụmiin bho iḅẹebh tenyina: enyina itulan mụ zạmi siibha bho kẹzo bho enyina itulan ạami tọḅel egbiom obho.
Ịitua mẹzo enyina neegbeenyan ạami toḍighi iiḅi. Ikiraan tịkarabh enyina, pạami oru tenyina ọseghe ọtodi obho mi tesi obhꞌodi.
Iibha pibha ịneghe magey tenyina: enyina ịlogh ḍien meḍighiom ạar arōoy ibhꞌaNikolaos, ibha tạami ẹkona ịneghe ḍio bho.
“ Erumolo enyina ịteeny raḅeri, pịmoghon mibha Ẹmugh obho ạkpete ạnogho mạrasosi obho!
“ Tobo bho aḅe apuom ạvo obho, ạami tạnogho zodi mịnyaam mole ikpo oorẹeny aghuḍum obho, obho nasi taleeny tẸnaan obho. ”
“Gẹ mạghiom otelema tẸnaan obhꞌạsosi obhꞌaSimana:
“Oobho adōm obho ạḍua bọ todi obo bho aru mọḅel nꞌikunughi obho, obho ạbho keḍio amina ni aḍum ni ạrol obho.

“ Ạami naalōghōm mịiḅaghami enyina. Ạami naalōghōm mekulom enyina — keḍio tạkar odi nị dụgh, enyina ạruula. Ạami naalōghōm mịkarabh obho obo bho ighōl bọ eedi aJu kịkar io eru milꞌaJu obho, nẹgbaam enyina bho eedi ilꞌogbo taSetan obho.

Ighiil ghạ ruugu mọmiinom obho enyina netu mọmiinom obho. Ịmoghon. Eru obho tạlogh ni zenyina mi tọdegh oonon, akughi mẹde enyina ạlokioghom ikoli. Ịiḅaghami obhꞌenyina tẹtol maḍiōbh aḍuma. Ịteeny ologhi omōruōm tạmi. Eru kạar olo iru nạ mọbho, pạami ọnogho ozu enyina meghōony aghuḍum.
“ Erumolo enyina ịteeny raḅeri, pịmoghon mibha Ẹmugh obho ạkpete ạnogho mạrasosi obho!
“ Obo bho iḅe ipuom ạvo bho, ogbẹbhiōm ịzal ọbho bho ọteeny io zeedi.”
“Gẹ mạghiom otelema ạsosi obhꞌaPagamom:
“Oobho adōm obho ạḍua todi obo bho ạteeny momamagh obꞌạmugem ịzal ạman obho.

“Ạami naalōghōm mesi enyina netugh, tesi obho ẹtolom Eru obho odi obho. Enyina eḅolom ạami, molo enyina ịparanaan io mologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina mi tạmi, mi tạkar amen obho ughigh bọ mẠntipas, obho ạteeny mogbagbarabh ologhi omōruōm mi tạmi obho, mi tesi obho Eru obho natugh obho.

“Oomo ipa ẹkona, iibha pibha ạami ụteeny mọliom enyina: tenyina kir ẹde ilo nẹtuonom mịtughumiom taBelam, obho ạtughumiom mạBelak mẹzo oḍighi arōoy Izirẹl moḍighi ịkarabh ọrol ole eḍian ilo ụtunom mạar ụnogho maruru nꞌoḍighiiy ịkarabh eḍighiom ạar ole ẹma.
Onyiin ẹzo bho nạ, enyina ẹteeny nạ rōoy ilo nẹtuonom mịtughumiom arōoy aNikolaos.
Ikiraan tịkarabh enyina siibha, bolobolo ạami natu siibha siibha moḅiom arōoy bhipa nꞌobꞌạmugem obhꞌọnu ạmi.
“Erumolo enyina ịteeny raḅeri mọmoghon, pịmoghon mibha Ẹmugh obho nạkpete ạnogho mạrasosi obho!

“Teedi obo bho neeḅe ipuom ạvo bho, ạami tạnogho ni zeedi mẹde eḍian ạruumugh obho ụḅoki ni obho. Ạami tạnogho ạni ni moomo eedi mọḅaal eekpōogh ọbharakpar olo nọoge momoom aḍien olo ọnon ōoy otue ḍio aghōl tughuneen zodi obo bho abhin obho ḍio.”
“Gẹ mạghiom otelema ạsosi obhꞌaTiatira:
“Oobho adōm obhꞌỌony obho tẸnaan, obo bho ariḍien odi idi kamuumōr ạnyan, obho asike odi nẹmua kokurōgh olo ugbul ụḅaaleni.

“Ạami naalōghōm mibha enyina iḍighi obho. Ạami naalōghōm metulan obhꞌenyina nꞌologhi omōruōm obhꞌenyina, nꞌoḍighi obhꞌenyina, nꞌalideny obhꞌenyina. Ạami naalōghōm mobho enyina neḍighi siibha bho milo ipu mibhꞌọḅel egbiom obho.

“Keḍio iibha pibha ạami ụteeny mọliom enyina: enyina iḅaam ịkarabh ạni opopo ạJezebel, obho aghōl bọ modi ozil tẸnaan obho. Odi ạtughumiom aabiōghōm mạrubana ạmi ẹghi eḍighi mịkarabh eḍighiom ạar ole ẹma, nele nạ mariḍian ilo ụtunom mạar ụnoghooy ruru.
Ạami nạanogho zodi men olo odi kaghiraan tịkarabh odi, keḍio odi ọva ḍio moghiraan tịkarabh eḍighiom ạar odi.

Esiibha ạami tatuḅeen zodi mi tẹmuna olo odi nꞌobo bho nꞌodi neleeyogh rạama bho tẹmiinom mịkanya. Iibha pibha ạami taḍighi siibha, tughuneen molo eedi ighiraan tịkarabh ibha eedi iḍighi nꞌodi ạni obho ḍio.

Ạami tạze nạ nị mobo bho nẹtuonom zodi obho, keḍio oomo ạrasosi obho telōghōm mobho ạami ulōghōm moomo ịitua arōoy nꞌibha eedi nẹva bho. Ạami tạkpe amulumian kōoy kōoy enyina tẹzo ibha odi aḍighi obho.

“Enyina ibha isughō mi taTiatira bho ịtuonom io mịkarabh ịtughumiom obhobho. Enyina dẹtuugha nạ ḍio mibha ipedi obho ighōl ‘Ibꞌọkpo ẹḅokia eru obho.’ Ạami nạkpete miibha bho ạnogho enyina mobho ạami ụbughe mu dōol enyina.
Keḍio ịmaar ẹbham mi tibha enyina ịteeny obho ninii ạami atu.

“Tobo bho iḅe bọ ipuom ạvo bho, ịkparam iḍighi mibha ạami nạva bho isi tạkar ikunughi obho, ạami tạnogho zeedi monyiin ịnyaam obho ạami ubhin tỌde ạmi obho: ạami tạnogho zeedi mịnyaam mọto ịto tarubhuugh obho, ọdaam eedi nꞌọoghuanaan ạvo, nꞌoḅomi eedi mịpaḍi kilo uḅomi mịinu. Ạami tạnogho nạ nị nạ zeedi mẹenaany obho ụḍirogh obho.
“Erumolo enyina ịteeny raḅeri mọmoghon, pịmoghon mibha Ẹmugh obho nạkpete ạnogho mạrasosi obho!”
“Gẹ mạghiom motelema ạsosi obhꞌạSadis:
“Oobho adōm obho ạḍua natu tobo bho ạteeny moḍual ạruumugh obho tẸnaan nꞌoḍual ịinaany obho.
“Ạami naalōghōm mibha enyina neḍighi obho, nꞌọdu aghuḍum obho enyina neḍum obho, toomo ibha enyina nẹebho bho ẹkona.
Tebum ipa bẹleni, iḅetunu mẹghuemi mibha enyina ịteeny obho ku megbi mọbho ọman. Ạami nạamiin mobho ibha enyina neeḍighi obho degbẹbhan io taghisigh tẸnaan obhꞌạmi.

Ịitua siibha bho mibha ụtughumiom enyina bho nꞌẹzo bho enyina ịmoghon obho: ịtuugh eḍighi, meghiraan tịkarabh enyina. Erumolo enyina iḅetunu ḍio, ạami tatu tenyina kọḅa, molo enyina iru ḍio elōghōm mamen ạami tatu.
“Ịbam enyina mi tạSadis meeseeri marukpe enyina ẹḅaaleni. Enyina tẹḅologhia ni mịḅaal ibura bhꞌenyina etelian ạami, ebum obho enyina igbẹbhan ni morelian ạmi obho.

Obo bho iḅe ipuom ạvo bho tẹḅologhia ạni ni mịḅaal kipedi obho, keḍio ạami utughuneen io riḍien eedi mi tọbhereer aghuḍum obho. Taghisigh Ọde ạmi nꞌaritelema bhꞌodi, pạami ọgba omutiom mobho eedi iru milꞌạmi.
“Erumolo enyina ịteeny raḅeri mọmoghon, pịmoghon mibha Ẹmugh obho nạkpete ạnogho mạrasosi obho! ”
“Gẹ mạghiom motelema ạsosi obhꞌaFiladelfia:
“Oobho adōm obho ạḍua natu todi obo bho ạneghe ni ạman, iben ilo todi obho, obho nạpam mịsabi taDevid obho. Odi aghuuron obo oghuughi olo, odi aghuughi obo oghuuron olo.

“Ạami naalōghōm mibha enyina iḍighi obho. Ạami naalōghōm mobho ịnyaam enyina igbẹbhan io: enyina nẹetuonom mịtughumiom ạmi ẹmaar ẹtolan nạ zạmi. Ạami naaghuuron ạnogho enyina meguugh olo obo orue oghuughi olo bho.
Ịmoghon! Ạami taḍighi ni mogbo opopo tenyina obho iḍigh bọ nꞌaSetan, mọgba iben ibha nekōl eedi aJu kitu ḍio milꞌaJu obho, egbuluman tasike enyina. Oomo eedi telōghōm ni mobho ạami utulan enyina.
Ebum obho enyina ideny kẹzo bho ạami ụkpete ụnogho enyina bho, ạami ẹkona tạpam ni enyina atughuneen mi tamen olo ọmiinom aru, obho natu mọteenyom oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho, mọḍa oonon oomo arōoy ade bho.
“Ạami natu siibha siibha. Ịmaar ẹbham eekō kibha enyina ịteeny obho, molo arōoy ịboor enyina mi tạmukpe oḍighi obhꞌenyina.

Ạami taḍighi zodi obo bho arue aḅe apuom ạvo obho mạkpo otu iikpulughu tẸnaan obhꞌạmi, odi ọḍua mụ nạ. Ạami tạge todi maḍien Ẹnaan obhꞌạmi, nꞌaḍien ẹma bho tẸnaan obhꞌạmi, omoom aJerusạlẹm, obho tạḍua tẸnaan obhꞌạmi atu mi tạnyu obho. Ạami tamina ni ạge mi todi momoom aḍien obhꞌạmi.
“Erumolo enyina ịteeny raḅeri mọmoghon, pịmoghon mibha Ẹmugh obho nạkpete ạnogho mạrasosi obho! ”
“Gẹ mạghiom otelema ạsosi obhꞌaLaodisia:
“Oobho adōm obho ạḍua natu tAgey Oōy obho, obho obi ghạ ḍio bho, nꞌobho oomo ọnu odi agey agey be idi obho, obho aru mọḅel egbiom oomo ẹmar-ọkpo ibha Ẹnaan ạlemogh obho.
“Ạami naalōghōm mibha enyina iḍighi obho. Ạami naalōghōm mobho enyina iḅakaam io ịisu nạ ḍio. Kōl enyina kiḅakaam ni bolobolo ẹesu.
Kebum obho enyina ịzololo ni be bho, ạami natu mọsir enyina orōbh tọnu ạmi.
Enyina nekōl ghạ kua, ‘Ezōor ạruula, bọbon ạar olo ịkparanaan ezōor olo.’ Keḍio enyina ilōghōma ḍio mobꞌọsu ạghusan aḍien ekulom obhꞌenyina. Enyina aruvekulom ilo idi mẹduḅa, nꞌarōoy ikpom ariḍien.

Ạami naakiom enyina siibha, itu meghō mạkar agold tạvo ạmi molo enyina egbo. Itu meghō nạ mạbalala olo enyina kẹlokia mopuom ẹduḅa ạregheer enyina. Itu meghō nạ mịigho ọloki tariḍien enyina, molo enyina ẹmiin.
“Ạami nasi ghạ ni ạliom kōoy kōoy olo ạami utulan. Ịgba magey obho siibha, meghiraan tịkarabh enyina.
Ịmoghon! Ạami nạamara tọnu otu eguugh obho naakpu. Kōoy kōoy olo ạmoghon moghōrōkō ạmi kaghuuron meguugh obho, pạami oḍigh todi, otul nꞌodi ole, odi katul nꞌạami kale.
Toomo obo bho teḅe epuom ạvo ạami tạnogho zeedi mịnyaam mọrol ạni toḍiom ạvo ẹtolom ạmi, kẹzo bho ạami uḅe upuom ạvo uru ụrol delede mi toḍiom ạvo ẹtolom Ọde bhꞌạmi obho.
“Erumolo enyina ịteeny raḅeri mọmoghon, pịmoghon siibha mibha Ẹmugh obho nạkpete ạnogho mạrasosi obho! ”
Iibha iru itẹn, pạami umina ụmiin mọnon ạghiiny olo eguugh ạnyu obho aghuurunu.
Keḍio oghōrōkō bho ạami ụmoghon bho amulughu keeḍue bho, ạnogho ạami tamen olo neetẹn obho, ạkpete kua, “Sịin, aru eebha, pạami oḍeeriom onuma mọkpo ilo temute tamen olo iibha neetẹn.”
Onyiin amen obho pẸmugh Iigbia bho ạsiin ạami. Ẹtolom ọolema ạrol tạnyu obho, nꞌōoy olo ạrolom delede.
Odi obho ạrol tẹtolom obho, aghisigh odi nạmua kꞌobꞌooḅi ọbharakpar olo ughōl ạjaspa nꞌakanelian; toomo odi ẹtolom obho ạlagba-ẹnaan, olo aḅil kalogo oorẹeny, akin ni akiton.
Kir ịnon aḍisibh nꞌinya ạrutolom ilo ukinom ukiton odi ẹtolom obho, ilo aḍisibh nꞌinya arukenya ịrolom. Eedi ịḅologhia mịḅaal ạrusuoma, izuaay roghōony ọolema olo ụlemom agold.
Tẹtolom obho pesi ẹḅaal ạḍua amute nꞌoghōrōkō olo nagumughu kọkarabh aḍio. Tẹtolom obho kir oḍual ịtaany ạnyan ilo neemōr. Iibha poḍual ạruumugh obho tẸnaan.
Taghisigh ẹtolom obho kir esi olo odi kọbhiiny ạrataḅaliki, olo nạmua kꞌoghōrōghōr obun-ụḍirogh.
Tonyiin odi ẹtolom obho, mi tạruukul obho, kir inya imoom ịnam ilo ịteeny mọlogh ariḍien mi taghisigh nꞌạman.
Ọḅel omoom ẹnam obho odi kodumunuḅụạgụ; ogbẹbhiōm ịzal obho odi kọony ạnam; ogbẹbhiōm ịraar obho odi kaghisigh ōoy; ogbẹbhiōm inya bho odi kugo olo nạpeebh.
Oomo inya eedi imoom ịnam obho ịteeny diin diin asubham. Oomo ạman nꞌaghisigh obho, ariḍien ariḍien. Ịḅele ḍio bọbon amen mọmoor ạsoor mootaany nꞌuḍugul oghōl ekua:
“Iigbia, Iigbia, Iigbia, ẹrol ẹnogho mẸnaan Obạmọogh obho ạbugh bọ apu obho,
obho ạrol bọ bho, obho odi nạ siibha bho, obho tatu bọ bho.”
Inya imoom ịnam obho nẹemoor sọor eghuan, nꞌiibhughumi, nạlisebh ẹnogho mobo bho ạrolom bọ mẹtolom obho, obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho,

paḍisibh nꞌinya arukenya bho ogbuluman taghisigh odi obo bho ạrolom mẹtolom obho, ookpulughu odi obo bho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho. Peedi ozuuruna raghōony obhꞌeedi mi taghisigh ẹtolom obho ọkpete ekua,
“Ẹnaan, Obạmọogh ezōor! Ạna naagbẹbh mobhin eghuan,
nꞌiibhughumi, nꞌịnyaam.
Ạna ụlem oomo ẹmorokpo bho,
ịḍua nạ tịto onuma keru koomo eedi ẹteeny ghuḍum neḍum.”
Keḍio ạami ụmiin mọbhereer mi toḍiom ạvo odi obo bho ạrol tẹtolom obho; nọoge opule tologhi nꞌạman obho, ọkpulughi ọḍiniom moḍual ookpe.
Keḍio ạami ụmiin mọoghuanaan obꞌOtelema tẸnaan, olo abhin nobꞌoghōrōkō nạgbaam apuruan kua, “Okōr ōoy mobo agbẹbh ni ạman, tatue ni ạakpo mariisi obho ụḍinogh obho, akpẹerōn mọbhereer obho?”
Bọbon ōoy olo ụmiin tạnyu obho bolobolo tade bho, bolobolo tẹmar-arōoy obho odi tẹeḍiani ade bho, olo tatue ni akpẹerōn mọbhereer obho moonon tologhi obho olo.
Pạami uleghe magey mebum obho bọbon ōoy olo ụmiin molo agbẹbh ni ạman mokpẹerōn ọbhereer obho oonon tologhi obho olo bho.

Keḍio onyiin okenya bho ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, “Uleghe ghạ. Nonon ni! Odumunuḅụạgụ bhꞌeghun otu taJuda, ogbōgh ọony ọobhe bho taDevid, naaḅe apuom molo odi tatue ni ạakpo moḍual ariisi obho ụḍinogh obho, akpẹerōn nạ mọbhereer obho.”

Pạami ụmiin mỌony Ẹena nạamara togbo ẹtolom obho, olo inya imoom ịnam obho nꞌarukenya bho ikō zodi ikin ikiton. Ọony Ẹena bho nạgbaanan molo nooghigh. Odi ạteeny moḍual ạrubhaal nꞌoḍual ikpo ariḍien, ibha iru bọ moḍual ạruumugh obho tẸnaan ibha noorōm iru bọ toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho.
PỌony Ẹena bho ạghi abhin mọbhereer obho mi toḍiom ạvo odi obo bho ạrolom mẹtolom obho.

Ẹzo bho odi ạseghe bho, pinya imoom ịnam obho nꞌaḍisibh nꞌinya arukenya bho igbuluman taghisigh Ọony Ẹena bho. Oomo eedi, ōoy onyiin onyiin, ịbhamagh marugumagum nꞌạrukpa agold ilo ụloki mịnsens, ibha iru bọ miikpulughu arōoy tẸnaan obho.
Eedi ịmoor momoom ạsoor ighōl kua:
“Ạna ugbẹbh ni mọseghe ọbhereer obho nꞌọokpo ariisi obho ụḍinogh obho.
Ughigh ni ạna, keḍio tebum ọbho bhꞌonuma,
pạna ụta rōoy uruom Ẹnaan,
mi toomo arughun otu nꞌọnu-ạraama,
nꞌạraama nꞌaruubhugh.
Ạna naaḍighi zeedi etu meghun otu iiḅua moḍighi oḍighi ọnogho Ẹnaan ezira,
eedi tẹda tade bho.”
Keḍio ạami umina uunon, pạami ụmoghon sọor ạsumuunir itelema tẸnaan, ilo ịmara ikō ikiton mẹtolom obho tẸnaan, nꞌinya imoom ịnam obho nꞌarukenya bho,
nẹmoorom nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō, ekōl kua,
“Ọony Ẹena bho ughigh obho agbẹbh mobhin ịikpo,
nꞌẹela, nꞌolōghōm ạar, nꞌịnyaam,
nꞌiibhughumi, nꞌeghuan nꞌibuom!”
Keḍio ạami ụmoghon oomo kạar kạar ilo idi mimoom mi tọbhiiny obho, nꞌoomo kạar kạar ilo idi mimoom mi toomo ariisi obho, nẹmoor sọor ekōl kua:
“Todi obo bho ạrolom ẹtolom obho, nꞌỌony Ẹena bho,
igbẹbh ni mobuom obhin iibhughumi nꞌeghuan nꞌịnyaam ẹrolan eedi kamen kamen!”
Pinya imoom ịnam obho ịbhagharana kua, “Ẹrol nị nạ kua!” Keḍio arukenya bho igbuluman iikpulughu zodi.

Keḍio ạami ụmiin mibha Ọony Ẹena bho ạakpo nakpẹerōn mọḅel ẹḍinom ibhꞌoḍual ẹḍinom ọbhereer obho, keḍio ạami ụmoghon mobho ọḅel omoom ẹnam obho nạkpete ạnogho ạami nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō olo odi kọkarabh aḍio aghōl kua, “Tue!”
Ạami uunon, pạami ụmiin mọḅaal ạsu. Obo bho nakiilom zodi obho ạbham ạghumu, keḍio ụnogho nạ zodi meghōony ọolema. Odi amute aru kobꞌoḅe mẹgham aḅe napuoghom.
Keḍio Ọony Ẹena bho ạakpo akpẹerōn mogbẹbhiōm ịzal ẹḍinom obho; pạami ụmoghon mobho ogbẹbhiōm ịzal ẹnam obho nạkpete kua, “Tue!”
Pọnon ạsu amute, okōkōgh mobhꞌeede bho. Obo bho nakiilom moobhobho, nọonogho mịnyaam mobhin ẹgham oru tade bho, molo arōoy kẹze rōoy; keḍio ụnogho nạ zodi mobꞌọodoony elōor ẹgham.

Keḍio Ọony Ẹena bho ạakpo akpẹerōn mogbẹbhiōm ịraar ẹḍinom obho; pạami ụmoghon mogbẹbhiōm ịraar omoom ẹnam obho nạkpete kua, “Tue!” Ạami uunon pạami ụmiin moḅile ạsu. Obo bho nakiilom zodi obho ạbham mọtuom mi tạvo odi.

Keḍio ạami ụmoghon moghur olo ạgbaanan moghōrōkō olo ạḍua togbo inya imoom ịnam obho aru ạkpete kua. “Aḍuma oḍighi odiin ạkopu ạrusu bolobolo aḍiōbh nꞌabhenya pibha tọkpe ạkopu ịgari. Ụpue ghạ maḅua ạmunu nꞌamiim!”
Keḍio Ọony Ẹena bho ạakpo akpẹerōn mogbẹbhiōm inya ẹḍinom obho; pạami ụmoghon mobho ogbẹbhiōm inya omoom ẹnam obho nạkpete kua, “Tue!”

Ạami uunon, pạami ụmiin mạsu olo akōgh kọbherebher. Aḍien obo bho nakiilom zodi obho ughōl Aḍuugh, nꞌẸmir-iḍim nạtuonom tạman odi. Nọoḍi made bho inya abin, ọnogho zeedi mịnyaam mobhin ẹgham, nꞌoḅẹer, nꞌạrazegh nꞌịnam eḍum ade bho ọziom onyiin abin.
Keḍio Ọony Ẹena bho ạakpo akpẹerōn mogbẹbhiōm ōogh ẹḍinom obho. Pạami ụmiin tẹeḍiani ẹede iiḅua bho mạruumugh obo bho nọoze mebum obho eedi ịgba imutiom moghōrōkō tẸnaan, ịnogho rōoy obho.
Eedi imulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō, “Obạmọogh Oomo ẹmiriikpobho, obho ạneghe ni ạman, iben ilo tọnu odi obho! Tạteeny okōr amen kạna ạtu mịiruan ạliom marōoy ade bho ịze bọ zezōor obho?”

Oomo eedi, ōoy ọḅaal ọḅaal obꞌạdoni bho ụnogho; keḍio ụkpete ụnogho zeedi moḅōrō obhooghia ịbam amen, ninii ọnu arōoy obho egbẹbh, obo bho itul nꞌenyina neḍighi moḍighi obho, aburumōr obhꞌenyina ibha eedi tẹze bho, kẹzo bho ụze enyina bho.
Keḍio ạami ụmiin Ọony Ẹena bho ạakpo akpẹerōn mogbẹbhiōm odiin ẹḍinom obho. Ade bho abhōor aḅomoghian, paghōzōgh obho aḅil kẹnu, keḍio ụvanyu obho akōgh kịḅaal ạman.
Ịinaany obho ịḍua tạnyu obho ịgharaghu tade bho, kilo ịmir nẹkaraghu tobꞌogim.
Pạnyu obho abhẹ, kẹzo bho nokpōr ghạ ọseghe mọota olo ụrere bho, nꞌoomo ibꞌaruugum nꞌaruuḅum ibhꞌọbhiiny obho ụḅirogh tariisi obhꞌeedi.

Keḍio ạruula ade bho, nꞌobo bho ịdaay rạama bho, nꞌaruvẹmụ ạraagham, nꞌobo bho igbooy mẹela bho, nꞌarōoy ibꞌịnyaam obho, nꞌoomo ịnon arōoy, ạrubana nꞌạnwuny ogbo eghun, ighilighu ịghi ịḅokiaay tịinu nꞌaraapōgh aruugum ạrubharakpar obho.
Eedi ileghe ibheleghi mibꞌaruugum obho nꞌạrubharakpar obho ighōl kua, “Meelom ezōor mạḅoki ezōor mi todi obo bho ạrolom mẹtolom obho, nꞌỌony Ẹena bho natu mọliom ezōor obho.
Nạateeny mobꞌaḍuma ạlile bhꞌeedi, keḍio okōr ōoy tatue ạmaranuan?”
Iibha iru itẹn, pạami ụmiin minya itelema tẸnaan bho ịmara tinya ạruukul ade bho, ịbham imulumi minya ạrupibha ade bho, molo ogim ogim io tade bho, nꞌạribhiiny obho, nꞌiirẹeny obho.

Pạami ụmiin ọnon otelema ạḍua natu tọpaḍi obho aghōzōgh obho nꞌẹḍinom obho tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol obho. Odi abheleghi amutiom nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō minya itelema ibha Ẹnaan nạanogho mịnyaam mọpueghi ade bho nꞌạribhiiny obho.
Podi otelema bho ạkpete kua, “Uḍighi ghạ mạpue made bho, nꞌạribhiiny obho, nꞌiirẹeny obho, ninii ezira nooru ụloki mạraleke ụḍinom mi taragbodo ạrubana tẸnaan obhꞌezira.”
Keḍio ụgba ụnogho ạami mọnu obo bho nọolokiiy mạraleke tẸnaan ụḍinom mi taragbodo eedi obho: eedi esugho ạraala ọonir arōoy mi toomo eghun otu obhꞌIzirẹl.
Aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu taJuda mobho nọologh melẹkẹ tẸnaan ụḍinom; aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu taRuben, aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu tạGad;
aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu tẠsa; aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu taNaftali; aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu tạManase;
aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu tạSimion; aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu taLivai; aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu tạIsaka;
aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu tạZebulon; aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu taJosef; aḍisibh ḍiōbh ọonir ilꞌeghun otu ibha taBenjamin.

Iibha iru itẹn, ạami uunon, kir eḅir arōoy — bọbon ōoy olo arue ghạ ạḅal ạman olo! Eedi ilꞌoomo oḍigh kẹrekere arōoy, nꞌaruubhugh, nꞌarughun otu, nꞌọnu-ạraama. Eedi ịbologhiaay mịḅaal ibꞌạradoni, ẹbhamagh nạ tạravo eedi masukpulom ale ẹmara taghisigh ẹtolom obho nꞌỌony Ẹena bho,
keḍio eedi ịkpete imulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō ighōl kua, “Ịbhelegha bhꞌezira nẹḍua ghạ etu tezira mi tẸnaan ezira obho ạrolom ẹtolom obho nꞌỌony Ẹena bho.”
Oomo itelema bho ikō ikitonom mẹtolom obho, nꞌarukenya bho, nꞌinya imoom ịnam obho. Keḍio eedi igbuluman izumeni sumusigh eedi mi tẹtolom obho iikpulughu mẸnaan,
nekōl kua, “Ẹrol nị nạ kua! Ẹnaan obhꞌezira agbẹbh ni mobuom obhin eghuan, nꞌolōghōm ạar, nꞌạlisebh, nꞌiibhughumi, nꞌịnyaam, nꞌịikpo kamen kamen! Ẹrol nị nạ kua!”
Ponyiin mi tarukenya bho apuruan kua zạmi, “Iibha kikōr arōoy ibha ibura mịḅaal ibꞌạradoni obho, ịḍua teḍighen eru?”

Keḍio ạami ụbhagharana kua, “Ạabo ạami ulōghōm io. Ạna kulōghōm.” Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, “Abaabha pobo imuzōnaan mi togbōgh ọmiinom. Eedi neetōl mạradoni eedi ẹḅaaleni mi tịḅaal Ọony Ẹena bho.
Pạar obho eedi ịmara taghisigh ẹtolom tẸnaan neḍighinaan moḍighi mẸnaan moomo uḍugul nꞌootaany, mi totu iikpulughu obho. Obo bho ạrolom mẹtolom obho tạmaar ni ạpam zeedi nꞌalōor obhꞌodi.
Kamen kamen ọkoony osibh mu zeedi; aghōzōgh nꞌẹesu onyiin ạar ọbhooghi mu zeedi;

tebum obho Ọony Ẹena bho, obho odi togbo ẹtolom obho, tatu mookō rạana obho taanon eedi obho, keḍio odi tapin eedi ateliom ạki tariizi ạmuum aghuḍum. Keḍio Ẹnaan tatu agbul moomo izin mi tariḍien eedi.”
Amen Ọony Ẹena bho ạakpo akpẹerōn mogbẹbhiōm oḍual ẹḍinom obho, pạnyu obho ạrol kua be param-m milo tẹkian ni mogbẹbh ạmaḍian ạwa.
Keḍio ạami ụmiin moḍual itelema bho nẹemara taghisigh tẸnaan; keḍio uru ụnogho eedi moḍual aruuḍue.

Ọnon otelema, olo ạteeny mạmogi agold olo ịnsens imuza ni aru ạmara tẹede iiḅua obho. Omina ọnogho zodi mịnon ọlogh ịnsens mọḅaram tiikpulughu oomo arōoy tẸnaan, moḅo iiḅua mi tẹede agold obho odi taghisigh ẹtolom obho.
Ạmugi ịnsens obho ụsu obho ịḍua tạvo otelema bho ạmara taghisigh tẸnaan obho ẹsiin nꞌiikpulughu oomo arōoy tẸnaan.
Keḍio odi otelema bho aru ạseghe mạmogi ịnsens obho, ạseghe nyạn tẹede bho ạlogh abhule keḍio azu tade bho. Paḍio bho ạraḅalu agumughu, ạrol aḍighi meghenem meghenem, ade bho ẹkona arubhughu aḅomian.
Poḍual itelema bho ịmara nꞌoḍual aruuḍue bho mopulo.
Ọḅel otelema bho aru apulo meeḍue obhꞌodi. Paraakpa ạmuum nꞌạnyan, ilo ụguonom nꞌịḅaal iru izuan tade bho. Pụḍi ịraar abin made bho, abin aru ạnu ạman, iirẹeny nꞌoomo ịigho.
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm ịzal otelema bho aru apulo meeḍue obhꞌodi. Pụseghe urōbh ụlogh tạbadi obho mạar olo odi kobꞌeegum olo ạrinyan neemōr. Pạbadi obho ạḍian ịraar abin onyiin abin atẹn mạzara.
Onyiin abin tịraar abin oomo ọkpo bho idi nꞌaghuḍum mi tạmuum obho iru ịbho, onyiin abin tịraar abin ạrunwiaru obho iru ịikpuan.
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm ịraar otelema bho aru apulo meeḍue obhꞌodi. Pobꞌogbōgh ẹenaany olo naamōr kọtodi uḍugul ạḍua tạnyu obho ameelom onyiin abin mi tịraar abin ạribhiiny obho nꞌariisi ạmuum obho.
(Aḍien odi ẹenaany obho ughōl Eghiḍim.) Onyiin abin tịraar abin ạrumuum obho iru ighiḍim, molo eghiḍim ạmuum obho ịze mọlogh arōoy ilo ịbhoghol mụum obho.

Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm inya otelema bho apulo meeḍue obhꞌodi. Pụgur monyiin abin mi tịraar abin aghōzōgh obho nꞌụvanyu obho nꞌịinaany obho, molo onyiin abin ịmuaay mu. Ẹḅaal omina ḍio ạrol tonyiin abin mi tịraar abin aḍuma nꞌuḍugul obho nạ.

Keḍio ạami uunon, pạami ụmiin mugo nạpeebh tobꞌạnyu obho nạkpete nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō akōl kua, “Oloo! Oloo! Oomo obo bho idi tade bho teleghe ni moloo oloo, mamen ịraar itelema bho isughō bho tepulo maruuḍue ibhꞌeedi.”
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm ōogh otelema bho aru apulo meeḍue obhꞌodi. Pạami ụmiin mẹenaany bho ạḍua tạnyu obho ameel tade bho. Nọonogho zodi mịsabi eguugh obꞌoonu obho ikunughi olo bho.
Podi ẹenaany obho aru ạkaton aghuuron meguugh obꞌoonu obho, keḍio ạmugi ibꞌaruugu imute, ilo idi kobꞌegi ạnyan molo ẹḅaal aghōzōgh obho nꞌọpibha bho iru iḅil.
Pigurubia ịḍua tạmugi obho iru isōorōm made bho, keḍio ụnogho zeedi ịnyaam kịikpolodu.
Nọokpete ọnogho zeedi mọḅele ole ịigho nꞌiirẹeny bolobolo kạar kạar olo nasi tade bho. Eedi tenomi marōoy obo bho ịteeny ạni ḍio melẹkẹ ẹḍinom obho tẸnaan mi taragbodo eedi obho be.
Ụnogho ḍio zeedi igurubia bho mịnyaam mọze arōoy bhibha. Eedi tẹnogho zeedi mọmiinom mōogh ụvanyu be. Ẹegama ibha igurubia bho tenomi rōoy obho tẹtol kibha ọokpolodu anomi mōoy.
Tologhi ōogh ụvanyu bhibha, arōoy bhipa tẹva ni mọbho, keḍio eedi irue ḍio ẹmiin. Eedi tẹkar ẹva kua mọbho, keḍio ọbho takiil ni zeedi ạḍua.
Igurubia bho idiighi kạrusu ilo nẹemara mibhꞌẹgham. Tạruumu eedi kir ọkpo ilo idi karaghōony ọolema ilo ụlemom agold, asumusigh eedi idi kibhꞌarōoy.
Ạsilaan eedi idi kạsilaan ạraani, isōbhōm eedi kạralaay odumunuḅụạgụ.
Aruuku eedi idi kolo ukpereghiom arugbugba arukurōgh, oghur asubham obhꞌeedi nekur koghur ọlogh ạrusu ilo nẹki mẹgham.
Eedi ịteeny mịdu nꞌọmoobhom kibha ịikpolodu, keḍio ịdu obhꞌeedi pibha eedi tepin eḍighiom mạar rōoy obho mōogh ạruvanyu obho.
Eedi kir ọolema olo ạda zeedi, odi potelema bho ạbham ịsabi obꞌoonu obho. Aḍien odi mi tọnu aHibru ughōl Ạbadon, tọnu aGris ughōl Ạpolion (ẹmu obho pokune rōoy).
Ọḅel “oloo” bho naamuneen. Oobho aru atẹn, pịzal “oloo” isughō.
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm odiin otelema bho aru apulo meeḍue obhꞌodi. Pạami ụmoghon moghōrōkō olo ạḍua aru tinya ạruukul ẹede agold iiḅua bho odi taghisigh tẸnaan obho.
Oghōrōkō bho ạkpete kua ạnogho mogbẹbhiōm odiin otelema bho, “Kọrion amutiom inya itelema bho ibha ụkpo tobꞌọbhiiny aYufratis obho!”
Pụkorion umutiom minya itelema bho. Useeri zeedi mọze onyiin abin tịraar abin oomo arōoy mi tạkar ạla nꞌụvanyu nꞌaḍuma nꞌamen obhobho.
Ọgba ọnogho ạami mọnu arōoy obho nekiilom mạrusu ẹgham obho — ạmaḍian ọonir ạmilion ạḅekeeny.

Tạghiiny obhꞌạmi, pạami ụmiin mạrusu nꞌobo bho nekiilom zeedi obho. Eedi ịteeny mọdaam ikpo ạrapani arukurōgh taruuku eedi ilo ikōgh kịghanaghan ạnyan, nꞌabulu ukpe, ikōgh nạ kọbherebher. Ạruumu ạrusu obho idiighu kạruumu arudumunuḅụạgụ, keḍio tịnu obhꞌeedi ạrinyan nꞌạsumugi nꞌạar olo oghōl ạsolfa nemuteghuuy.
Onyiin abin mi tịraar abin arōoy bho ịraar ạrazegh bhibha ịze: ạnyan nꞌạmugi nꞌạsolfa ibha ịḍua nemuteghu tịnu ạrusu obho.
Ịnyaam eedi ạrusu obho idi tịnu obhꞌeedi, nꞌịdu obhꞌeedi. Ịdu obhꞌeedi nꞌạruumu kạririar, molo eedi ibhin neḍighiom mạar rōoy.

Arōoy ibha isughō bho, oomo obo bho ạrazegh obho ịze ạni ḍio bho, ịḅeleey io mọkpo bho eedi nịvo nịvo iḍighiiy obho. Eedi ịḅele ḍio mookpulughu ịkarabh ạruumugh nꞌaruru ibha eedi ịlemom magold nꞌasilva nꞌạrapani, ịkaay nạ miirẹeny nꞌạrubharakpar ibha ịmiin io, ịmoghon ghạ ḍio, itele ghạ nạ ḍio.
Arōoy bhipa ẹkona ighiraan io mi tạruukoma nꞌịiḍaany nꞌịkarabh eḍighiom ạar nꞌaviigh obhꞌeedi.

Keḍio ạami ụmiin mọnon ogbōgh otelema ạḍua tẸnaan natu. Odi ạseghe meḅōghōghaan obho aburuom lōor odi, ạkaghuom ẹmu odi mạlagba-ẹnaan obho. Aghisigh obhꞌodi odi kaghōzōgh obho, asike obhꞌodi idi kamuumōr ạnyan.
Odi ạbham tạvo odi mọbam ọbhereer olo nookpẹerōn. Keḍio odi ạseghe moḍiom alẹkẹ odi asōorẹ tobꞌọbhiiny, ạseghe mekẹeny obho ạḅam tegbolom,
keḍio ạkpete amutiom nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō olo nạduḅuḍian kilo arudumunuḅụạgụ nelegheey. Odi ạkpete ạḅele, poḍual ịkarabh aḍio bho igumughuuy ịraḅalu.
Eedi igumughu kua be ẹkpete ẹḅele, pạami uru mọge. Pạami ụmoghon moghōrōkō ạḍua tẸnaan aru ạkpete kua, “Ụgba ghạ mamutiom, ḅọki ni mibha oḍual ịkarabh aḍio bho ịkpete bho, ụge ghạ!”
Potelema bho ạami ụmiin nạamaruom mọbhiiny nꞌegbolom obho aabhaghami moḍiom ạvo odi ạghiom tạnyu obho,

aghir ịzo mi taḍien tẸnaan, obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho, obho ạlem mạnyu obho nꞌoomo ẹmorokpo ibha idi todi obho, ade bho nꞌoomo ibha idi todi obho, nꞌọbhiiny obho nꞌoomo ọkpo bho idi bọ todi obho. Keḍio otelema bho ạkpete kua, “Ubiemi mu!
Amen ogbẹbhiōm oḍual otelema bho tapulo meeḍue obhꞌodi, keḍio Ẹnaan tagbẹbhiōm mọkpo ẹḅokia obhꞌodi, kẹzo bho odi ạgba ạnogho mạrubana odi obho, arizil obho.”

Keḍio oghōrōkō bho ạami ụmoghon bho ạkpete ạḍua tẸnaan natu obho amina ạkpete ạnogho ạami nakōl kua, “Kịa mabhin mọbhereer obho ukpẹerōn obho, obho odi tạvo otelema bho ạmaruom mọbhiiny nꞌegbolom obho.”
Keḍio ạami ụghi todi otelema bho ugbẹel zodi mọnogho ạmi mọbam ọbhereer obho. Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, “Sẹghe mạraḍi mạminogh tạmel tọnu onuma kạmem, akiḍim kạkata tọbaraka onuma.”
Keḍio ạami ubhin mọbam ọbhereer obho tạvo odi ụraḍi ụminogh. Ạmel kạmem tọnu ạmi. Ạami ụminogh, paghiḍim kạkata tọbaraka ạmi.
Keḍio ụgba kua ụnogho ạami, “Ạna tamina ni ạgba madōm obho tẸnaan ibha igboloman nꞌọlogh arōoy nꞌaruubhugh, nꞌọnu-ạraama nꞌạruula ẹma bho.”
Keḍio uru ụnogho ạami moorẹeny ọtuom olo odi kẹḅu okurōgh, ụkpete kua ụnogho ạami, “Ḅetunu mạto motu iikpulughu obho tẸnaan nꞌẹede iiḅua bho nꞌobo bho neekpulughu suo bho.
Ụtuom ghạ mozaal otu etẹrẹ bho, nọonogho mesi obhobho mobo bho ilōghōm io mẸnaan obho, ibha tẹezeghi mẹma iigbia bho merubal nꞌịzal ạruvanyu obho.
Ạami tatōm mịzal obo ịigbaay ạmi ilo ibura mibura ịitu etu ẹgba emutiom madōm obho tẸnaan mi teesoḍia ịraar ọonir nꞌerubal nꞌaḍisibh aruḍuma.”
Ịzal obo ịigbaay obho pịzal iirẹeny obho ughōl bọ ọliiv obho, nꞌịzal ịtodi ibha idi mi taghisigh tObạmọogh ade bho.
Erumolo onyiin ōoy aru moḍighi eedi mịkarabh, ạnyan pibha temute tịnu eedi ẹze mobo ọlogh aḍien eedi. Tẹzo bho, kōoy kōoy olo tạva moḍighi eedi mịkarabh poghigh.

Eedi ẹteeny mịnyaam mọbham ạnyu obho molo ẹlebhe ọlobh mu mi taruḍuma bho eedi tẹgba dōm obho tẸnaan obho. Eedi ẹteeny nạ mịnyaam mọbham ạrumuum ibhꞌade bho, oghireni otẹnẹ eedi mạzara, eedi ẹteeny nạ mịnyaam, kamen kamen olo aḍigh tologhi eedi mobhin oḍigh kẹrekere ạrazegh oru tesuo ade bho.
Amen eedi nẹegba dōm obho ịman, pẹnam obho amute bọ mi tobꞌoonu obho oru oḅe eedi. Odi tapuom ni eedi mạvo ạze zeedi.
Keḍio iḍim obhꞌeedi tẹtol tebōom obꞌẹma bho, tesi obho ụkan bọ mObạmọogh obhꞌeedi mi toorẹeny ẹmigheri obho. Aḍien ighōlan odi ẹma bho ughōl ạSodom nꞌIzipt.
Arōoy oomo aruubhugh nꞌarughun otu nꞌọnu-ạraama nꞌarōoy tepōgha ni miḍim obhꞌeedi mịraar nꞌạmaḍian aruḍuma, molo umōrō ḍio oḍi zeedi.
Arōoy ibhꞌade bho tebo ni mi tọbho ịzal arōoy bhibha, ẹḍeey rạaḍe onyiin ạnogho monyiin minwo, tebum obho ịzal arizil bhibha ibhin mịkanya ọmiinom iru toomo arōoy ade bho.
Ịraar nꞌạmaḍian aruḍuma bho iru itẹn pipooghu aghuḍum ịḍua tẸnaan iru iḍigh teedi, peedi iḅerenu. Kōoy kōoy olo ạmiin eedi poghiil ibꞌaruugu.
Peedi ịzal arizil obho ịmoghon mobꞌoghōrōkō ạḍua tẸnaan aru nạkpete kua ạnogho eedi, “Ịsiin meru teebha!” Ẹzo bho obo ọlogh aḍien eedi nepōgha zeedi obho, peedi ịghi tẸnaan mi teḅōghōghaan obho.

Tonyiin odi amen opopo, ade bho aḅomian magey. Onyiin abin ụḍi mẹma bho ḍiōbh abin, ạakpuan molo aḍiōbh nꞌoḍual nꞌạmaḍian ọonir arōoy ịbhozu. Arōoy ibha isughō bho aruugu esibh magey molo ibuom mạlibugh obho tẸnaan mi tạnyu obho.
Ogbẹbhiōm ịzal “oloo” obho naamuneen, keḍio nonon ni, ogbẹbhiōm ịraar “oloo” bho tatu siibha siibha.

Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm oḍual otelema bho apulo meeḍue obhꞌodi molo ụmoghon magey mibꞌaraghōrōkō mi tạnyu obho nekōl kua, “Ịnyaam ọdaam oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho ilo tObạmọogh ezōor obho siibha, nꞌaKraist obhꞌodi, keḍio odi tạda kamen kamen.”
Paḍisibh nꞌinya arukenya bho ibha idi tẹtolom eedi mi taghisigh tẸnaan obho igbuluman izumeni sumusigh eedi iikpulughu mẸnaan,
nekōl kua,
“Ẹnaan Obạmọogh oomo ẹmir-ịikpo, obho odi obho nꞌobho ạrol obho!
Ezōor nọsebh ni ạna mibha ạna naamutiom ịnyaam obhꞌonuma ụke mọda!
Iloghi obo bho ilōghōm io ạna bho neḅẹebh mebum obho nạateeny molo ạlile bhꞌonuma karu obho,
nꞌobho tọtu mịiruan ọnogho mobo bho nẹebho bho.
Nạateeny momulumian ạrubana bhꞌonuma, arizil obho, nꞌoomo arōoy onuma, oomo obo bho nekiilaan ạna bho, ogbōgh nꞌọbam monyiin ẹzo bho.
Oobho amen obhiẹmi obo bho ibhiẹmi de bho!”

Potu iikpulughu tẸnaan mi tạnyu obho aghuurunu, molo eḅina bho ụloghom bọ mịzo obho ụmiin ni mi totu iikpulughu obhꞌodi. Molo aḍio bho aḍighi meghenem meghenem, ạraḅalu agumughu, ade bho arubhughu aḅomian, ạlogh nạ maraakpa iminiminim ạmuum kẹlebhe.
Keḍio ạmagh ibꞌaruugu amute tạnyu obho. Kir onyiin ạni olo amina mẹnam-aḍio bho, ạseghe sike odi aḅeleriom mụvanyu obho, azua nꞌeghōony aḍiōbh nꞌịzal ịinaany tẹmu odi.
Odi odi nꞌọbaraka olo eghun obho negun, molo ẹegama igun eghun obho iḍighi molo odi aleghe amutiom.
Ọnon ạmagh amina amute tạnyu obho nạ. Kir obꞌogbōgh okōkōgh ẹnam ibꞌaruugu olo ạteeny moḍual ạruumu nꞌaḍiōbh ạrabhaal, azua tẹmu esuo eghōony eghōony ọdaam ẹma.
Ạseghe mọdu obhꞌodi ạkomom ạnyagh monyiin abin tịraar abin ịinaany obho mi tạnyu obho asōorẹ tade bho. Odi aru ạmara taghisigh ạni obho natu mọmar obho, mọḅa ọony obho kamen kamen olo ụmar.
Keḍio ạni obho aru ạmar molobhir ọony, olo tapin ọoghuanaan ạvo ạdaam oomo aruubhugh obho. Ụmar kua be mọony obho puḅum ụseghe ụghiom Ẹnaan mi tẹtolom odi.
Ạni obho aghiil aḍigh tobꞌeekpu eḍum, tesi olo Ẹnaan aḍighi aseerian odi. Tesuo pesi tọmaar ookō zodi mịraar ọonir nꞌerubal nꞌaḍisibh aruḍuma.
Pẹgham aru asōor tạnyu obho. AMaikiel nꞌitelema odi iḅe mobꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho, nꞌitelema ibhꞌodi
keḍio eedi iru ipuom ạvo mẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho molo ugine zeedi nꞌitelema bhꞌodi momina ọrol tạnyu obho.
Odi obꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho unyu ni omutiom! Odi ugbaany ooḍigh obho ughōl Eru bolobolo aSetan obho, obho naabiōghōm moomo ẹmar-arōoy obho. Unyu zodi nꞌoomo itelema odi orōbh tade bho.

Keḍio ạami ụmoghon mobꞌoghōrōkō tạnyu obho nạkpete kua, “Esiibha ịbhelegha bho tẸnaan naaru! Esiibha Ẹnaan naaḍighi aḍeeriom mịnyaam odi kỌolema! Esiibha aKraist obhꞌodi naamutiom ẹmu obhꞌodi! Obo ịmelebh aburumōr obhꞌezira, obho ạmaranuan Ẹnaan nạgbaaghiom ghạ zeedi moomo uḍugul nꞌootaany obho, noobhirighan tạnyu obho.
Aburumōr obhꞌezira ibhin tịnyaam ạzara Ọony Ẹena bho nꞌagey obho eedi ịgba imutiom obho, eḅe epuom ạvo zodi; eedi nẹekar ẹmara nạ moḅe ọbhozu.

Tipa bẹleni, ibo, ạna ạnyu obho nꞌoomo obo bho netughogh epa bho! Sọo! Pọmiinom ilo tẹtol tade bho nꞌạribhiiny obho! Eru obho naasōor atu tonuma nꞌobꞌọkarabh ologhi, tebum obho odi naalōghōm mobho aruḍuma odi neetuan obho.”
Amen obꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho ạatua alōghōm mobho noonyu zodi umutiom usōorẹ tade bho, podi ạke mobhirighan ạni obho ạmar bọ molobhir ọony obho.
Nọonogho zodi mịzal ibꞌasubham ugo mọbheebhom ọghi tesi obho odi ạni obho odi mi togbo eḍum obho. Tesuo pesi tookō zodi mịraar nꞌạmaḍian ạsia, momuzōnaan tạravo ooḍigh obho.
Pooḍigh obho azu mụum aḍigho amutiom mọtuonom ạni obho, ogbōrōm odi ọseghe.
Tipa bho pade bho ạlogh ạvo ạnogho mạni obho, ạkpaton mọnu odi ạbhoghol mụum obho obꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho amurughia bho.

Pologhi obꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho aḅẹebh magey mi tạni obho, podi aḅetunu ạghi moḅe ipedi ạnwuny obhꞌodi ạni obho, oomo obo bho neekō maraalōgh tẸnaan nꞌobo bho ịmara tagey obho ạJizos ạgba amutiom obho.
Podi obꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho ạghi ạmara tọtu ọbhiiny obho.
Keḍio ạami ụmiin molobhir ẹnam olo ạḍua tọbhiiny obho amute natu. Odi ạteeny aḍiōbh ạrubhaal nꞌoḍual ạruumu. Ọbhaal esuo nꞌeghōony nꞌeghōony, nꞌaḍien ọkarabh ẹmu ōoy bho ụge tẹmu obhꞌodi.

Odi ẹnam obho ạami ụmiin obho odi kọkurunuma, asike bho idi kasike otoḅol, ọnu obho kọnu odumunuḅụạgụ. Pobꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho aru ạnogho mịnyaam odi molobhir ẹnam obho, ạnogho nạ zodi ẹnam obho mẹtolom obhꞌodi nꞌoomo ariisi ịto bhꞌodi.
Onyiin ẹmu odi ẹnam obho odi kolo nạabho, keḍio obꞌẹnem obhꞌodi odi kolo nạaḍua. Oomo arōoy ade bho iimōogh ni eḍigh ẹtuonom mẹnam obho,
eekpulughu mobꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho tebum obho odi ạnogho mịnyaam ọto ịto molobhir ẹnam obho. Eedi eekpulughu nạ mẹnam obho, ẹkpete kua, “Okōr ōoy odi kẹnam obho? Okōr ōoy tatue aḅe zodi?”
Nọoḅelemaan mẹnam obho mọkpeteey oḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh, ọnogho nạ zodi mọto ịto merubal nꞌịzal ụvanyu.
Odi abhira ạke mọkpete ọpue Ẹnaan nꞌaḍien odi Ẹnaan, nꞌesi amarugh odi, nꞌoomo obo netugh tạnyu obho.
Nọoḅelemaan zodi moḅe arōoy tẸnaan nꞌopuom eedi mạvo ọnogho nạ zodi mọto ịto ọnogho oomo orōoy nꞌarughun otu, nꞌaruubhugh nꞌọnu-ạraama,
Oomo arōoy ibha netugh tade bho teekpulughu ni zodi. Eedi pobo bho ariḍien eedi dọge ḍio, tọbhereer aghuḍum Ọony Ẹena bho ughigh bọ bho. Nọoge kogbi mọlem ẹmar-arōoy obho.
“Mọghon siibha bho, erumolo ạna ụteeny raḅeri mọmoghon!

Kōoy kōoy olo noogu mobho toḅol ni zodi, toḅol nạ ạni nạ zodi; olo noogu mobho tokighom odi mobꞌạmugem, tẹtuugh nạ mẹzo bho emute. Nọgba kua ọnogho rōoy tẸnaan molo eedi etue ẹkparam ẹteeny nạ mologhi omōruōm.”
Keḍio ạami ụmiin ọnon olobhir ẹnam olo ạḍua tade bho natu. Odi ạteeny ịzal ạrabhaal kibha ọony ẹena, keḍio nạkpete kobꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu.
Odi aḍighiom mọkpo nꞌibꞌịto obhꞌọḅel ẹnam obho mi taghisigh odi. Odi ạbham aḍighi kōoy kōoy tade bho mookpulughu ọḅel ẹnam obho obꞌẹnem obhꞌodi nạaḍua bho.
Odi ogbẹbhiōm ịzal ẹnam obhobho aḍighi mịkanya ọkpo ibꞌaruugu; odi aḍighi ạnyan ẹḍua tạnyu obho esōor tade bho mi taghisigh oomo arōoy.

Keḍio odi ạseghe mọkpo ibꞌaruugu ibha ụto ụnogho zodi moḍighi taghisigh ọḅel ẹnam obho, aabiōghōm moomo arōoy ibha idi bọ tade bho. Odi ẹnam obho ạkpete ạnogho moomo arōoy obho mọka eru oobhughumi aḍien ẹnam obho obꞌạmugem aḍighi, keḍio ọpo ḍio bho.
Nọoḅelemaan mogbẹbhiōm ịzal obho mobhooghu ipooghu aghuḍum ọnogho ọḅel ẹnam obho ụka bọ bho, molo eru obho kạkpete mạar, kạze moomo obo bho imōrō ḍio mookpulughu odi obho.
Ẹnam obho ạbham aḍighi kōoy kōoy, ọbam nꞌogbōgh, ọola nꞌuvekulom, ẹbana nꞌọony ogbo eghun, moguaay aralẹkẹ mi toḍiom ạravo eedi nꞌaragbodo eedi.
Bọbon ōoy olo tatue aḅool bolobolo akō mạar olo, tughuneen molo odi ạteeny melẹkẹ bhobho ḍio. Elẹkẹ bho paḍien ẹnam obho bolobolo ọnu ọḅal olo ḍien obho.

Iibha bho nẹgba ẹnogho ezira molōghōm ạar. Kōoy kōoy olo ạteeny olōghōm ạar tatue ni agbi alōghōm mẹmu ọnu ọḅal ẹnam obho, ebum obho ọnu ọḅal obho namōrō maḍien ōoy. Ọnu ọḅal obhꞌodi odiin odiin odiin, bolobolo onyiin nꞌạmaḍian ọonir nꞌerubal nꞌaḍisibh nꞌodiin.
Ạami uunon, pạami ụmiin mỌony Ẹena bho ạmara tobꞌeegum obhꞌạZayon; odi nꞌesugho ạraala ọonir arōoy obo bho nẹegiaay taragbodo eedi maḍien odi nꞌobhꞌỌde odi.
Keḍio ạami ụmoghon mobꞌoghōrōkō olo nakur kobꞌeekpa ạrumuum ọbhiiny-ạbadi, nagumughu kọkarabh aḍio. Oghōrōkō bho ạami ụmoghon obho aghur koghur ọḍe arōoy ilo neti ragumagum.
Esugho ạraala ọonir arōoy obho isōmōghōn mẹtolom ẹma bho, nꞌinya imoom ịnam obho nꞌarukenya bho. Eedi ịmoor omoom ạsoor olo eedi obo bho nọota tade bho be mobo tetue ẹtuugha.

Eedi idi karōoy ilo iseeri silōor eedi sẹrere karōoy ilo imunuom io rạani ẹpue silōor obhꞌeedi. Eedi ịrol kịkpur ạsunwunyaan. Eedi ịtuonom ghạ mỌony Ẹena bho kesi kesi olo odi ạghi. Nọota nạ zeedi otughuneen tipedi arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho eedi etu mịḅel obo ubhira uḍighi iru mạkar ạnwuny tẸnaan nꞌỌony Ẹena bho.
Dọmoghon ghạ ḍio miben tịnu eedi, bọbon ịkarabh ilo ọgbaam eedi ilo nạ.

Keḍio ạami umina ụmiin ọnon otelema olo nạpeebh tobꞌạnyu obho. Odi ạbhamam ooḅi ọnuekpete adōm obho aḍum ni ạman obho mọgba ọnogho oomo oḍigh kẹrekere arōoy, nꞌarughunotu, nꞌọnu-ạraama, nꞌaruubhugh ibha idi bọ tade bho.

Odi ạkpete amutiom nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō aghōl kua, “Ikiilaan mẸnaan, mebuom ạlibugh obhꞌodi! Amen odi kạru mịiruan kạnogho mẹmar-arōoy obho nạateeny. Igbuluman meekpulughu zodi obo bho ạlem bọ mạnyu nꞌade nꞌạribhiiny obho, nꞌoomo ariizi ạmuum obho!”
Ọnon otelema ạtuonom mọḅel obho nạkpete kua, “Odi naameel! ẠBabilon Ogbōgh bho naameel! Odi ạnogho rimiim odi moomo arōoy aḍighi eedi ẹbhoghoḍiaay — ọoghuanaan amiim ole ẹma bhꞌodi!”
Omina ọnon otelema ạtuonom mịḅel ịzal obho, ạkpete nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō aghōl kua, “Kōoy kōoy olo azuman aakpulughu molobhir ẹnam obho nꞌeru obhꞌodi, agua nạ tegbodo bolobolo tạvo odi melẹkẹ odi ẹnam obho,

odi nịvo nịvo tạpoghol ạni ni mobꞌọoghuanaan amiim ạlile tẸnaan, ibha odi naazu ạlogh tạkopu ọkarabh ologhi odi obho. Oomo obo iḍighi miibha bho tọlogh zeedi tọmiinom ạnyan nꞌạkabit mi taghisigh iiḅi itelema bho nꞌỌony Ẹena bho.

Ạmugi ạnyan obho tạnogho eedi mọoḅaghami obho tẹsiin tạnyu obho ẹtol kamen kamen. Oomo uḍugul nꞌootaany bọbon amen olo tadeny ạnogho mobo bho izuman iikpulughu mẹnam obho nꞌeru obhꞌodi, nꞌoomo obo bho ịteeny melẹkẹ aḍien odi obho.”
Iibha bho nẹgba ẹnogho marōoy tẸnaan mọkparami alōor eedi, obo bho nekiilaan eekō maraalōgh tẸnaan obho, ibha iseeriom oomo ologhi omōruōm obhꞌeedi tạJizos obho.

Keḍio ạami ụmoghon moghōrōkō olo ạḍua tẸnaan aru nạkpete kua, “Gẹ miibha bho: Ạseghe siibha ạghi taghisigh ọḅaal ologhi tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho iḍighi moḍighi tObạmọogh obho ịbhuom obho.” PẸmugh obho ạbhagharana kua, “Ii ạkar agey nạ ni, eedi tẹḅaal ni mologhi tepooghia ạni ni talikumuan oḍighi obhꞌeedi, ebum obho ạsuo oḍighi obhꞌeedi tẹtuonom ni zeedi obho.”
Keḍio ạami uunon, pạami ụmiin ẹḅaal eḅōghōghaan nꞌonyiin olo ạgbaanan mōoy bho ạrolom delede meḅōghōghaan obho. Odi azua meghōony ọolema olo ụlemom agold, ạbham tạvo odi mọbam elōor olo arōbh magey.

Keḍio ọnon otelema amute totu iikpulughu obho aru, naleghe amulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō ạnogho zodi obo bho odi delede teḅōghōghaan obho nakōl kua, “Sẹghe mọbam elōor obhꞌonuma maḅuom iiḅua bho. Nạateeny men ọkuuy ikpo iirẹeny bho; ikpo iirẹeny bho nẹeḅaarogh!”
Podi obo bho ạrolom delede meḅōghōghaan obho abulom mọbam elōor obhꞌodi mi tade bho ạkuuy mikpo iirẹeny bho.
Keḍio ạami ụmiin mọnon otelema bho ạḍua totu iikpulughu obho tẸnaan aru. Odi ạbham nạ mọbam elōor olo arōbh magey.

Keḍio omina ọnon otelema, obho ạteeny bọ mịnyaam ạnyan obho, ạḍua tẹede iikpulughu obhu aru, amulughuom nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō motelema bho ạbham bọ mọbam elōor obho arōbh obho, ạkpete kua ạnogho zodi, “Sẹghe mọbam elōor obhꞌonuma mạkuoghom mitu ikpo iirẹeny ariḍighi ade bho. Eedi mẹemaar ẹḅaarogh!”
Podi otelema bho abulom mọbam elōor obhꞌodi mi tade bho, ạkuuy mikpo bho mi tiirẹeny obho, keḍio aakōbhōghi zeedi azu togua ibꞌạlile bho tẸnaan.
Umiibh mikpo bho togua ebughotu ẹma bho, molo aḍigho ịḅaal igbōr togua bho ilela mesi olo tegbẹbh ni mạmaḍian ọonir atobi mạlidoony obho, nꞌōogh ạraaḅa asike mekuḍum obho.
Keḍio ạami ụmiin tạnyu obho mọnon elẹgh obꞌaruugu olo ạnogho ạami memōogh. Ạami ụmiin moḍual itelema nꞌoḍual ạrazegh, ibha iru bọ mibhꞌikunughi obho. Teedi pesi ạlile obho tẸnaan akunughiom.
