Keḍio ạami ụmiin mesi olo odi kọbhiiny ạrataḅaliki olo ụguonom nꞌạnyan. Ạami ạmiin nạ mobo bho iḅe bọ ipuom molobhir ẹnam obho nꞌeru obhꞌodi nꞌobo bho nẹeteeny mọnu ọḅal olo namara ḍien obhꞌodi. Eedi ịmara tọtu ọbhiiny ạrataḅaliki obho, ẹbhamagh ruuḍue ilo Ẹnaan ạnogho zeedi.
Eedi ịrol nẹmoor sọor obho taMozis ẹbana bho tẸnaan, nꞌạsoor Ọony Ẹena bho. Eedi ịmoor kua,
“Ẹnaan, Obạmọogh oomo Ẹmiriikpo bho,
pẹzo ariḍighi onuma ịbugh iḍiku ruugu.
Ạna Ọolema oomo aruubhugh obho,
pẹzo araabōom obhꞌonuma ịmaar ịneghe.
Obumọogh, okōr ōoy obo tạḅele moghiilaan onuma?
Okōr ōoy obo tagin mọgba ạlibugh obhꞌonuma?
Ạna be mobo ụneghe ni ụman.
Oomo aruubhugh obho tetu ni eekpulughu ạna,
ebum obho oomo eedi nẹemiin miiḅi eḍighiom ạar onuma bho.”
Iibha iru itẹn, pạami ụmiin mobho nooghuuron motu iikpulughu obho tẸnaan nꞌotu ạgalaga amarugh obhꞌodi.
Keḍio oḍual itelema bho ịbham bọ moḍual ạrazegh obho iru imute mi totu iikpulughu obho; eedi ibura mịḅaal ịnyeghenyeghe ibura, keḍio ikuugha teeku obhꞌeedi mooḍigh agold.
Keḍio onyiin mi tinya imoom ịnam obho aru ạnogho moḍual itelema bho moḍual ạrukpa ilo ạlile tẸnaan obho aḍum ni ạrol kamen kamen obho imuza ni.
Ạmugi eghuan nꞌịnyaam obho tẸnaan imuzō ni totu iikpulughu obho, molo bọbon ōoy olo arue moḍigh totu iikpulughu obho olo ninii oḍual ạrazegh obho oḍual itelema bho ibhin iru obho isi tikunughi.
Keḍio ạami ụmoghon mobꞌoghur oghōrōkō olo ụkpete totu iikpulughu obho nọnogho moḍual itelema bho, nokōl kua, “Ịki mezu moḍual ạrukpa ạlile bho tẸnaan mi tade bho!”
Ọḅel otelema bho ạghi azu mẹkpa obhꞌodi mi tade bho. Kụmiin obꞌẹegama ọmiinom ariisi ilo ịrol tobo bho iguaay mạraleke olobhir ẹnam obho, nꞌobo bho iikpulughu meru obhꞌodi obho.
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm ịzal otelema bho azu mẹkpa obhꞌodi mi tọbhiiny ạbadi obho. Pạmuum obho inwean ịrol kịḅaal ōoy olo nạabho, keḍio oomo ọkpo bho idi tọbhiiny ạbadi obho iru ịbhozu ịman.
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm ịraar otelema bho aru azu mẹkpa obhꞌodi mi tạribhiiny nꞌariizi ạrumuum obho, pạrumuum obho inwean itẹn mạzara.
Pạami ụmoghon mobho otelema bho ạda rụmuum obho ạkpete kua, “Ẹliom obhꞌonuma iizuan ni. Ạna obo bho ụneghe ni ụman obho, obho odi, nꞌobho ạrol nạ bho!
Eedi izu mịḅaal arōoy tẸnaan nꞌarizil obho, keḍio ạna ụnogho ạni zeedi mịḅaal mọbhoghol. Iizuan ni moḍighi eedi kua.”
Keḍio ạami ụmoghon moghōrōkō bho ạḍua tẹede iikpulughu obho aru nạkpete kua, “Ẹnaan Obạmọogh oomo ẹmiriikpo bho, ịiruan obhꞌonuma iizuan ni ẹneghe nạ magey!”
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm inya otelema bho aru azu taghōzōgh obho mẹkpa obhꞌodi, keḍio ụḅelemaan mọpobhotion arōoy mẹesu obhꞌodi.
Keḍio ẹesu obhꞌodi ạsuughiiy rōoy, peedi ịghor maḍien tẸnaan, odi obo bho ạto bọ mịto ạrazegh bhibha bho, molo eedi ikiraan io tịkarabh eedi ebuom mạlibugh obhꞌodi.
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm ōogh otelema bho azu mẹkpa obhꞌodi mi tẹtolom olobhir ẹnam obho. Keḍio ọkinim asōorōm marōoy obho odi nạda bho, molo eedi ịghiir rạlaay eedi mebum ẹegama bho.
Peedi ịghor mẸnaan obho odi tạnyu obho tebum ẹegama bho nꞌariisi obhꞌeedi, molo eedi ikiraan toḍighi ịkarabh obhꞌeedi.
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm odiin otelema bho azu mẹkpa obhꞌodi mi tobꞌọbhiiny obho ughōl bọ Yufratis obho. Pọbhiiny obho ạaghara mọnogho ebōom mạruula bho ịḍua tọpaḍi obho aghōzōgh obho iru obho.
Keḍio ạami ụmiin mịraar ịkarabh ạruumugh, ilo ịgbaanan mịfokufoku, ịḍua nemute tọnu obꞌẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho, nꞌọnu olobhir ẹnam obho, nꞌọnu iben ozil obho.

Eedi ạruumugh aruru obho ịrol iḍighi mịiḍaany obho. Eedi ịraar ạruumugh bhibha imute ịghi tạruula oomo ade bho, mookōbhōghi obhin eedi oru ẹgham mi togbōgh aḍuma bho tẸnaan Obạmọogh oomo ẹmiriikpo bho.
“Ịmoghon! Ạami natu kọḅa! Ọḅaal ologhi tạtol ni ạnogho mobo bho okoḍi ḍio ạmaar aanona mukpe odi, molo odi otele ḍio mẹduḅa ạlokia rẹgheer mi togbo arōoy!”
Keḍio ạruumugh obho iikōbhōghi rụula bho monyiin esi ibhin iru tesi obho, tọnu aHibru ughōl bọ Ạmagedon obho.
Keḍio ogbẹbhiōm oḍual otelema bho azu mẹkpa obhꞌodi mi tạnyu obho. Keḍio obꞌoghōrōkō ạḍua tẹtolom mi totu iikpulughu obho aru, nạkpete kua, “Nooḍighi!”

Molo aḍio bho aḍighi meghenem meghenem, ạraḅalu agumughu ade bho arubhughu aḅomian milo ibꞌaruugu. Oḍigh oḅomian obho ade bho aḅomian obho dọrol ghạ ḍio moomo arōoy imute: iibha bho iḅẹebh epu moomo ibha ade bho naḅomian ghạ bho.

Pụveleghi mogbōgh ẹma bho ụḍi ịraar abin, nꞌolo oomo ạraama aruubhugh obho ụukpooy ni. PẸnaan ạatua mạBabilon ogbōgh obho keḍio aḍighi odi ạbhoghol miim ạkopu obhꞌodi — amiim ạlile ibꞌaruugum obhꞌodi.
Poomo aruuḅum obho ạmuum ikin ikitonom obho nꞌiba aruugum obho ibhẹzuuy.
Paraakpa ạmuum ạrubharakpar ibꞌaruugu ilo ịimor koghōluōm ịḍua tạnyu obho imeleghuom rōoy. Parōoy ịrol nẹkorogh Ẹnaan mebum ọmiinom araakpa ạmuum obho, tebum obho ọmiinom obho ipu ni obho.
Keḍio onyiin otelema bho tẸnaan obho ạbham moḍual ạrukpa bho aru tạmi ạkpete kua, “Tue, molo ạami aḍeeriom ạna mẹzo tọliom mobꞌole-mẹma bho, odi ogbōgh ẹma bho ạrolom delede mọlogh ạribhiiny obho
Ạruula ẹmar-arōoy obho neeḍighi mọkpo ạregheer nꞌodi ole-mẹma bho, arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho ẹko nạ nẹebhoghol nekigh kamiim mịkarabh ọkpo ạregheer odi ạni obho.”

Keḍio Ẹmugh Iigbia bho ạsiin ạami, odi otelema bho abhin ạami ạghi tobꞌeekpu eḍum. Tepa pạami ụmiin monyiin ạni olo ạrolom delede mẹnam olo akōgh kigbula, olo ạteeny mọnu ariḍien morōnyōghōm Ẹnaan ilo ụgiom moomo odi. Ẹnam obho ạteeny oḍual ạruumu nꞌaḍiōbh ạrabhaal.

Ạni obho abura mikōkōgh ibura ilo ịla mạar magey, azuughia mạrabe nꞌịla agold nꞌibꞌiiḅi ịpaḍi ạrubharakpar ilo nẹmua. Tạvo odi, odi ạbham mạkopu agold olo oomo ịkarabh ọkpo ạregheer ole-ẹma bhꞌodi imuzō ni.
Tegbodo odi nọoge maḍien ẹḅokia bhꞌodi olo ẹmu obho ughōl kua, “ẠBabilon ogbōgh bho oniin oomo ile-rạama nꞌipesi mipesi ẹmar-arōoy obho.”
Keḍio ạami ụmiin mobho ạni obho nạabhoghol mịḅaal arōoy tẸnaan nekigh, nꞌịḅaal obo bho ụze tebum aḍien tạJizos obho.
Amen ạami ụmiin odi pạami ukperenom nꞌeemōogh.
Potelema bho apuruan kua zạmi, “Ạna naamōogh meeghe? Ạami tạgba ạnogho ạna mẹmu ọkpo ẹḅokia ạni obhobho nꞌẹnam oḍual ạruumu nꞌaḍiōbh ạrabhaal obho arōol odi obho.

Ẹnam obho ạna ụmiin obho, onyiin amen aḍum ghuḍum, esiibha aghuḍum olo mu todi. Odi natu momute ọḍua toonu obho ikunughi olo bho ọghi koghigh odi. Arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho ilo ariḍien eedi dọge ḍio tọbhereer aghuḍum obho kogbi mọlem ẹmar-arōoy obho, teemōogh ni tẹzo eedi nẹmiin mẹnam obho. Onyiin amen aḍum ni ghuḍum, esiibha bho aghuḍum ilo mu, keḍio tamute ni atu.
“Iibha bho nẹgba ẹnogho ezira molōghōm ạar. Oḍual ạruumu obho poḍual aruugum obho ạni obho ạrolom delede obho. Eedi oḍual ạruula nạ.
Oōgh eedi neesōor, onyiin odi ni nạda, opedi obho doru ḍio noru; amen odi tatu, odi tạtol ịbam amen be.
Odi ẹnam obho, tamen olo neetẹn ạrol nꞌaghuḍum obho, obho aghuḍum olo mu siibha bho, odi ọolema obho agbẹbhiōm ạbhenya mi tịḅel oḍual obho, olo ạghi molo koghigh odi.
“Aḍiōbh ạrabhaal obho ạna ụmiin obho paḍiōbh ạruula ilo dẹke ḍio mọda ạraama, ilo tọnogho ni zeedi mịnyaam mọḅar olobhir ẹnam obho ọto ịto, kạruula ẹma monyiin ạwa.
Aḍiōbh bhibha, oomo eedi ịteeny monyiin ịitua, keḍio eedi iru ịnogho mịnyaam nꞌịto eedi mẹnam obho.

Eedi teḅe mỌony Ẹena bho. Ọony Ẹena bho nꞌobo bho odi abheleghi ạson ạseghe bho, ibha imōruōm odi obho, tẹtuonom odi ẹtol mesi eḅe epuom ạvo zeedi, tebum obho tughuneen zodi ḍio ọnon Obạmọogh nꞌỌola olo bho.”
Odi otelema bho amina ạkpete kua ạnogho ạmi, “Ạrumuum obho ạna ụmiin obho, obho ole-mẹma bho ạrolom delede bho, pạraama, nꞌarōoy, nꞌaruubhugh, nꞌọnu-ạraama.
Aḍiōbh ạrabhaal obho ạna ụmiin obho, nꞌolobhir ẹnam obho, tẹlogh ni ḍien mole-mẹma bho. Eedi tẹḅirogh ni kạar kạar olo odi ạteeny, eseeri zodi mẹduḅa; eedi tẹḅa ni miikpōogh odi, ẹsu nyạn zodi ekigh.
Ẹnaan naaseeri mi tologhi eedi moḍighi obhulughi tịto bhꞌodi, oomo eedi tetul ọnu, ẹnogho mịnyaam eedi mẹnam obho mọda ninii ọnuekpete bho tẸnaan etu magey obho.
“Odi ạni obho ạna ụmiin obho pogbōgh ẹma bho nạda mạruula ade bho.”
Iibha iru itẹn pạami ụmiin ọnon otelema tẸnaan bho ạḍua tạnyu obho natu. Odi ạḍua natu nꞌibꞌịnyaam, molo eghuan odi ạnogho mẹḅaal moomo ade bho.
Odi amulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō aghōl kua, “Odi naameel! ẠBabilon ogbōgh obho naameel! Aruru nꞌịkarabh ạruumugh nꞌoomo oḍigh kẹrekere ịkarabh ịnun ilo nogbi ni netughogh todi.

Ebum obho odi ạnogho miim odi moomo arōoy aḍighi eedi, isumughia — miim ịkarabh ọkpo ạregheer ole-ẹma odi obho. Ạruula ẹmar-arōoy obho neele mẹma nꞌodi. Iḅo raaḅo ẹmar-arōoy obho neeru egbo tebum ịdianan obhꞌodi.”
Keḍio ạami umina ụmoghon ọnon oghōrōkō olo ạḍua tạnyu obho aru, nạkpete kua,
“Arōoy ạmi, imute meru! Imute mẹḍua todi ạni obho!
Ibhin ghạ bin mi toḍighi ịkarabh obhꞌodi;
Ị́ḍian ghạ bin ọmiinom odi!
Nookōbhōghi okubh mịkarabh odi ẹsiin esi tạnyu obho,
molo Ẹnaan nꞌꞌạatua mịkarabh obhꞌodi.
Tụugh amulumian zodi kẹzo bho odi aḍighi ạna bho;
ḍighi mạkpe mamulumian zodi ịzal abin ibha odi aḍighi obho.
Pule mạkopu obhꞌodi miim olo ạghua ịzal amen apu mibha odi aḍighi ạnogho ạna bho.
Nọgho zodi mọmiinom nꞌịitu ilo teleeny ni meghuan nꞌẹela bho odi agbueni lōor odi obho,
kẹzo bho odi nạkpete ghạ ạnogho lōor odi obho:
‘Ạni ọolema bho ạami odi suo delede!
Ạami ekpukele ạni ḍio.
Ạami ulōghōm mu mịitu!’
Tebum iibha bẹleni, ịiḅaghami obhꞌodi tesōorōm zodi monyiin aḍuma;
ẹzegh nꞌọmiinom, nꞌoḅẹer.
Keḍio odi, tọsu nyạn, tebum obho Ẹnaan Obạmọogh, obho tạliom odi obho, ạbugh ni apu obho.”
Ạruula ade bho itul nꞌodi iḍighi mịkarabh ole-ẹma ịdianan obho teleghe ni mẹma bho nꞌizin, mamen eedi tẹmiin mạmugi ạnyan obho nale zodi obho.
Eedi tẹmara tegbeeny, mebum aruugu ọmiinom obhꞌodi, keḍio tẹkpete kua, “Oloo, oloo. Iibha kokōr oḍigh itōnyōgh! Obꞌẹma bhobho ạBabilon! Onyiin amen be bho ubhin ụliom ạna kua!”
Iḅo raaḅo ade bho ẹko nạ teleghe ni zodi eḍigh tịitu, tebum obho bọbon ōoy olo tamina akō mọkpo aḅo eedi olo mu obho.

Ughō mu magold nꞌasilva ibha nọlemom ghạ mikpoki obho ibꞌiiḅi ạrubharakpar nꞌạrabe nꞌibꞌiiḅi oḍigh kẹrekere ikōkōgh nꞌịḅaal ịnyeghenyeghe arukpe, nꞌọkpo ilo ụkaam ịighuanaan iirẹeny, nꞌarukurōgh, nꞌarasilati;

nꞌịiza, nꞌạsent, nꞌọkpo bho ughōl bọ ịnsens, nꞌamaa, nꞌạfrankinsens; nꞌamiim nꞌạrumunu, nꞌạfalawa bho noḍighiom mạbred obho, nꞌạranam nꞌạraana, nꞌạrusu nꞌạragada ilo ạrusu obho keghiilom, nꞌạrubana, nꞌạkar ạruumugh arōoy nạ.
Keḍio eedi iḅo raaḅo bho tẹkpete kua ẹnogho zodi ạni obho, “Oomo ọkpo bho ạna ụliaay mọteeny obho neeḍigh eḍum, oomo ẹela nꞌọdu obhꞌonuma neebhẹ, molo ạna orue mu ạteeny zeedi!”
Iḅo raaḅo bho iru igbo mẹela mi toḅuan aḅo nꞌodi ẹma bho, tẹmara tegbeeny, tebum obho eedi nekiil ruugu ọmiinom obhꞌodi obho. Eedi teleghe ni eḍigh tịitu,

keḍio tẹkpete kua, “Oloo, iibha kokōr oḍigh itōnyōgh ilo ịrol ịnogho mobꞌẹma bhobho! Odi abura ghạ moḍigh kẹrekere ibꞌiiḅi ikōkōgh nꞌịḅaal ịnyeghenyeghe arukpe, keḍio azuughia ghạ moḍigh kẹrekere ịla nꞌarununuma agold nꞌạrubharakpar!
Onyiin ạwa be mobho oomo ẹela bhꞌodi ibhẹzu.”
Oomo obo bho nẹzoghiom ghạ rughuugh ụnwiaru obho nꞌoomo obo bho nẹzoghiiy tạribhiiny nꞌoomo obo bho neḍikuuy ghạ tarughuugh eedi obho nꞌibha neḅooy raaḅo tạribhiiny obho, tẹmara tegbeeny,
keḍio teleghe kua emutiom men eedi tẹmiin mụgi obho nale zodi, obho: “Ọnon ẹma olo nạarol ghạ kobo ẹma bhobho olo!”

Eedi ikpooy obhugh ezuughiom rụumu eedi eleghe eḍigh ịitu, ẹkpete kua, “Oloo, iibha kokōr oḍigh itōnyōgh ilo ịrol ịnogho mobꞌẹma bhobho! Odi pẹma bho agbuemi moomo obo bho ịteeny rughuugh ụnwiaru tạribhiiny. Keḍio onyiin ạwa be mobho kạar kạar odi ibhẹ imuneen.”
Enyina obo bho idi tạnyu obho, ibo tebum obho nọokpo zodi obho! Enyina arōoy tẸnaan, nꞌiteledōm obho nꞌarizil obho tẸnaan ibo nạ, tebum obho Ẹnaan nạaliom zodi tebum ibha odi aḍighi enyina bho!
Keḍio onyiin obꞌotelema bho aḅẹtōn mọbharakpar olo ạbugh kọgbiom igbula arōbh tọbhiiny obho, ạkpete kua, “Pẹzo tọokpo mobꞌẹma bho ạBabilon nꞌịnyaam ẹgham, molo ụmiin mụ zodi.

Iitia oḍigh kẹrekere ạraaḍe nꞌaruuḍue bho nopulooy ghạ bho, umina mu ọmoghon tonuma; oomo oḍigh kẹrekere arōoy ariḍighi ẹkona ụmiin mu nạ tonuma. Oghur ạrubharakpar obho nọgbioghom ghạ mọkpo bho ẹkona ụmoghon mụ nạ.

Ụmiin mụ mẹḅaal ọtodi tonuma; oghōrōkō ọḅaal ologhi ọḅalan ilom ụmoghon mụ nạ tonuma. Iḅo raaḅo onuma pigbōgh arōoy oomo ẹmar-arōoy obho, keḍio tiben ịiḍaany obhꞌonuma, pạna ubhin uubiōghōm moomo arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho!”
Ụliom ạBabilon tebum ịḅaal arizil nꞌarōoy tẸnaan ibha ụmiin todi obho; ii, ịḅaal oomo obo bho nọoze bọ tesuo ade bho.
Iibha iru itẹn, pạami ụmoghon oghur olo ạgbaanan moghōrōkō imulughu obꞌọlogh arōoy mi tạnyu obho, nẹkpete kua, “Ibuom Ẹnaan! Ịbhelegha bho, nꞌeghuan obho, nꞌịnyaam obho ilo tẸnaan obhꞌezira!
Odi nạtu magey ịiruan obho! Odi nạaru ạnogho mobꞌOle-mẹma bho ạseghe mole-ẹma bhꞌodi ạpue made bho. Ẹnaan nạaliom zodi mebum obho odi ạze mạrubana odi obho.”
Peedi imina imulughu, “Ibuom Ẹnaan! Ạmugi ạnyan obho nale mobꞌẹma bho nẹesiin ẹtol kamen kamen!”
Paḍisibh nꞌinya arukenya bho nꞌinya imoom ịnam obho igbuluman iikpulughu mẸnaan obho ạrolom ẹtolom ọolema bho, keḍio ịkpete kua, “Ẹrol ni nạ kua! Ibuom Ẹnaan!”
Keḍio oghur oghōrōkō ạḍua tẹtolan obho aru, ạkpete kua, “Oomo ạrubana bho tẸnaan, nꞌoomo arōoy, igbōgh nꞌịbam, ibha nekiilaan zodi obho, ibuom Ẹnaan obhꞌezira!”

Keḍio ạami ụmoghon oghur olo ạgbaanan moghōrōkō imulughu obꞌọlogh arōoy koghur obꞌeekpa ạrumuum ọbhiiny ạbadi, kobꞌọkarabh aḍio olo nagumughu. Ạami ụmoghon mobho eedi nẹkpete kua, “Ibuom Ẹnaan! Odi Obạmọogh obho, Ẹnaan obhꞌezira obho ạmoogh oomo ẹmiriikpo bho, Ọolema!
Itu ọḅaal ologhi obo; itu obuom ạlibugh obhꞌodi! Amen ipina Ọony Ẹena bho nạateeny, ạni obhꞌodi naakōbhōghia naḅōrō.
Nọonogho zodi mịnyeghenyeghe ịḅaal arukpe mobura.” (Ịnyeghenyeghe ịḅaal arukpe pooḅi eḍighiom ạar arōoy obho tẸnaan.)

Keḍio otelema bho ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, “Gẹ miibha bho: Ọḅaal ologhi tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho noobheleghi mọrol ole ạni ẹzaal ipina Ọony Ẹena bho.” Keḍio amina ạloghom kua, “Iibha bho ạkar agey ọnuekpete tẸnaan.”

Keḍio ạami ugbuluman tasike odi mookpulughu odi, podi ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, “Uḍighi ghạ kua! Ạami onyiin ẹbana konuma nꞌoomo aburumōr obhꞌonuma, ibha ịbham bọ magey obho tạJizos obho odi ạgba amutiom obho. Kpukpulughu mẸnaan!”
Agey obho tạJizos pibha ịnogho mịnyaam marizil obho.

Keḍio ạami ụmiin mobho ạnyu obho naaghuurunu, nꞌọḅaal ạsu olo odi tologhi obho. Obo bho nakiilom zodi obho ughōl Obi ghạ ḍio nꞌỌgba magey; odi abhin tagey obho nạtu mịiruan obho, naḅiom mẹgham obhꞌodi.
Ariḍien odi idi bhulululu kamuumōr ạnyan, keḍio azuaay mọlogh arughōony ọolema tẹmu odi. Odi ạteeny ḍien olo ụge talōor odi, olo odi be alōghōm, ọnon olo alōghōm olo.
Oomo ạdoni obho odi ạḅologhia bho ịḅaal ịḅaal. “Ọnuekpete tẸnaan” paḍien obho nopeleghiom odi.
Ọlogh arōoy ẹgham ibhꞌạnyu obho nekiilom mịḅaal ạrusu, ilo eburaay mịḅaal ịnyeghenyeghe arukpe nẹtuonom odi.
Omamagh obꞌạmugem odi tọnu odi, obho odi tapin aḅe apuom ruubhugh obho. Odi tapin ọodoony okurōgh ạdaam zeedi, keḍio odi tamiibh mamiim ạliliom ibꞌaruugu obho tẸnaan Obạmọogh oomo ẹmiriikpo bho.
Tạdoni bhꞌodi nꞌalẹkẹ bhꞌodi nọoge maḍien obhobho, “Ọola nꞌObạmọogh, olo tughuneen zodi ḍio ọnon olo.”
Keḍio ạami ụmiin onyiin otelema bho ạmara mi taghōzōgh obho. Odi amulughu nꞌobꞌoghōrōkō ạnogho moomo ịnun ibha nẹpeebh togbo ạnyu obho aghōl kua, “Itu meekōbhōghian monyiin esi mele mẹzaal tẸnaan!
Itu mẹḅa silōor ạruula, nꞌarōoy ẹgham, nꞌaruvẹmụ bhꞌeedi nꞌasilōor ạrusu nꞌobo bho nekiilom eedi obho, nꞌasilōor oomo arōoy, ạrubana nꞌạnwuny ogbo ẹma, ịbam nꞌigbōgh!”
Keḍio ạami ụmiin olobhir ẹnam obho nꞌạruula ẹmar-arōoy obho nꞌarōoy ẹgham eedi iru ịmaranuan moḅe odi obo bho nakiilom mạsu obho nꞌarōoy ẹgham ibhꞌodi.

Uḅol ni ọloghom mikoli mẹnam obho, nꞌiben ozil obho aḍighi mịiḍaany taghisigh odi obho. (Ịḍua tịiḍaany bhibha kodi aabiōghōm mobo bho iguaay melẹkẹ ẹnam obho, nꞌobo bho iikpulughu meru ẹnam obho.) Urōḅōḍi ni mẹnam obho nꞌiben ozil obho mimoom ọloki toonu ạnyan obho neemōrōm nꞌạkabait obho.
Ubhin omamagh obꞌạmugem obho odi bọ tọnu obo bho nakiilom mạsu obho ọziom arōoy ẹgham obhꞌeedi; keḍio oomo ịnun obho ịḅa miikpōogh obhꞌeedi ạrubaraka imute.
Keḍio ạami ụmiin onyiin otelema bho ạḍua tạnyu obho natu. Odi ạbham ịsabi oonu obho ikunughi olo bho nꞌobꞌagbirigbiri.
Keḍio odi abhum aḅol mobꞌogbōgh ẹnam ibꞌaruugu obho, ugbaany ooḍigh opopo (obho ughōl nạ zodi eru nꞌaSetan obho) keḍio ạkasiom zodi ạrol ọonir nꞌạmaḍian ạsia.
Otelema bho anyu zodi ạlogh tobꞌoonu obho, aghuughi ạkasiom zodi ạḍine, molo odi oobiōghōm mu ruubhugh obho ninii ịzal ọonir nꞌạmaḍian ạsia bho etu etẹn, keḍio tomutiom odi mọbam amen.

Keḍio ạami umina ụmiin rạtolom ạruula nꞌeedi obo bho ịrologhom obho. Nọonogho zeedi mịnyaam ọru ịiruan. Ạami ạmiin nạ mạruumugh obo bho ụze mebum obho eedi ịgba magey obho tạJizos nꞌọnuekpete tẸnaan obho. Eedi iikpulughu ạni ḍio molobhir ẹnam obho bolobolo eru obhꞌodi. Eedi iguaay ạni nạ ḍio tegbodo bolobolo tạravo eedi melẹkẹ ẹnam obho. Eedi imula taghuḍum ẹḅar maKraist ẹda mẹmar-arōoy obho kạruula mịzal ọonir nꞌạmaḍian ạsia.
(Arōoy ipedi obho nẹebho bho imula ạni ḍio taghuḍum ninii ịzal ọonir nꞌạmaḍian ạsia bho iru itẹn.) Oobho pọḅel oḅerenu tọbho bho.

Ọḅaal ologhi nꞌigbōgh ạlisebh tẹtol ni ẹnogho zodi obo bho taḅetunu ạni tọḅel oḅerenu tọbho bho. Ọbho bho agbẹbhiōm ịzal obho ọteeny io mịnyaam teedi; eedi tetu marōoy iiḅua tẸnaan nꞌaKraist, keḍio eedi nꞌodi tẹda mẹmar-arōoy obho mịzal ọonir nꞌạmaḍian ạsia.
Amen ịzal ọonir nꞌạmaḍian ạsia bho neetẹn, pomutiom eru obho mi tikoli obho,

keḍio odi tamute ạki aabiōghōm ruubhugh obho ịizaranu toomo ẹmar-arōoy obho, obho aru mạGog nꞌạMagog obho. Eru obho tapin oomo eedi atu monyiin esi moḅe ẹgham. Ọlogh obhꞌeedi tẹtol kọosaar ọbhiiny obho.
Keḍio eedi iḍuraan ilela moomo ade bho ikuōm marōoy tẸnaan nꞌẹma oḍigh ologhi obhꞌodi. Keḍio ạnyan ạḍua tạnyu obho aru ạze zeedi.
Odi eru obho obo bho aabiōghōm zeedi obho unyu ụlogh tobꞌegha ạnyan nꞌạkabait, esi obho noonyuughi ụlogh mẹnam obho nꞌiben ozil obho; keḍio tạnogho zeedi mọmiinom muḍugul nꞌootaany, kamen kamen.
Keḍio ạami umina ụmiin mobꞌogbōgh ọḅaal ẹtolom ọolema nꞌodi obo bho ạrolom obho. Ade nꞌạnyu obho ighiil ni ẹḍua taghisigh odi, molo umina ḍio ọmiin.

Keḍio ạami ụmiin mobo bho nẹebho bho, igbōgh nꞌịbam, ịmara taghisigh ẹtolom obho. Keḍio ukpẹnyōgh mịbhereer obho, keḍio umina ukpẹerōn nạ mọnon ọbhereer, ọbhereer aghuḍum obho. Ụru mịiruan obho ọnogho mobo bho nẹebho bho tẹzo ọkpo bho eedi iḍighi obho, tibha ẹzo bho nọoge tịbhereer obho.

Keḍio ọbhiiny obho aru amutiom obho bho ịbho todi obho. Ọbho nꞌẹmir-iḍim ẹkona iru imutiom nạ mobo bho nẹebho bho ibha idi teedi obho. Keḍio ụru mịiruan obho ụnogho moomo eedi tẹzo ọkpo bho eedi iḍighi obho.
Keḍio unyu mọbho nꞌẹmir-iḍim ụlogh tegha ạnyan obho. (Oobho pogbẹbhiōm ịzal ọbho bho.)
Kōoy kōoy olo ụmiin ạni ḍio ḍien odi mi tọbhereer aghuḍum obho, ponyuom nạ ọlogh tegha ạnyan obho.
Keḍio ạami ụmiin omoom ạnyu nꞌomoom ade. Ọḅel ạnyu obho nꞌọḅel ade bho neetẹn epẹ, ạribhiiny obho ẹkona ilo mu nạ.
Keḍio ạami uru ụmiin omoom aJerusạlẹm ẹma iigbia bho, ạḍua tẸnaan asōor natu mi tạnyu obho. Odi naakōbhōghia naḅōrō kạni olo naabura moghẹel totu olom odi.

Pạami ụmoghon moghōrōkō imulughu olo ạḍua tẹtolom obho natu, nạkpete kua, “Nonon ni, amarugh tẸnaan odi nꞌarōoy siibha! Odi tatughan eedi, keḍio eedi tetu marōoy odi. Ẹnaan nịvo nịvo tạtolan eedi, keḍio odi tatu mẸnaan eedi.
Odi tagbul ni moomo izin obhꞌeedi mi tariḍien eedi. Ọbho nꞌịitu nꞌeḍi nꞌẹegama ịrol mụ nạ. Igbaany ọkpo bho neetẹn epẹ ẹḍua.”

Keḍio odi obo bho ạrolom mẹtolom obho ạkpete kua, “Esiibha ạami naaḍighi kạar kạar atẹnẹ mimoom!” Keḍio odi amina ạkpete kua, “Gẹ miibha bho, tebum obho ọnuekpete bhibha iru magey ịneghe ni nạ mobhinom obho.”
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua, “Nooḍighi! Ạami Ạlfa nꞌOmega, ọḅel egbiom nꞌikunughi obho. Todi obo bho ạmuum nẹtal obho, ạami tạnogho ni zodi mụum ozi ạmuum aghuḍum obho odi ạpoghol mịkpo.
Kōoy kōoy olo aḅe apuom ạvo tapin ni tạmi miibha bho. Ạami tatu mẸnaan odi, keḍio odi tatu mọony ạmi.

Ibꞌịtoogh mẹroogh obho, nꞌobo bho ịteeny io mologhi omōruōm obho, nꞌobo iiniom nꞌipesi, nꞌạruukoma, nꞌịva rạani, nꞌobo bho nẹtuugha ghạ mịiḍaany obho, nꞌobo bho neekpulughu ghạ maruru obho, nꞌoomo obo bho nẹgbaay ghạ miben obho, oomo obo bho idi keedi obho, nooguanaan monyuughi eedi ọlogh tegha ạnyan obho naamōr nꞌạkabait obho, obho aru bọ mogbẹbhiōm ịzal ọbho bho.”
Onyiin toḍual aritelema bho ibha ịbham moḍual ạrukpa obhꞌoḍual ạrazegh obho ikunughiom obho, aru tạmi ạkpete kua, “Tue, ạami taḍeeriom ạna mạni ipina bho, ạni obho Ọony Ẹena bho tapin obho.”
Ẹmugh Iigbia bho aru ạsiin ạami, keḍio odi otelema bho abhin ạami ạsiinom tobo ọodoony obꞌeegum. Podi aḍeeriom ạami maJerusạlẹm, Ẹma Iigbia bho, ạḍua tẸnaan natu mi tạnyu obho,
Ẹḅaal eghuan tẸnaan asōorōm mẹma bho molo ạmua kobꞌooḅi ọbharakpar, olo ughōl ạjaspa, olo akela kogharagha.
Odi ẹma bho ạteeny mobꞌẹḅagh-otu olo ạsiiniom magey, nꞌaḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạrunu-otu ilo aḍiōbh nꞌịzal itelema neḅōrō. Tạrunu-otu otu obho nọogeey riḍien aḍiōbh nꞌịzal arughun otu arōoy obhꞌaIzirẹl.
Ẹḅagh esuo rạar-rạar ạrunu-otu, tekẹeny, nꞌoḍiom, nꞌaghisigh, nꞌạman obho.
Ạruḅagh otu odi ẹma bho uḅōgh tạnyu aḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạrubharakpar, ilo teedi nọogiom riḍien aḍiōbh nꞌịzal iteledōm Ọony Ẹena bho.
Otelema bho, obho ạgba bọ mọkpo ạnogho ạami obho, ạteeny ọtuom oorẹeny olo ụlemom agold, mọtuom ẹma bho, nꞌạrunu-otu nꞌạruḅagh otu obhꞌodi.
Inya ạruukul ẹma bho. Ạlidoony obho nꞌẹreghe obho iileeny ni. Potelema bho aru ạto mẹma bho nꞌọtuom obhꞌodi. Ạlidoony obho ịraar ọonir nꞌoḍual ạraala nꞌaḍisibh atobi, ẹreghe bho onyiin ẹzo bho.
Otelema bho ẹkona ạtuom nạ mẹḅagh otu obho. Ạnyu obho ạmaḍian ọonir nꞌaḍiōbh nꞌodiin ẹeḅa alẹkẹ, kẹzo ịitooy arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho.
Uḅōghōm ạjaspa mạruḅagh otu obho, keḍio odi ẹma bho nịvo nịvo uḅōghōm ạkar agold molo nạmua kạtaḅaliki.
Ade ariisi obho uḅōgh bọ mạruḅagh otu obho, uḅologhom moomo oḍigh kẹrekere ibꞌiiḅi ạrubharakpar. Ọḅel obho uḅōghōm ạjaspa, obho agbẹbhiōm ịzal ạsafair, ogbẹbhiōm ịraar aget, ogbẹbhiōm inya ẹmerold,

ogbẹbhiōm ōogh ọniks, ogbẹbhiōm odiin akanelian, ogbẹbhiōm oḍual ọḅaar ạkuats, ogbẹbhiōm ạbhenya ạberil, ogbẹbhiōm esugho ạtopas, obho agbẹbhiōm ḍiōbh ạkalsidoni, obho agbẹbhiōm ḍiōbh nꞌonyiin obho ạtukuos, obho agbẹbhiōm ḍiōbh nꞌịzal obho ạmetist.
Aḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạrunu-otu obho, paḍiōbh nꞌịzal ạrubharakpar ilo nẹmua; eguugh esuo uḍighiom onyiin onyiin eedi ạrubharakpar obho. Ogbo-ebōom ẹma bho uḅolom ạkar agold, olo nẹmua kạtaḅaliki.
Ạami ụmiin io motu iikpulughu mi tẹma bho, ebum obho otu iikpulughu obhꞌodi aru mẸnaan, Obạmọogh oomo ẹmiriikpo bho, nꞌỌony Ẹena bho.
Ạar oḍighiom aghōzōgh nꞌụvanyu mi tẹma bho olo, ebum obho eghuan obho tẸnaan nạmua moomo odi. Ọony Ẹena bho pọtodi odi ẹma bho.
Arōoy ẹmar-arōoy obho tetele tẹḅaal odi, keḍio ạruula ade bho tepin mẹela bhꞌeedi etu todi.
Aruguugh ẹma bho ughughi ghạ ḍio, ebum obho aḍio okul mu tẹma bho.
Ạlibugh nꞌẹela ạraama ẹmar-arōoy obho topin otu todi ẹma bho.

Keḍio bọbon ạar olo ọneghe ḍio olo tọloghom tẹma bho olo. Bọbon ōoy olo naḍighi ghạ mọkpo ạregheer, nꞌịgba miben olo taḍigh nạ olo. Obo bho ariḍien eedi nọoge ụlogh tọbhereer aghuḍum Ọony Ẹna bho be mobo teḍigh tẹma bho.
Keḍio odi otelema bho amina aḍeeriom ạami mọbhiiny ạmuum aghuḍum olo nẹnyan kogharaghar, igbōr tẹtolom ọolema tẸnaan nꞌỌony Ẹena bho,

iru isi togbo ebōom ẹma bho. Oorẹeny aghuḍum obho asi tịzal ẹḅeenyom ọbhiiny obho. Odi nạloki ghạ mikpo ḍiōbh nꞌịzal amen mẹmu ạla. Ụvanyu esuo amen amen ọloki; asigo bhꞌodi ilo ookuōm arōoy aruubhugh obho.
Bọbon ạar olo Ẹnaan naarōnyōgh olo tọmiin todi ẹma bho olo.
Ẹtolom ọolema bho tẸnaan nꞌỌony Ẹena bho tẹtol ni todi ẹma bho, keḍio ạrubana bhꞌodi teekpulughu zodi.
Eedi tẹmiin ni ghisigh odi, keḍio tọge ni maḍien odi mi taragbodo bhꞌeedi.
Aḍio oghul mu, molo ạar omina oḍighiom ọtodi bolobolo ẹḅaal ẹkona olo, ebum obho Ẹnaan Obạmọogh obho tatu mẹḅaal eedi, keḍio eedi tẹda ẹto mịto kạruula kamen kamen.

Keḍio otelema bho ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, “Ọnuekpete bhibha agey, ilo ịneghe ni mobhinom. Keḍio Ẹnaan Obạmọogh obho, obo bho ạnogho mẸmugh odi marizil obho, arōm motelema odi mọgba oḍeeriom ạrubana odi mọkpo bho netu momute esiibha bho.”
ẠJizos nạkpete kua, “Ịmoghon. Ạami natu siibha siibha! Ọḅaal ologhi tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho ighiilaan mọnuekpete ạghiiny ibhꞌọbhereer obhobho bho!”
Ạami, ạJon, nạamoghon ạmiin nạ moomo ọkpo bhibha. Amen ạami ụmoghon ụmiin ụḅele zeedi ọkpo bhibha, pạami ugbuluman tasike odi otelema bho, obho aḍeeriom ạami mọkpo bhibha bho, uukpulughu zodi.
Podi ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, “Uḍighi ghạ kua! Ạami onyiin ẹbana konuma nꞌaburumōr onuma ibha iru rizil obho, nꞌoomo obo bho ighiilaan iikō mọnuekpete ọbhereer obhobho bho. Kpukpulughu mẸnaan.”
Keḍio odi ạkpete kua ạnogho ạami, “Ụḅoki ghạ mọnuekpete ạghiiny ọbhereer obhobho, ebum obho naatuan mamen oomo ọkpo bhibha temuteghu obho.

Odi obo bho aru mọkarabh obho aḍighi ghạ ni be mịkarabh odi ạghi taghisigh, obo bho aḍigh ẹenir oḍighi ịkarabh obho ạrolom tịkarabh odi; obo bho naḍighi ghạ miiḅi obho aḍighi ghạ ni be miiḅi odi ạghi taghisigh, kōoy kōoy olo ịkarabh ilo ạrol nạ kua ạghi taghisigh!”
ẠJizos nạkpete kua, “Ịmoghon, ạami natu siibha siibha! Ạami naabhin mạmukpe ạmi natu mọnogho kōoy kōoy tẹzo eḍighiom ạar ibha odi aḍighi obho.
Ạami Ạlfa nꞌOmega, ọḅel nꞌobho akunughiom obho, ọḅel egbiom obho nꞌikunughi obho.”
Ạlisebh tẹtol ni ẹnogho mobo bho iitōl mạradoni eedi ịḅaaleni obho, ibha nẹeteeny mịnyaam ole ekpo oorẹeny aghuḍum obho, nꞌọḅol tạrunu-otu obho oḍigh ạni tẹma bho.
Teḅughotu ẹma bho, pesi obo iiniom nꞌipesi, nꞌobo neḍighi ghạ mịiḍaany, nꞌịva rạani, nꞌạruukoma, nꞌobo bho neekpulughu ghạ maruru obho, nꞌịgba miben mi tọnuekpete nꞌeḍighiom ạar eedi.
“Ạami, ạJizos, urōm motelema ạmi aru mọgba ọkpo bhibha ọnogho enyina obo bho idi mi tạrasosi obho. Ạami olꞌeghun taDevid. Ạami ẹenaany obho nạmu ạnogho mẹḅaal ụḍirogh obho.”
Ẹmugh obho nꞌạni ipina bho nepeleghi ekōl kua, “Tue!”
Kōoy kōoy olo ạmoghon nạ miibha bho aghōl nạ kua, “Tue!”
Obo bho ạmuum nẹtal obho aru, abhin mụum aghuḍum obho mịkpo.

Ạami, ạJon, ụmaar ni adeny naakiom kōoy kōoy olo ạmoghon mọnuekpete ạghiiny ọbhereer obhobho: erumolo onyiin ōoy ạloghom mạar ạḅaram teedi, pẸnaan ọlogh nạ ọḅaram tạrazegh obho ụḍeghe tọbhereer obhobho obho, ọliom odi.

Kerumolo onyiin ōoy ạsoghoron monyiin ạar mi tọnuekpete ạghiiny ọbhereer obhobho bho, pẸnaan ọsoghoron abin odi mi tikpo oorẹeny aghuḍum obho, nꞌabin ibhꞌodi mi tẸma Iigbia bho, ibha ụḍeghe mi tọbhereer obhobho bho.
Obo bho ạmiin kụ nạgba moomo ọkpo bhibha bho, nạkpete nạ kua, “Agey nạ ni! Ạami natu siibha siibha!”
Ẹrol ni nạ kua. ẠJizos Obạmọogh, tue!
Inwo bho tạJizos Obạmọogh obho ẹrolan nꞌoomo enyina.
